translation.en: tuberculosis ( tb ) is man 's oldest infectious killer , and it remains such a serious health threat that the world health organization ( who ) compares it to a time bomb .
translation.zu: na tb i stap yet olsem wanpela sik bilong bagarapim tru ol man , olsem na lain wol helt oganaisesen ( who ) i tok , sik tb i kain olsem bom i wet long pairap .

translation.en: " we are in a race against time , " warns a who report on tb .
translation.zu: wanpela ripot bilong lain who long sik tb i tok : " taim i sot pinis . "

translation.en: if man fails to defuse this bomb , he may one day face a drug - resistant disease that " spreads through the air , yet is virtually as incurable as aids . "
translation.zu: sapos ol i no pasim sik tb , ating bihain em bai kamap wanpela sik i winim strong bilong ol marasin , na em i save ' kalap long ol man long rot bilong win , na ol dokta i no inap oraitim olsem ol i no inap oraitim sik aids . '

translation.en: the time has come , urges who , to wake up to tb 's devastating potential .
translation.zu: lain who i tok , nau em taim bilong tingim gut ol samting nogut tru em sik tb inap kamapim .

translation.en: " everyone who breathes air , from wall street to the great wall . . . , needs to worry about this risk . "
translation.zu: dispela lain i tok : ' olgeta man i save pulim win long olgeta hap , ol i mas tingting planti olsem ol inap kisim dispela sik . '

translation.en: hardly .
translation.zu: nogat .

translation.en: just imagine how wide - awake the world would be if a disease threatened to rage out of control and erase the entire population of , say , canada in ten years !
translation.zu: olgeta man bai kirap nogut na tingting planti sapos wanpela sik i wok long i go nabaut na insait long 10 - pela yia em i pinisim olgeta manmeri bilong kanada !

translation.en: though this sounds like fiction , the threat is real .
translation.zu: maski dispela i olsem stori nating , em inap kamap .

translation.en: some 20 million people now suffer from active tb , and some 30 million could die from it in the next ten years - a number larger than the population of canada . - see the box " tb 's global grip , " on page 22 .
translation.zu: long nau inap 20 milion manmeri i gat sik tb , na 30 milion ol inap i dai long en insait long 10 - pela yia - dispela namba i winim namba bilong ol manmeri i sindaun long kanada . - lukim blok " tb i strong tru long olgeta hap , " long pes 20 .

translation.en: today , however , there is hope .
translation.zu: tasol long nau i gat samting bilong helpim ol man .

translation.en: after ten years of testing , researchers have come up with a strategy that may reduce tb from being a killer on the loose to being a criminal under siege .
translation.zu: ol saveman i bin traim traim sampela samting inap 10 - pela yia , na nau ol i kamapim wanpela samting em inap mekim na sik tb i no inap bagarapim planti man .

translation.en: dr . hiroshi nakajima , former director - general of who , called this new strategy " one of the most important public health breakthroughs of this decade . "
translation.zu: dairekta - jeneral bilong lain wol helt oganaisesen long bipo , em dokta hiroshi nakajima , em i tok olsem dispela nupela samting " em i nambawan bikpela samting ol man i bin mekim bilong helpim ol lain i gat sik long dispela taim bilong yumi . "

translation.en: and dr . arata kochi , director of the who global tb programme , says that it offers the first - ever chance to " reverse the tb epidemic . "
translation.zu: na dairekta bilong wanpela lain ( who global tb programme ) , em dokta arata kochi , em i tok olsem dispela em i namba wan taim i gat rot bilong " daunim sik tb . "

translation.en: the cause of all this excitement ?
translation.zu: wanem samting i mekim na ol dispela man i amamas ?

translation.en: a method called dots .
translation.zu: em wanpela pasin ol i kolim dots .

translation.en: it is a health management system that can cure most tb patients in six to eight months without their spending a single day in the hospital .
translation.zu: klostu olgeta man i gat sik tb , ol inap orait insait long 6 - pela i go inap 8 - pela mun , na ol i no slip liklik long haus sik .

translation.en: if any of the elements are missing , notes who , the ability to cure tb victims " slips through our fingers . "
translation.zu: lain who i tok , sapos ol i lusim wanpela bilong dispela 5 - pela samting na ol i no mekim , wok bilong oraitim sik tb " i lus nating . "

translation.en: what are these elements ?
translation.zu: wanem dispela 5 - pela samting ?

translation.en: observed : the second element of dots makes the health system - not the patient - responsible for achieving a cure .
translation.zu: ( o ) lukim ol : namba tu samting bilong dots , em i putim wok long ol lain bilong helt - i no long sikman - long stretim sik bilong em .

translation.en: ( see the box " why on the rise - again ? "
translation.zu: ( lukim blok " bilong wanem em i go bikpela gen ? "

translation.en: on page 22 . )
translation.zu: long pes 20 . )

translation.en: after just a few weeks of medication , they start feeling better and stop taking their pills .
translation.zu: taim ol i kisim marasin inap sampela wik tasol , ol i pilim olsem sik bilong ol i orait liklik , na nau ol i lusim marasin .

translation.en: yet , the medication must be taken for six to eight months in order to rid the body of all tb bacilli .
translation.zu: tasol ol i mas kisim dispela marasin inap 6 - pela i go 8 - pela mun na bai binatang bilong sik tb i ken pinis olgeta long skin .

translation.en: in that way , they make sure that patients are fully cured and cannot pass the infection on to others .
translation.zu: long dispela pasin ol inap save tru olsem sik bilong em i pinis olgeta na em i no inap givim long ol narapela man .

translation.en: short - course : using the right combination and the right amount of anti - tb drugs , known as short - course chemotherapy , for the right length of time is the fourth element of the dots strategy .
translation.zu: dispela pasin i olsem kimoterapi bilong sotpela taim , long wanem , namba 4 samting bilong dots long oraitim dispela sik , em sikman i mas bihainim taim stret ol i makim bilong kisim dispela marasin .

translation.en: ● 5 . ! : who expresses this fifth element of the dots strategy by means of an exclamation mark at the end of dots !
translation.zu: ● 5 . ! : bilong makim namba 5 samting bilong dots , lain who i putim mak long pinis bilong dots !

translation.en: the world bank has ranked dots as " one of the most cost - effective interventions available in fighting . . . disease . "
translation.zu: wol beng i makim dots em ' wanpela gutpela rot bilong daunim sik na i no pinisim bikpela mani bilong mekim dispela wok . '

translation.en: low costs , however , do not rule out high payoffs .
translation.zu: tasol maski pe bilong en i liklik tasol , em inap helpim moa yet ol man .

translation.en: how well does it work ?
translation.zu: dispela pasin i save wok gut o nogat ?

translation.en: who representatives announced in march 1997 that the limited use of the dots strategy was " causing the global tb epidemic to level off for the first time in decades . "
translation.zu: long mas 1997 , lain who i tokaut olsem dispela pasin ( dots ) ol i mekim wok long en long sampela hap , dispela i mekim na ' namba bilong ol man i kisim sik tb i go daun - em namba wan taim insait long planti yia . '

translation.en: in india " dots has been applied in demonstration areas covering over 12 million people . . . .
translation.zu: long india ' ol i bin traim wok bilong dots long sampela hap i gat 12 milion manmeri i sindaun long en .

translation.en: in china , pilot projects were " a stunning success , " with a cure rate of 94 percent .
translation.zu: long saina ol i traim dispela pasin na em " i kamap gutpela tru , " - klostu olgeta ( olsem 94 pesen ) ol i orait .

translation.en: in one south african city , " more than 80 percent [ of the tb patients ] are being successfully treated . "
translation.zu: long wanpela biktaun long saut afrika , ol i bihainim dispela pasin na ' planti man i gat sik tb ( olsem 80 pesen ) ol i orait . '

translation.en: recently , dots was also instituted in new york city , with impressive results . the findings of field tests in several dozen countries , concludes dr .
translation.zu: nau long dispela taim ol i kirapim dispela wok bilong dots long nu yok siti na gutpela samting tru i kamap long dispela wok .

translation.en: no boom - but progress
translation.zu: i no olgeta kantri i mekim

translation.en: with a treatment that can practically defeat one of man 's deadliest infectious killers easily and inexpensively , you would expect the dots strategy to be booming .
translation.zu: nau ol i gat dispela gutpela marasin bilong pinisim dispela sik nogut tru i save kalap long ol man na kilim ol i dai , olsem na yumi ting planti kantri bai i gat laik long mekim wok long dispela pasin dots .

translation.en: indeed , at the beginning of 1996 , only 34 countries had implemented the strategy nationwide .
translation.zu: long 1996 , i gat 34 kantri tasol i kirapim dispela wok long olgeta hap insait long kantri .

translation.en: even so , there is progress .
translation.zu: tasol isi isi dispela wok i kamap gutpela .

translation.en: reportedly , in 1998 some 96 countries were using the dots strategy .
translation.zu: ol i tok , long 1998 i gat olsem 96 kantri ol i mekim wok long dispela pasin dots .

translation.en: if more countries rally around dots , the annual number of tb cases ' will be cut in half in just a decade . '
translation.zu: sapos sampela kantri moa i bihainim dispela pasin , ' namba bilong ol lain i kisim sik tb long olgeta yia bai i go daun tru insait long 10 - pela yia . '

translation.en: says dr . kochi : " we have a proven health care package which only needs to be used more widely . "
translation.zu: dokta kochi i tok : ' yumi gat wanpela gutpela samting tru bilong helpim ol man , tasol planti lain moa ol i mas mekim wok long en . '

translation.en: since man has the knowledge and the tools to fight against tb successfully , the only thing that is lacking is the ' people who will see that these medicines are put to use throughout the world . '
translation.zu: ol man i gat save na ol marasin bilong daunim sik tb , tasol wanpela samting i sot - em ' ol man bilong kirapim olgeta kantri long mekim wok long ol dispela marasin . '

translation.en: no wonder that in a publication directed to physicians and other health workers worldwide , who asks : " what are we all waiting for ? "
translation.zu: olsem na long wanpela nius bilong helpim ol dokta na ol narapela lain bilong helt , lain who i askim olsem : " bilong wanem yumi wet yet long mekim wok long ol dispela samting ? "

translation.zu: sampela bilong ol dispela marasin em isoniazid , rifampin , pyrazinamide , streptomycin , ethambutol .

translation.en: why on the rise - again ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem em i go bikpela gen ?

translation.en: the cure for tuberculosis ( tb ) was discovered more than four decades ago .
translation.zu: ol i bin painim marasin bilong stretim sik tb inap 40 yia i go pinis .

translation.en: since then , over 120 million people have died of tb , and nearly 3 million more people will die this year .
translation.zu: kirap long dispela taim na i kam inap nau , inap olsem 120 milion manmeri ol i bin dai long dispela sik , na sampela milion moa bai dai long dispela yia .

translation.en: why are so many people still dying from tb when there is a cure ?
translation.zu: tasol i gat marasin bilong stretim sik tb , olsem na bilong wanem planti planti man i save dai yet long dispela sik ?

translation.en: the eyes of the world are focused on such infectious diseases as aids and ebola .
translation.zu: long olgeta hap bilong graun ol man i wok long tingim ol sik nogut i save kalap long man olsem aids na ebola .

translation.en: in 1995 , however , for every person who died of ebola , 12,000 died of tb .
translation.zu: tasol long 1995 , long olgeta wan wan man i bin dai long sik ebola , i gat 12,000 ol i dai long sik tb .

translation.en: in fact , tb is so common in developing countries that people there have come to view the disease as a fact of life .
translation.zu: long ol kantri i no gat planti mani , planti man ol i gat sik tb , olsem na ol i tingim dispela sik i olsem wanpela hevi bilong i stap bilong ol na ol i mas karim tasol .

translation.en: meanwhile , in the richer countries , tb has been allowed to spread even while effective medicines to cure it sit on the shelves .
translation.zu: na long ol kantri i gat planti mani , ol i bin larim sik tb i go nabaut , na ol gutpela marasin bilong oraitim dispela sik ol i stap nating tasol .

translation.en: while the world 's concern about tb was weakening , the tb bacilli were growing stronger .
translation.zu: na taim ol i wok long lusim tingting long sik tb , ol binatang bilong en i wok long kamap strong moa .

translation.en: today they attack more people in more countries than ever before in human history .
translation.zu: long nau ol dispela binatang i save kalap long planti man moa na long planti kantri moa , winim olgeta taim bipo .

translation.en: hiv ⁄ aids .
translation.zu: hiv na aids .

translation.en: tb is a traveling companion of hiv and aids .
translation.zu: sik tb em i poroman bilong hiv na aids .

translation.en: no wonder that the current worldwide hiv epidemic has caused an increase in the number of tb patients as well !
translation.zu: long nau dispela sik aids i go bikpela tru long olgeta hap , na dispela i mekim na namba bilong ol man i kisim sik tb em tu i go bikpela !

translation.en: it is estimated that 266,000 hiv - positive people died from tb in 1997 .
translation.zu: ol i ting inap 266,000 manmeri i gat sik aids ol i bin dai long sik tb long 1997 .

translation.en: " these are the men and women , " says peter piot , director of the joint united nations programme on hiv / aids , " who didn 't benefit from the inexpensive anti - tb medicines they needed to cure their tuberculosis . "
translation.zu: peter piot , em dairekta bilong wanpela wok bilong yunaitet nesen long hiv na aids , em i tok , " dispela lain em ol man na meri i no bin kisim helpim long ol marasin bilong oraitim sik tb bilong ol , na ol dispela marasin i gat liklik pe tasol . "

translation.en: " superbugs , " immune to man 's antibiotic arsenal , are the stuff of science fiction , but in the case of tb , they are rapidly becoming a fact .
translation.zu: ol man i save raitim ol stori nating long ol binatang i gat bikpela strong moa na ol inap sakim olgeta marasin ol man i kamapim . tasol nau ol binatang bilong sik tb i wok long mekim tru dispela samting .

translation.en: more than 50 million people may already be infected with multidrug - resistant ( mdr ) tb .
translation.zu: ol i ting inap 50 milion manmeri i kisim pinis dispela kain binatang bilong sik tb i gat strong long sakim planti marasin wantaim .

translation.en: when they become sick again , the disease may be harder to treat because the surviving bacteria fight back and triumph over every available anti - tb medicine .
translation.zu: orait taim dispela sik i kisim ol gen , ating nau bai i hatwok moa long stretim , long wanem , ol binatang i stap yet long skin ol i gat strong long sakim olgeta kain marasin bilong sik tb .

translation.en: as a result , the patients end up with a type of tb that is incurable - for them and for whomever they may infect .
translation.zu: em nau , ol dispela man bai kisim wanpela kain sik tb i no gat marasin bilong pinisim long skin bilong ol yet na bilong ol narapela man ol i givim dispela sik long ol .

translation.en: and once this deadly mdr genie is out of the bottle , we are left with the grim question , will man be able to put it back ?
translation.zu: orait taim dispela strongpela binatang bilong bagarapim man i go nabaut , bai yumi tingting planti na yumi askim olsem : ol man inap pasim dispela kain sik tb i gat strong long sakim planti marasin wantaim o nogat ?

translation.en: the tuberculosis ( tb ) epidemic is growing more sizable , more expensive , and more deadly by the year .
translation.zu: long olgeta yia , sik tb i wok long go bikpela moa , na i pinisim bikpela mani moa , na em i gat bikpela strong moa long bagarapim man .

translation.en: here are some examples : " pakistan has been losing the war against tuberculosis . "
translation.zu: olsem : " pakistan i no inap daunim sik tb . "

translation.en: " tuberculosis has returned to thailand with a vengeance . "
translation.zu: " sik tb i kamap gen long tailan na em i gat bikpela strong moa . "

translation.en: " tuberculosis has maintained a tenacious grip on mexico 's people . "
translation.zu: ' sik tb i wok yet long kisim planti man long meksiko . '

translation.en: in russia " the incidence of tb is rising sharply . "
translation.zu: long rasia , ' sik tb i wok long go bikpela tru . '

translation.en: although 95 out of every 100 tb patients live in the world 's poorer countries , tb is tightening its grip on rich countries as well .
translation.zu: tru , long olgeta 100 100 manmeri i gat sik tb , inap 95 ol i sindaun long ol kantri i stap rabis . tasol dispela sik i wok long kamap strong tu long ol kantri i gat planti mani .

translation.en: the united states saw a sharp rise in reported tb cases during the early 1990 ' s .
translation.zu: long yunaitet stets , sik tb i go bikpela namel long 1990 na 1994 samting .

translation.en: u.s . journalist valery gartseff notes that tb " has once more returned to haunt americans . " likewise , dr .
translation.zu: wanpela niusmeri bilong dispela hap , em valery gartseff , em i tok , sik tb ' i kamap strong gen long amerika . '

translation.en: jaap broekmans , director of the royal netherlands tb association , said recently that the tb epidemic has " begun to worsen in eastern europe and parts of western europe . "
translation.zu: na i no longtaim i go pinis na dokta jaap broekmans , em dairekta bilong wanpela lain ( royal netherlands tb association ) , em i tok , sik tb i ' wok long kisim planti man moa long isten yurop na long sampela hap bilong westen yurop . '

translation.en: not surprisingly , the journal science , of august 22 , 1997 , states that " tuberculosis continues to be a major health threat . "
translation.zu: olsem na nius science , bilong ogas 22 , 1997 , i tok olsem ' sik tb i stap yet olsem wanpela bikpela sik i kisim planti man . '

translation.en: researchers recently succeeded in documenting the entire genetic blueprint of the tuberculosis ( tb ) bacterium .
translation.zu: nau tasol ol saveman i bin kisim save long raitim olgeta samting bilong ol jin i stap long binatang bilong sik tb .

translation.en: this feat marks " a new phase in the battle against one of mankind 's most successful predators , " says dr . douglas young , of the imperial college school of medicine in london .
translation.zu: dokta douglas young , bilong wanpela bikpela skul long landon ( imperial college school of medicine ) , i tok , dispela samting ol i mekim i " kirapim wanpela nupela wok bilong daunim dispela samting nogut tru bilong bagarapim ol man . "

translation.en: the world health organization reports that this discovery " could prove invaluable to future research on anti - tb drugs and vaccines . " - the tb treatment observer , september 15 , 1998 .
translation.zu: wol helt oganaisesen i tok , dispela samting ol i painim pinis , " bihain em inap helpim tru ol saveman i wok long painim sampela marasin moa bilong daunim sik tb . " - nius the tb treatment observer , septemba 15 , 1998 .

translation.zu: " tok bilong en i gutpela tru ! "

translation.en: how can young people find a purpose in life , understand themselves , or learn to get along well with their parents ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ol yangpela i ken painim gutpela as bilong i stap bilong ol , na save gut long ol yet , o lain long pas gut wantaim papamama ?

translation.en: recently , the branch office of jehovah 's witnesses in spain received a letter , which said in part :
translation.zu: i no longtaim i go pinis brens - ofis bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long spen i kisim wanpela pas i tok :

translation.en: " my reason for writing is to congratulate you fervently for the good work you do in publishing marvelous books , such as the one entitled questions young people ask - answers that work .
translation.zu: " mi raitim dispela pas , long wanem , mi laik tok amamas tru long yupela long gutpela wok yupela i mekim long kamapim ol gutpela buk , olsem buk i gat het - tok , sampela askim bilong ol yangpela - ol gutpela bekim .

translation.en: i congratulate the writers and publishers , who have fulfilled the dreams of thousands of young people .
translation.zu: mi laik tok amamas long ol man i raitim na wokim dispela buk ; ol i inapim laik bilong planti tausen yangpela .

translation.en: " i am a 21 - year - old girl who had previously sought out and studied the bible . . . .
translation.zu: " mi wanpela meri i gat 21 krismas na bipo mi painim rot na stadi long baibel . . . .

translation.en: quite by chance , through a friend , the book questions young people ask - answers that work came into my possession .
translation.zu: long rot bilong wanpela pren , mi kisim dispela buk sampela askim bilong ol yangpela - ol gutpela bekim .

translation.en: " at first i thought that it would be of no help to me , but little by little , my interest in reading it grew .
translation.zu: " pastaim mi ting dispela buk i no inap helpim mi , tasol isi isi laik bilong mi long kaunim dispela buk i wok long kamap .

translation.en: it made me think about many things , such as what i should do with my life , and gradually it answered my questions .
translation.zu: dispela buk i kirapim mi long tingim planti samting , olsem mi mas mekim wanem long i stap bilong mi , na isi isi em i bekim ol askim bilong mi .

translation.en: with that treasure in my hands , i learned how to understand my parents , how to forgive , and how to be a woman and act like one . "
translation.zu: dispela gutpela buk i helpim mi long pilim gut tingting bilong papamama bilong mi , na lusim rong bilong narapela , na stap olsem wanpela meri tru na mekim pasin olsem meri tru . "

translation.en: if you would like to benefit from the information in the young people ask book , you can receive a copy by filling in and mailing the accompanying coupon to the address shown on the coupon or to an appropriate address listed on page 5 of this magazine .
translation.zu: sapos yu laik ol tok bilong buk sampela askim bilong ol yangpela i helpim yu , yu ken kisim wanpela sapos yu raitim nem na atres long hap daunbilo na salim i go long atres i stap long en o long atres i stap long pes 5 bilong dispela nius .

translation.en: □ send me the book questions young people ask - answers that work .
translation.zu: □ salim wanpela buk sampela askim bilong ol yangpela - ol gutpela bekim long mi .

translation.en: " a third of the natural world has been destroyed by human activity in the past 25 years . "
translation.zu: " wok ol man i bin mekim insait long 25 yia i go pinis i bagarapim bikpela hap bilong ol bikbus na ol samting bilong graun . "

translation.en: so reports the world wide fund for nature .
translation.zu: em tok bilong wanpela lain ( world wide fund for nature ) .

translation.en: the marine environment has suffered a 30 - percent loss , evident in the decline of such species as the bluefin tuna in the atlantic and the leatherback turtle in asian waters .
translation.zu: inap 30 pesen bilong ol samting i stap long solwara ol i pinis , na yumi save , long wanem , namba bilong blufin tuna pis long solwara atlantik na ol traipela trausel ( leatherback ) long ol solwara bilong esia , ol i wok long pinis .

translation.en: worst of all is the 50 - percent drop in the freshwater ecosystems index , blamed mainly on increasing agricultural and industrial pollution together with much greater water consumption .
translation.zu: samting i nogut moa em mak bilong wara . wanpela samting ol i kolim freshwater ecosystems index i kamapim klia olsem mak bilong wara i bin go daun inap 50 pesen .

translation.en: " the conservation of natural ecosystems is not a luxury which only the rich can afford , " comments sir ghillian prance , director of the royal botanical gardens at kew , london , england , " but is essential to ensure the maintenance of the vital ecological functions of our planet upon which we all depend for our survival . "
translation.zu: na tu , ol i save mekim bikpela wok moa long wara . wanpela dairekta bilong ol gaden ( royal botanical gardens ) long kyu , landon , inglan , em bikman ghillian prance , em i tok : ' pasin bilong lukautim ol samting bilong graun i wok gut wantaim bilong helpim ol samting long i stap laip , em i no samting ol maniman tasol inap mekim nabaut long en .

translation.en: so how can a lasting global solution be achieved ?
translation.zu: orait , olsem wanem ol dispela hevi bilong graun bai pinis ?

translation.en: interestingly , the last book of the bible , revelation , refers to those who ruin the earth .
translation.zu: laspela buk bilong baibel , em kamapim tok hait , em i toktok long ol man i bagarapim graun .

translation.en: it foretells a time when such ones will themselves be brought to ruin .
translation.zu: em i tok profet long wanpela taim bai kamap na ol dispela man yet ol bai bagarap . olsem wanem ?

translation.en: will there be survivors ?
translation.zu: i gat man bai abrusim bagarap ?

translation.en: yes , because this will come about through the intervention of " jehovah god , the almighty , " who has the only solution to this earth 's environmental problems and the power to carry it out .
translation.zu: tru tumas , sampela man bai abrusim bagarap , long wanem , dispela samting bai kamap long rot bilong jehova , em " god i gat olgeta strong . " em tasol inap stretim ol hevi bilong ol samting long graun na em i gat strong bilong mekim .

translation.en: revelation 21 : 3 describes a time when god " will reside with [ mankind ] , and they will be his peoples . "
translation.zu: kamapim tok hait 21 : 3 i stori long wanpela taim bai kamap na god " bai i stap wantaim ol [ man ] , na em bai i stap god bilong ol . "

translation.en: how can you become one of ' his people ' and have the prospect of seeing the present - day decline of earth 's environment reversed ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem yu ken kamap wanpela ' man o meri bilong em ' na yu inap long lukim ol samting bilong graun nau ol i wok long bagarap taim ol i kamap gutpela gen ?

translation.en: please contact jehovah 's witnesses in your area by writing to one of the addresses on page 5 .
translation.zu: yu ken salim pas long ol witnes bilong jehova i stap long hap bilong yu , long wanpela atres i stap long pes 5 .

translation.en: or talk with them the next time they visit your home .
translation.zu: o yu ken toktok wantaim ol long narapela taim ol i kam long haus bilong yu .

translation.en: they will gladly help you learn more about what you can do right now to be ready when god shortly intervenes .
translation.zu: ol bai amamas long helpim yu long kisim sampela save moa long samting yu ken mekim nau bilong redi taim god i kirap mekim ol samting liklik taim .

translation.en: as told by michiko ogawa
translation.zu: em stori bilong michiko ogawa

translation.en: on april 29 , 1969 , i received a call from the police .
translation.zu: long epril 29 , 1969 , polis i ringim mi .

translation.en: my husband , seikichi , had been injured in a traffic accident and was in the hospital .
translation.zu: man bilong mi , seikichi , em i bin kisim bagarap long rot na em i slip long haus sik .

translation.en: i left my two young sons with a friend and rushed over there .
translation.zu: mi lusim tupela pikinini man bilong mi wantaim wanpela pren na mi siksti i go long haus sik .

translation.en: let me tell you about our family and how we have managed .
translation.zu: mi laik stori long famili bilong mipela na olsem wanem mipela i bin karim dispela hevi .

translation.en: i was born in february 1940 in sanda , near kobe , japan .
translation.zu: mama i karim mi long februeri 1940 long sanda , klostu long kobe , japan .

translation.en: we were married on february 16 , 1964 .
translation.zu: mipela i marit long februeri 16 , 1964 .

translation.en: my husband was a man of few words , but he loved children .
translation.zu: man bilong mi em i no man bilong toktok , tasol em i laikim tru ol pikinini .

translation.en: in time , we had two boys , ryusuke and kohei .
translation.zu: bihain , mipela i kamapim tupela pikinini man , ryusuke na kohei .

translation.en: seikichi was employed at a construction company in tokyo , so after we married we lived in one of its suburbs .
translation.zu: seikichi i wok long wanpela kampani bilong sanapim ol haus long tokyo , olsem na taim mipela i marit pinis , mipela i sindaun long wanpela hap bilong dispela biktaun .

translation.en: in october of 1967 , i was visited by a young woman who introduced herself as a bible teacher .
translation.zu: long oktoba 1967 , wanpela yangpela meri i kam long haus bilong mipela , na em i tok em i save lainim ol man long baibel .

translation.en: i have my own bible , " i said .
translation.zu: mi gat baibel bilong mi yet . "

translation.en: " may i see the bible ? " she asked .
translation.zu: em i askim mi olsem : " mi inap lukim baibel bilong yu ? "

translation.en: i took the bible from our bookshelf - it belonged to seikichi - and let her see it .
translation.zu: mi kisim baibel long kabot bilong mipela na givim long em - em baibel bilong seikichi .

translation.en: she showed me the name jehovah in it .
translation.zu: meri i soim nem jehova long dispela baibel .

translation.en: i never knew that this was god 's name .
translation.zu: mi no bin save olsem dispela em nem bilong god .

translation.en: the woman , observing my two small children , read to me from the bible : " train up a boy according to the way for him ; even when he grows old he will not turn aside from it . "
translation.zu: dispela meri i lukim tupela liklik pikinini bilong mi , na em i ritim dispela tok bilong baibel long mi : " skulim pikinini bilong yu long bihainim gutpela pasin , na em bai i wokabaut long dispela rot inap long em i lapun tru . "

translation.en: so right away i wanted to study the bible .
translation.zu: olsem na wantu mi laik stadi long baibel .

translation.en: i invited the woman into the room , and we began a discussion from the booklet " look !
translation.zu: mi singautim dispela meri i kam insait , na mipela i kirap toktok long buklet " harim !

translation.en: i am making all things new . "
translation.zu: mi mekim olgeta samting i kamap nupela . "

translation.en: i thought , ' how wonderful it would be if we as a family could enjoy a happy life ! '
translation.zu: mi tingting , ' em bai gutpela tru sapos mipela famili inap i stap amamas ! '

translation.en: when seikichi came home , i said : " i want to study the bible . "
translation.zu: taim seikichi i kam long haus , mi tokim em olsem : " mi laik stadi long baibel . "

translation.en: " honey , you don 't need to be so educated , " he said .
translation.zu: em i tok : " lewa bilong mi , i no olsem yu mas kisim planti save .

translation.en: " i 'll help you with whatever you wish to know . "
translation.zu: mi bai helpim yu long save long ol samting yu laik save long en . "

translation.en: nevertheless , i began studying the bible with jehovah 's witnesses each week and soon started to attend their meetings .
translation.zu: tasol mi kirap stadi long baibel wantaim ol witnes bilong jehova long olgeta wik , na i no longtaim na mi kirap long i go long ol miting bilong ol .

translation.en: beginning of our trials
translation.zu: kirap bilong ol hevi bilong mipela

translation.en: when i arrived at the hospital that night in april 1969 mentioned above , i was shocked to learn that a friend of seikichi , the husband of the woman with whom i had left my sons , had also been in the taxi when the accident occurred .
translation.zu: taim mi kamap long haus sik long nait long epril 1969 olsem mi stori pinis long en , mi kirap nogut long save olsem pren bilong seikichi - em man bilong dispela meri mi bin lusim tupela pikinini man bilong mi wantaim em - em tu i bin stap long teksi taim bagarap i painim ol .

translation.en: that night the hospital staff told me to get in touch with anybody who i felt should see seikichi , since he was not expected to live .
translation.zu: long dispela nait ol nes i tokim mi long askim ol pren na famili long kam lukim seikichi , long wanem , ol i ting bai em i dai .

translation.en: he had a fracture of the base of the skull and a cerebral contusion .
translation.zu: bun daunbilo long het bilong em i bruk na mit bilong kru i bagarap .

translation.en: the next day relatives hurried to the hospital from the kobe area .
translation.zu: long de bihain , ol wanblut i stap long hap bilong kobe ol i kam hariap long haus sik .

translation.en: a voice announced urgently over the hospital loudspeaker : " all relatives of seikichi ogawa , please visit him immediately . "
translation.zu: wanpela nek i toksave long bikmaus bilong haus sik , olsem : " olgeta wanblut bilong seikichi ogawa , plis kam lukim em hariap . "

translation.en: however , his critical condition lasted a whole month .
translation.zu: tasol skin bilong em i stap nogut olsem inap wanpela mun .

translation.en: a final diagnosis indicated that this condition would last for a long time .
translation.zu: bihain ol dokta i tok , bai em i stap olsem inap longpela taim .

translation.en: so seikichi was transferred from tokyo to kobe by ambulance , a distance of some 400 miles [ 650 km ] .
translation.zu: olsem na long rot bilong ambulens seikichi i lusim tokyo na i go long kobe , em longwe inap 650 kilomita .

translation.en: later in the evening , on seeing him alive at a hospital in kobe , i was overjoyed .
translation.zu: bihain long apinun , taim mi lukim em i stap laip long wanpela haus sik long kobe , mi amamas nogut tru .

translation.en: under my breath i said to him , ' honey , you did hang in there ! '
translation.zu: mi tok isi long em , ' lewa bilong mi , yu stap laip yet ! '

translation.en: living with my parents
translation.zu: mi stap wantaim papamama bilong mi

translation.en: i purchased a season train ticket to kobe , which was some 25 miles [ 40 km ] away , and my mother - in - law and i took turns commuting to the hospital daily for the next year .
translation.zu: kobe i stap longwe long hap bilong mipela inap 40 kilomita , na inap wanpela yia mitupela tambu mama i senis senis long i go long haus sik long olgeta de .

translation.en: i would wonder , ' will seikichi regain consciousness today ?
translation.zu: long olgeta de mi tingting , ' tingting bilong seikichi bai kirap nau long dispela de ?

translation.en: what will he tell me first ?
translation.zu: pastaim bai em i mekim wanem tok long mi ?

translation.en: how should i respond ? '
translation.zu: bai mi mekim wanem tok long em ? '

translation.en: i would also think , especially when i happened to see a happy - looking family , ' if only seikichi were well , then our sons would have a pleasant time . '
translation.zu: na tu , taim mi lukim wanpela famili i stap amamas wantaim , mi tingting , ' sapos seikichi i orait , tupela pikinini man bilong mipela bai i stap amamas . '

translation.en: tears would well up in my eyes .
translation.zu: aiwara i pulap long ai bilong mi .

translation.en: in those early years , when i read in the newspaper that a person had regained consciousness after several months in a coma , i would think that seikichi might also wake up .
translation.zu: taim dispela hevi bilong mipela i nupela samting yet , mi ritim long niuspepa stori bilong wanpela man em tingting bilong em i kirap gen bihain long tingting i bin dai inap sampela mun , na mi ting seikichi tu inap kirap gen .

translation.en: so i once said to my brother - in - law : " i want to take him to the hospital in northeastern honshu . "
translation.zu: olsem na wanpela taim mi tokim tambu brata bilong mi olsem : " mi laik kisim seikichi i go long haus sik i stap long hap not - is bilong honsu . "

translation.en: but he told me that there was no remedy , and he advised me to use what funds we had for the other family members .
translation.zu: tasol em i tokim mi olsem i no gat marasin bilong oraitim seikichi , na em i tokim mi long mekim wok long mani bilong mipela bilong lukautim ol narapela long famili .

translation.en: a christian elder in one of the kobe congregations of jehovah 's witnesses lived near the hospital , and i would stop at his house before going to visit seikichi .
translation.zu: wanpela elda kristen long wanpela kongrigesen bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long kobe , em i stap klostu long haus sik na mi save go long haus bilong em paslain long mi go lukim seikichi .

translation.en: once a week his wife conducted a bible study with me .
translation.zu: wanpela taim long wik , meri bilong dispela brata em i stadi wantaim mi long baibel .

translation.en: and their two children would come to our room in the hospital to deliver an audiocassette of their congregation meetings .
translation.zu: na tupela pikinini bilong ol i kam long rum bilong mipela long haus sik , na givim kaset i gat ol tok bilong miting bilong kongrigesen long en .

translation.en: i was greatly encouraged and comforted by this family .
translation.zu: dispela famili i strongim mi na mekim gut bel bilong mi .

translation.en: one day , a traveling overseer of jehovah 's witnesses visited us at the hospital and read romans 8 : 18 - 25 to me .
translation.zu: long wanpela de , wanpela wasman bilong raun bilong ol witnes bilong jehova em i kam lukim mipela long haus sik , na em i ritim rom 8 : 18 - 25 long mi .

translation.en: in part , it says : " i reckon that the sufferings of the present season do not amount to anything in comparison with the glory that is going to be revealed in us . . . .
translation.zu: hap bilong en i tok : " dispela gutpela sindaun na biknem bai i kamap ples klia long yumi bihain , mi ting em bai i winim tru dispela pen yumi save karim nau long dispela taim . . . .

translation.en: when a man sees a thing , does he hope for it ?
translation.zu: sapos man i kisim pinis wanpela samting , orait bilong wanem em bai i wet i stap ?

translation.en: but if we hope for what we do not see , we keep on waiting for it with endurance . "
translation.zu: tasol yumi save , yumi bai kisim tru ol dispela samting yumi no kisim yet , olsem na yumi save strongim bel na wetim i stap . "

translation.en: the discussion helped me to face present realities with hope and to focus on the future realities of new world blessings . - 2 corinthians 4 : 17 , 18 ; revelation 21 : 3 , 4 .
translation.zu: dispela i helpim mi long karim ol hevi bilong nau , na long tingim ol gutpela samting nupela taim bai kamapim long bihain . - 2 korin 4 : 17 , 18 ; kth 21 : 3 , 4 .

translation.en: in june 1970 , seikichi was transferred to a hospital in sanda , where my parents and i lived .
translation.zu: long jun 1970 , ol i kisim seikichi i go long wanpela haus sik long sanda , em hap mi na papamama bilong mi i sindaun long en .

translation.en: the following january , when i received the document filed by our lawyer that declared my husband incompetent as a result of the accident , i was extremely sad and couldn 't hold back my tears .
translation.zu: long janueri 1971 , mi kisim wanpela pepa i kam long loya bilong mipela , na pepa i tok dispela bagarap i bin painim man bilong mi i mekim na em i no inap mekim wanpela wok , olsem na mi bel hevi nogut tru na mi krai .

translation.en: my mother - in - law often told me : " i am sorry , michiko , for the hard time you are having because of my son . "
translation.zu: planti taim tambu mama bilong mi em i tokim mi olsem : " sori tru michiko , pikinini man bilong mi i mekim na yu karim bikpela hevi . "

translation.en: she would also say : " i wish i could substitute myself for seikichi . "
translation.zu: na tu , em i save tok olsem : " sapos mi inap , mi bai kisim ples bilong seikichi . "

translation.en: we would weep together .
translation.zu: na mipela i krai wantaim .

translation.en: my father would urge me to find full - time employment , but i was determined to care for seikichi .
translation.zu: papa bilong mi em i kirapim mi long painim wok mani , tasol mi strong long lukautim seikichi .

translation.en: father wanted me to remarry , but i realized that doing so would be inappropriate , since my husband was still living .
translation.zu: papa i laik mi marit gen , tasol mi save i no stret long mekim olsem , long wanem , man bilong mi em i stap laip yet .

translation.en: thereafter , when father drank he would say : " when i die i will take seikichi along with me . "
translation.zu: bihain , taim papa i dring em i save tok : " taim mi dai , bai mi kisim seikichi i go wantaim mi . "

translation.en: to my great joy , a congregation was formed in sanda in 1971 .
translation.zu: mi amamas nogut tru long ol i kamapim wanpela kongrigesen long sanda long 1971 .

translation.en: then , on july 28 , 1973 , i was able to symbolize my dedication to jehovah by water baptism .
translation.zu: bihain , long julai 28 , 1973 , mi inap kisim baptais long wara bilong makim olsem mi dediket pinis long jehova .

translation.en: this was during the international convention of jehovah 's witnesses at the osaka expo grounds .
translation.zu: dispela i kamap long kibung intenesenel bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long so graun bilong osaka .

translation.en: my father was also in the hospital because of tuberculosis .
translation.zu: papa bilong mi em i kisim sik tb na em tu i slip long haus sik .

translation.en: so on january 1 , 1974 , i visited my father , my husband , and my son at three different hospitals .
translation.zu: olsem na long janueri 1 , 1974 , mi go long lukim papa , na man , na pikinini man bilong mi long 3 - pela narapela narapela haus sik .

translation.en: on sundays when i went to see kohei with my older son , ryusuke , i studied the book listening to the great teacher with them .
translation.zu: long ol sande taim mi go lukim kohei wantaim narapela pikinini man bilong mi , em ryusuke , mi stadi wantaim tupela long buk harim tok bilong bikpela tisa .

translation.en: after that , ryusuke and i would attend a meeting in kobe and return home with joyful hearts .
translation.zu: bihain long stadi , mitupela ryusuke i go long miting long kobe , na bihain long en mipela i go bek long haus na bel bilong mipela i amamas .

translation.en: i have always been thankful for those who helped to care for seikichi .
translation.zu: oltaim mi bin pilim tru gutpela wok ol man i bin mekim bilong lukautim seikichi .

translation.en: i made a point of sharing bible knowledge with them .
translation.zu: mi autim tok bilong baibel long ol .

translation.en: after one caregiver lost her sister in a fire , she responded when i showed her the grand hope of the resurrection promised in the bible .
translation.zu: taim paia i kilim i dai susa bilong wanpela nes , em i laik harim tok taim mi soim long em gutpela tok promis long baibel olsem ol daiman bai kirap bek .

translation.en: my children , a source of joy
translation.zu: ol pikinini bilong mi , as bilong amamas

translation.en: rearing my children without the help of my husband has been a challenge , but how rewarding it has been !
translation.zu: i hatwok long mekim bikpela long tupela pikinini taim man bilong mi em i no inap helpim mi , tasol mi bin kisim bikpela amamas tru !

translation.en: i taught them proper manners and concern for the feelings of others .
translation.zu: mi skulim ol long bihainim ol gutpela pasin na long tingim bel bilong ol narapela .

translation.en: when ryusuke was only three , he would apologize when he did not behave himself , saying : " mama , i 'm sorry . "
translation.zu: taim ryusuke i gat 3 - pela krismas tasol na em i no bin mekim gutpela pasin , em i tok : " mama , mi laik tok sori . "

translation.en: kohei was a little rebellious , at times showing resentment when i tried to correct him .
translation.zu: kohei i bikhet liklik , na sampela taim em i nolaik tru long mi stretim em .

translation.en: but i would reason with him , showing affection and patience .
translation.zu: tasol mi toktok gut wantaim em , na mi mekim pasin sori long em na mi stap isi .

translation.en: in time , he became an obedient , good boy .
translation.zu: bihain , em i kamap gutpela manki bilong harim tok .

translation.en: this helped to convince me that the bible truly is god 's word . - 2 timothy 3 : 15 - 17 .
translation.zu: dispela i helpim mi long bilip tru olsem baibel em i tok bilong god . - 2 timoti 3 : 15 - 17 .

translation.en: when ryusuke entered junior high school , he explained to the teachers why he could not accept training in the martial arts .
translation.zu: taim ryusuke i go long haiskul , em i tokim ol tisa long as na em i no ken lain long karate samting .

translation.en: one day , he came home from school bubbling with joy because at a meeting with a number of teachers , he was able to answer their questions .
translation.zu: ( aisaia 2 : 4 ) long wanpela de , em i kam bek long haus na em i amamas nogut tru , long wanem , em i bin bung wantaim sampela tisa na em inap bekim ol askim bilong ol .

translation.en: wholesome association in the congregation was very helpful for my sons .
translation.zu: ol gutpela poroman long kongrigesen i helpim tru tupela pikinini man bilong mi .

translation.en: christian elders often invited them for dinner and included them in their family bible study as well as recreational activities .
translation.zu: planti taim ol elda kristen i singautim ol long kaikai wantaim ol , na long insait long famili - stadi bilong ol , na long ol amamas bilong ol .

translation.en: there were also opportunities for pleasant association , including participation in various sports .
translation.zu: na tu , ol pikinini inap raun wantaim ol gutpela poroman na insait long kain kain spot .

translation.en: ryusuke symbolized his dedication to jehovah by water immersion in 1979 , and kohei was baptized the following year .
translation.zu: long 1979 , ryusuke i kisim baptais long wara bilong makim olsem em i dediket pinis long jehova , na kohei i kisim baptais long yia bihain .

translation.en: our full - time ministry
translation.zu: mipela i autim tok long olgeta de

translation.en: once during the visit of a traveling overseer , i told him that i wanted to be a pioneer , as full - time ministers of jehovah 's witnesses are called .
translation.zu: taim wasman bilong raun i kam lukim kongrigesen bilong mipela , mi tokim em olsem mi laik kamap wanpela painia , em nem bilong ol witnes bilong jehova i save autim tok long olgeta de .

translation.en: because at that time my circumstances would have made such a step unwise , he kindly reminded me of the need to bring up my sons firmly in bible truth .
translation.zu: long dispela taim i stap bilong mi i mekim na i no gutpela long mi mekim wok painia , olsem na dispela wasman i helpim mi long tingim wok bilong mi long lainim gut tupela pikinini man long tok i tru bilong baibel .

translation.en: " the important thing , " he said , " is to have a pioneer spirit . "
translation.zu: em i tok : " bikpela samting em olsem : yu mas i gat tingting olsem bilong ol painia . "

translation.en: so i auxiliary pioneered , sharing in this activity with my sons during their school vacations .
translation.zu: olsem na mi mekim wok painia haptaim , na mi insait long dispela wok wantaim tupela pikinini man bilong mi taim ol i malolo long skul .

translation.en: this activity helped me greatly to maintain joy and peace of mind while caring for seikichi .
translation.zu: dispela wok i helpim mi long stap amamas na bel isi taim mi wok long lukautim seikichi .

translation.en: finally , in september 1979 , i was able to join the regular pioneer ranks .
translation.zu: bihain , long septemba 1979 , mi inap kamap wanpela painia oltaim .

translation.en: in may 1984 , about a year after graduating from high school , ryusuke also enrolled as a pioneer .
translation.zu: long me 1984 , inap wanpela yia bihain long ryusuke i winim haiskul , em tu i kirap mekim wok painia .

translation.en: kohei joined him in the pioneer work in september 1984 .
translation.zu: kohei i kirap mekim wok painia long septemba 1984 .

translation.en: thus , all three of us have enjoyed this form of the full - time ministry .
translation.zu: olsem na mipela olgeta 3 - pela i bin insait long dispela wok .

translation.en: as i look back over 20 years of pioneering , during which time i have had the privilege of helping a number of people to serve jehovah , i feel that this activity has helped sustain me through my trials .
translation.zu: taim mi tingim ol dispela 20 yia mi bin mekim wok painia , na long dispela hap taim mi bin helpim planti manmeri long mekim wok bilong jehova , mi ting dispela wok i bin helpim mi long karim ol hevi bilong mi .

translation.en: ryusuke volunteered for construction work on a building for use by jehovah 's witnesses adjacent to the kansai assembly hall .
translation.zu: ryusuke i insait long wok bilong sanapim wanpela haus i stap klostu long haus kibung bilong kansai na ol witnes i mekim wok long en bilong skulim ol brata sista .

translation.en: later he served for seven years as a caretaker at the hyogo assembly hall .
translation.zu: bihain em i lukautim haus kibung bilong hiogo inap 7 - pela yia .

translation.en: now , as a christian elder in a nearby congregation in kobe , he looks after me .
translation.zu: nau em i wanpela elda kristen long wanpela kongrigesen klostu long mi long kobe , na em i lukautim mi .

translation.en: since 1985 , kohei has served as a volunteer worker at the branch office of jehovah 's witnesses in ebina .
translation.zu: kirap long yia 1985 , kohei i bin wok long brens - ofis bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long ebina .

translation.en: sustained by many blessings
translation.zu: planti blesing i strongim mi

translation.en: for many years i went to the hospital several times a week to visit seikichi and to give him a bath .
translation.zu: inap planti yia na inap planti taim long olgeta wik , mi go long haus sik long lukim seikichi na long wasim em .

translation.en: my care was provided in addition to that given by a regular caregiver .
translation.zu: wok mi mekim i antap long wok wanpela nes i mekim bilong lukautim seikichi long olgeta taim .

translation.en: its flesh was soft and buttery in texture , with a somewhat nutty flavor .
translation.zu: mit bilong en i malumalum na i olsem bata , na swit bilong en i wankain liklik olsem bilong pinat .

translation.en: the avocado was first introduced to the european public in 1519 , by martín fernández de enciso .
translation.zu: namba wan taim ol man bilong yurop i kisim save long bata , em long yia 1519 long rot bilong martin fernandes de ensiso .

translation.en: enciso had seen the fruit near what is now santa marta , colombia , at the time of one of the first spanish expeditions to south america .
translation.zu: dispela man i bin lukim dispela kaikai klostu long hap nau ol i kolim santa mata , kalombia , em long taim ol spen i go raun long saut amerika long namba wan taim .

translation.en: during those years of exploration , europeans first tasted a number of new foods besides the avocado , including chocolate , corn , and the potato .
translation.zu: long dispela taim , em namba wan taim bilong ol yurop long traim bata na ol narapela nupela kaikai , olsem sokolat , kon , na poteto .

translation.en: of course , none of those foods were really new .
translation.zu: tru , ol dispela kaikai i no nupela kaikai .

translation.en: all of them had been known and enjoyed by the native inhabitants of the temperate areas of the western hemisphere for centuries .
translation.zu: ol asples bilong hap em san i hat liklik long en long hap bilong wes , ol i bin kaikai ol dispela samting inap planti handet yia pinis .

translation.en: among some indigenous tribes , the avocado was so highly esteemed that it was used as a wedding gift as well as a gift to welcome visitors .
translation.zu: bata em i bikpela samting long sampela lain asples , olsem na ol i givim bata olsem presen long ol man taim ol i marit , na long ol man i kam lukim ol bilong tok amamas long ol .

translation.en: today the avocado is cultivated in many places with a warm or temperate climate , including australia , israel , kenya , new zealand , north and south america , and the philippines .
translation.zu: long nau bata i save kamap long planti hap i hat liklik , olsem ostrelia , israel , kenya , nu silan , not na saut amerika , na filipin .

translation.en: scattered throughout the tropical lands of the americas , however , are many varieties of avocado , ranging from some no larger than a hen 's egg to others as big as a medium - sized melon , weighing up to four pounds [ 2 kg ] .
translation.zu: tasol kain kain bata i save kamap long ol kantri bilong not na sentral na saut amerika . sampela i liklik olsem kiau bilong kakaruk na sampela i bikpela olsem melen em hevi bilong en i tupela kilo .

translation.en: their color may vary from green to dark purple , and the skin of some varieties is rough and brittle , while that of others is thin and smooth .
translation.zu: skin bilong sampela i grinpela o blakpela liklik , na skin bilong sampela i gat ol liklik liklik buk long en na em inap bruk hariap , na skin bilong sampela i no strong na i no gat ol liklik buk long en .

translation.en: it is possible , though , to cultivate orchards that produce avocados of uniform appearance and quality .
translation.zu: tasol ol man inap kamapim gaden bata em ol bata bilong en i wankain stret .

translation.en: when flowering , avocado trees are covered with thousands of pale - yellow blossoms .
translation.zu: taim ol diwai bata i putim ol plaua , planti tausen yelopela plaua i karamapim ol diwai .

translation.en: however , only 1 in 5,000 of these blossoms will become an avocado .
translation.zu: tasol wanpela tasol bilong ol dispela 5,000 plaua bai kamap pikinini bata .

translation.en: an unusual characteristic of these flowers is that each of them bears a stamen , or pollen - producing structure , and at the same time , a pistil , or ovary - bearing structure .
translation.zu: wanpela samting i narapela kain long ol dispela plaua em olsem : olgeta i gat samting bilong kamapim paura bilong plaua , na tu , ol i gat samting bilong kisim paura bilong plaua .

translation.en: this could allow for self - pollination were it not for a marvelous mechanism in the avocado tree that programs these structures to be active at separate times .
translation.zu: ol samting bilong diwai bata i wok gut na dispela i mekim na samting bilong kamapim paura na samting bilong kisim paura i no wok long wankain taim .

translation.en: as a result , some trees open their flowers as pollen receptors with the morning sun and close the flowers at midday .
translation.zu: olsem na taim san i kam antap long moningtaim , plaua bilong sampela diwai bai op bilong kisim paura na ol i pas gen long belo .

translation.en: these same flowers then reopen as pollen producers in the evening .
translation.zu: ol dispela wankain plaua bai op gen long apinun bilong kamapim paura .

translation.en: pollination occurs when a tree that is producing pollen is near one that is at the same time receiving pollen .
translation.zu: paura bilong plaua i save go long ol diwai bata taim wanpela diwai i wok long kamapim paura i stap klostu long wanpela diwai i wok long kisim paura .

translation.en: the avocado has outstanding nutritional value , being high in protein , riboflavin , niacin , potassium , and vitamin c .
translation.zu: bata i gat planti gutpela marasin bilong strongim skin , olsem protin , raiboflavin , niasin , potasiam , na vaitamin c .

translation.en: it is said to contain no less than 11 vitamins and 14 minerals .
translation.zu: ol i tok , bata i gat 11 - pela vaitamin na 14 mineral long en .

translation.en: in some parts of central america , an avocado with tortillas is considered a complete meal .
translation.zu: long sampela hap bilong sentral amerika , ol i ting bata wantaim pankek totila em gutpela kaikai i no sot long wanpela vaitamin samting .

translation.en: the avocado is also rich in fat , and its oil is similar to olive oil in that it contains monounsaturated fats .
translation.zu: na tu , pikinini bata i gat planti gris long en , na wel bilong en i gat wankain gris ( monounsaturated ) olsem wel bilong oliv .

translation.en: the oil is also used in the fabrication of soaps and cosmetics .
translation.zu: ol i wokim sop na ol samting bilong penim pes tu long wel bilong bata .

translation.en: almost every part of the avocado tree is useful .
translation.zu: klostu olgeta hap bilong diwai bata i gat wok bilong en .

translation.en: the wood is used as fuel .
translation.zu: ol man i save mekim wok long en olsem paiawut .

translation.en: the pit , or seed , is used in south america to mark clothing , since it leaves an indelible stain .
translation.zu: long saut amerika ol i save mekim wok long kiau bilong bata olsem kala bilong putim mak samting long klos , na dispela kala i no inap raus .

translation.en: in some parts of the philippines , the leaves are used to make tea .
translation.zu: long sampela hap bilong filipin , ol i mekim wok long lip bilong diwai bata bilong wokim ti .

translation.en: buying and eating the fruit
translation.zu: baim na kaikai pikinini bata

translation.en: if you go to the market to buy avocados , do not try to judge their ripeness by the color of their skin , since this differs from one variety to another .
translation.zu: sapos yu go long maket bilong baim bata , yu no ken skelim kala bilong en bilong save em i mau o nogat , long wanem , kala bilong narapela narapela bata i no wankain .

translation.en: try gently squeezing the fruit .
translation.zu: holim bata long han na bengim isi isi .

translation.en: if it is slightly soft , it is ripe .
translation.zu: sapos bata i malumalum liklik , orait em i mau pinis .

translation.en: avocados should be stored in warm , well - ventilated places , and you can aid the ripening process slightly by wrapping them in newspaper .
translation.zu: putim ol bata long hap i hat liklik na win inap kam insait gut , na yu ken karamapim ol bata long niuspepa bilong mekim ol i mau hariap .

translation.en: they may also be kept in the refrigerator , even after they have been opened .
translation.zu: na tu , yu ken putim ol bata long bokis ais , maski yu katim pinis .

translation.en: by sprinkling the open side of the fruit with lemon juice , you may forestall the browning of the pulp .
translation.zu: putim wara bilong muli long hap yu katim pinis bambai mit bilong en i no ken kamap braunpela .

translation.en: many enjoy eating avocados with citrus fruits or tomatoes .
translation.zu: planti ol i laik kaikai bata wantaim tomato o muli samting .

translation.en: their taste may be enhanced by a sharp or tangy dressing .
translation.zu: bilong mekim bata i swit moa yu ken putim sampela kain sos i pait liklik .

translation.en: in addition , the avocado goes well with shrimp , crab , or lobster , and avocados can be used to advantage in many types of salads .
translation.zu: na tu , bata i gutpela bilong kaikai wantaim kindam o kuka , na yu ken tanim bata wantaim kain kain kumu bilong mekim kumu i swit moa .

translation.en: some people combine them with other fruits to make a refreshing juice .
translation.zu: sampela man i save tanim bata wantaim sampela prut bilong wokim gutpela dring long en .

translation.en: when avocados are mashed with spices and other ingredients , a delicious spread is produced that can be used on crackers .
translation.zu: taim yu memeim bata na putim sol na kain kain kari samting long en , bata bai kamap gutpela samting bilong putim antap long bisket .

translation.en: not to be overlooked , of course , is the famous guacamole , made with avocados , tomatoes , onions , green peppers , and spices .
translation.zu: na wanpela gutpela kaikai em planti man i save long en ol i kolim guakamole . ol i wokim dispela kaikai long bata , tomato , anian , lombo , na ol kari samting .

translation.en: the fruit can also be served with cooked foods , as part of a main dish .
translation.zu: na tu , yu ken tanim bata wantaim kaikai yu kukim .

translation.en: in that case , it should be added at the last moment , being kept away from heat .
translation.zu: tasol yu mas mekim olsem taim kaikai i tan pinis , nogut bata i boil wantaim kaikai .

translation.en: perhaps the avocado already plays an important role in your diet .
translation.zu: ating yu save kaikai bata planti taim .

translation.en: in some parts of the world , however , it may be considered an exotic and rare fruit .
translation.zu: tasol long sampela hap bilong graun , ol man i ting bata em i kaikai bilong narapela hap na ol i no save kaikai .

translation.en: if you have never tasted an avocado , why not do so the next time you have the opportunity .
translation.zu: sapos yu no bin kaikai bata , gutpela yu mekim olsem taim rot i op .

translation.en: at age 61 , josé , a belgian from the small town of oupeye , was told that he would need a liver transplant .
translation.zu: josé , wanpela man bilong liklik taun upeye , long beljam , em i gat 61 krismas taim ol dokta i tokim em ol i mas rausim lewa bilong em na putim narapela lewa insait long skin bilong em .

translation.en: " it was the shock of my life , " he says .
translation.zu: em i tok : " man ! bel bilong mi i bagarap stret . "

translation.en: today , however , liver transplants are routinely performed , with a much higher success rate .
translation.zu: tasol long nau , ol dokta i save mekim dispela samting planti taim , na planti man moa ol i abrusim bagarap .

translation.en: but there is still a major drawback .
translation.zu: tasol i gat wanpela bikpela hevi yet long dispela samting .

translation.en: because of his religious convictions , josé did not want blood .
translation.zu: bilip bilong josé long lotu i mekim na em i no laik kisim blut .

translation.en: some might think so .
translation.zu: ating sampela bai ting olsem .

translation.en: but the chief surgeon felt that he and his colleagues had a good chance of operating successfully without blood .
translation.zu: tasol nambawan dokta bilong katim man em i ting em na ol wanwok bilong em inap katim josé na ol i no ken mekim wok long blut .

translation.en: and that is precisely what they did !
translation.zu: na tru tumas , ol i mekim olsem !

translation.en: just 25 days after his operation , josé was back home with his wife and daughter .
translation.zu: inap 25 de bihain long ol dokta i katim em , josé i stap gen long haus wantaim meri na pikinini bilong em .

translation.en: thanks to the skills of those whom time magazine calls " heroes of medicine , " bloodless medicine and surgery is now more common than ever .
translation.zu: ol dokta i gat save long katim man na i no mekim wok long blut , nius time i kolim ol olsem " ol hapman stret bilong wok dokta . "

translation.en: but why is there such a demand for it ?
translation.zu: tasol bilong wanem planti man i no laik kisim blut taim dokta i katim ol ?

translation.en: worldwide , there are currently more than 90,000 doctors who have made it known that they are willing to treat jehovah 's witnesses without blood
translation.zu: long nau , long olgeta hap bilong graun i gat olsem 90,000 dokta i tokaut pinis olsem ol i orait long helpim ol witnes bilong jehova na i no ken mekim wok long blut

translation.en: " if red blood cells were a new drug today , it would be very difficult to get it licensed . " - dr . jeffrey mccullough .
translation.zu: " sapos ol retpela sel bilong blut em wanpela nupela marasin long nau , em bai hatwok tru long kisim tok orait bilong mekim wok long en . " - em tok bilong dokta jeffrey mccullough .

translation.en: in the winter of 1667 , a violent madman named antoine mauroy was brought to jean - baptiste denis , eminent physician to king louis xiv of france .
translation.zu: long yia 1667 , ol i bringim wanpela longlong man nogut , nem bilong em antwan morwa , i kam long so - baptis deni , em nambawan dokta bilong king lui namba 14 bilong frans .

translation.en: denis had the ideal " cure " for mauroy 's mania - a transfusion of calf 's blood , which he thought would have a calming effect on his patient .
translation.zu: deni i tok em i gat " marasin " bilong oraitim sik longlong bilong morwa - em blut bilong pikinini bulmakau . em i ting dispela blut bai helpim morwa long i stap bel isi .

translation.en: but things did not go well for mauroy .
translation.zu: tasol dispela i no helpim morwa .

translation.en: but soon madness again seized the frenchman , and before long he was dead .
translation.zu: tasol i no longtaim na pasin longlong bilong dispela man bilong frans i kamap gen , na bihain liklik em i dai .

translation.en: even though it was later determined that mauroy actually died from arsenic poisoning , denis ' experiments with animal blood provoked a heated controversy in france .
translation.zu: tru , bihain ol i kisim save olsem morwa i dai long gip bilong marasin asenik , tasol ol pasin bilong deni long mekim wok long blut bilong animal i kamapim bikpela tok pait long frans .

translation.en: finally , in 1670 the procedure was banned .
translation.zu: bihain , long yia 1670 , ol i tambuim dispela pasin .

translation.en: in time , the english parliament and even the pope followed suit .
translation.zu: na bihain moa , palamen bilong inglan , na pop tu , ol i tambuim .

translation.en: in the 19th century , blood transfusions made a comeback .
translation.zu: bihain long yia 1800 , pasin bilong kisim blut i kamap bek .

translation.en: leading the revival was an english obstetrician named james blundell .
translation.zu: man i go pas long dispela samting em james blundell , wanpela dokta bilong inglan .

translation.en: understandably , hayem 's saline solution came to be widely used .
translation.zu: olsem na planti dokta i kirap mekim wok long dispela wara bilong hayem .

translation.en: in 1900 , austrian pathologist karl landsteiner discovered the existence of blood types , and he found that one type of blood is not always compatible with another .
translation.zu: long yia 1900 , wanpela dokta bilong ostria , em karl landsteiner , em i kisim save olsem blut bilong olgeta man i narapela narapela kain . na em i kisim save olsem wanpela kain blut inap pait wantaim narapela kain blut .

translation.en: now that could be changed , simply by making sure that the blood type of the donor was compatible with that of the recipient .
translation.zu: nau ol inap senisim dispela samting sapos ol i was gut , olsem blut bilong sikman i stret wantaim blut em bai kisim .

translation.en: with this knowledge , physicians renewed their confidence in transfusions - just in time for world war i .
translation.zu: dispela save i mekim na ol dokta i laik mekim wok gen long blut - em taim stret , long wanem , klostu namba wan pait bai kirap .

translation.en: blood transfusions and war
translation.zu: kisim blut na pait

translation.en: of course , blood clots quickly , and previously it would have been all but impossible to transport it to the battlefield . but early in the 20th century , dr .
translation.zu: tru , blut i save go strong kwiktaim , na bipo ol i no inap kisim blut i go long ples pait .

translation.en: richard lewisohn , of mount sinai hospital in new york city , successfully experimented with an anticoagulant called sodium citrate . this exciting breakthrough was regarded by some doctors as a miracle .
translation.zu: tasol long yia 1914 , dokta richard lewisohn bilong wanpela haus sik ( mount sinai ) long nu yok siti , em i mekim sampela wok long marasin sodiam sitret - em wanpela marasin i save pasim blut long i go strong - na wok bilong em i kamap gutpela .

translation.en: " it was almost as if the sun had been made to stand still , " wrote dr .
translation.zu: dispela gutpela samting i mekim na sampela dokta i tok em wanpela mirakel .

translation.en: bertram m .
translation.zu: dokta bertram m .

translation.en: world war ii saw an increase in the demand for blood .
translation.zu: namba tu pait i mekim na ol i mas mekim bikpela wok moa long blut .

translation.en: the public was bombarded with posters bearing such slogans as " give blood now , " " your blood can save him , " and " he gave his blood .
translation.zu: long olgeta hap nabaut ol i hangamapim ol bikpela pepa i gat tok olsem : " givim blut nau , " na " blut bilong yu inap helpim em long abrusim bagarap , " na " em i givim blut bilong em .

translation.en: will you give yours ? "
translation.zu: bai yu givim blut bilong yu ? "

translation.en: during world war ii , some 13,000,000 units were donated in the united states .
translation.zu: long taim bilong namba tu pait , ol man long amerika i givim planti blut , inap olsem 6,500,000 lita .

translation.en: it is estimated that in london more than 68,500 gallons [ 260,000 l ] were collected and distributed .
translation.zu: ol i ting long landon ol i bin kisim inap olsem 260,000 lita blut bilong mekim wok long en .

translation.en: of course , blood transfusions carried a number of health risks , as soon became clear .
translation.zu: tasol i gat sampela samting nogut em blut i save mekim long skin bilong man , na i no longtaim na dispela i kamap ples klia .

translation.en: blood - borne disease
translation.zu: bikpela sik long blut

translation.en: during the korean war , for example , nearly 22 percent of those who received plasma transfusions developed hepatitis - almost triple the rate during world war ii .
translation.zu: olsem : long taim bilong pait bilong korea , klostu 22 pesen bilong ol man i bin kisim plasma - em wanpela samting bilong blut - ol i kisim sik hepataitis .

translation.en: by the 1970 ' s , the u.s .
translation.zu: bihain long 1970 , wanpela lain ( u.s .

translation.en: centers for disease control estimated the number of deaths from transfusion - related hepatitis at 3,500 a year .
translation.zu: centers for disease control ) i tok , long olgeta yia inap 3,500 man ol i bin dai long sik hepataitis ol i bin kisim long rot bilong blut .

translation.en: but then a new and sometimes fatal form of the virus - hepatitis c - took a heavy toll .
translation.zu: tasol bihain wanpela nupela binatang jem bilong dispela sik i kamap - em hepataitis c .

translation.en: still , some fear that new dangers will appear and will only be understood when it is too late .
translation.zu: tasol sampela i pret olsem ol nupela sik bai kamap na ol bai kisim save long en long taim i no gat rot moa long stretim .

translation.en: another scandal : hiv - contaminated blood
translation.zu: blut i gat hiv long en

translation.en: in the 1980 ' s , it was found that blood can be contaminated with hiv , the virus that leads to aids .
translation.zu: bihain long 1980 , ol i kisim save olsem hiv , em binatang jem i save kamapim sik aids , em inap stap long blut .

translation.en: at first , blood bankers were loathe to consider that their supply might be tainted .
translation.zu: pastaim ol lain bilong bungim blut ol i no laik ting olsem blut ol i save bungim em i gat hiv long en .

translation.en: many of them initially greeted the hiv threat with skepticism . according to dr .
translation.zu: pastaim planti bilong ol i no tingting tumas olsem ol man inap kisim hiv long rot bilong blut .

translation.en: bruce evatt , " it was as though someone had wandered in from the desert and said , ' i 've seen an extraterrestrial . '
translation.zu: dokta bruce evatt i tok : " i olsem wanpela man i wokabaut i kam long ples drai nating na em i tok , ' mi lukim wanpela kain man bilong ples antap . '

translation.en: they listened , but they just didn 't believe it . "
translation.zu: ol i harim tok , tasol ol i no bilip long en . "

translation.en: it is estimated that in france , between 6,000 and 8,000 people were infected with hiv through transfusions that were administered between 1982 and 1985 .
translation.zu: ol i tok , long frans i gat olsem 6,000 i go inap 8,000 manmeri ol i bin kisim hiv long blut ol i bin kisim long haus sik namel long 1982 na 1985 .

translation.en: understandably , in recent years there has been an increased interest in bloodless medicine and surgery .
translation.zu: olsem na inap sampela yia pinis , planti man moa ol i no laik kisim blut taim dokta i katim ol .

translation.en: each year in the united states alone , more than 11,000,000 units of red cells are transfused into 3,000,000 patients .
translation.zu: long olgeta yia long amerika , inap 3,000,000 sikman i save kisim inap olsem 5,500,000 lita blut .

translation.en: in view of that large number , one would assume that there is a strict standard among physicians when it comes to administering blood .
translation.zu: em planti manmeri tru , olsem na yumi bai ting ol dokta i mas bihainim strongpela lo long pasin bilong givim blut long man , a ?

translation.en: yet , the new england journal of medicine notes that there is surprisingly little data " to guide decisions about transfusions . "
translation.zu: tasol nius the new england journal of medicine i tok , i no gat planti tok samting " bilong stiaim tingting bilong ol dokta long pasin bilong givim blut . "

translation.en: indeed , there is a wide variation in practice , not only regarding precisely what is transfused and how much but also regarding whether a transfusion is administered at all .
translation.zu: tru tumas , pasin bilong ol dokta long givim blut long man i kain kain , olsem ol bai givim blut stret long sikman o sampela hap bilong blut , na hamas blut ol bai givim o ol i no ken givim blut .

translation.en: " transfusion depends on the doctor , not on the patient , " says the medical journal acta anæsthesiologica belgica .
translation.zu: wanpela nius bilong ol dokta ( acta anæsthesiologica belgica ) i tok : " sikman bai kisim blut o nogat , em samting bilong dokta na bilong sikman nogat . "
