translation.en: the tragedy of aids has compelled scientists and physicians to take additional steps to make the operating room a safer place .
translation.zu: bikpela hevi bilong sik aids i bin mekim na ol saientis na dokta ol i mas mekim sampela samting moa na sikman i no ken kisim bagarap long rum bilong katim man .

translation.en: " even as society expends great resources on making the blood supply safer than ever , " says the magazine transfusion , " we believe patients will still try to avoid allogeneic [ donor ] transfusions simply because the blood supply can never be completely safe . "
translation.zu: nius transfusion i tok : ' maski ol i tromoi bikpela mani bilong glasim blut na bai man i no ken tru kisim sik i stap long en , mipela i ting ol sikman bai traim yet long sakim blut bilong narapela man , long wanem , i no gat rot bilong klinim gut blut na bai i no gat wanpela sik i stap long en . '

translation.en: not surprisingly , many doctors are becoming wary of administering blood .
translation.zu: olsem na yumi no kirap nogut long planti dokta i gat tupela tingting long givim blut long sikman .

translation.en: " blood transfusions are basically no good , and we are very aggressive in avoiding them for everybody , " says dr . alex zapolanski , of san francisco , california .
translation.zu: dokta alex zapolanski bilong san fransisko , kalifonia , em i tok : ' pasin bilong givim blut long man i no gutpela , na mipela i strong long abrusim dispela pasin taim mipela katim ol man . '

translation.en: the general public too is becoming aware of the dangers of transfusions .
translation.zu: ol manmeri tu ol i kisim save pinis olsem pasin bilong kisim blut inap nogutim ol .

translation.en: " nonetheless , the risks of disease transmission and immunomodulation offer clear evidence that we must find alternatives for all of our patients . "
translation.zu: olsem na yumi save , yumi mas painim ol narapela marasin samting olsem senis bilong blut bilong helpim olgeta sikman bilong yumi . "

translation.en: many patients view it not as a last resort but as a preferred treatment , and with good reason .
translation.zu: planti sikman i laikim dispela pasin , na i gat as bilong en - ol i no ting i no gat rot moa na ol i laikim , nogat .

translation.en: in one sense the question is rather odd , since bloodless medicine actually predates the use of blood .
translation.zu: dispela askim i narapela kain , long wanem , dispela pasin em i bin kamap taim ol i no kirap yet long mekim wok long blut .

translation.en: indeed , it was not until the early 20th century that transfusion technology had advanced to the point where it was routinely used .
translation.zu: tru tumas , bihain long yia 1900 tasol ol dokta i kirap givim blut long planti man .

translation.en: nevertheless , in recent decades some have popularized the field of bloodless surgery .
translation.zu: tasol long taim bilong yumi , sampela dokta i kirapim pasin bilong katim man na i no mekim wok long blut .

translation.en: by the 1980 ' s a number of large medical teams were performing bloodless surgery .
translation.zu: long 1983 samting , planti bikpela lain dokta ol i katim ol man na i no mekim wok long blut .

translation.en: then , when the aids epidemic broke out , these teams were repeatedly consulted by others who were eager to adopt the same techniques .
translation.zu: orait , taim sik aids i wok long kisim planti man , ol narapela dokta i laik bihainim wankain pasin bilong ol dispela lain dokta na ol i toktok planti taim wantaim ol bilong kisim save .

translation.en: during the 1990 ' s many hospitals developed programs that offer bloodless options to their patients .
translation.zu: bihain long 1990 , planti haus sik i kamapim ol samting bilong helpim ol sikman i no laik kisim blut .

translation.en: wong , in the canadian journal of anaesthesia .
translation.zu: long wanpela nius ( canadian journal of anaesthesia ) dokta d . h .

translation.en: " the surgeon 's skill is of the greatest importance in the prevention of blood loss , " says dr .
translation.zu: wanpela gutpela samting bilong katim man na i no mekim wok long blut i olsem : dokta i save was gut tru long mekim stret ol samting bilong helpim sikman .

translation.en: it adds : " certainly the aftercare treatment in many instances has proved cheaper and less time - consuming . "
translation.zu: " tru tumas , planti taim i no hatwok long lukautim kain sikman olsem bihain long dokta i katim em , na bikpela mani na taim i no lus . "

translation.en: blood and jehovah 's witnesses
translation.zu: blut na ol witnes bilong jehova

translation.en: for bible - based reasons , jehovah 's witnesses refuse blood transfusions .
translation.zu: tok bilong baibel i as na ol witnes bilong jehova i save sakim blut .

translation.en: * but they do accept - and vigorously pursue - medical alternatives to blood . " jehovah 's witnesses actively seek the best in medical treatment , " said dr .
translation.zu: * tasol ol i orait long kisim ol narapela marasin samting i olsem senis bilong blut , na ol i strong long mekim olsem .

translation.en: " as a group , they are the best educated consumers the surgeon will ever encounter . "
translation.zu: dokta bilong katim man i no inap bungim narapela lain i gat gutpela save long dispela samting olsem dispela lain . "

translation.en: over a period of 27 years , his team performed bloodless open - heart surgery on 663 of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: insait long 27 yia , dispela dokta na lain dokta bilong em , ol i bin katim 663 witnes bilong jehova bilong stretim klok bilong ol na ol i no mekim wok long blut .

translation.en: the results clearly demonstrate that cardiac operations can be successfully performed without the use of blood .
translation.zu: dispela i makim olsem ol dokta inap katim gut ol man i gat sik bilong klok , maski ol i no mekim wok long blut .

translation.en: true , many have criticized jehovah 's witnesses for their refusal of blood .
translation.zu: tru , planti man i bin sutim tok long ol witnes bilong jehova , long wanem , ol i sakim blut .

translation.en: but a guide published by the association of anaesthetists of great britain and ireland calls the witnesses ' position " a sign of respect for life . "
translation.zu: tasol wanpela liklik buk em wanpela lain ( association of anaesthetists of great britain and ireland ) i bin wokim , i tok laik bilong ol witnes long sakim blut i " makim olsem ol i tingim gut laip bilong man . "

translation.en: in truth , the witnesses ' rigorous stand has been a major force behind safer medical treatment becoming available for all .
translation.zu: tru tumas , strongpela tingting bilong ol witnes long sakim blut i wanpela bikpela as na olgeta man inap kisim gutpela marasin samting bilong stretim sik bilong ol .

translation.en: to assist doctors in providing treatment without the use of blood , jehovah 's witnesses have developed a helpful liaison service .
translation.zu: bilong helpim ol dokta long katim man na i no mekim wok long blut , ol witnes bilong jehova i bin kamapim wanpela lain bilong toktok gut wantaim ol dokta samting .

translation.en: presently , more than 1,400 hospital liaison committees worldwide are equipped to provide doctors and researchers with medical literature from a data base of over 3,000 articles related to bloodless medicine and surgery .
translation.zu: nau long dispela taim , winim 1,400 hospital lieson komiti long olgeta hap , ol i gat ol pepa na lista samting bilong marasin na pasin bilong katim man na i no mekim wok long blut , bambai ol i ken givim long ol dokta na ol saveman .

translation.en: the information on bloodless medicine and surgery that has been compiled by jehovah 's witnesses has been of benefit to many in the medical field .
translation.zu: ol save ol witnes bilong jehova i bin bungim long pasin bilong katim man na i no mekim wok long blut , na kisim ol samting i olsem senis bilong blut , dispela save i bin helpim planti dokta .

translation.en: for example , in preparing material for a book entitled autotransfusion : therapeutic principles and trends , the authors asked jehovah 's witnesses to provide them with information about alternatives to blood transfusion .
translation.zu: olsem : taim tupela man i wok long bungim ol samting bilong raitim wanpela buk ( autotransfusion : therapeutic principles and trends ) , ol i askim ol witnes bilong jehova long helpim ol long sampela tok long ol marasin samting olsem senis bilong blut .

translation.en: the witnesses gladly granted their request .
translation.zu: ol witnes i amamas long mekim olsem .

translation.en: with gratitude the authors later stated : " in all our reading on this subject , we have never seen such a concise , complete list of strategies to avoid homologous blood transfusion . "
translation.zu: tupela man bilong raitim buk i tenkyu tru long dispela na bihain ol i tok : " long olgeta tok bilong dispela samting em mipela i bin kaunim long ol buk na nius , mipela i no bin lukim wanpela gutpela lista olsem .

translation.en: where will this lead us ?
translation.zu: orait olsem wanem long bihain ?

translation.en: professor luc montagnier , discoverer of the aids virus , states : " the evolution of our understanding in this field shows that blood transfusions must one day die out . "
translation.zu: profesa luc montagnier , em namba wan man bilong kisim save long binatang jem i save kamapim sik aids , em i tok : ' save yumi kisim long dispela samting i makim olsem , bihain pasin bilong givim blut long man bai pinis olgeta . '

translation.en: some of the methods
translation.zu: sampela pasin ol i mekim

translation.en: drugs : genetically engineered proteins can stimulate the production of red blood cells ( erythropoietin ) , blood platelets ( interleukin - 11 ) , and various white blood cells ( gm - csf , g - csf ) .
translation.zu: ol marasin : sampela marasin protin ol saveman i kamapim inap kirapim ol retpela sel bilong blut long wokim sampela blut moa ( erythropoietin ) , na ol samting insait bilong blut ( interleukin - 11 ) , na kain kain waitpela sel bilong blut ( gm - csf , g - csf ) .

translation.en: other medications greatly reduce blood loss during surgery ( aprotinin , antifibrinolytics ) or help to reduce acute bleeding ( desmopressin ) .
translation.zu: ol narapela marasin ( aprotinin , antifibrinolytics ) i mekim na bikpela hap blut i no lus taim dokta i katim man o i save pasim blut long ran strong ( desmopressin ) .

translation.en: blood salvage : salvaging machines recover blood that is lost during surgery or trauma .
translation.zu: masin bilong kisim blut i lus : dispela kain masin i save kisim blut i lus taim dokta i katim man .

translation.en: the blood is cleansed and can be returned to the patient in a closed circuit .
translation.zu: masin i klinim blut na em inap salim i go bek insait long skin bilong man ; blut i save ran oltaim long masin .

translation.en: other devices can seal bleeding on large areas of tissue .
translation.zu: ol narapela tul inap pasim blut na blut i no lus long bikpela hap bilong skin .

translation.en: prompt action to stop bleeding is essential .
translation.zu: em i bikpela samting long pasim blut kwiktaim .

translation.en: delays greater than 24 hours can greatly increase patient mortality .

translation.en: is coffee raising your cholesterol level ?
translation.zu: kofi i mekim mak bilong kolestrol i go antap ?

translation.en: the crucial word is " unfiltered . "
translation.zu: bikpela tok em " ol i no bin sipim . "

translation.en: research reports , a newsletter from the netherlands organization for scientific research , says that coffee beans contain a cholesterol - raising substance called cafestol .
translation.zu: nius research reports bilong wanpela lain ( netherlands organization for scientific research ) i tok , pikinini kofi i gat wanpela marasin long en ol i kolim kafestol na dispela marasin i save mekim mak bilong kolestrol i go antap .

translation.en: when hot water is poured directly on the ground coffee , the cafestol is extracted .
translation.zu: taim man i kapsaitim hatwara long kofi ol i memeim pinis , marasin kafestol i save kamaut long kofi .

translation.en: the same is true when finely ground coffee is boiled in water several times , as it is in turkish coffee , or when a metal filter is used instead of a paper filter , such as in a french press .
translation.zu: wankain samting i save kamap taim ol i boilim kofi planti taim olsem ol i save mekim bilong wokim kofi bilong turki , o taim ol i sipim kofi long samting ol i wokim long ain , olsem sospen bilong ol frans bilong wokim kofi na ol i no sipim long pepa .

translation.en: without a paper filter , the cafestol ends up in the brew .
translation.zu: taim ol i no sipim kofi long wanpela kain pepa , marasin kafestol i save go long kofi .

translation.en: one unfiltered cup of coffee , which may contain up to four milligrams of cafestol , can cause the cholesterol level to rise by about 1 percent .
translation.zu: insait long wanpela kap kofi em ol i no bin sipim , i gat 4 - pela miligram marasin kafestol , na dispela inap mekim mak bilong kolestrol i go antap inap wan pesen .

translation.en: however , its cholesterol - raising effect is less if you use a demitasse .
translation.zu: tasol sapos yu dring liklik kap espreso tasol , mak bilong kolestrol i no go antap tumas .

translation.en: less espresso , less cafestol - perhaps as little as one or two milligrams per cup .
translation.zu: long liklik kap espreso i gat liklik marasin kafestol long en , ating wanpela o tupela miligram tasol .

translation.en: research reports cautions , though , that five small cups of espresso a day can raise the body 's cholesterol level by 2 percent .
translation.zu: tasol nius research reports i tok , sapos man i dring 5 - pela liklik kap espreso long wanpela de , dispela inap mekim mak bilong kolestrol i go antap inap 2 pesen .

translation.en: besides , bottle - fed babies in poor communities are about 15 times more likely to die from diarrheic disease than those who are breast - fed .
translation.zu: na tu , long ol hap i stap rabis , planti bebi i save kisim susu bilong botol ol inap dai long pekpek wara , winim ( inap 15 taim ) ol bebi i save kisim susu bilong mama .

translation.en: in fact , the united nations children 's fund ( unicef ) reports that some 4,000 children die every day as a result of hazards associated with breast - milk substitutes .
translation.zu: lain unicef ( united nations children 's fund ) i tok , inap 4,000 pikinini i dai long olgeta de long ol sik em susu bilong botol i save kamapim .

translation.en: in cynthia 's case , however , the decision regarding breast - feeding involved another danger altogether .
translation.zu: tasol sapos sintia i givim susu bilong em long bebi , wanpela samting nogut inap kamap .

translation.en: her husband had infected her with the human immunodeficiency virus ( hiv ) , which causes aids .
translation.zu: em i bin kisim binatang jem hiv long man bilong em , em dispela jem i save kamapim sik aids .

translation.en: after giving birth , cynthia learned that a child of an hiv - positive mother stands a 1 - in - 7 chance of becoming infected through breast milk .
translation.zu: bihain , taim sintia i karim pinis bebi bilong em , em i kisim save olsem long olgeta 7 - pela 7 - pela bebi em mama bilong em i gat binatang jem hiv , wanpela inap kisim dispela jem long rot bilong susu bilong mama .

translation.en: * thus , she had to make an agonizing choice : expose her baby to the risks of breast - feeding or subject it to the hazards of bottle - feeding .
translation.zu: * olsem na sintia i mas makim wanem samting em bai mekim - bai em i givim susu bilong em long bebi na bebi inap kisim sik aids o bai em i givim susu bilong botol i gat hatwok bilong en .

translation.en: in parts of the world where the aids epidemic has hit the hardest , 2 or 3 out of every 10 pregnant women are hiv positive .
translation.zu: long ol hap em sik aids i go bikpela tru long en , long olgeta 10 - pela 10 - pela meri i gat bel , 2 - pela o 3 - pela i gat binatang jem hiv .

translation.en: in one country , more than half of all pregnant women tested were infected .
translation.zu: long wanpela kantri , winim 50 pesen bilong ol meri i gat bel , ol i gat dispela jem .

translation.en: " these alarming figures , " reports un radio , " have had scientists racing to find a remedy . "
translation.zu: redio un i tok : " dispela bikpela lain tru i mekim na ol saientis i wok strong long painim rot bilong oraitim dispela sik . "

translation.en: to respond to this threat , six un organizations have pooled their experience , efforts , and resources to form the joint united nations programme on hiv / aids , known as unaids .
translation.zu: bilong mekim sampela samting bilong stretim dispela hevi , inap 6 - pela lain bilong yunaitet nesen ol i bungim save , na wok , na mani bilong ol bilong kamapim wanpela lain ol i kolim unaids ( joint united nations programme on hiv / aids ) .

translation.en: * but what unaids has found is that the solution to the aids dilemma is not so simple .
translation.zu: * tasol lain unaids i kisim save olsem rot bilong stretim sik aids i gat hatwok bilong en .

translation.en: complex obstacles blocking a simple solution
translation.zu: ol bikpela hevi i pasim rot bilong oraitim sik

translation.en: according to edith white , a specialist on breast - feeding and mother - to - child transmission of hiv , health workers are advising hiv - positive women in industrialized countries not to breast - feed their babies , since this nearly doubles the risk of the baby 's being infected .
translation.zu: edith white , wanpela savemeri bilong pasin bilong givim susu na bilong binatang jem hiv ol pikinini i save kisim long mama , em i tok , ol lain bilong helt i tokim ol meri i gat binatang jem hiv na ol i sindaun long ol kantri i gat planti mani , long ol i no ken givim susu bilong ol long bebi , long wanem , dispela bai dabolim rot bilong bebi long kisim dispela jem .

translation.en: but in the developing world - where idealistic theories quickly give way to harsh realities - this simple solution is hard to carry out .
translation.zu: tasol long ol kantri i stap rabis , ol mama i no inap bihainim dispela rot .

translation.en: one of the obstacles is a social one .
translation.zu: wanpela hevi em ol pasin bilong ples .

translation.en: in countries where breast - feeding is the norm , women who bottle - feed their babies may be advertising the fact that they have been infected with hiv .
translation.zu: taim ol meri i givim susu bilong botol long bebi long ol kantri em pasin bilong ol meri long givim susu bilong ol yet long bebi , dispela inap makim olsem ol i gat binatang jem hiv .

translation.en: a woman may fear that she will be blamed , abandoned , or even beaten when her condition becomes known .
translation.zu: meri inap pret olsem ol man bai sutim tok long em , o rausim em , o paitim em , taim ol i kisim save long sik bilong em .

translation.en: some women in this circumstance feel that they have no choice but to breast - feed their baby to keep their hiv - positive condition a secret .
translation.zu: olsem na sampela meri i ting ol i no gat narapela rot , ol i mas givim susu bilong ol long bebi bambai ol narapela i no ken kisim save long sik bilong ol .

translation.en: there are other obstacles too .
translation.zu: i gat ol narapela hevi tu .

translation.en: for example , consider 20 - year - old margaret .
translation.zu: tingim margaret i gat 20 krismas .

translation.en: but margaret has reason to be concerned .
translation.zu: tasol i gat as na margaret i tingting planti .

translation.en: her first child died , and her second is frail and sickly .
translation.zu: namba wan pikinini bilong em i dai , na namba tu i sik na em i no gat strong .

translation.en: margaret is breast - feeding her third child ten times a day , despite the fact that she may have hiv .
translation.zu: margaret i save givim susu bilong em long namba tri pikinini inap 10 - pela taim long olgeta de , maski margaret i no save em i gat binatang jem hiv o nogat .

translation.en: " i would never be able to feed my baby with formula , " she says .
translation.zu: em i tok : " mi no inap givim susu bilong stua long bebi bilong mi . "

translation.en: the cost of feeding one child infant formula , margaret says , is one and a half times the sum that a family in her village earns in an entire year .
translation.zu: margaret i tok , pe bilong dispela susu long wanpela pikinini i winim inap wan na hap taim mani wanpela famili long ples bilong em i save kisim insait long wanpela yia .

translation.en: even if formula were available free of charge , there would still be the problem of finding clean water to make the formula into safe baby food .
translation.zu: maski ol inap kisim fri susu bilong stua , ol i gat hevi yet long painim klinpela wara bilong wokim susu em bebi inap dring na i no kisim sik long en .

translation.en: some of these obstacles can be reduced if hiv - infected mothers are provided proper sanitation , adequate amounts of breast - milk substitutes , and access to safe water .
translation.zu: ol inap daunim sampela bilong ol dispela hevi sapos ol mama i gat ol samting bilong klinim gut ol botol samting , na ol i gat planti susu bilong stua , na klinpela wara .

translation.en: expensive ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ?

translation.en: perhaps .
translation.zu: ating olsem .

translation.en: yet , surprisingly , making such provisions seems to be more a matter of setting priorities than finding funds .
translation.zu: tasol bilong ol i ken helpim ol mama olsem , ating ol gavman i mas tingim wanem samting i bikpela samting - i no olsem ol i sot long mani .

translation.en: indeed , the un reports that some of the world 's poorest developing countries spend about twice as much on the military as they do on health and education .
translation.zu: tru tumas , yunaitet nesen i tok , gavman bilong sampela kantri i stap rabis olgeta , ol i tromoi bikpela mani long ol samting bilong ami , winim inap tupela taim mani ol i tromoi long ol samting bilong helt na skul .

translation.en: what about anti - aids drugs ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem long marasin bilong pasim aids ?

translation.en: with the help of unaids , the cost of this treatment has been lowered to $ 50 .
translation.zu: lain unaids i helpim ol , olsem na pe bilong dispela marasin i go daun long 50 dola .

translation.en: health experts say that nevirapine could prevent up to 400,000 newborns per year from beginning their life infected with hiv .
translation.zu: ol saveman bilong helt i tok , marasin nevirapin inap helpim 400,000 nupela bebi long olgeta yia long abrusim binatang jem hiv .

translation.en: however , some criticize such drug treatments , claiming that since they are limited to preventing hiv transmission from mother to baby , the mother will eventually succumb to aids and leave the child orphaned .
translation.zu: tasol sampela i toktok planti long dispela kain marasin , na ol i tok dispela ol marasin inap pasim bebi tasol long kisim binatang jem hiv long mama , olsem na bihain mama bai dai long sik aids na pikinini i no gat mama .

translation.en: the un counters that the grim alternative is letting babies contract hiv , thus condemning these innocent victims to a slow and sad death .
translation.zu: yunaitet nesen i tok , narapela rot em long larim ol bebi i kisim binatang jem hiv , olsem na ol bebi i no gat asua ol i save dai isi isi .

translation.en: they also contend that hiv - infected mothers may live on for years .
translation.zu: na yunaitet nesen i tok , ol mama i gat binatang jem hiv ol inap i stap planti yia .

translation.en: she learned that she had hiv in 1985 , when her baby was born , but she did not become ill until eight years later .
translation.zu: long 1985 taim em i karim bebi , em i kisim save olsem em i gat binatang jem hiv , tasol inap 8 - pela yia em i no gat sik .

translation.en: and even though her baby had hiv at birth , by age two the child was free of it .
translation.zu: na maski bebi bilong em i gat binatang jem hiv taim sintia i karim em , taim pikinini i gat tupela krismas em i no gat moa dispela jem .

translation.en: the bible 's comforting assurance is that a truly safe environment and the lasting solution to scourges like aids are in sight .
translation.zu: baibel i tok promis , ol sik nogut olsem sik aids klostu nau bai pinis olgeta na olgeta man bai i stap gut .

translation.en: jehovah god promises a new world in which " no resident will say : ' i am sick . ' "
translation.zu: god jehova i tok promis long kamapim nupela taim i no gat wanpela man long en " bai i tok olsem , ' mi gat sik . '

translation.en: for more information , please contact the publishers of this magazine or jehovah 's witnesses in your community .
translation.zu: bilong kisim sampela save moa , plis raitim pas i go long lain i wokim dispela nius o go lukim ol witnes bilong jehova long hap bilong yu .

translation.zu: em i no nem tru bilong em .

translation.zu: lain unicef i tok , long olgeta de 500 i go inap 700 bebi i save kisim binatang jem hiv long susu bilong mama bilong ol i gat dispela jem .

translation.en: the six organizations are unicef , the united nations development programme , the united nations population fund , the world health organization , the world bank , and the united nations educational , scientific , and cultural organization .
translation.zu: ol dispela 6 - pela lain i olsem : unicef , united nations development programme , united nations population fund , world health organization , world bank , united nations educational , scientific , and cultural organization .

translation.zu: wanpela ripot i tok , pasin bilong senis senis long givim susu bilong botol na susu bilong mama inap mekim na bebi i kisim binatang jem hiv , na ating susu bilong mama i gat sampela marasin bilong daunim strong bilong dispela jem .

translation.en: if this is true , exclusive breast - feeding - even with its risks - may be a safer choice .
translation.zu: sapos dispela tok em i tru , ating pasin bilong givim susu bilong mama tasol i gutpela rot , maski dispela inap givim sik long bebi .

translation.zu: tasol ol i wok yet long skelim dispela samting .

translation.en: the bible 's viewpoint
translation.zu: baibel i tok wanem ?

translation.en: a balanced view of popular customs
translation.zu: stretpela tingting long ol pasin bilong ples

translation.en: " there is no possible line of conduct which has not at some time and place been condemned , and which at some other time and place been enjoined as a duty . "
translation.zu: " i no gat wanpela pasin ol man i nolaik tru long en long sampela taim o long sampela hap , tasol long narapela taim o long narapela hap ol i bin subim ol man long bihainim dispela pasin . "

translation.en: with this observation , the irish historian william lecky sums up the fickle nature of people .
translation.zu: em tok bilong wanpela saveman , william lecky , na dispela tok i kamapim pasin bilong ol man long senisim tingting bilong ol .

translation.en: indeed , many practices that were once viewed as an essential part of daily life have in later times been condemned .
translation.zu: tru tumas , planti pasin em bipo sampela man i ting em i bikpela samting long i stap bilong ol long olgeta de , bihain ol i no orait long en .

translation.en: this is not surprising , for as the christian apostle paul noted , " the scene of this world is changing . " - 1 corinthians 7 : 31 .
translation.zu: yumi no kirap nogut long dispela samting , long wanem , kristen aposel pol i tok , " graun wantaim olgeta samting bilong en bai i pinis . " - 1 korin 7 : 31 .

translation.en: yes , human society is in a constant state of flux .
translation.zu: em nau , ol samting bilong ol manmeri i save senis senis long olgeta taim .

translation.en: this is often reflected in wide shifts in attitudes and social habits .
translation.zu: dispela i save kamap ples klia long pasin bilong ol man long senisim tingting na sampela pasin bilong ol .

translation.en: christians are to be " no part of the world " - that is , they remain separate from human society that is alienated from god .
translation.zu: ol kristen i " no bilong dispela graun " - olsem ol i mas klia long ol manmeri i stap longwe long god .

translation.en: still , the bible acknowledges that christians are " in the world , " and it does not command them to be isolationists .
translation.zu: tasol baibel i kamapim olsem ol kristen i stap long " dispela graun , " na baibel i no tokim ol long stap wanpis , olsem stap longwe long ol narapela man , nogat .

translation.en: hence , a balanced view of customs is vital . - john 17 : 11 , 14 - 16 ; 2 corinthians 6 : 14 - 17 ; ephesians 4 : 17 - 19 ; 2 peter 2 : 20 .
translation.zu: olsem na em i bikpela samting long kisim stretpela tingting long ol pasin bilong ples . - jon 17 : 11 , 14 - 16 ; 2 korin 6 : 14 - 17 ; efesus 4 : 17 - 19 ; 2 pita 2 : 20 .

translation.en: customs are practices that apply to social life and are common to a particular place or class of people .
translation.zu: ol pasin bilong ples em ol samting i stret long sindaun bilong ol man , na ol man bilong wanpela hap o bilong wanpela lain ol i save bihainim .

translation.en: some customs , such as table manners and etiquette , may have arisen out of a need to regulate people 's behavior in group activities , enabling them to interact in a civil and mutually respectful manner .
translation.zu: ating sampela pasin bilong ples - olsem ol pasin bilong bihainim long taim bilong kaikai - ol i bin kamap bilong bosim pasin bilong ol man long taim ol i bung wantaim bambai pasin bilong ol i no ken bagarapim tingting na bel bilong narapela .

translation.en: in such cases , social courtesies can be likened to oil , in that they lubricate the wheels of human relationships .
translation.zu: ol dispela pasin i olsem wel i helpim wil long wok gut , ol kain pasin olsem i helpim ol man long stap gut wantaim .

translation.en: customs have been profoundly influenced by religion .
translation.zu: ol lotu i bin stiaim tru ol pasin bilong ples .

translation.en: many , in fact , arose from old superstitions and non - biblical religious ideas .
translation.zu: as bilong planti pasin bilong ples em ol bilip giaman o tingting bilong ol lotu em baibel i no as bilong en .

translation.en: * in addition , the color blue - often associated with baby boys - was thought to frighten away demons .
translation.zu: * na tu , planti man i ting blu em kala bilong ol liklik pikinini man , tasol bipo ol i bin ting dispela kala em i bilong pretim ol spirit nogut .

translation.en: even a custom as innocuous as covering the mouth while yawning may have arisen from the idea that one 's soul could escape through a wide - open mouth .
translation.zu: na pasin bilong putim han long maus taim man i opim maus olsem em i laik slip , ating dispela i kirap long tingting bilong ol man olsem tewel bilong man bai lusim em long rot bilong maus i op bikpela .

translation.en: over the years , however , the religious associations have faded , and today these practices and customs have no religious significance .
translation.zu: tasol bihain , ol man i no gat dispela kain tingting moa , na nau ol dispela pasin i no samting bilong lotu .

translation.en: when a christian must decide whether or not to follow a certain custom , his main concern should be , what is god 's viewpoint as expressed in the bible ?
translation.zu: taim kristen i mas skelim bai em i bihainim wanpela pasin bilong ples o nogat , namba wan samting em i mas tingting long en i olsem : tingting bilong god i stap long baibel i tok wanem long dispela pasin ?

translation.en: in the past god condemned certain practices that may have been tolerated in some communities .
translation.zu: long bipo god i no orait long sampela pasin bilong ples em sampela man i orait long en .

translation.en: these included child sacrifice , the misuse of blood , and various sexual practices .
translation.zu: olsem : pasin bilong kilim i dai pikinini olsem ofa , na mekim nabaut long blut , na kain kain pasin sem .

translation.en: among these are non - biblical traditions connected with religious holidays such as christmas and easter or with superstitious practices related to spiritism .
translation.zu: sampela bilong ol dispela pasin em baibel i no as bilong en i olsem : ol bikpela de bilong lotu olsem krismas na ista , na ol bilip giaman em ol spirit nogut i as bilong en .

translation.en: but what about customs that may once have been linked to questionable practices but that today are primarily viewed as social etiquette ?
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem long sampela pasin bilong ples em bipo i gat sampela samting i no stret tumas long en , tasol nau ol man i ting em ol pasin i stret yumi bihainim ?

translation.en: for example , many popular wedding customs - including the exchanging of rings and the eating of cake - may have pagan origins .
translation.zu: olsem : ating ol haiden i as bilong planti pasin ol man i save mekim long taim ol i marit , olsem narapela i save givim ring long narapela na ol i kaikai kek . olsem wanem ?

translation.en: does this mean that christians are forbidden to observe such customs ?
translation.zu: dispela i makim olsem ol kristen i no ken bihainim ol dispela pasin ?

translation.en: are christians required to scrutinize meticulously each custom of the community to see whether somewhere or at some time it had negative connotations ?
translation.zu: ol kristen i mas skelim skelim olgeta wan wan pasin bilong ples bilong save long wanem hap o long wanem taim dispela pasin i no stret ?

translation.en: paul points out that " where the spirit of jehovah is , there is freedom . "
translation.zu: pol i tok , " sapos spirit bilong bikpela i stap long wanpela man . . . em i stap fri . "

translation.en: god wants us to use this freedom , not as an inducement for selfish cravings , but to train our perceptive powers to distinguish right from wrong .
translation.zu: god i laik yumi mekim wok long dispela pasin bilong i stap fri bilong lainim gut tingting bilong yumi long save long ol samting i stret na ol samting i no stret , na i no bilong inapim ol laik nogut bilong skin .

translation.en: hence , in a matter where there is no clear violation of bible principles , jehovah 's witnesses do not create a hard - and - fast rule .
translation.zu: olsem na sapos wanpela pasin bilong ples i no brukim stret wanpela lo bilong baibel , orait ol witnes bilong jehova i no kamapim wanpela lo long dispela samting . nogat .

translation.en: seek others ' advantage
translation.zu: tingting long helpim ol narapela

translation.en: does this mean that it is always proper to participate in a certain custom as long as it does not directly violate bible teachings ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ? dispela i makim olsem , oltaim em i stret long insait long wanpela pasin bilong ples sapos dispela pasin i no kalapim wanpela lo bilong baibel ?

translation.en: no .
translation.zu: nogat .

translation.en: paul indicated that a christian should seek not only his own advantage " but that of the many . "
translation.zu: pol i tok , kristen i no ken tingting long helpim em yet tasol , em i mas " wok long helpim ol arapela manmeri . "

translation.en: he should " do all things for god 's glory " and not become a cause for stumbling .
translation.zu: em i mas mekim " olgeta samting bilong givim biknem long god , " na em i no ken mekim wanpela samting em inap pundaunim ol narapela .

translation.en: so a person seeking god 's approval would want to ask himself : ' how do others view this custom ?
translation.zu: olsem na man i laik god i orait long em , em i mas askim em yet olsem : ' ol narapela i gat wanem kain tingting long dispela pasin bilong ples ?

translation.en: does the community attach any objectionable meaning to it ?
translation.zu: ol man bilong ples ol i save ting dispela pasin i no gutpela ?

translation.en: would my participation imply that i am in agreement with practices or ideas that are displeasing to god ? ' - 1 corinthians 9 : 19 , 23 ; 10 : 23 , 24 .
translation.zu: sapos mi insait long dispela pasin , dispela bai makim olsem mi orait long sampela pasin o tingting em god i no orait long en ? ' - 1 korin 9 : 19 , 23 ; 10 : 23 , 24 .

translation.en: for instance , on specific occasions the giving of flowers may take on special meaning that conflicts with bible teachings .
translation.zu: olsem : sampela taim , pasin bilong givim ol plaua inap makim samting i no stret wantaim tok bilong baibel .

translation.en: so , what should a christian primarily be concerned about ?
translation.zu: olsem na kristen i mas ting olsem wanem long sampela pasin bilong ples ?

translation.en: although there may be reason to examine the origin of a particular custom , in some cases it is more important to consider what the custom means to people at the time and in the place where one now lives .
translation.zu: ating sampela taim i gat as na yumi mas kisim save long as bilong wanpela pasin bilong ples , tasol sampela taim em i bikpela samting moa long tingim ol man bilong nau long dispela hap yumi sindaun long en , ol i ting olsem wanem long dispela pasin bilong ples .

translation.en: if a custom has unscriptural or otherwise negative connotations during a particular period of the year or under certain circumstances , christians may wisely decide to avoid it at that time .
translation.zu: sapos baibel i no as bilong wanpela pasin bilong ples o samting bilong dispela pasin i no gutpela long wanpela hap taim bilong yia o long taim bilong sampela bung samting , orait ating ol kristen bai bihainim savepasin na ol i no insait long en long dispela taim .

translation.en: by keeping a balanced view of popular customs , christians " make sure of the more important things , so that [ they ] may be flawless and not be stumbling others . "
translation.zu: taim ol kristen i gat stretpela tingting long ol pasin bilong ples , ol ' inap long skelim gut olgeta pasin na kisim ol pasin i gutpela tru , na ol i no gat asua long wanpela samting . '

translation.en: at the same time , they will let their " reasonableness become known to all men . " - philippians 4 : 5 .
translation.zu: na tu , olgeta man bai ' lukim dispela gutpela pasin bilong ol . ' - filipai 4 : 5 .

translation.en: according to some anthropologists , flower bouquets were at times used as offerings to the dead to prevent them from haunting the living .
translation.zu: sampela saveman i tok , bipo ol i givim ol plaua olsem ofa long ol man i dai pinis bambai ol i no ken kam na pretim ol man i stap laip .

translation.en: a close shave
translation.zu: rausim gut mausgras

translation.en: if a man spends five minutes a day shaving and does so every day for 50 years , he will have spent just over 63 days of his life removing hair from his face !
translation.zu: sapos long olgeta de man i lusim 5 - pela minit long sev , insait long 50 yia bai em i lusim 63 de olgeta long rausim mausgras !

translation.en: how do men feel about this daily ritual ?
translation.zu: ol man i gat wanem tingting long mekim dispela wok long olgeta de ?

translation.en: a recent informal survey yielded these comments about shaving : " i don 't like it . "
translation.zu: ol i bin askim sampela man long tingting bilong ol long pasin bilong sev na ol i tok : " mi no laik mekim . "

translation.en: " i hate it . "
translation.zu: " mi nolaik tru long mekim . "

translation.en: " one of the hazards of life . "
translation.zu: " em i wanpela hevi yumi mas karim . "

translation.en: " something to be avoided whenever you can get away with it . "
translation.zu: " em i wanpela samting bilong abrusim sapos yu inap . "

translation.en: if some men feel so strongly about removing their facial hair , why do they do it ?
translation.zu: olsem na sapos planti man i no laik sev , bilong wanem ol i save mekim ?

translation.en: let 's learn a little more about shaving . perhaps we 'll find the answer .
translation.zu: taim yumi kisim sampela save moa long pasin bilong rausim mausgras , ating bai yumi painim bekim bilong dispela askim .

translation.en: from clamshells to disposable razors
translation.zu: pastaim kramsel na nau resa bilong tromoi

translation.en: can you imagine shaving with a clamshell ?
translation.zu: taim yu sev , yu laik mekim wok long kramsel ?

translation.en: a shark 's tooth ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem long tit bilong sak ?

translation.en: perhaps a sharp sliver of flint ?
translation.zu: o wanpela ston ol i bin sapim ?

translation.en: humans have shown remarkable ingenuity in choosing implements for shaving !
translation.zu: ol man i bin mekim wok long kain kain samting bilong rausim gras bilong pes !

translation.en: more recently , in the 18th and 19th centuries , what became known as cutthroats were manufactured , primarily in sheffield , england .
translation.zu: kirap long yia 1700 samting i go inap long yia 1900 samting , ol i wokim wanpela resa long sefil , inglan , em ol i kolim cutthroat .

translation.en: often ornately decorated , these razors had a hollow - ground steel blade that folded safely into the handle when not in use .
translation.zu: planti taim ol i bilasim gut han bilong en , na sap bilong en ol i wokim long ain na taim ol i no mekim wok long en , ol inap pasim olsem wanpela poket naip .

translation.en: these devices had to be handled with great care , and learning to master them no doubt cost more than a little skin and blood .
translation.zu: bilong lain long mekim gutpela wok long ol dispela resa , sampela hap skin bai tekewe pastaim na sampela blut bai kapsait tu . olsem na man i mas was gut .

translation.en: however , the 20th century promised relief .
translation.zu: tasol bihain long yia 1900 i gat helpim i kamap .

translation.en: his idea took the world by storm and eventually led to a variety of designs , including razors with silver - or gold - plated handles .
translation.zu: planti man long olgeta hap i laikim dispela kain masin bilong sev , na bihain ol i wokim i gat kain kain stail - sampela ol i wokim han bilong ol long silva na gol .

translation.en: not to be forgotten , of course , are electric razors , which first appeared on the market in 1931 .
translation.zu: na tu , kirap long 1931 ol i kirap wokim ol masin bilong sev i wok long paua .

translation.en: an on - again , off - again history
translation.zu: ol i laikim , ol i no laikim

translation.en: from earliest times mankind has had an on - again , off - again relationship with beards .
translation.zu: kirap long bipo yet , sampela taim ol man i save amamas long larim mausgras i kamap , na sampela taim nogat .

translation.en: this custom may explain why the hebrew prisoner joseph shaved prior to appearing before pharaoh . - genesis 41 : 14 .
translation.zu: dispela pasin bilong ol inap givim tingting long yumi bilong wanem josep i bin rausim mausgras paslain long taim em i go lukim fero . - stat 41 : 14 .

translation.en: assyrians were a race of splendidly bearded men .
translation.zu: ol man bilong asiria ol i gat ol mausgras i naispela tru .

translation.en: to the point of vanity , they lavished care and attention on their beards , having them elaborately curled , plaited , and arranged .
translation.zu: ol i hambak stret na lusim bikpela hap taim long lukautim mausgras bilong ol , na ol bai wokim long kain kain stail .

translation.en: israelite men of old wore beards of moderate length , and they used a razor to keep them well trimmed .
translation.zu: ol man bilong israel long bipo ol i gat mausgras i no longpela tumas na ol i mekim wok long ol resa bilong katim na sotim .

translation.en: so , what did god 's law mean when it commanded israelite men not to ' cut their sidelocks short around ' or " destroy the extremity " of their beards ?
translation.zu: olsem na wanem insait bilong lo bilong god taim em i tokim ol man bilong israel olsem , ' no ken katim gras bilong het klostu long yau bilong yupela ' na ' no ken katim na sotim mausgras ' ?

translation.en: rather , it discouraged israelite men from imitating the extreme religious practices of neighboring pagan nations .
translation.zu: i olsem ol i no ken bihainim pasin bilong lotu bilong ol haiden ol i stap klostu long ol .

translation.en: in ancient greek society , beards were normally worn by all except the nobility , who were often clean - shaven .
translation.zu: long ol grik bilong bipo ol bikman tasol i no gat mausgras , ol narapela i gat .

translation.en: in rome the habit of shaving seems to have started in the second century b.c.e . , and for several centuries thereafter , a daily shave remained the custom .
translation.zu: long rom pasin bilong sev i bin kirap long yia 100 samting paslain long krais na inap planti handet yia bihain em i pasin bilong ol long sev long olgeta de .

translation.en: with the fall of the roman empire , however , the beard once again prevailed , doing so for 1,000 years until the second half of the 17th century , when shaving became the vogue .
translation.zu: tasol taim gavman bilong rom i bagarap , ol man i lusim pasin bilong sev na ol i larim mausgras i stap .

translation.en: in the early part of the 20th century , however , shaving enjoyed a resurgence of popularity that has endured in most countries to our day .

translation.en: softening your whiskers : the only way to soften facial hair really well is to apply plenty of hot water .
translation.zu: mekim mausgras i kamap malumalum : i gat wanpela rot tasol bilong mekim ol gras long pes i kamap malumalum , em taim yu wasim long wara i hat .

translation.en: if possible , shave after taking a shower , as this allows more time for the water to soften the whiskers .
translation.zu: sapos yu save waswas long wara i hat , orait taim yu pinis em i gutpela taim bilong sev , long wanem , hatwara i bin pas long pes na nau gras bai malumalum .

translation.en: applying preshave products : all the various soaps , lathers , creams , and gels accomplish essentially three things .
translation.zu: putim sop samting bilong sev : olgeta kain sop samting bilong putim long pes taim yu laik sev , ol i save mekim tripela samting .

translation.en: ( 1 ) they lock moisture into the whiskers , ( 2 ) they keep them erect , and ( 3 ) they lubricate the skin so that the razor slides over it more easily .
translation.zu: ( 1 ) ol i mekim na wara i pas insait long pesgras , ( 2 ) ol i mekim ol wan wan gras i sanap , na ( 3 ) ol i welim skin na bai resa i no holim o katim skin .

translation.en: choose the product that works best for you .
translation.zu: kisim wanpela sop samting yu save pilim i wok gut .

translation.en: oh , have you tried hair conditioner ?
translation.zu: yu bin traim dispela samting ol i kolim hair conditioner ?

translation.en: it is also designed to soften hair .
translation.zu: em tu i save mekim gras i malumalum .

translation.en: using the right razor in the right manner : the right razor is a sharp razor .
translation.zu: mekim wok long resa i stret na long stretpela rot : gutpela resa em wanpela resa i sap .

translation.en: blunt razors can damage your skin .
translation.zu: sapos i no sap em inap bagarapim skin bilong yu .

translation.en: shaving against the grain may give a close shave , but it can cut whiskers below skin level and cause them to grow into surrounding tissue instead of out through the pores of the skin .
translation.zu: no ken kirap daunbilo na pulim resa i kam antap , long wanem , dispela pasin i save katim gras i go sot olgeta na go insait long skin , na taim em i kru em no inap kamap long hul stret bilong en , nogat , em bai sut i go insait long skin yet .

translation.en: according to some sources , careless shaving habits - by men and women - can cause viral infections leading to warts .
translation.zu: na sampela i tok dispela inap mekim na sua o buk i kamap .

translation.en: after - shave skin protection : each time you shave , you remove a microscopic layer of skin , leaving your skin vulnerable .
translation.zu: bilong lukautim skin bihain long sev : taim yu sev , yu save rausim liklik hap skin wantaim , em yu no inap lukim , na dispela i mekim na skin inap kisim bagarap long en .

translation.en: therefore , it is important to rinse all residues off your face with clean water - warm at first , then cool to close your pores and seal in moisture .
translation.zu: olsem na em i bikpela samting long wasim pes long wara i hat liklik na bihain wasim gen long kolwara . sapos yu laik , yu inap mekim wok long marasin ol i wokim bilong putim long pes bihain long taim yu sev .

translation.en: what are whiskers ?
translation.zu: mausgras em i wanem samting ?

translation.en: whiskers are hairs that grow on the face .
translation.zu: mausgras em gras i save kamap long pes .

translation.en: keratin is a fibrous , sulfur - containing protein manufactured by the body of man and animal and is the basic building block of hair , nails , feathers , hooves , and horns .
translation.zu: keratin em i wanpela protin i gat ol rop na salfa long en na bodi bilong ol manmeri na animal i save wokim dispela marasin , na dispela i save kamapim gras , na kapa bilong pinga , na gras bilong pisin , na kapa bilong lek bilong ol animal , na kom bilong ol .

translation.en: of all the hair on the human body , the whiskers are among the toughest and most resilient , being as hard to cut as a copper wire of equivalent thickness .
translation.zu: strong bilong gras bilong pes i winim strong bilong olgeta narapela gras long bodi bilong man , na strong bilong en i wankain olsem kapa waia i gat wankain sais na i hatwok long katim .

translation.en: there are as many as 25,000 on the face of the average man , and they grow at the rate of about half a millimeter every 24 hours .
translation.zu: long pes bilong ol man i gat 25,000 gras i stap na ol bai go bikpela inap hap milimita insait long olgeta 24 aua .

translation.en: how can i avoid dangers on the internet ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem mi inap abrusim samting nogut bilong intenet ?

translation.en: picture yourself in the world 's biggest library .
translation.zu: long tingting i olsem yu stap long wanpela traipela haus buk .

translation.en: books , newspapers , catalogs , photographs , and recordings of every sort - on virtually every subject - surround you .
translation.zu: long dispela haus buk i gat ol kain kain buk na nius samting na ol piksa bilong stori long planti samting .

translation.en: all the latest information as well as much of the literature of past centuries is at your fingertips .
translation.zu: wanem samting yu gat laik long save long en , samting bilong bipo o samting bilong nau , ol i stap na yu ken skelim .

translation.en: well , the internet can place such information at your fingertips .
translation.zu: intenet i narapela rot bilong kisim ol kain save olsem .

translation.en: * it allows users to sell products , to make purchases , to make banking transactions , to converse , to listen to the latest music recordings - all in the privacy of their own home .
translation.zu: em inap mekim wok long beng o toktok wantaim narapela i mekim wok long intenet o harim ol nupela kaset bilong singsing - em inap mekim ol dispela samting taim em i stap long haus bilong em yet .

translation.en: little wonder , then , that some experts predict that over 320 million people will be using the internet by the end of this year .
translation.zu: olsem na sampela man i gat save long ol dispela samting ol i tok taim dispela yia i pinis , 320 milion manmeri bai mekim wok long intenet .

translation.en: use of the internet is thus becoming commonplace in many parts of the world .
translation.zu: long planti ol hap bilong graun ol i save mekim wok long en .

translation.en: in the united states , nearly 65 percent of youths between the ages of 12 and 19 have already used or subscribed to on - line services .
translation.zu: long yunaitet stets , 65 pesen bilong ol yangpela i gat 12 i go inap 19 krismas ol i mekim wok long en .

translation.en: through it , you can buy books , car parts , and other things .
translation.zu: yu inap mekim wok long en bilong baim ol buk o samting bilong stretim ka na ol narapela samting .

translation.en: although the internet can be useful , it can also seem like a library without librarians or other observers .
translation.zu: wok bilong intenet inap long helpim yumi , tasol em i olsem wanpela haus buk i no gat man i stap long en .

translation.en: one can browse it with the feeling that no one else is around .
translation.zu: yumi inap stap yumi yet na lukluk long ol samting .

translation.en: but this is one of the greatest dangers of using the internet .
translation.zu: tasol dispela em i wanpela samting nogut bilong intenet .

translation.en: why ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem ?

translation.en: thus , the internet can expose young christians to temptation .
translation.zu: olsem na samting ol i lukim long intenet inap traim ol yangpela .

translation.en: after all , humans are naturally curious - a tendency that satan the devil has long exploited .
translation.zu: tru , ol manmeri i gat laik long kisim save long ol samting , na inap longpela taim satan i save mekim wok long dispela .

translation.en: satan certainly took advantage of eve 's curiosity and ' seduced her by his cunning . ' - 2 corinthians 11 : 3 .
translation.zu: iv i gat laik long save long olgeta samting , olsem na satan i mekim wok long dispela bilong ' giamanim em . ' - 2 korin 11 : 3 .

translation.en: similarly , a young christian could easily be seduced by unwholesome information if he is not determined to safeguard his spirituality .
translation.zu: olsem tasol , sapos wanpela yangpela kristen i no lukautim em yet long ol samting bilong spirit , ol save nogut bilong intenet inap traim em .

translation.en: they want to entice you - to get your money . " a young christian named john admits : " once you start looking at improper material , it 's hard to stop - it 's so addictive . "
translation.zu: wanpela yangpela kristen nem bilong em john , em i tok : " taim yu kirap pinis long skelim ol samting nogut , i hatwok long lusim dispela pasin - bai yu gat laik long mekim moa moa yet . "

translation.en: some christian youths have frequented unwholesome web sites , and this has led them into more serious trouble .
translation.zu: sampela yangpela kristen i bin wok long skelim sampela web - sait nogut , na dispela i kirapim ol long insait long sampela pasin nogut .

translation.en: some have even damaged their relationship with jehovah .
translation.zu: sampela i no pas gut moa wantaim jehova .

translation.en: how can this be avoided ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem yu inap abrusim dispela hevi ?

translation.en: sometimes a web - site address itself clearly indicates that the site contains objectionable material .
translation.zu: atres bilong sampela web - sait i kamapim klia olsem ol samting i stap long en i no gutpela .

translation.en: * proverbs 22 : 3 warns : " shrewd is the one that has seen the calamity and proceeds to conceal himself , but the inexperienced have passed along and must suffer the penalty . "
translation.zu: * sindaun 22 : 3 i tokaut olsem : " man i gat gutpela tingting , em i save olsem , hevi i laik kamap long em na em i abrusim .

translation.en: more commonly , though , the problem is that people may stumble upon an objectionable site purely by accident .
translation.zu: tasol man i no gat tingting , em i lukim trabel i stap long rot bilong en , na em i go na bungim na karim hevi . "

translation.en: the home page may contain lurid images that have been carefully designed to entice you into exploring the site - and returning to it over and over again !
translation.zu: sampela piksa nogut bai stap long hom pes bilong grisim man long skelim ol samting i stap insait long web - sait - bihain em bai i gat laik long lukim long olgeta taim !

translation.en: kevin describes what happened to one of his friends : " he had time on his hands and was curious .
translation.zu: kevin i stori long samting i bin kamap long wanpela pren bilong em : " em i stap nating na em i gat laik long save liklik long dispela samting .

translation.en: fortunately , this young christian sought out an elder and received help .
translation.zu: tasol gutpela tru dispela yangpela kristen i tokim wanpela elda bilong helpim em long lusim dispela pasin .

translation.en: it is clear what a christian should do : leave the site immediately - or even shut down the internet browser !
translation.zu: kristen i mas mekim olsem : lusim dispela web - sait wantu o pasim intenet long kompiuta bilong em !

translation.en: be like the psalmist who prayed : " make my eyes pass on from seeing what is worthless . "
translation.zu: bihainim tingting bilong man i bin raitim ol song , em i beten olsem : " helpim mi long givim baksait long ol samting i no gutpela . "

translation.en: the bible reminds us that all things are " openly exposed to the eyes of him with whom we have an accounting . " - hebrews 4 : 13 .
translation.zu: baibel i tokim yumi : " i no gat wanpela samting god i bin wokim , em inap hait long pes bilong god . " - hibru 4 : 13 .

translation.en: talking to your parents or to other mature christians can strengthen your resolve not to revisit unwholesome sites .
translation.zu: i wankain olsem sapos klostu yu bai kisim sampela bagarap long skin , yu bai singaut long kisim helpim wantu a ?

translation.en: what about association on - line ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem long toktok wantaim ol narapela long intenet ?

translation.en: chat allows internet users from all over the world to communicate instantaneously with one another .
translation.zu: ol man inap mekim wok long intenet bilong toktok wantaim ol man long olgeta narapela hap bilong graun .

translation.en: some chat rooms allow users to share information on technical matters , such as auto repair or computer programming .
translation.zu: yu inap toktok wantaim ol man i gat save long stretim ol samting olsem ka o long stretim kompiuta .

translation.en: some forms of chat allow friends and family members to communicate privately without the expense of long - distance telephone calls .
translation.zu: rot i op na yu inap toktok wantaim sampela pren o famili bilong yu i stap longwe na no gat hevi long bikpela pe bilong telefon .

translation.en: though there may be legitimate uses for this medium , are there any dangers ?
translation.zu: i gat ol gutpela wok bilong intenet , tasol olsem wanem ? i gat sampela hevi inap kamap long dispela ?

translation.en: there is a real need for caution when it comes to public chat rooms , for these can pose certain dangers .
translation.zu: man i toktok wantaim ol narapela long rot bilong intenet em i mas was gut , long wanem , hevi inap kamap long dispela .

translation.en: unfortunately , some of those strangers with whom teens may be talking online also happen to be adult perverts looking for sexual trysts with kids . "
translation.zu: tasol nogut yangpela i toktok wantaim wanpela man nogut i gat tingting long paulim yangpela long sampela pasin bilong sem . "

translation.en: an article in popular mechanics warned that " you have to be extremely careful " when using public chat rooms .
translation.zu: wanpela stori i stap long buk popular mechanics i tok , yu mas " was gut " taim yu toktok wantaim man yu no save long en long intenet .

translation.en: giving out your name or address to a stranger could be an invitation to serious trouble !
translation.zu: sapos yu givim nem na atres bilong yu long wanpela man yu no save long en , i olsem yu laik kisim sampela bikpela hevi !

translation.en: why subject yourself to that danger ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem yu laik givim hevi long yu yet ?

translation.en: the bible 's counsel at 1 corinthians 15 : 33 is thus appropriate : " do not be misled .
translation.zu: tok bilong baibel long 1 korin 15 : 33 i stret : " yupela i no ken larim ol arapela man i giamanim yupela .

translation.en: should a god - fearing youth recklessly expose himself or herself to such risks ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ? i gutpela sapos wanpela yangpela i pret long god i mekim dispela samting ?

translation.en: in view of the dangers that the internet presents , it must be used with caution .
translation.zu: hevi inap kamap sapos yu mekim wok long intenet , olsem na i gutpela sapos yu bihainim savepasin taim yu mekim wok long en .

translation.en: some families , for example , place the computer in a well - traveled area , such as the living room .
translation.zu: sampela famili i putim kompiuta i stap ples klia long wanpela rum i gat planti man i go i kam long en .

translation.en: they may also establish the rule that the internet only be used when others are at home .
translation.zu: na ating sampela famili bai putim lo olsem sampela i mas i stap taim yangpela i laik mekim wok long intenet .

translation.en: if schoolwork requires that you use the internet , why not keep track of how much time you spend on - line ?
translation.zu: sapos wok bilong skul i mekim na yu mas mekim wok long intenet , skelim ol aua yu bai wok long en .

translation.en: try to decide in advance how much time you will spend , using an alarm clock to remind you when the time is up .
translation.zu: makim taim yu bai lusim long dispela wok , na kisim klok na putim belo bilong en na taim em i krai em bai kirapim yu long tingim taim i pinis .

translation.en: tom suggests : " plan ahead , know exactly what you 're looking for , and stick to it - no matter how interesting other things look . "
translation.zu: tom i tok : " tingting gut , na save gut long samting yu laik lukim , na lukim dispela tasol , maski planti narapela samting i pulim ai bilong yu . "

translation.en: caution is also needed when it comes to the use of e - mail .
translation.zu: na yumi mas tingting gut taim yumi mekim wok long e - mail .

translation.en: king solomon said : " to the making of many books there is no end , and much devotion to them is wearisome to the flesh . "
translation.zu: king solomon i tok : " ol man i save raitim planti buk , na dispela kain wok i no gat pinis bilong en . "

translation.en: those words could well apply to the internet .
translation.zu: ( saveman 12 : 12 ) dispela tok i stret long intenet .

translation.en: don 't get so involved in the search for facts and figures that you neglect personal study of the bible and participation in the christian ministry .
translation.zu: no ken tromoi bikpela hap taim bilong kisim kain kain save na bai yu lus long mekim wok bilong yu long stadi long baibel na long go autim tok .

translation.en: remember , too , that while communicating via the computer may have its place , there is no substitute for having face - to - face contact with fellow christians .
translation.zu: i gat taim bilong toktok wantaim narapela long kompiuta , tasol pasin bilong lukim pes bilong narapela kristen na toktok wantaim em i win tru .

translation.en: so if you really need to use the internet , make a firm decision to use it wisely .
translation.zu: olsem na sapos yu mas mekim wok long intenet , pasim tok long bel olsem yu bai mekim gutpela wok long en tasol .

translation.en: avoid dangerous sites , and do not spend excessive time on - line .
translation.zu: abrusim ol web - sait nogut , na no ken tromoi bikpela hap taim long intenet .

translation.en: " safeguard your heart , " and never become a slave of the internet . - proverbs 4 : 23 .
translation.zu: " was gut tru long tingting bilong yu , " no ken kamap wokboi bilong intenet . - sindaun 4 : 23 .
