translation.zu: olsem : meri i bin katim marit em inap marit gen hariap , long wanem , em i laik ol pikinini bilong em ol i kisim nupela papa .

translation.en: but while remarriage may have its advantages , there can be problems .
translation.zu: tru , taim mama i marit gen dispela inap helpim famili , tasol ol hevi tu inap painim ol .

translation.en: children are sometimes resistant to accepting someone new as their father .
translation.zu: sampela pikinini i no orait long wanpela nupela man i kamap olsem papa bilong ol .

translation.en: sometimes they never do .
translation.zu: sampela pikinini bai sakim dispela man olgeta .

translation.en: similarly , there are no quick fixes to the problem of teen pregnancy .
translation.zu: na tu , i no gat ol rot bilong stretim kwik hevi bilong ol yangpela meri i kisim bel .

translation.en: abortion , for example , violates god 's law and requires a young woman to shut the door of her tender compassions upon the tiny life developing within her .
translation.zu: olsem : pasin bilong rausim bel i brukim lo bilong god , na dispela pasin i mekim na yangpela meri i mas wok long daunim pasin sori long dispela liklik bebi i wok long kamap insait long bel bilong em .

translation.en: how could that not leave emotional scars ?
translation.zu: dispela bai bagarapim bel bilong mama , a ?

translation.en: giving up a child for adoption is seen by many as a more humane solution , but it too can leave emotional scars - on both mother and child .
translation.zu: em nau , ol rot bilong stretim kwik ol hevi bai no inap pinisim pasin bilong kamapim ol famili i no gat papa .

translation.en: current family trends will be halted only if people are willing to make profound changes in their thinking , their attitudes , their behavior , their morals .
translation.zu: dispela rot em olsem : sapos ol manmeri i redi long senisim tru tingting na pasin bilong ol , ol famili i no gat papa o mama i no ken kamap planti .

translation.en: something more than high - sounding talk and pop psychology is needed if people are to be motivated to make such sweeping changes .
translation.zu: ol kain kain tok na tingting bilong ol saveman i no inap kirapim ol man long mekim ol bikpela senis olsem - i mas i gat narapela samting moa .

translation.en: that " something more " is found in god 's word , the bible .
translation.zu: dispela " narapela samting " i stap long tok bilong god , em baibel .

translation.en: after all , it is god himself who instituted the family arrangement .
translation.zu: yumi save god yet i as bilong famili .

translation.en: but can the bible really help children who have an absentee parent ?
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem ? baibel inap helpim tru ol pikinini i gat mama o papa tasol ?

translation.en: at the beginning of this article , we quoted a u.s . government report that itemized many of the risks these children face .
translation.zu: long kirap bilong dispela stori , mipela i bin kamapim tok bilong wanpela ripot bilong gavman bilong amerika em i kolim ol planti hevi inap painim ol dispela pikinini .

translation.en: this requires hard work on the part of a single parent - a prospect that may seem overwhelming at first .
translation.zu: bilong mekim olsem mama i mas wok strong - ating pastaim em i ting dispela wok i winim strong bilong em .

translation.en: regarding such ones the bible says : " the woman who is actually a widow and left destitute has put her hope in god and persists in supplications and prayers night and day . "
translation.zu: em i bilip tru long god na em i wetim god i mekim gut tru long em , na oltaim long san na long nait , em i save prea long god na askim god long helpim em . "

translation.en: conducting a regular home bible study with one 's children is an essential way to help them grow up to be balanced , mature adults .
translation.zu: pasin bilong stadi long baibel wantaim ol pikinini em i wanpela bikpela na gutpela rot bilong helpim ol long kamap man i gat gutpela na stretpela tingting .

translation.en: * the information therein helps young ones to develop moral standards that can help them to avoid making their parents ' mistakes .
translation.zu: * ol tok i stap long dispela buk i helpim ol yangpela long bihainim stretpela pasin , na dispela inap helpim ol long abrusim ol popaia em papamama bilong ol i bin mekim .

translation.en: as children come to know jehovah god , they can begin to perceive that they have a heavenly father who deeply cares for them .
translation.zu: taim ol pikinini i wok long kisim save long god jehova , bai ol i save olsem ol i gat wanpela papa i stap long heven na em i tingim tru ol .

translation.en: a british girl who experienced her parents ' breakup recalls : " through all of it , mum instilled in me the need for prayer and complete reliance on jehovah .
translation.zu: wanpela yangpela meri long briten em papamama bilong em ol i bin katim marit , em i tok : " taim dispela hevi i kamap , planti taim mama i tokim mi long mi mas beten na bilip strong long jehova .

translation.en: that enabled us to cope . "
translation.zu: dispela i helpim mipela long karim dispela hevi . "

translation.en: maintaining the parent - child bond
translation.zu: papamama na pikinini i pas gut wantaim

translation.en: the bible makes it clear that a child must honor both his mother and his father .
translation.zu: baibel i kamapim klia olsem pikinini i mas daun long mama na papa bilong em .

translation.en: though the ex - husband may no longer live at home , the children can still benefit from having a warm relationship with him .
translation.zu: maski papa i no stap moa wantaim famili , em inap helpim tru ol pikinini taim em i pas gut wantaim ol .

translation.en: * the problem is that the mother may feel angry toward him and resent his involvement with the children .
translation.zu: * tasol ating wanpela hevi i save kamap em olsem : mama i kros long man bilong em bilong bipo na em i no laik man i poromanim ol pikinini .

translation.en: how can the mother cope with these feelings ?
translation.zu: mama i ken mekim wanem bilong daunim dispela tingting ?

translation.en: the bible gives good advice when it cautions : " take care that rage does not allure you into spiteful [ actions ] . . .
translation.zu: baibel i givim gutpela tingting taim em i tok : " lukaut . nogut yu larim belhat bilong yu i pulim yu long mekim tok bilas . . .

translation.en: be on your guard that you do not turn to what is hurtful . "
translation.zu: lukaut gut . nogut yu pas olgeta long pasin nogut . "

translation.en: but ask yourself : ' can a girl learn to trust a man if she is constantly told how bad her father is ?
translation.zu: tasol askim yu yet : ' pikinini meri inap lain long bilip long wanpela man sapos oltaim mama i tokim em olsem papa bilong em i wanpela man nogut ?

translation.en: can a boy develop a stable , manly personality if he is chastised by being told , " you 're just like your father " ?
translation.zu: pikinini man inap kamapim pasin bilong man tru sapos mama i krosim em na i tok , " yu wankain stret olsem papa bilong yu " ?

translation.en: can children have a healthy view of authority if they are taught to despise their father or are discouraged from seeing him at all ? '
translation.zu: ol pikinini inap kisim stretpela tingting long man i gat wok long bosim ol , sapos mama i lainim ol long sakim papa bilong ol , o mama i no laik ol i lukim em liklik ? '

translation.en: it might surprise you to know that the bible does not condemn righteous indignation .
translation.zu: ating yu kirap nogut long save olsem baibel i no tambuim man long belhat sapos dispela belhat i stret .

translation.en: " be wrathful , " says the bible , " and yet do not sin . "
translation.zu: baibel i tok : " sapos bel bilong yupela i hat , orait yupela lukaut . nogut yupela i mekim sin . "

translation.en: being angry is not the sin , but being controlled by " wrath , anger , badness , abusive speech " is .
translation.zu: yumi ken belhat , tasol i no stret long larim " pasin bilong kros na belhat na bel nogut , na pasin bilong tok nogut " i bosim yumi .

translation.en: so avoid ' father bashing ' in front of your children .
translation.zu: olsem na yu no ken tok nogutim papa bilong ol pikinini long ai bilong ol .

translation.en: if you feel the need to express your frustrations , follow the bible 's suggestion to share your " anxious care , " but do so with someone other than your children - perhaps a trusted friend .
translation.zu: sapos yu pilim olsem yu mas kamapim bel hevi bilong yu , bihainim tok bilong baibel na kamapim ol " wari " bilong yu long wanpela man , olsem long wanpela pren yu inap bilip long em - tasol no ken kamapim long ol pikinini .

translation.en: doing so can do much to help mitigate your anger .
translation.zu: ( saveman 7 : 10 ) dispela inap helpim yu long daunim belhat bilong yu .

translation.en: finally , remember that the bible commands a child to respect his father - even if his father 's conduct has been less than admirable .
translation.zu: na tingim , baibel i tokim ol pikinini long stap daun long papa bilong em - maski pasin papa i bin mekim i nogut .

translation.en: so try to help your children to put their father 's shortcomings in perspective .
translation.zu: olsem na traim long helpim ol pikinini bilong yu long kisim stretpela tingting long ol pasin kranki bilong papa bilong ol .

translation.en: one young woman who grew up in a broken home says : " by viewing my father objectively - as a fallible , imperfect human - i 've finally come to terms with him . "
translation.zu: wanpela yangpela meri i go bikpela insait long famili i bruk , em i tok : " taim mi kisim stretpela tingting long papa bilong mi - olsem em i man i gat sin na em i save popaia - mi no kros moa long em . "

translation.en: by encouraging your children to respect their father , you help them to develop a healthy view of your parental authority !
translation.zu: taim yu kirapim ol pikinini bilong yu long stap daun long papa bilong ol , yu helpim ol long kisim stretpela tingting long wok bos bilong yu !

translation.en: it is also important that you not blur the boundaries between you and your children .
translation.zu: na tu , em i bikpela samting long ol pikinini i save yu gat namba bilong bosim ol .

translation.en: they are still under the ' law of their mother . '
translation.zu: ol i ' no ken sakim tok bilong mama . '

translation.en: daughters can likewise be overwhelmed by having to serve as their mother 's confidante .
translation.zu: na i wankain sapos mama i kamapim ol wari bilong em long ol pikinini meri , dispela inap putim hevi long ol .

translation.en: children need to be assured that you the parent will care for them - not vice versa .
translation.zu: ol pikinini i mas save olsem yu mama bilong ol na yu bai lukautim ol , nogut ol i ting ol i mas lukautim yu .

translation.en: ( compare 2 corinthians 12 : 14 . )
translation.zu: ( skelim wantaim 2 korin 12 : 14 . )

translation.en: such assurance can make them feel secure , even though their family situation is not ideal .
translation.zu: taim ol pikinini i save long dispela , ol i stap bel isi maski sindaun bilong famili i no gutpela tumas .

translation.en: what if the father is entirely out of the picture ?
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem sapos papa i no save bung liklik wantaim ol pikinini ?

translation.en: while the kindly interest that an uncle or a neighbor takes in a child can do some good , he will particularly benefit from the wholesome male association that exists within the christian congregation .
translation.zu: taim wanpela ankol o wanpela man i stap klostu em i tingim pikinini dispela bai helpim em , tasol gutpela samting moa bai painim pikinini taim em i poromanim wanpela brata i stap insait long kongrigesen kristen .

translation.en: jesus promised that the congregation would be like a supportive family . - mark 10 : 29 , 30 .
translation.zu: jisas i tok promis olsem kongrigesen bai stap olsem wanpela gutpela famili bilong helpim man . - mak 10 : 29 , 30 .

translation.en: in bible times young timothy grew up to be an outstanding man of god , without the support of a believing father .
translation.zu: long taim bilong ol man i bin raitim baibel , yangpela timoti i kamap gutpela wokman bilong god , maski papa bilong em i no bilip .

translation.en: the bible gives much of the credit for this to his loving mother and grandmother .
translation.zu: baibel i tok , mama na bubu meri bilong timoti ol i mekim na em i kamap gutpela man olsem .

translation.en: however , he also benefited from association with a christian man - the apostle paul .
translation.zu: tasol em i poroman gut wantaim wanpela man kristen , em aposel pol , na dispela tu i helpim em .

translation.en: they are urged to ' rescue fatherless boys ' by taking a sincere , balanced interest in such ones .
translation.zu: baibel i tokim ol witnes long ' helpim ol pikinini em papa bilong ol i dai pinis , ' na tingim gut ol .

translation.en: a young woman named annette recalls the healthy interest a christian elder took in her when she was young , saying : " he was the only real father figure i ever had . "
translation.zu: ( jop 29 : 12 ) wanpela yangpela meri nem bilong em annette , em i tingim gutpela pasin wanpela elda kristen i mekim long em taim em i yangpela yet , na em i tok : " em wanpela tasol i bin stap olsem papa bilong mi . "

translation.en: breaking the cycle
translation.zu: pinisim dispela hevi

translation.en: and ultimately , the cycle of fatherless families can be broken only when men and women make a commitment to apply the bible in their lives - for example , by adhering to the bible 's prohibition on sex before marriage and by following the standards the bible sets for husbands and wives . - 1 corinthians 6 : 9 ; ephesians 5 : 21 - 33 .
translation.zu: olsem : ol i mas bihainim tok bilong baibel long ol i no ken mekim maritpasin taim ol i no marit yet , na ol i mas bihainim ol lo bilong baibel em ol i bilong ol man marit na meri marit . - 1 korin 6 : 9 ; efesus 5 : 21 - 33 .

translation.en: nowadays , many children have fathers in the house and yet can still be called fatherless .
translation.zu: long taim bilong yumi , papa bilong planti pikinini i stap wantaim famili , tasol yumi ken tok ol i olsem pikinini i no gat papa .

translation.en: claims one expert in family issues : " the biggest problem facing . . . children today is a lack of time with and attention from their parents . "
translation.zu: wanpela saveman long ol samting bilong famili , em i tok : ' nambawan bikpela hevi bilong ol pikinini long nau em olsem : papamama i no lusim bikpela hap taim bilong stap wantaim ol pikinini na ol i no save tingim ol tumas . '

translation.en: god 's word addresses this issue head - on .
translation.zu: baibel i tokaut stret long dispela samting .

translation.en: it commands fathers regarding their children : " give them the instruction , and the correction , which belong to a christian upbringing . "
translation.zu: em i tokim ol papa long mekim olsem : " yupela i mas mekim gutpela pasin long ai bilong bikpela , na stretim gut ol pikinini bilong yupela na skulim ol long tok bilong bikpela . "

translation.en: when fathers follow the bible 's advice , children have no fear of being abandoned .
translation.zu: taim ol papa i bihainim tok bilong baibel , ol pikinini i no pret long papa bai lusim ol .

translation.en: is it realistic to believe , though , that people will turn to the bible on a large scale ?
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem ? yumi ken ting planti man bai kirap bihainim tok bilong baibel ?

translation.en: hardly .
translation.zu: ating nogat .

translation.en: but jehovah 's witnesses have helped millions to find happiness in their family life through a program of home bible study .
translation.zu: tasol ol witnes bilong jehova i bin helpim planti milion famili long kisim amamas taim ol i stadi wantaim ol long baibel .

translation.en: * of course , the bible warns that all married couples will suffer " tribulation in their flesh " because of imperfection .
translation.zu: * tru , baibel i tok olsem olgeta marit bai " painim planti hevi long laip bilong ol , " long wanem , ol i no gutpela olgeta .

translation.en: but those who truly respect god 's word seek to work out their problems , not to divorce at the first sign of trouble .
translation.zu: tasol ol manmeri i daun tru long tok bilong god , ol i wok long stretim hevi bilong ol , na ol i no katim marit taim hevi i kamap .

translation.en: admittedly , there are times when a christian may appropriately consider separation or even divorce .
translation.zu: tru , sampela taim i gat as na wanpela kristen inap tingting long lusim poroman o long katim marit .

translation.en: however , knowing the possible impact this could have on his or her children will move a christian to seek ways to salvage the marriage if at all possible .
translation.zu: tasol kristen i save long ol samting nogut dispela inap mekim long ol pikinini bilong em , olsem na em bai wok long painim rot bilong stretim hevi bilong marit sapos em inap mekim olsem .

translation.en: it can make it possible for all of you to live forever !
translation.zu: jisas i tok : " laip bilong i stap gut oltaim , em i olsem .

translation.en: jesus said : " this means everlasting life , their taking in knowledge of you , the only true god , and of the one whom you sent forth , jesus christ . "
translation.zu: ol man i kisim dispela laip , ol i save long yu , yu wanpela tasol yu god tru . na ol i save long jisas krais , em yu bin salim i kam . "

translation.en: reading and applying the counsel found in god 's word is one of the best ways to make sure that your family will remain intact forever .
translation.zu: pasin bilong ritim na bihainim ol tok i stap long baibel em i nambawan gutpela rot bilong helpim famili bilong yu long pas gut wantaim inap oltaim oltaim .

translation.en: from the look of sheer delight on her face , it is obvious that the little girl is enjoying her meal .
translation.zu: taim yu lukim pes bilong liklik pikinini meri i lait , yu save em i amamas long kaikai .

translation.en: in her left hand is a bowl piled to the brim with rice , small pieces of vegetables , and fish .
translation.zu: long han kais em i holim plet em rais wantaim liklik kumu na pis i pulap long en .

translation.en: in her right hand is a pair of thin bamboo sticks .
translation.zu: long han sut em i holim tupela stik ol i wokim long mambu .

translation.en: working the sticks with her tiny fingers , the girl picks out her favorite morsels and places them neatly in her mouth .
translation.zu: em i holim gut tupela stik mambu long liklik han bilong em , na em i kisim ol kaikai em i save laikim na putim long maus bilong em .

translation.en: sometimes she takes the bowl up to her lips and , with a few quick strokes of the sticks , scoops the rice right into her mouth .
translation.zu: sampela taim em i holim plet klostu long maus na mekim wok long tupela stik mambu bilong savolim kaikai i go insait long maus .

translation.en: it all looks so natural , easy , and neat .
translation.zu: i no hatwok long em long mekim olsem , na kaikai i no pundaun nabaut .

translation.en: what the little girl has in her hand are , of course , the fabled chopsticks .
translation.zu: yu save , dispela meri i holim tupela stik ol i kolim sopstik .

translation.en: in chinese they are called k 'uai tzu ( pinyin , kuaizi ) , which means " quick ones . "
translation.zu: long saina ol i kolim ol dispela stik olsem k 'uai tzu , insait bilong dispela nem i olsem " mekim hariap . "

translation.en: the english word " chopsticks " is said to have come from the pidgin term chop , meaning " quick . "
translation.zu: klostu olgeta famili long hap bilong saut - is esia i save mekim wok long ol dispela stik .

translation.en: perhaps you have tried to use them while dining in a chinese restaurant .
translation.zu: nogut yu bin traim taim yu kaikai long wanpela haus kaikai bilong ol saina .

translation.en: but do you know where the idea of chopsticks came from ?
translation.zu: dispela tingting bilong mekim wok long tupela stik bilong kaikai i kamap olsem wanem ?

translation.en: and would you like to know how to use them correctly ?
translation.zu: yu laik kisim save long pasin bilong mekim wok long en ?

translation.en: the " quick ones "
translation.zu: tupela stik bilong " mekim hariap "

translation.en: chopsticks are slender sticks about eight to ten inches [ 20 - 25 cm ] long .
translation.zu: ol sopstik i olsem ol liklik stik longpela bilong ol i olsem 20 i go inap long 25 sentimita .

translation.en: this makes it easier to grasp and prevents it from rolling around on the table .
translation.zu: ol sopstik bilong japan i liklik long ol narapela na sap bilong ol i sap moa .

translation.en: in these days of mass production , many restaurants provide prepackaged chopsticks that are still joined at the upper end .
translation.zu: ol man bai mekim wok long en long wanpela taim tasol , olsem na ol i wokim long diwai o mambu .

translation.en: because they are for one - time use only , such chopsticks are made of plain wood or bamboo .
translation.zu: sampela ol i wokim long plastik , ain , silva o tit bilong elefan .

translation.en: they may also be inscribed with poetry or decorated with a painting .
translation.zu: sampela i gat ol gutpela rait long en o ol i penim gutpela piksa long en .

translation.en: many visitors to oriental countries such as china and japan are fascinated when they see a small child of perhaps just two years of age eating with a pair of seemingly oversized chopsticks .
translation.zu: taim ol man i go raun long ol kantri bilong is olsem saina o japan , ol i kirap nogut long lukim ol liklik pikinini i gat olsem 2 - pela krismas i mekim wok long ol sopstik .

translation.en: in no time at all , the contents of the bowl are transferred piece by piece to the child 's mouth .
translation.zu: pikinini i save kisim ol kaikai hariap na putim i go stret long maus bilong em .

translation.en: would you like to try using a pair of the " quick ones " ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ? yu laik traim na mekim wok long tupela stik bilong " mekim hariap " ?

translation.en: at first you may find it awkward to get the chopsticks to move in the way you want them to , but with a little practice , it becomes easy and the chopsticks become like an extension of your hand .
translation.zu: pastaim yu bai pilim olsem i hatwok long holim gut stik na kisim kaikai long en , tasol bihain taim yu mekim mekim bai yu pilim olsem i no hatwok , na tupela stik i kamap olsem hap han bilong yu .

translation.en: chopsticks are held in one hand only , usually the right hand .
translation.zu: ol i save holim tupela stik long wanpela han tasol , olsem long han sut .

translation.en: ( see the illustrations on page 15 . )
translation.zu: ( lukim ol piksa i stap long pes 15 . )

translation.en: first , cup your hand , with your thumb apart from your fingers . place one chopstick in between your thumb and fingers , resting it against the base of your index finger and the tip of your ring finger .
translation.zu: wanpela stik bai stap namel long pinga namba wan na pinga namba tu , na pinga namba 4 bai holim gut hap daunbilo bilong en .

translation.en: get the ends even by tapping them on the table .
translation.zu: holim narapela stik olsem wanpela pensil .

translation.en: now , keeping the bottom chopstick stationary , move the top one by flexing your index and middle fingers up and down .
translation.zu: namba wan stik bai stap tasol na namba tu stik bai mekim wok long go i kam .

translation.en: practice until you can bring the tips of the chopsticks together easily .
translation.zu: traim planti taim na bai yu inap wokim gut ol stik .

translation.en: you are now ready to use these versatile implements to pick up any of the delicious morsels served in a chinese meal - from a single grain of rice to a quail 's egg !
translation.zu: nau yu inap mekim wok long tupela stik bilong kisim olgeta kain kaikai ol i redim long pasin bilong ol saina !

translation.en: what about dishes in which a chicken , a duck , or a pork rump is served whole , without being cut up into small pieces ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem sapos ol i kukim sampela kakaruk o pato o hap bilong pik na ol i no katim i go liklik ?

translation.en: usually the meat is cooked to such a degree that chopsticks can easily be used to separate a bite - size portion .
translation.zu: ol i save kukim longtaim na i no hatwok long brukim long dispela tupela stik .

translation.en: what about eating rice ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem long kaikai rais ?

translation.en: if the occasion is informal , you may pick up the rice bowl with your left hand , take it up to your mouth , and scoop the rice into your mouth with the chopsticks .
translation.zu: sampela taim yu inap holim plet klostu long maus bilong yu na mekim wok long tupela stik bilong savolim rais i go long maus .

translation.en: at a more formal meal , however , you would pick up the rice with the chopsticks , a small amount at a time .
translation.zu: tasol taim yu bung wantaim ol narapela long bikpela kaikai samting , i gutpela long kisim liklik hap rais tasol long stik na kaikai .

translation.en: what about soup , which is always a component of a chinese meal ?
translation.zu: olgeta taim ol kaikai bilong saina bai i gat sup long en , olsem na bai yu kaikai olsem wanem ?

translation.en: a porcelain spoon is usually provided .
translation.zu: planti taim ol bai putim wanpela spun i stap .

translation.en: but if the soup contains noodles or dumplings or pieces of vegetable , meat , or fish , try using your chopsticks in your right hand to pick up the food and the spoon in your left hand to help transport it to your mouth .
translation.zu: tasol sapos ol nudol , o plaua , o kumu , o abus , o pis samting i stap long sup , orait long wanpela han yu ken holim ol samting long tupela stik na long narapela han yu ken mekim wok long spun bilong putim long maus .

translation.en: when you are invited to a chinese home for a meal , it is helpful to be aware of chinese table manners , or etiquette .
translation.zu: taim yu go long haus bilong ol saina bilong kaikai , i gutpela sapos yu save gut long pasin bilong ol long kaikai .

translation.en: first , several dishes are placed in the center of the table .
translation.zu: pastaim ol i save putim ol plet i gat kaikai namel long tebol .

translation.en: that is the proper moment for the guests to acknowledge the invitation , pick up their chopsticks , and proceed .
translation.zu: ol i no save bihainim pasin bilong ol lain bilong wes , olsem sampela taim ol i save salim ol bikpela plet i go long ol man wan wan , nogat .

translation.en: unlike some western - style meals , the dishes are not passed around the table .
translation.zu: ol kaikai i stap namel long tebol na ol man i kisim samting long laik bilong ol .

translation.en: in a family meal , it is customary for each member to use his or her own pair of chopsticks to take pieces from the common dishes and put them right into the mouth .
translation.zu: tasol i no gutpela pasin sapos yu mekim bikpela pairap long maus taim yu kaikai , o mekim wok long tang bilong yu long klinim tupela stik bilong yu .

translation.en: even so , it is considered bad manners to slurp your food , lick the ends of your chopsticks , or pick through the dishes for your favorite piece .
translation.zu: na tu , i no gutpela long mekim wok long ol stik bilong lukluk gut long ol kaikai na painim ol hap kaikai yu save laikim moa yet .

translation.en: mothers in the orient instruct their children not to bite the ends of their chopsticks , not only because they are concerned about hygiene but also because it spoils the appearance of the chopsticks .
translation.zu: ol mama i stap long hap bilong is ol i save tambuim ol pikinini long kaikaim arere bilong ol stik long tit , long wanem , ol i tingting long pasin bilong stap klin , na tu ol stik bai bagarap .

translation.en: out of consideration for guests , sometimes serving spoons or additional chopsticks are provided .
translation.zu: ol i tingim ol lain ol i bin singautim na sampela taim ol bai putim ol spun na sampela stik moa i stap .

translation.en: still , do not be offended if your host uses his chopsticks to pick out a choice morsel and place it right into your bowl .
translation.zu: tasol no ken tingting planti sapos man bilong bosim dispela kaikai em i kisim sampela kaikai long tupela stik bilong em na putim long plet bilong yu .

translation.en: after all , he wants to make sure that his honored guest gets the best piece !
translation.zu: em i laik bai man em i bin singautim i kam em i kisim nambawan gutpela hap bilong kaikai !

translation.en: it is equally bad manners to pick up something else while you still have your chopsticks in your hand .
translation.zu: na tu , i no gutpela pasin long kisim narapela samting long han taim yu holim yet tupela stik .

translation.en: so when you need to use the serving spoon or to pick up a napkin or a teacup , first put down your chopsticks .
translation.zu: olsem na taim yu laik kisim spun o kisim kap bilong dring , lusim ol stik long tebol .

translation.en: small , attractive chopstick stands are often provided for this purpose .
translation.zu: sampela taim ol i putim ol naispela liklik plet samting bilong slipim ol stik long en .

translation.en: when you finish eating , put your chopsticks down neatly , sit back , and wait .
translation.zu: taim yu kaikai pinis , putim gut ol stik na wet i stap .

translation.en: it is bad manners to leave the table before everyone finishes .
translation.zu: i no gutpela pasin long lusim tebol taim ol narapela i kaikai yet .

translation.en: now that you know how to use them , all you need to do is get some chopsticks and practice with them .
translation.zu: nau yu save pinis long pasin bilong mekim wok long tupela stik , olsem na yu ken kisim sampela na traim mekim wok long en , a ?

translation.en: the next time someone invites you to a chinese restaurant or to their home for a chinese meal , why not try a pair of the " quick ones " ?
translation.zu: na taim sampela i singautim yu long go long wanpela haus kaikai bilong ol saina o go long haus bilong ol yet long kaikai long sampela kaikai bilong ol saina , yu inap mekim wok long tupela stik .

translation.en: it may even make the food taste better !
translation.zu: ating kaikai bai i swit moa !

translation.en: a little chopstick history
translation.zu: stori bilong ol stik bilong kaikai

translation.en: in this way food could be cooked without the cook getting burned !
translation.zu: long dispela rot man inap kukim ol kaikai tasol paia i no kukim han bilong em !

translation.en: later in history , chopsticks were used to remove pieces of food from the cooking pot .
translation.zu: bihain long dispela taim , ol i mekim wok long ol stik bilong rausim kaikai long sospen .

translation.en: * that is one reason why it is nearly impossible to state with accuracy just when they were first used .
translation.zu: * olsem na em i wanpela as na i hatwok tru long save wanem taim stret ol i kirap na mekim wok long ol stik bilong kaikai .

translation.en: some believe that chopsticks were used in china as early as the shang dynasty ( about the 16th to the 11th century b.c.e . ) .
translation.zu: sampela i ting ol i bin mekim wok long en long saina long taim ol lain shang i stap king ( em long yia 1500 samting i go inap long yia 1000 samting paslain long krais ) .

translation.en: a historical document from just after confucius ' time ( 551 - 479 b.c.e . ) spoke of ' pinching ' food from soup , indicating that chopsticks of some sort were used .
translation.zu: wanpela olpela rait bihain liklik long taim bilong ol konfusas ( 551 - 479 b.c.e . ) i stori long pasin bilong sampela long " stilim " ol hap kaikai long sup , na dispela i makim olsem ol i mekim wok long sampela kain samting olsem stik bilong kaikai .

translation.en: apparently by the early han dynasty ( 206 b.c.e . to 220 c.e . ) , eating with chopsticks had become a common practice .
translation.zu: long taim bilong ol lain han long stap king ( 206 b.c.e . i go inap long 220 c.e . ) , ol saina i kisim pinis pasin bilong kaikai long tupela stik .

translation.en: a grave of that period was excavated in changsha , hunan province , in which was found a set of lacquered eating utensils , including chopsticks .
translation.zu: sampela i bin rausim ol samting i stap long wanpela matmat bilong dispela taim bilong bipo na ol i painim ol samting ol man i bin mekim wok long en bilong kaikai na ol stik bilong kaikai tu i stap .

translation.en: [ footnote ]
translation.zu: [ futnot ]

translation.en: in ancient chinese both characters for k 'uai tzu ( quick ones ) were written with the bamboo radical , suggesting the material with which chopsticks were initially made .
translation.zu: long tok ples bilong ol saina bilong bipo dispela tok k 'uai tzu ( mekim hariap ) i gat hap tok i stap long en i makim mambu , na dispela i givim tingting long yumi olsem ol i bin wokim ol sopstik bilong pastaim long mambu .

translation.en: the bible 's viewpoint
translation.zu: baibel i tok wanem ?

translation.en: lying - is it ever justified ?
translation.zu: i stret sampela taim yumi ken mekim tok giaman ?

translation.en: this comment illustrates how many people feel about lying .
translation.zu: dispela tok i kamapim tingting bilong planti man long pasin bilong tok giaman .

translation.en: their rationale is that lying is not wrong if it does not harm anyone .
translation.zu: ol i ting , tok giaman i no gat rong sapos em i no bagarapim narapela .

translation.en: such reasoning even has an academic name - situation ethics , which says that the only law you need to follow is the so - called law of love .
translation.zu: ol man i gat dispela kain tingting ol i tok , i gat wanpela lo tasol yumi mas bihainim , em lo bilong laikim tru ol narapela .

translation.en: in other words , explains author diane komp , " if your motivation is right and your heart is right ( then the ) fact that you lied . . . is no big deal . "
translation.zu: olsem wanpela meri bilong raitim buk , em diane komp , em i tok , ' sapos gutpela tingting i kirapim yu long giaman , orait tok giaman bilong yu i no bikpela samting . '

translation.en: such a viewpoint is common in today 's world .
translation.zu: planti man long nau ol i gat dispela kain tingting .

translation.en: scandals involving lies told by prominent politicians and other world leaders have rocked society .
translation.zu: ol man i kirap nogut long ol tok giaman bilong sampela bikman bilong wok politik na bilong gavman .

translation.en: influenced by this climate , many people have relaxed their commitment to telling the truth .
translation.zu: pasin bilong tok giaman i go bikpela , olsem na planti man i no strong moa long mekim tok tru .

translation.en: this seems to be the core of retail sales training everywhere , " complains one salesclerk .
translation.zu: i olsem tok giaman em i wanpela bikpela samting ol i lainim ol wokman bilong stua long mekim long olgeta hap . "

translation.en: many believe that there is no real harm in so - called little white lies .
translation.zu: planti ol i ting i no gat rong sapos ol i mekim liklik tok giaman .

translation.en: is this true ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ?

translation.en: are there occasions when christians may be justified in telling a lie ?
translation.zu: dispela em i tru ? sampela taim i stret long ol kristen i mekim tok giaman ?

translation.en: the bible 's exalted standard
translation.zu: gutpela lo bilong baibel

translation.en: the bible roundly condemns all sorts of lying .
translation.zu: baibel i tambuim olgeta kain tok giaman .

translation.en: " [ god ] will destroy those speaking a lie , " declares the psalmist .
translation.zu: man bilong raitim song em i tok : " [ god i ] save bagarapim olgeta man bilong giaman . "

translation.en: at proverbs 6 : 16 - 19 , the bible lists seven things that jehovah detests .
translation.zu: long sindaun 6 : 16 - 19 , baibel i kamapim wanpela lista i kolim 7 - pela samting em jehova i nolaik tru long en .

translation.en: " a false tongue " and " a false witness that launches forth lies " are prominently included in this list .
translation.zu: " pasin bilong mekim tok giaman " na " pasin bilong tok giaman long kot " i stap long dispela lista .

translation.en: why ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem ?

translation.en: his lies plunged humanity into misery and death . - genesis 3 : 4 , 5 ; john 8 : 44 ; romans 5 : 12 .
translation.zu: ol tok giaman bilong em i mekim na planti hevi na indai i painim ol man . - stat 3 : 4 , 5 ; jon 8 : 44 ; rom 5 : 12 .

translation.en: just how seriously jehovah views lying is highlighted by what happened to ananias and sapphira .
translation.zu: samting i painim ananaias na safaira i kamapim klia tingting bilong jehova long tok giaman .

translation.en: these two deliberately lied to the apostles in an apparent attempt to appear more generous than they really were .
translation.zu: tupela hia i giamanim ol aposel bambai ol i ken ting tupela i bin givim planti mani , tasol ol i givim liklik tasol .

translation.en: for this , they both died at god 's hand . - acts 5 : 1 - 10 .
translation.zu: long dispela as god i kilim tupela i dai . - aposel 5 : 1 - 10 .

translation.en: years later the apostle paul admonished christians : " do not be lying to one another . "
translation.zu: sampela yia bihain , aposel pol i tokim ol kristen olsem : " yupela wan wan i no ken giamanim ol arapela kristen . "

translation.en: this exhortation is particularly vital in the christian congregation .
translation.zu: dispela tok i bikpela samting tru insait long kongrigesen kristen .

translation.en: jesus said that principled love would be the identifying mark of his true followers .
translation.zu: jisas i tok , pasin bilong laikim tru ol narapela em i mak bilong ol disaipel tru bilong em .

translation.en: it is difficult to love someone if we cannot be confident that he will always tell us the truth .
translation.zu: i hatwok long laikim tru wanpela man sapos yumi no inap bilip olsem em i save mekim tok tru long olgeta taim .

translation.en: while all lying is reprehensible , some lies are more serious than others .
translation.zu: olgeta kain tok giaman i nogut , tasol sampela i nogut tru .

translation.en: for example , one person may lie out of embarrassment or fear .
translation.zu: olsem : wanpela man i giaman , long wanem , em i sem o pret .

translation.en: another may wickedly make a practice of lying with the intent to harm or injure .
translation.zu: tasol narapela man i gat pasin bilong tok giaman , long wanem , em i laik bagarapim ol narapela .

translation.en: because of his malicious motivation , such a willful liar is a danger to others and would be disfellowshipped from the congregation if he does not repent .
translation.zu: tingting nogut i kirapim em long giaman , olsem na man i gat laik long giaman , em inap bagarapim ol narapela , na em bai raus long kongrigesen sapos em i no tanim bel .

translation.en: since not all lies are inspired by maliciousness , care must be taken not to condemn unnecessarily but to be sure one knows all the factors involved when someone has told a lie .
translation.zu: pasin bilong bel nogut i no as bilong olgeta tok giaman , olsem na yu mas was gut nogut yu sutim tok nating long narapela , yu mas save long olgeta samting i bin kamap taim wanpela man i tok giaman .

translation.en: " cautious as serpents "
translation.zu: " bihainim pasin bilong ol snek "

translation.en: of course , being truthful does not mean that we are obligated to divulge all information to anyone who asks it of us .
translation.zu: bilong mekim tok tru i no olsem yumi mas stori long olgeta samting long man i askim yumi long mekim olsem .

translation.en: " do not give what is holy to dogs , neither throw your pearls before swine , that they may never . . . turn around and rip you open , " warned jesus , at matthew 7 : 6 .
translation.zu: long matyu 7 : 6 jisas i tok : " yupela i no ken kisim samting ol i makim bilong god , na givim long ol dok . . . . na yupela i no ken tromoi ol gutpela gutpela bis bilong yupela i go long ol pik .

translation.en: for example , individuals with wicked intent may have no right to know certain things .
translation.zu: olsem : i no stret long ol man i gat tingting nogut ol i kisim save long sampela samting .

translation.en: christians understand that they are living in a hostile world .
translation.zu: ol kristen i save ol lain bilong graun i save birua long ol .

translation.en: thus , jesus advised his disciples to be " cautious as serpents " while remaining " innocent as doves . "
translation.zu: olsem na jisas i tokim ol disaipel bilong em long " bihainim pasin bilong ol snek " tasol ol i " no ken tingting long mekim wanpela pasin nogut . "

translation.en: jesus did not always disclose the full truth , especially when revealing all the facts could have brought unnecessary harm to himself or his disciples .
translation.zu: sampela taim jisas i no kamapim olgeta samting , na em i tingim dispela moa yet taim pasin bilong kamapim olgeta samting inap bagarapim em yet o ol disaipel bilong em .

translation.en: still , even at such times , he did not lie .
translation.zu: tasol long kain taim olsem tu , em i no bin mekim tok giaman , nogat .

translation.en: instead , he chose either to say nothing or to divert the conversation in another direction . - matthew 15 : 1 - 6 ; 21 : 23 - 27 ; john 7 : 3 - 10 .
translation.zu: em i pasim maus tasol na em i no mekim wanpela tok o em i stiaim ol man long toktok long narapela samting . - matyu 15 : 1 - 6 ; 21 : 23 - 27 ; jon 7 : 3 - 10 .

translation.en: that makes them worthy of imitation . - romans 15 : 4 ; hebrews 11 : 8 - 10 , 20 , 31 , 32 - 39 .
translation.zu: olsem na ol i stap olsem gutpela piksa bilong yumi ken bihainim . - rom 15 : 4 ; hibru 11 : 8 - 10 , 20 , 31 , 32 - 39 .

translation.en: there may be times when lying seemingly provides an easy way out .
translation.zu: ating long sampela taim i luk olsem tok giaman inap helpim yu long abrusim wanpela hevi samting .

translation.en: but christians today do well to imitate jesus ' course and follow their bible - trained conscience when facing particularly difficult situations . - hebrews 5 : 14 .
translation.zu: tasol taim ol kristen bilong nau i gat ol bikpela hevi , i gutpela ol i bihainim pasin bilong jisas na maus bilong bel em baibel i skulim pinis . - hibru 5 : 14 .

translation.en: the bible encourages us to be truthful and honest .
translation.zu: baibel i kirapim yumi long mekim tok tru tasol .

translation.en: lying is wrong , and we should follow the bible counsel : " speak truth each one of you with his neighbor . "
translation.zu: pasin bilong mekim tok giaman i no stret , na yumi mas bihainim tok bilong baibel : " yupela olgeta i mas mekim tok tru tasol long ol arapela . "

translation.en: by doing so , we will keep a clean conscience , promote peace and love in the congregation , and continue to honor " the god of truth . " - psalm 31 : 5 ; hebrews 13 : 18 .
translation.zu: taim yumi mekim olsem , bel bilong yumi i no kotim yumi , na yumi kamapim pasin sori na bel isi insait long kongrigesen , na yumi wok long litimapim nem bilong " god bilong mekim pasin tru tasol . " - song 31 : 5 ; hibru 13 : 18 .

translation.en: ananias and sapphira lost their lives because of lying
translation.zu: ananaias na safaira i mekim tok giaman , olsem na ol i dai

translation.en: " archaeologists in egypt have announced the discovery of at least 200 mummies , some of them with golden masks , in a huge cemetery in the western desert , " says a bbc news dispatch . the burial area is near a desert oasis and within the city of bawiti , some 185 miles [ 300 km ] southwest of cairo .
translation.zu: wanpela nius ( the sunday telegraph ) bilong landon i tok , ol nambawan bikpela ples ais bai pinis insait long 40 yia , sapos ais i wok yet long kamap wara olsem em i save mekim long nau - ol dispela ples ais i no bilong ples kol nogut tru long hap bilong not na saut .

translation.en: according to egypt 's middle east news agency , the cemetery may contain over 10,000 mummies . it has been renamed valley of the mummies .
translation.zu: long olgeta hap , ples i wok long kamap hat moa , na ol maunten himalaya i stap klostu long ekweta , olsem na ais bilong ol 15,000 bikpela maunten ais bilong dispela hap i laik go liklik .

translation.en: pestilences plague africa attempts by the world health organization to have polio completely eradicated in africa by the end of the year have been thwarted , reports the cape times .
translation.zu: wanpela saientis bilong skelim ol bikpela maunten ais , em syed hasnain , em i tok , sapos ais bilong ol dispela maunten i wok yet long go liklik , " ol bikpela wara olsem genjis , na indus , na bramaputra bai drai .

translation.en: leprosy is still a problem in congo , ethiopia , mozambique , niger , and nigeria .
translation.zu: taim ol bikpela hap ais i kamap wara , ol i kamapim ol raunwara em ais na ston na wesan i no strong tumas i banisim .

translation.en: all of this , added to the fact that malaria is rampant throughout much of the continent , is causing serious concern because , as cameron remarked , " borders are no barrier against disease . "
translation.zu: na taim ais i wok yet long kamap wara , ol dispela banis i bruk , na bikpela tait i go daun long ol ples daun .

translation.en: " most vital substance to life "
translation.zu: ' nambawan bikpela samting bilong lukautim laip '

translation.en: " water is the most vital substance to life , because the body is mostly fluid , " reports the toronto star newspaper .
translation.zu: nius toronto star i tok : " wara em i nambawan bikpela samting bilong helpim yumi long i stap laip , long wanem , skin bilong yumi i gat planti wara long en .

translation.en: " even a 20 - per cent drop in body water can be fatal . "
translation.zu: taim 20 pesen bilong wara bilong skin i lus , dispela inap kilim man i dai . "

translation.en: drinking coffee , pop , or alcohol may actually increase the need for pure water because they can contribute to dehydration .
translation.zu: pasin bilong dring kofi , o koldring , o bia samting em inap mekim na man i mas dring sampela wara moa , long wanem , ol dispela dring inap pinisim wara long skin .

translation.en: according to one dietitian , thirst should not serve as a reminder to take in water because by the time you feel parched , you are likely already dehydrated .
translation.zu: wanpela savemeri i tok , no ken dring wara long taim nek i drai tasol , long wanem , taim nek bilong yu i drai planti wara bilong skin i lus pinis .

translation.en: the paper states that " drinking a glass every hour during the day will satisfy most people 's water needs . "
translation.zu: nius i tok , " pasin bilong dring wanpela kap wara long olgeta aua long san bai inapim laik bilong skin long kisim wara . "

translation.en: napping on the job
translation.zu: planti sik nogut long afrika

translation.en: " some canadian businesses are waking up to the benefits of napping on the job , " says the toronto star newspaper .
translation.zu: nius cape times i tok : wok bilong lain wol helt oganaisesen bilong pinisim tru sik polio long afrika long pinis bilong dispela yia , i no karim kaikai .

translation.en: employers have introduced " alertness recovery rooms " for night - shift workers .
translation.zu: pait i stap long angola i mekim na sik polio i go bikpela tru long dispela kantri .

translation.en: " the rooms are dimly lit , cool , quiet and equipped with alarm clocks , couches or reclining chairs , " says the star . but " old perceptions die hard . companies that provide napping areas don 't tend to broadcast it . "
translation.zu: neil cameron , em dairekta bilong wanpela lain bilong pasim ol sik ( south africa 's department of health ) , em i tok , inap 10 - pela yia i mas pinis pastaim na sik polio bai pinis olgeta long angola .

translation.en: its total length is said to be ten times that of the great wall of china .

translation.en: nevertheless , many people have never heard of this awesome sight in the philippines .

translation.en: what is it ?
translation.zu: em wanem samting ?

translation.en: the precipitous mountains of the cordilleras are so steep that they could normally not be used for farming .
translation.zu: ol maunten bilong kodiliera i go antap tru , na i no olsem wanpela hap bilong wokim gaden .

translation.en: the incline of some slopes exceeds 50 percent .
translation.zu: sampela maunten i sap tru .

translation.en: but ancient farmers were not deterred by this .
translation.zu: tasol dispela i no pasim ol man bilong bipo long wokim gaden .

translation.en: at an elevation of 4,000 feet [ 1,200 m ] or more , they carved thousands of terraces into the sides of the verdant mountains .
translation.zu: ol maunten i go antap inap olsem 1,200 mita na sampela i go antap moa , na ol i katim planti tausen gaden long arere bilong ol dispela maunten .

translation.en: sometimes 25 , 30 , or more are stacked like a stairway reaching skyward .
translation.zu: ol i wokim 25 o 30 narapela narapela gaden i stap olsem ol lata bilong go antap long skai .

translation.en: and each terrace is a cultivated pond field , lined with earthen dikes and retained with stone walls .
translation.zu: ol wan wan gaden i stap olsem liklik raunwara , na ol i banisim long graun wantaim ol ston na dispela i save pasim wara i stap .

translation.en: most are planted with rice and follow the contour of the mountains ; some slopes are concave , others convex .
translation.zu: planti ol gaden i gat rais ol i planim long en , na ol i wokim ol gaden bilong bihainim mak bilong ol maunten .

translation.en: of course , agricultural terraces are hardly unique to the philippines .
translation.zu: ol dispela kain gaden i no stap long hap bilong kantri filipin tasol .

translation.en: terraced fields are found in other countries too , particularly in southeast asia , south america , and some parts of africa .
translation.zu: long saut - is esia , na long saut amerika , na long sampela hap bilong afrika , i gat ol gaden ol i katim long ol maunten .

translation.en: but in many ways the rice terraces of the philippines are unique .
translation.zu: tasol ol gaden rais bilong filipin i narapela kain .

translation.en: mario movillon , of the international rice research institute , told awake ! : " the philippine rice terraces are on a much larger scale than terraces in other countries .
translation.zu: mario movillon ( bilong lain international rice research institute ) , i tokim kirap ! : " ol gaden rais bilong filipin i traipela tru , winim ol gaden ol i katim long ol maunten long ol narapela kantri .

translation.en: they cover a big part of the mountains of the cordillera . "
translation.zu: ol i karamapim bikpela hap bilong ol maunten bilong kodiliera . "

translation.en: a large proportion are in ifugao province .
translation.zu: bikpela hap bilong ol dispela gaden i stap long provins ifugau .

translation.en: one cannot help but be impressed by the sheer number of terraces .
translation.zu: bai yumi kirap nogut long lukim ol gaden rais i planti tru .

translation.en: they add a sculptured beauty to the natural flow of the mountains .
translation.zu: ol gaden rais i bihainim mak bilong ol maunten na i naispela tru long lukim long ai .

translation.en: a wonder of the world ?
translation.zu: em i winim ol narapela samting ?

translation.en: well , consider this fact : they may be the largest single agricultural project in human history .
translation.zu: tingim dispela : long bipo yet na i kam inap nau , i no gat narapela gaden ol i wokim i bikpela olsem .

translation.en: as a result , the terraces are now equated with other sites of great historical and cultural value , such as the taj mahal in india , the galapagos islands of ecuador , the great wall of china , and angkor wat of cambodia .
translation.zu: olsem na ol dispela gaden i gat biknem olsem sampela narapela hap bilong bipo yet , olsem taj mahal bilong india , ol ailan galepagas bilong ekwado , traipela banis bilong saina , na anko wat bilong kambodia .

translation.en: if you visit when new rice is coming up , the terraces make a beautiful mosaic of varying hues of green .
translation.zu: sapos yu go long ol gaden taim nupela rais ol i bin planim i kru pinis , bai yu lukim kain kain grinpela kala i stap long ol narapela narapela gaden .

translation.en: wet varieties of rice cannot survive without large amounts of water .
translation.zu: rais ol i save planim long wara i mas i gat planti wara bilong kamap gut .

translation.en: mountain streams are tapped , and water is sluiced to the terraces by a complex system of canals and bamboo tubes .
translation.zu: ol i wokim planti ol baret long ol liklik wara i ran long maunten na mekim wok long ol mambu bilong pulim wara i go daun long ol narapela narapela gaden .

translation.en: driven by gravity , a reliable supply of water is distributed from terrace to terrace . far from being a dead monument , the terraces truly are a living wonder !
translation.zu: dispela ol gaden i no olsem wanpela ples bilong bipo tasol na nau i stap nating olsem samting i dai pinis , nogat , ol gaden i wok i stap , olsem samting i stap laip tru !

translation.en: who built them ?
translation.zu: husat i wokim ?

translation.en: it goes without saying that these thousands of terraces could not have been built overnight , or even in a few years .
translation.zu: yumi save , ol i no wokim dispela ol planti tausen gaden hariap o insait long sampela yia tasol .

translation.en: remember , this construction was done without any modern tools or machinery .
translation.zu: tingim , taim ol i wokim i no gat ol tul bilong nau o masin samting bilong helpim ol .

translation.en: it is therefore believed that the terrace building began , at the very least , several hundred years ago .
translation.zu: olsem na sampela i ting ol i bin kirap na wokim ol dispela gaden long sampela handet yia i go pinis .

translation.en: let us now take an imaginary tour of the terraces .
translation.zu: nau yumi laik mekim olsem yumi raun long ol dispela gaden .

translation.en: first we take an air - conditioned bus from manila to the town of banaue , ifugao .
translation.zu: pastaim yumi kalap long wanpela bas long manila na go long wanpela taun bilong ifugau ol i kolim banawe .

translation.en: we might decide to walk , take a tricycle ( a motorcycle with a sidecar ) , or ride in a jeepney to various points of interest .
translation.zu: sapos yumi gat laik na bikpela strong , yumi inap wokabaut i go long sampela hap bilong ol maunten i no gat rot bilong ka .

translation.en: and if we have the will and the stamina , we might want to take one of the trails that go into mountain areas that are accessible only on foot .
translation.zu: taim yu wokabaut bai yu inap lukim ol hap i gutpela moa na bai yu pilim tru olsem ol gaden ol man i bin wokim olsem lata lata i karamapim traipela hap stret .

translation.en: we opt to take a jeepney to the village of batad .
translation.zu: inap wanpela aua mipela i bihainim rot nogut bilong maunten .

translation.en: it takes us more than an hour of riding on the rough mountain road to reach the seven - mile [ 12 km ] point .
translation.zu: bihain mipela kamap long mak bilong 12 - pela kilomita , na mipela lusim ka na bihainim liklik rot bilong wokabaut .

translation.en: it takes us through a variety of mountain vegetation as we gradually climb up to a ridge between two higher points .
translation.zu: isi isi mipela kamap antap long wanpela kil i stap namel long tupela maunten em het bilong ol i go antap moa .

translation.en: ( there is a shorter route , but it is very steep and is not recommended for those not used to strenuous climbing . )
translation.zu: ( i gat narapela rot i sotpela , tasol em i go antap tumas na i no gutpela long ol man i no bin lain long wokabaut long kain maunten olsem . )

translation.en: after having walked for a couple of hours , enjoying the fresh mountain air along the way , we finally reach our destination .
translation.zu: mipela wokabaut inap sampela aua na kisim ol gutpela kolwin bilong maunten , na bihain mipela kamap long hap mipela i laik go long en .

translation.en: here the terraces present a feast for our eyes .
translation.zu: samting mipela lukim i gutpela tru .

translation.en: since batad is located against a concave mountain slope , the terraces are in the shape of a huge amphitheater .
translation.zu: batat i stap arere long maunten na ol gaden i stap olsem lata lata i go antap long skai .

translation.en: the people are friendly and extend a greeting to us as we pass them working in the terraces .
translation.zu: taim ol i wok i stap long gaden na mipela wokabaut na bungim ol , ol i tok gude long mipela .

translation.en: you may be amazed as you watch the local people walk agilely along the edge of a rock terrace wall , using it as their path to get from point to point .
translation.zu: yu bai kirap nogut long lukim ol as ples i wokabaut antap long ol ston i raunim gaden , em olsem rot bilong ol long go long ol narapela hap bilong gaden .

translation.en: others climb from level to level with the surefootedness of a mountain goat , using strategically placed rocks as their stairway .
translation.zu: sampela i putim ol wan wan ston i stap olsem lata na ol i go antap olsem wanpela meme bilong maunten .

translation.en: a closer look reveals that they are barefoot .
translation.zu: ol i no save putim su .

translation.en: and all around them is this spectacular view of mountain terraces - a rare instance where man 's building work fits into and complements the environment .
translation.zu: ol i wok i stap namel long planti ol narapela gaden i stap olsem lata lata long ol maunten na i gutpela tru long lukim - em olsem wanpela hap ol man i wokim sampela samting tasol ol i no bagarapim graun .

translation.en: then , by all means , if you visit the philippines , do not pass up the opportunity to see the stairway to the sky , a living wonder that you will not easily forget .

translation.en: john and mary * are in their late 50 ' s and live in the rural united states in a small house .
translation.zu: jon na maria * i gat 58 krismas samting , na ol i sindaun long wanpela liklik haus long hap bilong bus bilong yunaitet stets .

translation.en: mary simply cannot imagine life without john , and she cannot stand the pain of seeing him fade away , one gasping breath at a time .
translation.zu: maria i ting sapos jon i dai , em i no laik stap laip , na em i bel hevi tru long lukim skin bilong jon i wok long lusim strong bilong en isi isi .

translation.en: mary has health problems of her own and has suffered for years from depression .
translation.zu: maria tu i gat sampela sik na em i bin bel hevi tru inap planti yia .

translation.en: john has been alarmed lately because mary has been talking about suicide .
translation.zu: jon i tingting planti , long wanem , maria i toktok long kilim i dai skin bilong em yet .

translation.en: her thinking is increasingly confused because of the depression and all the medication she takes .
translation.zu: em i bel hevi na em i save dring planti marasin , olsem na tingting bilong em i wok long paul moa .

translation.en: she says that she cannot bear the thought of being alone .
translation.zu: em i tok , em i no laik stap wanpis .

translation.en: the house is full of medicine - heart pills , antidepressants , tranquilizers .
translation.zu: long wanpela bikmoning maria i go long haus kuk , na em i kirap daunim ol marasin .

translation.en: in the early hours one morning , mary goes into the kitchen and just starts taking pills .
translation.zu: em i mekim olsem i go inap jon i lukim em na rausim marasin long han bilong maria .

translation.en: she doesn 't stop until john finds her and takes the pills from her .
translation.zu: tingting bilong maria i wok long i dai na jon i ringim ambulens .

translation.en: he calls the rescue squad as she slips into a coma .
translation.zu: jon i beten askim god long helpim maria , nogut em i dai .

translation.en: he prays it is not too late .

translation.en: much has been written in recent years about increasing numbers of suicides among the young - and rightly so , for what greater tragedy is there than the needless death of a young person , full of life and promise ?
translation.zu: na i stret ol i raitim stori long dispela samting , long wanem , em i samting nogut tru long wanpela yangpela i dai taim em i gat strong yet na ol gutpela samting inap painim em .

translation.en: yet , overlooked in the headlines is the fact that the suicide rate in most countries rises steadily with age .
translation.zu: tasol ol nius i no stori olsem namba bilong ol lapun i kilim i dai skin bilong ol yet i wok long i go bikpela long planti kantri .

translation.en: this is true whether the overall suicide rate in a given country is high or low , as the box on the preceding page shows .
translation.zu: na dispela i olsem maski namba bilong ol man i kilim i dai ol yet long wanpela kantri em i bikpela o liklik , olsem blok daunbilo i kamapim .

translation.en: a glance at those statistics also reveals the global nature of this hidden epidemic .
translation.zu: taim yu lukluk long ol dispela namba bai yu luksave olsem dispela hevi i stap hait em i stap long olgeta hap .

translation.en: some of this increase was due to the greater numbers of elderly americans - but not all of it .
translation.zu: wanpela as na namba bilong ol i go bikpela i olsem : i gat planti lapun moa long amerika , tasol dispela samting tasol i no as bilong dispela hevi .

translation.en: in 1996 the actual rate of suicide among those over 65 also went up , by 9 percent , for the first time in 40 years .
translation.zu: long 1996 , namba bilong ol man i winim 65 krismas na i kilim i dai ol yet i go bikpela inap 9 pesen , em namba wan taim namba i go bikpela olsem insait long 40 yia .

translation.en: the book adds that some estimate the actual figures to be twice as high as the reported statistics .
translation.zu: buk i tok , sampela i ting namba bilong ol man i kilim i dai ol yet i dabol long namba ol ripot i kamapim .

translation.en: the united states , like many other countries , is suffering from the hidden global epidemic of senior - citizen suicide .
translation.zu: long yunaitet stets na long planti narapela kantri tu , ol i gat bikpela hevi bilong ol lapun manmeri i kilim i dai ol yet .

translation.en: dr . herbert hendin , an expert on the subject , notes : " despite the fact that the suicide rate in the united states rises consistently and markedly with age , suicide among older people has received little public attention . "
translation.zu: dokta herbert hendin i gat save long dispela hevi , em i tok : " maski long yunaitet stets planti man moa i kilim i dai ol yet taim ol i wok long kamap lapun , ol nius samting i no stori planti tumas long dispela samting . "

translation.en: why is that ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem i olsem ?

translation.en: these statistics , although shocking , are just cold numbers .
translation.zu: yumi kirap nogut long ol dispela bikpela namba , tasol ol i namba tasol .

translation.en: the sad truth is that while young people may attempt suicide as a reckless reaction to temporary problems , older people are usually faced with problems that seem to be permanent and unsolvable .
translation.zu: taim ol yangpela i gat sampela hevi , ol i no tingting gut na ol inap traim long kilim i dai ol yet . tasol ol lapun i save karim ol hevi em ol i ting i bilong stap longpela taim na i no gat rot bilong stretim ol .

translation.en: yet , there is powerful reason to treasure life - even under very difficult circumstances .
translation.zu: tasol i gat gutpela as na yumi ken amamas tru long laip bilong yumi - long taim bilong bikpela hevi tu .

translation.en: consider what happened to mary , who was mentioned in the introduction .

translation.en: mary suffered from clinical depression as well as some other health problems .
translation.zu: maria i gat sik bilong bel hevi na sampela narapela sik tu .

translation.en: however , she was not isolated from her family , nor did she abuse alcohol or drugs .
translation.zu: tasol em i pas gut wantaim famili bilong em , na em i no save dring planti tumas o kisim drak .

translation.en: mary 's case well illustrates the point that not all risk factors need to be present for a serious suicide attempt to take place .
translation.zu: stori bilong maria i kamapim klia olsem , bilong man i traim kilim i dai em yet i no olsem olgeta kain hevi samting i mas painim em .

translation.en: for a time it seemed that mary would become another statistic testifying to the efficacy with which older people end their lives .
translation.zu: inap liklik taim i luk olsem maria bai truim dispela tok olsem ol lapun inap tru long pinisim laip bilong ol yet .

translation.en: her distraught husband , john , was rarely far from her side .
translation.zu: man bilong em , jon , em i tingting planti na em i stap wantaim maria long haus sik .

translation.en: the doctors warned john and the family that mary might not survive and that they could expect her to suffer permanent brain damage even if she did pull through .
translation.zu: ol dokta i tokim jon na famili bilong em olsem maria inap i dai , na sapos em i no dai ating kru bilong em i bagarap . wanpela meri i stap klostu long ol em i go lukim maria long olgeta de .

translation.en: mary was visited daily by a neighbor , sally , who is one of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: nem bilong dispela meri em sally , na em i wanpela witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: " i urged the family not to give up hope , " says sally .
translation.zu: sally i tok : " mi tokim famili olsem ol i no ken ting maria i no inap kamap gutpela gen .

translation.en: " my mother , who is diabetic , was in a coma for weeks a couple of years ago .
translation.zu: mama bilong mi em i gat sik daiabitis , na long sampela yia i go pinis , tingting bilong em i bin dai inap sampela wik .

translation.en: the doctors told our family that she would never survive , but she did .
translation.zu: ol dokta i bin tokim famili bilong mipela olsem mama i no inap abrusim bagarap , tasol em i bin kamap gutpela gen .

translation.en: i would take mary 's hand and talk to her , as i did with my mother , and it seemed to me that i could detect a feeble response . "
translation.zu: mi holim han bilong maria na toktok long em , olsem mi bin mekim long mama bilong mi , na mi ting maria inap pilim liklik ol samting . "

translation.en: by the third day , the response was stronger , and mary seemed to recognize people , although she could not speak .
translation.zu: long de namba 3 , maria i pilim ol samting strong moa na em i luksave long ol manmeri , tasol em i no inap toktok .

translation.en: " john was so terribly guilt - ridden , " says sally .
translation.zu: sally i tok : " jon i sutim tok long em yet .

translation.en: " he was sure that it was all his fault . "
translation.zu: em i ting dispela hevi em asua bilong em wanpela tasol . "

translation.en: this is a common response to the suicide or attempted suicide of a loved one .
translation.zu: planti man em wanpela bilong famili bilong ol em i bin traim kilim i dai em yet , ol i kisim dispela kain tingting .

translation.en: " i reminded him that mary was being treated for clinical depression .
translation.zu: sally i tok : " mi tokim jon olsem maria i gat sik bilong bel hevi .

translation.en: but if not , remember that you are not responsible for another person 's self - destructive act .
translation.zu: tasol sapos yu no inap mekim olsem , tingim dispela : taim narapela i bagarapim em yet , dispela em i no asua bilong yu .

translation.en: this is especially important to remember in those cases where the suicidal family member deliberately seeks to inflict guilt on others .
translation.zu: em i bikpela samting long tingim dispela , taim wanpela long famili i laik kilim i dai em yet na em i laik ol narapela i ting em asua bilong ol .

translation.en: dr . hendin , quoted earlier , notes : " it should be kept in mind that fatal suicide attempts are often made by people who are hoping to influence or manipulate the feelings of other people even though they will not be around to witness the success or failure of their efforts . "
translation.zu: dokta hendin , em pastaim yumi stori long em , em i tok : " yumi mas tingim olsem ol man i kilim i dai ol yet , planti ol i mekim olsem bilong bagarapim bel bilong narapela , maski ol bai no stap bilong lukim bel bilong narapela i bagarap o nogat . "

translation.en: dr . hendin goes on to point out : " in the case of older people who are suicidal , there are often grown children as well as siblings or marital partners whom the patient wishes to influence , control , or force to assume a more protective role .
translation.zu: dokta hendin i tok moa : " ol lapun i laik kilim i dai ol yet na ol i gat ol pikinini i bikpela pinis , o ol brata susa , o poroman marit , ol dispela lapun sikman i laik stiaim tingting bilong ol , o bosim ol , o subim ol long mekim bikpela wok moa bilong lukautim ol .

translation.en: the demands of the patient are often impossible to meet , the patient is often uncompromising with regard to them , and suicide attempts that are not serious are often followed by attempts that are . "
translation.zu: planti taim famili i no inap mekim ol samting olsem sikman i laikim , na planti taim sikman i no senisim tingting bilong em long ol samting em i laikim , na bihain long sikman i traim kilim i dai em yet , em bai mekim tru . "

translation.en: family members in these circumstances may feel that they are truly under extreme pressure , beyond their strength .
translation.zu: long kain taim olsem famili inap pilim olsem ol i gat bikpela hevi tru em ol i no inap karim .

translation.en: as a father shows mercy to his sons , jehovah has shown mercy to those fearing him .
translation.zu: papa i save sori long ol pikinini bilong en . olsem tasol bikpela i save sori long ol manmeri i pret long em .

translation.en: for two days mary teetered between life and death , but she survived .
translation.zu: inap tupela de maria i bagarap tru na klostu em i dai , tasol em i no dai .

translation.en: gradually her mind cleared , and john took her home , to a house with all medicine safely under lock and key .
translation.zu: isi isi tingting bilong em i kamap klia , na jon i kisim em i go bek long haus , na nau olgeta marasin i stap long hap i gat lok .

translation.en: mary now has regular follow - up visits with mental - health social workers and says that she is unable to explain or even remember the dark compulsion that so nearly cost her her life .
translation.zu: nau maria i save bung long olgeta taim wantaim wanpela nes bilong sik bilong tingting , na em i tok em i no inap tingim o stori long dispela hevi i bin kirapim em long kilim i dai em yet na klostu em i dai tru .

translation.en: now sally , john and mary 's neighbor , has a weekly bible study with them .
translation.zu: sally , em dispela meri i sindaun klostu long jon na maria , nau em i save stadi wantaim tupela long baibel long olgeta wik .

translation.en: they have learned from the bible that the very problems that seem so insoluble , especially to older ones , will be solved by god very soon .
translation.zu: ol i kisim save long baibel , olsem klostu nau god bai pinisim ol dispela hevi em planti man na ol lapun i save ting i no gat rot bilong stretim .

translation.en: " of course , by itself , a bible study is no panacea , " explains sally .
translation.zu: sally i tok : " tru , baibel - stadi yet i no rot bilong stretim olgeta hevi .

translation.en: " you have to prove to yourself from the scriptures that these promises are real , and then you have to apply what you learn .
translation.zu: yu mas skelim tok bilong baibel bambai yu ken bilip tru olsem ol dispela tok promis ol i tru , na tu , yu mas bihainim tok yu kisim save long en .

translation.en: but i think john and mary are getting a real hope for the future . "
translation.zu: tasol mi ting jon na maria i wetim gutpela samting bai kamap bihain . "

translation.en: if your future looks bleak and you would like a real hope , why not get in touch with jehovah 's witnesses ?
translation.zu: sapos yu ting i no gat wanpela gutpela samting bai painim yu bihain tasol yu laik wet long ol gutpela samting bai kamap , gutpela sapos yu toktok wantaim ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: let them prove to you , as they did to john and mary , that there are no problems that god cannot and will not solve in the near future .
translation.zu: olsem ol i bin mekim long jon na maria , larim ol i soim yu long baibel olsem god inap tru long stretim olgeta hevi na klostu nau em bai mekim olsem .

translation.en: no matter how bad things may look right now , there is an answer .
translation.zu: maski ol hevi i bikpela tru long nau , i gat rot bilong stretim ol .

translation.en: please consider with us the sure hope for the future that has provided many with a renewed desire to live .
translation.zu: plis skelim wantaim mipela ol dispela gutpela samting bai kamap bihain , em dispela ol samting i bin helpim planti man long kisim gen laik bilong i stap laip .

translation.en: " studies reveal that members of a family touched by a suicide are at a greater risk for committing suicide themselves . "
translation.zu: " save ol man i kisim i kamapim olsem sapos wanpela bilong famili i bin kilim i dai em yet , ating ol narapela bilong famili bai mekim olsem . "

translation.en: illness :
translation.zu: sik :

translation.en: " fear over physical decline , leading to possible institutionalization , can be enough to precipitate a suicidal response among some older people . "
translation.zu: " pasin bilong pret long sik i daunim ol na ol i mas i go na stap long haus bilong ol lapun manmeri . dispela inap kirapim sampela lapun long kilim i dai ol yet . "

translation.en: " the loss may be tangible , such as a mate or friend , a job , or a person 's health .
translation.zu: " samting bilong man i lus , olsem poroman marit o pren i dai , o em i mas lusim wok mani , o bikpela sik i painim em .

translation.en: it can also be something intangible . examples include self - worth , status , or a sense of security . "
translation.zu: ol narapela samting bilong man i lus i olsem : pasin bilong laikim em yet , o namba bilong em , o em i tingting planti long sindaun bilong em . "

translation.en: " statements such as ' they won 't have to worry about me much longer ' or ' they 'd be better off without me ' are examples of obvious threats . "
translation.zu: " man i tok olsem , ' i no longtaim na famili i no gat wok moa long wari long mi ' o ' famili bai stap gutpela moa sapos mi no stap . ' dispela kain tok inap makim olsem man i laik kilim i dai em yet . "
