translation.en: a sure hope
translation.zu: gutpela samting bilong wetim

translation.en: while he hung on a torture stake , an evildoer hanging next to him said derisively : " you are the christ , are you not ?
translation.zu: taim em i hangamap long pos , wanpela man nogut i stap klostu long em , em i tok bilas olsem : " yu man god i makim , a ?

translation.en: at that , another evildoer who was also being executed rebuked the man : " do you not fear god at all , now that you are in the same judgment ?
translation.zu: narapela man nogut ol i laik kilim em i dai , em i krosim namba wan man olsem : " yu tu yu kisim wankain hevi olsem dispela man , na yu no pret long god , a ?

translation.en: and we , indeed , justly so , for we are receiving in full what we deserve for things we did ; but this man did nothing out of the way . "
translation.zu: mitupela i kisim hevi inap stret long ol pasin mitupela i bin mekim . tasol dispela man hia em i no bin mekim wanpela rong . "

translation.en: then he turned to jesus and petitioned : " remember me when you get into your kingdom . "
translation.zu: na em i tokim jisas olsem : " jisas , taim yu kamap king , yu ken tingting long mi . "

translation.en: jesus replied : " truly i tell you today , you will be with me in paradise . " - luke 23 : 39 - 43 .
translation.zu: jisas i tokim em : " mi tok tru long yu nau , bai yu stap wantaim mi long paradais . " - luk 23 : 39 - 43 , nw .

translation.en: jesus had a marvelous hope set before him .
translation.zu: jisas i gat gutpela samting tru bilong wetim i kamap .

translation.en: the apostle paul noted the effect that this hope had upon jesus , observing : " for the joy that was set before him he endured a torture stake , despising shame . " - hebrews 12 : 2 .
translation.zu: aposel pol i stori long olsem wanem dispela gutpela samting jisas i wet long en i bin helpim em . em i tok : " em i tingting long dispela na em i stap strong , na em i karim pen na i dai long diwai [ pos ] . " - hibru 12 : 2 .

translation.en: included in " the joy " set before jesus was living with his father again in heaven and eventually serving as ruler of god 's kingdom .
translation.zu: wanpela samting jisas i " amamas " long wet long en i olsem : em i ken stap gen wantaim papa bilong em long heven , na bihain em i kamap king bilong kingdom bilong god .

translation.en: moreover , he would also have the joy of welcoming into heaven proven and trusted followers of his that would rule with him as kings over the earth .
translation.zu: na tu , em bai tok amamas long ol gutpela disaipel bilong em ol i kam long heven na wok king wantaim em na bosim graun .

translation.en: what , then , did jesus mean when he promised the repentant evildoer that he would be in paradise ?
translation.zu: tasol taim jisas i tokim dispela man nogut i tanim bel olsem em bai stap long paradais , wanem insait bilong dispela tok ?

translation.en: what hope for the evildoer ?
translation.zu: wanem gutpela samting inap painim man nogut ?

translation.en: that man did not qualify to rule with jesus in heaven .
translation.zu: dispela man i no inap mekim wok king wantaim jisas long heven .

translation.en: he is not included among those to whom jesus said : " you are the ones that have stuck with me in my trials ; and i make a covenant with you , just as my father has made a covenant with me , for a kingdom . "
translation.zu: em i no wanpela bilong ol dispela man em jisas i tok long ol olsem : " taim ol samting i kamap bilong traim mi , yupela i bin i stap wantaim mi , na yupela i no lusim mi . papa bilong mi em i givim kingdom long mi , olsem tasol mi givim kingdom long yupela . "

translation.en: yet , jesus promised that the evildoer would be in paradise with him .
translation.zu: tasol jisas i tokim dispela man nogut olsem em bai stap wantaim em long paradais .

translation.en: how will that promise be fulfilled ?
translation.zu: dispela tok promis bai kamap tru olsem wanem ?

translation.en: the first man and woman , adam and eve , were placed by jehovah god in paradise , a garden of pleasure called eden .
translation.zu: jehova i putim namba wan man na meri , em adam tupela iv , long paradais , em wanpela gaden bilong amamas ol i kolim iden .

translation.en: however , adam and eve disobeyed god and were put out of their beautiful home .
translation.zu: tasol adam na iv i no bihainim tok bilong god , na god i rausim tupela long gutpela ples bilong ol .

translation.en: significantly , in luke 's account of this conversation , instead of saying " in the re - creation , " jesus is quoted as saying " in the coming system of things . " - luke 18 : 28 - 30 .
translation.zu: gutnius luk i raitim i kamapim olsem jisas i tok , " taim i laik kamap bihain . " - luk 18 : 28 - 30 .

translation.en: thus , when jesus christ sits down in heaven upon his glorious throne , along with those who will rule with him , he will establish a righteous new system of things .
translation.zu: olsem na taim krais jisas i sindaun long sia king bilong em long heven wantaim ol man em ol bai mekim wok king wantaim em , em bai kamapim nupela taim i gat stretpela pasin tasol long en .

translation.en: by means of christ 's heavenly rule , god 's original purpose for the entire earth to be a paradise will be fulfilled !
translation.zu: long rot bilong wok king bilong krais , laik bilong god long pastaim tru bai kamap na graun olgeta bai kamap wanpela paradais !

translation.en: during this kingdom rule , jesus will fulfill his promise to the criminal who died alongside him .
translation.zu: taim kingdom i bosim graun , krais bai truim tok promis bilong em long dispela man nogut i bin dai klostu long em .

translation.en: he will resurrect him , and that man will become an earthly subject of jesus .
translation.zu: em bai kirapim em long matmat , na dispela man bai stap long graun em jisas i bosim .

translation.en: then the evildoer will be given an opportunity to meet god 's requirements and live forever under the rule of the kingdom .
translation.zu: long dispela taim rot bai op long dispela man nogut long bihainim ol lo bilong god , na long stap oltaim aninit long wok bos bilong kingdom .

translation.en: surely we can rejoice in the bible - based prospect of living forever in paradise on earth !
translation.zu: yumi ken amamas tru long wet long kisim laip oltaim long paradais long graun !

translation.en: life can have meaning
translation.zu: laip i gat as bilong en

translation.en: imagine the meaning that such a grand hope can give to our lives .
translation.zu: taim yumi wet long kisim ol dispela gutpela samting , i stap bilong yumi bai i gat as bilong en .

translation.en: that hope was likened by the apostle paul to a vital piece of spiritual armor .
translation.zu: aposel pol i tok , dispela gutpela samting yumi wet long en , em i wanpela bikpela samting bilong klos pait .

translation.en: he said that we must put " the hope of salvation " on " as a helmet . " - 1 thessalonians 5 : 8 ; psalm 37 : 29 ; revelation 21 : 3 , 4 .
translation.zu: em i tok , yumi mas ' putim hat kapa olsem pasin bilong wetim god i kisim bek yumi . ' - 1 tesalonaika 5 : 8 ; song 37 : 29 ; kth 21 : 3 , 4 .

translation.en: in the coming paradise , loneliness will give way to tears of joy as cherished loved ones are brought back to life by " the god who raises up the dead . "
translation.zu: long nupela paradais ol man bai no stap wanpis , nogat ; na aiwara bilong amamas bai pundaun taim god i " kirapim bek ol man i dai pinis . "

translation.en: then the frustration of physical frailty , pain , and immobility will be forgotten , for " the lame one will climb up just as a stag does . "
translation.zu: long dispela taim ol man i no tingim moa kain kain hevi bilong skin , na pen ol i bin karim , long wanem , " ol lek nogut bai ol i kalap olsem ol dia . "

translation.en: a person 's ' flesh will become fresher than in youth , ' and he will " return to the days of his youthful vigor . " - isaiah 35 : 6 ; job 33 : 25 .
translation.zu: na " bodi bilong dispela man bai i kamap gutpela na strongpela gen , " na em bai kamap " wankain olsem em i bin i stap long taim em i yangpela man . " - aisaia 35 : 6 ; jop 33 : 25 .

translation.en: at that time , when " no resident will say : ' i am sick , ' " the despair of a lingering disease will be merely a fading memory .
translation.zu: long dispela taim ' i no gat wanpela man i tok : " mi gat sik . " ' ol man i no tingim moa bel hevi bilong ol em bikpela sik i as bilong en .

translation.en: the hopelessness of a fatal illness will vanish along with death itself , mankind 's ancient enemy . - 1 corinthians 15 : 26 .
translation.zu: ( aisaia 35 : 10 ) bikpela bel hevi em sik nogut i save kamapim bai pinis wantaim indai , em dispela birua bilong ol manmeri bilong bipo yet . - 1 korin 15 : 26 .

translation.en: young people ask . . .
translation.zu: ol yangpela i laik save . . .

translation.en: why did my friend hurt me ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem pren bilong mi i bagarapim bel bilong mi ?

translation.en: " i had a couple of friends . . .
translation.zu: " bipo mi gat sampela pren . . .

translation.en: then they started being friends with one other girl and if i 'd walk up to them , they 'd stop talking . . . .
translation.zu: tasol bihain ol i kirap na prenim narapela meri , na sapos mi go klostu long ol , ol bai pasim maus na stap . . . .

translation.en: they started excluding me from everything .
translation.zu: ol i no laik mi mekim ol samting wantaim ol .

translation.en: it really hurt my feelings . " - karen .
translation.zu: dispela samting i bagarapim tru bel bilong mi . " - karen .

translation.en: it can happen to the best of friends .
translation.zu: dispela samting inap kamap long ol gutpela pren tru .

translation.en: one day the two are inseparable ; the next day they aren 't even talking to each other .
translation.zu: long wanpela de ol i pas gut wantaim ; narapela de ol i no laik toktok moa long narapela .

translation.en: " a friend is supposed to be somebody you can rely on and trust , somebody you can turn to no matter what , " says 17 - year - old nora .
translation.zu: nora i gat 17 krismas , em i tok : " pren em wanpela man o meri yu inap bilip tru long en , na yu ken i go long en bilong em i ken helpim yu , maski wanem samting i kamap . "

translation.en: sometimes , though , your best friend may start acting like your worst enemy .
translation.zu: tasol sampela taim nambawan pren bilong yu i mekim pasin olsem nambawan birua bilong yu .

translation.en: for sandra , the trouble began when her friend megan borrowed one of her favorite tops .
translation.zu: long sandra hevi i kamap taim em i larim pren bilong em , megan , i mekim wok long wanpela siot bilong em .

translation.en: " when she returned it , " says sandra , " it was dirty and there was a little rip in the sleeve .
translation.zu: sandra i tok : " taim megan i kisim dispela siot i kam bek long mi , siot i doti na liklik hap long han bilong siot i bruk .

translation.en: she didn 't even mention it , like i wasn 't going to notice . "
translation.zu: na em i no stori liklik long dispela samting , i olsem em i ting bai mi no luksave long dispela samting . "

translation.en: how did sandra feel about megan 's lack of consideration ?
translation.zu: sandra i gat wanem tingting long dispela pasin bilong megan ?

translation.en: " it drove me crazy , " she says . " it felt as if she had no respect for my things . . . or my feelings . "
translation.zu: em i tok : " mi no amamas liklik long em , mi pilim olsem em i ting ol samting bilong mi i samting nating , . . . na tu , em i no wari liklik long bagarapim bel bilong mi . "

translation.en: hurt might also be caused if a close friend does or says something that humiliates you .
translation.zu: hevi inap kamap tu sapos wanpela gutpela pren i mekim sampela tok i semim yu .

translation.en: this happened to cindy when she told a group of her schoolmates that she had not yet read a book for her book report .
translation.zu: dispela i bin kamap long cindy taim em i tokim sampela wanskul olsem em i no bin ritim yet wanpela buk bilong wokim ripot long en .

translation.en: suddenly , her friend kate started to scold her .
translation.zu: wantu pren bilong em kate i krosim em .

translation.en: " she embarrassed me in front of a bunch of our friends , " recalls cindy .
translation.zu: cindy i tok : " em i semim mi long ai bilong ol pren bilong mipela .

translation.en: " i was so mad at her .
translation.zu: mi kros tru long em .

translation.en: sometimes a rift occurs when a friend starts spending time with new companions .
translation.zu: sampela taim hevi i kamap taim wanpela pren i kirap poromanim sampela nupela pren .

translation.en: " i had a good friend who became a member of this little clique , " says 13 - year - old bonnie . " she started ignoring me . "
translation.zu: bonnie i gat 13 krismas , em i tok : " mi bin i gat wanpela gutpela pren , tasol bihain em i pas wantaim sampela nupela pren na em i givim baksait long mi . "

translation.en: " bobby and i were really good friends , " says joe , 13 . " i thought he liked me for me , but i found out that he only liked me because my dad is in advertising and could always get good tickets to games and concerts . "
translation.zu: joe i gat 13 krismas , em i tok : " mi na bobby i stap gutpela pren , mi bin ting olsem em i laikim mi tru , tasol bihain mi painimaut em i laikim mi , long wanem , long rot bilong wok papa bilong mi inap kisim ol tiket i no gat pe bilong go lukim spot o musik . "

translation.en: how does joe feel now ?
translation.zu: nau joe i gat wanem tingting ?

translation.en: " i 'll never trust bobby again ! " he says .
translation.zu: em i tok : " mi no inap bilip moa long bobby ! "

translation.en: in some cases a friend might reveal information to others that you wanted kept confidential .
translation.zu: sampela taim wanpela pren bai kamapim sampela tok yu no laik bai ol narapela i save long en .

translation.en: allison , for example , talked to her friend sara about the personal problem of a workmate .
translation.zu: olsem : allison i bin stori long pren bilong em sara long hevi bilong wanpela wanwok bilong em .

translation.en: the next day sara brought up the matter right in front of the workmate .
translation.zu: long de bihain , taim dispela wanwok i stap sara i kamapim dispela tok allison i bin mekim .

translation.en: " i never dreamed she would be such a blabbermouth ! " allison says .
translation.zu: allison i tok : " mi no ting sara i gat dispela pasin bilong tokaut long ol samting .

translation.en: " i was furious . "
translation.zu: mi belhat stret . "

translation.en: " i felt embarrassed and also betrayed , " rachel says .
translation.zu: rachel i tok : " mi sem tru na mi no inap bilip moa long em .

translation.en: " i thought to myself , ' how can i ever confide in her again ? ' "
translation.zu: mi tingting olsem , ' mi no inap stori gen long em long ol samting bilong mi . '

translation.en: a friendship can provide a source of emotional support , especially when there is a feeling of mutual care , trust , and respect .
translation.zu: " pasin bilong stap pren bilong narapela , em inap strongim bel bilong man , na dispela i kamap moa yet sapos narapela i tingim narapela , na bilip long em .

translation.en: yet , even close friendships can undergo periods of strain .
translation.zu: tasol maski tupela i stap gutpela pren tru , sampela taim hevi i save kamap .

translation.en: the bible candidly observes : " there exist companions disposed to break one another to pieces . "
translation.zu: baibel i tok stret , olsem : " sampela pren i tingting long bagarapim pren bilong ol . "

translation.en: why does this happen ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem dispela samting i save kamap ?

translation.en: no human relationship - whether between youths or adults - is problem free .
translation.zu: maski ol man i bikpela pinis o ol i yangpela , sampela taim hevi i save kamap namel long ol pren .

translation.en: after all , it is just as the christian disciple james wrote : " we all stumble many times .
translation.zu: tru tumas , i olsem disaipel jems i tok : ' planti taim yumi save popaia .

translation.en: if anyone does not stumble in word , this one is a perfect man , able to bridle also his whole body . "
translation.zu: sapos wanpela man i no save mekim sampela tok i no stret , orait em i gutpela man tru , na em inap long bosim gut olgeta hap bilong bodi bilong en . '

translation.en: since everyone makes mistakes , it is only to be expected that sooner or later a friend will do or say something that hurts you .
translation.zu: olgeta manmeri i save popaia , olsem na sampela taim wanpela pren bai mekim sampela tok o sampela pasin i bagarapim bel bilong yu .

translation.en: you may even recall a time when you caused hurt to that person as well .
translation.zu: ating yu inap tingim wanpela taim bipo na yu bin bagarapim bel bilong dispela pren bilong yu .

translation.en: " we 're all imperfect , and we 're going to rub one another the wrong way once in a while , " says 20 - year - old lisa .
translation.zu: ( saveman 7 : 22 ) lisa i gat 20 krismas , em i tok : " yumi olgeta i no stap gutpela olgeta , olsem na sampela taim yumi save mekim sampela pasin i bagarapim bel bilong narapela . "

translation.en: remember , as you grow and mature , your interests - as well as those of your friends - tend to change .
translation.zu: tingim , taim yu wok long go bikpela , tingting na laik bilong yu i save senis na i wankain long ol pren bilong yu .

translation.en: thus , two people who once shared much in common may find that they are slowly but steadily growing apart .
translation.zu: olsem na tupela pren em pastaim ol i gat wankain tingting long planti samting , tasol ating isi isi tingting bilong tupela i senis na bihain ol i gat narapela narapela tingting .

translation.en: one teenager lamented regarding her best friend : " we don 't call each other very often and when we do talk , we hardly agree on anything anymore . "
translation.zu: wanpela yangpela i gat 15 krismas i bel hevi taim em i stori long gutpela pren bilong em : " mipela i no save toktok tumas long telefon olsem bipo , na nau taim mipela i toktok , mipela i no wanbel long planti samting . "

translation.en: of course , it is one thing simply to grow apart .
translation.zu: tru tumas , sampela taim tingting i senis na isi isi tupela i no stap pren moa .

translation.en: but why do some people hurt their friends ?
translation.zu: tasol bilong wanem sampela manmeri i save bagarapim bel bilong pren bilong ol ?

translation.en: for example , it may be that a friend starts to resent you because of your talents or accomplishments .
translation.zu: sampela taim i olsem : ating wanpela pren i kirap na bel nogut long yu , long wanem , yu gat bikpela save o yu bin mekim gut sampela wok .

translation.en: ( compare genesis 37 : 4 ; 1 samuel 18 : 7 - 9 . )
translation.zu: ( skelim wantaim stat 37 : 4 ; 1 samuel 18 : 7 - 9 . )

translation.en: regardless of the cause , what can you do if a friend hurts you ?
translation.zu: maski i gat wanem as na hevi i kamap , bai yu inap mekim wanem sapos wanpela pren i bagarapim bel bilong yu ?

translation.en: making amends
translation.zu: kamap pren gen

translation.en: " first , " says rachel , " i would observe the person and try to determine if what he or she did was intentional . "
translation.zu: rachel i tok : " pastaim bai mi skelim pasin em i wok long mekim long mi bilong kisim save em i laik bagarapim bel bilong mi o nogat . "

translation.en: instead , be patient and think the matter through .
translation.zu: stap isi na tingting gut long ol samting i bin kamap .

translation.en: will your reacting rashly over the perceived insult really improve the situation ?
translation.zu: sapos yu kros hariap long ol samting i bin daunim yu , yu ting dispela bai stretim dispela hevi ?

translation.en: after considering matters , you may choose to follow the advice of psalm 4 : 4 : " be agitated , but do not sin .
translation.zu: taim yu skelim pinis ol samting , ating bai yu tingting long bihainim tok i stap long song 4 : 4 : " yupela i [ ken kros , tasol yupela i mas ] lusim pasin bilong mekim sin .

translation.en: have your say in your heart , upon your bed , and keep silent . "
translation.zu: taim yupela i slip long bet , yupela i mas tingting gut long dispela tok , na pasim maus . "

translation.en: then you may choose to let ' love cover a multitude of sins . ' - 1 peter 4 : 8 .
translation.zu: taim yu mekim olsem , ating yu inap larim ' pasin bilong laikim ol narapela i karamapim planti sin . ' - 1 pita 4 : 8 .

translation.en: what , though , if you feel that you cannot simply dismiss the hurtful conduct ?
translation.zu: tasol bai yu mekim wanem sapos yu no inap lusim tingting long pasin kranki bilong pren bilong yu ?

translation.en: in such a case , it might be best to approach the person .
translation.zu: sapos olsem , i gutpela sapos yu go toktok wantaim dispela pren bilong yu .

translation.en: " get together , just the two of you , and talk out what happened , " says 13 - year - old frank .
translation.zu: frank i gat 13 krismas , em i tok : " bung wantaim dispela pren tasol , na toktok gut long ol samting i bin kamap .

translation.en: " if you don 't , you 'll hold a grudge . "
translation.zu: sapos yu no mekim olsem , bai yu bel nogut i stap . "

translation.en: susan , 16 , felt similarly . " the best thing to do , " she says , " is tell them that you trusted them and they let you down . "
translation.zu: susan i gat 16 krismas , i gat wankain tingting : " i gutpela long tokim ol olsem yu bin bilip long ol , na samting ol i mekim i bagarapim bel bilong yu . "

translation.en: jacqueline too prefers to handle things on a personal basis .
translation.zu: jacqueline tu i save stretim ol hevi long pasin bilong toktok gut wantaim narapela .

translation.en: " i try to get things out in the open , " she says . " usually , the person is straight with you and you can fix things practically on the spot . "
translation.zu: em i tok : " mi laik kamapim olgeta tingting bilong mi long dispela hevi , planti taim narapela bai tokaut stret long ol samting na rot i op long stretim hevi wantu . "

translation.en: of course , you should be careful not to approach your friend in a fit of anger .
translation.zu: tasol yu mas was gut , nogut yu belhat na go toktok wantaim dispela pren bilong yu .

translation.en: the bible states : " an enraged man stirs up contention , but one that is slow to anger quiets down quarreling . "
translation.zu: baibel i tok : " man bilong belhat kwik i save mekim ol arapela man i kros .

translation.en: " you 're mad at first , " admits lisa , " but you should allow yourself to cool down .
translation.zu: ( sindaun 15 : 18 ) olsem na wet inap bel i kol pinis , na nau yu ken i go na stretim dispela hevi .

translation.en: then you can go to the person and sit down and discuss things in a peaceful manner . "
translation.zu: taim yu no pilim bikpela belhat moa , go na sindaun wantaim em na toktok wantaim em long pasin isi . "

translation.en: the key word is " peaceful . "
translation.zu: em nau , bikpela samting hia em " pasin isi . "

translation.en: remember , your objective is not to give your friend a tongue - lashing .
translation.zu: tingim , yu no laik kros na bikmaus long pren bilong yu . nogat .

translation.en: it is to settle matters amicably and , if at all possible , to restore the friendship .
translation.zu: yu laik stretim dispela hevi , na sapos rot i op , stap pren gen wantaim em .

translation.en: " you can say , ' i 'm your friend , and you 're my friend ; but i just need to know what happened , ' " suggests lisa .
translation.zu: lisa i tok : " yu inap tok olsem , ' mi pren bilong yu , na yu pren bilong mi - tasol mi laik save , i gat wanem as na dispela hevi i kamap . '

translation.en: " you need to know the reason behind the action . once you do , it 's usually not so hard to deal with . "
translation.zu: taim yu save long as bilong dispela samting , i no hatwok long karim hevi bilong en . "

translation.en: it would certainly be wrong to try to retaliate , perhaps by gossiping about the person and trying to get others to side with you .
translation.zu: pasin bilong bekim rong , olsem tok baksait long dispela pren o kirapim ol narapela long bel nogut long em , dispela i no stret .

translation.en: the christian apostle paul wrote to the romans : " return evil for evil to no one . "
translation.zu: aposel pol i raitim pas long ol kristen i stap long rom na em i tok : " yupela i no ken bekim pasin nogut long ol .

translation.en: really , no matter how deep the hurt may be , lashing back will only make matters worse .
translation.zu: nogat . " maski yu bel hevi tru , pasin bilong bekim rong bai kamapim bikpela hevi moa .

translation.en: " revenge is not worth it , " says nora , " because you 'll never become friends again . "
translation.zu: nora i tok : " pasin bilong bekim rong i no gutpela , long wanem , bai yu no inap stap pren gen . "

translation.en: in contrast , she adds that doing your best to repair the relationship " makes you feel like a better person . "
translation.zu: na em i tok moa olsem , tasol taim yu wok strong long kamap wanbel gen " bel bilong yu bai stap isi . "

translation.en: but what if your friend is unresponsive to your attempts at reconciliation ?
translation.zu: tasol bai yu mekim wanem sapos pren bilong yu i no laik stretim dispela hevi ?

translation.en: in such a case , remember that friendships come in varying degrees .
translation.zu: sapos olsem , yu mas tingim dispela : i gat kain kain pasin bilong i stap pren .

translation.en: " learn that you can have different kinds of relationships . "
translation.zu: tasol yu ken amamas , long wanem , yu yet i bin wok strong long kamap wanbel gen .

translation.en: still , you can be comforted in the fact that you have done your part to restore peace .
translation.zu: aposel pol i tok : " yupela yet i no ken tingting long kros na pait .

translation.en: the apostle paul wrote : " if possible , as far as it depends upon you , be peaceable with all men . " - romans 12 : 18 .
translation.zu: oltaim yupela i mas painim rot bilong i stap wanbel wantaim olgeta man . " - rom 12 : 18 .

translation.en: storms will pass through even the best of friendships .
translation.zu: hevi i save kamap namel long olgeta pren - namel long gutpela pren tu .

translation.en: if you can weather the storm without letting it destroy your view of others or your self - worth , you are well on your way to becoming a mature adult .
translation.zu: sapos yu inap karim dispela hevi na yu no tingting nogut long ol narapela , na yu no bel hevi tumas , i olsem yu wok long kisim tingting bilong man i bikpela pinis .

translation.en: although some may be " disposed to break one another to pieces , " the bible also assures us that " there exists a friend sticking closer than a brother . " - proverbs 18 : 24 .
translation.zu: tru sampela i gat pasin bilong " bagarapim narapela , " tasol baibel i tok , " i gat pren em i stap klostu tru long yumi , winim brata bilong yumi . " - sindaun 18 : 24 , nw .

translation.zu: ating yupela inap kamap pren gen sapos yupela i toktok gut long samting i bin kamap

translation.en: since the dissolution of the soviet union in 1991 , people living there have enjoyed greater freedom to worship god .
translation.zu: kirap long taim soviet yunion i bruk long 1991 , ol manmeri bilong dispela hap ol i stap fri moa long lotuim god .

translation.en: such freedom has also been treasured by those who have emigrated to other countries .
translation.zu: na ol man i go sindaun long ol narapela kantri , ol tu i stap fri long mekim lotu .

translation.en: for many who live in the former soviet union , the freedom to assemble openly to worship god is a cherished delight - one that they were deprived of for many decades .
translation.zu: long planti manmeri em ol i sindaun long ol hap bipo soviet yunion i bosim , pasin bilong bung long ples klia bilong lotuim god em i wanpela gutpela samting tru . em wanpela samting gavman i bin tambuim ol long mekim inap planti planti yia .

translation.en: after the bolshevik revolution in 1917 , it became dangerous in russia to read the bible , and few people risked their freedom to do so .
translation.zu: bihain long lain bolsevik i daunim gavman ( bolshevik revolution ) long 1917 , bikpela hevi i painim ol man i ritim baibel long rasia , olsem na wan wan man tasol i ritim baibel nogut ol i kalabus .

translation.en: jehovah 's witnesses were an exception .
translation.zu: tasol ol witnes bilong jehova i narapela kain .

translation.en: in fact , newsweek magazine of april 16 , 1956 - nearly 44 years ago - quoted a youth in east germany as saying : " nobody but jehovah 's witnesses reads the bible . "
translation.zu: nius newsweek bilong epril 16 , 1956 - klostu 44 yia i go pinis - em i kamapim tok bilong wanpela yangpela man bilong is jemani , em i tok : " i no gat narapela lain i save ritim baibel , ol witnes bilong jehova tasol i save mekim olsem . "

translation.en: yet , for holding bible study meetings and for preaching the bible 's message , witnesses were put in prisons and labor camps .
translation.zu: tasol ol i putim ol witnes long kain kain kalabus nogut , long wanem , ol i mekim ol miting bilong stadi long baibel na ol i autim tok bilong baibel .

translation.en: when the soviet union began to dissolve in 1991 , the witnesses there held seven conventions featuring a program of bible instruction .
translation.zu: taim soviet yunion i pundaun long 1991 , ol witnes bilong dispela hap ol i mekim 7 - pela kibung em program bilong en i skulim ol long baibel .

translation.en: in 1993 , just two years later , 112,326 assembled at eight such conventions in 4 of the 15 former republics of the soviet union .
translation.zu: tupela yia bihain , long 1993 , inap 112,326 i bung long 8 - pela kibung olsem , long 4 - pela bilong 15 provins em bipo soviet yunion i bosim .

translation.en: * many of those thousands had spent long years in soviet prisons and labor camps .
translation.zu: * planti bilong ol i bin stap planti yia long kain kain kalabus bilong soviet yunion .

translation.en: every year since 1993 , people from the former soviet republics have treasured the privilege of meeting freely at christian gatherings in their homeland .
translation.zu: kirap long 1993 , ol manmeri bilong ol hap em bipo gavman komyunis i bosim , ol i amamas tru long ol i stap fri long bung long ol kibung kristen long kantri bilong ol yet .

translation.en: last year , for example , a total of 282,333 jehovah 's witnesses and their friends were delighted to worship together at 80 " god 's prophetic word " district conventions held in former soviet republics .
translation.zu: olsem : long yia i go pinis , inap 282,333 witnes bilong jehova na ol pren bilong ol , ol i amamas long lotu wantaim long 80 " tok profet bilong god " kibung distrik long ol hap em bipo gavman komyunis i bosim .

translation.en: and a total of 13,452 were baptized .
translation.zu: na inap 13,452 i kisim baptais .

translation.en: surprising as it may seem , last year there were also russian - language conventions in other countries in the world .
translation.zu: ating yu kirap nogut long save olsem long yia i go pinis , ol i mekim ol kibung long tok rasia long ol narapela kantri tu .

translation.en: a total of 6,336 persons attended four such gatherings in countries outside the former soviet union !
translation.zu: inap 6,336 manmeri i bung long 4 - pela kibung olsem long ol kantri i stap ausait long ol hap em bipo soviet yunion i bosim !

translation.en: and why do so many russian - speaking people have an intense interest in the bible ?
translation.zu: na bilong wanem planti manmeri i save tok rasia ol i gat bikpela laik long save long baibel ?

translation.en: let us first briefly consider the latter question .
translation.zu: pastaim yumi ken skelim laspela askim .

translation.en: russia has a rich religious history .
translation.zu: long bipo yet rasia i gat planti samting bilong lotu .

translation.en: yet , the russian orthodox church , like the roman catholic church , has kept people in ignorance of the bible .
translation.zu: tasol olsem misin katolik , misin otodoks bilong rasia tu ol i no bin lainim ol man long tok bilong baibel .

translation.en: " the bible , " explains the recent book the russian tragedy - the burden of history , " has never been a principal part of russian orthodoxy . "
translation.zu: wanpela nupela buk ( the russian tragedy - the burden of history ) i tok : " i kam inap long nau , baibel i no bikpela samting long misin otodoks bilong rasia . "

translation.en: the result , according to russian religious scholar sergei ivanenko , is that " the lack of bible knowledge of orthodox believers has led to the fact that many parishioners of orthodox churches are more susceptible to the influence of superstitions , occultism , and magic than unbelievers . "
translation.zu: wanpela saveman bilong lotu long rasia , em sergei ivanenko , em i tok , dispela i mekim na " ol man bilong misin otodoks ol i no gat save long baibel , na long dispela rot planti bilong ol i go insait long ol bilip bilong ol tumbuna , na wok marila , na majik , winim ol man i no bilip . "

translation.en: he wrote : " i convinced myself that the doctrine of the [ russian orthodox ] church was in theory a cunning and harmful deceit , and in practice a collection of the grossest superstitions and sorcery , which completely conceals the whole meaning of the christian teaching . "
translation.zu: em i tok : " mi bilip tru olsem bilip bilong misin [ otodoks bilong rasia ] em i wanpela bikpela tok giaman inap bagarapim man , na ol i kamapim dispela bilip long ol bilip nogut bilong ol tumbuna na marila posin samting , em ol dispela samting i haitim tru as bilong ol bilip kristen . "

translation.en: this situation proved to be a fertile ground for the rise of soviet communism with its atheistic propaganda and well - known refrain : " religion is the opium of the people . "
translation.zu: dispela samting i mekim na gavman komyunis na bikpela toktok bilong ol olsem i no gat god em inap kamap . ol i mekim wanpela tok em planti man i save long en , olsem : " lotu em i olsem drak i save paulim tingting bilong ol man . "

translation.en: yet , communism itself soon became a form of religion , often called the red religion .
translation.zu: tasol i no longtaim na gavman komyunis yet i kamap olsem wanpela lotu , em planti man i kolim olsem retpela lotu .

translation.en: but the red religion did not last .
translation.zu: tasol retpela lotu i no stap longpela taim .

translation.en: when the soviet state collapsed in 1991 , millions of people were confused and wondered where to turn .
translation.zu: taim gavman komyunis i pundaun long 1991 , planti milion manmeri i paul na ol i no save ol inap bilip long wanem samting .

translation.en: as a result of a fine educational system , russians had come to be among the most literate people in the world .
translation.zu: ol rasia i gat planti gutpela skul na dispela i mekim na ol i save gut long rit rait , winim klostu olgeta narapela kantri .

translation.en: thus , many russians became not only bible readers but also lovers of its teachings .
translation.zu: olsem na planti manmeri bilong rasia ol i kirap ritim baibel , na tu , ol i laikim tru tok bilong en .

translation.en: at the same time , especially during the decade of the 1990 ' s , hundreds of thousands of people from the former soviet union migrated to other countries , such as germany , greece , and the united states .
translation.zu: long wankain taim , kirap long 1991 i go inap 1999 , planti handet tausen manmeri bilong ol hap em bipo soviet yunion i bosim , ol i go sindaun long ol narapela kantri , olsem jemani , grik , na yunaitet stets .

translation.en: during her long reign , sophie , later known as catherine the great , invited german farmers to live in russia .
translation.zu: sofi i bosim rasia inap longpela taim , na em i singautim ol fama bilong jemani long kam sindaun long rasia .

translation.en: then , when germany attacked the soviet union during world war ii , most of those of german descent were transported to siberia and to such soviet republics as kazakhstan , kyrgyzstan , and uzbekistan .
translation.zu: bihain ol i givim nem bikpela kwin katrin long em . bihain , taim jemani i pait long soviet yunion long taim bilong namba tu pait , ol i salim planti tumbuna bilong ol dispela jeman i go long saibiria na long ol provins bilong soviet yunion olsem kasakstan , kirgistan , na usbekistan .

translation.en: recently many russian - speaking germans , as well as others from the former soviet union , moved to germany to enjoy better economic conditions .
translation.zu: nau long dispela taim , planti jeman i save mekim tok rasia na sampela narapela man bilong ol hap em bipo soviet yunion i bosim , ol i go sindaun long jemani bilong kisim gutpela sindaun .

translation.en: in december 1992 the first russian - speaking congregation in germany was formed in berlin .
translation.zu: long disemba 1992 , ol i kamapim namba wan kongrigesen i mekim tok rasia long belin , jemani .

translation.en: by last year , 52 congregations and 43 smaller groups had been formed into three russian - speaking circuits in germany .
translation.zu: i go inap long yia i go pinis , inap 52 kongrigesen na 43 liklik grup ol i kamap 3 - pela sekit i mekim tok rasia long jemani .

translation.en: there was a peak attendance of 4,920 at the russian - language " god 's prophetic word " district convention in cologne , held from july 30 to august 1 , where 164 were baptized to symbolize their dedication to jehovah .
translation.zu: inap 4,920 manmeri i bung long kolon long " tok profet bilong god " kibung distrik long tok rasia , em dispela kibung i bin kamap long julai 30 i go inap ogas 1 , na 164 i kisim baptais bilong makim olsem ol i dediket pinis long jehova .

translation.en: earlier , on april 1 , in germany 's russian - language congregations , 6,175 were present for the celebration of the memorial of jesus ' death .
translation.zu: paslain long dispela , long epril 1 , inap 6,175 manmeri bilong ol kongrigesen i mekim tok rasia long jemani ol i bung bilong mekim memorial bilong tingim indai bilong jisas .

translation.en: russians in the united states
translation.zu: ol rasia long yunaitet stets

translation.en: the united states too has experienced an influx of russian - speaking people from the former soviet union .
translation.zu: na planti man bilong ol hap em bipo soviet yunion i bosim na ol i save mekim tok rasia , ol i go sindaun long yunaitet stets .

translation.en: the new york times reported : " between 1991 and 1996 , russians were brooklyn 's fastest - growing immigrant group .
translation.zu: nius the new york times tok : " namel long 1991 na 1996 , planti rasia i go sindaun long bruklin , winim ol man bilong ol narapela lain .

translation.en: during the same period , the immigration and naturalization service admitted more than 339,000 immigrants to the united states from the former soviet union . "
translation.zu: long dispela wankain hap taim , wanpela lain ( immigration and naturalization service ) i orait long 339,000 manmeri bilong ol hap em bipo soviet yunion i bosim long ol i ken kam sindaun long yunaitet stets . "

translation.en: later , the times of january 1999 said that during the previous decade , some 400,000 jews from the former soviet union had immigrated to new york city and the surrounding area .
translation.zu: bihain , nius times bilong janueri 1999 , i tok olsem long 1981 i go inap 1989 samting , inap 400,000 juda bilong ol hap em bipo soviet yunion i bosim , ol i bin i go sindaun long nu yok siti na long ol hap klostu long en .

translation.en: in addition , russians by the thousands have settled in other parts of the united states in recent years .
translation.zu: na tu , nau long dispela taim , planti tausen rasia i bin go sindaun long ol narapela hap bilong yunaitet stets .

translation.en: for example , northern california has had an influx of some 35,000 new russian immigrants , making it the third - largest center of immigrants from the former soviet union after new york and los angeles .
translation.zu: olsem : inap 35,000 manmeri bilong rasia i go sindaun long noten kalifonia , olsem na dispela hap i kamap namba 3 hap i gat planti manmeri bilong ol hap em bipo soviet yunion i bosim . nu yok na los enjeles tasol i gat planti rasia moa long en .

translation.en: these russian - speaking people have also responded to the opportunity to study the bible , and hundreds of them have become worshipers of the true god , jehovah .
translation.zu: planti bilong ol dispela manmeri i save mekim tok rasia ol tu i kirap stadi long baibel , na planti handet bilong ol i kamap man bilong lotuim trupela god , em jehova .

translation.en: on april 1 , 1994 , the first russian - language congregation of jehovah 's witnesses in recent times in the united states was formed in brooklyn , new york .
translation.zu: long epril 1 , 1994 , ol i kamapim namba wan kongrigesen i mekim tok rasia bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long yunaitet stets , em long bruklin , nu yok .

translation.en: eventually , russian congregations were started in pennsylvania , california , and washington .
translation.zu: bihain , ol i kamapim ol kongrigesen i mekim tok rasia long pensilvenia , kalifonia , na wosington .

translation.en: study groups were begun in many other parts of the country .
translation.zu: na ol i kirapim ol grup bilong stadi long ol narapela hap bilong kantri .

translation.en: a first in the united states
translation.zu: namba wan kibung long yunaitet stets

translation.en: last august 20 to 22 , a peak attendance of 670 from throughout the united states and canada were thrilled to attend the first russian - language district convention held in new york city .
translation.zu: long ogas 20 i go inap 22 , 1999 , inap 670 manmeri bilong yunaitet stets na kanada ol i amamas long bung long namba wan kibung distrik bilong tok rasia i kamap long nu yok siti .

translation.en: all the talks were delivered in russian , and a full - costume drama , featuring the bible account of jacob and esau , was presented by members of the russian congregation of los angeles , california .
translation.zu: ol i mekim olgeta tok bilong kibung long tok rasia , na ol i mekim pilai bilong baibel i stori long jekop na iso . ol brata sista bilong kongrigesen i mekim tok rasia bilong los enjeles , kalifonia , ol i mekim dispela pilai .

translation.en: it was truly a highlight of the convention .
translation.zu: pilai i wanpela bikpela samting bilong kibung .

translation.en: another convention highlight was the baptism of 14 persons , all of whom appear in the accompanying photograph .
translation.zu: narapela bikpela samting bilong kibung em baptais bilong 14 manmeri , em olgeta i stap long wanpela piksa bilong dispela stori .

translation.en: several traveled some 2,500 miles [ 4,000 km ] from portland , oregon , and from los angeles and san francisco , california , to be baptized at the convention in new york city .
translation.zu: sampela ol i raun longwe inap 4,000 kilomita . ol i kam long potlan , origen , na los enjeles na san fransisko , kalifonia , bilong ol i ken kisim baptais long kibung long nu yok siti .

translation.en: previously , these 14 had lived in the former soviet republics of armenia , azerbaijan , belarus , moldova , russia , and ukraine .
translation.zu: bipo ol dispela 14 brata sista i sindaun long ol hap em bipo soviet yunion i bosim , olsem amenia , asebaijan , belarus , moldova , rasia , na yukren .

translation.en: svetlana ( front row , third from the left ) was raised in moscow .
translation.zu: svetlana ( namba wan lain , namba 3 long han kais ) i go bikpela long mosko .

translation.en: at 17 she married a famous singer many years older than she , and in 1989 they came to the united states with their infant son .
translation.zu: taim em i gat 17 krismas , em i maritim wanpela man bilong singsing i gat nem , em krismas bilong em i winim tru krismas bilong svetlana .

translation.en: when svetlana met a witness coworker , her friends warned her about getting involved with what they told her was " a sect that would take control of [ her ] life and take all [ her ] money . "
translation.zu: taim svetlana i bungim wanpela wanwok witnes , ol pren bilong em i tok em i no ken bung wantaim ol witnes , long wanem , ol i " wanpela lotu em ol bai bosim i stap bilong [ em ] na kisim olgeta mani bilong [ em ] . "

translation.en: yet , she wanted to learn what the bible teaches .
translation.zu: tasol em i laik kisim save long tok bilong baibel .

translation.en: about being shown god 's name in the bible , she says : " i was greatly impressed that the witnesses were the only ones making it known . "
translation.zu: ol witnes i soim em nem bilong god long baibel , na svetlana i stori long dispela samting olsem : " mi pilim tru pasin bilong ol witnes , ol tasol i save autim nem bilong god . "

translation.en: as a youth , andrei ( back row , third from the left ) left his home in siberia for advanced training as an athlete in what today is st . petersburg .
translation.zu: taim andrei ( long baksait , namba 3 long han kais ) i yangpela yet , em i lusim haus bilong em long saibiria na go skul long hap nau ol i kolim sen pitasbek bilong lain gut long pilai spot .

translation.en: soon afterward , the soviet union dissolved , and in 1993 , andrei , at age 22 , immigrated to the united states .
translation.zu: bihain liklik , soviet yunion i bruk , na long 1993 taim andrei i gat 22 krismas , em i go sindaun long yunaitet stets .

translation.en: he explains : " i began to think about god and started going to the russian orthodox church .
translation.zu: em i tok : " mi kirap tingting long god na mi go long misin otodoks bilong rasia .

translation.en: once , during the russian easter celebration , i stayed in church the entire night seeking to draw close to god . "
translation.zu: wanpela taim , long taim bilong tingim ista bilong rasia , mi stap long haus lotu long nait olgeta bambai mi ken go klostu long god . "

translation.en: about this time svetlana met andrei , and she told him about what she was learning from her bible study .
translation.zu: long dispela taim svetlana i bungim andrei , na em i stori long em long ol samting em i kisim save long en long rot bilong baibel - stadi .

translation.en: he agreed to accompany her to a meeting of jehovah 's witnesses , and afterward he accepted a bible study .
translation.zu: andrei i go wantaim em long wanpela miting bilong ol witnes bilong jehova , na bihain em i orait long stadi long baibel .

translation.en: in january 1999 they were married .
translation.zu: long janueri 1999 ol i marit .

translation.en: after their baptism at the convention , they were radiant .
translation.zu: bihain long ol i kisim baptais long kibung , pes bilong ol i lait tru .

translation.en: pavel ( back row , fourth from the left ) was born near qaraghandy , kazakhstan , but later moved to nal 'chik , russia .
translation.zu: mama i karim pavel ( long baksait , namba 4 long han kais ) klostu long karagandi , kasakstan , tasol bihain ol i go sindaun long nalsik , rasia .

translation.en: this large city is close to chechnya and dagestan , where so much fighting has occurred .
translation.zu: dispela bikpela taun i stap klostu long sesnia na dagestan , em dispela hap bikpela pait i bin kamap long en .

translation.en: pavel first met witnesses there in august 1996 , but he migrated to san francisco the following month .
translation.zu: namba wan taim pavel i bungim ol witnes long dispela hap long ogas 1996 , tasol long mun bihain em i go sindaun long san fransisko .

translation.en: he was involved in drugs and had fathered a daughter , who was left in russia with her mother .
translation.zu: em i kisim ol drak , na em i bin kamapim wanpela pikinini meri na pikinini i stap wantaim mama bilong em long rasia .

translation.en: immediately after arriving in the united states , pavel contacted jehovah 's witnesses and accepted a bible study .
translation.zu: taim pavel i kamap long yunaitet stets , wantu em i painim ol witnes bilong jehova na em i kirap stadi long baibel .

translation.en: she is now studying with the witnesses , and there are plans for her to come to the united states so that she and pavel can marry and serve jehovah together in california with their daughter .
translation.zu: nau mama bilong pikinini i stadi wantaim ol witnes , na ol i wok long stretim rot bambai em i ken kam long yunaitet stets bilong maritim pavel na tupela i ken lotu long jehova wantaim pikinini meri bilong ol long kalifonia .

translation.en: george ( back row , second from the left ) was born and raised in moscow .
translation.zu: mama i karim george ( long baksait , namba 2 long han kais ) long mosko na em i go bikpela long dispela hap .

translation.en: he came to the united states in 1996 , and the following year he married flora , who was originally from azerbaijan .
translation.zu: em i kam long yunaitet stets long 1996 , na long yia bihain em i maritim flora , em bilong asebaijan .

translation.en: george attended the russian orthodox church , but after reading a copy of the watchtower magazine , he had questions about the trinity doctrine .
translation.zu: george i save go long misin otodoks bilong rasia , tasol bihain long em i ritim wanpela nius wastaua em i gat ol askim long bilip bilong god triwan .

translation.en: in response to his letter to the watch tower society , he received the brochure should you believe in the trinity ?
translation.zu: em i raitim pas i go long sosaiti was taua , na bilong bekim pas ol i salim buklet gutpela yu bilip long god triwan o nogat ?

translation.en: in 1998 both he and flora began to study the bible .
translation.zu: long 1998 , em wantaim flora ol i kirap stadi long baibel .

translation.en: now she also plans to be baptized .
translation.zu: nau flora tu i laik kisim baptais .

translation.en: how thrilled delegates in new york city were to hear the announcement that 600 had been baptized there !
translation.zu: lain i bung long nu yok siti ol i amamas tru long harim olsem 600 brata sista i bin kisim baptais long mosko !

translation.en: that was particularly true in view of the ominous newspaper and television reports that had begun to appear in the united states and elsewhere in the week leading up to the convention date .
translation.zu: ol i amamas tru long dispela samting , long wanem , long wik kibung i laik kamap , ol nius na televisen long yunaitet stets na long ol narapela hap ol i bin stori olsem sampela man i laik bagarapim kibung long mosko .

translation.en: what was happening in moscow
translation.zu: ol samting i wok long kamap long mosko

translation.en: on july 21 , 1999 , the witnesses signed a contract for the use of the olympic stadium located near the center of moscow and right next to a large russian orthodox church .
translation.zu: long julai 21 , 1999 , ol witnes i sainim kontrak bilong mekim wok long olimpik stediam i stap long mosko , klostu long wanpela bikpela haus lotu bilong misin otodoks bilong rasia .

translation.en: but a week before the convention was to begin , it was clear that there was going to be opposition .
translation.zu: tasol wanpela wik paslain long kibung i laik kirap , ol brata i luksave olsem sampela man bai givim hevi long ol .

translation.en: by wednesday , august 18 , permission to use the stadium had still not been granted , even though the rental fee had already been paid .
translation.zu: long trinde , ogas 18 , ol i no bin givim yet tok orait long ol witnes i ken mekim wok long stediam , maski ol i baim pinis rent bilong en .

translation.en: it was emphasized to officials that , as the box on page 28 shows , jehovah 's witnesses are a legally recognized religious organization in russia .
translation.zu: ol witnes i tokim ol bikman olsem gavman i rejistaim pinis ol witnes bilong jehova olsem wanpela lain lotu long rasia , olsem blok i stap long pes 28 i kamapim .

translation.en: because about 15,000 convention delegates were preparing to attend on friday morning , witness representatives were becoming anxious .
translation.zu: ol witnes i go pas long redim kibung ol i tingting planti , long wanem , inap 15,000 manmeri i redi long kam long kibung long fraide moningtaim .

translation.en: some delegates were traveling to moscow from cities and towns many miles away .
translation.zu: sampela ol i raun i kam long mosko long ol taun i stap longwe tru inap planti kilomita .

translation.en: finally , after some hours of discussion , about 8 : 00 p.m . , on thursday , august 19 , the stadium management was delighted to inform witness representatives that the convention could proceed .
translation.zu: orait , bihain long ol i bin toktok inap sampela aua , long 8 klok long apinun , long fonde , ogas 19 , ol bos bilong stediam ol i amamas long tokim ol witnes olsem ol inap mekim kibung .

translation.en: the city administration had advised that they had no objection to the convention .
translation.zu: ol bikman bilong biktaun ol i bin tokim ol olsem ol i orait long kibung bilong ol witnes .

translation.en: the next morning thousands flooded into the stadium .
translation.zu: long de bihain long moningtaim , planti tausen i kam insait long stediam .

translation.en: witness volunteers had worked all night to prepare for their arrival .
translation.zu: sampela witnes i bin wok nait olgeta bilong redim ol samting .

translation.en: also present that first morning were members of the press , who had been notified earlier about the opposition to holding the convention .
translation.zu: ol lain bilong nius tu ol i kam long dispela namba wan moning , em ol i bin harim olsem sampela man i laik pasim ol witnes long mekim kibung .

translation.en: thus , security people with metal detection equipment such as is used to screen passengers at airports were stationed at all entrances .
translation.zu: ol i putim ol dispela kain masin long olgeta hap ol man i kam insait long stediam .

translation.en: policemen were also stationed throughout the inside of the stadium .
translation.zu: ol polis i bin stap tu long olgeta hap insait long stediam .

translation.en: the convention proceeded in an orderly manner despite a serious threat .
translation.zu: kibung i kamap gut , maski wanpela man i tok bagarap bai painim ol .

translation.en: on saturday afternoon someone made a phone call indicating that a bomb had been planted in the stadium .
translation.zu: long sarere apinun wanpela man i ring na em i tok , em i bin putim wanpela bom insait long stediam .

translation.en: the threat was received shortly before the end of the next - to - last talk of the day .
translation.zu: em i ring paslain liklik long pinis bilong tok i kamap paslain long laspela tok bilong dispela de .

translation.en: so , at the request of the stadium management , a brief announcement was made to evacuate the stadium immediately .
translation.zu: olsem na ol bos bilong stediam i laik ol brata i mekim sotpela toksave , na askim olgeta brata sista long lusim stediam hariap .

translation.en: they had never seen anything like it !
translation.zu: ol i no bin lukim kain samting olsem bipo !

translation.en: no bomb was found , and the following day the program was extended to include what had not been presented on saturday .
translation.zu: ol i no painim wanpela bom , na long de bihain ol i skruim program i go longpela na mekim tok ol i no bin mekim long sarere .

translation.en: the stadium management was pleased with the convention .
translation.zu: ol bos bilong stediam ol i amamas long kibung .

translation.en: during the last weekend of august and the first one in september , russian - language district conventions were also held in greece - in athens first and then in thessalonica .
translation.zu: long laspela fraide i go sande bilong ogas na namba wan fraide i go sande bilong septemba , ol i mekim tu kibung distrik long tok rasia long kantri grik - pastaim long atens na bihain long tesalonaika .

translation.en: a total of 746 attended , and 34 were baptized .
translation.zu: inap 746 i bung , na 34 i kisim baptais .

translation.en: there are 8 russian - speaking congregations in greece and 17 smaller groups made up of immigrants from former southern republics of the soviet union .
translation.zu: i gat 8 - pela kongrigesen na 17 liklik grup ol i mekim tok rasia long kantri grik .

translation.en: these have their meetings in russian and in other languages spoken by the immigrants .
translation.zu: ol dispela kongrigesen na grup ol i gat ol manmeri bilong ol provins bilong ol hap saut em bipo soviet yunion i bosim .

translation.en: one of those baptized in athens was victor .
translation.zu: wanpela bilong ol man i kisim baptais long atens , em victor .

translation.en: he had been an atheist , but in august 1998 he attended the international convention of jehovah 's witnesses in athens , where his wife was baptized .
translation.zu: bipo em i no bilip long god , tasol long ogas 1998 em i go long kibung intenesenel bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long atens , na meri bilong em i kisim baptais long dispela kibung .

translation.en: he said that he was so impressed by the love manifested by the delegates that he was moved to study the bible .
translation.zu: em i tok , em i pilim tru pasin sori i stap namel long lain i bung long kibung , na dispela i kirapim em long stadi long baibel .

translation.en: a man named ighor received a copy of the book you can live forever in paradise on earth and after reading it threw away his icons .
translation.zu: wanpela man , nem bilong em ighor , em i kisim buk yu inap i stap oltaim long paradais long graun , na taim em i ritim pinis dispela buk em i rausim olgeta imis bilong em .

translation.en: he even began to introduce himself as one of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: em i kirap tokim ol man olsem em i wanpela witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: after writing to the branch office in athens and receiving a visit by the witnesses in november 1998 , he immediately attended his first congregation meeting and has not missed one since .
translation.zu: em i raitim pas i go long brens - ofis long atens na bihain long wanpela witnes i kam lukim em long novemba 1998 , wantu em i go long namba wan miting bilong kongrigesen , na em i no bin lusim wanpela miting bihain long dispela .

translation.en: now , after his baptism , ighor 's goal is to be a full - time minister of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: nau em i baptais pinis , na ighor i laik kamap wanpela witnes bilong jehova i save autim tok long olgeta de .

translation.en: russian - speaking people have immigrated to a number of other countries in the world that we have not mentioned .
translation.zu: ol manmeri i save mekim tok rasia ol i bin go sindaun long planti narapela kantri em mipela i no bin kolim .

translation.en: many of these people too rejoice in their freedom to study the bible and to assemble openly to worship god .
translation.zu: planti bilong ol dispela lain tu ol i amamas long ol i stap fri long stadi long baibel na long bung wantaim long ples klia bilong lotuim god .

translation.en: to them this privilege is a cherished delight !
translation.zu: dispela em i wanpela gutpela samting tru long ol !

translation.en: russians who love the bible
translation.zu: sampela rasia i save laikim tru baibel

translation.en: professor sergei ivanenko , a respected russian religious scholar , described jehovah 's witnesses as people truly devoted to bible study .
translation.zu: wanpela saveman bilong lotu i gat nem , em profesa sergei ivanenko , em i tok ol witnes bilong jehova i save givim bel tru long stadi long baibel .

translation.en: in his recent book in russian , o lyudyakh , nikogda nye rasstayushchikhsya s bibliey ( the people who are never without their bibles ) , he wrote of their early history in the soviet union : " even when they ended up in prison for their faithfulness to their beliefs , jehovah 's witnesses found ways to make use of the bible . "
translation.zu: i no longtaim i go pinis na em i raitim wanpela buk long tok rasia , o lyudyakh , nikogda nye rasstayushchikhsya s bibliey ( wanpela lain i save holim baibel long olgeta taim ) , na em i raitim stori bilong ol witnes taim ol i nupela yet long soviet yunion .

translation.en: " it was forbidden for prisoners to have a bible .
translation.zu: " ol i tambuim ol kalabusman long holim baibel .

translation.en: in one of the northern camps , one of jehovah 's witnesses was an electrician and he kept bible books in a transformer unit where there was very high voltage .
translation.zu: long wanpela banis kalabus long hap bilong not , wanpela witnes bilong jehova em i mekim wok olsem elektrisen na em i putim ol hap bilong baibel insait long wanpela bokis bilong stretim strong bilong paua - dispela bokis i gat bikpela paua insait long en .

translation.en: each part of the bible was tied with a string to a particular wire , and only that man knew which string had to be pulled to pull it out - for example , the gospel of matthew - without getting a deadly shock .
translation.zu: em i pasim olgeta wan wan hap bilong baibel long narapela narapela waia , na em wanpela tasol i save em i mas pulim wanem waia bambai em i ken kisim wanpela buk bilong baibel - olsem gutnius matyu i raitim - na paua i no kilim em i dai .

translation.en: of course no search , no matter how hard the guards looked , yielded results , and so this unique bible was not discovered . "
translation.zu: wok bilong ol woda long painim baibel i no karim kaikai maski ol i wok strong tru long painim , olsem na ol i no painim dispela narapela kain baibel . "

translation.en: jehovah 's witnesses reregistered in russia
translation.zu: ol i rejistaim ol witnes bilong jehova long rasia

translation.en: jehovah 's witnesses have been actively proclaiming god 's kingdom in russia for more than a century .
translation.zu: ol witnes bilong jehova i bin autim tok bilong kingdom bilong god long rasia inap olsem 100 yia .

translation.en: because of governmental restrictions , however , the witnesses did not first receive legal recognition until march 27 , 1991 .
translation.zu: tasol gavman i bin putim tambu long wok bilong ol witnes , olsem na gavman i no rejistaim ol i go inap long mas 27 , 1991 .

translation.en: at that time , they were registered under the name administrative center of the religious organizations of jehovah 's witnesses in the u.s.s.r .
translation.zu: long dispela taim , gavman i rejistaim ol long nem , nambawan ofis bilong lotu bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long soviet yunion .

translation.en: on september 26 , 1997 , a law entitled " on freedom of conscience and religious association " was enacted .
translation.zu: long septemba 26 , 1997 , ol i kamapim wanpela lo em nem bilong en , " pasin bilong stap fri long bihainim maus bilong bel na mekim lotu . "

translation.en: why ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem ?

translation.en: because many viewed the passage of this law as an attempt to restrict the religious activities of minority religions in russia .
translation.zu: long wanem , planti ol i ting dispela lo i bilong pasim rot bilong planti lain lotu long mekim wok bilong ol long rasia .

translation.en: thus , in spite of jehovah 's witnesses ' hard - won registration in 1991 , russia 's new freedom of conscience law required them , as well as all other religious organizations , to reregister .
translation.zu: olsem na maski ol witnes bilong jehova i bin wok strong na gavman i rejistaim ol long 1991 , dispela nupela lo i mekim na ol witnes na olgeta narapela lain lotu tu ol i mas rejista gen long gavman .

translation.en: this raised a number of questions .
translation.zu: dispela i kamapim planti askim .

translation.en: did this indicate that russian authorities were returning to a policy of oppressing jehovah 's witnesses ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ? dispela i makim olsem ol bikman bilong rasia ol bai putim gen hevi long ol witnes bilong jehova ?

translation.en: how happy the witnesses were to receive legal recognition once again when russia 's ministry of justice issued a certificate of registration for the " administrative center for jehovah 's witnesses in russia , " on april 29 , 1999 !
translation.zu: long epril 29 , 1999 , ol witnes i amamas tru long gavman i orait gen long ol , taim dipatmen bilong jastis i givim pepa long ol witnes em i rejistaim ol long nem " nambawan ofis bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long rasia . "

translation.en: teaching respect for authority " today 's parents demand so little respect for authority that we actually may be lowering our children 's self - esteem , " says a report in the toronto star .
translation.zu: wanpela ripot long nius the toronto star i tok : " ol papamama bilong nau ol i no strong long pikinini i mas daun long man i gat namba , olsem na ating ol papamama i mekim na ol pikinini i kisim tingting olsem ol i no gutpela man . "

translation.en: " knowing their limits actually appeals to children 's need for predictability and security - which in turn helps them feel higher self - esteem , " notes behavior specialist ronald morrish .
translation.zu: saveman ronald morrish i tok : " taim ol pikinini i save long ol mak ol i no ken abrusim dispela i helpim ol pikinini long stap bel isi na long save long ol samting ol i mas mekim na dispela bai helpim ol tu long laikim ol yet .

translation.en: i see 3 - year - olds whose mothers try to persuade them not to misbehave by explaining how it makes mommy feel . "
translation.zu: mi save long sampela pikinini i gat 3 - pela krismas , em mama bilong ol i tokim pikinini long em bai i pilim nogut sapos pikinini i sakim tok .

translation.en: so why don 't we also expect kids ' behaviour to improve each year ? "
translation.zu: olsem na bilong wanem yumi no ting pasin bilong ol tu i mas kamap gutpela moa long olgeta yia ?

translation.en: he asks . " if you won 't do what it takes to get a toddler to pick up a toy , you won 't have a teenager who makes his curfew . "
translation.zu: sapos yu no strong long liklik pikinini i mas kisim samting em i bin tromoi long plua , orait taim pikinini i gat 15 krismas samting bai em i no kam long haus taim yu tokim em long kam . "

translation.en: " we recorded the sound a mother hen makes when she finds something she wants her chicks to eat , " says luis bate of the university of prince edward island .
translation.zu: luis bate bilong yunivesiti bilong prins edwat ailan , em i tok : " mipela i putim long kaset krai bilong mama kakaruk taim em i painim samting em i laik ol pikinini bilong em i kaikai . "

translation.en: when the recordings were played back over speakers placed near food , chicks ate even though their mother was not present .
translation.zu: taim ol i pilai kaset long ol bikmaus i stap klostu long kaikai , ol liklik kakaruk i kaikai maski mama bilong ol i no stap wantaim ol .

translation.en: but the sounds must be just right .
translation.zu: tasol krai bilong mama i mas stret .

translation.en: observes bate : " when we played them the sound a mother hen makes after chicks hatch , which to my ear sounds identical to the feeding call , the chicks became immobile . "
translation.zu: bate i tok : " taim mipela i pilai kaset i gat krai bilong mama kakaruk bihain long pikinini kakaruk i lusim kiau , ol liklik kakaruk i no mekim wanpela samting .

translation.en: in similar experiments , turkey chicks and piglets could also be encouraged to eat more often .

translation.en: " no one shall be held in slavery or servitude : slavery and the slave trade shall be prohibited in all their forms . " - universal declaration of human rights .
translation.zu: ' i no gat wanpela man ol bai holim em olsem wokboi nating i kalabus ; olgeta pasin bilong mekim wok kalabus na wok bilong kisim ol man na salim ol long mani olsem wokboi nating , dispela bai stap tambu . ' - yunivesal dekleresen ov yuman raits .

translation.en: the next time you put sugar in your coffee , think of prevot , a haitian who was promised a good job in another caribbean country .
translation.zu: long narapela taim yu putim suga long kofi bilong yu , tingim prevot , wanpela man bilong haiti . ol i bin tok promis olsem ol bai givim gutpela wok mani long em long narapela kantri bilong karibian .

translation.en: instead , he was sold for eight dollars .
translation.zu: tasol nogat , ol i salim em long 8 dola .

translation.en: prevot shared the lot of thousands of his enslaved countrymen who are forced to cut sugarcane for six or seven months for little or no money .
translation.zu: prevot em wanpela bilong planti tausen wankantri em ol i stap olsem wokboi nating i kalabus na ol i mas katim suga inap 6 - pela o 7 - pela mun bilong kisim liklik mani o ol i no kisim mani .

translation.en: to obtain food , they must work .
translation.zu: bilong kisim kaikai ol i mas wok .

translation.en: if they attempt to escape , they may be beaten .
translation.zu: sapos ol i traim long ranawe , ol man i paitim ol .

translation.en: consider the case of lin - lin , a girl from southeast asia .
translation.zu: tingim lin - lin , wanpela liklik meri bilong saut - is esia .

translation.en: she was 13 when her mother died .
translation.zu: em i gat 13 krismas taim mama i dai .

translation.en: the price paid for her was termed " an advance on her earnings " - a sure way to keep her tied to her new owners for good .
translation.zu: ol i tok , dispela mani ol i baim lin - lin long en i olsem ' hap pe bilong mani em bai kisim ' - em wanpela rot bilong kalabusim em olgeta long ol nupela bos bilong em .

translation.en: instead of being given a decent job , lin - lin was taken to a brothel , where clients pay the owner $ 4 an hour for her .
translation.zu: lin - lin i no kisim gutpela wok , nogat ; ol i kisim em i go long wanpela haus pamuk na ol man i givim 4 dola long bos bilong haus pamuk bambai ol i ken slip wantaim lin - lin inap wanpela aua .

translation.en: lin - lin is virtually a prisoner , for she cannot leave until her debt is paid .
translation.zu: lin - lin i stap olsem kalabus , long wanem , em i no inap lusim dispela haus inap long em i bekim dinau bilong em .

translation.en: this includes her cost to the brothel owner in addition to interest and expenses .
translation.zu: na tu , em i mas givim mani long bos bilong haus pamuk bilong lukautim em , na hap mani moa olsem interes .

translation.en: if lin - lin refuses to comply with her employer 's wishes , she might be beaten or tortured .
translation.zu: sapos lin - lin i sakim laik bilong bos , ating em bai paitim em o givim pen nogut long em .

translation.en: worse still , if she tries to escape , she might be killed .
translation.zu: tasol samting i nogut moa i olsem : sapos em i traim long ranawe , ol inap kilim em i dai .

translation.en: national laws ban slavery , and its abolition is enshrined in international instruments - notably article 4 of the 1948 universal declaration of human rights , cited above .
translation.zu: lo bilong ol gavman i tambuim dispela pasin na dispela tambu i stap olsem bikpela samting long pepa bilong ol gavman , olsem hap namba 4 bilong yunivesal dekleresen ov human raits bilong 1948 , em yumi stori long en long kirap bilong dispela stori .

translation.en: from phnom penh to paris , from mumbai to brasília , millions of our fellow humans - men , women , and children - are forced to live and work as slaves or in slavelike conditions .
translation.zu: long olgeta hap , ol i subim planti milion man , meri , na pikinini long sindaun na wok olsem wokboi nating i kalabus .

translation.en: london - based anti - slavery international , the world 's oldest monitor of forced labor , puts the number of people in bondage in the hundreds of millions .
translation.zu: wanpela olpela lain tru long landon ( anti - slavery international ) i gat wok long skelim pasin bilong subim ol man long wok kalabus , ol i tok , planti handet milion manmeri i wok kalabus .

translation.en: indeed , there may be more slaves in the world today than ever before !
translation.zu: tru tumas , ating i gat planti moa long nau ol i wokboi nating i wok kalabus , winim olgeta taim bipo !

translation.en: granted , the familiar images of shackles , whips , and auctions are not typical of modern - day slavery .
translation.zu: tru , yumi no lukim ol i pasim sen long han lek bilong ol man long nau , na wipim ol , na oksenim ol olsem ol i bin mekim bipo .

translation.en: in some cases their lives are even more tragic .
translation.zu: na i stap bilong sampela bilong ol i moa nogut .

translation.zu: ol i mekim wanem bilong helpim ol dispela lain ?

translation.en: what is modern slavery ?
translation.zu: wok kalabus bilong nau em wanem samting ?

translation.en: this is a question that even the united nations has difficulty answering after years of effort .
translation.zu: em wanpela askim yunaitet nesen tu i hatwok long bekim , maski ol i bin wok planti yia long kisim save long en .

translation.en: one definition of slavery is that formulated by the 1926 slavery convention , which stated : " slavery is the status or condition of a person over whom any or all of the powers attaching to the right of ownership are exercised . "
translation.zu: wanpela kibung ( 1926 slavery convention ) i kamapim insait bilong dispela tok olsem : ' wok kalabus inap makim i stap bilong man aninit long wanpela man o wanpela lain em ol i baim em pinis na i stret ol i bosim em . '

translation.en: still , the term is open to interpretation .
translation.zu: tasol i gat ol narapela tingting long dispela tok .

translation.en: mike dottridge , the director of anti - slavery international , believes that " as slavery seems to take new forms - or as the word is applied to more conditions - there is a danger that its meaning will be diluted or even diminished . "
translation.zu: mike dottridge , dairekta bilong lain anti - slavery international , em i ting ' i gat ol nupela pasin ol i save kolim wok kalabus na ol i kolim dispela tok long sampela kain wok moa , olsem na ol man i no pilim moa insait tru bilong dispela tok . '

translation.en: he feels that " slavery is identified by an element of ownership or control over another 's life . "
translation.zu: em i ting ' wok kalabus i makim man i stap long han bilong man i baim em o i bosim strong i stap bilong em . '

translation.en: it includes coercion and restriction of movement - the fact that " someone is not free to leave , to change an employer . "
translation.zu: na tu , wok kalabus i makim pasin bilong subim o pasim man long mekim wanpela samting , olsem ' man i no stap fri long lusim wanpela wok o long senisim bos bilong em . '
