translation.en: who are slaves today ?
translation.zu: husat i olsem wokboi nating long nau ?

translation.en: just think of the numbers .
translation.zu: tingim ol dispela namba .

translation.en: it is estimated that between 200 and 250 million children under the age of 15 spend most of their waking hours at work .
translation.zu: ol i ting inap olsem 200 milion i go inap 250 milion pikinini , em ol i no winim yet 15 krismas , ol i mas lusim planti planti aua long ples wok .

translation.en: a quarter of a million children , some as young as seven , were drawn into armed combat during 1995 and 1996 alone , some of them thus becoming war slaves .
translation.zu: inap 250 tausen pikinini , em sampela i gat 7 - pela krismas tasol , ol i bin subim ol i go insait long pait long 1995 na 1996 , olsem na sampela bilong ol i kamap wokboi nating i kalabus long pait .

translation.en: the number of women and children sold as slaves each year is estimated to be more than a million .
translation.zu: long olgeta yia , winim wan milion meri na pikinini ol i salim ol long mani bilong mekim wok kalabus .

translation.en: but cold numbers cannot possibly reveal the desperation of these individuals .
translation.zu: tasol ol namba i no inap kamapim bikpela bel hevi dispela ol lain i save pilim , nogat .

translation.en: for example , in a northern african country , writer elinor burkett met fatma , a young woman who managed to escape her cruel master .
translation.zu: olsem : long wanpela kantri long hap not bilong afrika , elinor burkett , wanpela meri bilong raitim buk , em i bungim fatma , wanpela yangpela meri i bin ranawe long hatpela bos bilong em .

translation.en: however , after speaking with her , burkett realized that fatma " will be a slave forever , in her own mind . "
translation.zu: bihain long em i toktok wantaim em , burkett i save , ' long tingting fatma bai stap oltaim olsem wokmeri nating i kalabus . ' olsem wanem ?

translation.en: can fatma even dream of a better future ?
translation.zu: fatma inap tingting long kisim gutpela sindaun long bihain ?

translation.en: " she cannot project beyond the dawn , " says burkett .
translation.zu: burkett i tok : ' em i no inap tingting long wanpela gutpela samting bai kamap bihain .

translation.en: " the future is one of the many abstract concepts she lacks . "
translation.zu: dispela em wanpela bilong planti samting em i no save tingting long en . '

translation.en: into what forms of slavery are they thrown ?
translation.zu: ol i mas mekim wanem ol kain wok kalabus ?

translation.en: the tourist brochure circulating in the united states could not be more straightforward : " sex tours to thailand .
translation.zu: wanpela buklet bilong ol turis ol lain i wok long tilim long amerika i tokaut stret olsem : ' raun long tailan bilong pamuk .

translation.en: real sex .
translation.zu: mekim maritpasin .

translation.en: did you know you can actually buy a virgin girl for as little as $ 200 ? "
translation.zu: olsem wanem ? yu save yu inap baim wanpela yangpela meri i no bin slip wantaim man long 200 dola tasol ? '

translation.en: what the brochure did not tell is that these " virgins " have likely been kidnapped or forcibly sold into brothels , where they average some 10 to 20 customers a day .
translation.zu: tasol wanpela samting dispela buklet i no kamapim i olsem : ol man i bin stilim ol dispela yangpela meri o salim ol long mani long ol haus pamuk , na long olgeta de ol i mas slip wantaim 10 - pela i go inap 20 man samting .

translation.en: if they do not provide sexual services , they are beaten .
translation.zu: sapos ol i no slip wantaim ol man , bos i save paitim ol .

translation.en: when a fire broke out in a brothel on phuket island , a resort in southern thailand , five prostitutes burned to death .
translation.zu: taim paia i bin kukim wanpela haus pamuk long ailan puket , tailan , inap 5 - pela pamukmeri ol i dai long paia .

translation.en: why ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem ?

translation.en: where do these young women come from ?
translation.zu: ol dispela yangpela meri i save kam long we ?

translation.en: women 's organizations in southeast asia have estimated that from the mid - 1970 ' s to the early 1990 ' s , 30 million women were sold worldwide .
translation.zu: ol lain bilong helpim ol meri long saut - is esia i tok , kirap long 1975 i go inap long 1993 samting , ol man i kisim inap 30 milion meri long olgeta hap na salim ol long mani .

translation.en: since the breakup of the communist bloc in 1991 , a whole new population of impoverished girls and women has been created .
translation.zu: kirap long taim gavman komyunis i pundaun long 1991 , planti meri na pikinini meri ol i kamap rabis .

translation.en: in one small carpet factory in asia , children as young as five are working from 4 o 'clock in the morning until 11 o 'clock at night without pay .
translation.zu: long wanpela faktori bilong wokim mat long esia , ol pikinini em sampela bilong ol i gat 5 - pela krismas tasol , ol i kirap wok long 4 klok moningtaim i go inap 11 klok nait , na ol i no kisim pe .

translation.en: in many cases child laborers like these face grave health hazards : unsafe machinery , long hours in a poorly lit and poorly ventilated environment , and exposure to dangerous chemicals used in manufacturing .
translation.zu: planti pikinini i wok mani olsem ol inap kisim bagarap , long wanem , ol i wok long ol masin i no wok gut , na ol i wok planti aua long ples i no gat gutpela lait na gutpela win , na ol i mekim wok long ol marasin nogut .

translation.en: because child labor is cheap and because by nature children are docile , easy to discipline , and too frightened to complain .
translation.zu: long wanem ol inap givim liklik pe tasol long ol pikinini , na i no hatwok long bosim na stretim ol , na ol pikinini i pret long toktok planti long hevi bilong ol .

translation.en: their small physique and nimble fingers are seen by unscrupulous employers as assets for doing certain kinds of work , such as carpet weaving .
translation.zu: ol bisnisman nogut i laikim liklik skin na gutpela pinga bilong ol pikinini bilong mekim sampela kain wok , olsem wokim mat .

translation.en: often such children are given jobs , while their parents sit at home , unemployed .
translation.zu: planti pikinini olsem ol i kisim wok , tasol papamama i stap nating long haus - ol i no gat wok mani .

translation.en: to add to their misery , domestic child workers are particularly vulnerable to sexual and physical abuse .
translation.zu: ol pikinini i wok long haus bilong ol man ol i karim narapela hevi nogut - ol man i mekim pasin sem long ol na paitim ol .

translation.en: by day , they may be put to work building roads and quarrying stone .
translation.zu: long san , ating ol dispela pikinini i mas wokim rot o digim graun bilong kisim ol ston .

translation.en: anti - slavery international explains a typical case : " a 12 - year - old girl is told that her family has arranged her marriage to a 60 - year - old man .
translation.zu: lain anti - slavery international i stori olsem long samting i save kamap planti taim : " wanpela pikinini meri i gat 12 - pela krismas i kisim tok olsem famili bilong em i stretim rot bilong em i ken maritim wanpela man i gat 60 krismas .

translation.en: ostensibly she has the right to refuse , but in practice she has no opportunity to exercise that right and is unaware that she can do so . "
translation.zu: lo i tok pikinini inap sakim dispela man , tasol famili i no larim em long mekim olsem na pikinini i no save em inap sakim dispela man . "

translation.en: slaves of debt
translation.zu: ol wokboi bilong dinau

translation.en: hundreds of thousands of laborers are held in bondage to their employers and places of employment because of loans that they or their parents have been given .
translation.zu: planti handet tausen manmeri i wok leba , ol i kalabus long bos bilong ol na long ples wok , long wanem , ol yet o papamama bilong ol , ol i bin kisim dinau .

translation.en: traditionally , bonded labor occurs mainly in agricultural areas , where laborers work as general servants or as farmers .
translation.zu: planti i wok leba olsem ol i wok long ol hap i gat ol bikpela gaden - ol i wok gaden o long haus bilong man samting .

translation.en: in some cases , debts are passed on from one generation to the next , ensuring that members of a family remain in permanent bondage .
translation.zu: dinau bilong sampela famili em dinau ol i bin kisim long tumbuna bilong ol , olsem na olgeta long famili i mas wok olsem kalabus - no gat pinis bilong en .

translation.en: in extreme cases , bonded laborers receive no payment at all for the work they do .
translation.zu: wan wan man i kalabus long wok leba em i no kisim pe long wok em i mekim .

translation.en: binti , from west africa , is 12 years old and is one of thousands of girls who serve as trocosi , meaning in the ewe language " slaves of the gods . "
translation.zu: binti bilong wes afrika i gat 12 - pela krismas , na em i wanpela bilong planti tausen pikinini meri i mas wok olsem wanpela trokosi .

translation.en: she has been forced into a life of slavery and redemption for a crime she did not commit - the rape that led to her own birth !
translation.zu: ol i bin subim binti long mekim wok kalabus na dispela i olsem pe bilong baim wanpela pasin nogut em i no bin mekim - man i bin reipim mama na binti i bin kamap long dispela rot !

translation.en: presently her responsibilities are limited to household chores for a local fetish priest .
translation.zu: long nau em i mekim ol wok long haus bilong wanpela pris bilong lotu bilong ol tumbuna .

translation.en: later binti 's duties will broaden to include providing sexual services to the priest , who is her owner .
translation.zu: bihain binti bai kisim sampela wok moa , olsem em i mas slip wantaim dispela pris , em bos bilong em .

translation.en: then by middle age binti will be replaced - the priest will find other appealing girls to serve him as trocosi .
translation.zu: orait , taim binti i gat 50 krismas samting , narapela meri bai kisim ples bilong em . dispela pris bai painim ol narapela yangpela meri bilong mekim wok bilong em olsem trokosi .

translation.en: like binti , thousands who are victims of ritual slavery are offered by their families to work as virtual slaves in an effort to atone for an act interpreted as a sin or an offense against holy decree .
translation.zu: olsem binti , planti tausen em ol i wok kalabus long pasin bilong lotu , ol i stap olsem , long wanem , famili bilong ol i bin givim ol bilong mekim wok olsem kalabus , na dispela i olsem pe bilong karamapim wanpela sin o pasin ol i bin mekim na i no stret long lo holi .

translation.en: in several parts of the world , girls or women are obliged to perform religious duties and to provide sexual services to priests or others - on the pretext that such women are married to a deity .
translation.zu: long sampela kantri , ol meri o ol pikinini meri i mas mekim ol wok bilong lotu na mekim maritpasin wantaim ol pris o ol narapela - em ol i giaman na tok olsem ol dispela meri i marit long wanpela god .

translation.en: in many cases the women perform other unpaid services .
translation.zu: planti meri i mas mekim ol narapela wok tu i no gat pe .

translation.en: they are not free to change their place of residence or work and often remain in servitude for many years .
translation.zu: ol meri i no stap fri long senisim ples ol i sindaun long en o wok ol i mekim , na planti i mas wok olsem kalabus inap planti yia .

translation.en: although most countries claim to have legally abolished slavery , in some areas there has been a recent resurgence of traditional chattel slavery .
translation.zu: tru planti kantri i tok ol i pinisim dispela pasin bilong salim ol man long mani olsem wokboi nating , tasol long sampela hap long nau ol i kirap gen long mekim dispela samting .

translation.en: " in the areas of conflict the rule of law has effectively been suspended , " reports anti - slavery international , " and soldiers or armed militia are able to force people to work for them unpaid . . . without fear of retribution ; such practices have been reported chiefly in areas controlled by armed groups which have not achieved international recognition . "
translation.zu: lain anti - slavery international i tok : ' long ol hap i gat pait ol i no bihainim stret ol samting bilong lo , na ol soldia o ol paitman olsem soldia ol inap subim ol manmeri long mekim wok bilong ol na ol i no kisim pe , na ol soldia i save ol i no ken kisim strafe long dispela samting ol i mekim .

translation.en: however , according to the same organization , " there have also been recent reports of government soldiers forcing civilians to work as slaves , outside any legal framework .
translation.zu: kain pasin olsem i kamap long planti hap ol lain i holim ol samting bilong pait ol i bosim - em ol lain ol gavman bilong olgeta hap i no orait long ol . '

translation.en: soldiers and militias have also been reported to engage in the slave trade , selling those they have captured to work for others . "
translation.zu: na tu , ol ripot i tok , ol soldia na ol paitman olsem soldia , ol i insait long wok bilong salim ol man long mani bilong i go wok kalabus .

translation.en: sadly , the curse of slavery still haunts humanity in many forms and disguises .
translation.zu: ol man ol soldia i bin holim , ol i salim ol long mani bilong mekim wok bilong ol narapela . '

translation.en: stop and think again of the numbers involved - the millions of people suffering as slaves around the globe .
translation.zu: tingim gen namba bilong dispela lain - planti milion manmeri long olgeta hap ol i wok kalabus na ol i karim hevi na pen long dispela .

translation.en: then think of one or two of the modern slaves whose stories you read in these pages - perhaps lin - lin or binti .
translation.zu: na tingim wanpela o tupela i wok kalabus long nau - ating lin - lin o binti - na yu bin kaunim stori bilong ol long dispela nius . olsem wanem ?

translation.en: do you want to see the crime of modern slavery stopped ?
translation.zu: yu laik bai dispela wok nogut bilong nau long salim ol man olsem wokboi nating i pinis ?

translation.en: will the abolition of slavery ever become a reality ?
translation.zu: yu ting dispela wok nogut bai pinis tru tru ?

translation.en: before this can occur , radical changes have to take place .
translation.zu: pastaim long dispela samting i ken kamap , ol bikpela senis i mas kamap .

translation.en: various official agencies , such as the united nations children 's fund and the international labor organization , are diligently instituting and implementing strategies for the elimination of modern slavery .
translation.zu: kain kain lain bilong gavman , olsem united nations children 's fund na international labor organization , ol i wok strong long kamapim na mekim sampela samting bilong pinisim dispela pasin bilong nau long wok kalabus .

translation.en: in addition , a host of nongovernmental organizations , such as anti - slavery international and human rights watch , have put forth an effort to increase public awareness of modern slavery and to emancipate its victims .
translation.zu: na tu , planti oganaisesen em ol i no bilong gavman , olsem anti - slavery international na human rights watch , ol i bin wok long helpim ol manmeri long save moa long dispela samting na long helpim ol lain i wok kalabus long kamap fri .

translation.en: so that people engaging in sex with children can be prosecuted upon their return to their home country , other agencies are calling for legislation in countries where " sex tours " originate .
translation.zu: ol narapela lain i tokaut olsem ol i mas kamapim wanpela lo long ol kantri em raun bilong ol turis bilong pamuk i kirap long en , olsem na ol turis i mekim pasin pamuk wantaim ol pikinini , ol bai kot taim ol i kam bek long ples .

translation.en: some human rights activists have gone so far as to pay slave traders and masters large sums of money in order to redeem as many slaves as they can .
translation.zu: sampela man i save wok long helpim ol manmeri , ol i bin givim bikpela mani long ol man i wok bisnis long ol wokboi nating na long bos bilong ol inap long ol i ken baim planti wokboi nating na larim ol i go fri .

translation.en: modern slavery - its end is near !

translation.en: you cannot touch one without at the same time jeopardizing the other . " - victor schoelcher , french journalist and politician , 1848 .
translation.zu: yu no inap tekewe dispela samting long wanpela man sapos yu no laik tekewe dispela samting long ol narapela . ' - victor schoelcher , wanpela niusman na man bilong politik bilong frans , 1848 .

translation.en: " what is this dark side of man that has always led him to despise , subjugate and debase his fellows ? " ask the editors of the unesco courier .
translation.zu: ol edita bilong nius the unesco courier i tok : ' wanem dispela pasin nogut bilong man na long olgeta taim em i nolaik tru long ol narapela , na em i bosim ol na daunim tru ol ?

translation.en: the answer is complex .
translation.zu: bekim i gat planti samting bilong en .

translation.en: and in the case of males who visit bangkok or manila to find young aids - free boys or girls , the motive is outright sexual perversion and immorality .
translation.zu: na ol man i raun long bankok o manila bilong painim ol manki o pikinini meri i no gat sik aids , as bilong dispela em laik nogut bilong ol long mekim pasin sem na pasin pamuk .

translation.en: all of this is part of a world where people are " lovers of themselves , lovers of money , . . . having no natural affection , . . . without self - control , fierce , " in the words of the apostle paul , a first - century student of law .
translation.zu: ol dispela samting i insait long pasin bilong dispela graun em aposel pol i tok , " ol man bai i laikim ol yet tasol , na ol bai i laikim tumas long kisim mani , . . . ol bai i no save long pasin bilong i stap pren bilong ol arapela , . . . ol bai i no bosim laik bilong bodi bilong ol , na ol bai i pait na bagarapim ol man nabaut . "

translation.en: it is part of a world where " that which is made crooked cannot be made straight , and that which is wanting cannot possibly be counted , " to use the words of an ancient statesman named solomon . - ecclesiastes 1 : 15 .
translation.zu: na king solomon bilong bipo em i tok long dispela graun olsem : " ol samting i krungut pinis , em yumi no inap stretim . ol samting i no i stap , em yumi no inap kaunim . " - saveman 1 : 15 .

translation.en: a change of mind
translation.zu: tingting i mas senis

translation.en: does this mean that nothing can or will be done to put a permanent end to slavery - either in its traditional manifestations or in its more recent forms ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ? dispela i makim olsem i no gat wanpela samting ol inap mekim o bai ol i mekim bilong pinisim tru wok kalabus , maski ol i mekim long pasin bilong bipo o long pasin bilong nau ?

translation.en: not at all !
translation.zu: nogat tru !

translation.en: the un office of the high commissioner for human rights ( ohchr ) states that slavery is " a state of mind , " adding : " even when abolished , slavery leaves traces .
translation.zu: lain ohchr bilong yunaitet nesen ( office of the high commissioner for human rights ) i tok , wok kalabus em i ' wanpela samting bilong tingting . maski wok kalabus i pinis , ol samting bilong en i no tekewe olgeta .

translation.en: so one way to abolish slavery would be to effect a change of thinking - a change of heart - on a worldwide scale .
translation.zu: wanpela rot bilong pinisim wok kalabus em long helpim olgeta man long senisim tingting na bel bilong ol .

translation.en: and that involves a change of education - teaching people to love one another and respect one another 's dignity .
translation.zu: olsem na ol i mas skulim ol man long laikim tru ol narapela na long tingim gut ol narapela .

translation.en: it means helping people to root greed out of their hearts and abide by high moral standards .
translation.zu: na tu , ol i mas helpim ol man long bihainim ol stretpela pasin na long rausim pasin bilong mangal long bel bilong ol .

translation.en: who can provide such education ?
translation.zu: husat inap lainim ol man long mekim olsem ?

translation.en: consider an educational program that has been carried out worldwide by the christian community of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: tingim wanpela skul ol witnes bilong jehova i mekim long olgeta hap bilong lainim ol man .

translation.en: through it , millions of people in more than 230 lands have been taught to treat all their fellowmen with dignity .
translation.zu: long rot bilong dispela skul , planti milion manmeri long 230 kantri , ol i bin lain long mekim gut long olgeta man .

translation.en: because it is based on the bible , a book inspired by the creator of man .
translation.zu: long wanem , as bilong skul em baibel , em wanpela buk man bilong wokim yumi em i bin kamapim .

translation.zu: wanpela liklik meri , nem bilong em danielle i raitim wanpela pas na tok olsem : " mi laikim tru dispela video , na mi laik bihainim wankain pasin olsem noa .

translation.en: of course , bible videos take time to make .
translation.zu: tasol bilong wokim ol video mipela mas lusim bikpela hap taim .

translation.en: why is that ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem i olsem ?

translation.en: how was the noah video made ?
translation.zu: ol i wokim dispela video bilong noa olsem wanem ?

translation.en: long before any sequence was filmed or any pictures painted , a scriptwriter drafted a story line based on the bible account .
translation.zu: paslain long mekim wok long kamera o wokim ol piksa , wanpela man i bin raitim stori bilong dispela video i stret wantaim tok bilong baibel .

translation.en: this would eventually become a storyboard and then a script .
translation.zu: dispela bai kamap wanpela storibot pastaim na bihain ol bai raitim stori olgeta .

translation.en: a storyboard is a series of small , rough drawings that help artists establish the sequence and design of a story .
translation.zu: storibot em sampela liklik piksa ol i putim bilong helpim ol man bilong wokim ol piksa long stretim gut wanem samting i kamap paslain long dispela stori na wanem samting i kamap bihain .

translation.en: what would be the next step in the production ?
translation.zu: bihain long dispela ol bai mekim wanem bilong wokim dispela video ?

translation.en: a cast was chosen to represent noah and his family .
translation.zu: ol i makim sampela lain bilong stap olsem noa na famili bilong em .

translation.en: their costumes were designed , and the color schemes for each scene were decided upon .
translation.zu: ol i wokim klos bilong ol na makim ol kala ol bai mekim wok long en long ol narapela narapela hap bilong video .

translation.en: all of this was necessary because the artists could not draw and paint noah and his wife and sons and daughters - in - law until they knew what the actors looked like in their costumes .
translation.zu: ol i mas mekim olsem bilong helpim ol man bilong wokim ol piksa na bai ol i ken save noa na meri bilong em na ol pikinini man wantaim ol meri bilong ol i luk olsem wanem taim ol i putim ol klos .

translation.en: the paintings had to be consistent with the real - life scenes .
translation.zu: ol piksa ol i wokim i mas stret wantaim ol hap bilong video ol bai kamapim olsem pilai .

translation.en: but where would these scenes be filmed ?
translation.zu: ol bai mekim ol dispela wok long wanem hap ?

translation.en: a film crew went from the audio / video services department of the watchtower educational center at patterson , new york , to do the filming , which also involved danish personnel . the story is told through narration .
translation.zu: sampela lain i save mekim wok long kamera ( audio / video services department ) i lusim wastaua edukesen senta long patesen , nu yok , na ol i go wok wantaim sampela lain bilong denmak bilong kisim ol piksa bilong dispela video .

translation.en: this has made it much easier to produce the program in other languages because it eliminates the difficult step of dubbing , that is , inserting a synchronized translation of dialogue .
translation.zu: ol lain i insait long video i no save toktok , wanpela man i stori long ol samting i kamap , long dispela rot i isi long tanim ol tok bilong dispela video i go long ol narapela narapela tok ples .

translation.en: but how was the difficult artwork prepared ?
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem ol i wokim ol piksa bilong video ?

translation.en: art and a special camera
translation.zu: ol piksa na narapela kain kamera

translation.en: artists prepared hundreds of watercolor paintings based on the storyboard that the creative team had prepared .
translation.zu: ol man bilong wokim piksa ol i wokim sampela handet piksa i stret wantaim ol piksa ol narapela i bin putim long storibot .

translation.en: these were not necessarily square or rectangular paintings .
translation.zu: i no olsem ol piksa i skwe tasol . nogat .

translation.en: sometimes they were curved or oval - shaped , depending on the camera angle that was going to be used .
translation.zu: sampela taim ol i raunpela na ol i wokim ol piksa bilong kamera i ken kisim gut .

translation.en: in order to give a three - dimensional effect , the artwork was set up in three layers - foreground , middle distance , and background .
translation.zu: bilong ol piksa i ken luk olsem ol samting tru , ol i putim sampela piksa klostu , na sampela longwe liklik , na sampela long baksait .

translation.en: in this way views could be shot through trees , through the legs of an elephant , or through whatever else was needed to give the effect of depth .
translation.zu: long dispela rot kamera inap kisim piksa bilong ol samting i stap baksait long diwai o leg bilong elefan o ol narapela samting bambai ol piksa i no luk olsem piksa ol i droim long pepa tasol .

translation.en: the camera was controlled by a computer and could pan over a scene or zoom in to create a special effect .
translation.zu: wanpela kompiuta i bosim dispela kamera na em inap i go i kam o pulim ol piksa i kam klostu .

translation.en: this can give the impression that the scene is moving when , in fact , it is only the camera that is doing so .
translation.zu: dispela i mekim na i luk olsem ol piksa i wok long i go i kam , tasol nogat , kamera tasol i mekim dispela wok .

translation.en: since the watch tower society does not have the skills or the resources to do genuine animation , the mixed - media approach of using enacted sequences along with paintings serves as a viable compromise .
translation.zu: sosaiti was taua i no gat ol samting bilong wokim wanpela video olsem ol lain i save wokim ol katun samting , olsem na sampela hap bilong video ol i wokim olsem pilai na long sampela narapela hap ol i mekim wok long ol piksa .

translation.en: children in the 3 - to 12 - year - old age - group , for whom the video was designed , have enjoyed this method .
translation.zu: mipela wokim dispela video bilong ol pikinini i gat 3 - pela i go inap 12 - pela krismas na ol i laikim dispela kain video .

translation.en: and the video clearly points out many lessons that can be learned from noah 's example .
translation.zu: na dispela video i kamapim planti samting yumi ken lainim long pasin bilong noa .

translation.en: furthermore , the quiz on the video sleeve helps parents review the main points of the story with their children .
translation.zu: na tu , long karamap bilong dispela video i gat ol askim bilong helpim ol papamama long skelim gen ol bikpela tok bilong dispela stori wantaim ol pikinini bilong ol .

translation.en: other special effects , such as the increasing downpour at the time of the flood , were achieved by computer technology .
translation.zu: ol i mekim wok long kompiuta bilong kamapim sampela narapela samting long video olsem ren i pundaun na bihain i go bikpela moa .

translation.en: it is easy to see that much time and creative effort went into the production of the noah video .
translation.zu: i no hatwok long save olsem ol i lusim bikpela hap taim na wokim gut tingting bilong kamapim dispela video bilong noa .

translation.en: since bible accounts do not change , the video noah - he walked with god will always be current and can help teach each new generation of youngsters .
translation.zu: ol stori bilong baibel i no save senis , olsem na dispela video noah - he walked with god bai i stret inap long olgeta taim . na ol narapela yangpela i kamap long bihain bai inap kisim skul long en .

translation.en: one person wrote : " i am 50 years old and raised my children long ago .
translation.zu: wanpela i bin tok : " mi gat 50 krismas na ol pikinini bilong mi i bikpela pinis .

translation.en: but i think it would be an invaluable tool today for parents with young children to have a video library of bible stories . "
translation.zu: tasol mi ting , ol papamama i gat ol liklik pikinini bai ol i gat gutpela tul tru sapos ol i gat planti video bilong baibel . "

translation.en: it is vital to have a clear understanding of what faith is because , as quoted above , ' without faith it is impossible to please god . '

translation.en: therefore , faith is founded on accurate knowledge , facts on which right decisions can be based .
translation.zu: olsem na stretpela save na ol samting tru em i as bilong bilip , na em inap helpim man long bosim gut wokabaut bilong em .

translation.en: to illustrate : perhaps you have a friend of whom you can say : " i trust that man .
translation.zu: yumi ken tok piksa olsem : ating yu gat wanpela pren na yu inap tokim ol narapela olsem : " mi bilip long em .

translation.en: i can count on him to keep his word .
translation.zu: mi save em bai truim tok bilong em .

translation.en: i know that if i have a problem , he will come to my aid . "
translation.zu: na sapos mi gat wanpela hevi , mi save em bai helpim mi . "

translation.en: it is not likely that you would say that about someone you have known for only a day or two , is it ?
translation.zu: bai yu no inap tok olsem long wanpela man yu bin save long em inap wanpela o tupela de tasol , a ?

translation.en: he would have to be someone who had proved his dependability time and again .
translation.zu: kain tok olsem yu inap mekim tasol long wanpela pren i bin kamapim klia planti taim pinis olsem yu inap bilip long em .

translation.en: faith or credulity ?
translation.zu: bilip tru o bilip nating ?

translation.en: much of what passes for faith today is in reality credulity - a readiness to believe without a valid basis or reason .
translation.zu: long nau , planti man i ting olsem ol i bilip tru long god , tasol nogat ; bilip bilong ol i no gat as bilong en o ol i bilip nating long sampela samting .

translation.en: this is not well - founded faith because it has no reliable basis for belief .
translation.zu: dispela kain bilip i no gat as bilong en , olsem na ol man i no inap bilip tru long en .

translation.en: credulity could cause one to jump to conclusions that may be out of harmony with bible truth .
translation.zu: yumi inap kisim tingting i no stret long tok bilong baibel taim yumi bilip nating long sampela tok .

translation.en: accordingly , the bible warns against unfounded faith : " anyone inexperienced puts faith in every word , but the shrewd one considers his steps . "
translation.zu: olsem na baibel i givim tok lukaut long yumi long pasin bilong bilip long ol samting i no gat as bilong en : " ol man i gat liklik save tasol , ol i save bilipim olgeta kain tok .

translation.en: the apostle paul wrote : " make sure of all things ; hold fast to what is fine . "
translation.zu: ( sindaun 14 : 15 ) aposel pol i tok : " tasol yupela i mas skelim gut olgeta tok na pasin . "

translation.en: paul noted : " faith is not a possession of all people . "
translation.zu: pol i tok : " planti man ol i no bilip long krais . "

translation.en: but bible - based faith is the possession of some people , and it does affect their lives .
translation.zu: tasol baibel em i as bilong bilip bilong sampela manmeri , na dispela i bosim wokabaut bilong ol .

translation.en: faith can be likened to a chain with links of confidence and trust that bind man to god .
translation.zu: na pasin bilong bilip olsem god i helpim yumi i olsem ol wan wan hap bilong dispela sen i save pasim man wantaim god .

translation.en: but this kind of faith is something that is cultivated ; it is not something that we are born with .
translation.zu: tasol yumi mas wok long kisim dispela kain bilip , em i no stap long yumi taim mama i karim yumi .

translation.en: how can you develop true faith ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem yu inap kisim bilip tru ?

translation.en: the bible explains : " faith follows the thing heard .
translation.zu: baibel i tok : " yumi harim tok bilong god na dispela i kirapim bilip .

translation.en: in turn the thing heard is through the word about christ . " - romans 10 : 17 .
translation.zu: na dispela tok yumi harim , em i kamap long maus bilong krais . " - rom 10 : 17 .

translation.en: therefore , you need to take time to get to know god and the teachings of his son , jesus christ .
translation.zu: olsem na yu mas lusim sampela hap taim bilong kisim save long god na ol samting pikinini bilong em , krais jisas , i bin skulim ol man long en .

translation.en: this knowledge is not acquired without effort .
translation.zu: yu no inap kisim nating dispela save .

translation.en: true faith , however , involves more than just possessing knowledge or believing that something is true .
translation.zu: yu no ken ting bikpela save o pasin bilong bilip strong long wanpela samting em i olsem bilip tru . nogat .

translation.en: it also involves the heart - the seat of motivation .
translation.zu: bel i save kirapim man long mekim ol samting .

translation.en: romans 10 : 10 says : " with the heart one exercises faith . "
translation.zu: rom 10 : 10 i tok : " long bel yumi save bilip . "

translation.en: what does this mean ?
translation.zu: wanem insait bilong dispela tok ?

translation.en: as you meditate on godly things , building up appreciation for them , you allow the bible 's message to sink deep into your heart .
translation.zu: taim yu tingim tingim long bel ol samting bilong god , bai yu amamas long ol tok bilong em , na long dispela rot tok bilong baibel bai i go daun long bel bilong yu .

translation.en: faith grows and becomes stronger as you are motivated to act on god 's promises and as you see the evidence of his blessing . - 2 thessalonians 1 : 3 .
translation.zu: bilip bilong yu bai go bikpela na i kamap strong moa taim ol tok promis bilong god i kirapim yu long bihainim ol tok bilong god na taim yu lukim ol blesing em i givim yu . - 2 tesalonaika 1 : 3 .

translation.en: what a precious possession true faith is !
translation.zu: bilip tru i olsem wanpela gutpela samting tru yu holim !

translation.en: we benefit by being able to face difficult conditions with confidence in god , trusting in his ability to guide our steps and in his willingness to care for our needs .
translation.zu: em i save helpim yumi long karim hevi na bilip strong long god , olsem em bai stiaim wokabaut bilong yumi na em i gat laik long lukautim yumi .

translation.en: in addition , god 's son , jesus christ , pointed to one long - term benefit of faith : " god loved the world so much that he gave his only - begotten son , in order that everyone exercising faith in him might not be destroyed but have everlasting life . "
translation.zu: na tu , pikinini bilong god , krais jisas , em i tokaut long olsem wanem bilip i ken helpim yumi long bihain : " god i gat wanpela pikinini tasol i stap . tasol god i laikim tumas olgeta manmeri bilong graun , olsem na em i givim dispela wanpela pikinini long ol .

translation.en: everlasting life - what a marvelous gift to those having faith !
translation.zu: laip oltaim - em gutpela presen tru god i givim long ol man i save bilip !

translation.en: hebrews 11 : 6 says that true faith involves belief in god 's ability to reward " those earnestly seeking him . "
translation.zu: hibru 11 : 6 i tok , pasin bilong bilip tru i olsem man i mas bilip olsem god inap mekim gut tru long ol " man i wok long painim em . "

translation.en: clearly , then , true faith is not credulity , and it is much more than just believing that god exists .
translation.zu: olsem na pasin bilong bilip tru i no olsem pasin bilong bilip nating , na i winim tru pasin bilong bilip tasol olsem god i stap .

translation.en: it involves an acceptance of god 's ability to act as a rewarder of those earnestly seeking him .
translation.zu: man i bilip tru em i bilip olsem god inap mekim gut long ol lain i wok long painim em .

translation.en: do you really and sincerely want to know god ?
translation.zu: yu gat laik tru long save long god ?

translation.en: if you do , then acquire accurate knowledge from his word , the bible , and your faith will be rewarded . - colossians 1 : 9 , 10 .
translation.zu: sapos olsem , kisim stretpela save long tok bilong em i stap long baibel , na bai yu kisim gutpela samting long rot long bilip bilong yu . - kolosi 1 : 9 , 10 .

translation.en: bill was a kind man , an intelligent man , a strong man .
translation.zu: bill em i wanpela strongpela man i gat gutpela pasin na gutpela save .

translation.en: he loved his family .
translation.zu: em i laikim tru famili bilong em .

translation.en: at an early age , though , he began to smoke cigarettes .
translation.zu: tasol taim em i yangpela yet , em i bin kirap long smok .

translation.en: even as he puffed on a cigarette , he earnestly warned his sons against smoking , saying how stupid it was .
translation.zu: na taim em i smok i stap , em i tokim ol pikinini man bilong em long ol i no ken smok , em i tok dispela em i longlong pasin tru .

translation.en: there were times when he would crush a pack of cigarettes in his powerful hands and fling it across the room , vowing that he had smoked his last .
translation.zu: sampela taim em i brukim karamap bilong smok long strongpela han bilong em na tromoi i go long hapsait bilong rum , na em i tok promis olsem em i kisim pinis laspela smok bilong em .

translation.en: soon , though , he would be drawn back to smoking - first secretly , then openly .
translation.zu: tasol bihain liklik , em i kirap smok gen - pastaim long pasin hait , bihain long ples klia .

translation.en: if he had not been a smoker , he would possibly be alive today .
translation.zu: sapos em i no bin smok , ating em i stap laip yet long nau .

translation.en: his wife would still have a husband ; his sons would still have a father .
translation.zu: meri bilong em bai i gat yet poroman marit , na ol pikinini man bilong em bai i gat yet papa bilong ol .

translation.en: bill 's death , tragic though it was for his family , is not unique .
translation.zu: i dai bilong bill i bagarapim tru bel bilong famili bilong em , tasol dispela samting i no painim bill tasol .

translation.en: according to the world health organization ( who ) , tobacco - related diseases kill about four million people each year , or one person every eight seconds .
translation.zu: nogat . lain wol helt oganaisesen ( who ) i tok , ol sik em smok i as bilong en i save kilim i dai inap 4 milion manmeri long olgeta yia , o wanpela man long olgeta 8 - pela 8 - pela sekon .

translation.en: tobacco use is the major preventable cause of disease worldwide .
translation.zu: long olgeta hap , smok em i nambawan as bilong ol sik em man inap abrusim .

translation.en: worldwide , at least 1.1 billion people are smokers , states who .
translation.zu: lain who i tok , long olgeta hap inap olsem 1.1 bilion manmeri i save smok .

translation.en: that means roughly one third of the world 's adults .
translation.zu: em olsem wanpela bilong olgeta 3 - pela 3 - pela man i bikpela pinis .

translation.en: analysts estimate that while tobacco companies now pay hundreds of millions of dollars because of lawsuits brought against them , this amount is small compared with their multibillion - dollar profits .
translation.zu: ol saveman i tok , ol kampani bilong wokim smok ol i save tromoi planti handet milion dola bilong baim kot taim ol man i putim ol long kot , tasol dispela mani i liklik samting sapos yumi skelim wantaim planti bilion dola winmani ol i save kisim .

translation.en: in the united states alone , an estimated 1.5 billion cigarettes roll off production lines in tobacco factories each day .
translation.zu: long yunaitet stets , long olgeta wan wan de ol i save wokim inap 1.5 bilion smok long ol faktori .

translation.en: why do so many people persist in a habit that is deadly ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem planti man i save mekim yet dispela pasin em inap kilim ol i dai ?

translation.en: if you are a smoker , how can you quit ?
translation.zu: sapos yu save smok , olsem wanem yu inap lusim smok ?

translation.en: these questions will be answered in the following articles .
translation.zu: stori i kamap bihain long dispela bai bekim ol dispela askim .

translation.en: smoking is not for those who want to live a long and happy life .
translation.zu: smok i no samting bilong ol man i gat laik long i stap amamas na longpela taim .

translation.en: the probability that a long - term smoker will eventually be killed by tobacco is 1 in 2 .
translation.zu: long olgeta 2 - pela 2 - pela man i save smok inap longpela taim , wanpela inap i dai long dispela as .

translation.en: the director - general of the world health organization ( who ) stated : " a cigarette is . . . a cleverly crafted product that delivers just the right amount of nicotine to keep its user addicted for life before killing the person . "
translation.zu: dairekta - jeneral bilong wol helt oganaisesen ( who ) em i tok : ' smok em i wanpela samting ol man i bin wokim , na i save givim marasin nikotin long mak stret bilong mekim man i save smok i kalabus long en i go inap long taim smok i kilim em i dai . '

translation.en: one reason , then , to quit smoking is that smoking tobacco endangers health and life .
translation.zu: olsem na wanpela as bilong lusim smok i olsem : smok inap bagarapim skin na kilim man i dai .

translation.en: smoking has been linked to more than 25 life - threatening diseases .
translation.zu: smok inap kamapim 25 narapela narapela sik em man inap dai long en .

translation.en: it is , for example , a major contributor to heart attack , stroke , chronic bronchitis , emphysema , and various cancers , especially lung cancer .
translation.zu: olsem : smok em i wanpela bikpela samting bilong kamapim hat - atek , sik strok , strongpela kus , bikpela sik bilong wetlewa , kain kain kensa , na planti ol i kisim kensa bilong wetlewa .

translation.en: of course , a person may smoke for years before being stricken with one of these diseases .
translation.zu: tru , ating man i ken smok inap planti yia na bihain tasol wanpela bilong ol dispela sik i kisim em .

translation.en: meanwhile , smoking does not make a person more appealing to others .
translation.zu: tasol pasin bilong smok i no kirapim ol narapela long laikim man i smok .

translation.en: smoking makes the breath stink and stains teeth and fingers a yellowish - brown .
translation.zu: pasin bilong smok i mekim na maus i gat smel nogut long en , na ol tit na pinga i kamap yelopela .

translation.en: it causes smoker 's cough and shortness of breath .
translation.zu: ol man i save smok ol i kisim kus na sik sotwin .

translation.en: smokers are also more likely to experience premature facial wrinkling and other skin problems .
translation.zu: na tu , skin bilong pes bilong ol inap slek hariap o sampela narapela sik bilong skin inap kamap .

translation.en: the bible says : " you must love your neighbor as yourself . "
translation.zu: baibel i tok : " yu mas laikim ol wantok olsem yu laikim yu yet . "

translation.en: love for your neighbors - and your family members are your closest neighbors - is a powerful reason to quit .
translation.zu: pasin bilong laikim famili bilong yu em i wanpela strongpela as bilong lusim smok .

translation.en: until recent times a smoker could light up just about anywhere and expect no objection .
translation.zu: i kam inap long nau , ol man inap smok long klostu olgeta hap na i no gat man i gat tok long dispela .

translation.en: for example , a nonsmoker who is married to a smoker has a 30 - percent greater risk of developing lung cancer than if he or she were married to a nonsmoker .
translation.zu: olsem : planti man na meri i no save smok em ol i marit long poroman i save smok , ol i save kisim sik kensa long wetlewa , winim ol man o meri em poroman bilong ol i no save smok inap 30 pesen .

translation.en: children who live with parents who smoke are more likely to develop pneumonia or bronchitis in the first two years of life than are children who live in homes where no one smokes .
translation.zu: planti pikinini i sindaun wantaim papamama i save smok , ol inap kisim sik numonia o strongpela kus taim ol i bebi yet i go inap long ol i gat 2 - pela krismas , winim ol pikinini i stap long haus i no gat wanpela man i save smok .

translation.en: nicotine , carbon monoxide , and other dangerous chemicals contained in cigarette smoke enter the mother 's bloodstream and pass directly to the child in the womb .
translation.zu: nikotin , kabon - monoksait , na ol narapela marasin nogut i stap long smok bilong tabak i go insait long blut bilong mama na i go stret long pikinini i stap insait long bel .

translation.en: the cost is high
translation.zu: ol i mas tromoi bikpela mani

translation.en: a study by the world bank estimated that the health - care costs caused directly by smoking amount to about $ 200 billion each year .
translation.zu: lain wol beng i kisim save olsem long olgeta yia ol i tromoi 200 bilion dola bilong lukautim ol man i gat sik em smok i as bilong en .

translation.en: that figure , of course , does nothing to convey the cost in suffering and pain to those who contract diseases caused by tobacco .
translation.zu: na ol i no tromoi bikpela mani tasol , nogat ; ol sik em smok i as bilong en i save givim bikpela pen na hevi long ol man .

translation.en: the direct cost of cigarettes to the individual smoker is easy to calculate .
translation.zu: i no hatwok long save hamas mani wanpela man bilong smok i save tromoi bilong baim smok .

translation.en: if you smoke , multiply the amount of money you spend on cigarettes in one day by 365 .
translation.zu: sapos yu save smok , tingim hamas mani yu save lusim bilong baim smok bilong wanpela de na wokim dispela namba taims 365 .

translation.en: that will show you how much money you spend in a year .
translation.zu: dispela namba bai soim yu hamas mani yu tromoi long olgeta yia bilong baim smok .

translation.en: multiply that figure by ten , and you will see how much cigarettes will cost you if you smoke for another ten years .
translation.zu: nau kaunim dispela namba taims 10 , na bai yu save hamas mani yu mas tromoi sapos yu smok inap 10 - pela yia moa .

translation.en: think about what else you could do with that much money .
translation.zu: tingim ol narapela samting yu inap mekim long dispela kain bikpela mani .

translation.en: the tobacco industry advertises low tar and nicotine cigarettes - promoted as light or mild cigarettes - as a way to reduce the health risks of smoking .
translation.zu: ol kampani bilong wokim smok i kamapim toksave bilong ol smok i no gat planti kolta na nikotin long en , na ol i tok ol dispela smok i no gat planti marasin nogut long en na ol i no bagarapim tumas skin .

translation.en: even for those who do not make changes to compensate , the health benefits are small compared with the advantages of quitting completely .
translation.zu: tasol maski sampela ol i no mekim ol dispela samting bilong kisim planti nikotin , dispela kain smok em i no inap helpim tumas skin bilong ol ; pasin bilong lusim smok olgeta inap helpim skin .

translation.en: though the tobacco industry has long promoted pipes and cigars as status symbols , the smoke they deliver is just as deadly as that from cigarettes .
translation.zu: maski inap longpela taim ol kampani bilong wokim smok i bin tok olsem paip bilong smok na siga em i bilong ol man i gat namba , tasol smok bilong ol inap kilim i dai man wankain olsem smok bilong sigaret .

translation.en: even if smokers don 't inhale cigar or pipe smoke , they have an increased risk of developing lip , mouth , and tongue cancers .
translation.zu: maski ol man bilong smok i no pulim smok bilong siga o paip i go insait long wetlewa , planti bilong ol inap kisim kensa insait o ausait bilong maus , o long tang . olsem wanem ?

translation.en: this comes in two different forms : snuff and chewing tobacco .
translation.zu: i gat tupela kain tabak i no bilong smok .

translation.en: snuff is a powdered tobacco , usually sold in cans or pouches .
translation.zu: wanpela ol i kolim snaf na narapela em tabak bilong kaikai .

translation.en: as the name suggests , it is chewed , not sucked .
translation.zu: ol i salim tabak bilong kaikai long ol longpela rop , insait long liklik paus .

translation.en: snuff and chewing tobacco both cause bad breath , stained teeth , cancer of the mouth and pharynx , addiction to nicotine , white sores in the mouth that can lead to cancer , peeling back of the gums , and bone loss around the teeth .
translation.zu: man i kaikai dispela tabak , em i no pulim wara bilong en . snaf na tabak bilong kaikai i mekim na maus i smel , tit i kamap doti , man inap kisim kensa long maus o long nek , em i kalabus long nikotin , ol waitpela sua i kamap insait long maus na kensa inap kamap long ol dispela sua , na skin na bun klostu long ol tit inap bagarap .

translation.en: clearly , sucking or chewing tobacco is not a wise alternative to smoking it .
translation.zu: tru tumas , snaf o tabak bilong kaikai i no gutpela senis bilong smok .

translation.en: suppose you are a long - term smoker . what happens when you quit ?
translation.zu: sapos yu bin smok inap longpela taim , wanem samting bai kamap taim yu lusim smok ?

translation.en: within 20 minutes of your last cigarette , your blood pressure will drop to normal .
translation.zu: insait long 20 minit bihain long yu kisim laspela smok , mak bilong blut bilong yu bai go daun long mak stret bilong en .

translation.en: after a week your body will be free of nicotine .
translation.zu: bihain long wanpela wik , skin bilong yu i no gat nikotin long en .

translation.en: after one month your coughing , sinus congestion , fatigue , and shortness of breath will begin to decrease .
translation.zu: bihain long wanpela mun , kus , na skin i les , na sotwin bai pinis liklik .

translation.en: after 15 years your risk of coronary heart disease will fall to that of a person who has never smoked at all .
translation.zu: bihain long 15 yia , klok bilong yu i kamap strong moa wankain olsem bilong ol man i no bin smok , olsem na ating bai yu no kisim bikpela sik bilong klok .

translation.en: your food will taste better .
translation.zu: kaikai bai swit moa long maus bilong yu .

translation.en: your breath , body , and clothing will smell better .
translation.zu: maus , na skin , na ol klos bilong yu bai i gat gutpela smel .

translation.en: you will no longer have the trouble or the expense of buying tobacco .
translation.zu: yu no gat wok moa long baim smok o long tromoi mani bilong baim smok .

translation.en: you will have a feeling of accomplishment .
translation.zu: bai yu pilim olsem yu bin winim gutpela mak .

translation.en: if you have children , your example will reduce the likelihood that they will be smokers .
translation.zu: sapos yu gat pikinini , gutpela pasin bilong yu inap mekim na ating pikinini bilong yu bai i no smok .

translation.en: you will likely live longer .
translation.zu: ating bai yu stap longpela taim moa .

translation.en: further , you will be acting in harmony with god 's will , since the bible says : " let us cleanse ourselves of every defilement of [ the ] flesh . "
translation.zu: na tu , pasin bilong yu i stret wantaim laik bilong god , long wanem , baibel i tok : " yumi mas rausim olgeta pasin doti bilong bodi . "

translation.en: don 't feel that it is too late for you to quit ; the sooner you quit , the better .
translation.zu: yu no ken ting yu bin smok longpela taim pinis , olsem na maski long lusim smok .

translation.en: why quitting is so hard
translation.zu: lusim hariap , dispela bai helpim yu .

translation.en: mainly , this is because the nicotine in tobacco is a highly addictive drug .
translation.zu: wanpela bikpela as bilong dispela i olsem : nikotin i stap long smok em i wanpela drak i kalabusim strong man .

translation.en: " in a ranking of the addictiveness of psycho - active drugs , nicotine was determined to be more addictive than heroin [ and ] cocaine , " states who .
translation.zu: lain who i tok : " ol i skelim ol drak i save paulim tingting na pasin bilong man na ol i tok , nikotin i save kalabusim tru man , winim drak heroin [ na ] koken . "

translation.en: unlike heroin and cocaine , nicotine does not produce dramatic evidence of intoxication , so it is easy to underestimate its power .
translation.zu: tasol nikotin i no mekim na man i spak olsem heroin na koken i save mekim , olsem na planti man i ting nikotin i no gat bikpela strong .

translation.en: nicotine really does alter your mood ; it does soothe anxiety .
translation.zu: tru , nikotin i save helpim man long kisim amamas na long stap bel isi .

translation.en: however , the tension the cigarette reduces is caused in part by the craving for nicotine itself .
translation.zu: tasol as na bel i no stap isi em skin i krai long nikotin , na taim man i kisim smok , bel bai stap isi liklik .

translation.en: ' it 's something to do with your hands . ' ' it fills time , ' some may say .
translation.zu: sampela inap tok , ' smok i givim wok long han bilong mi ' o ' em i samting bilong mekim taim mi no gat narapela wok . '

translation.en: a third factor that makes it difficult to quit is that tobacco is woven into everyday life .
translation.zu: namba tri as na i hatwok long lusim smok i olsem : smok em i wanpela samting long i stap bilong ol man long olgeta de .

translation.en: often they are shown riding a horse , swimming , playing tennis , or engaging in another appealing activity .
translation.zu: planti piksa i makim ol man bilong smok ol i raun long hos , subim wara , pilai tenis , o mekim wanpela narapela gutpela samting .

translation.en: most of us are never far from someone who smokes .
translation.zu: planti bilong yumi i save stap klostu long man i save smok .

translation.en: you can 't escape these influences .
translation.zu: yumi no inap stap longwe long ol dispela samting .

translation.en: sadly , there is no pill that you can take to eliminate the desire to smoke as an aspirin might eliminate a headache .
translation.zu: sori tru , i no gat wanpela marasin yu ken kisim bilong pinisim laik bilong skin long kisim smok , olsem asprin inap pinisim het pen .

translation.en: to succeed in the difficult task of quitting , a person must be motivated .
translation.zu: bilong winim dispela bikpela hatwok long lusim smok , man i mas i gat gutpela laik long mekim olsem .

translation.en: the responsibility for success lies with the person who smokes .
translation.zu: em wok bilong man yet long mekim ol samting bambai em i ken lusim smok .

translation.en: [ box on page 5 ]
translation.zu: [ blok long pes 5 ]

translation.en: a study in the united states showed that 1 in 4 young people who tried cigarettes eventually became addicted .
translation.zu: wanpela lain long yunaitet stets i tok , long olgeta 4 - pela 4 - pela yangpela i traim smok , bihain wanpela bai kalabus long en .

translation.en: this was similar to the addiction rate of those who experimented with cocaine and heroin .
translation.zu: na namba bilong ol yangpela i bin traim koken na heroin na ol i kalabus long en em i wankain .

translation.en: though about 70 percent of adolescent smokers regret having started , few are able to quit .
translation.zu: maski planti man bilong smok ( 70 pesen ) ol i bel hevi long ol i bin kirap smok , wan wan tasol inap lusim smok .

translation.en: [ box on page 5 ]
translation.zu: [ blok long pes 5 ]

translation.en: what is in cigarette smoke ?
translation.zu: wanem samting i stap long smok bilong tabak

translation.en: of these chemicals , 43 are known to cause cancer .
translation.zu: inap 43 bilong ol dispela marasin inap kamapim kensa .

translation.en: its main active ingredient is nicotine , a highly addictive drug .
translation.zu: nambawan bikpela marasin nogut bilong smok em nikotin , em wanpela drak i save kalabusim tru man .

translation.en: [ box on page 6 ]
translation.zu: [ blok long pes 6 ]

translation.en: helping a loved one quit
translation.zu: helpim narapela long lusim smok

translation.en: if you are a nonsmoker who knows the dangers of smoking , you likely feel frustrated when your friends and loved ones continue to smoke .
translation.zu: sapos yu no smok na yu save long ol samting nogut smok i save kamapim , ating yu bel hevi taim ol pren bilong yu o sampela bilong famili ol i wok yet long smok .

translation.en: what can you do to help them quit ?
translation.zu: yu inap mekim wanem bilong helpim ol long lusim smok ?

translation.en: instead of quitting , the smoker may reach for a cigarette to ease the emotional pain these tactics may cause .
translation.zu: nogat . ating em bai kisim smok bilong daunim bel hevi ol dispela kain tok i givim long em .

translation.en: so try to understand how difficult it is to quit and that for some it is much harder than it is for others .
translation.zu: olsem na traim long pilim bikpela hatwok man i mas mekim bilong lusim smok , na sampela ol i hatwok moa long lusim smok , winim ol narapela .

translation.en: you can 't make a person quit smoking .
translation.zu: yu no inap subim narapela long lusim smok .

translation.en: the inner strength and conviction to quit must come from the person who smokes .
translation.zu: man i save smok em yet i mas i gat strongpela tingting long lusim smok .

translation.en: you need to find loving ways to encourage and support a desire to quit .
translation.zu: yu mas painim ol gutpela rot bilong kirapim na helpim laik bilong narapela long lusim smok .

translation.en: how can you do that ?
translation.zu: yu inap mekim dispela olsem wanem ?

translation.en: at the right time , you might express your love for the person and say that you are concerned about his or her smoking habit .
translation.zu: long wanpela gutpela taim , yu inap tokim dispela man i save smok olsem yu laikim em tru na yu tingting planti long pasin bilong em long smok .

translation.en: explain that you will be there to support any decision to quit .
translation.zu: tokim em olsem yu laik helpim em long bihainim olgeta samting em i laik mekim bilong lusim smok .

translation.en: of course , if this approach is used too often , it will lose its effectiveness and meaning .
translation.zu: tasol sapos yu mekim dispela kain tok planti taim tumas , tok i no kirapim narapela long lusim smok na i kamap olsem tok nating .

translation.en: what might you do if your loved one does decide to quit ?
translation.zu: yu ken mekim wanem sapos wanpela bilong famili em i pasim tok long bel long lusim smok ?

translation.en: keep in mind that he or she may have withdrawal symptoms , including irritability and depression .
translation.zu: tingim dispela : ating skin bilong em bai krai long smok , na em inap kros hariap na bel hevi .

translation.en: headaches and difficulty in sleeping might be problems too .
translation.zu: na tu , ating het bilong em i pen na em i hatwok long slip .

translation.en: remind your loved one that these symptoms are only temporary and are signs that the body is adjusting to a new and healthy equilibrium .
translation.zu: tokim em olsem ol dispela pen na hevi i bilong sotpela taim tasol , na i makim olsem skin bilong em i wok long lain long nupela kain pasin i no save bagarapim skin .

translation.en: express how happy you are that he or she is quitting .
translation.zu: tokim em olsem yu amamas tru long em i wok long lusim smok .

translation.en: throughout the withdrawal period , help your loved one avoid stressful situations that could lead to a relapse .
translation.zu: taim skin bilong em i krai yet long smok , helpim em long abrusim ol samting inap putim hevi long em , na inap kirapim em long smok gen .

translation.en: what if there is a relapse ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem sapos em i kirap gen long smok ?

translation.en: view the situation as a learning experience for both of you , making it more likely that the next attempt will be a success .
translation.zu: tingim olsem dispela samting i skulim yutupela wantaim , na ating long narapela taim dispela bai helpim em long lusim smok .

translation.en: [ picture on page 7 ]
translation.zu: [ piksa long pes 7 ]

translation.en: how you can quit
translation.zu: rot bilong lusim smok

translation.en: like learning to ride a bicycle , giving up tobacco is rarely accomplished the first time you try .
translation.zu: olsem na sapos yu tingting strong long lusim smok , yu mas redi long mekim olsem inap planti taim i go inap long taim yu winim pinis dispela mak .

translation.en: so if you are determined to quit , you should be prepared to make repeated attempts until you are successful .
translation.zu: taim yu pundaun na yu smok gen , yu no ken ting dispela i makim olsem yu no inap lusim smok .

translation.en: think of it as a learning experience , a small setback in what can be a successful program .
translation.zu: dispela samting inap skulim yu , na maski yu pundaun yu inap lusim smok .

translation.en: here are some suggestions that have worked for others .
translation.zu: orait nau mipela bai kamapim sampela tok i bin helpim sampela man long lusim smok .

translation.en: they may work well for you too .
translation.zu: ating ol dispela tok inap helpim yu tu .

translation.en: prepare your mind to quit
translation.zu: redim tingting bilong yu long lusim smok

translation.en: ■ first , you must convince yourself that quitting is worth the effort .
translation.zu: ■ pastaim yu mas bilip strong olsem i gat gutpela as long lusim smok .

translation.en: a desire to please god is the greatest motive for quitting .
translation.zu: laik bilong yumi long mekim ol samting god i laikim em i nambawan gutpela as bilong lusim smok .

translation.en: the bible says that we should love god with our whole mind , heart , soul , and strength .
translation.zu: baibel i tok yumi mas laikim tru god long tingting , na bel , na strong olgeta bilong yumi .

translation.en: that is something we cannot do if we are addicted to tobacco . - mark 12 : 30 .
translation.zu: yumi no inap mekim olsem sapos yumi kalabus long smok . - mak 12 : 30 .

translation.en: ■ analyze your smoking habits to figure out when and why you smoke .
translation.zu: ■ skelim pasin bilong yu long smok bambai yu ken save long wanem taim na bilong wanem yu save smok .

translation.en: you may find it helpful to record on paper when and where you smoke each cigarette during a typical day .
translation.zu: ating em bai helpim yu sapos yu raitim long pepa long wanem taim na long wanem kain ples yu save smok .

translation.en: this will help you to foresee situations that may tempt you to smoke after you do quit .
translation.zu: taim yu lusim smok pinis , dispela pepa bai helpim yu long luksave long ol samting inap pulim yu long smok .

translation.en: plan a quit date
translation.zu: makim de bilong lusim smok

translation.en: ■ choose a quit date , and mark it on your calendar .
translation.zu: ■ makim de bilong lusim smok , na raitim dispela de long kalenda bilong yu .

translation.en: it is best to choose a day when you will not be under undue outside stress .
translation.zu: em i gutpela long makim wanpela de i no gat ol narapela samting bilong putim hevi long yu .

translation.en: when that day arrives , quit completely - abruptly and totally .
translation.zu: taim dispela de i kamap , wantu tasol lusim smok olgeta .

translation.en: ■ before the quit date arrives , get rid of ashtrays , matches , and lighters .
translation.zu: ■ paslain long de bilong lusim smok i kamap , rausim ol plet bilong putim pipia bilong smok , na ol masis samting .

translation.en: clean all your clothes that smell of tobacco smoke .
translation.zu: wasim olgeta klos bilong yu i gat smel bilong smok long en .

translation.en: ■ enlist the support of coworkers , friends , and family to encourage you in your efforts to quit .
translation.zu: ■ askim ol wanwok , na pren , na famili long strongim yu long taim yu wok long lusim smok .

translation.en: do not be afraid to ask others not to smoke in your presence .
translation.zu: yu no ken pret long tokim ol narapela long ol i no ken smok klostu long yu .

translation.en: you might go somewhere where smoking is not permitted , such as to a museum or a theater .
translation.zu: ating yu ken i go long wanpela hap ol i tambuim ol man long smok long en , olsem haus tumbuna o haus piksa samting .

translation.en: you could also exercise - swim or take a bicycle ride or a long walk .
translation.zu: yu ken eksasais tu - subim wara o raun long wilwil o wokabaut .

translation.en: if you are a heavy smoker , you will likely experience withdrawal symptoms , which begin within hours of smoking the last cigarette .
translation.zu: sapos yu save smok planti , ating skin bilong yu bai krai long smok . dispela samting bai kirap inap sampela aua bihain long yu kisim laspela smok .

translation.en: perhaps your doctor can prescribe medication that will help ease these symptoms .
translation.zu: ating dokta bilong yu em i ken makim sampela marasin bilong daunim liklik ol dispela hevi .

translation.en: in addition , there are things you can do to help you win the battle .
translation.zu: na tu , i gat ol samting yu inap mekim bilong winim dispela hevi .

translation.en: ■ during the first few difficult weeks , eat low - calorie foods , and drink plenty of water .
translation.zu: ■ insait long sampela wik bihain long yu lusim smok , kisim ol kaikai i no save mekim skin i go bikpela , na dring planti wara .

translation.en: some have found it helpful to snack on raw vegetables , such as carrots or celery .
translation.zu: pasin bilong kisim ol liklik kaikai olsem karot o seleri i bin helpim sampela .

translation.en: if you exercise , you will help offset weight gain and soothe jittery nerves .
translation.zu: sapos yu eksasais , dispela bai helpim yu na skin i no go bikpela na yu inap i stap bel isi .

translation.en: ■ avoid places and situations where you will be tempted to smoke .
translation.zu: ■ abrusim ol ples na ol samting inap pulim yu long smok .

translation.en: ■ fight against bad reasoning that may tempt you to smoke .
translation.zu: ■ wok strong long daunim ol tingting kranki em inap pulim yu long smok .

translation.en: here are some common thoughts during withdrawal : ' i 'll smoke just today to get me through this tough time . '
translation.zu: sampela tingting bilong planti man em skin bilong ol i krai long smok i olsem : ' bai mi smok long nau tasol bambai mi ken winim dispela taim nogut . '

translation.en: ' tobacco can 't be all that bad ; some heavy smokers live to be over 90 . '
translation.zu: ' ating smok i no nogut olgeta , sampela man i save smok planti ol i winim 90 krismas . '

translation.en: ' i 've got to die of something . '
translation.zu: ' mi mas i dai long sampela samting . '

translation.en: ■ if you are about to give in , delay .
translation.zu: ■ sapos klostu yu laik pundaun na kisim smok , wet pastaim .

translation.en: if you feel that way , concentrate on quitting just for today .
translation.zu: sapos yu pilim olsem , tingting long lusim smok long dispela de tasol .

translation.en: ■ if you want to serve god , pray for help .
translation.zu: ■ sapos yu laik lotu long god , beten askim em long helpim yu .

translation.en: our loving creator can provide " help at the right time " for those who are striving to bring their lives into harmony with his will .
translation.zu: gutpela man bilong wokim yumi em inap givim " helpim " long ol man i wok strong long bihainim laik bilong em .

translation.en: but don 't expect a miracle .
translation.zu: tasol yu no ken ting god bai wokim wanpela mirakel .

translation.en: you must act in harmony with your prayers .
translation.zu: yu mas mekim ol samting i stret wantaim beten bilong yu .

translation.en: remain an ex - smoker
translation.zu: stap olsem man i lusim smok pinis

translation.en: ■ the first three months are the most difficult , but even after that you should , when possible , avoid smokers and situations that may tempt you to smoke .
translation.zu: ■ taim yu lusim smok bai yu hatwok tru inap 3 - pela mun , tasol bihain long dispela hap taim yu mas stap longwe yet long ol man i save smok na long ol samting inap pulim yu long smok .

translation.en: ■ don 't fool yourself into thinking that you can be an occasional smoker , even if you have stopped smoking for a year or more .
translation.zu: ■ yu no ken giamanim yu yet na ting yu inap smok long wan wan taim , maski yu no bin smok inap wanpela yia samting .

translation.en: ■ resist the temptation to have " just one cigarette . "
translation.zu: ■ sakim laik bilong skin long kisim " wanpela smok tasol . "

translation.en: just one may easily lead to others , and soon you will have undone all the hard work you put into quitting .
translation.zu: bihain long wanpela smok i no hatwok long yu kisim narapela , na i no longtaim na hatwok bilong yu long lusim smok i lus nating .

translation.en: however , if you do weaken and have a cigarette , there is no reason to smoke another .
translation.zu: tasol sapos yu pundaun na yu kisim wanpela smok , orait i no gat as na yu mas kisim narapela smok .

translation.en: millions of smokers have successfully quit .
translation.zu: planti milion manmeri i bin lusim smok .

translation.en: when love is blind by awake !
translation.zu: taim narapela i no inap lukim narapela

translation.en: imagine searching for a bride if you were very nearsighted and if suitable maidens ventured out only after dark .
translation.zu: tingim olsem yu wok long painim wanpela meri bilong maritim , na yu no inap lukluk gut na ol meri i save lusim haus bilong ol long taim bilong tudak tasol .

translation.en: such is the plight of the male emperor moth .
translation.zu: dispela kain hevi i save painim wanpela kain bataplai ( emperor moth ) bilong nait .

translation.en: but this elegant insect has certain attributes that make this formidable challenge less daunting .
translation.zu: tasol sampela samting bilong dispela naispela bataplai i mekim na wok bilong painim meri i no hatwok tumas .

translation.en: during the summer months , our prospective suitor spends his days as a fat caterpillar gorging on all the food he can find .
translation.zu: long taim bilong san , dispela bataplai man em i stap olsem wanpela katapila i save daunim olgeta kaikai em inap kisim .

translation.en: thus , the following spring , when he emerges from his chrysalis , the resplendent moth has enough food stored to last him his brief lifetime .
translation.zu: olsem na long epril samting taim em i lusim karamap em i save stap long en , kaikai em i bin kisim bai lukautim em i go inap long taim em i dai - em i save stap laip inap tupela mun .

translation.en: with food problems resolved , the emperor moth can concentrate on the task of finding a mate .
translation.zu: em i no gat wok long painim kaikai , olsem na dispela bataplai man i ken tingting tasol long wok bilong painim poroman .

translation.en: nevertheless , if it weren 't for a useful appliance he carries with him , finding a female by the light of the moon would be as difficult as finding a needle in a haystack .
translation.zu: tasol sapos em i no gat wanpela gutpela samting em i save karim raun wantaim em , ating em bai no inap painim bataplai meri long lait bilong mun .

translation.en: sprouting like delicate ferns from the moth 's diminutive head are two antennas .
translation.zu: long liklik het bilong bataplai i gat tupela antena .

translation.en: these tiny fronds may well be the most sophisticated odor - detecting devices on earth .
translation.zu: ating dispela tupela antena ol i nambawan gutpela masin long dispela graun bilong smelim ol samting .

translation.en: furthermore , they are fine - tuned to pick up minute traces of a pheromone , or " perfume , " that the female moth obligingly emits .
translation.zu: na dispela tupela antena inap smelim wanpela kain smel ( pheromone ) em meri bataplai i save kamapim .

translation.en: although females may be few and far between , their potent pheromone acts like an olfactory lighthouse .
translation.zu: maski i no gat planti bataplai meri , dispela smel bilong ol em i samting i toksave long hap ol i stap long en .

translation.en: so sensitive are the male moth 's antennas that they can detect a female nearly seven miles [ 11 km ] away .
translation.zu: antena bilong bataplai man i wok gut tru na ol inap smelim wanpela bataplai meri i stap longwe inap 11 - pela kilomita .

translation.en: thus all obstacles are finally overcome , and boy moth finally meets his girl counterpart .
translation.zu: olsem na em inap winim ol samting i pasim rot bilong em long painim meri , na bataplai man i bungim bataplai meri .

translation.en: love can afford to be blind in the insect world - at least in this case .
translation.zu: maski bataplai man bilong nait em i no inap lukluk gut , em inap painim poroman .

translation.en: god 's creation abounds with such fascinating details and extraordinary design !
translation.zu: ol samting god i bin wokim i gat planti gutpela samting bilong en na i narapela kain !

translation.en: the psalmist wrote : " how many your works are , o jehovah !
translation.zu: man bilong raitim song em i tok : " bikpela , yu bin wokim planti samting .

translation.en: all of them in wisdom you have made . " - psalm 104 : 24 .
translation.zu: ol samting yu bin wokim i pulap tru long dispela graun . " - song 104 : 24 .
