translation.en: ' when i first saw people with lips and other parts of their body pierced , i thought " wow !
translation.zu: ' nambawan taim mi lukim sampela manmeri ol i bin sutim hul long arere bilong maus na ol narapela hap bilong bodi bilong putim ring samting , mi ting " man !

translation.en: that 's special . " ' - lisa .
translation.zu: em i gutpela tru . "

translation.en: lisa is not alone .
translation.zu: ' - lisa .

translation.en: increasing numbers of young people are wearing rings and studs through various body parts , even their eyebrows , tongue , lips , and navel .
translation.zu: i no lisa tasol i pilim olsem . planti yangpela ol i kirap putim ol ring samting long gras antap long ai , na nus , na yau , na tang , na arere bilong maus , na long butoma .

translation.en: a 16 - year - old named heather is eager to jump on the bandwagon .
translation.zu: wanpela meri i gat 16 krismas , nem bilong em heather , em i amamas long bihainim dispela pasin .

translation.en: she is convinced that a ring in her navel will look " absolutely awesome . "
translation.zu: em i ting wanpela ring long butoma bilong em bai luk ' nambawan tru . '

translation.en: and another young girl chose to have her eyebrow pierced because she wanted something " highly visible " that would " freak people out . "
translation.zu: na narapela yangpela meri i bin sutim hul long gras antap long ai , long wanem , em i laik " bai ol man i ken lukim " na ol bai " kirap nogut long en . "

translation.en: the idea of attaching jewelry to the body is hardly new .
translation.zu: pasin bilong pasim bilas long bodi i no nupela samting .

translation.en: it is not known , though , whether such jewelry was attached by means of ear and nose piercing .
translation.zu: ( kisim bek 32 : 2 ) tasol yumi no save ol i bin sutim hul long yau o nus bilong pasim ol dispela ring o nogat .

translation.en: faithful slaves did have their ears pierced , however , as a symbol of their loyalty to their masters .
translation.zu: ol i bin wokim hul long yau bilong ol gutpela wokboi bilong makim olsem ol i stap gut long bosman bilong ol .

translation.en: insertion of decorative objects through the nose is common among melanesians and inhabitants of india and pakistan .
translation.zu: long melanisia na india na pakistan ol manmeri i save putim ol gutpela bilas long hul ol i wokim long nus .

translation.en: until just a few years ago , piercing in the western world was generally limited to women 's earlobes .
translation.zu: inap sampela yia i go pinis , ol meri long hap bilong wes ol i save sutim hul long yau tasol bilong putim yau - ring .

translation.en: but now teenagers and young adults of both sexes are wearing jewelry on just about every part of the body to which it can be attached .
translation.zu: tasol nau ol yangpela man na meri ol i save putim ol ring samting long klostu olgeta hap bilong bodi .

translation.en: why they get pierced
translation.zu: bilong wanem ol i mekim ?

translation.en: many get pierced because they feel that it is fashionable - the in thing to do .
translation.zu: planti ol i mekim , long wanem , ol i ting em i stail stret .

translation.en: others feel that it will enhance their appearance .
translation.zu: sampela i ting em bai helpim skin bilong ol i luk naispela moa .

translation.en: certainly , the fad has been fueled by the use of body jewelry by top models , sports stars , and popular musicians .
translation.zu: ol manmeri i gat nem long pilai spot na mekim musik samting ol i save pasim ol dispela kain bilas na dispela samting i bin kirapim planti yangpela long bihainim dispela pasin .

translation.en: and for some youths , piercing also seems to serve as an expression of independence , a quest for individuality , a way for them to say that they are not like everybody else .
translation.zu: sampela yangpela i mekim dispela samting bilong tokaut olsem ol i laik bosim ol samting bilong ol yet , o ol i laik stap narapela kain , o ol i laik kamapim klia olsem ol i no wankain olsem ol narapela .

translation.en: there are even those who get pierced to meet deep psychological or emotional needs .
translation.zu: sampela i bihainim dispela pasin bilong mekim isi bel na tingting bilong ol .

translation.en: certainly , do - it - yourself piercing is hazardous .
translation.zu: hevi inap painim ol man i save mekim dispela pasin long ol yet .

translation.en: this is no small problem , since making a hole in the wrong place can cause excessive bleeding .
translation.zu: dispela i no liklik samting , long wanem , sapos ol i sutim skin long wanpela hap i no stret bai bikpela blut inap kapsait .

translation.en: unsterile equipment can transmit such lethal diseases as hepatitis , aids , tuberculosis , and tetanus .
translation.zu: sapos ol i mekim wok long ol tul i no klin tru , yu inap kisim sik hepataitis , aids , tb , o sik tetanus .

translation.en: a navel piercing , for example , is subject to irritation because it is constantly rubbed by clothing . it can thus take up to nine months to heal .
translation.zu: olsem : taim ol i wokim hul long skin bilong butoma ating 9 - pela mun inap lus inap long sua i drai gut , long wanem , ol klos i save skrapim skin long dispela hap bilong bodi .

translation.en: a newsletter from the american academy of facial plastic and reconstructive surgery explains : " multiple earring holes placed around the top of the ear are a particular cause for concern - serious infections can cause the loss of the entire top curve of the ear .
translation.zu: nius bilong wanpela lain dokta ( american academy of facial plastic and reconstructive surgery ) i tok : " pasin bilong sutim sampela hul long arere bilong yau em inap kamapim sua na dispela inap mekim na arere bilong yau inap bagarap na lus olgeta .

translation.en: concludes the newsletter : " ideally , [ piercing ] should be limited to the earlobe area . "
translation.zu: bilong pinisim tok nius i tok : " mobeta ol i sutim hul long liklik hap skin i stap daunbilo long yau tasol . "

translation.en: if rings in very sensitive areas , such as the breast , get caught or pulled by clothing , the piercings can easily tear .
translation.zu: sapos ring i stap long sampela hap bilong skin i no strong tumas , olsem long susu , na klos o sampela narapela samting i pulim em , dispela inap brukim skin long dispela hap .

translation.en: scar tissue formed in the breast of a young girl can block milk ducts , and if she does not seek treatment , she may find it difficult or impossible to nurse a baby in the future .
translation.zu: taim sua i drai pinis long susu bilong yangpela meri , skin long dispela hap inap kamap strong na pasim rot susu i save kam long en , na sapos em i no lukim dokta , bihain em bai hatwok long givim susu long bebi o bai em i no inap long mekim .

translation.en: additional risks of piercing the mouth area include choking after swallowing jewelry , numbness and loss of taste in the tongue , prolonged bleeding , chipped or fractured teeth , increased salivary flow , uncontrolled drooling , gum injury , speech impediment , and difficulties in breathing , chewing , and swallowing .
translation.zu: ol hevi inap kamap long dispela i olsem : bilas man i pasim inap pas long nek , tang i dai na no inap pilim swit bilong kaikai , blut i ran i go longpela taim , tit i bruk , planti spet i kamap long maus , na spet i kamap long olgeta taim , maus i sua , toktok i no klia , hatwok long pulim win , hatwok long memeim na daunim kaikai .

translation.en: when a young woman named kendra had her tongue pierced , it " swelled up like a balloon . "
translation.zu: taim wanpela yangpela meri , nem bilong em kendra , em i bin larim ol long sutim hul long tang bilong em , tang i bin " solap olsem balun . "

translation.en: to make matters worse , the piercer used a stud designed for the chin , and it cut into kendra 's tongue and ripped through tissue underneath . she almost lost the ability to speak .
translation.zu: na samting i nogut moa em olsem : man i bin wokim hul em i bin putim wanpela kain bilas long tang em i bilong putim long wasket na dispela bilas i katim tang bilong em nogut tru na klostu em i no inap mekim toktok moa .

translation.en: god taught his people the israelites to respect their bodies and to avoid self - mutilation .
translation.zu: god i lainim lain bilong em , israel , long ol i mas lukautim gut bodi bilong ol na no ken katim nabaut skin bilong ol .

translation.en: does it not make good sense , then , to avoid unnecessary health risks ?
translation.zu: olsem na em i savepasin long abrusim ol samting em inap givim sik long yumi , a ?

translation.en: nevertheless , there are other factors you should consider besides health .
translation.zu: tasol i gat sampela samting moa yumi mas skelim .

translation.en: but it does encourage us to adorn ourselves with " modesty and soundness of mind . "
translation.zu: tasol em i kirapim yumi long bihainim gutpela tingting na pasin daun taim yumi bilasim skin bilong yumi .

translation.en: while something might be considered modest in one part of the world , the real issue is how it is viewed where you live .
translation.zu: long sampela hap ol man bai orait long wanpela pasin bilong putim bilas , tasol bikpela samting yumi mas tingim em i olsem : ol man long hap bilong yumi yet i gat wanem tingting long dispela pasin .

translation.en: but in another country or culture , some may take offense at them . despite their popularity among celebrities , body piercings and earrings for men have thus far failed to gain general acceptance in the west .
translation.zu: maski sampela man bilong pilai spot na piksa wokabaut ol i sutim skin bilong pasim bilas na ol i putim ring long yau , tasol planti man long hap bilong wes i no orait long dispela pasin .

translation.en: for many , body piercing has the connotation of deviance and rebellion .
translation.zu: planti man i ting ol man i putim dispela kain bilas ol i laik bikhet na stap narapela kain .

translation.en: a number view it as shocking , repugnant .
translation.zu: na sampela i pilim em i samting nogut tru .

translation.en: little wonder , then , that one well - known american store has a rule that employees having direct contact with customers are restricted to one earring per ear and that all other visible piercings are banned .
translation.zu: dispela lo i tok ol i ken pasim wanpela yau - ring long wan wan yau tasol na no ken pasim ol bilas long ol narapela hap ol i bin sutim skin long en .

translation.en: " you can 't predict how people might react , " explains a company spokeswoman .
translation.zu: wanpela mausmeri bilong kampani i tok , " yu no inap save ol manmeri bai kisim wanem kain tingting . "

translation.en: young christians in particular should be concerned that they give the right impression to others , including when they engage in the evangelizing work .
translation.zu: ol yangpela kristen i mas i gat laik long mekim ol samting na bai ol narapela i kisim stretpela tingting long ol , na ol i mas tingim dispela moa yet taim ol i mekim wok autim tok .

translation.en: whatever personal opinion you might have about piercing , your appearance inescapably makes a statement about your attitudes and life - style .
translation.zu: maski yu yet i gat wanem tingting long pasin bilong sutim skin bilong pasim bilas , pasin bilong yu long bilas i save tokaut long tingting na pasin bilong yu .

translation.en: what statement do you want to make ?
translation.zu: yu laik bai ol man i ting olsem wanem long yu ?

translation.en: ultimately , you - and , of course , your parents - must decide what you will do in this regard .
translation.zu: yu yet - na papamama bilong yu tu - yupela i mas pasim tok olsem yu bai pasim dispela kain bilas o nogat .

translation.en: " don 't let the world around you squeeze you into its own mould , " is the bible 's sound advice .
translation.zu: " yupela i no ken wokabaut wankain olsem ol man bilong dispela graun . " em gutpela tok bilong baibel long rom 12 : 2 .

translation.en: after all , you are the one who will have to live with the results .
translation.zu: tasol wanem wanem ol samting i painim yu long pasin yu mekim , em yu yet i mas karim .

translation.en: lamu - an island lost in time
translation.zu: lamu - wanpela ailan i stap wankain olsem long bipo yet

translation.en: the salty breeze whipped the canvas sail taut , sending the small wooden ship forward .
translation.zu: liklik sip i wok long ran i go taim win bilong solwara i holim sel .

translation.en: high above the deck , clinging to the mast , a lookout scanned the horizon for land , straining his eyes against the glare of the indian ocean .
translation.zu: san i wok long sutim ai bilong wanpela man taim em i stap antap tru na holim strong mas bilong sip na bai em i ken lukluk long ol hap bilong solwara india bilong painim sampela graun .

translation.en: it was the 15th century c.e . , and these sailors were searching for the island of lamu .
translation.zu: dispela i kamap long yia 1500 samting , na ol dispela man i laik painim ailan lamu .

translation.en: lured by africa 's treasures and the urge to explore , hardy men sailed to the east african coast from faraway countries .
translation.zu: ol dispela kago wantaim bikpela laik long skelim ol narapela hap i kirapim ol strongpela man long sampela kantri i stap longwe long kam long hap bilong is afrika .

translation.en: crowding into cramped wooden sailing vessels , they set out on journeys of great length .
translation.zu: ol boskru i save pas tru insait long ol liklik sip ol i wokim long diwai na go long ol longwe hap .

translation.en: midway up the east african coast , a small group of islands , the lamu archipelago , provided these seafaring travelers and their frail ships a deep , safe harbor protected by coral reefs .
translation.zu: namel long nambis bilong is afrika i gat ol liklik ailan i stap , ol i kolim ol ailan lamu , na i gat ol rip i raunim hap klostu long nambis , na solwara i daun .

translation.en: here sailors were able to resupply their vessels with fresh water and food .
translation.zu: olsem na i gutpela hap bilong ol sip i no strong tumas wantaim ol boskru i ken i go sua .

translation.en: by the 15th century , the island of lamu was established as a prosperous trading and supply center .
translation.zu: long yia 1500 samting ailan lamu i kamap olsem wanpela hap i gat ol gutpela stua bilong baim na salim ol samting .

translation.en: gold bangles adorned the arms and ankles of perfumed women as they moved through the narrow streets .
translation.zu: ol meri i save putim sanda long skin bilong ol na pasim ol bilas gol long han na lek taim ol i wokabaut long rot .

translation.en: all along the dock , sailing ships with their lateen sails furled sat heavy in the water , loaded to capacity with goods destined for foreign lands .
translation.zu: ol sip i go daun tru long wara , long wanem , ol i pulimapim ol kago inap long mak bilong ol bilong redi long go long ol kantri i stap longwe .

translation.en: seafront homes were built with coral blocks chiseled by hand from local quarries , and heavy wooden doors , exquisitely carved , guarded their entryways .
translation.zu: bilong wokim ol haus i stap arere long solwara ol i bin kisim ol karanas i stap long dispela hap na katim ol blok long han .

translation.en: homes of the more affluent inhabitants were large and spacious .
translation.zu: ol haus bilong ol maniman i bikpela na i gat planti spes long en .

translation.en: bathrooms were supplied with fresh water piped through rudimentary plumbing systems .
translation.zu: ol i mekim wok long paip bilong pulim wara i go long rum bilong waswas .

translation.en: waste removal was equally impressive and more advanced than that of many european countries at the time .
translation.zu: pasin bilong ol long rausim pipia bilong toilet i gutpela na i winim planti kantri long yurop long dispela taim .

translation.en: large ducts , carved out of stone , sloped toward the sea and carried wastewater to deep soak pits that were placed far away from sources of fresh water .
translation.zu: ol longpela baret ol i bin katim long ston i save rausim ol pipia i go daun long wanpela hul i stap klostu long solwara na longwe long ol wara bilong dring .

translation.en: the stone cisterns that supplied the homes with fresh water contained small fish that would feed on mosquito larvae , thus keeping the biting insects at bay .
translation.zu: wara bilong haus i stap long wanpela dram samting ol i wokim long ston , na bilong daunim ol natnat ol i putim ol liklik pis long dram bilong kaikai ol liklik snek bilong natnat .

translation.en: in time , however , lamu 's prosperity began to wane .
translation.zu: tasol isi isi ol gutpela bisnis bilong lamu i wok long go slek .

translation.en: wooden dhows of ancient design glide along the coast , their triangular white sails resembling butterflies on the wing .
translation.zu: taim sip i wok long ran i go bihainim nambis , sel bilong ol i luk olsem ol wing bilong bataflai .

translation.en: laden with fish , fruit , coconuts , cows , chickens , and passengers , they head for the port of lamu .
translation.zu: ol sip i kam long lamu i gat ol pis , frut , kokonas , bulmakau , kakaruk , na pasindia i pulap long en .

translation.en: at the dock , palm trees rustling in the hot breeze provide scant shade for the men unloading the wooden vessels .
translation.zu: long bris bilong lamu , win i wok long meknaisim ol kokonas i stap olsem ples kol liklik bilong ol man i wok long rausim ol kago bilong ol sip .

translation.en: in the shade of a huge mango tree , men plait long ropes from sisal fiber and mend the cloth sails that propel their wooden dhows .
translation.zu: bikpela diwai mango i stap olsem ples kol bilong sampela man i wokim ol rop long sampela strongpela gras na ol i wok long stretim sel bilong ol liklik sip diwai bilong ol .

translation.en: streets are narrow and filled with people moving in all directions .
translation.zu: ol rot bilong taun i liklik na planti ol manmeri i wok long go i kam .

translation.en: merchants clad in their long , flowing white robes call from their cluttered shops , beckoning customers to come in and examine their wares .
translation.zu: ol bisnisman i pasim ol longpela waitpela klos na ol i stap long stua bilong ol na singaut long ol man long kam na lukim ol samting ol i salim .

translation.en: a donkey , straining to pull a wooden cart loaded with heavy sacks of grain , threads its way through the flow of people .
translation.zu: wanpela donki i stap namel long ol manmeri long rot na wok strong long pulim wanpela wilka i gat ol traipela bek ol i bin pulapim rais samting long en .

translation.en: lamu 's inhabitants move from one part of the island to another on foot , for there are no motor vehicles on the island for transportation .
translation.zu: ol lain bilong lamu i save wokabaut long lek tasol bilong go long ol narapela hap bilong ailan , long wanem , i no gat ol ka i stap long dispela hap .

translation.en: when the sun reaches its zenith at midday , time appears to stand still .
translation.zu: taim san i kamap hat olgeta long belo , i olsem olgeta samting i slip i stap .

translation.en: in the oppressive heat , few people move about , and even the donkeys stand motionless with their eyes tightly shut waiting for a reprieve from the heat .
translation.zu: tuhat i mekim na i no gat planti man i wokabaut ; ol donki tu i sanap i stap na pasim ai strong na wetim san i kol liklik .

translation.en: as the sun begins to descend and the temperature goes down , the sleepy island comes alive .
translation.zu: ol lain i kirap taim san i wok long go daun na ples i wok long go kol liklik .

translation.en: merchants swing open their heavy carved doors to resume business , and they will continue burning their lamps until late at night .
translation.zu: ol bisnisman i opim ol strongpela dua bilong stua na wok long salim ol samting i go inap biknait .

translation.en: women bathe their small children and rub them with coconut oil until their skin glistens .
translation.zu: ol meri i save wasim ol pikinini na bihain putim wel bilong kokonas i go long skin bilong ol na skin i lait .

translation.en: although lamu has lost its former splendor , traditional pre - 20th - century african culture still flourishes here .
translation.zu: lamu i no stap gutpela tru olsem long bipo , tasol pasin na tingting bilong ol afrika paslain long yia 1900 samting i stap yet .

translation.en: under the warm tropical sun , life continues just as it has for many centuries .
translation.zu: aninit long hatpela san , i stap bilong ol man i wankain olsem long planti handet yia i go pinis .

translation.en: here one can visit the past and the present together .
translation.zu: long dispela hap yu inap lukim ol pasin bilong nau na ol pasin bilong bipo .

translation.en: indeed , lamu is a unique survivor of a bygone age , an island lost in time .
translation.zu: tru tumas , lamu i stap yet olsem narapela kain ples bilong bipo . em wanpela ailan i no bin senis .

translation.en: our visit to lamu
translation.zu: taim mipela i go lukim lamu

translation.en: not too long ago , a group of us made a visit to lamu , but it was not for the purpose of buying or selling goods .
translation.zu: i no longtaim i go pinis na sampela bilong mipela i go lukim lamu , tasol i no bilong baim o salim ol samting .

translation.en: we went to visit our christian brothers and sisters , fellow witnesses of jehovah .
translation.zu: mipela ol witnes bilong jehova na mipela i go bilong lukim ol brata sista kristen bilong mipela .

translation.en: our light aircraft flew north over the rugged kenyan coastline .
translation.zu: liklik balus bilong mipela i flai i go not , antap long nambis bilong kenya .

translation.en: far below , gentle waves rolled onto a shoreline of rich , green tropical forests fringed with a ribbon of white sand .
translation.zu: daunbilo tru liklik si i wok long bruk i kam long nambis i gat waitpela wesan na planti ol grinpela diwai i stap .

translation.en: then , seemingly out of nowhere , we saw the islands of the lamu archipelago glistening like jewels in the turquoise sea .
translation.zu: bihain , mipela kirap nogut long lukim ol ailan bilong lamu , ol i lait olsem ol ston i dia tumas long grinpela solwara .

translation.en: like a huge african eagle , we circled the islands and then dropped from the sky , landing on a small airstrip on the mainland .
translation.zu: olsem wanpela traipela tarangau bilong afrika , mipela i stap antap na raunim ol dispela ailan na bihain mipela i lusim skai na kam daun long liklik ples balus bilong bikples .

translation.en: we disembarked , walked to the water 's edge , and boarded a wooden dhow for the trip to lamu .
translation.zu: mipela lusim balus na wokabaut i go arere long solwara na kalap long wanpela liklik sip i go long lamu .

translation.en: it was a beautiful sunny day , and the sea wind was warm and fresh .
translation.zu: san i lait gut tru , na win bilong solwara i gutpela .

translation.en: strong backs lifted heavy loads from the boats , and women carried their wares balanced delicately on their heads .
translation.zu: ol strongpela lain i wok long rausim ol samting long ol bot , na ol meri i karim ol samting long het em ol bai maket long en .

translation.en: carrying our baggage , we pushed our way through the crowd and stood under the shade of a palm tree .
translation.zu: mipela wokabaut namel long planti manmeri taim mipela karim ol kago bilong mipela i go long ples kol bilong wanpela kokonas .

translation.en: within minutes , our christian brothers spotted us , and we were warmly welcomed to their island home .
translation.zu: insait long sampela minit tasol ol brata kristen i lukim mipela na ol i kam sekanim mipela .

translation.en: the journey to attend the congregation meetings was long and would take several hours .
translation.zu: rot i go long ol miting bilong kongrigesen i longpela na mipela bai wokabaut long en inap sampela aua .

translation.en: we had prepared ourselves with drinking water , wide - brimmed hats , and good walking shoes .
translation.zu: bilong redi long go mipela kisim wara bilong dring , ol hat i bikpela inap long pasim san , na ol gutpela su bilong wokabaut .

translation.en: with the dawn light to our backs , we set sail for the mainland , where the meetings were held .
translation.zu: san bilong moningtaim tru i stap baksait long mipela taim mipela i kalap long bot bilong go long bikples , em dispela hap ol miting i save kamap long en .

translation.en: the brothers used the opportunity to witness to those on board , and by the time we docked , we had enjoyed some bible discussions and had placed several magazines .
translation.zu: rot i op na ol brata i autim tok long ol lain i sindaun long bot , olsem na taim mipela i no kamap yet long bris bilong bikples mipela bin kamapim sampela stori bilong baibel na tilim sampela magasin .

translation.en: walking through uninhabited bush country , we were advised to keep our eyes open for wild animals , including the occasional elephant crossing the road .
translation.zu: no gat ol lain i save stap long bus bilong dispela hap , olsem na ol i tokim mipela long was gut , long wanem , i gat ol wel animal na sampela taim ol elefan long rot .

translation.en: the brothers were cheerful and happy as we walked slowly to our destination .
translation.zu: ol brata i stap amamas taim mipela i wokabaut isi isi long rot .

translation.en: before long , we arrived at a small village where we met others in the congregation who had walked from distant areas .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na mipela kamap long wanpela liklik ples na bungim ol narapela long kongrigesen , ol tu i bin kam long ol longwe hap .

translation.en: because of the long distances involved , four congregation meetings would be held on this one day .
translation.zu: rot bilong go long miting i longpela tru , olsem na ol i save mekim 4 - pela miting long wanpela de .

translation.en: meetings were conducted in a small school constructed of rough stone , with no finished windows or doors .
translation.zu: ol i wokim ol miting long wanpela liklik skul ol man i bin wokim long ston , na hap bilong ol windo na dua i stap op tasol .

translation.en: inside a classroom , 15 of us sat on narrow wooden benches and enjoyed a fine bible - based program , which was encouraging and instructive .
translation.zu: mipela 15 manmeri i amamas long sindaun insait long klasrum long ol bang ol i wokim long diwai na kisim ol gutpela tok bilong baibel bilong strongim mipela na givim gutpela skul long mipela .

translation.en: no one seemed to mind the oppressive heat radiating from the tin roof over our heads .
translation.zu: mipela i no tingting tumas long san i hatim kapa na mekim hap mipela i sindaun long en i hat tru .

translation.en: all were just happy to be together .
translation.zu: long 4 - pela aua bihain ol miting i pinis .

translation.en: after four hours of meetings , we said our good - byes and everyone departed in different directions .
translation.zu: mipela tok gutbai na mipela olgeta i lusim dispela hap na go long narapela narapela hap .

translation.en: by the time we returned to lamu , the golden sun was setting on the horizon .
translation.zu: taim mipela kam bek long lamu , san i wok long go daun .

translation.en: that evening , in the coolness of the night , we enjoyed a simple meal with the witness families that live on lamu .
translation.zu: long nait taim ples i kol liklik mipela sindaun wantaim ol famili witnes i stap long lamu na kisim sampela liklik kaikai .

translation.en: on subsequent days we walked through the winding narrow streets with them in the preaching work , searching for people hungering for bible truth .
translation.zu: long ol de bihain mipela wokabaut long ol liklik rot bilong lamu bilong wok wantaim ol long autim tok na painim ol man i hangre long kisim ol tok i tru bilong baibel .

translation.en: finally the day arrived when we had to leave .
translation.zu: bihain de i kamap bilong mipela i mas lusim dispela hap .

translation.en: the brothers took us to the dockside , and we sadly said good - bye .
translation.zu: ol brata i kisim mipela i go long hap bilong kalap long bot , na mipela bel hevi taim mipela tok gutbai .

translation.en: they told us that our visit had encouraged them .
translation.zu: ol i tok olsem ol i kisim strong taim mipela i stap wantaim ol .

translation.en: we wondered if they realized how much they had encouraged us !
translation.zu: tasol mipela tingting , ol i save ol i bin strongim mipela ?

translation.en: back on the mainland , we soon boarded our small plane .
translation.zu: bihain mipela kamap long bikples na i no longtaim na mipela i kalap long liklik balus .

translation.en: as we climbed higher in the sky , we looked down on the beautiful island of lamu .
translation.zu: taim balus i wok long go antap na bihain i go antap moa , mipela lukluk i go daun long naispela ailan lamu .

translation.en: we reflected on the strong faith of the brothers who live there , the long distances they travel to attend meetings , and the zeal and love they have for the truth .
translation.zu: mipela tingting long strongpela bilip bilong ol brata i stap long dispela hap , ol i mas wokabaut longwe long go long ol miting , na ol i save givim bel tru long tok i tru na wok strong long autim tok .

translation.en: long ago the prophecy was recorded at psalm 97 : 1 : " jehovah himself has become king !
translation.zu: long bipo tru ol i raitim wanpela tok profet long song 97 : 1 : " bikpela i stap king .

translation.en: let the earth be joyful .
translation.zu: graun yu mas amamas .

translation.en: let the many islands rejoice . "
translation.zu: na ol ailan , yupela i mas belgut . "

translation.en: indeed , even on the remote island of lamu , people are being given the chance to rejoice in the marvelous hope of a future paradise under god 's kingdom . - contributed .
translation.zu: tru tumas , maski lamu i stap longwe long ol narapela man , rot i op na ol i ken save long gutpela samting yumi wetim , em paradais bai kamap long graun long rot bilong kingdom bilong god . - wanpela man i salim dispela stori i kam .

translation.en: what is el niño ?
translation.zu: el nino - em i wanem samting ?

translation.en: when the normally dry apurímac river near lima , peru , swept away just about everything that carmen owned , she lamented : " there are many of us like this , so many .
translation.zu: planti taim wara apurimak long lima , peru , i save drai , tasol em i bin tait na tait i kisim klostu olgeta samting bilong carmen .

translation.en: farther north , the torrential rains temporarily transformed a section of the coastal sechura desert into the second - largest lake in peru , covering about 1,800 square miles [ 5,000 sq km ] .
translation.zu: i go moa long hap bilong not long sekura - em wanpela ples drai i stap arere long solwara - traipela ren i pundaun na wara i karamapim 5,000 skwe kilomita bilong dispela ples wesan nating na i kamap olsem wanpela traipela raunwara .

translation.en: elsewhere across the globe , record flooding , intense cyclones , and severe droughts led to famine , pestilence , wildfires , and damage to crops , property , and the environment .
translation.zu: long ol narapela hap bilong graun i gat ol kain hevi olsem i bin kamap na i winim ol narapela long bipo . long sampela hap i gat bikpela tait , o strongpela win saiklon , o taim bilong traipela san .

translation.en: what was the cause of all of this ?
translation.zu: i gat wanem as bilong ol dispela samting ?

translation.en: many point their finger at el niño , which rose out of the tropical , or equatorial , pacific ocean toward the end of 1997 and ran its course for some eight months .
translation.zu: planti ol i sutim asua i go long el nino . kirap long pinis bilong 1997 , el nino i kamap long hap bilong ekweta long solwara pasifik , na i stap inap long 8 - pela mun samting .

translation.en: what exactly is el niño ?
translation.zu: el nino em i wanem samting ?

translation.en: how does it develop ?
translation.zu: em i kamap olsem wanem ?

translation.en: it begins with a warming of waters
translation.zu: pastaim solwara i save kamap hat liklik

translation.en: " el niño is , strictly speaking , only the warm current of water that appears off peru every two to seven years , " says newsweek magazine .
translation.zu: nius newsweek i tok : " el nino i makim solwara i hat liklik na i save kamap long olgeta 2 - pela o 7 - pela yia long nambis bilong peru . "

translation.en: since these warm currents usually arrive around christmas , they were named el niño , the spanish term for the infant jesus .
translation.zu: planti taim dispela i save kamap long taim bilong krismas , olsem na ol i save kolim dispela samting el nino , em tok ples spen , na insait bilong en i olsem bebi jisas .

translation.en: the warming of waters near the coastline of peru means increased rainfall for that land .
translation.zu: taim solwara i kamap hat liklik long hap bilong peru , bai i gat planti ren moa long dispela hap .

translation.en: when heavy , the rains also bring floods to the region .
translation.zu: tasol taim ren i pundaun bikpela tumas , ol wara long dispela hap i save tait .

translation.en: moreover , the warm upper layer of seawater prevents the nutrient - filled cooler waters below from welling up .
translation.zu: na tu , solwara i hat liklik i stap antap na pasim wara i kol i gat ol kaikai samting i stap long en na i no inap long kam antap .

translation.en: consequently , many marine creatures and even some birds migrate in search of food .
translation.zu: olsem na planti pis samting na sampela pisin tu i save lusim dispela hap na go longwe long painim kaikai .

translation.en: the effects of el niño are subsequently felt in other places far away from the peruvian coast .
translation.zu: ol samting el nino i kamapim long hap bilong peru i save kamapim ol samting long ol narapela hap i stap longwe .

translation.en: born of wind and water
translation.zu: samting win na wara i kamapim

translation.en: what causes the unusual rise of the ocean temperature near the coastline of peru ?
translation.zu: i gat wanem as na solwara long hap bilong nambis bilong peru i save kamap hat liklik ?

translation.en: to understand this , consider first the giant circulatory loop , known as the walker circulation , that exists in the atmosphere between the eastern and the western tropical pacific .
translation.zu: bilong save long dispela samting , pastaim yumi mas skelim wanpela win i stap namel long is na wes pasifik long hap bilong ekweta na i raunim bikpela hap ( ol i kolim dispela win , walker circulation ) .

translation.en: the dry air is driven eastward by the winds in the higher atmosphere .
translation.zu: bihain wanpela win i stap antap moa i save sakim dispela win i go long hap bilong is .

translation.en: and , at low altitudes , the air currents known as trade winds flow back westward toward indonesia , thus completing the loop .
translation.zu: dispela win ol i kolim rai em i mekim wanem na solwara pasifik bilong ekweta i save stap hat o kol ?

translation.en: how do the trade winds affect the surface temperature of the tropical pacific ?
translation.zu: nius newsweek i tok : " em i mekim wankain samting olsem win i save mekim long liklik raunwara .

translation.en: " these winds normally act like breezes in a tiny pond , " says newsweek , " piling up warm water in the western pacific so that the sea surface there is as much as two feet [ 60 cm ] higher and 15 degrees fahrenheit [ 8 ° c . ] warmer than it is at , say , ecuador . "
translation.zu: dispela win i save sakim wara i stap antap i go long hap wes bilong pasifik , na dispela i mekim na wara long dispela hap i save go antap moa , winim solwara long hap bilong ekwado inap olsem 60 sentimita , na i hat moa olsem 8 digri selsias . "

translation.en: thus , during normal , or non - el niño , years the sea surface temperature is cooler in the east than in the west .
translation.zu: olsem na taim ol samting i wok gut na i no gat dispela el nino , antap bilong solwara bilong is i save kol moa , winim solwara i stap long hap bilong wes .

translation.en: what changes in the atmosphere bring about an el niño ?
translation.zu: wanem senis i save kamap long win na i kamapim el nino ?

translation.en: " for reasons that scientists still do not comprehend , " states national geographic , " every few years the trade winds subside or even disappear . "
translation.zu: nius national geographic i tok : " ol saientis i no save long as bilong dispela samting , tasol long sampela yia ol win ol i kolim rai i save lusim sampela strong o sampela taim i dai olgeta . "

translation.en: this movement , in turn , has an effect on the atmospheric system .
translation.zu: na tu , dispela i senisim pasin bilong ren long pundaun .

translation.en: like a boulder in a stream
translation.zu: olsem wanpela traipela ston i stap long liklik wara

translation.en: el niño can also alter climate patterns at great distances from the water currents of the tropical pacific .
translation.zu: el nino inap senisim ren na san samting long ol hap i stap longwe tru long solwara pasifik i stap long hap bilong ples hat .

translation.en: by using the atmospheric circulatory system as an agent .
translation.zu: ren na san samting long olgeta hap bilong graun i save wok wantaim .

translation.en: the far - reaching effects of a local disturbance in atmospheric circulation can be likened to the way one boulder in the middle of a stream can cause ripples to form across the entire stream .
translation.zu: na samting i kamap long wanpela hap na i kamapim senis long narapela hap i wankain olsem wanpela traipela ston i stap long liklik wara . dispela ston i stap namel long wara na i senisim pasin bilong wara long ran i go .

translation.en: the dense rain clouds rising above the water of the warm tropical ocean form a boulderlike obstruction in the atmosphere , which affects weather patterns thousands of miles away .
translation.zu: bikpela smok bilong ren i save kamap antap long solwara i hat liklik na i stap olsem traipela ston i pasim ol samting , na dispela i kamapim senis long ren na san i go inap long planti tausen kilomita .

translation.en: at higher latitudes , el niño strengthens and displaces the fast - moving , eastward wind currents known as jet streams .
translation.zu: el nino i save strongim na senisim rot bilong win i stap antap moa na i save spit tru .

translation.en: the jet streams direct the flow of most storm systems at these latitudes .
translation.zu: dispela ol strongpela win i stap antap i save bosim klostu olgeta bikpela ren na win samting .

translation.en: for example , el niño winters are generally milder than normal over parts of the northern united states , whereas they are wetter and colder over some southern states .
translation.zu: olsem : el nino i save mekim na taim bilong kol long hap not bilong yunaitet stets i no save kol tumas , tasol long hap saut bilong yunaitet stets i kol moa na i gat bikpela ren moa .

translation.en: the effects of individual storms can be predicted only as much as several days in advance .
translation.zu: long sampela de paslain tasol ol man inap save long bikpela ren na win samting bai kamap .

translation.en: is the same true of the attempts to predict an el niño ?
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem ? em i wankain tu long el nino ?

translation.en: no .
translation.zu: nogat .

translation.en: for instance , the forecast for the 1997 - 98 el niño was issued in may of 1997 - some six months before its rise .
translation.zu: olsem , ol i bin tokaut long dispela el nino bilong 1997 - 1998 long me 1997 - em 6 - pela mun paslain long dispela samting i bin kamap .

translation.en: spread across the tropical pacific now stand 70 anchored buoys that measure wind conditions at the surface and ocean temperatures down to a depth of 1,600 feet [ 500 m ] .
translation.zu: ol i pasim ol wan wan masin long anka na ol i save trip antap long solwara bilong skelim strong bilong win i stap antap long wara , na skelim solwara i hat o kol inap long 500 mita samting daunbilo .

translation.en: early warnings of el niño can indeed help people prepare for the changes that are expected .
translation.zu: ol toksave i kamap paslain tru olsem wanpela el nino bai kamap i helpim ol manmeri long redi long ol senis dispela samting bai kamapim .

translation.en: since 1983 , for example , el niño forecasts in peru have encouraged many farmers to raise cattle and plant crops suited for wetter conditions , while fishermen have switched from catching fish to harvesting the shrimp that come with the warmer waters .
translation.zu: long peru , kirap long 1983 , ol i bin tokaut olsem wanpela el nino bai kam na dispela i kirapim planti ol man i save lukautim ol fam long kisim ol bulmakau na planim ol samting i save laikim planti ren .

translation.en: scientific research into the processes that govern our earth 's climate testifies to the accuracy of the inspired words recorded by king solomon of ancient israel some 3,000 years ago .
translation.zu: save ol lain bilong saiens i kisim long ol samting i bosim ren na san samting long dispela graun i kamapim klia olsem tok god i kirapim king solomon long raitim long 3 tausen yia i go pinis i stret .

translation.en: he wrote : " the wind is going to the south , and it is circling around to the north .
translation.zu: solomon i bin tok : " win i save kirap long hap not , na i go long hap saut , na i save tanim na i go bek long hap not .

translation.en: may we benefit from that knowledge by giving heed to warnings concerning such events as el niño .
translation.zu: ol dispela save inap helpim yumi sapos yumi bihainim ol toksave long ol samting i laik kamap olsem el nino .

translation.en: in contrast , la niña ( spanish for " the little girl " ) is a periodic cooling of water temperatures off the western coast of south america .
translation.zu: la nina i makim narapela samting . la nina ( " liklik pikinini meri " long tok ples bilong spen ) i olsem solwara bilong wes kos bilong saut amerika i save go kol long sampela taim .

translation.en: la niña too has far - reaching effects on the weather .
translation.zu: na dispela tu i save kamapim ol samting long ol narapela hap .

translation.en: el niño 's trail of destruction
translation.zu: ol bagarap el nino i bin kamapim long bipo

translation.en: ■ 1789 - 93 : el niño was responsible for more than 600,000 deaths in india and caused a severe famine in southern africa .
translation.zu: ■ 1789 - 1793 : el nino bilong dispela yia i mekim na winim 600,000 man long india i dai , na long hap bilong saut afrika dispela el nino i kamapim bikpela hangre tru .

translation.en: ■ 1982 - 83 : this event was the cause of more than 2,000 deaths and more than $ 13 billion in property damage , mainly in tropical regions .
translation.zu: ■ 1982 - 1983 : winim 2,000 manmeri i bin dai long ol samting dispela el nino i kamapim , na pe bilong stretim ol samting i bagarap long hap bilong ekweta i winim 48 bilion kina .

translation.en: ■ 1997 - 98 : in spite of the first largely successful regional forecasts of flooding and droughts for an el niño , about 2,100 lives were lost , and damages amounting to $ 33 billion were incurred worldwide .
translation.zu: ■ 1997 - 1998 : maski ol i bin tokaut olsem long sampela hap wara bai tait na long sampela hap bai i no gat ren , klostu 2,100 manmeri i dai long dispela taim na pe bilong stretim ol samting i bin bagarap long olgeta hap bilong graun i olsem 122 bilion kina .

translation.en: a wild jewel
translation.zu: wanpela naispela diwai

translation.en: delicately shaped , with twisted limbs , this plant grows slowly and is said to live for hundreds of years .
translation.zu: ol han bilong en i tanim tanim , na dispela diwai i no save kamap bikpela hariap , na ol i tok em i save stap inap planti handet yia .

translation.en: the tree 's swollen trunk and its roots serve as a water reservoir , enabling it to flourish in a dry , inhospitable environment .
translation.zu: bikpela as bilong diwai na ol rop bilong en i gat wara i stap long en , olsem na diwai inap i stap gut long dispela hap i drai nogut tru .

translation.en: the milky sap , roots , and seeds of this succulent plant contain a deadly poison .
translation.zu: waitpela blut , na ol rop , na ol pikinini bilong dispela diwai i gat gip nogut long en .

translation.en: extract from the seeds is used to poison the tips of arrows , and local fishermen toss its branches into the water to stun fish for an easy catch .
translation.zu: ol i save kisim gip i stap long pikinini bilong en na putim long supsup , na ol man bilong painim pis long dispela hap , ol i save tromoi ol han bilong dispela diwai long wara bilong paulim ol pis bambai ol i ken kisim ol .

translation.en: additionally , herdsmen use parts of the plant to prepare a poison that kills ticks and lice on their camels and cattle .
translation.zu: na tu , ol man bilong lukautim ol bulmakau samting , ol i save wokim gip long sampela hap bilong dispela diwai bilong kilim i dai ol laus samting bilong ol kamel na bulmakau .

translation.en: surprisingly , despite the tree 's lethal nature , wild animals feed on its leaves without being harmed .
translation.zu: tasol maski dispela diwai i gat ol gip long en , ol wel animal i save kaikai lip bilong en na ol i no kisim bagarap .

translation.en: but how can the poisonous desert rose be called a jewel ?
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem yumi inap kolim dispela diwai i gat gip long en olsem wanpela gutpela diwai tru ?

translation.en: clothed with clusters of delicate blossoms , the desert rose is spectacular , with vibrant colors that range from bright pink to deep crimson - red .
translation.zu: ol gutpela plaua em kala bilong ol i pink na ret ol i pulap long ol han bilong en , olsem na dispela diwai desert rose i luk naispela tru .

translation.en: when the land is dry and colorless , this beautiful wild jewel puts forth a profusion of flowers that glow when illuminated by the sun .
translation.zu: taim ples i drai na i no gat kala long en , dispela gutpela diwai i save kamapim planti naispela plaua i save lait tru taim san i holim ol .

translation.en: such amazing beauty in the desert is but a reminder of the time when " the wilderness and the waterless region will exult , and the desert plain will be joyful and blossom . "
translation.zu: kain gutpela samting olsem i stap long ples drai nating inap kirapim yumi long tingim taim em " ples wesan nating wantaim ples drai bai ol i amamas tru , long wanem , ol naispela plaua bai i kamap na karamapim ol dispela hap . "

translation.en: this delightful promise will indeed become a reality under the coming rulership of god 's kingdom .
translation.zu: ( aisaia 35 : 1 ) dispela gutpela tok promis bai kamap tru taim kingdom bilong god i bosim graun .

translation.en: at that time the entire earth will " exult , " becoming not only a paradise of beauty but also a place of peace for all mankind . - psalm 37 : 11 , 29 ; isaiah 35 : 6 , 7 .
translation.zu: long dispela taim graun olgeta bai " amamas " na kamap wanpela gutpela ples paradais , na tu , olgeta manmeri bai i stap bel isi long en . - song 37 : 11 , 29 ; aisaia 35 : 6 , 7 .

translation.en: one morning in april 1999 , the calm was shattered in the town of littleton , near denver , colorado , u.s.a .
translation.zu: long wanpela moningtaim long epril 1999 , bel isi i pinis long taun litelton , klostu long denva , kolorado , amerika .

translation.en: two youths in black trench coats entered the local high school and began shooting at students and teachers .
translation.zu: tupela yangpela i pasim blakpela saket ol i go insait long haiskul na kirap sutim ol sumatin na tisa long gan .

translation.en: they also detonated bombs .
translation.zu: ol i pairapim sampela bom tu .

translation.en: twelve students and a teacher were killed , and more than 20 were wounded .
translation.zu: inap 12 - pela sumatin na wanpela tisa ol i dai , na winim 20 ol i kisim bagarap .

translation.en: they were only 17 and 18 years old and had a deep hatred for certain groups .
translation.zu: ol i gat 17 na 18 krismas tasol , na ol i nolaik tru long sampela lain manmeri .

translation.en: sadly , the example mentioned above is not an isolated incident .
translation.zu: sori tru , dispela kain samting nau mipela i stori long en i save kamap long planti hap .

translation.en: according to the national center for education statistics , about 11,000 violent incidents involving weapons in american schools were reported during 1997 .
translation.zu: wanpela lain ( national center for education statistics ) i tok , long ol skul bilong amerika long 1997 ol i bin bagarapim man long gan o naip samting inap 11 tausen taim .

translation.en: in hamburg , germany , reports of acts of violence increased by 10 percent during 1997 , and 44 percent of the suspects were youths under 21 .
translation.zu: long hambek , jemani , ol i tok pasin bilong pait na bagarapim man i go bikpela inap 10 pesen long 1997 , na inap 44 pesen bilong ol man i mekim dispela samting em ol yangpela i no winim 21 krismas .

translation.en: corruption among politicians and government officials is common .
translation.zu: planti man bilong politik na gavman ol i save paulim mani samting .

translation.en: a report by european union ( eu ) commissioner anita gradin in 1998 revealed that the cost of corruption within the eu during 1997 was estimated at 1.4 billion dollars .
translation.zu: long 1998 , ripot bilong wanpela ofisa bilong lain yuropian yunion ( eu ) , em anita gradin , i kamapim olsem ol man insait long lain yuropian yunion ol i bin paulim inap 1.4 bilion dola long 1997 .

translation.en: however , it is not only those at the highest levels of society who cheat .
translation.zu: tasol i no ol man i gat bikpela namba tasol ol i save mekim pasin giaman , nogat .

translation.en: furthermore , in the united states , the association of certified fraud examiners stated that american companies lose well over 400 billion dollars annually because of employees stealing money or property from them .
translation.zu: na long yunaitet stets , wanpela lain ( association of certified fraud examiners ) i tok long olgeta yia inap 400 bilion dola bilong ol kampani long amerika i lus , long wanem , ol wokman i save stilim mani o kago samting bilong kampani .

translation.en: in norway in 1997 , this organization received 1,883 tips about child pornography web sites on the internet .
translation.zu: long nowe long 1997 , dispela lain i kisim 1,883 toksave long ol piksa nogut bilong ol pikinini i stap long web - sait long intenet .

translation.en: the next year the number of such tips skyrocketed to almost 5,000 .
translation.zu: long yia bihain , namba bilong kain toksave olsem i go antap long 5,000 .

translation.en: much of the material is produced in countries where governments or local authorities cannot control this despicable activity .
translation.zu: ol i wokim planti piksa nogut olsem long ol kantri em gavman o polis samting ol i no inap pasim dispela pasin nogut tru .

translation.en: was it better in the past ?
translation.zu: yu ting bipo pasin bilong ol man i gutpela moa ?

translation.en: many people who are horrified by the bad state of morals in the world today may think back longingly to the community spirit of their parents ' or grandparents ' day .
translation.zu: planti man em ol i kirap nogut tru long pasin nogut bilong ol man long nau , ating ol i tingting i go bek long taim bilong papamama o bubu bilong ol , em taim narapela i save helpim narapela .

translation.en: perhaps they have heard that people lived a much calmer life back then and that honesty and other aspects of morality were highly valued at all levels of society .
translation.zu: ating ol i bin harim olsem long bipo ol man i bin stap isi na ol i no save giamanim narapela , na ol man bilong kain kain sindaun ol i bin laikim tru stretpela pasin na ol narapela gutpela pasin .

translation.en: older folks may have spoken about the time when hardworking people helped one another , family ties were strong , and youths felt secure and assisted on their parents ' farm or in their workshop .
translation.zu: ating ol lapun i bin stori long taim ol man i bin wok strong na narapela i helpim narapela , na ol famili i bin pas gut wantaim , na ol yangpela i bin stap bel isi na ol i wok long fam o long woksop bilong papamama bilong ol .

translation.en: this leads to the questions : were people 's morals really better in the past ?
translation.zu: dispela i kamapim ol askim olsem : pasin bilong ol manmeri i gutpela moa long bipo o nogat ?

translation.en: or is there simply a feeling of nostalgia that distorts our memory of days gone by ?
translation.zu: o pasin bilong tingim taim bipo i mekim na yumi ting ol hevi i no bikpela tumas long bipo ?

translation.en: let us see how historians and other social analysts answer .
translation.zu: orait nau yumi ken stori long olsem wanem ol saveman i bekim ol dispela askim .

translation.en: morals defined
translation.zu: stretpela pasin

translation.en: in these articles the word " morals " is used in the sense of relating to principles of right and wrong in human behavior .
translation.zu: long ol dispela stori mipela i mekim wok long tok " pasin " bilong skelim wanem pasin i stret na wanem pasin i no stret .

translation.en: this includes honesty , truthfulness , and high standards of conduct in sexual and other matters .
translation.zu: olsem : wanem samting em i stretpela pasin , na pasin bilong tok tru , na stretpela tingting long maritpasin na long ol narapela samting .

translation.en: if you were to ask historians , " are people 's morals today better or worse than in the past ? "
translation.zu: " yu ting pasin bilong ol man long nau i gutpela moa o nogut moa , winim bilong bipo ? "

translation.en: consider , for example , the development of violent crime in europe since the 16th century .
translation.zu: tingim pasin bilong pait na bagarapim man i bin kamap long yurop , kirap long yia 1500 na i kam inap nau .

translation.en: people often took the law into their own hands , and blood feuds were common .
translation.zu: planti man i bin givim strafe long narapela olsem ol yet i makim , na planti lain ol i pait wantaim .

translation.en: nevertheless , historians arne jarrick and johan söderberg write in the book människovärdet och makten ( human dignity and power ) that the period between 1600 and 1850 was " characterized by a genuine civilizing of social life " in some places .
translation.zu: tasol long buk människovärdet och makten ( biknem na strong bilong man ) , tupela saveman , em arne jarrick na johan söderberg , ol i tok , kirap long yia 1600 i go inap 1850 , long sampela hap " ol man i kirap sindaun gut wantaim ol narapela . "

translation.en: people had become better at taking the needs of others into consideration - they had become more empathetic .
translation.zu: ol manmeri i bin lain long pasin bilong tingim ol samting ol narapela i sot long en - ol i tingim hevi bilong ol narapela .

translation.en: other historians note , for example , that theft and crimes against property were much less common in the 16th century than they are today .
translation.zu: sampela narapela saveman ol i tok , long yia 1550 samting pasin stil na bagarapim samting bilong narapela man i no bin kamap planti taim olsem i save kamap long nau .

translation.en: of course , the institution of slavery existed , and it resulted in some of the most serious crimes in history - the kidnapping of humans in africa by european traders and the brutalizing of these millions of slaves in the lands to which they were taken .
translation.zu: ol bisnisman bilong yurop ol i bin stilim ol manmeri long afrika , na ol man i bin bagarapim tru ol dispela planti milion wokboi nating long ol kantri ol i bin kisim ol i go long en .

translation.en: nevertheless , something very different and very serious - indeed , unprecedented - happened during the 20th century and is still happening .
translation.zu: tasol wanpela narapela kain bikpela samting i wok long kamap long taim bilong yumi , em dispela samting i no bin kamap bipo .

translation.en: the 20th century - a turning point
translation.zu: taim bilong yumi - bikpela senis i kamap

translation.en: historians jarrick and söderberg observe : " in the 1930 ' s the curve of murder and homicide once again turned upward , and , sadly , since then this trend has continued for more than half a century . "
translation.zu: tupela saveman , em jarrick na söderberg , ol i tok : " long 1935 samting pasin bilong kilim i dai narapela man i go bikpela gen , na sori tru , kirap long dispela taim dispela pasin i wok long kamap yet , winim 50 yia nau . "

translation.en: according to many commentators , there was a large - scale deterioration of morals during the 20th century .
translation.zu: planti saveman i tok , long taim bilong yumi ol man i bin lusim stretpela pasin bilong planti samting .

translation.en: an essay about moral philosophy says : " one can clearly see that society 's view of sex and what is morally acceptable has changed much in the past 30 to 40 years - from society making clear what is morally correct , by means of strict rules , to a more free and individualist view . "
translation.zu: wanpela stori long pasin bilong ol man i tok : " yumi inap luksave tru olsem tingting bilong ol man long ol samting bilong maritpasin na ol samting ol man i orait long en i bin senis tru insait long 30 i go inap 40 yia . bipo ol man i wokim ol strongpela lo bilong kamapim klia wanem pasin i stret , tasol long nau ol man i stap fri long bihainim tingting bilong ol yet . "

translation.en: this means that sexual conduct and other aspects of morality are things that most individuals now feel they can decide for themselves .
translation.zu: dispela i makim olsem planti manmeri long nau ol i pilim olsem ol samting bilong maritpasin na ol narapela pasin ol i mekim , em samting bilong ol yet long skelim .

translation.en: to illustrate this , the essay cites statistics showing that in 1960 only 5.3 percent of all children in the united states were born out of wedlock .
translation.zu: bilong kamapim klia dispela samting , dispela stori i soim olsem long 1960 inap 5.3 pesen tasol bilong olgeta pikinini long yunaitet stets ol i kamap long ol meri i no marit .

translation.en: in 1990 the figure was 28 percent .
translation.zu: tasol long 1990 dispela namba i go antap long 28 pesen .

translation.en: according to lieberman , this phenomenon " has been brewing for the better part of two generations . "
translation.zu: lieberman i tok , " dispela pasin i bin wok long kamap insait long 50 yia samting . "

translation.en: what do historians and other analysts say is the reason for this remarkable development during the 20th century ?
translation.zu: ol saveman i tok wanem long as na dispela bikpela senis i bin kamap long taim bilong yumi ?

translation.en: " one of the most important changes in society during the past two centuries is secularization , " observes the book människovärdet och makten .
translation.zu: wanpela buk ( människo värdet och makten ) i tok : " wanpela bikpela samting i senisim pasin bilong ol man insait long 200 yia samting em pasin bilong tingim ol samting bilong graun tasol . "

translation.en: secularization meant that " people would be afforded the opportunity to take their stand on different viewpoints on their own .
translation.zu: dispela pasin i mekim na " ol manmeri inap wokim tingting bilong ol yet long ol samting .

translation.en: this idea . . . has its origin among the 18th - century philosophers of the enlightenment , who were the first to . . . reject the bible as the only source of truth . "
translation.zu: dispela tingting . . . i bin kamap namel long ol saveman bilong taim bilong save long yia 1750 samting , em dispela lain ol i namba wan lain long . . . sakim dispela tingting olsem baibel tasol i no as bilong tok i tru . "

translation.en: thus , religions , especially those of christendom , are not looked to for moral guidance as much as they were in the past .
translation.zu: olsem na planti man i ting ol lotu na ol lotu i gat nem kristen ol i no inap stiaim ol long bihainim stretpela pasin , olsem ol i bin mekim long bipo .

translation.en: but why is it that a philosophy that was formulated in the 18th century took more than 200 years to catch on ?
translation.zu: tasol bilong wanem inap 200 yia i mas pinis pastaim na bihain planti man bai kirap bihainim wanpela tingting ol i bin kamapim long yia 1750 samting ?

translation.en: " these ideas were not easily spread to the public , " says the above - mentioned book .
translation.zu: dispela buk i tok : " ol man nating i no kisim hariap dispela kain tingting .

translation.en: even if the trend to abandon traditional moral standards and christian values did proceed slowly for most of the past 200 years , it accelerated sharply during the 20th century .
translation.zu: tru , insait long 200 yia i go pinis ol man i bin lusim isi isi ol gutpela lo bilong ol tumbuna na ol lo kristen , tasol long taim bilong yumi ol man i lusim ol dispela lo hariap .

translation.en: this has especially been the case in the past few decades .
translation.zu: dispela samting i bin kamap tru insait long 30 yia i go pinis .

translation.en: why is that ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem i olsem ?

translation.en: an article in the german newsmagazine die zeit stated that we live in a " dynamic epoch and not , as during former centuries , in a world characterized as being static . "
translation.zu: wanpela stori long nius die zeit bilong jemani i tok , yumi stap long " taim bilong ol bikpela senis , na taim bilong yumi i no olsem bipo em taim bilong ol samting i bin stap wankain tasol . "

translation.en: " this selfishness , " the article continued , " could not be stopped by anything .
translation.zu: dispela pasin i save kirapim ol man long pait na bagarapim man olsem yumi save lukim long nau .

translation.en: in its wake grows the brutality that marks our daily life , as well as corruption , which in many countries has reached right up to the government .
translation.zu: na pasin bilong paulim mani tu i go bikpela - long sampela kantri dispela pasin i stap insait long gavman tu .

translation.en: " the problem with the pursuit of profit among business leaders is that their attitudes are infectious and that they lower the moral threshold among people in general , " observes kjell ove nilsson , associate professor of ethics and theological director at the christian council of sweden .
translation.zu: kjell ove nilsson , em wanpela profesa na dairekta bilong wanpela lain ( christian council ) long swiden , em i tok : " hevi bilong pasin bilong wok strong long kisim winmani namel long ol bikman bilong bisnis em olsem : ol narapela man i kirap bihainim pasin bilong ol , na pasin bilong ol dispela bikman i mekim na ol man i lusim stretpela pasin bilong ol .

translation.en: " of course , this has a devastating effect on morals - in society as well as on the personal level . "
translation.zu: olsem na pasin bilong ol man i kamap nogut olgeta - namel long ol lain manmeri na long wan wan man . "

translation.en: the media culture
translation.zu: nius na televisen samting

translation.en: another major factor contributing to the rapid moral decline in the latter half of the 20th century is the media culture .
translation.zu: narapela bikpela samting i mekim na pasin bilong ol man i kamap nogut moa insait long 50 yia samting i go pinis , em ol nius na televisen samting .

translation.en: " these trend - setters exert an extremely powerful hold on our culture and our children in particular , and they often have had little or no sense of responsibility for the harmful values they are purveying . "
translation.zu: ol dispela lain i gat bikpela strong tru long stiaim sindaun bilong yumi na ol pikinini bilong yumi , na planti ol i no pilim olsem i gat rong long kamapim ol dispela tingting nogut . "

translation.en: as an example , lieberman cites a record made by a heavy - metal band called cannibal corpse .
translation.zu: bilong kamapim klia dispela samting , lieberman i stori long wanpela singsing em wanpela lain ( cannibal corpse ) bilong musik hevi - metal i bin wokim .

translation.en: he and a colleague made a plea to the record company to withdraw the record .
translation.zu: lieberman na wanpela wanwok bilong em ol i askim strong lain i wokim plet musik samting long ol i mas rausim dispela singsing .

translation.en: but as lieberman relates , it was to no avail .
translation.zu: tasol olsem lieberman i tok , ol i no harim tok bilong ol .

translation.en: responsible parents today are therefore locked in a bitter competition with the media culture as to who will influence and raise their children .
translation.zu: ol papamama i laik mekim gut wok bilong ol , ol i mas resis wantaim televisen samting long husat bai stiaim na mekim bikpela long pikinini bilong ol .

translation.en: " in those cases , " says lieberman , " the culture is unchallenged as the standard setter , and the child 's sense of right and wrong and his priorities in life are shaped primarily by what he learns from the television , the movie screen and the cd player . "
translation.zu: lieberman i tok : " i no hatwok long ol nius na televisen samting long stiaim ol pikinini bilong ol dispela kain famili , na ol samting pikinini i kisim save long en long rot bilong televisen , na long ol piksa wokabaut , na long masin bilong pilaim ol cd , ol dispela samting i stiaim tingting bilong pikinini long ol samting i stret o i no stret , na long ol samting i bikpela samting long i stap bilong em . "

translation.en: and more recently , the internet can be added to this list .
translation.zu: na nau long dispela taim , intenet tu i wok long stiaim ol pikinini .

translation.en: back to " a moral stone age "
translation.zu: ol i bihainim gen " ol pasin nogut bilong bipo tru "

translation.en: for one thing , in recent years more children and teenagers have committed cruel acts of violence against other children as well as adults .
translation.zu: wanpela samting em olsem : nau long dispela taim planti pikinini na ol yangpela ol i bin bagarapim tru ol narapela pikinini na ol man i bikpela pinis .

translation.en: a shocking case took place in sweden in 1998 .
translation.zu: wanpela samting nogut tru i bin kamap long swiden long 1998 .

translation.en: a child psychiatrist made this telling comment : " a restraint against letting it go too far is something that has to be learned , " she said .
translation.zu: wanpela dokta bilong tingting bilong ol pikinini , em i tok : ' samting bilong stiaim tingting bilong pikinini , nogut em i abrusim mak , em samting pikinini i mas lain long kisim .

translation.en: " we have been thrown back into a moral stone age , " claims christina hoff sommers , a professor of philosophy .
translation.zu: profesa christina hoff sommers i tok : " yumi kirap bihainim gen ol pasin nogut bilong bipo tru . "

translation.en: she noted that when her young students are faced with the question of what is right and what is wrong , most of them react by becoming very insecure .
translation.zu: em i tok , taim em i askim ol yangpela sumatin bilong em long wanem samting i stret na wanem samting i no stret , dispela askim i mekim na planti bilong ol i no stap bel isi .

translation.en: then they reply that there is no such thing as right or wrong .
translation.zu: na ol i tok , i no gat ol samting em man inap tok em i stret o i no stret .

translation.en: they believe that each person must consider what is best for himself .
translation.zu: ol i ting olgeta wan wan man i mas skelim wanem samting i stret long em yet .

translation.en: in recent times , many of her students have objected to the principle of the unique dignity and value of human life .
translation.zu: nau long dispela taim , planti sumatin bilong em ol i no ting laip bilong man em i wanpela gutpela samting yumi mas tingting gut long en .

translation.en: for example , when asked what they would do if faced with the choice between saving the life of their pet or the life of a fellow human whom they did not know , many said that they would choose the animal .
translation.zu: olsem : taim ol i askim ol sumatin long ol bai helpim husat long abrusim bagarap , pusi o dok samting bilong ol o wanpela man ol i no save long en , planti ol i tok ol bai helpim animal .

translation.en: she claims that many young people today actually question whether there is a right or a wrong , and she feels that this attitude poses one of the greatest threats to society .
translation.zu: em i tok , planti yangpela long nau ol i ting yumi no inap tok wanem samting i stret o wanem samting i no stret , na em i ting dispela tingting em i wanpela bikpela samting bilong bagarapim tru sindaun bilong yumi man .

translation.en: the undermining of morals in our time is therefore a reality .
translation.zu: olsem na planti man long taim bilong yumi ol i save daunim ol stretpela pasin .

translation.en: what does all of this really mean ?
translation.zu: dispela olgeta samting i makim wanem samting ?

translation.en: and what kind of future do we have to look forward to ?
translation.zu: na yumi ken wet long wanem samting bai kamap bihain ?
