translation.en: what does it all mean ?
translation.zu: dispela i makim wanem samting ?

translation.en: if you were to analyze moral standards in recent years , you would see a clear trend .
translation.zu: sapos yu skelim ol pasin bilong ol man long taim bilong yumi , yu inap luksave long wanem kain pasin ol man i save bihainim .

translation.en: without a doubt , moral standards are being increasingly undermined among a growing number of people .
translation.zu: yumi ken save tru olsem planti manmeri moa ol i no ting stretpela pasin i bikpela samting .

translation.en: what is the real significance of this ?
translation.zu: dispela i makim wanem samting tru ?

translation.en: does it mean , as some individuals claim , that our entire civilization and all mankind are doomed , nearing annihilation ?
translation.zu: yu ting dispela i makim olsem sindaun bilong yumi ol man na olgeta lain manmeri bai bagarap olgeta , olsem sampela i save tok ?

translation.en: the latter is what many people think .
translation.zu: dispela laspela askim i kamapim tingting bilong planti man .

translation.en: they fully expect that the pendulum will eventually swing back and that higher moral standards will return .
translation.zu: ol i bilip tru olsem pasin bilong ol man bai senis na ol bai kirap bihainim ol gutpela pasin gen . olsem wanem ?

translation.en: are they correct ?
translation.zu: tingting bilong ol i stret ?

translation.en: " the last days "
translation.zu: " taim bilong las de "

translation.en: let us consider the facts in the light of a book that for centuries was a widely accepted authority on moral issues - god 's word , the bible .
translation.zu: nau yumi ken skelim ol dispela samting wantaim wanpela buk , dispela buk em baibel . inap planti handet yia pinis ol man i bilip olsem dispela buk i makim gut wanem pasin i stret na wanem pasin i no stret .

translation.en: it is very enlightening to compare today 's world with the prophetic description that the bible gives of the most decisive era in human history .
translation.zu: em i gutpela long skelim pasin bilong ol manmeri bilong nau wantaim tok profet bilong baibel i stori long wanpela bikpela hap taim bilong ol manmeri .

translation.en: this is the time period it calls " the last days " or " the conclusion of the system of things . "
translation.zu: baibel i kolim dispela hap taim olsem " taim bilong las de " o taim em " pasin bilong dispela graun i laik pinis . "

translation.en: as these expressions imply , this period is to mark the definite end of an epoch and the beginning of a new one .
translation.zu: olsem ol dispela tok i kamapim , dispela hap taim i makim pinis bilong wanpela kain sindaun na kirap bilong nupela sindaun .

translation.en: god 's word foretold that the last days would be marked by " critical times hard to deal with . "
translation.zu: baibel i tok long taim bilong las de " planti hevi nogut tru bai i kamap . "

translation.en: to help watchful observers to identify the last days , the bible gives a number of details that together provide a clear description , or composite sign , of this unique time period .
translation.zu: bilong helpim ol man long luksave long taim bilong las de , baibel i kamapim planti samting em olgeta wantaim i kamapim mak bilong dispela narapela kain taim bilong yumi .

translation.en: bad traits in people
translation.zu: pasin nogut bilong ol man

translation.en: note one of the features of this sign that is prominent today : ' men will have a form of godly devotion but prove false to its power . '
translation.zu: olsem : ' ol man bai bihainim pasin bilong god long skin tasol na ol bai i no save liklik long bikpela strong i stap long pasin tru bilong god . '

translation.en: no other period in history has been characterized by such powerful and thorough secularization .
translation.zu: i no gat narapela hap taim olsem nau em ol man i bin strong tru long tingim ol samting bilong graun tasol .

translation.en: god has been widely rejected as the only authority , and most people do not accept the bible as the only source of truth .
translation.zu: long planti hap ol man i no ting god tasol i ken bosim yumi , na planti manmeri i no bilip olsem baibel tasol em i as bilong tok i tru .

translation.en: of course , religions still exist , but many have little influence .
translation.zu: tru , ol lotu i stap yet , tasol ol i no gat strong long stiaim ol man .

translation.en: they are only a veneer .
translation.zu: ol dispela lotu i olsem skin nating tasol .

translation.en: the bible mentions another feature of the sign : " men will be . . . without self - control , fierce , " and " because of the increasing of lawlessness the love of the greater number will cool off . "
translation.zu: baibel i kolim narapela samting bilong mak bilong las de : " ol man . . . i no bosim laik bilong bodi bilong ol , na ol bai i pait na bagarapim ol man nabaut , " na " pasin nogut bai i kamap bikpela , olsem na planti man bai i lusim pasin bilong laikim ol arapela . "

translation.en: the greek word translated " fierce " means , among other things , " lacking human sympathy and feeling . "
translation.zu: wanpela insait bilong dispela tok grik ol i tanim olsem " pait na bagarapim ol man " em " man i no pilim hevi bilong narapela . "

translation.en: today ever younger children are showing themselves to be " fierce " and are committing increasingly violent crimes .
translation.zu: long nau ol pikinini i yangpela tru ol i save " pait na bagarapim ol man " na pasin nogut bilong ol i wok long kamap nogut olgeta .

translation.en: furthermore , fast - paced technical and economic developments , and the greed these have brought with them , have caused more and more people to throw aside old values .
translation.zu: na tu , kain kain nupela masin i kamap na ol man i gat planti mani moa , na ol dispela samting i bin kamapim pasin mangal , olsem na planti manmeri moa ol i no bihainim moa ol gutpela pasin bilong bipo .

translation.en: without regard for others , they use any available means , even dishonest ones , to grab as much as they can to satisfy their selfish desires .
translation.zu: ol i no save tingim ol narapela , na ol i mekim wok long kain kain samting - ol pasin giaman tu - bilong kisim ol samting bilong inapim laik bilong ol yet .

translation.en: a feature especially prevalent in our time is this one : " men will be . . . lovers of pleasures rather than lovers of god . "
translation.zu: wanpela pasin em planti man i save bihainim long taim bilong yumi em olsem : " ol man bai . . . laikim tumas ol kain kain pasin bilong amamas bilong dispela graun , na ol bai i no laikim god . "

translation.en: one example of this is that people want sensual pleasure , but they do not want the responsibility of living with one marriage partner for a lifetime .
translation.zu: wanpela samting i kamapim klia dispela samting em olsem : ol man i laikim ol amamas bilong skin , tasol ol i no laik stap wantaim wanpela poroman marit inap long taim ol i dai .

translation.en: another aspect of the sign is that " men will be lovers of themselves , lovers of money . "
translation.zu: narapela samting bilong dispela mak em olsem : " ol man bai i laikim ol yet tasol , na ol bai i laikim tumas long kisim mani . "

translation.en: according to the german magazine die zeit , " the motor of [ today 's economic ] system is selfishness . "
translation.zu: wanpela nius ( die zeit ) bilong jemani i tok , " wanpela bikpela samting bilong strongim [ wok bisnis bilong nau ] em pasin bilong ol man long tingim ol yet tasol . "

translation.en: more than ever before , the pursuit of money is the most important thing in many people 's lives .
translation.zu: long nau pasin bilong kisim mani em i nambawan bikpela samting long i stap bilong planti man , winim bilong bipo .

translation.en: besides describing the breakdown in human values , the bible also foretold that the last days would be marked by extraordinary upheavals that would affect the human family .
translation.zu: baibel i stori long ol man bai lusim ol stretpela lo , na tu , baibel i tok profet long taim bilong las de ol narapela kain samting bai bagarapim sindaun bilong ol manmeri .

translation.en: it says , for example , that " nation will rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom ; and there will be great earthquakes , and in one place after another pestilences and food shortages . " - luke 21 : 10 , 11 .
translation.zu: ol bikpela bikpela guria bai i kamap long graun . na long sampela hap ol bai i gat taim bilong bikpela hangre na bikpela sik . " - luk 21 : 10 , 11 .

translation.en: except for the 20th century , there has been no period in history when so many people have been involved in so many world - shaking catastrophes during such a limited span of time .
translation.zu: i no gat wanpela narapela hap taim long bipo em planti manmeri tru ol i bin karim hevi bilong planti bikpela bagarap i kamap insait long sotpela hap taim tasol , dispela samting i bin kamap long taim bilong yumi tasol .

translation.en: for instance , well over 100 million people were killed in wars during that time , a figure many times greater than the number of war casualties in several previous centuries put together .
translation.zu: olsem : winim 100 milion manmeri i dai long ol pait long taim bilong yumi . dispela namba i winim namba bilong ol man i bin dai long pait insait long planti handet yia paslain long taim bilong yumi .

translation.en: the 20th century gave us two wars so different from any others that they were called world wars .
translation.zu: tupela pait i bin kamap long taim bilong yumi ol i narapela kain , olsem na ol i kolim ol olsem pait bilong olgeta hap .

translation.en: global conflicts like these had never occurred before .
translation.zu: kain bikpela pait olsem i no bin kamap bipo .

translation.en: the bible also reveals the existence of a powerful , evil spirit creature , " the one called devil and satan , " whose purpose is to lure people away from true values and pull them down into moral corruption .
translation.zu: baibel i stori tu olsem i gat wanpela strongpela spirit nogut i stap , ' ol i kolim em satan na man i save kotim olgeta manmeri , ' na em i laik pulim ol manmeri bambai ol i lusim stretpela pasin na kirap bihainim ol pasin nogut .

translation.en: it says that during the last days , he has come down to the earth , " having great anger , knowing he has a short period of time . " - revelation 12 : 9 , 12 .
translation.zu: baibel i tok , long taim bilong las de satan i bin kam daun long graun , na " em i belhat nogut tru . em i save , em i gat sotpela taim tasol bilong i stap . " - kth 12 : 9 , 12 .

translation.en: the devil is described in the bible as " the ruler of the authority of the air , the spirit that now operates in the sons of disobedience . "
translation.zu: baibel i tok satan em i " hetman i bosim strong bilong win , em spirit i stap insait long bel bilong ol man i sakim tok . "

translation.en: this implies that the devil exercises a powerful influence on many humans , usually without their noticing it , just as we sometimes may not notice an invisible pollutant in the air .
translation.zu: dispela tok i makim olsem satan i wok strong long stiaim planti manmeri na ol i no save long dispela , wankain olsem sampela taim yumi no save long samting nogut bilong bagarapim win i stap insait long win .

translation.en: for example , satan 's influence is seen in many modern means of communication : videos , movies , television , the internet , advertising , books , magazines , and newspapers .
translation.zu: long planti samting bilong nau yumi inap lukim ol samting satan i mekim wok long en bilong stiaim ol man . olsem : long ol video , piksa wokabaut , televisen , intenet , ol toksave bilong grisim ol man long baim ol samting , na long ol buk na nius .

translation.en: many sincere people have been struck by the similarities between the description the bible gives of the last days and the actual circumstances in the world of our day .
translation.zu: planti man i gat gutpela bel ol i kirap nogut long lukim olsem tok bilong baibel i stori long taim bilong las de na ol samting i wok long kamap long nau i wankain .

translation.en: true , there have been some events in history before the 20th century that in lesser ways seemed to fit the bible 's description .
translation.zu: tru , paslain long taim bilong yumi sampela samting i bin kamap i wankain olsem baibel i tokaut long en .

translation.en: but it is only during the 20th century , and now the 21st century , that all the elements of the sign can be observed .
translation.zu: tasol long taim bilong yumi tasol , ol man inap lukim olgeta samting bilong mak bilong las de i wok long kamap .

translation.en: the coming new epoch
translation.zu: nupela taim i laik kamap

translation.en: neither those who believe that mankind will be destroyed nor those who claim that things will continue the way they always have are correct .
translation.zu: sampela man i bilip olsem ol manmeri bai bagarap na sampela ol i tok ol samting bai stap wankain tasol olsem bipo , tasol dispela tupela tingting wantaim i no stret .

translation.en: instead , the bible clearly shows that the present world society dominating the earth will be replaced by something completely new .
translation.zu: baibel i kamapim klia olsem lain manmeri bilong taim bilong yumi bai pinis na nupela pasin olgeta bai kamap .

translation.en: after jesus listed a number of the features of the sign of the last days , he said : " in this way you also , when you see these things occurring , know that the kingdom of god is near . "
translation.zu: taim jisas i kamapim pinis planti samting bilong mak bilong las de , em i tok : " olsem tasol , taim yupela i lukim ol dispela samting i kamap , yupela i ken save , kingdom bilong god i kam klostu pinis . "

translation.en: god 's heavenly kingdom was the main theme of jesus ' preaching .
translation.zu: kingdom bilong god long heven em i nambawan bikpela tok jisas i autim .

translation.en: and god appointed him to be the king of this kingdom , which is a government that will soon rule over all the earth . - luke 8 : 1 ; revelation 11 : 15 ; 20 : 1 - 6 .
translation.zu: na god i makim em long kamap king bilong dispela kingdom , em i wanpela gavman klostu nau bai bosim graun olgeta . - luk 8 : 1 ; kth 11 : 15 ; 20 : 1 - 6 .

translation.en: at the end of the last days , god 's heavenly kingdom in the hands of christ is going to eliminate all who are its enemies - the devil and those who support him - and replace today 's present morally bankrupt society with a righteous new world .
translation.zu: long pinis bilong taim bilong las de , kingdom bilong god long heven long han bilong krais em bai bagarapim olgeta birua bilong en , em satan na ol lain i bihainim em , na em bai pinisim ol manmeri nogut bilong nau na kamapim nupela taim em stretpela pasin tasol i stap long en .

translation.en: in this new world , righthearted people will enjoy eternal life on an earth transformed into a paradise . - luke 23 : 43 ; 2 peter 3 : 13 ; revelation 21 : 3 , 4 .
translation.zu: ( daniel 2 : 44 ) long dispela nupela taim , ol manmeri i gat gutpela bel ol bai kisim laip i stap oltaim long graun i kamap wanpela paradais . - luk 23 : 43 , nw ; 2 pita 3 : 13 ; kth 21 : 3 , 4 .

translation.en: those who detest today 's moral breakdown and discern that the composite sign of the last days is being fulfilled in current events can look forward to a magnificent future .
translation.zu: ol man i nolaik tru long pasin nogut bilong nau na ol i luksave olsem mak bilong taim bilong las de i wok long kamap nau long taim bilong yumi , ol i ken wet long ol gutpela samting tru bai kamap bihain .

translation.en: for this we thank almighty god , who cares about us humans and who has a glorious purpose for his creation , the earth . - psalm 37 : 10 , 11 , 29 ; 1 peter 5 : 6 , 7 .
translation.zu: em i save tingim yumi ol man , na em i gat laik long kamapim gutpela samting long dispela graun em i bin wokim . - song 37 : 10 , 11 , 29 ; 1 pita 5 : 6 , 7 .

translation.en: jehovah 's witnesses invite you to learn more about our loving creator and the prospect of life in a morally clean world , which he holds out to all searching individuals .
translation.zu: ol witnes bilong jehova i laik bai yu kisim sampela save moa long dispela gutpela man bilong wokim olgeta samting , na long laip oltaim long graun i gat gutpela pasin long en , em dispela samting em i laik givim long ol man i wok long painim em .

translation.en: as the bible says , " this means everlasting life , their taking in knowledge of you , the only true god , and of the one whom you sent forth , jesus christ . " - john 17 : 3 .
translation.zu: baibel i tok : " bilong kisim laip i stap oltaim oltaim , ol i mas wok long kisim save long yu , yu wanpela tasol yu god tru , na long man yu bin salim i kam , em krais jisas . " - jon 17 : 3 , nw .

translation.en: " each day when i came home from school , joey , my pet kangaroo , would be sitting there waiting for me at the gate , " john recalls .
translation.zu: john i tok : " long olgeta de taim mi lusim skul na kam bek long haus , joi em bikpela sikau mi save lukautim , i save sindaun wetim mi klostu long dua bilong banis . "

translation.en: " as soon as i opened the gate , he would jump up and embrace me with his forelimbs , and i would embrace him .
translation.zu: em i tok moa : " taim mi opim dua , wantu em bai kalap na holim mi na mi holim em .

translation.en: we 'd talk to each other in a language that said , ' it 's great to see you ! '
translation.zu: i olsem mitupela i toktok wantaim olsem , ' mi amamas tru long lukim yu ! '

translation.en: then joey would bound up the driveway a few yards like an excited dog , hop back , and repeat the process until we got to the house . "
translation.zu: nau joi bai kalap kalap i go inap sampela mita na em tanim na kalap i kam bek gen long mi , wankain olsem wanpela dok i save mekim taim em i amamas nogut tru .

translation.en: people living in the australian bush are legally permitted to have pet kangaroos , as john 's family did .
translation.zu: em i mekim dispela pasin i go i go inap mitupela i kamap pinis long haus . "

translation.en: even though it was the name john gave his pet , " joey " is , in fact , the common term for a baby kangaroo .
translation.zu: john i bin givim nem joi long bikpela sikau bilong em , tasol tru tru dispela nem joi ( mas kolim olsem jo - i ) i save makim olgeta bikpela sikau bebi .

translation.en: naturally , the joey 's adopted family want to make it feel at home quickly .
translation.zu: ol famili i lukautim wanpela joi ol i laik bai em i ken amamas long i stap bilong em .

translation.en: so one of the first things they do is give it a pouch .
translation.zu: olsem na namba wan samting ol i save mekim em i olsem : ol bai givim wanpela paus long em .

translation.en: they choose a location away from the elements - and at a comfortable distance from the fireplace - and there they nail a large , tough cloth bag with a slot cut in it to resemble a mother kangaroo 's pouch .
translation.zu: ol bai pasim wanpela bikpela bek ol i wokim long strongpela laplap long wanpela hap insait long haus i klostu liklik long ples bilong wokim paia na ol bai katim wanpela hul long en , lukluk bilong en i wankain olsem paus bilong bikpela sikau mama .

translation.en: then they put the joey into it with a bottle of warm , specially prepared milk .
translation.zu: nau ol bai putim wanpela botol susu i narapela kain na i hat liklik long dispela paus .

translation.en: in this way many joeys are helped to survive .
translation.zu: long dispela rot ol i helpim planti joi long i stap laip .

translation.en: they soon adapt to their new pouch , diving into it headfirst , as if it were their mother 's .
translation.zu: kwiktaim ol i lain long nupela paus bilong ol na ol bai sut i go insait long en olsem em paus bilong mama bilong ol .

translation.en: how do you describe a kangaroo ?
translation.zu: bikpela sikau i luk olsem wanem ?

translation.en: animals that raise their young in a pouch , or marsupium , are called marsupials .
translation.zu: ol animal i save mekim bikpela long pikinini bilong ol insait long wanpela paus ol i kolim ol dispela animal olsem masupil .

translation.en: comprising some 260 species , marsupials include the kangaroo , koala , wombat , bandicoot , and opossum , the only species native to north america .
translation.zu: i gat 260 narapela narapela animal bilong lain masupil , na ol bikpela sikau , ol koala , ol mumut , na ol kapul ol i insait long dispela lain ; na long not amerika wanpela kain kapul tasol i stap .

translation.en: he likened the animal to ' a greyhound that jumps like a hare or a deer . '
translation.zu: em i tok , dispela animal i kain olsem ' wanpela bikpela dok na em i save kalap olsem wanpela rabit o dia . '

translation.en: when a live kangaroo was later exhibited in london , it caused a sensation .
translation.zu: bihain ol i kisim wanpela bikpela sikau i kam long landon na taim ol man i lukim ol i kirap nogut tru .

translation.en: their small but powerful forelimbs resemble human arms , especially when the kangaroo stands erect .
translation.zu: liklik han bilong ol i gat strong na i luk olsem han bilong man taim sikau i sanap stret .

translation.en: kangaroos also have large , muscular hips ; a long , thick , sinuous tail ; and , of course , huge feet - a characteristic that has earned them the designation " macropodidae , " meaning " long feet . "
translation.zu: masol bilong lek i bikpela na tel em i longpela na lek daunbilo em i traipela . long dispela as ol i givim nem " macropodidae " long ol , insait bilong dispela tok i olsem " longpela lek . "

translation.en: some 55 species of macropodidae range in size from that of a man down to that of a rat .
translation.zu: i gat 55 narapela narapela animal macropodidae . sampela i bikpela olsem man na sampela i liklik olsem rat .

translation.en: all macropodidae have short forelimbs and long hind limbs for hopping .
translation.zu: olgeta i gat sotpela han na longpela lek bilong kalap kalap .

translation.en: one male red kangaroo measured over seven feet [ 200 cm ] from his nose to the tip of his tail and weighed 170 pounds [ 77 kg ] .
translation.zu: wanpela retpela bikpela sikau man em i longpela tru , winim 200 sentimita na hevi bilong em i 77 kilogram .

translation.en: smaller species of kangaroo are called wallabies .
translation.zu: ol liklik sikau ol i kolim walabi .

translation.en: have you ever seen or heard of a kangaroo that lives in trees ?
translation.zu: yu bin lukim o harim stori bilong wanpela sikau i save stap antap long ol diwai ?

translation.en: well , believe it or not , kangaroos do have a " monkey " in the family - the tree kangaroo .
translation.zu: dispela animal i save stap long bikbus bilong niugini na long hap not - is bilong ostrelia .

translation.en: found in the tropical rain forests of new guinea and northeastern australia , these shorter - legged , agile animals , so at home in trees , can leap some 30 feet [ 9 m ] from one branch or tree to another .
translation.zu: lek bilong ol i sotpela liklik na ol i save stap antap long ol diwai . ol inap kalap long wanpela diwai na i go long narapela diwai i stap longwe olsem 9 - pela mita .

translation.en: at night they descend to the forest floor , where they feed mainly on herbs and grubs .
translation.zu: long nait ol i save lusim diwai na go long graun bilong painim ol sayor na binatang bilong kaikai .

translation.en: their tail and short forelimbs become a tripod that supports their weight as they lift their hind legs forward .
translation.zu: ol i sanap long tupela sotpela han na long tel na pulim tupela bikpela lek wantaim i go pas .

translation.en: but they are graceful runners .
translation.zu: tasol pasin bilong ol long ran i naispela .

translation.en: when bounding along at up to 30 miles [ 50 km ] an hour , they use their great tail to balance themselves .
translation.zu: taim ol i spit olsem 50 kilomita long wanpela aua ol i mekim wok long traipela tel bilong ol na ol i no pundaun .

translation.en: according to the world book encyclopedia , they " can reach a top speed of over 60 kilometers [ 38 miles ] an hour . "
translation.zu: olsem the world book encyclopedia i tok , " sapos ol i spit tru ol inap spit olsem 60 kilomita long wanpela aua . "

translation.en: in the case of a large kangaroo , a single hop at high speed may span from 30 [ 9 ] to 44 feet [ 13.5 m ] - a leap that could almost pass for flying !
translation.zu: taim wanpela bikpela sikau i spit olsem , em inap kalap i go inap 13 na hap mita long wanpela taim - klostu i olsem em i laik flai !

translation.en: kangaroos are not only fast but also efficient in their use of energy .
translation.zu: ol bikpela sikau i save spit na ol i no save lusim nating strong bilong ol .

translation.en: professor uwe proske , of monash university in melbourne , australia , says that a kangaroo 's oxygen consumption is actually more energy efficient at higher speeds than it is at lower speeds .
translation.zu: profesa uwe proske bilong yunivesiti monash long melbon , ostrelia , em i tok taim yu skelim win oksijen bikpela sikau i save pulim taim em i spit em i liklik long win oksijen em i save pulim taim em i wokabaut isi isi .

translation.en: proske also calculated that " at 20 kilometres [ 12 miles ] per hour or faster , the energy used by the hopping kangaroo was less than that of a four - legged placental mammal [ a mammal that is born fully developed , like a dog or a deer ] of similar weight , running at the same speed . "
translation.zu: na proske i tok moa olsem " sapos yu skelim strong bikpela sikau i mas lusim bilong spit inap 20 kilomita long wanpela aua wantaim strong dok o dia i bikpela olsem sikau i mas lusim bilong spit olsem , dok na dia i mas lusim bikpela strong moa . "

translation.en: because of the kangaroo 's energy - efficient locomotion , it can travel long distances without tiring .
translation.zu: bikpela sikau i no lusim nating strong bilong em na long dispela as em inap ran i go longwe tru na skin i no les .

translation.en: but how does the kangaroo manage to run so economically ?
translation.zu: tasol wanem samting i mekim na em i no lusim bikpela strong ?

translation.en: " it is as though kangaroos are hopping on pairs of coiled springs , " says proske .
translation.zu: proske i tok : " lek bilong bikpela sikau i olsem tupela strongpela spring . "

translation.en: kangaroos hop at the same number of hops per second ( about two for a red kangaroo ) over a wide range of speeds .
translation.zu: maski ol i ran long wanem spit , ol bikpela sikau i save kalap tupela taim insait long ol wan wan sekon .

translation.en: to go faster , they simply lengthen each stride .
translation.zu: taim ol i laik spit moa ol i kalap i go longpela moa .

translation.en: an exception is when a kangaroo is startled . then it may take off with a few small , rapid hops for better acceleration .
translation.zu: tasol taim ol i pret samting ol bai mekim ol sotpela sotpela kalap bambai ol inap spit hariap .

translation.en: not only do they use their powerful legs but they get additional propulsion by swinging their tail from side to side .
translation.zu: ol bai mekim wok long strongpela lek taim ol i subim wara , na tu , ol bai meknaisim tel bilong ol i go i kam .

translation.en: when chased by dogs , kangaroos have been known to use their aquatic skills by bounding into a water hole or a river .
translation.zu: taim ol dok i raunim ol , sampela taim ol i kalap i go insait long wanpela wara o hul wara .

translation.en: any dog brave enough to go after the kangaroo promptly gets shoved under the water by the kangaroo 's muscular forelimbs and five - fingered paws , each armed with sharp claws .
translation.zu: na sapos dok i bihainim em i go long wara , bikpela sikau bai mekim wok long tupela han bilong em - i gat 5 - pela pinga na kapa bilong en i sap tru - bilong subim dok i go aninit long wara .

translation.en: john , mentioned at the outset , had two dogs that were almost drowned by a wild buck kangaroo when it took them on in a small reservoir on his family 's property .
translation.zu: john , em pastaim yumi bin stori long en , em i tok , wanpela taim wanpela bikpela sikau man klostu em i kilim i dai tupela dok bilong em taim bikpela sikau i pait wantaim ol insait long wanpela wara i stap long graun bilong famili bilong john .

translation.en: resembling little more than a pink worm measuring about an inch long and weighing a fraction of an ounce , they are born hairless , blind , and deaf .
translation.zu: taim mama i karim ol , ol i olsem wanpela liklik retpela snek , longpela bilong en i olsem 2.5 sentimita na hevi bilong en i olsem sampela gram tasol .

translation.en: yet , thanks to its precociously developed forelimbs equipped with claws and its sense of smell , the tiny " worm " crawls instinctively through its mother 's fur and up into her pouch .
translation.zu: ol i no gat gras na ol i aipas na yaupas . tasol han bilong ol i gat ol kapa long pinga i kamap strong liklik na ol i mekim wok long dispela na bihainim smel bilong mama na wokabaut namel long gras bilong mama na kam kamap long paus na go insait .

translation.en: when inside the pouch , it latches onto one of four teats .
translation.zu: insait long paus i gat fopela susu i stap na em bai putim wanpela long maus bilong em .

translation.en: the end of the teat immediately swells into a bulb inside the infant 's mouth , locking it firmly in place for several weeks .
translation.zu: taim em i holim susu long maus , wantu susu i solap na nau pikinini i pas gut tru long en na i no inap lusim inap sampela wik .

translation.en: considering its mother 's mode of travel , a solid anchor is clearly an advantage !
translation.zu: taim yumi tingim pasin bilong mama sikau long wokabaut yumi save em i bikpela samting long em i holim strong susu !

translation.en: in fact , so good is this anchor that early observers assumed that the young grew from the teat !
translation.zu: sampela man bilong bipo taim ol i lukim liklik pikinini insait long paus em i pas strong long susu ol i bin ting pikinini i save kamap long dispela susu !

translation.en: eventually , of course , the joey will grow to the stage where it will leave the pouch , although only temporarily at first .
translation.zu: bihain pikinini sikau bai go bikpela liklik inap long em i lusim paus , tasol em i save mekim inap sotpela taim tasol .

translation.en: however , after seven to ten months , when it is fully weaned , it will leave the pouch permanently .
translation.zu: bihain long 7 - pela i go inap 10 - pela mun em bai lusim susu na em i lusim paus olgeta .

translation.en: but let 's go back in time to when the joey first anchored itself to a teat and see another marvel of kangaroo reproduction .
translation.zu: tasol nau yumi laik stori moa long taim pikinini i pas long susu bilong mama long namba wan taim , na bai yumi ken kisim save long narakain samting i kamap taim bikpela sikau i laik karim pikinini .

translation.en: a few days after the newborn latches onto its mother 's teat , she again mates .
translation.zu: sampela de bihain long taim nupela pikinini i pas long susu bilong mama , mama bai kisim bel gen .

translation.en: the embryo resulting from this mating develops for about a week , but then it goes dormant - on hold , so to speak - while its older sibling continues to grow in the pouch .
translation.zu: dispela namba tu pikinini bai wok long i go bikpela insait long bel bilong mama inap wanpela wik tasol - bihain long dispela em i no go bikpela moa , em i stap tasol .

translation.en: after a 30 - day gestation , it also attaches itself to a teat , but not the one suckled by the older sibling .
translation.zu: na 30 de bihain em i lusim bel bilong mama , na em tu i kam insait long paus na pas long susu , tasol i no dispela susu narapela pikinini i susu long en .

translation.en: therein lies another marvel of kangaroo biology .
translation.zu: dispela pasin bilong kisim susu em i narapela kain tru .

translation.en: the mother gives her youngest joey one kind of milk and the older one a different kind .
translation.zu: susu mama i givim long liklik pikinini em i narapela kain long susu em i givim long bikpela pikinini .

translation.en: how this can be achieved under the same hormonal conditions is an intriguing question . "
translation.zu: olsem wanem dispela samting inap kamap em i wanpela askim i hatwok long bekim . "

translation.en: if you want to see kangaroos in their natural setting , you must be prepared to leave the cities and go out into the australian bush , or the outback .
translation.zu: bilong lukim ol bikpela sikau long hap ol i save stap long en yu mas lusim ol taun na i go long bus bilong ostrelia .

translation.en: foraging for grass and small plants , kangaroos can be found individually as well as in small groups or in larger groups called mobs , which are presided over by big buck kangaroos called boomers .
translation.zu: taim ol i wok long painim ol gras na sayor samting bilong kaikai yu inap lukim ol wan wan sikau o sampela i bung wantaim o planti bai i bung wantaim .

translation.en: because kangaroos feed mainly at night and rest in the shade ( where they are well camouflaged ) during the heat of the day , a good time to see them is early in the morning or at dusk .
translation.zu: taim bikpela lain i bung bai i gat wanpela bikpela sikau man ol i kolim buma em i stap olsem bos bilong ol . gutpela taim bilong lukim ol em long moningtaim tru o klostu long tudak , long wanem , ol i save kaikai long nait na long san ol i save hait long san na malolo .

translation.en: but in cooler weather , they may be active throughout the day .
translation.zu: tasol taim san i no hat tumas , ating ol bai raun long de olgeta .

translation.en: whatever the case , be sure to bring a telephoto lens and binoculars - wild kangaroos are very shy animals .
translation.zu: ol bikpela sikau i wel ol i save pret long man olsem na bilong lukim ol gut , gutpela yu bringim kamera i gat strongpela lens na kompas bilong lukluk longwe .

translation.en: of course , you can also see kangaroos at most zoos , wildlife sanctuaries , and national parks throughout australia and in some other countries as well .
translation.zu: tru , yu inap lukim ol bikpela sikau long ol banis bilong ol animal na ol nesenel - pak samting long ostrelia na long sampela narapela kantri tu .

translation.en: regular exposure to humans has made these kangaroos less timid , and so you should be able to get some good close - ups , perhaps even of a mother with a joey peeking out of her pouch .
translation.zu: ol bikpela sikau i stap long ol dispela kain ples ol i no pret tumas olsem na em bai isi long kisim sampela gutpela piksa bilong ol . ating yu inap kisim piksa bilong wanpela joi i stap insait long paus bilong mama na het bilong em tasol i stap ausait .

translation.en: larger joeys always win a smile when they dive into mother 's pouch , only to have their lanky hind legs stick out awkwardly , making mother kangaroo resemble an overstuffed shopping bag .
translation.zu: ol man i save lap taim ol i lukim wanpela joi i bikpela liklik i sut i go insait long paus bilong mama na longpela lek bilong em i stap ausait .

translation.en: a handsome buck may even grant you an erect , stately pose . who knows ?
translation.zu: ating bai yu lukim wanpela bikpela sikau man i gat gutpela skin i sanap stret na lukluk long yu .

translation.en: you may even see a couple of big boomers standing as tall as their long , sinuous legs permit and having a sparring match - genuine boxing kangaroos !
translation.zu: yumi no save , tasol ating yu inap lukim tupela bikpela sikau man i sanap stret na mekim boksen !

translation.en: true , other animals may be able to run faster or jump higher , but with no other creature will you see such a remarkable combination of grace , power , and spring on just two mighty legs .
translation.zu: tru , i gat sampela animal inap spit moa yet i winim ol bikpela sikau na sampela inap kalap i go antap moa , tasol bai yu no inap lukim narapela animal i mekim wok long tupela strongpela lek na em i naispela tru , i gat strong , na em i kalap kalap .

translation.en: for example , when prodded to do an act of worship to the devil , jesus said : " it is jehovah your god you must worship , and it is to him alone you must render sacred service . "
translation.zu: na yu mas lotu long em wanpela tasol . " bihain jisas i bin skulim ol disaipel bilong em olsem : " long graun hia yupela i no ken kolim wanpela man em i papa bilong yupela .

translation.en: later jesus instructed his disciples : " do not call anyone your father on earth , for one is your father , the heavenly one . " - matthew 23 : 9 .
translation.zu: wanpela tasol em i papa bilong yupela , na em i stap long heven . " - matyu 23 : 9 .

translation.en: to a samaritan woman , jesus described the type of worship that individuals must give to god .
translation.zu: jisas i bin tokim wanpela meri bilong samaria olsem ol man i mas lotuim god long spirit na long pasin i tru .

translation.en: indeed , " the father is looking for suchlike ones to worship him . "
translation.zu: yumi laik lotu na givim biknem long god wanpela tasol .

translation.en: to render worship to anyone or anything else would be a form of idolatry , which is condemned in both the hebrew and the greek scriptures . - exodus 20 : 4 , 5 ; galatians 5 : 19 , 20 .
translation.zu: ol skripsa hibru na ol skripsa grik long baibel i tambuim dispela samting . - kisim bek 20 : 4 , 5 ; galesia 5 : 19 , 20 . sampela i save tok , ' tasol olsem wanem ?

translation.en: ' but , ' some may counter , ' does the bible not indicate that we must also worship jesus ?
translation.zu: sampela tok bilong baibel yet i makim olsem yumi mas lotuim jisas tu wantaim ?

translation.en: did paul not say at hebrews 1 : 6 : " let all the angels of god worship him [ jesus ] " ? '
translation.zu: pol i bin tokim ol lain long hibru 1 : 6 olsem : " olgeta ensel bilong god i mas lotu long em [ jisas ] . "

translation.en: ( king james version ) how can we understand this scripture in the light of what the bible says about idolatry ?
translation.zu: ' ( king james version ) olsem wanem yumi inap kisim stretpela tingting long dispela skripsa wantaim tok baibel i mekim long pasin bilong lotuim ol god giaman ?

translation.en: first , we have to understand what paul meant here by worship .
translation.zu: pastaim yumi mas save long tingting bilong pol taim em i kolim dispela tok , lotu .

translation.en: he used the greek word pro · sky · neʹo .
translation.zu: em i bin mekim wok long wanpela tok grik olsem pro · sky · neʹo .

translation.en: unger 's bible dictionary says that this word literally means to ' kiss the hand of someone in token of reverence or to do homage . '
translation.zu: wanpela buk dikseneri ( unger 's bible dictionary ) i tok , insait bilong dispela tok i makim pasin bilong ' kis long han bilong narapela olsem yu laik stap daun long em o litimapim em . '

translation.en: consider the parable jesus gave of the slave who was unable to repay a substantial sum of money to his master .
translation.zu: tingim tok piksa bilong jisas long wanpela wokboi i no inap bekim bikpela dinau bilong em long bos .

translation.en: a form of this greek word appears in this parable , and in translating it the king james version says that " the servant therefore fell down , and worshipped [ form of pro · sky · neʹo ] him [ the king ] , saying , lord , have patience with me , and i will pay thee all . "
translation.zu: long dispela tok piksa ol i mekim wok long wanpela hap bilong dispela tok grik , olsem na long wanpela baibel ( king james version ) ol i bin tanim dispela tok olsem , " dispela wokboi i brukim skru na lotuim [ hap tok i kam long dispela tok pro · sky · neʹo ] [ king ] , na tok olsem , bikpela , yu mas isi long mi , bihain bai mi bekim olgeta dinau bilong mi . " olsem wanem ?

translation.en: was this man committing an idolatrous act ?
translation.zu: yu ting dispela man i lotuim king olsem wanpela god ?

translation.en: not at all !
translation.zu: nogat tru !

translation.en: he was merely expressing the kind of reverence and respect due the king , his master and superior .
translation.zu: em i bihainim pasin daun na tingim namba bilong king , long wanem , king i stap olsem bos bilong em .

translation.en: such acts of obeisance , or expressions of respect , were fairly common in the orient of bible times .
translation.zu: long taim bilong ol man i bin raitim baibel , planti man i stap long hap bilong is ol i save brukim skru samting long bikman .

translation.en: in this light we can better understand what happened when the astrologers found the young child jesus , whom they recognized as " the one born king of the jews . "
translation.zu: ( stat 42 : 6 ) ol dispela tok i helpim yumi long save long samting i bin kamap taim ol lain i save lukluk long ol sta i painim yangpela pikinini jisas , ol i save " em king bilong ol juda . "

translation.en: as rendered in the king james version , the account tells us that they " fell down , and worshipped [ pro · sky · neʹo ] him . " - matthew 2 : 2 , 11 .
translation.zu: wanpela baibel ( king james version ) i tok olsem , " ol i brukim skru na lotu ( pro · sky · neʹo ) long em . " - matyu 2 : 2 , 11 .

translation.en: clearly , then , the word pro · sky · neʹo , rendered " worship " in some bible translations , is not reserved exclusively for the type of adoration due jehovah god .
translation.zu: olsem na dispela tok pro · sky · neʹo em sampela baibel i save tanim olsem " lotu " i no makim pasin yumi mas mekim bilong lotuim god jehova tasol , nogat .

translation.en: it can also refer to the respect and honor shown to another person .
translation.zu: em inap makim pasin bilong tingim narapela o daun long em .

translation.en: in an effort to avoid any misunderstanding , some bible translations render the word pro · sky · neʹo at hebrews 1 : 6 as " pay him homage " ( new jerusalem bible ) , " honour him " ( the complete bible in modern english ) , " bow down before him " ( twentieth century new testament ) , or " do obeisance to him " ( new world translation ) .
translation.zu: bilong kamapim tok ol man i no inap paul long en , sampela baibel i save tanim dispela tok pro · sky · neʹo long hibru 1 : 6 olsem " givim biknem long em " ( new jerusalem bible ) , o " litimapim em " ( the complete bible in modern english ) , o " putim pes i go daun " ( twentieth century new testament ) , o " brukim skru long em " ( new world translation ) .

translation.en: jesus is worthy of obeisance
translation.zu: i stret yumi brukim skru long jisas

translation.en: is jesus worthy of such obeisance ?
translation.zu: i stret yumi brukim skru long jisas ?

translation.en: in his letter to the hebrews , the apostle paul explains that as the " heir of all things , " jesus has " sat down on the right hand of the majesty in lofty places . "
translation.zu: long pas em i raitim long ol hibru , aposel pol i bin tok jisas em i ' dispela pikinini bilong kisim olgeta samting ' na em i " sindaun long han sut bilong namba wan king i stap antap . "

translation.en: thus , " in the name of jesus every knee should bend of those in heaven and those on earth and those under the ground , and every tongue should openly acknowledge that jesus christ is lord to the glory of god the father . " - philippians 2 : 10,11 .
translation.zu: na olgeta bilong ol i ken tokaut olsem , ' jisas krais em i bikpela . ' na long dispela pasin ol bai i givim biknem long god papa . " - filipai 2 : 10 , 11 .

translation.en: outstandingly , christ will soon use this exalted position and the extensive executive powers that go with it to transform this earth into a global paradise .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na krais bai mekim wok long namba em i holim na bikpela strong em i kisim wantaim dispela namba bilong senisim ol samting bilong dispela graun na kamapim wanpela ples paradais .

translation.en: under god 's direction , and as a result of the ransom sacrifice of jesus , he will rid the world of all sadness , pain , and sorrow for the benefit of those who submit to his righteous rule .
translation.zu: god i makim jisas long mekim wok long ofa bilong em bilong baim bek yumi na pinisim olgeta hevi na pen bilong dispela graun bilong helpim ol lain i daun long wok king bilong em .

translation.en: is he therefore not worthy of our honor , respect , and obedience ? - psalm 2 : 12 ; isaiah 9 : 6 ; luke 23 : 43 ; revelation 21 : 3 , 4 .
translation.zu: olsem na i stret yumi litimapim nem bilong em , na daun long em , na brukim skru long em , a ? - song 2 : 12 ; aisaia 9 : 6 ; luk 23 : 43 ; kth 21 : 3 , 4 .

translation.en: the bible clearly indicates , however , that our worship - in the sense of religious reverence and devotion - must be addressed solely to god .
translation.zu: tasol tok bilong baibel i kamapim klia olsem taim yumi lotu - olsem givim bel olgeta na lotuim narapela bilong givim biknem long em - dispela em samting bilong givim long god tasol .

translation.en: moses described him as " a god exacting exclusive devotion . "
translation.zu: moses i tok god " i no inap larim yupela i lotu long wanpela giaman god . "

translation.en: and the bible exhorts us to " worship the one who made the heaven and the earth and sea and fountains of waters . " - deuteronomy 4 : 24 ; revelation 14 : 7 .
translation.zu: tok bilong baibel i kirapim yumi long " lotu long god , em i bin wokim heven na graun na solwara na olgeta hul wara . " - lo 4 : 24 ; kth 14 : 7 .

translation.en: jesus certainly occupies a pivotal role in true worship , one worthy of honor and respect .
translation.zu: jisas i holim bikpela wok long lotu i tru , olsem na i stret yumi daun long em na givim biknem long em .

translation.en: he is the only way through which we are able to approach jehovah god .
translation.zu: yumi inap go klostu long god jehova long rot bilong jisas tasol .

translation.en: accordingly , true christians do well to direct their worship only to jehovah god , the almighty .
translation.zu: olsem na ol kristen tru i mas lotu long god i gat olgeta strong , em god jehova .

translation.en: the american academy of pediatrics recommends that children under the age of two not watch television , reports the toronto star .
translation.zu: nius the toronto star i tok , wanpela lain ( the american academy of pediatrics ) i ting ol pikinini i no winim tupela krismas , ol i no ken lukim televisen .

translation.en: research on early brain development shows that babies and toddlers need direct contact with parents and other caregivers .
translation.zu: wok bilong skelim kru bilong ol bebi na ol liklik pikinini i kamapim olsem ol papamama na ol narapela i lukautim pikinini ol i mas toktok wantaim ol .

translation.en: not all experts agree , however .
translation.zu: tasol olgeta saveman i no wanbel wantaim dispela tok .

translation.en: the canadian pediatric society , for example , says that watching quality programming with parental supervision for a maximum of 30 minutes a day provides the child " an opportunity to be taught by a parent . "
translation.zu: olsem : wanpela lain ( the canadian pediatric society ) i tok , pasin bilong lukim ol gutpela program wantaim papamama inap 30 minit long wanpela de , em i ' opim rot long papa o mama i ken skulim pikinini . '

translation.en: both organizations agree , however , that young children should not have televisions or computers in their bedrooms and that tv should not be used as a baby - sitter .
translation.zu: tasol dispela tupela lain wantaim i tok , ol pikinini i no ken kisim televisen o kompiuta long rum slip bilong ol , na televisen i no ken kamap olsem samting bilong was long pikinini .

translation.en: since tv viewing can affect the health of young people , it is suggested that " children be encouraged to play outside , read books or work with puzzles or games . "
translation.zu: pasin bilong lukim televisen inap bagarapim skin bilong ol yangpela , olsem na ol i tok ol man i mas " strongim ol pikinini long pilai ausait long haus , o ritim buk , o mekim ol pilai . "

translation.en: why do some people lose their temper or even become violent at work ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem sampela man i kros o pait long ples wok ?

translation.en: he believes that this condition develops in some employees who feel that they are being " asked to sell their souls at work and then discover the payoff is not proportionate to what they have given , " reports the globe and mail newspaper .
translation.zu: wanpela nius ( globe and mail ) i tok , dispela dokta i bilip olsem dispela samting i painim sampela wokman em ol i pilim olsem " ol i mas mekim bikpela wok tumas , na pe ol i kisim long wok i no stret wantaim bikpela wok ol i bin mekim . "

translation.en: klarreich cautions that prolonged anger is " a very unhealthy emotion " that can lead to strokes or heart attacks .
translation.zu: klarreich i tok , pasin bilong kros inap longpela taim em i " wanpela samting bilong nogutim tru skin " na em inap kamapim sik strok o hat - atek .

translation.en: he encourages employees to learn to accept frustrations and to sit down with their employers and calmly discuss how much work they can realistically do .
translation.zu: em i kirapim ol wokman long lain long karim hevi , na long pasin isi ol i mas toktok wantaim bos bilong ol long hamas wok tru ol inap long mekim .

translation.en: on the other hand , klarreich advises employers to be alert to employees who seem to be burning out and to give them extra help , relieve them of some of their load , or suggest that they take a day off .
translation.zu: na tu , klarreich i tokim ol bos long tingim ol wokman em strong bilong ol i laik pinis olgeta na long givim helpim long ol , o rausim sampela wok bilong ol , o tokim ol long malolo inap wanpela de .

translation.en: singing lifts the heart
translation.zu: singsing i amamasim bel bilong man

translation.en: scientists have found that singing releases chemicals in the brain that make you feel relaxed and happy , reports the german newspaper stuttgarter nachrichten .
translation.zu: wanpela nius ( stuttgarter nachrichten ) bilong jemani i tok , ol saientis i bin kisim save olsem pasin bilong singsing i kamapim wanpela kain marasin long kru em i save mekim man i stap bel isi na amamas .

translation.en: researchers say that singing gets the " molecules of emotion " in the brain moving .
translation.zu: ol saveman i tok , pasin bilong singsing i ' kirapim kru bilong man ' long pilim ol samting .

translation.en: thus , " singing is said not only to express emotions but also to create them , " states the report .
translation.zu: olsem na nius i tok : " pasin bilong singsing i bilong kamapim tingting i stap long bel , na tu , bilong kirapim man long pilim ol samting long bel . "

translation.en: music teachers note that many people today feel that singing is " old - fashioned " or that their voices are not very good , and they therefore leave singing and music to the media .
translation.zu: ol tisa bilong musik i tok , planti man long nau ol i ting pasin bilong singsing em " samting bilong bipo , " o ol i ting nek bilong ol i no gutpela , olsem na ol i ting singsing na pilai musik em samting bilong ol man i gat save long en .

translation.en: this research indicates , however , that people benefit when they themselves sing .
translation.zu: tasol save ol i kisim i kamapim olsem taim ol man yet i singsing , dispela i mekim gut long ol .

translation.en: in several german states , farmers are complaining about an increase in the theft of crops , reports the siegener zeitung .
translation.zu: wanpela nius ( siegener zeitung ) i tok , ol fama long sampela provins bilong jemani ol i toktok planti , long wanem , ol man i stilim planti kaikai moa bilong gaden .

translation.en: thieves help themselves to cucumbers by the bucketful and load minivans with piles of asparagus .
translation.zu: ol stilman i pulimapim ol kukamba long planti baket na ol i hipim wanpela kain sayor ol i kolim esperagas .

translation.en: in one case they stole 7,000 strawberry plants .
translation.zu: wanpela taim ol i stilim 7,000 kru bilong stroberi ol i bin planim .

translation.en: although some may steal food because of their worsening financial situation , others seem to view it as a hobby .
translation.zu: ating sampela ol i stil , long wanem , ol i no gat planti mani , tasol sampela ol i stil bilong painim amamas .

translation.en: fields are often located far from their owners ' residences , and in these fields the thieves become even bolder .
translation.zu: planti gaden i stap longwe long haus bilong papa bilong gaden , na ol stilman i no pret long stilim planti moa long ol dispela gaden .

translation.en: the socially active may live longer
translation.zu: ol inap i stap longtaim moa

translation.en: according to a new study by harvard university , elderly people who participate in social activities , such as going to church , restaurants , sports events , and movies , live an average of two and a half years longer than less social people .
translation.zu: nupela save em yunivesiti havat i kisim em i kamapim olsem ol lapun manmeri i save go long ol bung , olsem long haus lotu , haus kaikai , lukim ol spot , na piksa wokabaut , ol i stap inap 2 - pela yia na hap moa , winim ol man i no save bung tumas wantaim ol narapela .

translation.en: it has long been assumed that it was the physical part of such activities that helped people , said harvard 's thomas glass , who led the study .
translation.zu: thomas glass bilong havat , em i go pas long skelim dispela samting na em i tok , inap longpela taim ol man i bin ting pasin bilong wokabaut na raun long kain bung olsem i helpim ol man .

translation.en: however , he added that this study provides " perhaps the strongest circumstantial evidence we 've had to date that having a meaningful purpose at the end of life lengthens life . "
translation.zu: tasol em i tok moa olsem ' ating save yumi kisim long nau i kamapim moa yet olsem taim man i lapun na i stap bilong em i gat as bilong en , dispela bai mekim na em i stap longpela taim moa . '

translation.en: world 's oldest shipwrecks
translation.zu: ol sip bilong bipo tru

translation.en: oceanographers have discovered the wrecks of two phoenician vessels dating from about 750 b.c.e . , reports the french magazine sciences et avenir .
translation.zu: wanpela nius ( sciences et avenir ) bilong frans i tok , ol saveman bilong solwara ol i bin painim tupela sip bilong ol fonisia em ol i bilong yia 750 b.c.e . samting .

translation.en: the 48 [ 15 ] - and 58 - foot [ 18 m ] boats , lying off the coast of israel at a depth of about 1,600 feet [ 500 m ] , are the oldest ships ever found in the open sea .
translation.zu: longpela bilong tupela sip i olsem 15 mita na 18 mita , na ol i slip long as bilong solwara i go daun inap 500 mita , em long hap bilong solwara bilong israel .

translation.en: the boats had set off from the port of tyre carrying earthenware wine amphorae , probably bound for egypt or the north african city of carthage .
translation.zu: tupela sip i olpela tru , winim ol narapela sip ol i bin painim insait long solwara .

translation.en: the researchers said that this discovery " could help to open up a whole new chapter in the research on this ancient maritime culture . " first choice to relax
translation.zu: dispela tupela sip i bin lusim pasis bilong tair na i karim ol dram ol i wokim long graun na i gat wain long en .

translation.en: in a recent study , 1,000 people in 30 different countries were asked which activity they favor to minimize or release stress .
translation.zu: ating ol sip i laik go long isip o long wanpela taun bilong not afrika , em kates .

translation.en: worldwide , 56 percent of those interviewed indicated that music is their first choice , reports reuters news agency . in north america , 64 percent ranked music first , compared with 46 percent in developed asia .
translation.zu: wanpela nius ( international herald tribune ) i kamapim tok bilong man i bin painim dispela tupela sip , em robert ballard , em i tok : " solwara i save go daun tru , na lait bilong san i no go insait tru long en , na wara i stap daunbilo i gat bikpela strong .

translation.en: overall , tv watching came in second , followed by taking a bath or a shower .
translation.zu: ol dispela samting i save lukautim gut ol samting bilong bipo , mipela i no bin ting em bai lukautim gut ol samting olsem . "

translation.en: poverty - a world problem
translation.zu: stap rabis - hevi bilong olgeta hap

translation.en: the president of the world bank , james d .
translation.zu: presiden bilong wol beng , em james d .

translation.en: he added that half of earth 's inhabitants survive on less than two dollars a day ; and one billion , on less than a dollar .
translation.zu: em i tok moa olsem inap 50 pesen bilong ol manmeri i save tromoi 2 dola long wanpela de bilong baim kaikai samting , na wan bilion manmeri i tromoi wan dola tasol .

translation.en: although he is proud of the progress made by the world bank in the fight against poverty , wolfensohn provided figures showing that the problem is widespread and far from being overcome .
translation.zu: wolfensohn i amamas long wok wol beng i mekim bilong pinisim pasin bilong i stap rabis , tasol em i kamapim ol namba i soim olsem dispela hevi i stap long planti hap na ol i no winim yet , nogat tru .

translation.en: he stated : " we must recognize that poverty is a world problem . "
translation.zu: em i tok : " yumi mas save olsem pasin bilong i stap rabis em i wanpela hevi bilong olgeta hap . "

translation.en: if in doubt , throw it out
translation.zu: sapos yu gat tupela tingting , no ken kaikai

translation.en: some molds , such as those in blue cheese , are safe to eat .
translation.zu: sampela mosong , olsem mosong i stap long sis ol i kolim blupela sis , i orait long kaikai .

translation.en: the molds on bread and grain products are among the most toxic .
translation.zu: mosong i save kamap long bret na wit samting em i nogut moa na i gat gip long en .

translation.en: moreover , the toxins produced by mold cannot be destroyed by cooking .
translation.zu: na tu , gip dispela mosong i save kamapim em i no inap pinis taim man i kukim kaikai .

translation.en: ▪ throw out small fruits , such as berries or grapes , that are moldy .
translation.zu: ▪ rausim ol liklik prut , olsem ol beri na grep , ol i gat mosong long en .

translation.en: wash fruit only when you are ready to eat it , as moisture promotes mold .
translation.zu: wasim prut long taim yu laik kaikai , long wanem , wara i stap long skin bilong prut i save kamapim mosong .

translation.en: ▪ small moldy areas of large , hard fruits and vegetables , such as apples , potatoes , cauliflower , or onions , may be safely cut out .
translation.zu: ▪ yu ken katim na rausim ol liklik hap mosong i kamap long ol bikpela na strongpela prut na kaikai bilong gaden , olsem long apel , poteto , koliplaua , o anian .

translation.en: moldy soft fruits , such as peaches and melons , should be discarded .
translation.zu: rausim ol prut i malumalum na i gat mosong long en , olsem melen samting .

translation.en: ▪ moldy hard cheese may be partially salvaged by cutting away the outer part at least an inch [ 2 - 3 cm ] away from the mold .
translation.zu: ▪ yu inap kaikai yet strongpela sis i gat mosong long en sapos yu katim na rausim mosong na 3 - pela sentimita bilong sis i raunim mosong .

translation.en: when meat is cooked at high temperatures , carcinogenic compounds called heterocyclic amines ( hcas ) are formed .
translation.zu: wanpela lain ( research institute for child nutrition ) long dotmun , jemani , i kisim save long dispela samting , na nius test i stori long en .

translation.en: the report suggests that using a simple marinade that includes " an acidic component , such as lemon juice , orange juice or vinegar , " may make grilling safer .
translation.zu: skin bilong ol pikinini i gat wanpela i go inap 4 - pela krismas inap kisim sik taim skin i sot long wara , olsem na ol i mas dring klostu wan lita wara long olgeta de antap long wara samting ol i save kisim wantaim kaikai .

translation.en: in repeated trials , researchers at the american institute for cancer research " found that the marinated foods had 92 % to 99 % fewer hcas than their non - marinated counterparts - and it made no difference whether they were marinated for 40 minutes or two days . "
translation.zu: planti ol i save dring inap hap lita tasol , na maski ol i gat laik long dring sampela wara moa ol i no inap . ol saveman i kisim save olsem wanpela bilong olgeta 5 - pela 5 - pela pikinini i askim papa o mama long givim wara samting long em , tasol ol i no save givim long em . wanem samting i gutpela long dring ?

translation.en: a day to remember
translation.zu: wanpela de bilong tingim

translation.en: the evening before he died , jesus instituted a memorial of his death .
translation.zu: long nait paslain long jisas i dai , em i kamapim bung bilong tingim indai bilong em .

translation.en: during it he told his disciples : " keep doing this in remembrance of me . " - luke 22 : 19 .
translation.zu: long dispela bung , em i tokim ol disaipel bilong em : " yupela i mas mekim olsem bilong tingim mi . " - luk 22 : 19 .

translation.en: this year the anniversary of this event falls on wednesday , april 19 , after sunset .
translation.zu: long dispela yia , de bilong tingim dispela bung bai kamap long trinde , epril 19 , long taim san i go daun pinis .

translation.en: as a result , jehovah 's witnesses around the world will be gathered on this special night to observe this memorial in the manner jesus requested .
translation.zu: olsem na ol witnes bilong jehova long olgeta hap bilong graun bai bung long dispela bikpela nait , bilong tingim dispela samting wankain olsem jisas i bin tokim ol long mekim .

translation.zu: ol i laik singautim yupela i kam long bung wantaim ol .

translation.en: please check with jehovah 's witnesses locally for the exact time and place of the meeting .
translation.zu: plis askim ol witnes bilong jehova i stap long hap bilong yu long wanem taim na ples stret ol bai mekim dispela bung .

translation.en: " i know quite a few [ guys ] who say , ' i got a daughter who lives over here and a son who lives over there , ' and the way they say it , it seems like they don 't care . " - harold .
translation.zu: " mi save long sampela man ol i tok , ' mi gat wanpela pikinini meri i stap long dispela hap na wanpela pikinini man bilong mi i stap long hap , ' na pasin bilong ol long kamapim ol dispela tok i makim olsem ol i no tingim liklik ol dispela pikinini . " - harold .

translation.en: every year nearly a million teenage girls in the united states become pregnant .
translation.zu: long olgeta yia klostu wan milion yangpela meri long yunaitet stets i save kisim bel .

translation.en: the vast majority of children born to such mothers are born out of wedlock .
translation.zu: klostu olgeta mama bilong ol dispela pikinini i no marit .

translation.en: of these teenage mothers , 1 out of 4 will end up having a second child within the next two years .
translation.zu: sapos yumi skelim olgeta 4 - pela 4 - pela mama olsem , wanpela bai kamapim narapela pikinini insait long tupela yia samting .

translation.en: says the atlantic monthly magazine : " if current trends continue , less than half of all children born today will live continuously with their own mother and father throughout childhood .
translation.zu: wanpela nius ( atlantic monthly ) i tok : " sapos dispela pasin i stap olsem tasol , bikpela hap lain bilong ol pikinini i kamap long nau bai i no sindaun wantaim papa na mama bilong ol yet na go bikpela .

translation.en: most american children will spend several years in a single - mother family . "
translation.zu: klostu olgeta pikinini bilong amerika bai sindaun inap sampela yia wantaim mama i stap wanpis . "

translation.en: although the united states has a far higher teen pregnancy rate than other developed nations , the problem of out - of - wedlock births is global .
translation.zu: tru , namba bilong ol yangpela i kisim bel long amerika i winim namba bilong ol narapela yangpela bilong ol kantri i gat wankain sindaun , tasol em wanpela hevi i stap long olgeta hap bilong graun .

translation.en: in some european lands , such as england and france , the rates of such births are comparable to those in the united states .
translation.zu: long sampela kantri bilong yurop olsem inglan na frans , dispela hevi i klostu wankain olsem long amerika .

translation.en: what is fueling this epidemic ?
translation.zu: wanem as bilong dispela samting ?

translation.en: behind the epidemic
translation.zu: as bilong dispela hevi

translation.en: to a great extent , this situation reflects the moral degradation of the " critical times " in which we live .
translation.zu: wanpela bikpela as bilong dispela hevi i olsem pasin bilong ol man long dispela taim bilong " planti hevi nogut tru " i wok long go nogut moa .

translation.zu: i luk olsem planti yangpela i stap rabis i gat dispela kain tingting .

translation.zu: em i tok : " long planti yangpela man , pasin pamuk i rot bilong kisim biknem long ai bilong ol narapela i stap long dispela hap ; na ol ting sapos ol i slip wantaim planti meri , i olsem ol i wok long kamap hapman stret bilong pulim ol meri . "

translation.en: what accounts for such a callous attitude ?
translation.zu: wanem as bilong dispela kain tingting nogut ?

translation.en: anderson explains that in many cases the most important people in the life of an inner - city youth " are members of his peer group .
translation.zu: anderson i tok moa olsem , planti taim ol lain i stap olsem nambawan samting long laip bilong yangpela man i stap long biktaun , " em ol wankrismas bilong em .

translation.zu: olsem na anderson i tok , long tingting bilong planti yangpela man pasin bilong grisim wanpela meri long slip wantaim ol em i olsem wanpela pilai bilong ol , na ol i mekim bilong " semim meri tasol . "

translation.zu: planti yangpela man i save gut long dispela pasin bilong grisim ol meri .

translation.en: but anderson notes : " when the girl becomes pregnant , the boy tends to retreat from her . " - young unwed fathers - changing roles and emerging policies , edited by robert lerman and theodora ooms .

translation.zu: long tingting bilong god jehova i no olsem .

translation.zu: long tok bilong em long baibel , god i kamapim klia olsem maritpasin i gat gutpela wok bilong en .

translation.zu: taim baibel i kamapim pinis stori bilong namba wan man na meri em i tok moa olsem : " [ god ] i tokim ol olsem , ' yupela i mas kamap planti na i go sindaun long olgeta hap bilong graun . '

translation.zu: em i wokim marit bilong namba wan man na meri , na marit bilong ol em bilong i stap oltaim .

translation.en: it was therefore his will that every child have both a mother and a father .
translation.zu: ( stat 2 : 24 ) olsem na em laik bilong god yet olsem olgeta pikinini bai i gat wanpela papa na wanpela mama .

translation.zu: tasol i no longtaim na ol man i kirap na maritim planti meri .

translation.en: " carry on as men "
translation.zu: stap olsem man tru

translation.zu: orait yangpela man inap mekim wanem bilong kamapim klia olsem em i wanpela man tru ?

translation.en: the bible exhorts : " stay awake , stand firm in the faith , carry on as men , grow mighty .
translation.zu: baibel i tok strong olsem : " yupela i mas was gut na sanap strong long bilip .

translation.en: let all your affairs take place with love . " - 1 corinthians 16 : 13 , 14 .
translation.zu: na yupela i mas givim bel bilong yupela long god na long ol man . " - 1 korin 16 : 13 , 14 .

translation.en: notice that ' carrying on as men ' involves being alert , firm in the faith , courageous , and loving .
translation.zu: tingim dispela : bilong i stap olsem man tru , man i mas was gut , sanap strong long bilip , no ken pret , na laikim tru ol narapela .

translation.en: of course , these principles apply to men and women with equal force .
translation.zu: tru , em ol pasin ol man na meri wantaim i mas bihainim .

translation.en: but if you develop spiritual qualities like these , people will have good reason to respect and admire you as a true man !
translation.zu: tasol sapos yu wok long kamap strong long samting bilong spirit olsem dispela skripsa i makim , bai i gat as na ol manmeri bai tingim yu na tok olsem yu wanpela man tru !

translation.en: take a lesson from the greatest man who ever lived - jesus christ .
translation.zu: larim nambawan man tru i bin i stap long graun i skulim yu - em krais jisas .

translation.en: but how did jesus conduct himself with the opposite sex ?
translation.zu: tasol jisas i bihainim wanem kain pasin taim em i stap wantaim ol meri ?

translation.en: certainly jesus had opportunity to enjoy the company of women .
translation.zu: planti taim jisas i gat rot long bung wantaim ol meri .

translation.en: he had many female followers , some of whom " were ministering to [ him and his apostles ] from their belongings . "
translation.zu: i gat planti ol meri i bihainim em , sampela bilong ol " i save givim ol samting bilong ol bilong helpim jisas wantaim ol disaipel bilong en . "

translation.en: he was particularly close to the two sisters of lazarus .
translation.zu: em i pas gut tru wantaim tupela susa bilong lasarus .

translation.en: in fact , the bible says that " jesus loved martha and her sister . "
translation.zu: tru tumas , baibel i tok olsem " jisas i laikim tumas marta wantaim susa bilong en . "

translation.en: did jesus use his wit , charm , or attractive physical appearance , with which he was no doubt endowed as a perfect man , to lure these women into immoral acts ?
translation.zu: jisas em wanpela man i gutpela olgeta , olsem na em i gat gutpela skin na pasin bilong toktok gut . olsem wanem ? em i mekim wok long ol dispela samting bilong grisim ol dispela meri long mekim pasin i no stret olsem pasin pamuk ?

translation.en: on the contrary , the bible says of jesus that he " committed no sin . "
translation.zu: nogat tru , baibel i tok olsem long jisas , " em i no bin mekim sin . "

translation.en: he did not behave improperly even when a woman who was widely known as a sinner , perhaps a prostitute , " wept and started to wet his feet with her tears and she would wipe them off with the hair of her head . "
translation.zu: na jisas i no bin mekim wanpela pasin i no stret taim wanpela meri i gat nem olsem meri bilong mekim sin , ating em i wanpela pamukmeri em " i krai i stap . [ na ] wara bilong ai bilong en i kapsait long lek bilong jisas , na dispela meri i mekim drai long gras bilong het bilong em yet . "

translation.en: he demonstrated the ability to control his feelings - the mark of a true man .
translation.zu: jisas i kamapim pasin bilong man tru - em i bosim gut bel .

translation.en: he treated women , not as sex objects , but as individuals worthy of love and respect .
translation.zu: em i no gat tingting olsem ol meri i stap bilong amamasim ol man tasol , nogat .

translation.en: if you are a young christian man , following the example of christ - and not that of some of your peers - will prevent you from ' harming and encroaching upon the rights ' of someone .
translation.zu: sapos yu wanpela yangpela man i bihainim pasin bilong krais - na yu no bihainim tingting bilong ol pren , olsem ol wanlain bilong yu - dispela bai helpim yu na bai yu no ' rongim ' narapela .

translation.en: it will also protect you from experiencing the sad tragedy of fathering an illegitimate child .
translation.zu: na dispela pasin bai helpim yu long abrusim dispela hevi bilong kamapim wanpela pikinini taim yu no marit yet .

translation.en: but in the long run , gaining god 's favor will benefit you more than gaining the temporary favor of your peers . - proverbs 27 : 11 .
translation.zu: tasol bihain bai yu save pasin bilong mekim ol samting god i amamas long en i winim pasin bilong amamasim ol pren . - sindaun 27 : 11 .

translation.en: what , though , if a youth has lived an immoral life in the past but has already turned away from his immoral course and truly repented ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem sapos wanpela yangpela i bin insait long pasin pamuk long bipo tasol em i tanim bel na lusim pinis dispela pasin nogut ?

translation.en: if so , like repentant king david , who also engaged in sexual misconduct , he can be assured of god 's forgiveness .
translation.zu: em i stap olsem king devit , em i bin mekim pasin pamuk na god i lusim tingting long rong bilong em taim em i tanim bel .

translation.en: should he marry the girl ?
translation.zu: i stret em i maritim dispela meri ?

translation.en: does he have any responsibilities toward his child ?
translation.zu: em i gat sampela wok long lukautim dispela pikinini ?

translation.en: a future article will deal with these questions .
translation.zu: narapela kirap ! long bihain bai stori long ol dispela askim .

translation.zu: ' dispela pait em i samting bilong god tasol - i no samting bilong yupela '
