translation.en: glen how
translation.zu: glen how

translation.en: during the past six decades , jehovah 's witnesses have fought many legal battles in canada .
translation.zu: inap 60 yia i go pinis na i kam inap nau , ol witnes bilong jehova i bin winim planti kot long kanada .

translation.en: their victories have not gone unnoticed by the legal community .
translation.zu: em samting ol lain i holim wok loya samting i save gut long en .

translation.en: for the part that i played in some of these struggles , i was recently presented with the award for courageous advocacy , by the american college of trial lawyers .
translation.zu: mi bin insait long sampela bilong ol dispela kot na wanpela lain bilong ol loya ( american college of trial lawyers ) i laik praisim mi na ol i givim setifiket long mi , ol i kolim prais bilong sanap strong na helpim ol narapela .

translation.en: let me share with you details of some of these court cases and tell you how i came to be involved in law and with jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: orait nau mi laik stori long sampela bilong ol dispela kot , na olsem wanem mi bin kisim dispela wok loya na wok bilong helpim ol lain witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: in 1924 , george rix , a bible student , as jehovah 's witnesses were then called , visited my parents in toronto , canada .
translation.zu: long 1924 , wanpela sumatin bilong baibel - em nem bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long bipo - george rix i bin kam long haus bilong papamama bilong mi long toronto , kanada .

translation.en: my mother , bessie how , a tiny woman , invited him in for a discussion .
translation.zu: mama bilong mi , em wanpela liklik sotpela meri nem bilong em bessie how , em i tokim em long kam insait na toktok wantaim mipela .

translation.en: i was five years old , and my brother , joe , was three .
translation.zu: long dispela taim mi gat 5 - pela krismas na brata bilong mi joe i gat 3 - pela krismas .

translation.en: mother soon began to attend meetings of the bible students in toronto .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na mama i kirap na go long ol miting bilong ol sumatin bilong baibel long toronto .

translation.en: in 1929 she became a pioneer , or full - time minister , and continued in that activity until 1969 , when she finished her earthly course .
translation.zu: long 1929 em i kirap mekim wok painia , na em i mekim dispela wok i go inap long 1969 taim em i dai na wok bilong em long graun i pinis .

translation.en: her determined and tireless ministry set a fine example for us and helped many to come to a knowledge of bible truth .
translation.zu: pasin bilong em long wok strong long autim tok i bin helpim planti man long kisim save long tok i tru bilong baibel , na dispela i makim gutpela rot mipela ken bihainim .

translation.en: my father , frank how , was a quiet man who at first opposed mother 's religious activities .
translation.zu: papa bilong mi , em frank how , em i no man bilong toktok na pastaim em i no amamas long wok bilong lotu mama i mekim .

translation.en: however , she wisely invited traveling ministers , such as george young , to visit and talk with him .
translation.zu: tasol mama i bihainim gutpela tingting na kisim ol wasman bilong raun , olsem george young , long kam toktok wantaim em .

translation.en: as he observed the beneficial effect of bible truth on his family , he became very supportive , although he never did become a witness .
translation.zu: em yet i no bin kamap wanpela witnes , tasol taim em i lukim tok bilong baibel i helpim famili bilong em , em i strongim mipela long stap olsem .

translation.en: making a decision to serve god
translation.zu: mi gat laik long mekim wok bilong god

translation.en: in 1936 , i graduated from high school .
translation.zu: mi pinisim haiskul long 1936 .

translation.en: during my teen years , i was not very interested in spiritual things .
translation.zu: taim mi gat 13 i go inap 19 krismas samting , mi no save tingting tumas long ol samting bilong spirit .

translation.en: we were in the midst of the great depression , and job prospects were bleak .
translation.zu: em taim bilong bikpela hevi bilong mani , na i hatwok long kisim wok bilong skin .

translation.en: so i went to the university of toronto .
translation.zu: olsem na mi go long yunivesiti bilong toronto .

translation.en: in 1940 , i decided to go to law school .
translation.zu: long 1940 mi tingting long go long skul bilong kamap loya .

translation.en: this decision did not surprise my mother .
translation.zu: mama i no kirap nogut long dispela samting .

translation.en: when i was a child , she had often said in exasperation : " that little rascal will argue about anything !
translation.zu: taim mi stap pikinini yet mama i les pinis long sampela pasin bilong mi na em i tok olsem : " dispela liklik hambak manki i save tok pait long olgeta samting !

translation.en: he will probably turn out to be a lawyer ! "
translation.zu: ating em bai kamap wanpela loya ! "

translation.en: on july 4 , 1940 , just before i began law school , the canadian government banned jehovah 's witnesses without warning .
translation.zu: long julai 4 , 1940 , klostu long taim mi go long skul bilong kamap loya , gavman bilong kanada i tambuim wok bilong ol witnes bilong jehova , tasol ol i no toksave pastaim .

translation.en: this was the turning point in my life .
translation.zu: dispela i kamapim bikpela senis long i stap bilong mi .

translation.en: on february 10 , 1941 , i symbolized my dedication to jehovah god by water baptism .
translation.zu: long februeri 10 , 1941 , mi kisim baptais long wara bilong makim olsem mi dediket pinis long god jehova .

translation.en: i wanted to get right into the pioneer work .
translation.zu: mi laik go insait hariap long wok painia .

translation.en: however , jack nathan , who was then taking a lead in the preaching work in canada , encouraged me to complete my legal training .
translation.zu: tasol brata i bosim wok bilong autim tok long kanada , em jack nathan , em i kirapim mi long pinisim skul bilong kamap loya pastaim .

translation.en: so i did , and i graduated in may 1943 , after which i started pioneering .
translation.zu: mi bihainim tok bilong em na long mun me 1943 mi kisim setifiket , na bihain long dispela mi kirap mekim wok painia .

translation.en: in august , i was invited to serve at the watch tower society 's branch office in toronto and assist with the legal problems that jehovah 's witnesses were facing .
translation.zu: long mun ogas ol i singautim mi long wok long brens - ofis bilong sosaiti was taua long toronto bilong helpim ol long stretim sampela hevi ol witnes bilong jehova i bin kisim long ol lo bilong gavman .

translation.en: the following month i was admitted to the bar in ontario , canada .
translation.zu: wanpela mun bihain mi winim mak bilong mekim wok loya long onterio , kanada .

translation.en: legally defending the good news
translation.zu: sambai long gutnius long rot bilong kot

translation.en: world war ii was raging , and the witnesses were still banned in canada .
translation.zu: em taim bilong namba tu pait na tambu i stap yet long ol witnes long kanada .

translation.en: this was because they refused to engage in nationalistic forms of worship , such as saluting the flag or singing the national anthem .
translation.zu: ol i mekim olsem , long wanem , ol witnes i no laik bihainim pasin bilong lotuim gavman olsem salut long plak , o mekim singsing bilong litimapim kantri .

translation.en: professor william kaplan , who wrote a book entitled state and salvation : the jehovah 's witnesses and their fight for civil rights , said that the " witnesses were publicly reviled and the object of both state action and private attacks by an intolerant government and an openly hostile citizenry caught up in the passions and patriotism of the war . "
translation.zu: buk bilong profesa william kaplan ( state and salvation : the jehovah 's witnesses and their fight for civil rights ) i stori long dispela samting na i tok : " long taim bilong pait ol lain bilong gavman wantaim ol manmeri i bin larim pasin bilong litimapim kantri i bosim tingting na bel bilong ol , ol i tok nogutim ol witnes long rot bilong ol nius samting na gavman i pasim wok bilong ol na ol manmeri i biruaim ol . "

translation.en: the witnesses had been seeking to get the ban removed but without success .
translation.zu: ol witnes i wok long askim gavman long rausim tambu i stap long ol , tasol gavman i no mekim .

translation.en: suddenly , on october 14 , 1943 , it was lifted .
translation.zu: orait wantu long oktoba 14 , 1943 , ol i rausim tambu .

translation.en: yet , witnesses were still in prisons and labor camps , children were still denied access to public schooling , and the ban continued against the watch tower bible and tract society and the international bible students association , a corporation that held title to our property in toronto .
translation.zu: tasol ol witnes i stap yet long kalabus na long sampela banis kalabus bilong mekim wok . ol i pasim yet ol pikinini long go long skul bilong gavman . na tambu i stap yet long sosaiti was taua na intenesenel baibel stiudens asosiesen - graun ol i wokim brens - ofis long en long toronto i stap long nem bilong dispela asosiesen .

translation.en: in late 1943 , i traveled to new york with percy chapman , who was the canada branch servant , to consult with nathan knorr , then president of the watch tower society , and hayden covington , the society 's vice president and legal counsel .
translation.zu: long pinis bilong yia 1943 , mi go long nu yok wantaim percy chapman , em i bin lukautim ol wok long brens bilong kanada . mipela go bilong toktok wantaim nathan knorr , em presiden bilong sosaiti was taua long dispela taim , na hayden covington em nambatu presiden bilong sosaiti na loya bilong en .

translation.en: brother covington 's legal experience was immense .
translation.zu: brata covington i gat bikpela save tru long mekim wok loya .

translation.en: he eventually won an astounding 36 out of 45 appeals before the supreme court of the united states .
translation.zu: bihain em i winim 36 bilong 45 apil long sprim kot bilong yunaitet stets .

translation.en: relief came slowly to the witnesses in canada .
translation.zu: isi isi hevi bilong ol witnes long kanada i wok long pinis liklik .

translation.en: in 1944 the branch property in toronto was restored , and those who had been serving there before the ban were able to return .
translation.zu: long 1944 ol i larim ol witnes i mekim wok gen long brens - ofis bilong toronto , na ol lain i bin stap na wok long dispela hap long bipo ol inap i go bek .

translation.en: in 1945 the highest court for the province of ontario declared that children may not be forced to share in exercises to which they have conscientious objections .
translation.zu: long 1945 nambawan kot bilong onterio i tokaut olsem ol man i no inap subim ol pikinini long mekim ol samting bel bilong ol i gat tok long en .

translation.en: finally , in 1946 the canadian government released all witnesses from labor camps .
translation.zu: orait bihain , long 1946 , gavman bilong kanada i larim ol witnes i lusim ol banis kalabus .

translation.en: under brother covington 's guidance , i learned to fight these issues with courage and determination but , above all , with reliance on jehovah .
translation.zu: brata covington i lainim mi long sanap strong na wok strong long stretim ol dispela tok , na bikpela samting moa yet , mi mas larim jehova i helpim mi .

translation.en: the battle of quebec
translation.zu: pait long kwibek

translation.en: while the religious freedom of jehovah 's witnesses was now respected in most parts of canada , there was one exception - the french catholic province of quebec .
translation.zu: klostu olgeta hap bilong kanada i larim ol witnes i stap fri long mekim wok bilong ol , tasol long wanpela hap nogat - em long hap bilong kwibek , em ol lain i save mekim tok ples frans na bihainim lotu katolik .

translation.en: this province had been directly controlled by the roman catholic church for more than 300 years .
translation.zu: inap 300 yia samting misin katolik i bosim dispela hap .

translation.en: schools , hospitals , and most public services were either run by the clergy or controlled by them .
translation.zu: ol pris i save bosim wok bilong ol skul , haus sik , na planti narapela dipatmen bilong gavman .

translation.en: the premier and attorney general of quebec , maurice duplessis , was a dictator who , according to quebec historian gérard pelletier , inflicted upon the province " a twenty - year reign of lies , injustice and corruption , the systematic misuse of power , the sway of small minds and the triumph of stupidity . "
translation.zu: man i bosim gavman bilong kwibek na i stap loya bilong en , em maurice duplessis . wanpela man bilong kwibek i save raitim stori bilong ol samting i bin kamap bipo , em gerard pelletier , em i tok olsem maurice duplessis em i wanpela dikteta na " inap long 21 yia samting em i paulim ol samting na bihainim pasin bilong giaman na mekim pasin i no stret long sampela lain .

translation.en: duplessis consolidated his political power by working hand in glove with roman catholic cardinal villeneuve .
translation.zu: bilong kisim bikpela strong moa , duplessis i pas wantaim kadinal villeneuve .

translation.en: by the early 1940 ' s , there were 300 witnesses in quebec .
translation.zu: long 1940 samting i gat 300 witnes i stap long kwibek .

translation.en: many , including my brother joe , were pioneers from other parts of canada .
translation.zu: planti ol i bin kam long ol narapela hap bilong kanada bilong mekim wok painia , olsem brata bilong mi joe .

translation.en: i was traveling between toronto and quebec so often that i was eventually assigned to move to quebec to assist non - witness lawyers who were representing our christian brothers and sisters .
translation.zu: planti taim mi save go i kam long toronto na kwibek , olsem na bihain ol i makim mi long stap olgeta long kwibek bilong helpim ol loya i no witnes em ol i wok long helpim ol brata sista kristen long kot .

translation.en: fortunately , a well - to - do witness , frank roncarelli , supplied bail in many of these cases .
translation.zu: gutpela tru frank roncarelli em wanpela brata i gat planti mani , na em i bin baim kot bilong planti brata sista .

translation.en: not only were public authorities arresting and harassing witnesses continuously but unruly mobs , incited by the catholic clergy , were also attacking them .
translation.zu: olgeta taim ol polis i wok long kisim ol na putim ol long rum gat . na i no dispela tasol - ol pris bilong lotu katolik i kirapim ol bikhetlain long bung na pait long ol brata .

translation.en: on november 2 and 3 , 1946 , a special meeting was held in montreal to address this crisis .
translation.zu: long novemba 2 na 3 , long 1946 , mipela wokim wanpela miting long montriol bilong toktok long dispela hevi .

translation.en: brother knorr gave the last talk , entitled " what shall we do ? "
translation.zu: brata knorr i kamapim laspela tok , nem bilong en " bai mipela mekim wanem ? "

translation.en: all in attendance were delighted to hear his answer - he read aloud the now historic document quebec 's burning hate for god and christ and freedom is the shame of all canada .
translation.zu: olgeta brata i bung long dispela taim i amamas long harim dispela bekim - em i ritim wanpela pepa , long nau dispela pepa i stap olsem wanpela olpela rait i stori long ol samting i bin kamap long bipo .

translation.en: within days , duplessis announced publicly a " war without mercy " against jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: sampela de bihain long dispela , duplessis i tokaut olsem nau bai i gat " pait i no gat marimari long ol witnes bilong jehova . "

translation.en: by directing that anyone distributing quebec 's burning hate be charged with sedition - a very serious crime that would lead us out of the quebec courts and into the supreme court of canada .
translation.zu: tasol dispela tok em i sutim long ol witnes em samting i nogut tru , olsem na bai mipela i no ken kot long kwibek - bai mipela kot long sprim kot bilong kanada .

translation.en: in his rage , duplessis recklessly ignored that consequence .
translation.zu: belhat i paulim tingting bilong duplessis na em i no bin tingim dispela samting .

translation.en: with no wine available , brother roncarelli 's fine restaurant in montreal was closed in a matter of months , and he was financially ruined .
translation.zu: brata roncarelli i no inap kisim wain , olsem na insait long sampela mun tasol em i mas pasim gutpela haus kaikai bilong em long montriol na bisnis bilong em i bagarap olgeta .

translation.en: in response , we would suggest an easy remedy : let the police arrest the criminals instead of the christians . that would solve the problem !
translation.zu: bilong bekim tok bilong ol mipela i tok olsem : sapos ol polis i wok long holim ol man nogut tasol na maski long holim ol kristen , dispela hevi bai pinis !

translation.en: l .
translation.zu: l .

translation.en: stein of montreal and sam s .
translation.zu: stein bilong montriol na sam s .

translation.en: bard of quebec city , assisted by acting for us in many cases , especially before i was admitted to the quebec bar in 1949 .
translation.zu: bard bilong biktaun kwibek , ol i bin helpim mipela long planti kot , na ol i bin mekim moa yet taim mi no kisim tok orait yet long mekim wok loya long kwibek long 1949 .

translation.en: pierre elliott trudeau , later prime minister of canada , wrote that jehovah 's witnesses in quebec had " been mocked , persecuted , and hated by our entire society ; but they have managed by legal means to fight church , government , nation , police , and public opinion . "
translation.zu: paslain long em i kamap praim minista bilong kanada , pierre elliott trudeau i stori long ol witnes bilong jehova long kwibek na i tok olsem , ol man " i bin tok bilas long ol , na mekim nogut long ol , na olgeta man i bel nogut long ol ; tasol long rot bilong kot ol i mekim pait long lotu , gavman , kantri , ol polis , na tingting bilong ol man . "

translation.en: the attitude of the quebec courts was manifest in the treatment of my brother , joe .
translation.zu: pasin ol i bin mekim long brata bilong mi joe i kamapim klia tingting bilong ol man i bosim ol kot long kwibek .

translation.en: recorder jean mercier sentenced joe to the maximum penalty of 60 days in jail .
translation.zu: jas jean mercier i makim em long stap 60 de long kalabus .

translation.en: such behavior only proved the truthfulness of the accusations in our tract quebec 's burning hate .
translation.zu: pasin bilong ol i kamapim klia olsem ol tok i stap long nius bilong mipela , kwibek i bel nogut , em i tru .

translation.en: the following are some typical headlines of canadian newspapers outside quebec : " the dark ages return to quebec " ( the toronto star ) , " return of the inquisition " ( the globe and mail , toronto ) , " the stench of fascism " ( the gazette , glace bay , nova scotia ) .
translation.zu: het - tok bilong sampela nius long sampela narapela provins bilong kanada i tok : " taim bilong tudak i kamap gen long kwibek " ( the toronto star ) , " taim bilong misin long kotim ol man i kamap gen " ( the globe and mail , toronto ) , " pasin nogut bilong gavman fasis " ( the gazette , gles bei , nova skosa ) .

translation.en: aimé had distributed some tracts near his home .
translation.zu: aimé i bin tilim ol dispela nius klostu long haus bilong em .

translation.en: at aimé 's trial we proved that quebec 's burning hate contained no falsehoods but that it only used strong language to complain about atrocities against jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: long kot bilong aimé mipela i bin kamapim klia olsem ol tok i stap long nius kwibek i bel nogut i no giaman ; nius i kamapim ol strongpela tok bilong tokaut long ol pasin nogut ol i mekim long ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: we showed that no charges had ever been laid against those who had committed these atrocities .
translation.zu: mipela i soim ol olsem ol polis i no mekim wanpela samting long ol man i bin mekim nogut long ol witnes .

translation.en: the prosecution 's position came down to this : it had become a crime to tell the truth !
translation.zu: i olsem ol lain i kotim aimé ol i laik tok : pasin bilong mekim tok tru i brukim lo !

translation.en: duplessis too relied on that definition in order to suppress criticism of his regime .
translation.zu: duplessis i mekim wok long dispela lo bilong pasim ol man long sutim tok long wok bilong em .

translation.en: but in 1950 the supreme court of canada accepted our submission that in a modern democracy , " sedition " requires incitement to violence or insurrection against the government .
translation.zu: tasol long 1950 sprim kot bilong kanada i orait long tok bilong mipela , olsem long ol gavman demokratik bilong nau , pasin bilong daunim gavman i olsem man i kirapim ol narapela long pait long gavman o bikhet long gavman .

translation.en: quebec 's burning hate contained no such incitements and was therefore a lawful form of free speech .
translation.zu: nius kwibek i bel nogut i no mekim olsem , em i bihainim lo olsem ol man i fri long tokaut long ol samting .

translation.en: in 1947 a civil suit was filed in brother saumur 's name to enjoin quebec city from enforcing its bylaw against jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: long 1947 , long nem bilong brata saumur , mipela mekim kot bilong pasim biktaun kwibek long mekim wok long dispela lo bilong tambuim ol witnes long tilim ol nius sapos ol i no kisim dispela pepa .

translation.en: the quebec courts ruled against us , and again we appealed to the supreme court of canada .
translation.zu: mipela i no winim dispela kot long kwibek , olsem na mipela apil gen long sprim kot bilong kanada .

translation.en: the court recognized that the public distribution of printed bible sermons is a fundamental part of the christian worship of jehovah 's witnesses and therefore is constitutionally protected from censorship .
translation.zu: dispela kot i luksave olsem , wok bilong tilim ol nius i kamapim tok bilong baibel i bikpela samting long lotu bilong ol witnes bilong jehova , olsem na konstitusen bilong kanada i no inap larim wanpela lain i pasim toktok bilong wanpela lotu .

translation.en: the victory in the saumur case led to the dismissal of over 1,100 bylaw charges in quebec .
translation.zu: taim mipela winim kot bilong saumur , ol i mekim dai ol narapela kot ol i laik mekim long ol brata .

translation.en: soon the slate was clean - there were no prosecutions left in quebec !
translation.zu: i no longtaim na i no gat wanpela kot moa bilong ol witnes long kwibek !

translation.en: duplessis ' final attack
translation.zu: laspela samting duplessis i mekim

translation.en: having no laws left to use against jehovah 's witnesses , in early january 1954 , duplessis introduced into the legislature a new law , bill no . 38 , which was described by the media as the ' anti - jehovah 's witnesses law . '
translation.zu: nau i no gat wanpela lo i stap em ol i ken mekim wok long en bilong pasim ol witnes bilong jehova , olsem na long kirap bilong janureri 1954 , duplessis i kamapim wanpela nupela lo em i laik bai palamen i orait long en , em lo namba 38 .

translation.en: it provided that those who suspected that any person intended to make a statement that was " abusive or insulting " could file a complaint without the need to provide any evidence .
translation.zu: dispela lo i tok sapos man i ting olsem wanpela i laik kamapim sampela tok i " nogut o i bagarapim bel bilong man , " em inap kotim em long polis maski em i no inap kamapim long ples klia olsem man i mekim dispela samting o nogat .

translation.en: once the injunction was issued against one individual , all members of that person 's church were equally prohibited from speaking .
translation.zu: taim kot i pasim wanpela man long autim tok , olgeta wanlotu bilong dispela man tu i no inap mekim wok autim tok .

translation.en: in addition , all the bibles and religious literature belonging to that church would be seized and destroyed , and all of its places of worship would be closed until the case was decided , which might take years .
translation.zu: na tu , gavman bai kisim olgeta baibel na nius bilong baibel bilong dispela lotu na bagarapim , na pasim olgeta haus lotu bilong ol inap long kot i pinis , na dispela inap kisim sampela yia .

translation.en: bill no . 38 copied a law devised in the 15th century during the spanish inquisition under torquemada .
translation.zu: lo namba 38 i wankain long wanpela lo ol i bin kamapim long yia 1400 samting , taim torquemada i bosim kot bilong misin long spen .

translation.en: regarding bill no . 38 , the press announced that the provincial police had been instructed to close all the kingdom halls of jehovah 's witnesses and to seize and destroy their bibles and other literature .
translation.zu: ol niusman i tok , bilong bihainim lo namba 38 , ol polis i kisim toksave olsem ol i mas pasim ol haus kingdom bilong ol witnes bilong jehova na kisim na bagarapim ol baibel na ol narapela buk na nius bilong ol .

translation.en: they did , however , continue their public preaching work but with just their personal copies of the bible .
translation.zu: tasol ol i wok yet long autim tok na mekim wok long ol wan wan baibel bilong ol yet .

translation.en: the bill became law on january 28 , 1954 .
translation.zu: long janueri 28 , 1954 , palamen i orait long dispela lo .

translation.en: on january 29 , at 9 : 00 a.m . , i was at the courthouse door to file an action on behalf of all of jehovah 's witnesses in the province of quebec , seeking a permanent injunction against this law before duplessis could even use it .
translation.zu: olsem na long janueri 29 , long 9 klok moningtaim , mi go long haus kot bilong kirapim jas long pasim dispela lo taim duplessis i no mekim wok yet long en .

translation.en: the judge did not grant a temporary injunction because bill no . 38 had not yet been used .
translation.zu: tasol jas i no pasim dispela lo , long wanem , gavman i no mekim wok yet long en .

translation.en: but he said that if the government tried to use it , i could come back to him for protection .
translation.zu: tasol jas i tok sapos gavman i laik mekim wok long dispela lo , em bai helpim mipela .

translation.en: the judge 's action thus had the same effect as a temporary injunction , for as soon as duplessis even tried to use this law , he would be stopped !
translation.zu: olsem na samting jas i mekim i wankain olsem em i pasim dispela lo , long wanem , taim duplessis i laik mekim wok long en , wantu jas bai pasim em !

translation.en: during the next week , we waited to see whether the police would take any action under this new law .
translation.zu: long wik antap , mipela wet i stap bilong save olsem ol polis bai kotim mipela long dispela nupela lo o nogat .

translation.en: to find out why not , i arranged a test .
translation.zu: bilong save long as bilong dispela , mi kamapim wanpela samting bilong traim ol polis .

translation.en: two pioneers , victoria dougaluk ( later steele ) and helen dougaluk ( later simcox ) , went from house to house with literature in trois - rivières , duplessis ' hometown .
translation.zu: tupela painia , em victoria dougaluk na helen dougaluk , ol i go autim tok long ol haus na mekim wok long ol buk na nius long ples bilong duplessis .

translation.en: while the sisters were so engaged , i sent laurier saumur to telephone the provincial police .
translation.zu: taim tupela sista i wok yet , mi tokim laurier saumur long ringim ol polis .

translation.en: sheepishly , the officer in charge said : " yes , we know that the law was passed ; but the next day jehovah 's witnesses got an injunction against us , so there is nothing we can do . "
translation.zu: ofisa bilong ol polis i sem liklik na i tok : " mipela save dispela lo i kamap pinis olsem wanpela lo bilong gavman ; tasol long de bihain long dispela , ol witnes bilong jehova i go long kot bilong pasim mipela long mekim wok long en , olsem na mipela i no inap mekim wanpela samting . "

translation.en: immediately , we moved our literature back into the province , and during the ten years that this case worked its way up through the courts , our preaching work went ahead successfully .
translation.zu: wantu mipela kisim ol buk na nius bilong mipela i kam bek , na inap 10 - pela yia samting taim ol kot i wok long toktok long dispela samting , mipela no gat hevi long mekim wok bilong autim tok .

translation.en: to prove that this law was aimed squarely at jehovah 's witnesses , we decided on a bold move - to send duplessis himself a subpoena , compelling him to attend the trial and give evidence .
translation.zu: bilong kamapim klia olsem dispela lo em bilong pasim wok bilong ol witnes bilong jehova tasol , mipela mekim wanpela bikpela samting - mipela kisim kot pepa i tok olsem duplessis i mas kamapim ol tok bilong em long kot .

translation.en: i cross - examined him for two and a half hours .
translation.zu: mi sanap long kot na toktok wantaim em inap 2 - pela aua samting .

translation.en: i repeatedly confronted him with his public declarations of " war without mercy on the witnesses of jehovah " and his statement that bill no . 38 would be the end of jehovah 's witnesses in quebec .
translation.zu: planti taim mi kamapim ol tok em i bin mekim long ol man olsem bai i gat " pait i no gat marimari long ol witnes bilong jehova " na lo namba 38 bai pinisim wok bilong ol witnes long kwibek .

translation.en: enraged , he attacked me personally : " you are a very impertinent young man ! "
translation.zu: em i belhat olgeta na sutim tok long pasin bilong mi yet taim em i tok : " yu wanpela hambakman stret ! "

translation.en: " mr . duplessis , " i replied , " if we were discussing personalities , i might have a few remarks of my own .
translation.zu: mi tokim em , " mista duplessis , sapos yumi wok long toktok long ol pasin bilong man , nogut mi kamapim sampela tok long pasin bilong yu .

translation.en: but since we have business to attend to , would you please explain to the court why you did not answer the last question . "
translation.zu: tasol mipela i gat sampela wok long mekim , olsem na yu ken tokim ol lain i harim kot , i gat wanem as na yu no bekim laspela askim . "

translation.en: in 1964 , i argued the bill no . 38 case before the supreme court of canada .
translation.zu: long 1964 mi mekim tok long sprim kot bilong kanada olsem lo namba 38 i no stret .

translation.en: however , by that time duplessis was dead , and no one cared about bill no . 38 any longer .
translation.zu: na tu , taim mi mekim dispela tok long kot , duplessis i dai pinis , olsem na i no gat man i tingim moa lo namba 38 .

translation.en: shortly before duplessis died in 1959 , he was ordered by the supreme court of canada to pay damages to brother roncarelli for having illegally canceled his liquor license .
translation.zu: paslain liklik long taim duplessis i dai long 1959 , sprim kot bilong kanada i tok em i mas givim mani long brata roncarelli bilong stretim hevi i bin kamap taim duplessis i brukim lo bilong gavman na rausim laisens bilong em .

translation.en: since that time many of the people of quebec have become very friendly .
translation.zu: kirap long dispela taim i kam inap long nau , planti ol manmeri long kwibek i save amamas long mipela .

translation.en: the number of witnesses there has grown from 300 in 1943 to over 33,000 today , according to a government census .
translation.zu: sensus bilong gavman i tok namba bilong ol witnes i go bikpela - long 1943 i gat 300 i stap , na long nau namba bilong ol i winim 33,000 .

translation.en: jehovah 's witnesses are now listed as the fourth - largest religious group in the province .
translation.zu: long nau i gat 3 - pela narapela lotu tasol i gat bikpela namba moa i winim namba bilong ol witnes long kwibek .

translation.en: i do not regard these legal victories or the success of the ministry of jehovah 's witnesses as achievements of any human .
translation.zu: mi no ting em wok bilong man yet na mipela i winim ol kot o namba bilong mipela i go antap .

translation.en: rather , it has proved to me that jehovah gives the victory , for the battle is his and not ours . - 2 chronicles 20 : 15 .
translation.zu: ol samting i bin kamap i kamapim klia tru long mi olsem jehova i save makim husat bai winim pait , long wanem , em i pait bilong em na i no pait bilong mipela . - 2 stori 20 : 15 .

translation.en: in 1954 , i married a charming pioneer from england , margaret biegel , and we took up the pioneer work together .
translation.zu: long 1954 mi maritim margaret biegel , em wanpela sista painia bilong inglan , na mipela i kirap mekim wok painia wantaim .

translation.en: i continued to conduct court cases on behalf of jehovah 's witnesses in both canada and the united states and to serve as consultant on some cases in europe and australia .
translation.zu: mi wok yet long helpim ol witnes bilong jehova long sampela kot long kanada na amerika na sampela taim mi helpim ol long sampela kot long yurop na ostrelia .

translation.en: margaret became my secretary and was an invaluable support for many years .
translation.zu: margaret i stap olsem kuskus bilong mi na inap planti yia em i stap olsem bikpela helpim bilong mi .

translation.en: in 1984 , i returned , along with margaret , to live at the canada branch , and i helped to reestablish a legal department .
translation.zu: long 1984 mi wantaim margaret i go bek na stap long brens - ofis bilong kanada , na mi helpim ol long kamapim gen wanpela dipatmen bilong lo .

translation.en: sadly , in 1987 , margaret died of cancer .
translation.zu: sori tru , long 1987 margaret i dai long sik kensa .

translation.en: after my mother 's death in 1969 , my brother joe and his wife , elsie , who had both been trained as missionaries in the ninth class of the watchtower bible school of gilead , took my father into their home and cared for him until his death 16 years later .
translation.zu: long 1969 , taim mama i dai , brata bilong mi joe wantaim meri bilong em elsie - em tupela wantaim i bin go long skul gileat bilong sosaiti wastaua bilong lainim wok misineri - ol i kisim papa na lukautim em inap 16 yia paslain long taim em i dai .

translation.en: in this self - sacrificing way , they enabled me to stay in the full - time service , and for this i shall always be grateful .
translation.zu: olgeta taim mi tenkyu tru long pasin bilong tupela long daunim sampela laik bilong ol yet bilong helpim mi long mekim yet wok bilong god long olgeta de .

translation.en: over the years , the legal battles of jehovah 's witnesses have changed .
translation.zu: planti kot bilong ol witnes bilong nau i narapela kain long ol kot bilong ol witnes bilong bipo .

translation.en: many cases involved securing property and permits for kingdom halls and assembly halls .
translation.zu: ol i mekim wok long kot bilong kisim hap graun o laisens bilong wokim wanpela haus kingdom o haus kibung .

translation.en: others were child - custody disputes in which non - witness parents used religious bigotry either to gain sole custody or to restrict witness parents from sharing beneficial religious beliefs and practices with their own children .
translation.zu: sampela narapela kot em bilong makim husat bai kisim pikinini taim marit i bruk , na papa o mama i no wanpela witnes i sutim tok long lotu bilong kirapim kot long makim em long lukautim pikinini o pasim narapela long skulim pikinini long ol bilip bilong lotu .

translation.en: an american lawyer , linda manning , came to the canada branch in 1989 to provide temporary legal assistance .
translation.zu: wanpela loya bilong amerika , em linda manning , em i kam long brens - ofis bilong kanada long 1989 bilong stap sotpela taim na helpim mipela long sampela wok loya .

translation.en: then in 1995 and 1996 , linda and i were privileged to spend five months in singapore because of the ban against jehovah 's witnesses in that land and the resulting prosecutions .
translation.zu: bihain long dispela , long 1995 na 1996 , mi wantaim linda i bin stap 5 - pela mun long singapo , long wanem , gavman i tambuim wok bilong ol witnes na i putim sampela long kot .

translation.en: we did not win any of these cases , but we saw how jehovah strengthened his faithful servants to endure with integrity and joy .
translation.zu: ol i kotim sampela man , meri , na yangpela , long wanem , ol i save go long ol miting kristen na holim baibel bilong ol yet na ol nius bilong lotu .

translation.en: grateful to have had a share
translation.zu: mi amamas mi inap insait long ol dispela wok

translation.en: at the age of 80 , i rejoice to be in good health and to be able to continue to have a share in fighting the legal battles of jehovah 's people .
translation.zu: long nau mi gat 80 krismas , na mi amamas long skin bilong mi i stap gut na mi inap mekim wok yet long helpim lain bilong jehova long stretim ol samting long rot bilong kot .

translation.en: i am still ever ready to go to court and make a stand for what is right .
translation.zu: long olgeta taim mi stap redi long sanap long kot bilong tokaut long samting i stret .

translation.en: it is my pleasure to have seen the number of witnesses in canada grow from 4,000 in 1940 to 111,000 at the present time .
translation.zu: mi amamas mi bin lukim namba bilong ol witnes long kanada i go bikpela , olsem long 1940 i gat 4,000 na long nau i gat 111,000 .

translation.en: are there problems ? yes , but the word of jehovah reassures us : " any weapon whatever that will be formed against you will have no success . "
translation.zu: tru , i gat ol hevi i save kamap , tasol tok bilong jehova i save strongim bel bilong yumi : " i no gat wanpela bilong ol dispela samting bilong pait inap bagarapim yu . "

translation.en: based on the more than 56 years i have spent in the full - time ministry ' defending and legally establishing the good news , ' i can testify to how true isaiah 's prophecy is ! - philippians 1 : 7 .
translation.zu: ( aisaia 54 : 17 ) winim 56 yia mi mekim wok bilong jehova long olgeta de bilong " helpim na strongim gutnius , " na mi inap tokaut olsem tok profet bilong aisaia i tru ! - filipai 1 : 7 .

translation.en: tobacco company admits smoking causes cancer
translation.zu: kampani bilong smok i tok smok i kamapim kensa

translation.en: after decades of disputing the findings of various medical authorities , philip morris , the largest cigarette manufacturer in the united states , now acknowledges that smoking causes lung cancer and other deadly diseases .
translation.zu: philip morris - em wanpela bikpela kampani bilong smok long amerika - i bin tok pait inap planti yia long save sampela saveman i bin kisim .

translation.en: a company press release says : " there is an overwhelming medical and scientific consensus that cigarette smoking causes lung cancer , heart disease , emphysema and other serious diseases in smokers . "
translation.zu: tasol nau kampani i tokaut olsem pasin bilong smok i save kamapim kensa bilong wetlewa na sampela sik moa i kilim man i dai .

translation.en: the new york times notes that " previously , the company had contended . . . that smoking was a ' risk factor ' or a ' causal factor ' in diseases like lung cancer , not that it caused the diseases . "
translation.zu: kampani i tokim ol nius olsem : " save ol dokta na ol saveman i kisim i kamapim klia tru olsem pasin bilong smok i save kamapim kensa bilong wetlewa , sik bilong klok , bikpela sik bilong wetlewa , na sampela bikpela sik moa . "

translation.en: yet , despite this admission , the company says : " we are very proud of our cigarette brands and the advertising campaigns that have supported them over the years . "
translation.zu: nius the new york times i tok , " bipo dispela kampani i tok olsem . . . smok em ' inap mekim ' na man i kisim ol sik olsem kensa bilong wetlewa , tasol smok yet i no as bilong ol dispela sik . "

translation.en: since then the number has plummeted to 1,052 .
translation.zu: wok long daunim hevi olsem wanem ?

translation.en: one person who witnessed the demolition of a grain elevator lamented : " times have changed so much .
translation.zu: nius el universal i kamapim tok wanpela lain ( mexican institute of social security ) i mekim bilong helpim ol man long daunim hevi .

translation.en: one grain elevator was converted into a museum and another into a dinner theater .
translation.zu: na pasin bilong wokabaut long bus o lukautim ol plaua samting inap helpim yu long daunim hevi .

translation.en: never enough time
translation.zu: no gat taim

translation.en: the same is true whether people are working outside the home , doing housework , or enjoying leisure time .
translation.zu: dispela samting i save painim ol man maski ol i stap long ples wok , o mekim wok bilong haus , o painim amamas .

translation.en: instead , on average , time for meals has been reduced by 20 minutes and for a night 's rest by 40 minutes .
translation.zu: tasol nau hap taim ol man i save tromoi bilong kaikai i go daun inap 20 minit , na hap taim bilong slip i go daun inap 40 minit .

translation.en: " gambling is now a serious health issue in australia , directly affecting at least 330,000 chronic gamblers , " reports the australian .
translation.zu: nius the australian i tok : " long nau pasin bilong pilai laki em i wanpela bikpela samting bilong bagarapim skin bilong ol man long ostrelia .

translation.en: a commission investigating australia 's gambling industry found that 2.3 percent of adult australians have a serious gambling problem .
translation.zu: nius i tok , long olgeta 5 - pela 5 - pela masin bilong pilai laki long olgeta hap , winim wanpela i stap long ostrelia .

translation.en: do you feel stressed ? as reported in el universal , the mexican institute of social security suggests the following guidelines to help combat tension . sleep as much as your body demands - between six and ten hours a day .
translation.zu: inap 37 pesen bilong dispela lain ol i bin tingting long kilim i dai ol yet , na winim 11 pesen i bin traim long kilim i dai ol yet , na 90 pesen i tok pilai laki i mekim na ol i bel hevi tru .

translation.en: eat a complete and balanced breakfast , an average - size dinner , and a light supper . also , experts widely recommend that you reduce your intake of foods high in fat , limit the amount of salt you use and , after age 40 , reduce your consumption of milk and sugar .
translation.zu: dispela lain i tokim ol bisnis bilong pilai laki long senisim ol samting bilong wok bilong ol , na ol i tokim ol long putim long ples bilong pilai laki ol toksave i stori long ol samting nogut pilai laki i save kamapim .

translation.en: try to find time for quiet meditation .
translation.zu: marasin bilong mekim skin i kamap gutpela

translation.en: toxic beauty a cosmetic procedure that involves injecting the deadly toxin botulin is now being used to eliminate facial wrinkles , reports the toronto star .
translation.zu: nius the toronto star i tok , wanpela samting bilong helpim skin bilong pes i slek pinis long kamap gutpela gen em olsem : ol i givim sut i gat wanpela kain gip ol i kolim botolium .

translation.en: the toxin paralyzes selected facial muscles , which in a few days lose their tone , causing wrinkles to flatten out .
translation.zu: dispela gip i mekim na sampela masol bilong pes i dai na insait long sampela de ol dispela masol i no strong moa , na ol liklik liklik baret bilong skin i lus .

translation.en: the treatment lasts for about four months and leaves a patient with a more relaxed , youthful appearance .
translation.zu: dispela marasin i wok inap 4 - pela mun na skin bilong pes bilong man i kamap olsem bilong yangpela man .

translation.en: there is a toll exacted , however .
translation.zu: tasol dispela samting i gat hevi bilong en .

translation.en: the report cautions that " users lose their wrinkles , but they also lose their ability to raise their brows in surprise , to have a smile spread up to their eyes , [ and ] to frown . "
translation.zu: nius i tok , " ol liklik liklik baret bai lus long skin bilong man , tasol man i no inap apim gras i stap antap long ai bilong makim em i kirap nogut , na taim em i lap , ai bilong em i no lait , na em i no inap mekim pes i kros . "

translation.en: it is a matter of being prepared to " paralyze parts of your face for the beauty of youth , " the paper says .
translation.zu: nius i tok , man i mas redi long " mekim hap bilong pes i dai bambai skin i ken kamap gutpela olsem bilong yangpela man . "

translation.en: " which side is god on ? "
translation.zu: " god i laik helpim husat ? "

translation.en: why are football players praying after scoring a [ touchdown ] ? "
translation.zu: bilong wanem ol man bilong pilai ragbi ol i save beten bihain long ol i bin putim trai ? "

translation.en: the same players who huddle in prayer after a game can also be seen " cursing out reporters " in the locker room or " trying to injure players " during the heat of a sports contest , notes smith .
translation.zu: smith i tok , ol dispela man bilong pilai ol i save beten bihain long pilai , tasol long rum senis ol i save " tok swea long ol niusman , " o ol i " traim long bagarapim ol narapela man bilong pilai " long taim ol i resis .

translation.en: thinking that god favors one team over another " seems to demean the belief in god , " he says .
translation.zu: em i tok , pasin bilong tingting olsem god bai helpim wanpela tim na narapela nogat , " i daunim pasin bilong bilip long god . "

translation.en: thus , his article concludes : " let 's not make sports into more than what they are . "
translation.zu: olsem na long pinis bilong stori bilong em , em i tok : " maski long mekim ol pilai i kamap olsem samting bilong lotu . "

translation.en: bureau of labor statistics , timber cutters topped the list with nearly 129 fatalities per 100,000 workers , while fishers and water transportation workers followed close behind with some 123 and 94 deaths respectively per 100,000 workers .
translation.zu: tasol dispela sik inap kalap tu long rot bilong ol man i save katim mak long skin bilong man , na ol man i save oraitim sik long rot bilong akupanksa , na ol i no bin klinim gut ol sut samting bilong ol .

translation.en: however , " the overall rate of fatal occupational injuries - 4.7 per 100,000 employed - has decreased by about 10 percent " in the last five years , reports scientific american .
translation.zu: long olgeta yia , inap 1,000 manmeri long yunaitet stets ol i kisim lewa bilong narapela man , long wanem , dispela sik i bin bagarapim lewa bilong ol yet .

translation.en: experts have noted that with the increase of malaria , sparrows are now flying farther afield to search for leaves of a tree known for its high concentrations of naturally occurring quinine , which is an antimalarial medicine .
translation.zu: ol saveman i luksave olsem sik malaria i go bikpela , olsem na ol sparo i save flai i go longwe moa bilong painim lip bilong wanpela diwai i gat marasin kwinin long en , em dispela marasin i save oraitim malaria .

translation.en: in addition to using the leaves to line their nests , the birds apparently eat them .
translation.zu: ol dispela pisin i save putim lip bilong dispela diwai insait long haus bilong ol , na tu , ol i save kaikai dispela lip .

translation.en: " sparrows , fond of cities and afraid of malaria , seem to have found a way to protect themselves , " notes the magazine .
translation.zu: nius i tok : " ol sparo i pret long malaria , tasol ol i laik stap long biktaun , i luk olsem ol i bin painim gutpela rot bilong lukautim ol yet . "

translation.en: dirty money
translation.zu: mani i doti

translation.en: more than 99 percent of london 's bank notes are tainted with cocaine , reports the guardian newspaper .
translation.zu: nius guardian i tok , winim 99 pesen bilong pepa mani bilong beng bilong landon i gat drak koken long en .

translation.en: contamination begins when notes are handled by drug users .
translation.zu: drak i pas long mani taim ol man bilong kisim drak ol i holim mani .

translation.zu: lain manmeri long briten i gat 20 i go inap 24 krismas ol i save kisim planti koken moa , winim olgeta narapela drak .

translation.en: according to the london - based youth awareness project , teenagers use cocaine because they feel that it enhances their reputation and increases their power .
translation.zu: wanpela lain ( youth awareness project ) bilong landon i tok , ol yangpela i save kisim koken , long wanem , ol i ting dispela i helpim ol long kisim nem na bikpela namba .

translation.en: as told by leanne karlinsky
translation.zu: em stori bilong leann karlinsky

translation.en: if you could take a trip anywhere in the world , where would you choose to go ?
translation.zu: sapos yu inap go raun long wanpela hap bilong dispela graun , bai yu makim wanem hap ?

translation.en: for me the answer was simple .
translation.zu: mi no gat hatwok long bekim dispela askim .

translation.en: i teach spanish in school , and along with my husband , jay , and my son joel , i attend a spanish - language congregation of jehovah 's witnesses in galax , virginia , u.s.a .
translation.zu: mi lainim ol narapela long kisim save long tok ples spen long skul , na mi wantaim man bilong mi , jay , na pikinini man bilong mi , joel , i save go long wanpela kongrigesen bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long galaks , vejinia , long amerika , ol i mekim tok ples spen .

translation.en: my longing , then , was to travel to spain .
translation.zu: na long dispela taim , mi gat bikpela laik tru long go long spen .

translation.en: so you can imagine how thrilled i was when my parents offered to take me there !
translation.zu: olsem na yu ken save mi bin amamas tru taim papamama bilong mi i laik kisim mi i go long dispela hap !

translation.en: upon our arrival on april 21 , we decided to drive to estella , a small town in navarre , in northern spain .
translation.zu: taim mipela kamap long dispela hap long epril 21 , mipela kisim wanpela ka na mipela laik draiv i go long estelya , em wanpela liklik taun i stap long navare , long hap not bilong spen .

translation.en: i made myself comfortable in the back seat and promptly dozed off .
translation.zu: mi sindaun gut long baksait bilong ka na i no longtaim na mi slip .

translation.en: the next memory i have is of lying in a field , with the sun shining in my eyes .
translation.zu: pastaim mi bin slip long ka tasol bihain bodi bilong mi i slip long graun na san i wok long sutim ai bilong mi .

translation.en: ' where am i ?
translation.zu: mi stap we ?

translation.en: am i dreaming ? '
translation.zu: em wanpela driman bilong mi ?

translation.en: as these questions raced through my mind , a horrible reality settled in .
translation.zu: ol dispela askim i stap long tingting bilong mi na isi isi tingting bilong mi i kamap klia .

translation.en: something was wrong , and this was no dream .
translation.zu: dispela i no wanpela driman , nogat .

translation.en: i called out for help , and a truck driver rushed over to me .
translation.zu: i gutpela samting mi yet wantaim papamama bilong mi i no inap tingim liklik dispela bagarap i bin kamap .

translation.en: then he descended farther down the embankment to the car , where my parents were trapped .
translation.zu: mi singaut bilong kisim sampela helpim , na wanpela man i save draivim ol bikpela trak em i kam lukim mi .

translation.en: " tell the ambulance to hurry ! " he shouted to his partner .
translation.zu: bihain em i go daun long lukim papamama bilong mi , ol i pas yet insait long ka .

translation.en: then he came back to where i lay paralyzed , and with good intentions , he tried to straighten my leg .
translation.zu: bihain em i kam lukim mi gen , mi no inap surik liklik , olsem na em i gat tingting long helpim mi na em i wok long stretim lek bilong mi .

translation.en: i screamed in agony , realizing for the first time how badly i was hurt .
translation.zu: tasol mi kisim bikpela pen tru long en na mi singaut , olsem na mi save mi bin kisim bikpela bagarap .

translation.en: soon i was in the emergency room in the local hospital in logroño .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na mi stap long haus sik long logrono .

translation.en: the police kindly notified jehovah 's witnesses in the area of where i was and what had happened .
translation.zu: ol polis i mekim gutpela pasin na toksave long sampela witnes bilong jehova i stap long dispela hap olsem mi stap we na wanem samting i bin painim mi .

translation.en: before long , many from the congregations in estella and logroño were at my bedside , along with the local hospital liaison committee .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na planti ol i kam long ol kongrigesen bilong estelya na logrono na stap wantaim mi , na ol lain bilong hospital lieson komiti long dispela hap ol i kam tu .

translation.en: indeed , throughout my ordeal at this hospital , dear fellow christians whom i had never before met were ready and willing to care for my needs , around the clock .
translation.zu: tru tumas , taim mi stap long dispela haus sik na karim hevi , ol brata sista kristen mi no bin save long ol long bipo ol i amamas long lukautim mi long san na long nait .

translation.en: they also lovingly cared for my parents , who recovered sufficiently to be released from the hospital about a week after the accident .
translation.zu: ol i mekim wankain gutpela pasin sori na lukautim papamama - skin bilong tupela i wok long kamap orait na tupela i lusim haus sik wanpela wik samting bihain long dispela bagarap i painim mipela .

translation.en: about 1 : 00 a.m . on wednesday , the doctors came to operate on my broken hip .
translation.zu: long trinde long 1 klok long nait , ol dokta i laik katim mi bilong stretim dispela lek i bruk .

translation.en: i told the doctor that i did not want to receive blood .
translation.zu: mi tokim dokta olsem ol i no ken givim blut long mi .

translation.en: * he reluctantly agreed to honor my request , although he told me that i would likely die .
translation.zu: * em i no amamas tumas long dispela samting , na em i tok bai mi dai , tasol em bai bihainim laik bilong mi .

translation.en: the doctor agreed to give me an alternative treatment - injections of erythropoietin ( epo ) , which , along with iron and blood - building supplements , stimulates red blood cell production .
translation.zu: dokta i orait long givim narapela samting long mi bilong helpim mi - em ol sut epo ( erythropoietin ) wantaim marasin ain na sampela narapela marasin i save helpim ol retpela sel bilong blut i kamap planti .

translation.en: * by now , jay and joel had arrived .
translation.zu: * jay na joel i kam i stap pinis long dispela taim .

translation.en: how good it was to see my husband and my son !
translation.zu: mi amamas tru long lukim man bilong mi na pikinini bilong mi !

translation.en: at approximately 1 : 30 a.m . , a doctor told jay that the hospital had already obtained a court order to administer blood if my condition worsened .
translation.zu: long 1 klok biknait samting , wanpela dokta i tokim jay olsem ol lain i wok long haus sik i kisim tok orait long kot long givim blut long mi sapos mak bilong blut i wok long go daun moa .

translation.en: jay told him that my wishes were that i not receive blood under any circumstances .
translation.zu: jay i tokim em , em laik bilong mi yet na mi no laik kisim blut , maski wanem samting i kamap .

translation.en: the doctor replied . jay talked to the hospital liaison committee about transferring me to another facility - one that would respect my wishes .
translation.zu: jay i kamapim tingting bilong em long hospital lieson komiti long kisim mi i go long narapela haus sik - em wanpela haus sik ol bai tingim laik bilong mi .

translation.en: one doctor , for example , assured me that she would do her utmost to make sure that i was treated with all the respect i deserved .
translation.zu: wanpela dokta i tokim mi olsem em bai mekim olgeta samting em inap long mekim bilong kirapim ol narapela long bihainim stretpela pasin na tingim laik bilong mi .

translation.en: the doctors were not moved to help .
translation.zu: dispela i no kirapim ol dokta long helpim mi .

translation.en: " you are going to die ! " one stated bluntly .
translation.zu: wanpela i tok strong olsem , " bai yu dai ! "

translation.en: in barcelona two nurses gently washed me and made me feel comfortable .
translation.zu: long basilona , tupela nes i wasim mi long pasin isi na ol i helpim mi long stap gut .

translation.en: when changing my bandages , one of the nurses saw that they were green and caked with dried blood .
translation.zu: taim ol i senisim banis i stap long skin bilong mi , wanpela nes i lukim olsem banis i bin stap longpela taim na blut i pas long en .

translation.en: she said that she was ashamed that her fellow countrymen had treated me this way .
translation.zu: em i tok em i sem long pasin ol wanlain bilong em long dispela kantri i bin mekim long mi .

translation.en: soon i was receiving the medical treatment that was supposed to have been started at the hospital in logroño .
translation.zu: bihain liklik ol i kirap na mekim ol samting bilong stretim hevi bilong mi , em ol lain long haus sik bilong logrono i no bin kirap na mekim .

translation.en: the results were dramatic .
translation.zu: dispela i kamapim bikpela senis .

translation.en: within days my vital organs were out of danger , and my hemoglobin count had gone up to 7.3 .
translation.zu: inap long sampela de tasol skin bilong mi i wok long kamap orait gen , na mak bilong blut i go antap inap long 7.3 .

translation.en: by the time i left the hospital , it had risen to 10.7 .
translation.zu: taim mi lusim haus sik , mak bilong blut i go antap inap 10.7 .

translation.en: when i needed more surgery at a hospital in the united states , it was up to 11.9 .
translation.zu: na taim ol dokta long amerika i mas katim mi gen , mak bilong blut i antap moa inap long 11.9 .

translation.en: i am grateful for the efforts of doctors and nurses who are willing to accommodate the wishes of their patients , whether they agree with them or not .
translation.zu: mi amamas long wok ol dokta na nes i mekim bilong bihainim tingting bilong ol sikman i kam long ol bilong kisim sampela helpim , maski ol i wanbel long dispela tingting bilong ol o nogat .

translation.en: loida 's journey out of silence
translation.zu: ol samting i mekim na loida inap toktok

translation.en: as told by loida 's mother
translation.zu: mama bilong loida i kamapim dispela stori

translation.en: inadvertently , the doctor had broken loida 's collarbone with his forceps .
translation.zu: dokta i popaia na brukim wanpela bun long sol bilong loida .

translation.en: a couple of weeks after corrective surgery , loida was sent home .
translation.zu: ol i katim em bilong stretim bun i bruk na sampela wik bihain mipela lusim haus sik .

translation.en: our joy , however , was short - lived .
translation.zu: amamas bilong mipela long kisim loida i kam long haus i no stap longpela taim .

translation.en: during the next few months , it became apparent that something was terribly wrong .
translation.zu: insait long 2 - pela mun samting , mipela kisim save olsem loida i gat sampela bikpela sik samting long skin .

translation.en: loida 's medication caused adverse reactions - including fever , diarrhea , and convulsions - and treatment for these symptoms only seemed to make her condition worse .
translation.zu: marasin bilong em i kamapim sampela hevi olsem - skin hat , pekpek wara , na sampela taim skin i guria strong - na i luk olsem marasin bilong stretim ol dispela samting i bagarapim em moa yet .

translation.en: soon loida could not control her bodily movements .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na loida i no inap bosim han lek samting .

translation.en: they said that she would never walk or speak - or even understand us .
translation.zu: ol i tok , em bai i no inap wokabaut o toktok o save long toktok bilong mipela .

translation.en: despite the grim prognosis , i still felt that loida could understand many things .
translation.zu: maski ol dokta i tok olsem , mi yet mi pilim olsem loida inap save long planti samting .

translation.en: so i read simple books to her and endeavored to teach her the alphabet .
translation.zu: olsem na mi ritim sampela ol buk long em , na mi wok long skulim em long abc .

translation.en: but loida could not speak , nor could she indicate any awareness of what i was saying .
translation.zu: tasol loida i no inap toktok , na tu , em i no inap mekim wanpela samting bilong makim olsem em i kisim tok bilong mi .

translation.en: there was no way of knowing what - if anything - she could grasp .
translation.zu: i no gat rot long save olsem em inap kisim gut wanpela tok o nogat .

translation.en: as the years passed , my efforts to teach loida seemed to have little success .
translation.zu: ol yia i wok long kam i go na mi gat tingting olsem wok bilong mi long skulim loida i no helpim em tumas .

translation.en: still , i spent many hours reading to her .
translation.zu: tasol mi lusim bikpela hap taim yet long ritim ol buk long em .

translation.en: we even included her in our family bible study with noemí , our youngest daughter , using the books listening to the great teacher and my book of bible stories .
translation.zu: mipela save kisim em i kam sindaun wantaim mipela taim mipela wokim famili - stadi wantaim noemi , em laspela pikinini meri bilong mipela , long buk harim tok bilong bikpela tisa na buk baibel stori buk bilong mi .

translation.en: * i read many of the chapters from these books to loida repeatedly .
translation.zu: * mi ritim planti ol sapta bilong ol dispela buk planti taim long loida .

translation.en: not being able to communicate with someone you love is truly frustrating .
translation.zu: taim yu no inap toktok wantaim wanpela yu save laikim em tru , bai yu no stap bel isi .

translation.en: it seemed to me that she was tormented by the fact that she could not run and play like the other children .
translation.zu: long tingting bilong mi , i olsem bel bilong em i bagarap stret , long wanem , em i no inap ran na pilai olsem ol narapela pikinini .

translation.en: on one occasion , loida burst into tears when her sister read something to me from a school textbook .
translation.zu: wanpela taim loida i kirap na krai nogut tru taim sista bilong em i ritim wanpela hap bilong buk bilong skul long mi .

translation.en: clearly , something bothered her , but i had no idea what it was .
translation.zu: mi save , wanpela samting i wok long bagarapim bel bilong em , tasol mi no save liklik em i wanem samting .

translation.en: loida 's speech was limited to a few inarticulate sounds , which indicated her basic needs for food , water , bed , or toilet .
translation.zu: loida i no inap mekim ol toktok i klia , em i save mekim sampela krai tasol long nek bilong makim olsem em i gat laik long kaikai , dring wara , slip , o go long toilet .

translation.en: during the next three years , however , her condition worsened .
translation.zu: tasol insait long 3 - pela yia , ol hevi bilong em i go nogut moa .

translation.en: she was afraid to walk even a few steps without help , and she all but stopped uttering any speech sounds .
translation.zu: sapos i no gat wanpela long helpim em , em i pret long wokabaut liklik , na em i no traim na kamapim sampela toktok olsem long bipo .

translation.en: my husband and i decided that it would be better to educate loida at home .
translation.zu: mi na man bilong mi i ting olsem em bai gutpela moa sapos loida i kisim sampela skul long haus .

translation.en: for the next six years , i taught loida as well as i could .
translation.zu: insait long 6 - pela yia mi wok strong long skulim loida .

translation.en: i wrote letters on a blackboard , hoping that loida would copy them .
translation.zu: mi raitim ol leta long blakbot , na mi laik bai loida i raitim ol dispela leta .

translation.en: was the problem a lack of comprehension , or was it that loida could not write because she had no control over the movements of her hands ?
translation.zu: mi no save i gat wanem as na loida i no inap rait - nogut em i no inap kisim save , o em i no inap bosim tupela han bilong em .

translation.en: by age 18 , loida had become so difficult to manage that i earnestly prayed to jehovah , begging him to help me communicate with my daughter .
translation.zu: taim loida i gat 18 krismas , wok bilong lukautim em i givim bikpela hatwok tru long mi , olsem na mi beten strong long jehova long helpim mi long painim rot bilong toktok wantaim em .

translation.en: the answer to my prayer came in an unusual way .
translation.zu: bekim bilong dispela beten i kam long narapela kain rot .

translation.en: breaking through the silence
translation.zu: rot i op bilong toktok

translation.en: a turning point came when my daughters were redecorating our bedroom .
translation.zu: senis i kamap taim ol pikinini meri bilong mi i laik penim rum slip bilong mipela .

translation.en: before stripping off the old wallpaper , noemí wrote some names on the wall - names from the bible and names of friends and family members .
translation.zu: taim ol i laik rausim olpela pepa i stap long ol banis bilong rum , pastaim noemi i raitim sampela nem long en - em sampela nem i stap long baibel na nem bilong sampela pren na famili bilong mipela .

translation.en: surprisingly , loida went to the wall and put her head next to where god 's name appeared .
translation.zu: bilong bekim dispela askim , loida i go na putim het bilong em klostu long nem bilong god .

translation.en: rut wondered if loida could recognize the other names , so she tested her .
translation.zu: bilong painimaut olsem loida i save long ol narapela nem o nogat , rut i givim sampela askim moa long em .

translation.en: to rut 's amazement , loida could identify every one of them - even the names she had never seen spelled out before !
translation.zu: rut i kirap nogut tru taim loida inap makim olgeta nem em i bin kolim - na sampela nem em i makim , em i no bin lukim bipo !

translation.en: rut gathered the entire family to see it for themselves .
translation.zu: rut i singautim olgeta long famili long kam na lukim dispela samting .

translation.en: loida could read !
translation.zu: loida i save long rit !

translation.en: in time , we came up with a method that would help loida " speak " to us .
translation.zu: bihain mipela i kamapim wanpela rot na loida inap " toktok " wantaim mipela .

translation.en: we attached letters of the alphabet to the wall of our long hallway .
translation.zu: mipela i pasim ol leta abc insait long sampela banis bilong haus .

translation.en: putting smaller letters on a hand - held board would not work , since loida does not have enough control of her hands to point to each letter .
translation.zu: loida i no inap bosim tumas tupela han bilong em , olsem na mipela no inap putim ol leta long samting em i ken holim long han na mekim wok long en .

translation.en: so when loida wished to communicate , she would spell out her message by walking up to each letter on the wall .
translation.zu: olsem na taim loida i laik toktok wantaim mipela , em bai go sanap klostu long ol wan wan leta bilong kamapim ol tok mipela ken ritim .

translation.en: as you can imagine , this would be quite tiring .
translation.zu: dispela i kisim bikpela hap taim liklik .

translation.en: in fact , loida had to walk miles just to compose a single page of communication , and it could take hours for her to complete it !
translation.zu: tru tumas , bilong kamapim planti tok liklik loida i mas wokabaut i go i kam , inap olsem sampela kilomita , na dispela wok inap kisim sampela aua !

translation.en: nevertheless , loida is thrilled to be able to " talk " to us .
translation.zu: maski em i bikpela wok liklik , loida i amamas long " toktok " wantaim mipela long dispela rot .

translation.en: in fact , this was her first message to us : " i am so happy that , thanks to jehovah , i can now communicate . "
translation.zu: namba wan tok em i bin kamapim long mipela i olsem : " mi amamas tru na mi laik tok tenkyu long jehova , nau mi inap toktok wantaim yupela . "

translation.en: astonished , we asked loida : " what were you doing while you were sitting all day ? "
translation.zu: mipela i kirap nogut na givim askim long loida olsem : " yu bin mekim wanem taim yu sindaun long de olgeta ? "

translation.en: loida told us that she would work out in her mind what she wished she could say to us .
translation.zu: loida i tok em i bin tingting long ol tok em i laik mekim long mipela .

translation.en: indeed , loida said that for 18 years she had longed to communicate .
translation.zu: inap long 18 yia samting em i gat bikpela laik tru long toktok wantaim mipela .

translation.en: " when rut started going to school , " she said , " i read the school textbook to myself .
translation.zu: em i tok olsem : " taim rut i kirap na go long skul , mi bin ritim buk skul bilong em .

translation.en: i moved my mouth and emitted some sounds , but you couldn 't understand me .
translation.zu: maus bilong mi i op , tasol mi no inap kamapim ol tok yupela inap kisim .

translation.en: that is why i often began to cry . "
translation.zu: em long dispela as na planti taim mi bin krai . "

translation.en: loida replied : " you are a good mother , and you never gave up .
translation.zu: loida i tok olsem : " yu wanpela gutpela mama , i no gat wanpela taim yu bin les long helpim mi .

translation.en: i have always been happy alongside you .
translation.zu: olgeta taim mi bin amamas long stap wantaim yu .

translation.en: i love you very much .
translation.zu: mi save laikim yu tru .

translation.en: ok ? " spiritual progress
translation.zu: kamap strong long samting bilong spirit

translation.en: loida already had a knowledge of the bible , and she had memorized some bible verses .
translation.zu: loida i gat save pinis long tok bilong baibel , na em i bin lainim sampela ves na putim long tingting bilong em .

translation.en: but soon she told us that she wanted to offer comments at the congregation watchtower study , a weekly question - and - answer bible discussion .
translation.zu: tasol i no longtaim na em i tokim mipela olsem em i gat laik long bekim tok long stadi wastaua bilong kongrigesen , em wanpela miting i gat ol askim na bekim bilong sampela tok bilong baibel .

translation.en: how would she do this ?
translation.zu: em bai bekim tok olsem wanem ?

translation.en: one of us would read the entire article to her .
translation.zu: wanpela bilong mipela bai ritim olgeta tok bilong wastaua ol bai stadi long en .

translation.en: then loida would select a question she wanted to answer .
translation.zu: bihain loida bai makim wanem askim em i gat laik long bekim .

translation.en: we would write down her comment as she spelled it out to us .
translation.zu: mipela bai raitim bekim bilong em taim em i wok long kamapim long rot bilong ol leta abc .

translation.en: then , at the meeting , one of us would read loida 's comment .
translation.zu: na long taim bilong miting , wanpela bilong mipela bai ritim bekim bilong em .

translation.en: " it 's thrilling for me to be able to participate , " loida once told us , " because it makes me feel a part of the congregation . "
translation.zu: wanpela taim loida i tokim mipela olsem : " mi kisim bikpela amamas long bekim tok long ol miting , long wanem , mi pilim olsem mi wanpela wanwok bilong ol narapela long kongrigesen . "

translation.en: when she was 20 years old , loida expressed the desire to get baptized .
translation.zu: taim loida i gat 20 krismas , em i kamapim laik bilong em long kisim baptais .

translation.en: when she was asked if she knew what it meant to dedicate oneself to jehovah , loida replied that she had already done this seven years earlier - when she was just 13 years old .
translation.zu: na taim mipela i askim em olsem dediket em i wanem samting , em i tok em i bin dediket inap 7 - pela yia i go pinis , taim em i gat 13 krismas .

translation.en: " i prayed to jehovah , " she said , " and i told him that i wanted to serve him forever . "
translation.zu: em i tok : " mi bin beten long jehova na tokim em olsem mi bai mekim laik bilong em i go inap oltaim oltaim . "

translation.en: on august 2 , 1997 , loida symbolized her dedication to jehovah by water baptism .
translation.zu: long ogas 2 , 1997 , loida i kisim baptais long wara bilong makim olsem em i dediket long jehova .

translation.en: at times she accompanies us as we preach to people on the street .
translation.zu: sampela taim em i save kam wantaim mipela taim mipela autim tok long ol manmeri i stap long rot .

translation.en: she has also prepared a letter that we leave at the door when no one is at home .
translation.zu: em i bin redim wanpela pas mipela ken lusim long haus taim i no gat man i stap .

translation.en: loida takes a special interest in the elderly and those who are sick .
translation.zu: loida i save tingim ol lapun na ol lain i gat hevi long sampela sik .

translation.en: for example , we have a sister in our congregation who had her leg amputated .
translation.zu: ol dokta i bin rausim lek bilong wanpela sista long kongrigesen bilong mipela .

translation.en: " i know what it means to be unable to walk , " loida told us , and so she prepared a letter of encouragement for this sister .
translation.zu: loida i bin tokim mipela olsem : " mi save pinis long dispela hevi olsem man i no inap wokabaut , " olsem na em i bin raitim wanpela pas bilong strongim bel bilong dispela sista .

translation.en: then there is jairo , a young boy in another congregation , who is practically paralyzed from the head down .
translation.zu: long narapela kongrigesen i gat wanpela manki nem bilong em jairo , na skin bilong em i dai .

translation.en: when loida heard of his plight , she wrote a letter to him .
translation.zu: taim loida i kisim save long hevi bilong em , em i raitim wanpela pas long em .

translation.en: in part , it stated : " soon jehovah will make us well .
translation.zu: hap tok bilong pas i tok : " i no longtaim na jehova bai oraitim sik bilong yumi .

translation.en: in paradise there will be no suffering .
translation.zu: long paradais bai i no gat pen na hevi i stap .

translation.en: then i will challenge you to a race .
translation.zu: long dispela taim mitupela bai ran long wanpela resis .

translation.en: isn 't it marvelous ? "
translation.zu: dispela samting i gutpela tumas a ? "

translation.en: i now understand many things about loida 's former behavior that used to baffle me .
translation.zu: nau mi save pinis long sampela pasin bilong loida long bipo mi bin tingting planti long en .

translation.en: for example , loida says that when she was younger she didn 't like to be hugged because she was so frustrated .
translation.zu: olsem : loida i tokim mipela olsem em i no bin amamas taim em i pikinini yet na mipela laik holim em , long wanem , bel bilong em i bagarap stret .

translation.en: " it seemed so unfair that my sisters could speak and learn things and i could not , " she said .
translation.zu: em i tok olsem : " ol sista bilong mi inap toktok na lainim ol nupela samting , tasol mi yet i no inap , na mi pilim olsem i no stret liklik .

translation.en: " i felt so angry .
translation.zu: mi belhat long dispela samting .

translation.en: there were times when i would have preferred to have been dead . "
translation.zu: sampela taim mi bin ting olsem mi no laik stap laip moa . "

translation.en: for example , every month or so she has a series of convulsions during which she seems to be choking and her arms and legs move uncontrollably .
translation.zu: olsem : klostu long olgeta mun skin bilong em i guria strong na i olsem nek i pas na ol han lek bilong em i go nabaut na em i no inap bosim .

translation.en: in addition , any infection - even a simple cold - weakens her considerably .
translation.zu: na tu , ol sik i save pinisim strong bilong em , maski em liklik kus tasol .

translation.en: occasionally loida gets depressed over her condition .
translation.zu: sampela taim loida i save bel hevi long sik bilong em .

translation.en: what helps her to endure ?
translation.zu: wanem samting i helpim em long karim hevi ?

translation.en: well , let her tell you in her own words :

translation.en: " prayer has been an enormous help .
translation.zu: " beten em i bin helpim mi tru .

translation.en: it makes me so happy to talk to jehovah , to feel close to him .
translation.zu: mi amamas long toktok wantaim jehova na pilim olsem mi pas gut wantaim em .

translation.en: i also appreciate the love and attention from others at the kingdom hall .
translation.zu: mi amamas long ol brata sista long haus kingdom ol i save tingim mi na mekim pasin sori long mi .

translation.en: i feel very fortunate that despite my physical problems , i have been brought up by two wonderful parents who love me so much .
translation.zu: maski mi gat hevi long skin bilong mi , papamama bilong mi i bin lukautim mi na ol i save laikim mi tru , na dispela em i bikpela samting tru long mi .

translation.en: i will never forget what my sisters have done for me .
translation.zu: bai mi no lusim tingting long samting tupela sista bilong mi i bin mekim bilong helpim mi .

translation.en: without jehovah 's love and the love of my family , my life would have had no meaning . "
