translation.en: what can a bird teach a prisoner ?
translation.zu: wanpela pisin inap skulim kalabusman long wanem samting ?

translation.en: according to the sunday tribune of durban , south africa , birds are playing a role in softening the hearts of inmates at pollsmoor prison .
translation.zu: nius sunday tribune bilong deban , saut afrika , i stori olsem ol pisin i wok long helpim ol kalabusman bilong haus kalabus polsmor long kisim pasin isi .

translation.en: currently 14 convicts are participating in a program that involves taking care of cockatiels and lovebirds in their cells .
translation.zu: long nau i gat 14 kalabusman i insait long dispela wok , ol i lukautim sampela koki na kalangar insait long rum kalabus bilong ol .

translation.en: how does the program work ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ol i mekim dispela wok ?

translation.en: a hatchling is put in the care of the prisoner , who hand - feeds the helpless little creature every hour or two , day and night , for about five weeks .
translation.zu: ol dispela kalabusman i kisim wanpela pikinini pisin i kamap nupela , na em i wok bilong ol long lukautim .

translation.en: when the bird is grown , it is sold to the public .
translation.zu: taim pisin i kamap bikpela pinis ol manmeri i stap ausait ol i baim .

translation.en: some inmates become so attached to their birds that they cry when the inevitable parting takes place .
translation.zu: sampela kalabusman i pas gut tru wantaim pisin bilong ol , olsem na ol i krai taim ol pisin i mas lusim ol .

translation.en: one inmate said : " i tame the birds , but they have tamed me too . "
translation.zu: wanpela kalabusman i tok : " mi save lukautim pisin na pisin i no wel moa , na pisin i mekim wankain samting long mi . "

translation.en: another says that the birds taught him patience and self - control .
translation.zu: narapela i tok olsem pasin bilong lukautim ol pisin i lainim em long stap isi na bosim gut bel .

translation.en: caring for these birds has another benefit for inmates .
translation.zu: pasin bilong lukautim ol dispela pisin i save helpim ol kalabusman long narapela samting tu .

translation.en: " with the skills they learn here , " says wikus gresse , who conceived the program , " they can get a job outside with bird breeders or a vet . "
translation.zu: wikus gresse , em man i bin kirapim dispela wok , em i tok : " save ol i kisim bilong lukautim ol pisin em inap helpim ol long kisim wok mani taim ol i lusim pinis kalabus .

translation.en: aids in africa - what hope for the new millennium ?
translation.zu: sik aids long afrika - gutpela samting bai kamap long yia 2000 na bihain long en ?

translation.en: last september delegates from various parts of africa gathered in lusaka , zambia , for the 11th international conference on aids and stds in africa .
translation.zu: long septemba long yia i go pinis , sampela man bilong ol narapela narapela hap bilong afrika ol i bung long lusaka , sambia , bilong mekim namba 11 kibung intenesenel bilong sik aids na std long afrika .

translation.en: one purpose of the conference was to encourage greater interregional cooperation in answering the question , how can we tackle the spread of aids in africa ?
translation.zu: wanpela as tingting bilong dispela kibung em long strongim olgeta kantri long wok wantaim bilong bekim dispela askim , olsem wanem yumi ken pasim sik aids long i go bikpela long afrika ?

translation.en: professor nkandu luo , then the zambian minister of health , said that the situation in africa and in other parts of the developing world is " extremely serious , " adding that it is " arresting and even reversing some of the significant gains made in health and in other social and economic spheres . "
translation.zu: profesa nkandu luo , em i minista bilong helt long sambia , em i tok sik aids long afrika na long ol narapela kantri i stap rabis em i go " nogut tru , " na em i tok moa , dispela sik i " pasim na daunim ol gutpela wok ol dokta na ol haus sik i bin mekim , na ol gutpela samting i kamap long sindaun bilong ol man na long wok bisinis . "

translation.en: one doctor , a representative of the world health organization 's blood safety unit , pointed out that while sexual intercourse with an infected partner does not always transmit hiv , the recipient of aids - contaminated blood will be infected - in every case !
translation.zu: wanpela dokta i makim lain bilong world health organization 's blood safety unit , em i tok , taim man o meri i slip wantaim poroman i gat binatang jem i kamapim sik aids , i no olgeta taim em bai kisim sik aids , tasol olgeta man i kisim blut i gat binatang jem bilong aids long en ol bai kisim sik aids !

translation.en: with good reason , this doctor stated that in such a case , " the safest blood transfusion is the one that is not given . "
translation.zu: i gat gutpela as na dispela dokta i tok , " sapos yu laik stap gut , no ken kisim blut bilong narapela man . "

translation.en: on the average , for example , a ugandan in an urban area earns about $ 200 a month .
translation.zu: olsem : ol man long yuganda i save wok long taun i kisim 200 dola long wanpela mun .

translation.en: but treatment using antiretrovirals can cost up to $ 1,000 per month !
translation.zu: tasol pe bilong marasin bilong daunim dispela sik em inap 1,000 dola long wanpela mun !

translation.en: the lusaka conference indicated that the start of the new millennium would see no easy solution to the spread of aids .
translation.zu: kibung long lusaka i kamapim olsem , maski nau yumi stap long yia 2000 , ol dokta i no inap painim wanpela gutpela rot bilong pasim sik aids long go bikpela .

translation.en: students of the bible , however , realize that ultimately the solution for all sicknesses depends upon the creator , jehovah god , who promises that in his new world , " no resident will say : ' i am sick . ' " - isaiah 33 : 24 .
translation.zu: tasol ol man i stadi long baibel ol i save olsem man bilong wokim yumi , god jehova , em tasol inap pinisim olgeta sik , na em i bin tok promis olsem long nupela graun " bai i no gat wanpela man i tok : ' mi gat sik . ' " - aisaia 33 : 24 , nw .

translation.en: the bible 's viewpoint

translation.en: despair is common to all humans , at least to a degree .
translation.zu: em pasin bilong yumi olgeta man long kisim bel hevi long sampela taim .

translation.en: consider , for example , elijah and job - both of whom enjoyed a good relationship with god .
translation.zu: tingim elaija na jop , tupela wantaim i bin pas gut wantaim god .

translation.en: after fleeing for his life from wicked queen jezebel , elijah " began to ask [ jehovah ] that his soul might die . "
translation.zu: taim elaija i ranawe bilong abrusim birua i laik painim em long han bilong kwin nogut jesebel , em i tokim jehova : " nau mi laik bai yu larim mi i dai . "

translation.en: for some today , despair may stem from the painful effects of aging , the death of a mate , or serious financial difficulties .
translation.zu: bel hevi bilong daunim man olgeta i save painim sampela man long nau , ating hevi bilong go lapun i mekim , o poroman marit bilong ol i dai , o ol i gat bikpela hevi long mani samting .

translation.en: others find that relentless stress , lingering effects of a traumatic experience , or family problems make them feel as if they were floundering in the middle of the ocean , with each wave making it harder to reach the shore .
translation.zu: na long sampela man , hevi bilong olgeta de i no save slek liklik , o samting nogut tru i bin painim ol na ol i pilim yet hevi bilong dispela samting , o ol i gat ol hevi i stap long famili na ol i pilim olsem ol i stap long solwara na biksi i pasim ol long go kamap long nambis .

translation.en: one man stated : " you feel a sense of worthlessness - as though no one will miss you once you are gone .
translation.zu: wanpela man i bin tok : " bai yu pilim olsem yu nogut tasol - olsem sapos yu no stap moa bai i no gat man i tingting planti long dispela samting .

translation.en: in some cases circumstances change for the better , relieving this intense pressure .
translation.zu: sampela taim senis i kamap na hevi i no bikpela moa , na i olsem yu kisim malolo .

translation.en: the bible can help
translation.zu: tok bilong baibel inap helpim yumi

translation.en: jehovah had the ability and the power to sustain elijah and job through their difficulties .
translation.zu: jehova i gat strong bilong inapim elaija na jop long karim ol hevi bilong ol .

translation.en: the bible states : " god is for us a refuge and strength , a help that is readily to be found during distresses . "
translation.zu: baibel i tok olsem : " god em i ples hait bilong yumi , na em i save strongim yumi oltaim . em i stap klostu na i redi long helpim yumi long taim bilong bikpela hevi . "

translation.en: though it may seem that feelings of despair are pulling us under , jehovah promises that he will keep fast hold of us with his right hand of righteousness .
translation.zu: ( song 46 : 1 ; 55 : 22 ) maski yumi pilim olsem ol hevi i wok long daunim yumi olgeta , jehova i tok promis pinis long mekim wok long bikpela strong bilong em long was gut long yumi .

translation.en: because of our distress , we may see no way out of our problem .
translation.zu: hevi bilong yumi i mekim na long tingting yumi bai pilim olsem i no gat rot bilong stretim .

translation.en: if we " persevere in prayer , " however , jehovah can guard our hearts and minds , providing us with the strength we need to endure . - romans 12 : 12 ; isaiah 40 : 28 - 31 ; 2 corinthians 1 : 3 , 4 ; philippians 4 : 13 .
translation.zu: tasol sapos yumi " beten long olgeta taim , " jehova inap strongim bel na tingting bilong yumi bilong helpim yumi long karim dispela hevi . - rom 12 : 12 ; aisaia 40 : 28 - 31 ; 2 korin 1 : 3 , 4 ; filipai 4 : 13 .

translation.en: we have the assurance : " the desire of those fearing him [ jehovah ] will perform , and their cry for help he will hear , and he will save them . " - psalm 145 : 19 .
translation.zu: na em i save harim krai bilong ol na kisim bek ol . " - song 145 : 19 . i gat narapela samting moa yumi mas mekim - i no beten tasol .

translation.en: in addition to praying , we must resist isolation .
translation.zu: yumi mas wok strong long sakim pasin bilong i stap yumi yet .

translation.en: maria had to force herself to get out of bed and get back into a routine .
translation.zu: maria i wok strong long subim em yet long lusim bet na kirap na mekim gen ol wok bilong em .

translation.en: she went out nearly every day to teach others about the bible , and she regularly attended christian meetings .
translation.zu: klostu olgeta de em i go na skulim ol narapela long tok bilong baibel , na em i save go long ol miting kristen .

translation.en: upon returning home , maria 's feelings of distress would come back full force .
translation.zu: taim em i go bek long haus , bel hevi bilong em i kamap strong gen .

translation.en: however , by focusing on how she can help others , maria is able to endure .
translation.zu: tasol em i wok long tingim rot bilong helpim ol narapela , na dispela i helpim em na em inap karim ol hevi .

translation.en: but what if we find it difficult to pray or cannot seem to pull ourselves out of isolation ?
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem sapos yumi gat hatwok long beten , o yumi no inap abrusim pasin bilong surik long ol narapela na stap yumi yet ?

translation.en: in that case we must reach out for help .
translation.zu: sapos olsem , yumi mas kisim sampela helpim .

translation.en: the bible encourages us to turn to " the older men of the congregation . "
translation.zu: tok bilong baibel i strongim yumi long go long " ol hetman bilong sios . "

translation.en: a man dealing with severe ongoing depression stated : " sometimes talking to someone you trust helps ease the mind and calm the spirit , so that rational thinking prevails . "
translation.zu: wanpela man i gat dispela pasin bilong stap bel hevi tumas em i tok : " sampela taim pasin bilong toktok wantaim wanpela gutpela pren inap helpim yu long stap bel isi na daunim pasin bilong tingting planti bambai gutpela tingting i ken wok strong gen . "

translation.en: * - matthew 9 : 12 .
translation.zu: * - matyu 9 : 12 .

translation.en: though no easy solutions exist , we should not underestimate god 's ability to help us cope with our problems .
translation.zu: i no olsem i no gat hatwok long stretim ol hevi , tasol yumi no ken kisim tingting olsem god i no inap helpim yumi tumas long karim hevi .

translation.en: the bible promises that god will bring to a complete end the root causes of our intense despair .
translation.zu: olsem baibel i tok , i no longtaim na god bai pinisim olgeta samting i save kirapim yumi long stap bel hevi tru .

translation.en: christians are determined to rely on him while awaiting the day when these " former things will not be called to mind . " - isaiah 65 : 17 ; revelation 21 : 4 .
translation.zu: ol kristen i gat strongpela tingting long larim god i helpim ol na wetim dispela taim " ol man bai i no inap tingim moa ol samting i bin kamap bipo . " - aisaia 65 : 17 ; kth 21 : 4 .

translation.en: does the moon influence your life ?
translation.zu: yu ting mun i save stiaim i stap bilong yu ?

translation.en: for thousands of years , men have believed that the moon governs aspects of life on earth .
translation.zu: inap planti tausen yia pinis , ol man i bilip olsem mun i save stiaim sampela samting long i stap bilong ol samting bilong graun .

translation.en: while some long - cherished notions have been disproved by modern scientific research , other beliefs persist to this day .
translation.zu: save ol saientis bilong nau i bin kisim i kamapim olsem sampela olpela bilip olsem i no tru , tasol sampela bilip i stap yet .

translation.en: some people are convinced that there is a connection between the phases of the moon and the growth of plants .
translation.zu: sampela man i bilip olsem pasin bilong mun long senis senis , dispela i save stiaim pasin bilong ol plaua samting long kamap bikpela .

translation.en: this is done in the belief that if certain tasks are performed during the wrong phase of the moon , the quality of the product will be compromised .
translation.zu: ol i mekim olsem , long wanem , ol i bilip olsem sapos ol i mekim sampela wok taim bikpela bilong mun i no stret long wok ol i laik mekim , orait wok bai i no inap kamap gutpela .

translation.en: one source offers this advice to gardeners : " vegetables to be eaten fresh should generally be picked during the waxing moon , while vegetables to be preserved should be picked during the waning moon . "
translation.zu: wanpela nius i tokim ol man bilong wokim gaden : " ol sayor i bilong kaikai nau tasol , yu mas kamautim taim mun i wok long go bikpela , na taim mun i wok long go liklik , kamautim ol sayor yu laik pulimapim long botol na putim i stap . " olsem wanem ?

translation.en: is there a scientific basis for this practice ?
translation.zu: tok bilong ol saientis i strongim dispela pasin ?

translation.en: however , many scientists are not convinced .
translation.zu: tasol planti saientis i no bilip long dispela tok .

translation.en: they point out that lunar rhythms are complex , they are not completely regular , and their effects are not marked , so it is difficult to replicate the experiments upon which the studies are based .
translation.zu: ol i tok , pasin bilong mun long senis senis i no wankain long olgeta taim , na ol samting mun i mekim taim em i senis senis , i no kamap ples klia , olsem na i hatwok long mekim traim gen ol wankain wok bilong kamapim klia dispela samting .

translation.en: for example , it has been shown that the activity , feeding , reproduction , and biological rhythms of many living organisms are connected with the tides , which , in turn , are directly influenced by the gravitational force of the moon .
translation.zu: olsem : ol i bin kamapim klia olsem haiwara na draiwara - em samting mun i save kamapim - em i save stiaim pasin bilong planti liklik liklik binatang long kaikai , na kamapim pikinini , na mekim ol samting .

translation.en: some claim that if the moon influences the tides , it must affect humans as well , since much of the human body is water .
translation.zu: sampela ol i tok , sapos mun i kamapim haiwara na draiwara , mun i mas mekim sampela samting long ol man tu , long wanem , bikpela hap ( 80 pesen ) bilong skin bilong man em wara .

translation.en: studies have been undertaken in the fields of psychiatry , psychology , and gynecology to get to the truth of the matter .
translation.zu: ol dokta bilong sik bilong tingting na sik bilong ol meri , ol i bin skelim dispela samting bambai ol i ken save dispela tok i tru o nogat .

translation.en: some researchers claim to have found slight correlations between human activities and lunar rhythms , but others state flatly that there is no link at all .
translation.zu: sampela saveman i tok ol i bin kisim save olsem pasin bilong mun long senis senis i save mekim sampela samting long ol man , tasol sampela saveman i tokaut stret olsem dispela i no tru .

translation.en: they argue that if lunar cycles had a marked influence on human births , the connection would have been clearly demonstrated long ago .
translation.zu: ol i tok , sapos pasin bilong mun long senis senis i stiaim taim bilong mama long karim pikinini , ating long bipo yet ol man inap kamapim klia dispela samting .

translation.en: what is more , none of the theories proposed to explain the supposed lunar effect on man have convinced scientists in general .
translation.zu: na tu , planti saientis i no bilip long ol tok ol man i mekim bilong kamapim olsem mun i save stiaim ol samting long i stap bilong man .

translation.en: although science has demonstrated that the moon has some effect on the various forms of life on earth , the extent is not easily determined .
translation.zu: tru , saiens i bin kamapim klia olsem mun i save stiaim i stap bilong sampela samting bilong graun i gat laip , tasol i hatwok long save mun i save stiaim planti samting o nogat .

translation.en: our physical universe is complex , and at least for now , many of the marvelous mechanisms that regulate it remain unknown .
translation.zu: graun na ol samting i stap long ples antap i narakain tru , na long nau yumi no save long planti samting i save stiaim ol dispela samting .

translation.en: anacondas - are they shedding some secrets ?
translation.zu: ol anakonda - ol i kisim sampela save moa long ol ?

translation.en: by an awake !
translation.zu: wanpela wokman bilong kirap !

translation.en: i don 't know about you , but big snakes fascinate me in a way that few other animals do .
translation.zu: mi no save long tingting bilong yu long ol bikpela snek , tasol ol i save kirapim tru tingting bilong mi , winim planti narapela animal .

translation.en: and if we 're talking about big snakes , we 're talking about anacondas , members of the animal family boidae .
translation.zu: na sapos yumi stori long ol bikpela snek , yumi stori long ol anakonda , em wanpela snek bilong lain animal ol i kolim boidi .

translation.en: curiously , though , despite their huge proportions , little has been known about their behavior - that is , until recently .
translation.zu: tasol maski ol dispela snek i traipela tru , ol man i no bin save long planti samting bilong pasin bilong ol - nau tasol ol i kisim sampela save moa .

translation.en: in 1992 , biologist jesús a .
translation.zu: long 1992 , saveman jesús a .

translation.en: rivas and researchers of the new york - based wildlife conservation society ( wcs ) began to study these giants for the first time ever in the wild .
translation.zu: rivas na ol saveman bilong lain wcs ( wildlife conservation society ) i stap long nu yok , ol i kirap skelim ol dispela traipela snek long ples ol snek i save stap long en .

translation.en: * when i read that this six - year - long field study , which was carried out in a swampy region of venezuela , had revealed some new facts , i wondered what had been learned .
translation.zu: * taim mi ritim olsem ol i bin skelim ol anakonda inap 6 - pela yia long ples tais bilong veneswela na ol i bin kisim sampela nupela save , orait mi laik save wanem samting ol i bin kisim save long en .

translation.en: today i will try to find out .
translation.zu: nau bai mi traim painimaut dispela samting .

translation.en: about names and species
translation.zu: ol nem na lain bilong anakonda

translation.en: on a sunny afternoon , i leave my brooklyn office and head for the wcs headquarters , located in new york city 's bronx zoo .
translation.zu: long wanpela apinun , mi lusim ofis bilong mi long bruklin na mi go long hetkota bilong lain wcs i stap insait long banis bilong ol animal long bronks , nu yok .

translation.en: i had already done enough research to know some facts about anacondas .
translation.zu: mi bin lukim sampela buk na mi kisim sampela save pinis long ol anakonda .

translation.en: strangely , the name anaconda may have originated far from the animal 's south american home .
translation.zu: yumi kirap nogut long save olsem ating nem anakonda i kam long hap i longwe tru long ples bilong dispela animal long saut amerika .

translation.en: some say that it comes from the tamil words anai , meaning " elephant , " and kolra , meaning " killer . "
translation.zu: sampela i tok dispela nem i kam long tupela tok tamil - tok anai i makim " elefan , " na tok kolra i makim ' kilim i dai . '

translation.en: others think it comes from the sinhala word henakandayā ( hena , meaning " lightning , " and kanda , meaning " stem " ) .
translation.zu: sampela narapela i ting dispela nem i kam long tok sinhala henakandayā ( tok hena i makim " lait bilong klaut , " na tok kanda i makim " stik " ) .

translation.en: likely the sinhala words - originally used for pythons in sri lanka - were brought from asia to south america by portuguese traders .
translation.zu: ating dispela tok sinhala - em pastaim ol i bin kolim snek moran long en - ol i kisim long esia na bringim i kam long saut amerika long rot bilong ol bisnisman bilong potugal .

translation.en: speaking of misnomers , even the anaconda 's official name , eunectes murinus , is not exactly correct .
translation.zu: nem tru ol saveman i givim long anakonda , em eunectes murinus , em tu i no stret tumas .

translation.en: but murinus stands for " mouse - colored . "
translation.zu: tasol tok murinus em i makim " kala bilong gras bilong liklik rat . "

translation.en: for a snake with an olive - green skin , this name " does not seem really suitable , " notes one reference work .
translation.zu: skin bilong dispela snek i grinpela , olsem na wanpela buk i tok " dispela nem i no stret tumas " long en .

translation.en: there is one more thing to mention about the animal 's scientific names and divisions .
translation.zu: i gat wanpela samting moa bilong tokaut long en long dispela snek na ol nem ol saveman i givim long en .

translation.en: literature on anacondas usually states that there are two species of anacondas .
translation.zu: ol buk i stori long ol anakonda i tok i gat tupela kain anakonda .

translation.en: one is the subject of this article - the green anaconda , or water boa , slithering mainly in the swamps of the amazon and orinoco basins and in the guianas .
translation.zu: wanpela em snek dispela stori i toktok long en - em grinpela anakonda , o snek bilong wara , na em i save stap long ples tais bilong amason na orinoko , na long ol hap bilong giana .

translation.en: the other is the smaller yellow anaconda ( e . notaeus ) , a denizen of paraguay , southern brazil , and northern argentina .
translation.zu: narapela anakonda i yelopela ( e . notaeus ) na i no bikpela olsem grinpela anakonda , na em i save stap long paragwai , sauten brasil , na noten ajentina .

translation.en: meet an expert
translation.zu: bungim wanpela saveman

translation.en: here i am at the bronx zoo .
translation.zu: orait mi kamap long banis bilong ol animal long bronks .

translation.en: this wildlife park , covering 265 wooded acres [ 107 wooded hectares ] , is home to more than 4,000 animals , including a dozen or so anacondas .
translation.zu: bikpela bilong dispela banis em 107 hekta , na winim 4,000 animal i stap long en , na 12 - pela anakonda tu .

translation.en: khaki - clad william holmstrom of wcs 's department of herpetology ( the study of reptiles ) is here to meet me at the zoo 's entrance . mr .
translation.zu: william holmstrom , em i pasim ol braunpela klos na em i bilong wanpela dipatmen ( department of herpetology ) bilong lain wcs i skelim ol snek , em i bungim mi long dua bilong dispela banis bilong ol animal .

translation.en: holmstrom - a 51 - year - old new yorker wearing glasses , a mustache , and a ready smile - is the collection manager of the zoo 's reptile department and has participated in the field study of anacondas in venezuela .
translation.zu: mista holmstrom i gat 51 krismas na em i bilong nu yok , em i save pasim aiglas , na em i gat mausgras , na em i man bilong lap . em i go pas long lain bilong dispela banis bilong skelim ol snek , na em i bin skelim ol anakonda long ples ol i save stap long en long veneswela .

translation.en: according to him , scientists now recognize the existence of a third species of anaconda ( e . deschauenseei ) , an inhabitant of northeastern brazil and coastal french guiana .
translation.zu: em i tok , nau ol saveman i save olsem i gat wanpela kain anakonda moa i stap ( e . deschauenseei ) , em i save stap long hap not - is bilong brasil na long hap nambis bilong frens giana .

translation.en: * this afternoon mr . holmstrom will be my expert guide .
translation.zu: * long apinun mista holmstrom bai kisim mi i go raun long dispela banis .

translation.en: it doesn 't take long to sense that my guide loves snakes the way others love poodles or parakeets .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na mi luksave olsem mista holmstrom i laikim tru ol snek olsem sampela man i save laikim tru ol dok o kalangar .

translation.en: he tells me that from the time he was a child , his parents ' home housed salamanders , frogs , and the like .
translation.zu: em i tokim mi olsem taim em i pikinini yet , long haus bilong ol i gat ol rokrok na ol palai samting .

translation.en: needless to say , mr . holmstrom took after his father .
translation.zu: olsem na yumi ken save mista holmstrom i gat wankain laik olsem papa bilong em .

translation.en: dazzling dimensions and drastic differences
translation.zu: sampela i traipela na sampela i liklik

translation.en: inside the 100 - year - old reptile house , the two of us stop in front of an enclosure that houses an anaconda .
translation.zu: insait long haus snek i gat 100 krismas , mitupela i sanap long ai bilong wanpela banis i gat wanpela anakonda long en .

translation.en: although i am looking at an animal that i anticipated seeing , i still can 't suppress my amazement .
translation.zu: maski mi lukluk long animal mi bin wet long lukim , mi kirap nogut tru long en .

translation.en: i marvel at its sheer size and bizarre proportions .
translation.zu: em i traipela na skin i narapela kain .

translation.en: its blunt - nosed head , bigger than a man 's hand , is dwarfed by the bulky body attached to it .
translation.zu: nus bilong en i sotpela na bikpela bilong het bilong en i winim han bilong man , tasol bikpela bodi bilong en i mekim na i olsem het i liklik .

translation.en: my guide tells me that this striking reptile is a 16 - foot - [ 5 m ] long female weighing some 180 pounds [ 80 kg ] .
translation.zu: holmstrom i tokim mi olsem longpela bilong dispela anakonda meri em i 5 - pela mita na hevi bilong skin bilong en i 80 kilo .

translation.en: although her body is nearly as thick as a telephone pole , i learn that she is merely a " little leaguer " in comparison with the world record holder - a roly - poly female anaconda caught in 1960 that , it was estimated , weighed nearly 500 pounds [ 227 kg ] !
translation.zu: maski braitpela bilong bodi bilong en i bikpela olsem pos bilong telefon , mi kisim save olsem em i liklik tru taim yumi skelim wantaim wanpela anakonda meri ol i kisim long 1960 , em hevi bilong en i olsem 227 kilo !

translation.en: no male anaconda can even dream of attaining to such dazzling dimensions .
translation.zu: i no gat wanpela anakonda man inap kamap traipela olsem .

translation.en: in fact , the study showed that females are , on an average , nearly five times bigger than males .
translation.zu: na save ol i kisim i kamapim olsem bikpela bilong planti anakonda meri i winim bikpela bilong anakonda man inap 5 - pela taim .

translation.en: that radical difference in size between the sexes can be misleading , as biologist jesús rivas discovered .
translation.zu: liklik skin bilong anakonda man inap trikim man , olsem saveman jesús rivas i bin kisim save long en .

translation.en: he used to keep a baby anaconda as a pet but always wondered why the little fellow kept biting him .
translation.zu: bipo em i lukautim wanpela pikinini anakonda , tasol em i tingting bilong wanem dispela liklik snek i wok long kaikaim em .

translation.en: only during the field study did it dawn on him that he had been petting a full - grown and irritated male !
translation.zu: tasol taim em i skelim ol anakonda long ples ol i save stap long en , em i kisim save olsem em i bin lukautim wanpela anakonda man i bikpela pinis na i kros !

translation.en: wanted ! - reward waiting
translation.zu: ol i laik baim bikpela anakonda !

translation.en: although an anaconda 's bulk is its star quality , its length is equally impressive .
translation.zu: skin bilong anakonda i bikpela tru , tasol longpela tu bilong en i narapela kain .

translation.en: granted , anacondas are not as gargantuan as hollywood depicts them - one movie featured a 40 - foot - long [ 12 m ] anaconda - but their maximum length of 30 feet [ 9 m ] or so is breathtaking enough to contemplate .
translation.zu: tru , ol anakonda i no traipela olsem ol lain bilong wokim piksa wokabaut i save kamapim - wanpela piksa wokabaut i stori long anakonda em longpela bilong en i 12 - pela mita - tasol ol inap kamap longpela olsem 9 - pela mita samting na yumi kirap nogut long dispela .

translation.en: anacondas of that size are few and far between .
translation.zu: wan wan anakonda tasol i longpela olsem .

translation.en: in fact , larger anacondas are so hard to find that a reward of $ 1,000 , offered some 90 years ago by the new york zoological society ( the forerunner of wcs ) , for any live snake over 30 feet [ 9.2 m ] long has gone uncollected until this day .
translation.zu: i hatwok tru long painim ol bikpela anakonda , olsem na inap 90 yia i go pinis , lain new york zoological society ( em dispela lain i bin go pas long lain wcs ) i tok , ol bai givim 1,000 dola long man i kisim anakonda i stap laip yet na longpela bilong en i winim 9.2 mita .

translation.en: " we get two or three calls a year from people in south america who claim the reward , " says mr .
translation.zu: i kam inap nau , i no gat wanpela man i bin kisim dispela mani .

translation.en: oh , by the way , the reward for a 30 - footer [ 9.2 m ] now stands at $ 50,000 !
translation.zu: na nau pe ol bai givim long man i kisim anakonda i gat 9.2 mita , em 50,000 dola !

translation.en: i follow my guide as he leads me to the second floor of the reptile house , which serves as a holding and breeding area .
translation.zu: mi bihainim holmstrom taim em i kisim mi i go long namba tu plua bilong haus snek , em dispela hap i bilong banisim ol snek na long ol i ken kamapim pikinini .

translation.en: the place is hot and humid .
translation.zu: dispela hap i hat .

translation.en: to give me an unobstructed look at my subject of interest , mr . holmstrom opens the door of an enclosure that holds a hefty female anaconda .
translation.zu: bilong mi ken lukluk gut long anakonda , mista holmstrom i opim dua bilong wanpela banis i gat traipela anakonda meri long en .

translation.en: at this point , there are some eight feet [ 2 m ] - and nothing else - between us and the animal .
translation.zu: nau mipela i stap longwe long dispela animal inap 2 - pela mita tasol , na i no gat wanpela samting i stap namel long mipela .

translation.en: then , the anaconda 's head rises slowly and moves steadily in our direction .
translation.zu: orait , isi isi anakonda i apim het bilong en na i kam klostu long mipela .

translation.en: by now only a distance of three feet [ 1 m ] remains between the anaconda 's head and ours .
translation.zu: nau het bilong anakonda i longwe long het bilong mipela inap wanpela mita tasol .

translation.en: " we 'd better back off , " says mr . holmstrom matter - of - factly , " she may be looking for food . "
translation.zu: mista holmstrom i tok : " gutpela sapos yumi surik i go bek , nogut em i painim kaikai . "

translation.en: i readily agree .
translation.zu: mi wanbel wantaim dispela tok .

translation.en: he shuts the door of the enclosure , and the anaconda 's head moves back until it gradually comes to rest near the center of its coiled body .
translation.zu: em i pasim dua bilong banis , na het bilong anakonda i go bek na i slip klostu long namel bilong bodi bilong en em i bin raunim .

translation.en: if you manage to ignore the anaconda 's malevolent - looking glare and take a good look at its red - striped head , you will see that it has remarkable features .
translation.zu: sapos yu no lukluk long ai bilong anakonda i lukluk strong long yu , na yu skelim het bilong en i gat ol retpela mak , bai yu lukim sampela samting i narapela kain tru long het bilong en .

translation.en: the anaconda 's eyes and nostrils , for instance , form the highest points on its head .
translation.zu: ai na hul bilong nus bilong en i stap antap tru long het bilong en .

translation.en: this allows the snake to submerge its body and head and leave its eyes and nostrils just above the water surface - much the way alligators do .
translation.zu: olsem na bodi na het bilong snek i stap aninit long wara , na ai na hul bilong nus i stap antap long wara - olsem ol aligeta i save mekim .

translation.en: the anaconda is not poisonous .
translation.zu: anakonda i no gat gip bilong en .

translation.en: it kills by wrapping its coils tightly around its prey .
translation.zu: bilong kilim abus em i save taitim strong em yet long skin bilong animal .

translation.en: it does not crush its prey , but each time the victim exhales , the snake tightens its coils until the helpless victim suffocates .
translation.zu: em i no save brukbrukim skin bilong animal , tasol taim animal i winim win , snek i save taitim strong em yet long skin bilong animal i go inap long animal i no inap pulim win moa .

translation.en: almost anything - from ducks to deer - is considered fair game .
translation.zu: em i laik kaikai klostu olgeta kain abus , olsem pato na dia samting .

translation.en: however , reliable reports of people being eaten by anacondas are rare .
translation.zu: tasol i no gat planti ripot i kamapim olsem ol anakonda i bin kaikai man .

translation.en: since snakes cannot chew or tear their food , the anaconda has no choice but to swallow its dead prey whole - even if the prey is considerably bulkier than the snake itself .
translation.zu: ol snek i no inap memeim o brukbrukim abus , olsem na anakonda i mas daunim tasol - maski skin bilong abus i bikpela , winim snek .

translation.en: in fact , if you could tackle food the way an anaconda does , you could wrap your lips around a coconut and gulp it down whole as easily as if it were a peanut .
translation.zu: sapos yu inap daunim kaikai olsem anakonda i save mekim , bai yu inap putim kokonas long maus bilong yu na daunim kokonas olgeta olsem em i wanpela pinat .

translation.en: how does the anaconda do it ?
translation.zu: anakonda inap mekim dispela olsem wanem ?

translation.en: " it walks its head over the prey , " says mr . holmstrom .
translation.zu: mista holmstrom i tok : " het bilong en i go i kam long abus em i laik kaikai . "

translation.en: he explains that the anaconda 's jaws are loosely attached to its head .
translation.zu: em i tok , bun bilong maus bilong anakonda i no pas strong long het bilong en .

translation.en: before setting its teeth into a bulky victim , its lower jaw can drop down and spread out .
translation.zu: paslain long em i putim tit bilong en long bikpela skin bilong abus , bun bilong maus daunbilo bai go daun na maus i op bikpela .

translation.en: then the anaconda pushes one side of its lower jaw forward , hooks its backward - facing teeth into the prey , and pulls that side of the jaw and the prey back into its mouth .
translation.zu: orait nau anakonda i subim wanpela sait bilong bun bilong maus daunbilo i go pas , na em i putim tit bilong en long abus na pulim sait bilong bun bilong maus i go bek na abus i go insait long maus bilong en .

translation.en: next , it repeats the same steps with the other half of its lower jaw .
translation.zu: bihain em i mekim wankain samting long narapela sait bilong bun bilong maus i stap daunbilo .

translation.en: to some extent the upper jaw can do the same .
translation.zu: bun bilong maus i stap antap inap mekim wankain samting .

translation.en: with this alternating forward movement , the animal 's jaw seems indeed to be walking over the prey .
translation.zu: taim bun bilong maus bilong en i go i kam dispela i mekim na i olsem maus bilong en i wokabaut long abus .

translation.en: once the prey has been swallowed , which may take several hours , the snake yawns a few times , and the various parts of its flexible head fall back into place .
translation.zu: taim em i daunim abus pinis - em inap lusim planti aua long mekim dispela samting - snek i opim maus i go bikpela inap sampela taim , na ol hap bilong het bilong en i go bek long ples stret bilong en .

translation.en: the presence of an extendable windpipe located in the floor of its mouth .
translation.zu: daunbilo insait long maus bilong en em i gat wanpela paip bilong pulim win em inap kamap longpela .

translation.en: while working its food inward , the anaconda pushes its windpipe outward to the front of its mouth .
translation.zu: taim em i wok long daunim abus , anakonda i subim dispela paip i go pas long maus bilong en .

translation.en: that way , the snorkellike windpipe gives the anaconda access to air while eating .
translation.zu: long dispela rot anakonda inap pulim win taim em i kaikai .

translation.en: my guide now removes the lid from a terrarium , and we look down at two young anacondas .
translation.zu: holmstrom i rausim ai bilong wanpela kain bokis , na mipela i lukluk i go daun long tupela yangpela anakonda .

translation.en: their identical looks make me wonder how the researchers could tell the difference between the hundreds of wild anacondas they studied during their venezuelan project .
translation.zu: ol i luk wankain stret , olsem na mi tingting long olsem wanem ol saveman inap luksave long wan wan anakonda bilong ol dispela planti handet anakonda ol i bin skelim long veneswela .

translation.en: mr . holmstrom explains that they tried to solve the identification problem by making tiny branding irons out of paper clips .
translation.zu: mista holmstrom i tok , bilong stretim dispela hevi ol i wokim samting bilong makim ol snek long ol liklik waia ol man i save pasim ol pepa long en .

translation.en: they heated the " irons " and branded small numbers on the anacondas ' heads .
translation.zu: ol i hatim ol dispela waia na kukim liklik namba long het bilong ol anakonda .

translation.en: the method worked well until the snakes shed their skin - and their numbers !
translation.zu: dispela i wok gut i go inap long ol snek i rausim skin bilong ol - na ol namba bilong ol tu !

translation.en: the researchers noticed , though , that each anaconda already carries its own identification mark .
translation.zu: tasol ol saveman i luksave olsem olgeta wan wan anakonda i gat mak bilong en yet .

translation.en: each snake has a pattern of black blotches on the yellow underside of its tail - as unique to each snake as a fingerprint is to a human .
translation.zu: olgeta wan wan snek i gat ol blakpela mak long aninit bilong yelopela tel bilong en - olgeta snek i gat mak bilong en yet wankain olsem olgeta wan wan man i gat mak bilong pinga bilong em yet .

translation.en: " all we needed to do was to diagram the pattern found on a stretch of skin 15 scales in length , and we had enough variations to tell apart the 800 snakes that we studied . "
translation.zu: holmstrom i tok : " mipela i wokim piksa bilong ol mak bilong wanpela hap skin bilong ol snek , na mipela inap wokim piksa bilong planti narapela narapela mak , olsem na mipela inap luksave long 800 narapela narapela snek mipela i bin skelim . "

translation.en: the fastest , the fittest , or the strongest ?
translation.zu: snek i kwik , o snek i strong ?

translation.en: as we wrap up the interview in mr . holm - strom 's office , he shows me a picture he took in venezuela of male anacondas all coiled around one another .
translation.zu: taim mipela i wok long pinisim stori bilong mipela long ofis bilong mista holmstrom , em i soim wanpela piksa em i bin kisim long veneswela , em poto bilong ol anakonda man em narapela i raunim narapela .

translation.en: it is a spellbinding sight .
translation.zu: em i narapela kain samting bilong lukim .

translation.en: he explains that this knot of tangled anaconda bodies forms a so - called breeding ball .
translation.zu: em i tok , ol dispela anakonda em narapela i raunim skin bilong narapela em i olsem wanpela bung bilong kamapim pikinini .

translation.en: ( see photo on page 26 . )
translation.zu: ( lukim piksa i stap long pes 26 . )

translation.en: are the males fighting ?
translation.zu: ol anakonda man i pait ?

translation.en: each of the male contenders tries to squeeze the others out and maneuver himself into a mating position with the female .
translation.zu: olgeta wan wan anakonda man i traim subim narapela i go longwe bambai em i ken pas long skin bilong anakonda meri na kamapim pikinini .

translation.en: the match may last for as long as two to four weeks .
translation.zu: dispela resis inap i stap 2 - pela i go 4 - pela wik .

translation.en: who wins ?
translation.zu: husat i win ?

translation.en: the fastest ( the male that finds the female first ) , the fittest ( the male that produces the most sperm ) , or the strongest ( the male that outwrestles the competition ) ?
translation.zu: snek i kwik tru ( anakonda man i painim anakonda meri paslain long ol narapela ) , o snek i gat strong long kamapim pikinini ( anakonda man inap kamapim planti melek , winim ol narapela ) , o snek i gat strongpela skin ( anakonda man inap daunim ol narapela ) ?

translation.en: at the end of the afternoon , i thank my guide for his captivating tour .
translation.zu: long pinis bilong apinun , mi tok tenkyu long holmstrom long gutpela raun i bin kirapim tru tingting bilong mi .

translation.en: as i travel back to my office , i reflect on what i 've learned .
translation.zu: taim mi go bek long ofis bilong mi , mi tingting long ol samting mi bin kisim save long en .

translation.en: granted , i still don 't share the sentiments of biologist jesús rivas , that " anacondas are fun , " but i admit that anacondas definitely grabbed my attention .
translation.zu: tru , mi no wanbel yet wantaim tok bilong saveman jesús rivas , em dispela man i bin tok " ol anakonda i samting bilong amamas , " tasol mi ken tok olsem ol anakonda i bin kirapim tingting bilong mi .

translation.en: as researchers continue to trail anacondas in the wild , it will be interesting to learn whether these giant snakes will be inclined to shed more of their fascinating secrets .
translation.zu: taim ol saveman i wok yet long skelim ol anakonda long ples ol i save stap long en , bai yumi amamas sapos ol saveman i kisim sampela save moa long ol dispela traipela snek ol i save kirapim tingting bilong man .

translation.en: " when she said , ' i 'm going to have your baby , ' i was shocked .
translation.zu: " mi kirap nogut tru taim em i tok , ' mi bai karim pikinini bilong yu . '

translation.en: who was going to care for the baby ?
translation.zu: husat bai lukautim dispela bebi ?

translation.en: i felt like running away . " - jim .
translation.zu: mi pilim olsem mi laik ranawe . " - em tok bilong jim .

translation.en: " each year , " says a report from the alan guttmacher institute , " almost 1 million teenage women . . . become pregnant . "
translation.zu: ripot bilong wanpela lain ( alan guttmacher institute ) i tok : " long olgeta yia , klostu wan milion yangpela meri . . . i kisim bel . "

translation.en: as many as " 78 % of births to teens occur outside of marriage . "
translation.zu: na " ol yangpela i karim pikinini , planti ( 78 pesen ) bilong ol i no marit . "

translation.en: in days gone by , men felt obliged to take responsibility for the children they fathered .
translation.zu: long bipo ol man i pilim olsem em wok bilong ol long lukautim pikinini ol i bin kamapim .

translation.en: but as the book teenage fathers says , " out - of - wedlock pregnancy no longer carries the shame and humiliation it [ once ] did . "
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanpela buk ( teenage fathers ) i tok , " long nau pasin bilong ol meri singel long karim pikinini i no samting bilong sem long en olsem long bipo . "

translation.en: among young people in some communities , fathering a child may even be viewed as a status symbol !
translation.zu: long sampela hap , pasin bilong kamapim pikinini i mekim na man i kisim biknem long ai bilong ol yangpela !

translation.en: still , few young men make long - term commitments to the children they sire .
translation.zu: tasol wan wan yangpela man tasol i save lukautim ol pikinini bilong ol i go inap longpela taim .

translation.en: many eventually walk - or run - away .
translation.zu: planti ol i save ranawe lusim wok papa bilong ol .

translation.en: but can a young man fully escape the consequences of immoral conduct ?
translation.zu: yangpela man inap abrusim olgeta samting pasin pamuk bilong em i kamapim ?

translation.en: not according to the bible .
translation.zu: baibel i tok em i no inap abrusim .

translation.en: it warns : " do not be misled : god is not one to be mocked .
translation.zu: em i tok : " nogut yupela i giamanim yupela yet na yupela i ting yupela inap long trikim god .

translation.en: young people can avoid such consequences by heeding the bible 's clear - cut counsel to avoid sexual immorality .
translation.zu: ol yangpela inap abrusim ol kain hevi olsem taim ol i bihainim ol lo bilong baibel i tambuim pasin pamuk .

translation.en: walking away - not so easy
translation.zu: i hatwok long lusim pikinini

translation.en: the book young unwed fathers notes : " some young men are not interested in ' taking care of somebody else , ' when to do so means having less . "
translation.zu: buk young unwed fathers i tok : " sampela yangpela man ol i no laik ' lukautim narapela , ' sapos dispela i makim olsem ol i mas lusim mani samting bilong ol yet . "

translation.en: many pay a high price for their selfishness , however .
translation.zu: tasol planti ol i kisim pe nogut long pasin bilong ol long tingim ol yet tasol .

translation.en: for one thing , the courts and lawmakers in many lands have taken an increasingly dim view of men who fail to support their children .
translation.zu: olsem : long planti kantri ol kot na lain bilong kamapim lo ol i no gat gutpela tingting long ol man i no save givim mani bilong lukautim pikinini bilong ol .

translation.en: once paternity has been legally established , young fathers may be required to pay up for years to come - and rightly so .
translation.zu: taim ol i tokaut long husat em i papa tru bilong pikinini , kot inap makim dispela yangpela papa long givim mani bilong lukautim pikinini inap planti yia - na i stret ol i mekim olsem .

translation.en: many youths are forced to quit school or to work at low - paying jobs to meet such obligations .
translation.zu: planti yangpela i mas lusim skul o kisim wok mani ol i no kisim bikpela pe long en bilong ol i ken lukautim pikinini .

translation.en: " the younger the age at parenthood , " says the book school - age pregnancy and parenthood , " the less formal education a father achieves . "
translation.zu: wanpela buk ( school - age pregnancy and parenthood ) i tok : " taim ol yangpela man i kamap papa , planti ol i no save skul inap planti yia . "

translation.en: and if one fails to make support payments , enormous debts can accrue .
translation.zu: na sapos papa i no givim mani bilong lukautim pikinini , dinau bilong em inap kamap bikpela tru .

translation.en: of course , not all young men are callous toward their offspring .
translation.zu: tru , sampela yangpela man ol i save sori long pikinini bilong ol .

translation.en: according to one survey , 75 percent of teen fathers visited their child in the hospital .
translation.zu: save wanpela lain i kisim i kamapim olsem planti ( 75 pesen ) yangpela papa i go lukim pikinini bilong ol long haus sik .

translation.en: still , it isn 't long before most young fathers are overwhelmed by the responsibilities of caring for a child .
translation.zu: tasol i no longtaim na planti ol i pilim olsem wok bilong lukautim pikinini i hatwok tumas .

translation.en: many find that they simply do not have the skill or experience to land suitable employment .
translation.zu: planti ol i no gat save o ol i no bin mekim sampela kain wok bambai ol i ken kisim gutpela wok mani .

translation.en: ashamed of their inability to provide financial support , in time they drop out of the picture .
translation.zu: ol i sem long ol i no inap givim mani bilong lukautim pikinini , na bihain liklik ol i no mekim ol samting bilong helpim pikinini .

translation.en: nevertheless , pangs of regret can haunt a young man for years to come .
translation.zu: tasol yangpela man inap bel hevi long dispela samting inap planti yia bihain .

translation.en: one young father admits : " sometimes i wonder what has happened to my son . . . .
translation.zu: wanpela yangpela papa i tok : " sampela taim mi tingting long wanem samting i bin painim pikinini bilong mi . . . .

translation.en: i don 't feel good about leaving [ him ] , but now i 've lost him .
translation.zu: mi no amamas long mi bin lusim [ em ] , na nau mi no save em i stap we .

translation.en: maybe one day he will find me . "
translation.zu: ating long wanpela de bihain em bai painim na bungim mi . "

translation.en: the harm done to children
translation.zu: ol samting nogut i painim ol pikinini

translation.en: runaway dads may also have to cope with intense feelings of shame - the shame of having done harm to one 's own child .
translation.zu: ol papa i ranawe long wok papa bilong ol , ating ol i sem tu - ol i sem long ol i bin bagarapim sindaun bilong pikinini bilong ol yet .

translation.en: after all , as the bible indicates , a child needs both a mother and a father .
translation.zu: olsem baibel i kamapim , pikinini i mas i gat mama na papa bilong em .

translation.en: says a report by the u.s .
translation.zu: ripot bilong wanpela lain ( u.s .

translation.en: department of health and human services : " young children in single - mother families tend to have lower scores on verbal and math achievement tests .
translation.zu: department of health and human services ) i tok : " ol yangpela pikinini bilong ol famili i gat mama tasol , ol i no save kisim gutpela mak long ol tes bilong pasin bilong toktok na bilong bungim ol namba .

translation.en: in middle childhood , children raised by a single parent tend to receive lower grades , have more behavior problems , and have higher rates of chronic health and psychiatric disorders .
translation.zu: ol pikinini i gat 7 - pela i go inap 10 - pela krismas na papa o mama wanpela tasol i mekim bikpela long ol , planti pikinini olsem i no save mekim gutpela pasin , na planti ol i gat sik bilong skin na bilong tingting .

translation.en: among adolescents and young adults , being raised in a single - mother family is associated with elevated risks of teenage childbearing , high school dropout , incarceration , and with being neither employed nor in school . "
translation.zu: ol yangpela manmeri i go bikpela insait long famili i gat mama tasol , planti bilong ol i no pinisim haiskul , o ol i go long kalabus , o ol i no gat wok mani , o ol i no skul , o ol i karim pikinini taim ol i yangpela yet . "

translation.en: they are also likely to stay poor . "
translation.zu: na planti bilong ol bai i stap rabis inap longpela taim . "

translation.en: many children turn out to be fine , well - balanced adults despite disadvantaged family backgrounds .
translation.zu: planti pikinini i kamap man na meri i gat gutpela pasin na tingting , maski sindaun bilong famili bilong ol i no bin gutpela tumas .

translation.en: even so , feelings of guilt can weigh heavily on the mind of a young man who has abandoned his child .
translation.zu: tasol maski em i olsem , yangpela man i bin lusim pikinini bilong em , bel bilong em inap kotim em tru .

translation.en: " i 'm afraid i 've really [ messed up ] his life forever , " says one unwed father . - teenage fathers .
translation.zu: wanpela papa singel i tok : " mi ting mi bin [ bagarapim ] tru i stap bilong em i go inap em i dai . " - buk teenage fathers .

translation.en: the challenge of rendering support
translation.zu: hatwok long helpim wok bilong lukautim pikinini

translation.en: some young men rightfully do feel a moral obligation toward their children and genuinely want to help in their rearing .
translation.zu: sampela yangpela man i tingting stret olsem ol i gat wok ol i mas mekim na ol i laik helpim wok bilong mekim bikpela long pikinini .

translation.en: often , though , this is much easier said than done .
translation.zu: tasol planti taim dispela i hatwok long mekim .

translation.en: for one thing , an unwed father may have few legal rights , leaving the girl and her parents to control how much - or how little - contact he can have with his child .
translation.zu: wanpela as bilong dispela em olsem : ating kot i no bin givim tok orait long papa singel i ken mekim planti samting bilong lukautim pikinini , olsem na mama bilong pikinini na tupela bubu ol i save makim hamas taim papa inap bung wantaim pikinini bilong em .

translation.en: " it 's a constant jockeying for position to have some say about the child , " says jim , quoted at the outset .
translation.zu: jim , em pastaim mipela i kamapim tok bilong em , em i tok : " long olgeta taim mi mas wok strong long mi ken kamapim tingting bilong mi long wok bilong mekim bikpela long pikinini . "

translation.en: * " it 's hard for me to let them just give him away to some stranger , " laments one young father , " but i guess i don 't have any other choice . "
translation.zu: * wanpela yangpela papa i tok : " mi hatwok long larim ol i givim pikinini long wanpela man mi no save long em , tasol ating i no gat wanpela samting mi inap mekim . "

translation.en: some young men offer to marry the mother of their child .
translation.zu: sampela yangpela man ol i redi long maritim mama bilong pikinini bilong ol .

translation.en: * admittedly , marriage would spare the girl some embarrassment and allow the child to be raised by two parents .
translation.zu: * tru , dispela inap mekim na yangpela meri i no kisim bikpela sem long ai bilong ol man , na pikinini i gat papa na mama bilong mekim bikpela long em .

translation.en: it may even be that despite their misconduct , the young couple are genuinely in love .
translation.zu: na maski tupela i bin mekim pasin pamuk , ating narapela i laikim tru narapela .

translation.en: however , the fact that a boy is able to reproduce hardly means that he has the mental and emotional maturity needed to be a husband and father .
translation.zu: tru , yangpela man inap kamapim pikinini , tasol dispela i no makim olsem bel na tingting bilong em i olsem bilong man i bikpela pinis na em inap stap olsem man marit na papa .

translation.en: nor does it mean that he has the ability to support a wife and child financially .
translation.zu: na tu , dispela i no makim olsem yangpela man inap lukautim meri na pikinini long ol samting bilong skin .

translation.en: so rushing into marriage is not always a wise solution .
translation.zu: olsem na planti taim em i no savepasin long marit hariap .

translation.en: many young men offer to support their children financially .
translation.zu: planti yangpela man i tok ol bai givim mani bilong lukautim pikinini .

translation.en: as mentioned earlier , it takes real determination for a young father to keep up such support over the long haul - perhaps for 18 years or longer !
translation.zu: olsem mipela i stori pinis , yangpela man i mas tingting strong bambai em inap long givim mani bilong lukautim pikinini bilong em inap longpela taim - ating inap 18 yia samting !

translation.en: but consistent help along these lines can prevent the mother and the child from living a life of poverty .
translation.zu: tasol pasin bilong helpim pikinini na mama bilong em long ol samting bilong skin long olgeta taim inap mekim na tupela i no stap rabis .

translation.en: what about sharing in the actual raising of the child ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem long pasin bilong insait long wok bilong mekim bikpela long pikinini ?

translation.en: this too may prove to be a difficult challenge .
translation.zu: ating dispela tu em i hatwok .

translation.en: sometimes parents of the couple fear that there may be further sexual involvement and thus try to discourage - or even forbid - the couple from seeing each other .
translation.zu: sampela papamama bilong tupela yangpela ol i ting tupela bai slip gen wantaim , olsem na ol i no laik - o ol i tambuim - tupela long bung wantaim .

translation.en: the girl herself may decide that she does not want her child to " bond " with a man who is not her husband .
translation.zu: na ating yangpela meri yet i no laik bai pikinini bilong em i pas wantaim man i no poroman marit bilong em .

translation.en: at any rate , if the father is permitted regular contact with his child , families are wise to make sure that visits are well chaperoned , in order to prevent further misconduct .
translation.zu: tasol sapos ol i larim papa i bung wantaim pikinini bilong em , famili bilong tupela yangpela bai bihainim savepasin sapos ol i stretim rot long narapela i stap wantaim tupela yangpela taim papa i kam lukim pikinini , nogut ol i mekim gen pasin i no stret .

translation.en: desiring to get close to their children , some unwed fathers have learned how to perform some basic parenting tasks , such as bathing , feeding , or reading to their children .
translation.zu: sampela papa singel i laik pas gut wantaim pikinini bilong ol , olsem na ol i lain long mekim sampela wok bilong papamama , olsem wasim pikinini , givim kaikai long em , o ritim buk long em .

translation.en: a young man who has gained an appreciation for bible standards may even try to teach his child some of the principles of god 's word .
translation.zu: yangpela man i bin kisim save long ol lo bilong baibel , ating em i gat laik long skulim pikinini bilong em long sampela lo bilong tok bilong god .

translation.en: but while some loving attention from a father is doubtless better for a child than none at all , it is simply not the same as having a father who is there every day .
translation.zu: tru , em i gutpela sapos papa i mekim sampela gutpela pasin long pikinini , tasol em i gutpela moa sapos pikinini i gat papa i stap wantaim em long olgeta de .

translation.en: and if the mother of the child ever gets married , a young father may have to look on helplessly as another man takes over the job of raising his child .
translation.zu: na sapos mama bilong pikinini bai marit , ating yangpela papa i no inap mekim wanpela samting taim narapela man i kisim wok bilong mekim bikpela long pikinini bilong em .

translation.en: it is clear , then , that fathering a child out of wedlock leads to much misery - for both the parents and the child .
translation.zu: tru tumas , pasin bilong ol singel long kamapim pikinini i mekim na papamama na pikinini tu bai karim bikpela hevi .

translation.en: while it may be possible to make the most of a bad situation like teen pregnancy , it should be clear that the best course is to avoid getting involved in immoral conduct in the first place .
translation.zu: ating yangpela inap i stap amamas maski sindaun bilong em i no gutpela tumas olsem taim em i kisim bel , tasol ating yumi inap save tru olsem em i gutpela moa long abrusim pasin pamuk .

translation.en: one young father admits : " once you father a child out of wedlock , your life will never be the same . "
translation.zu: wanpela yangpela papa i tok : " taim man o meri singel i kamapim pikinini , i stap bilong em bai senis olgeta . "

translation.en: indeed , a young father may have to live with the consequences of his error for the rest of his life .
translation.zu: tru tumas , ating yangpela papa i mas karim hevi bilong pasin bilong em i go inap long em i dai .

translation.en: once again the bible 's counsel has proved wise when it says : " flee from fornication . " - 1 corinthians 6 : 18 .
translation.zu: yumi ken save tru olsem tok bilong baibel i gutpela tru bilong helpim man . em i tok : " yupela i mas i stap longwe long pasin pamuk . " - 1 korin 6 : 18 .
