translation.en: as told by lars and judith westergaard
translation.zu: em stori bilong lars na judith westergaard

translation.en: their home looks like a normal setting for any happy family in denmark .
translation.zu: haus bilong ol i olsem haus bilong planti famili i stap amamas long denmak .

translation.en: it is a comfortable house with a pleasant garden , situated in a peaceful village .
translation.zu: em i gutpela haus i gat naispela gaden plaua , na haus i stap long wanpela gutpela ples .

translation.en: indoors , a large photograph on the wall shows the healthy and smiling children of the family .
translation.zu: insait long haus long wanpela banis i gat piksa bilong ol pikinini bilong famili em ol i no gat sik na pes bilong ol i lait .

translation.en: the father , lars , is an elder in a congregation of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: papa bilong famili , em lars , em i wanpela elda long kongrigesen bilong ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: his wife , judith , is a pioneer ( a full - time evangelizer ) .
translation.zu: meri bilong em , judith , em i wanpela painia ( em i save autim tok long olgeta de ) .

translation.en: though they are a happy couple , that has not always been the case .
translation.zu: ol i stap amamas wantaim , tasol ol i no bin stap olsem long olgeta taim .

translation.en: lars and judith have been through trouble and bitterness that resulted in divorce and the splitting up of their family .
translation.zu: lars na judith i bin karim ol hevi na narapela i bel nogut long narapela , olsem na ol i bin katim marit na famili bilong ol i bruk .

translation.en: now , though , their family is reunited .
translation.zu: tasol nau famili bilong ol i stap wanbel wantaim .

translation.en: why ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem ?

translation.en: lars and judith don 't mind telling what went so terribly wrong with their marriage and how they were reunited .
translation.zu: lars na judith i laik stori long ol samting i bin bagarapim marit bilong ol , na long olsem wanem ol i bin kamap wanbel gen .

translation.en: it began so well
translation.zu: kirap bilong marit i gutpela tru

translation.en: lars : our marriage was sheer happiness when it began , in april 1973 .
translation.zu: lars : mipela i stap amamas tru taim mipela i marit long epril 1973 .

translation.en: the whole world seemed open to us .
translation.zu: i olsem planti gutpela samting bai painim mipela .

translation.en: we knew neither the bible nor jehovah 's witnesses , but we were convinced that we could make the world a much better place to live in if all people worked hard enough at it .
translation.zu: mipela i no gat save long baibel o long ol witnes bilong jehova , tasol mipela i bilip olsem dispela graun inap kamap wanpela gutpela ples bilong mipela i ken i stap long en , sapos olgeta man i wok strong long mekim olsem .

translation.en: so we involved ourselves in many political efforts .
translation.zu: olsem na mipela i insait long kain kain wok politik .

translation.en: our happiness grew as our family was increased by three healthy and lively boys - martin , thomas , and jonas .
translation.zu: amamas bilong mipela i go bikpela moa , taim mipela i kisim 3 - pela strongpela pikinini man i no gat sik - em martin , thomas , na jonas .

translation.en: judith : i had an executive position in a branch of the civil service .
translation.zu: judith : mi gat bikpela namba long wanpela ofis bilong gavman .

translation.en: at the same time , i was engaged in political and labor union activities .
translation.zu: long wankain taim mi insait long wok politik na long wok bilong wanpela lain bilong helpim ol wokman .

translation.en: lars : as for me , my job was in a large labor union , and i advanced to an important position .
translation.zu: lars : mi wok long wanpela bikpela lain bilong helpim ol wokman , na mi kisim bikpela namba .

translation.en: lars : but we were so engrossed in our separate activities that we spent less and less time with each other .
translation.zu: lars : tasol mi givim bel long wok bilong mi na judith i givim bel long wok bilong em , olsem na hap taim mipela i stap wantaim i wok long i go liklik .

translation.en: we were working for the same political party but in separate spheres of it .
translation.zu: mipela i wok long wankain lain politik , tasol long narapela narapela hap bilong en .

translation.en: since both of us were thinking of our own matters , our family life became disorganized .
translation.zu: mitupela i wok long tingim ol wok samting bilong mipela wan wan yet , olsem na ol samting bilong famili bilong mipela i no wok gut .

translation.en: if both of us happened to be at home , loud quarrels often erupted .
translation.zu: sapos mitupela wantaim i stap long haus , planti taim mipela i bikmaus na tok pait .

translation.en: then i started using alcohol as a kind of soothing medicine .
translation.zu: bihain mi kirap dring bia samting bilong mekim bel bilong mi i stap isi .

translation.en: judith : of course , we still felt love for each other and the children , but our love was never cultivated the way it should have been ; it seemed to wither .
translation.zu: judith : tru , narapela i laikim yet narapela na mipela i laikim tru ol pikinini bilong mipela , tasol mipela i no bin mekim ol samting bilong strongim dispela pasin sori olsem i stret ol marit i mekim , olsem na pasin sori i wok long pinis .

translation.en: lars : in a desperate attempt to get our family back on track , i decided to quit my job .
translation.zu: lars : bilong helpim famili bilong mipela long stap gut wantaim , mi lusim wok mani bilong mi .

translation.en: in 1985 we moved out of the city to the village where we live now .
translation.zu: long 1985 mipela i lusim biktaun na go sindaun long dispela ples nau mipela i stap long en .

translation.en: matters improved for a little while , but my wife and i continued to be centered on our separate concerns .
translation.zu: inap sotpela taim i stap bilong mipela i kamap gutpela liklik , tasol mitupela i givim bel yet long wok samting bilong mipela wan wan .

translation.en: finally , in february 1989 , our 16 years of marriage ended in divorce .
translation.zu: bihain , long februeri 1989 , taim mipela i bin marit inap 16 yia mipela i katim marit .

translation.en: our family was in ruins .
translation.zu: famili bilong mipela i bagarap .

translation.en: judith : it was terrible to see our own family torn apart and to see how the children suffered .
translation.zu: judith : em i samting nogut tru long lukim famili bilong mipela i bruk na ol pikinini i karim bikpela hevi long dispela .

translation.en: we were so bitter that we could not even agree on shared custody of the boys , so i got custody of all three of them .
translation.zu: mitupela i bel nogut tru , olsem na mipela i no inap pasim tok long wanem taim ol pikinini bai stap wantaim lars na long wanem taim ol bai stap wantaim mi .

translation.en: lars : judith and i had made a few bewildered efforts to keep our crumbling family together .
translation.zu: lars : mitupela judith i bin mekim sampela samting bilong helpim famili bilong mipela long stap wantaim .

translation.en: we even prayed to god for help .
translation.zu: mipela i beten askim god long helpim mipela .

translation.en: but we knew so little about god .
translation.zu: tasol mipela i no save gut long god .

translation.en: judith : our prayers left us with the feeling that god didn 't listen .
translation.zu: judith : taim mipela i beten mipela i pilim olsem god i no harim beten bilong mipela .

translation.en: we are thankful that since then we have seen that god does listen to prayers .
translation.zu: tasol mipela i amamas tru , long wanem , bihain mipela i bin lukim olsem god i save harim beten bilong ol man .

translation.en: lars : we had no idea that we needed to put forth effort and make changes ourselves .
translation.zu: lars : mipela i no bin save olsem mipela yet i mas wok strong na senisim sampela pasin bilong mipela .

translation.en: so the divorce became a sad reality .
translation.zu: olsem na sori tru , mipela i katim marit .

translation.en: an unexpected turn for lars
translation.zu: senis i kamap long i stap bilong lars

translation.en: lars : while i was living alone , events took a completely unexpected turn for me .
translation.zu: lars : taim mi stap wanpis , bikpela senis i kamap long i stap bilong mi .

translation.en: one day i accepted two magazines from jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: long wanpela de mi kisim tupela nius long ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: but as i looked through those magazines , i saw that the witnesses actually believe in both god and jesus christ .
translation.zu: tasol taim mi skelim dispela tupela nius , mi kisim save olsem ol witnes i save bilip long god na long krais jisas tu .

translation.en: that was a big surprise .
translation.zu: mi kirap nogut long dispela .

translation.en: i had no idea that they were christians .
translation.zu: mi no bin save olsem ol i kristen .

translation.en: about the same time , i moved in with a woman i had met .
translation.zu: long dispela taim , mi poromanim wanpela meri na go sindaun wantaim em .

translation.en: it turned out that she had been one of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: mi kisim save olsem bipo em i wanpela witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: when i started asking questions , she showed me in the bible that jehovah is the name of god .
translation.zu: taim mi kirap mekim sampela askim , em i soim mi long baibel olsem jehova em i nem bilong god .

translation.en: so " jehovah 's witnesses " means " god 's witnesses " !
translation.zu: olsem na dispela nem " witnes bilong jehova " i makim " witnes bilong god " !

translation.en: the woman arranged for me to attend a public talk at an assembly hall of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: dispela meri i stretim rot long mi ken i go harim wanpela pablik - tok long haus kibung bilong ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: i visited the local kingdom hall to learn more , and a bible study was established .
translation.zu: mi go long haus kingdom bilong kisim sampela save moa , na mi kirap stadi long baibel .

translation.en: it didn 't take long for me to realize that the way i was living was wrong , so i moved away from my female acquaintance and went to live alone in my hometown .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na mi luksave olsem i no stret long mi stap nating wantaim wanpela meri , olsem na mi lusim em na go sindaun long ples bilong mi .

translation.en: yet , i still had some doubts .
translation.zu: tasol mi gat tupela tingting yet .

translation.en: were jehovah 's witnesses really god 's people ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ? ol witnes bilong jehova ol i lain tru bilong god ?

translation.en: what about all the things i had learned as a child ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem long ol samting mi bin kisim save long en taim mi pikinini yet ?

translation.en: since i had been raised as a seventh - day adventist , i now contacted an adventist minister .
translation.zu: mi go bikpela insait long lotu sevende adventis , olsem na mi ringim wanpela pris bilong lotu sevende .

translation.en: he agreed to study with me every wednesday , while jehovah 's witnesses studied with me every monday .
translation.zu: em i tok em bai stadi wantaim mi long olgeta trinde , na ol witnes bilong jehova ol i stadi wantaim mi long olgeta mande .

translation.en: what i wanted was a clear answer from both groups on four specific matters : the return of christ , the resurrection , the doctrine of the trinity , and the way the congregation should be organized .
translation.zu: mi laik dispela tupela lain i givim gutpela bekim long 4 - pela samting : long kam bek bilong krais , kirap bek , bilip bilong god triwan , na long pasin bilong lukautim wok bilong kongrigesen .

translation.en: it took me only a few months to erase all doubts .
translation.zu: insait long sampela mun tasol mi no gat tupela tingting moa .

translation.en: in each of the four areas - and in everything else - only the beliefs of jehovah 's witnesses were fully bible based .
translation.zu: long olgeta dispela 4 - pela tok - na long olgeta narapela samting tu - baibel i as bilong ol bilip bilong ol witnes bilong jehova tasol .

translation.en: as a consequence , i happily began to take part in all congregation activities and soon made a dedication to jehovah .
translation.zu: olsem na mi amamas long insait long ol wok bilong kongrigesen na bihain liklik mi dediket long jehova .

translation.en: in may 1990 , i was baptized .
translation.zu: long me 1990 , mi kisim baptais .

translation.en: what about judith ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem long judith ?

translation.en: judith : at the culmination of our marital crisis , i had started going to church again .
translation.zu: judith : taim hevi bilong marit bilong mipela i go bikpela tru , mi kirap gen long go long lotu .

translation.en: when i heard that lars was becoming one of jehovah 's witnesses , i was far from pleased .
translation.zu: taim mi harim olsem lars i laik kamap wanpela witnes bilong jehova , mi no amamas liklik long dispela samting .

translation.en: our youngest son , ten - year - old jonas , sometimes visited his father , but i forbade lars to take jonas to any meetings of the witnesses .
translation.zu: laspela pikinini man bilong mipela , em jonas i gat 10 - pela krismas , em i save go lukim papa bilong em long sampela taim , tasol mi tambuim lars long kisim jonas i go long ol miting bilong ol witnes .

translation.en: also , i had become more involved in politics and all kinds of community work .
translation.zu: na tu , mi insait moa yet long wok politik na long kain kain wok bilong helpim sindaun bilong ol man .

translation.en: so if anyone had talked about a possible reunion of our family at that time , it would have seemed impossible .
translation.zu: olsem na long dispela taim sapos wanpela man i bin tok olsem famili bilong mipela bai kamap wanbel gen , mi no inap bilipim dispela tok .

translation.en: in search of ammunition against jehovah 's witnesses , i went to the minister of the local parish , who admitted straight away that he knew nothing about the witnesses and had no literature about them .
translation.zu: bilong painim sampela tok bilong daunim ol witnes bilong jehova , mi go lukim pris bilong haus lotu i stap klostu , na wantu em i tok olsem em i no save long wanpela samting bilong ol witnes na em i no gat sampela buk samting i stori long ol .

translation.en: all he could say was that i had better keep away from them .
translation.zu: em i tok tasol olsem mi mas i stap longwe long ol .

translation.en: that , of course , did nothing to change my negative view of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: dispela i no senisim tingting nogut bilong mi long ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: but then i was forced to meet them in a way i had never expected .
translation.zu: tasol bihain wanpela samting i subim mi long bung wantaim ol long wanpela rot mi kirap nogut long en .

translation.en: my brother who lives in sweden had become one of jehovah 's witnesses , and i was invited to his wedding at a kingdom hall !
translation.zu: brata bilong mi em i stap long swiden em i bin kamap wanpela witnes bilong jehova , na em i singautim mi long go long bung bilong marit bilong em long wanpela haus kingdom !

translation.en: that experience made a drastic change in my view of the witnesses .
translation.zu: dispela bung i senisim tru tingting bilong mi long ol witnes .

translation.en: to my amazement they were not the dull people i had always envisioned .
translation.zu: mi kirap nogut long lukim olsem ol i no olsem ol man yumi save les long toktok wantaim ol .

translation.en: they were kind and happy , even showing a good sense of humor .
translation.zu: ol i stap amamas na mekim gutpela pasin , na ol i save tok pani na lap .

translation.en: meanwhile , my ex - husband , lars , had completely changed .
translation.zu: long dispela taim pasin bilong man bilong mi bilong bipo , em lars , em i senis olgeta .

translation.en: he was more responsible , spent time with the children , was kind and controlled in his speech , and did not drink immoderately as he had in the past .
translation.zu: em i mekim gut ol wok bilong em , em i lusim hap taim bilong stap wantaim ol pikinini , em i bosim maus bilong em na mekim gutpela tok , na em i no dring planti tumas olsem em i bin mekim long bipo .

translation.en: his personality was so appealing !
translation.zu: mi laikim tru pasin bilong em !

translation.en: he was now just the kind of man i had always wanted him to be .
translation.zu: nau em i dispela kain man em oltaim mi gat laik long em i mas i stap olsem .

translation.en: it was such a frustrating thought that i was no longer married to him and that perhaps someday another woman would marry him !
translation.zu: mi bel hevi tru long tingting olsem mi no marit moa wantaim em , na ating bihain narapela meri bai maritim em !

translation.en: then i planned a subtle " attack . "
translation.zu: orait nau mi wokim rot bilong bung wantaim lars .

translation.en: we met in an amusement park .
translation.zu: mi tok olsem tupela anti i laik lukim jonas .

translation.en: to my surprise , as soon as i brought up the subject of our future , lars took a book out of his pocket .
translation.zu: taim tupela anti i lukautim jonas , mitupela lars i painim wanpela bang na sindaun long en .

translation.en: it was called making your family life happy .
translation.zu: nem bilong buk em rot bilong kamapim amamas insait long famili .

translation.en: * he handed the book to me and suggested that i read the chapters on the role of the husband and the wife in a family .
translation.zu: * em i givim dispela buk long mi na em i tokim mi long ritim ol sapta i tok long wok bilong man marit na meri marit insait long famili .

translation.en: he made a special point of recommending that i look up the scriptures .
translation.zu: na em i kirapim mi long lukim ol skripsa em buk i makim .

translation.en: then , when lars and i got up from the bench , i wanted to take his arm , but he kindly rejected that .
translation.zu: orait , taim mitupela lars i kirap sanap mi laik holim han bilong em , tasol long gutpela pasin em i tok nogat long dispela samting .

translation.en: lars had no intention of forming a new alliance with me without knowing my view of his new faith .
translation.zu: lars i no gat tingting long stap gen wantaim mi taim em i no save long tingting bilong mi long nupela bilip bilong em .

translation.en: that offended me somewhat , but then i realized that his attitude was quite reasonable and would be to my own benefit if he ever became my husband again .
translation.zu: dispela i bagarapim bel bilong mi liklik , tasol bihain mi luksave olsem tingting bilong em i gutpela na dispela bai helpim mi bihain sapos em bai kamap gen man bilong mi .

translation.en: all of this made me more curious than ever about jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: olgeta dispela samting i mekim na mi laik kisim sampela save moa long ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: the next day , i contacted a woman who i knew was a witness , and we arranged for her and her husband to give me the information i wanted about their religion .
translation.zu: long de bihain , mi toktok wantaim wanpela meri em mi save olsem em i wanpela witnes , na mipela i stretim rot long em wantaim man bilong em ol bai stori long mi long ol samting bilong lotu bilong ol , em mi gat laik long kisim save long en .

translation.en: they had bible answers to all my many questions .
translation.zu: ol i bekim olgeta askim bilong mi long rot bilong baibel .

translation.en: i was able to see that what jehovah 's witnesses teach is solidly founded on the bible .
translation.zu: mi inap luksave olsem baibel i as bilong ol samting ol witnes bilong jehova i lainim ol man long en .

translation.en: on one point after another , i had to surrender to the truth .
translation.zu: olgeta wan wan samting mipela i toktok long en , mi mas tokaut olsem ol i kamapim tok i tru .

translation.en: during that period i resigned from the evangelical lutheran church and terminated my political activities .
translation.zu: long dispela taim mi lusim lotu luteran na mi pinis long olgeta wok politik mi bin insait long en .

translation.en: i even quit smoking .
translation.zu: na mi lusim smok tu .

translation.en: my bible study began in august 1990 , and in april 1991 , i was baptized as one of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: mi kirap stadi long baibel long ogas 1990 , na long epril 1991 , mi kisim baptais olsem wanpela witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: judith : now we were both baptized witnesses .
translation.zu: judith : nau mitupela wantaim i witnes i baptais pinis .

translation.en: though we had gone separate ways , we had both made a study of the bible .
translation.zu: maski lars i bin bihainim rot bilong em na mi bin bihainim rot bilong mi , mitupela wantaim i bin stadi long baibel .

translation.en: thanks to its fine teachings , we were different from what we had been before .
translation.zu: ol gutpela tok bilong en i bin helpim mipela , na pasin bilong mipela i no wankain olsem bipo .

translation.en: we still cared for each other , perhaps in an even deeper way than before .
translation.zu: narapela i laikim yet narapela , na ating dispela pasin i bin kamap strong moa , winim bilong bipo .

translation.en: so there we were , free to marry again - and that is what we did .
translation.zu: olsem na rot i op na mipela inap marit gen - na tru tumas , mipela i mekim olsem .

translation.en: we exchanged our vows for the second time , but this time in the kingdom hall of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: mipela i mekim tok promis bilong marit long namba tu taim , tasol long dispela taim long haus kingdom bilong ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: what happiness and joy we now felt !
translation.zu: man ! mipela i amamas na belgut tru !

translation.en: judith : the wedding was attended by our sons , many relatives , and many new and old friends .
translation.zu: judith : ol pikinini bilong mipela , na planti wanblut , na planti nupela pren na ol pren bilong bipo ol i kam long bung bilong marit bilong mipela .

translation.en: it was a marvelous experience .
translation.zu: em i wanpela gutpela samting tru .

translation.en: among the guests were some who had known us during our previous marriage ; they were pleased to see us together again and were surprised to see the genuine joy among jehovah 's witnesses .

translation.zu: long taim bilong yumi , ol man i bin kamapim ol narapela kain samting yumi kirap nogut long en , na yumi save ol bai kamapim yet planti samting moa .

translation.en: no wonder an ancient wise man urged : " stand still and show yourself attentive to the wonderful works of god " ! - job 37 : 14 .
translation.zu: olsem na wanpela saveman bilong bipo i tok : " yu mas stap isi na putim yau gut na kisim tingting long ol kain kain strongpela wok god i save mekim " ! - jop 37 : 14 .

translation.en: what lessons should we draw from the creations around us , such as the tides , the rain , the snow , and the wind ?
translation.zu: ol samting god i bin wokim olsem tait bilong solwara , ren , ais , na win , ol i skulim yumi long wanem samting ?

translation.en: these and other questions will be answered during the discourse .
translation.zu: dispela tok bai bekim ol dispela askim na sampela narapela askim .

translation.en: others have reached similar conclusions regarding the god of the " old testament " - yahweh , or jehovah .
translation.zu: sampela narapela i kisim wankain tingting long pasin bilong dispela god bilong " olpela testamen " - em yawe , o jehova .

translation.en: thus , some today wonder whether jehovah was in fact a cruel god who eventually changed his character to become the loving and merciful god of the " new testament . "
translation.zu: olsem na sampela i gat hap tingting olsem pastaim jehova em i wanpela god i save mekim pasin nogut na isi isi em i senis na kamap dispela god bilong " nupela testamen , " em god bilong sori na marimari .

translation.en: it was first propounded by marcion , a semi - gnostic of the second century c.e .
translation.zu: marsion i bin kamapim pastaim , em i bin stap 150 yia samting bihain long krais , na em i bihainim sampela tingting bilong ol nostik .

translation.en: marcion repudiated the god of the " old testament . "
translation.zu: marsion i no laikim liklik dispela god bilong " olpela testamen . "

translation.en: he considered that god to be violent and vindictive , a tyrant who offered material rewards to those worshiping him .
translation.zu: em i tok dispela god i man bilong belhat na pait , na man bilong bekim rong , na em i wanpela hatpela bos i save praisim ol man i lotuim em .

translation.en: on the other hand , marcion described the " new testament " god - as revealed through jesus christ - as a perfect god , a god of pure love and mercy , of graciousness and forgiveness .
translation.zu: marsion i tok olsem god bilong " nupela testamen " - em dispela god jisas krais i stori long en - em i gutpela olgeta , na em i wanpela god bilong sori na marimari , na em i save bihainim gutpela pasin na pasin bilong lusim tingting long rong bilong man .

translation.en: jehovah meets the challenge of changing conditions
translation.zu: " jehova i save tingim ol senis i kamap "

translation.en: god 's very name , jehovah , means " he causes to become . "
translation.zu: insait bilong dispela nem bilong god , jehova , i olsem , " em i mekim i kamap . "

translation.en: this implies that jehovah causes himself to become the fulfiller of all his promises .
translation.zu: nem bilong em i makim olsem jehova i save kamap olsem man bilong inapim ol tok promis bilong em .

translation.en: when moses asked god his name , jehovah elaborated on its meaning in this way : " i shall prove to be what i shall prove to be . "
translation.zu: taim moses i bin askim god long kamapim nem bilong em , jehova i kamapim sampela insait moa bilong dispela nem , olsem : " mi bai kamap wanem wanem kain mi laikim . "

translation.en: so jehovah chooses to become , or proves to be , whatever is needed to fulfill his righteous purposes and promises .
translation.zu: olsem na jehova i save kamap wanem wanem kain em i laikim bilong inapim laik bilong em na truim ol tok promis bilong em .

translation.en: an evidence of this is the fact that he bears a wide array of titles and descriptive terms : jehovah of armies , judge , sovereign , jealous , sovereign lord , creator , father , grand instructor , shepherd , hearer of prayer , repurchaser , happy god , and many others .
translation.zu: ol nem em i holim i kamapim klia dispela samting . sampela nem bilong em i olsem : jehova bilong ol bikpela lain ami , jas , king , man i no inap larim wanpela god giaman i senisim em , bikpela king , man bilong wokim yumi , papa , man bilong skulim yumi , wasman , man bilong harim beten , man bilong baim bek yumi , god bilong amamas - em i holim ol dispela nem wantaim planti narapela nem moa .

translation.en: he has chosen to become all of these - and much more - in order to carry out his loving purposes . - exodus 34 : 14 ; judges 11 : 27 ; psalm 23 : 1 ; 65 : 2 ; 73 : 28 ; 89 : 26 ; isaiah 8 : 13 ; 30 : 20 ; 40 : 28 ; 41 : 14 ; 1 timothy 1 : 11 .
translation.zu: bilong kamapim ol gutpela laik bilong em , jehova i save kamap kain man olsem ol dispela nem i makim . - kisim bek 34 : 14 , nw ; hetman 11 : 27 ; song 23 : 1 ; 65 : 2 ; 73 : 28 ; 89 : 26 ; aisaia 8 : 13 , nw ; 30 : 20 ; 40 : 28 ; 41 : 14 ; 1 timoti 1 : 11 .

translation.en: does this mean , then , that god 's personality or standards change ?
translation.zu: orait yu ting dispela i makim olsem pasin bilong god o sampela lo bilong em i save senis ?

translation.en: no .
translation.zu: nogat .

translation.en: regarding god , james 1 : 17 says : " with him there is not a variation of the turning of the shadow . "
translation.zu: jems 1 : 17 i tok olsem : " dispela papa em i no save senisim nabaut pasin bilong en . "

translation.en: the example of caring parents who shift roles for the sake of their children illustrates how this is possible .
translation.zu: pasin bilong gutpela papamama long mekim kain kain samting bilong helpim pikinini bilong ol i piksa bilong dispela samting .

translation.en: in the course of a single day , a parent may be a cook , a housekeeper , an electrician , a nurse , a friend , a counselor , a teacher , a disciplinarian , and much more .
translation.zu: insait long wanpela de , ating papa o mama i kamap olsem man o meri bilong redim kaikai , klinim haus , givim gutpela tingting , givim kanda , na ol bai mekim wok olsem nes , pren , tisa , na planti samting moa .

translation.en: the parent does not change personality when assuming these roles ; he or she simply adapts to needs as they arise .
translation.zu: dispela papa o mama ol i no save senisim pasin bilong ol bilong mekim ol dispela narapela narapela wok , nogat ; ol i save mekim ol samting ol i gat wok long mekim .

translation.en: the same is true of jehovah but on a far grander scale .
translation.zu: na i wankain tu long jehova , tasol wok em i mekim i bikpela moa yet .

translation.en: there is no limit to what he can cause himself to become in order to fulfill his purpose and to benefit his creatures . - romans 11 : 33 .
translation.zu: jehova inap bihainim kain kain pasin bilong inapim laik bilong em na helpim lain bilong em . - rom 11 : 33 .

translation.en: for example , jehovah is revealed as a god of love and mercy in both the hebrew and the christian greek scriptures .
translation.zu: profet maika , em i bin stap olsem 700 yia samting paslain long krais , i stori long pasin bilong jehova olsem : " bikpela , i no gat wanpela god i olsem yu .

translation.en: the prophet micah of the eighth century b.c.e . asked about jehovah : " who is a god like you , one pardoning error and passing over transgression of the remnant of his inheritance ?
translation.zu: yu save lusim sin bilong ol liklik lain manmeri bilong yu i stap yet . kros bilong yu i no save stap oltaim .

translation.en: he will certainly not hold onto his anger forever , for he is delighting in loving - kindness . "
translation.zu: nogat . oltaim yu save laikim mipela na yu save amamas long mekim gutpela pasin long mipela . "

translation.en: on the other hand , in both parts of the bible , jehovah is presented as the righteous judge of those who repeatedly , grossly , and unrepentantly violate his laws and harm others .
translation.zu: tasol ol skripsa hibru na ol skripsa grik i kamapim tu pasin bilong jehova long stap stretpela jas bilong ol man ol i save brukim ol lo bilong em planti taim na bagarapim ol narapela , tasol ol i no laik tanim bel .

translation.en: " all the wicked ones [ jehovah ] will annihilate , " said the psalmist .
translation.zu: olsem man bilong raitim song i tok : " [ jehova ] bai bagarapim ol manmeri i save mekim pasin nogut . "

translation.en: in a similar vein , john 3 : 36 states : " he that exercises faith in the son has everlasting life ; he that disobeys the son will not see life , but the wrath of god remains upon him . "
translation.zu: ( song 145 : 20 ) i olsem jon 3 : 36 i tok : " man i bilip long pikinini , em i gat laip i stap gut oltaim oltaim . tasol man i no bihainim tok bilong pikinini , em bai i no inap kisim laip . nogat .

translation.en: jehovah 's personality and cardinal qualities - love , wisdom , justice , and power - have not changed .
translation.zu: pasin bilong jehova i no bin senis na em i holim yet ol pasin olsem pasin sori , gutpela tingting na save , stretpela pasin , na bikpela strong .

translation.en: he told the people of israel : " i am jehovah ; i have not changed . "
translation.zu: em i tokim ol lain israel olsem : ' mi tasol mi bikpela na mi no save senisim tingting bilong mi . '

translation.en: true to that divine statement , a close examination of the bible as a whole reveals a god who is unchanging in his standards and qualities .
translation.zu: na olsem dispela tok bilong god yet i kamapim , taim yumi skelim gut ol tok i stap long baibel olgeta , dispela i kamapim klia olsem ol lo na pasin bilong god i no save senis .

translation.en: god 's firmness for righteousness , as revealed throughout the bible , is no less nor his love any greater than it was at the beginning of his dealings with humans in eden .
translation.zu: olsem baibel i kamapim , pasin sori bilong god na pasin bilong em long holimpas stretpela pasin i no bin senis ; em i bihainim wankain pasin olsem em i bin mekim long taim em i kirap na wokim ol man long gaden iden .

translation.en: the differences in his personality seemingly demonstrated in various parts of the bible are in reality different aspects of the same unchanging personality .
translation.zu: ol samting jehova i bin mekim olsem baibel i stori long en i kamapim ol narapela narapela pasin bilong dispela god i no save senis .

translation.en: jehovah is the supreme embodiment of constancy and consistency .
translation.zu: jehova em i man bilong stap wankain tasol .

translation.en: we can always rely on him .
translation.zu: em i no save senis .

translation.en: we found some in lesotho , a mountainous kingdom in southern africa .
translation.zu: mipela painim sampela long lesoto , long ol maunten long hap saut bilong afrika .

translation.en: their village , ha kome , is situated about 40 miles [ 60 km ] from maseru , the capital city of lesotho , in the foothills of the majestic maluti mountains .
translation.zu: ha komi em nem bilong dispela ples na em i stap longwe olsem 60 kilomita long maseru , em biktaun bilong lesoto , long hap ol bikpela maunten tru bilong maluti i kirap long en .

translation.en: during the summer months , these mountain slopes are often covered with bright - red flowers .
translation.zu: long taim bilong san , ol retpela plaua i save pulap long olgeta hap bilong maunten .

translation.en: commonly known as red - hot pokers , these beautiful flowers provide a striking contrast to the lush green vegetation of the area .
translation.zu: em ol plaua ol i save kolim olsem red - hot pokers , kala bilong ol dispela naispela plaua i lait gut tru namel long ol grinpela gras samting .

translation.en: they actually build their homes inside the caves of the mountain slope .
translation.zu: ol i save wokim ol haus bilong ol insait long ol hul bilong maunten .

translation.en: wooden sticks and other materials , such as reeds , form the frame of the thick front wall .
translation.zu: bilong banisim maus bilong hul , ol i mekim wok long han bilong ol diwai na ol narapela samting olsem pitpit .

translation.en: the wall is insulated with a mixture of mud and cow dung .
translation.zu: bilong pasim kol ol i save putim graun malumalum wantaim pekpek bilong bulmakau long dispela banis .

translation.en: this insulation affords some protection from lesotho 's cold winters , when the temperature can fall below the freezing point .
translation.zu: sampela taim kol bilong lesoto i mekim na ol wara i kamap olsem ais .

translation.en: inside , there is a lowered spot in the floor called ifo , meaning " fireplace , " which is also used to provide some heat when it is cold .
translation.zu: long plua i stap insait ol i wokim wanpela hap ol i kolim ifo , dispela nem i makim " ples bilong wokim paia , " na dispela paia tu i save mekim ples i hat liklik long taim bilong kol .

translation.en: the roof , the back wall , and often the sidewalls are all formed by the rock of the cave itself .
translation.zu: banis ston bilong dispela hul i stap olsem rup bilong haus , na banis bilong baksait , na ol banis i stap arere .

translation.en: a mixture of mud and cow dung is applied to these , and it is reapplied each year .
translation.zu: wanpela taim long olgeta yia ol i save tanim graun malumalum wantaim pekpek bilong bulmakau na pasim long banis na rup i stap insait .

translation.en: this adds color and a smoother surface to the rock .
translation.zu: dispela i kamapim kala insait long haus na ol banis insait i stap gut .

translation.en: cowhides decorate the interior and are also used as mattresses for sleeping .
translation.zu: skin bilong bulmakau i bilasim haus insait na i stap olsem matres bilong ol long slip .

translation.en: the men of the village can be seen either working in their maize fields or eagerly engaging in conversation with other men .
translation.zu: yu inap lukim ol man bilong dispela ples i wok long ol bikpela gaden kon bilong ol o ol i amamas long bung na toktok wantaim ol narapela man .

translation.en: the occasional small aircraft flying overhead and four - wheel - drive vehicles bringing visitors to the caves amuse young and old in the village .
translation.zu: ol yangpela na ol lapun long ples i kisim amamas long lukim ol liklik balus o ol ka i gat 4 - wil - draiv i save kam sampela taim bilong lusim ol lain i kam raun long dispela hap .

translation.en: because of the lack of firewood , dried cow dung , reeds , and a few tree branches are used for fuel .
translation.zu: i no gat planti paiawut , olsem na ol i save wokim paia long pekpek bilong bulmakau i drai pinis , na pitpit , na sampela han bilong diwai .

translation.en: common household implements found in these cave dwellings include the traditional hand mill for grinding maize and a wooden stick for stirring maize porridge .
translation.zu: planti haus i gat wanpela masin bilong bipo bilong wilwilim kon , na wanpela stik bilong tanim kon taim ol i wok long kukim .

translation.en: lesotho is well - known for paintings by bushmen , which are found in numerous caves and on rocks throughout the country .
translation.zu: ol man i save olsem lesoto i gat ol piksa bipo ol lain busman i bin wokim insait long sampela hul bilong maunten na ausait long sampela ston .

translation.en: bushmen are the people who originally inhabited the caves of ha kome .
translation.zu: ol busman i bin stap long ol hul bilong maunten long ha komi paslain long ol narapela .

translation.en: most of the paintings in the ha kome caves have vanished .
translation.zu: planti piksa long ol hul long ha komi i no stap moa .

translation.en: only some vestiges remain as reminders of the bushmen 's artistry .
translation.zu: sampela tasol i stap bilong kirapim yumi long tingim pasin bilong ol busman long wokim piksa .

translation.en: a group of jehovah 's witnesses engage in their preaching work in an area not too far from ha kome .
translation.zu: sampela lain bilong ol witnes bilong jehova i save mekim wok bilong ol long autim tok long wanpela hap i no longwe tumas long ha komi .

translation.en: many in ha kome are eager to accept bible literature .
translation.zu: planti lain bilong ha komi ol i amamas long kisim sampela nius bilong baibel .

translation.en: often they express appreciation for the literature by offering vegetables , eggs , or other items as donations for the witnesses ' educational work .
translation.zu: na bilong tok tenkyu long dispela samting ol i save givim sampela kaikai bilong gaden , kiau , na sampela narapela samting bilong helpim wok bilong ol witnes long skulim ol man long baibel .

translation.en: the activity of zealous witnesses in that area has resulted in a number of bible studies .
translation.zu: ol witnes i save wok strong long dispela hap , na dispela i mekim na ol i bin kirapim sampela baibel - stadi .

translation.en: in this way , seeds of truth have found fertile soil in the hearts of these humble people . - matthew 13 : 8 .
translation.zu: long dispela rot , pikinini wit bilong tok i tru i kru na kamap long bel bilong ol dispela lain i save bihainim pasin daun . - matyu 13 : 8 .

translation.en: this series of conventions , which began in may in the united states , will be held in hundreds of cities throughout the world for a number of months to come .
translation.zu: ol dispela kibung i kirap pinis long amerika long mun me , na inap sampela mun bihain ol bai mekim long planti handet biktaun long olgeta hap bilong graun .

translation.en: in most locations the program will begin friday morning at 9 : 30 with a musical program .
translation.zu: long planti hap , program bai kirap long 9 : 30 long fraide long moningtaim , na pastaim bai i gat sampela musik bilong kirapim program .

translation.en: after opening with encouragement to heed what god 's word says , the morning program will continue with the talks " become radiant over the goodness of jehovah " and " continue steadfast as seeing the one who is invisible . "
translation.zu: ol bai kirapim program long wanpela tok bilong strongim yumi long bihainim tok bilong god , na bihain ol bai mekim ol tok , nem bilong en " amamas tru long gutpela pasin bilong jehova " na " sanap strong olsem man i lukim god . "

translation.en: then the morning program will conclude with the convention 's keynote address , " praise jehovah - the doer of wonderful things . "
translation.zu: bilong pinisim program bilong moningtaim , ol bai kamapim as tok bilong kibung , em " litimapim nem bilong jehova - em man bilong mekim ol gutpela wok . "

translation.en: the first talk of the afternoon session , " do not give up in doing what is fine , " will be followed by a three - part symposium on how to select a marriage mate , build a spiritually strong family , and teach children to love jehovah .
translation.zu: namba wan tok long program bilong apinun em " no ken les long mekim ol gutpela pasin , " na bihain long en wanpela tok i gat 3 - pela hap bai stori long ol samting man o meri i mas tingim taim em i laik painim poroman marit , na kamapim wanpela famili i strong long samting bilong spirit , na skulim ol pikinini long laikim jehova .

translation.en: the concluding discourse of the day , " keeping in step with jehovah 's organization , " will review the progressive development in modern times of an understanding of god 's purposes .
translation.zu: laspela tok bilong dispela de , nem bilong en " wokabaut gut wantaim oganaisesen bilong jehova , " bai stori long ol nupela save yumi wok long kisim long ol laik bilong god long nau .

translation.en: the saturday morning program features a second three - part symposium , entitled " ministers of god 's word . "
translation.zu: long program bilong sarere long moningtaim bai i gat narapela tok i gat 3 - pela hap , nem bilong en " ol wokman bilong tok bilong god . "

translation.en: this will provide suggestions on how to carry out our disciple - making work .
translation.zu: dispela tok bai kamapim sampela tok bilong helpim yumi long mekim gut wok bilong yumi long kamapim ol disaipel .

translation.en: after that will come a talk on baptism , and an opportunity to be baptized will be provided for those who qualify .
translation.zu: na bihain long dispela , bai i gat tok bilong baptais , na rot i op long ol manmeri i winim mak bilong baptais ol i ken kisim baptais .

translation.en: in the afternoon a third three - part symposium will highlight the theme " work hard at cultivating spirituality , " during which practical suggestions will be provided on how to develop spirituality .
translation.zu: long apinun i gat narapela tok i gat 3 - pela hap bilong en na ol bai stori gut olsem yumi mas " wok strong long kisim pasin bilong tingim ol samting bilong spirit . " ol bai kamapim ol tok bilong helpim yumi long tingim moa yet ol samting bilong spirit .

translation.en: it will discuss isaiah chapters 25 and 26 and will describe how we can better understand this fascinating book of the bible .
translation.zu: em bai stori long ol tok bilong aisaia sapta 25 na 26 na i kamapim olsem wanem yumi ken save moa long dispela gutpela buk bilong baibel .

translation.en: sunday morning will include a final three - part symposium entitled " zephaniah 's meaningful prophecy for those doing god 's will . "
translation.zu: long sande moning i gat narapela tok i gat 3 - pela hap , nem bilong en " bikpela tok profet bilong sefanaia , em bilong ol man i mekim laik bilong god . "

translation.en: it will explain how that prophecy applied in ancient times to the nation of judah and how it applies in our day , especially to the religions of this world .
translation.zu: em bai kamapim klia olsem wanem dispela tok profet i stret long lain juda bilong bipo na olsem wanem em i stret long taim bilong yumi long ol lotu bilong dispela graun .

translation.en: afterward you will enjoy a full - costume drama entitled " warning examples for our day , " which discusses the immorality of israelite men just prior to israel 's entry into the promised land .
translation.zu: bihain long dispela bai yu amamas long lukim wanpela pilai , nem bilong en " ol i stap olsem piksa bilong givim tok lukaut long yumi long nau . " pilai bai stori long ol pasin nogut bilong ol man israel paslain long ol i go insait long graun bilong promis .

translation.en: a feature of the convention 's final session on sunday afternoon will be the public talk , " why be attentive to god 's wonderful works . "
translation.zu: wanpela tok long laspela hap bilong program long sande apinun em pablik - tok " bilong wanem yumi mas tingim ol gutpela wok bilong god . "

translation.en: to find the location nearest your home , contact the local kingdom hall of jehovah 's witnesses or write the publishers of this magazine .
translation.zu: bilong save long ples kibung bai kamap long en , yu ken go long haus kingdom bilong ol witnes bilong jehova na askim ol o raitim pas long ol man bilong wokim dispela nius .

translation.en: in its issue of february 15 , our companion magazine , the watchtower , has a list of all the convention locations in the united states , canada , britain , and ireland .
translation.zu: long wastaua bilong februeri 15 , em poroman bilong dispela nius , i gat lista bilong ol ples dispela kibung bai kamap long en long papua niugini , fiji , nu kaledonia , nu silan , ol ailan solomon , ostrelia , vanuatu na sampela hap moa .

translation.en: young people ask . . .
translation.zu: ol yangpela i laik save . . .

translation.en: " i wanted to live somewhere else . " - sam .
translation.zu: " mi bin i gat laik long stap long narapela hap . " - sam .

translation.en: " i was just plain curious . i wanted to see something new . " - maren .
translation.zu: " bel bilong mi i kirap long lukim nupela ples . " - maren .

translation.en: " a close friend told me that breaking away from home a little would be good for me . " - andreas .
translation.zu: " wanpela pren i bin tok olsem pasin bilong lusim famili inap liklik hap taim bai i gutpela bilong helpim mi . " - andreas .

translation.en: do you ever dream of living in a foreign country - perhaps just on a temporary basis ?
translation.zu: sampela taim yu save tingting long go na stap sotpela taim liklik long narapela kantri ?

translation.en: every year , thousands of young people are able to do just that .
translation.zu: long olgeta yia rot i op na planti yangpela i save mekim olsem .

translation.en: andreas says of his foreign experience : " i would love to do it again . "
translation.zu: andreas i bin mekim na em i tok olsem : " mi gat bikpela laik tru long mekim gen . "

translation.en: some youths make a temporary move because they want to earn money or learn a foreign language .
translation.zu: sampela yangpela i save go long ol narapela kantri inap sotpela taim bilong kisim wok mani , o lainim narapela tok ples .

translation.en: for example , in many countries au pair programs are quite popular .
translation.zu: olsem , long planti kantri ol yangpela i ken kisim wok ol i kolim olsem au pair .

translation.en: these allow young foreigners to do domestic work for a family in return for room and board , and they are able to use their spare time to study the local language .
translation.zu: dispela i olsem , wanpela yangpela i kam long narapela kantri bilong stap wantaim wanpela famili na helpim ol long sampela wok bilong haus , na em i kisim wanpela rum slip na kaikai olsem pe bilong wok em i mekim .

translation.en: others make the move to find work so that they will be able to help their families financially .
translation.zu: na tu , sampela ol i save go bilong kisim wok mani bilong helpim famili bilong ol i stap long ples .

translation.en: still others move because they are not sure what they want to do after school and they want to take a time - out abroad .
translation.zu: tasol long sampela yangpela , skul bilong ol i pinis na ol i no save gut wanem kain wok ol i laik mekim , olsem na ol i laik malolo na go long narapela kantri .

translation.en: interestingly , some christian youths have moved to lands where there is a shortage of evangelizers , in order to expand their ministry .
translation.zu: bilong mekim bikpela wok moa long samting bilong spirit , sampela yangpela kristen i lusim ples bilong ol na go long ol kantri i no gat planti man i save mekim wok bilong autim gutnius .

translation.en: whatever the reason for the move , living in a foreign country can be a valuable lesson in adult independence .
translation.zu: maski i gat wanem as na ol i go , pasin bilong stap long narapela kantri inap skulim ol yangpela long lukautim ol yet .

translation.en: you might even master a foreign language - something that could increase your prospects in the job market .
translation.zu: na yu inap lainim narapela tok ples - ating dispela inap mekim na bai i no hatwok long kisim wanpela wok mani long bihain .

translation.en: nevertheless , living abroad is not always a positive experience .
translation.zu: tasol sampela taim pasin bilong stap long narapela kantri i no gutpela tumas .

translation.en: it was not . "
translation.zu: tasol i no olsem . "

translation.en: so before packing your bags , it would be wise for you to sit down and consider the pros and cons .
translation.zu: pastaim i gutpela long skelim olsem i gat wanem as na yu ting i gutpela long go o i gat wanem as na yu ting i gutpela long stap long ples bilong yu yet .

translation.en: it is one thing to travel to pursue spiritual interests or to care for family responsibilities .
translation.zu: sampela ol i save go bilong mekim wok bilong spirit o bilong helpim famili bilong ol .

translation.en: but like the youths quoted at the outset , many desire to move simply because they want adventure , greater freedom , or a good time .
translation.zu: tasol olsem ol yangpela long kirap bilong dispela stori , planti ol i laik raun bilong kisim amamas , o lukim ol samting i nupela , o stap fri long mekim laik bilong ol yet .

translation.en: after all , ecclesiastes 11 : 9 encourages young people to ' rejoice in their youth . '
translation.zu: i olsem saveman 11 : 9 i tok : " yupela i mas amamas long taim yupela i yangpela yet . "

translation.en: however , ec 11 verse 10 warns : " remove vexation from your heart , and ward off calamity from your flesh . "
translation.zu: tasol ves 10 i toksave olsem : " na yupela i no ken bihainim pasin i givim pen long bodi bilong yupela . "

translation.en: if your motive for moving to a foreign land is to avoid parental restrictions , you might be inviting " calamity . "
translation.zu: i olsem yu laik kisim " pen " sapos yu laik go long narapela kantri bilong stap fri long ol lo bilong papamama tasol .

translation.en: do you remember jesus ' parable of the prodigal son ?
translation.zu: yu tingim tok piksa bilong jisas i stori long pikinini i bin lusim papa ?

translation.en: it involved a young man who selfishly traveled abroad , evidently to obtain more freedom .
translation.zu: i luk olsem dispela yangpela man i go raun long ol narapela kantri bilong stap fri na bihainim laik bilong em yet .

translation.en: before long , though , calamity struck , and he found himself hungry , impoverished , and spiritually ill . - luke 15 : 11 - 16 .
translation.zu: tasol i no longtaim na bikpela hevi i painim em , olsem em i no gat kaikai , em i stap rabis olgeta , na em i no stap gut long ol samting bilong spirit . - luk 15 : 11 - 16 .

translation.en: then there are those who want to move because they want to escape problems at home .
translation.zu: na sampela i laik go long narapela kantri , long wanem , ol i laik ranawe long ol hevi i stap long famili bilong ol .

translation.en: but , as heike berg writes in her book what 's up , " if you want to go away only because you are unhappy . . . and you believe everything will be better somewhere else - forget it ! "
translation.zu: tasol i olsem buk bilong heike berg ( what 's up ) i tok : " sapos yu no amamas na long dispela as tasol yu laik lusim hap bilong yu , na yu ting olgeta samting bai i gutpela moa long narapela hap - no ken holim dispela tingting ! "

translation.en: really , it is better to face problems squarely .
translation.zu: i gutpela moa long stap na lain long stretim ol hevi .

translation.en: nothing is gained by running away from situations that are not to our liking .
translation.zu: dispela pasin bilong ranawe long ol samting yumi no amamas long en i no save kamapim gutpela samting .

translation.en: spurred on by a desire for wealth , many youths nurture grandiose , unrealistic ideas of what life is like in industrialized lands .
translation.zu: laik bilong kisim planti mani i mekim na planti yangpela i wok long kisim tingting kranki long i stap bilong ol man long ol kantri i gat planti wok bisnis samting .

translation.en: but this is far from true .
translation.zu: tasol dispela tingting i kranki olgeta .

translation.en: after moving , many youths find themselves in a strange land , struggling to get out of poverty .
translation.zu: * baibel i toksave olsem : " pasin bilong laikim tumas mani em i as bilong olgeta pasin nogut .

translation.en: * the bible warns : " the love of money is a root of all sorts of injurious things , and by reaching out for this love some have been led astray from the faith and have stabbed themselves all over with many pains . " - 1 timothy 6 : 10 .
translation.zu: sampela man ol i bin laikim tumas mani , na dispela pasin i pulim ol na ol i lusim bilip pinis , na ol i karim bikpela hevi moa . " - 1 timoti 6 : 10 .

translation.en: there is another factor to consider : are you truly mature enough to deal with the hardships , problems , and conflicts that will arise abroad ?
translation.zu: i gat narapela samting i gutpela long tingim , olsem : yu gat tingting bilong man i bikpela pinis bilong inapim yu long karim ol hevi samting i save kamap taim yu stap long narapela kantri ?

translation.en: so how are you doing at home now ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem long i stap bilong yu long nau ?

translation.en: do your parents complain that you are inconsiderate and self - centered ?
translation.zu: yu save sindaun gut wantaim famili bilong yu ?

translation.en: are you prone to be picky about what you eat ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ? yu no save laikim ol kain kain kaikai ?

translation.en: how willing are you to do your share of the housework ?
translation.zu: yu amamas long mekim ol wok bilong yu long haus ?

translation.en: if these are difficult issues for you now , imagine how much more so they could be for you in a foreign country !
translation.zu: sapos yu gat hevi long ol dispela samting long nau , em bai i hatwok moa long yu taim yu stap long narapela kantri !

translation.en: if you are a christian , will you be able to maintain your own spirituality ?
translation.zu: sapos yu wanpela kristen , yu inap mekim ol samting yu mas mekim bilong stap strong long samting bilong spirit ?

translation.en: or do your parents constantly have to remind you not to neglect bible study , christian meetings , and the preaching work ?
translation.zu: olgeta taim papamama i gat wok long kirapim yu long stadi long baibel , go long ol miting kristen , na autim tok ? olsem wanem ?

translation.en: later he was asked out on a date by a female schoolmate .
translation.zu: bihain wanpela meri long skul i askim em long raun wantaim em .

translation.en: in his native land , a girl would never express her interest so directly .
translation.zu: long ples bilong dispela kristen , i no pasin bilong ol meri long tokaut olsem .

translation.en: but here you see them everywhere . "
translation.zu: tasol long hia , yu inap lukim long olgeta hap . "

translation.en: moving abroad could lead to spiritual shipwreck if one is not " solid in the faith . " - 1 peter 5 : 9 .
translation.zu: sapos wanpela i no " stap strong long bilip " taim em i go stap long narapela kantri , em inap kisim bagarap long ol samting bilong spirit . - 1 pita 5 : 9 .

translation.en: get the facts !
translation.zu: kisim stretpela save pastaim !

translation.en: before making a move , you need to get all the facts .
translation.zu: paslain long go long narapela kantri , yu mas kisim ol stretpela save long ol samting bilong dispela hap .

translation.en: do not go on secondhand information .
translation.zu: no ken bihainim ol tok yu harim tasol .

translation.en: if , for example , you are considering a student - exchange program , how much will it cost ?
translation.zu: olsem : sapos yu wanpela sumatin na yu laik senisim ples bilong yu long skul wantaim wanpela sumatin bilong narapela kantri , yu save long pe stret bilong dispela samting ?

translation.en: you may be surprised to know that it often involves thousands of dollars .
translation.zu: ating yu bai kirap nogut olsem planti taim i gat bikpela pe inap sampela tausen kina samting long mekim dispela samting .

translation.en: you also need to find out whether the schooling you receive abroad will be recognized at home .
translation.zu: na yu mas save , lo bilong kantri bilong yu bai orait long setifiket bilong skul yu kisim long narapela kantri , o nogat ?

translation.en: also , gather as much information as you can about the country - its laws , its culture , its customs .
translation.zu: na tu , wok long kisim wanem ol save yu inap kisim long dispela kantri , olsem ol lo bilong en , na i stap na pasin bilong ol man long dispela hap .

translation.en: what taxes will you have to pay ?
translation.zu: gavman long dispela hap i tok yu mas baim takis ?

translation.en: you may find it helpful to talk to people who have actually lived there .
translation.zu: ating i gutpela sapos yu toktok wantaim sampela manmeri i bin stap long dispela hap bipo .

translation.en: if you plan to earn money while abroad , do not forget your christian obligation to obey the secular authorities .
translation.zu: sapos yu tingting long mekim wok mani long narapela kantri , no ken lusim tingting olsem yu wanpela kristen na yu gat wok long daun long gavman .

translation.en: if so , under what conditions ?
translation.zu: sapos olsem , yu mas mekim olsem wanem ?

translation.en: even if it is legal to work , you will need to exercise caution and shrewdness .
translation.zu: na sapos gavman i no gat tok na yu kisim wanpela wok mani , bai yu gat wok long was gut na wokim gut tingting .

translation.en: it is clear , then , that the decision to move to a foreign land is a big one - and should not be taken lightly .
translation.zu: yumi save , bilong makim olsem yu bai go long narapela kantri o nogat , yu gat bikpela wok - na i no samting bilong makim hariap .

translation.en: try not to let your enthusiasm override your discernment .
translation.zu: no ken larim bikpela laik bilong yu long go i pasim gutpela tingting .

translation.en: listen carefully to your parents .
translation.zu: harim gut ol tok papamama i mekim .

translation.en: after all , they will still feel responsible for you , even if you are hundreds of miles away .
translation.zu: yu save , maski yu stap longwe long ol , ol bai pilim olsem ol i gat wok yet long lukautim yu .

translation.en: all things considered , it may be that moving is unwise - at least for the time being .
translation.zu: taim yu skelim ol dispela samting pinis , ating bai yu kisim tingting olsem nau long dispela taim i no gutpela long go long narapela kantri .

translation.en: this may be disappointing , but there are many other exciting things you can do .
translation.zu: ating yu bai bel hevi long dispela samting , tasol i gat planti narapela samting yu ken mekim .

translation.en: for example , have you explored the possibility of visiting interesting places in your own country ?
translation.zu: olsem : yu bin tingting long raun long sampela hap bilong kantri bilong yu yet ?

translation.en: in time , perhaps the opportunity to travel abroad will open up .
translation.zu: ating sampela taim bihain rot bai op na yu inap raun long sampela narapela kantri .

translation.en: what , though , if you do decide to move ?
translation.zu: tasol bai yu mekim wanem sapos yu tingting pinis long i go long narapela kantri ?

translation.en: a future article will discuss how you can make a success of your stay abroad .
translation.zu: narapela stori bihain bai toktok long olsem wanem raun bilong yu inap kamap gutpela .

translation.en: daily aspirin - should i or shouldn 't i ?
translation.zu: asprin long olgeta de - mi mas kisim o nogat ?

translation.en: the following is a true - to - life scenario described by a doctor . it reflects an all - too - frequent problem .
translation.zu: wanpela dokta i kamapim dispela stori , em stori tru tru i makim wanpela hevi i save kamap planti taim .

translation.en: the whole family was worried .
translation.zu: famili olgeta i tingting planti .

translation.en: now even the doctor was too .
translation.zu: na dokta tu i tingting planti .

translation.en: " if his bleeding doesn 't stop soon , " the doctor said , " we may have to consider a blood transfusion . "
translation.zu: em i tok : " sapos sampela blut moa i lus , ating mipela mas givim blut long em . "

translation.en: the man had been slowly losing blood through his bowels for several weeks , and the problem had been diagnosed as inflammation of the stomach , or gastritis .
translation.zu: inap sampela wik pinis blut i wok long lus long bel bilong dispela man , na ol dokta i bin glasim sik bilong em na ol i tokaut olsem em i gat sua long bel , em wanpela sik ol i save kolim gastritis .

translation.en: " are you sure you 're not taking any medications ? " asked the frustrated doctor .
translation.zu: dokta i wok long tingting planti yet na askim dispela man gen : " yu wok long dring sampela marasin o nogat ? "

translation.en: only this natural over - the - counter stuff for my arthritis , " said the man .
translation.zu: bilong daunim pen bilong atraitis mi save kisim samting mi baim long stua tasol . "

translation.en: suddenly the doctor pricked up his ears . " let me see it . "
translation.zu: wantu dispela tok i kirapim tingting bilong dokta na em i tok : " mi laik lukim . "

translation.en: though many medications can be implicated , the majority of such problems come from medicines used for arthritis and pain .
translation.zu: marasin i mekim na blut i wok long lus long bel , dispela em i wanpela bikpela hevi tru ol dokta i save lukim i kamap planti taim long nau .

translation.en: names may vary from one country to another .
translation.zu: sampela marasin olsem , em ol marasin ol i save kolim nsaids .

translation.en: aspirin is present in many over - the - counter medications , and in many countries the daily use of aspirin by individuals has increased in recent years .
translation.zu: planti marasin yu inap baim long stua ol i gat asprin i stap long en , na long planti kantri pasin bilong kisim asprin long olgeta de i wok long go bikpela .

translation.en: why ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem ?

translation.en: in 1995 the harvard health letter reported that " routine aspirin use saves lives . "
translation.zu: long 1995 wanpela pas harvard health letter i bin tok olsem " pasin bilong kisim asprin i save lukautim laip bilong man . "

translation.en: citing several worldwide studies , which have been repeated many times since then , researchers concluded : " nearly everyone who has ever had a heart attack or stroke , suffers from angina , or has undergone coronary artery bypass surgery should take one - half to one aspirin tablet daily unless they are allergic to the drug . "
translation.zu: dispela pas i kamapim tok bilong ol man i bin skelim wok bilong asprin long olgeta hap bilong graun na i tok : " ol man i bin kisim hat - atek , sik strok , o pen i save kamap long bros , o rop i go long klok i pas na ol dokta i katim ol , i gutpela sapos ol dispela man i kisim wanpela asprin o hap bilong wanpela asprin long olgeta de , sapos asprin i no pait long bodi bilong ol . "

translation.en: other researchers claim benefits of taking aspirin daily for men over 50 who are at risk for a heart attack and for women at risk as well .
translation.zu: sampela narapela lain i bin skelim dispela samting i tok olsem pasin bilong kisim asprin long olgeta de i ken helpim ol man na meri i winim 50 krismas sapos i luk olsem ol inap kisim hat - atek .

translation.en: furthermore , there are studies indicating that daily aspirin may reduce the risk of colon cancer and that large doses over a long period can help lower blood - sugar levels in diabetics .
translation.zu: na tu , sampela i tok olsem pasin bilong kisim asprin long olgeta de inap daunim sik kensa bilong bel , na pasin bilong kisim planti asprin inap longpela taim i ken daunim suga i stap long blut bilong ol man i gat sik daiabitis .

translation.en: how does aspirin work to provide these proposed benefits ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem asprin inap helpim ol dispela sik olsem ol i tok ?

translation.en: though all is not known , evidence indicates that aspirin acts to make platelets in the blood less sticky , thus interfering with the formation of blood clots .
translation.zu: ol i no save long olgeta samting bilong dispela , tasol ol samting ol i skelim i givim tingting long ol olsem asprin i mekim na blut inap ran gut na i no save pas insait long rop .

translation.en: presumably , this helps to prevent blockage of small arteries to the heart and brain , in this way preventing damage to vital organs .
translation.zu: na ol i gat tingting olsem dispela i save helpim blut long ran gut long ol liklik rop i go long kru na klok , na dispela i save helpim ol hap bilong bodi long i stap gut .

translation.en: with all these presumed benefits of aspirin , why doesn 't everyone take it ?
translation.zu: sapos tru tru asprin i save helpim ol dispela samting , bilong wanem i no olgeta man i save kisim ?

translation.en: should the dosage for women be different from that for men ?
translation.zu: i gutpela sapos meri i kisim wankain mak bilong marasin olsem wanpela man ?

translation.en: though technically aspirin is a natural substance - american indians obtained components of aspirin from the bark of a willow tree - it has many side effects .
translation.zu: tru , asprin em i wanpela marasin ol i bin kisim long bus - ol indian bilong amerika i bin kisim sampela hap bilong asprin long skin bilong wanpela diwai - tasol asprin inap mekim planti samting i save nogutim skin .

translation.en: besides the fact that it causes bleeding problems in some people , there are many other potential complications with aspirin , including allergic reactions in aspirin - sensitive people .
translation.zu: olsem yumi stori pinis , asprin inap mekim na blut i lus long bel , tasol i gat sampela hevi moa , olsem asprin i save pait long skin bilong sampela man .

translation.en: needless to say , daily aspirin usage is not for everyone .
translation.zu: olsem na pasin bilong kisim asprin long olgeta de i no samting bilong olgeta man long mekim .

translation.en: a person who is at risk for heart attack or stroke or who has significant risk factors , however , may want to ask his or her doctor about the risks and benefits of daily aspirin use .
translation.zu: tasol sapos i luk olsem wanpela inap kisim hat - atek , o sik strok , o i gat ol samting i makim olsem em inap tru long kisim , em i ken askim dokta bilong em olsem i gutpela em i kisim asprin long olgeta de o nogat .

translation.en: other medications too need to be considered with care , particularly other anti - inflammatory medicines .
translation.zu: yu mas tingim gut ol narapela marasin tu , na tingim moa yet ol dispela kain marasin bilong daunim pen bilong atraitis samting .

translation.en: be sure to inform your physician if you are using any of them .
translation.zu: yu mas toksave long dokta bilong yu sapos yu wok long kisim sampela bilong ol dispela narapela kain marasin .

translation.en: in most cases it would be wise to discontinue the medication prior to surgery .
translation.zu: na i gutpela long lusim dispela marasin paslain long ol dokta i katim yu .

translation.en: perhaps even regular laboratory monitoring of blood levels would be helpful .
translation.zu: ating i gutpela sapos sampela taim ol dokta i ken skelim mak bilong blut bilong yu .

translation.en: if we want to protect ourselves from future problems , we will heed the bible proverb : " shrewd is the one that has seen the calamity and proceeds to conceal himself , but the inexperienced have passed along and must suffer the penalty . "
translation.zu: sapos yumi laik lukautim yumi yet na abrusim sampela hevi inap kamap long bihain , yumi bai bihainim dispela gutpela tok bilong baibel : " man i gat gutpela tingting , em i save olsem , hevi i laik kamap long em na em i abrusim .

translation.en: in this medical matter , may we be among the shrewd ones so that we suffer no penalty with our health .
translation.zu: tasol man i no gat tingting , em i lukim trabel i stap long rot bilong en , na em i go na bungim na karim hevi . "
