translation.en: a big lesson from a tiny island
translation.zu: wanpela liklik ailan i skulim yumi long bikpela samting

translation.en: rapa nui , a 64 - square - mile [ 170 sq km ] volcanic outcrop virtually devoid of trees , is the most isolated piece of inhabited land in the world .
translation.zu: rapa nui em i wanpela ailan em volkeno i bin kamapim . dispela ailan i no gat ol diwai long en na bikpela bilong en i olsem 170 skwe kilomita .

translation.en: * the entire island is now a historical monument , partially because of its rock statues called moai .
translation.zu: * long nau ol i makim dispela ailan olgeta i stap olsem ples bilong tingim ol samting bilong bipo tru .

translation.en: carved from volcanic rock , some moai are buried so deep that only their giant heads are visible .
translation.zu: graun i karamapim sampela imis ol i bin katim long ol ston bilong volkeno na yu inap lukim traipela het tasol bilong ol .

translation.en: those standing vary from isolated statues to rows numbering up to 15 , each one with its back to the sea .
translation.zu: sampela imis i sanap longwe long ol narapela , na sampela i sanap insait long lain i gat 15 imis long en , na olgeta imis i givim baksait long solwara .

translation.en: in recent years science has begun to understand not only the mystery of the moai but also the puzzle of why the once thriving civilization that built them collapsed .
translation.zu: nau long dispela taim , ol saveman i wok long kisim save olsem i gat wanem as na ol imis i stap , na wanem samting i mekim na lain bilong bipo tru i bin wokim ol dispela samting ol i lus .

translation.en: according to encyclopædia britannica , they offer " an important lesson for the modern world . "
translation.zu: olsem wanpela buk ( encyclopædia britannica ) i tok , ol save ol i kisim i bilong " skulim ol manmeri bilong nau . "

translation.en: that lesson concerns management of the earth , especially its natural resources .
translation.zu: samting i bin kamap long dispela ailan i skulim yumi long pasin bilong lukautim graun bilong yumi .

translation.en: of course , the earth is far more complex and biologically diverse than is a small island , but that does not mean that we should ignore the lesson of rapa nui .
translation.zu: tru , graun olgeta i gat planti samting moa long en na planti ol kain kain pisin animal samting moa yet , winim wanpela liklik ailan , tasol dispela i no makim olsem yumi ken givim baksait long samting i bin kamap long rapa nui .

translation.en: let us take a few moments , then , to review some highlights of rapa nui 's history .
translation.zu: pastaim bai yumi stori long ol bikpela samting i bin kamap long rapa nui .

translation.en: our account begins about 400 c.e . when the founding families arrived in their oceangoing canoes .
translation.zu: stori i kirap long yia 400 c.e . , taim ol namba wan lain i kam long dispela ailan long rot bilong ol kanu bilong solwara .

translation.en: an island paradise
translation.zu: ples paradais

translation.en: the island did not boast a broad variety of plants , but it was well endowed with forests of palm , hauhau , and toromiro trees , besides shrubs , herbs , ferns , and grasses .
translation.zu: dispela ailan i no bin i gat planti ol narapela narapela kain plaua samting , tasol i gat planti kain diwai olsem kokonas , na diwai hauhau , na ol diwai toromiro long bikbus , wantaim kain kain gras samting .

translation.en: the colonists may have brought chickens and edible rats , which they viewed as a delicacy , to the island .
translation.zu: ating ol dispela lain i bin kisim ol kakaruk na wanpela kain rat i kam , em wanpela kaikai i swit tru long ol .

translation.en: they also brought crop plants : taro , yam , sweet potato , banana , and sugarcane .
translation.zu: na tu , ol i bin kisim ol samting long planim , olsem taro , yam , kaukau , banana , na suga .

translation.en: the soil was good , so they immediately began clearing land and planting - a process that continued as the population grew .
translation.zu: graun i gutpela , olsem na wantu ol i katim sampela hap bus na wokim gaden - na taim ol lain manmeri i wok long go bikpela , ol i wokim planti gaden moa .

translation.en: the history of rapa nui
translation.zu: stori bilong rapa nui

translation.en: the deeper the pollen sample is lodged within a bed of sediment , the earlier the time period it represents .
translation.zu: ol paura i stap insait tru long graun i kam long ol plaua samting bilong bipo tru .

translation.en: all dates , shown in bold , are in the common era .
translation.zu: olgeta yia ol i raitim daunbilo i makim samting i bin kamap bihain long taim bilong krais .

translation.en: 400 between 20 and 50 polynesian settlers arrive , probably in 50 - foot [ 15 m ] or longer double canoes capable of carrying more than 18,000 pounds [ 8,000 kg ] each .
translation.zu: yia 400 samting olsem 20 i go inap 50 manmeri bilong polinisia i kam , na ating ol i bin kam long ol kanu i bikpela olsem 15 mita o i bikpela moa yet , na ol wan wan kanu i karim planti kago inap olsem 8,000 kilo .

translation.en: 900 - 1300 about one third of the bones of animals caught for food during this period are dolphin bones .
translation.zu: yia 900 - 1300 planti bun ol i bin painim taim ol i digim graun em ol bun bilong dolfin .

translation.en: to bring in dolphins from the open sea , the islanders employ large canoes made from the trunks of big palms .
translation.zu: bilong kisim ol dolfin i stap ausait long rip , ol i mekim wok long ol bikpela kanu ol i wokim long ol bikpela diwai .

translation.en: trees also furnish raw materials for the gear used to move and erect the moai , the construction of which is by now well under way .
translation.zu: long dispela taim tu , ol i kirapim pinis dispela wok bilong katim ol imis long ston , olsem na ol i mekim wok long ol diwai bilong helpim ol long karim ol imis i go long narapela hap na sanapim .

translation.en: she adds that " approximately 1,000 statues were produced over some 800 to 1,300 years . . . , one for every seven to nine people at peak population estimates . "
translation.zu: ol i bin wokim olsem 1,000 imis insait long 800 i go inap long 1,300 yia samting . . . , na ol i ting taim lain rapa nui i bikpela tru , i gat wanpela imis i stap bilong olgeta 7 - pela o 9 - pela manmeri . "

translation.en: apparently the moai were not worshiped , though they played a role in burial and agricultural rites .
translation.zu: ating ol i no lotuim ol dispela imis , tasol ol imis i insait long sampela wok ol i mekim bilong planim man o wokim gaden .

translation.en: they may have been viewed as an abode for spirits .
translation.zu: na ating ol i tingim ol imis i stap olsem haus bilong ol spirit .

translation.en: it seems that they also symbolized their builders ' power , status , and genealogy .
translation.zu: i luk olsem ol imis i makim biknem na namba na lain tumbuna bilong dispela man i bin wokim .

translation.en: " without exception , every species of native land bird became extinct , " says discover .
translation.zu: nius discover i tok : " olgeta kain pisin bilong dispela ailan i bin pinis olgeta . "

translation.en: large - scale starvation takes hold .
translation.zu: bikpela hangre i kamap .

translation.en: the rapa nui polarize into two opposing confederacies .
translation.zu: ol rapa nui i bruk long 2 - pela lain i birua birua .

translation.en: this is the warrior heyday .
translation.zu: em taim bilong pait .

translation.en: about the year 1700 , the population plummets to approximately 2,000 .
translation.zu: long yia 1700 samting , namba bilong ol rapa nui i go daun tru olsem 2,000 samting .

translation.en: 1722 dutch explorer jacob roggeveen is the first european to discover the island .
translation.zu: yia 1722 namba wan man bilong yurop i painim dispela ailan , em jekop rogevin .

translation.en: traditional rapa nui culture essentially comes to an end .
translation.zu: ol pasin tumbuna ol i bin bihainim , em i pinis .

translation.en: 1872 only 111 indigenous people remain on the island .
translation.zu: yia 1872 i gat 111 asples tasol i stap long ailan .

translation.en: rapa nui became a province of chile in 1888 .
translation.zu: kirap long 1888 , kantri sili i bosim rapa nui .

translation.en: in recent years rapa nui has had a mixed population of about 2,100 .
translation.zu: long nau i gat olsem 2,100 manmeri i kam long ol narapela narapela hap na i sindaun long dispela ailan .

translation.en: in order to preserve rapa nui 's unique character and history , many statues have been reerected .
translation.zu: na bilong tingim ol samting bilong ol lain bilong rapa nui na lukautim ol samting bilong bipo , ol i sanapim gen planti imis .

translation.en: a lesson for today
translation.zu: dispela inap skulim yumi

translation.en: note the comments of various researchers regarding the situation .
translation.zu: tingim tok bilong sampela man i bin skelim ol dispela samting .

translation.en: " the forest . . . didn 't simply disappear one day - it vanished slowly , over decades . . . .
translation.zu: " dispela bikbus . . . i no lus insait long wanpela de tasol - isi isi insait long planti yia bikbus i wok long pinis . . . .

translation.en: " the price they paid for the way they chose to articulate their spiritual and political ideas was an island world which came to be , in many ways , but a shadow of its former natural self . " - easter island - archaeology , ecology , and culture .
translation.zu: " ol samting ol i laik mekim bilong bihainim bilip na tingting bilong ol , dispela i bin mekim na ailan bilong ol i no gutpela moa olsem bipo , nogat tru . " - easter island - archaeology , ecology , and culture .

translation.en: " what happened to the rapa nui suggested that uncontrolled growth and the impulse to manipulate the environment past the breaking point were not merely aspects of the industrialized world ; they were the human condition . " - national geographic .
translation.zu: " samting i bin kamap long ol lain rapa nui i givim tingting long yumi olsem pasin bilong sakim gutpela tingting na wokim ol samting hariap tumas , na pasin bilong bagarapim graun , dispela i no pasin bilong ol kantri i gat planti faktori na bisnis samting tasol , nogat . em pasin bilong man yet . " - national geographic .

translation.en: what if today there is no change in the so - called human condition ?
translation.zu: wanem samting inap kamap long taim bilong yumi sapos ol man i no senisim pasin bilong ol ?

translation.en: according to one writer , we have one big advantage over the rapa nui .
translation.zu: wanpela man i tok olsem i gat samting bilong helpim yumi em ol rapa nui i no gat .

translation.en: massive deforestation and the continued extinction of earth 's living things at an alarming rate suggest that it is not .
translation.zu: pasin bilong ol long katim ol bikbus na pinisim sampela lain animal o plaua samting i makim olsem ol i no tingim dispela samting .

translation.en: a vandal taking one rivet at a time from a plane does not know which rivet will cause a crash ; but when that critical rivet is gone , the fate of the plane is sealed , though it may not crash on the very next flight .
translation.zu: man i gat tingting nogut inap rausim wanpela skru long balus , na bihain rausim narapela gen , tasol em i no save wanem skru em i rausim na balus bai i bagarap ; maski balus i no pundaun na bagarap wantu , dispela pasin bilong rausim ol skru wan wan bai kamapim bagarap long bihain .

translation.en: likewise , humans are eliminating earth 's living " rivets " at the rate of over 20,000 species per year , with no sign of letup !
translation.zu: olsem pasin bilong rausim wan wan skru bilong balus , ol man i wok long pinisim 20,000 bilong ol narapela narapela lain animal o plaua samting insait long olgeta wan wan yia !

translation.en: the book easter island - earth island made this significant comment : " the person who felled the last tree [ on rapa nui ] could see that it was the last tree .
translation.zu: wanpela buk ( easter island - earth island ) i kamapim bikpela tok olsem : " man i katim laspela diwai [ long rapa nui ] , em i ken luksave olsem i no gat narapela diwai i stap .

translation.en: but he ( or she ) still felled it . "
translation.zu: tasol dispela i no pasim em long katim dispela laspela diwai . "

translation.en: " we must change our religion "
translation.zu: " yumi mas senisim tingting bilong yumi "

translation.en: " if there is any hope , " adds easter island - earth island , " it is surely in the idea that we must change our religion .
translation.zu: buk ( easter island - earth island ) i tok moa olsem : " bilong abrusim bagarap , yumi mas senisim tingting bilong yumi .

translation.en: each village competed with its neighbours to erect the largest statue . . . .
translation.zu: ol rapa nui i resis wantaim ol narapela lain bilong ples long wokim ol imis i bikpela moa yet . . . .

translation.en: our creator is the only one who can show us how to ' direct our step . '
translation.zu: na i no gat narapela inap stretim bikpela hevi bilong yumi long graun .

translation.en: he is also the only one who can lift us out of our sad condition . this he promises to do in his word , the bible - a book that also records many good and bad examples of past civilizations .
translation.zu: na tok promis bilong em long mekim olsem i stap long baibel - em wanpela buk i kamapim stori bilong ol lain long bipo em sampela i stap olsem gutpela piksa na sampela nogat .

translation.en: this book can , indeed , be a ' light to our roadway ' in these dark times . - psalm 119 : 105 .
translation.zu: nau long dispela taim nogut bilong tudak dispela buk inap i stap olsem wanpela " lait bilong soim rot long yumi . " - song 119 : 105 .

translation.en: eventually , that roadway will take obedient humans to a paradise of peace and plenty - a new world that will include that tiny patch in the south pacific called rapa nui . - 2 peter 3 : 13 .
translation.zu: bihain dispela rot bai i bringim ol man bilong harim tok i go long wanpela ples paradais , em ples bilong i stap bel isi na i no sot long wanpela samting - em nupela graun bai stap , na bai i gat dispela liklik ailan rapa nui long saut pasifik tu i stap . - 2 pita 3 : 13 .

translation.en: " it is a world where life is cheap .
translation.zu: " long dispela graun laip em i samting nating .

translation.en: death can be bought for a few hundred pounds [ sterling ] and there is no shortage of those willing to provide the service . " - the scotsman .
translation.zu: yu inap baim man long kilim i dai narapela man long sampela handet paun tasol , na i gat planti man i redi long mekim dispela samting . " - nius the scotsman .

translation.en: during april 1999 , in an assault that shocked the entire world , two adolescents violently took over columbine high school , in littleton , colorado , u.s.a . , leaving 15 dead .
translation.zu: long epril 1999 , wanpela samting nogut tru i kamap em olgeta manmeri i kirap nogut long en . tupela yangpela man ol i go insait long haiskul kalambain , long litelton , kolorado , amerika , na ol i pairapim gan na kilim 15 manmeri i dai .

translation.en: south africa led the world with a murder rate of 75 per 100,000 inhabitants in 1995 .
translation.zu: long 1995 , long olgeta 100 tausen 100 tausen manmeri bilong dispela hap ol i bin kilim i dai 75 manmeri .

translation.en: life is especially cheap in one south american country , where more than 6,000 were killed for political reasons in 1997 .
translation.zu: long 1997 , ol i bin kilim i dai inap 6,000 manmeri long dispela kantri , long wanem , ol i no wanbel long ol samting bilong wok politik .

translation.en: one report on that country states : " shockingly , the murder of children has also soared : in 1996 , 4,322 children were killed , a 40 per cent rise in just two years . "
translation.zu: wanpela ripot i stori long dispela kantri olsem : " namba bilong ol pikinini ol i kilim i dai em tu i go antap . long 1996 , ol i kilim i dai 4,322 pikinini , dispela namba i go bikpela inap 40 pesen insait long tupela yia tasol . "

translation.en: however , even children are becoming murderers - of other children and of their own parents .
translation.zu: tasol ol pikinini tu i save kilim i dai man - ol i kilim i dai ol narapela pikinini o papamama bilong ol yet .

translation.en: what do these facts and figures show ?
translation.zu: ol dispela namba i kamapim wanem samting ?

translation.en: they euphemize their killing by using such expressions as " whacking , " " rubbing out , " " eliminating , " or " terminating " the victims of what they call hits .
translation.zu: ol i save givim ol narapela nem long pasin bilong ol long kilim man i dai , olsem " paitim , " " rausim , " " pinisim , " man .

translation.en: genocide and ethnic cleansing have added to the toll and have cheapened the value of human life .
translation.zu: pasin bilong bagarapim na pinisim wanpela lain olgeta dispela tu i mekim na ol man i ting laip em i samting nating .

translation.en: as a result , killings have become daily fare on the news menus of tv stations worldwide .
translation.zu: olsem na long olgeta de ol nius bilong televisen long olgeta hap i save stori long ol man i kilim i dai ol narapela .

translation.en: add to this the violence and mayhem glorified on television and movie screens , and our society appears to be wrapped up in a morbid culture centering on death .
translation.zu: na tu , televisen na ol piksa wokabaut i save litimapim pasin bilong pait na bagarapim man , olsem na i olsem ol samting bilong indai i save stiaim i stap bilong yumi .

translation.en: in this regard the encyclopædia britannica says : " during the latter half of the 20th century , death has become a strangely popular subject .
translation.zu: wanpela buk ( encyclopædia britannica ) i tok long dispela samting olsem : ' bihain long 1950 na i kam inap nau , indai i bin kamap olsem wanpela samting em planti man i laik toktok long en .

translation.en: before that time , perhaps rather surprisingly , it was a theme largely eschewed in serious scientific , and to a lesser extent , philosophical speculations . "
translation.zu: tasol paslain long dispela taim , indai em i samting planti saveman i no laik toktok long en . '

translation.en: according to josep fericgla , a catalonian professor of cultural anthropology , " death has become the last effective taboo in our societies , and therefore , it is one of the most important sources today of ideological manipulation . "
translation.zu: josep fericgla bilong katalonia , em i profesa bilong ol samting bilong pasin bilong man , em i tok , " long taim bilong yumi , indai i bin kamap olsem samting i no tambu moa long toktok long en , olsem na em i wanpela bikpela samting ol man i ken mekim wok long en bilong stiaim tingting bilong ol man . "

translation.en: perhaps the most outstanding characteristic of this " death culture " is the popular belief that power , supremacy , money , and pleasure are of much more importance than human life and moral values .
translation.zu: ating nambawan bikpela tingting bilong ol man i kisim " pasin bilong kilim man i dai " em olsem : planti ol i bilip olsem strong , namba , mani , na amamas bilong skin em i bikpela samting , winim laip bilong man na stretpela pasin .

translation.en: what can parents do to counteract this negative influence that surrounds them and affects their children ?
translation.zu: ol papamama i ken mekim wanem bilong sakim dispela tingting nogut i stap long olgeta hap na i stiaim ol pikinini bilong ol ?

translation.en: these are some of the questions that will be answered in the following articles .
translation.zu: stori i kamap bihain long dispela bai bekim ol dispela askim na sampela narapela askim tu .

translation.en: he has explosives and machine guns and doesn 't hesitate to use them . ' - the guardian weekly .
translation.zu: ol i gat ol bom na masin - gan na ol i no pret long mekim wok long ol . ' - nius guardian weekly .

translation.en: " thousands of miles lie between the traumatized young refugees of kosovo and american children exposed to violence and other painful experiences , but the emotional distance between them may not be so great . " - marc kaufman , the washington post .
translation.zu: " planti tausen kilomita i stap namel long ol yangpela refyuji bilong kosovo na ol pikinini bilong amerika em ol i save lukim pasin bilong pait na bagarapim man na ol narapela samting nogut , tasol ating bel hevi bilong dispela tupela lain i wankain . " - em tok bilong marc kaufman , long nius the washington post .

translation.en: whether we like it or not , we are all affected directly or indirectly by death .
translation.zu: indai i save mekim sampela samting long i stap bilong yumi olgeta , maski yumi laikim dispela samting o nogat .

translation.en: this is true regardless of where we live - in a country that is racked by violent conflict or in one that enjoys relative stability .
translation.zu: ol hevi bilong indai i save painim yumi maski yumi sindaun long wanem wanem hap - long wanpela kantri i gat pait long en o long wanpela kantri em ol manmeri i stap isi long en .

translation.en: the manifestation of the " death culture " can be seen in the high incidence of depression , anguish , drug addiction , abortion , self - destructive behavior , suicide , and mass murder today .
translation.zu: ol samting em " pasin bilong kilim man i dai " i save kamapim long nau em olsem : planti manmeri i bel hevi tru , tingting planti , kalabus long ol drak , rausim bel , bagarapim skin bilong ol yet , kilim i dai ol yet , na kilim i dai planti manmeri .

translation.en: professor michael kearl , of the department of sociology and anthropology of trinity university in san antonio , texas , u.s.a . , explained with regard to the manipulation of the subject of death : " from our late twentieth century vantage point [ 1999 ] , we find that . . . death is becoming recognized as the central dynamism underlying the life , vitality , and structure of the social order .
translation.zu: profesa michael kearl bilong wanpela lain ( department of sociology and anthropology of trinity university ) long san antonio , teksas , amerika , em i tok long pasin bilong stiaim tingting bilong ol man long ol samting bilong indai , olsem : " long taim bilong yumi [ 1999 ] . . . ol man i ting ol samting bilong indai i wok long kamap wanpela samting i givim strong long as bilong ol samting bilong i stap bilong ol .

translation.en: it sells newspapers and insurance policies , invigorates the plots of our television programs , and . . . even powers our industries . "
translation.zu: em i save kirapim ol man long baim ol niuspepa na insurens , na em i givim tingting long ol program bilong televisen , na . . . em i givim strong long ol wok bisnis bilong yumi . "

translation.en: let us examine some examples of how this phenomenon , called death culture , is manifested in our times .

translation.zu: ol i stori long laip bihain long taim man i dai pinis na long ol daiman i kam lukim ol man i stap laip , na dispela i mekim na ol man i ting indai em i samting nating .

translation.en: in the united states , the way television programs are rated was revised to protect young people from seeing material that might affect them adversely .

translation.en: in his book the deathmatch manifesto , robert waring analyzes the popularity of so - called deathmatch games among adolescents . * mr .
translation.zu: long wanpela buk ( the deathmatch manifesto ) robert waring i skelim pasin bilong planti yangpela long laikim ol pilai i gat pasin bilong resis long kilim man i dai .

translation.en: waring believes that an underground society of gamers has sprung up around this phenomenon .
translation.zu: * mista waring i ting long nau planti ol i save insait long dispela kain pilai .

translation.en: these games really have the effect , not of educating , but of teaching to kill .
translation.zu: ol dispela pilai nogut i save skulim tru ol yangpela long kilim man i dai na ol i no givim gutpela save long ol .

translation.en: it 's really easy to get sucked into that , " waring comments .
translation.zu: na dispela samting inap pulim man long givim bel tru long ol dispela pilai . "

translation.en: adolescents are trapped by the force of the three - dimensional scenarios designed as backdrops for the bloody struggles .
translation.zu: ol piksa bilong ol dispela pilai i olsem samting tru tru , na dispela i save kalabusim ol yangpela long ol dispela pilai bilong kilim man i dai .

translation.en: not having access through the internet , some buy video - game packages to use on the television at home .
translation.zu: sampela ol i no inap mekim ol pilai long intenet , tasol ol i save baim ol video - gem ol i ken mekim wok long en long rot bilong televisen .

translation.en: others customarily go to public places where they rent video - game machines and have ' virtual ' fights to the death with other opponents .
translation.zu: sampela narapela ol i go long ol stua bilong rentim ol masin bilong pilai long ol video - gem na i olsem ol i pait tru wantaim ol narapela i go inap long ol i dai .

translation.en: although " deathmatch " games are classified according to the age of the player , the truth is that there is very little control .
translation.zu: ol i save makim wanem pilai i stret long krismas bilong ol yangpela , tasol dispela i no bosim ol yangpela .

translation.en: fourteen - year - old eddie from the united states commented : " people usually tell you you 're not old enough , but they don 't stop you from buying [ the game ] . "
translation.zu: eddie i gat 14 krismas na em i bilong yunaitet stets , em i tok : " ol man i save tok yu yangpela tumas , tasol ol i no pasim yu long baim [ dispela pilai ] . "

translation.en: although his parents are aware of this and do not like it , they rarely check to see if he is playing the game .
translation.zu: papamama bilong em ol i save long dispela samting na ol i no laikim dispela pilai , tasol ol i no save sekim em tumas olsem em i mekim dispela pilai o nogat .

translation.en: john leland , writing in newsweek , stated : " with as many as 11 million teenagers now online [ in the united states ] , more and more of adolescent life is taking place in a landscape that is inaccessible to many parents . "
translation.zu: john leland i raitim stori long nius newsweek , na em i tok : " long nau inap 11 milion yangpela [ long yunaitet stets ] ol i gat rot na ol i ken insait long intenet , olsem na ol yangpela i save lusim bikpela hap taim moa long wanpela ples em planti papamama i no inap insait long en . "

translation.en: christians do not view death as something attractive and fun but , rather , as something against nature , a direct consequence of sin and rebellion against god .
translation.zu: ol kristen i no ting indai em i wanpela gutpela samting o samting bilong amamas , nogat ; ol i ting em i samting i bagarapim sindaun bilong man , em i samting sin na pasin bilong bikhet long god i bin kamapim .

translation.en: death was never a part of god 's original purpose for man .
translation.zu: indai em i no wanpela samting bilong laik bilong god long pastaim .

translation.en: what accounts for the fascination with the subject of death that is seen among young people today ?
translation.zu: wanem samting i mekim na ol yangpela long nau ol i gat laik long save long ol samting bilong indai ?

translation.en: representative henry hyde , of the state of illinois , u.s.a . , said : " there is a spiritual vacuum in these young people that is filled with the culture of death and violence . "
translation.zu: wanpela bikman bilong gavman bilong provins ilinoi , amerika , em i tok : " ol yangpela i sot long ol samting bilong spirit , olsem na ol i insait long ol samting bilong indai na pasin bilong pait na bagarapim man . "

translation.en: loneliness is another of the major problems afflicting adolescents .
translation.zu: pasin bilong i stap wanpis em i narapela bikpela hevi bilong ol yangpela .

translation.en: according to one source , adolescents in the united states pass some 3.5 hours alone every day and spend 11 hours less with their parents each week than young ones did in the ' 60 ' s .
translation.zu: wanpela lain i tok , ol yangpela long amerika ol i save stap wanpis inap 3.5 aua long olgeta de , na ol aua ol i save lusim bilong i stap wantaim papamama long olgeta wik i go daun inap 11 - pela aua long ol aua ol yangpela i bin lusim wantaim ol papamama long 1965 samting .

translation.en: what parents can do
translation.zu: ol samting papamama inap mekim

translation.en: in view of the " spiritual vacuum " that young people contend with , how important is the role of parents ?
translation.zu: ol yangpela i " sot long ol samting bilong spirit , " olsem na wok bilong papamama i bikpela samting olsem wanem ?

translation.en: wise parents understand that on the one hand , their children need wholesome entertainment and on the other hand , they need regular personal support .
translation.zu: ol papamama i gat gutpela tingting ol i save olsem ol pikinini bilong ol i mas kisim sampela gutpela amamas , na tu , oltaim ol i mas helpim olgeta wan wan pikinini .

translation.en: motivated by loving interest , parents can talk with them about their preferences in music , television programs , videos , novels , video games , and movies .
translation.zu: pasin sori i kirapim ol papamama long toktok wantaim ol pikinini long musik , ol program bilong televisen , ol video , ol buk , ol video - gem , na long ol piksa wokabaut em ol yangpela i save laikim .

translation.en: although young people may not express it , many of them crave the affection and loving guidance of their parents .
translation.zu: ating ol yangpela i no tokaut long dispela , tasol planti ol i laik papamama bilong ol i mas stiaim ol na kamapim klia olsem ol i laikim tru ol .

translation.en: parents who wish to protect their children will converse with them regularly , really listen to them , and warn them of the dangers involved in modern culture .
translation.zu: ol papamama i laik lukautim pikinini bilong ol , ol bai toktok wantaim ol long olgeta taim , na putim gut yau long tok bilong ol , na tokim ol long ol samting nogut bilong ol pasin bilong nau .

translation.en: when parents set firm limits and are consistent and reasonable as well as affectionate with their children , they will normally have good results . - matthew 5 : 37 .
translation.zu: gutpela samting bai kamap taim papamama i putim ol strongpela lo long ol pikinini , na bihainim stretpela tingting na mekim wankain pasin long olgeta taim , na sori long ol . - matyu 5 : 37 .

translation.en: * they use such occasions , not to call their children to account , but rather to consider subjects that are spiritually upbuilding .
translation.zu: * long kain taim olsem ol i no laik stretim ol pikinini , nogat ; ol i laik toktok wantaim ol long ol samting i strongim ol pikinini long ol samting bilong spirit .

translation.en: in these family gatherings , they listen to problems or challenges that affect each of their children so that the youths have an opportunity to receive individual attention .
translation.zu: taim famili i bung olsem , ol papamama i putim gut yau long ol hevi i save painim ol pikinini bambai ol i ken mekim ol samting bilong helpim olgeta wan wan pikinini .

translation.en: young people who get no spiritual guidance from their parents can gain strength from psalm 27 : 10 , which says : " in case my own father and my own mother did leave me , even jehovah himself would take me up . "
translation.zu: ol yangpela em papamama bilong ol i no stiaim ol long ol samting bilong spirit , ol i ken kisim strong long tok bilong song 27 : 10 : " maski papa na mama i givim baksait long mi , bikpela bai i lukautim mi . "

translation.en: how does jehovah , the father of tender mercies , help young people ?
translation.zu: jehova , em i as bilong pasin marimari na sori , orait olsem wanem em i save helpim ol yangpela ?

translation.en: the congregations of jehovah 's witnesses have been a refuge where many have found the affection of other people and have resolved their doubts .
translation.zu: ol kongrigesen bilong ol witnes bilong jehova i save helpim ol yangpela , na lain bilong kongrigesen i save mekim pasin sori long planti yangpela na bel bilong ol i stap isi .

translation.en: josías , a young man who found that to be true , comments : " jehovah 's organization fills a vital role .
translation.zu: dispela samting i bin painim wanpela yangpela man nem bilong em josías , em i tok : " oganaisesen bilong jehova i mekim bikpela wok .

translation.en: i lived without purpose , without hope .
translation.zu: mi no bin wet long wanpela gutpela samting bai kamap .

translation.en: to know that one is not alone changed my life completely .
translation.zu: taim mi kisim save olsem mi no stap wanpis , dispela i senisim tru i stap bilong mi .

translation.en: i saw in the brothers in the congregation the family that i had lost .
translation.zu: ol brata sista bilong kongrigesen ol i kamap famili bilong mi .

translation.en: the elders and the families in the congregation are like an anchor in an emotional sense . "
translation.zu: ol elda na ol famili insait long kongrigesen ol i olsem anka bilong helpim bel bilong man long i stap isi . "

translation.en: anthropologist patricia fortuny commented about this positive effect in her essay los testigos de jehová : una alternativa religiosa para enfrentar el fin del milenio ( jehovah 's witnesses : a religious alternative for facing the end of the millennium ) : " jehovah 's witnesses offer a clear and explicit system of order to apply to daily life , an exact code that serves as a guide for thinking and acting . "
translation.zu: wanpela savemeri , patricia fortuny , em i toktok long dispela gutpela samting long wanpela stori em i bin raitim . nem bilong stori em olsem : los testigos de jehová : una alternativa religiosa para enfrentar el fin del milenio . ( ol witnes bilong jehova : wanpela lotu bilong helpim yumi long karim hevi long pinis bilong milenium ) . em i tok : " ol witnes bilong jehova i tokaut klia tru wanem pasin i gutpela long bihainim long olgeta de . "

translation.en: the " system of order " and the " code " referred to here are based on the bible .
translation.zu: baibel em i as bilong dispela " pasin " na " ol lo . "

translation.en: hence , although jehovah 's witnesses face the same problems and pressures as their neighbors , they are strengthened by the unique wisdom of that ancient book .
translation.zu: olsem na maski wankain hevi i save painim ol witnes bilong jehova olsem i save painim ol narapela man , ol gutpela savetok bilong dispela buk bilong bipo i save strongim ol .

translation.en: yes , the witnesses find refuge in the clear doctrines and principles found in the bible .
translation.zu: em nau , ol tok na lo i stap long baibel i save lukautim ol witnes .

translation.en: when " death will be no more "
translation.zu: taim " ol manmeri bai i no i dai moa "

translation.en: the teaching given in the kingdom halls of jehovah 's witnesses stresses again and again god 's promise of a new world that will soon begin , where " righteousness is to dwell " and where " there will be no one making them tremble . "
translation.zu: long ol haus kingdom bilong ol witnes bilong jehova ol i stori planti taim long tok promis bilong god olsem klostu nau nupela taim bai kamap , na long dispela taim " stretpela pasin tasol bai i stap long en " na " i no gat wanpela man bai i mekim ol i pret . "

translation.en: moreover , the prophet isaiah records that then god " will actually swallow up death forever , and the sovereign lord jehovah will certainly wipe the tears from all faces . "
translation.zu: na tu , profet aisaia i tok long dispela taim god " bai i pinisim dai tru na bai dai i no kamap moa long ol . god , bikpela bai i pinisim krai bilong ol na mekim drai wara bilong ai bilong olgeta manmeri . "

translation.en: death struck the human race as a consequence of the transgression of the first man , adam , but god 's promise is that soon " death will be no more . " - isaiah 25 : 8 ; revelation 21 : 3 , 4 ; romans 5 : 12 .
translation.zu: sin bilong namba wan man , em adam , i mekim na indai i painim ol manmeri , tasol god i tok promis olsem klostu nau " ol manmeri bai i no i dai moa . " - aisaia 25 : 8 ; kth 21 : 3 , 4 ; rom 5 : 12 .

translation.en: if you are a youth looking for help , we invite you to find hope and a reason for living , through the pages of the bible .
translation.zu: sapos yu wanpela yangpela i wok long painim helpim , mipela i laik bai ol tok bilong baibel i ken helpim yu long wetim gutpela samting long bihain na i stap bilong yu i gat as bilong en .

translation.en: with the help of jehovah 's witnesses , you can have the hope that the best of times are still ahead of us in the new world that god promises .
translation.zu: ol witnes bilong jehova inap helpim yu , na yu inap long wetim gutpela taim tru bai kamap long bihain , long nupela taim god i tok promis long kamapim .

translation.en: what is a smile ?

translation.en: a smile is generally defined in dictionaries as ' a facial expression in which the corners of the mouth curve slightly upward , expressing amusement , approval , or joy . '
translation.zu: planti buk dikseneri i tok pes bilong man i lait taim em i ' wokim tupela sait bilong maus i go antap na dispela i makim olsem man i amamas , o em i orait long yu . '

translation.en: a smile is a nonverbal way of expressing one 's feelings or communicating one 's emotions to others . of course , a smile might also express scorn or disdain , but that is another subject .

translation.en: a warm smile may help relieve built - up tensions .

translation.zu: pasin bilong lap na pes i lait i save helpim ol narapela .

translation.en: a cold or stern expression may convey anger , irritation , rejection , or even hostility .
translation.zu: pes i drai o pasin bilong lukluk strong inap makim olsem man i no laikim yu o em i belhat na kros .

translation.en: on the other hand , would not a warm smile on the counselor 's face perhaps make you feel more at ease and thus more receptive to the counsel ?
translation.zu: tasol sapos em i lap na pes i lait , bai yu stap bel isi na bai yu amamas long harim na bihainim tok bilong em , a ?

translation.en: positive thoughts make smiling easier
translation.zu: gutpela tingting i save helpim pasin bilong lap

translation.en: of course , most of us are not like professional actors who can radiate a flashing smile at any given moment ; nor do we desire to be such .
translation.zu: tru planti bilong yumi i no olsem ol lain yumi save lukim long televisen samting - sapos ol i gat wok long mekim , ol i ken lap na pes i lait wantu tasol . yumi no laik mekim olsem , nogat .

translation.en: we want our smiles to be natural and genuine .
translation.zu: yumi laik bai bel i kirapim yumi long lap na pes i lait .

translation.en: a communication school instructor commented : ' it is important to relax and give a heartfelt smile , or else your smile may look artificial . '
translation.zu: wanpela man i tok : " i bikpela samting long stap bel isi na bel yet i kirapim yu long lap na pes i lait ; sapos yu no mekim olsem , ol narapela inap ting olsem yu lap nating tasol . "

translation.en: here the bible can help us .
translation.zu: baibel i ken helpim yumi long dispela samting .

translation.en: regarding our speech it tells us at matthew 12 : 34 , 35 : " out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaks .
translation.zu: matyu 12 : 34 , 35 i stori long pasin bilong kamapim ol tok , olsem : " man em i save autim kain tingting i pulap long bel bilong en .

translation.en: the good man out of his good treasure sends out good things , whereas the wicked man out of his wicked treasure sends out wicked things . "
translation.zu: gutpela man i gat planti gutpela tingting i stap long bel bilong en . olsem na em i save mekim gutpela pasin .

translation.en: remember , a smile is a nonverbal way of communicating our feelings .
translation.zu: man nogut em i gat planti tingting nogut i stap long bel bilong en .

translation.en: bearing in mind that we speak " out of the abundance of the heart " and that " good things " come out of a " good treasure , " it becomes evident that the key to a genuine smile lies in our thoughts and emotions .
translation.zu: maski yumi no mekim wanpela toktok , pasin bilong lap na pes i lait em i wanpela rot long kamapim bel bilong yumi . olsem dispela skripsa long baibel i kamapim , yumi save " autim kain kain tingting i pulap long bel , " na " man i gat planti gutpela tingting " i save " mekim gutpela pasin . "

translation.en: yes , what is in our hearts will no doubt be expressed , sooner or later , not only by our words and deeds but also by our facial expressions .
translation.zu: olsem na tingting i stap long bel i as bilong pasin bilong givim bel tru long lap na pes i lait .

translation.en: our facial expression is strongly affected by our thoughts about others .
translation.zu: olsem na yumi mas wok long tingting long ol gutpela samting .

translation.en: so let us concentrate on the finer qualities of family members , people in our neighborhood , and our good friends .
translation.zu: tingting bilong yumi long pasin bilong narapela man i save bosim lukluk long pes bilong yumi .

translation.en: it will be a genuine smile , for behind it will be a heart filled with goodness , mercy , and kindness .
translation.zu: ol bai save yumi no giaman na mekim dispela pasin , long wanem , pes bilong yumi bai kamapim long ples klia gutpela tingting i stap long bel bilong yumi .

translation.en: our eyes will be bright , and others will know that we really mean it .
translation.zu: pes bilong yumi bai lait na ol narapela bai save yumi givim bel tru long mekim .

translation.en: the same may be true of other cultures .
translation.zu: na ating sampela man long ol narapela lain i gat wankain pasin .

translation.en: or some individuals may be shy by nature and may not find it easy to smile at others .
translation.zu: o ol i gat pasin bilong sem na ol i pilim olsem i hatwok long lap na pes i lait taim ol i bungim ol man .

translation.en: hence , we should not judge others by how big their smile is or how often they smile .
translation.zu: olsem na yumi no ken tingting planti long pasin bilong wanpela man sapos em i no save lap na pes i lait .

translation.en: the bible advises : " let us not give up in doing what is fine . . .
translation.zu: baibel i tok : " yumi no ken les long mekim gutpela pasin . . .

translation.en: let us work what is good toward all . "
translation.zu: yumi inap mekim gutpela pasin long ol arapela . "

translation.en: one way to work " what is good " to others is to smile at them - and this is within your means !
translation.zu: pasin bilong lap na pes i lait em i wanpela rot bilong mekim gutpela pasin long ol narapela - na em i samting yu inap mekim !

translation.en: also , you will discover that smiling becomes much easier as you develop the habit .
translation.zu: na tu , taim yu wok long mekim dispela pasin , bihain bai yu pilim olsem i no hatwok tumas long mekim .

translation.en: a word of caution
translation.zu: yu mas was gut

translation.en: it is a sad fact that not every smile we see is genuine .
translation.zu: sori tru , i no olsem olgeta man i lap na pes i lait ol i gat gutpela tingting .

translation.en: they know that a smile can disarm people and put them off guard .
translation.zu: ol i save , taim ol i mekim olsem bai yu no kisim tingting hariap olsem ol i man bilong giaman .

translation.en: so while not being overly suspicious of others , we need to appreciate that living in " the last days , " which are hard to deal with , we need to ' prove ourselves cautious as serpents and yet innocent as doves , ' as jesus himself recommended . - 2 timothy 3 : 1 ; matthew 10 : 16 .
translation.zu: ( saveman 7 : 6 ) tru , yumi no laik ting olsem olgeta man i gat tingting nogut taim ol i lap na pes i lait , tasol yumi save yumi stap long " taim bilong las de , " na planti hevi nogut tru i save kamap , na olsem jisas i tok , yumi mas ' bihainim pasin bilong ol snek , na tingim gut pastaim ol samting yumi laik mekim . ' - 2 timoti 3 : 1 ; matyu 10 : 16 .

translation.en: santeria has been a prominent religion in cuba for many years .
translation.zu: inap planti yia lotu santeria i bikpela long kuba .

translation.en: however , this form of worship has been gradually introduced to other countries .
translation.zu: tasol isi isi dispela kain pasin bilong lotu i wok long kamap long sampela narapela kantri .

translation.en: most of these shops are known as botanicas , and they can be found in other large cities of the americas .
translation.zu: planti stua olsem , ol i save kolim botanica , na yu ken painim ol dispela kain stua long ol biktaun bilong not na sentral na saut amerika .

translation.en: in new york city , botanicas are well advertised in the telephone book , having far more listings in the yellow pages than other religious stores .
translation.zu: long nu yok siti bikpela lista bilong ol stua olsem i stap long buk bilong telefon , na i winim lista bilong ol narapela stua i save salim ol samting bilong lotu .

translation.en: santeria is becoming more secular and cultural than religious , and it has been spread through afro - caribbean music and cultural events .
translation.zu: na long rot bilong ol singsing na bung bilong ol lain afro - karibian , tingting bilong lotu santeria i wok long go long ol narapela hap .

translation.en: santeria has the basic features and traditions of an ancient african religion practiced among the yoruba in nigeria .
translation.zu: sampela bilip na pasin bilong lotu santeria i klostu wankain olsem bilong ol tumbuna bilong lain yoruba bilong naijiria long afrika .

translation.en: when yoruba were taken to the caribbean islands as slaves between the 1770 ' s and the 1840 ' s , they took their religion with them .
translation.zu: taim ol i bin kisim ol lain yoruba long ol yia olsem 1770 i go inap long 1840 samting , na karim ol i go long ol ailan karibian bilong stap olsem wokboi , ol yoruba i bihainim yet lotu bilong ol .

translation.en: once in the new world , these africans in bondage were forced to accept catholicism , but they refused to give up their traditions completely .
translation.zu: taim ol kamap pinis long amerika ol man i subim ol dispela lain afrika long bihainim lotu katolik , tasol ol i strong long holim yet sampela bilip bilong ol .

translation.en: so they created a new form of worship with elements taken from both religions .
translation.zu: olsem na ol i bungim sampela bilip bilong lotu katolik na sampela bilip bilong ol yet na kamapim nupela lotu .

translation.en: such a merging of religious practices is called syncretism .
translation.zu: ol i save kolim dispela pasin bilong bungim tupela lotu olsem pasin sinkretis .

translation.en: in an effort to worship according to their ancient beliefs , the slaves gave catholic saints dual identities , each one corresponding to an african god with particular characteristics and powers .
translation.zu: bilong bihainim pasin bilong lotu i stret wantaim ol bilip bilong ol long bipo yet , ol i putim nem bilong ol god bilong afrika long ol wan wan santu bilong lotu katolik i gat wankain pasin o strong .

translation.en: thus , african gods and goddesses , called orisha , took on the names and forms of catholic saints .
translation.zu: olsem na ol god bilong afrika , em ol i save kolim orisa , i kisim ol nem na kain skin olsem bilong ol santu bilong lotu katolik .

translation.en: however , the rituals , customs , and beliefs remained the same as those practiced in africa .
translation.zu: tasol ol dispela lain wokboi i mekim wankain pasin olsem ol i bin mekim long afrika bilong lotuim ol dispela god .

translation.en: a santeria priest in cuba explains : " syncretism allows us to worship the catholic god on the altar , but what we see is the african god behind it . "
translation.zu: wanpela pris bilong lotu santeria long kuba i tok olsem : " long rot bilong pasin sinkretis mipela ken lotu long god bilong ol katolik i stap long alta , tasol taim mipela mekim , i olsem mipela lukim god bilong ol afrika . "

translation.en: religions such as voodoo , obeah , and macumba are also made up of elements from roman catholic liturgy , sacraments , and sacred paraphernalia blended with spiritistic practices from africa .
translation.zu: ol lotu olsem vudu na obia na makumba , ol tu i kisim sampela pasin bilong lotu katolik na bungim wantaim ol kain kain wok bilong spirit nogut ol i mekim long afrika .

translation.en: because from the beginning the catholic church in latin america prohibited african religions , santeria had to be practiced in secrecy for a long time .
translation.zu: kirap long taim ol lain afrika i kam long latin - amerika , misin katolik i tambuim ol long bihainim lotu bilong ol yet , olsem na inap long planti yia ol i mekim pasin hait na bihainim lotu santeria .

translation.en: eventually the catholic church came to tolerate this syncretism among the slaves .
translation.zu: isi isi misin katolik i larim ol dispela lain wokboi bilong afrika i bihainim dispela pasin .

translation.en: characteristics of santeria
translation.zu: pasin bilong santeria

translation.en: what are the characteristics of this religious worship ?
translation.zu: wanem pasin bilong dispela lotu ?

translation.en: santeros , as the practitioners of santeria are now called , worship one supreme being and a group of deities , or orisha , that form the yoruba pantheon .
translation.zu: ol santeros - em nem bilong ol man i save bihainim lotu santeria - ol i save bilip long wanpela god i gat olgeta strong , na wanpela lain god ol i save kolim olsem orisa , em ol god bilong ol yoruba .

translation.en: followers can appeal to the orisha through prayers , music , proper behavior , and offerings .
translation.zu: long rot bilong beten , musik , gutpela pasin , na ol ofa , ol santeros i ken givim ol askim long ol orisa .

translation.en: altars play an important role in the worship ; santeros set them up in their homes and put flowers , rum , cake , and cigars on them to keep the deities happy and helpful .
translation.zu: ol alta i bikpela samting long ol santeros ; ol i save wokim wanpela alta long haus na putim ol samting long en olsem plaua , strongpela dring , kek , na sampela smok bilong amamasim ol god na kirapim ol long helpim ol .

translation.en: each deity represents an aspect of nature , like thunder , and a human characteristic , like power . "
translation.zu: ol wan wan god bilong ol i makim samting bilong graun , olsem klaut i pairap , o sampela pasin bilong man olsem bikpela strong . "

translation.en: santeria priests help people to resolve day - to - day problems by consulting the orisha .
translation.zu: ol pris bilong santeria i save kisim tok bilong ol orisa bilong helpim man long stretim ol hevi bilong ol wan wan de .

translation.en: the ones most attracted are the deprived and also immigrants who move to countries where santeria is practiced .
translation.zu: ol man i stap rabis na ol man i kam long ol narapela kantri i save laikim lotu santeria moa yet .

translation.en: chickens , goats , doves , pigeons , and turtles are among the animals used .
translation.zu: taim ol i wokim ofa , ol i mekim wok long ol kakaruk , meme , ol pisin balus , na ol trausel .

translation.en: the music of santeria
translation.zu: musik bilong santeria

translation.en: music plays an important role as a regular feature of worship in santeria .
translation.zu: musik i bikpela samting long lotu santeria , na ol i save mekim wok long en long taim bilong lotu .

translation.en: music is used during bembés , or ceremonies in which drums are beaten to invoke the deities .
translation.zu: long ol bung ol i kolim olsem bembés , ol i save paitim ol kundu bilong kirapim ol god long putim yau long tok bilong ol .

translation.en: the sound is so loud that the insistent rhythm of the drums can be heard blocks away .
translation.zu: krai bilong kundu i antap tru na ol lain i stap longwe ol inap harim pairap bilong en .

translation.en: percussion instruments such as drums and xylophones , or marimbas , have been cult instruments in west africa for centuries .
translation.zu: inap planti handet yia long wes afrika ol kundu i stap olsem samting bilong lotu .

translation.en: in brazil , membranes for sacred drums are made from the skins of ritually sacrificed animals , and new instruments are customarily baptized , preferably with " holy " water from a catholic church .
translation.zu: long brasil , ol i kisim skin bilong ol animal ol i bin ofaim pinis na putim long ol kundu , na ol i save baptaisim ol nupela kundu long wara , na sapos inap , ol bai mekim long wara holi bilong misin katolik .

translation.en: other drums represent a certain deity , such as in the afro - caribbean culture of haiti .
translation.zu: sampela ol narapela kundu i makim ol wan wan god , na dispela pasin i stap long ol lain afro - karibian bilong haiti .

translation.en: it is not unusual to find on the market compact discs of sacred music for santeria , openly referred to as such .
translation.zu: i no hatwok long painim sampela kaset o cd samting i gat ol musik bilong lotu santeria .

translation.en: drums are the main instrument in the rhythms , and some pieces have titles that are actually names of santeria deities or of customs of the religion .
translation.zu: ol dispela musik i save mekim bikpela wok long ol kundu , na sampela god bilong lotu santeria o sampela pasin bilong dispela lotu i stap olsem nem bilong sampela singsing .

translation.en: santeria terminology has been included in some musical pieces .
translation.zu: sampela ol tok bilong santeria i stap insait long sampela ol narapela singsing .

translation.en: what the bible says
translation.zu: baibel i tok wanem ?

translation.en: god 's word lists the " practice of spiritism " among " the works of the flesh , " which bar a person from inheriting god 's kingdom .
translation.zu: ( wok pris 19 : 31 ) tok bilong god i bungim wok bilong ol spirit nogut wantaim ol narapela " pasin bilong olpela bel , " na man i insait long ol dispela pasin i no inap go insait long kingdom bilong god .

translation.en: the scriptures also command those desiring god 's approval to " flee from idolatry " and to " worship the father with spirit and truth . " - 1 corinthians 10 : 14 ; john 4 : 23 , 24 .
translation.zu: na tu , ol man i laik bai god i orait long ol , baibel i tokim ol long " stap longwe long pasin bilong lotu long ol giaman god " na ol i mas " lotu long strong bilong holi spirit na long pasin i tru . " - 1 korin 10 : 14 ; jon 4 : 23 , 24 .

translation.en: various forms of entertainment and some aspects of latin - american culture are laced with elements of santeria .
translation.zu: sampela tingting i kam long lotu santeria i insait long sampela musik na singsing na sampela pasin bilong ol lain bilong saut amerika .

translation.en: nevertheless , christians do well to avoid anything that is in direct conflict with bible principles regardless of how popular it is or how harmless it seems to be . - 2 corinthians 6 : 14 - 18 .
translation.zu: tasol maski em samting planti man i laikim o i olsem em samting bilong amamas tasol , ol kristen i mas abrusim olgeta samting i pait wantaim ol lo bilong baibel . - 2 korin 6 : 14 - 18 .

translation.en: terms used in santeria
translation.zu: sampela tok bilong lotu santeria

translation.en: babalú - aye : god of healing worshiped as " saint " lazaro .
translation.zu: bebalu - aye : god bilong oraitim sik na ol i lotuim em na tok em i " santu " lasaro .

translation.en: changó : god of fire , thunder , and lightning and also patron of artillery , worshiped as " saint " barbara in the catholic faith .
translation.zu: sengo : god bilong paia na klaut i pairap , na man bilong lukautim ol samting bilong pait , na long lotu katolik ol i kolim em olsem " santu " barbara .

translation.en: ifa corpus : system of laws expressed in 256 symbols that represent the santeria tradition .
translation.zu: ifa korpus : ol 256 mak samting i makim ol lo bilong santeria .

translation.en: obatalá : a god who created human life and consciousness out of the substance of the earth .
translation.zu: obatala : wanpela god i kisim graun na wokim ol manmeri .

translation.en: ochún : goddess of rivers , love , marriage , money , joy , and abundance , who doubles as the virgen de la caridad , patron saint of cuba .
translation.zu: osun : god meri bilong ol wara , pasin sori , marit , mani , amamas , na pasin bilong holim planti samting , ol i putim nem bilong em i go long santu bilong kuba , em virgen de la caridad .

translation.en: orumila : a god that decides an individual 's fate .
translation.zu: orumila : wanpela god i save makim wanem ol samting bai painim man .

translation.en: yemayá , or xemayá : goddess of the seas and of fertility , who is identified with the virgin mary , or the virgen de regla in cuba .
translation.zu: yemaia , o semaia : god meri bilong solwara na pasin bilong karim planti pikinini , ol i tingim em olsem virgo maria o virgen de regla bilong kuba .

translation.en: the bible 's viewpoint
translation.zu: baibel i tok wanem ?

translation.en: who is a minister ?
translation.zu: husat i stap olsem wokman bilong god ?

translation.en: on the eve of jesus ' sacrificial death , his closest friends got involved in a heated argument .
translation.zu: long nait paslain long jisas i dai olsem ofa , ol gutpela pren bilong em i insait long wanpela bikpela tok pait .

translation.en: according to luke 22 : 24 , there " arose a heated dispute among them over which one of them seemed to be greatest . "
translation.zu: olsem luk 22 : 24 i tok , ol " i stat long pait long toktok long husat em i namba wan bilong ol . "

translation.en: this was not the first time that such an argument had erupted among jesus ' apostles .
translation.zu: i no namba wan taim ol aposel bilong jisas i bin tok pait long dispela samting .

translation.en: on at least two previous occasions , jesus had to correct their thinking .
translation.zu: long tupela narapela taim bipo jisas i bin stretim tingting bilong ol .

translation.en: how sad that on this critical night , jesus found himself having to remind them again what a christian minister should truly be .
translation.zu: em i tok : " man i stap namba wan namel long yupela , em i mas i stap olsem man i kamap bihain tru .

translation.en: he said : " let him that is the greatest among you become as the youngest , and the one acting as chief as the one ministering . " - luke 22 : 26 .
translation.zu: na hetman bilong yupela em i mas i stap olsem wokman bilong helpim yupela . " - luk 22 : 26 .

translation.en: it should not surprise us that the apostles had an erroneous idea about the importance of position and prominence .
translation.zu: ol aposel i no gat stretpela tingting long pasin bilong holim bikpela wok na pasin bilong kisim biknem , na yumi no ken kirap nogut long dispela .

translation.en: prior to jesus , their principal example in the matter of religious leadership had been provided by the scribes and pharisees .
translation.zu: taim ol i no save yet long jisas , ol farisi na ol saveman bilong lo i stap olsem piksa bilong ol long pasin bilong i stap hetman bilong lotu .

translation.en: instead of giving people spiritual guidance and direction , these false ministers endorsed rigid traditions and rules that " shut up the kingdom of the heavens before men . "
translation.zu: ol i strong long ol manmeri i mas bihainim sampela pasin bilong ol tumbuna na ol lo i save " pasim dua bilong kingdom bilong heven long pes bilong ol manmeri . "

translation.en: they were position - oriented , prominence - seeking , self - centered individuals who performed their works " to be viewed by men . " - matthew 23 : 4 , 5 , 13 .
translation.zu: ol i tingting tumas long kisim biknem na namba , na ol i save tingim ol yet tasol . ol samting ol i mekim , em ol i mekim " bai ol man i ken lukim . " - matyu 23 : 4 , 5 , 13 . pasin bilong narapela kain wokman

translation.en: jesus , however , introduced a new concept of spiritual ministry to his disciples .
translation.zu: nogat . wanpela tasol em i tisa bilong yupela , na yupela olgeta i stap brata brata .

translation.en: he taught : " do not you be called rabbi , for one is your teacher , whereas all you are brothers .
translation.zu: na long graun hia yupela i no ken kolim wanpela man em i papa bilong yupela .

translation.en: moreover , do not call anyone your father on earth , for one is your father , the heavenly one . . . .
translation.zu: wanpela tasol em i papa bilong yupela , na em i stap long heven . . . .

translation.en: but the greatest one among you must be your minister . "
translation.zu: [ tasol ] bikman bilong yupela em i mas i stap wokman bilong yupela . "

translation.en: jesus ' disciples were not to imitate the religious leaders of their day .
translation.zu: jisas i no laik bai ol disaipel bilong em i bihainim pasin bilong ol hetman bilong lotu .

translation.en: if they wanted to be genuine ministers , they had to imitate jesus .
translation.zu: sapos ol i laik stap olsem wokman tru bilong god , ol i mas bihainim pasin bilong jisas .

translation.en: what kind of example did he leave ?
translation.zu: orait jisas i makim wanem kain pasin ol i mas bihainim ?

translation.en: the bible often uses the greek word di · aʹko · nos for " minister . "
translation.zu: planti taim baibel i save kolim wanpela tok grik di · aʹko · nos , i makim " wokman . "

translation.en: the encyclopedia of religion explains that this word represents " not status but the serving relationship of the minister to the one served : following the example of christ . . . is at the heart of the christian understanding of ministry . "
translation.zu: wanpela buk ( the encyclopedia of religion ) i stori olsem dispela tok " i no makim namba man i holim , tasol em i makim pasin wanpela wokman i mekim long man em i gat wok long lukautim : pasin krais i mekim . . . i as tru bilong tingting bilong lotu kristen long dispela tok olsem wokman bilong god . "

translation.en: in harmony with the correct definition of the word " minister , " jesus spent himself giving to others .
translation.zu: long mekim wok i stret wantaim dispela tok " wokman , " jisas i lusim strong bilong em yet bilong helpim ol narapela .

translation.en: " the son of man came , " he explained patiently , " not to be ministered to , but to minister and to give his soul a ransom in exchange for many . "
translation.zu: long pasin isi em i tokim ol disaipel olsem : " pikinini bilong man i no bin i kam bilong ol man i ken mekim wok bilong helpim em . nogat .

translation.en: he wanted to help .
translation.zu: em i laik helpim ol .

translation.en: generous love is what motivated his ministry , and he wanted his disciples to display the same giving attitude . - matthew 9 : 36 .
translation.zu: pasin sori i kirapim em long mekim ol dispela wok , na em i laik bai ol disaipel bilong em i bihainim wankain pasin bilong tingim ol narapela . - matyu 9 : 36 .

translation.en: " the harvest is great , " he said , " but the workers are few .
translation.zu: jisas i tok : " planti kaikai tumas i mau pinis long gaden , tasol i no gat planti wokman i stap bilong kisim .

translation.en: therefore , beg the master of the harvest to send out workers into his harvest . "
translation.zu: olsem na yupela i mas beten long papa bilong gaden , bai em i salim ol wokman i go bungim kaikai bilong en . "

translation.en: yes , christ 's ministers were to be workers in the greatest work the world has ever seen - providing spiritual comfort to all mankind by preaching and teaching the good news of god 's kingdom . - matthew 28 : 19 , 20 .
translation.zu: em nau , ol wokman bilong krais bai insait long wanpela bikpela wok tru i winim ol narapela wok ol man long graun i save mekim - long rot bilong skulim ol man long ol gutpela tok long kingdom , ol bai helpim ol man long kisim bel isi long ol samting bilong spirit . - matyu 28 : 19 , 20 .
