translation.zu: sampela wok bilong glasman em pasin bilong lukluk long ol sta na bal glas , kamapim insait bilong ol driman , lukim ol mak bilong han , na kisim save long ol samting bai kamap bihain long rot bilong ol kas ol i kolim tarot .

translation.en: if you have been taught that some forms of spiritism are ways to contact good spirits , it may surprise you to learn what the bible says about spiritism .
translation.zu: em i tok : " yupela i no ken i go askim ol man i save toktok wantaim . . . ol man i dai pinis , long kisim tingting long ol . . . na givim long yupela .

translation.en: for instance , it states : " do not turn yourselves to the spirit mediums , and do not consult professional foretellers of events , so as to become unclean by them . " - leviticus 19 : 31 ; 20 : 6 , 27 .
translation.zu: sapos yupela i mekim olsem bai yupela i kamap doti tru long ai bilong mi . " - wok pris 19 : 31 ; 20 : 6 , 27 .

translation.en: the bible , in fact , describes the one practicing spiritism as " something detestable to jehovah . "
translation.zu: baibel i tok , jehova " i no laikim tru " ol manmeri i save mekim wok bilong ol spirit .

translation.en: a closer look at what the bible says about one major feature of spiritism - claimed communication with the dead - will answer that question .
translation.zu: taim yumi skelim tok baibel i mekim long wanpela bikpela hap wok bilong ol spirit - ol i tok ol inap toktok wantaim ol man i dai pinis - bai yumi kisim bekim long dispela askim .

translation.en: contrary to what many people think , god 's word , the bible , teaches that it is not possible for humans to communicate with loved ones who have died .
translation.zu: baibel i tok , ol man i no inap toktok wantaim ol famili i dai pinis , tasol planti manmeri i ting ol inap mekim olsem .

translation.en: well , if anyone is to talk with the dead , the dead must actually be alive .
translation.zu: sapos wanpela man i toktok wantaim man i dai pinis , dispela daiman i mas i stap laip yet .

translation.en: there must be a part of them that survives death .
translation.zu: i mas i gat wanpela hap bilong ol i no save dai .

translation.en: some claim that the soul lives on when the body dies .
translation.zu: sampela ol i tok tewel bilong man i stap laip taim bodi i dai .

translation.en: is that true ?
translation.zu: dispela tok em i tru ?

translation.en: the bible account of man 's creation says : " jehovah god proceeded to form the man out of dust from the ground and to blow into his nostrils the breath of life , and the man came to be a living soul . "
translation.zu: baibel i stori long taim god i bin wokim man , olsem : " god jehova i kisim graun na em i wokim man long en , na em i winim win bilong laip i go insait long nus bilong man , na man i kamap wanpela man i gat laip . "

translation.en: does this not reveal that the person himself is a soul and that he does not have an immortal soul that lives on after the death of the body ?
translation.zu: ( stat 2 : 7 , nw ) dispela tok i kamapim klia olsem man i gat laip na em i no gat wanpela tewel i save stap laip taim bodi i dai pinis .

translation.en: in fact , the scriptures say : " the soul that is sinning - it itself will die . "
translation.zu: baibel i tok : " sapos wanpela man i mekim sin , dispela man tasol i mas i dai . "

translation.en: " the living are conscious that they will die ; but as for the dead , they are conscious of nothing at all . . .
translation.zu: long wanem , ol i save wanpela samting bai i kamap long ol . ol i save bai ol i dai . tasol ol man i dai pinis , ol i no inap save long wanpela samting . . . .

translation.en: there is no work nor devising nor knowledge nor wisdom in sheol , " mankind 's common grave . - ecclesiastes 9 : 5 , 10 .
translation.zu: bai yu no inap mekim wok o tingting o kisim gutpela tingting na save long ples bilong ol man i dai pinis . " - saveman 9 : 5 , 10 .

translation.en: so according to the bible , the soul is not something that survives the death of the body and that living humans can thereafter communicate with .
translation.zu: olsem na baibel i kamapim klia olsem man i no gat wanpela tewel i save stap laip yet taim em i dai , na ol man i stap laip ol i no inap toktok wantaim tewel .

translation.en: here are two examples of respected bible scholars who have reached the conclusion that the soul dies .
translation.zu: orait nau mipela i laik kamapim tok bilong tupela saveman i gat nem em ol i ting taim man i dai em i dai tru .

translation.en: pinnock observed : " this concept [ that the human soul is immortal ] has influenced theology for a long , long time but it is not biblical .
translation.zu: pinnock , em i tok : " dispela tingting [ olsem yumi gat tewel i no inap i dai ] em i bin bosim tingting bilong ol lotu inap longtaim tru , tasol dispela tingting em i no bilong baibel .

translation.en: the bible does not teach the natural immortality of the soul . "
translation.zu: baibel i no lainim yumi olsem yumi gat tewel i no save dai . "

translation.en: w .
translation.zu: w .

translation.en: nevertheless , people do receive messages and hear voices that seem to come from the dead .
translation.zu: tasol ol man i save kisim ol toksave na harim sampela nek i olsem nek bilong ol man i dai pinis .

translation.en: who , then , are speaking ?
translation.zu: orait husat i toktok ?

translation.en: communication with whom ?
translation.zu: toktok wantaim husat ?

translation.en: the bible relates that an invisible spirit person used a serpent , much as a ventriloquist uses a dummy , to communicate with the first woman , eve , and lead her to rebel against god .
translation.zu: olsem man i mekim wok long wanpela doli na tromoi tok long maus bilong en , baibel i tok wanpela spirit i bin mekim wok long snek bilong toktok wantaim namba wan meri , iv , na em i kirapim em long bikhet long god .

translation.en: the bible calls this spirit person , or angel , " the original serpent , the one called devil and satan , who is misleading the entire inhabited earth . "
translation.zu: ( stat 3 : 1 - 5 ) baibel i tok dispela spirit o ensel , em i " dispela snek bilong bipo yet , na ol i kolim em satan na ' man i save kotim olgeta manmeri . '

translation.en: that one , satan , succeeded in enticing other angels into rebellion .
translation.zu: dispela spirit , satan , em i pulim sampela narapela ensel long bikhet long god .

translation.en: these wicked angels are called demons and are enemies of god .
translation.zu: ol i kolim ol dispela ensel nogut olsem ol spirit nogut na ol i birua bilong god .

translation.en: the bible shows that demons have the power to influence humans .
translation.zu: baibel i soim yumi olsem ol spirit nogut i gat strong long stiaim ol manmeri .

translation.en: it is no wonder , then , that god 's law says : " there should not be found in you anyone . . . who consults a spirit medium or a professional foreteller of events or anyone who inquires of the dead .
translation.zu: olsem na yumi no kirap nogut long lo bilong god i tok : " yupela i no ken . . . mekim olkain pasin bilong glasman , na pasin tambaran na pasin sanguma na wokim posin na mekim marila . na yupela i no ken toktok wantaim tewel bilong ol man i dai pinis .

translation.en: a real - life experience of king saul of ancient israel answers that question .
translation.zu: samting i painim king sol bilong israel long bipo i bekim dispela askim .

translation.en: because of fear of his enemies , king saul sought out a spirit medium .
translation.zu: king sol i pret long ol birua bilong em , olsem na em i go lukim wanpela wailis bilong ol spirit .

translation.en: he asked her to contact the dead prophet samuel .
translation.zu: em i askim dispela wailis long toktok wantaim profet samuel i dai pinis .

translation.en: on hearing the spirit medium 's description of an old man , saul assumed this apparition to be samuel .
translation.zu: taim wailis i tok dispela spirit i olsem wanpela lapun man na em i stori long skin bilong em i luk olsem wanem , orait sol i ting em i samuel .

translation.en: and what message did saul receive ?
translation.zu: na dispela spirit i tok wanem long sol ?

translation.en: israel would be given into the hands of enemies , and saul and his sons would be with " samuel , " indicating that they would die .
translation.zu: ol birua bai daunim ol israel , na sol na ol pikinini man bilong em ol bai stap wantaim " samuel " - dispela tok i makim olsem bai ol i dai .

translation.en: what was god 's reaction to saul 's decision to consult a spirit medium ?
translation.zu: ( 1 samuel 28 : 4 - 19 ) god i mekim wanem taim sol i go toktok wantaim wailis bilong ol spirit ?

translation.en: what a high price to pay !
translation.zu: ( 1 stori 10 : 13 ) man !

translation.en: the bible warns that " those practicing spiritism " will suffer " the second [ or , everlasting ] death . "
translation.zu: baibel i tok , " ol man i wokim posin na i yusim ol arapela kain pawa " ol bai kisim " namba 2 dai " olsem ol bai pinis olgeta .

translation.en: clearly , then , the wise and lifesaving course to take is to avoid spiritism in all its forms .
translation.zu: olsem na em i savepasin na em bai helpim yumi long abrusim bagarap sapos yumi sakim olgeta kain wok bilong ol spirit nogut .

translation.en: how to resist wicked spirits
translation.zu: rot bilong sakim ol spirit nogut

translation.en: what if you have already become involved in spiritism ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem sapos yu insait pinis long wok bilong ol spirit nogut ?

translation.en: then you will do well to take immediate steps to protect yourself and your family from being harmed by wicked spirits .
translation.zu: em i gutpela sapos yu mekim hariap ol samting bilong lukautim yu yet na famili bilong yu bambai ol spirit nogut i no ken bagarapim yupela .

translation.en: to illustrate : how does a person protect his home and family against vermin ?
translation.zu: yumi ken tok piksa olsem : man i mas mekim wanem bilong lukautim haus na famili bilong em long ol binatang nogut ?

translation.en: after removing them from his house , he rids his house of items that attract the vermin .
translation.zu: taim em i rausim pinis ol binatang long haus , em i mas rausim tu ol samting i save pulim ol binatang i kam long haus .

translation.en: he seals cracks and reinforces the walls to stop the vermin invasion , and if the vermin plague persists , he may ask for the help of local authorities to deal with it .
translation.zu: em i mas stretim ol hul na strongim ol banis bilong pasim rot bilong ol binatang , na sapos ol binatang i stap yet , ating em bai askim sampela lain long helpim em long stretim dispela hevi .

translation.en: a similar approach can help you to resist wicked spirits and to break free from them .
translation.zu: yu ken mekim wankain samting bilong sakim ol spirit nogut na long lusim wok bilong ol .

translation.en: after they made up their mind to break free from spiritism , they took three steps to protect themselves against the verminlike attacks of wicked spirits .
translation.zu: taim ol i pasim tok pinis long bel long lusim wok bilong ol spirit nogut , ol i mekim 3 - pela samting bilong lukautim ol yet long ol samting bilong ol spirit nogut .

translation.en: what did they do ?
translation.zu: ol i bin mekim wanem ?

translation.en: the first step
translation.zu: namba wan samting

translation.en: get rid of all objects related to spiritism .
translation.zu: rausim olgeta samting bilong wok bilong ol spirit nogut .

translation.en: this would include all books , magazines , comic books , videos , posters , material from electronic sources , and music recordings that have spiritistic overtones , as well as amulets or other items worn for " protection . " - deuteronomy 7 : 25 , 26 ; 1 corinthians 10 : 21 .
translation.zu: ol dispela samting em ol buk , nius , buk komik , video , piksa , intenet samting , na ol kaset na cd em ol i kamapim ol samting bilong wok bilong ol spirit nogut , na tu , ol paspas o ol narapela samting ol man i save mekim wok long en bilong " lukautim " ol yet . - lo 7 : 25 , 26 ; 1 korin 10 : 21 .

translation.en: one man in south america who had been steeped in spiritism for decades took this scriptural advice to heart .
translation.zu: wanpela man long saut amerika em i bin insait tru long wok bilong ol spirit nogut inap planti yia , em i bihainim dispela tok bilong baibel .

translation.en: " one day , " he recalls , " i gathered all my spiritistic belongings in front of my house , grabbed an ax , and chopped them to pieces . "
translation.zu: em i tok : " wanpela de mi bungim olgeta samting bilong wok bilong ol spirit nogut na putim long ai bilong haus bilong mi , na mi kisim tamiok na katim ol i go liklik . "

translation.en: after that he made good spiritual progress and before long became a zealous minister in one of the congregations of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: bihain long dispela em i kamap strong long ol samting bilong spirit , na bihain liklik em i kamap strongpela wokman bilong autim tok long wanpela kongrigesen bilong ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: yet , that first step is not enough .
translation.zu: tasol dispela namba wan samting man i mas mekim em i no inap .

translation.en: why not ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem ?

translation.en: well , even some years after those christians in ephesus had destroyed their books on magic , the apostle paul wrote : " we have a wrestling . . . against the wicked spirit forces . "
translation.zu: inap sampela yia bihain long ol dispela kristen long efesus ol i bin bagarapim ol buk i stori long wok marila samting , aposel pol i tok : " yumi pait long olgeta spirit nogut i stap antap . "

translation.en: the demons had not given up .
translation.zu: ol spirit nogut i no bin lusim wok bilong ol .

translation.en: they were still seeking to gain an advantage .
translation.zu: ol i traim yet long pulim ol dispela kristen .

translation.en: what else did those christians need to do ?
translation.zu: ol i mas mekim wanem samting moa ?

translation.en: the second step
translation.zu: namba tu samting

translation.en: paul urged the first - century ephesians : " put on the complete suit of armor from god that you may be able to stand firm against the crafty acts of the devil . "
translation.zu: pol i tokim ol efesus long taim bilong ol aposel : " yupela i mas pasim olgeta klos pait god i save givim long yumi , na bai yupela inap long sanap strong na sakim olgeta kain pasin bilong trik na giaman satan i save hait na mekim . "

translation.en: that advice is still valid today .
translation.zu: dispela tok i stret long nau tu .

translation.en: much like the person who is trying to keep vermin out of his home , the christian must fortify his wall - like defenses in order to stay out of the reach of wicked spirits .
translation.zu: olsem man i wok strong long pasim rot bilong ol binatang long kam insait long haus bilong em , kristen i mas strongim em yet bambai em i ken sakim ol spirit nogut .

translation.en: " above all things , " stresses paul , " take up the large shield of faith , with which you will be able to quench all the wicked one 's burning missiles . "
translation.zu: pol i tok : " yupela i mas kisim dispela olgeta samting bilong pait , na yupela i mas kisim tu pasin bilong bilip , na holim strong olsem hap plang , bai yupela inap long mekim i dai olgeta spia paia dispela man nogut satan i save sutim i kam long yupela . "

translation.en: this shield is absolutely necessary .
translation.zu: yu mas i gat dispela kain bilip .

translation.en: the firmer your faith , the stronger your resistance to wicked spirit forces will be . - matthew 17 : 20 .
translation.zu: taim bilip bilong yu i wok long kamap strong moa , bai yu inap strong moa long sakim ol spirit nogut . - matyu 17 : 20 .

translation.en: how , then , can you fortify your protective defenses ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem yu ken strongim yu yet long sakim ol spirit nogut ?

translation.en: by continuing your study of the bible .
translation.zu: wok yet long stadi long baibel .

translation.en: in what way is bible study related to faith ?
translation.zu: pasin bilong stadi long baibel inap mekim wanem long bilip bilong yu ?

translation.en: well , just as the firmness of a wall depends much on the strength of its foundation , so the firmness of one 's faith depends greatly on the strength of its base .
translation.zu: sapos as bilong haus i strong , orait banis tu bai strong , na olsem tasol bilip bilong man bai strong sapos as bilong bilip bilong em i strong .

translation.en: what is that base ?
translation.zu: wanem samting i olsem as bilong bilip ?

translation.en: accurate knowledge of god 's word .
translation.zu: stretpela save long tok bilong god .

translation.en: in turn the thing heard is through the word about christ . "
translation.zu: na dispela tok yumi harim , em i kamap long maus bilong krais . "

translation.en: you are invited to request a free bible study from one of jehovah 's witnesses , at a time and location convenient for you .
translation.zu: yu ken askim wanpela witnes bilong jehova long stadi long baibel wantaim yu , na yu yet i ken makim taim na ples bilong mekim dispela stadi .

translation.en: such a study will fortify your faith .
translation.zu: kain stadi olsem bai strongim bilip bilong yu .

translation.en: before long your faith will become a bulwark that will serve as a shield against the influence of wicked spirits . - psalm 91 : 4 ; 1 john 5 : 5 .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na bilip bilong yu bai kamap olsem wanpela strongpela hap plang i lukautim yu long wok bilong ol spirit nogut . - song 91 : 4 ; 1 jon 5 : 5 .

translation.en: what is the third step that those christians in ephesus had to take ?
translation.zu: wanem namba 3 samting ol kristen long efesus i mas mekim ?

translation.en: the third step
translation.zu: namba tri samting

translation.en: back in ephesus those new believers had taken steps to resist wicked spirits , but those christians were still living in a city infested with demonism .
translation.zu: long efesus long bipo ol dispela nupela bilipman ol i bin mekim ol samting bilong sakim ol spirit nogut , tasol ol dispela kristen i stap yet long wanpela taun em wok bilong ol spirit nogut i pulap long en .

translation.en: and to that end keep awake with all constancy and with supplication in behalf of all the holy ones . " - ephesians 6 : 18 .
translation.zu: oltaim yupela i mas prea na askim god long helpim olgeta manmeri bilong en . " - efesus 6 : 18 .

translation.en: surely , praying intensely and constantly for jehovah 's protection was , and still is , a decisive step that is necessary for protection against wicked spirits .
translation.zu: tru tumas , long bipo na long nau tu pasin bilong beten strong long olgeta taim na askim jehova long lukautim yu , em i wanpela bikpela samting yu mas mekim bilong sakim ol spirit nogut .

translation.en: and it is comforting to know that jehovah will answer your heartfelt supplications by giving you his protection , which includes the support of his angels .
translation.zu: na yumi amamas long save olsem jehova bai harim ol beten bilong yu na lukautim yu , na ol ensel bilong em tu bai helpim yu .

translation.en: it is very important , therefore , to persist in praying to god , " deliver us from the wicked one . " - matthew 6 : 13 ; 1 john 5 : 18 , 19 .
translation.zu: ( song 34 : 7 ; 91 : 2 , 3 , 11 , 14 ; 145 : 19 ) olsem na em i bikpela samting long beten oltaim na askim god olsem , " yu ken tekewe mipela long ol samting nogut . " - matyu 6 : 13 ; 1 jon 5 : 18 , 19 .

translation.en: antônio , a former spirit medium in brazil , came to appreciate the value of prayer .
translation.zu: antônio , bipo em i wanpela wailis bilong ol spirit long brasil , em i kisim save olsem beten em i bikpela samting .

translation.en: after he had accepted a bible study and learned god 's name , jehovah , he began to pray intensely to jehovah god for help to break away from spiritism .
translation.zu: taim em i kirap stadi long baibel na kisim save long nem bilong god , jehova , em i kirap beten strong long god jehova bambai em i ken helpim em long lusim wok bilong ol spirit nogut .

translation.en: looking back , he says : " praying to jehovah has proved to be a refuge for me and many others who were enslaved by wicked spirits in the past . " - proverbs 18 : 10 .
translation.zu: em i tingting i go bek , na em i tok : " pasin bilong beten long jehova em i bin helpim mi na planti narapela man em bipo ol spirit nogut i bin bosim ol . " - sindaun 18 : 10 .

translation.en: you can succeed
translation.zu: yu inap lusim

translation.en: it is vital that after coming to know jehovah , you put full trust in him , submit to his authority , and obey his commands .
translation.zu: taim yu kisim pinis save long jehova , em i bikpela samting long yu mas bilip olgeta long em , na daun long wok bos bilong em , na bihainim tok bilong em .

translation.en: if you do this , when you call out to him for help , using his personal name , he will give you protection .
translation.zu: sapos yu mekim olsem , orait taim yu askim em long helpim yu na yu mekim wok long nem bilong em , em bai lukautim yu .

translation.en: today he is a christian elder in one of the congregations of jehovah 's witnesses in são paulo and is grateful to have found the truth that set him free . - john 8 : 32 .
translation.zu: long nau em i wanpela elda kristen long wanpela kongrigesen bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long sau paulo , na em i amamas tru long em i bin painim tok i tru i helpim em long kamap fri . - jon 8 : 32 .

translation.en: like antônio and thousands of other former spiritists who now serve jehovah god , you can be successful in breaking free from spiritism .
translation.zu: olsem antônio na planti tausen narapela man em bipo ol i mekim wok bilong ol spirit nogut na nau ol i lotu long god jehova , yu tu inap lusim dispela wok nogut .

translation.en: therefore , get rid of objects related to spiritism , strengthen your faith through bible study , and pray for jehovah 's protection .
translation.zu: olsem na rausim olgeta samting bilong wok bilong ol spirit nogut , na stadi long baibel bilong strongim bilip bilong yu , na beten askim jehova long lukautim yu .

translation.en: take these steps - your life depends on it !
translation.zu: mekim ol dispela samting - long dispela rot yu inap kisim laip !

translation.en: young people ask . . .
translation.zu: ol yangpela i laik save . . .

translation.en: how can i make a success of my stay abroad ?
translation.zu: mi inap mekim wanem bambai i stap bilong mi long narapela kantri i ken kamap gutpela ?

translation.en: " when i arrived at the airport , all i wanted to do was go home ! . . .
translation.zu: " taim mi kamap long ples balus , mi gat wanpela tingting tasol , mi laik go bek long ples bilong mi ! . . .

translation.en: i had lost all my thirst for adventure and all my joy of discovery .
translation.zu: mi no gat laik moa long raun na lukim ol nupela samting .

translation.en: in a word , i was more homesick than i had ever been before . " - uta .
translation.zu: bipo mi no bin tingim tingim ples bilong mi olsem long dispela taim mi mekim . " - uta .

translation.en: it is a scary feeling to be all by yourself in a foreign land .
translation.zu: yu inap pret taim yu wanpela i stap long narapela kantri .

translation.en: some go to get an education or to receive special training .
translation.zu: paslain long dispela , planti yangpela i laik stap inap sampela yia samting long narapela kantri .

translation.en: others , though , have moved to serve in foreign lands where there is a need for kingdom preachers .
translation.zu: tasol sampela ol i go na wok long narapela kantri i sot long ol man bilong autim tok bilong kingdom .

translation.en: assuming that you are staying abroad for wise reasons - reasons that take into account your spiritual needs and goals * - what can you do to ensure that your stay will be a success ?
translation.zu: ating i gat gutpela as na yu sindaun long narapela kantri - olsem yu tingim tu ol samting bilong spirit na ol mak bilong spirit yu laik winim . * yu ken mekim wanem bambai i stap bilong yu long narapela kantri i ken kamap gutpela ?

translation.en: first , you must be willing to adapt .
translation.zu: pastaim yu mas redi long lain long pasin na sindaun bilong ol manmeri .

translation.en: that does not mean abandoning christian principles or your spiritual routine .
translation.zu: dispela i no makim olsem yu mas lusim ol lo kristen o ol wok bilong spirit , nogat .

translation.en: but it might mean acquiring a taste for new foods , learning some new rules of etiquette , or trying new ways of doing things .
translation.zu: tasol ating yu mas lain long laikim ol nupela kain kaikai , lainim sampela nupela pasin bilong ol man , o nupela rot bilong mekim sampela wok samting .

translation.en: these new customs may be very different from the way you did things back home .
translation.zu: ating ol dispela nupela pasin i narapela kain tru long ol pasin yu bin bihainim long ples bilong yu .

translation.en: but jesus ' command to " stop judging " could well be applied here .
translation.zu: tasol ating tok bilong jisas long " no ken skelim pasin bilong arapela " i stret long dispela kain taim tu .

translation.en: really , no race or culture has the right to declare itself superior to others .
translation.zu: tru tumas , i no stret long wanpela lain man i tok olsem ol i winim ol narapela lain man .

translation.en: just as older people should avoid making critical comparisons between the youth of yesteryear and those of today , so young people abroad should avoid making critical comparisons between a foreign country and their own .
translation.zu: ol lapun i no ken skelim pasin bilong ol yangpela bilong bipo wantaim pasin bilong ol yangpela long nau , na olsem tasol ol yangpela i go sindaun long narapela kantri , ol i no ken skelim ol samting bilong dispela kantri wantaim ples bilong ol yet .

translation.en: also , the quicker you learn the language of this land , the quicker you will begin to feel at home .
translation.zu: na tu , sapos yu lain hariap long tok ples bilong ol , i no longtaim na bai yu pilim olsem em i ples bilong yu .

translation.en: the apostle paul successfully adapted to different cultures in his work as a missionary because he was willing to become " all things to people of all sorts . "
translation.zu: aposel pol i bin lain gut long bihainim pasin bilong ol narapela narapela ples taim em i mekim wok misineri , long wanem , em i redi long " kisim pasin bilong olgeta kain man . "

translation.en: adrianne is an au pair living in germany , doing domestic work for a family in exchange for room and board .
translation.zu: adrianne i go sindaun long jemani , em i mekim ol wok bilong haus bilong wanpela famili , na ol i givim rum na kaikai long em .

translation.en: ' i 'm homesick ! '
translation.zu: ' mi tingim tingim ples bilong mi ! '

translation.en: during the first few weeks , it is not unusual to feel sad and homesick .
translation.zu: taim yu kamap long nupela kantri , ating inap sampela wik bai yu bel hevi liklik na tingim tingim ples bilong yu .

translation.en: the bible shows that jacob was ' yearning intensely for the house of his father , ' even though jacob had been in a foreign land for over 20 years !
translation.zu: baibel i tok , jekop i ' laikim tumas long go bek long ples bilong em , ' maski em i bin sindaun long narapela kantri inap 20 yia samting !

translation.en: of course , if you constantly dwell on what you left behind , you will only increase your feelings of sadness .
translation.zu: tasol sapos olgeta taim yu tingim ol samting bilong ples bilong yu , dispela bai mekim na yu bel hevi moa yet .

translation.en: while it 's good to keep in touch with your family by letters or phone calls , too many calls home might hinder you from adjusting to your new home .
translation.zu: tru , em i gutpela long raitim pas i go long famili o ringim ol long telefon , tasol sapos yu ringim ol planti taim tumas , dispela inap mekim na yu no lain hariap long sindaun bilong nupela ples bilong yu .

translation.en: amber recalls her first weeks abroad : " i found it hard in the evenings , when there was nothing to do , so i tried to do some extra studying or to read a book . "
translation.zu: amber i stori long namba wan wik bilong em long narapela kantri , na em i tok : " mi bel hevi long apinun taim mi no gat wok samting , olsem na mi mekim sampela stadi moa o ritim buk . "

translation.en: young rachel , a british au pair in germany , speaks from personal experience when she advises : " get involved straightaway .
translation.zu: yangpela rachel i bin go sindaun long narapela kantri , na em i tok : " kwiktaim yu mas insait long ol samting bilong kongrigesen .

translation.en: start attending the meetings at once . "
translation.zu: kirap hariap long go long ol miting . "

translation.en: initially , you may need some help in getting to the meetings .
translation.zu: ating pastaim sampela i mas helpim yu long go long ol miting .

translation.en: but within the christian congregation , you can find wholesome friends who can be like " brothers and sisters and mothers . " - mark 10 : 29 , 30 .
translation.zu: tasol insait long kongrigesen kristen , yu inap painim ol gutpela poroman ol i olsem ' ol brata na susa na mama . ' - mak 10 : 29 , 30 .

translation.en: sharing in the christian evangelizing work is also an important part of a good spiritual routine .
translation.zu: pasin bilong insait long wok bilong autim tok , em tu i bikpela hap bilong ol wok bilong spirit .

translation.en: finally , keep up a routine of prayer and personal study .
translation.zu: wok long beten na stadi long olgeta taim .

translation.en: for this reason , adrianne , mentioned earlier , made sure that she brought along bible literature in her mother tongue .
translation.zu: long dispela as adrianne , em pastaim yumi stori long em , em i kisim ol buk bilong baibel long tok ples bilong em yet i go wantaim em .

translation.en: living with a host family
translation.zu: sindaun wantaim narapela famili

translation.en: some young christians have arranged to live with believing families while they are abroad .
translation.zu: sampela yangpela kristen i stretim rot bambai ol i ken stap wantaim wanpela famili wanbilip taim ol i sindaun long narapela kantri .

translation.en: while a host family cannot be expected to take on the job of parenting , they can be good association and a source of spiritual encouragement . - proverbs 27 : 17 .
translation.zu: tru , yu no ken ting dispela famili bai lukautim yu olsem papamama , tasol ol i ken stap olsem gutpela poroman na strongim yu long ol samting bilong spirit . - sindaun 27 : 17 .

translation.en: even so , open communication with the host family is essential to maintaining a good relationship .
translation.zu: bilong stap gut wantaim dispela famili , em i bikpela samting long toktok gut wantaim ol .

translation.en: you need to know what your hosts ' expectations are .
translation.zu: yu mas save long ol samting dispela famili i laik yu mas mekim .

translation.en: and they should be aware of what your expectations are . "
translation.zu: na ol tu i mas save long tingting na laik bilong yu . "

translation.en: find out what the family house rules are and to what extent you are expected to share in chores .
translation.zu: kisim save long ol lo bilong famili , na long ol wok bilong haus ol i laik bai yu mekim .

translation.en: such matters should be thoroughly discussed .
translation.zu: yupela i mas toktok gut long ol dispela samting .

translation.en: your situation will be particularly challenging if , for example , you are working for a host family that does not share your beliefs .
translation.zu: i stap bilong yu bai hatwok moa sapos famili yu stap wantaim ol i no gat wankain bilip olsem yu .

translation.en: since the family may not understand your stand on bible principles , you could find yourself in compromising situations .
translation.zu: ating dispela famili i no save long ol lo bilong baibel yu laik bihainim , na dispela inap mekim na sampela samting inap kamap em inap traim bilip bilong yu .

translation.en: so if unavoidable circumstances force you to stay with a family that does not share your beliefs , then a number of precautions should be taken .
translation.zu: olsem na sapos sampela samting i mekim na yu mas sindaun wantaim famili i no wanbilip bilong yu , orait yu mas mekim ol samting bilong lukautim yu yet .

translation.en: rachel recommends : " make sure that they know that you are a christian .
translation.zu: rachel i tok : " yu mas tokim ol olsem yu wanpela kristen .

translation.en: it is best that you tell them honestly right away . "
translation.zu: em i gutpela long tokaut hariap long dispela samting . "

translation.en: also , you should make clear to your employer how important christian meetings and preaching are to you .
translation.zu: na tu , yu mas tokim famili yu sindaun wantaim ol olsem ol miting kristen na wok autim tok ol i bikpela samting long yu .

translation.en: finally , it is wise to make sure that important matters such as working hours , time off , and payment have been put in writing before you start .
translation.zu: na paslain long yu kirap mekim wok , em i savepasin long raitim long pepa ol bikpela samting , olsem hamas aua yu mas wok , na wanem taim yu ken malolo , na pe yu bai kisim .

translation.en: solving problems
translation.zu: stretim ol hevi

translation.en: in spite of your best efforts , trouble can still arise .
translation.zu: maski yu wok strong long mekim gut ol samting , hevi inap kamap .

translation.en: for example , what if your hosts demand that you leave their home ?
translation.zu: olsem : olsem wanem sapos famili yu sindaun wantaim ol i laik bai yu lusim haus bilong ol ?

translation.en: this can be quite devastating .
translation.zu: dispela inap bagarapim tru bel bilong yu .

translation.en: if some sort of misunderstanding occurs , you might try talking things out with your hosts in a calm and reasonable way .
translation.zu: sapos narapela i kisim tingting kranki long narapela , gutpela sapos yu wok strong long toktok wantaim dispela famili long gutpela pasin isi .

translation.en: perhaps they will change their minds .
translation.zu: ol inap senisim tingting bilong ol .

translation.en: if not , you will have to find another accommodation .
translation.zu: tasol sapos nogat , orait yu mas painim narapela haus bilong i stap long en .

translation.en: other problems may require that you ask someone for help .
translation.zu: ating sampela hevi inap mekim na yu mas askim sampela long helpim yu .

translation.en: you might , for example , run into financial trouble or get ill .
translation.zu: olsem : yu sot long mani o sik i painim yu .

translation.en: fearing that your parents might come to take you home , you may be hesitant to let them know what is going on .
translation.zu: yu pret long papamama bilong yu bai kam na kisim yu i go bek long ples , olsem na ating yu no laik tokim ol long ol hevi bilong yu .

translation.en: besides , they are miles away and may not know how to deal with such a situation in a foreign land .
translation.zu: na tu , ol i stap longwe tru na ating ol i no save long pasin bilong stretim ol kain hevi olsem long narapela kantri .

translation.en: the local congregation elders , however , may have experience in dealing with such problems and might be able to offer some practical advice .
translation.zu: tasol ating ol elda bilong kongrigesen bilong dispela hap ol i gat save long ol kain hevi olsem , na ol inap givim sampela gutpela tingting long yu .

translation.en: they may also be able to help you decide if this is a matter that should come to the attention of your parents .
translation.zu: na ol inap helpim yu long save , i gutpela yu kamapim dispela hevi long papamama bilong yu o nogat .

translation.en: of course , the time may come when you will have to return home .
translation.zu: ating bihain yu mas i go bek long ples bilong yu .

translation.en: andreas says : " with so many positive memories - negative ones are soon forgotten - it was very hard for me to leave . "
translation.zu: andreas i tok : " planti gutpela samting i bin painim mi , olsem na kwiktaim mi lusim tingting long ol samting nogut .

translation.en: in addition , do not irritate them with constant reminders of how things are done elsewhere .
translation.zu: na tu , yu no ken skrapim bel bilong ol na tokim ol planti taim long pasin na sindaun bilong ol man long narapela kantri .

translation.en: naturally , you will want to tell everybody your story , but don 't be frustrated if not everyone shares your excitement .
translation.zu: tru , yu laik stori long ol samting i bin painim yu , tasol yu no ken bel hevi sapos sampela ol i no amamas wantaim yu long ol dispela samting .

translation.en: clearly , the decision to live for a while in a foreign land is one that should be taken seriously .
translation.zu: tru tumas , sapos inap sampela hap taim yu laik go sindaun long narapela kantri yu mas tingting gut .

translation.en: if after discussing the matter with your parents , you decide that there are sound reasons to make the move , be prepared to cope with the challenges you will face .
translation.zu: taim yu toktok pinis long dispela samting wantaim papamama bilong yu , na yu ting i gat gutpela as na yu go sindaun long narapela kantri , orait redi long karim ol hevi .

translation.en: as with any big decision you face in life , it is wise to count the cost first . - luke 14 : 28 - 30 .
translation.zu: olsem long olgeta bikpela samting yu tingting long mekim long i stap bilong yu , em i savepasin long skelim na tingting gut pastaim long ol samting yu laik mekim . - luk 14 : 28 - 30 .

translation.en: pi " has fascinated the giants of science as well as amateurs around the world , " states the book fractals for the classroom .
translation.zu: wanpela buk ( fractals for the classroom ) , i tok pai " i bin kirapim tingting bilong ol saveman bilong saiens na ol man i traim dispela wok long olgeta hap . "

translation.en: in fact , pi is regarded by some as one of the five most significant numbers in mathematics .
translation.zu: i gat faipela namba i gat bikpela wok insait long wok bilong bungim ol namba , na sampela i ting namba pai em i wanpela bilong ol .

translation.en: pi represents the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter . you can figure out the circumference of any circle , regardless of its size , by multiplying its diameter by pi .
translation.zu: maski wanpela sekel ( olsem raunpela mak ) em i bikpela o liklik , yu inap kisim save long mak bilong raunpela bilong en ( sekamfrans ) taim yu save long braitpela bilong en ( daiamita ) na mekim wok long dispela namba em pai i makim , olsem : π x daiamita = sekamfrans .

translation.en: for many applications , using a value of 3.14159 for pi will be accurate enough .
translation.zu: long planti wok ol man i mekim , namba 3.14159 i stret long makim pai .

translation.en: but pi can never be calculated exactly .
translation.zu: tasol ol i no inap raitim stret tru dispela namba pai .

translation.en: when written as a decimal , it simply goes on and on .
translation.zu: long wanem , em i wanpela kain namba i no gat pinis bilong en .

translation.en: in fact , it can be calculated to an infinite number of decimal places .
translation.zu: tasol ol saveman bilong wok bilong bungim ol namba ol i wok yet long painim pinis bilong dispela namba .

translation.en: nevertheless , this has not deterred mathematicians from laboring tediously to calculate the value of pi to ever more decimal places .
translation.zu: ol i no save husat i bin kisim save pastaim olsem dispela namba pai i stap wankain , maski sekel i liklik o bikpela .

translation.en: it is not known who first realized that pi remains constant regardless of the size of the circle .
translation.zu: tasol kirap long bipo tru na i kam inap long nau ol man i bin wok long painim wanpela namba i makim stret dispela namba .

translation.en: the babylonians approximated pi as 3 1 / 8 ( 3.125 ) , and the egyptians , slightly less accurately , as about 3.16 .
translation.zu: ol man bilong babilon i bin raitim dispela namba olsem 3.125 na ol man bilong isip i bin raitim olsem 3.16 .

translation.en: in the third century b.c.e . , greek mathematician archimedes made perhaps the first scientific effort to compute it , arriving at a figure of about 3.14 .
translation.zu: wanpela saveman bilong ol grik , nem bilong em akemides ( 287 - 212 b.c.e . ) em i namba wan man bilong mekim wok long saiens bilong kisim namba stret bilong pai na em i kisim namba 3.14 .

translation.en: by the year 200 c.e . , it had been worked out to the equivalent of 3.1416 , a figure that chinese and indian mathematicians had independently confirmed by the early sixth century c.e .
translation.zu: i kam inap long yia 200 c.e . ol i makim dispela namba olsem 3.1416 , na ol saveman bilong saina na india ol i stap long yia 500 samting c.e . ol i wanbel long dispela namba .

translation.en: but as useful as pi has proved to be , notes fractals for the classroom , " it would be hard to find applications in scientific computing , where more than some 20 digits of [ pi ] are necessary . "
translation.zu: tasol dispela buk ( fractals for the classroom ) i tok , " long wok bilong ol saientis long bungim ol namba , i gat wok long namba pai i makim i go inap long 20 namba bihain long fulstop , na em tasol - i no gat wok long sampela namba moa . "

translation.en: pi shows up in formulas that are used in many fields - physics , electrical and electronic engineering , probability , structural design , and navigation , to name but a few .
translation.zu: ol i mekim wok long namba pai long kain kain wok bilong saiens , na wok ensinia , na wokim bun bilong ol haus na masin samting , na mekim wok long kompas samting bilong painim rot .

translation.en: just as there is no end to its digits , it seems that there is also no end to the number of practical applications for useful , elusive pi .
translation.zu: i no gat pinis bilong dispela namba , na tu i no gat pinis bilong wok ol inap mekim long dispela namba ol i kolim pai .

translation.en: the largest of all penguins , the emperor stands nearly four feet [ stands more than a meter ] tall and weighs up to 85 pounds [ 40 kg ] .
translation.zu: wanpela pisin ol i kolim empera pengwin , em i bikpela tru , winim olgeta narapela pengwin . longpela bilong en i winim wanpela mita na hevi bilong en i 40 kilo samting .

translation.en: why ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem ?

translation.en: amazingly , to have their young .
translation.zu: ol i go bilong karim pikinini bilong ol .

translation.en: when the female emperor lays her egg , the male quickly scoops it up off the ice and onto his feet .
translation.zu: taim meri pengwin i putim kiau , man pengwin i kisim kiau hariap long ais na putim antap long lek bilong en .

translation.en: he then tucks it under his brood pouch - a fold of skin on his lower abdomen .
translation.zu: em i putim kiau aninit long bikpela hap skin i stap daunbilo long bel bilong en .

translation.en: the female then heads for the open sea and food .
translation.zu: orait nau meri pengwin i kalap i go long solwara bilong painim kaikai .

translation.en: for 65 days , during the harshest of weather , the male incubates the egg while living off his body fat .
translation.zu: inap 65 de , taim ples i kol nogut tru , man pengwin i lukautim kiau na em i kisim strong long gris bilong skin bilong em yet .

translation.en: to preserve body heat while being raked with blizzards that may reach 120 miles [ 200 km ] per hour , these canny birds huddle together in large groups , each one taking its turn on the outside , with its back to the wind .
translation.zu: bilong skin bilong pengwin i no ken kol taim ol strongpela kolwin i raun inap 200 kilomita long wanpela aua , ol dispela pisin i gat save ol i pas pas olsem bikpela lain pisin . olgeta wan wan i gat taim bilong en long sanap long arere bilong lain pisin , na tanim baksait i go long hap em win i kam long en .

translation.en: with incredible timing , the egg hatches just when the female returns .
translation.zu: long taim stret , pikinini pengwin i brukim kiau taim mama i kam bek .

translation.en: but how does she find her mate among the thousands of look - alikes ?
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem mama inap painim poroman bilong en i stap namel long planti tausen pengwin i luk wankain stret ?

translation.en: by means of a song .
translation.zu: long rot bilong singsing .

translation.en: during their initial courtship , the pair sang to each other and committed each other 's rendition to memory .
translation.zu: taim tupela i bin poroman wantaim , narapela i singsing long narapela na tupela i tingim singsing narapela i bin mekim long narapela .

translation.en: when the females return , males and females sing with all their heart .
translation.zu: taim ol meri pengwin i kam bek , ol man na meri pengwin i givim bel long singsing .

translation.en: humans would be thoroughly confused by the cacophony , but the emperors soon find their mates .
translation.zu: bihain , man pengwin i givim nupela pikinini long meri pengwin , maski em i no laik mekim olsem .

translation.en: then , after reluctantly handing over the newly hatched chick , the near - starving male waddles and belly - slides across some 45 miles of ice in his quest for open water and food .
translation.zu: man pengwin i hangre nogut tru na em i wokabaut long lek na long bel bilong em inap 70 kilomita antap long ais i wel bilong painim solwara na kaikai .

translation.en: " children learn self - respect and self - control by receiving both love and discipline from parents , " says a report in the gazette , a montreal , canada , newspaper .
translation.zu: wanpela ripot bilong nius the gazette bilong montriol , kanada , i tok : " ol pikinini i lainim pasin bilong amamas long ol yet na bosim skin bilong ol taim papamama i laikim ol na wok long stretim ol . "

translation.en: what does this involve ?
translation.zu: wanem samting i insait long dispela wok ?

translation.en: lalinec , who works with children and families , also notes that " when we prevent children from experiencing the consequences of their actions , we also prevent much of their learning . "
translation.zu: lalinec i save wok wantaim ol pikinini na ol famili , em i tok tu olsem , " taim yumi pasim ol pikinini long karim ol hevi em pasin bikhet bilong ol yet i kamapim , yumi pasim ol tu long lainim planti samting . "

translation.en: this sends a clear message to children about parental rules and expectations - that people ' will reap what they sow . '
translation.zu: dispela bai kamapim klia long ol pikinini olsem i gat lo bilong papamama na ol i mas bihainim - na kaikai ol man i planim " dispela kain kaikai tasol " bai ol i kamautim .

translation.en: the desired objective of loving and effective discipline is for children to learn to comply with rules and to tolerate frustration and delayed gratification so that they can develop qualities that they need in order to grow into well - adjusted , responsible adults .
translation.zu: ol papamama i laik tru bai pasin bilong ol long sori long ol pikinini na stretim gut ol i helpim ol pikinini long lain long bihainim ol lo , na long ol i no ken les kwik , na ol i wet pastaim na bihain inapim laik bilong ol .

translation.en: more advice about what god says to parents about disciplining their children with love is found in the book the secret of family happiness .
translation.zu: dispela bai helpim ol long kisim ol gutpela pasin ol i mas i gat bilong kamap gutpela man bilong tingim gut ol wok samting em i mas mekim .

translation.en: " no history can give us an idea so exact of the vicissitudes of a people , of their social organization and their beliefs and feelings , as an analysis of their language . " - martín alonso .
translation.zu: " i gat wanpela gutpela rot long save long ol gutpela samting na ol samting nogut i bin painim wanpela lain , na long kisim save long ol pasin ol i bihainim , na ol bilip na tingting bilong ol , em long rot bilong skelim gut tok ples bilong ol . " - martín alonso .

translation.en: at the present time , some linguists estimate that about 6,000 or more languages are spoken in the world , not including local dialects .
translation.zu: long nau sampela man bilong skelim ol tok ples i tok , long graun olgeta i gat 6,000 tok ples .

translation.en: by far , the most widely spoken language is mandarin chinese , with more than 800 million speakers .
translation.zu: tok saina , em 800 milion manmeri i save mekim , i winim tru ol narapela tok ples .

translation.en: the next four most spoken languages , not necessarily in this order , are english , spanish , hindi , and bengali .
translation.zu: fopela narapela bikpela tok ples em tok inglis , spen , hindi , na bengali .

translation.en: what happens when different cultures and , of course , their languages suddenly come into contact with one another ?
translation.zu: wanem samting i save kamap taim wanpela lain i gat narapela tok ples wantu ol i bungim wanpela lain i gat narapela tok ples ?

translation.en: pidgins , creoles , and lingua francas
translation.zu: ol tok pisin , na ol tok kriol samting

translation.en: so they began using a reduced , or simplified , form of language .
translation.zu: olsem na ol i kirap mekim wok long sampela tok i no hatwok long kisim save long en .

translation.en: in this way pidgins were created .
translation.zu: long dispela rot ol tok pisin i bin kamap .

translation.en: pidgin , as reduced as it may be , is a language with its own linguistic system .
translation.zu: maski wanpela tok pisin i no gat planti narapela narapela tok bilong en , em i wanpela tok ples i gat ol lo bilong en .

translation.en: creoles , as opposed to pidgins , express the culture of a people .
translation.zu: ol tok kriol i save kamapim pasin bilong wanpela lain .

translation.en: some have even become prominent languages within a country , such as tok pisin in papua new guinea and bislama in vanuatu .
translation.zu: sampela bilong ol i bin kamap bikpela insait long wanpela kantri , olsem tok pisin long papua niugini na tok bislama long vanuatu .

translation.en: in the central african republic , for instance , speakers of various local languages can communicate by means of sango .
translation.zu: long ripablik bilong sentral afrika ol man i gat tok ples bilong ol yet tasol ol i mekim wok long tok sango bilong toktok wantaim .

translation.en: pidgins are lingua francas , and creoles can be also .
translation.zu: yumi ken tok , ol tok pisin na tok kriol tu em kain tok ples olsem .

translation.en: in different regions inside a country , local varieties of the national language may be used , which are called dialects .
translation.zu: long sampela hap insait long wanpela kantri ol man i mekim tok ples bilong kantri , tasol ol i tanim liklik , na ol i kolim dispela olsem wanpela dailek .

translation.en: in time , some dialects become so different from the original language of the area that they become another language .
translation.zu: sampela taim wanpela dailek i kamap narapela kain olgeta na klostu i no wankain liklik long tok ples i as bilong en .

translation.en: in some cases it is not easy for linguists to distinguish between a language and a dialect .
translation.zu: taim kain samting i kamap , nau dispela dailek i kamap wanpela tok ples tru tru .

translation.en: we may also learn from language that no one group of people is superior to another , for there is no such thing as an inferior language .
translation.zu: na tu yumi kisim save olsem wanpela lain i no winim narapela lain , long wanem , olgeta tok ples i gat ol lo na pasin bilong ol yet .

translation.en: just as with other divine gifts , language is equally available to all people , no matter what their culture or the place where they live .
translation.zu: olsem ol narapela presen god i givim ol , olgeta lain inap mekim wok long dispela presen , maski ol i stap we o bihainim wanem kain pasin bilong ples .

translation.en: each one of them is worthy of respect , regardless of how many people use it .
translation.zu: yumi mas tingim olgeta wan wan tok ples i gutpela samting , maski hamas manmeri i mekim wok long en .

translation.en: for instance , through its many words of arabic origin , spanish , considered a modified version of latin , retains a record of the eighth - century muslim conquest of spanish territory .
translation.zu: tok spen i bin kamap long rot bilong tok latin , tasol i gat planti tok arabik i stap insait long en , long wanem , long yia 711 samting ol muslim i bin pait na kisim hap graun bilong spen .

translation.en: the influence of greek , french , english , and other languages on spanish can also be traced .
translation.zu: na i gat sampela hap tok grik , frans , inglis , na sampela tok ples moa i stap insait long tok spen .

translation.en: moreover , in the spanish spoken in america , traces remain of the ancient inhabitants of the continent .
translation.zu: na tu , long tok spen ol i mekim long amerika i gat sampela hap tok ol i bin kisim long ol asples bilong bipo yet .

translation.en: for example , spanish there contains many words from the nahuatl language of aztec central america .
translation.zu: olsem : tok spen long dispela hap i kisim planti tok bilong ol astek bilong sentral amerika , ol i kolim nahuatl .

translation.en: just as a mother tongue identifies individuals with a certain nation and even with a region , language usage can identify people with a group , such as a profession , a trade , cultural and sports groups , or even criminal organizations .
translation.zu: yu inap harim tok ples bilong man na save em i bilong wanem kantri o wanem hap bilong wanpela kantri , na tu sampela kain tok ol man i mekim inap makim olsem em i bilong wanpela lain , olsem em i mekim wanpela kain wok , o em i insait long wanpela lain bilong amamas o pilai spot o wanpela lain raskol .

translation.en: the list is practically endless . linguists call these special variations jargon or slang or sometimes even a dialect .
translation.zu: ol man i skelim ol tok ples i save kolim ol dispela kain tok olsem tok bilong ol manki bilong rot , o sampela taim wanpela dailek .

translation.en: it can become a wall that adds to the divisions between people .
translation.zu: em inap kamap olsem wanpela banis i brukim ol man . ol tok ples long bihain

translation.en: on one hand , the modern tendency is toward breaking down linguistic walls , primarily on account of mass media .
translation.zu: as na ol i laik mekim olsem , em save ol inap kisim long rot bilong ol niuspepa , nius , televisen , na intenet .

translation.en: according to the encyclopædia britannica , english is now spoken as a primary or a secondary language by 1 person in 7 .
translation.zu: olsem na wanpela buk ( encyclopædia britannica ) i tok , tok inglis em i namba wan o namba tu tok ples bilong 14 pesen bilong olgeta manmeri .

translation.en: thus , it is the most widely used lingua franca in the world .
translation.zu: olsem na em i namba wan tok ol man i mekim wok long en .

translation.en: people 's use of it has allowed for wider communication and the exchange of beneficial information .
translation.zu: long dispela rot ol inap toktok wantaim planti manmeri moa , na ol inap na kisim na givim sampela gutpela save bilong helpim ol narapela .

translation.en: on the other hand , linguistic walls have contributed to division , hatred , and war .
translation.zu: tasol pasin bilong mekim narapela narapela tok ples i bin helpim pasin bilong brukim lain , na birua , na pait .

translation.en: the world book encyclopedia states : " if all peoples spoke the same tongue , . . . goodwill would increase between countries . "
translation.zu: wanpela buk ( the world book encyclopedia ) i tok : " sapos olgeta manmeri i mekim wanpela tok ples tasol , . . . pasin bilong belgut long man bilong narapela kantri bai kamap strong moa . "

translation.en: of course , such goodwill would require a much more profound change than the mere use of a lingua franca .
translation.zu: tasol kain pasin bilong belgut i no inap kamap long rot bilong mekim wok long wanpela tok ples em planti lain inap mekim .

translation.en: only the wise creator of language could cause all people to speak one language .
translation.zu: man bilong kamapim pasin bilong mekim tok ples , em tasol inap kirapim olgeta manmeri long mekim wanpela tok ples tasol .

translation.en: the bible , god 's main means of communication with humans , clearly shows that soon god will eliminate this present wicked system of things and replace it with a government ruling from heaven - his kingdom .
translation.zu: baibel , em namba wan rot bilong god long toktok wantaim ol man , em i kamapim klia olsem klostu nau god bai pinisim pasin nogut i stap long graun , na wanpela gavman , em kingdom bilong em i stap long heven , bai kisim ples bilong en .

translation.en: that government will unite all mankind in a peaceful , righteous new system of things here on earth . - matthew 6 : 9 , 10 ; 2 peter 3 : 10 - 13 .
translation.zu: ( daniel 2 : 44 ) dispela gavman bai kamapim nupela taim i gat pasin wanbel na bel isi na stretpela pasin namel long ol man hia long graun . - matyu 6 : 9 , 10 ; 2 pita 3 : 10 - 13 .

translation.en: thus , it would seem logical that in his new world , god would further unite mankind by providing all peoples with one common language , reversing what he did at babel .
translation.zu: ( sefanaia 3 : 9 ) olsem na long nupela taim god bai kamapim , ating god bai givim wanpela tok ples tasol long olgeta manmeri bilong helpim ol long stap wanbel moa yet , na dispela bai senisim samting i bin kamap long taun babel .

translation.en: the origin of languages
translation.zu: as bilong olgeta tok ples

translation.en: about the 20th century b.c.e . , contrary to god 's command to spread out and " fill the earth , " humans made an effort to control all society at the plains of shinar , in mesopotamia , and began building the religious tower of babel .
translation.zu: klostu long yia 2000 b.c.e . long hap bilong babilonia long mesopotemia , ol man i sakim tok bilong god long i go sindaun long olgeta hap bilong graun na kamap planti , na ol i laik bai olgeta man i mas i stap wanpela lain , na ol i kirap wokim taua bilong babel bilong lotu long en .

translation.en: language diversity originated when god confused their common language , thwarting their dangerous and hurtful plans . - genesis 1 : 28 ; 11 : 1 - 9 .
translation.zu: ol kain kain tok ples i kamap taim god i paulim dispela wanpela tok ples bilong ol , na dispela i pasim ol long kamapim ol samting nogut ol i laik mekim . - stat 1 : 28 ; 11 : 1 - 9 .

translation.en: the bible record does not say that all languages descended from the original one .
translation.zu: baibel i no tok olgeta tok ples i kamap long dispela namba wan tok ples .

translation.en: at shinar , god introduced many new vocabularies and thought patterns , resulting in a variety of languages .
translation.zu: long babilonia , god i givim planti nupela tok na pasin bilong tingting long ol man , na dispela i mekim na planti nupela tok ples i bin kamap .

translation.en: thus , efforts to trace a parent language from which all others developed have been in vain .
translation.zu: olsem na ol man i no inap painim wanpela tok ples em i as bilong olgeta narapela tok ples .

translation.en: at babel , god confused the language of rebellious humans
translation.zu: long babel , god i bin paulim tok ples bilong ol bikhetman

translation.en: in her book on children and death , dr . elisabeth kübler - ross states : " many , many adults suffer from never having resolved the hurts of their childhood .
translation.zu: long buk bilong em ( on children and death ) , dokta elisabeth kübler - ross i tok : " planti manmeri i no bin pinisim sampela bel hevi bilong ol taim ol i stap pikinini yet , na inap long nau ol i karim bikpela hevi long dispela samting .

translation.en: so children need to be allowed to grieve without being labeled crybaby or sissy , or hearing the ridiculous statement ' big boys don 't cry . ' "
translation.zu: olsem na ol narapela i mas larim ol pikinini i pinisim krai bilong ol na ol i no ken sutim tok long pikinini olsem em i bebi yet o mekim tok kranki long ol olsem ' ol bikpela manki i no save krai . '

translation.en: a funeral director 's experience
translation.zu: man bilong lukautim wok bilong planim man

translation.en: when i started in this profession back in the 1950 ' s , we had a lot of first - generation italian families in our area .
translation.zu: long 1950 taim mi kirap na mekim dispela wok , i gat planti ol famili bilong itali i bin kam long amerika .

translation.en: all his sons and daughters came to comfort him , but he refused to be comforted .
translation.zu: olgeta pikinini man na pikinini meri bilong em , ol i kam bilong mekim bel bilong em kamap gutpela gen .

translation.en: and his father wept for him . "
translation.zu: olsem na jekop i krai i stap . "

translation.en: different culture , different reaction
translation.zu: narapela kantri i gat narapela pasin

translation.en: for example , in many parts of nigeria , although families tend to have many children and death is a constant visitor because of various sicknesses , " there is an outpouring of grief when a child dies , especially if it is the first child and more so if it is a boy , " stated a writer with 20 years of experience in africa .
translation.zu: olsem : long planti hap bilong naijiria , maski ol papamama i save kamapim planti pikinini na planti ol i save dai long kain kain sik , " i gat bikpela krai tru i save kamap taim wanpela pikinini i dai , na krai i bikpela moa yet sapos em namba wan pikinini bilong famili o sapos em pikinini man i dai . " em tok bilong wanpela man bilong raitim ol buk na em i bin stap long afrika inap 20 yia .

translation.en: greetings are not limited to a handshake ; they include a warm embrace .
translation.zu: taim ol i bungim man , ol i no save sekan tasol , narapela i holim narapela .

translation.en: the honest gut emotion of cleansing the soul with tears of grief is akin to lancing a wound to drain the infection . "
translation.zu: pasin bilong krai sori bilong autim ol samting ol i pilim long bel , em i kain olsem pasin bilong katim buk bilong rausim susu na pinisim pen bilong en . "

translation.en: but it is not to be considered a sign of weakness to grieve and give way to tears .
translation.zu: tasol yumi no ken ting pasin bilong krai sori i makim olsem man i no gat bun , nogat .

translation.en: even jesus christ " gave way to tears " over the death of his friend lazarus , although jesus knew that he would shortly resurrect him . - john 11 : 35 .
translation.zu: " jisas i krai " taim pren bilong em lasarus i dai , maski jisas i save liklik taim em bai kirapim bek lasarus . - jon 11 : 35 .

translation.en: flying creatures of the deep
translation.zu: samting i flai insait long solwara

translation.en: they can be found in the depths of the oceans , whether cold or warm , and even in some lakes and rivers .
translation.zu: ol i save stap long olgeta hap bilong solwara , maski wara i hat liklik o wara i kol , na sampela taim yu ken lukim ol long sampela raunwara na wara i ran .

translation.en: what are they ?
translation.zu: em wanem samting ?

translation.en: they are members of the ray family , creatures of the deep that appear to fly !
translation.zu: em wanpela samting ol i kolim par , na i olsem ol i save flai insait long ol hap bilong solwara !

translation.en: you don 't have to be a deep - sea diver or a fisherman to enjoy the flying beauty of the ray , and you don 't have to be in the water either .
translation.zu: i no olsem yu mas stap man bilong kisim pis o go long biksolwara na kalap i go daun tru bilong kisim amamas long lukim wanpela par i flai ; yu inap lukim wanpela maski yu no stap insait long wara .

translation.en: there are several hundred species of rays , ranging in size from a few inches to many feet .
translation.zu: i gat planti ol narapela narapela kain par , sampela i liklik olsem sampela sentimita tasol , na sampela i bikpela olsem sampela mita .

translation.en: you can see their resemblance to their relative the shark .
translation.zu: yu inap luksave olsem ol par i wanlain bilong ol sak .

translation.en: among the best known are the stingrays , which have a boneless body made of cartilage , with a fin on each side that extends from the head to the base of the tail .
translation.zu: planti man i save long dispela par i gat nil long tel bilong en , na i no gat bun i stap long bodi bilong en , na wing bilong en i kirap long het bilong en na i go inap long tel bilong en .

translation.en: their flattened bodies offer very little resistance to the water .
translation.zu: bodi bilong ol i slip stret , olsem na ol i ken raun hariap long wara .

translation.en: wavelike movements of their fins give them the power to glide through the sea as if flying effortlessly .
translation.zu: wok bilong wing bilong ol i mekim na ol i save raun gut tru insait long solwara , i olsem ol i no gat hatwok liklik .

translation.en: when not swimming , rays will lie hidden on the sandy bottom .
translation.zu: taim ol i no raun , ol i hait i stap long wesan long as bilong solwara .

translation.en: the eyes of stingrays are on the top of their head , while their mouth is underneath .
translation.zu: ai bilong ol par i stap antap long het bilong ol , na maus bilong ol i stap aninit .

translation.en: they have hard teeth and a strong jaw , which enables them to tear into shells .
translation.zu: ol i gat strongpela tit na maus , na dispela i save helpim ol long brukim skin bilong ol gam samting .

translation.en: the tail is capable of inflicting a painful , poisonous stab if the ray is stepped on , mishandled , or threatened by enemies .
translation.zu: ol nil inap givim bikpela pen na sutim marasin nogut long birua , o long man i krungutim , o holim kranki .

translation.en: the spines frequently break off deep in the wound , making them hard to remove , and they can cause serious infection if the wound is not treated properly .
translation.zu: planti taim ol nil i save bruk na stap insait long skin , na i hatwok long rausim , na man inap kisim bikpela sik o bagarap sapos em i no stretim gut hap em nil i bin sutim em .

translation.en: if you are ever stung by a ray , wash the area thoroughly with water - seawater if necessary .
translation.zu: sapos nil bilong par i sutim yu , wasim gut dispela hap long wara - sapos wara i no stap klostu , orait wasim long solwara .

translation.en: as soon as possible , soak the wound in hot water , as hot as you can tolerate .
translation.zu: taim yu wasim pinis , orait dispela hap bilong skin em nil i sutim , putim hariap long wara i hat tru .

translation.en: hot water destroys the venom and relieves the pain .
translation.zu: wara i hat i save pinisim strong bilong marasin nogut na daunim pen .

translation.en: then get to a doctor without delay .
translation.zu: orait nau yu mas i go hariap long dokta .

translation.en: bart , mentioned at the beginning of the article , found stingrays quite friendly when he and his wife swam with them in the cayman islands at a local spot known to be a feeding area for friendly rays .
translation.zu: bart , em mipela stori pinis long em , i subim wara wantaim meri bilong em long wanpela hap bilong ol ailan keiman ol par i save kam long en bilong kisim kaikai , na ol par i stap isi namel long ol manmeri .

translation.en: he reports : " we were kneeling on the bottom , in about 15 feet [ 5 m ] of water .
translation.zu: em i tok : " mipela stap long as bilong solwara i go daun inap long 5 - pela mita .

translation.en: when we began feeding them , the stingrays besieged us !
translation.zu: na taim mipela givim kaikai long sampela par , planti ol i kam na banisim mipela !

translation.en: there were probably 30 or 40 stingrays of all sizes surrounding our party .
translation.zu: ating i gat 30 o 40 i subim wara namel long mipela , sampela i bikpela na sampela i liklik .

translation.en: searching for food , the rays started at our knees and went up our fronts and backs and over our heads , gently swimming along and nudging us for even a tiny bit of food .
translation.zu: bilong painim kaikai ol i kam klostu tru long mipela na sekim mipela gut tru , olsem ol i kirap skelim skin bilong mipela , kirap long skru bilong lek na i go antap long het na i go daun long baksait na ol i subim mipela liklik bilong kisim liklik hap kaikai .

translation.en: it was astonishing how docile these beautiful creatures were .
translation.zu: mipela kirap nogut long pasin isi bilong ol dispela naispela animal tru .

translation.en: they even let us rub their stomachs as they went over us . "
translation.zu: ol i larim mipela i putim han long bel bilong ol taim ol i kam klostu . "

translation.en: bart mentioned that these rays have become so tame that in all the years that people have been swimming with them , there have been no recorded attacks .
translation.zu: bart i tok ol dispela par i kisim pasin isi tru na inap planti yia pinis ol man i subim wara namel long ol na i no gat wanpela stori i kamap olsem ol par i bin sutim wanpela .

translation.en: says ron hardy , owner of gulf world , in panama city , florida : " one of the best examples of the power of displaying live animals is our stingray petting pool .
translation.zu: long panama siti long florida , wanpela ples bilong lukautim ol pis samting em bilong ron hardy , na em i tok olsem : " long hap mipela putim ol par long en yu inap lukim pasin bilong holim skin bilong ol i senisim tingting bilong man .

translation.en: people seem to have a fear of stingrays - almost a phobia - but you should see their opinion change as they learn the facts from our narration !
translation.zu: ol man i save pret long ol par - sampela i save pret nogut tru - tasol tingting bilong ol i senis taim ol i harim stori bilong mipela na kisim stretpela save long pasin bilong ol par .

translation.en: however , remember that they often conceal themselves on the sandy bottom of shallow , warm waters .
translation.zu: tasol i gat wanpela toksave : tingim pasin bilong par long hait long wesan long as bilong solwara i hat liklik na i no daun tumas .

translation.en: so while wading in such places , shuffle your feet instead of lifting them .
translation.zu: long dispela rot yu bai helpim ol par long save olsem wanpela samting i kam .

translation.en: in this way you will warn the rays of your approach and thus avoid stepping on a ray and perhaps feeling the sting of this beautiful flying creature of the deep .
translation.zu: na bai yu no krungutim wanpela na kisim pen bilong nil bilong dispela naispela animal i save flai insait long solwara .

translation.en: the bible 's viewpoint
translation.zu: baibel i tok wanem ?

translation.en: body decoration - the need for reasonableness
translation.zu: bilasim skin - yumi mas bihainim gutpela tingting

translation.en: certainly , reason has had little to do with many of the things humans have done to themselves for vanity 's sake over the centuries .
translation.zu: tru , insait long planti handet yia i kam inap long nau , gutpela tingting i no bosim planti samting ol manmeri i mekim bilong bilasim skin .

translation.en: some claimed to have waists as tiny as 13 inches [ 325 mm ] .
translation.zu: sampela i tok bel bilong ol i liklik tru olsem 32.5 sentimita .

translation.en: some women were so constricted by their corsets that their ribs were actually pushed into their livers , causing death .
translation.zu: sampela meri i bin taitim laplap strong tumas na bun bilong banis i sutim lewa bilong ol na ol i dai .

translation.en: while that fashion fad has mercifully died out , the vanity that produced it is as much in evidence today as it was then .
translation.zu: gutpela tru dispela pasin i pinis , tasol dispela tingting i bin kirapim ol long mekim dispela samting , em i stap yet .

translation.en: for example , tattoo and piercing parlors , once the haunt of the less savory elements of society , are springing up in shopping malls and suburbs .
translation.zu: olsem bipo long ol hap ol hambakman i save raun long en , i gat ol bisnis bilong wokim tatu o sutim hul long kain kain hap bilong bodi .

translation.en: in fact , in a recent year , tattooing was the sixth - fastest - growing retail business in the united states .
translation.zu: tasol long nau ol dispela kain bisnis i wok long kamap long ol hap olgeta manmeri i save raun long en .

translation.en: extensive piercing of body parts - including nipples , noses , tongues , and even genitals - is increasingly popular .
translation.zu: pasin bilong mekim ol narapela kain samting tru long skin i wok long kamap bikpela moa , na em samting planti ol yangpela i laikim .

translation.en: an ancient practice
translation.zu: pasin bilong bipo tru

translation.en: in certain parts of africa , ritual scarification and tattooing have been used for centuries to identify specific family groups or tribes .
translation.zu: inap planti handet yia samting long sampela hap bilong afrika , ol i katkatim skin bilong wokim ol makmak o wokim tatu bilong makim ol i bilong wanem wanem lain .

translation.en: interestingly , in many of these lands , such practices are now viewed with disfavor and are on the decline .
translation.zu: tasol long kantri ol man i bin bihainim dispela pasin , ol i no save laikim tumas long nau , na planti ol i no save wokim moa .

translation.en: they were most often practiced by pagan nations in connection with their religion .
translation.zu: planti taim em ol haiden i save mekim bilong bihainim bilip bilong ol .

translation.en: understandably , jehovah forbade his people , the jews , to imitate those pagans .
translation.zu: olsem na jehova i bin tambuim lain bilong em , em ol juda , long bihainim dispela pasin bilong ol haiden .

translation.en: christians are not under the mosaic law , although it sets out certain principles that were carried over to the christian congregation .
translation.zu: lo bilong moses i no bosim ol kristen , tasol kongrigesen kristen i gat wok yet long bihainim as tingting bilong dispela lo .

translation.en: they can thus express themselves within the bounds of propriety when it comes to the type of adornment they choose to wear .
translation.zu: olsem na ol i ken bihainim stretpela pasin na makim ol bilas ol i laik pasim .

translation.en: however , this freedom is not without limits . - 1 peter 2 : 16 .
translation.zu: tasol i no olsem i no gat samting i bosim ol kristen long pasin bilong bilas . - 1 pita 2 : 16 .

translation.en: paul wrote , at 1 corinthians 6 : 12 : " all things are lawful for me ; but not all things are advantageous . "
translation.zu: long 1 korin 6 : 12 , pol i tok : " olgeta samting i orait long mi mekim .

translation.en: paul understood that his freedom as a christian did not give him license to do whatever he wanted without consideration for others .
translation.zu: dispela tok em i tru , tasol i no olgeta samting i save helpim yu long i stap gut . "

translation.en: his selfless viewpoint serves as an excellent example to any christian contemplating some form of body decoration .

translation.en: one of the mandates for christians is to preach and teach the good news .
translation.zu: wanpela samting god i tokim ol kristen long mekim , em wok bilong autim tok na skulim ol narapela long gutnius bilong kingdom .

translation.en: a christian would not want to let anything , including his appearance , distract others from listening to that message . - 2 corinthians 4 : 2 .
translation.zu: ol kristen i no laik mekim sampela pasin bilong bilasim skin o narapela samting i pulim tingting bilong wanpela man na em i no inap givim bel long harim tok bilong gutnius . - 2 korin 4 : 2 .

translation.en: while such decorations as piercings or tattoos may be popular among some people , a christian needs to ask himself or herself , ' what kind of a reaction would such a decoration provoke in the area where i live ?
translation.zu: tru , sampela i save laikim dispela bilaspasin bilong tatu o sutim skin bilong pasim bilas , tasol man o meri kristen i mas givim askim long em yet olsem : ' ol manmeri i stap long hap bilong mi ol bai i gat wanem tingting long pasin mi laik bihainim bilong bilasim skin ? olsem wanem ?

translation.en: even if my conscience were to allow it , what effect would my piercing or tattoo have on others within the congregation ?
translation.zu: maski bel bilong mi i no gat tok , pasin bilong mi long sutim hul long skin bilong pasim bilas o kisim wanpela tatu , dispela bai mekim wanem long ol narapela long kongrigesen ?

translation.en: certain types of body modifications carry serious medical risks .
translation.zu: sampela pasin bilong putim ol mak samting long skin inap bagarapim man .

translation.en: for example , depending on the size and the color , a tattoo can take several expensive and painful laser sessions to remove .
translation.zu: bilong rausim wanpela tatu , man i mas tromoi bikpela mani na em bai kisim bikpela pen tu .

translation.en: but one who seeks to please god recognizes that becoming a christian involves the offering of oneself to god .
translation.zu: tasol man i laik amamasim god , em bai save olsem pasin bilong kamap wanpela kristen i makim olsem man i mas givim em yet long god .

translation.en: hence , mature christians do not view their bodies as their exclusive property to be damaged or defaced at will .
translation.zu: olsem na ol strongpela kristen i no gat tingting olsem em bodi bilong ol yet tasol na ol i ken bagarapim long laik bilong ol .

translation.en: especially those who qualify to take the lead in the congregation are known for their moderate habits , soundness of mind , and reasonableness . - 1 timothy 3 : 2 , 3 .
translation.zu: na ol lain i winim mak bilong mekim ol wok bilong helpim kongrigesen , ol i gat nem olsem ol man bilong mekim ol samting long skel tasol na ol i save tingting stret na bihainim gutpela tingting . - 1 timoti 3 : 2 , 3 .

translation.en: developing and exercising the bible - trained power of reason will help christians avoid the extreme , masochistic practices of this world , which is so hopelessly " alienated from the life that belongs to god . "
translation.zu: pasin bilong kisim na bihainim ol gutpela tingting i kam long baibel bai helpim ol kristen long sakim ol pasin i narapela kain tru , na amamas bilong kisim pen na bagarapim skin , em pasin bilong ol manmeri bilong dispela graun , em ol i stap " ausait long laip bilong god . "
