translation.en: what would we do without sugar ?
translation.zu: sapos yumi no gat suga , bai yumi mekim wanem ?

translation.en: it would be an exaggeration to say that the world would come to a stop - but many a diet would need to be changed dramatically if sugar were to disappear .
translation.zu: i no olsem ol samting bilong graun bai bagarap , tasol sapos i no gat suga , pasin bilong planti man long kaikai bai i gat bikpela senis long en .

translation.en: yes , today in most parts of the world , sugar intake has become part of daily life , making sugar production a worldwide industry .
translation.zu: long nau , long planti hap bilong graun ol man i save kaikai sampela suga long olgeta de , na dispela i mekim na pasin bilong wokim suga em wanpela bisnis i stap long olgeta hap .

translation.en: millions of people , from cuba to india and from brazil to africa , grow and harvest sugarcane .
translation.zu: planti milion manmeri long ol kantri olsem kuba , india , brasil , afrika , na planti hap moa ol i save planim suga .

translation.en: in fact , at one time sugar production reigned supreme as the world 's largest and most lucrative industry .
translation.zu: bipo , bisnis bilong wokim suga i nambawan bikpela bisnis ol i kisim bikpela mani long en long olgeta hap bilong graun .

translation.en: it could be said that sugarcane has molded the world in a way that few other plants have .
translation.zu: yumi inap tok olsem suga i mekim bikpela samting long olgeta hap na i winim planti narapela samting i save kru long graun .

translation.en: then join us on a visit to a region in queensland , australia , where sugarcane is grown .
translation.zu: orait kam wantaim mipela long hap bilong kwinslan , ostrelia , em ol i save planim suga long en .

translation.en: a visit to sugarcane country
translation.zu: long hap ol i save planim suga

translation.en: a large machine resembling a wheat harvester is slowly moving through the tall crop of sugarcane , chopping the stalks in the harvesting process and depositing the cut cane into a trailer moving alongside .
translation.zu: dispela masin i save katim stik bilong suga na bihain putim i go long wanpela trela em ka i pulim arere long masin .

translation.en: sugar juice soon oozes from the severed cane , and a sweet , musty smell wafts through the air .
translation.zu: liklik wara i lus long stik suga ol i katim , na gutpela smel bilong en i kamap long win .

translation.en: the precious juice from this remarkable grass has begun its journey from the field to the sugar bowl on your table .
translation.zu: nau ol bai i kisim dispela stik suga i go long faktori na wokim i kamap olsem dispela suga i stap long haus bilong yu .

translation.en: not so long ago , the cane was cut laboriously by hand here in australia as it still is in many countries where sugarcane is harvested .
translation.zu: long ostrelia , i no longtaim i go pinis ol i bin katim ol stik suga long naip olsem ol i save mekim yet long planti narapela kantri i gat ol gaden suga .

translation.en: workers are cutting cane by hand .
translation.zu: ol wokman i katim stik suga long naip .

translation.en: a row of sweating cane cutters slowly advance through the field of sugarcane .
translation.zu: ol i tuhat pinis taim ol i bihainim lain na wok long katim suga i karamapim bikpela hap .

translation.en: with almost military precision , the workers gather clusters of upright cane stalks with one arm and then pull them firmly to one side to expose their common base .
translation.zu: olgeta i bihainim wankain pasin long mekim dispela wok , long wanpela han ol i save holim ol stik suga i kru long wanpela as na long narapela han ol i katim .

translation.en: swish , chop ! swish , chop !
translation.zu: ol i mekim olsem i go i go .

translation.en: tossing them aside into neat rows , they move on to the next stool , or cluster , of cane .
translation.zu: ol i tromoi ol stik suga long graun na ol i lainim gut , na bihain ol i kirap na katim narapela lain suga .

translation.en: australia 's sugarcane country consists primarily of a coastal strip about 1,300 miles [ 2,100 km ] long that , for the most part , runs parallel to the famous great barrier reef .
translation.zu: bikpela hap bilong ol gaden suga long ostrelia i bihainim nambis i go i go inap long 2,100 kilomita , na bikpela rip bilong ostrelia i stap long dispela hap .

translation.en: ( see the article " a visit to the great barrier reef , " in the june 8 , 1991 , issue of awake ! )
translation.zu: ( lukim stori long kirap ! , tok inglis , bilong jun 8 , 1991 , " a visit to the great barrier reef . " )

translation.en: the year - round warm , humid climate here allows sugarcane to thrive , and about 6,500 growers live mainly on small family farms that lie scattered along the coast like bunches of grapes on a vine .
translation.zu: kol i no save kam long dispela hap , olsem na suga i save kamap gut tru . na klostu 6,500 man bilong planim ol gaden suga i save sindaun long ol fam bilong ol yet long dispela hap .

translation.en: after a long drive , we see in the distance the sugar city of bundaberg , on queensland 's central coast .
translation.zu: mipela raun longpela taim pinis long ka na kamap long taun bandabek , em hap i gat planti gaden suga long en na i stap long nambis bilong kwinslan .

translation.en: as we descend a small hill , a breathtaking panorama greets us - as far as the eye can see is a sea of waving sugarcane !
translation.zu: taim ka i wok long go daun long wanpela liklik maunten , mipela lukim naispela hap tru . long olgeta hap mipela lukim suga i meknais long win !

translation.en: and what variety in color !
translation.zu: na i gat ol kain kain kala tu !

translation.en: july is the coolest month of the year , and the harvesting and crushing season has just begun .
translation.zu: sampela hap i grinpela , sampela i lait olsem gol , na ol gaden i stap nating o nau tasol ol i katim , em i stap olsem braunpela .

translation.en: now we are eager to visit a sugar mill to see what happens to the harvested sugarcane .
translation.zu: i go inap long mun disemba ol bai katim wanem wanem gaden suga i redi pinis .

translation.en: but it is suggested that before we do that , we learn something of sugarcane itself .
translation.zu: nau mipela gat bikpela laik tru long go long faktori bilong wokim suga na lukim ol samting ol i save mekim long ol stik suga .

translation.en: so we decide to make our first stop at a sugar experiment station set up in the region .
translation.zu: tasol wanpela i tokim mipela long kisim sampela save long dispela stik suga pastaim , na bihain mipela i ken go long faktori .

translation.en: at the sugar research station , an obliging agronomist is happy to teach us something about sugarcane itself and explain how it is grown .
translation.zu: long dispela hap wanpela saientis i amamas long skulim mipela long dispela stik suga na pasin bilong planim .

translation.en: originally found in the rain forests of southeast asia and new guinea , sugarcane is a giant of the grass family , which includes members as varied as lawn grass , cereal grains , and woody bamboos .
translation.zu: pastaim tru suga i bin kamap long ol bikbus bilong saut - is esia na niugini . suga em wanpela kain gras i bikpela tru ; stik suga , gras i raunim haus , wit na rais samting , na mambu , olgeta dispela samting i narapela narapela kain gras tasol .

translation.en: all these plants manufacture sugar in their leaves through the process of photosynthesis .
translation.zu: olgeta dispela samting i save kamapim suga long lip bilong ol taim san i holim , em i olsem fotosintesis .

translation.en: yet , sugarcane differs in that it does so in prodigious amounts and then stores the sugar as sweet juice in its fibrous stalks .
translation.zu: tasol stik suga i narapela kain liklik , long wanem , em i save wokim bikpela suga tru na dispela suga i stap olsem wara long ol stik bilong en .

translation.en: sugarcane cultivation was widely known in ancient india .
translation.zu: long bipo yet ol i bin planim suga long india .

translation.en: today cane varieties number into the thousands , and over 80 countries contribute to an annual crop of about one billion tons .
translation.zu: long nau i gat planti tausen narapela narapela kain stik suga , na ol gaden suga long 80 samting kantri i save kamapim wan bilion ton suga long olgeta yia .

translation.en: in most parts of the world , planting is a very labor - intensive operation .
translation.zu: long planti hap bilong graun i gat bikpela wok tru long planim suga .

translation.en: mature sugarcane stalks are cut in lengths of about 16 inches [ 40 cm ] and are planted in furrows about 5 feet [ 1.5 m ] apart .
translation.zu: ol i katim katim ol stik suga i go long ol liklik hap inap olsem 40 sentimita , na bihain ol bai planim na bai i gat 1.5 mita i stap namel long ol wan wan stik .

translation.en: each cutting , or set , grows a stool of about 8 to 12 cane stalks , which mature over a period of between 12 and 16 months .
translation.zu: insait long 12 o 16 mun ol liklik stik bai kamapim 8 - pela i go inap 12 - pela ol narapela stik suga i bikpela pinis .

translation.en: cane stalks and thick foliage tower to a height of up to 13 feet [ 4 m ] .
translation.zu: pasin bilong wokabaut namel long gaden suga em inap pretim yu liklik .

translation.en: could that rustling over there be just the wind , or is it perhaps a snake or a rodent ?
translation.zu: ating em win tasol i mekim na sampela lip i meknais , o nogut wanpela snek o wanpela rat i mekim .

translation.en: just in case , perhaps it is time to retreat to the safety of open ground !
translation.zu: i gutpela yumi lusim dispela hap na sanap long hap ol samting i stap ples klia !

translation.en: many of these efforts have met with some success , although not all .
translation.zu: planti samting ol i mekim i gutpela , tasol i no olsem olgeta samting i gutpela .

translation.en: for example , in 1935 , in an effort to eradicate the troublesome cane beetle , authorities introduced the hawaiian cane toad into northern queensland .
translation.zu: olsem : bilong pinisim wanpela kain binatang i wok long bagarapim suga , ol i bin kisim sampela ol rokrok bilong hawaii i kam long hap bilong not kwinslan long 1935 .

translation.en: you burn before harvesting ?
translation.zu: kukim paslain long katim ?

translation.en: within seconds the small field becomes a major conflagration with flames leaping high into the night sky .
translation.zu: em i wokim paia na i no longtaim na paia i kamap bikpela tru .

translation.en: in recent times , however , there has been a growing trend to harvest without the spectacular preburn .
translation.zu: tasol long nau , planti ol i no save wokim dispela bikpela paia paslain long katim suga .

translation.en: this method is called green cane harvesting .
translation.zu: ol i kolim olsem pasin bilong katim grinpela suga .

translation.en: not only does it improve the sugar yield but it also leaves behind a protective mulch blanket on the ground , which , in turn , is helpful in combating soil erosion and weeds .
translation.zu: dispela i mekim na ol bai kisim bikpela suga moa long faktori , na tu , ol lip samting bai stap na karamapim graun na givim gris long en , na dispela bai pasim ol gras nating long kamap na long taim bilong ren graun i no inap tekewe .

translation.en: although in many countries where sugarcane is grown today the crop is still harvested by hand , more countries are now harvesting with huge cane - cutting machines .
translation.zu: long nau long ol kantri i gat ol gaden suga , planti ol i wok yet long katim suga long naip , tasol pasin bilong katim suga long masin i wok long kamap bikpela moa .

translation.en: these behemoths carve their way through tall stands of sugarcane , topping and tailing the stalks and then automatically cutting them into short billets , or pieces , ready for processing at the mill .
translation.zu: i olsem dispela traipela masin i wokim rot long gaden taim em i katim ol stik , na rausim lip bilong ol na katim i go liklik liklik bilong redim i go long faktori .

translation.en: while one cane cutter may harvest an average of 5 tons of cane per day using the laborious hand - cutting method , cane - cutting machines can process up to 300 tons per day with ease .
translation.zu: insait long wanpela de , sapos man i wok strong em inap katim 5 - pela ton suga long naip , tasol i no hatwok long masin long katim 300 ton suga insait long wanpela de .

translation.en: fields may be cut annually for several years before the sugar yield drops and the plants need to be replaced .
translation.zu: ol i ken katim suga long wanpela gaden wanpela taim long olgeta yia i go inap long taim suga i no kru gut moa na ol i mas planim nupela gaden suga .

translation.en: once the cane is cut , speed in handling is essential , for the sugar in harvested cane deteriorates rapidly .
translation.zu: suga ol i katim pinis i save sting hariap , olsem na wantu ol i mas salim i go long ol faktori .

translation.en: to facilitate quick transport to the mills , about 2,500 miles [ 4,100 kilometers ] of narrow - gauge tram lines service cane - growing areas in queensland .
translation.zu: bilong mekim olsem , long hap bilong kwinslan i gat ol gaden suga long en ol i wokim ol rot bilong liklik tren , longpela bilong ol rot i olsem 4,100 kilomita .

translation.en: the miniature locomotives that travel these lines are a colorful sight as they traverse the countryside , trailing dozens of wagons filled to the brim with sugarcane .
translation.zu: ol tren i kala kala na i gutpela long lukim taim ol i wok long pulim planti ol trela i gat ol suga i pulap tru long en .

translation.en: through the mill
translation.zu: faktori bilong wokim suga

translation.en: touring a sugar mill is an interesting experience .
translation.zu: i gutpela tru long raun long wanpela faktori bilong wokim suga .

translation.en: huge shredders and rollers pulverize the cane , squeezing the sugar juice from the fiber .
translation.zu: i gat ol traipela masin i memeim ol stik suga na rausim wara bilong en .

translation.en: the leftover fiber , or bagasse , is dried and used as fuel to power the entire mill .
translation.zu: bihain ol i mekim drai ol pipia bilong suga na mekim wok long sampela olsem bensin bilong givim paua long faktori olgeta .

translation.en: the impurities in the sugar juice are then removed , leaving a clarified liquor .
translation.zu: ol i kisim wara long ol stik suga na rausim ol doti bilong en inap wara bilong stik suga i kamap klin tru .

translation.en: another by - product , molasses , is used as stock food or as a raw material in the distillation of rum and industrial alcohol .
translation.zu: na tu , ol i rausim yet ol samting long dispela wara bilong suga na kisim samting olsem hani bilong wokim kaikai bilong ol bulmakau pik samting , na ol samting bilong wokim strongpela dring , na marasin etanol .

translation.en: the liquor is then concentrated into a syrup by boiling off excess water , and it is seeded with tiny sugar crystals .
translation.zu: ol i boilim dispela wara bilong suga i klin pinis inap wara i kamap strong liklik olsem hani .

translation.en: these crystals grow until they reach the required size .
translation.zu: bihain ol i putim ol liklik liklik hap suga i go long en .

translation.en: the result is raw brown sugar .
translation.zu: ol i mekim olsem na nau i kamap braunpela suga .

translation.en: further refining will convert this raw sugar into the familiar refined white sugar found by many on their meal table .
translation.zu: i gat sampela wok moa ol bai mekim na suga bai i kamap waitpela , i wankain olsem dispela suga ol manmeri i save mekim wok long en long haus .

translation.en: of course , if you are diabetic , then you may have to forgo sugar and perhaps use a substitute .
translation.zu: tasol sapos yu gat sik daiabitis , ating yu mas putim narapela samting long ti o kopi bilong yu i olsem senis bilong suga .

translation.en: certainly , we have been impressed with the versatility and ingenuity of the one who designed and then caused to grow in such profusion this amazing plant , sugarcane - truly a giant among grasses !
translation.zu: tru tumas , mipela i kirap nogut long save na pasin bilong dispela man i bin kamapim dispela kain gras i save kamap planti na i narapela kain tru , em stik suga - em i bikpela tru long ol narapela kain gras !

translation.en: sugarcane is mainly grown in tropical areas and accounts for at least 65 percent of the world 's sugar production .
translation.zu: dispela stik suga em ol i planim long ol ples hot i kamapim 65 pesen samting bilong ol suga ol i kisim long ol faktori .

translation.en: the remaining 35 percent is extracted from sugar beets , which are grown in colder climates , such as eastern and western europe and north america .
translation.zu: na 35 pesen bilong ol narapela suga ol i kisim long wanpela kain kaikai ol i planim long ples kol , olsem long is na wes yurop na not amerika .

translation.en: the sugars are chemically identical .
translation.zu: tasol suga bilong tupela i wankain .

translation.zu: patmos - ailan bilong ol driman bilong kamapim tok hait

translation.en: once in a while , the people of patmos gaze across the aegean sea toward a light flickering over the slopes of a mountain on the nearby island of samos .
translation.zu: sampela i save tok dispela lait i kain olsem lait bilong klaut i bruk , tasol ol man bilong patmos i givim bel long lotu , ol i no gat dispela tingting .

translation.en: they run to tell the neighbors that they have received another sign from the island 's most famous former resident , who was banished to this small greek island just off the coast of asia minor almost 1,900 years ago .
translation.zu: inap olsem 1,900 yia i go pinis wanpela kot i bin rausim dispela man i go long dispela liklik ailan bilong kantri grik klostu long nambis bilong esia maina .

translation.en: there he heard god 's voice , " like that of a trumpet , " which said : " i am the alpha and the omega . . .
translation.zu: na taim dispela man i stap pinis long patmos em i harim nek bilong god i olsem " krai bilong biugel , " na god i tokim em olsem : " mi tasol mi stap paslain tru na mi stap las tru . . . .

translation.en: what you see write in a scroll . " - revelation 1 : 8 - 11 .
translation.zu: olgeta samting yu lukim , em yu mas raitim long buk . " - kth 1 : 8 - 11 .

translation.en: that scroll , or book , is the epilogue of the best - seller of all times .
translation.zu: dispela buk em i raitim , em i laspela hap bilong wanpela buk i stap namba wan long lista bilong ol buk ol man i save baim .

translation.en: it has been described by some as one of the least understood works ever written - the bible book named revelation , or apocalypse , the last book of the bible .
translation.zu: sampela i tok , i hatwok tru long kisim gut insait bilong ol tok bilong dispela buk , winim planti ol narapela buk - dispela buk em laspela buk bilong baibel ol i kolim olsem kamapim tok hait , o revelesen .

translation.en: the writer was john , jesus ' apostle .
translation.zu: man i raitim dispela buk em jon , aposel bilong jisas .

translation.en: patmos today
translation.zu: patmos long nau

translation.en: after midnight , as the ferry came into the fjord - shaped harbor of skála - patmos ' port and largest town - the clouds parted and revealed the island in the light of a full moon .
translation.zu: bihain long biknait , ol i stiaim sip i go namel long ol maunten na kamap long nambawan biktaun na pasis bilong patmos , em skela , na ol klaut i tekewe na mun i lait gut tru long dispela hap .

translation.en: the early morning scene revealed grandmothers , dressed in black from head to toe , trying to keep up with fleeing toddlers .
translation.zu: em moning yet na mi lukim ol bubu meri , em ol i pasim ol blakpela klos tasol , ol i wok long lukautim ol liklik pikinini i ran i go nabaut .

translation.en: a bewhiskered fisherman sitting nearby beat his lunch - an octopus that he had just forked out of the water - against the cement quay to tenderize it .
translation.zu: wanpela mausgras man bilong kisim pis i kisim wanpela urita long spia na em i wok long paitim long pos simen bilong bris na bai mit bilong en i no ken strong tumas .

translation.en: instead of boarding a boat , i decided to climb the mountainside behind skála for a view of the entire island .
translation.zu: mi no kalap long wanpela bot , nogat ; mi tingting long wokabaut i go antap long maunten i stap baksait long taun skela bilong lukluk long ailan olgeta .

translation.en: patmos gives you three islets in one - headlands that are joined by low isthmuses .
translation.zu: patmos i olsem 3 - pela ailan i gat liklik hap graun i stap namel long ol na i skruim ol wantaim .

translation.en: one of these narrow strips of land is situated at skála .
translation.zu: wanpela liklik hap graun olsem i stap long skela .

translation.en: the other is located at the aptly named diakofti , meaning " cut apart , " near the unpopulated southern end of the island .
translation.zu: narapela i stap long hap saut bilong ailan i no gat ol man long en , nem bilong dispela ples em tiakofti , insait bilong dispela nem i olsem " katim i go tupela hap . "

translation.en: patmos is scarcely eight miles [ 13 km ] long , and at one point it is only a stone 's throw across .
translation.zu: longpela bilong ailan patmos i olsem 13 kilomita , na long wanpela hap braitpela bilong en i liklik tru .

translation.en: those early residents chose the second - highest point on the island as the site for their temple to artemis , goddess of hunting .
translation.zu: ol dispela lain bilong pastaim i bin makim nambatu bikpela maunten bilong wokim haus lotu bilong artemis , em god meri bilong painim abus long bus .

translation.en: about 96 c.e . , when the apostle john is thought to have been exiled to patmos , it was under the heel of imperial rome .
translation.zu: long yia 96 c.e . , em yia ol i ting olsem ol i bin rausim jon i go long patmos , rom i bosim dispela ailan .

translation.en: in the fourth century , the island became part of the " christianized " byzantine empire .
translation.zu: long yia 300 samting patmos i stap aninit long gavman bisantin , em lain bilong en i bin kamap olsem " kristen . "

translation.en: then , between the seventh and tenth centuries , it came to be dominated by islam .
translation.zu: bihain , namel long ol yia 600 i go 900 samting ol lain i bihainim lotu islam i bosim patmos .

translation.en: then , late in the 11th century , a greek orthodox monk began building the fortified monastery of " saint " john on the site of the pagan temple of artemis .
translation.zu: tasol long pinis bilong yia 1000 samting , wanpela man grik bilong misin otodoks i kirap na wokim wanpela haus bruder bilong " santu " jon long hap ol haiden i bin wokim haus lotu bilong artemis long en long bipo .

translation.en: settlers gradually returned and constructed an array of white cubical houses at hora , the town that still huddles against the monastery 's protective walls .
translation.zu: isi isi ol man i kam bek gen long patmos na wokim ol waitpela haus long taun hora , em i stap long hap stret bilong dispela haus bruder .

translation.en: that fleet was indirectly responsible for a new invasion .
translation.zu: dispela lain sip i mekim na i gat narapela senis i kamap long patmos .

translation.en: patmos has so far escaped the tourist stampede that has nearly ruined other greek islands .
translation.zu: sampela ailan bilong grik i laik kisim bagarap , long wanem , planti turis tumas i raun long ol .

translation.en: the main reasons are its lack of an airport and the monks ' insistence that it remain largely a holy precinct .
translation.zu: tupela bikpela as bilong dispela samting i olsem patmos i no gat ples balus , na ol bruder i strong olsem dispela hap i mas stap olsem wanpela ples holi .

translation.en: mixing history and tradition
translation.zu: stori bilong bipo na pasin tumbuna

translation.en: on the outskirts of town , i passed an ominous graffito freshly daubed in red on a stone wall : " ohi sto 666 " ( look out for 666 ) , one of the misunderstood symbols of revelation .
translation.zu: ausait long taun mi lukim wanpela tok i no longtaim wanpela i bin penim long banis ston , i tok olsem : " ohi sto 666 " ( was gut long namba 666 ) , em wanpela namba long kamapim tok hait planti man i paul long insait bilong en .

translation.en: the monastery of the apocalypse , containing the tiny chapel of " saint " anne , was built in 1090 to enclose the entrance of the grotto where tradition has it that john received his visions .
translation.zu: long yia 1090 ol i wokim haus bruder apokalips i gat liklik ples lotu bilong " santu " an long en , ol i bin wokim bilong pasim hul bilong ston em stori bilong ol tumbuna i tok jon i bin stap long en na kisim ol driman .

translation.en: i watched a lone woman kneel and attach a tama ( offering ) to the icon of " saint " john .
translation.zu: mi stap na lukim wanpela meri i brukim skru na pasim wanpela tama ( ofa ) long imis bilong " santu " jon .

translation.en: i remembered having seen similar offerings made of clay near corinth in the temple of the ancient greek god - physician asclepius .
translation.zu: long korin , long tempel bilong asklipias , em god - dokta bilong ol grik long bipo tru , mi bin lukim ol wankain ofa ol i wokim long wanpela kain graun .

translation.en: a mere coincidence ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ?

translation.en: as i entered the courtyard of the monastery of " saint " john , a friendly figure appeared from the dark labyrinth of corridors .
translation.zu: taim mi go insait long banis bilong haus bruder bilong " santu " jon , wanpela man i lusim haus na kam ausait , na em i mekim pasin pren long mipela .

translation.en: " papa nikos " ( father nick ) took personal pride in showing several other tourists and me the monastery 's treasures .
translation.zu: " papa nikos " ( pater nik ) i amamas long soim mi na sampela ol narapela turis ol gutpela gutpela samting bilong haus bruder i dia tumas .

translation.en: the monastery , which owns much of patmos , is one of the richest and most influential in greece .
translation.zu: dispela haus bruder i gat planti mani samting na bikpela nem , winim planti narapela haus bruder bilong kantri grik , na bikpela hap graun bilong patmos i bilong en .

translation.en: we strolled through a cool , candle - blackened chapel , where the remains of the monastery 's founder lie , and then through the chapel of the virgin , built in part with stones from the temple of artemis .
translation.zu: matmat bilong man i bin kamapim dispela haus bruder i stap long en . bihain mipela go long haus lotu bilong virgo , ol i bin wokim hap bilong en long ol ston bilong haus lotu bilong artemis .

translation.en: in the museum , we saw a king 's ransom in gold and jewels that had been donated by the czars ; the monks ' 11th - century deed to the island , signed by byzantine emperor alexius i comnenus ; and a beautiful 6th - century fragment of the gospel of mark , written on purple vellum with silver rather than ink .
translation.zu: long haus tumbuna mipela lukim planti gol na ol ston i dia tumas em sampela king bilong rasia i bin givim ; wanpela pepa bilong yia 1000 samting i makim olsem ailan em bilong ol bruder , na i gat nem bilong king bilong bisantin , aleksias namba 1 kamnenas , i stap long en ; na wanpela naispela hap tru bilong olpela rait bilong gutnius mak i raitim , em ol i bin raitim long skin bilong pikinini bulmakau i gat blupela kala long en , na ol i raitim ol tok long en long silva .

translation.en: in addition to this fragment , the monastery houses a large collection of bible and theological manuscripts .
translation.zu: na tu , i gat planti ol narapela olpela rait bilong baibel i stap na ol rait bilong ol tisa bilong lotu .

translation.en: the island also has natural beauty to offer .
translation.zu: ailan yet i gutpela long lukim .

translation.en: a few miles south of skála , a pristine beach curves along a protected bay .
translation.zu: sampela kilomita ausait long skela long hap saut i gat wanpela gutpela nambis long wanpela pasis em win i no strong tumas long en .

translation.en: the beach is flat and featureless except for kalikatsou , meaning " cormorant , " a boulder in the middle of the beach , which is five or six stories high and is riddled with caves like an enormous swiss cheese .
translation.zu: nambis i stret tasol , na namel long en i gat wanpela traipela ston tru i gat planti ol hul long en , na bikpela bilong ston i go antap olsem 20 mita samting , ol i kolim dispela ston , keliketsu , insait bilong dispela nem i olsem " pisin bilong solwara . "

translation.en: the best way to enjoy patmos is simply to ramble all over it .
translation.zu: pasin bilong raun tasol i nambawan rot bilong lukim ol samting bilong patmos .

translation.en: or some afternoon when the aegean spreads its gauzelike mist across the sky , you may want to sit and watch the beaches where boats departing in the evaporating mist look as if they were climbing into the sky .
translation.zu: o long sampela apinun taim sno bilong solwara ijien i wok long karamapim skai , ating yu bai amamas long sindaun na lukim ol bot , i olsem ol i go antap long skai taim ol i lusim nambis na sno i karamapim ol .

translation.en: on my last day there , a beautiful red setting sun magnified the town below .
translation.zu: long apinun tru long laspela de mi stap long patmos , naispela retpela san i lait long taun i stap daunbilo .

translation.en: out on the bay , lamp fishermen were readying small motorless boats , which are known as gri - gri , ducklings , because they are pulled in a line behind a mother ship .
translation.zu: long pasis ol man bilong kisim pis i mekim wok long lam na raun long ol liklik bot i no gat mota long en , ol i save kolim olsem gri - gri , em makim ol liklik pato , long wanem , wanpela sip i pulim ol long wanpela lain .

translation.en: the whole island seemed to glow .
translation.zu: i olsem ailan olgeta i lait .

translation.en: a chill wind and high waves tossed the gri - gri dangerously .
translation.zu: win na biksi i wok long sakim ol gri - gri .

translation.en: a few hours later , i saw the boats again , from the deck of the ferry returning to piraievs as it slid swiftly past their fishing grounds a mile or so offshore .
translation.zu: sampela aua bihain , mi lukim ol dispela bot i stap longwe long nambis inap tupela kilomita samting taim sip mi stap long en bilong go bek long pireus i abrusim ol .

translation.en: the men had ignited the blindingly bright lights that they use to attract fish .
translation.zu: ol i mekim wok long ol lam i lait gut tru bilong pulim ol pis i kam .

translation.en: that night , until they and the island behind them disappeared from view , the picture of an exiled john penning his visions at patmos remained in my mind .
translation.zu: na long tingting i olsem mi lukim jon , em dispela aposel ol i rausim em i kam long patmos , em i stap na raitim tok bilong ol driman em i bin kisim .

translation.en: watching the world living for the millennium
translation.zu: sampela tok i kam long olgeta hap

translation.en: in britain , 65 percent more people died that week , and in new york city , deaths rose by over 50 percent , compared with the first week in 1999 .
translation.zu: richard suzman bilong wanpela lain ( national institute on aging ) long betesda , merilan , amerika , em i tok : " ol samting i kamapim klia olsem ol manmeri i gat bikpela sik ol i strong long i stap laip bambai ol i ken lukim wanpela bikpela samting .

translation.en: robert butler , president of the international longevity center , said that these figures were reflected around the world .
translation.zu: yumi no save wanem ol samting bilong skin i mekim na man inap i stap longpela taim moa , tasol dispela samting i save kamap tru . "

translation.en: navigation by computer thanks to electronic technology , ships may no longer need masses of paper charts in order to navigate , notes the daily telegraph of london .
translation.zu: nius the guardian bilong landon i tok , ol man i strong long ol i laik lukim yia 2000 , olsem na planti man moa ol i dai long namba wan wik bilong yia 2000 , winim ol narapela yia .

translation.en: in place of paper charts , the computer offers two electronic versions - a scanned facsimile of the paper chart and a digitized version known as a vector chart .
translation.zu: robert butler , em presiden bilong wanpela lain ( international longevity center ) , em i tok , long olgeta hap planti manmeri moa i bin dai long dispela taim .

translation.en: a key advantage of the electronic chart is that it shows the ship 's true location at all times .
translation.zu: em i tok moa : " laik bilong man long i stap laip i gat bikpela strong . "

translation.en: one shipmaster , enthusiastic about this development , said : " it lightens our load . . . so we can concentrate more on pilotage , traffic movements , other ships and , when approaching a harbour , what our pilot is doing . " extraterrestrials unlikely
translation.zu: nius the new york times i tok : ' inap planti yia nau , planti saveman bilong glasim ol sta samting ol i bin tok olsem ol narapela lain i sindaun long ol sta samting .

translation.en: " in the last few decades , a growing number of astronomers have promulgated the view that alien civilizations are likely to be scattered among the stars , " states the new york times .
translation.zu: dispela bilip olsem ol lain i sindaun long ol narapela sta i mekim na ol man i bin raitim planti buk , na wokim ol piksa wokabaut na program bilong televisen .

translation.en: " this extraterrestrial credo has fueled not only countless books , movies and television shows . . . but a long scientific hunt that uses huge dish antennas to scan the sky for faint radio signals from intelligent aliens . "
translation.zu: na tu , ol saveman i mekim bikpela wok long ol traipela dis antena bilong glasim ples antap bilong kisim tok samting i kam long ol narapela lain . '

translation.en: ward and dr . donald c .
translation.zu: ward na donald c .

translation.en: " we have finally said out loud what so many have thought for so long - that complex life , at least , is rare , " said dr .
translation.zu: saveman ward i tok : " nau mipela i tokaut klia long samting em planti man i bin tingting long en inap longpela taim - ating ol samting i gat laip i no stap long ol narapela sta . "

translation.en: ward . adds dr .
translation.zu: dispela tok i no tru .

translation.en: " the bible continues to be the most translated book in the world , " notes the mexican newspaper excelsior .
translation.zu: wanpela nius ( excelsior ) bilong meksiko i tok : " ol i wok yet long tanim baibel long planti tok ples , winim olgeta narapela buk long olgeta hap . "

translation.en: according to the german bible society , the bible was translated into another 21 languages in 1999 , making it now available at least in part in 2,233 languages .
translation.zu: wanpela lain ( german bible society ) i tok , ol i bin tanim baibel long 21 tok ples moa long 1999 , olsem na nau baibel olgeta o hap bilong en i stap long 2,233 tok ples .

translation.en: of these , " the old testament and the new testament have been translated in their entirety into 371 languages , 5 more than in 1998 . "
translation.zu: ol i bin " tanim olpela testamen na nupela testamen olgeta long 371 tok ples , em 5 - pela tok ples moa long 1998 . "

translation.en: where are all these languages found ?
translation.zu: ol dispela tok ples i stap we ?

translation.en: " the greatest diversity of translations is found in africa , with 627 , followed by asia , with 553 , australia / pacific , with 396 , latin america / caribbean , with 384 , europe , with 197 , and the united states , with 73 , " says the paper .
translation.zu: nius i tok : " planti narapela narapela tok ples i stap long afrika inap olsem 627 , esia i gat 553 , ostrelia / pasifik i gat 396 , latin amerika / karibian i gat 384 , yurop i gat 197 , na long yunaitet stets i gat 73 . "

translation.en: still , " the bible has not been translated into even half the languages spoken on earth . "
translation.zu: tasol " ol i no bin tanim baibel long 50 pesen bilong olgeta tok ples bilong graun . "

translation.en: why not ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem ?

translation.en: also , many people are bilingual , and if the bible is not printed in one of their languages , they can read it in another .
translation.zu: na tu , planti manmeri i save long tupela tok ples , olsem na sapos i no gat baibel long wanpela tok ples ol i save long en , ol i ken ritim baibel long narapela tok ples .

translation.en: italian fishermen have recently been hauling in catches that they would have preferred not to make - chemical weapons .
translation.zu: ol man bilong kisim pis long itali ol i bin kisim ol samting ol i no gat laik long kisim long umben bilong ol - ol bom i gat marasin nogut .

translation.en: according to valerio calzolaio , under secretary to the italian ministry of the environment , " from 1946 until the ' 70 ' s . . . , the regular practice for disposing of obsolete munitions was to dump them in the sea . "
translation.zu: valerio calzolaio , em i wanpela kuskus bilong wanpela lain ( italian ministry of the environment ) , na em i tok " kirap long 1946 i kam inap 1975 samting . . . , ol i bin tromoi nating long solwara ol bom samting em ol i no gat wok long en . "

translation.en: it is estimated that there are some 20,000 bombs lying on the bed of the adriatic , off the east coast of italy .
translation.zu: ol i ting i gat 20,000 bom i slip long as bilong solwara adriatik , klostu long nambis long hap is bilong itali .

translation.en: by 1997 , 5 italian fishermen had died and 236 had required hospitalization as a result of the effects of lethal chemicals leaking from corroded munitions that they brought up in their nets .
translation.zu: i kam inap long 1997 , 5 - pela man bilong kisim pis long itali ol i bin dai , na 236 i mas slip long haus sik , long wanem , umben bilong ol i bin kisim ol bom i ros na marasin nogut bilong en i lus .

translation.en: adding to the problem , an undisclosed number of bombs were jettisoned into the same waters by warplanes during the recent balkan conflict , and some of these have already been " caught " in fishing nets .
translation.zu: na tu , taim ol i bin pait long bolkan ol balus bilong pait i bin tromoi planti bom long dispela solwara , na ol man bilong kisim pis ol i " kisim " pinis sampela bilong ol dispela bom long umben bilong ol .

translation.en: journalists " are not infallibly accurate . "
translation.zu: dispela hevi i no kamap long solwara bilong itali tasol .

translation.en: why ? " in the fog of war , or of peacetime catastrophe , it is , of course , impossible to know for certain how many people have died or been hurt , " the article says . to satisfy people 's curiosity , journalists give estimates , often high ones , and " seldom reduce their estimates as time goes by . " the reason ?
translation.zu: ol i ting i gat inap 100 tausen ton bom nogut i slip long as bilong solwara boltik , na tu , ol i bin tromoi nating ol bom ol i no gat wok long en klostu long nambis bilong japan , yunaitet stets , na briten .

translation.en: however , a recent study by a group of veterinarians at the institute of comparative animal immunology , in maisons - alfort , france , shows that fungi and parasites carried by france 's 8.4 million cats and 7.9 million dogs are responsible for various diseases in pet owners .
translation.zu: tasol i no longtaim i go pinis na ripot bilong lain dokta bilong ol animal bilong wanpela lain ( institute of comparative animal immunology ) long meson - alfo , frans , i soim olsem long frans i gat 8.4 milion pusi na 7.9 milion dok na sampela ol i gat grile na ol binatang jem , na ol i save givim kain kain sik long man i lukautim ol .

translation.en: these include ringworm , roundworm , scabies , leishmaniasis , and toxoplasmosis .
translation.zu: ol dispela sik em kain kain grile , kaskas , na sik ol i kolim lismanaiasis , na toksoplasmosis .

translation.en: the report also mentions the many allergic reactions caused by household pets and the infections that result from dog bites - about 100,000 a year in france .
translation.zu: ripot i tok tu olsem planti man i kisim kain kain sik taim ol i lukautim ol animal , na long olgeta yia inap 100 tausen manmeri long frans i kisim sua taim dok i kaikaim ol .

translation.en: oral ecosystem
translation.zu: maus bilong man

translation.en: " stanford university scientists have discovered 37 new and unique organisms in one of the most diverse ecosystems on earth : the human mouth , " reports the toronto star .
translation.zu: nius the toronto star i tok : ' ol saientis bilong yunivesiti stanfot i bin kisim save long 37 nupela na narapela kain binatang jem i stap long maus bilong man . '

translation.en: this increases the known types of oral bacteria to over 500 , " a diversity so large that it may rival that of tropical rain forests , often seen as the pinnacle of biological richness . "
translation.zu: dispela i mekim na nau ol i save long 500 binatang jem i stap long maus - ' ol i planti tru na ol i narapela narapela kain , klostu wankain olsem bikbus i gat planti ol binatang samting long en , winim olgeta narapela ples . '

translation.en: after discovering the new organisms in oral plaque , microbiologist dr .
translation.zu: ol dispela binatang jem inap bagarapim man ?

translation.en: the star adds that most types of bacteria " are thought to provide comfort , protection and nourishment . "
translation.zu: nius star i tok moa olsem klostu olgeta binatang jem i save " lukautim maus na mekim em i stap gut . "

translation.en: wars on the rise
translation.zu: planti pait moa i kamap

translation.en: " the number of wars continued to increase " in 1999 , reports the german newspaper siegener zeitung .
translation.zu: wanpela nius ( siegener zeitung ) bilong jemani i tok : " namba bilong ol pait i wok long go antap " long 1999 .

translation.en: the study group for research into war causes , at the university of hamburg , counted 35 armed conflicts in 1999 , 3 more than the year before .
translation.zu: wanpela lain ( the study group for research into war causes ) long yunivesiti bilong hambek i tok , inap 35 pait i kamap long 1999 , em 3 - pela pait moa long yia i go pinis .

translation.en: of them , 14 were in africa , 12 were in asia , one was in europe , and the others were in the middle east and latin america .
translation.zu: inap 14 bilong ol dispela pait i kamap long afrika , 12 - pela long esia , wanpela long yurop , na ol narapela i kamap long midel - is na latin amerika .

translation.en: an end to warfare is not in sight , said the study group .
translation.zu: dispela lain i tok , pinis bilong ol pait i no klostu .

translation.en: in fact , " eight wars appeared on this year 's list for the first time , among them the violent conflicts in chechnya , nepal , kyrgyzstan , and nigeria . "
translation.zu: na " long lista bilong ol pait bilong dispela yia i gat 8 - pela nupela pait i kamap . sampela bilong ol em pait nogut i kamap long sesnia , nepal , kirgistan , na naijiria . "

translation.en: one reason is that some causes for conflicts can simmer under the surface for a long period of time before they erupt into armed conflict or full - scale war .
translation.zu: wanpela as bilong dispela em olsem : sampela kros samting ol i stap inap longpela taim , na bihain ol man i kirap pait wantaim gan samting o ol i kirapim bikpela pait tru .

translation.en: many consider the olympic games to be the world 's most important athletic competition .
translation.zu: planti man i ting ol olimpik - gems ol i nambawan bikpela pilai bilong spot .

translation.en: " several million people attend the games , and hundreds of millions throughout the world watch them on television . "
translation.zu: planti milion manmeri i save go lukim ol dispela pilai , na planti handet milion manmeri long olgeta hap ol i save lukim ol long televisen . "

translation.en: these included the isthmian , nemean , olympic , and pythian games .
translation.zu: sampela bilong ol dispela bung em ol pilai bilong ismian , nimian , olimpik , na pitian .

translation.en: of these , the olympics were held in highest esteem , for they honored zeus , whom the greeks considered the king of the gods .
translation.zu: ol man i ting ol olimpik i winim olgeta narapela pilai , long wanem , ol i litimapim nem bilong sus , em ol grik i ting em i king bilong olgeta god .

translation.en: evidently the early olympics featured only one event , a footrace .
translation.zu: pastaim i gat wanpela kain pilai tasol long ol olimpik - gems , em resis bilong ran .

translation.en: but in time they came to include other contests , such as chariot races and rigorous tests of endurance .
translation.zu: tasol bihain ol i mekim ol narapela pilai tu , olsem resis bilong ol karis em ol hos i save pulim , na ol pilai bilong traim strong bilong man .

translation.en: visitors streamed in for the occasion from far and wide .
translation.zu: planti man bilong ol longwe longwe hap ol i kam lukim ol dispela pilai .

translation.en: to ensure their safety , a truce forbidding warfare was put into effect for a period both before and after the games .
translation.zu: bilong hevi i no ken painim ol dispela pilai , ol i tambuim ol kantri long ol i no ken pait paslain na bihain long pilai .

translation.en: indeed , many romans viewed athletics with a measure of contempt .
translation.zu: tru tumas , planti man bilong rom ol i ting ol spot i samting nating tasol .

translation.en: he entered the games in 67 c.e . and won every event in which he participated .
translation.zu: em i insait long ol olimpik - gems long yia 67 c.e . na em i winim olgeta pilai em i insait long en .

translation.en: it seems that the other contestants knew what was good for them !
translation.zu: ol narapela man i insait long pilai , ol i bihainim savepasin na larim king i winim ol !

translation.en: in any case , by 394 c.e . , the olympics had been discontinued .
translation.zu: tasol long yia 394 c.e . , ol olimpik - gems i pinis .

translation.en: the revival of the olympics
translation.zu: kirapim gen ol olimpik - gems

translation.en: some 15 centuries later , what the spades of german archaeologists unearthed on the plain of ancient olympia brought renewed interest in the games .
translation.zu: inap 15 handet yia bihain , ol samting sampela saveman bilong jemani i painim insait long graun long ples daun bilong olimpia bilong bipo , dispela i kirapim ol man long tingim gen dispela pilai .

translation.en: then , baron pierre de coubertin , a 29 - year - old frenchman , proposed reviving the event .
translation.zu: bihain , pierre de coubertin , em wanpela bikman bilong frans i gat 29 krismas , em i laik bai dispela pilai i kirap gen .

translation.en: thus , in 1896 the first modern olympic games were held in athens .
translation.zu: olsem na long yia 1896 , namba wan olimpik - gems bilong nau i kamap long atens .

translation.en: this year , they are to take place in sydney , australia , from september 15 to october 1 .
translation.zu: long dispela yia , ol olimpik - gems bai kamap long sidni , ostrelia , kirap long septemba 15 i go inap oktoba 1 .

translation.en: in recent years , however , the olympics have become steeped in controversy .
translation.zu: tasol nau long dispela taim , ol man i toktok planti long ol samting bilong ol olimpik - gems .

translation.en: many people even say that the olympic ideals are in crisis .
translation.zu: planti ol i tok ol gutpela samting ol olimpik - gems i laik kamapim i laik bagarap .

translation.en: when baron pierre de coubertin proposed the revival of the olympics , he set forth some noble ideals .
translation.zu: taim bikman pierre de coubertin i laik bai ol olimpik - gems i kirap gen , em i kamapim sampela gutpela tingting .

translation.en: indeed , the modern olympic creed , attributed to coubertin , states : " the most important thing in the olympic games is not to win but to take part . . .
translation.zu: tru tumas , ol lo bilong ol olimpik - gems long nau , em ol lo bilong coubertin , i tokaut olsem : " nambawan bikpela samting bilong ol olimpik - gems i no pasin bilong win , nogat , em pasin bilong insait long en . . .

translation.en: he even spoke of a ' religion of sport . '
translation.zu: em i tok tu long ' lotu bilong spot . '

translation.en: the olympics , he felt , could teach people to live in peace .
translation.zu: em i ting ol olimpik - gems inap lainim ol man long stap wanbel wantaim .

translation.en: but by the time coubertin died in 1937 , any hopes in this regard had faded .
translation.zu: tasol coubertin i dai long 1937 , na ol samting em i bin wet long en i no kamap .

translation.en: the games had already been suspended once because of a world war , and tensions were building for another major conflict .
translation.zu: bikpela pait bilong olgeta hap i mekim na wanpela taim ol olimpik - gems i no bin kamap , na ol hevi i wok long kamapim narapela bikpela pait .

translation.en: why is this so ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem em olsem ?

translation.en: for decades performance - enhancing drugs have been used by athletes to gain a competitive edge , and the olympic games have not escaped this scourge .
translation.zu: inap planti yia pinis , ol man bilong pilai spot ol i bin kisim ol drak i save helpim ol long pilai gut moa , na ol olimpik - gems i gat dispela hevi tu .

translation.en: meanwhile , a genetically engineered version of erythropoietin is the drug of choice among many long - distance runners , swimmers , and cross - country skiers because it enhances their endurance by stimulating red blood cell production .
translation.zu: na planti man bilong ran long longpela rot , na ol man bilong subim wara , na ol man bilong ski , ol i save kisim wanpela kain drak ( erythropoietin ) i kirapim skin bilong man long wokim blut na dispela i helpim ol long stap strong long resis inap longpela taim .

translation.en: understandably , dr . robert voy , former director of drug testing for the u.s .
translation.zu: olsem na yumi no kirap nogut long dokta robert voy , bipo em dairekta bilong wanpela lain ( u.s .

translation.en: dr . donald catlin , director of a drug - testing laboratory in the united states , says : " the sophisticated athlete who wants to take drugs has switched to things we can 't test for . "
translation.zu: dokta donald catlin , em dairekta bilong wanpela laboritori bilong glasim blut long amerika , em i tok : " man bilong pilai spot i gat save na i laik kisim ol drak , em bai kisim ol drak mipela i no inap luksave long en taim mipela i glasim blut . "

translation.en: bribery and corruption
translation.zu: grismani na paulim mani

translation.en: since only a handful of cities can afford to bid on hosting the olympics , some of them will stop at nothing to secure the event .
translation.zu: wan wan biktaun tasol inap lukautim ol olimpik - gems , olsem na sampela bilong ol bai mekim olgeta kain samting bambai ol i ken lukautim pilai .

translation.en: almost two years ago , the international olympic committee ( ioc ) found itself mired in scandal .
translation.zu: klostu tupela yia i go pinis , ol man i toktok planti long ol samting lain ioc ( international olympic committee ) i mekim .

translation.en: as for the 2000 games in australia , all attempts to keep an aboveboard image vanished when the president of the australian olympic committee admitted : " well , we didn 't win [ the bid ] on the beauty of the city and the sporting facilities we had to offer on their own . "
translation.zu: taim ol i makim ostrelia long lukautim ol olimpik - gems bilong yia 2000 , wok bilong ol long holimpas gutpela nem i bagarap taim presiden bilong wanpela lain ( australian olympic committee ) i tokaut olsem : " biktaun bilong mipela i gutpela tru na mipela i gat ol stediam samting bilong ol pilai i ken kamap long en , tasol i no long dispela as tasol na ol i makim mipela long lukautim ol pilai . "

translation.en: the late swiss head of the international rowing federation , tommy keller , once said that in his view some sports officials see the olympics as a means of " fulfilling their own personal pride . "
translation.zu: bos bilong wanpela lain ( international rowing federation ) , em tommy keller bilong swiselan , em i dai pinis , em i tok sampela bikman bilong spot ol i ting ol olimpik - gems em rot bilong ol man long " hambak long wok bilong ol yet . "

translation.en: he added that the driving force seemed to be " the pursuit of money and the satisfaction of personal ambitions . "
translation.zu: em i tok moa olsem " laik bilong kisim planti mani na inapim laik bilong ol yet " i kirapim ol long mekim ol samting .

translation.en: consider the 1988 olympics , for which nine multinational companies paid a total of over $ 100 million to the ioc for worldwide marketing rights .
translation.zu: nainpela bikpela kampani ol i givim 100 milion dola long lain ioc bilong ol i ken kamapim ol toksave long olgeta hap bilong grisim ol man long baim ol samting .

translation.en: an american tv network paid more than $ 3.5 billion for the rights to broadcast the olympic games between 2000 and 2008 , and it was reported that over a four - year period , 11 worldwide sponsors would have to pay $ 84 million each .
translation.zu: wanpela televisen - stesin long amerika i tromoi inap 3.5 bilion dola bilong ol i ken soim ol olimpik - gems bilong yia 2000 i go inap 2008 , na ol i tok insait long 4 - pela yia , wan wan kampani bilong 11 - pela kampani i helpim ol olimpik - gems ol i mas tromoi 84 milion dola .

translation.en: thus , some people have expressed the view that while the olympics once stood for the ideal of human excellence , today the games are primarily a moneymaking opportunity that stands for human greed .
translation.zu: olsem na sampela man i tok , bipo ol olimpik - gems i makim rot bilong man i ken kamapim ol gutpela pasin , tasol nau ol i rot bilong kisim planti mani na i kamapim pasin mangal bilong man .

translation.en: what went wrong ?
translation.zu: wanem as bilong ol hevi ?

translation.en: some experts say that the crisis of the olympics can be traced to two key developments that began in the early 1980 ' s .
translation.zu: sampela saveman i tok , as bilong ol hevi i painim ol olimpik - gems em tupela bikpela samting i bin kirap long 1982 samting .

translation.en: the first was the decision to grant individual international sports federations the right to determine which athletes were eligible for the olympics .
translation.zu: namba wan samting i olsem : ol i pasim tok olsem olgeta wan wan lain bilong spot yet ol i ken makim husat man bilong pilai spot i ken insait long ol pilai .

translation.en: merely ' fighting well ' does not procure endorsement dollars , and it was not long before winning became everything .
translation.zu: pasin bilong ' resis gut ' i no givim bikpela mani long man bilong pilai , olsem na i no longtaim na pasin bilong win em i kamap nambawan bikpela samting .

translation.en: not surprisingly , that has spurred on the use of performance - enhancing drugs .
translation.zu: olsem na planti moa ol i kisim ol drak bilong strongim ol long pilai gut .

translation.en: this fostered the climate of unbridled commercialism that has become the trademark of the olympics .
translation.zu: dispela i kirapim tru ol lain bilong ol olimpik - gems long mekim bikpela wok bisnis long en .

translation.en: jason zengerle observed : " for all of the talk about promoting peace and bringing people of the world together . . . , the olympics are really no different from . . . any other ostentatious sporting display . "
translation.zu: jason zengerle i tok : " maski ol i tok long kamapim bel isi na pasin wanbel namel long ol lain man bilong olgeta hap . . . , ol olimpik - gems i no narapela kain long . . . ol narapela bikpela pilai spot . " tasol olsem wanem ?

translation.en: does this mean , though , that the ideals proposed by the olympic movement are unattainable ?
translation.zu: dispela i makim olsem ol gutpela samting ol i laik bai ol olimpik - gems i kamapim ol i no inap kamap ?

translation.en: since september 1993 , when sydney won the bid for the 2000 olympic games , the city has been frantically getting ready to receive visitors numbering into the tens of thousands .
translation.zu: kirap long septemba 1993 , taim ol i makim sidni long lukautim ol pilai bilong yia 2000 , ol man bilong dispela biktaun i bin wok strong bilong stretim planti samting bambai planti tausen manmeri i ken kam lukim ol pilai .

translation.en: much work has been done to clean up the site , build world - class venues , and transform old garbage dumps into a series of wetlands , parks , and estuaries , which cover 1,900 acres [ 760 ha ] .
translation.zu: ol i bin mekim bikpela wok bilong klinim hap em ol pilai bai kamap long en , na ol i sanapim ol haus samting bilong ol pilai , na mekim ol olpela ples pipia i kamap olsem ol ples tais , na pak , na ol liklik wara . bikpela bilong dispela hap em 760 hekta .

translation.en: the sydney olympic village , built to house all the athletes and officials , is the largest solar - powered village in the world .
translation.zu: long olimpik viles bilong sidni , ol i sanapim ol haus bilong ol man bilong pilai spot na bilong ol bikman bilong spot .

translation.en: the superdome - the largest indoor sports and entertainment center in the southern hemisphere - has the largest private solar - power grid in australia , and it runs on energy that produces almost no greenhouse gas emissions .
translation.zu: em i nambawan bikpela ples i kisim pawa long san , winim olgeta narapela ples long graun . wanpela haus spot ( superdome ) , em i nambawan bikpela haus spot na haus amamas , winim olgeta haus olsem long hap bilong saut .

translation.en: four boeing 747 airliners could park side by side under the main arch of the stadium !
translation.zu: fopela traipela balus boeing 747 inap sanap aninit long rup bilong stediam !

translation.en: overhead , translucent ceiling tiles shield spectators from the sun 's ultraviolet rays .
translation.zu: ol i wokim rup bilong en long ol tail glas na dispela i pasim lait nogut bilong san .

translation.en: " for a couple of months in 2000 , " said alan patching , chief executive of the stadium , " this place will be the heart of australia . "
translation.zu: bos bilong stediam , em alan patching , em i tok : " inap sampela mun long 2000 , dispela stediam bai kamap nambawan bikpela samting long ostrelia . "

translation.en: then he ventured a prediction : " it will become iconic after that , like the opera house . "

translation.zu: tasol sapos yumi trening long mekim pasin bilong god i kamap strong long yumi , dispela bai i helpim yumi moa yet . em inap long helpim yumi long dispela laip nau yumi stap long en , na long laip yumi bai kisim bihain tu . " - 1 timoti 4 : 8 . olsem wanem ?

translation.en: do the ideals set forth in these scriptures really work ?
translation.zu: ol tok i stap long ol dispela skripsa ol inap helpim tru ol man ?

translation.en: consider what happened in munich , germany .
translation.zu: tingim samting i bin kamap long munik , jemani .

translation.en: in 1974 , just two years after the olympic games held in that city were marred by terrorism and murder , jehovah 's witnesses held an international convention at the olympic stadium .
translation.zu: long 1974 , tupela yia bihain long olimpik - gems i kamap long dispela taun na pasin bilong birua long narapela lain na kilim man i dai i bagarapim ol dispela pilai , ol witnes bilong jehova i mekim kibung intenesenel long olimpik stediam .

translation.en: in attendance , among others , were groups from greece and turkey - countries that were fighting each other .
translation.zu: ol lain bilong ol narapela narapela kantri i kam long kibung , na ol grik na turki tu , em dispela tupela kantri i bin pait wantaim .

translation.en: in fact , during that very summer , greek and turkish troops were embroiled in a conflict over the island of cyprus .
translation.zu: long wankain taim , ami bilong grik na turki ol i bin pait long husat bai bosim ailan saiprus . olsem wanem ?

translation.en: would this affect the christians attending this convention ?
translation.zu: dispela bai bagarapim pasin wanbel bilong ol kristen i kam long dispela kibung ?

translation.en: no !
translation.zu: nogat !

translation.en: how touching it was for observers to see greeks and turks embrace and call one another brother and sister !
translation.zu: ol brata i pilim tru gutpela pasin bilong ol grik na ol turki taim narapela i holimpas narapela na kolim ol olsem brata na sista !

translation.en: jehovah 's witnesses are known the world over for achieving peaceful relationships that transcend national , ethnic , and tribal barriers .
translation.zu: ol witnes bilong jehova i gat nem long olgeta hap long ol i save stap wanbel wantaim , maski ol i bilong narapela narapela lain , skin , o ples .

translation.en: of course , they do not claim to have perfectly attained the ideal of worldwide unity and cooperation .
translation.zu: ol i no save tok olsem pasin wanbel na pasin bilong ol long wok gut wantaim i gutpela olgeta .

translation.en: like anyone else , they have to work hard to follow the christian apostle paul 's counsel : " strip off the old personality with its practices , and clothe yourselves with the new personality . "
translation.zu: olsem ol narapela man , ol i mas wok strong bilong bihainim tok bilong aposel pol : ' yupela i mas rausim olgeta pasin bilong olpela bel , na yupela i kamap nupela man . '

translation.en: nevertheless , they strongly believe that following bible principles can help people to " seek peace and pursue it . " - 1 peter 3 : 11 .
translation.zu: tasol ol i bilip strong olsem pasin bilong bihainim ol lo bilong baibel bai helpim ol man long " kamap wanbel wantaim ol arapela manmeri . " - 1 pita 3 : 11 .

translation.en: in contrast , god 's powerful word brings out the best in people , promoting international goodwill and peace .
translation.zu: tasol tok bilong god i kirapim ol man long bihainim ol nambawan gutpela pasin , olsem pasin bilong belgut long ol narapela lain na stap bel isi wantaim ol .

translation.en: this might be your reaction to the taste of a typical hungarian goulash .
translation.zu: ating bai yu tok olsem taim yu traim wanpela kaikai bilong ol hangari ol i kolim gulas .

translation.en: peppers are even among the foods that were buried with inca mummies .
translation.zu: na ol i bin putim ol lombo wantaim ol narapela kaikai long matmat bilong ol inka .

translation.en: some historians believe that a doctor who sailed to america with columbus carried pepper seeds to spain in 1493 .
translation.zu: sampela saveman i ting wanpela dokta i go long amerika wantaim kolambas , em i bin kisim pikinini bilong diwai lombo i go long spen long yia 1493 .

translation.en: whatever the case , spain was the first european country to cultivate peppers widely .
translation.zu: tasol maski dispela samting i bin kamap o nogat , spen em i namba wan kantri long yurop i kamapim planti lombo .

translation.en: from there the pepper plant made its way to britain and to southern france , where it was more popular as a houseplant than as a seasoning or a source of food !
translation.zu: long spen ol i kisim diwai lombo i go long briten na long hap saut bilong frans , em long dispela hap ol man i laik kamapim dispela lombo olsem plaua nating na i no bilong putim long kaikai o bilong kaikai !

translation.en: later , greek tradesmen took pepper plants to the countries around the mediterranean and the black sea .
translation.zu: bihain , ol bisnisman bilong grik ol i kisim diwai lombo i go long ol kantri i stap klostu long mediterenian na solwara blaksi .

translation.en: the pepper plant has been known in hungary since the 16th century .
translation.zu: diwai lombo i bin stap long hangari kirap long yia 1550 samting .

translation.en: one of its designations , " turkish pepper , " suggests that it may have come to us by means of the turks .
translation.zu: wanpela nem ol i givim long dispela diwai em " lombo bilong turki , " na ating dispela i makim olsem ol turki i bin bringim lombo i kam long hangari .

translation.en: in any event , to this day the dark - red , aromatic , and sweet - flavored paprika of hungary is a favorite of spice lovers around the globe .
translation.zu: tasol maski em i kam long wanem hap tru , dispela retpela paprika bilong hangari i gat gutpela swit bilong en , na em i wanpela kain kari em planti man long olgeta hap ol i save laikim .

translation.en: pepper plants thrive in flat fields of brown , sandy soil bathed in plenty of sunlight .
translation.zu: diwai lombo i save kamap gutpela long hap graun i stret na i gat wesan long en , na ol inap kisim planti lait bilong san .

translation.en: farmers begin to prepare the soil for planting in late summer , right after the previous year 's harvest .
translation.zu: long ogas samting , ol fama i kirap stretim graun bilong planim lombo , bihain stret long ol i kisim lombo bilong yia i go pinis .

translation.en: pepper plants for transplanting need to be started off in a controlled environment , such as a well - ventilated greenhouse .
translation.zu: ol liklik diwai lombo bilong planim i mas go bikpela long wanpela gutpela hap - olsem long wanpela neseri em win inap i go i kam long en .

translation.en: after six to eight weeks , it is time to move the pepper seedlings to the fields .
translation.zu: long hangari ol i mekim olsem long kirap bilong mun me .

translation.en: in hungary this takes place during the first few days of may .
translation.zu: taim diwai i liklik yet ol i mas lukautim gut .

translation.en: at this stage the plants still require careful attention - the farmers must water and spray them and hoe around them if they want to harvest healthy peppers .
translation.zu: ol fama i mas putim wara long en na marasin bilong kilim ol binatang na kisim baira na brukim graun liklik sapos ol i laik kisim ol gutpela lombo .

translation.en: the harvest starts at the end of august or the beginning of september .
translation.zu: taim bilong kisim lombo i kirap long pinis bilong ogas o long kirap bilong septemba .

translation.en: a green pepper will turn a luscious red when ripe .
translation.zu: grinpela lombo bai kamap retpela taim em i mau pinis .

translation.en: unless the plants all ripen at the same time , they must be harvested by hand rather than by machine .
translation.zu: sapos ol lombo i no mau long wankain taim , ol i mas kisim ol long han na i no long masin .

translation.en: whichever harvesting method is used , the peppers will go through many physical and chemical changes before appearing on your dinner table .
translation.zu: maski ol i kisim ol lombo long wanem rot , planti samting bilong lombo bai senis paslain long yu mekim wok long en .

translation.en: for example , after harvesting , the pepper loses most of its moisture , and its sugar and vitamin - c levels decrease .
translation.zu: olsem : taim ol i kisim pinis ol lombo , bikpela hap wara bilong en bai lus , na mak bilong suga na vaitamin c bilong en bai go daun .

translation.en: after the harvest , peppers must be allowed to dry and ripen further .
translation.zu: taim ol i kisim pinis ol lombo , ol i mas larim ol i drai na mau gut .

translation.en: a traditional way of doing this has been to hang them on a string .
translation.zu: wanpela pasin bilong bipo long mekim dispela samting em olsem : ol i pasim ol lombo long rop na hangamapim .

translation.en: today , though , it is more common to put the peppers in long sacks made of material that is woven loosely , which allows air to pass through .
translation.zu: tasol long nau , ol i save putim ol lombo insait long ol longpela bek i gat ol liklik liklik hul long en bambai win inap i go i kam long en .

translation.en: once they are fully ripened , the peppers can be ground into powder to produce the delicious seasoning known by the hungarian word for pepper - paprika .
translation.zu: taim ol i mau gut pinis , ol inap memeim ol lombo i kamap paura na wokim ol i kamap wanpela kain gutpela kari em long tok ples hangari ol i kolim paprika .

translation.en: some types of paprika can be quite spicy , largely because of the presence of a chemical agent called capsaicin .
translation.zu: sampela paprika i pait liklik , long wanem , ol i gat wanpela kain marasin ( capsaicin ) long en .

translation.en: this natural product has even been used for medicinal purposes , such as for treating digestive difficulties and rheumatic pain .
translation.zu: ol i bin mekim wok long paprika olsem marasin bilong helpim man i gat sik long bel na pen long ol skru samting .

translation.en: in any event , paprika 's distinctive flavor - whether spicy or mild - is just one of its attributes .
translation.zu: tru , paprika i gat gutpela swit bilong en - maski em i pait liklik o nogat - tasol i gat narapela gutpela samting bilong en tu .

translation.en: on the aesthetic side , the dash of color that paprika adds to a dish appeals to the eyes .
translation.zu: taim yu putim liklik paprika long kaikai , kala bilong en i mekim na kaikai i luk naispela tru .

translation.en: would you like to taste a dish seasoned with paprika ?
translation.zu: yu laik traim wanpela kaikai i gat paprika long en ?

translation.en: why not try the recipe for goulash shown below ?
translation.zu: bihainim rot i stap daunbilo bilong kukim gulas .

translation.en: as we hungarians say , jó étvágyat ! - enjoy your meal !
translation.zu: olsem mipela ol hangari i save tok , jó étvágyat ! - kaikai gut !

translation.en: combating the " kiss " of death
translation.zu: sakim wanpela " kis " i kamapim dai

translation.en: in the dead of night , while you are sound asleep , it draws ever closer .
translation.zu: long biknait taim yu slip , dispela samting i wok long kam klostu long yu .

translation.en: it does not wake you .
translation.zu: em i no kirapim yu .

translation.en: indeed , you do not even stir as you receive its harmful " kiss . "
translation.zu: tru tumas , yu slip i dai na yu no surik liklik taim dispela samting i kaikaim yu .

translation.en: this nocturnal intruder is the barber beetle - also called the kissing bug - which thrives in south america .
translation.zu: dispela samting i save kam long tudak em i wanpela binatang i stap long saut amerika na ol i kolim olsem baba , o binatang i save kis long man .

translation.en: the lingering " kiss " of this insect can last up to 15 minutes as the insect slowly draws your blood .
translation.zu: inap 15 minit samting dispela binatang inap kaikaim yu na wok isi isi long pulim blut bilong yu .

translation.en: in itself , the " kiss " will not harm you .
translation.zu: hap em i kaikaim yu long en bai i no inap bagarapim yu .

translation.en: if this parasite enters your body through the eyes , the mouth , or an open cut , it can cause american trypanosomiasis , better known as chagas ' disease .
translation.zu: sapos dispela jem i go insait long bodi bilong yu long rot bilong ai , o maus , o long hap i gat sua long en , wanpela sik inap kamap ( american trypanosomiasis ) .

translation.en: in its acute stage , the most recognizable symptom of chagas ' disease is the swelling of an eye .
translation.zu: taim sik sagas i kamap nupela , wanpela samting ol i ken luksave hariap long en i olsem ai i solap .

translation.en: then , after a month or two , the symptoms usually disappear - even without treatment .
translation.zu: na insait long wanpela o tupela mun bihain dispela samting i save pinis , maski ol i no kisim marasin .

translation.en: but the worst may be yet to come .
translation.zu: tasol samting nogut moa bilong dispela sik inap kamap bihain .

translation.en: some 10 to 20 years after infection , the victim may develop cardiac problems , including rhythm disturbances or even heart failure .
translation.zu: insait long 10 o 20 yia samting bihain long taim dispela sik i kisim man , em inap kisim sik long klok , olsem klok i no wok stret , o i no wok moa .

translation.en: it is estimated that up to 18 million people are infected with chagas ' disease , and some 50,000 die from it each year .
translation.zu: sampela i ting olsem dispela sik i stap pinis long skin bilong 18 milion manmeri , na long olgeta yia i gat 50,000 manmeri i save dai long en .

translation.en: some , for example , are breast - fed children who contracted the disease through an infected mother .
translation.zu: sampela em ol pikinini i susu na kisim dispela sik i stap long skin bilong mama .

translation.en: a pregnant woman can even pass on the malady to her unborn child or infect her baby at the time of birth .
translation.zu: taim pikinini i stap yet long bel , em inap kisim dispela sik long mama bilong em o em inap kisim taim mama i karim em .

translation.en: what is being done to combat chagas ' disease ?
translation.zu: ol i mekim wanem bilong daunim sik sagas ?

translation.en: insecticides have been effective in controlling the barber beetle population .
translation.zu: ol marasin bilong kilim binatang i wok long daunim namba bilong ol binatang baba .

translation.en: the product was tested on 4,800 houses .
translation.zu: pastaim ol i traim dispela pen long 4,800 haus .

translation.en: researchers have also discovered that the leaves of the neem , or brazilian cinamomo , tree contain a nontoxic biodegradable substance ( azadirachtin ) that not only cures infected beetles but also prevents healthy ones from becoming hosts .
translation.zu: sampela lain bilong skelim ol samting i kisim save olsem ol lip bilong diwai nim ( brazilian cinamomo ) i gat wanpela kain marasin long en i no gat strong long kilim binatang , tasol dispela marasin i save oraitim sik i stap long binatang na pasim sik long kamap long ol narapela binatang .

translation.en: is there any hope for the millions of people who have been infected with chagas ' disease ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ? i gat samting bilong helpim planti milion manmeri i gat sik sagas ?

translation.en: yes .
translation.zu: i gat .

translation.en: an international team of scientists is trying to unravel the secrets of the 10,000 genes of t . cruzi .
translation.zu: sampela saientis bilong olgeta hap bilong graun ol i wok long kisim ol nupela save long ol samting bilong dispela binatang jem ( t . cruzi ) .

translation.en: in july 1997 , scientists sent one of t . cruzi 's vital proteins into outer space on the space shuttle columbia so that they could study its structure in microgravity .
translation.zu: long julai 1997 , ol saientis i salim wanpela hap bilong dispela binatang jem i go long wanpela roket ( columbia ) long skai i stap antap tru . long dispela rot ol inap skelim wanem samting win bilong antap tru i mekim long jem .

translation.en: recognizing the benefits of early treatment , brazilian biologist constança britto developed the polymerase - chain - reaction test , which makes a diagnosis possible within two days .
translation.zu: wanpela saientis bilong brasil , em constança britto , em i save olsem i gutpela sapos man i kisim marasin taim sik i nupela long skin bilong em .

translation.en: unfortunately , though , many do not even know that they have the disease when it is in its early stages .
translation.zu: olsem na em i kamapim wanpela rot bilong painimaut insait long 2 - pela de tasol olsem man i gat dispela sik o nogat .

translation.en: prevention is the key
translation.zu: abrusim sik em nambawan samting

translation.en: in conclusion , what precautions can you take if you are in a region that is home to the barber beetle ?
translation.zu: orait yu ken mekim wanem samting sapos hap yu stap long en i gat dispela binatang baba ?

translation.en: ▪ if you sleep in a mud or thatch house , try to use a bed net .
translation.zu: ▪ mekim wok long wanpela taunam sapos yu slip long wanpela haus ol i wokim long graun o long kunai .

translation.en: ▪ repair wall cracks and fissures , as these may be breeding sites for the barber beetle .
translation.zu: ol binatang baba inap mekim wok long ol kain hap olsem bilong kamapim ol pikinini .

translation.en: ▪ occasionally lay out mattresses and blankets in the sun .
translation.zu: ▪ kisim ol matres na laplap samting na putim long san sampela taim .

translation.en: ▪ remember that animals - wild and domesticated - can be carriers .
translation.zu: ▪ tingim , dispela sik inap stap long skin bilong ol animal bilong bus na ol animal bilong ples .

translation.en: ▪ if you suspect an insect to be a barber beetle , send it to the nearest health center for analysis .
translation.zu: ▪ sapos yu ting yu painim wanpela binatang baba , salim i go long etpos i stap klostu long yu na ol i ken skelim .

translation.en: symptoms vary , and some of them are not exclusive to chagas ' disease .
translation.zu: ol mak bilong dispela sik i no wankain long olgeta man , na sampela hevi bilong en i no bilong sik sagas tasol .

translation.en: hence , they are presented here merely as an overview and are not intended to serve as a basis for making a diagnosis .
translation.zu: mipela kamapim ol bikpela samting bilong dispela sik , olsem na ol tok bilong mipela i no bilong makim olsem man i gat dispela sik o nogat .

translation.en: many people do not experience any symptoms unless the disease reaches its chronic stage .
translation.zu: planti man i no save pilim wanpela samting bilong dispela sik i go inap long taim sik i laik bagarapim ol .

translation.en: centers for disease control and prevention notes that in some countries the blood supply is not always screened for chagas ' disease .
translation.zu: centers for disease control and prevention ) i tok sampela kantri ol i no save glasim blut bilong haus sik long olgeta taim bilong save olsem dispela sik sagas i stap long en o nogat .
