translation.en: in 1909 , carlos chagas , a brazilian doctor , was working in minas gerais state , brazil , where malaria was hindering the construction of a railroad .
translation.zu: long 1909 , carlos chagas , wanpela dokta bilong brasil , em i wok long minas jerais long brasil . long dispela hap sik malaria i laik pasim ol wokman long wokim wanpela rot bilong tren .

translation.en: he also noted that houses in the region were infested with insects called barber beetles , which feed on blood .
translation.zu: na tu , em i lukim olsem ol binatang baba i pulap long ol haus long dispela hap , em ol binatang i save dring blut bilong man .

translation.en: on examining the contents of the insects ' intestines , chagas discovered a new protozoan .
translation.zu: taim em i skelim bel bilong dispela binatang , em i painim wanpela nupela jem .

translation.en: he named it trypanosoma cruzi , in honor of his friend , the scientist oswaldo cruz .
translation.zu: dispela dokta i makim nem bilong dispela jem olsem trypanosoma cruzi , bilong litimapim nem bilong pren bilong em , em oswaldo cruz .

translation.en: the new disease was fittingly named after carlos chagas because of the depth of the research he did , which led to the discovery of this ailment .
translation.zu: i stret dispela nupela sik i kisim nem bilong dispela dokta , carlos chagas , long wanem , bikpela wok em i bin mekim i helpim ol long painimaut as bilong dispela sik .

translation.en: how much do you value the ability to read and write ?
translation.zu: yu pilim olsem save bilong yu long rit rait i bikpela samting ?

translation.en: some may take it for granted , but reading and writing make up our very foundation for learning .
translation.zu: sampela inap ting olsem em i samting nating , tasol save bilong rit na rait i olsem rot bilong lainim ol samting .

translation.en: remove the capacity to unlock the written word , and the key to a vast storehouse of knowledge is lost .
translation.zu: sapos yu no inap rit , bai yu no gat rot bilong kisim bikpela save long ol buk .

translation.en: for hundreds of years , the written word was inaccessible to the blind .
translation.zu: inap planti handet yia , ol aipas i no gat rot long ritim ol buk .

translation.en: during the 19th century , however , concern for their plight moved an earnest young man to develop a method of communication that opened up a new door for himself and millions of others .
translation.zu: tasol bihain long yia 1800 samting , wanpela yangpela man i tingting planti long hevi bilong ol aipas na dispela i kirapim em long kamapim wanpela samting i opim rot bilong em yet na planti milion ol narapela aipas long rit .

translation.en: hope springs from tragedy
translation.zu: hevi i kamapim gutpela samting

translation.en: louis braille was born in 1809 in the village of coupvray in france , about 25 miles [ 40 km ] from paris .
translation.zu: mama i karim louis braille long 1809 long taun kiure bilong frans , em hap i stap longwe long paris olsem 40 kilomita .

translation.en: perhaps young louis often played in his father 's workshop .
translation.zu: ating planti taim liklik louis i stap na pilai long ples wok bilong papa bilong em .

translation.en: on one occasion , however , it was the setting for a terrible accident .
translation.zu: tasol wanpela taim bikpela hevi i kamap long ples wok .

translation.en: gripping a sharp pointed tool - possibly an awl - louis inadvertently plunged it into his eye .
translation.zu: louis i holim wanpela tul i gat sap na em i popaia na sutim ai bilong em .

translation.en: the damage was irreversible .
translation.zu: ai i bagarap olgeta .

translation.en: worse still , the infection soon spread to his other eye .
translation.zu: na sik bilong dispela ai i bagarap i kalap i go long narapela ai .

translation.en: at the tender age of three , louis became totally blind .
translation.zu: olsem na taim em i gat 3 - pela krismas tasol , louis i kamap aipas .

translation.en: trying to make the best of the situation , louis ' parents and the parish priest , jacques palluy , arranged for louis to sit in on classes held at the local school .
translation.zu: maski i gat samting nogut i bin kamap , papamama bilong louis na wanpela pris , em jacques palluy , ol i laik helpim louis .

translation.en: in fact , some years he was at the head of his class !
translation.zu: louis i kisim gut planti samting em i bin harim , na long sampela yia em i stap nambawan bilong klas !

translation.en: but there were limits to what a blind person could learn using methods that were designed for the sighted .
translation.zu: tasol ol aipas i no inap kisim save long olgeta samting long wankain rot ol lain i no gat dispela hevi i save mekim .

translation.en: hence , in 1819 , louis was enrolled in the royal institute for blind youth .
translation.zu: olsem na long 1819 , ol i putim nem bilong louis long wanpela skul bilong ol aipas .

translation.en: the founder of the institute , valentin haüy , was one of the first to establish a program to help the blind to read .
translation.zu: man i kamapim dispela skul , em valentin haüy , em i namba wan man i bin kamapim skul bilong helpim ol aipas long lain long rit .

translation.en: his desire was to combat the prevailing notion that blindness precluded a person from the benefits of a formal education .
translation.zu: em i laik daunim dispela tingting bilong planti man olsem ol aipas i no inap tru kisim wankain skul olsem ol man i gat gutpela ai .

translation.en: braille learned how to read the large embossed letters in the books of haüy 's small library .
translation.zu: braille i lainim dispela pasin bilong putim han long ol bikpela leta bilong ritim buk long laibreri bilong valentin haüy .

translation.en: he realized , however , that this approach to learning was slow and impractical .
translation.zu: tasol em i ting dispela pasin i kisim bikpela hap taim na i no gutpela tumas .

translation.en: fortunately , someone else who recognized these limitations was about to appear on the scene .
translation.zu: olsem na i no longtaim na i gat narapela man i pilim olsem dispela pasin bilong rit i no gutpela tumas .

translation.en: in 1821 , when louis braille was just 12 years old , charles barbier , a retired french artillery captain , visited the institute .
translation.zu: long 1821 , taim louis braille i gat 12 - pela krismas , charles barbier i kam na raun long dispela skul bilong ol aipas .

translation.en: night writing was developed for use on the battlefield .
translation.zu: ol i kamapim bilong helpim ol lain ami i stap long pait .

translation.en: this concept of using a code to represent words phonetically struck a responsive chord at the school .
translation.zu: dispela pasin bilong mekim wok long sampela mak tasol bilong makim ol leta i kirapim tru tingting bilong ol lain long skul .

translation.en: braille enthusiastically applied himself to this new approach and even made improvements to it .
translation.zu: braille i lainim dispela nupela samting na em i wok long mekim i kamap gutpela moa .

translation.en: but to make the system truly practical , braille had to persevere .
translation.zu: tasol bilong wokim dispela pasin bilong rit i kamap gutpela moa , braille i mas wok strong .

translation.en: in 1824 , at the age of 15 , louis braille completed a six - dot cell system .
translation.zu: long 1824 , taim louis braille i gat 15 krismas , em i pinisim dispela wok bilong kamapim ol mak bilong ol wan wan leta bilong ol abc .

translation.en: soon thereafter , braille began teaching at the institute , and in 1829 he published his unique method of communication known today by his name .
translation.zu: na long 1829 , em i kamapim wanpela buk i gat dispela narapela kain pasin bilong rit long en , na long taim bilong yumi nem bilong em i makim samting em i kamapim .

translation.en: the late 1820 ' s saw the publication of the first book that explained braille 's raised - dot invention ; but the invention was slow to gain wide acceptance .
translation.zu: klostu long yia 1900 , ol i kamapim namba wan buk i stori gut long samting braille i bin kamapim olsem ol mak mak ol i sutim long pepa ; tasol pastaim i no planti man i mekim wok long dispela samting .

translation.en: the watchtower society began making such material available in 1912 , when the code was still being standardized for the english - speaking world .
translation.zu: sosaiti wastaua i kirap na wokim ol nius samting long rait brel long 1912 ; long dispela taim i gat wok yet long stretim ol rait bilong ol lain i save bihainim tok inglis .

translation.en: today , using advanced braille printing methods , the society embosses millions of pages each year in eight languages and distributes these to over 70 countries .
translation.zu: long olgeta yia , ol i wokim ol nius na buk samting long rait brel long 8 - pela tok ples , na bihain ol i salim i go long 70 ol narapela kantri .

translation.en: today the simple , well - crafted braille code makes the written word available to millions who are visually impaired - thanks to the dedicated efforts of a young boy almost 200 years ago .
translation.zu: long nau , dispela gutpela rait brel i mekim na planti milion aipas inap ritim ol samting - bikpela tenkyu i go long dispela yangpela manki i bin givim bel tru long kamapim dispela kain rait long 200 yia i go pinis .

translation.en: unlocking the braille code
translation.zu: bilong kisim save long rait brel

translation.en: there are 63 possible dot combinations in each braille cell .
translation.zu: i gat 63 narapela narapela mak i makim ol wan wan leta bilong abc samting .

translation.en: hence , all the letters and punctuation in most alphabets can be assigned a specific combination of dots .
translation.zu: olsem na olgeta leta na ol koma samting bilong planti tok ples i gat sampela mak bilong en .

translation.en: several languages use a contracted form of braille , in which some cells stand for frequently occurring letter combinations or entire words .
translation.zu: sampela tok ples i gat ol mak bilong makim sampela tok ol i mekim wok long en planti taim .

translation.en: some people have become so proficient at braille that they can read up to 200 words per minute !
translation.zu: sampela manmeri i lainim gut tru dispela pasin bilong rit long rait brel , olsem insait long wanpela minit ol i ken ritim 200 narapela narapela tok !

translation.en: as our boat takes its final turn heading for the port of the greek island of santorini , we are confronted with a breathtaking scene .
translation.zu: taim bot bilong mipela i tanim i go long bris bilong ailan santarini bilong kantri grik , wanpela hap i gutpela tru i kamap ples klia .

translation.en: a high wall of threatening cliffs rises almost a thousand feet [ 300 m ] out of the sea .
translation.zu: ol bikpela maunten ston i go antap long solwara olsem 300 mita .

translation.en: stark white houses are perched on the precipices .
translation.zu: ol waitpela haus i stap antap long arere bilong ol dispela maunten .

translation.en: the making of an island
translation.zu: wanpela ailan i kamap

translation.en: in ancient times the island of santorini - today also known as santorin or thíra - was called strongyle , meaning " round . "
translation.zu: ailan santarini i gat sampela nem moa long nau , olsem santarin na tira - tasol long bipo tru ol i kolim olsem strangili , insait bilong dispela nem i olsem " raunpela . "

translation.en: but according to experts , a mighty volcanic eruption changed the shape of the island nearly 3,500 years ago .
translation.zu: tasol ol saveman i tok olsem volkeno i bin pairap bikpela tru klostu 3,500 yia i go pinis , na bihain long pairap dispela ailan i no raunpela moa .

translation.en: evidently , a large explosion blew open a wide caldera at the center of the island , forming a deep basin , and the sea rushed in to fill it .
translation.zu: i luk olsem bikpela pairap i mekim na traipela hul i kamap namel long ailan na i go daun tru , na taim hul i op , solwara i go insait na pulapim hul .

translation.en: some volcanologists speculate that the thunder of the blast traveled to europe , asia , and africa and that it knocked down buildings up to a hundred miles [ 150 km ] away .
translation.zu: sampela man bilong skelim volkeno i ting olsem strongpela krai bilong dispela pairap bilong volkeno i bin go long yurop , esia , na afrika na pairap i mekim na sampela haus samting i stap longwe olsem 150 kilomita ol i pundaun .

translation.en: the choking ash , they claim , must have blocked out sunlight over the entire mediterranean basin for several days .
translation.zu: ol i tok ol pipia i kam long volkeno na stap long win , em i bin pasim lait bilong san long ol hap bilong mediterenian inap sampela de .

translation.en: in all , 32 square miles [ 80 sq km ] of the island disappeared into the air or fell into the sea .
translation.zu: bikpela hap , olsem 80 skwe kilomita , bilong dispela ailan i lus long dispela taim , olsem em i pairap na go long win o i pundaun i go insait long solwara .

translation.en: in time , what was left of strongyle came to be inhabited by mainland settlers , and the island was renamed calliste , meaning " most beautiful . "
translation.zu: isi isi sampela man long bikples i kam na stap long hap bilong ailan i no bagarap , na ailan i kisim narapela nem olsem kalisti , insait bilong en i olsem " naispela moa yet . "

translation.en: but living on a volcano offered the settlers an existence that was literally shaky .
translation.zu: tasol ol i sindaun long wanpela volkeno , na dispela i mekim na planti taim guria i seksekim ol .

translation.en: then , in 1956 an earthquake devastated many of the island 's homes .
translation.zu: na long 1956 , wanpela guria i bagarapim planti haus i stap long ailan .

translation.en: " the ground was shaking and trembling like jelly , " says kyra eleni , an elderly woman who lived through that catastrophic event .
translation.zu: wanpela lapun meri i bin abrusim bagarap long dispela taim nogut , em kyra eleni , em i tok : " graun i wok long guria na seksek .

translation.en: " in front of the courtyard of my house , which was perched on a cliff , there was a gravel pathway .
translation.zu: haus bilong mi i sindaun antap long wanpela maunten , na i gat wanpela rot bilong wokabaut i kam klostu long haus .

translation.en: we had to abandon that house and build a new one on more stable ground . "
translation.zu: mipela mas lusim dispela haus na wokim nupela haus long hap graun i no save seksek tumas . "

translation.en: today santorini plays host to thousands of visitors who flock there each summer .
translation.zu: long nau , i gat planti tausen man i kam long santarini long taim bilong san .

translation.en: in addition , cradled in the midst of santorini 's caldera are two volcanic islets - néa kaméni and palaía kaméni .
translation.zu: na tu , tupela liklik ailan tru i stap long dispela bikpela hul em volkeno i bin kamapim long namba wan taim em i bin pairap , em ne kameni na palea kameni .

translation.en: volcanic activity can still be seen on these recently formed islets , as the ' sleeping giant ' occasionally awakes and spews wisps of smoke .
translation.zu: long dispela tupela nupela ailan , yu inap lukim liklik smok em traipela volkeno i kamapim long wan wan taim .

translation.en: the overall shape of santorini is ever changing , so that from time to time , its map must be redrawn .
translation.zu: mak bilong ailan santarini i wok long senis senis , olsem na sampela taim ol i mas senisim mep bilong en .

translation.en: living on the edge
translation.zu: ol haus i stap arere tru

translation.en: on the caldera rim of santorini , there are no slopes , only precipices .
translation.zu: long dispela hap i gat wanpela rot bilong wokim haus na i no hatwok tumas .

translation.en: the perpendicular landmasses provide the islanders with the simplest of solutions for home building : dig a horizontal tunnel in the ground , build a wall across the mouth , and move in .
translation.zu: ol i wokim olsem : ol i digim bikpela hul i go insait long maunten na ol i wokim banis long maus bilong hul na em tasol , em kamap haus bilong ol .

translation.en: yes , most of the homes found on the caldera are hewn out of rock .
translation.zu: planti ol lain bilong dispela hap i sindaun long ol haus ol i bin katim long ston .

translation.en: in front of each such home is a courtyard , or balcony , overlooking the caldera .
translation.zu: olgeta haus i gat wanpela veranda , na long veranda ol i ken lukim solwara .

translation.en: the courtyard of the upper house is the rooftop of the house located underneath .
translation.zu: veranda bilong wanpela haus i stap olsem rup bilong haus i stap daunbilo .

translation.en: you can enjoy spectacular sunsets from these balconies , savoring the purple sun as it slowly and majestically disappears into the sea .
translation.zu: yu ken stap long ol dispela veranda na lukim ol gutpela kala tru i kamap taim san i wok long go daun olgeta long hap bilong solwara .

translation.en: some courtyards also contain a tiny kitchen , a henhouse or two , and potted plants of fragrant herbs and flowers .
translation.zu: long sampela veranda ol i wokim liklik haus kuk , na hap bilong lukautim kakaruk , na ol i planim sampela plaua na sayor samting i gat gutpela smel .

translation.en: not even the vaults are symmetrical .
translation.zu: ol haus yet i no skwe .

translation.en: this plethora of random lines and curves , meeting to form the most unlikely of shapes , lends a gentleness to the clusters of buildings , which is surprising on such a rugged , jagged island .
translation.zu: ol dispela samting i mekim na ples i narapela kain , olsem ol maunten yet i go antap na i stret , tasol mak bilong ol haus samting i narapela narapela kain , na ol i stap nabaut nabaut .

translation.en: santorini is very dry .
translation.zu: santarini em i ples drai .

translation.en: the only water available is the collected rainwater stored in cisterns .
translation.zu: ol i kisim wara long ren tasol , em ol i save pulimapim long ol tang .

translation.en: hence , the limited hinterland of the island produces a variety of crops .
translation.zu: olsem na liklik hap graun i stap long ailan i save kamapim kain kain kaikai .

translation.en: for both the tourist and the native , santorini is a unique and magnificent monument to the beauty of our planet .
translation.zu: ol turis na ol as ples , ol i pilim tru olsem santarini i wanpela gutpela ples tru bilong dispela graun bilong yumi .

translation.en: a myth that may have originated in egypt , survived in classical greek writings , and then emerged in medieval traditions by arabian geographers is that of the lost continent , island , or city of atlantis .
translation.zu: i gat wanpela stori nating i bin kamap long isip pastaim , na tu , dispela stori i stap long olpela rait bilong ol grik , na bihain i kamap olsem stori tumbuna bilong ol lain bilong arap i wokim ol mep .

translation.en: atlantis presumably disappeared into the sea as a result of earthquakes and floods .
translation.zu: ol i ting olsem sampela bikpela guria na tait wara i mekim na atlantis i lus long solwara .

translation.en: excavations that began here in 1966 / 67 revealed a rich , royal minoan city buried under the volcanic debris , preserved just as it was at the time of the eruption .
translation.zu: taim ol i digim graun long 1966 na 1967 long santarini , ol i painim wanpela taun bilong king em ol pipia bilong volkeno i bin karamapim . taim ol i rausim ol pipia , ol i lukim olsem taun i stap wankain olsem long bipo tru .

translation.en: some researchers speculate that the unwillingness of the inhabitants to admit that their once splendid city was gone gave birth to the legend of an atlantis remaining alive and well , continuing its city life at the bottom of the sea .
translation.zu: sampela saveman i ting ol lain bilong dispela taun i no laik tokaut olsem gutpela ples bilong ol i lus , na long dispela as i gat wanpela stori i kamap olsem taun atlantis i stap long as bilong solwara na ol man i stap gut long en .

translation.zu: santarini

translation.en: the bible 's viewpoint
translation.zu: baibel i tok wanem ?

translation.en: if you follow the teachings of some eastern religions , you may believe that it is something that brings greater clarity of thought or special enlightenment .
translation.zu: sapos yu bihainim tingting bilong sampela lotu long hap bilong is , ating bai yu gat tingting olsem dispela pasin bai mekim na tingting bilong yu i klia tru , o long dispela rot bai yu kisim narapela kain save .

translation.en: other forms of meditation are said to encourage filling your mind with " universal truths of wisdom . "
translation.zu: sampela i tok olsem pasin bilong tingim wanpela " tok tru olgeta man i save long en " i olsem narapela rot bilong tingim tingim samting long bel .

translation.en: consider the biblical example of a man named isaac , who at the age of 40 had much to meditate on .
translation.zu: tingim tok bilong baibel i stori long pasin aisak i mekim . em i gat 40 krismas na i gat planti samting em i mas tingim .

translation.en: genesis 24 : 63 states : " isaac was out walking in order to meditate in the field at about the falling of evening . "
translation.zu: stat 24 : 63 ( nw ) i tok : " taim san i laik go daun , aisak i wokabaut long ples i gat sotpela gras bambai em i ken tingim tingim ol samting long bel . "

translation.en: there is no reason to assume that isaac emptied his mind of thought or that he was merely contemplating a vague ' universal truth of wisdom . '
translation.zu: i no gat as bilong ting olsem aisak i rausim olgeta samting i stap long tingting na em i wokabaut , o em i wok long tingim wanpela kain ' tok tru olgeta man i save long en . '

translation.en: isaac likely had specific things to think about , such as his future , the loss of his mother , or who his wife was to be .
translation.zu: i luk olsem aisak i gat planti samting bilong tingting long en , olsem i dai bilong mama bilong em , na ol samting em yet bai mekim long bihain , na husat bai stap olsem meri bilong em .

translation.en: he made use of some private time in the evening to meditate , likely on such vital matters .
translation.zu: em i mekim wok long hap taim em i stap wanpis long apinun bilong tingim gut ol dispela bikpela samting .

translation.en: there is more to meditation
translation.zu: bilong tingim tingim long bel

translation.en: consider the example of the psalmist david .
translation.zu: tingim pasin bilong devit , em man bilong raitim song .

translation.en: he faced an array of seemingly insurmountable problems , and he well knew that as an imperfect man , he needed help from god in conducting himself aright .
translation.zu: em i gat kain kain bikpela hevi i hatwok long stretim , na em i save em i wanpela sinman , na bilong bihainim pasin i stret em i mas i gat helpim i kam long god .

translation.en: what fortified david through difficult circumstances ?
translation.zu: wanem samting i bin strongim devit long karim ol hevi ?

translation.en: as recorded at psalm 19 : 14 , david said : " let the sayings of my mouth and the meditation of my heart become pleasurable before you , o jehovah my rock and my redeemer . "
translation.zu: olsem song 19 : 14 i kamapim , devit i tok : " bikpela , mi laik bai tok bilong mi na tingting bilong mi i ken i orait long ai bilong yu . bikpela , yu ples hait bilong mi na helpim bilong mi . "

translation.en: the hebrew word here translated " meditation " comes from a root word literally meaning " speak with oneself . "
translation.zu: insait bilong dispela tok hibru ol i tanim olsem tingim tingim long bel i olsem " toktok wantaim yu yet . "

translation.en: yes , david ' spoke with himself ' about jehovah , his activity , his works , his laws , and his righteousness . - psalm 143 : 5 .
translation.zu: em nau , devit i bin " toktok wantaim em yet " long ol samting bilong jehova , olsem wok bilong em , lo bilong em , na gutpela pasin bilong em . - song 143 : 5 .

translation.en: the apostle paul admonished : " whatever things are true , whatever things are of serious concern , whatever things are righteous , whatever things are chaste , whatever things are lovable , whatever things are well spoken of , whatever virtue there is and whatever praiseworthy thing there is , continue considering these things . "
translation.zu: aposel pol i tokim ol kristen : " oltaim yupela i mas tingting tasol long ol pasin i tru na ol pasin i gutpela long ol man i mekim na ol stretpela pasin na ol klinpela pasin na ol naispela samting na ol samting i gutpela tru na olgeta pasin i nambawan tru na olgeta pasin yumi save amamas tru long lukim ol man i mekim . "

translation.en: of course , in order to think upbuilding thoughts , these " things " that paul spoke of would need to enter our minds at some point .
translation.zu: tasol bilong tingting long ol gutpela samting i strongim bel , i mas i gat wanpela taim yumi bin putim ol dispela tok bilong pol long tingting bilong yumi .

translation.en: the psalmist provides an answer .
translation.zu: man i raitim song i bekim dispela askim .

translation.en: psalm 1 : 1 , 2 reads : " happy is the man that has not walked in the counsel of the wicked ones . . .
translation.zu: song 1 : 1 , 2 i tok : " man i no save bihainim tok bilong ol man nogut , . . . dispela man i ken amamas tru .

translation.en: his delight is in the law of jehovah , and in his law he reads in an undertone day and night . "
translation.zu: dispela man i save laikim tumas lo bilong god , na em i save tingting long dispela lo long san na long nait . "

translation.en: reading the bible is invaluable , but after reading , we must meditate , think deeply , or " speak with ourselves " about what we have read .
translation.zu: wok bilong ritim baibel i bikpela samting tru , tasol taim yumi ritim sampela hap pinis , yumi mas tingim tingim long bel o " toktok wantaim yumi yet " long ol samting yumi bin ritim .

translation.en: just as digestion is needed if we are to benefit fully from the food we eat , meditation is needed if we are to absorb what we read in the bible .
translation.zu: olsem skin i mas mekim wok long kaikai bilong helpim bodi , olsem tasol yumi mas tingim tingim long bel ol samting yumi ritim long baibel sapos yumi laik kisim gut insait bilong en .

translation.en: it also allows us to consider bible - based solutions to our problems .
translation.zu: dispela i helpim yumi long tingim wanem tok bilong baibel yumi ken bihainim bilong stretim hevi bilong yumi .

translation.en: such meditation can help us deal successfully with the anxieties of day - to - day life . - matthew 6 : 25 - 32 .
translation.zu: na em i ken helpim yumi long karim ol hevi bilong ol wan wan de . - matyu 6 : 25 - 32 .

translation.en: he stated : " the mouth of the righteous is the one that utters wisdom in an undertone . "
translation.zu: em i tok : " stretpela man i gat gutpela save na i autim gutpela tok tasol . "

translation.en: for example , the bible says that " the path of the righteous ones is like the bright light that is getting lighter and lighter until the day is firmly established . "
translation.zu: i olsem baibel i tok : " rot bilong ol stretpela man i lait olsem san i kamap long moningtaim , na lait i wok long kamap strong moa , inap long belo . "

translation.en: the apostle paul told timothy : " ponder over these things ; be absorbed in them , that your advancement may be manifest to all persons .
translation.zu: aposel pol i tokim timoti : " oltaim yu mas lukautim gut ol dispela wok bilong yu .

translation.en: yes , what we say and do can have a profound effect on others .
translation.zu: tru tumas , toktok bilong yumi na pasin bilong yumi inap mekim bikpela samting long ol narapela .

translation.en: clearly , we have many reasons to engage in deep , concentrated thinking about important things .
translation.zu: em nau , yumi save i gat planti as na yumi laik tingim gut tru ol bikpela samting .

translation.en: it is vital to reflect on our past experiences , ponder over current matters , and thoughtfully contemplate our future .
translation.zu: yumi mas tingim ol samting i bin kamap long yumi long bipo na tingim ol samting bilong yumi long nau na ol samting bilong bihain .

translation.en: but above all , our meditation will bring us the greatest enlightenment if our thoughts center on the wisdom of our creator , jehovah god .
translation.zu: tasol nambawan bikpela samting i olsem , sapos yumi tingim tingim long bel ol save bilong man i bin wokim olgeta samting , em god jehova , dispela bai helpim yumi moa yet .

translation.en: earthquake !
translation.zu: guria !

translation.en: " i was lying down , reading in my ninth - floor apartment in taipei when the lights began to fade .
translation.zu: " mi slip long bet na rit i stap long rum bilong mi long namba 9 plua bilong wanpela bikpela haus , na nau lait i wok long dai .

translation.en: then the room began to move violently .
translation.zu: na wantu , rum i wok long guria nogut tru .

translation.en: it was as if some monster had grabbed the building and was shaking it from side to side .
translation.zu: i olsem traipela samting nogut i holim dispela haus na wok long seksekim .

translation.en: it seemed to go on and on . " - a journalist living in taiwan .
translation.zu: i olsem dispela guria i no laik pinis . " - wanpela niusman i stap long taiwan .

translation.en: earthquake .
translation.zu: guria .

translation.en: the very mention of the word elicits fear , and recently you may have heard it with alarming regularity . according to the u.s .
translation.zu: dispela tok i save kirapim ol man long pret , na long nau ating yu harim stori bilong dispela samting klostu klostu .

translation.en: geological survey , more than the usual number of major earthquakes occurred during 1999 , and the number of deaths resulting was double the annual average .
translation.zu: olsem wanpela ripot i tok , planti guria moa i bin kamap long 1999 , na namba bilong ol man i dai long ol dispela guria i bikpela moa , winim ol narapela taim bipo .

translation.en: the largest earthquake of 1999 took place in taiwan , where two major plates of the earth 's crust converge .
translation.zu: nambawan bikpela guria bilong 1999 i bin kamap long taiwan , long dispela hap em graun i stap insait tru i bruk long tupela bikpela hap .

translation.en: in all , there are 51 recognized fault lines running through taiwan .
translation.zu: long taiwan i gat 51 ol narapela narapela hap insait long graun i bruk olsem .

translation.en: most of them , though , are too small to be felt .
translation.zu: tasol planti bilong ol dispela guria i liklik tumas na ol man i no pilim .

translation.en: not so on september 21 , 1999 .
translation.zu: tasol long septemba 21 , 1999 , i no olsem .

translation.en: at 1 : 47 a.m . , taiwan was rocked by an earthquake so severe that president lee teng - hui dubbed it " the island 's worst in a century . "
translation.zu: long 1 : 47 bikmoning , bikpela guria tru i seksekim taiwan . guria i strong tru , olsem na presiden lee teng - hui bilong taiwan i tok " insait long wan handet yia samting i no gat bikpela guria olsem long dispela ailan . "

translation.en: * the depth of the temblor was just over half a mile [ 1 km ] , and its shallow nature caused its effects to be fully felt .
translation.zu: * dispela guria i kirap long hap i stap insait long graun inap long 1 kilomita tasol , olsem na ol man i bin pilim tru strong bilong dispela guria .

translation.en: " furnishings fell , and even the ceiling light came crashing down .
translation.zu: ol samting insait long haus i wok long pundaun , na lait tu i pundaun na mekim bikpela pairap .

translation.en: i was unable to get out because the door was jammed by fallen objects and broken glass . "
translation.zu: mi no inap lusim haus na go ausait , long wanem , ol samting i pundaun na ol glas i bruk bruk na dua i no inap op . "

translation.en: huang shu - hong , who was thrown out of bed by the quake , met with a different challenge .
translation.zu: huang shu - hong i slip long bet na guria i tromoi em i go long plua , na narapela kain hevi i painim em .

translation.en: " i stumbled outside and spent the rest of the night with neighbors on the roadside .
translation.zu: mi na ol lain i stap klostu long mi , mipela stap long rot inap long tulait .

translation.en: the ground didn 't seem to stop moving . "
translation.zu: i olsem graun i no malolo long seksek . "

translation.en: at dawn the effects of the earthquake were evident .
translation.zu: taim tulait i bruk , ol samting guria i bin mekim i kamap ples klia .

translation.en: as many as 12,000 structures , from single - story homes to multistory apartment buildings , had collapsed .
translation.zu: i gat olsem 12,000 haus i bagarap , em ol liklik haus wantaim ol bikpela haus i gat planti plua long en .

translation.en: for example , a six - year - old boy was rescued after being trapped for 87 hours .
translation.zu: olsem , ol i bin painim wanpela pikinini man i gat 6 - pela krismas , na em i bin stap kalabus insait long pipia inap 87 aua pinis .

translation.en: and in taipei , while workers were using heavy equipment to clear away the wreckage of a collapsed 12 - story residence building , a young man suddenly emerged .
translation.zu: na long taipe , taim ol wokman i mekim wok long ol bikpela masin na rausim pipia bilong wanpela bikpela haus i bin i gat 12 - pela plua long en , wanpela yangpela man i lusim pipia na kam ausait .

translation.en: he and his brother had been trapped inside for more than five days , and both survived the ordeal !
translation.zu: dispela man wantaim brata bilong em , tupela i abrusim bagarap maski pipia i kalabusim ol inap 5 - pela de !

translation.en: for instance , one team leader lamented : " we heard a child crying until eight hours ago . but then it stopped . "
translation.zu: bos bilong wanpela lain wokman i bel hevi na i tok olsem : " mipela i bin harim krai bilong wanpela pikinini , tasol nau inap long 8 - pela aua mipela i no harim moa . "

translation.en: a huge effort was launched to provide shelter for the hundreds of thousands who were left homeless by the earthquake .
translation.zu: ol i kirap na mekim bikpela wok tru bilong painim ples slip bilong planti handet tausen manmeri em guria i mekim na ol i no gat haus moa .

translation.en: at first , some victims were a bit hesitant to go back indoors .
translation.zu: pastaim sampela i pret long stap insait long wanpela haus .

translation.en: this is understandable , for during the ten - day period following the initial quake , nearly 10,000 aftershocks were recorded !
translation.zu: i no hatwok long save long as bilong dispela pret , long wanem , inap long 10 - pela de bihain long bikpela guria i gat 10,000 ol liklik guria i wok long kamap !

translation.en: a number of nongovernmental organizations - including foreign rescue teams , the buddhist group tzu chi , and fire fighters - contributed their time and skill to the work at hand .
translation.zu: sampela ol oganaisesen i no bilong gavman - em ol lain i kam long ol narapela kantri , na tzu chi , em wanpela lain bilong lotu buda , na ol lain bilong daunim paia - olgeta i lusim bikpela hap taim na save bilong ol long mekim ol wok .

translation.en: in the spirit of the bible counsel at galatians 6 : 10 , they had two goals .
translation.zu: olsem galesia 6 : 10 i makim , i gat tupela samting ol i laik mekim .

translation.en: they wanted to ( 1 ) provide for those related to them in the faith and ( 2 ) do good toward all , including those who do not share their beliefs .
translation.zu: namba wan i olsem ol i laik helpim ol wanbilip , na namba tu i olsem ol i laik mekim gutpela pasin long olgeta man , maski ol i no wanbilip bilong ol .

translation.en: by the end of the first day , jehovah 's witnesses were trucking in food , water , tents , and outdoor cooking equipment .
translation.zu: taim dispela de bilong bikpela guria i laik pinis , ol witnes i wok long bungim ol kaikai , wara , haus sel , na ol praimas samting , na salim i kam .

translation.en: since all communications were down , elders from the six congregations in the affected area made a concerted effort to search out fellow witnesses and their relatives as well as bible students and interested ones .
translation.zu: ol telefon i no wok , olsem na ol elda bilong ol 6 - pela kongrigesen long dispela hap i gat bagarap long en , ol i wok strong tru long painim ol wanbilip na ol famili bilong ol wanbilip , na ol baibel - stadi na ol man i laikim tok i tru .

translation.en: each congregation made up a list of those needing assistance .
translation.zu: ol wan wan kongrigesen i wokim lista bilong husat i mas i gat sampela helpim .

translation.en: then , under the direction of the regional building committee , teams of volunteers were sent to make needed repairs .
translation.zu: ol i mekim olsem na nau komiti bilong wokim ol haus kingdom i salim ol lain volantia long stretim ol dispela samting .

translation.en: within a month after the quake , the work was complete .
translation.zu: insait long wanpela mun bihain long guria , ol i pinisim ol dispela wok .

translation.en: jehovah 's witnesses also extended help to their non - witness neighbors .
translation.zu: na tu , ol witnes bilong jehova i bin helpim ol narapela lain i no wanlotu bilong ol .

translation.en: they also distributed photocopies of the article " natural disasters - helping your child to cope , " published in the june 22 , 1996 , issue of awake !
translation.zu: na ol i tilim planti kopi bilong wanpela stori i stap long kirap ! bilong jun 22 , 1996 long tok inglis ( natural disasters - helping your child to cope ) .

translation.en: many people were grateful to receive this information and began reading it immediately .
translation.zu: planti manmeri i amamas long kisim dispela nius na wantu ol i kirap na ritim .

translation.en: those who study the bible realize that it long ago foretold that the last days of this system of things would be marked by " earthquakes in one place after another . "
translation.zu: ol man i stadi long baibel ol i save , long bipo yet tok bilong en i makim olsem long taim bilong las de " graun bai i guria . "

translation.en: but the bible also provides assurance that soon , under the peaceful rule of god 's kingdom , mankind will no longer live in fear of natural disasters .
translation.zu: tasol narapela tok bilong baibel i makim olsem klostu nau ol man bai kisim bel isi long wok kingdom bilong god bai kamapim , na bai ol i no pret moa long ol bikpela guria samting .

translation.en: at that time the earth will truly be a paradise . - isaiah 65 : 17 , 21 , 23 ; luke 23 : 43 .
translation.zu: long dispela taim graun bai kamap ples paradais tru tru . - aisaia 65 : 17 , 21 , 23 ; luk 23 : 43 .

translation.en: rather than follow " traditional belief systems , [ north ] americans ' pick and choose ' what they want to believe , often mixing ideas from within one religion or blending two or more religions into a personal belief system , " reports canada 's national post newspaper .

translation.en: the study also reveals that " there is a glaring lack of knowledge about the bible , basic doctrines and the traditions of one 's own religion " and that " often the faith professed is superficial , with people not knowing what they believe or why , " says the newspaper .
translation.zu: nius i tok , dispela ripot i kamapim tu olsem " planti ol i no gat save long baibel , na long bilip na pasin bilong lotu bilong ol yet " na " planti man i bilip nating long skin tasol , na ol i no save ol i bilip long wanem samting na bilong wanem ol i bilip long en . "

"

translation.en: " the stronger the coffee , the better the removal , " said environmental chemist dr .

translation.en: similar experiments were conducted with tea bags , but while tea takes out about a third of the lead , it did not seem to have much effect on copper .
translation.zu: ol i mekim wankain traim long ol ti - bek , tasol ti inap rausim 33 pesen bilong ain let tasol , na em i no inap rausim kopa .

translation.zu: wanpela lain ( israelwire ) bilong kamapim nius i tok , nambawan rabai bilong israel , mordehai eliyahu , em i bin kamapim sampela tok bilong helpim ol bilipman i no save gut long ol samting ol i ken mekim na ol samting ol i no ken mekim .

translation.en: the rabbi explained that building a snowman is " work , " even if it is just for fun .
translation.zu: dispela rabai i tok , pasin bilong wokim aisman em i wanpela " wok , " maski em i samting bilong amamas tasol .

translation.en: hence this activity falls under the sabbath restrictions .
translation.zu: olsem na lo bilong sabat i tambuim dispela samting .

translation.zu: tasol pasin bilong tromoi na paitim man long ol bal ol i wokim long ais i no wanpela wok , olsem na em i orait long mekim dispela samting .

translation.en: adult brains produce new nerve cells ?
translation.zu: kru bilong man i wokim ol nupela sel

translation.en: " for decades , it was axiomatic that people were born with all the brain cells they would ever have , " states the new york times .
translation.zu: nius the new york times i tok : " inap planti yia ol man i bin ting olsem taim mama i karim pikinini em i kisim pinis olgeta sel bilong kru em bai kisim . "

translation.en: even though as far back as 1965 , experiments with certain animals indicated that their brains were generating new nerve cells , many neurologists believed that this did not happen in humans .
translation.zu: long 1965 , ol i bin mekim ol traim long sampela animal na save ol i kisim i kamapim olsem kru bilong ol i wokim ol nupela sel bilong ol rop wailis olsem nev , tasol planti dokta i bin ting dispela samting i no save kamap long ol man .

translation.en: during the past decade , however , evidence has mounted to indicate that the brain does produce new nerve cells and that it may be constantly renewing itself .
translation.zu: tasol insait long 10 - pela yia i go pinis , save ol i kisim i kamapim klia olsem kru bilong man i save wokim ol nupela sel bilong ol nev , na ating long olgeta taim kru i wok long stretim em yet .

translation.en: last year researchers discovered that new cells were formed in a part of the human brain associated with short - term memory .
translation.zu: long yia i go pinis , ol saveman i kisim save olsem ol nupela sel i kamap long hap bilong kru bilong man i helpim em long tingim ol samting i bin kamap long nau .

translation.en: some scientists now believe that " the brain may be repairing itself all the time . "
translation.zu: sampela saveman long nau ol i ting " kru i wok long stretim em yet long olgeta taim . "

translation.en: acute stress linked to child abuse
translation.zu: ol hevi na pasin bilong mekim nogut long pikinini

translation.en: researchers at emory university in atlanta compared stress hormone levels and heart rates of women who had previously been abused with those of nonabused women , while the women were performing a stressful task .
translation.zu: ol saveman long yunivesiti emori long atlanta , ol i skelim ol meri em ol man i bin mekim nogut long ol na ol meri em ol man i no bin mekim nogut long ol . ol i skelim mak bilong wanpela kain homon na hamas taim klok i pam insait long wanpela minit .

translation.en: those who had suffered child abuse showed markedly elevated levels of stress hormones and increased heart rates in response to stress .
translation.zu: mak bilong ol homon bilong ol meri em ol man i bin mekim nogut long ol taim ol i pikinini yet i go antap tru , na klok bilong ol i pam hariap moa .

translation.en: the researchers conclude that " there may be a permanent biochemical disruption in the way their bodies respond to and regulate stress , " states the newspaper .
translation.zu: nius i tok , ol saveman i ting " pasin bilong skin bilong ol dispela meri long pilim hevi na karim hevi inap senis olgeta . "

translation.en: heavy backpacks
translation.zu: ol hevipela ruksak

translation.en: a study by the american academy of orthopedic surgeons has shown that there is a close relationship between back and shoulder pain in children and the heavy backpacks that some children carry .
translation.zu: ripot bilong wanpela lain ( american academy of orthopedic surgeons ) i bin kamapim olsem ol hevipela ruksak em sampela pikinini i save karim , i kamapim pen long baksait na long sol bilong ol .

translation.en: after stuffing their backpacks with schoolbooks , food and drink , musical instruments , and a change of clothing , some children carry loads of up to 40 pounds [ 18 kg ] .
translation.zu: ol i save pulimapim ruksak long ol buk bilong skul , kaikai na dring , samting bilong pilai musik long en , na senis bilong ol , olsem na sampela pikinini i save karim ruksak em hevi bilong en inap 18 kilo .

translation.en: pediatricians caution that elementary school children could end up having serious back problems , including curvature of the spine , if they daily carry such heavy loads to school .
translation.zu: ol dokta bilong ol pikinini i tok , ol pikinini i save go long komyuniti skul ol inap kisim ol bikpela hevi long baksait , olsem bun bilong baksait i krungut , sapos ol i karim ol hevipela ruksak i go long skul .

translation.en: some specialists suggest to principals and teachers that the weight of the backpacks that students carry equal no more than 20 percent of the body weight of the child or that backpacks be transported " on wheels , have belts for the hips , and even have padded backs , " reports mexico city 's excelsior newspaper .
translation.zu: wanpela nius ( excelsior ) bilong meksiko siti i tok , sampela dokta i tokim ol tisa olsem hevi bilong ruksak em pikinini i karim i no ken winim 20 pesen bilong hevi bilong skin bilong pikinini , o ol i mas karim ruksak long " wanpela samting i gat wil bilong en , o i mas i gat let bilong pasim ruksak daunbilo long bel , o putim liklik matres samting long hap em ruksak i pas long baksait . "

translation.en: nine months later they rejoice in the birth of the daughter of their choosing - a real , living alice .
translation.zu: nainpela mun bihain ol i amamas taim melisa i karim pinis alis , em dispela pikinini meri ol yet i bin makim .

translation.en: it is a projection of what he believes may occur in the decades ahead .
translation.zu: ol samting ol saientis i wok long mekim na ol i mekim pinis i as bilong dispela tingting bilong em .

translation.en: he based his ideas on existing research and technology . already , human embryos can be screened for certain genetic disorders .
translation.zu: long nau ol inap glasim ol jin bilong ol pikinini i stap blut yet long bel bilong mama na luksave olsem em i gat sampela kain sik o bagarap long skin bilong em .

translation.en: having been conceived in a petri dish , she was the first human conceived outside her mother 's womb .
translation.zu: em i namba wan pikinini i bin kamap nupela ausait long bel bilong mama .

translation.en: the fact that dr . silver names the child alice may remind us of the well - known fantasy alice in wonderland .
translation.zu: dokta silver i kolim dispela pikinini long stori bilong em alis , na dispela inap kirapim sampela long tingim dispela stori nating planti man i save long en , em alice in wonderland .

translation.en: indeed , the future to which many are looking is a land of wonders .
translation.zu: planti man i ting ol samting i kamap bihain bai narapela kain tru .

translation.en: an editorial in the prestigious magazine nature stated : " the growing power of molecular genetics confronts us with future prospects of being able to change the nature of our species . "
translation.zu: edita bilong wanpela nius ( nature ) i tok : " ol save ol saientis i kisim long ol jin i wok olsem wanem , dispela i mekim na long bihain bai yumi inap kamapim sampela bikpela senis long skin bilong yumi man . "

translation.en: will the work being done in the laboratories today affect your life or that of your children ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ? ol samting ol saientis i mekim nau , em bai helpim sindaun bilong yu o pikinini bilong yu ?

translation.en: many believe that it will .
translation.zu: planti ol i ting olsem .

translation.en: the quest for a perfect society
translation.zu: ol i laik painim rot bilong kamap gutpela olgeta

translation.en: it would be wonderful to see a better world , one filled with people free of pain , sickness , and disability !
translation.zu: em bai gutpela tru sapos long olgeta hap bilong graun i no gat pen , na sik , na ol bagarap bilong skin !

translation.en: obviously , to achieve such goals would require major adjustments in humanity itself .
translation.zu: bilong i stap olsem , ol man i mas kamapim sampela bikpela senis .

translation.en: it wasn 't until more recent times , however , that efforts to upgrade the human family began in earnest .
translation.zu: tasol nau , klostu long taim bilong yumi , ol man i kirap givim bel long bihainim dispela tingting .

translation.en: the term " eugenics " was coined in 1883 by sir francis galton , a british scientist and cousin of charles darwin .
translation.zu: bikman francis galton i kamapim dispela tok " yujiniks " long 1883 , em i wanpela saientis bilong briten na charles darwin em i kasen brata bilong em .

translation.en: the word comes from greek terms meaning " good in birth " or " noble in heredity . "
translation.zu: em i kisim dispela tok long wanpela tok grik , insait bilong en i olsem " ol tumbuna i gat nem o namba . "

translation.en: galton believed that it could .
translation.zu: galton em i ting olsem .

translation.en: he reasoned that if a fraction of the cost and effort devoted to the breeding of horses and cattle were spent on " the improvement of the human race , " the result would be " a galaxy of genius . "
translation.zu: ol man i save tromoi planti mani bilong kamapim ol gutpela hos na bulmakau , na galton i ting sapos ol i tromoi liklik hap bilong dispela mani bilong " mekim ol manmeri i kamap gutpela moa , " bai i gat " planti pikinini i kamap em ol i smatpela moa . "

translation.en: influenced by the writings of darwin , galton reasoned that it was time for humans to take control of their own evolution .
translation.zu: ol buk samting darwin i bin raitim i kirapim galton long tingting olsem em i taim bilong ol man long bosim ol senis i kamap long ol .

translation.en: during the early decades of the 20th century , galton 's ideas became extremely popular among politicians , scientists , and academics , in both europe and the united states .
translation.zu: long 1900 i go inap 1930 samting planti man bilong politik , na ol saientis , na ol saveman long yurop na amerika ol i laikim tru tingting bilong galton .

translation.en: reflecting the popular notions of his day , the leader of a powerful nation wrote : " society has no business to permit degenerates to reproduce their kind . . . .
translation.zu: hetman bilong wanpela strongpela gavman em i kamapim tingting bilong planti man i stap long taim bilong em , na em i tok : " yumi ol man bilong graun i no ken larim ol man nogut i kamapim ol pikinini i wankain olsem ol . . . .

translation.en: any group of farmers who permitted their best stock not to breed , and let all the increase come from the worst stock , would be treated as fit inmates for an asylum . . . .
translation.zu: sapos ol fama i no larim ol gutpela bulmakau bilong ol i kamapim ol pikinini , na ol i larim ol bulmakau i stap nogut o i gat sik samting tasol i kamapim ol pikinini , bai yumi ting ol fama i longlong . . . .

translation.en: some day we will realize that the prime duty of the good citizen of the right type is to leave his blood behind him in the world , and that we have no business to perpetuate citizens of the wrong type . "
translation.zu: bihain bai yumi kisim save olsem em i wok bilong ol gutpela manmeri long kamapim ol gutpela pikinini , na yumi no gat wok long larim ol manmeri nogut i kamapim ol pikinini i no gutpela . "

translation.en: those words were written by the 26th president of the united states , theodore roosevelt .
translation.zu: theodore roosevelt , em namba 26 presiden bilong yunaitet stets , i bin raitim dispela tok .

translation.en: in fairs and expositions in both britain and america , the laws of genetic inheritance were depicted , often on a vertical board displaying an array of stuffed guinea pigs .
translation.zu: long ol so samting long briten na amerika ol i stori long ol lo i stap long skin bilong ol samting i stap laip na i makim pikinini bai kisim wanem kain pasin long papamama bilong ol .

translation.en: they were arranged to show the inheritance of fur color from one generation to the next generation .
translation.zu: i gat wanpela kain rat ol i kolim gini - pik , na gras bilong ol i narapela narapela kain kala .

translation.en: the point of the exhibits was made clear by accompanying text .
translation.zu: na taim ol i kamapim pikinini , ol pikinini bai kisim kala bilong gras bilong papamama .

translation.en: eugenics in action
translation.zu: wok yujiniks i mekim

translation.en: these ideas were not merely intellectual exercises .
translation.zu: dispela tingting i no tingting nating tasol . nogat .

translation.en: of course , the definition of who or what was undesirable depended largely on the views of those making the decisions to force sterilization .
translation.zu: ol man i kamapim dispela lo ol i bihainim tingting bilong ol yet long makim husat o wanem samting i nogut .

translation.en: in the state of missouri , u.s.a . , for example , legislation was proposed that called for the sterilization of those " convicted of murder , rape , highway robbery , chicken stealing , bombing , or theft of automobiles . "
translation.zu: long misuri , amerika , ol i bin tokaut long kamapim wanpela lo i tok ol dokta i mas katim rop bilong ol man o meri bilong pasim ol long kamapim pikinini sapos ol i bin " kilim i dai man , reipim meri , hansapim man long rot , stilim kakaruk , pairapim bom , o stilim ka . "

translation.en: in its misguided effort to achieve a master race in one generation , nazi germany went a step further .
translation.zu: natsi jemani i bihainim tingting kranki na ol i strong long kamapim wanpela lain i winim olgeta narapela lain , na ol i mekim sampela samting moa .

translation.en: because of the barbarism of the nazi era , eugenics took on an ugly connotation , and many hoped that this field of study had been laid to rest , buried with the millions who died in its name .
translation.zu: ol natsi i bin mekim pasin nogut tru , olsem na yujiniks i kisim nem nogut na planti man i laik bai ol saientis i lusim tingting long yujiniks , olsem planim long matmat wantaim ol dispela planti milion manmeri i bin i dai long nem bilong en .

translation.en: some feared that these advances might fuel a return to the ideas that had seduced europe and north america earlier in the century .
translation.zu: sampela man i pret , nogut dispela nupela save inap kirapim gen ol man long yurop na not amerika long kisim dispela tingting ol i bin kisim long 1900 i go inap long 1930 samting .

translation.en: that 's where they figure out how to have us produce children with ideal characteristics . . . .
translation.zu: olsem ol inap kisim save long kamapim ol pikinini i nambawan tru .

translation.en: many today would consider it ludicrous to compare the advances in genetic engineering with hitler 's eugenic program .
translation.zu: planti man bilong nau bai ting em i no stret long skelim wok ol saientis i mekim long nau wantaim wok yujiniks hitler i bin kamapim .

translation.en: even as you read these words , powerful computers are systematically mapping the human genome - the complete set of instructions contained in our genes that direct how we grow and that define much of what we are .
translation.zu: taim yu wok long ritim dispela tok , ol strongpela kompiuta i wok long skelim wok na lo bilong olgeta jin - ol lo i bosim olgeta samting bilong yumi , olsem yumi go bikpela olsem wanem na wanem kain pasin yumi kisim , ol i stap insait long ol jin .

translation.en: these computers are carefully cataloging the tens of thousands of genes contained in human dna .
translation.zu: ol dispela kompiuta i wok long wokim lista bilong olgeta jin bilong man i stap insait long dna , em planti tausen i stap .

translation.en: ( see the box " dna detectives . " )
translation.zu: ( lukim blok " ol cid bilong dna . " )

translation.en: scientists predict that once the information is collected and stored , it will be used far into the future as a primary source for understanding human biology and medicine .
translation.zu: ol saientis i tok taim ol i kisim pinis save long olgeta jin , ol bai mekim wok long dispela save inap longpela taim long helpim ol long save gut long skin bilong man na marasin .

translation.en: doctors hope that genetic research will result in a new generation of safe yet powerful drugs for preventing and fighting disease .
translation.zu: ol dokta i laik bai dispela wok bilong kisim save long ol jin em inap kamapim ol nupela strongpela marasin bilong pasim na pinisim sampela sik .

translation.en: such technology may also make it possible for your doctor to check your genetic profile to determine in advance which drug would work best for you .
translation.zu: na ating ol dokta inap glasim ol jin bilong yu na kisim save long wanem kain marasin bai helpim yu moa .

translation.en: between the second world war and the early 1990 ' s , academics argued that social problems could be reduced by reforming economies and institutions and improving the environment in which people live .
translation.zu: namel long taim bilong namba tu pait na 1993 samting , ol saveman i strong long tok olsem bilong daunim ol hevi i stap namel long ol man , yumi mas stretim gut ol wok bisnis na samting bilong mani na mekim sindaun bilong ol man i kamap gutpela moa .

translation.en: in more recent years , though , social problems have deepened .
translation.zu: tasol long nau ol hevi namel long ol man i go bikpela moa .

translation.en: many people have come to believe that the key to such problems lies at the genetic level .
translation.zu: planti manmeri i ting rot bilong stretim ol dispela hevi em long rot bilong senisim ol jin .

translation.en: and some now believe that genes play a more important role than environment in influencing individual and group behavior .
translation.zu: na sampela man i ting ol jin i bosim wanem kain pasin ol wan wan man na ol lain man bai mekim , winim sindaun bilong man .

translation.en: what about death ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem long i dai ?

translation.en: according to researchers , even the solution to that problem lies in tweaking our dna .
translation.zu: ol saientis i tok rot bilong pinisim i dai em long senisim nabaut dna bilong yumi .

translation.en: already scientists have doubled the life span of fruit flies and worms , using techniques that they claim might someday be applied to humans .
translation.zu: ol i skruim bikpela hap taim moa long laip bilong sampela lang na liklik snek , na ol i tok ating bihain ol inap mekim wok long wankain save bilong helpim ol man .

translation.en: the head of human genome sciences inc . said : " this is the first time that we can conceive of human immortality . "
translation.zu: hetman bilong wanpela lain ( human genome sciences inc . ) i tok : " nau em i namba wan taim yumi inap tingting tru olsem man inap i stap oltaim . "

translation.en: the glowing reports of what is being done and what may be done in the years ahead make it easy to overlook the present limitations and the potential problems of the new technologies .
translation.zu: long nau i gat planti ripot long ol samting ol i mekim pinis na wanem samting ol i tingting long mekim sampela yia bihain , olsem na i no hatwok long lusim tingting long ol samting ol i no inap mekim na ol hevi em inap kamapim .

translation.en: to illustrate , let us return to the subject of babies .
translation.zu: olsem : yumi ken stori gen long kamapim ol pikinini .

translation.en: this procedure is usually performed after the 16th week of pregnancy .
translation.zu: ol i bin kirap mekim dispela samting namel long 1960 i go 1969 samting .

translation.en: a more recent procedure reveals details of the embryo 's genetic makeup between the sixth and tenth weeks of pregnancy .
translation.zu: nau ol inap mekim kain samting olsem namel long namba 6 na namba 10 wik bihain long taim em i bin kisim bel .

translation.en: these procedures enable doctors to identify many disorders , but only about 15 percent of them can be corrected .
translation.zu: dispela pasin i mekim na ol dokta inap luksave long planti sik na bagarap bilong skin , tasol ol inap stretim 15 pesen tasol bilong ol dispela sik samting .

translation.en: when tests reveal a genetic problem or give an ambiguous result , many parents are faced with an agonizing decision - should the fetus be aborted , or should the child be brought to birth ?
translation.zu: orait taim ol i painim wanpela sik o bagarap o ol i no klia tumas olsem pikinini i gat wanpela sik samting o nogat , nau planti papamama ol i tingting planti na ol i wok long skelim olsem ol bai larim pikinini i stap na mama bai karim , o ol bai rausim bel ?

translation.en: the unesco courier comments : " despite the proliferation of dna tests - each patented and profit - yielding - genetics has so far failed to fulfill its vaunted promises of gene therapy .
translation.zu: wanpela nius ( the unesco courier ) i tok : " maski ol saientis i kamapim planti samting bilong glasim dna , ol i no kamapim sampela pasin bilong stretim ol sik long rot bilong senisim ol jin .

translation.en: doctors are screening for conditions and disorders which they cannot treat .
translation.zu: ol dokta i save glasim na painim ol sik na bagarap em ol i no inap stretim .

translation.en: of course , as biotechnology becomes more effective , doctors expect to have far greater powers to detect and correct the genetic defects that either cause or predispose humans to various diseases .
translation.zu: ol dokta i ting taim wok bilong skelim ol jin na mekim wok long en bilong kamapim nupela marasin samting i kamap gutpela moa bai ol inap glasim na stretim ol jin i no wok gut na i kamapim sampela sik long ol man .

translation.en: in addition , scientists hope that eventually they will be able to transfer artificial chromosomes into a human embryo to offer protection against such diseases as parkinson 's , aids , diabetes , and prostate and breast cancer .
translation.zu: na tu , ol i ting bihain ol inap mekim sampela samting bilong lukautim bebi i stap yet long bel na bai em i no inap kisim ol sik olsem sik pakinson , aids , daiabitis , na kensa .

translation.en: a child would thus be born with a strengthened immune system .
translation.zu: olsem na mama bai karim wanpela pikinini i gat bikpela strong long sakim ol sik .

translation.en: there is also the prospect of future drugs that will " enhance " the developing embryo , perhaps by manipulating genes to boost intelligence or improve memory .
translation.zu: na tu ol i ting ol bai kamapim sampela marasin inap helpim pikinini long kamap smatpela moa na em inap tingim gut ol samting .

translation.en: though even the most optimistic scientists realize that it will be a long time before parents may be able to choose the kind of child they want from a catalog , to many people the prospect of bearing the child of one 's dreams is immensely appealing .
translation.zu: planti papamama i laikim tru dispela pasin bilong kamapim wanpela pikinini ol yet i bin makim olgeta pasin samting bilong em , maski ol saientis i tok dispela samting i no inap kamap hariap .

translation.en: after all , they reason , if there is nothing wrong with sending your child to the best schools and the best doctors , why not try to have the best baby possible ?
translation.zu: ol i tok i no gat rong long salim pikinini bilong yu long ol gutpela skul o long ol gutpela dokta , olsem na i no gat rong long traim kamapim wanpela bebi i gutpela tru .

translation.en: concerns about the future
translation.zu: tingting planti long bihain

translation.en: others , however , voice concerns .
translation.zu: tasol sampela i tingting planti long dispela pasin .

translation.en: for example , the book the biotech century states : " if diabetes , sickle - cell anemia , and cancer are to be prevented by altering the genetic makeup of individuals , why not proceed to other less serious ' disorders ' : myopia , color blindness , dyslexia , obesity , left - handedness ?
translation.zu: olsem wanpela buk ( the biotech century ) i tok : " sapos ol i laik senisim nabaut ol jin bilong ol man bilong pasim ol long kisim kensa o narapela bikpela sik , orait ol i ken senisim ol narapela samting olsem : ai i no inap lukluk longwe , ai i no inap lukim sampela kala , man i patpela o han kais .

translation.en: indeed , what is to preclude a society from deciding that a certain skin color is a disorder ? "
translation.zu: em nau , wanem samting inap pasim wanpela lain long tok wanpela kain kala bilong skin em i wanpela sik ? "

translation.en: will insurance companies pressure the mother to have an abortion ?
translation.zu: kampani bai subim mama long rausim bel ?

translation.en: chemical , pharmaceutical , and biotech companies compete to patent genes and organisms as well as ways to manipulate them .
translation.zu: planti kampani bilong wokim ol kain kain marasin i resis long rejistaim long gavman ol kain kain jin samting na ol samting ol i ken mekim long en .

translation.en: it 's easy to imagine how advertising could play a major role in such a trend .
translation.zu: i no hatwok long tingim ol samting man bilong wok bisnis bai mekim bilong kirapim ol manmeri long bihainim dispela kain tingting .

translation.en: of course , the new technologies are unlikely to be readily available in the poorer parts of the world .
translation.zu: tasol ol kantri i stap rabis ol i no inap mekim wok long ol dispela nupela pasin na save bilong helpim ol .

translation.en: already many parts of the earth lack the most basic health care .
translation.zu: long nau long planti hap ol man i no gat ol samting bilong lukautim skin bilong ol .

translation.en: in the avalanche of literature about what is being done in the field of biotechnology , the expression " playing god " appears frequently .
translation.zu: ol i raitim planti buk na nius long ol samting ol saientis i wok long mekim long ol jin bilong ol man , na planti taim ol i kamapim dispela tok " ol i laik stap olsem god . "

translation.en: since god is the designer and creator of life , it is fitting to consider what he has in mind respecting the quest for perfection .
translation.zu: god em i man bilong wokim olgeta samting i gat laip , olsem na i stret yumi skelim tingting bilong em , em i ting olsem wanem long laik bilong man long kamap gutpela olgeta .

translation.en: the bible book of genesis says that after creating life on earth , " god saw everything he had made and , look ! it was very good . "
translation.zu: baibel i tok long buk stat , taim god i wokim pinis olgeta samting , " god i lukim olgeta dispela samting i gutpela , na em i amamas tru . "

translation.en: it was because they rebelled against god that they brought imperfection and death upon themselves and their offspring . - genesis 3 : 6 , 16 - 19 ; romans 5 : 12 .
translation.zu: tasol tupela i bikhet long god na dispela i mekim na tupela wantaim ol pikinini bilong tupela ol i no gutpela olgeta na ol i mas i dai . - stat 3 : 6 , 16 - 19 ; rom 5 : 12 .

translation.en: jehovah god wants to see an end to sickness , suffering , and death .
translation.zu: god jehova i laik bai sik , pen , na i dai i ken pinis .

translation.en: long ago , he made provision to rescue humanity from these problems .
translation.zu: longtaim i go pinis em i kirap mekim samting bilong pinisim ol dispela hevi bilong ol man .

translation.en: the bible book of revelation foretells a time when god will intervene in human affairs .
translation.zu: baibel i tok : " em bai i mekim drai wara i stap long ai bilong olgeta bilong ol .

translation.en: of that time , we read : " [ god ] will wipe out every tear from their eyes , and death will be no more , neither will mourning nor outcry nor pain be anymore .
translation.zu: na ol manmeri bai i no i dai moa , na ol bai i no bel hevi moa na krai moa , na ol bai i no inap kisim pen gen .

translation.en: the former things have passed away . "
translation.zu: ol dispela samting bilong bipo ol i pinis olgeta . "

translation.en: these sweeping changes will not come as a result of the scientific breakthroughs of humans , many of whom do not even admit the existence of god , much less praise him .
translation.zu: ol dispela senis i no inap kamap long rot bilong ol wok na save bilong ol saientis , em planti bilong ol i no bilip long god na litimapim nem bilong em . nogat .

translation.en: no , the passage continues : " the one [ jehovah god ] seated on the throne said : ' look !
translation.zu: skripsa i tok moa olsem : " dispela man [ god jehova ] i sindaun long sia king , em i tok olsem , ' harim .

translation.en: i am making all things new . ' " - revelation 21 : 4 , 5 .
translation.zu: mi mekim olgeta samting i kamap nupela . ' " - kth 21 : 4 , 5 .

translation.en: can humans be cloned ?
translation.zu: ol inap kamapim man long pasin klon ?

translation.en: in 1997 a sheep named dolly made headlines around the world .
translation.zu: long 1997 stori bilong wanpela sipsip ol i kolim doli i kamap long planti nius long olgeta hap .

translation.en: thus dolly became a younger " twin " to the sheep from which the cell was taken .
translation.zu: olsem na doli i kamap wankain olsem dispela sipsip ol i bin kisim sel long en , tasol doli i yangpela long en .

translation.en: few thought that it was possible to reprogram a cell from an adult mammal to generate another animal in its exact genetic image .
translation.zu: tasol ol i no ting ol inap kisim sel bilong wanpela animal i bikpela pinis na kamapim wanpela animal i wankain stret .

translation.en: cloning from an adult cell makes it possible to see in advance what the offspring will be like .
translation.zu: taim ol i mekim pasin klon long sel bilong animal i bikpela pinis , ol inap save pastaim olsem dispela pikinini bai luk olsem wanem .

translation.en: the aim of the scientists who cloned dolly was to improve farm animals as a valuable source for producing pharmaceuticals secreted in their milk .
translation.zu: ol saientis i laik kamapim ol animal i gutpela moa bambai ol inap kisim ol marasin i stap insait long susu bilong ol , olsem na ol i bin mekim pasin klon bilong kamapim doli .

translation.en: the report of the scientists ' success first appeared in february 1997 , in the scientific magazine nature , under the title " viable offspring derived from fetal and adult mammalian cells . "
translation.zu: long mun februeri 1997 , namba wan ripot long samting ol saientis i bin mekim i kamap long nius nature , em i wanpela nius bilong saiens .

translation.en: the media quickly seized on the report and its implications .
translation.zu: ol narapela nius tu i kirap hariap long stori long dispela samting .

translation.en: two weeks later the cover of time magazine featured a photograph of dolly along with the headline " will there ever be another you ? "
translation.zu: tupela wik bihain , nius time i putim piksa bilong doli long namba wan pes na het - tok i tok " bai i gat narapela i wankain stret olsem yu i kamap ? "

translation.en: can the same technology be used to clone adult humans ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ? ol inap mekim wankain samting long ol man ?

translation.en: yes , say some biologists .
translation.zu: sampela saientis i tok ol inap .

translation.en: not yet .
translation.zu: i no yet .

translation.en: ian wilmut , the british scientist who led the team that cloned dolly , points out that cloning is presently " a very inefficient procedure , " producing a death rate among fetuses that is about ten times higher than in natural reproduction .
translation.zu: saientis ian wilmut , em i bin bosim lain i mekim pasin klon bilong kamapim doli , i tok dispela wok " i no kamap gutpela yet , " long wanem , planti taim tumas , taim pikinini animal i stap blut yet em i save dai .

translation.en: some wonder , ' what if someone were to perfect the technique and cloned , say , multiple hitlers ? '
translation.zu: sampela i askim , ' tasol olsem wanem sapos ol inap stretim gut dispela pasin klon na ol i kamapim planti man i wankain olsem hitler ? '

translation.en: in an effort to allay such fears , wilmut points out that while a cloned child would be a genetically identical twin of the person from whom it was cloned , a cloned human would be influenced by its environment and would develop a distinct personality just as natural twins do .
translation.zu: bilong daunim pret bilong ol man , wilmut i stori olsem em i tru dispela man ol i kamapim long pasin klon bai i gat ol wankain jin olsem man ol i kisim sel bilong em bilong kamapim dispela man . tasol sindaun na ol samting i painim dispela man bai mekim na bai em i no gat wankain pasin olsem man ol i kisim sel long en .

translation.en: the human body is made up of about 100 trillion cells .
translation.zu: long bodi bilong man i gat samting olsem 100 trilion sel i stap .

translation.en: inside each nucleus are 46 packets called chromosomes .
translation.zu: na insait long olgeta nuklias i gat 46 kromosom .

translation.en: each chromosome contains a single , tightly coiled , threadlike molecule called dna .
translation.zu: olgeta wan wan kromosom i gat samting i luk olsem wanpela string ol i kolim dna .

translation.en: it is estimated that within the dna there are up to 100,000 genes , positioned something like towns and cities along a major highway .
translation.zu: insait long dna i gat samting olsem 100,000 jin i stap na ol i stap long lain long dispela string olsem ol liklik na bikpela taun i lain long wanpela bikrot .

translation.en: scientists also believe that our dna includes a " clock " that determines how long we will live .
translation.zu: na tu , ol saientis i ting dna i gat wanpela " klok " i save makim olsem yu bai stap laip inap hamas yia .

translation.en: the dna of animals and humans is remarkably similar .
translation.zu: dna bilong ol animal na ol man i klostu wankain .

translation.en: for example , the genetic makeup of chimpanzees differs from that of humans by only 1 percent .
translation.zu: dna bilong man na monki i klostu wankain , 1 pesen tasol i narapela kain .

translation.en: still , that gap is ten times wider than the differences between the dna of any two humans .
translation.zu: tasol dna bilong tupela man i klostu wankain moa yet , olsem 0.1 pesen tasol i narapela kain .

translation.en: nevertheless , it is those infinitesimal differences that account for the many features that make each of us a unique individual .
translation.zu: tasol maski i gat liklik hap samting tasol i narapela kain , dispela i mekim na yumi olgeta wan wan man na meri i narapela kain long ol narapela man na meri .

translation.en: a little less than ten years ago , scientists undertook a complex task - to determine the precise order of chemical units in human dna .
translation.zu: klostu 10 - pela yia i go pinis ol saientis i kirap long wokim lista bilong olgeta samting i stap insait long dna na ol i lain olsem wanem .

translation.en: this task , known as the human genome project , is ambitious and enormous , and it will cost billions of dollars .
translation.zu: em i bikpela wok tru na ol bai tromoi planti bilion dola long mekim .

translation.en: the data collected will be enough to fill an estimated 200 volumes , with each volume the size of a 1,000 - page telephone book .
translation.zu: sapos ol i raitim long wanpela buk ol save ol i kisim , buk bai i gat 200,000 pes long en .

translation.en: to read all this information , a person would have to be at it 24 hours a day for 26 years !
translation.zu: bilong ritim ol dispela tok , wanpela man i mas ritim tok inap 24 aua long olgeta de , i go inap long 26 yia !

translation.en: often overlooked in the media is the fact that once this information is accumulated , it will still have to be interpreted .
translation.zu: taim ol i kisim pinis ol dispela save , ol i mas kisim save long olsem wanem ol bai mekim wok long en .

translation.en: new tools will be needed to analyze the data .
translation.zu: ol i mas kamapim sampela nupela tul samting bilong skelim gut ol dispela save .

translation.en: it is one thing to identify genes ; it is quite another to know what they do and how they interact to build a human .
translation.zu: ol inap kisim save long ol jin ; tasol i hatwok moa long kisim save long wok ol i mekim na ol i wok olsem wanem long kamapim wanpela man .

translation.en: one eminent biologist called the human genome project " the holy grail of genetics . " however , a more down - to - earth description was suggested by geneticist eric lander : " it 's a parts list , " he says . " if i gave you the parts list for the boeing 777 and it had 100,000 parts , i don 't think you could screw it together and you certainly wouldn 't understand why it flew . "
translation.zu: wanpela saientis , em eric lander , i tok : " dispela lista bilong ol jin i stap insait long dna i kain olsem lista bilong olgeta hap bilong wanpela traipela balus na balus i gat 100,000 hap bilong en , mi no ting bai yu inap bungim olgeta hap bilong en na wokim dispela balus , na yu no inap save long as na em inap flai . "
