translation.en: whatever happened to the " job for life " ?
translation.zu: bai yu wok long wanpela kampani inap yu lapun pinis ?

translation.en: graham * worked for a large australian company for 37 years .
translation.zu: graham * i bin wok long wanpela bikpela kampani bilong ostrelia inap long 37 yia .

translation.en: in his late 50 ' s , he was suddenly given a few weeks ' notice that his services were no longer required .
translation.zu: taim em i gat 58 krismas samting , kampani i toksave olsem em bai wok inap sampela wik moa na bihain ol i no gat wok moa bilong em .

translation.en: we can understand his perplexity , reflecting astonishment and deep concern for his future welfare .
translation.zu: em i kirap nogut olsem kampani i rausim em na em i no save long samting em bai mekim long bihain .

translation.en: of course , losing one 's job is not unusual , nor is it something new .
translation.zu: tru , pasin bilong kampani long rausim wokman i no narapela kain samting , o nupela samting .

translation.en: however , the magnitude of job loss on a global scale is new to this current generation of employees .
translation.zu: tasol long olgeta hap , ol kampani i wok long rausim bikpela lain wokman , na dispela i nupela samting long planti wokman bilong nau .

translation.en: undoubtedly , there are many reasons for job loss , but a major one appears to be what is called downsizing .
translation.zu: i gat kain kain as bilong rausim wokman , tasol i luk olsem wanpela bikpela as na ol kampani i mekim long nau , em bilong daunim namba bilong lain wokman .

translation.en: what is downsizing , and how has it come about ?
translation.zu: tasol bilong wanem dispela pasin i kamap bikpela ?

translation.en: this came to be realized particularly in the united states in the late 1970 ' s when companies noticed that increasing numbers of consumers were purchasing cars , electronics , and many other goods produced overseas .
translation.zu: dispela pasin i kamap klia moa long amerika long 1977 i go inap long 1979 samting , long dispela taim ol kampani i luksave olsem ol manmeri i wok long baim ol samting olsem ka , samting bilong pawa , na planti narapela samting , ol man i bin wokim long ol narapela kantri .

translation.en: in an effort to become competitive and to reduce production costs , american companies began cutting the number of workers and improving methods and equipment .
translation.zu: bilong helpim ol long winim ol dispela kampani na daunim pe bilong wokim ol samting , ol kampani bilong amerika i kirap na rausim sampela wokman , na mekim ol samting i helpim wok bilong ol long kamap gutpela moa .

translation.en: the technique used to reduce the work force became known as downsizing .
translation.zu: dispela pasin bilong rausim sampela lain wokman i kisim nem olsem daunim namba .

translation.en: the process has been described as " reducing the size of an organization 's workforce , usually through a combination of layoffs , early retirement incentives , transfers , and natural attrition . "
translation.zu: bilong daunim namba bilong lain wokman , sampela kampani i save makim sampela long malolo , o kirapim sampela i wok longpela taim long lusim wok , o makim sampela long wok long narapela hap , o pinisim sampela em ol i gat laik long lusim wok .

translation.en: for some years it was blue - collar workers who were mainly affected by downsizing .
translation.zu: pastaim dispela samting i painim planti ol wokman i save wok leba .

translation.en: but in the late 1980 ' s and the early 1990 ' s , this process began to include growing numbers of white - collar staff , particularly middle management .
translation.zu: tasol long 1989 i go inap long 1990 samting , dispela pasin i wok long kamap long ol man i wok long ol ofis , na i kamap moa yet long ol man i olsem nambatu bos .

translation.en: and as financial pressure continued , governments and other employers searched for cost reductions through further downsizing .
translation.zu: na taim hevi i stap yet bilong kisim mani , sampela gavman na bosman i rausim sampela wokman moa bilong daunim pe bilong wokim ol samting .

translation.en: a trade union official states : " people who gave 10 , 15 , 20 years of loyal service have seen their implicit contract ripped up and they have been thrown out . "
translation.zu: wanpela mausman bilong ol wokman i tok : " sampela manmeri ol i bin stap gut long wok inap 10 , 15 , o 20 yia , na long ai bilong ol yet bos i brukim pepa kontrak bilong ol na rausim ol long wok . "

translation.en: in her book healing the downsized organization , delorese ambrose explains that in 1956 the term " organization man " was coined to describe the typical employee .
translation.zu: buk bilong delorese ambrose ( healing the downsized organization ) i stori long olsem wanem dispela tok " man bilong kampani " i bin kamap long 1956 bilong makim wokman bilong wanpela kampani .

translation.en: she adds : " whether he worked as a union laborer or as a manager , he turned over his economic well - being , social life , and loyalty to the organization in exchange for security - a job for life .
translation.zu: em i tok moa olsem : " maski em i wokman tasol o wanpela maneja , em i stap gut long kampani na larim kampani yet i bosim planti samting long i stap bilong em , na em i mekim olsem bilong kisim wanpela samting - em wanpela wok mani em i ken holim inap long em i lapun .

translation.en: clearly , this pact has been broken in the modern corporation . "
translation.zu: tasol long nau planti kampani i no bihainim moa dispela pasin . "

translation.en: millions of workers around the world have lost their jobs to downsizing , and no group of employees has escaped unscathed .
translation.zu: wok mani bilong planti milion manmeri long olgeta hap i lus long dispela pasin bilong daunim lain wokman , na i no gat wanpela lain wokman i abrusim olgeta dispela hevi .

translation.en: in the united states alone , the number of employees involved has been substantial , with millions losing permanent jobs .
translation.zu: dispela samting i kamap long bikpela lain tru bilong amerika , long dispela hap i gat planti milion manmeri em ol kampani i bin pinisim ol long wok .

translation.en: similar downsizing has occurred in many other countries .
translation.zu: wankain samting i kamap long planti narapela kantri .

translation.en: the adverse effects
translation.zu: bel hevi bilong ol

translation.en: graham , mentioned at the beginning of this article , said : " you suffer some real psychological damage . "
translation.zu: graham , em mipela i stori pinis long en , em i tok : " dispela samting i save bagarapim tru bel na tingting bilong man . "

translation.en: additionally , the unemployed person 's ability to manage mortgage payments , other debts , health care for family members , and school fees and to keep up his or her life - style , hobbies , and personal possessions is jeopardized by the sudden loss of regular income .
translation.zu: na tu , man i no gat wok mani bai i gat hatwok long bekim dinau , na lukautim famili taim ol i sik , baim skul - fi , bihainim wankain pasin bilong baim ol samting olsem bipo , mekim ol samting bilong amamas , na lukautim ol samting em i holim pinis .

translation.en: a survey in australia revealed that people between the ages of 45 and 59 were the most likely to be targeted for dismissal .
translation.zu: ol i skelim dispela hevi long ostrelia na dispela i kamapim klia olsem ol manmeri i gat 45 i go inap long 59 krismas i olsem namba wan lain ol kampani bai rausim .

translation.en: yet , this is the age group that finds it most difficult to adjust to the change .
translation.zu: tasol ol dispela lain i gat hatwok moa long stap isi taim dispela kain senis i kamap . olsem wanem ?

translation.en: part - time employment or work at lower wages is certainly preferable to unemployment .
translation.zu: wok haptaim o ol wok i no gat bikpela pe , dispela i winim pasin bilong stap nating .

translation.en: and it has been found that only about a third of laid - off workers eventually get jobs that pay as well as their previous one did .
translation.zu: liklik hap lain tasol i save painim wanpela wok mani i gat wankain pe olsem wok mani bilong ol long bipo .

translation.en: this adds stress to family life .
translation.zu: na dispela i givim hevi long ol famili .

translation.en: you rarely get to test even the most ingenious ideas , because you usually don 't see the truck - or the ax - before it flattens you . "
translation.zu: yu no inap redi long dispela samting , long wanem , yu no save olsem wanpela ka i kam , inap em i bamim yu pinis . "

translation.en: so if it is felt that employment signals the beginning of real adult life , unemployment could be devastating to youths .
translation.zu: taim yangpela i kisim wok mani , i olsem em i stap bikpela pinis long ai bilong ol narapela , na em i gat mani bilong lukautim em yet . "

translation.en: the book parting company identifies the most frequent emotions experienced as anger , shame , fear , sadness , and self - pity .
translation.zu: dispela buk ( parting company ) i tok , ol samting i save kamap long bel i olsem belhat , sem , pret , bel hevi , na pasin bilong tingim hevi bilong yu yet tasol .

translation.en: and explaining their sudden dismissal to their family is one of the most difficult problems the unemployed face .
translation.zu: na olsem tasol , taim man i mas tokim famili olsem kampani i bin rausim em , em bai i hatwok tru long tokim ol .

translation.en: however , there are some practical ways to deal with the impact of downsizing .
translation.zu: tasol i gat sampela samting man i ken mekim bilong helpim em taim kampani i rausim sampela wokman .

translation.en: the first step is to downsize your way of life immediately by planning for and living a life - style that is simpler than what you have been accustomed to in the past .
translation.zu: namba wan samting long mekim , em yu ken senisim sampela pasin long sindaun bilong yu na bai yu no gat wok long baim planti samting olsem bipo .

translation.en: here are some suggestions that may help you to handle the situation , even if they do not solve it altogether .
translation.zu: mipela kamapim sampela tok daunbilo i ken helpim yu long karim dispela hevi , tasol i no olsem em bai pinisim .

translation.en: first , recognize that unexpected job loss is a reality in these times .
translation.zu: yumi mas save , pasin bilong rausim nating man long wok i save kamap long nau .

translation.en: second , be careful about taking on any large debt for items that are not essential for sustenance and covering .
translation.zu: namba 2 , tingting gut pastaim sapos yu laik kisim bikpela dinau long ol samting i no olsem samting yu mas i gat bilong stap laip .

translation.en: live within your means , and do not assume that you can cover debts with anticipated income from promotions or regular wage increases .
translation.zu: baim ol samting i stret long skel bilong mani bilong yu , na no ken ting yu inap bekim dinau long sampela winmani yu bai kisim bihain .

translation.en: the message of today 's economy is that there may be no long - term future to rely on .
translation.zu: samting i kamap long ol wok bisnis bilong nau i makim olsem man i no ken ting olgeta taim em bai i holim wanpela wok mani .

translation.en: third , look for ways to simplify your life and reduce existing financial commitments .
translation.zu: namba 3 , skelim ol samting yu mekim na bai i no gat planti samting bilong pulim mani bilong yu .

translation.en: this includes shedding debts for items that are not essential to a reasonably simple , wholesome life - style .
translation.zu: na tu , dispela i makim olsem yu bai rausim sampela dinau long ol samting i no olsem yu mas i gat bilong stap gut .

translation.en: finally , do not look longingly at the life - style of others in your community who are living less frugally , lest you begin to desire the things they have and be lured into their way of life .
translation.zu: na laspela samting long tingim i olsem , no ken aigris long sindaun bilong ol narapela em ol i no bosim tumas laik bilong baim ol samting , nogut yu kirap long laikim ol samting ol i gat na yu bihainim pasin bilong ol .

translation.en: these are a few suggestions that may help you and your family to avoid the snare of relying on uncertain riches in a very uncertain world and to keep free of many of the anxieties incurred by contemporary life - styles .
translation.zu: dispela em sampela tok bilong helpim yu yet na famili bilong yu long abrusim planti ol hevi i save kamap long dispela pasin bilong kisim planti samting na bilip tumas long mani .

translation.en: former investment banker felix rohatyn is quoted as saying : " there is something fundamentally wrong in our society when one man 's unemployment generates another man 's wealth . "
translation.zu: wanpela man i mekim wok bisnis wantaim ol beng , em felix rohatyn , em i tok : " em pasin kranki tru i kamap long taim bilong yumi , olsem wanpela wokman i save kisim winmani taim kampani i pinisim narapela long wok . "

translation.en: so fundamentally wrong is this system that soon it will be replaced with a world where the expression " job for life " will take on meaning beyond our present imagination . - isaiah 65 : 17 - 24 ; 2 peter 3 : 13 .
translation.zu: tru tumas , pasin bilong dispela graun i no stret liklik , olsem na i no longtaim na bai dispela pasin bilong graun i pinis na nupela taim bai kamap , na bai yumi kisim narapela kain tingting tru long dispela tok olsem ' wanpela wok bilong holim oltaim . translation.en: " extreme sports " - should you take the risk ?
translation.zu: " ol narapela kain spot " - yu ting i gutpela long mekim ?

translation.en: " these days more and more of us have left the observer 's seat to do our own leaping out of planes , rappelling down mountains , kayaking over waterfalls and diving with sharks . " - the willow glen resident newspaper .
translation.zu: nau yumi yet i save pasim parasut na kalap i go daun long balus , o holim baklain na kam daun long ol maunten , o raun long kanu long ol bikpela wara i kalap i go daun , o subim wara wantaim ol sak . " - em tok i kamap long nius willow glen resident .

translation.en: however , this increase in popularity also brings with it a high personal cost .
translation.zu: tasol taim planti man moa ol i laik insait long kain spot olsem ol i kisim pe nogut bilong en tu .

translation.en: for other sports , the results are even more dramatic , as is evident in the growing number of deaths related to extreme sports .
translation.zu: na long sampela narapela spot , samting nogut moa i save kamap ; namba bilong ol man i dai taim ol i mekim ol narapela kain spot i go antap .

translation.en: one woman who participates in extreme skiing states : " i constantly have death in the back of my mind . "
translation.zu: wanpela meri i save ski long narapela kain pasin , em i tok : " long olgeta taim mi save tingting long indai . "

translation.en: a professional snowboarder sums it up by saying that if " you don 't get hurt , then you 're not trying hard enough . "
translation.zu: wanpela man bilong raun long ais wantaim plang , em i tok , sapos " sampela hap skin bilong yu i no kisim bagarap , yu no givim bel tru long mekim spot . "

translation.en: in view of these facts , how should a christian regard participation in such activities ?
translation.zu: olsem na ol kristen i mas ting olsem wanem long kain spot olsem ?

translation.en: how can the bible assist us in deciding whether we should engage in extreme sports ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem baibel inap helpim yumi long save yumi ken insait long ol narapela kain spot o nogat ?

translation.en: a consideration of how god feels about the sanctity of life will help to answer these questions .
translation.zu: taim yumi skelim tingting bilong god long laip olsem em i samting holi , dispela bai helpim yumi long bekim ol dispela askim .

translation.en: god 's view of life
translation.zu: tingting bilong god long laip

translation.en: the bible tells us that jehovah is " the source of life . "
translation.zu: baibel i tok , jehova em i " as tru bilong laip . "

translation.en: beyond creating mankind , he also took great care in giving us what we need to enjoy life .
translation.zu: ( song 36 : 9 ) em i bin wokim ol manmeri , na tu , em i bin givim ol samting yumi mas kisim bilong stap amamas .

translation.en: laws and principles given to the nation of israel help us appreciate that fact .
translation.zu: ol lo em i bin givim long lain israel i helpim yumi long save long ol dispela samting .

translation.en: the mosaic law required that an individual take steps to protect the lives of others .
translation.zu: lo bilong moses i tok ol man i mas mekim ol samting bilong lukautim laip bilong narapela man .

translation.en: if this was not done and a life was lost , the one who could have prevented the tragedy would be considered bloodguilty .
translation.zu: sapos ol i no mekim olsem na wanpela man i dai , orait dispela man em inap mekim ol samting bambai narapela i no ken kisim bagarap , em i gat asua long blut .

translation.en: for example , a homeowner was commanded to build a low wall or railing , called a parapet , around the flat roof of his new house .
translation.zu: olsem : lo i tok papa bilong haus i mas wokim liklik banis long arere bilong stretpela rup bilong nupela haus bilong em .

translation.en: otherwise , bloodguilt would come upon the house if someone fell to his death from the roof .
translation.zu: sapos em i no mekim olsem , em bai i gat asua long blut sapos wanpela man i pundaun long graun na i dai .

translation.en: on the other hand , if the bull was known to be dangerous and the owner had been warned but did not keep the bull properly guarded , then if the bull gored someone , the owner of the bull would be considered bloodguilty and could be put to death .
translation.zu: tasol sapos ol i save dispela bulmakau man i save pait long ol man na ol i bin toksave long papa bilong bulmakau long dispela samting , tasol em i no bin banisim em na bulmakau i sutim man long kom bilong en , orait papa bilong bulmakau i gat asua long blut bilong man na ol inap kilim em i dai .

translation.en: in one bible account , david expressed his desire to be able to " have a drink of the water from the cistern of bethlehem . "
translation.zu: wanpela hap bilong baibel i stori long devit i laik " dringim sampela wara bilong hul wara i stap klostu long dua bilong betlehem . "

translation.en: bethlehem was under philistine control at the time .
translation.zu: long dispela taim ol filistia i bosim betlehem .

translation.en: on hearing david 's request , three of his soldiers forced their way into the camp of the philistines , drew out water from the cistern of bethlehem , and brought it back to david .
translation.zu: taim ol i harim dispela tok bilong devit , 3 - pela soldia bilong em ol i pait na go insait long kem bilong ol filistia , na ol i kisim wara long hul wara bilong betlehem , na bringim i go bek long devit .

translation.en: how did david react ?
translation.zu: devit i mekim wanem ?

translation.en: he would not drink the water but , rather , poured it out on the ground .
translation.zu: em i no dring , tasol em i kapsaitim dispela wara i go long graun .

translation.en: he said : " it is unthinkable on my part , as regards my god , to do this !
translation.zu: em i tok : " long nem bilong god , mi tok tru tumas , mi no ken dring dispela wara .

translation.en: is it the blood of these men that i should drink at the risk of their souls ? for it was at the risk of their souls that they brought it . "
translation.zu: sapos mi dring bai i olsem mi dring blut bilong ol dispela man , long wanem , ol inap tru long painim i dai long taim ol i bin go na kisim wara . "

translation.en: jesus reacted in a similar manner when , likely in a vision , the devil tempted him to throw himself off the battlement of the temple to see if the angels would protect him from injury .
translation.zu: jisas i mekim wankain samting taim satan i tokim em - ating long wanpela driman - long kalap i go daun long rup bilong tempel bambai em i ken save ol ensel bai lukautim em o nogat .

translation.en: jesus responded : " you must not put jehovah your god to the test . "
translation.zu: jisas i tok : " yu no ken traim strong bilong god , bikpela bilong yu . "

translation.en: yes , both david and jesus recognized that it was wrong in god 's eyes to take unnecessary risks that could endanger human life .
translation.zu: em nau , devit na jisas i save olsem god i no orait long pasin bilong mekim ol samting em laip bilong man inap bagarap long en .

translation.en: with these examples in mind , we may wonder , ' where do we draw the line as to what is an extreme or dangerous sport ?
translation.zu: taim yumi tingim ol dispela tok , ating bai yumi tingting , ' olsem wanem yumi ken save wanem kain spot em i narapela kain spot o spot em man inap kisim bagarap long en ?

translation.en: since even a common form of recreation , not dangerous in itself , can be pushed to extreme limits , how can we determine how far we should go ? '
translation.zu: na i gat ol spot na amamas em ol i no bilong bagarapim man , tasol man inap mekim dispela spot long pasin i abrusim mak na em inap kisim bagarap long en , na olsem wanem yumi ken save long mak yumi no ken abrusim ? '

translation.en: is it worth the risk ?
translation.zu: yu ting i gutpela long mekim ?

translation.en: an honest appraisal of any activity we might be contemplating will help us determine the answer .
translation.zu: taim yumi skelim gut olgeta kain samting yumi laik mekim , dispela bai helpim yumi long bekim dispela askim .

translation.en: for example , we might ask ourselves , ' what is the accident rate for this sport ?
translation.zu: olsem : yumi ken askim yumi yet , ' hamas man i save kisim bagarap long dispela spot ?

translation.en: would it be a minor mishap , or is there a probability of serious injury or death ? '
translation.zu: liklik samting tasol bai kamap , o skin bilong mi inap kisim bikpela bagarap o mi inap i dai ? '

translation.en: taking unnecessary risks in the name of recreation can affect a true christian 's precious relationship with jehovah as well as his eligibility for special privileges in the congregation .
translation.zu: sapos kristen i insait long ol spot o amamas em inap kisim bagarap long en , dispela inap mekim na em i no stap gut long ai bilong jehova , na tu , ating em i no inap holim bikpela wok insait long kongrigesen .

translation.en: base stands for building , antenna , span , and earth . this sport of parachuting from fixed objects such as buildings , bridges , and cliffs is considered so dangerous that it is banned by the national park service in the united states .
translation.zu: dispela spot bilong pasim parasut na kalap i go daun long haus , bris , o maunten inap bagarapim tru man , olsem na wanpela lain ( national park service ) i tambuim ol man long mekim dispela spot long amerika .

translation.en: as told by alexei davidjuk
translation.zu: stori bilong alexei davidjuk

translation.en: the year was 1947 ; the place , a few miles from our village of laskiv , ukraine , near the polish border .
translation.zu: em yia 1947 , long hap i stap klostu long boda bilong polan , na sampela kilomita tasol long ples bilong mipela , em laskiv bilong yukren .

translation.en: one night a border guard saw him , gave chase , and shot him .
translation.zu: wanpela nait wanpela gad bilong was long boda i lukim em na i ranim em na sutim em long gan .

translation.en: twelve years later stepan 's death had a dramatic effect on my life , as i will explain later .
translation.zu: bihain mi bai stori long olsem wanem i dai bilong stepan i bin mekim bikpela samting long mi 12 - pela yia bihain .

translation.en: by the time i was born in laskiv in 1932 , ten families in our village were bible students , as jehovah 's witnesses were then known .
translation.zu: taim mama i karim mi long laskiv long 1932 , i gat 10 - pela famili long dispela hap em ol i sumatin bilong baibel , em nem bilong ol witnes bilong jehova bilong bipo .

translation.en: among them were my parents , who set a fine example of loyalty to jehovah until their deaths in the mid - 1970 ' s .
translation.zu: papamama bilong mi i insait long dispela lain , na ol i stap gutpela piksa long pasin bilong stap gut long jehova inap long tupela i dai long 1975 samting .

translation.en: all my life , being loyal to god has been my chief concern as well . - psalm 18 : 25 .
translation.zu: na long laip bilong mi tu , dispela pasin bilong stap gut long god i namba wan bikpela samting . - song 18 : 25 .

translation.en: in 1939 , the year world war ii began , the area in which we lived in eastern poland was incorporated into the soviet union .
translation.zu: long 1939 , taim namba tu pait i kirap , ples mipela stap long en long hap is bilong polan i kamap olsem hap bilong soviet yunion .

translation.en: we were under soviet rule until june of 1941 , when the germans invaded and occupied our area .
translation.zu: na ol lain soviet i bosim dispela hap i go inap long jun 1941 , long dispela taim ol jeman i kam na kisim hap bilong mipela na bosim .

translation.en: during world war ii , i had some hard times at school .
translation.zu: long taim bilong namba tu pait mi gat sampela hevi long skul .

translation.en: the children were taught to sing nationalistic songs and to share in military exercises .
translation.zu: ol i skulim ol pikinini long ol singsing bilong litimapim kantri na bilong lainim sampela wok bilong ami .

translation.en: in fact , part of our training included learning how to throw grenades .
translation.zu: wanpela samting bilong ami ol i lainim mipela long en , em long tromoi ol hanbom .

translation.en: but i refused both to sing patriotic songs and to engage in any military training .
translation.zu: tasol mi tok nogat long lainim wok bilong ami na ol singsing bilong litimapim kantri .

translation.en: learning at an early age to stand up for my bible - based convictions helped me to remain loyal to god in the years that followed .
translation.zu: samting mi lainim taim mi liklik yet , olsem pasin bilong sanap strong na bihainim bilip em baibel i as bilong en , dispela i bin helpim mi long stap gut long god long bihain .

translation.en: there were so many people who were interested in bible truth in our congregation 's territory that two pioneers , as full - time ministers of jehovah 's witnesses are called , were assigned to our area to help teach them .
translation.zu: i gat planti manmeri i laik save long ol trupela tok bilong baibel long teritori bilong kongrigesen bilong mipela , olsem na bilong helpim ol , sosaiti i salim tupela painia i kam , em ol witnes bilong jehova i save mekim wok autim tok long olgeta de .

translation.en: one of the pioneers , ilja fedorovitsch , also studied the bible with me and trained me in the ministry .
translation.zu: nem bilong wanpela painia em ilja fedorovitsch , em i bin stadi wantaim mi long baibel na lainim mi long autim tok .

translation.en: during the german occupation , ilja was deported and put into one of the nazi concentration camps , where he died .
translation.zu: taim ol jeman i stap na bosim kantri , ol i kisim ilja na putim em i go long banis kalabus nogut bilong ol natsi , na em i dai long dispela hap .

translation.en: in 1941 the soviet authorities tried to make father sign a document promising to pay money to help finance the war .
translation.zu: long 1941 , sampela hetman bilong soviet yunion i laik subim papa long putim nem bilong em long wanpela pepa i tok em bai givim mani bilong helpim pait .

translation.en: he told them that he could not support either side in the war and that as a servant of the true god , he would stay neutral .
translation.zu: papa i tokim ol olsem em i no inap mekim wanpela samting bilong helpim wanpela lain i insait long dispela pait , na em i stap wokman bilong trupela god , olsem na em bai i no insait long ol samting bilong graun .

translation.en: why ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem ?

translation.en: because on the sunday following his imprisonment , the german army occupied the area where we lived .
translation.zu: long wanem , long sande taim em i kalabus 4 - pela de pinis , ol ami bilong lain jeman i kam na bosim taun bilong mipela .

translation.en: when the prison guards heard that the germans were nearby , they opened the prison doors and fled .
translation.zu: taim ol woda i harim olsem ol jeman i kam klostu , ol i opim ol dua bilong kalabus na ranawe .

translation.en: outside , most of the inmates were shot by soviet soldiers .
translation.zu: na taim ol kalabusman i kam ausait , lain ami bilong soviet yunion i sutim planti bilong ol .

translation.en: father did not leave immediately but later escaped to the home of friends .
translation.zu: papa i no lusim kalabus hariap , tasol bihain em i lusim na ranawe i go long haus bilong sampela pren .

translation.en: from there he sent word to mother to bring his documents , which proved that he had been imprisoned for refusing to support the soviets in the war .
translation.zu: em i stap wantaim ol pren na salim tok i go long mama long kisim ol pepa bilong em i kam , em ol pepa i kamapim klia olsem em i kalabus , long wanem , em i no laik helpim ol rasia long pait .

translation.en: when father showed these to the german authorities , they spared his life .
translation.zu: taim papa i soim ol dispela pepa long ol jeman , ol i larim em i stap laip .

translation.en: the germans wanted to know the names of all the people who had cooperated with the soviets .
translation.zu: ol jeman i laik save long nem bilong olgeta manmeri i bin helpim ol lain bilong soviet yunion .

translation.en: if he had named anyone , he or she would have been shot .
translation.zu: sapos em i bin kolim nem bilong wanpela man o wanpela meri , ol jeman bai sutim ol .

translation.en: hence , father 's neutrality also saved the lives of other people , who were very grateful to him .
translation.zu: olsem na pasin bilong papa long sakim olgeta samting i insait long pait i bin lukautim laip bilong sampela manmeri , na ol i pilim tru dispela samting .

translation.en: the soviets returned to ukraine in august 1944 , and in may 1945 the european phase of world war ii ended .
translation.zu: ol lain bilong soviet yunion i kam bek long yukren long ogas 1944 , na long me 1945 , namba tu pait long hap bilong yurop i pinis .

translation.en: afterward the so - called iron curtain kept those of us in the soviet union cut off from the rest of the world .
translation.zu: bihain pasin birua bilong soviet yunion i mekim na mipela ol manmeri i stap long dispela hap , mipela i no inap kisim tok long ol samting bilong ol narapela hap bilong graun .

translation.en: since the border was just five miles [ 8 km ] from our home in laskiv , i heard about the perils that these couriers experienced .
translation.zu: boda i stap longwe long haus bilong mipela long laskiv inap 12 - pela kilomita tasol , olsem na mi bin harim ol stori bilong ol hevi samting i painim ol lain i go bilong kisim ol nius samting .

translation.en: for example , a witness called silvester went across twice and returned each time without incident .
translation.zu: olsem : wanpela witnes , em silvester , em i brukim boda na kam bek tupela taim na i no gat wanpela hevi i bin kamap .

translation.en: but on the third trip , he was spotted by the border patrol and their guard dogs .
translation.zu: tasol long namba tri raun bilong em , ol polis i was long boda wantaim ol dok bilong ol , ol i lukim em .

translation.en: the soldiers shouted for him to stop , but silvester ran for his life .
translation.zu: ol i bikmaus long silvester na tokim em long sanap , tasol em i ranawe .

translation.en: his only chance of avoiding the dogs was to wade into a nearby lake .
translation.zu: i gat wanpela rot tasol bilong abrusim ol dok - em i mas kalap i go insait long wanpela raunwara i stap klostu .

translation.en: he spent the whole night up to his neck in water , hiding in tall grass .
translation.zu: long dispela nait olgeta em i hait namel long ol longpela gras insait long wara , na wara i kam antap inap long nek bilong em .

translation.en: as related earlier , silvester 's nephew stepan was killed while trying to make the crossing .
translation.zu: silvester em i ankol bilong stepan , em dispela man i bin dai taim em i laik brukim boda .

translation.en: yet , it was important that we continue to maintain contact with jehovah 's people .
translation.zu: tasol i bikpela samting tru long mipela i mas wok yet long kisim ol nupela tok samting i kam long lain bilong jehova .

translation.en: by the efforts of courageous couriers , we were able to receive spiritual food and helpful direction .
translation.zu: long rot bilong ol brata i gat strongpela bel , mipela i kisim ol kaikai bilong spirit na tok bilong stiaim mipela .

translation.en: the following year , in 1948 , i was baptized at night in a small lake near our home .
translation.zu: long yia antap long dispela , em 1948 , mi kisim baptais long nait long liklik raunwara i stap klostu long haus bilong mipela .

translation.en: those to be immersed met in our house , but i didn 't know who they were , since it was dark and everything took place in hushed secrecy .
translation.zu: ol lain i laik baptais i bung long haus bilong mipela , tasol mi no save long ol , long wanem , em i tudak na mipela mekim dispela samting long pasin hait .

translation.en: we baptism candidates didn 't speak to one another .
translation.zu: mipela ol lain i laik kisim baptais , mipela i no toktok wantaim .

translation.en: i don 't know who gave the baptism talk , who asked me the baptism questions as we stood near the lake , or who immersed me .
translation.zu: mi no save husat i givim tok bilong baptais , o husat i givim ol askim bilong baptais long mi taim mipela sanap klostu long wara , na tu mi no save husat i baptaisim mi .

translation.en: years later , when comparing notes with a good friend , we discovered that we had both been among those baptized that night !
translation.zu: planti yia bihain , taim mi toktok wantaim wanpela gutpela pren bilong mi , mipela kisim save olsem mitupela i bin stap insait long dispela lain i bin baptais long dispela nait !

translation.en: in 1949 the witnesses in ukraine received word from brooklyn that encouraged them to petition moscow to legalize the preaching work in the soviet union .
translation.zu: long 1949 ol witnes bilong yukren i kisim tok long bruklin olsem i gutpela long askim gavman bilong soviet yunion i stap long mosko long orait long ol witnes i ken autim tok long dispela hap .

translation.en: afterward mykola pyatokha and ilya babijchuk were asked to go to moscow to obtain the government 's answer to our petition .
translation.zu: bihain ol brata i askim mykola pyatokha na ilya babijchuk long go long mosko na kisim bekim bilong gavman .

translation.en: they agreed and traveled to moscow that summer .
translation.zu: ol i wanbel na raun i go long dispela hap .

translation.en: the official who received this delegation listened as they provided the bible - based reason for our work .
translation.zu: bikman bilong gavman i harim toktok bilong tupela taim ol i stori long wok bilong mipela em baibel i as bilong en .

translation.en: they explained that our work was being done in fulfillment of jesus ' prophecy that " this good news of the kingdom [ would ] be preached in all the inhabited earth for a witness to all the nations . "
translation.zu: ol i stori olsem mipela mekim ol wok i truim tok profet jisas i kamapim olsem " bai ol i autim dispela gutnius bilong kingdom bilong god long olgeta hap bilong graun . "

translation.en: however , the official said that the state would never legalize us .
translation.zu: tasol dispela bikman i tok olsem gavman bai i no inap orait long mipela , nogat tru .

translation.en: the witnesses returned home and went to the ukrainian capital of kiev to obtain legal recognition for our work here in ukraine .
translation.zu: tupela witnes i go bek long ples bilong ol na ol i go long biktaun bilong yukren , em kiev , bilong kisim tok orait long mekim wok bilong mipela long yukren .

translation.en: they said that jehovah 's witnesses would be left in peace only if they supported the state .
translation.zu: ol i tok , sapos ol witnes bilong jehova i mekim ol samting bilong helpim gavman , bai ol i no pasim ol .

translation.en: witnesses , they said , needed to serve in the armed forces and participate in elections .
translation.zu: ol i tok olsem ol witnes i mas insait long ami na ol eleksen .

translation.en: again our position of neutrality was explained , namely , that in imitation of our master , jesus christ , we must be no part of the world . - john 17 : 14 - 16 .
translation.zu: tupela i stori gen long tingting bilong mipela long ol dispela samting , olsem bilong bihainim bikman , em jisas krais , mipela i no ken insait long ol samting bilong dispela graun . - jon 17 : 14 - 16 .

translation.en: shortly after that , brothers pyatokha and babijchuk were arrested , charged , and sentenced to 25 years in prison .
translation.zu: i no longtaim bihain long dispela ol i kisim brata pyatokha na brata babijchuk na kalabusim ol na kot i makim ol long stap kalabus 25 yia .

translation.en: about that time , in 1950 , many witnesses , including my father , were taken away by the authorities .
translation.zu: na klostu long dispela taim , em long 1950 , ol polis i kisim planti witnes , na papa bilong mi tu wantaim .

translation.en: he was given a 25 - year prison sentence and sent to khabarovsk at the eastern extremity of the soviet union nearly 5,000 miles [ 7,000 km ] away !
translation.zu: kot i makim em long stap kalabus inap 25 yia na ol i salim em i go long kabarask , em hap is tru bilong soviet yunion , na i stap longwe long mipela inap olsem 7,000 kilomita !

translation.en: exiled to siberia
translation.zu: kalabus long saibiria

translation.en: then in april 1951 , the soviet state struck an organized blow against the witnesses in its western republics now known as latvia , estonia , lithuania , moldova , belarus , and ukraine .
translation.zu: bihain , em long epril 1951 , gavman soviet i stretim ol samting bilong givim bikpela hevi long ol witnes i stap long ol hap wes bilong kantri , nem bilong ol dispela ples long nau i olsem latvia , estonia , lituenia , moldova , belarus , na yukren .

translation.en: during that month some 7,000 of us , including mother and me , were sent into exile in siberia .
translation.zu: long dispela mun epril , ol i salim mi na mama wantaim 7,000 ol narapela witnes i go kalabus long saibiria .

translation.en: soldiers simply came to our home at night and took us to the railway station .
translation.zu: ol lain ami i kam long haus bilong mipela long wanpela nait na kisim mipela i go long ples bilong kalap long tren .

translation.en: there we were locked in cattle cars - about 50 to a car - and over two weeks later , we were dropped off at a place called zalari , which is close to lake baikal in the district of irkutsk .
translation.zu: na ol i kalabusim mipela insait long ol hap bilong tren ol i save karim ol bulmakau long en - i gat 50 samting manmeri insait long ol wan wan hap bilong tren .

translation.en: standing in the snow in the grip of an icy wind and surrounded by armed soldiers , i wondered what awaited us .
translation.zu: mi sanap long ais i karamapim graun , na win i kol nogut tru olsem ais i holim skin bilong mi , na ol lain ami i holim gan i stap na was long mipela .

translation.en: how would i manage to stay loyal to jehovah here ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem mi bai mekim ol samting bilong stap gut long jehova long dispela ples ?

translation.en: we began to sing kingdom songs to keep our minds off the cold .
translation.zu: bilong helpim mipela long lusim tingting long kol , mipela kirap na mekim ol singsing bilong kingdom .

translation.en: then managers of local state - owned enterprises arrived .
translation.zu: long dispela taim ol maneja bilong sampela bisnis bilong dispela provins yet ol i kam .

translation.en: some needed men for hard physical work , whereas others wanted women for such things as caring for animals .
translation.zu: sampela maneja i painim ol man i gat strong bilong mekim ol bikpela wok , na sampela i laikim ol meri bilong lukautim ol animal samting .

translation.en: mother and i were taken to a construction site where the tagninskaya hydroelectric power station was being built .
translation.zu: ol i kisim mi na mama i go long wanpela hap ol i laik wokim tagninskiya paua - stesin long en .

translation.en: i was assigned to work as a tractor driver and an electrician , and mother was put to work on a farm .
translation.zu: ol i makim mi bilong draivim trakta na mekim wok elektrisen , na ol i makim mama bilong wok long fam .

translation.en: so we were free to move within a short distance of the power station , although we were forbidden to visit the next settlement some 30 miles [ 50 km ] away .
translation.zu: olsem na mipela inap lusim hap em paua - stesin i stap long en na raun liklik , tasol mipela no inap go long narapela ples i stap longwe long mipela olsem 50 kilomita .

translation.en: that sounded like an exceedingly long time to me , a 19 - year - old , so i refused to sign .
translation.zu: mi wanpela manki i gat 19 krismas tasol , na long tingting bilong mi yet em i longpela taim tumas , olsem na mi no sainim nem bilong mi .

translation.en: yet , we did remain in the area for 15 years .
translation.zu: tasol mipela bin stap long dispela hap inap long 15 yia .

translation.en: there in siberia the polish border was no longer within just 5 miles [ 8 km ] of us but was over 4,000 [ 6,000 km ] miles away !
translation.zu: long dispela hap bilong saibiria , boda bilong polan i no longwe olsem 8 - pela kilomita tasol , nogat , em longwe tru olsem 6,000 kilomita samting !

translation.en: we witnesses did all that we could to organize ourselves into congregations again , appointing men to take the lead .
translation.zu: mipela ol witnes i traim mekim ol samting bilong kamapim ol kongrigesen na bilong makim ol man i olsem gopas .

translation.en: at first , we had no bible literature except for a few items that some witnesses had managed to bring with them from ukraine .
translation.zu: pastaim mipela i no gat ol nius bilong baibel , tasol sampela witnes i bin kisim wan wan nius bilong baibel taim ol i lusim yukren .

translation.en: these were copied by hand , and we passed them among ourselves .
translation.zu: na mipela raitim ol kopi bilong ol dispela nius na tilim i go long narapela narapela .

translation.en: our congregation consisted of about 50 people , and i was assigned to conduct the theocratic ministry school .
translation.zu: kongrigesen bilong mipela i gat olsem 50 manmeri long en , na ol i makim mi long lukautim skul bilong wok autim tok .

translation.en: there were few men in our congregation , so women also gave student talks , which was a procedure introduced to congregations of jehovah 's witnesses elsewhere in 1958 .
translation.zu: i no gat planti man long kongrigesen , olsem na ol meri tu i mekim ol tok olsem sumatin i insait long skul . ol narapela kongrigesen bilong ol witnes bilong jehova i kirapim dispela pasin long 1958 .

translation.en: all took their assignments seriously , viewing the school as a way to praise jehovah and to encourage others in the congregation .
translation.zu: olgeta i pilim olsem ol wok ol i kisim long skul i bikpela samting ; ol i pilim olsem em i rot bilong litimapim nem bilong jehova na strongim bel bilong ol narapela long kongrigesen .

translation.en: since we shared the barracks with non - witnesses , hardly a day went by without our talking with others about our faith , even though this was strictly forbidden .
translation.zu: i gat ol man i no witnes i stap insait long ol dispela bikpela haus bilong kampani , olsem na klostu olgeta de mipela i toktok wantaim ol long bilip bilong mipela , maski i gat bikpela tambu long dispela samting .

translation.en: after joseph stalin , the soviet premier , died in 1953 , conditions improved .
translation.zu: taim bikman bilong ol soviet , em joseph stalin , i dai long 1953 , ol samting i kamap gutpela liklik .

translation.en: we were allowed to talk more openly with others about our bible - based beliefs .
translation.zu: na ol i larim mipela i toktok wantaim ol narapela long ol bilip bilong mipela em baibel i as bilong en .

translation.en: this enabled us to organize our congregations into circuits .
translation.zu: long dispela rot , mipela inap skelim ol kongrigesen bilong mipela na kamapim ol sekit .

translation.en: in 1954 , i married olga , also exiled from ukraine .
translation.zu: long 1954 , mi maritim olga , em tu ol i bin rausim em long yukren .

translation.en: over the years she was a great support to me in my service to jehovah .
translation.zu: inap planti yia em i helpim mi tru long ol wok mi mekim bilong lotuim jehova .

translation.en: it was olga 's brother , stepan , who was killed at the border between ukraine and poland in 1947 .
translation.zu: stepan em brata bilong em , ol i bin kilim em i dai long 1947 long boda i stap namel long yukren na polan .

translation.en: olga and i enjoyed many blessings in our christian ministry in siberia .
translation.zu: mi na olga i kisim planti blesing long wok kristen bilong mipela long saibiria .

translation.en: for example , we met george , who was the leader of a baptist group .
translation.zu: olsem : mipela bungim george , em i gopas bilong wanpela lain baptis .

translation.en: we called on him regularly and studied whatever watchtower magazines were available .
translation.zu: mipela go lukim em planti taim na stadi long ol wastaua mipela inap kisim .

translation.en: george soon came to appreciate that what jehovah 's servants preach from the bible is the truth .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na george i pilim tru olsem ol tok bilong baibel ol lain bilong jehova i autim em tok i tru .

translation.en: we also began to study with several of his baptist friends .
translation.zu: na tu , sampela ol pren bilong em bilong lotu baptis i kirap na stadi wantaim mipela .

translation.en: what a thrill it was for us when george and a number of his friends were baptized and became our spiritual brothers !
translation.zu: mipela i kisim bikpela amamas taim george na sampela pren bilong em i kisim baptais na kamap ol brata bilong mipela long spirit !

translation.en: in 1956 , i was appointed as a traveling overseer , which required that i visit a congregation in our area each week .
translation.zu: long 1956 , ol i makim mi long kamap wasman bilong raun , olsem na mi mas go lukim wanpela kongrigesen long hap bilong mipela long olgeta wik .

translation.en: i would work all day and then set off in the evening on my motorbike to meet with the congregation .
translation.zu: bilong mekim olsem , mi bai wok skin long de olgeta , na long apinun tru mi bai kalap long motabaik na bung wantaim kongrigesen .

translation.en: early the next morning , i would return and go to work .
translation.zu: long moningtaim tru mi bai go bek long hap bilong mi na wok .

translation.en: mykhailo serdinsky , who was appointed to assist me in the traveling work , was killed in a road accident in 1958 .
translation.zu: mykhailo serdinsky , em brata ol i bin makim bilong helpim mi long raun , em i kisim bagarap long rot na i dai long 1958 .

translation.en: he died on a wednesday , but we delayed his funeral until sunday to give as many witnesses as possible the opportunity to attend .
translation.zu: em i dai long wanpela trinde , tasol mipela i no wokim bung bilong planim em hariap - mipela i wokim long sande na bai rot i op na planti ol witnes inap bung wantaim .

translation.en: when a large group of us began walking to the cemetery , members of the state security followed .
translation.zu: taim bikpela lain bilong mipela i wokabaut i go long matmat , i gat ol sekyuriti bilong gavman i bihainim mipela .

translation.en: delivering a talk that covered our bible - based hope of the resurrection meant running the risk of arrest .
translation.zu: ol dispela sekyuriti inap kalabusim man i kamapim ol tok bilong baibel long bilip bilong kirap bek long matmat .

translation.en: but i was impelled to speak about mykhailo and his wonderful future prospects .
translation.zu: tasol mi pilim olsem mi mas tokaut long mykhailo na long ol gutpela samting tru i laik painim em long bihain .

translation.en: although i used the bible , the state security did not arrest me .
translation.zu: na maski mi mekim wok long baibel , ol sekyuriti i no kalabusim mi .

translation.en: apparently they felt that nothing was to be gained , and i was well - known to them anyway , having often been a " guest " at their headquarters for questioning .
translation.zu: i luk olsem wok bilong kisim mi i no inap helpim ol liklik , na ol i save gut long mi , long wanem planti taim ol i bin singautim mi i kam long hetkota bilong ol taim ol i laik givim sampela askim long mi .

translation.en: in 1959 the state security arrested 12 witnesses who had been taking the lead in the preaching work .
translation.zu: long 1959 , polis i kalabusim 12 - pela witnes , em ol i go pas bilong wok autim tok .

translation.en: when my turn for questioning came , i was aghast to hear the officials recounting confidential details about our work .
translation.zu: taim ol i givim sampela askim long mi , mi kirap nogut tru long harim ol i toktok long ol samting bilong wok bilong mipela em mipela i mekim long pasin hait .

translation.en: obviously there was an informer , someone who knew a lot about us and who had been working for the state for some time .
translation.zu: i mas i gat wanpela i bin tokim ol , em wanpela i save long planti samting bilong mipela na inap longpela taim em i kamapim ol samting long ol polis .

translation.en: the 12 who had been arrested were in adjoining cells , and they agreed that they would not say one more word to the authorities .
translation.zu: ol dispela 12 - pela brata i kalabus long ol rum i stap klostu klostu , olsem na ol i pasim tok olsem ol bai i no kamapim wanpela tok moa long ol polis .

translation.en: that way the informer would have to appear in person at the trial to give evidence against them .
translation.zu: long dispela rot , man i bin kamapim mipela i mas kam long kot na tokaut long jas long ol samting em i save long en .

translation.en: although i was not charged , i went to court to see what would happen .
translation.zu: ol i no bin kotim mi , tasol mi go long kot bilong save long wanem ol samting bai kamap .

translation.en: the judge asked questions , and the 12 did not respond .
translation.zu: jas i givim askim long ol dispela 12 - pela brata , tasol ol i no bekim .

translation.en: the trial ended with some of the witnesses receiving prison sentences .
translation.zu: kot i makim sampela bilong ol dispela witnes long kalabus .

translation.en: on the street outside the court building , i bumped into polishchuk .
translation.zu: bihain mi bungim polishchuk long rot i stap ausait long haus kot .

translation.en: " why are you betraying us ? " i asked .
translation.zu: mi askim em : " bilong wanem yu kamapim mipela ? "

translation.en: " because i no longer believe , " he replied .
translation.zu: em i bekim olsem : " long wanem mi no bilip moa . "

translation.en: " what do you no longer believe ? " i asked .
translation.zu: mi askim em : " yu no bilip moa long wanem samting ? "

translation.en: " i just cannot believe the bible any longer , " he replied .
translation.zu: em i bekim olsem : " mi no inap bilip moa long baibel . "

translation.en: polishchuk could have also betrayed me , but in his testimony he didn 't mention my name .
translation.zu: polishchuk inap tokim kot long ol samting mi bin mekim , tasol taim em i toktok long kot , em i no kamapim nem bilong mi .

translation.en: so i asked him why he didn 't .
translation.zu: olsem na mi askim em bilong wanem em i no bin mekim olsem ?

translation.en: " i don 't want you to go to prison , " he explained .
translation.zu: em i tok : " mi no laik bai yu kalabus .

translation.en: " i still feel guilty about your wife 's brother , stepan .
translation.zu: bel i kotim mi yet long samting i bin kamap long brata bilong meri bilong yu , em stepan .

translation.en: i was the one responsible for sending him across the border the night he was killed .
translation.zu: mi yet i bin salim em i go brukim boda long dispela nait ol i bin kilim em i dai .

translation.en: i am truly sorry for that . "
translation.zu: na mi sori tru long dispela samting . "

translation.en: how warped his conscience had become !
translation.zu: tingting bilong bel bilong em i paul tru !

translation.en: i never saw polishchuk again .
translation.zu: mi no bin lukim polishchuk gen .

translation.en: he died some months later .
translation.zu: na sampela mun bihain em i dai .

translation.en: surely we need to keep this lesson in mind : if we are to stay loyal to jehovah , we need to engage in regular study of the holy scriptures .
translation.zu: yumi mas tingim yet dispela samting : sapos yumi laik stap gut long jehova , yumi mas bihainim pasin bilong stadi oltaim long baibel .

translation.en: the bible says : " safeguard your heart , for out of it are the sources of life . "
translation.zu: baibel i tok : " gutpela tingting bilong stiaim laip bilong yu , em i save kamap long tingting bilong yu . . .

translation.en: moreover , the apostle paul told christians to beware .
translation.zu: na tu , aposel pol i givim wanpela tok lukaut long ol kristen .

translation.en: " for fear there should ever develop in any one of you a wicked heart lacking faith by drawing away from the living god . " - proverbs 4 : 23 ; hebrews 3 : 12 .
translation.zu: long wanem , " nogut wanpela brata namel long yupela em i gat tingting nogut long bel bilong en na em i lusim bilip na i givim baksait long god i gat laip . " - sindaun 4 : 23 ; hibru 3 : 12 .

translation.en: when our exile in siberia ended in 1966 , olga and i moved back to ukraine , to a town called sokal , about 50 miles [ 80 km ] from l 'viv .
translation.zu: long 1966 ol no pasim mipela moa long saibiria , olsem na mitupela olga i go bek long yukren , long wanpela taun ol i kolim sokal , em i stap longwe long taun lavif olsem 50 kilomita .

translation.en: we had much to do , since there were only 34 witnesses in sokal and the nearby towns of cervonograd and sosnivka .
translation.zu: i gat planti wok long mekim , long wanem , i gat 34 witnes tasol i stap long sokal na tupela narapela taun i stap klostu , olsem servonograt na sosnifka .

translation.en: in this area today , there are 11 congregations !
translation.zu: long nau i gat 11 - pela kongrigesen i stap long dispela hap !

translation.en: three years later i married lidiya , and since then she has been a great strength to me .
translation.zu: tripela yia bihain mi maritim lidiya , na em i stap olsem gutpela helpim bilong mi .

translation.en: in addition , my daughter , valentina , and her family are zealous servants of jehovah and have also been a source of encouragement .
translation.zu: na tu , pikinini meri bilong mi , valentina , na famili bilong em , ol i givim bel long jehova , na dispela tu i strongim bel bilong mi .

translation.en: however , what continues to bring me the greatest joy is that i have remained loyal to jehovah , a god who acts with loyalty . - 2 samuel 22 : 26 .
translation.zu: tasol nambawan samting i givim bikpela amamas long mi i olsem mi bin stap gut long jehova , em god i no save lusim man i stap gut long em . - 2 samuel 22 : 26 .

translation.en: alexei davidjuk died loyal to jehovah on february 18 , 2000 , as this article was being prepared for publication .
translation.zu: alexei davidjuk i stap gut long jehova i go inap long em i dai long februeri 18 , 2000 , taim ol i wok yet long redim dispela stori .

translation.en: the pyramids of mexico
translation.zu: ol piramid bilong meksiko

translation.en: like their counterparts in egypt , the mexican pyramids are many centuries old and are shrouded in mystery .
translation.zu: olsem ol piramid bilong isip , ol piramid bilong meksiko i stap planti handet yia , na inap long nau ol i no save long planti samting bilong ol .

translation.en: an egyptian pyramid is a tomb encased in a huge symmetrical mound of stones .
translation.zu: ol piramid bilong isip ol i olsem wanpela matmat i insait long traipela haus ston .

translation.en: however , the mexican pyramid is a large pile of earth with a temple at the very top and an external staircase that provides access to the summit .
translation.zu: tasol ol piramid bilong meksiko i narapela kain - ol i hipim tru bikpela hap graun i go antap olsem maunten na wokim wanpela haus lotu antap long en , na long arere bilong maunten ol i wokim wanpela lata bilong go antap .

translation.en: with few exceptions , the pyramids found in america were not tombs .
translation.zu: long amerika wan wan piramid tasol i gat ol matmat i stap long en .

translation.en: teotihuacán - " the city of the gods "
translation.zu: teotiwaken - " biktaun bilong ol god "

translation.en: one of the most outstanding pyramid sites in mexico is teotihuacán .
translation.zu: dispela hap i stap longwe long not - is bilong meksiko inap 50 kilomita .

translation.en: located about 33 miles [ 50 km ] northeast of mexico city , teotihuacán is still a mystery to anthropologists and archaeologists .
translation.zu: ol saveman i gat hatwok yet long painimaut olsem i gat wanem as bilong ol samting ol man i wokim long dispela hap .

translation.en: this ancient metropolis was abandoned by its builders more than 500 years before the aztec culture emerged .
translation.zu: ol man i bin lusim dispela biktaun 500 yia samting paslain long taim bilong ol astek .

translation.en: the name teotihuacán , from the nahuatl language , means " the city of the gods " or " where men become gods . "
translation.zu: dispela nem teotiwaken i kam long tok ples nawatel , na insait bilong dispela tok i olsem " biktaun bilong ol god " o " ples ol man i kamap god . "

translation.en: it is thought that the aztecs gave the name to the city when they visited it .
translation.zu: ol man i ting ol astek i kamapim dispela nem taim ol i lukim dispela ples .

translation.en: one of the editors for national geographic magazine , george stuart , explains that " teotihuacan was the first true urban center in the western hemisphere . . .
translation.zu: george stuart , em wanpela edita bilong nius national geographic , em i tok : " teotiwaken i namba wan ples long ol hap bilong wes i bin kamap olsem wanpela biktaun . . .

translation.en: almost in the center of the city stands the great pyramid of the sun .
translation.zu: e . samting , ol i ting olsem i gat 125,000 i go inap long 200,000 manmeri i stap long en . "

translation.en: it measures about 720 feet by 740 feet [ 220 by 225 m ] at the base , and its five terraces rise to its present height of about 210 feet [ 63 m ] .
translation.zu: traipela piramid bilong san i sanap klostu long namel bilong biktaun , braitpela na longpela bilong as bilong en i olsem 220 mita na 225 mita , na antap bilong en i olsem 63 mita .

translation.en: to reach the top of the pyramid , one must climb more than 240 steps .
translation.zu: na lata i gat 240 hap bilong lek bilong wokabaut i go antap long dispela piramid .

translation.en: to the north of the ancient city is the pyramid of the moon , with its top 130 feet [ 40 m ] high .
translation.zu: piramid bilong mun i stap long hap not bilong biktaun na antap bilong en i olsem 40 mita .

translation.en: once there were temples on top of these two main pyramids .
translation.zu: bipo dispela tupela piramid i bin i gat haus lotu i stap antap long ol .

translation.en: in recent decades much has been learned about these pyramids .
translation.zu: nau long taim bilong yumi ol i kisim planti save long ol dispela piramid .

translation.en: however , as stuart puts it , " we still know next to nothing about the origins of the teotihuacanos , what language they spoke , how their society was organized , and what caused their decline . "
translation.zu: tasol olsem stuart i tok , " planti samting bilong dispela lain i stap hait yet , olsem ol teotiwaken i kam long wanem hap , na wanem tok ples bilong ol , na ol i bihainim wanem kain pasin long sindaun bilong ol , na wanem samting i mekim na ol i lus . "

translation.en: right in the heart of mexico city , one can visit the main temple of the aztecs .
translation.zu: namel stret long meksiko siti , yu inap lukim nambawan tempel bilong ol astek .

translation.en: while there is no pyramid in sight , the remains of a pyramid structure that was the basis for the main temple can still be seen .
translation.zu: yu no inap lukim wanpela piramid long dispela hap , tasol yu inap lukim yet hap pipia bilong wanpela i stap olsem as bilong dispela nambawan tempel .

translation.en: in palenque , visitors will find an impressive maya complex surrounded by the chiapas jungle .
translation.zu: ol lain i raun long palenke bai i lukim wanpela biktaun samting ol maia i bin wokim insait long bikbus bilong siapas .

translation.en: the temple of the inscriptions " is one of the most famous temples in the whole of mesoamerica because it was not simply the base for a temple like all the others , but a funeral monument , " explains the book the mayas - 3000 years of civilization .
translation.zu: wanpela buk ( the mayas - 3000 years of civilization ) i tok dispela tempel bilong rait " i gat biknem tru , long wanem , em i no as bilong wanpela haus lotu olsem ol narapela , nogat , em i traipela haus matmat .

translation.en: " inside there is a vaulted staircase leading down to the most magnificent burial chamber ever found in the maya area . "
translation.zu: i gat lata i go daun insait long wanpela rum bilong planim man , na dispela rum i gutpela tru , winim ol narapela rum olsem matmat ol maia i bin wokim . "

translation.en: the tomb was built for a governor who lived in the seventh century - pacal , or uoxoc ahau .
translation.zu: ol i bin wokim dispela matmat bilong pakal , o woksok eau , em i wanpela gavena bilong bipo .

translation.en: these are only a few of the pyramids in mexico .
translation.zu: dispela em ol stori bilong sampela piramid tasol bilong meksiko .

translation.en: there are also huge pyramids in guatemala and honduras .
translation.zu: na tu , i gat ol traipela piramid long guatemala na honduras .

translation.en: all of these ancient structures show that the inhabitants of mesoamerica desired higher ground on which to build their places of worship .
translation.zu: ol dispela olpela samting bilong bipo tru i kamapim klia olsem ol i bin i gat laik long wokim ol haus lotu bilong ol antap long maunten .

translation.en: walter krickeberg , author of the book las antiguas culturas mexicanas , wrote : " the custom of building temples on a stepped base goes back to an ancient worship of heights . "
translation.zu: long buk bilong em ( las antiguas culturas mexicanas ) , walter krickeberg i tok : " dispela pasin bilong wokim haus lotu long graun ol i bin hipim olsem maunten em i bin i stap long sampela lain long bipo tru , em ol i bin lotuim ol ples olsem maunten . "

translation.en: he adds : " while we consider heaven to be like a ' vault , ' for other peoples it represented a mountain by means of which the sun ascended in the morning and descended in the evening ; therefore , its slopes are stepped like those of a gigantic building .
translation.zu: em i tok moa olsem : " yumi gat tingting olsem heven em i olsem wanpela traipela rum em rup bilong en i raunpela , tasol long sampela lain , em i olsem wanpela maunten em san i save go antap long en long moningtaim na i go daun long en long apinun ; em as na ol i wokim arere bilong ol dispela maunten i olsem lata .

translation.en: thus , the ' artificial mountain ' . . . was transformed into a stepped pyramid and , as deduced from legends and customs , was converted into a symbol of heaven among the many peoples of mesoamerica . "
translation.zu: olsem na dispela maunten ol i wokim . . . i kamap wanpela piramid , na olsem ol olpela bilip na tumbuna stori i kamapim , long tingting bilong ol lain bilong saut na sentral amerika dispela piramid i makim heven . "

translation.en: this concept may remind bible students of the bible account about the tower of babel , located in a city later known as babylon .
translation.zu: ating dispela tingting inap kirapim ol man i stadi long baibel long tingim stori bilong taua bilong babel , long taun babilon .

translation.en: let us build ourselves a city and also a tower with its top in the heavens , and let us make a celebrated name for ourselves . ' "
translation.zu: dispela taua bai i go antap inap long skai . olsem na bai ol manmeri i lukim dispela wok , na ol i litimapim nem bilong yumi . '

translation.en: not too far from the ruins of babylon , archaeologists have found pyramid structures known as ziggurats .
translation.zu: " long hap i no stap longwe tumas long babilon , ol saveman i painim ol samting i olsem ol piramid i gat ol lata long en .

translation.en: the form of worship that originated in babylon spread to many parts of the world , likely reaching the region that became known as mexico .
translation.zu: pasin bilong lotu i kirap long babilon i bin go long planti ol narapela hap bilong graun bihain . ating long meksiko tu .

translation.en: it would not be surprising if the ziggurats of babylon as well as the religion practiced there were the prototypes for the mysterious and impressive pyramids of mexico .
translation.zu: olsem na bai yumi no kirap nogut sapos ol samting olsem piramid i stap long babilon wantaim lotu bilong ol i as bilong ol dispela tripela piramid bilong meksiko .

translation.en: in 1968 , only 9 percent of total family spending went for leisure , compared with 17 percent today .
translation.zu: ol saveman bilong yunivesiti bilong bristol , inglan , ol i tok pasin bilong pinisim wanpela karamap smok bai sotim laip bilong man inap wanpela de na hap .

translation.en: taking a holiday is now regarded by most people as a ' need ' rather than a ' want . '
translation.zu: ol saientis i kisim dispela save taim ol i skelim hamas yia ol man bilong smok i save stap na hamas yia ol man i no save smok ol i save stap .

translation.en: in fact , 1 household in 10 is connected to the internet , and 1 in 3 has a computer . a nap that refreshes
translation.zu: nius the new york times i tok , pasin bilong dring kofi bambai skin i no ken les long belo bek inap mekim na skin bilong man bai les .

translation.en: the habit of relying on caffeine to get through early - afternoon drowsiness may be counterproductive , according to the new york times .
translation.zu: james maas , em saveman bilong ol samting bilong slip long yunivesiti konel , em i tok : ' taim man i dring kofi pinis , bihain skin bilong em bai les .

translation.en: " consumption of caffeine will be followed by feelings of lethargy , " says cornell university sleep expert dr . james maas .
translation.zu: sapos man i no bin slip inap long skel bilong em , ol marasin bilong kirapim skin i no stretim dispela samting . '

translation.en: " a debt in your sleep bank account is not reduced by artificial stimulants . "
translation.zu: maas i tok i gutpela moa long slip liklik na maski long dring kofi .

translation.en: instead of taking coffee breaks , maas recommends taking naps , which he says " greatly strengthen the ability to pay close attention to details and to make critical decisions . "
translation.zu: em i tok , pasin bilong slip liklik " i helpim tru man long putim gut tingting bilong em long ol samting bilong wok , na i helpim em long skelim na pasim tok long ol bikpela samting . "

translation.en: a short midday nap , less than 30 minutes long , can revive a person 's energy without making it difficult to wake up and without interfering with a good night 's sleep , notes the times .
translation.zu: nius times i tok , pasin bilong slip liklik long belo , inap 30 minit samting , inap givim nupela strong long man na em i no hatwok long kirap , na dispela i no bagarapim slip bilong em long nait .

translation.en: " napping should not be frowned upon , " says maas .
translation.zu: maas i tok : " yumi no ken ting pasin bilong slip liklik i no gutpela .

translation.en: " it should have the status of daily exercise . "
translation.zu: yumi mas ting em i bikpela samting olsem pasin bilong eksasais long olgeta de . "

translation.en: cotton grows on sheep ?

translation.en: according to a recent survey commissioned by the european council of young farmers , " 50 per cent of eu [ european union ] children do not know where sugar comes from , three - quarters . . . do not know where cotton comes from , with over a quarter who believe that it is grown on sheep . "
translation.zu: i no longtaim i go pinis na wanpela lain ( european council of young farmers ) i skelim save bilong ol yangpela , na ol i tok " 50 pesen bilong ol pikinini long ol kantri bilong yuropian yunion ol i no save suga i kam we , na 75 pesen i no save kapok i kam we , na 25 pesen i ting ol sipsip i save kamapim kapok . "

translation.en: in addition , 25 percent of nine - and ten - year - olds in britain and the netherlands believe that oranges and olives grow in their countries .
translation.zu: na tu , 25 pesen bilong ol pikinini long briten na netelan i gat 9 - pela o 10 - pela krismas , ol i ting ol orens na oliv i save kamap long kantri bilong ol yet .

translation.en: the children 's main contact with agricultural products is , not the farm , but the supermarket , and they learn about agriculture mainly at school .
translation.zu: ol pikinini i no save go long fam na lukim ol prut samting , ol i save lukim ol prut long supamaket , na ol i lain long ol samting bilong wok didiman long skul tasol .

translation.en: these may be among the reasons why farming as a profession does not attract many european children today .
translation.zu: ating dispela ol samting i mekim na i no gat planti pikinini long yurop ol i laik kamap fama .

translation.en: " on average , " states the council , " only 10 per cent of eu children would ' very much like ' to become a farmer in the future . "
translation.zu: dispela lain i tok : " inap 10 pesen tasol bilong ol pikinini long ol kantri bilong yuropian yunion ol ' i gat laik tru ' long kamap fama long bihain . "

translation.en: " spending time with friends is played down as an optional indulgence that steals scarce hours out of an already jam - packed schedule , " notes the paper .
translation.zu: nius i tok : " ol man i ting i no bikpela samting long lusim hap taim bilong stap wantaim ol pren , em samting man i mekim taim em i gat laik tasol .

translation.en: but those who neglect friendships may find that when family tragedy strikes , " no one 's there for them , " says sociologist jan yager .
translation.zu: ol i ting pasin bilong stap wantaim ol pren i kisim hap taim bilong mekim planti narapela samting ol i laik mekim . "

translation.en: on the other hand , studies seem to indicate that those who have good friends usually suffer less stress and illness and may even live longer .
translation.zu: tasol saveman jan yager i tok , taim wanpela hevi i painim famili bilong ol man i no save pas gut wantaim ol narapela , ating " i no gat man i laik helpim ol . "

translation.en: " the key , " notes the journal , " is realizing that maintaining friendships takes extra effort , just the way balancing work and family does . "
translation.zu: na save ol i kisim i kamapim olsem ol man i gat ol gutpela pren ol i no karim planti hevi tumas , na ol i no save sik tumas , na ol inap i stap longpela taim moa .

translation.en: the incidence of overweight children in many parts of asia is high , especially among boys and in urban areas , reports asiaweek .
translation.zu: nius asiaweek i tok , long planti hap bilong esia i gat planti pikinini i patpela tru , na planti bilong ol em ol manki na ol yangpela i stap long taun .

translation.en: a recent study in beijing revealed that more than 20 percent of primary - and secondary - school students there are overweight .
translation.zu: i no longtaim i go pinis na wanpela ripot long beijing i kamapim olsem , winim 20 pesen bilong ol sumatin bilong ol komyuniti skul ol i patpela tumas .

translation.en: it seems that asian youngsters are spending more and more time watching tv and playing video games , states the report .
translation.zu: ripot i tok , i luk olsem ol yangpela bilong esia ol i save lusim bikpela hap taim moa long lukim televisen na long pilai ol video - gem .

translation.en: according to asiaweek , the solution lies not so much in limiting the amount of food children eat but , rather , in combining regular exercise with a healthy diet - one that emphasizes fruits and vegetables over fatty snacks .
translation.zu: nius asiaweek i tok , bilong stretim dispela i no olsem ol pikinini i no ken kaikai planti , tasol ol i mas eksasais na kisim gutpela kaikai i save strongim skin , olsem planti prut na ol kumu samting , na ol i no ken kisim ol sis - pop samting i gat planti gris long en .

translation.en: dr . chwang further notes that making physical activity fun is the key to success .
translation.zu: dokta chwang i tok moa olsem eksasais i mas kamap samting bilong amamas bambai ol pikinini i ken insait long en .

translation.en: but without a change in habits , says the report , overweight children could be facing high blood pressure , liver trouble , diabetes , and psychological problems .
translation.zu: tasol ripot i tok , sapos ol pikinini i no senisim pasin bilong ol , bihain mak bilong blut bilong ol inap go antap , ol i kisim sik long lewa , daiabitis , o sik bilong tingting .

translation.en: " to teenagers , films such as terminator 2 , titanic and star wars offer deeper religious experiences than conventional churches , " reports london 's newspaper the independent .
translation.zu: wanpela nius ( the independent ) bilong landon i tok : " ol yangpela i ting ol piksa wokabaut olsem terminator 2 na titanic na star wars , ol i kirapim ol long pilim ol samting bilong spirit , winim ol bikpela lotu .

translation.en: dr . lynn clark , of the university of colorado 's center for mass media research , asked 200 young people which film was most like their religious beliefs .
translation.zu: savemeri lynn clark bilong lain i skelim ol nius samting long yunivesiti bilong kolorado , em i askim 200 yangpela long wanem piksa wokabaut i klostu wankain olsem ol bilip bilong lotu bilong ol .

translation.en: many cited terminator 2 , which portrays a battle between good and evil , with the lead character traveling back in time to save a messiahlike child . speaking at a conference in edinburgh , scotland , dr .
translation.zu: planti ol i tok terminator 2 , em dispela piksa wokabaut i stori long pait i stap namel long ol gutpela man na ol man nogut , na man i go pas long dispela piksa em i save raun long hap taim bilong bipo bilong helpim wanpela pikinini i kain olsem mesaia .

translation.en: clark concluded : " young people are now looking to darth vader and the x files as sources to help them unravel questions about what life is about .
translation.zu: savemeri clark i toktok long wanpela bung long edinbara , skotlan , na em i tok : " long nau ol yangpela i wet long darth vader na x files long helpim ol long kisim save long ol i stap bilong mekim wanem .

translation.en: the x files appeals because it looks at the whole idea of an unknown force controlling the universe .
translation.zu: planti ol i laikim x files , long wanem , dispela program i stori long wanpela strong i save bosim graun na ples antap .

translation.en: that 's a religious question , but one that religion is not handling well . "
translation.zu: dispela em i wanpela askim bilong lotu , tasol ol lotu i no inap stori gut long en . "

translation.en: the researchers commented : " it shows the high cost of smoking in a way that everyone can understand . "
