translation.en: in ottapalam , india , baby elephants are being taught to paint pictures by grasping a brush with their trunk . conservationists have established the asian elephant art and conservation project to raise money to protect elephants by selling elephants ' paintings , reports the indian express .
translation.zu: nius the indian express i tok , ol man bilong lukautim ol samting bilong graun , ol i bin kamapim wanpela lain ( asian elephant art and conservation project ) i salim ol piksa ol elefan i bin droim na long dispela rot ol i kisim mani bilong lukautim ol elefan .

translation.en: one six - year - old tusker named ganesan appears especially to enjoy his " artistic " endeavors .
translation.zu: wanpela elefan i gat 6 - pela krismas , nem bilong en ganesan , em i save amamas tru long droim ol piksa .

translation.en: when he is in the mood to paint , he wags his ears and accepts the brush from his trainer .
translation.zu: taim em i gat laik long droim piksa , em i save meknaisim tupela yau bilong em na kisim bras long man i skulim em .

translation.en: after making some colorful strokes , ganesan pauses and seems to study his work .
translation.zu: taim ganesan i droim sampela mak pinis , em i malolo liklik na i olsem em i skelim wok bilong en .

translation.en: however , not all young elephants respond to efforts to turn them into animal " artists . "
translation.zu: tasol i no olgeta yangpela elefan i laik droim ol piksa .

translation.en: at a conference on birth held recently in florence , italy , swiss gynecologist fred paccaud noted : " since the 19th century , in the western world , there has been a 95 - percent drop in births on saturdays and sundays .
translation.zu: long 1968 , inap 9 pesen bilong mani bilong famili i go bilong baim ol samting bilong amamas , tasol long nau 17 pesen bilong mani bilong famili i go long dispela samting .

translation.en: but that is not all : we can state that the majority of births take place during labor - union - correct hours of the day , that is , during those shifts when most doctors and nurses are at work . " the births are either induced by medication or performed by cesarean section .
translation.zu: saveman martin hayward i tok : " nau yumi gat planti mani moa , winim long 30 yia i go pinis , olsem na ol samting bilong amamas em bipo ol maniman tasol i baim , long nau planti ol i ting em samting ol i mas kisim .

translation.en: " we see a rapid increase in cesarean section , which by now accounts for more than 20 percent [ of births ] . "
translation.zu: sampela ol i ting ol i mas kisim holide inap 3 - pela taim long olgeta yia . "

translation.en: however , professor carlo romanini , president of the italian society of gynecology and obstetrics , claims that " ' programmed ' births are not a choice of convenience " but are a safeguard for the mothers and their infants against unforeseen complications .
translation.zu: ol famili i save tromoi bikpela mani long ol video na kaset samting , televisen , na kompiuta , winim mani ol famili i bin tromoi long ol dispela samting long 1968 inap 4 - pela taim .

translation.en: " it is much better for [ a birth ] to occur when the hospital is fully staffed and able to guarantee the best possible care , " he said .

translation.en: better health - a new direction ?
translation.zu: strongpela skin - painim nupela rot ?

translation.en: at times , there seem to be as many opinions as there are health practitioners .
translation.zu: sampela taim i olsem olgeta wan wan dokta i gat narapela narapela tingting long dispela samting .

translation.en: we do not endorse any of the health treatments that we will discuss or any others .
translation.zu: taim mipela i mekim olsem , i no olsem mipela i tok orait long ol dispela marasin , o ol narapela marasin , nogat .

translation.en: everyone wants to be healthy .
translation.zu: olgeta man i laik stap strong long skin .

translation.en: but good health can be elusive , as can be seen by the numbers of people who have health complaints .
translation.zu: tasol planti man i gat sik , olsem na yumi save , strongpela skin , olsem no ken sik tumas , em i hatwok long kisim .

translation.en: it seems to some that more people are sick today than ever before .
translation.zu: sampela man i ting olsem planti man moa long nau ol i gat sik , winim olgeta taim bipo .

translation.en: significantly , the world market for such drugs has skyrocketed in recent decades , from just a few billion dollars a year to hundreds of billions of dollars annually .
translation.zu: inap olsem 30 yia i go pinis , ol man i save tromoi 12 bilion dola tasol long olgeta yia bilong baim marasin , tasol nau , ol i save tromoi planti handet bilion dola long olgeta wan wan yia .

translation.en: what has been a consequence ?
translation.zu: orait wanem samting i bin kamap long dispela ?

translation.en: yet , the health of some who take drugs has either remained unchanged or become worse .
translation.zu: tasol sik bilong sampela man i kisim marasin em i stap yet , o em i go bikpela .

translation.en: so , recently some have turned to using other methods of medical treatment .
translation.zu: olsem na sampela i bin kirap na kisim marasin samting i narapela kain long marasin bilong ol dokta .

translation.en: where many are turning
translation.zu: samting ol i kisim

translation.en: in places where modern , conventional medicine has been the standard of care , many are now turning to what have been called alternative , or complementary , therapies .
translation.zu: long ol hap ol man i save kisim marasin bilong ol dokta , planti man i kirap nau na kisim dispela narapela kain marasin .

translation.en: " the berlin wall that has long divided alternative therapies from mainstream medicine appears to be crumbling , " said consumer reports of may 2000 .
translation.zu: nius consumer reports bilong me 2000 i tok : ' inap longtaim pinis , samting olsem traipela banis i bin stap namel long marasin bilong ol dokta na ol narapela kain marasin .

translation.en: noting recent trends , however , the journal of managed care pharmacy explained in 1997 : " in the past , conventional medical practitioners have been skeptical about alternative medical practices , but 27 medical schools in the united states [ a more recent report says 75 ] currently offer elective course work on alternative medicine , including harvard , stanford , university of arizona , and yale . "
translation.zu: tasol long 1997 , wanpela nius i tok : ' bipo ol dokta i gat tupela tingting long ol dispela narapela kain marasin , tasol nau long amerika , long 27 skul [ nau 75 ] bilong lainim man long kamap dokta , i gat wanpela kos bilong lainim ol long dispela narapela kain marasin . sampela skul i olsem : havat , stanfot , yunivesiti bilong arisona , na yel . ' - journal of managed care pharmacy .

translation.en: jama noted what many patients are doing in an effort to improve their health .
translation.zu: nius jama i stori long samting planti sikman i save mekim bilong daunim sik bilong ol .

translation.en: it reported : " in 1990 , an estimated 1 ( 19.9 % ) in 5 individuals seeing a medical doctor for a principal condition also used an alternative therapy .
translation.zu: nius i tok : ' long 1990 , long olgeta 5 - pela 5 - pela man i save go lukim dokta bilong stretim sik bilong ol , wanpela i save mekim wok long narapela kain samting tu bilong stretim sik .

translation.en: this percentage increased to nearly 1 ( 31.8 % ) in 3 in 1997 . "
translation.zu: long 1997 , planti moa , olsem wanpela long olgeta 3 - pela 3 - pela ol i bin mekim olsem . '

translation.en: according to jama , the proportion of the population that used alternative treatments within a recent 12 - month period was 15 percent in canada , 33 percent in finland , and 49 percent in australia .
translation.zu: nius jama i tok , taim ol i skelim hamas man long ol dispela kantri i kisim dispela narapela kain marasin insait long wanpela yia , ol i kisim save olsem i gat 15 pesen long kanada , 33 pesen long finlan , na 49 pesen long ostrelia .

translation.en: " the magnitude of the demand for alternative therapy is noteworthy , " jama acknowledged .
translation.zu: jama i tok : ' planti man tru i laik kisim dispela narapela kain marasin . '

translation.en: this is especially true in view of the fact that alternative therapies are rarely included in insurance benefits .
translation.zu: em samting yumi mas tingim , long wanem , mani bilong insurens i no save baim dispela narapela kain marasin - wan wan taim tasol .

translation.en: so the jama article concluded : " current use is likely to underrepresent utilization patterns if insurance coverage for alternative therapies increases in the future . "
translation.zu: jama i pinisim tok olsem : ' sapos bihain i gat sampela moa kain marasin em insurens bai baim , ating namba bilong ol man i kisim dispela narapela kain marasin bai go antap . '

translation.en: the trend toward integrating alternative therapies with conventional ones has long been a general practice in many countries .
translation.zu: long planti kantri , inap longtaim pinis ol i bin mekim wok long marasin bilong dokta wantaim dispela narapela kain marasin .

translation.en: dr . peter fisher , of the royal london homeopathic hospital , noted that the principal forms of complementary medicine have become " virtually conventional in many places .
translation.zu: dokta peter fisher ( bilong royal london homeopathic hospital ) i tok : ' long planti hap , ol i save mekim wok long dispela narapela kain marasin .

translation.en: there are no longer two types of medicine , orthodox and complementary , " he claimed .
translation.zu: nau i no gat tupela kain marasin - marasin bilong dokta na dispela narapela kain marasin .

translation.en: " there is only good medicine and bad medicine . "
translation.zu: i gat gutpela marasin na marasin i nogut , na em tasol . '

translation.en: thus many medical professionals today are recognizing value in both orthodox medicine and alternative therapies .
translation.zu: olsem na planti dokta long nau ol i luksave olsem marasin bilong dokta na dispela narapela kain marasin , tupela i gutpela .

translation.en: rather than insisting that a patient accept either one form of medicine or another , they recommend taking advantage of whatever proves to be beneficial to the patient from all the various forms of healing therapy .
translation.zu: ol i no strong long sikman i kisim wanpela kain marasin tasol . ol i laik bai sikman i kisim wanem wanem samting em inap stretim gut sik bilong em .

translation.en: what are some healing methods of what is called alternative , or complementary , medicine ?
translation.zu: orait wanem sampela bilong ol dispela marasin i narapela kain long marasin bilong ol dokta ?

translation.en: alternative therapies - why many use them
translation.zu: ol narapela kain marasin - as na planti man i kisim

translation.en: alternative , or complementary , medicine covers a broad range of healing techniques and treatments .
translation.zu: i gat planti kain kain marasin samting i narapela kain long marasin bilong ol dokta .

translation.en: many come under the general heading of naturopathy , which is a system of treatment that emphasizes the use of natural agents or physical means to condition the body and allow it to heal itself .
translation.zu: wanpela ol i kolim naturopati , em pasin bilong mekim wok long wara o diwai sayor samting bilong helpim skin long daunim sik . i gat planti kain marasin olsem , em inap planti handet yia ol man i bin mekim wok long en .

translation.en: quite a number of these therapies , commonly used for centuries , have long been abandoned or ignored by modern medicine .
translation.zu: tasol inap longtaim pinis ol i no yusim moa na ol dokta bilong nau ol i no bin mekim wok long en .

translation.en: for example , the august 27 , 1960 , journal of the american medical association noted that the application of cold for burns was " known to the ancients but seems to have been ignored by physician and layman alike .
translation.zu: olsem : wanpela nius bilong ogas 27 , 1960 , i tok pasin bilong mekim kol skin em paia samting i bin kukim , em wanpela pasin ' ol man long bipo i bin save long en , tasol ol dokta na man nating long nau ol i no tingim .

translation.en: although scattered references in the literature are unanimous in praise of this form of treatment , it is not generally used today .
translation.zu: maski sampela stori long ol buk i litimapim dispela pasin , ol man long nau ol i no save mekim wok tumas long en .

translation.en: in recent decades , however , the application of cold water or cold compresses for burns has once again been advocated by conventional medicine .
translation.zu: tasol nau ol dokta i laik bai ol man i kirap gen na mekim wok long dispela pasin , olsem taim paia samting i kukim skin , wasim dispela hap skin long kolwara o mekim kol dispela hap .

translation.en: the journal of trauma , of september 1963 , reported : " interest in the use of cold water in the early treatment of burns has developed since the reports of ofeigsson and schulman in 1959 and 1960 .
translation.zu: wanpela nius bilong septemba 1963 i tok : ' long 1959 na 1960 , tupela dokta , ofeigsson na schulman , i kamapim wanpela ripot , na dispela i bin kirapim ol man long tingim pasin bilong mekim wok kwiktaim long kolwara bilong helpim skin taim paia samting i kukim .

translation.en: we have been treating patients for the past year with this method ; our clinical results were encouraging . "
translation.zu: inap wanpela yia mipela i bin mekim wok long dispela pasin , na gutpela samting i bin kamap long en . ' - the journal of trauma .

translation.en: the treatment with cold water is relatively safe , and it certainly provides comforting relief .
translation.zu: pasin bilong mekim wok long kolwara ating i no kamapim hevi , na tru tumas , em i save tekewe pen .

translation.en: hydrotherapy , which uses water in various ways to treat ailments , is utilized in alternative medicine , and now various forms of such treatment are also recognized by modern medicine .
translation.zu: ol dokta bilong nau ol i luksave olsem , pasin haidroterapi , olsem pasin bilong mekim wok long wara , em inap helpim sikman .

translation.en: this has been a practice for hundreds - even thousands - of years in some parts of the earth .
translation.zu: long sampela hap bilong graun ol i bin mekim olsem inap planti handet o tausen yia .

translation.en: in india , for example , the use of herbs has long been a mainstay of medicine .
translation.zu: olsem : long india , inap longtaim pinis ol i bin mekim bikpela wok long ol lip nabaut .

translation.en: today , practically everywhere , the healing power of certain plants is recognized by many health professionals .
translation.zu: long nau , ating long olgeta hap , planti dokta i luksave olsem sampela diwai sayor samting ol i gat strong long stretim sik .

translation.en: a noteworthy experience
translation.zu: samting i bin kamap

translation.en: about a hundred years ago , richard willstätter , who later became a student of the biochemistry of plants , was influenced by what happened to a close young friend , ten - year - old sepp schwab .
translation.zu: inap olsem 100 yia i go pinis , richard willstätter , em bihain em i lain na kisim save long ol diwai sayor samting , em i tingim samting i bin painim sepp schwab , em wanpela gutpela pren bilong em i gat 10 - pela krismas , na em i larim dispela samting i stiaim em .

translation.en: sepp had a badly infected leg that a doctor said needed to be amputated to save his life , but sepp 's parents postponed the operation till the next morning .
translation.zu: sua i bagarapim tru lek bilong sepp na dokta i tok ol i mas katim na rausim lek , nogut sepp i dai . tasol papamama bilong sepp i tokim dokta long wet inap long moningtaim .

translation.en: in the meantime , they sought out a shepherd who had a reputation for his use of herbal remedies .
translation.zu: orait nau ol i go lukim wanpela wasman bilong sipsip , em i gat nem long mekim wok long ol lip nabaut bilong oraitim sik .

translation.en: the shepherd gathered a combination of plants , cut them into very fine pieces until they were a mass resembling cooked spinach , and applied this to the wound .
translation.zu: wasman i bungim kain kain lip na katkatim i go liklik tru olsem aupa ol i kukim pinis . orait nau em i putim long sua .

translation.en: by morning the wound had improved , and the operation was again postponed .
translation.zu: long moningtaim , sua i orait liklik , na dokta i no katim lek .

translation.en: the treatment was continued , and in time , the wound healed completely .
translation.zu: ol i putim gen ol dispela lip , mekim mekim i go , na bihain sua i pinis olgeta .

translation.en: willstätter went on to study chemistry at munich university in germany and later won the nobel prize for discoveries made in connection with his studies of plant pigments , particularly chlorophyll .
translation.zu: bihain willstätter i go long yunivesiti bilong munik long jemani na stadi long kemistri . em i kisim save long ol samting , olsem klorifil , i givim kala long ol lip samting , na bihain em i kisim prais nobel long dispela save em kisim .

translation.en: significantly , some 25 percent of pharmaceutical drugs now used are derived either in part or entirely from chemicals occurring naturally in plants .
translation.zu: em nau , inap 25 pesen bilong ol marasin ol bikpela kampani i wokim na ol man i mekim wok long en long nau , ol i kisim long ol diwai sayor samting .

translation.en: yet , it should be recognized that when it comes to medical treatment , what works wonders for one person may do little for another .
translation.zu: tasol yumi mas save olsem , samting i stretim sik bilong wanpela man , ating em no stretim sik bilong narapela .

translation.en: alternative methods usually work more slowly than orthodox methods , so a disease that might have been warded off had it been diagnosed and treated earlier may develop to the point where strong drugs - perhaps even surgery - are necessary to save life .
translation.zu: olsem na taim sik i liklik yet , sapos sikman i go kwiktaim long dokta na dokta i tokim em i gat wanem kain sik na em i kisim marasin , ating bai em inap sakim dispela sik .

translation.en: it may therefore be unwise to hold to any one kind of therapy as though it were the only way to handle a health problem .
translation.zu: sapos em i no mekim olsem , ating dispela sik bai go bikpela tru na em i mas kisim strongpela marasin o dokta i mas katim em bambai em i no ken bagarap .

translation.en: a strong appeal of alternative medicine no doubt is the perception that its use of natural products and its methods of treatment are gentler and less hazardous than those employed by conventional medicine .
translation.zu: planti man i laikim dispela narapela kain marasin samting , long wanem , em i no save nogutim man olsem marasin bilong ol dokta inap mekim .

translation.en: therefore , because of increased interest in identifying safe and effective medical treatments , a few examples of alternative therapies will be presented in the following article .
translation.zu: tru tumas , planti man moa i laik save long ol gutpela marasin samting i no save nogutim ol , olsem na long stori i kam bihain long dispela , bai mipela i toktok long sampela bilong ol dispela narapela kain marasin samting .

translation.en: a look at alternative therapies
translation.zu: skelim ol dispela narapela kain marasin

translation.en: " opening a professional dialogue between physicians and practitioners of alternative medicine is crucial to better health care for those patients who choose alternative therapies . "
translation.zu: ' bilong helpim tru man i laik kisim marasin i narapela kain long marasin bilong ol dokta , ol dokta na ol man i mekim wok long dispela narapela kain marasin ol i mas toktok wantaim .

translation.en: that statement was printed in the journal of the american medical association ( jama ) in its issue of november 11 , 1998 .
translation.zu: dispela i bikpela samting . ' dispela tok i bin kamap long wanpela nius bilong novemba 11 , 1998 .

translation.en: the article stated : " this need [ of dialogue ] can be expected to grow with use of alternative therapies , particularly as health insurance plans include such therapies in the benefits they offer . "
translation.zu: nius i tok : ' taim planti man moa i kirap na kisim dispela narapela kain marasin samting , na insurens i orait long baim , i gat wok long bihainim moa moa yet dispela pasin bilong toktok wantaim . ' - the journal of the american medical association ( jama ) .

translation.en: more and more patients are employing alternative therapies while availing themselves of more conventional forms of treatment .
translation.zu: ol man i kisim dispela narapela kain marasin na ol marasin bilong dokta tu , ol i wok long kamap planti moa .

translation.en: yet , some fail to keep their medical doctor informed of what they are doing .
translation.zu: tasol sampela ol i no toksave long dokta bilong ol long samting ol i mekim .

translation.en: therefore , tufts university health & nutrition letter of april 2000 urged : " you should act in your best interest by working with your doctor rather than privately . "
translation.zu: olsem na wanpela nius bilong epril 2000 i tok : ' yu mas wok wantaim dokta bilong yu - nogut yu tasol i save long samting yu mekim . '

translation.en: this was said because of possible health risks when certain herbs are combined with conventional therapies .
translation.zu: sampela dokta i save , sampela sikman ol i save lukautim , ol i save kisim dispela narapela kain marasin tu .

translation.en: recognizing that some of their patients are choosing alternative therapies , many health professionals strive not to allow their own opinions about health care to prevent them from working along with alternative therapists for the benefit of the patient .
translation.zu: olsem na bilong helpim tru sikman , planti dokta i no laik bai tingting bilong ol yet i pasim ol long wok gut wantaim ol man i save mekim wok long dispela narapela kain marasin samting bilong stretim sik . bilong helpim ol man bilong kaunim kirap !

translation.en: to give our readers an idea of alternative therapies now used by growing numbers of people in many countries , we are providing a brief description of a few of them .
translation.zu: long kisim save long sampela narapela kain marasin samting , em planti man long planti kantri i wok long kisim , mipela bai stori liklik long sampela .

translation.en: please note , however , that awake !
translation.zu: tasol tingim , dispela i no makim olsem kirap !

translation.en: does not endorse any of these or any other form of medical treatment .
translation.zu: i orait long ol na ol narapela kain samting bilong stretim sik , nogat .

translation.en: these remedies are perhaps the most common form of alternative medicine .
translation.zu: planti man i save mekim wok long ol lip samting bilong stretim sik .

translation.en: despite the use of herbs in medicine throughout the centuries , only a relatively small number of plant species have been carefully studied by scientists .
translation.zu: tasol maski inap planti handet yia ol man i bin mekim wok long ol lip nabaut bilong stretim sik , ol saientis i no bin skelim gut planti kain diwai sayor samting , sampela tasol .

translation.en: an even smaller number of plants and their extracts have been studied so thoroughly that information is available on their safety and efficacy .
translation.zu: i gat wan wan tasol ol i bin skelim gut tru na kamapim long ples klia ol i helpim o nogutim yumi olsem wanem .

translation.en: in recent years , however , there have been a number of scientific studies that show the usefulness of certain herbs in treating such conditions as mild depression , age - related memory loss , and symptoms of benign prostate enlargement .
translation.zu: tasol long taim bilong yumi ol saientis i bin kisim save olsem sampela lip i gat strong long helpim man i save bel hevi liklik , na lapun i save lusim tingting long planti samting , na i helpim man em prostet bilong em i solap nating .

translation.en: one herb that has been studied is black cohosh , which is sometimes known as black snakeroot , bugbane , or rattleroot .
translation.zu: wanpela lip samting ol i bin skelim , em black cohosh ( o , black snakeroot , bugbane , rattleroot ) .

translation.en: it seems that much of the demand for such natural remedies is based on the perception that they are safer than synthetic drugs .
translation.zu: ating planti man i laik kisim dispela narapela kain marasin , long wanem , ol i ting dispela kain marasin i no ken bagarapim ol olsem marasin bilong ol dokta inap mekim .

translation.en: while this may often be true , some herbs are associated with side effects , especially if they are used in combination with other medications .
translation.zu: tru , tingting bilong ol i stret , tasol sampela kain lip inap bagarapim skin , na em bai bagarapim skin moa yet sapos man i daunim wantaim ol marasin bilong dokta .

translation.en: there are also herbs that will increase the rate at which a patient bleeds .
translation.zu: na sampela kain lip inap mekim blut i ran hariap taim blut i wok long lus .

translation.en: if these herbs are used in combination with " blood - thinning " medical drugs , serious problems can result .
translation.zu: sapos man i kisim dispela lip wantaim marasin bilong dokta i save mekim ' blut i ran , ' dispela inap kamapim sampela bikpela hevi .

translation.en: people with chronic illnesses , such as diabetes or high blood pressure , or those taking other medications should be careful about using herbal remedies . - see the accompanying box .
translation.zu: man i gat sik i stap olgeta taim , olsem sik daiabitis o mak bilong blut i go antap tumas , o man i save kisim marasin bilong dokta , em i mas was gut taim em i laik kisim ol lip samting bilong stretim sik . - lukim blok .

translation.en: in recent years there have been reports of products tainted with heavy metals and other contaminants .
translation.zu: nau long dispela taim ol i painimaut olsem sampela marasin ol kampani i wokim i gat samting nogut long en .

translation.en: additionally , some herbal products have been found to contain little or none of the ingredients on the label .
translation.zu: na tu , sampela marasin i no gat dispela lip samting em karamap bilong marasin i kolim , o i gat liklik tasol bilong dispela lip i stap long en .

translation.en: dietary supplements
translation.zu: ol vaitamin

translation.en: dietary supplements , such as vitamins and minerals , have reportedly been helpful in preventing and treating a number of health problems , including anemia and osteoporosis - and even in preventing some birth defects .
translation.zu: ol i tok ol vaitamin na ol mineral i bin helpim man long sakim o daunim sampela kain sik olsem blut i sot na sik ostioporosis - na i bin helpim tu ol pikinini na bai ol i no ken kamap nogut taim mama i karim ol .

translation.en: on the other hand , megadoses promoted for the treatment of some illnesses may be hazardous to health .
translation.zu: tasol sapos yumi kisim planti vaitamin tumas bilong stretim wanpela sik , dispela inap nogutim yumi .

translation.en: they can possibly interfere with the absorption or activity of other nutrients and can also cause serious side effects .
translation.zu: ol inap pasim wok bilong ol narapela marasin bilong strongim skin na mekim nogut long yumi tu .

translation.en: this possibility , as well as the lack of substantial evidence supporting the use of megavitamins , should not be ignored .
translation.zu: yumi mas tingim gut dispela samting , na tingim tu olsem i no gat samting i kamapim klia olsem i gat as na yumi mas kisim planti vaitamin .

translation.en: homeopathy
translation.zu: homiopati

translation.en: homeopathy was developed in the 1700 ' s as a kinder , gentler type of treatment than those in popular use at the time .
translation.zu: ol i kamapim pasin bilong homiopati bihain long yia 1700 - ol i laik mekim wok long samting i no ken mekim nogut long skin bilong man olsem ol narapela marasin long dispela taim inap mekim .

translation.en: homeopathy is based on the principle that " like cures like " and on the minimum - dose theory .
translation.zu: pasin homiopati i olsem : ' wankain samting i save oraitim wankain samting ' na no ken mekim wok long ol strongpela marasin .

translation.en: nonetheless , when compared with the use of a placebo , homeopathic remedies were found to have some effect in treating such things as asthma , allergies , and childhood diarrhea .
translation.zu: tasol taim ol i skelim marasin bilong homiopati ol i kisim save olsem i gutpela bilong daunim sampela kain sik olsem sik asma , skin i no orait long sampela kain samting , na pekpek wara ol pikinini i save kisim .

translation.en: an article published in the march 4 , 1998 , issue of jama observed : " for many patients suffering from chronic problems that lack a specific diagnosis , homeopathy may be an important and useful treatment option .
translation.zu: wanpela stori long nius jama bilong mas 4 , 1998 , i tok : ' planti sikman i gat bikpela sik , tasol ol i no save stret ol i gat wanem kain sik , olsem na ating marasin bilong homiopati inap helpim gut ol .

translation.en: if used within its limits , homeopathy could complement modern medicine as , ' another tool in the bag . ' "
translation.zu: sapos ol i mekim stretpela wok long en , ating marasin bilong homiopati inap helpim wok bilong marasin bilong dokta . '

translation.en: in potentially life - threatening emergencies , however , it may be wiser to use more conventional medical treatments .
translation.zu: tasol sapos laip bilong man i laik lus , ating mobeta ol i mekim wok long marasin bilong dokta .

translation.en: chiropractic
translation.zu: kairopraktik

translation.en: there are a number of alternative therapies using body manipulation .
translation.zu: narapela pasin bilong helpim sikman , em pasin bilong stretim bun , ol i kolim kairopratik .

translation.en: chiropractic is among the most commonly used alternative treatments , especially in the united states .
translation.zu: planti man i save mekim wok long dispela pasin bilong stretim sik , na ol i mekim moa yet long amerika .

translation.en: it is based on the idea that healing can be promoted when spinal misalignments are corrected .
translation.zu: as bilong dispela pasin i olsem : ol i ting sapos sampela bun bilong baksait i krungut na ol i stretim , dispela inap helpim sikman .

translation.en: this is why chiropractors specialize in spinal manipulation to adjust the vertebrae of their patients .
translation.zu: olsem na bikpela wok bilong ol kairoprakta i bilong stretim bun bilong baksait bilong ol sikman i kam lukim ol .

translation.en: on the other hand , some patients who receive chiropractic treatments report a high degree of satisfaction .
translation.zu: tasol sampela man em kairoprakta i bin stretim bun bilong ol ol i tok dispela i bin helpim gut ol na daunim pen .

translation.en: significantly , there is a low incidence of side effects with chiropractic manipulation by a skilled practitioner .
translation.zu: sapos man bilong stretim bun i gat save tru long mekim dispela wok , ating i no gat planti hevi inap kamap long dispela wok .

translation.en: yet , at the same time , a person should be aware that neck manipulation is associated with a risk of serious complications , including stroke and paralysis .
translation.zu: tasol yumi mas save olsem , pasin bilong stretim ol bun long nek inap kamapim sampela bikpela hevi , olsem sik strok na sik bilong mekim skin i dai .

translation.en: to reduce the risk of complications , some experts recommend that a person have a thorough examination to see if a specific manipulation style is safe for him .
translation.zu: bilong hevi i no ken kamap , sampela saveman i tok i gutpela sapos wanpela man olsem dokta i ken skelim gut sikman bilong kisim save olsem i gutpela ol i stretim bun bilong em o nogat .

translation.en: acupuncture is a healing technique that has become quite popular throughout the world .
translation.zu: planti man long olgeta hap i save kisim akupanksa bilong stretim sik bilong ol .

translation.en: while the term " acupuncture " covers several different techniques , it most commonly involves the use of fine needles inserted into specific areas of the body to achieve a therapeutic response .
translation.zu: man i mekim wok long akupanksa em i save sutim ol longpela nil i liklik tru i go insait long sampela hap skin .

translation.en: some research suggests that acupuncture may be effective in treating quite a number of ailments and that it is a safe alternative to the use of anesthetics .
translation.zu: samting ol i kisim save long en i makim olsem pasin bilong akupanksa inap stretim planti kain sik na em i gutpela senis bilong marasin bilong mekim dai tingting .

translation.en: isadore rosenfeld emphasized this point : " any health measure or intervention dispensed to a randomly selected group of individuals who are assured that it will ' work ' may result in improvement as often as half the time . "
translation.zu: long buk bilong em i stori long marasin i narapela kain long marasin bilong ol dokta , dokta isadore rosenfeld i tok : ' taim ol i givim marasin long sikman na strongim em olsem dispela bai stretim tru tru sik bilong em , planti taim sik bilong em i wok long go liklik . '

translation.en: this is called the placebo effect , which means that even a sugar pill can be effective if the person believes that it will be .
translation.zu: olsem na sapos sikman i bilip strong tru olsem marasin em i kisim bai stretim sik bilong em , ating dispela marasin , maski ol i wokim long suga tasol , em bai helpim em .

translation.en: the placebo effect can relieve subjective symptoms , including pain , nausea , fatigue , dizziness , anxiety , and depression .
translation.zu: dispela kain samting inap helpim man i pilim pen , i laik traut , skin i les olgeta , het i raun , tingting planti , o bel hevi .

translation.en: for one thing , it shows that having confidence in whatever treatment one receives is in many cases an important factor in getting better .
translation.zu: dispela i soim olsem pasin bilong bilip tru long marasin samting yumi kisim , maski em i wanem kain , dispela em i bikpela samting long daunim sik bilong yumi .

translation.en: at the same time , it may be the course of wisdom to check to see if a form of treatment is attacking the root of the problem and not just the symptoms .
translation.zu: tasol ating em savepasin sapos yumi painimaut olsem marasin samting yumi kisim em i stretim as bilong sik o em i stretim tasol samting i stap ples klia .

translation.en: this can be done by measuring the effects of the treatment by objective means , such as laboratory tests and x rays .
translation.zu: yumi ken painimaut dispela samting long rot bilong ol eksre o ol dokta long laboritori i ken glasim blut samting bilong yumi .

translation.en: yet , there is more that a person can do when choosing a form of medical treatment .
translation.zu: tasol i gat sampela samting moa yumi ken mekim taim yumi laik makim wanem kain marasin yumi bai kisim .

translation.en: important steps to take
translation.zu: ol bikpela samting yu ken mekim

translation.en: ask questions .
translation.zu: kamapim sampela askim .

translation.en: what results can be expected ?
translation.zu: marasin inap helpim yu olsem wanem ?

translation.en: what are the advantages , the disadvantages , and the expected costs and length of treatment ?
translation.zu: wanem ol gutpela samting bilong dispela marasin na wanem ol samting nogut bilong en ?

translation.en: talk with people who have received or undergone the treatment being considered .
translation.zu: toktok wantaim ol man i kisim pinis dispela kain marasin yu gat tingting long kisim .

translation.en: remember , though , that mere anecdotal evidence can be misleading .
translation.zu: tasol was gut , nogut ol i no tokaut stret na dispela i giamanim yu .

translation.en: a form of therapy that is not conventional may not be advisable if it causes one to put off treatment that has a record of success , even though the success rate of the conventional therapy is limited .
translation.zu: sapos wanpela marasin samting bilong ol dokta i bin helpim planti sikman , orait maski sampela taim dispela marasin i no mekim gut wok bilong en , ating nogut yumi sakim dispela marasin na kisim narapela kain marasin samting .

translation.en: evidence of the harm that can result appeared in a report in the new england journal of medicine .
translation.zu: samting nogut dispela pasin inap kamapim i bin kamap long wanpela nius ( the new england journal of medicine ) .

translation.en: the magazine described the progression of cancer in two young patients who refused conventional therapies while using alternative remedies .
translation.zu: nius i stori long sik kensa bilong tupela yangpela i go bikpela olsem wanem taim ol i kisim dispela narapela kain marasin na sakim marasin bilong ol dokta .

translation.en: one of these patients died .
translation.zu: wanpela em i dai .

translation.en: people with chronic or life - threatening illnesses wisely remain alert to the fact that they may be vulnerable targets of charlatans who promote fraudulent therapies .
translation.zu: ol man i gat bikpela sik ol i mas was gut . nogut ol i larim ol dokta giaman i givim marasin nating long ol .

translation.en: be wary of any product that promises to cure a variety of ailments .
translation.zu: was gut long ol marasin ol i tok em inap stretim kain kain sik .

translation.en: a recent example involved a new vitamin that was said to have " helped eliminate everything from breathing problems and lack of energy to life - threatening diseases . "
translation.zu: wanpela samting olsem em wanpela nupela vaitamin ol i tok i bin " stretim planti kain sik , olsem sotwin , skin i no gat strong , na ol bikpela sik em man inap kisim bagarap long en . "

translation.en: an analysis of the " vitamin " found it to be nothing more than salt water .
translation.zu: ol i glasim dispela " vaitamin " na ol i kisim save olsem em wara i gat sol tasol long en .

translation.en: no doubt some forms of alternative therapies can be beneficial in promoting good health .
translation.zu: tru , sampela bilong ol dispela narapela kain marasin samting inap helpim gut skin bilong yu .

translation.en: however , be realistic in your expectations .
translation.zu: tasol yu mas kisim stretpela tingting long dispela .

translation.en: it is wise to concentrate on eating nutritious food , getting enough sleep , exercising sufficiently , and being cautious when choosing medical treatment .
translation.zu: em pasin bilong gutpela tingting sapos yu kisim kain kain gutpela kaikai , na gutpela slip , na eksasais liklik , na skelim gut ol marasin samting yu laik kisim .

translation.en: obviously , no human therapy can put an end to all sickness and eventual death .
translation.zu: i no gat wanpela marasin samting man i kamapim em inap pinisim olgeta kain sik na dai .

translation.en: this is because these have been inherited from our original parent , the first man , adam .
translation.zu: long wanem , sik na dai em samting yumi bin kisim long namba wan tumbuna bilong yumi bilong pastaim .

translation.en: however , there is a sure cure for the problem of poor health , and millions have already discovered it .
translation.zu: tasol i gat wanpela rot tru bilong pinisim sik , em planti milion manmeri ol i painim pinis .

translation.en: that cure has been provided by our creator , jehovah god , the great physician .
translation.zu: man bilong wokim yumi , em god jehova , na em nambawan dokta tru , em i wokim pinis rot bilong pinisim sik .

translation.en: by exercising faith in him and taking advantage of the sin - atoning merit of the ransom sacrifice of his son , jesus christ , you will be able to enjoy perfect health and everlasting life in a disease - free world !
translation.zu: sapos yumi bilip long em na long ofa bilong pikinini bilong em , jisas krais , em ofa i gat strong long tekewe sin , bai yumi inap kisim gutpela skin na laip oltaim long nupela taim i no gat sik long en !

translation.en: the bible promises that in that new world , " no resident will say : ' i am sick . ' " - isaiah 33 : 24 .

translation.en: then , later on , i talked to my mother , and she helped me solve my problem .
translation.zu: bihain mi toktok wantaim mama , na em i helpim mi long stretim hevi .

translation.en: if i had not talked with her , i would have felt sadder . "
translation.zu: sapos mi no bin toktok wantaim em , mi bai pilim nogut moa yet . "

translation.en: have you considered having a heart - to - heart talk with your parents ?
translation.zu: yu bin tingting long kamapim bel na tingting bilong yu long ol ?

translation.en: perhaps you feel that they could not possibly understand your problems .
translation.zu: nogut yu gat tingting pinis olsem ol bai i no inap pilim hevi bilong yu .

translation.en: but is that really the case ?
translation.zu: tasol tru ol i olsem ?

translation.en: they may not fully understand all the pressures young ones face in today 's world ; however , isn 't it true that they probably know you better than anyone else in the world does ?
translation.zu: ating ol bai i gat hatwok liklik long save long olgeta hevi bilong ol yangpela long nau ; tasol ating save bilong ol long ol samting bilong yu yet i winim ol narapela , a ?

translation.en: alejandro says : " sometimes it is not easy for my parents to sympathize with me and understand just how i feel . "
translation.zu: alejandro i tok : " sampela taim papamama i gat hatwok long pilim tru ol samting i stap long bel bilong mi na save gut long tingting bilong mi . "

translation.en: nevertheless , he admits : " i know that i can turn to them . "
translation.zu: tasol em i tok olsem : " mi save mi inap i go long ol na kamapim hevi bilong mi . "

translation.en: often youths are surprised to find out just how well their parents do understand their problems !
translation.zu: planti taim ol yangpela i kirap nogut long kisim save olsem papamama bilong ol inap pilim tru hevi bilong ol !

translation.en: " when i speak with my parents , i receive encouragement and practical solutions to my problems , " says beatriz , quoted earlier .
translation.zu: " taim mi toktok wantaim papamama , mi save kisim strong na gutpela tingting bilong stretim ol hevi . " em tok bilong beatriz , em pastaim yumi bin stori long em .

translation.en: with good reason , then , the bible offers this counsel for youths : " observe , o my son , the commandment of your father , and do not forsake the law of your mother .
translation.zu: olsem na i gat gutpela as na baibel i givim dispela tok long ol yangpela : " pikinini , yu mas harim tok bilong papamama bilong yu na yu no ken sakim tok bilong tupela .

translation.en: listen to your father who caused your birth , and do not despise your mother just because she has grown old . " - proverbs 6 : 20 ; 23 : 22 .
translation.zu: papa bilong yu i bin kamapim yu na yu mas harim tok bilong en . na taim mama bilong yu i lapun pinis , yu no ken rabisim em . " - sindaun 6 : 20 ; 23 : 22 .

translation.en: of course , it 's hard to confide in your parents if you have a poor relationship with them .
translation.zu: tru , i hatwok long kamapim bel bilong yu long papamama sapos yu no save sindaun gut wantaim ol .

translation.en: according to dr . catalina gonzález forteza , a study conducted among high school students showed that those who said that they had attempted to take their lives had feelings of low self - esteem and had a poor relationship with their parents .
translation.zu: olsem dokta catalina gonzález forteza i tok , ol askim ol i bin givim long ol yangpela bilong haiskul i kamapim klia olsem ol lain em ol i tok olsem ol i bin traim kilim i dai ol yet , ol i gat tingting olsem ol i nogut tasol , na ol i no sindaun gut wantaim papamama .

translation.en: in contrast , youths who avoid such self - destructive thinking are generally " those who enjoy a good relationship with their mother and father . "
translation.zu: tasol ol yangpela i no gat hevi long dispela kain tingting , planti " em ol yangpela i sindaun gut wantaim papamama . "

translation.en: therefore , wisely work on cultivating a good relationship with your parents .
translation.zu: olsem na bihainim gutpela tingting na wok strong long kisim pasin bilong sindaun gut wantaim papamama .

translation.en: get in the habit of conversing with them regularly .
translation.zu: kisim pasin bilong toktok wantaim ol long olgeta taim .

translation.en: tell them what 's going on in your life .
translation.zu: tokim ol long ol samting i save kamap long yu .

translation.en: ask them questions .
translation.zu: givim askim long ol .

translation.en: such lighthearted conversations may make it easier to approach them when you have a serious problem .
translation.zu: pasin bilong toktok gut olsem bai i mekim na bai yu no gat hatwok long toktok wantaim ol taim yu gat sampela bikpela hevi .

translation.en: talking to a friend
translation.zu: toktok wantaim pren

translation.en: but wouldn 't it be easier to go to a peer with your problems ?
translation.zu: tasol ating em bai isi moa long kamapim ol hevi bilong yu long wanpela wankrismas , a ?

translation.en: well , it 's good to have friends you can trust .
translation.zu: tru , i gutpela yu gat ol pren yu inap bilip long ol .

translation.en: proverbs 18 : 24 says that " there exists a friend sticking closer than a brother . "
translation.zu: sindaun 18 : 24 i tok : " sampela man i gat narakain pren na tupela i pas gut na i wanbel .

translation.en: but while peers can offer you sympathy and support , they may not always offer the best advice .
translation.zu: na ol pren inap pilim hevi bilong yu na strongim yu , tasol sampela taim ol i no inap givim gutpela tok long yu em inap helpim yu tru .

translation.en: after all , they usually have no more life experience than you do .
translation.zu: long wanem , ating save bilong ol i no winim save bilong yu yet .

translation.en: remember rehoboam ?
translation.zu: yu tingim rehoboam ?

translation.en: he was a king in bible times .
translation.zu: long taim bilong baibel em i stap wanpela king .

translation.en: rehoboam lost both the support of most of his nation and god 's approval . - 1 kings 12 : 8 - 19 .
translation.zu: ol lain em i bosim , ol i no laik bihainim em moa na god tu i no orait moa long em . - 1 king 12 : 8 - 19 .

translation.en: another problem with confiding in peers might be the matter of confidentiality .
translation.zu: na nogut pren bilong yu i tokim ol narapela long ol samting yu bin kamapim long em .

translation.en: arturo , quoted at the outset , observes : " most of the boys i know talk to their friends when they feel sad .
translation.zu: arturo , em pastaim yumi stori long em , em i tok : " planti ol yangpela manki mi save long ol , ol i save toktok wantaim ol pren bilong ol taim ol i bel hevi .

translation.en: but later on , their friends reveal everything to others and make fun of them . "
translation.zu: tasol bihain , ol dispela pren i save kamapim olgeta tok long ol narapela na tok bilas long ol . "

translation.en: thirteen - year - old gabriela has had a similar experience .
translation.zu: gabriela i gat 13 krismas na wankain samting i bin painim .

translation.en: she says : " one day i found out that my friend was telling my personal affairs to a friend of hers , so i did not confide in her anymore .
translation.zu: em i tok : " mi bin painimaut olsem pren bilong mi i kamapim ol tok bilong mi long narapela pren bilong em , olsem na mi no tokim em moa long ol hevi samting bilong mi .

translation.en: yes , i talk to people of my age , but i try not to tell them things that could affect me adversely if they were to tell them to others . "
translation.zu: tru , mi save toktok wantaim ol wankrismas , tasol mi no save tokim ol long ol samting mi inap kisim hevi long en sapos ol i kamapim long ol narapela . "

translation.en: so when you are looking for help , it is important to find someone who does " not reveal the confidential talk of another . "
translation.zu: olsem na taim yu laik painim wanpela bilong helpim yu , i bikpela samting long painim wanpela em i " no ken autim " dispela tok long ol narapela .

translation.en: such a person is more likely to be someone who is older than you .
translation.zu: ( sindaun 25 : 9 ) kain man olsem , ating krismas bilong em bai winim krismas bilong yu .

translation.en: so if for some reason you are unable to find support at home , it 's all right to find a friend to confide in , but make sure that he or she has experience in life and a knowledge of bible principles .
translation.zu: olsem na sapos i gat sampela as na yu no inap kisim sampela helpim long papamama , i no gat rong long kamapim bel hevi bilong yu long wanpela pren , tasol tingting gut pastaim na makim wanpela pren i save gut long ol samting bilong i stap bilong yumi na ol lo bilong baibel .

translation.en: sixteen - year - old liliana says : " i have confided in some of my christian sisters , and this has been quite good .
translation.zu: liliana i gat 16 krismas na em i tok : " mi bin kamapim bel bilong mi long sampela sista kristen na dispela i bin helpim mi .

translation.en: since they are older than i am , their advice is sound .
translation.zu: ol i bikpela long mi , olsem na tok bilong ol i gutpela .

translation.en: they have become my friends . "
translation.zu: ol i kamap gutpela pren bilong mi . "

translation.en: what if your spirituality has also begun to suffer ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem sapos nau yu no strong moa long ol samting bilong spirit olsem bipo ?

translation.en: perhaps you 've been so sad that you 've begun to neglect prayer or bible reading .
translation.zu: ating bel hevi bilong yu i mekim na yu no strong tumas long beten o ritim baibel olsem bipo .

translation.en: at james 5 : 14 , 15 , the bible gives this advice : " is there anyone sick among you ?
translation.zu: long jems 5 : 14 , 15 , baibel i givim dispela gutpela tok long yumi : " ating wanpela bilong yupela i gat sik ?

translation.en: let him call the older men of the congregation to him , and let them pray over him , greasing him with oil in the name of jehovah .
translation.zu: na long nem bilong bikpela ol i mas putim wel long bodi bilong em , na ol i mas prea long god i ken mekim em i kamap orait gen .

translation.en: and the prayer of faith will make the indisposed one well , and jehovah will raise him up . "
translation.zu: sapos ol i bilip long god na ol i prea , orait bikpela bai i mekim orait dispela sikman na kirapim em gen . "

translation.en: feel free to talk to them .
translation.zu: no ken surik long toktok wantaim ol .

translation.en: the bible says that such men can be " like a hiding place from the wind and a place of concealment from the rainstorm . " - isaiah 32 : 2 .
translation.zu: baibel i tok ol dispela man inap i stap olsem " ples hait ol manmeri i ken i go na hait long en long taim bilong bikpela win na ren . " - aisaia 32 : 2 .

translation.en: " let your petitions be made known to god "
translation.zu: " tokim god long olgeta hevi "

translation.en: the very best source of help , however , is " the god of all comfort . "
translation.zu: tasol nambawan gutpela helpim i kam long " god bilong mekim isi bel bilong olgeta man i gat hevi . "

translation.en: jehovah is always willing to listen to you .
translation.zu: oltaim yupela i mas tokim god long olgeta hevi bilong yupela .

translation.en: if you feel sad or depressed from time to time , never forget that many other youths have had the same feelings .
translation.zu: sapos sampela taim yu pilim nogut na yu stap bel hevi , yu no ken lusim tingting olsem planti yangpela i bin i gat hevi long dispela samting .

translation.en: in time , those feelings will usually go away .
translation.zu: na planti taim ol dispela kain tingting i save pinis .

translation.en: let someone know that you are hurting .
translation.zu: larim narapela i save long hevi yu karim .

translation.en: proverbs 12 : 25 states : " anxious care in the heart of a man is what will cause it to bow down , but the good word is what makes it rejoice . "
translation.zu: sindaun 12 : 25 i tok : " man i save wari oltaim , em bai i bel hevi tru na tingting bilong en bai i bagarap . tasol sapos man i mekim gutpela tok long wantok bilong en , orait wantok bai i belgut tru . "

translation.en: how do you get that " good word " of encouragement ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem bai yu kisim " gutpela tok " bilong strongim yu ?

translation.en: if sad feelings persist , it may indicate a serious emotional or physical disorder .
translation.zu: sapos pasin bilong stap bel hevi i no laik pinis , dispela inap makim sik long tingting o long skin .

translation.en: prompt medical attention is recommended .
translation.zu: na i gutpela long lukim dokta hariap .

translation.en: see the article " winning the battle against depression , " in the march 1 , 1990 , issue of our companion journal , the watchtower .
translation.zu: lukim stori " rot bilong daunim bel hevi , " bilong julai 1 , 1990 , long nius wastaua , em poroman bilong dispela nius .

translation.en: when the mountain tried to join the sea
translation.zu: taim maunten i laik bungim solwara

translation.en: between venezuela 's capital city , caracas , and the sea stands a 7,000 - foot [ 2,000 m ] mountain named el ávila .
translation.zu: ol i kolim dispela maunten el avila , na em i go antap inap olsem 2,000 mita .

translation.en: on the north side is a narrow , heavily populated strip of coastline .
translation.zu: long hap not bilong maunten i gat nambis na planti manmeri tru ol i sindaun long en .

translation.en: venezuela 's major airport is there , and to get from the airport to caracas , tourists must travel through a tunnel that is cut right through the mountain .
translation.zu: bikpela ples balus bilong veneswela i stap long dispela hap , na bilong lusim ples balus na go long karakas , ol turis i mas go long wanpela rot ol i bin katim insait long dispela maunten .

translation.en: its sides seemed to burst as millions of cubic feet of water cascaded from the mountain .
translation.zu: i olsem ol arere arere bilong maunten i bruk taim bikpela wara i kapsait i kam daun long maunten .

translation.en: it seemed , as one person put it , as if the mountain were trying to join the sea .
translation.zu: olsem wanpela man i bin tok , i olsem dispela maunten i laik bungim solwara .

translation.en: an elderly man said that he thought it was the end of the world .
translation.zu: wanpela lapun man i tok em i ting olsem dispela graun i laik pinis .

translation.en: in time , the rain stopped , and the floodwaters began to subside .
translation.zu: bihain , ren i pinis na tait wara i wok long i go daun .

translation.en: according to one estimate , some 50,000 people may have died , and 400,000 were rendered homeless .
translation.zu: sampela i tok , inap 50,000 manmeri i dai , na 400,000 samting ol i no gat haus bilong i stap .

translation.en: for good reasons , this has been termed " the worst natural disaster in venezuela 's history . "
translation.zu: i gat as na yumi inap tok olsem " em wanpela bagarap nogut tru i winim olgeta narapela bagarap i bin kamap long veneswela . "

translation.en: soon , however , the water started pouring in and rose rapidly .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na wara i kam insait long haus na i wok long solap i kam antap .

translation.en: all were able to make it to the roof .
translation.zu: olgeta dispela lain ol i go antap long rup bilong haus .

translation.en: meanwhile , boulders and tree trunks pounded the building .
translation.zu: ol traipela ston na diwai i wok long sakim haus .

translation.en: before long , the walls on the first and second floors were demolished , so that only the columns and the roof were left .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na ol banis bilong haus long namba wan na namba tu plua ol i bruk , olsem na ol pos na rup bilong haus tasol i stap .

translation.en: as it turned away , juan carlos and his father tearfully said good - bye to each other , convinced that this was the end .
translation.zu: taim helikopta i tanim i go bek , juan carlos na papa bilong em tupela i krai na narapela i tok gutbai long narapela , long wanem , tupela i ting olsem ol bai dai .

translation.en: then two helicopters arrived .
translation.zu: tasol bihain tupela helikopta i kam .

translation.en: as soon as the helicopters departed , the building collapsed into the raging waters .
translation.zu: i no longtaim bihain long helikopta i lusim dispela hap , haus hia i pundaun i go daun insait long tait wara .

translation.en: they had escaped just in time !
translation.zu: man ! klostu ol i dai !

translation.en: long lines of people - some carrying children on their shoulders - were guided by ropes through the surf onto boats .
translation.zu: long ol rop ol i stiaim longpela lain manmeri - sampela ol i karim ol pikinini antap long sol bilong ol - bilong brukim tait wara na i go long ol bot .

translation.en: while some were able to salvage a few personal items , many left with just the clothes they were wearing .
translation.zu: sampela manmeri ol i kisim liklik samting bilong ol , tasol planti ol i go tasol wantaim ol klos ol i bin pasim .

translation.en: at the venezuela branch office of jehovah 's witnesses , relief efforts began as soon as word of the disaster was received .
translation.zu: taim brens - ofis bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long veneswela i kisim toksave long dispela bikpela hevi , kwiktaim ol i stretim rot bilong helpim ol man i kisim bagarap .

translation.en: however , roads were either cluttered with debris or simply washed away .
translation.zu: tasol planti rot i pas long ol pipia na sampela rot tait wara i bagarapim olgeta .

translation.en: after a few days , one lane of the main highway was opened for emergency use , and witness vehicles carrying medical supplies and qualified personnel were allowed through .
translation.zu: sampela de bihain , ol i opim wanpela sait bilong bikrot bambai ol i ken mekim wok long en bilong helpim ol lain i kisim bagarap , na ol i larim ol ka bilong ol witnes i karim ol marasin samting tu long i go long en .

translation.en: an official later said : " the government is well aware that jehovah 's witnesses were among the first to arrive with help and to take people away from the area . "
translation.zu: bihain wanpela bikman bilong gavman i tok : " gavman i save olsem ol witnes bilong jehova ol i namba wan lain bilong bringim sampela helpim i kam na kisim ol manmeri i go . "

translation.en: the witnesses organized searches to find those needing help .
translation.zu: ol witnes i stretim rot bilong painim ol lain i mas kisim helpim .

translation.en: collection points were set up in the city so that food , clothing , and medicine could be distributed to people in need .
translation.zu: ol i makim sampela hap long taun bilong ol man i ken bringim ol kaikai na klos na marasin samting i kam long en na tilim i go long ol man i sot long ol dispela samting .

translation.en: but most of them needed more than food and clothing .
translation.zu: tasol planti ol i no sot long kaikai na klos tasol . nogat .

translation.en: even long after the disaster , people had friends and relatives living with them .
translation.zu: maski dispela bikpela bagarap i pinis longpela taim , sampela manmeri i gat ol pren na ol wanblut i stap yet wantaim ol .

translation.en: joel and elsa , witnesses in puerto cabello , live in a small apartment .
translation.zu: joel na elsa , tupela witnes long pueto kabelo , ol i save sindaun long wanpela liklik haus .

translation.en: a month after the storm , they still had 16 people living there with them .
translation.zu: wanpela mun bihain long dispela bikpela hevi i bin kamap , inap 16 manmeri i stap yet wantaim tupela .

translation.en: their places of work simply no longer exist .
translation.zu: ol ples wok bilong ol i no i stap moa .

translation.en: a layer of hardened mud - up to nine feet [ 3 m ] deep in some places - caused the level of streets to be so high that as a person walked on them , he was at eye level with an upper floor or even the rooftops of the buildings he passed !
translation.zu: bikpela hap graun malumalum i pas na i kamap strong - long sampela hap em i go antap inap olsem 3 - pela mita - na dispela i mekim na ol rot i go antap moa , olsem na taim wanpela man i wokabaut long en ai bilong em inap lukluk i go insait stret long namba 2 plua bilong haus o em i lukim rup bilong ol haus !

translation.en: some in venezuela commented that the disaster taught them a valuable lesson - not to put their trust in material things .
translation.zu: sampela manmeri long veneswela i tok dispela bagarap i bin skulim ol long wanpela gutpela samting tru - ol i no ken bilip tumas long ol samting bilong skin .

translation.en: a number came to appreciate the counsel of jesus christ : " stop storing up for yourselves treasures upon the earth , where moth and rust consume , and where thieves break in and steal .
translation.zu: planti ol i pilim tru tok bilong jisas krais : " yupela i no ken bungim ol gutpela gutpela samting bilong yupela hia long dispela graun .

translation.en: rather , store up for yourselves treasures in heaven , where neither moth nor rust consumes , and where thieves do not break in and steal .
translation.zu: long dispela graun ol binatang na ros i save bagarapim ol samting , na ol stilman i save brukim banis na stilim . tasol yupela i mas bungim ol gutpela samting bilong yupela long heven .

translation.en: for where your treasure is , there your heart will be also . " - matthew 6 : 19 - 21 .
translation.zu: long ples ol gutpela samting bilong yu i stap long en , long dispela ples tasol laik bilong yu tu bai i stap . " - matyu 6 : 19 - 21 .
