translation.en: as told by stepan kozhemba
translation.zu: em stori bilong stepan kozhemba

translation.en: one night early in april 1951 , trucks loaded with soviet troops drove into our ukrainian village of stenyatyn .
translation.zu: wanpela nait bilong mun epril 1951 , ol ami bilong lain soviet i pulap long ol ka na kam long ples bilong mipela long stenyatin bilong yukren .

translation.en: i was born in the village of stenyatyn in october 1938 .
translation.zu: mama i karim mi long stenyatin long oktoba 1938 , na tupela wik bihain em i dai .

translation.en: mother died two weeks after my birth , and father was killed in 1944 while fighting in the soviet army against germany .
translation.zu: papa i insait long ami bilong lain soviet , na em i dai long 1944 taim ol i pait wantaim ol lain jeman .

translation.en: my father 's sisters , olena and anna , took me in and raised me .
translation.zu: tupela susa bilong papa , em olena na anna , ol i lukautim mi inap mi bikpela .

translation.en: as a boy , i knew several of jehovah 's witnesses in our town .
translation.zu: taim mi stap manki yet mi save long sampela witnes bilong jehova i stap long taun bilong mipela .

translation.en: they talked to me and to others about the messianic kingdom whenever the opportunity arose .
translation.zu: wanem wanem taim rot i op ol i stori long mi na ol narapela tu long kingdom bilong krais .

translation.en: in time , i became friends with some of the young witnesses .
translation.zu: isi isi mi kamap pren wantaim sampela yangpela bilong ol .

translation.en: when they were taken by soviet troops and deported to siberia , i was completely surprised .
translation.zu: na taim ol ami bilong soviet i kam kisim ol na rausim ol i go long saibiria , mi kirap nogut tru .

translation.en: but not all witnesses were exiled .
translation.zu: tasol ol i no rausim olgeta witnes .

translation.en: stepan , a witness who lived near my home , was allowed to stay , since his family were not witnesses .
translation.zu: stepan em i wanpela witnes i sindaun klostu long haus bilong mi na ol i larim em i stap , long wanem , famili bilong em i no witnes .

translation.en: he was six years older than i was , and when i left school , i worked with him as a carpenter .
translation.zu: em i bikpela long mi inap long 6 - pela krismas , na taim mi lusim skul , mi wok kamda wantaim em .

translation.en: he studied the bible with me , using any copies of the watchtower that were available .
translation.zu: em i mekim wok long wanem wanem wastaua i stap bilong stadi long baibel wantaim mi .

translation.en: stepan , who now serves the true god , jehovah , in estonia , was thrilled when i got baptized in july 1956 .
translation.zu: stepan i amamas tru taim mi kisim baptais long julai 1956 . long nau em i mekim wok bilong jehova long estonia .

translation.en: opposition was part of life for any servant of jehovah in ukraine .
translation.zu: long dispela taim bipo olgeta man i lotuim jehova long yukren i karim hevi long pasin birua .

translation.en: the authorities conducted house searches to look for bible literature , so i had a number of hiding places .
translation.zu: ol polis i save go long ol haus bilong painim painim ol nius bilong baibel , olsem na mi gat planti hap mi haitim ol nius long en .

translation.en: my aunts olena and anna , who were greek catholics , did not approve of my contact with the witnesses .
translation.zu: tupela anti bilong mi , em olena na anna , i bilong lotu katolik bilong ol grik , na tupela i no amamas taim mi wok long toktok wantaim ol witnes .

translation.en: they even tried to influence me to stop associating with them .
translation.zu: na ol i laik kirapim mi long lusim pasin bilong bung wantaim ol .

translation.en: but my relationship with jehovah god strengthened me to endure every trial . - 2 corinthians 1 : 8 ; philippians 4 : 13 .
translation.zu: tasol mi stap gut long jehova na dispela i bin strongim mi long karim olgeta hevi . - 2 korin 1 : 8 ; filipai 4 : 13 .

translation.en: service in the soviet military was compulsory for young men 18 years of age .
translation.zu: lo i tok ol man i gat 18 krismas i mas insait long ami bilong soviet .

translation.en: because of my knowledge of the bible , i was determined to remain neutral with respect to the affairs of the world , which meant that i refused to join the soviet army .
translation.zu: save bilong mi long tok bilong baibel i kirapim mi long klia long ol samting bilong graun , olsem na mi tok nogat long wok bilong insait long ami .

translation.en: olena and anna encouraged me to become a soldier , even though their own brother , my father , had been killed in the war .
translation.zu: ( aisaia 2 : 4 ; jon 17 : 14 - 16 ) olena na anna i laik kirapim mi long insait long ami maski brata bilong ol , em papa bilong mi i bin dai long pait .

translation.en: after i received draft papers , i went to the military headquarters in our area and explained my position .
translation.zu: taim mi kisim pepa i toksave olsem mi mas insait long ami , mi go long hetkota bilong ol long hap bilong mipela na kamapim bilip bilong mi .

translation.en: i was promptly arrested and then kept in custody while charges were prepared against me .
translation.zu: wantu ol i kalabusim mi na mi stap kalabus taim ol i wok long stretim ol samting ol i laik kotim mi long en .

translation.en: i gave a thorough witness to the judge , the prosecutor , and the two - man jury .
translation.zu: mi autim gut ol tok bilong baibel long jas wantaim man i kotim mi na tupela narapela i sindaun long harim kot .

translation.en: after 20 minutes , it was all over .
translation.zu: na insait long 20 minit tasol kot i pinis .

translation.en: after the trial i was put in prison in lviv .
translation.zu: bihain long kot mi kalabus long lavif .

translation.en: i remained spiritually active , however , by witnessing to fellow inmates , who found my refusal to serve in the military difficult to understand .
translation.zu: tasol mi stap strong long ol samting bilong spirit long rot bilong autim tok long ol narapela kalabusman , em ol i hatwok long save long as na mi tok nogat long insait long ami .

translation.en: during those months , i relied on the personal study i had done before being put in detention .
translation.zu: long dispela 3 - pela mun ol samting mi bin stadi long en paslain long kalabus i helpim mi .

translation.en: the experience taught me a valuable lesson : personal bible study helps us to build up a spiritual reserve that sustains us when trials arise . - john 14 : 26 .
translation.zu: long dispela rot mi kisim bikpela skul olsem : baibel - stadi bilong yumi yet i helpim yumi long putim gut ol samting bilong spirit long tingting na bihain dispela bai strongim yumi taim ol traim i kamap . - jon 14 : 26 .

translation.en: in april 1958 , i was transferred to labor camp 21 , near dnepropetrovsk , over 450 miles [ 700 km ] from home , to serve the remainder of my sentence .
translation.zu: long epril 1958 , ol i kisim mi i go long kalabus 21 bilong wok leba bilong inapim hap taim i stap yet long kalabus bilong mi .

translation.en: there we got up at 6 : 00 a.m . , and after breakfast we were loaded onto trucks and taken about 30 miles [ 50 km ] to our workplace outside camp .
translation.zu: long kalabus mipela kirap long 6 klok moning , na taim kaikai i pinis mipela kalap long ol ka na go longwe inap olsem 50 kilomita long hap mipela bai wok long en .

translation.en: we worked eight hours on a construction site , and then we were returned to camp for the night .
translation.zu: mipela stap 8 - pela aua long ples wok na bihain ol i karim mipela i go bek long kem .

translation.en: each of us made a conscious effort to encourage the other two .
translation.zu: na narapela i wok strong long strongim bel bilong narapela .

translation.en: this is a further way that jehovah provides strength to his servants in distress - through the companionship of fellow believers . - 2 corinthians 7 : 6 .
translation.zu: dispela em i narapela rot bilong jehova long strongim bel bilong ol lain bilong em - em long pasin poroman i stap namel long ol wanbilip . - 2 korin 7 : 6 .

translation.en: in all , there were 12 witnesses in the camp .
translation.zu: i gat 12 - pela witnes i stap long kem .

translation.en: some of these had relatives on the outside who smuggled pages of the watchtower to us hidden in food parcels .
translation.zu: na sampela i gat ol wantok i no kalabus , olsem na long pasin hait ol i salim ol pes bilong wastaua long mipela insait long sampela karamap kaikai .

translation.en: most parcels were opened by the guards , who checked the contents before passing them on to us .
translation.zu: na planti taim ol woda bai opim karamap na skelim ol samting paslain long mipela i ken kisim .

translation.en: but to avoid detection , pages of the watchtower were wrapped in plastic and placed in tins of jam , which the guards did not bother to open .
translation.zu: tasol bilong haitim gut ol pes bilong wastaua , ol i karamapim long plastik na putim insait long wanpela tin jem , na ol woda i no gat tingting long opim ol dispela tin .

translation.en: once we received the articles , we copied them by hand and shared them among ourselves .
translation.zu: taim mipela kisim ol pes bilong wastaua , mipela raitim sampela kopi bilong ol na tilim namel long mipela yet .

translation.en: we also did our best to preach about god 's kingdom , and jehovah blessed our efforts .
translation.zu: na tu , mipela wok strong long autim tok long kingdom bilong god , na jehova i blesim wok bilong mipela .

translation.en: for instance , i got to know an inmate named sergei , who had worked as an accountant at a state - owned enterprise in eastern ukraine .
translation.zu: olsem : mi wok long toktok wantaim narapela wankalabus , em sergei , em i bin lukautim mani bilong wanpela bisnis bilong gavman long hap is bilong yukren .

translation.en: when fraud was discovered at his place of work , he was held responsible and was sentenced to ten years in detention .
translation.zu: taim pasin giaman bilong paulim mani i kamap ples klia long ples wok , ol i sutim asua i go long em na kot i makim em long stap kalabus inap 10 - pela yia .

translation.en: several witnesses in prison studied with him , using whatever magazines were available .
translation.zu: sampela witnes i mekim wok long wanem ol magasin ol i ken kisim bilong stadi wantaim em .

translation.en: sergei responded and finally told me : " when i am freed from camp , i want to be baptized as a witness of jehovah ! "
translation.zu: sergei i laikim ol save em i kisim na bihain em i tokim mi olsem : " taim mi lusim kalabus , mi laik baptais na kamap wanpela witnes bilong jehova ! "

translation.en: true to his word , sergei was baptized shortly after his release , and he served jehovah loyally until his death .
translation.zu: orait bihain liklik long taim em i lusim kalabus , em i truim tok bilong em na i kisim baptais . na em i stap gut long jehova inap long em i dai .

translation.en: confusion over romans chapter 13
translation.zu: tupela tingting long rom sapta 13

translation.en: i was released from detention in january 1963 and returned to my home village , stenyatyn .
translation.zu: long janueri 1963 mi lusim kalabus na go bek long ples bilong mi long stenyatin .

translation.en: almost immediately i sensed that something was wrong in the local congregation in sokal .
translation.zu: wantu mi pilim olsem samting i no stret long kongrigesen bilong mipela long sokal .

translation.en: the atmosphere among the brothers was tense .
translation.zu: ol brata i no stap bel isi wantaim .

translation.en: what was the problem ?
translation.zu: wanem hevi bilong ol ?

translation.en: what had led to this situation of uncertainty ?
translation.zu: wanem samting i kirapim pasin bilong holim tupela tingting ?

translation.en: for years the soviet authorities had been trying to sow disunity among jehovah 's people by picking up brothers for questioning and suggesting to them that the witnesses were being used to further the interests of the united states of america .
translation.zu: inap planti yia ol hetman bilong lain soviet i laik bagarapim pasin wanbel i stap namel long lain bilong jehova , olsem na taim ol i kisim sampela brata bilong givim askim long ol , ol i save tokim ol brata olsem oganaisesen bilong ol witnes i giaman na mekim wok long ol bilong helpim gavman bilong amerika tasol .

translation.en: the officials recommended that witnesses within the soviet union form their own separate organization , adding that they could then enjoy peaceful relations with the state and be left to practice their religion without persecution .
translation.zu: na ol hetman i tokim ol witnes i stap long soviet yunion long kamapim oganaisesen bilong ol yet . na tu , dispela bai helpim ol long stap wanbel wantaim gavman soviet , na gavman bai larim ol i bihainim lotu bilong ol na bai i no gat pasin birua moa .

translation.en: the officials made all of this sound appealing .
translation.zu: long pasin bilong grisim man ol hetman i kamapim ol dispela tok .

translation.en: then in the watchtower of november 15 , 1962 , which appeared later in the ukrainian edition of july 1 , 1964 , a new understanding of romans chapter 13 was presented .
translation.zu: orait wastaua bilong novemba 15 , 1962 long tok inglis i kamapim nupela tingting long rom sapta 13 , na bihain dispela tok i kamap long wastaua bilong yukren long julai 1 , 1964 .

translation.en: until that time , we had understood " the superior authorities " mentioned in ro 13 verse 1 to be jehovah god and jesus christ , but the watchtower noted that " the superior authorities " actually represent the earthly governments and that these are " placed in their relative positions by god . " - romans 13 : 1 .
translation.zu: taim dispela nupela tok i no kamap yet , mipela gat tingting olsem ol " gavman " em ves 1 i stori long ol i makim god jehova na jisas krais , tasol wastaua i tok olsem " ol gavman " i makim ol gavman bilong graun , na " god yet i putim ol na ol i stap . " - rom 13 : 1 .

translation.en: some of the witnesses found it hard to believe this adjusted view , since the heads of the earthly government in the soviet union had been so cruel in their attempts to wipe out the true worship of god .
translation.zu: sampela witnes i gat hatwok long bilip long dispela nupela tingting , long wanem , ol bikman bilong gavman bilong soviet yunion i bin mekim pasin nogut tru bilong traim pinisim trupela lotu bilong god .

translation.en: these witnesses , therefore , thought that the watchtower containing the new understanding had not originated with the official organization of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: olsem na ol dispela witnes i ting olsem dispela wastaua i kamapim nupela tingting i no kam long oganaisesen tru bilong ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: instead , they thought that the information had been fabricated by those compromising with the authorities in order to make the witnesses more obedient to the soviet state .
translation.zu: ol i ting sampela witnes i pundaun na bihainim tok bilong ol hetman bilong gavman na kamapim nating tok bilong dispela wastaua bilong kirapim ol lain witnes long soviet yunion long bihainim olgeta tok bilong gavman soviet .

translation.en: so each servant of jehovah in ukraine was faced with the question , which group is right , and which is wrong ?
translation.zu: olsem na dispela i kamapim wanpela askim olgeta wokman bilong jehova long yukren i mas bekim : wanem lain i stret na wanem lain i no stret ?

translation.en: i observed the witnesses supporting each side of the argument and asked myself , ' what motives do they have ? '
translation.zu: mi luksave olsem ol witnes i bruk long tupela lain long dispela samting , na mi askim mi yet , ' wanem as bilong tingting bilong ol ? '

translation.en: soon i was able to identify a clear difference between the two sides .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na mi inap luksave olsem tingting bilong tupela lain i narapela narapela .

translation.en: the majority of jehovah 's witnesses , some of whom may not have fully understood the new explanation of romans chapter 13 , wanted to stick loyally to jehovah and his organization .
translation.zu: planti witnes bilong jehova ol i laik stap gut long jehova na oganaisesen bilong em , maski sampela i no klia tumas long nupela tingting bilong rom sapta 13 .

translation.en: others , however , had begun to doubt that recent publications of the watch tower bible and tract society still came from the official organization of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: tasol sampela i wok long kisim tingting olsem ol nupela buk na nius samting bilong sosaiti was taua i no kam long oganaisesen tru bilong ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: such ones were also inclined to have extreme views on a number of matters .
translation.zu: na tu , ol dispela lain i gat narapela kain tingting olgeta long sampela narapela samting .

translation.en: for instance , they felt that it was wrong for a bride to wear a white dress at her wedding and for marriage partners to wear a wedding ring .
translation.zu: olsem : ol i ting i no stret sapos meri i pasim waitpela klos long taim bilong marit na tupela marit i pasim ring bilong makim olsem ol i marit .

translation.en: a number of individuals left the organization .
translation.zu: sampela i lusim oganaisesen long dispela taim .

translation.en: in time , however , quite a few of them recognized their error and returned to serving jehovah .
translation.zu: tasol bihain planti liklik ol i tingim popaia bilong ol na ol i kirap gen na lotuim jehova .

translation.en: even though our christian activities were banned , whenever possible we held our weekly meetings in groups of between 10 and 15 .
translation.zu: maski i gat tambu long ol wok kristen bilong mipela , taim rot i op mipela i save bung olsem 10 - pela o 15 manmeri bilong wokim ol miting bilong wik .

translation.en: from the meetings we derived spiritual strength , from both our bible study and our association after the study .
translation.zu: long ol miting mipela kisim strong long samting bilong spirit long rot bilong stadi long baibel na long pasin bilong toktok gut wantaim ol brata sista taim stadi i pinis .

translation.en: we would compare our experiences , and this helped us to realize that each of us had the same struggle .
translation.zu: mipela bai stori long ol samting i bin kamap long mipela , na dispela i helpim mipela long save olsem mipela i karim wankain hevi .

translation.en: we took to heart what the apostle peter wrote : " the same things in the way of sufferings are being accomplished in the entire association of your brothers in the world . " - 1 peter 5 : 9 .
translation.zu: mipela i pilim tru tok bilong aposel pita , olsem : " ol arapela manmeri bilong god , ol i stap long olgeta hap bilong graun , ol tu i save karim wankain pen olsem yupela . " - 1 pita 5 : 9 .

translation.en: how did the magazines reach us ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem mipela kisim ol dispela nius ?

translation.en: these films were passed along a prearranged route from one witness to the next . then each one produced enough copies for his congregation .
translation.zu: bihain ol liklik kopi bai i go long narapela narapela brata ol i makim pinis , na em bai i wokim ol kopi inap long kongrigesen bilong em .

translation.en: sometimes i got involved in making such copies .
translation.zu: sampela taim mi insait long dispela wok bilong wokim ol nius .

translation.en: i worked all day and kept busy in jehovah 's service at night , producing magazines and doing other things .
translation.zu: long san mi wok skin na long nait mi givim bel long mekim wok bilong jehova na wokim kopi bilong ol nius na ol narapela samting .

translation.en: it was a challenge to keep up with the schedule , but those of us who carried responsibility in the organization learned that jehovah " is giving to the tired one power . " - isaiah 40 : 29 .
translation.zu: i hatwok long mekim ol dispela wok , tasol mipela ol lain i gat ol bikpela wok insait long oganaisesen i kisim save olsem jehova " i save strongim ol man i no gat strong . " - aisaia 40 : 29 .

translation.en: we created opportunities to talk about the bible with people we met .
translation.zu: mipela yet i kamapim rot bilong stori long baibel long ol manmeri mipela bungim .

translation.en: many of us did this while riding on public transportation .
translation.zu: planti bilong mipela i mekim olsem taim mipela raun long ol bas .

translation.en: one common method of starting a conversation was simply to read the daily newspaper and then casually mention the latest news to a fellow passenger .
translation.zu: bilong kirapim toktok , mipela ritim niuspepa na kamapim sampela stori bilong en long narapela pasindia .

translation.en: once a conversation was started , we then steered it toward a bible subject .
translation.zu: taim toktok i kirap pinis , mipela bai stiaim tok i go long sampela tok bilong baibel .

translation.en: a capable wife
translation.zu: gutpela meri marit

translation.en: in 1965 , i married tamara , who had been brought up as a servant of the true god and knew what it meant to stand up for her faith under trial .
translation.zu: long 1965 , mi maritim tamara . kirap long taim em i liklik em i lainim pasin bilong lotuim trupela god , na em i save pinis long pasin bilong holimpas bilip long taim bilong traim .

translation.en: her brother sergei had been arrested and tried for his activities as a witness three times .
translation.zu: tripela taim brata bilong em sergei i kalabus na kot long ol wok em i mekim olsem wanpela witnes .

translation.en: on the last occasion , copies of the watchtower were found in his possession and he was sentenced to ten years in detention .
translation.zu: laspela taim ol i kisim em , ol i painim sampela wastaua em i holim , olsem na kot i makim em long kisim kalabus inap long 10 - pela yia .

translation.en: tamara herself was taken by the authorities to their headquarters for questioning and threatened with imprisonment .
translation.zu: na tamara tu , ol polis i kisim em i go long hetkota bilong givim sampela askim long em na pretim em olsem em bai kalabus .

translation.en: finding a place to live after our marriage was difficult , but a family living in sokal who were friendly toward the witnesses offered us a small room in their home at a low cost .
translation.zu: taim mipela marit pinis mipela gat hatwok long painim haus mipela i ken stap long en , tasol wanpela famili i stap long sokal i save mekim gutpela pasin long ol witnes , na ol i tok mipela ken kisim wanpela liklik rum long haus bilong ol long liklik pe tasol .

translation.en: this family assured us that tamara could continue to live in the room should i be arrested and put into prison again .
translation.zu: na dispela famili i tokim mipela olsem tamara i ken stap yet long dispela rum sapos polis i kisim mi na mi kalabus gen .

translation.en: my wife and i were grateful to jehovah for his blessing and to the family for their kindness .
translation.zu: mitupela i tenkyu tru long dispela blesing bilong jehova na long gutpela pasin bilong dispela famili .

translation.en: later , when the family suffered a bereavement , tamara took the opportunity to explain the resurrection hope to the daughter , galina .
translation.zu: taim wanpela long dispela famili i dai , tamara i stori long pikinini meri , em galina , long bilip olsem ol man i dai pinis ol bai kirap bek .

translation.en: the seeds of bible truth bore fruit , and galina grew to love our creator .
translation.zu: dispela tok bilong baibel tamara i planim i karim kaikai , na galina i kisim pasin bilong laikim tumas dispela man bilong wokim yumi .

translation.en: she was baptized and now serves jehovah along with her husband .
translation.zu: em i kisim baptais , na nau em i mekim wok bilong jehova wantaim man bilong em .

translation.en: most weekends in the 1970 ' s , i traveled to various parts of ukraine as well as to moldavia ( moldova ) and the carpathian mountains , meeting with and encouraging those who were taking the lead in jehovah 's organization .
translation.zu: long planti sarere sande bilong 1970 i go inap long 1979 , mi raun long ol narapela narapela hap bilong yukren , moldova , na ol maunten kapetian bilong bung wantaim na strongim bel bilong ol lain i olsem gopas insait long oganaisesen bilong jehova .

translation.en: normally i left friday evening and returned home late on sunday .
translation.zu: mi save lusim haus long apinun long fraide na kam bek long biknait long sande .

translation.en: tamara rarely knew where i was going and was sometimes not even sure whether i would return .
translation.zu: planti taim tamara i no save mi go long wanem hap , na sampela taim em i no save mi bai kam bek o nogat .

translation.en: this situation lasted for years .
translation.zu: inap planti yia mi bihainim dispela pasin .

translation.en: i can only confirm what the bible says about a capable wife : " her value is far more than that of corals . " - proverbs 31 : 10 .
translation.zu: mi wanbel tru long dispela tok bilong baibel i stori long gutpela meri marit : " kain meri olsem i winim olkain ston i dia tumas . " - sindaun 31 : 10 .

translation.en: in those days any activity as one of jehovah 's witnesses involved some risk .
translation.zu: long dispela taim olgeta wok bilong mipela ol witnes bilong jehova inap kamapim sampela hevi long mipela .

translation.en: we were able to carry on only with the strength that jehovah supplies .
translation.zu: olsem na mipela inap mekim yet ol dispela samting long strong i kam long jehova tasol .

translation.en: countless times i faced difficult situations and did not know what to do .
translation.zu: planti taim i gat ol samting i kamap na mi no save mi bai mekim wanem .

translation.en: so i would say a silent prayer and rely on jehovah for strength .
translation.zu: olsem na mi bai beten long tingting na wetim jehova i givim strong long mi .

translation.en: to do that became our way of life . - acts 4 : 29 .
translation.zu: dispela i kamap olsem pasin bilong mipela . - aposel 4 : 29 .

translation.en: more recent times
translation.zu: ol samting bilong nau

translation.en: with the passing of time , life became easier for servants of jehovah in ukraine .
translation.zu: isi isi ol hevi mipela ol lain bilong jehova i karim long yukren i go liklik na i no bikpela olsem bipo .

translation.en: in the 1980 ' s , the authorities came to appreciate that jehovah 's witnesses really are an international organization .
translation.zu: long 1985 samting ol hetman bilong yukren i wok long kisim stretpela tingting olsem oganaisesen bilong ol witnes bilong jehova i save stap long olgeta hap .

translation.en: thus , by imprisoning the witnesses in ukraine and elsewhere in the soviet union , the state was damaging its reputation abroad .
translation.zu: olsem na taim gavman i kalabusim ol witnes long yukren na ol narapela hap bilong soviet yunion , gavman i kisim nem nogut long ai bilong ol narapela kantri .

translation.en: i recall being questioned by one official who told me : " we now realize that religion does not have to be bad .
translation.zu: mi ken tingim yet tok wanpela hetman i mekim taim em i givim sampela askim long mi , em i tok olsem : " nau mipela save olsem lotu i no samting nogut .

translation.en: our chief concern is that a religious group should not harm the state . "
translation.zu: namba wan samting mipela tingting long en i olsem lotu i no ken bagarapim gavman . "

translation.en: in eastern europe the iron curtain began to open at the end of the 1980 ' s , and since then we have enjoyed increased freedom in ukraine .
translation.zu: long 1988 samting ol kantri bilong isten yurop i no pasim moa ol man long mekim ol samting ol i laik mekim , na kirap long dispela taim mipela i stap fri liklik long mekim ol samting long yukren .

translation.en: then , in september 1998 , the watch tower society established a branch office in lviv .
translation.zu: na long septemba 1998 , sosaiti was taua i kamapim wanpela brens - ofis long lavif .

translation.en: now in ukraine we have over 112,000 sharing in the preaching work , and more than 250,000 attended the memorial in 2000 .
translation.zu: nau long yukren namba bilong ol lain i insait long wok autim tok i winim 112,000 , na winim 250,000 i bin go long memorial bilong yia 2000 .

translation.en: what is most striking is the number of young people in our ranks .
translation.zu: bikpela samting tru planti man i lukim em namba bilong ol yangpela i save bung wantaim mipela .

translation.en: at a convention in kiev in 1991 , a newspaper reporter asked me :
translation.zu: long wanpela kibung long 1991 , wanpela niusmeri i givim dispela askim long mi :

translation.en: " where did all these people come from ?
translation.zu: " ol dispela manmeri i kam long we ?

translation.en: i thought that there were no witnesses in the soviet union , and suddenly there are thousands ! "
translation.zu: mi bin ting olsem i no gat ol witnes long soviet yunion , tasol i olsem wantu planti tausen i stap ! "

translation.en: " we did not appear all of a sudden , overnight , " i told her .
translation.zu: mi tokim em : " mipela i no kamap wantu tasol .

translation.en: " we have been serving jehovah here for many years . "
translation.zu: inap planti yia mipela stap na mekim wok bilong jehova . "

translation.en: she wanted to know . " the best thing is for you to ask the young ones themselves .
translation.zu: " em bai gutpela moa sapos yu givim dispela askim long ol yangpela yet .

translation.en: let them tell you why they want to serve jehovah . "
translation.zu: na ol i ken tokim yu long wanem as na ol i laik lotuim jehova . "

translation.en: " then that is the reason , " i added . " if that is what our young people say , then that is the explanation . "
translation.zu: sapos ol yangpela bilong mipela i bin tok olsem , yu ken save em as tru bilong dispela samting . "

translation.en: helped save his life .

translation.en: the awake ! articles , which terrell said that he kept recalling during his ordeal , contained the following advice from experts about what to do if kidnapped :
translation.zu: terrell i tok , long taim bilong dispela hevi em i bin tingim bek ol stori bilong kirap ! - ol i kamapim sampela gutpela tok bilong helpim ol man em ol narapela i bin stilim ol . nius i tok olsem :

translation.en: antagonistic hostages are more often subjected to harsh treatment , and they run a greater risk of being killed or singled out for punishment .
translation.zu: planti taim ol man bilong tok pait i save kisim bikpela hevi moa , na ol man i holim ol inap kilim ol o givim strafe long ol .

translation.en: " do not panic .
translation.zu: " no ken pret .

translation.en: " engage in small talk if possible and try to establish contact .
translation.zu: " mekim sampela tok nating , olsem yu laik mekim pasin pren long em .

translation.en: if the kidnappers see you as an individual , they will be less likely to harm or kill you .
translation.zu: sapos ol i lukim olsem yu mekim gut long ol , ating ol bai i no inap long bagarapim yu o kilim yu i dai .

translation.en: " make them [ the kidnappers ] aware of your needs in a polite manner . "
translation.zu: " long gutpela pasin toksave long ol [ man i holim yu ] long ol samting yu mas kisim . "

translation.en: " interaction has served as a protection to the kidnapped , as the book criminal behavior explains : ' the more the victim and the captor get to know one another , the more they tend to like one another .
translation.zu: " pasin bilong toktok gut wantaim i save helpim ol man long abrusim ol bikpela hevi , olsem buk criminal behavior i tok : ' sapos man i kisim hevi na man i givim hevi i save gut long narapela narapela , dispela bai i kirapim tupela long laikim moa yet narapela narapela .

translation.en: this phenomenon indicates that after a period of time the offender is less likely to harm the hostage . ' "
translation.zu: dispela samting i mekim na bihain man i givim hevi planti taim em bai i no inap mekim nogut long man em i holim . '

translation.en: william terrell , who is 53 years old and one of jehovah 's witnesses , did his best to follow such advice during the nearly 14 hours he was held hostage , much of the time at gunpoint .
translation.zu: " william terrell , em i gat 53 krismas na em i wanpela witnes bilong jehova , em i bin wok strong tru long bihainim ol dispela gutpela tok taim palczynski i bin holim em inap 14 aua , na klostu long olgeta taim man hia i bin makim gan long em .

translation.en: after hearing the stranger 's plight , terrell expressed a desire to help him .
translation.zu: bihain long terrell i kisim save long hevi bilong palczynski , em i tokaut olsem em bai helpim palczynski .

translation.en: palczynski asked for a glass of water and for a ride to baltimore , maryland , u.s.a .
translation.zu: palczynski i askim terrell long givim wanpela kap wara long em na draivim em i go long baltimo , merilan , amerika .

translation.en: terrell said he would arrange for someone to drive him to the city of fredericksburg , virginia , where he could catch a bus the rest of the way .
translation.zu: terrell i tok em bai i stretim rot na bai wanpela man i draivim palczynski i go long taun frederiksbek , vejinia , na long dispela hap em i ken kisim bas i go long haus bilong em .

translation.en: when terrell turned with a glass of water for the stranger , a gun was pointed at him .
translation.zu: taim terrell i kam bek bilong givim kap wara long dispela man em i no save long em , dispela man i makim gan long em .

translation.en: following the advice
translation.zu: bihainim ol gutpela tok

translation.en: during the drive along i - 95 , terrell followed palczynski 's directions to maintain the speed limit and not to drive in any way that would draw attention to them .
translation.zu: taim tupela i draiv long hap bilong dispela bikpela rot , terrell i bihainim ol tok bilong palczynski long spit long wankain mak na em i no ken draiv long pasin em inap long pulim ai bilong ol man .

translation.en: remaining calm , terrell engaged 31 - year - old palczynski in conversation , expressing genuine interest in him as a person and in the circumstances that led to their meeting .
translation.zu: terrell i stap isi , na em i kirapim palczynski , em i gat 31 krismas , long toktok wantaim em , na em i kamapim olsem em i tingim palczynski na em i sori tru long dispela hevi i kamap na nau terrell i bungim em .

translation.en: palczynski related that three days earlier he had gone to see his girlfriend tracy , who had broken up with him .
translation.zu: palczynski i stori olsem tripela de paslain em i bin i go long lukim gelpren bilong em tracy , tasol tracy i no laik pren moa wantaim em .

translation.en: there he shot and killed two of her friends and a neighbor who attempted to interfere with his taking tracy with him .
translation.zu: long dispela hap em i kilim i dai tupela pren bilong tracy na wanpela man i laik pasim em long kisim tracy i go wantaim em .

translation.en: later tracy escaped .
translation.zu: bihain tracy i ranawe .

translation.en: the following evening , during palczynski 's efforts to hijack a vehicle , a two - year - old child was struck by one of his bullets , shattering the child 's jaw .
translation.zu: long de bihain long apinun , taim palczynski i laik stilim wanpela ka , wanpela katres long gan bilong em i kisim wanpela pikinini man i gat 2 - pela krismas na i brukim wasket bilong em .

translation.en: jennifer and her husband , thomas , were on their way to the kingdom hall of jehovah 's witnesses , where both of them were to present assigned parts at the meeting that evening .
translation.zu: jennifer wantaim man bilong em , thomas , tupela i laik go long haus kingdom bilong ol witnes bilong jehova , na tupela wantaim i gat ol tok samting bilong mekim long miting .

translation.en: sarah francis , jennifer 's mother , explained : " that 's the only night they did not take that baby to the kingdom hall .
translation.zu: mama bilong jennifer , em sarah francis , i tok : " dispela nait tasol tupela i no bin kisim bebi i go long haus kingdom .

translation.en: [ otherwise ] we would have two of them to mourn . "
translation.zu: sapos tupela i bin kisim em tu i go , mipela bai krai long tupela wantaim . "

translation.en: as terrell continued gently to engage his abductor in conversation , palczynski said that he had never intended to hurt anyone and that he really loved tracy and wanted to be with her .
translation.zu: taim terrell i wok yet long toktok wantaim man i holim em , palczynski i tok olsem em i no bin tingting long bagarapim wanpela man , na em i laikim tru tracy na em i laik stap wantaim em .

translation.en: i told him i would come to visit him in prison and study the bible with him . "
translation.zu: mi tokim em olsem mi bai go lukim em long haus kalabus na stadi long baibel wantaim em . "

translation.en: using his experience as a long - time christian elder , terrell continued to appeal to the disturbed young man by using true - life examples from the bible .
translation.zu: terrell i mekim wok elda inap planti yia pinis , na em i mekim wok long gutpela save bilong em olsem elda bilong helpim dispela yangpela man i gat sik long tingting - em i kamapim sampela stori bilong baibel long ol samting i bin kamap tru .

translation.en: for instance , he told the experience of a good man , israel 's king david , who became obsessed with the wife of uriah , one of the soldiers in david 's army .
translation.zu: olsem : em i kamapim stori bilong wanpela gutpela man , em king devit bilong israel , olsem devit i bin kisim tingting nogut long meri bilong uria , em i wanpela soldia long ami bilong em .

translation.en: when the woman became pregnant by david , he saw to it that uriah died in battle .
translation.zu: taim meri bilong uria i kisim bel long devit , devit i stretim rot na bai uria i dai long pait .

translation.en: when david 's sins were tactfully presented to him , he sincerely repented and regained god 's favor . - 2 samuel 11 : 2 - 12 : 14 .
translation.zu: taim ol i kamapim dispela rong long em , em i tanim bel tru na god i orait gen long em . - 2 samuel 11 : 2 - 12 : 14 .

translation.en: terrell established a rapport with the fugitive , calling him by his nickname joby .
translation.zu: terrell i mekim gutpela pasin pren long dispela ranawe man , na em i kolim em long nem giaman bilong em , joby .

translation.en: when they stopped at a store and terrell was sent to purchase food and a portable television , palczynski said he would kill more people if he tried to warn anyone .
translation.zu: taim tupela i pasim ka long wanpela stua na palczynski i salim terrell long baim kaikai na wanpela liklik televisen em ol inap karim raun , palczynski i tok em bai kilim i dai planti manmeri moa sapos terrell i traim long toksave long ol man .

translation.en: about a week later , palczynski was cornered in a house where he was holding hostages .
translation.zu: wanpela wik bihain , ol i banisim palczynski long wanpela haus em i bin holim sampela man long en .

translation.en: terrell , whom the fugitive had spoken about , was called in to help with negotiations .
translation.zu: ol i singautim terrell , em dispela ranawe man i stori long em , bilong kam na helpim ol long stretim sampela tok .

translation.en: that he credits with helping to save his life .
translation.zu: em i lusim pinis sampela handet bilong dispela nius long ol narapela man .

translation.en: he has shared hundreds of these with others . terrell is grateful that he has made it a habit to read the valuable information in awake ! , and we feel that you will be too .

translation.en: effort to oust vatican from un
translation.zu: ol i laik rausim vatiken long yunaitet nesen

translation.en: the rome - based news agency inter press service ( ips ) reported that " an international coalition of more than 70 non - governmental organisations ( ngos ) has launched a global campaign to oust the vatican from the united nations . "
translation.zu: wanpela lain bilong nius i stap long rom , em ips ( inter press service ) , i tok : " winim 70 oganaisesen i no bilong gavman , em ol ngo , ol i stap long olgeta hap na ol i save wok bung wantaim , ol i kamapim bikpela tok long rausim vatiken long yunaitet nesen . "

translation.en: presently , the vatican is a permanent observer , or nonmember state , in the un organization .
translation.zu: long nau , vatiken i gat namba long i stap long ol bung bilong yunaitet nesen olsem wanpela gavman i no memba bilong en .

translation.en: the vatican has had that status since 1964 .
translation.zu: kirap long 1964 vatiken i holim dispela namba .

translation.en: why does this group of ngos , which by the end of april last year had increased to 100 organizations worldwide , object to the vatican 's position in the un ?
translation.zu: long epril 1999 lain ngo i go bikpela na inap 100 oganaisesen i stap long en , orait bilong wanem ol i no laik bai vatiken i holim yet dispela namba long yunaitet nesen ?

translation.en: because the vatican , the ngos argue , is a religious authority and not a political state .
translation.zu: long wanem , dispela lain i tok vatiken i gat wok long bosim ol samting bilong lotu na i no bilong mekim wok olsem wanpela gavman .

translation.en: frances kissling , president of catholics for a free choice , told ips that the coalition does not oppose the vatican 's right to express its view , but " what is in question is the right of this non - state to occupy a position with governments . "
translation.zu: frances kissling , em i presiden bilong wanpela oganaisesen ( catholics for a free choice ) , em i tokim lain ips olsem ol ngo i no gat tok long wok i stret vatiken i ken mekim , olsem kamapim tingting bilong ol . tasol " samting ol i gat tok long en , em pasin bilong vatiken long holim wankain namba olsem ol gavman . "

translation.en: anika rahman , director of international programmes at the centre for reproductive law and policy , agrees .
translation.zu: anika rahman , dairekta bilong wanpela lain ( international programmes at the centre for reproductive law and policy ) i wanbel long dispela tok .

translation.en: ips quoted her as saying that " if the un treats the holy see as a state with permanent observer privileges because of its religious authority , the world body is creating a precedent for similar claims by other religions . "
translation.zu: lain ips i kamapim dispela tok bilong em : " sapos yunaitet nesen i mekim olsem vatiken em wanpela gavman i ken bung oltaim wantaim ol , long wanem , em i holim bikpela namba long lotu , orait ol i makim rot bilong ol narapela lotu long bihainim . "

translation.en: she added : " to ensure that the united nations does not promote any particular religion , religious entities such as the roman catholic church should not be permitted to participate in this forum as a non - member state . "
translation.zu: na anika i tok moa olsem : " bilong pasim yunaitet nesen long apim nem bilong wanpela lotu , winim ol narapela , i mas i gat tambu long ol lotu olsem misin katolik long stap insait long yunaitet nesen olsem wanpela gavman i no memba bilong en . "

translation.en: but what about the argument that the vatican is a state and is therefore entitled to its present status ?
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem long dispela tok olsem vatiken em i wanpela gavman , olsem na namba em i holim insait long yunaitet nesen i stret ?

translation.en: " that is semantic double - talk , " responded ms . kissling in an interview .
translation.zu: fransis kissling i bekim dispela askim olsem : " em wanpela tok i save paulim man .

translation.en: " we say that this is in essence a 15th - century definition of statehood and that the holy see is , in effect , the governing structure of the religion . "
translation.zu: mipela i ting dispela tok olsem vatiken em i wanpela gavman , em i olpela tingting ol i bin kamapim long yia 1450 samting long wanem samting i makim gavman , na tru tru vatiken i olsem gavman bilong lotu tasol . "

translation.en: she added that the terms " vatican " and " the holy see " are both " synonyms for the roman catholic church . "
translation.zu: na em i tok moa olsem dispela tok " vatiken " na " holy see , " tupela tok wantaim i " makim misin katolik tasol . "

translation.en: much of the resentment of the ngos against the vatican 's current position in the un is caused by the vatican 's view on population issues .
translation.zu: bikpela samting i kirapim ol ngo long bel nogut long namba vatiken i holim long yunaitet nesen , em tingting bilong vatiken long pasin bilong kamapim pikinini .

translation.en: for instance , the vatican has used un conferences such as the 1994 international conference on population and development , in cairo , and the 1995 women 's conference , in beijing , to express its strong views against family planning .
translation.zu: olsem : i gat bikpela bung long 1994 long kairo , ( international conference on population and development ) na narapela bung bilong ol meri long beijing long 1995 , ( women 's conference ) , na vatiken i bin mekim wok long ol dispela bung bilong kamapim strongpela tingting bilong ol long famili plening .

translation.en: kissling , " the appropriate role for the vatican is that of a ngo - the same as all the other ngos representing muslims , hindus , buddhists , bahais and other religious organisations . "
translation.zu: kissling i tok moa olsem : " i stret vatiken i stap olsem wanpela ngo - olsem i gat ol ngo bilong ol muslim , hindu , buda , bahai , na ol narapela oganaisesen bilong lotu . "

translation.en: the coalition wants un secretary - general kofi annan and ultimately the un general assembly to conduct an official review of the place the vatican occupies within the world 's largest political body .
translation.zu: ol ngo i laik bai seketeri - jeneral , em kofi annan , wantaim jeneral asembli bilong yunaitet nesen , ol i ken skelim gen namba vatiken i holim insait long yunaitet nesen , em i nambawan bikpela oganaisesen bilong ol gavman long graun .

translation.en: meet australia 's stingless bees
translation.zu: wanpela kain binen bilong ostrelia

translation.en: have you ever been soothed by the relaxing hum of busy honeybees as they hurry from flower to flower in the brilliant sunshine of early spring ?
translation.zu: yu inap tingim wanpela taim em yu bin harim liklik krai ol binen i save mekim taim ol i lusim wanpela plaua na i go long narapela plaua , na dispela i mekim bel bilong yu i stap isi ?

translation.en: truly , they are beautiful insects .
translation.zu: man ! em ol gutpela binatang tru .

translation.en: you might be surprised to learn that there are bees that don 't sting .
translation.zu: tasol i gutpela sapos ol i no save kaikaim man , a ?

translation.en: stingless bees are little more than a sixth of an inch [ 4 mm ] in length .
translation.zu: longpela bilong ol dispela binen em inap olsem 4 - pela milimita .

translation.en: they are black in color , with thick white hair on their faces and sides .
translation.zu: kala bilong ol i blakpela , na ol i gat planti waitpela gras long pes na bodi bilong ol .

translation.en: many of them have tiny yellow dots on the back edges of their middle body segments .
translation.zu: planti bilong ol i gat ol liklik liklik yelopela mak long bodi bilong ol .

translation.en: at least ten species of stingless bees can be found along the coast from the far north of queensland down to southern new south wales .
translation.zu: inap olsem 10 - pela kain binen i no save kaikaim man ol i stap long ostrelia , kirap long nambis long hap not bilong kwinslan na i go daun inap long hap saut bilong nu saut wels .

translation.en: some have also been found in the continent 's tropical northern territory .
translation.zu: na sampela bilong ol dispela binen i stap tu long hap bilong noten teritori .

translation.en: think of the benefits for those who extract honey from hives .
translation.zu: tingim olsem wanem dispela samting i helpim ol man i save kisim hani long ol haus binen .

translation.en: five minutes after opening the box , the bees are still working as though i 'm not there . "
translation.zu: maski mi opim haus bilong ol binen inap 5 - pela minit pinis , ol i save mekim yet wok bilong ol olsem mi no stap . '

translation.en: the hives of stingless bees are quite different from those of other honeybees .
translation.zu: haus bilong ol binen i no save kaikaim man i narapela kain long haus bilong ol narapela binen bilong wokim hani .

translation.en: in fact , they are often called nests .
translation.zu: ol i kolim dispela haus olsem haus bilong putim kiau .

translation.en: be careful , though , for although these bees do not sting , they can nip you with their mandibles , or jaws .
translation.zu: tasol yu mas was gut , long wanem , tru ol dispela binen i no save kaikaim man , tasol ol inap holim strong skin bilong yu long wasket bilong ol .

translation.en: passing along the corridor of the nest , we encounter a world of activity .
translation.zu: taim yumi wokabaut insait long dispela haus , yumi lukim bikpela wok i kamap long en .

translation.en: there is real teamwork among these bees .
translation.zu: ol dispela binen i wok gut wantaim .

translation.en: each one knows exactly what to do and where it needs to be done .
translation.zu: olgeta wan wan bilong ol i save long wok ol i mas mekim na long wanem hap ol i mas mekim dispela wok .

translation.en: four more bees are beside us , sealing a pot that has just been filled with honey .
translation.zu: klostu long yumi i gat 4 - pela binen i wok long pasim ai bilong wanpela kap em hani i pulap pinis long en .

translation.en: a huge three - dimensional trellis provides the framework into which the honey pots are built .
translation.zu: ol i save wokim ol dispela kap bilong putim hani antap long wanpela banis olsem bun bilong haus .

translation.en: this engineering masterpiece helps support the weight of the honey .
translation.zu: dispela banis i save karim hevi bilong hani .

translation.en: we now enter the next compartment and notice a bee that is much bigger than the others .
translation.zu: nau yumi go insait long narapela rum na yumi lukim wanpela binen i bikpela moa long ol narapela binen .

translation.en: this is the queen in all her splendor !
translation.zu: dispela em kwin bilong ol binen ! man !

translation.en: how beautiful she is , dressed in her bright black and gold rings and surrounded by a crowd of other busy bees !
translation.zu: em i naispela tru , na em i bilas long ol blakpela na yelopela ring na planti narapela binen i raunim em !

translation.en: now the queen begins laying eggs in the 60 cells that have been prepared for her .
translation.zu: nau kwin i kirap long putim ol kiau long ol 60 kap ol i redim pinis bilong em .

translation.en: how delicate and precise she is , reminding us of a mother putting her baby into a crib !
translation.zu: em i putim gut ol kiau long ol kap na dispela i kirapim yumi long tingim pasin bilong wanpela mama long putim bebi bilong em long bet slip !

translation.en: in just a few minutes , the job is done .
translation.zu: insait long sampela minit tasol dispela wok i pinis .

translation.en: when the eggs hatch
translation.zu: taim ol kiau i bruk

translation.en: when the eggs hatch , each resultant tiny grub ( or , larva ) consumes the food that was placed in the cell prepared for it .
translation.zu: taim ol kiau i bruk , ol liklik binatang olsem liklik snek i kamap na wan wan bilong ol i save kisim kaikai ol i bin redim pinis na putim insait long kap bilong en .

translation.en: later , it emerges from the cocoon and gets to work - that is , after it receives a little pampering from some nursing bees .
translation.zu: bihain em bai lusim haus bilong em na kirap wok - tasol pastaim sampela binen bai helpim em na givim kaikai long em .

translation.en: they are immediately collected , and the material is recycled .
translation.zu: kwiktaim ol i save bungim ol na mekim wok gen long ol .

translation.en: once the bees emerge from their cocoons , the cocoons are no longer needed .
translation.zu: taim ol binen i lusim pinis haus , ol i no gat wok moa long ol dispela haus .

translation.en: so numerous cleaner bees dispose of these leftovers .
translation.zu: olsem na planti binen bilong klinim haus i save rausim ol dispela pipia .

translation.en: this is produced from wax from the bees ' own bodies combined with resins and wax that they collect from plants and trees .
translation.zu: ol i wokim dispela samting long gris i stap long bodi bilong ol yet na gris ol i kisim long ol plaua na diwai .

translation.en: cerumen is used to build a framework of pillars and beams and crossties , with all joints reinforced .
translation.zu: ol i save mekim wok long serumen bilong wokim wanpela banis olsem bun bilong haus .

translation.en: as they form the honey and pollen pots in this framework , bees run around inside the pots , shaping and compressing the cerumen .
translation.zu: taim ol i wokim ol kap bilong putim hani na paura insait long dispela banis , ol binen i save flai raun insait long ol dispela kap bilong stretim na strongim serumen .

translation.en: instinctively , the bees seem to know the seasonal value of plants and the hazards of seasonal weather .
translation.zu: ol binen i save long gutpela taim bilong ol plaua na diwai samting na ol i save tu long taim nogut bilong win ren samting .

translation.en: they seem well aware that the collection and preservation of food is a primary requisite for survival .
translation.zu: i olsem ol i save pasin bilong kisim na bungim kaikai em i bikpela samting bilong helpim ol long i stap laip .

translation.en: the bees leave the nest and forage for their building material as well as for nectar and pollen .
translation.zu: ol binen i save lusim haus bilong ol na ol i save go painim ol samting bilong wokim haus na hani na paura bilong ol plaua .

translation.en: once outside the nest , the bee becomes a qualified pilot and navigator .
translation.zu: taim binen i lusim pinis haus , em i kamap olsem wanpela pailot i save gut long raun .

translation.en: starting a new home
translation.zu: wokim nupela haus

translation.en: as the colony grows , the nest becomes filled to capacity .
translation.zu: taim ol binen i wok long kamap planti , haus bilong ol i pulap olgeta .

translation.en: " we 'll have to build another house " seems to be the message sent out to the family .
translation.zu: i olsem ol i salim toksave long famili olgeta olsem " yumi mas wokim narapela haus . "

translation.en: occasionally , a single scout will investigate a cavity that may be a suitable nest location .
translation.zu: sampela taim wanpela binen tasol bai go na skelim wanpela gutpela hap em ol inap wokim nupela haus long en .

translation.en: next comes the visit from the " engineers . "
translation.zu: bihain ol " ensinia " bai go na skelim dispela hap .

translation.en: usually from 30 to 50 of these experts will inspect the inside surface of the cavity for several hours , as though marking it out with lines and stakes .
translation.zu: planti taim inap olsem 30 o 50 bilong ol dispela ensinia bai lusim sampela aua long skelim gut insait bilong dispela hap ol bai wokim nupela haus long en , na i olsem ol i wok long putim ol mak na pos samting bilong makim dispela hap .

translation.en: then , having determined that the foundation is good , they return home , apparently to report .
translation.zu: taim ol i skelim pinis na save olsem em i gutpela hap bilong wokim haus , ol bai go bek na toksave long ol narapela .

translation.en: next , usually within 48 hours , the actual " builders " arrive .
translation.zu: orait nau , insait long 2 - pela de tasol , ol " kamda " bilong wokim haus bai kam .

translation.en: there may be more than a thousand bees in the crew - but no queen .
translation.zu: winim 1,000 binen inap i stap insait long dispela lain bilong wokim haus - tasol i no gat kwin .

translation.en: in preparation for the arrival of the queen of this new nest , the brood nest must be constructed to maintain the right temperature - about 80 degrees fahrenheit [ 28 ° c ] .
translation.zu: bilong redim ol samting na bai kwin bilong dispela nupela haus i ken kam , ol i mas wokim gut dispela haus bambai hat bilong en i stret - inap olsem 28 digri selsias .

translation.en: to achieve this , the worker bees surround the nest with a wall of cerumen , as if wrapping the nest in a blanket .
translation.zu: bilong mekim olsem , ol binen i save banisim haus long serumen na i olsem ol i karamapim blanket long haus .

translation.en: it is as though these wise bees know that the eggs must be kept warm .
translation.zu: i olsem ol dispela binen i save olsem ol kiau i mas i stap long ples i hat liklik .

translation.en: now everything is ready , and about the ninth day , the new queen , who has been developed in the mother nest , is brought in .
translation.zu: nau olgeta samting i redi pinis , na long namba 9 de samting , ol i bringim nupela kwin , em i bin kamap long olpela haus , i kam insait long nupela haus .

translation.en: immediately , she begins laying the eggs that will produce more bees for her palace .
translation.zu: kwiktaim kwin i kirap long putim ol kiau na ol bai kamapim planti binen moa long nupela haus bilong em .

translation.en: gradually , the bees that moved in from the mother nest will die off and be replaced by new , younger bees from this new home .
translation.zu: isi isi ol binen i bin stap pastaim long olpela haus na ol i kam long nupela haus ol bai dai na ol nupela binen i kamap long dispela nupela haus bai senisim ol .

translation.en: in time , the bees from this nest will find it necessary to build another house .
translation.zu: bihain ol binen bilong dispela nupela haus bai lukim olsem ol i mas wokim narapela haus gen .

translation.en: and so another amazing cycle designed by a matchless creator goes on !
translation.zu: long dispela rot , samting em man bilong wokim yumi i bin kamapim i wok long kamap yet !

translation.zu: wanpela yangpela nem bilong em maikel , em i tok : " papa i lusim mipela bilong stap wantaim narapela meri .

translation.en: " i saw him with her once , and it made me mad .
translation.zu: wanpela taim mi lukim papa i raun wantaim dispela meri , na dispela i mekim na mi belhat .

translation.en: i felt that dad had betrayed us . "
translation.zu: mi pilim olsem papa i givim baksait long mipela . "

translation.en: however , in some cases the departure may come as a relief .
translation.zu: tasol sampela taim i olsem famili i kisim malolo taim papa i lusim ol .

translation.en: melissa , whose dad is an alcoholic , says : " if he had stayed home , it would have been harder on us . "
translation.zu: papa bilong melisa i save dring planti tumas , na melisa i tok : " sapos em i no bin lusim mipela , mipela bai karim bikpela hevi moa . "

translation.en: in many cases , though , children have no idea why their father departed , and this can make his absence seem all the more painful .
translation.zu: tasol planti taim ol pikinini i no save liklik long as na papa i lusim ol , na dispela inap mekim na ol pikinini i bel hevi moa yet taim ol i no lukim em long haus .

translation.en: true , you might have known that your folks had problems , but you may never have dreamed that they would split up .
translation.zu: ating yu save pinis olsem papamama i no sindaun gut wantaim , tasol yu no bin tingting liklik olsem marit bilong ol bai bruk .

translation.en: recalls robert : " when dad left , i really didn 't understand everything that was going on .
translation.zu: robert i tok : " taim papa i lusim mipela , mi no bin save long olgeta hevi bilong papamama .

translation.en: all i knew was that things were bad because my parents were fighting all the time . "
translation.zu: mi save em ol samting nogut , long wanem , tupela i wok long tok pait long olgeta taim . "

translation.en: why do some fathers leave home ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem sampela papa i save lusim famili ?

translation.en: if your own dad has left , should you take it as a personal rejection ?
translation.zu: sapos papa i lusim yupela pinis , yu ting i stret long pilim olsem em i givim baksait long yu ?

translation.en: and why might your parents be reluctant to tell you much about it ?
translation.zu: na ating i gat wanem as na papamama i no gat laik long kamapim planti stori tumas long dispela samting ?

translation.en: oftentimes , the reason is adultery - misconduct that has usually been well hidden from the family .
translation.zu: planti taim pasin pamuk i as bilong en - em i pasin nogut ating papa i bin wok strong tru long haitim .

translation.en: when a wife discovers such wrongdoing , she may decide to divorce her husband .
translation.zu: taim meri i painimaut olsem man bilong em i bin mekim olsem , em inap katim marit sapos em i laik .

translation.en: she may even ask him to leave quietly before the divorce papers are filed .
translation.zu: ating em bai askim man bilong em long lusim famili taim ol pepa bilong katim marit i no redi yet .

translation.en: the children may be totally unaware of why this is happening .
translation.zu: na ating ol pikinini i no save liklik long as bilong ol dispela samting .

translation.en: try to understand , though , why your mom might be reluctant to reveal specifically what has taken place .
translation.zu: tasol i gutpela long tingim as na mama i no laik tokaut long olgeta samting i bin kamap .

translation.en: for one thing , she may feel that revealing any misconduct on your dad 's part would only stir up misery .
translation.zu: ating wanpela as i olsem em i ting pasin bilong tokaut long rong bilong papa bai kamapim bikpela bel hevi moa .

translation.en: realize , too , how hurtful it must be for a woman to discover that her husband has been unfaithful .
translation.zu: na tu , yu mas save , meri i save kisim bikpela bel hevi taim em i painimaut olsem man i no bin stap gut long em .

translation.en: what about your father ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem long papa ?

translation.en: understandably , if he has been unfaithful to your mother , he is not likely to talk to you about it .
translation.zu: sapos em i no bin stap gut long mama , ating em bai i no inap toktok wantaim yu long dispela samting .

translation.en: some men feel so guilty about their misconduct that they cannot bear even to face their children !
translation.zu: bel bilong sampela man i kotim ol nogut tru long rong ol i mekim na ol i pilim olsem ol i no inap lukim pikinini bilong ol !

translation.en: despite their shameful behavior , though , many fathers continue to love their children and may try to reestablish contact with them .
translation.zu: tasol maski ol i bihainim sampela pasin bilong sem long en , planti papa i laikim yet ol pikinini bilong ol na ating ol bai stretim rot bilong lukim ol gen .

translation.en: in some cases the father leaves because of misconduct on the wife 's part , and he makes every effort to maintain closeness with his children .
translation.zu: sampela taim papa i lusim famili , long wanem , meri i mekim sampela pasin i no stret .

translation.en: in other cases , though , a breakup is , not the result of adultery at all , but the climax of years of marital bickering .
translation.zu: taim samting olsem i kamap man i save wok strong long pas gut yet wantaim ol pikinini bilong em . i no olgeta taim pasin pamuk i as na marit i bruk , nogat .

translation.en: the bible says at proverbs 25 : 9 : " plead your own cause with your fellowman , and do not reveal the confidential talk of another . "
translation.zu: long sindaun 25 : 9 baibel i tok : " sapos yu gat tok long wantok bilong yu long wanpela samting , orait yu mas i go na stretim tok wantaim dispela wantok yet .

translation.en: believe it or not , you are probably better off not hearing about such things .
translation.zu: na maski yu gat narapela tingting , i gutpela sapos yu no harim stori bilong ol kain samting olsem .

translation.en: besides , revealing " confidential talk " often makes a bad situation worse .
translation.zu: na tu , planti taim pasin bilong kamapim sampela tok hait bilong narapela i save mekim hevi i go bikpela moa .

translation.en: so in the long run , you may be better off if your parents keep the details of their disputes to themselves .
translation.zu: olsem na ating em bai i helpim yu sapos papamama i no kamapim as bilong kros i stap namel long tupela yet .

translation.en: fight resentment by gaining insight
translation.zu: gutpela tingting i daunim bel nogut

translation.en: still , it 's hard not to feel angry and resentful when your father has left home and you can 't answer the question , why ?
translation.zu: tru , i hatwok long daunim belhat na pasin bilong bel nogut taim papa i lusim famili pinis na yu no inap bekim dispela askim , bilong wanem em i go ?

translation.en: however , at proverbs 19 : 11 , the bible observes : " the insight of a man certainly slows down [ not necessarily eliminates ] his anger . "
translation.zu: tasol sindaun 19 : 11 i tok : " man i gat gutpela tingting , em i no inap kros kwik [ dispela i no makim olsem em i no inap kros ] . "

translation.en: and you do not need to know all the details to have insight .
translation.zu: na i no olsem yu mas save long olgeta samting bilong papamama na bai yu inap bihainim gutpela tingting .

translation.en: for example , the bible helps us to see that our parents are imperfect .
translation.zu: tok i stap long baibel i helpim yumi long save olsem papamama bilong yumi i no gutpela olgeta .

translation.en: accepting this painful truth can help you to put your parents ' mistakes in perspective .
translation.zu: taim yu bilipim dispela tok , dispela i ken helpim yu long kisim stretpela tingting long ol popaia bilong papamama .

translation.en: if , for example , your father has dishonored his marriage vows , that is a serious shortcoming - one for which he is accountable before god .
translation.zu: olsem na sapos papa bilong yu i brukim tok promis bilong em long stap gut long marit , dispela em i wanpela bikpela rong - em wanpela rong god i gat tok long en .

translation.en: but it does not necessarily mean that he has rejected you or that he does not love you .
translation.zu: tasol dispela i no makim olsem em i givim baksait long yu o em i no laikim yu .

translation.en: all married couples suffer " tribulation in their flesh . "
translation.zu: olgeta " manmeri i marit bai i painim planti hevi long laip bilong ol . "

translation.en: and while there is no excuse for their doing so , some men and women give in to wrongdoing under the pressures of life in this troubled world .
translation.zu: tru , i no gat gutpela as long mekim olsem , tasol ol hevi bilong dispela graun i ken mekim na sampela man na meri i save pundaun long sampela pasin i no stret .

translation.en: robert recalls : " dad wanted the best for us .
translation.zu: robert i tok : " papa i laik bai mipela i gat olgeta gutpela samting .

translation.en: he moved the family to an area where he thought he could make a better living so that we could have a nice house and the family would be happy . "
translation.zu: em i kisim famili i go stap long narapela hap em i ting olsem em bai inap kisim gutpela wok mani moa na bai mipela inap kisim gutpela haus na stap amamas . "

translation.en: but his father 's well - meaning attempts to carve out a better life for his family soon went awry .
translation.zu: tasol i no longtaim na dispela gutpela laik bilong papa long helpim sindaun bilong famili long kamap gutpela moa i paul .

translation.en: after a while he became abusive toward my mother and my sister . "
translation.zu: na bihain liklik em i kirap na givim hevi long mama na susa bilong mi . "

translation.en: soon things deteriorated to the point that his father and mother were divorced .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na ol samting i go nogut moa na papamama bilong em i katim marit .

translation.en: robert could have become consumed with bitterness because of his father 's failures .
translation.zu: bel bilong robert inap bagarap stret long ol popaia bilong papa .

translation.en: although the breakup of his parents ' marriage was tragic , it has taught robert something important .
translation.zu: tru , i no gutpela liklik long papamama i katim marit , tasol dispela i skulim robert long wanpela bikpela samting .

translation.en: robert says : " when i start a family , spiritual things must come first . "
translation.zu: robert i tok : " taim mi kamapim wanpela famili , ol samting bilong spirit i mas i stap nambawan samting long mipela . "

translation.en: but he maintained a relationship with his father .
translation.zu: tasol maikel i wok long pas yet long papa bilong em .

translation.en: as time passed , michael was even able to let go of his anger and move on with his life .
translation.zu: na isi isi em i lusim pasin bilong bel nogut long papa , na em i tingim ol samting bilong em yet long mekim .

translation.en: you too may want to try to maintain as normal a relationship with your father as the situation permits .
translation.zu: sapos rot i op , em bai i gutpela long traim bihainim yet pasin bilong i stap gut long papa bilong yu .

translation.en: true , he may have hurt you and your mom .
translation.zu: tru , ating em i givim hevi long yu na mama bilong yu .

translation.en: but likely you do not have all the facts .
translation.zu: tasol nogut yu no save long olgeta samting i bin kamap .

translation.en: and even if you know he is guilty of wrongdoing , he is still your father .
translation.zu: na maski yu save em i gat asua long sampela rong , em i stap yet olsem papa bilong yu .

translation.en: you have an obligation to show him at least a measure of respect .
translation.zu: yu gat wok long stap daun long em .

translation.en: avoid " anger and wrath and screaming and abusive speech " when dealing with him .
translation.zu: abrusim pasin bilong " bel nogut na kros na belhat na bikmaus na tok bilas " taim yu bung wantaim em .

translation.en: if possible , stay neutral regarding your parents ' private marital disputes .
translation.zu: sapos yu inap , no ken insait long kros bilong papamama long samting bilong tupela marit tasol .

translation.en: by reassuring both of your parents that you love them , you may be able to enjoy good relations with both of them .
translation.zu: sapos yu wok long mekim gut bel bilong papamama olsem yu laikim ol tru , dispela inap helpim yu long pas gut long tupela wantaim .

translation.en: it 's not your fault
translation.zu: i no asua bilong yu

translation.en: having your father leave home is probably one of the most painful things you will ever experience .
translation.zu: long i stap bilong yu ating bai i no gat narapela bikpela hevi i winim dispela hevi yu karim taim papa i lusim famili .

translation.en: but even if you never find out all the reasons why he left , there is no need to feel that it was your fault .
translation.zu: tasol maski yu no painimaut olgeta samting i olsem as na papa i lusim yupela , yu no ken ting yu yet yu gat asua long dispela samting .

translation.en: true , it may feel like a personal rejection .
translation.zu: yu inap ting olsem papa i no laikim yu na em i lusim yupela .

translation.en: but marriages rarely break up because of the children .
translation.zu: tasol ol marit i no save bruk long ol samting ol pikinini i mekim .

translation.en: your parents took a vow before god to stay together .
translation.zu: papamama bilong yu i bin tok promis long ai bilong god olsem tupela bai stap wantaim .

translation.en: it is their responsibility - not yours - to live up to it . - ecclesiastes 5 : 4 - 6 .
translation.zu: na em wok bilong tupela long truim tok promis bilong ol - i no wok bilong yu . - saveman 5 : 4 - 6 .

translation.en: james , quoted at the outset , admits : " i used to think that i was to blame , until my mother and my father sat me down and talked with me . "
translation.zu: jems , em yumi kisim sampela tok bilong em long kirap bilong dispela stori , em i tok : " bipo mi bin ting olsem mi yet mi gat asua , tasol dispela tingting i pinis taim papamama i bin toktok gut wantaim mi . "

translation.en: young nancy likewise felt guilty when her father and mother broke up .
translation.zu: na tu , bel i kotim yangpela meri nansi taim marit bilong papamama bilong em i bruk .

translation.en: after several conversations with her mom , nancy was able to conclude : " kids should not blame themselves for what their parents do . "
translation.zu: orait taim em i toktok wantaim mama bilong em planti taim , nansi i kisim tingting olsem : " ol pikinini i no ken ting ol yet i gat asua long ol samting papamama i mekim . "

translation.en: yes , letting your parents ' carry their own load ' of responsibility can prevent you from feeling overloaded emotionally .
translation.zu: tru tumas , taim yu larim papamama i mekim ol samting em i wok bilong tupela long mekim , dispela inap helpim yu na bai yu no kisim bikpela bel hevi tumas .

translation.en: but how can you cope now that you live in a fatherless home ?
translation.zu: tasol yu ken mekim wanem bilong karim hevi bilong famili i no gat papa ?

translation.en: a future article in this series will provide some answers .
translation.zu: wanpela stori bihain bai kamapim sampela bekim bilong dispela askim .

translation.en: from its very inception , the united nations organization has been interested in children and their problems .
translation.zu: kirap long taim yunaitet nesen i kamap nupela , em i tingim ol pikinini na ol hevi bilong ol .

translation.en: although it is now officially known as the united nations children 's fund , it retained its original acronym , unicef .
translation.zu: nau ol i kolim olsem united nations children 's fund , tasol ol leta olsem unicef i makim yet dispela lain .

translation.en: thus , for over half a century , unicef has been providing children throughout the world with food , clothing , and medical care and has been trying to look after children 's needs in general .
translation.zu: olsem na inap 50 yia samting unicef i wok long lukautim ol pikinini long olgeta hap long kaikai , klos , na marasin , na taim rot i op ol i lukautim ol pikinini long ol narapela samting ol i mas kisim .

translation.en: ( see box , page 5 . )

translation.en: it was hoped that this document would generate interest in the problems of children and would help solve them by encouraging public support , financial and otherwise .
translation.zu: ol i laik bai dispela tokaut i kirapim ol man long tingting long ol hevi bilong ol pikinini na wok long stretim long rot bilong mani , na pasin bilong wok bung wantaim , na ol narapela samting .

translation.en: but " twenty years later , " according to collier 's 1980 year book , " these ' rights ' - especially those relating to nutrition , health , and material well - being - were still largely unrealized by many of the world 's 1.5 billion children . "
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanpela buk ( 1980 year book bilong collier ) i tok , " twenti yia bihain , planti bilong ol 1.5 bilion pikinini i stap long olgeta hap , ol i no kisim yet ol samting dispela ' lo ' i makim bilong ol , olsem gutpela kaikai , strongpela skin , na ol narapela samting bilong helpim ol long i stap gut . "

translation.en: so in recognition of the continuing need to solve the problems of children and in accord with its declared goals , the united nations designated 1979 the international year of the child .
translation.zu: yunaitet nesen i luksave olsem i gat wok yet long stretim hevi bilong ol pikinini , na tingim ol mak ol i putim pinis , olsem na ol i makim 1979 olsem intenesenel yia bilong pikinini .

translation.en: government , civic , religious , and charitable groups all over the world were quick to respond to the search for solutions .
translation.zu: long olgeta hap ol gavman , na sampela lain i wok bung wantaim bilong helpim ol narapela , na sampela lain bilong lotu , ol i kirap wantu long painim rot bilong stretim dispela hevi .
