translation.en: sad to say , according to a unicef report , children in developing nations did not fare well during the international year of the child .
translation.zu: tasol sori tru , bihain ripot bilong unicef i tok olsem , insait long dispela intenesenel yia bilong pikinini , ol pikinini bilong ol kantri i stap rabis liklik , ol i no gat gutpela sindaun .

translation.en: at year 's end , some 200 million of them were still malnourished , and half the deaths of the 15 million who died under the age of five could be attributed to malnutrition .
translation.zu: taim dispela yia i laik pinis , 200 milion bilong ol dispela pikinini i sot yet long kaikai . i gat 15 milion pikinini i no winim yet 5 - pela krismas na ol i dai , na planti bilong ol em ol i dai , long wanem , ol i no gat gutpela kaikai .

translation.en: of the 100 children born each minute that year in those countries , 15 would be dead before the end of their first year .
translation.zu: long dispela yia bilong pikinini , ol mama bilong ol kantri i stap rabis i karim 100 pikinini long olgeta wan wan minit , na 15 bilong ol i bin dai taim ol i no winim yet wanpela krismas .

translation.en: commenting on the unicef report , an editorial in the indian express newspaper complained that the year of the child turned out to be a " cruel joke . "
translation.zu: stori bilong wanpela nius ( indian express ) long dispela ripot bilong unicef i tok olsem dispela yia bilong pikinini i olsem wanpela " tok nating " tasol .

translation.en: for example , at the very beginning of the year , fabrizio dentice wrote in the magazine l 'espresso : " something more than the year of the child is needed to remedy the situation . "
translation.zu: long kirap bilong dispela yia , fabrizio dentice i raitim wanpela stori long nius l 'espresso olsem : " i mas i gat samting i winim dispela yia bilong pikinini bilong stretim hevi bilong ol . "

translation.en: the magazine commented : " today 's life - style makes us what we are , and this is what needs changing . "
translation.zu: nius i tok : " ol samting yumi mekim long i stap bilong yumi dispela i save bosim pasin bilong yumi , na yumi gat wok long senisim . "

translation.en: in the ongoing search for solutions to the problems of children , a world summit was held at un headquarters in september 1990 .
translation.zu: bilong wok yet long painim rot bilong stretim hevi bilong ol pikinini , ol hetman bilong olgeta hap i wokim wanpela bung long hetkota bilong yunaitet nesen long septemba 1990 .

translation.en: it was one of the largest meetings of world leaders in history .
translation.zu: i no gat wanpela taim bipo em bikpela lain hetman i bung olsem .

translation.en: over 70 government leaders were present .
translation.zu: namba bilong ol hetman long dispela bung i winim 70 .

translation.en: the gathering was a follow - up to the convention on the rights of the child , which was adopted on november 20 , 1989 , and went into force on september 2 , 1990 .
translation.zu: dispela bung i bilong mekim sampela wok moa antap long dispela kontrak bilong ol lo bilong pikinini , em planti kantri i orait long en long novemba 20 , 1989 , na ol i kirap long bihainim long septemba 2 , 1990 .

translation.en: by the end of that month , the agreement had already been ratified by 39 nations .
translation.zu: taim mun septemba i laik pinis , 39 kantri i wanbel long bihainim ol dispela lo .

translation.en: indeed , as of november 1999 , the convention had been adopted by 191 nations .
translation.zu: tru tumas , i kam inap long novemba 1999 , i gat 191 kantri i orait long dispela kontrak .

translation.en: unicef boasted : " more progress was made in realizing and protecting children 's rights in the decade following adoption of the convention on the rights of the child than in any other comparable period in human history . "
translation.zu: unicef i tok : " winim olgeta taim bipo wok bilong tingim na lukautim ol pikinini long ol samting ol i mas i gat i kamap gutpela moa insait long dispela 10 - pela yia bihain long dispela kontrak bilong ol lo bilong pikinini . "

translation.en: despite this progress , german president johannes rau was moved to comment : " it is sad that in our time we still have to be reminded that children have rights . "
translation.zu: maski samting i kamap gutpela moa , presiden bilong jemani , johannes rau , i tok : " sori tru , long taim bilong yumi i gat wok yet long kirapim ol man long tingim wanem pasin i stret long mekim long ol pikinini . "

translation.en: or to be reminded that they still have serious problems !
translation.zu: o long taim bilong yumi ol pikinini i gat ol bikpela hevi i stap yet !

translation.en: some 130 million children in developing countries are not in primary school . . .
translation.zu: long ol kantri i stap rabis , i gat samting olsem 130 milion pikinini i no save skul . . . .

translation.en: an estimated 250 million children are engaged in some form of labour . "
translation.zu: samting olsem 250 milion pikinini i mekim sampela kain wok leba . "

translation.en: mention was also made of the 600 million children living in absolute poverty and the 13 million who will have lost at least one parent to aids by the end of 2000 .
translation.zu: na tu , unicef i bin tok olsem i gat 600 milion pikinini i stap rabis olgeta , na i gat 13 milion pikinini em aids bai kilim i dai papa o mama bilong ol paslain long 2001 .

translation.en: the un declaration of the rights of the child :
translation.zu: tokaut bilong yunaitet nesen long ol lo bilong pikinini :

translation.en: ● the right to a name and nationality .
translation.zu: ● pikinini i mas i gat nem na ples .

translation.en: ● the right to affection , love , and understanding and to material security .
translation.zu: ● papamama i mas mekim gut long em na sori long em na lukautim em long ol samting bilong skin .

translation.en: ● the right to special care if disabled , be it physically , mentally , or socially .
translation.zu: ● sapos skin bilong em i nogut o em i gat sik longlong , i mas i gat man bilong lukautim em .

translation.en: ● the right to be among the first to receive protection and relief in all circumstances .
translation.zu: ● long taim bilong hevi , mas helpim em pastaim .

translation.en: ● the right to be protected against all forms of neglect , cruelty , and exploitation .
translation.zu: ● yumi mas helpim pikinini sapos ol i no lukautim em , o ol i mekim nogut long em .

translation.en: ● the right to full opportunity for play and recreation and equal opportunity to free and compulsory education , to enable the child to develop his individual abilities and to become a useful member of society .
translation.zu: ● pikinini i mas pilai , na amamas , na go long skul , na em i mas i gat rot bilong kisim save , na bihain em inap mekim gutpela wok na em i no stap nating tasol .

translation.en: ● the right to be brought up in a spirit of understanding , tolerance , friendship among peoples , peace , and universal brotherhood .
translation.zu: ● em i mas i go bikpela namel long ol lain i save tingim em , na isi long em , na prenim em , na i stap isi wantaim , olsem brata brata .

translation.en: " give a little love to a child , and you get a great deal back . "
translation.zu: " mekim pasin sori long wanpela pikinini , na em bai i laikim yu moa yet . "

translation.en: probably most parents will agree that it pays to love one 's children , not only because of the love received in return but , more important , because of the positive effect this love will have on them .
translation.zu: ol i save dispela bai kirapim ol pikinini long laikim ol , tasol i no long dispela as tasol na ol i laikim tru pikinini bilong ol , nogat ; nambawan as na ol i laikim ol pikinini , em bilong helpim ol long kamap gut .

translation.en: the book love and its place in nature observed , for example , that without love " children tend to die . "
translation.zu: wanpela buk ( love and its place in nature ) i tok , i olsem " pikinini i laik dai , " sapos i no gat man i laikim ol .

translation.en: and ashley montagu , noted british - born anthropologist , went so far as to say : " the child who has not been loved is biochemically , physiologically , and psychologically very different from the one who has been loved .
translation.zu: saveman ashley montagu bilong briten i tok : " sapos i no gat man i laikim pikinini , skin na tingting bilong em i narapela kain olgeta long wanpela pikinini i gat man i laikim em tru .

translation.en: the toronto star reported on a study that reached similar conclusions .
translation.zu: nius toronto star i stori long wanpela ripot i kamapim wankain tingting .

translation.en: it said : " children raised without being regularly hugged , caressed or stroked . . . have abnormally high levels of stress hormones . "
translation.zu: nius i tok : " ol pikinini i no gat wanpela i save mekim gut long ol na holim ol . . . skin bilong ol dispela pikinini i save kamapim wanpela kain marasin i nogutim ol . "

translation.en: these findings emphasize the need for the physical presence of parents .
translation.zu: ol dispela samting i makim olsem papamama i mas stap wantaim pikinini bilong ol .

translation.en: otherwise , how can strong ties develop between parent and child ?
translation.zu: sapos nogat , olsem wanem pasin bilong pas gut wantaim inap kamap namel long papamama na pikinini ?

translation.en: but sorry to say , even in affluent parts of the world , the tendency now is to try to supply a child 's needs apart from his or her parents .
translation.zu: tasol sori tru , long nau long ol kantri i gat planti samting , planti papamama i tingim pikinini long samting bilong skin , tasol ol yet i no save stap tumas wantaim ol pikinini .

translation.en: thrust out of the family nucleus , circling in orbit at a distance , as it were , millions of children naturally come to feel - if only subconsciously - neglected , unwanted , and unloved , surrounded by a hostile world of grown - ups .
translation.zu: i olsem ol i stap ausait long famili na longwe long papamama , na dispela i mekim na planti milion pikinini i pilim olsem papamama i givim baksait long ol o papamama i no laik lukautim ol , na tupela i no save sori long ol - i olsem ol pikinini i stap namel long ol bikpela manmeri i no save mekim gutpela pasin long ol .

translation.en: such a prevailing feeling among children may be one reason why there are an estimated 3,000 street children in berlin .
translation.zu: ating dispela tingting i wanpela as na i gat 3,000 pikinini i slip nating long rot long belin .

translation.en: typical is young micha , who said : " no one wanted me anymore . "
translation.zu: planti i gat wankain tingting olsem micha , em i tok : " i no gat wanpela i laik lukautim mi moa . "

translation.en: a nine - year - old german boy similarly complained : " i would rather be our dog . "
translation.zu: na wanpela manki bilong jemani i gat 9 - pela krismas i tok : " i gutpela moa sapos mi stap olsem dok bilong famili . "

translation.en: mistreatment of children takes many forms
translation.zu: i gat kain kain pasin i nogutim pikinini

translation.en: child neglect is a form of mistreatment that betrays a lack of what the bible calls " natural affection . "
translation.zu: taim papamama i no lukautim gut pikinini , dispela i makim olsem ol i no gat pasin bilong " stap pren bilong [ olsem laikim tru ] ol arapela . "

translation.en: and it can lead to more sinister forms of mistreatment .
translation.zu: na dispela inap kirapim ol long mekim sampela pasin i nogut moa long ol pikinini .

translation.en: for example , since the international year of the child in 1979 , more attention has been directed to the problems of physical mistreatment and sexual abuse of children .
translation.zu: kirap long taim bilong dispela yia bilong pikinini long 1979 , ol i wok strong moa long kirapim ol man long tingim moa yet hevi bilong ol pikinini em ol man i bagarapim skin bilong ol o mekim pasin sem long ol .

translation.en: of course , accurate statistics are difficult to come by , and they vary from place to place .
translation.zu: tru , i hatwok long save hamas ol pikinini i karim hevi long ol dispela samting , na namba bilong ol i no wankain long olgeta hap .

translation.en: regardless of the form mistreatment takes , it sends children the message that they are unloved and unwanted .
translation.zu: olgeta kain pasin i nogutim pikinini i save givim tingting long ol olsem i no gat man i laikim ol na i no gat man i laik lukautim ol .

translation.en: and this problem seems to be growing .
translation.zu: na dispela hevi i wok long go bikpela .

translation.en: according to [ gerd romeike , the director of a hamburg child - guidance center ] , the emotional bonding between children and parents is becoming weaker , or it is never established in the first place .
translation.zu: dairekta bilong wanpela dipatmen bilong helpim ol pikinini bilong hambek , em gerd romeike , em i tok olsem pasin sori i stap namel long ol papamama wantaim ol pikinini i wok long lus , o long sampela famili i no gat wanpela taim dispela pasin i bin kamap .

translation.en: fully a decade ago , a canadian task - force report signaled the need for immediate action lest a whole generation " who think society doesn 't care about them " be lost .
translation.zu: winim 10 - pela yia i go pinis , wanpela lain bilong skelim dispela samting long kanada i toksave olsem sapos ol pikinini i no kisim hariap sampela helpim , bikpela lain bilong ol bai go bikpela na " ol bai holim tingting olsem ol manmeri i no save tingim ol . "

translation.en: in fact , over 20 years ago , police estimated that 20,000 runaways under 16 were living in one u.s . metropolitan area alone .
translation.zu: winim 20 yia i go pinis na ol polis i tok wanpela biktaun bilong amerika i gat samting olsem 20,000 ranawe pikinini i stap long en , em ol i no winim yet 16 krismas .

translation.en: they take to the streets , use their bodies for survival and then , beaten by pimps and bereft of self - esteem , live in fear of reprisal if they attempt to escape the racket . "
translation.zu: man i bosim wok bilong ol long pamuk , em i save paitim ol , na ol i stap sem pipia , na ol i pret tru , nogut bosman bai mekim nogut moa yet long ol sapos ol i traim ranawe .

translation.en: sad to say , despite honest efforts to change this deplorable situation , it still exists .
translation.zu: sori tru , maski i gat ol lain i wok strong long pinisim dispela hevi , dispela pasin i stap yet .

translation.en: of course , millions of parents are doing their best to make sure that their children know that they are wanted and loved .
translation.zu: tru , i gat planti milion papamama ol i wok strong long helpim pikinini bilong ol long save olsem ol i laikim ol tru , na ol i laik lukautim ol .

translation.en: still , problems remain - problems clearly beyond the ability of individual parents to solve .
translation.zu: tasol ol hevi i stap yet - em ol hevi i bikpela tumas long ol papamama wan wan long stretim .

translation.en: for example , in some parts of the world , imperfect human economic and political systems fail to provide children with adequate health care , suitable education , and sufficient food , as well as protection from the scourge of child labor and deplorable living conditions .
translation.zu: olsem : long sampela hap , wok politik na wok bilong lukautim mani bilong kantri , dispela wok i pundaun long helpim ol pikinini long kisim ol marasin samting , gutpela skul , na gutpela kaikai .

translation.en: kofi annan , secretary - general of the united nations , mentioned some of the major problems children face today when he wrote : " millions of children continue to endure the dreadful indignities of poverty ; hundreds of thousands suffer the effects of conflict and economic chaos ; tens of thousands are maimed in wars ; many more are orphaned or killed by hiv / aids . "
translation.zu: seketeri - jeneral bilong yunaitet nesen , em kofi annan , em i tokaut long ol bikpela hevi ol pikinini i karim long nau , olsem : " planti milion pikinini i karim hevi yet long pasin bilong stap rabis tru ; planti handet tausen i stap long ol hap bilong pait , na long ol hap i gat bikpela hevi long mani ; planti tausen i kisim sampela bagarap long skin long taim bilong pait ; na i gat planti moa em binatang jem [ hiv ] i kamapim sik aids i mekim na ol i no gat papamama o ol yet i dai long dispela sik . "

translation.en: but not all the news is bad !
translation.zu: tasol i gat sampela gutpela samting tu i kamap !

translation.en: un agencies , such as the united nations children 's fund ( unicef ) and the world health organization , have worked hard to improve the lot of children .
translation.zu: sampela dipatmen bilong yunaitet nesen olsem unicef ( united nations children 's fund ) na wol helt oganaisesen , ol i mekim bikpela wok bilong helpim sindaun bilong ol pikinini i kamap gutpela moa .

translation.en: still , he warned : " this is no time to stand on past achievements . "
translation.zu: tasol em i tokaut olsem : " maski sampela gutpela samting i kamap pinis , yumi no ken slek long mekim sampela wok moa . "

translation.en: in the early 1960 ' s , the world was shocked to hear reports from over a dozen countries about the birth of thousands of so - called thalidomide children .
translation.zu: long 1961 samting ol man i kirap nogut tru taim i gat toksave i kam long 12 - pela kantri olsem i gat planti tausen pikinini em wanpela marasin ( thalidomide ) i bagarapim ol .

translation.en: when taken by pregnant women , the sedative and sleeping pill thalidomide had an unanticipated side effect that resulted in their giving birth to children with withered or nonexistent limbs .
translation.zu: sampela mama i gat bel ol i bin dringim dispela marasin bilong slip , tasol ol dokta i no bin save olsem dispela marasin bai mekim na ol mama bai karim pikinini em han lek i bagarap o i no stap .

translation.en: arms and legs were often little more than flippers .
translation.zu: han lek bilong planti pikinini i liklik tru .

translation.en: * some estimate that from 60 million to 110 million active mines lie scattered throughout the world .
translation.zu: * sampela i tok i gat samting olsem 60 milion i go inap long 110 milion ol bom i stap nabaut nabaut long olgeta hap .

translation.en: since 1997 , when jody williams won the nobel peace prize for her campaign to ban land mines , much attention has been given to this problem .
translation.zu: long 1997 , jody williams i kisim prais nobel long wok em i mekim bilong kirapim ol gavman long tambuim ol dispela bom , na kirap long dispela taim planti man moa i save tingim dispela hevi .

translation.en: another group of children needing special attention are those who have been deprived of their parents .
translation.zu: narapela lain pikinini yumi gat wok long tingim ol moa yet , em ol pikinini i no gat moa papa o mama .

translation.en: jehovah god , man 's creator , purposed that children grow up with the loving attention of both a mother and a father .
translation.zu: laik bilong god jehova , em man bilong wokim yumi , i olsem ol pikinini bai go bikpela insait long famili i gat papa na mama i bihainim pasin sori na tingim ol .

translation.en: a child needs and deserves such balanced parenting .
translation.zu: i stret olgeta pikinini i gat papamama i mekim kain pasin olsem .

translation.en: sad to say , however , some of the underprivileged children most desperately in need of adoption are the very ones most often ignored - those who are sick , have learning disorders , are physically disabled , or are of foreign parentage .
translation.zu: tasol sori tru , sampela pikinini em ol i stap tarangu tru na i gutpela sapos i gat ol man i kisim ol na lukautim ol , tasol planti man i save givim baksait long ol , em ol pikinini i gat sik , o i stap longlong , o i gat sampela bagarap long skin , o papamama bilong ol i bilong ol narapela kantri .

translation.en: organizations have been founded that encourage individuals to contribute money on a regular basis and thus " adopt " a child living in a less affluent country .
translation.zu: i gat sampela oganaisesen ol i kamapim bilong kirapim ol man long salim mani long olgeta mun samting bilong lukautim wanpela pikinini i stap long kantri i stap rabis .

translation.en: donated money is used to educate the child or to provide life 's necessities .
translation.zu: mani man i givim i bilong skulim dispela pikinini o lukautim pikinini long ol samting em i mas i gat .

translation.en: though helpful , this arrangement falls short of being the ideal solution .
translation.zu: dispela samting i helpim ol pikinini , tasol i no nambawan gutpela rot bilong stretim tru hevi bilong ol .

translation.en: another interesting example of what has been done to help children deprived of parents is a movement that in 1999 celebrated a half century of activity .
translation.zu: i gat narapela samting tu ol i bin kamapim bilong helpim ol pikinini wanpis , na i kam inap long 1999 dispela samting i bin stap 50 yia pinis .

translation.en: the sos children 's village
translation.zu: sos ples bilong ol pikinini

translation.en: in 1949 , hermann gmeiner founded in imst , austria , what he called the sos children 's village .
translation.zu: long 1949 , long taun imst bilong ostria , hermann gmeiner i kamapim sos ples bilong ol pikinini .

translation.en: from this small beginning , his organization has grown to include nearly 1,500 villages and similar institutions located in 131 african , american , asian , and european countries .
translation.zu: wok em i kirapim long wanpela taun tasol i go bikpela na nau i gat samting olsem 1,500 ples bilong lukautim ol pikinini wanpis , na ol narapela oganaisesen i mekim wankain wok i stap long 131 kantri long afrika , amerika , esia , na yurop .

translation.en: a " mother " forms the basis for a " family " of five or six - possibly more - children .
translation.zu: wanpela meri olsem " mama " em bai stap olsem as bilong wanpela " famili " i gat 5 - pela , 6 - pela o sampela pikinini moa long en .

translation.en: she lives with them and tries to show them the love and attention expected of a real mother .
translation.zu: na meri bai stap wantaim ol dispela pikinini na tingim ol na mekim pasin sori long ol olsem mama tru tru bai mekim .

translation.en: the children remain together in the same " family " and with the same " mother " until the time arrives for them to leave " home . "
translation.zu: ol dispela pikinini bai stap insait long dispela " famili " wantaim dispela " mama " inap long ol i bikpela pinis na lusim " haus . "

translation.en: children of different ages are included in the " family . "
translation.zu: ol pikinini i stap insait long " famili " ol i gat narapela narapela krismas .

translation.en: having both older and younger " brothers " and " sisters , " the children learn to care for one another , thus helping them to avoid becoming self - centered .
translation.zu: olsem na ol pikinini i stap wantaim sampela " brata susa " i bikpela o liklik long ol na ol i lainim pasin bilong lukautim narapela . dispela i helpim ol long abrusim pasin bilong tingim ol yet tasol .

translation.en: efforts are made to integrate the children into a " family " at as early an age as possible .
translation.zu: ol i laik makim pikinini bilong stap insait long wanpela " famili " taim krismas bilong em i no bikpela tumas .

translation.en: villages are composed of about 15 " families , " each living in its own house .
translation.zu: ol ples i gat 15 " famili " i stap long en na ol wan wan famili i gat haus bilong ol yet .

translation.en: all the children are trained to assist their " mother " in doing the necessary chores around the home .
translation.zu: ol i skulim ol pikinini long helpim " mama " bilong ol long ol wok bilong haus .

translation.en: although a father may be missing , provision is made for male support to give fatherly advice and to administer necessary discipline .
translation.zu: tru , dispela famili i no gat wanpela papa , tasol ol i stretim rot na bai i gat wanpela man bilong givim gutpela tok bilong stiaim tingting bilong ol pikinini na bilong stretim ol .

translation.en: each " family " receives a set monthly allowance to cover expenses .
translation.zu: na olgeta mun ol " famili " i save kisim hap mani i stret bilong lukautim ol .

translation.en: the aim is to introduce the children to typical family life with all its problems and joys , enabling them to lead , as far as possible , a normal life .
translation.zu: ol i laik helpim ol pikinini long kisim ol amamas na lain long karim ol hevi olsem ol famili tru tru i save mekim . dispela bai helpim ol long stap wankain liklik olsem planti pikinini i gat papamama .

translation.en: this prepares them for founding families of their own once they reach adulthood .
translation.zu: na dispela i redim ol bilong kamapim famili bilong ol yet taim ol i bikpela pinis .

translation.en: still in search of the ideal solution
translation.zu: bilong painim nambawan rot bilong stretim hevi

translation.en: adoption agencies , orphanages , sos children 's villages , unicef , and similar organizations or groups serve a good purpose when they try to provide support to underprivileged children .
translation.zu: ol ofis bilong stretim rot bilong adoptim pikinini , ol haus em gavman i makim bilong lukautim ol pikinini wanpis , ol sos ples bilong ol pikinini , na unicef wantaim ol narapela oganaisesen , ol i wok strong long helpim ol pikinini i no gat gutpela sindaun .

translation.en: but none of them can do away with the fact that some people are underprivileged .
translation.zu: tasol maski ol i mekim ol bikpela wok , i gat sampela lain i stap yet em ol i no gat gutpela sindaun .

translation.en: as much as they might like to , they cannot furnish the crippled child with healthy limbs , activate the mind of the mentally disabled child , reunite a child with his separated or divorced parents , or place him back in the loving embrace of a deceased parent .
translation.zu: na maski ol i gat bikpela laik long mekim , ol i no inap givim gutpela lek long pikinini em lek bilong em i bagarap , o pinisim sik longlong bilong pikinini , o pasim pikinini gen wantaim papamama , o stretim rot na bai pikinini i ken holimpas papa o mama i dai pinis .

translation.en: try as they may , humans cannot provide the ideal solution to the problems of children .
translation.zu: olsem na ol man yet i no inap kamapim ol samting bilong stretim tru hevi bilong ol pikinini .

translation.en: but they will be solved !
translation.zu: tasol ol dispela hevi bai pinis !

translation.en: yes , and possibly sooner than you may expect .
translation.zu: tru tumas , ating i no longtaim na ol bai pinis .

translation.en: [ footnote ]
translation.zu: [ futnot ]

translation.en: see the series " land mines - what can be done ? "
translation.zu: lukim ol stori " land mines - what can be done ? "

translation.en: appearing in our may 8 , 2000 , issue .
translation.zu: ( tok inglis ) bilong me 8 , 2000 .

translation.zu: [ ol piksa long pes 8 , 9 ]

translation.en: a child needs and deserves the love of both parents
translation.zu: ol pikinini i mas i gat papamama bilong laikim ol tru

translation.en: the solution at last !
translation.zu: samting bilong stretim i kamap pinis !

translation.en: imagine a world in which every child is truly wanted , is truly loved , and is blessed with caring , loving parents who have a sincere desire to provide the best possible guidance and direction for their child .
translation.zu: tingim wanpela taim na olgeta pikinini bai i gat lain i amamas long lukautim ol , na laikim ol tru , na olgeta bai i gat papamama i bihainim pasin sori na mekim ol samting bilong stiaim na lukautim gut pikinini bilong ol .

translation.en: imagine a world where every child is both physically and mentally sound , where street children are nowhere to be found , and where children are no longer robbed of childhood by the economic need to work !
translation.zu: tingim wanpela taim na olgeta pikinini bai stap strong long skin na long tingting , na long dispela taim bai yu no inap painim ol pikinini i save slip long rot , o ol pikinini em ol hevi i mekim na ol i mas wok skin tasol ; ol dispela kain hevi bai i no inap stap moa !

translation.en: jehovah 's witnesses think so , and this for two reasons .
translation.zu: ol witnes bilong jehova i bilip olsem , na i gat tupela as bilong dispela samting .

translation.en: parents can provide part of the solution
translation.zu: ol papamama inap stretim sampela hevi

translation.en: you will no doubt agree that grown - ups do have the power to solve - at times even to prevent - some of the problems of children .
translation.zu: ating yu bai wanbel long dispela tok olsem ol manmeri i bikpela pinis ol inap stretim sampela hevi i painim ol pikinini , o sampela taim ol inap pasim rot bilong ol dispela hevi .

translation.en: yes , parents themselves hold one of the keys to the problem .
translation.zu: tru tumas , rot i op long ol papamama yet long helpim wok bilong stretim ol dispela hevi .

translation.en: for example , grown - ups who are able to follow the bible counsel that " a wife should not depart from her husband . . . and a husband should not leave his wife " do not have children who suffer because of living in a home broken by separation or divorce . - 1 corinthians 7 : 10 , 11 .
translation.zu: olsem : ol manmeri i bikpela pinis na ol inap bihainim tok bilong baibel olsem " meri i no ken lusim man bilong en . . . na man tu em i no ken [ lusim ] meri bilong en , " ol pikinini bilong ol i no save karim hevi bilong famili i bruk taim papamama i no stap moa wantaim o tupela i katim marit . - 1 korin 7 : 10 , 11 .

translation.en: grown - ups who are willing to follow the bible counsel to " walk decently , not in revelries and drunken bouts , " do not have children who suffer the distress that goes along with having drunken or drug - addicted parents . - romans 13 : 13 ; ephesians 5 : 18 .
translation.zu: ol manmeri i bikpela pinis na i laik bihainim tok bilong baibel na " wokabaut stret " na ol i no " hambak nabaut na spak , " ol pikinini bilong ol i no save karim hevi long pasin bilong stap wantaim ol papamama i dring spak o ol i save kisim drak . - rom 13 : 13 ; efesus 5 : 18 .

translation.en: grown - ups who are willing to follow the bible counsel to " abstain from fornication " help reduce the risk of their children growing up unwanted , possibly in a one - parent family . - 1 thessalonians 4 : 3 ; matthew 19 : 9 .
translation.zu: ol manmeri i bikpela pinis na i laik bihainim tok bilong baibel na " abrusim olgeta kain pasin pamuk , " ol inap helpim pikinini bilong ol long abrusim dispela hevi bilong stap olsem pikinini i no gat lain i tingim ol , o pikinini em papa o mama i lusim ol . - 1 tesalonaika 4 : 3 ; matyu 19 : 9 .

translation.en: grown - ups who are willing to follow the bible counsel , " do not be exasperating your children , so that they do not become downhearted , " and who " love their children " will not have children who experience the physical or mental pain of abuse in any of its various forms . - colossians 3 : 21 ; titus 2 : 4 .
translation.zu: ol man i laik bihainim tok bilong baibel olsem " [ ol ] i no ken mekim ol pikinini bilong [ ol ] i kros , nogut ol i pilim olsem ol i no inap mekim wanpela gutpela wok , " na ol i ' laikim tru ol pikinini bilong ol , ' ol bai i no inap mekim nogut long ol pikinini na givim pen long ol o bagarapim bel bilong ol . - kolosi 3 : 21 ; taitus 2 : 4 .

translation.en: in summary , if all grown - ups were willing to follow the bible counsel given by jesus , " all things , therefore , that you want men to do to you , you also must likewise do to them , " would there be millions of unwanted and unloved children ? - matthew 7 : 12 .
translation.zu: orait , sapos olgeta manmeri i bikpela pinis ol i laik bihainim tok bilong baibel em jisas i bin givim long yumi olsem , " olgeta pasin yupela i laik bai ol arapela manmeri i mas mekim long yupela , ol dispela pasin tasol yupela i mas mekim long ol , " yu ting bai i gat planti milion pikinini i no gat man i lukautim ol o mekim pasin sori long ol ? - matyu 7 : 12 .

translation.en: happily , there are many grown - ups who are willing to do all the above .
translation.zu: gutpela tru i gat planti ol manmeri i amamas long mekim olgeta samting yumi stori pinis long en .

translation.en: but , sad to say , not all are , and therein lies the problem .
translation.zu: tasol sori tumas , i no olgeta i laik mekim , na long dispela as na i gat hevi i stap .

translation.en: and even those who are willing find that their efforts are often frustrated by human imperfection and things beyond their power to control .
translation.zu: na dispela lain i amamas long mekim ol dispela samting , ol tu i pilim olsem planti taim hevi bilong sin na ol narapela samting i wok long paulim hatwok bilong ol .

translation.en: humans can provide part of the solution to the problems of children , but they are clearly incapable of providing the complete solution .
translation.zu: tru , ol manmeri inap helpim liklik ol wok bilong stretim hevi bilong ol pikinini , tasol ol i no inap tru long pinisim ol dispela hevi .

translation.en: a divine government to provide the complete solution
translation.zu: gavman bilong god inap stretim hevi

translation.en: the writer john ruskin , mentioned in the preceding article , strongly believed that " the first duty of a state is to see that every child born therein shall be well housed , clothed , fed , and educated , till it attain years of discretion . "
translation.zu: stori paslain long dispela i kamapim tok bilong man bilong raitim ol buk , em john ruskin , em i bilip tru olsem " namba wan bikpela wok bilong wanpela gavman em bilong bosim gut wok bilong lukautim olgeta pikinini i stap long hap bilong en , na bai ol i stap long gutpela haus , bai ol i gat klos na kaikai , na bai ol i skul inap long taim ol i bikpela pinis . "

translation.en: ruskin admitted , however , that " in order to [ effect ] this the government must have an authority over the people of which we now do not so much as dream . "
translation.zu: tasol olsem ruskin i tok , " bilong kamapim ol dispela samting , gavman i mas i gat namba bilong bosim ol man long planti samting , tasol long nau sapos yumi ting olsem wanpela gavman inap holim kain namba na strong olsem , dispela tingting i olsem wanpela driman nating tasol . "

translation.en: only a government with divine backing could have the benign authority about which ruskin spoke .
translation.zu: wanpela gavman em god tasol i kamapim bai i gat namba na strong olsem ruskin i stori long en .

translation.en: and just such a government has been promised - the one that jesus mentioned at matthew 6 : 9 , 10 .
translation.zu: na i gat tok promis pinis olsem wanpela kain gavman bai kamap - em gavman jisas i stori long en long matyu 6 : 9 , 10 .

translation.en: once this government of god 's making has taken total control of earth 's affairs , it will exercise its authority over all peoples - housing , clothing , feeding , and educating all its subjects , including children .
translation.zu: taim dispela gavman bilong god yet i kirap bosim olgeta samting bilong graun , em bai bosim olgeta lain manmeri na bai ol i gat gutpela haus , klos , kaikai , na gutpela skul , na ol pikinini tu bai kisim ol dispela samting .

translation.en: young folks will be raised in the spirit of peace and universal brotherhood , the ideal set forth in the un declaration of the rights of the child .
translation.zu: ( jop 33 : 24 - 26 ) ol pikinini bai i go bikpela namel long ol lain manmeri i stap wanbel na stap olsem brata brata long olgeta hap , olsem dispela tokaut bilong yunaitet nesen long ol lo bilong pikinini i kamapim .

translation.en: never again will there be the need for an international year of the child or for a convention on the rights of the child .
translation.zu: ( song 46 : 8 , 9 ) na bai i no gat wok moa long makim wanpela yia bilong pikinini o kamapim wanpela kontrak bilong ol lo bilong pikinini .

translation.en: restoring perfect health to parents and to disabled children will be a simple task for christ jesus , the king of this heavenly government .
translation.zu: krais jisas , king bilong dispela gavman bilong heven , em bai i no hatwok liklik long mekim skin bilong ol papamama i kamap gutpela olgeta na oraitim ol pikinini em han lek samting i bagarap .

translation.en: the miracles of healing that he performed while he was on the earth are a guarantee .
translation.zu: ol mirakel em i wokim taim em i stap long graun i makim olsem em inap tru long mekim ol dispela samting .

translation.en: even resurrecting dead children and dead parents will not be beyond his power to accomplish ! - matthew 9 : 18 - 25 .
translation.zu: wok bilong kirapim bek ol pikinini i dai pinis na ol papamama i dai pinis , dispela tu bai i no givim hatwok long em ! - matyu 9 : 18 - 25 .

translation.en: what a joy to know that the time for god to act in behalf of earth 's children is near !
translation.zu: em samting bilong amamas long save olsem taim bilong god long mekim ol samting bilong helpim olgeta pikinini bilong graun i klostu !

translation.en: help for young people
translation.zu: bilong helpim ol yangpela

translation.en: jehovah 's witnesses are keenly interested both in helping young people to avoid problems and in showing them how best to cope with problems that are unavoidable .
translation.zu: ol witnes bilong jehova i gat bikpela laik tru long helpim ol yangpela long abrusim ol hevi , na tu bilong helpim ol long save olsem wanem ol i ken karim ol hevi ol i no inap abrusim .

translation.en: over the years they have therefore published a number of aids designed to meet the needs of young people - from preschoolers to teenagers .
translation.zu: bilong mekim olsem , inap planti yia ol i wok long kamapim ol buk i bilong helpim ol yangpela - em ol pikinini i no skul yet na ol yangpela .

translation.en: these publications include the books my book of bible stories and questions young people ask - answers that work as well as a video entitled young people ask - how can i make real friends ?
translation.zu: sampela buk olsem em baibel stori buk bilong mi na sampela askim bilong ol yangpela - ol gutpela bekim na wanpela video ( young people ask - how can i make real friends ? ) .

translation.en: these can be obtained from jehovah 's witnesses living in your locality or by writing to the publishers of this magazine .
translation.zu: yu inap kisim ol dispela samting long ol witnes bilong jehova i stap long hap bilong yu , o yu inap salim pas i go long ol lain i kamapim dispela buk na video .

translation.en: parents often use the fine material presented in the above - mentioned study aids as a basis for a progressive , regular program of youth training .
translation.zu: planti taim ol papamama bai mekim wok long ol buk samting mipela stori pinis long en bilong skulim ol pikinini kirap long taim ol i liklik na i go inap long taim ol i bikpela pinis .

translation.en: perhaps you might like to follow a similar procedure with your children .
translation.zu: ating yu bai gat laik long bihainim wankain pasin long ol pikinini bilong yu , a ?

translation.en: yellowstone - crucible of water , rock , and fire
translation.zu: yeloston - hap bilong wara , ston , na paia

translation.en: writer in the united states
translation.zu: long amerika i raitim dispela stori

translation.en: speak of firsts and superlatives - the world 's first national park , the world 's best - known and tallest geysers , and north america 's largest mountain lake .
translation.zu: taim yumi stori long yeloston , yumi stori long samting i kamap paslain long ol narapela , na long samting i win tru .

translation.en: with unbridled curiosity my wife and i drove to the north entrance of yellowstone national park in wyoming , u.s.a .
translation.zu: ol man long olgeta hap i save olsem em i nambawan hap bilong lukim ol wara i sut i go antap tru , winim ol narapela wara i sut olsem .

translation.en: since our childhood , the name old faithful and terms such as " geyser " and " hot spring " had intrigued us .
translation.zu: taim mipela i stap pikinini yet , dispela nem olt fetful , na ol tok olsem " gaisa " na " hot spring " i kirapim tru tingting bilong mipela . olsem wanem ?

translation.en: inscribed across its top were the words : " for the benefit and enjoyment of the people . "
translation.zu: rait i stap long en i tok olsem : " bilong helpim na amamasim ol manmeri . "

translation.en: we started at mammoth hot springs , just over the border from montana .
translation.zu: pastaim mipela raun long hap ol i kolim ol hot spring bilong mamot , klostu tru long boda bilong montana .

translation.en: here the heat from the earth was visibly hard at work .
translation.zu: long dispela hap yu inap lukim ol samting hatpela graun i save kamapim .

translation.en: water boiled and bubbled up from pools and basins .
translation.zu: wara bilong ol bikpela na liklik hulwara i wok long boil i kam antap .

translation.en: what 's cooking under yellowstone ?
translation.zu: wanem samting i boil aninit long yeloston ?

translation.en: the continental divide * cuts across this high rockies plateau .
translation.zu: kil bilong maunten ol i kolim kontinentel divaid * i brukim hap bilong ol maunten roki .

translation.en: thousands of years ago , one left a giant caldera ( crater ) measuring 47 miles [ 75 km ] by 28 miles [ 45 km ] .
translation.zu: na long planti tausen yia i go pinis , pairap bilong wanpela volkeno i wokim traipela hul , longpela bilong en i olsem 75 kilomita na braitpela bilong en i olsem 45 kilomita .

translation.en: the magma , or molten rock , that still lurks beneath the surface keeps yellowstone cooking .
translation.zu: ol ston insait long graun i hat nogut tru na i tanim olsem wara , ol i boil i stap aninit long dispela pak .

translation.en: park exhibits explain that surface water works its way down through porous rock until it reaches a layer of rock that is extremely hot , just above the magma .
translation.zu: rait bilong sampela sain - bot bilong pak i stori olsem wara i save go daun isi isi insait long ol ston na bihain em i kamap long ol ston i hat nogut tru , na aninit long dispela hap ol ston i paia na kamap malumalum .

translation.en: these vents are called fumaroles . mud pots bubble where acidic gases and water decompose soil into mud and clay .
translation.zu: na long sampela hap i gat graun malumalum i boil i kam antap .

translation.en: what a spectacular display !
translation.zu: em narapela kain samting tru long lukim !

translation.en: old faithful
translation.zu: olt fetful

translation.en: seeing all the geothermal activity around mammoth hot springs , we assumed that we were in the vicinity of the famous geyser old faithful .
translation.zu: taim mipela lukim ol dispela samting long ol hot spring bilong mamot , mipela i gat tingting olsem mipela stap klostu long dispela gaisa i gat biknem tru , em olt fetful .

translation.en: only when we checked our travel map did we realize that old faithful was 50 miles [ 80 km ] to the south .
translation.zu: tasol taim mipela lukim mep , mipela i kisim save olsem olt fetful i stap longwe olsem 80 kilomita long hap saut .

translation.en: yellowstone is much larger than we thought ; it covers 2.2 million acres [ 900,000 ha ] .
translation.zu: pastaim mipela i no ting yeloston - pak i karamapim bikpela hap tru olsem 900,000 hekta .

translation.en: to reach old faithful , we took the road that meanders down the western part of the park ; it conducts tourists past five geyser basins .
translation.zu: bilong kamap long hap olt fetful i stap long en mipela bihainim wanpela rot i stap long hap wes bilong pak . long dispela rot ol turis i ken lukim 5 - pela hap i gat ol gaisa long en .

translation.en: we soon began to accept as normal the smell of sulfur and the sight of escaping moisture .
translation.zu: long dispela hap smel bilong salfa i stap na mipela lukim ol smok i lusim graun na kam antap .

translation.en: but looking around , we saw a sign saying that the geyser 's next eruption was predicted for 12 : 47 p.m .
translation.zu: mipela lukim wanpela sain - bot i toksave olsem ol i ting dispela gaisa bai sut gen long 12 : 47 long belo bek .

translation.en: that was well over an hour away , and the time was a mere prediction !
translation.zu: nau mipela mas wet longpela taim liklik , winim wanpela aua , na ol i no save gut olsem em bai sut o nogat !

translation.en: we asked rick , a park ranger , about it .
translation.zu: mipela givim askim long rick , em wanpela man i wok long pak .

translation.en: " the time between eruptions has always varied , and over the years it has lengthened because of earthquakes and because of vandals ' throwing objects into the spouter .
translation.zu: tasol ol guria na pasin bilong ol hambak lain long tromoi ol pipia insait long hul em wara i save sut long en , ol dispela samting i mekim na wara i no save sut klostu klostu olsem bipo .

translation.en: our staff can only predict the eruptions one at a time . "
translation.zu: mipela ol lain i wok long pak inap toksave tasol long taim mipela ting olsem em bai sut . "

translation.en: it was now 12 : 30 p.m .
translation.zu: klok i makim olsem em 12 : 30 .

translation.en: hundreds of people were sitting in the spectator area or were on their way there .
translation.zu: planti handet manmeri i stap , sampela i sindaun pinis long hap bilong lukim wara na sampela i wokabaut i kam .

translation.en: old faithful kept us waiting ten minutes .
translation.zu: inap 10 - pela minit mipela wetim wara i sut .

translation.en: but when it erupted , it had a beauty that no photograph can convey .
translation.zu: na taim wara i sut , em samting i gutpela tumas na i winim tru pasin bilong lukim long poto tasol .

translation.en: after clearing its throat with a few fitful bursts , it gained momentum .
translation.zu: pastaim em i sut liklik na bihain em i sut strong moa .

translation.en: the water and the spray rose and fell in crescendos , reaching from 120 feet to 150 feet [ 37 to 46 meters ] .
translation.zu: wara i sut na bihain i sut strong moa , sampela taim wara i go antap olsem 37 mita na sampela taim i go antap olsem 46 mita .

translation.en: when it was over , we went to the lobby of the nearby hotel .
translation.zu: taim wara i no sut moa , mipela go long haus pasindia i stap klostu .

translation.en: for the rest of the day , whenever its predicted moment drew near , all the guests stopped what they were doing and walked out to watch it .
translation.zu: long dispela de olgeta , taim ol i ting olsem em bai sut , ol man bilong haus pasindia i lusim ol samting ol i wok long mekim na go ausait bilong lukim wara .

translation.en: it gave us several eruptions of exceptional length and height and beauty , especially one in which the dancing waters were silhouetted against the setting sun .
translation.zu: planti taim long dispela de wara i gutpela tru long lukim , em i sut longpela taim na i go antap tru , na em i naispela moa yet taim san i laik go daun .

translation.en: we found the old geyser to be duly faithful .
translation.zu: mipela ting dispela olpela gaisa i stap gut yet long wok bilong en .

translation.en: " there are fewer than 500 geysers on the planet , and about 300 of them are in yellowstone , " rick , the park ranger , told us .
translation.zu: dispela man i wok long pak , em rick , em i tok : " i gat 500 gaisa i stap long graun olgeta , na planti bilong ol , olsem 300 , i stap long yeloston .

translation.en: " and 160 of those are in this one little valley , the upper geyser basin , which is only a mile and a half [ 2 km ] long .
translation.zu: na 160 bilong ol gaisa bilong yeloston ol i stap long wanpela hap graun i bikpela olsem 2 kilomita tasol , nem bilong dispela hap em apa gaisa beisin .

translation.en: other geysers come and go - they 're active or they 're dormant - but old faithful is still here . "
translation.zu: sampela gaisa i save sut na bihain ol i no sut moa - olsem sampela i wok yet na sampela i slip i stap - tasol olt fetful i wok yet . "

translation.en: even so , old faithful 's neighbor , grand , sends jets as high as 200 feet [ 60 m ] .
translation.zu: gaisa i stap klostu long olt feftul , em grand , na em inap sutim wara i go antap olsem 60 mita .

translation.en: steamboat can shoot up nearly 400 feet [ 120 m ] , three times as high as old faithful - but it can remain inactive for years .
translation.zu: narapela em stimbot , em inap sutim wara i go antap olsem 120 mita , na dispela i winim tru olt fetful , tasol stimbot inap slip i stap planti yia na bihain em i sut gen .

translation.en: at norris , a geyser named echinus occasionally showers its admirers with warm water .
translation.zu: long hap ol i kolim noris , sampela taim gaisa ekinus i sutim wara i hat liklik i go long ol man .

translation.en: to outrun a buffalo
translation.zu: resis wantaim bafalo

translation.en: the next morning we reviewed a tourist brochure .
translation.zu: long moning antap mipela skelim wanpela pepa ol i wokim bilong ol turis .

translation.en: it said : " scalding water underlies thin , breakable crusts ; pools are near or above boiling temperatures .
translation.zu: pepa i tok : " graun antap long sampela wara i hat tru em i no strong tumas ; sampela wara i wok long boil na i hat nogut tru .

translation.en: another read : " warning : many visitors have been gored by buffalo .
translation.zu: narapela pepa i tok olsem : " lukaut : ol bafalo i bin sutim planti manmeri long kom bilong ol .

translation.en: buffalo can weigh 2,000 pounds [ 900 kg ] and can sprint at 30 mph [ 50 kph ] , three times faster than you can run . "
translation.zu: sampela i bikpela olsem 900 kilogram , na ol inap ran spit tru insait long sotpela hap olsem 50 kilomita insait long wanpela aua , tasol yu no inap ran spit olsem . "

translation.en: one was just ending as we arrived , and tourists were climbing back into their cars .
translation.zu: mipela i kamap long wanpela hap olsem , na mipela lukim ol turis i kalap gen long ka bilong ol .

translation.en: when we asked a woman what everyone was looking at , she said : " a big bull moose , but he 's gone . "
translation.zu: taim mipela askim wanpela meri , ol man i lukluk long wanem samting , meri i tok : " em wanpela traipela bafalo , tasol em i go pinis . "

translation.en: afterward we watched some elk trying to coax their two - week - old calves across a stream .
translation.zu: bihain mipela lukim ol narapela kain dia ol i subim ol nupela pikinini bilong ol long brukim wanpela wara .

translation.en: the calves didn 't want to go - they hadn 't bargained on crossing water .
translation.zu: tasol ol pikinini bilong ol i no laik kam - ol i no save olsem ol i mas brukim wanpela wara .

translation.en: the mothers kept calling to their young , and the calves eventually crossed .
translation.zu: ol mama bilong ol i wok long singaut long ol , na isi isi ol i brukim wara .

translation.en: next we drove to the grand canyon of the yellowstone .
translation.zu: bihain mipela kalap long ka na go long traipela baret tru bilong yeloston .

translation.en: we got out of our car at various lookout points along the 1,200 - foot - high [ 360 m ] rim and peered - not always willingly - down .
translation.zu: mipela lusim ka long ol narapela narapela hap ol i makim bilong lukim gut baret , na maski mipela pret liklik mipela wokabaut i go long arere bilong baret na lukluk i go daun olsem 360 mita .

translation.en: in his expedition journal of 1870 , nathaniel langford spoke of " my own littleness , my helplessness " as he gazed at this 20 - mile - long [ 32 km ] gorge with garish ocher walls - the source of the yellowstone river 's name - and two lofty waterfalls .
translation.zu: long buk i stori long raun bilong em long 1870 , nathaniel langford i tok " i olsem mi samting nating , i olsem mi no gat strong , " em i kisim dispela tingting taim em i lukluk long tupela wara kalap na traipela baret i longpela olsem 32 kilomita na graun bilong en i yelo tru - em as bilong nem bilong wara yeloston .

translation.en: the next day we swung east .
translation.zu: long de antap mipela raun i go long hap is .

translation.en: once again the park 's landscape changed .
translation.zu: nau ol samting i senis gen long pak .

translation.en: here it became high forest , and the road twice crossed the continental divide .
translation.zu: long dispela hap i gat ol bikbus bilong maunten , na tupela taim rot i brukim kontinentel divaid .

translation.en: we continued to see buffalo and other big animals , the buffalo often standing in classic profile .
translation.zu: na mipela lukim yet ol bafalo na ol narapela traipela animal ; ol bafalo i sanap olsem mipela save lukim long ol poto .

translation.en: regrettably , we didn 't see any bears - yellowstone 's other big tourist attraction .
translation.zu: tasol sori tru , mipela i no lukim ol bea - em narapela as na ol turis i save kam long yeloston .

translation.en: what happened to them ?
translation.zu: wanem samting i kamap long ol ?

translation.en: over the years the close proximity between humans and bears there resulted in some tourists ' getting hurt or killed .
translation.zu: inap planti yia ol bea i stap long hap ol man i save raun long en , long dispela rot sampela turis i bin kisim bagarap o indai .

translation.en: the situation was not good for the bears either .
translation.zu: na dispela i no gutpela long ol bea tu .

translation.en: so in the early 1970 ' s , the national park service closed the garbage dumps , thereby weaning the bears from dependence on human food .
translation.zu: olsem na long 1972 samting , ol lain bilong lukautim nesenel - pak ol i pasim ol ples pipia , na isi isi ol bea i lusim pasin bilong kisim ol kaikai bilong man tasol .

translation.en: this sent the bears into the wild .
translation.zu: dispela i mekim na ol bea i go long ol bikbus .

translation.en: the bears are now on a natural diet , and they are healthier .
translation.zu: long nau ol bea i save kaikai ol samting i kru long bus , na ol i gat strongpela skin moa .

translation.en: it was there that the park sprang its last big surprise on us .
translation.zu: long dispela hap mipela i lukim laspela samting bilong dispela pak mipela i kirap nogut long en .

translation.en: as we looked across yellowstone lake - the largest mountain lake in north america - to the snow - topped tetons , we thought for a moment that we were in northern italy ; the lake and its setting had that same alpine majesty .
translation.zu: mipela lukluk i go long hapsait bilong raunwara yeloston - em nambawan bikpela raunwara bilong ples maunten i stap long not amerika - na mipela lukim ol traipela maunten titon i gat ais antap long het bilong ol .

translation.en: it was time to leave yellowstone .
translation.zu: nau em taim bilong mipela long lusim yeloston .

translation.en: the eye and the spirit had been abundantly rewarded .
translation.zu: mipela bin lukim ol gutpela samting long ai , na bel bilong mipela i amamas .

translation.en: the fires of 1988
translation.zu: ol paia bilong 1988

translation.en: drought was one reason , as the summer of 1988 was the driest in yellowstone 's recorded history .
translation.zu: long taim bilong san long 1988 dispela hevi bilong bus i paia long yeloston i bikpela tru winim olgeta narapela taim bipo .

translation.en: high winds were the other reason .
translation.zu: ol bikpela win i narapela as bilong hevi .

translation.en: gusting to 50 miles [ 80 km ] an hour , they propelled the fires as much as 14 miles [ 20 km ] in a day .
translation.zu: strongpela win i raun spit tru olsem 80 kilomita insait long wanpela aua , na dispela i mekim na paia i wok long karamapim bikpela hap graun olsem 20 kilomita insait long wanpela de .

translation.en: they blew embers ahead of the fire for distances that fire fighters had never experienced .
translation.zu: bipo ol man i no bin lukim pasin bilong win long kisim pipia bilong paia i go longwe tru olsem .

translation.en: these embers started new fires .
translation.zu: na dispela pipia i kirapim ol nupela paia .

translation.en: helicopters and aerial tankers dropped about 1.4 million gallons [ 5,000,000 l ] of fire retardant and 10 million gallons [ 40,000,000 l ] of water .
translation.zu: ol helikopta na balus i gat tang long en i wok long lusim 5,000,000 lita marasin samting bilong kilim i dai paia , na 40,000,000 lita wara .

translation.en: day after day a thick blanket of smoke hung in the air .
translation.zu: olgeta de i gat bikpela smok i stap long win .

translation.en: by late summer the park resembled a war zone .
translation.zu: long pinis bilong mun ogas , pak i luk olsem wanpela ples pait .

translation.en: not until mid - september , after 1.4 million acres [ 600,000 ha ] had burned , did cool air , autumn storms , and light snow put the fires out .
translation.zu: paia i kukim bikpela hap graun olsem 600,000 hekta , na i no pinis inap long taim kolwin i kirap na i gat ren na liklik ais i pundaun namel long mun septemba .

translation.en: the fires scarcely harmed the animal population , and the tourist population has since risen steadily .
translation.zu: paia i no bin bagarapim tumas ol animal , na namba bilong ol turis i wok long go bikpela gen .

translation.en: in the years since the fires , an abundant new growth of trees has blanketed the formerly burned - out areas .
translation.zu: kirap long taim bilong paia i kam inap long nau , i gat planti ol nupela diwai i karamapim ol hap em bipo paia i kukim .

translation.en: the bible 's viewpoint
translation.zu: baibel i tok wanem ?

translation.en: now , though , some people are considering the prospect seriously .
translation.zu: tasol long nau sampela manmeri i tingting strong long dispela samting .

translation.en: it is a process that has been compared to an internal clock that controls when people age and die .
translation.zu: dispela samting i wankain olsem wanpela klok i stap long skin bilong ol man , na em i save makim wanem taim ol man bai go lapun na dai .

translation.en: scientists are now working to reset this clock .
translation.zu: nau ol saientis i wok long stretim bek dispela klok .

translation.en: one popular theory holds that the key to aging lies at the ends of each dna strand , a region called the telomere .
translation.zu: planti man i ting olsem , samting i save mekim na ol man i go lapun em i stap long pinis bilong wan wan rop bilong dna , em wanpela hap ol i kolim telomia .

translation.en: the telomeres have been compared to the plastic caps at the end of shoelaces , designed to protect the laces from unraveling .
translation.zu: ol telomia i gat wankain wok olsem ol liklik plastik i stap long pinis bilong rop bilong pasim su bambai rop i ken stap gut .

translation.en: eventually , it seems , the telomeres shorten to the point where the cell stops dividing .
translation.zu: bihain , isi isi ol telomia i go sot olgeta na ol sel i no inap moa long kamapim ol nupela sel .

translation.en: thus , according to the theory , this could give the cells the potential to continue dividing indefinitely .
translation.zu: olsem na ol saientis i ting dispela inap opim rot long ol sel long kamapim yet ol nupela sel i go i go .

translation.en: an official of one company involved in this work said : " this is the first time that we can conceive of human immortality . "
translation.zu: wanpela bikman bilong wanpela kampani i insait long dispela wok em i tok : " dispela em i namba wan taim mipela i ken tingting long man inap i stap oltaim . "

translation.en: how death came to be
translation.zu: rot na indai i kamap

translation.en: of course , people who have faith in the bible have believed in the possibility of everlasting life for humans for millenniums .
translation.zu: tru tumas , inap planti tausen yia pinis ol man i bilip long baibel , ol i bilip olsem ol man bai inap i stap oltaim oltaim .

translation.en: their trust is not in human scientists but in the master scientist , who created all living things , jehovah god . - psalm 104 : 24 , 25 .
translation.zu: ol i no bilip long tok bilong ol saientis , nogat ; ol i bilip long tok bilong nambawan saientis i bin wokim olgeta samting i gat laip , em god jehova . - song 104 : 24 , 25 .

translation.en: the bible shows that human death was not a part of the creator 's purpose .
translation.zu: baibel i kamapim olsem man bilong wokim yumi em i no laik bai ol man i dai .

translation.en: the first human couple were created in god 's image and placed in a paradise garden .
translation.zu: god i wokim namba wan man na meri i kamap olsem em yet na em i putim tupela long wanpela gutpela gaden .

translation.en: they were perfect , with no defect of mind or body .
translation.zu: ol i gutpela olgeta long tingting na long skin .

translation.en: as such , they had the prospect of living forever on earth .
translation.zu: olsem na ol i gat rot bilong i stap oltaim long graun .

translation.en: that was god 's desire for them .
translation.zu: dispela em i laik bilong god long tupela .

translation.en: he instructed them to bear children and gradually to extend paradise throughout the earth . - genesis 1 : 27 , 28 ; 2 : 8 , 9 , 15 .
translation.zu: em i tokim tupela long kamapim ol pikinini na isi isi ol i mas skruim paradais i go long olgeta hap bilong graun . - stat 1 : 27 , 28 ; 2 : 8 , 9 , 15 .

translation.en: as shown in genesis chapter 3 , adam , knowing that the penalty was death , deliberately rebelled against god .
translation.zu: olsem buk stat sapta 3 i kamapim , adam i save olsem pe bilong sin em dai , tasol long laik bilong em yet em i bikhet long god .

translation.en: moreover , by pursuing a course of disobedience , he brought sin and death upon his unborn offspring .
translation.zu: pasin bikhet bilong em i mekim na sin na dai i kam long olgeta pikinini em i no kamapim yet .

translation.en: the apostle paul explained it this way : " through one man sin entered into the world and death through sin , and thus death spread to all men because they had all sinned . "
translation.zu: aposel pol i stori long dispela samting olsem : " wanpela man i bin mekim sin , na long dispela pasin sin i kamap long graun . na sin i bringim dai i kam . na dai i kisim olgeta man , long wanem , olgeta man i bin mekim sin . "

translation.en: in other words , because adam sinned , his body was no longer perfect .
translation.zu: o yumi ken tok , adam i mekim sin , olsem na skin bilong em i no gutpela moa .

translation.en: he gradually grew old and died .
translation.zu: isi isi em i go lapun na dai .

translation.en: humans will not succeed in reversing that judgment .
translation.zu: em i tok : " mipela i save stap inap 70 yia tasol .

translation.en: jehovah 's provision for everlasting life
translation.zu: rot jehova i putim bilong kisim laip oltaim

translation.en: though at present all humans eventually die , it is not jehovah 's purpose that this situation continue indefinitely .
translation.zu: maski long nau olgeta man i save dai , jehova i no laik bai dispela hevi i stap oltaim oltaim , nogat .

translation.en: while adam and eve deserved to die , god knew that there would be many among their unborn children who would respond appreciatively to his loving oversight .
translation.zu: i stret adam na iv i mas dai , tasol god i save olsem planti pikinini bilong tupela i kamap bihain bai ol i amamas long daun long wok bos bilong em .

translation.en: for such people he made provision for endless life on earth .
translation.zu: em i bin stretim rot bilong ol kain man olsem long kisim laip oltaim long graun .

translation.en: the psalmist wrote : " the righteous themselves will possess the earth , and they will reside forever upon it . "
translation.zu: man bilong raitim song i tok : " ol stretpela man bai i kisim graun god i givim ol , na bai ol i stap oltaim long en . "

translation.en: this was not to occur as a result of humans ' unlocking the mysteries of dna .
translation.zu: laip oltaim i no inap kamap long rot bilong save ol man i kisim long ol samting hait bilong dna .

translation.en: rather , everlasting life is a gift that jehovah will bestow upon those exercising faith in him .
translation.zu: nogat . laip oltaim em i wanpela presen jehova bai givim long ol man i bilip long em .

translation.en: recognizing that the offspring of adam and eve needed rescuing , he provided a means for them to gain everlasting life - the ransom sacrifice of jesus christ .
translation.zu: jehova i luksave olsem ol pikinini bilong adam na iv i mas i gat man bilong helpim ol , olsem na em i stretim rot bilong ol long kisim laip oltaim - em ofa bilong krais jisas bilong baim bek ol man .

translation.en: like adam , jesus was a perfect human .
translation.zu: olsem adam , jisas em i wanpela man i gutpela olgeta .

translation.en: unlike adam , jesus was perfectly obedient to god .
translation.zu: tasol jisas i bihainim gut olgeta tok bilong god , adam nogat .

translation.en: jesus was thus able to sacrifice his perfect human life to pay for adam 's sin .
translation.zu: olsem na jisas inap long givim laip bilong em i gutpela olgeta bilong baim bek yumi long sin bilong adam .

translation.en: by means of this loving act , which balanced the scales of justice , adam 's children could be released from condemnation to death .
translation.zu: dispela samting i stret wantaim ol stretpela lo bilong god , na long rot bilong dispela gutpela pasin jisas i opim rot long ol pikinini bilong adam long lusim kalabus bilong indai .

translation.en: consequently , all who exercise faith in jesus will receive god 's gift of everlasting life . - romans 5 : 18 , 19 ; 1 timothy 2 : 5 , 6 .
translation.zu: olsem na olgeta man i bilip long jisas bai ol i kisim dispela presen god i givim , em laip oltaim . - rom 5 : 18 , 19 ; 1 timoti 2 : 5 , 6 .

translation.en: if humans were able to overcome imperfection and bring about everlasting life for themselves , there would be no need for the ransom .
translation.zu: baibel i kamapim gutpela tok olsem : " ol king na ol man bilong graun i no inap kisim bek yu . olsem na nogut yu bilip long ol .

translation.en: the bible gives this wise counsel : " do not put your trust in nobles , nor in the son of earthling man , to whom no salvation belongs .
translation.zu: taim ol i dai ol i tanim i kamap graun gen . na long dispela taim ol i no inap mekim olgeta samting ol i bin tok long mekim .

translation.en: happy is the one who has the god of jacob for his help , whose hope is in jehovah his god , the maker of heaven and earth , of the sea , and of all that is in them , the one keeping trueness to time indefinite . " - psalm 146 : 3 - 6 .
translation.zu: god i bin mekim kamap heven na graun na solwara na olgeta samting i stap long en . na oltaim god i save bihainim olgeta promis bilong em . " - song 146 : 3 - 6 .

translation.en: everlasting life will result , not from scientific research , but from jehovah .
translation.zu: jehova tasol bai givim laip oltaim long yumi - yumi no inap kisim long save bilong saiens .

translation.en: whatever god sets out to do , he can and will accomplish .
translation.zu: olgeta samting god i laik mekim , em inap long mekim na em bai mekim .

translation.en: " with god no declaration will be an impossibility . " - luke 1 : 37 .
translation.zu: " i no gat wanpela samting god i no inap mekim . " - luk 1 : 37 .
