translation.en: the ships slid up onto the beach , and fierce - looking bearded men wielding swords and axes jumped out and ran toward the monastery .
translation.zu: ol sip i kam sua na ol mausgras man i gat pes nogut ol i kalap lusim sip na ran i kam long haus bruder wantaim ol longpela naip na akis .

translation.en: they fell upon the terrified monks and inflicted a great slaughter .
translation.zu: ol i kilim i dai planti ol bruder .

translation.en: soon the vikings evoked such terror that throughout england echoed the prayer : " from the fury of the northmen deliver us , o lord . "
translation.zu: i no longtaim na bikpela pret ol inglan i kisim long ol vaiking i mekim na ol man bilong inglan i wok long kolim dispela beten : " bikpela , plis helpim mipela long abrusim belhat bilong ol man bilong not . "

translation.en: who were these vikings ?
translation.zu: husat ol dispela lain vaiking ?

translation.en: why did they suddenly appear on the pages of history as if out of nowhere , remain prominent for three centuries , and then seemingly vanish ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem i olsem ol i bin kamap nating na wantu ol i mekim ol samting ol man i no inap lusim tingting long en inap long 300 yia , na bihain i olsem ol i lus nating gen ?

translation.en: the vikings ' ancestors were germanic peoples who , some 2,000 years before the viking era , began migrating from northwestern europe into denmark , norway , and sweden - scandinavia .
translation.zu: ol tumbuna bilong ol vaiking i bilong sampela lain jeman , na inap 2,000 yia samting paslain long taim bilong ol vaiking , ol i kirap na lusim not - wes yurop na go long denmak , nowe , na swiden - olsem skandinevia .

translation.en: one possibility is overpopulation , but many historians feel that this would have been true only of western norway with its limited arable land .
translation.zu: tasol planti saveman i ting dispela samting bai givim hevi long ol vaiking i stap long hap wes bilong nowe tasol , em long hap i no gat planti graun bilong wokim ol gaden .

translation.en: the oxford illustrated history of the vikings says : " most of the first generations of vikings were seeking wealth , not land . "
translation.zu: wanpela buk ( the oxford illustrated history of the vikings ) i tok : " planti bilong ol namba wan lain vaiking i raun bilong kisim bikpela mani , ol i no tingting long kisim graun . "

translation.en: this was especially true of kings and chieftains who needed a substantial income to retain their power .
translation.zu: dispela tok i stret tru long ol king na hetman , long wanem , ol i mas i gat planti mani samting bilong holimpas namba bilong ol .

translation.en: another factor may have been that it was common for wealthy viking men to have more than one wife .
translation.zu: na narapela samting inap kamapim dispela senis , em pasin bilong ol maniman bilong ol vaiking long maritim planti meri .

translation.en: as a result , they had many children .
translation.zu: olsem na ol i gat planti pikinini .

translation.en: usually , however , only the firstborn son received the family inheritance , leaving his younger siblings to fend for themselves .
translation.zu: tasol ol namba wan pikinini man tasol i save kisim ol samting bilong papa , na ol narapela pikinini bai i gat wok long lukautim ol yet .

translation.en: the vikings had the right vehicle for hit - and - run raids - the longship .
translation.zu: ol saveman i tok olsem dispela sip em i wanpela gutpela samting tru ol man bilong yia 500 i go inap 1500 samting i bin wokim .

translation.en: historians praise the longship as one of the finest technological achievements of the early middle ages .
translation.zu: sip bilong ol i no save sindaun insait tumas long wara , na i gat ol sel o ol pul bilong en .

translation.en: of shallow draft and powered by sail or oars , these sleek vessels made the vikings the masters of every sea , lake , and river within their sweep .
translation.zu: ol dispela longpela sip i mekim na ol vaiking i stap olsem hapman stret bilong raun long solwara , na ol narapela wara i stap long hap ol i bosim .

translation.en: some historians say that the viking era dawned in the middle of the eighth century , just prior to the viking raid on lindisfarne .
translation.zu: sampela saveman i tok taim bilong ol vaiking i kirap long yia 750 samting , em paslain liklik long ol i stilim ol samting long lindasfon .

translation.en: the irish city of dublin , in fact , began as a viking enclave .
translation.zu: pastaim wanpela biktaun bilong aialan , em dablin , em i hap bilong ol vaiking .

translation.en: in 850 c.e . , they also began to winter in england , their first base being the isle of thanet at the mouth of the thames river .
translation.zu: long 850 c.e . , ol i kirap na sindaun long inglan long taim bilong kol ; namba wan hap ol i sindaun long en , em ailan bilong tanet long maus bilong wara tems .

translation.en: some of these ships may have been 100 feet long [ 30 metres ] and may have carried up to 100 warriors .
translation.zu: ating longpela bilong sampela sip bilong ol i olsem 30 mita na ating i gat samting olsem 100 paitman i stap long en .

translation.en: in the following years , vikings subdued northeast england , an area that came to be known as the danelaw because danish culture and law were dominant there .
translation.zu: insait long sampela yia bihain ol vaiking i daunim ol lain long hap not - is bilong inglan , na dispela hap i kisim nem olsem denlo , long wanem , pasin na lo bilong denmak i kamap bikpela moa long dispela hap .

translation.en: however , in the south of england in wessex , saxon king alfred and his successors held the vikings at bay .
translation.zu: tasol long hap saut bilong inglan , long weseks , king alfred bilong ol sakson , na ol lain i kamap bihain long em , ol i wok long sakim ol vaiking .

translation.en: but then , after a great battle at ashington in 1016 and the death of king edmund of wessex later that same year , the viking leader canute - a professed christian - became sole king of england .
translation.zu: tasol bihain long bikpela pait bilong asington long yia 1016 na indai bilong king edmund bilong weseks , hetman bilong ol vaiking nem bilong em kanut - em i tok em i wanpela kristen - em i kamap king na bosim olgeta hap bilong inglan .

translation.en: deep into europe and beyond
translation.zu: long yurop na ol narapela hap

translation.en: in 799 c.e . , danish vikings began raiding the area then called frisia - the coastal region of europe that stretches roughly from denmark to the netherlands .
translation.zu: long 799 c.e . , ol vaiking bilong denmak i raun bilong stil long hap em nem bilong en long dispela taim em frisia - em nambis bilong yurop i kirap long denmak na i go inap long netelan .

translation.en: from there they rowed up such rivers as the loire and the seine and pillaged towns and villages deep in the heartland of europe .
translation.zu: long ol dispela hap ol vaiking i bihainim ol wara olsem lawa na sen na stilim ol samting long ol taun na ples i stap insait tru long yurop .

translation.en: frankish king charles the bald paid them 7,000 pounds [ 3,000 kg ] of silver to withdraw from the city .
translation.zu: king sals bilong ol frenk i givim 3,178 kilo silva long ol bilong kirapim ol long lusim dispela biktaun .

translation.en: vikings also sailed to spain and portugal , where their first known raid occurred in 844 c.e .
translation.zu: ol man i ting namba wan taim ol vaiking i kam stil long dispela hap em long 844 c.e .

translation.en: " however , " says the cultural atlas of the viking world , " the arab defenders put up such fierce resistance that the vikings were quickly repulsed , their forces almost destroyed . "
translation.zu: tasol wanpela buk ( cultural atlas of the viking world ) i tok olsem : " ol arap i pait strong na wantu ol vaiking i surik bek , na klostu ami bilong ol i bagarap olgeta . "

translation.en: after ravaging parts of spain , they raided north africa ; and even though their ships were now brimful of loot , they went on to italy and sacked pisa and lina ( formerly luna ) .
translation.zu: taim ol i bagarapim na stilim ol samting long sampela hap bilong spen , ol i go mekim wankain pasin long not afrika ; na maski sip bilong ol i pulap olgeta , bihain ol i go long itali na bagarapim tupela taun pisa na lina .

translation.en: vikings from sweden sailed east across the baltic and into some of the great waterways of eastern europe - the volkhov , lovat ' , dnieper , and volga rivers .
translation.zu: ol vaiking bilong swiden , ol i brukim solwara boltik na bihainim sampela bikpela wara bilong isten yurop - em ol wara valkaf , lavat , nipa , na volga .

translation.en: these eventually took them to the black sea and the rich lands of the byzantine empire .
translation.zu: ol i bihainim dispela wara i go long solwara blaksi na long hap bilong planti maniman long ol kantri bilong bisantin .

translation.en: some viking merchants even reached baghdad by way of the volga river and the caspian sea .
translation.zu: sampela vaiking i bin bihainim wara volga na solwara kaspien na kamap long bagdad .

translation.en: eventually , swedish chieftains became the rulers of the vast slavic lands of the dnieper and the volga .
translation.zu: bihain sampela hetman bilong swiden i kirap na bosim bikpela hap graun bilong ol lain slav long hap bilong wara nipa na volga .

translation.en: the invaders were called the rus , a term that some hold to be the origin of the word " russia " - " land of the rus . "
translation.zu: ol lain swiden i kam bilong daunim ol narapela , ol i kisim nem olsem ol rus , em wanpela tok sampela i ting em i as bilong dispela tok " rasia " - " graun bilong ol rus . "

translation.en: to iceland , greenland , and newfoundland
translation.zu: aislan , grinlan , na nufaunlan

translation.en: norwegian vikings focused on many of the outer islands .
translation.zu: ol vaiking bilong nowe i raun long ol ailan i stap long hap bilong ol .

translation.en: for instance , they occupied the orkneys and the shetlands in the eighth century and the faeroes , the hebrides , and eastern ireland in the ninth century .
translation.zu: long yia 700 samting ol i kirap na bosim ol ailan okni na setlan na long yia 800 samting ol i kirap na bosim ol ailan fero , na hebridis , na hap is bilong aialan .

translation.en: still existing as the governing body of iceland , the althing is the west 's oldest parliamentary assembly .
translation.zu: elting i stap longpela taim tru , winim ol narapela asembli bilong palamen i stap long hap bilong wes .

translation.en: in 985 c.e . , a viking named erik the red established a colony in greenland .
translation.zu: long 985 c.e . , wanpela vaiking , em erik da ret , i kamapim wanpela ples long grinlan .

translation.en: later that year fellow norseman bjarni herjolfsson set off from iceland to join his parents in greenland .
translation.zu: bihain liklik narapela man bilong nos , em bedni heriolfson , em lusim aislan na raun long sip i go long grinlan bilong bungim papamama bilong em .

translation.en: but he was blown off course and overshot greenland .
translation.zu: tasol win i sakim sip na em i abrusim grinlan .

translation.en: " bjarni was probably the first norseman to sight north america , " says the cultural atlas of the viking world .
translation.zu: wanpela buk ( cultural atlas of the viking world ) i tok : " ating bedni em i namba wan man bilong nos i bin lukim not amerika . "

translation.en: on the basis of bjarni 's report , and probably after the year 1000 , leif eriksson , son of erik the red , sailed westward from greenland to baffin island and then down the coast of labrador .
translation.zu: ating bihain long yia 1000 , pikinini bilong erik da ret em lif erikson , i bihainim sampela rait bilong ripot bilong bedni na em i lusim grinlan na raun long sip i go wes long ailan bafin .

translation.en: a few years later , however , between 60 and 160 vikings established a settlement in vinland , but because of the ongoing hostility of the indigenous people , they stayed only about three years , never to return .
translation.zu: tasol sampela yia bihain , sampela vaiking olsem 60 i go inap long 160 samting , ol i go na kamapim wanpela ples long vinlan . tasol pasin bilong kros wantaim ol as ples i mekim na inap 3 - pela yia bihain ol i lusim dispela hap olgeta .

translation.en: the end of the viking era
translation.zu: taim bilong ol vaiking i pinis

translation.en: by the end of their era , the vikings had created a number of new political states over which scandinavian dynasties ruled .
translation.zu: klostu long pinis bilong taim bilong ol vaiking , i gat planti ples ol i bin kamapim nupela gavman long en na i gat ol king bilong skandinevia i bosim .

translation.en: but they did not remain foreigners for long , for many vikings were eventually assimilated into their newfound cultures , even religiously .
translation.zu: tasol ol i no stap longtaim olsem lain bilong narapela kantri , long wanem , bihain planti vaiking ol i kisim pasin bilong ol asples wantaim lotu bilong ol tu .

translation.en: one of his descendants was william , duke of normandy .
translation.zu: wanpela tumbuna bilong rolo em wiliam , em duk bilong nomandi .

translation.en: after the battle of hastings in 1066 , which pitted descendants of norman and english vikings against one another , victorious duke william was crowned king of england .
translation.zu: ol tumbuna bilong ol vaiking bilong noman i pait wantaim ol vaiking bilong inglan long pait bilong hastings long yia 1066 , na lain bilong wiliam i win . bihain long pait em i kamap king bilong inglan .

translation.en: hence , " if one date has to be chosen to mark the end of the viking age , " says the book the vikings , by else roesdahl , " it has to be 1066 . "
translation.zu: olsem na buk bilong else roesdahl ( the vikings ) i tok : " sapos yumi mas makim wanem taim stret em taim bilong ol vaiking i pinis , yumi mas tok em long yia 1066 . "

translation.en: yet , the image of the vikings as being nothing more than raiding barbarians who wielded sword and ax is not complete .
translation.zu: tasol dispela tingting olsem ol i lain nogut bilong holim naip na akis bilong bagarapim ol samting na stil na em tasol , dispela tingting tasol i no stret olgeta .

translation.en: yes , the vikings proved to be masters not just of sail and sword but of plow and politics as well .
translation.zu: tru tumas , ol vaiking em ol man i gat save long raun long sip , na pait , na mekim wok gaden , na wok politik tu .

translation.en: as most modern historians use the term " viking " for all scandinavians of the viking era , we have adopted that term in this article .
translation.zu: planti saveman bilong nau i kolim dispela tok " vaiking " bilong makim olgeta lain skandinevia i bin stap long taim bilong ol vaiking , na mipela tu i bihainim dispela tingting insait long dispela stori .

translation.en: the origin of the term " viking " is obscure .
translation.zu: i hatwok liklik long save olsem wanem dispela tok " vaiking " i bin kamap .

translation.en: at l 'anse aux meadows on the northern tip of newfoundland , turf - covered norse buildings have been reconstructed , based on archaeological evidence found there in the early 1960 ' s .
translation.zu: long lansomdos medo long hap not tru bilong nufaunlan ol i skelim ol samting ol man i bin painim long 1960 na dispela save i helpim ol long wokim gen ol haus bilong ol man bilong nos i gat graun wantaim gras i stap olsem rup bilong en .

translation.en: this evidence indicates a viking presence a thousand years earlier , but there are doubts that this settlement was part of the legendary vinland . - see awake ! , july 8 , 1999 .
translation.zu: ol samting ol i painim i makim olsem inap 1,000 yia i go pinis , ol vaiking i bin stap long dispela hap , tasol i hatwok long tok olsem dispela hap i makim vinlan . - lukim kirap ! ( tok inglis ) bilong julai 8 , 1999 .

translation.en: vikings worshiped many mythical gods , including odin , thor , frey , freya , and hel .
translation.zu: ol vaiking i lotuim planti giaman god , olsem odin , tor , fre , freya na hel .

translation.en: odin , the god of wisdom and war , led the pantheon .
translation.zu: odin em i god bilong gutpela tingting na pait , na em i stap hetman bilong ol narapela god .

translation.en: his wife was frigga .
translation.zu: friga , em meri bilong em .

translation.en: thor was a slayer of giants and ruler of winds and rain .
translation.zu: tor em i god bilong kilim i dai ol traipela man , na god bilong bosim win na ren .

translation.en: norse mythology is the basis for the names of certain days of the week in english and some other languages .
translation.zu: nem bilong sampela de bilong wik long tok ples inglis na sampela narapela tok ples i kam long ol stori nating bilong ol lain nos .

translation.en: odin promised that those who died valiantly in battle would have a place in the celestial realm of asgard ( a home of the gods ) , in the great hall of valhalla .
translation.zu: odin i bin tok promis olsem ol lain i dai taim ol i givim bel long pait , bai i gat ples bilong ol antap long asgat ( ples bilong ol god ) , long bikpela haus bilong valhala .

translation.en: there they could feast and fight to their hearts ' content .
translation.zu: long dispela hap ol inap kisim bikpela kaikai na pait inap long laik bilong ol .

translation.en: viking nobles were often buried with a boat or with stones laid out in the form of a boat .
translation.zu: ol i save planim ol bikman bilong ol vaiking wantaim wanpela bot o ol ston ol i lainim bilong makim wanpela bot .

translation.en: a queen 's maid might be buried along with her .
translation.zu: taim ol i planim kwin , sampela taim ol bai planim wokmeri bilong em tu wantaim .

translation.en: viking warriors wore simple conical helmets made of metal or leather , if they chose to wear a helmet at all .
translation.zu: sapos ol i laik pasim hat , ol paitman bilong ol vaiking i bin pasim ol raunpela hat ol i wokim long ain o skin bilong bulmakau samting .

translation.en: london 's medieval zoo excavations beneath the famous tower of london have revealed new details of " a medieval menagerie which held an extraordinary array of animals , " reports the sunday times of london .
translation.zu: nius the sunday times bilong landon i tok olsem wok bilong digim graun i stap aninit long haus taua bilong landon i kamapim klia olsem " bipo tru i bin i gat ples bilong lukautim ol kain kain animal long en . "

translation.en: experts have been aware of the zoo 's existence for some time , but new research in royal , university , and church archives , along with information gleaned from the dig , has clarified a number of points .
translation.zu: inap longpela taim liklik ol man i save olsem dispela ples bilong lukautim ol animal i bin i stap , tasol ol nupela samting ol i skelim long ol olpela rait bilong yunivesiti na misin bilong king wantaim ol samting ol i painim taim ol i digim graun i kliaim sampela tingting .

translation.en: some animals were then transferred to the new zoo , while others were shipped to america .
translation.zu: olsem na ol i putim sampela animal bilong king i go long dispela nupela pak na sampela ol i salim i go long amerika .

translation.en: geoffrey parnell , chief archivist at the tower , says : " it was clearly london 's longest - running show , which entertained both royalty and commoners for centuries . "
translation.zu: geoffrey parnell , em man i save lukautim ol olpela rait bilong taua , em i tok olsem : " i no gat narapela kain ples olsem long landon i stap inap planti handet yia na givim amamas long ol lain bilong king na ol man nating tu . "

translation.en: three judges in the state of espírito santo , brazil , are testing a computer program that is designed to help dispense instant justice , reports new scientist magazine .
translation.zu: nius new scientist i tok , long espirito santo , brasil , i gat 3 - pela jas i wok long skelim wanpela program bilong kompiuta i bilong wokim kot hariap .

translation.en: the program , called the electronic judge , runs on a laptop computer .
translation.zu: dispela program ( electronic judge ) i wok long wanpela kompiuta i liklik .

translation.en: when a minor accident occurs , police call a judge and a court clerk to the accident scene .
translation.zu: taim ka i bam , ol polis i singautim wanpela jas na kuskus bilong kot long kam long dispela hap .

translation.en: the program is designed to help the human judge weigh the evidence and dispense justice right there on the spot .
translation.zu: program bilong kompiuta i bilong helpim jas long skelim ol samting na wokim kot long dispela taim stret .

translation.en: it does so by presenting the judge with a series of questions , such as " did the driver stop at the red light ? "
translation.zu: kompiuta i kamapim ol askim bilong helpim jas , olsem : " man i draivim ka i wet i stap taim lait i retpela ? "

translation.en: or , " had the driver been drinking alcohol above the acceptable limit of the law ? "
translation.zu: o , " man i draivim ka i winim mak lo i putim bilong dring bia samting na draiv ? "

translation.en: according to new scientist , the program can also issue " fines , order damages to be paid and even recommend jail sentences . "
translation.zu: olsem nius i tok , kompiuta inap long makim " pe bilong baim kot , makim man long baim kompensesen , na makim man i mas kalabus . "

translation.en: it is hoped that the computer program will help human judges to be more efficient and thus help to reduce the burden of brazil 's overloaded legal system .
translation.zu: ol i laik bai dispela kompiuta i helpim wok bilong ol jas i kamap gutpela moa na dispela bai daunim hevi bilong planti tumas man i wet kot long brasil .

translation.zu: nius the times of india i tok , wanpela man i tok promis long givim 500 lita wara 4 - pela taim long wik inap long 2 - pela mun long taim bilong bikpela san long ol man i baim wanpela aven , bokis ais , masin bilong wasim klos , o wanpela tv .

translation.en: scientists have been trying to answer that question for 40 years - that is , until recently .
translation.zu: inap 40 yia ol saientis i wok long painim bekim bilong dispela askim , tasol nau ol i painim bekim pinis .

translation.en: " it turns out that when enough pressure is applied at the proper angles , " reports the buffalo news , " the hardest known natural substance turns into graphite , the same carbon . . . from which it is formed . "
translation.zu: wanpela niuspepa ( the buffalo news ) i tok : " nau ol i kisim save olsem taim samting i gat bikpela hevi tru i krungutim daimon , dispela strongpela samting tru i kamap olsem grafait , em dispela marasin kabon . . . i bin kamapim daimon pastaim . "

translation.en: did you ever go to school ?
translation.zu: yu bin skul bipo ?

translation.en: most people can answer yes - but not everyone can .
translation.zu: planti manmeri inap tok yes long dispela askim - tasol olgeta i no inap tok olsem .

translation.en: as we enter the 21st century , untold millions of children are receiving no regular schooling .
translation.zu: long nau i gat planti milion pikinini ol i no insait long skul .

translation.en: this has been true for a long time , so that today close to one billion adults are illiterate .
translation.zu: dispela em i wanpela hevi bilong bipo yet , olsem na long nau i gat klostu wan bilion manmeri i bikpela pinis em ol i no save rit rait .

translation.en: yet , a good education is a basic need .
translation.zu: tasol skul em i samting yumi mas kisim .

translation.en: but how can a good education be possible without the proper resources ?
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem olgeta i ken kisim gutpela skul sapos i nogat ol samting bilong kamapim wanpela skul ?

translation.en: is such an education really available to everyone ?

translation.en: it is a time - honored " textbook " that is available , in whole or in part , in more than 2,200 languages of the world .
translation.zu: dispela tul em wanpela " buk bilong skul " i bilong bipo yet , na ol i tanim tok bilong buk olgeta o hap bilong en i go long 2,200 tok ples bilong graun .

translation.en: essentially everyone on earth has access to it in a language that he or she can understand .
translation.zu: klostu olgeta man i stap long graun i gat rot bilong kisim dispela buk long wanpela tok ples ol i save long en .

translation.en: it is the bible , a book that has been widely acclaimed as the most important book ever written .
translation.zu: em buk baibel , em wanpela buk ol man i tok em i nambawan buk , winim olgeta narapela buk .

translation.en: " everyone who has a thorough knowledge of the bible may truly be called educated , " wrote the early 20th - century scholar william lyon phelps .
translation.zu: wanpela saveman bilong taim bilong yumi , em william lyon phelps , em i tok : " ol man i save gut long ol tok bilong baibel , yumi ken tok ol i olsem man i bin go long skul .

translation.en: " no other learning or culture , no matter how extensive or elegant , can . . . form a proper substitute . "
translation.zu: i no gat narapela skul o wok bilong kisim planti save , maski em i bikpela save o gutpela save tru , dispela i no . . . gutpela wankain olsem skul yumi kisim long baibel . "

translation.en: the bible is a collection of books written over a period of some 1,600 years .
translation.zu: baibel em ol liklik buk ol i bungim wantaim , na ol man i bin raitim ol dispela buk insait long 1,600 yia .

translation.en: of this important library of books , phelps added : " our ideas , our wisdom , our philosophy , our literature , our art , our ideals , come more from the bible than from all other books put together . . . .
translation.zu: phelps i stori moa long ol dispela buk bilong baibel olsem : " ol tingting na save bilong yumi , ol buk na ol gutpela bilas samting yumi wokim , ol mak yumi laik winim ; baibel em i as bilong planti bilong ol dispela samting , winim olgeta narapela buk . . . .

translation.en: i believe a knowledge of the bible without a college course is more valuable than a college course without the bible . "
translation.zu: mi bilip olsem man i no skul long yunivesiti tasol em i save long baibel , dispela man i winim man i kisim skul long yunivesiti tasol em i no gat save long baibel . "

translation.en: today a phenomenal , bible - based educational work is being carried out worldwide by the christian community of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: long nau ol witnes bilong jehova i mekim bikpela wok tru bilong givim skul long ol man em baibel i as bilong en .

translation.en: such education goes beyond the basics of reading and writing .
translation.zu: kain skul olsem i no bilong lain long rit na rait tasol .

translation.en: in a positive way , it affects people 's outlook on the future , offering the basis for valid hope that what lies ahead will be far better than what lies behind .
translation.zu: em i helpim man long kisim gutpela tingting long ol samting i laik kamap long bihain , em i kamapim as na man i ken bilip tru olsem ol samting i laik kamap i winim tru ol samting i bin kamap pinis .

translation.en: please learn about this education - for - life program by reading the following article .
translation.zu: plis , ritim stori i kamap bihain na kisim save moa long dispela kain skul bilong helpim i stap bilong yumi .

translation.en: jehovah 's witnesses too have high regard for the bible .
translation.zu: ol witnes bilong jehova tu i pilim olsem baibel em i bikpela samting .

translation.en: they are convinced that those who apply its principles become better husbands , better wives , better children - yes , the best people in the world .
translation.zu: olsem na ol witnes i bihainim tok bilong jisas krais : " yupela i mas i go mekim olgeta lain manmeri i kamap disaipel bilong mi . . . .

translation.en: in the pursuit of this goal of teaching people the bible , jehovah 's witnesses have embarked on what may be the most widespread educational campaign in human history .
translation.zu: ol witnes bilong jehova i kirapim pinis wanpela wok bilong inapim dispela mak bilong lainim ol manmeri long baibel . ating kirap long bipo yet na i kam inap long nau i no gat kain wok olsem bilong skulim bikpela lain manmeri i stap long olgeta hap .

translation.en: how far - reaching is it ?
translation.zu: dispela wok i bikpela olsem wanem ?

translation.en: in their public ministry , the witnesses use bible translations that are available in hundreds of languages .
translation.zu: long wok autim tok bilong ol , ol witnes i save yusim ol baibel bilong planti handet narapela narapela tok ples .

translation.en: but they have also produced the new world translation of the holy scriptures in 21 languages and the new world translation of the christian greek scriptures ( so - called new testament ) in 16 additional languages .
translation.zu: na tu , ol i bin wokim baibel new world translation of the holy scriptures long 21 tok ples , na baibel new world translation of the christian greek scriptures ( hap ol i kolim nupela testamen ) long 16 narapela tok ples .

translation.en: also , they are in the process of translating this bible into 11 more languages .
translation.zu: na long nau ol i wok long tanim tok bilong dispela baibel i go long 11 - pela tok ples moa .

translation.en: the witnesses also produce literature that enhances appreciation for the bible and contributes to a better understanding of it .
translation.zu: na tu , ol witnes i wokim ol buk na nius i bilong kirapim man long tingim tok bilong baibel na kisim gutpela save moa long insait bilong en .

translation.en: for example , this journal , awake ! , is published in 82 languages , and an average of more than 20,380,000 copies of each issue are printed .
translation.zu: olsem : ol i wokim nius kirap ! long 82 tok ples , na averes namba bilong ol nupela kopi ol i prinim i winim 20,380,000 .

translation.en: its companion magazine , the watchtower , has an average printing of 22,398,000 copies per issue in 137 languages .
translation.zu: poroman bilong dispela nius , em wastaua , na averes namba bilong ol nupela kopi ol i prinim i olsem 22,398,000 long 137 tok ples .

translation.en: this amounts to the printing of well over a billion copies of these magazines each year !
translation.zu: long olgeta yia , namba bilong ol dispela nius ol i wokim i winim wan bilion !

translation.en: moreover , the watchtower is printed simultaneously in 124 of these languages and awake !
translation.zu: na tu , ol inap prinim nius wastaua bilong 124 narapela narapela tok ples long wankain taim , na nius kirap !

translation.en: so , worldwide the information in these journals is being read by people of many language groups at the same time in their own language .
translation.zu: olsem na long olgeta hap bilong graun na long wankain taim , bikpela lain manmeri bilong narapela narapela tok ples , ol i save ritim ol dispela nius long tok ples bilong ol yet .

translation.en: in addition , in recent decades jehovah 's witnesses have produced hundreds of millions of copies of bible - study aids .
translation.zu: narapela samting tu ol witnes bilong jehova i bin kamapim long taim bilong yumi , em planti handet milion buk bilong helpim ol man long stadi long baibel .

translation.en: the book the truth that leads to eternal life had a printing of over 107 million copies .
translation.zu: ol i bin prinim 107 milion kopi bilong buk tok i tru i bringim man long laip oltaim .

translation.en: later , you can live forever in paradise on earth surpassed 81 million copies , and more recently , knowledge that leads to everlasting life has surpassed 75 million copies in 146 languages .
translation.zu: bihain , namba bilong buk yu inap i stap oltaim long paradais long graun i winim 81 milion , na i no longtaim i go pinis na namba bilong buk save i bringim man long laip oltaim i winim 75 milion long 146 tok ples .

translation.en: also , over 113 million copies of the 32 - page brochure what does god require of us ?
translation.zu: na tu , namba bilong ol nius i gat 32 pes long en , em god i laik yumi mas mekim wanem ?

translation.en: other books have been produced to fill particular needs .
translation.zu: ol i bin kamapim sampela narapela buk i bilong helpim sampela lain stret .

translation.en: my book of bible stories , designed for children , has reached a printing of over 51 million .
translation.zu: olsem buk baibel stori buk bilong mi i bilong ol pikinini , na namba bilong ol kopi ol i bin prinim i winim 51 milion .

translation.en: two books prepared especially with teenagers in mind , your youth - getting the best out of it and questions young people ask - answers that work , have a combined printing of over 53 million .
translation.zu: tupela buk ol i wokim bilong ol yangpela em rot bilong i stap amamas taim yu yangpela yet na sampela askim bilong ol yangpela - ol gutpela bekim , na namba bilong ol kopi ol i bin prinim bilong dispela tupela buk i winim 53 milion .

translation.en: and the secret of family happiness , which has assisted millions of families to cope with their problems , has been printed in 115 languages .
translation.zu: na buk rot bilong famili i ken stap amamas i bin helpim planti milion famili long karim ol hevi bilong ol , em ol i bin prinim long 115 tok ples .

translation.en: four other publications released since 1985 that build faith especially in the creator , his son , and the bible have a combined printing of over 117 million copies .
translation.zu: na i gat fopela narapela buk ol i bin kamapim kirap long 1985 i go inap long 1998 , em ol buk i bilong helpim man long bilip tru long man i bin wokim yumi , na pikinini bilong em , na baibel .

translation.en: these are life - how did it get here ?
translation.zu: em buk life - how did it get here ?

translation.en: by evolution or by creation ? , the greatest man who ever lived , the bible - god 's word or man 's ? , and is there a creator who cares about you ?
translation.zu: by evolution or by creation ? , nambawan man tru i winim olgeta narapela man , the bible - god 's word or man 's ? , na is there a creator who cares about you ?

translation.en: today bible - based publications produced by jehovah 's witnesses are available in 353 languages , and some of these will be released soon in an additional 38 languages .
translation.zu: long nau ol witnes bilong jehova i kamapim ol buk na nius bilong baibel long 353 tok ples , na i no longtaim na ol bai kamapim sampela bilong ol dispela buk na nius long 38 tok ples moa .

translation.en: indeed , well over 20 billion books , booklets , brochures , and magazines have been printed by jehovah 's witnesses since 1970 !
translation.zu: tru tumas , kirap long 1970 i kam inap long nau , namba bilong ol buk , liklik buk , nius , na ol magasin ol witnes i bin prinim i winim 20 bilion !

translation.en: but how has all of this become possible , and how are people 's lives affected ?
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem ol inap mekim ol dispela wok , na dispela wok i mekim wanem long i stap bilong ol manmeri ?

translation.en: why in their own languages
translation.zu: long tok ples bilong ol man

translation.en: as you can well imagine , it takes a huge coordinated effort to produce quality literature simultaneously in over a hundred languages .
translation.zu: ating yu ken save olsem em i bikpela wok tru long stretim ol samting bilong kamapim ol gutpela buk na nius long wankain taim na long wan handet samting tok ples .

translation.en: translation teams , who have volunteered their time and skills , utilize computer systems to achieve high levels of quality , accuracy , and speed .
translation.zu: ol lain bilong tanim tok i volantia na mekim wok long taim na save bilong ol , na ol i yusim ol kompiuta bilong tanim gut ol tok , na tanim stret , na mekim hariap .

translation.en: thus , even for languages in which there is a limited staff of translators , publications are made available quickly .
translation.zu: olsem na maski lain bilong tanim sampela tok ples i no bikpela tumas , ol buk na nius i save redi hariap .

translation.en: presently , more than 1,950 men and women are involved in this global , not - for - profit translation work .
translation.zu: long nau , winim 1,950 man na meri i insait long wok bilong tanim tok , dispela wok i kamap long olgeta hap na i no bilong kisim mani .

translation.en: is it really worth it , since so many who speak the lesser - known languages also have some knowledge of a major one ?
translation.zu: dispela askim i stret , long wanem , planti man i save mekim wok long ol liklik tok ples , ol i gat sampela save long wanpela bikpela tok ples tu .

translation.en: jehovah 's witnesses have discovered that the effort truly is worthwhile for a reason identified by william tyndale , a renowned bible translator of the 16th century .
translation.zu: ol witnes bilong jehova i luksave olsem dispela wok bilong tanim tok i karim gutpela kaikai . wiliam tindel i kamapim as bilong dispela samting , em wanpela man bilong yia 1500 samting i holim biknem long wok bilong tanim tok bilong baibel .

translation.en: he wrote : " i had perceived by experience how that it was impossible to establish the lay people in any truth , except the scripture were plainly laid before their eyes in their mother tongue , that they might see the process , order , and meaning of the text . "
translation.zu: em i bin tok : " mi lukim pinis olsem , i gat wanpela rot tasol na ol man i no holim wok lotu ol inap kisim save long tok i tru bilong baibel - ol i mas holim baibel long tok ples bilong ol yet bambai ol inap kisim gut dispela tok , na wanem ol stori bilong en i kamap pastaim na wanem ol stori i kamap bihain , na ol mining bilong en . "

translation.en: true , it has not always been possible for people to have bible publications in their mother tongue .
translation.zu: tru , i no olsem olgeta taim ol manmeri i bin i gat rot long kisim ol buk samting bilong baibel long tok ples bilong ol .

translation.en: but when these can be provided , bible truths touch their hearts more quickly and more deeply .
translation.zu: tasol taim ol inap kisim , ol tok bilong baibel i go hariap moa long bel bilong ol .

translation.en: this has been noted in countries of the former soviet union where ethnic peoples speak scores of native languages .
translation.zu: samting olsem i bin kamap long ol kantri em bipo soviet yunion i bin bosim , long ol dispela kantri ol i save mekim wok long planti narapela narapela tok ples .

translation.en: during the early part of the last century , many of these peoples were absorbed into the soviet union and were taught - and required to use - the russian language .
translation.zu: long 1922 samting , gavman bilong soviet yunion i bin kirap bosim planti bilong ol dispela manmeri na lainim ol long tok ples rasia , na tokim ol long ol i mas mekim wok long en .

translation.en: thus , they read and write russian and , at the same time , speak their native tongue .
translation.zu: olsem na ol manmeri i rit na rait long tok rasia , tasol ol i yusim tok ples bilong ol yet taim ol i toktok .

translation.en: especially since the collapse of the soviet union in 1991 , many of these people want to use their mother tongue .
translation.zu: tasol kirap long taim strong bilong gavman bilong soviet yunion i pinis long 1991 , planti bilong ol dispela manmeri i laik mekim wok long tok ples bilong ol yet .

translation.en: this is true for those whose native language is adyghe , altai , belorussian , georgian , kirghiz , komi , ossetian , tuvinian , or any one of dozens of others .
translation.zu: em ol manmeri em tok ples bilong ol em adye , altai , belorasia , jojia , kirhis , komi , osetia , tuvinia , na planti narapela tok ples .

translation.en: on the other hand , literature in their local vernacular has remarkable appeal .
translation.zu: tasol ol i laikim tru ol buk samting i stap long tok ples bilong ol yet .

translation.en: " it 's good that you are starting to produce literature in our language , " noted one who received a bible tract in altai .
translation.zu: wanpela man i bin kisim liklik nius long tok altai na tok : " i gutpela tru yupela i kirap na wokim ol nius long tok ples bilong mipela yet . "

translation.en: another example of this is greenland , an arctic island with a population of only about 60,000 people .
translation.zu: wankain samting i bin kamap long grinlan , em wanpela ailan bilong aktik i gat samting olsem 60,000 manmeri tasol i stap long en .

translation.en: both the watchtower and awake !
translation.zu: i gat nius wastaua na kirap !

translation.en: are printed in greenlandic , and these magazines are quite popular - as are other publications that jehovah 's witnesses print in the greenlandic language .
translation.zu: long tok grinlan , na planti i save laikim ol dispela nius na ol narapela buk samting ol witnes bilong jehova i kamapim long tok grinlan .

translation.en: in fact , such literature can be found in many homes in the island 's most distant settlements .
translation.zu: tru tumas , sampela man bilong ol ples i longwe tru long dispela ailan ol i holim sampela bilong ol dispela nius .

translation.en: in the south pacific , some 7,000 people speak nauruan , 4,500 tokelauan , and 12,000 rotuman .
translation.zu: long saut pasifik , i gat 7,000 manmeri i mekim tok nauru , 4,500 i mekim tok tokelau , na 12,000 i mekim tok rotuman .

translation.en: the witnesses now produce bible tracts and brochures in those languages as well as monthly editions of the watchtower in niuean , spoken by about 8,000 , and tuvaluan , spoken by some 11,000 .
translation.zu: ol witnes i save wokim ol nius bilong baibel long ol dispela tok ples , na tu , ol i kamapim nius wastaua long olgeta mun long tok nue , em tok ples bilong 8,000 manmeri , na tok tuvalu , em tok ples bilong 11,000 manmeri .

translation.en: jehovah 's witnesses are , in fact , one of the largest publishers of printed material in little - known languages , producing bible literature in such tongues as bislama , hiri motu , papiamento , mauritian creole , new guinea pidgin , seychelles - creole , solomon islands pidgin , and scores of others .
translation.zu: ol witnes bilong jehova i mekim bikpela wok bilong kamapim ol buk samting long ol tok ples em planti man i no save long en , em ol buk samting bilong baibel long tok ples bislama , hiri motu , papiamento , tok kriol bilong morisis na seisel , tok pisin bilong papua niugini na ol ailan solomon , na planti narapela liklik tok ples .

translation.en: yet , literacy rates for such regions may be high .
translation.zu: tasol long sampela ples olsem planti man i save long rit .

translation.en: and the bible in the local language is often one of the few publications available to the local residents .
translation.zu: na planti taim em baibel tasol i stap long tok ples bilong ol .

translation.en: in fact , there is not even a newspaper in some of these languages , since producing one is not commercially viable .
translation.zu: i no gat niuspepa long sampela bilong ol dispela liklik tok ples , long wanem , i no gat planti man bilong baim .

translation.en: because jehovah 's witnesses provide literature that improves the quality of people 's lives , many people have praised their translation efforts .
translation.zu: ol buk ol witnes bilong jehova i kamapim i save helpim sindaun bilong ol man i kamap gutpela moa , olsem na planti man i litimapim wok bilong ol witnes long tanim tok .

translation.en: when the quarterly edition of awake !
translation.zu: taim ol i kirap long kamapim kirap !

translation.en: was started in the samoan language , local newspapers as well as the national tv news carried the story .
translation.zu: long 4 - pela taim long yia long tok ples samoa , ol niuspepa na nius bilong tv bilong dispela ples i stori long dispela samting .

translation.en: during the broadcast the cover of awake !
translation.zu: long tv ol i soim karamap bilong kirap !

translation.en: was shown , and the magazine was opened to each article .
translation.zu: na opim ol pes na kamapim insait bilong wan wan stori bilong en .

translation.en: these were then featured one at a time . significantly , in some countries translators of witness publications are regularly consulted by local language institutes about grammar , orthography , coinage of new terms , and so on .
translation.zu: na long sampela kantri ol witnes i mekim wok bilong tanim tok ol i save kisim ol askim long ol lain bilong skelim tok ples , na ol dispela lain i laik save long ol lo bilong tok ples , pasin bilong raitim tok , kamapim sampela nupela tok , na sampela narapela samting .

translation.en: clearly , the free educational work done by jehovah 's witnesses has touched the lives of many more people than just those who have become active members of their congregations .
translation.zu: tru tumas , wok ol witnes bilong jehova i mekim bilong skulim ol man na no gat pe , dispela i bin mekim bikpela samting long i stap bilong planti manmeri , na i no bilong ol lain i kamap wanlotu bilong ol tasol .

translation.en: yet , as noted in the preceding article , close to one billion adults - nearly one sixth of the world 's population - are illiterate .
translation.zu: tasol olsem stori paslain long dispela i bin kamapim , i gat samting olsem wan bilion manmeri i bikpela pinis - em bikpela hap tru bilong olgeta manmeri bilong graun - ol i no save long rit rait .

translation.en: filling basic educational needs
translation.zu: wok bilong skulim ol man

translation.en: they have even developed their own instruction manuals , such as the publication apply yourself to reading and writing , which has been produced in 28 languages .
translation.zu: ol i bin wokim ol buk ol yet i yusim bilong skulim ol man , olsem buk wok strong long lain long rit na rait , ol i kamapim pinis dispela liklik buk long 28 tok ples .

translation.en: many thousands of individuals , including women and the elderly , have been helped to become literate by means of these classes .
translation.zu: planti tausen manmeri , na ol lapun tu i bin lain long rit long rot bilong dispela skul .

translation.en: in burundi , jehovah 's witnesses have conducted literacy classes that have assisted hundreds of people to read and write .
translation.zu: long barundi , ol witnes bilong jehova i bin lukautim ol skul bilong rit na rait na ol i bin helpim planti handet manmeri long lain long rit na rait .

translation.en: the following report was received regarding literacy classes in some 700 congregations of jehovah 's witnesses in mozambique : " over the past four years , 5,089 students have graduated , and at present we have 4,000 enrolled . "
translation.zu: wanpela ripot i stori long ol skul bilong rit rait long 700 kongrigesen bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long mosambik i tok olsem : " insait long laspela 4 - pela yia i go pinis , 5,089 sumatin i winim pinis dispela skul , na long nau mipela i gat 4,000 sumatin i insait long en . "

translation.en: one student wrote : " i would like to express my sincere appreciation for the school . . .
translation.zu: wanpela sumatin i salim pas i tok olsem : " mi laik kamapim bikpela tok tenkyu bilong mi long dispela skul . . .

translation.en: i was a person who knew nothing .
translation.zu: mi bin stap olsem wanpela man i no gat save .

translation.en: since 1946 , when records began to be kept in mexico , over 143,000 people there have been taught to read and write in special schools established to teach these skills .
translation.zu: kirap long 1946 , taim ol i kirap long raitim namba bilong ol man i bin insait long ol skul i kamap long meksiko , winim 143,000 manmeri i bin lain long rit na rait .

translation.en: a 63 - year - old woman wrote : " i am very grateful to jehovah 's witnesses , who taught me how to read and write .
translation.zu: wanpela meri i gat 63 krismas i raitim pas i tok olsem : " mi amamas tru long ol witnes bilong jehova , ol i lainim mi long rit na rait .

translation.en: now , though , i can go to the bible for counsel , and i have found happiness in its message . "
translation.zu: tasol nau , mi ken ritim baibel na kisim gutpela tok bilong helpim mi , na ol tok bilong en i givim amamas long mi . "

translation.en: in the south american country of brazil , the witnesses have also taught thousands to read and write .
translation.zu: long kantri brasil i stap long saut amerika , ol witnes i bin skulim planti tausen man long rit rait .

translation.en: " learning to read was like being freed from chains after many years , " said one 64 - year - old .
translation.zu: narapela meri i gat 64 krismas em i tok : " taim mi lain long rit , i olsem wanpela i bin rausim ol sen i bin pasin mi inap planti yia pinis .

translation.en: " i now have access to all kinds of information .
translation.zu: nau rot i op long mi ken kisim save long planti samting .

translation.en: often bible teachers who are jehovah 's witnesses help their students on an individual basis to learn to read .
translation.zu: planti witnes bilong jehova i mekim wok tisa na lainim ol man wan wan long baibel , na helpim ol dispela sumatin bilong ol long lain long rit .

translation.en: in the philippines , martina was in her 80 ' s when a witness visited her .
translation.zu: long kantri filipin , wanpela meri , em martina , em i gat 80 krismas taim ol witnes i kam lukim em .

translation.en: martina wanted a regular bible study , but she did not know how to read .
translation.zu: martina i laik stadi long baibel , tasol em i no save long rit .

translation.en: with the help of her bible teacher , martina made progress , and with additional training at the local congregation , she became qualified to use the bible in teaching others .
translation.zu: long helpim martina i kisim long tisa bilong em long baibel na long sampela skul moa bilong kongrigesen i stap long ples bilong em , martina i lain long mekim wok long baibel bilong skulim ol narapela .

translation.en: clearly , the capacity to become literate is present among all peoples .
translation.zu: tru tumas , ol lain i stap long olgeta hap ol inap lain long rit na rait .

translation.en: yet we might ask , does knowledge from the bible regarding god and his purposes actually benefit people ?
translation.zu: tasol ating yumi gat askim olsem : save yumi kisim long baibel long god na laik bilong em , dispela inap helpim ol manmeri o nogat ?

translation.en: the final article of this series will answer that question .
translation.zu: laspela stori bilong ol dispela stori bilong skul bai bekim dispela askim .

translation.zu: [ blok / piksa long pes 9 ]

translation.en: " i cannot express in words . . .
translation.zu: " mi no inap mekim wanpela tok . . .

translation.en: governmental authorities , academics , and ordinary people have all taken note of the efforts of jehovah 's witnesses to promote the education of people worldwide .
translation.zu: ol bikman bilong gavman , ol tisa , na ol narapela manmeri , ol i luksave long wok ol witnes bilong jehova i bin mekim bilong kirapim ol manmeri long olgeta hap long kisim skul .

translation.en: here is a sampling of their comments :
translation.zu: sampela tok bilong ol i stap daunbilo :

translation.en: " my government and i are especially happy because this book [ you can live forever in paradise on earth , in tuvaluan ] is yet another new and vital addition to the essential ' riches ' of tuvalu .
translation.zu: " mi yet na gavman bilong mi i amamas tru long buk [ yu inap i stap oltaim long paradais long graun , long tok tuvalu ] , long wanem , em i narapela nupela samting i ' dia tumas ' bilong tuvalu .

translation.en: you should be very happy with the part that you have played - an excellent part in the building up of the spiritual life of the people of this nation .
translation.zu: yupela i ken amamas tru long wok yupela i bin mekim - em i gutpela wok tru bilong helpim ol man bilong dispela kantri long ol samting bilong spirit .

translation.en: it is my belief that this work will be written into the history of tuvalu with regard to the printing of educational books . " - dr .
translation.zu: mi bilip olsem dispela wok bilong prinim ol buk bilong skulim ol man bai i stap insait long stori bilong ol bikpela samting i bin kamap long tuvalu . " - dokta t .

translation.en: t . puapua , former prime minister of tuvalu , south pacific .
translation.zu: puapua , praim minista bilong tuvalu long bipo , long saut pasifik .

translation.en: " jehovah 's witnesses have a very active publishing programme , which uses the most up - to - date technology in the south pacific . . . .
translation.zu: " ol witnes bilong jehova i mekim bikpela wok bilong prinim ol buk , ol i yusim ol kompiuta samting i nambawan long hap bilong saut pasifik . . . .

translation.en: this publishing feat is all the more remarkable when one considers the vagaries of communication . . . among the pacific islands . " - linda crowl , university of the south pacific , suva , fiji .
translation.zu: man bai i pilim tru bikpela wok ol i mekim sapos em i tingim olsem sampela taim ol telefon , na redio samting i no wok gut tumas . . . long ol ailan i stap long solwara pasifik . " - linda crowl , yunivesiti bilong saut pasifik , long suva , fiji .

translation.en: " how wonderful and powerful is the book the secret of family happiness in the isoko language !
translation.zu: " buk rot bilong famili i ken stap amamas long tok isoko i gutpela tru na i gat bikpela strong bilong helpim ol man !

translation.en: we thank the volunteers working in the isoko translation team for helping us get the full understanding of the book . " - c.o.a . , nigeria .
translation.zu: mipela i laik tok tenkyu long ol wok ol volantia bilong tanim tok isoko i bin mekim bilong helpim mipela long save gut long ol tok bilong dispela buk . " - c.o.a . , naijiria .

translation.en: " i cannot express in words how grateful i am for this translation of the bible [ the new world translation in serbian ] , which is easy to understand .
translation.zu: " mi no inap mekim wanpela tok i kamapim gut bikpela tenkyu bilong mi long baibel [ new world translation long tok serbia ] , em tok bilong dispela baibel i no hatwok long kisim gut .

translation.en: in the past , i tried to read the whole bible , but i always found myself giving up quickly because i was not able to understand the language .
translation.zu: bipo mi bin traim ritim baibel olgeta , tasol mi bai kirap long ritim na i no longtaim mi bai lusim gen , long wanem , mi no inap klia gut long tok bilong en .

translation.en: i am now able to read this unique translation and to understand it ! " - j . a . , yugoslavia .
translation.zu: nau mi inap ritim dispela nupela baibel na save gut long ol tok bilong en ! " - j.a . , yugoslavia .

translation.en: " thank you for the fine , instructive , and upbuilding publications translated into the tiv language .
translation.zu: " tenkyu long ol gutpela buk yupela i tanim long tok tiv , ol dispela buk i skulim na strongim mipela .

translation.en: in fact , words cannot express all the benefits and the encouragement derived from these books and brochures .
translation.zu: tru tumas , ol tok bilong mi i sot bilong kamapim gut wok ol dispela buk na nius i mekim bilong helpim na strongim mipela .

translation.en: these publications have reached thousands . " - p.t.s . , nigeria .
translation.zu: planti tausen i bin ritim ol dispela buk samting . " - p.t.s . , naijiria .
