translation.en: " the bible [ is ] the supreme guide in the art of living . " - thomas tiplady , 1924 .
translation.zu: " baibel [ em i ] nambawan gutpela samting bilong stiaim wokabaut bilong yumi . " - thomas tiplady , 1924 .

translation.en: it is no exaggeration to say that a bible - based education can transform lives .
translation.zu: mipela i no giaman taim mipela i tok , skul man i kisim long baibel inap kamapim bikpela senis long laip bilong em .

translation.en: a single parent from the country of namibia wrote to the south africa branch of jehovah 's witnesses :
translation.zu: wanpela mama wanpis bilong namibia i bin raitim pas i go long brens - ofis bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long saut afrika na tok olsem :

translation.en: " i am 29 years old , and i read the book questions young people ask - answers that work in just two days .
translation.zu: " mi gat 29 krismas , na insait long 2 - pela de tasol mi ritim buk sampela askim bilong ol yangpela - ol gutpela bekim .

translation.en: we are suffering very much .
translation.zu: mipela i karim bikpela hevi tru .

translation.en: i sometimes used to think it would be better to kill them and then myself .
translation.zu: bipo mi bin ting olsem em bai i gutpela sapos mi kilim i dai tupela pikinini na mi yet .

translation.en: but when i got this book , i changed my mind .
translation.zu: tasol taim mi kisim dispela buk , mi senisim tingting bilong mi .

translation.en: please help me with a free bible study . "
translation.zu: plis helpim mi long rot bilong baibel - stadi kos i no gat pe . "

translation.en: the bible is a guidebook that can help people succeed in every area of life - in relationships with their family , their workmates , and people in the community .
translation.zu: baibel em i wanpela buk bilong soim rot long man , em inap mekim olgeta samting long i stap bilong em i kamap gutpela - i stap bilong em wantaim famili , ol wanwok , na ol narapela manmeri bilong komiuniti .

translation.en: it is a book that deals realistically with life .
translation.zu: em i wanpela buk i kamapim ol tok i stret long i stap bilong man .

translation.en: as you read it , you will find that it is full of accounts about real people .
translation.zu: taim yu ritim baibel , yu bai luksave olsem dispela buk i gat planti stori bilong ol man i bin stap tru tru long bipo .

translation.en: you will see what made the lives of some happy and rewarding and of others painful and miserable .
translation.zu: yu bai kisim save long ol samting i bin mekim na sampela man i stap gut na amamas , na sampela narapela man i stap nogut na bel hevi .

translation.en: it will become plain to you which things are worthwhile and which are not .
translation.zu: ol samting i gutpela long mekim na ol samting i no gutpela long mekim bai i kamap ples klia .

translation.en: education for life now
translation.zu: skul bilong helpim yu long nau

translation.en: the bible emphasizes the importance of practical wisdom .
translation.zu: baibel i tok gutpela tingting em i bikpela samting .

translation.en: it says : " wisdom is the prime thing . acquire wisdom . "
translation.zu: em i tok olsem : " nambawan samting yu mas kisim , em i gutpela tingting . "

translation.en: how does our creator , jehovah god , give wisdom generously ?
translation.zu: man bilong wokim olgeta samting , em god jehova , i givim gutpela tingting long yumi olsem wanem ?

translation.en: he does so by means of his word , the bible , which he encourages us to read .
translation.zu: em i mekim olsem long rot bilong tok bilong em i stap long baibel , em i kirapim yumi long ritim dispela tok .

translation.en: god appeals : " my son , if you will receive my sayings and treasure up my own commandments with yourself , so as to pay attention to wisdom . . . , you will understand the fear of jehovah , and you will find the very knowledge of god .
translation.zu: god i tok : " pikinini , yu mas harim tok bilong mi na putim gut long tingting bilong yu . yu mas putim yau gut long olgeta tok i save givim yu gutpela tingting . . . , bai yu save tru long pasin bilong stap aninit long bikpela , na bai yu save gut long god .

translation.en: take , for example , the matter of coping with poverty .
translation.zu: olsem : tingim hevi bilong stap rabis .

translation.en: thus , such vices as the use of tobacco and overindulgence in alcoholic beverages are clearly contrary to bible principles . - proverbs 6 : 6 - 11 ; 10 : 26 ; 23 : 19 - 21 ; 2 corinthians 7 : 1 .
translation.zu: olsem na ol pasin nogut olsem pasin bilong smok na dring planti tumas bia samting i no stret liklik wantaim ol lo bilong baibel . - sindaun 6 : 6 - 11 ; 10 : 26 ; 23 : 19 - 21 ; 2 korin 7 : 1 .

translation.en: what about the effect that our companions can have on our lives ?
translation.zu: ol poroman inap mekim wanem long i stap bilong yumi ?

translation.en: have you observed that peer pressure has often led people - young and old alike - into drunkenness , drug abuse , and immorality ?
translation.zu: yu bin lukim pasin bilong ol wanlain long pulim man - ol yangpela na ol lapun tu - long dring spak , kisim ol drak , na pamuk ?

translation.en: yes , if we mix with ones who practice such things , we will become like them , even as the bible says : " bad associations spoil useful habits . " - 1 corinthians 15 : 33 .
translation.zu: tru tumas , sapos yumi poroman wantaim ol lain i bihainim ol dispela kain pasin , yumi tu bai kamap kain man olsem , olsem baibel i tok : " sapos yumi poroman wantaim ol man nogut , bai ol i bagarapim gutpela pasin bilong yumi . " - 1 korin 15 : 33 .

translation.en: surely , all of us want to be happy .
translation.zu: yumi olgeta i laik stap amamas , a ?

translation.en: but how is that possible ?
translation.zu: tasol yumi ken mekim wanem bilong stap olsem ?

translation.en: did you realize that the bible says that it is not necessarily things that can make us happy but , rather , proper attitudes and relationships , particularly a good relationship with god ?
translation.zu: ating yu save olsem baibel i tok ol mani kago samting bai i no inap mekim yumi i stap amamas , tasol yumi bai kisim amamas long rot bilong stretpela tingting na pasin bilong stap gut wantaim ol narapela , na moa yet taim yumi stap gut wantaim god .

translation.en: jesus christ , in his famous sermon on the mount , said that those who are truly happy are " conscious of their spiritual need , " " mild - tempered , " " thirsting for righteousness , " " merciful , " " pure in heart , " and " peaceable . " - matthew 5 : 1 - 9 .
translation.zu: long tok bilong em antap long maunten , jisas krais i stori long ol man i stap amamas tru , em ol manmeri " i save , ol i stap rabis tru long ol samting bilong god , " na ol manmeri i " daunim nem bilong ol yet , " " laikim tumas long bihainim stretpela pasin , " " marimari , " " bel bilong ol i klin , " na " mekim dai ol kros na pait . " - matyu 5 : 1 - 9 .

translation.en: when you think deeply about the teachings of the bible , you will appreciate how they can help guide our lives .
translation.zu: taim yu skelim gut ol samting baibel i save skulim yumi long en , bai yu kisim save olsem wanem ol tok bilong en inap stiaim wokabaut bilong yumi .

translation.en: as a source of advice , the bible is unique .
translation.zu: baibel em i nambawan gutpela buk bilong givim gutpela tingting .

translation.en: its counsel is always beneficial - it is never merely theoretical and never works to our harm .
translation.zu: oltaim tok bilong en i gutpela bilong helpim yumi , na i wok gut , na i no gat wanpela taim em bai bagarapim yumi .

translation.en: those who apply what the bible advises always benefit .
translation.zu: ol manmeri i bihainim ol tok bilong baibel , oltaim dispela bai helpim ol .

translation.en: yet , in addition to being of benefit to us right now , the bible provides hope for life in the future .
translation.zu: baibel i bilong helpim yumi long nau , tasol tu baibel i helpim yumi long bilip long ol gutpela samting bai kamap bihain .

translation.en: it tells of a dramatic cleansing of the earth and a transforming of it into a gorgeous home for those who serve god .
translation.zu: baibel i stori long wanpela bikpela senis bai kamap long dispela graun na graun bai kamap olsem gutpela ples tru bilong ol wokboi bilong god .

translation.en: note this heartwarming account of the future : " look !
translation.zu: tingim tok i bilong mekim gut tru bel bilong man , olsem : " harim .

translation.en: the tent of god is with mankind , and he will reside with them , and they will be his peoples .
translation.zu: nau haus bilong god i stap wantaim ol manmeri . em bai i stap namel long ol , na ol bai i stap ol lain manmeri bilong em .

translation.en: the former things have passed away . " - revelation 21 : 3 , 4 ; proverbs 2 : 21 , 22 .
translation.zu: ol dispela samting bilong bipo ol i pinis olgeta . " - kth 21 : 3 , 4 ; sindaun 2 : 21 , 22 .

translation.en: just think : no more sickly children , no more starvation , no more dreaded diseases that sap the body 's strength , no more biting pain !
translation.zu: tingim : bai i no gat moa ol pikinini i sik , bikpela hangre , ol sik nogut i save pinisim olgeta strong bilong man , na bai i no gat moa ol bikpela pen !

translation.en: tears of frustration , disappointment , and grief will vanish , as the conditions causing such things will be changed or removed .
translation.zu: krai bilong taim bel i bagarap , na krai bilong bikpela bel hevi bai pinis taim ol samting i kamapim ol dispela hevi i senis o i no stap moa .

translation.en: since willfully wicked people will have been destroyed by god 's angelic forces , the thieves , murderers , liars , and others who make life insecure will no longer exist .
translation.zu: ol ensel bilong god bai bagarapim ol manmeri i laik bihainim ol pasin nogut , olsem na ol stilman , ol kilman , ol man bilong giaman , na ol man i mekim ol pasin i pretim ol narapela , olgeta kain man olsem bai i no stap moa .

translation.en: people will be able to have their own homes and enjoy them in security . - isaiah 25 : 8 , 9 ; 33 : 24 ; 65 : 17 - 25 .
translation.zu: ol manmeri bai kisim haus bilong ol yet na stap amamas na bel isi long en . - aisaia 25 : 8 , 9 ; 33 : 24 ; 65 : 17 - 25 .

translation.en: does that sound good to you ?
translation.zu: yu laikim ol dispela tok ?

translation.en: would you like to learn more about applying bible principles so that you can benefit yourself now and in the future ?
translation.zu: yu laik kisim sampela save moa long pasin bilong bihainim ol lo bilong baibel bilong kisim sampela helpim long nau na long bihain tu ?

translation.en: if so , please contact jehovah 's witnesses , and they will be glad to include you and your family in their global " education for life " program .
translation.zu: sapos olsem , singautim ol witnes bilong jehova long kam lukim yu , ol bai amamas long helpim yu na famili bilong yu long insait long " skul bilong kisim laip " ol i kamapim long olgeta hap bilong graun .

translation.en: the legal charter of the watch tower bible and tract society was officially recorded in pennsylvania , u.s.a . , on december 15 , 1884 .
translation.zu: long disemba 15 , 1884 , ol i rejistaim sosaiti was taua long gavman , long pensilvenia , amerika .

translation.en: * there the headquarters of this society was established .
translation.zu: * long dispela hap ol i kamapim hetkota bilong dispela sosaiti .

translation.en: later , on april 23 , 1900 , property for the first branch office was secured in london , england .
translation.zu: bihain , long epril 23 , 1900 , ol i baim hap graun bilong wokim namba wan brens - ofis long landon , inglan .

translation.en: it was located at 131 gipsy lane , forest gate , in east london , as shown here .
translation.zu: ol i wokim long 131 jipsi len , forest get , long is landon , olsem piksa hia i kamapim .

translation.en: when that first branch was established a hundred years ago , england had a total of 138 bible students , as jehovah 's witnesses were then called .
translation.zu: taim ol i kamapim dispela namba wan brens - ofis inap 100 yia i go pinis , i gat 138 sumatin bilong baibel long inglan , em nem bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long dispela taim .

translation.en: two years later , in 1902 , a second branch was opened , in germany ; and by 1904 , additional branches had been set up in australia and switzerland .
translation.zu: tupela yia bihain , long 1902 , ol i kamapim namba tu brens - ofis , em long jemani ; na long 1904 , ol i kamapim 2 - pela brens - ofis moa long ostrelia na swiselan .

translation.en: the following year the fifth branch of the watch tower society was established - this one in canada .
translation.zu: long yia bihain ol i kamapim namba 5 brens - ofis bilong sosaiti was taua - dispela ol i kamapim long kanada .

translation.en: then , as the proclamation of the bible 's message gained momentum , new branches were opened in many different countries , six in 1921 alone .
translation.zu: bihain , taim wok bilong autim tok bilong baibel i go bikpela , ol i kamapim ol nupela brens - ofis long planti kantri ; insait long yia 1921 tasol ol i kamapim 6 - pela .

translation.en: by 1931 , when the bible students adopted the bible - based name jehovah 's witnesses , there were 40 branch offices throughout the world .
translation.zu: long 1931 , taim ol sumatin bilong baibel i kisim nem olsem ol witnes bilong jehova , em baibel i as bilong dispela nem , i gat 40 brens - ofis long olgeta hap .

translation.en: by 1938 there was a peak of 59,047 witnesses preaching in 52 countries , but by then fierce opposition had begun to threaten their christian activity in many places .
translation.zu: long 1938 inap 59,047 witnes i autim tok long 52 kantri , tasol long dispela taim pasin birua nogut tru i kamap pinis na i laik pasim wok kristen bilong ol long planti kantri .

translation.en: as political totalitarianism and dictatorships spread from country to country and world war ii broke out in september 1939 , branch offices of jehovah 's witnesses were closed in one country after another .
translation.zu: taim ol gavman totaliterian na gavman dikteta i kamap long planti kantri na namba tu pait i kirap long septemba 1939 , ol i pasim ol brens - ofis bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long planti kantri .

translation.en: by 1942 , only 25 were still operating .
translation.zu: long 1942 , inap 25 tasol i wok yet .

translation.en: amazingly , however , during that most devastating war in human history , jehovah 's witnesses remained active worldwide and enjoyed one of their greatest rates of growth in modern history .
translation.zu: tasol yumi kirap nogut olsem long taim bilong dispela bikpela pait nogut tru , em kain pait olsem i no bin kamap bipo , ol witnes bilong jehova i wok yet long autim tok long olgeta hap na ol i kamap planti tru , winim planti narapela yia long nau .

translation.en: even as world war ii was ending in 1945 - and many parts of the world lay in ruins - branch offices of the witnesses were reopened and new ones were established .
translation.zu: taim namba tu pait i pinis long 1945 - na planti hap bilong graun i bagarap - ol i opim gen ol brens - ofis bilong ol witnes na ol i kamapim tu sampela nupela .

translation.en: and how many active witnesses were there ?
translation.zu: na hamas witnes ol i autim tok ?

translation.en: then on april 26 , 1959 , new branch facilities in mill hill , london , were dedicated .
translation.zu: na long epril 26 , 1959 , ol i dediketim nupela brens - ofis long mil hil , landon .

translation.en: later the living quarters were enlarged , and eventually ( in 1993 ) a 200,000 - square - foot [ 18,500 m2 ] printery and administrative complex was dedicated nearby .
translation.zu: bihain ol i kamapim sampela rum slip moa , na long 1993 ol i dediketim wanpela bikpela haus em inap olsem 18,500 skwe mita na i stap klostu - em ol ofis na haus faktori bilong wokim ol buk samting .

translation.en: here over 90 million copies of the watchtower and awake !
translation.zu: long dispela hap ol i wokim long olgeta yia inap olsem 90 milion wastaua na kirap !

translation.en: are produced annually in 23 languages .
translation.zu: long 23 tok ples .

translation.en: the expansion of the society 's second branch was even more dramatic .
translation.zu: namba tu brens - ofis bilong sosaiti i go bikpela moa yet .

translation.en: in 1923 the germany branch was moved to magdeburg .
translation.zu: long 1923 ol i putim brens - ofis bilong jemani i go long magdabek .

translation.en: the watchtower of july 15 , 1923 , was the first to roll off the society 's own printing press there .
translation.zu: nius wastaua bilong julai 15 , 1923 , em i namba wan nius ol i wokim long dispela hap long ol masin bilong sosaiti yet .

translation.en: in 1933 the branch was confiscated by the nazis , the witnesses were banned and , in time , two thousand of them were sent to concentration camps .
translation.zu: long 1933 ol lain natsi i kisim brens - ofis , na ol i tambuim wok bilong ol witnes , na bihain ol i salim inap olsem 2,000 witnes i go long ol banis kalabus nogut .

translation.en: when world war ii ended in 1945 , the property in magdeburg , then part of east germany , was returned and the branch was reestablished .
translation.zu: taim namba tu pait i pinis long 1945 , ol witnes i kisim bek ol hap graun na haus samting long magdabek , na ol i kamapim gen brens - ofis .

translation.en: but on august 30 , 1950 , communist police stormed the facilities and arrested the workers , and the witnesses in east germany were banned .
translation.zu: tasol long ogas 30 , 1950 , ol polis bilong lain komyunis ol i kisim ol haus samting na holim ol wokman , na ol i tambuim ol witnes long is jemani .

translation.en: in the meantime , in 1947 property had been purchased in wiesbaden , west germany .
translation.zu: long 1947 , sosaiti i baim hap graun long wisbaden , wes jemani .

translation.en: because no further room for expansion was available in wiesbaden , some 75 acres [ 30 hectares ] were purchased near selters in 1979 .
translation.zu: i no gat sampela hap graun moa bilong skruim brens - ofis long wisbaden , olsem na long 1979 ol i baim wanpela hap graun i gat 30 hekta klostu long seltes .

translation.en: after about five years of construction , a large branch was dedicated on april 21 , 1984 .
translation.zu: insait long 5 - pela yia samting ol i wokim wanpela bikpela brens - ofis , na ol i dediketim long epril 21 , 1984 .

translation.en: each month over 16 million magazines in more than 30 languages roll off the huge offset printing presses in selters ; and in a recent year , over 18 million books , including bibles , were produced by the bindery .
translation.zu: long olgeta mun ol i wokim olsem 16 milion nius long 30 tok ples samting long ol bikpela masin bilong prinim ol buk samting long seltes ; na i no longtaim i go pinis long wanpela yia ol masin bilong pasim skin bilong ol buk i kamapim olsem 18 milion buk na baibel .

translation.en: a branch was first established in kobe , japan , in 1927 , but severe persecution of the witnesses during world war ii curtailed their activity .
translation.zu: long 1927 ol i kamapim namba wan brens - ofis bilong japan long kobe , tasol long taim bilong namba tu pait ol birua i mekim nogut tru long ol witnes na dispela i pasim sampela wok bilong ol .

translation.en: shortly after the war , however , the branch was reestablished , in tokyo .
translation.zu: tasol taim pait i pinis , bihain liklik ol i kamapim gen brens - ofis - ol i kamapim long tokyo .

translation.en: when no further space for expansion was available there , a new branch was constructed in numazu .
translation.zu: taim i no gat sampela hap graun moa bilong skruim brens - ofis long dispela hap , ol i wokim nupela brens - ofis long numasu .

translation.en: it was dedicated in 1973 .
translation.zu: ol i dediketim long 1973 .

translation.en: when these facilities were quickly outgrown , large new ones were built in ebina , and these were dedicated in 1982 .
translation.zu: insait long liklik taim dispela brens - ofis i liklik tumas , olsem na ol i wokim nupela bikpela brens - ofis long ebina , na ol i dediketim long 1982 .

translation.en: expanded facilities at this site , which can accommodate 900 workers , were recently completed .
translation.zu: long 1998 ol i pinisim sampela nupela haus moa long dispela hap , na inap 900 wokman i ken slip long en .

translation.en: in the japanese language alone , over 94 million copies of the watchtower and awake ! were printed in 1999 , as were millions of books .
translation.zu: long 1999 , long tok ples japan tasol ol i wokim olsem 94 milion nius wastaua na kirap ! , na ol i prinim tu planti milion buk .

translation.en: the expansion of branch facilities has been similar in country after country .
translation.zu: long planti kantri ol brens - ofis i go bikpela olsem long japan .

translation.en: a branch was established in mexico city , mexico , in 1929 .
translation.zu: long 1929 , ol i kamapim wanpela brens - ofis long meksiko siti , long meksiko .

translation.en: then , when the number of witnesses had reached 60,000 , a spacious new facility was built outside the city .
translation.zu: bihain , taim namba bilong ol witnes i go antap long 60,000 , ol i wokim wanpela nupela bikpela brens - ofis ausait long taun .

translation.en: it was dedicated in 1974 , and additions to it were completed in 1985 and 1989 .
translation.zu: ol i dediketim dispela brens - ofis long 1974 , na long 1985 na 1989 ol i skruim sampela haus moa long en .

translation.en: now nearing completion are a large new printing facility and additional living quarters .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na ol bai pinisim wanpela nupela bikpela haus faktori bilong prinim ol buk na haus slip .

translation.en: as a result , the mexico branch will soon be able to accommodate 1,200 workers .
translation.zu: olsem na klostu nau inap olsem 1,200 wokman i ken stap long dispela brens - ofis bilong meksiko .

translation.en: already the branch is providing magazines and books for the more than 500,000 witnesses and millions of other people in mexico as well as for people living in nearby countries .
translation.zu: long nau brens - ofis i save wokim ol nius na buk bilong 500,000 witnes na planti milion manmeri moa long meksiko , na bilong planti manmeri i sindaun klostu long dispela kantri .

translation.en: in 1923 a branch office was organized in rio de janeiro , brazil , and later fine new quarters were built there .
translation.zu: long 1923 ol i kamapim wanpela brens - ofis long rio de janero , brasil , na bihain ol i wokim sampela gutpela haus slip long dispela hap .

translation.en: but since são paulo is the business and transportation center of brazil , in 1968 a new branch was constructed in that city .
translation.zu: tasol sau paulo em ples bilong ol wok bisnis na ples bilong salim ol samting i go long ol narapela hap , olsem na long 1968 ol i wokim nupela brens - ofis long dispela taun .

translation.en: by the mid - 1970 ' s , there were about 100,000 witnesses in brazil .
translation.zu: long 1975 samting , i gat olsem 100,000 witnes long brasil .

translation.en: however , further expansion was impossible in são paulo , so a 285 - acre [ 115 hectares ] site was purchased at cesário lange , about 90 miles [ 150 km ] outside são paulo .
translation.zu: tasol ol i no inap skruim brens - ofis i go bikpela moa long sau paulo , olsem na ol i baim wanpela hap graun i gat 115 hekta long sesaryu lanse , em inap olsem 150 kilomita longwe long sau paulo .

translation.en: on march 21 , 1981 , the branch facilities at that new location were dedicated .
translation.zu: long mas 21 , 1981 , ol i dediketim brens - ofis long dispela nupela ples .

translation.en: as a result of expansion at this site , the branch can accommodate some 1,200 people .
translation.zu: bihain ol i skruim dispela brens - ofis , olsem na inap 1,200 manmeri i ken sindaun long en .

translation.en: magazines and books are produced in brazil for much of south america as well as for other parts of the world .
translation.zu: ol i wokim ol nius na buk long brasil bilong salim i go long klostu olgeta hap bilong saut amerika na long sampela narapela hap bilong graun .

translation.en: another large printing branch was completed in the early 1990 ' s , near bogotá , colombia .
translation.zu: long 1992 , klostu long bogota , kalombia , ol i wokim narapela bikpela brens - ofis i gat haus faktori bilong wokim ol buk na nius .

translation.en: magazines are produced for distribution throughout northwestern south america .
translation.zu: bilong salim i go long planti hap long not - wes bilong saut amerika .

translation.en: other branches that print millions of magazines annually are located in argentina , australia , canada , finland , italy , korea , nigeria , the philippines , south africa , and spain .
translation.zu: sampela narapela brens - ofis i prinim planti milion nius long olgeta yia ol i stap long ajentina , filipin , finlan , itali , kanada , korea , naijiria , ostrelia , saut afrika , na spen .

translation.en: the branch in italy also produces millions of books , including bibles , each year in many languages .
translation.zu: na long olgeta yia brens - ofis bilong itali i wokim planti milion buk na baibel long planti tok ples .

translation.en: of course , much of the annual production , which amounts to more than 40 million books and over one billion magazines , is still carried out at the headquarters of the watch tower bible and tract society in brooklyn , new york , as well as at its printery in upstate new york .
translation.zu: tasol planti buk na nius em sosaiti i wokim long olgeta yia - winim 40 milion buk na wan bilion nius - ol i prinim yet long hetkota bilong sosaiti was taua long bruklin , nu yok , na long haus faktori bilong ol i stap long hap not bilong nu yok . man !

translation.en: truly , it is remarkable that the number of branch offices has increased from one a hundred years ago to 109 today that serve the needs of jehovah 's witnesses in 234 lands .
translation.zu: em gutpela samting tru ! inap wan handet yia i go pinis i gat wanpela brens - ofis tasol , na nau i gat 109 brens - ofis bilong helpim wok bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long 234 kantri .

translation.en: and to think that these are staffed by some 13,000 dedicated christian volunteers !
translation.zu: na inap olsem 13,000 kristen i dediket pinis ol i mekim wok volantia long ol dispela brens - ofis !

translation.en: surely , their work along with that of the some 5,500 volunteers associated with the society 's headquarters has been vital to the fulfillment of the prophecy of jesus christ that ' this good news of god 's kingdom would be preached in all the inhabited earth before the end comes . ' - matthew 24 : 14 .
translation.zu: yumi save , wok bilong ol na wok bilong ol 5,500 volantia long hetkota bilong sosaiti em i bikpela samting bilong truim tok profet bilong jisas krais olsem ol bai ' autim dispela gutnius bilong kingdom bilong god long olgeta hap bilong graun , na bihain tasol bai las de i kamap . ' - matyu 24 : 14 .

translation.en: young people ask . . .
translation.zu: ol yangpela i laik save . . .

translation.en: how can i cope now that dad has left us ?
translation.zu: papa i lusim mipela pinis na olsem wanem mi inap karim dispela hevi ?

translation.en: i just wanted a little attention . " - henry .
translation.zu: mi laik bai papa i tingim mi . " - henry .

translation.en: joan was 13 years old when her father left home .
translation.zu: joan i gat 13 krismas taim papa i lusim famili .

translation.en: caught in the grip of an addiction to alcohol , he made few attempts to contact his children after his departure .
translation.zu: papa i kalabus long dring , olsem na taim em i lusim ol pinis em i no tingting tumas long save long i stap bilong ol pikinini bilong em .

translation.en: sad to say , joan is not alone ; many youths have been abandoned by their fathers .
translation.zu: sori tru , i no joan tasol i karim dispela hevi , nogat ; i gat planti yangpela long nau em papa i bin lusim ol .

translation.en: if this has happened to you , you may very well find it hard to cope .
translation.zu: sapos kain hevi olsem i bin kamap long yu , ating yu pilim olsem i hatwok tru long karim dispela hevi .

translation.en: feelings of pain and anger may overwhelm you from time to time .
translation.zu: sampela taim tingting bilong belhat na kros bai kamap long yu .

translation.en: you may sometimes feel sad and depressed .
translation.zu: na ating sampela taim bai yu pilim bel hevi tru .

translation.en: you may even be tempted to rebel .
translation.zu: na tu , yu inap tingting long bikhet .

translation.en: ' acting crazy '
translation.zu: " mekim pasin kranki "

translation.en: james ' acted crazy ' after his father left home .
translation.zu: james i " mekim pasin kranki " bihain long taim papa bilong em i lusim ol .

translation.en: james said : " i didn 't listen to any authority , not even my mom .
translation.zu: james i tok : " mi no harim tok bilong ol man i mekim wok bos , na mi no harim tok bilong mama bilong mi .

translation.en: i got into a lot of fights .
translation.zu: mi insait long planti pait .

translation.en: i was always lying and sneaking out at night because there was no one to discipline me .
translation.zu: olgeta taim mi save tok giaman na mi save hait na lusim haus long nait , long wanem , i no gat man bilong stretim mi .

translation.en: mom tried to stop me , but she couldn 't . "
translation.zu: mama i traim long pasim mi long mekim ol dispela pasin , tasol em i no inap . "

translation.en: did rebelling really improve james ' lot in life ?
translation.zu: yu ting pasin bikhet i helpim i stap bilong james ?

translation.en: hardly .
translation.zu: nogat tru !

translation.en: " i stole from stores , " he confesses , " and i mugged people too .
translation.zu: em i tokaut olsem : " mi stilim ol samting long ol stua na mi hansapim ol man .

translation.en: i was arrested twice and put in prison for a short time , but that didn 't stop me . "
translation.zu: tupela taim polis i holim mi na inap sotpela taim ol i putim mi long kalabus , tasol dispela i no pasim mi . "

translation.en: when asked what made him so rebellious , james said : " because my father was gone , i had no discipline .
translation.zu: taim mipela i askim em long wanem samting i mekim na em i bikhet , james i tok : " papa i lusim mipela , olsem na i no gat man bilong stretim mi .

translation.en: i really didn 't think of how much i was hurting my mom , my little brother and sister , and myself too .
translation.zu: mi no tingim ol hevi mi putim long mama na liklik brata na susa bilong mi , na mi yet .

translation.en: i wanted the attention and discipline of my dad . "
translation.zu: mi laik bai papa i tingim mi na stretim pasin bilong mi . "

translation.en: but rebelling only makes a bad situation worse .
translation.zu: tasol pasin bikhet bai kamapim planti hevi moa .

translation.en: even more serious is the fact that rebellious behavior can put one at odds with god himself .
translation.zu: na samting i nogut moa em olsem , pasin bikhet inap mekim na man i no stap wanbel wantaim god .

translation.en: after all , jehovah commands young people to be obedient to their mother . - proverbs 1 : 8 ; 30 : 17 .
translation.zu: long wanem , jehova i tokim ol yangpela long bihainim tok bilong mama bilong ol . - sindaun 1 : 8 ; 30 : 17 .

translation.en: how , then , can you deal with the anger and resentment that you might feel toward your father ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem yu inap daunim tingting bilong belhat na kros yu holim long papa bilong yu ?

translation.en: first of all , you may need to remind yourself that your father 's leaving was not your fault .
translation.zu: namba wan samting em olsem : yu mas ting olsem em i no asua bilong yu na papa i lusim yupela .

translation.en: nor does it necessarily mean that he no longer loves or cares about you .
translation.zu: na tu , dispela i no makim olsem em i no laikim yu o tingim yu moa .

translation.en: granted , it can be painful when a father makes little effort to call or visit .
translation.zu: tru , bai yu bel hevi taim papa i no ringim yupela o kam lukim yupela .

translation.en: others , like joan 's father , are addicted to drugs or alcohol , and this impedes their ability to function .
translation.zu: sampela narapela , olsem papa bilong joan , ol i kalabus long ol drak o dring samting , na dispela i pasim ol long bihainim stretpela pasin .

translation.en: whatever the situation , try to remember that your parents are imperfect .
translation.zu: maski wanem wanem samting i kamap , yu mas save olsem papamama bilong yu ol i no gutpela olgeta .

translation.en: the bible declares : " all have sinned and fall short of the glory of god . "
translation.zu: baibel i tok : " yumi olgeta man yumi bin mekim sin , na yumi no inap i stap wantaim god long heven . "

translation.en: but recognizing the fact that we are all inherently imperfect may make it easier for you to let go of destructive anger and resentment .
translation.zu: tasol taim yu luksave olsem yumi olgeta i gat sin , dispela inap helpim yu long daunim ol tingting bilong kros na belhat .

translation.en: what is said at ecclesiastes 7 : 10 can help you deal with the anger and the resentment that you may feel toward your parents .
translation.zu: tok bilong saveman 7 : 10 inap helpim yu long daunim ol tingting bilong kros na belhat em yu holim long papamama bilong yu .

translation.en: notice how it warns against focusing on the past : " do not say : ' why has it happened that the former days proved to be better than these ? '
translation.zu: tingim tok lukaut dispela skripsa i kamapim long pasin bilong tingim bek i stap bilong yu long bipo , olsem : " yu no ken tok , ' olsem wanem na taim bipo i winim dispela taim nau ? '

translation.en: for it is not due to wisdom that you have asked about this . "
translation.zu: sapos yu mekim kain tok olsem , yu no gat gutpela save . "

translation.en: thus , rather than dwelling on the way things once were , it 's better to focus on making the best of your situation .
translation.zu: olsem na i gutpela moa yu no tingting tumas long i stap bilong yu long bipo , tasol yu tingting long mekim ol samting na yu ken stap amamas long nau .

translation.en: taking the initiative
translation.zu: kirap mekim ol samting

translation.en: for example , you might consider taking the initiative to make contact with your father .
translation.zu: olsem : ating yu ken tingting long mekim ol samting bilong bungim papa bilong yu .

translation.en: true , he is the one who left you and you might rightly feel that it is his responsibility to make the first move .
translation.zu: tru , papa yet i bin lusim yu , olsem na i stret yu ting em yet i mas mekim ol samting bilong kam lukim yu .

translation.en: but if he has failed to do so and the lack of contact with him is making you sad and unhappy , might it be worth your while to try to improve the situation yourself ?
translation.zu: tasol sapos em i no mekim olsem na yu bel hevi long wanem yu no lukim em , orait yu ting yu inap mekim ol samting bilong daunim dispela hevi ?

translation.en: consider how jesus christ handled things when some of his friends hurt him .
translation.zu: tingim ol samting jisas krais i bin mekim taim sampela pren i bagarapim bel bilong em .

translation.en: on the last night of his human life , his apostles abandoned him .
translation.zu: long laspela nait bilong em long i stap olsem man long graun , ol aposel bilong em i lusim em .

translation.en: peter had bragged that he would stick with jesus no matter what .
translation.zu: pastaim pita i hambak na tok , maski wanem samting i kamap em bai stap yet wantaim jisas .

translation.en: even so , jesus continued to love peter in spite of peter 's shortcomings .
translation.zu: tasol jisas i laikim yet pita , maski pita i mekim pasin kranki .

translation.en: after jesus ' resurrection , jesus made the first move to reestablish their relationship by making a special appearance to peter .
translation.zu: taim jisas i kirap bek pinis , jisas i go pas long mekim ol samting bilong kamapim gen pasin pren wantaim pita , na em i kamap long pita .

translation.en: interestingly , when jesus asked peter the question , " do you love me ? "
translation.zu: taim jisas i askim pita olsem : " yu laikim mi ? "

translation.en: peter 's response was " yes , lord , you know i have affection for you . "
translation.zu: pita i bekim tok olsem : " yes , bikpela , yu save , mi laikim yu . "

translation.en: in spite of his shameful actions , peter still loved jesus . - john 21 : 15 .
translation.zu: maski em i mekim dispela samting nogut tru , pita i laikim yet jisas . - jon 21 : 15 .

translation.en: as was true in the case of peter and jesus , the situation with your father may not be as hopeless as it seems .
translation.zu: olsem dispela stori bilong pita na jisas i kamapim , ating i gat rot bilong stretim hevi i stap namel long papa na yu .

translation.en: perhaps he would respond if you took some initiative such as making a phone call , writing a letter , or making a visit .
translation.zu: ating em bai mekim sampela samting sapos yu ringim em , o salim pas long em , o yu go lukim em .

translation.en: henry , mentioned at the outset , recalls : " i wrote to my dad once , and he sent me a letter back saying that he was proud of me .
translation.zu: henry , em yumi toktok long em long kirap bilong dispela stori , em i tok : " mi salim wanpela pas long papa bilong mi , na em i salim pas i kam long mi na em i tok olsem em i amamas long mi .

translation.en: i framed that letter and kept it on my wall for years .
translation.zu: mi hangamapim dispela pas long banis bilong haus inap planti yia .

translation.en: i still have it to this day . "
translation.zu: na dispela pas i stap yet wantaim mi inap long nau . "

translation.en: " he wasn 't in the best condition , " joan admits , " but it was still good to see him . "
translation.zu: joan i tok : " em i no stap gutpela tumas , tasol mipela i amamas long lukim em . "

translation.en: perhaps taking the initiative will work for you .
translation.zu: ating sapos yu kirap mekim ol samting , dispela inap kamapim gutpela samting .

translation.en: if there is no response at first , you might want to let some time pass and then try again .
translation.zu: sapos pastaim i no gat gutpela samting i kamap , orait yu ken larim sampela hap taim i lus na bihain yu ken traim gen .

translation.en: solomon reminds us that there is " a time to seek and a time to give up as lost . "
translation.zu: solomon i kirapim yumi long tingim olsem i gat " taim bilong painim samting i lus na taim bilong lusim samting . "

translation.en: sometimes a youth must face the painful fact that his or her father does not want to have a relationship with his children .
translation.zu: ( saveman 3 : 6 ) sampela taim wanpela yangpela i mas save olsem papa bilong em i no laik pas moa wantaim ol pikinini bilong em .

translation.en: if this is true of your father , perhaps one day he will realize how much he has lost in failing to maintain a relationship with you .
translation.zu: sapos papa bilong yu i kain man olsem , ating wanpela taim bihain em bai luksave olsem em i bin lusim planti gutpela samting taim em i no laik pas moa wantaim yu .

translation.en: in the meantime , though , be assured that his rejection of you does not mean that you are worthless .
translation.zu: tasol yu mas save olsem maski papa i lusim yu , dispela i no makim olsem yu no gutpela moa .

translation.en: the bible psalmist david stated : " in case my own father and my own mother did leave me , even jehovah himself would take me up . "
translation.zu: man bilong raitim song long baibel , em devit , i tok : " maski papa na mama i givim baksait long mi , bikpela bai i lukautim mi . "

translation.en: yes , you still have great value in the eyes of god . - luke 12 : 6 , 7 .
translation.zu: ( song 27 : 10 ) tru tumas , yu olsem gutpela samting tru long ai bilong god . - luk 12 : 6 , 7 .

translation.en: so if you feel down or depressed , draw close to god in prayer .
translation.zu: olsem na sapos yu bel hevi , yu mas go klostu long god long rot bilong beten .

translation.en: be assured that he will listen to you and comfort you .
translation.zu: yu inap bilip tru olsem em bai harim beten bilong yu na mekim gut bel bilong yu .

translation.en: another bible psalmist wrote : " when my disquieting thoughts became many inside of me , your own consolations began to fondle my soul . " - psalm 94 : 19 .
translation.zu: narapela man bilong raitim song long baibel em i tok : " taim mi bel hevi na mi gat planti tingting long ol samting , yu save mekim bel bilong mi i stap isi na yu mekim mi i amamas . " - song 94 : 19 .

translation.en: warm association with fellow christians can also help you to cope with such rejection .
translation.zu: na tu , pasin bilong pas gut wantaim ol wanbilip kristen inap helpim yu long karim kain hevi olsem .

translation.en: proverbs 17 : 17 says : " a true companion is loving all the time , and is a brother that is born for when there is distress . "
translation.zu: sindaun 17 : 17 i tok : " ol gutpela pren i save laikim yumi long olgeta taim . tasol ol brata i save sambai long helpim yumi long taim bilong hevi . "

translation.en: you can find such true companions within the christian congregation of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: yu inap painim kain gutpela poroman olsem insait long kongrigesen kristen bilong ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: it may be particularly helpful to get to know some of the congregation overseers .
translation.zu: yu inap kisim helpim tu sapos yu wok long save long sampela elda insait long kongrigesen .

translation.en: joan 's brother peter gives this advice : " talk with the older ones in the congregation , and they will help a lot .
translation.zu: brata bilong joan , em peter , em i tok olsem : " toktok wantaim ol brata sista long kongrigesen em ol i gat bikpela krismas liklik na ol bai helpim yu gut .

translation.en: if you have been abandoned by your father , let them know how you feel . "
translation.zu: sapos papa bilong yu i bin lusim yu , yu mas tokim ol long ol tingting bilong yu . "

translation.en: the congregation overseers may also offer some practical suggestions on handling some of the responsibilities that your father formerly cared for , such as home repair .
translation.zu: ol elda long kongrigesen inap givim sampela gutpela tok bilong helpim yu long mekim sampela wok em papa bilong yu i bin mekim bipo , olsem ol wok bilong stretim haus samting .

translation.en: your mother may also be a source of support .
translation.zu: mama bilong yu tu inap long helpim yu .

translation.en: true , she may be suffering emotional distress herself .
translation.zu: tru , ating em yet i gat bikpela bel hevi tru .

translation.en: but if you respectfully express your feelings , she will no doubt do her best to respond .
translation.zu: tasol sapos long gutpela pasin yu kamapim ol tingting bilong yu , em tu bai mekim olgeta samting em inap long mekim bilong helpim yu .

translation.en: support your family !
translation.zu: helpim famili bilong yu !

translation.en: your father 's absence may impact your family in a number of ways .
translation.zu: taim papa i lusim yupela , dispela inap mekim sampela samting long i stap bilong famili bilong yu .

translation.en: your mother may have to take on a job - perhaps even two jobs - to make ends meet .
translation.zu: ating mama bilong yu i mas kisim wanpela wok mani - o sampela taim em i mas mekim tupela wok mani - bambai em inap long lukautim famili .

translation.en: you and your siblings may have to shoulder more household responsibilities .
translation.zu: yu na ol brata susa bilong yu i mas mekim sampela wok moa bilong haus .

translation.en: but you can cope with such changes if you cultivate unselfish christian love .
translation.zu: tasol yu inap karim dispela hevi sapos yu kamapim pasin kristen bilong givim bel bilong yu long ol narapela .

translation.en: this can help you to maintain a positive attitude and to squelch resentment .
translation.zu: dispela inap helpim yu long bihainim stretpela tingting oltaim na daunim pasin bilong belhat .

translation.en: says peter : " helping my family is the right thing to do , and i get a good feeling knowing that i am helping my mom and my sisters . "
translation.zu: peter i tok : " mekim ol samting bilong helpim famili bilong mi em i stretpela samting bilong mekim , na mi amamas long save olsem mi wok long helpim mama na ol susa bilong mi . "

translation.en: without a doubt , a father 's leaving home is a tragic , painful event .
translation.zu: tru , taim wanpela papa i lusim famili bilong em , dispela i save kamapim bikpela hevi tru .

translation.en: but you can be sure that with god 's help and the help of loving christian friends and family , you and your family can cope .
translation.zu: tasol yu mas save olsem god na ol gutpela poroman na famili kristen ol inap helpim yu na famili bilong yu long karim dispela hevi .

translation.en: it has been said that much of life 's happiness and much of its misery emanate from the same source - one 's marriage .
translation.zu: sampela i bin tok olsem , long i stap bilong yumi i gat wankain samting i save givim bikpela amamas na bikpela bel hevi long yumi - em marit bilong yumi .

translation.en: indeed , few things in life have the potential to provide as much ecstasy - or as much anguish .

translation.en: as the accompanying box indicates , many couples are having more than their share of the latter .
translation.zu: olsem tok i stap long blok i kamapim , planti manmeri i kisim bikpela bel hevi long marit bilong ol .

translation.en: for each marriage that sinks , countless others remain afloat but are stuck in stagnant waters .
translation.zu: i gat planti ol i no katim marit tasol ol i no sindaun gut wantaim poroman bilong ol .

translation.en: " we used to be a happy family , but the last 12 years have been horrible , " confided a woman married for more than 30 years .
translation.zu: wanpela meri i marit longpela taim , winim 30 yia , em i tok olsem : " pastaim mipela famili i sindaun gut wantaim , tasol insait long dispela laspela 12 - pela yia , pasin bilong mipela long stap gut wantaim i bagarap olgeta .

translation.en: " my husband is not interested in my feelings .
translation.zu: man bilong mi i no wari liklik long tingting bilong mi .

translation.en: similarly , a husband of nearly 25 years lamented : " my wife has told me that she doesn 't love me anymore .
translation.zu: wanpela man i marit klostu 25 yia pinis , em i tok : " meri i tokim mi pinis olsem em i no laikim mi moa .

translation.en: she says that if we can just exist as roommates and each go our separate ways when it comes to leisure time , the situation can be tolerated . "
translation.zu: em i tok sapos mipela i ken i stap olsem ol wanhaus tasol na raun wanpis long ol narapela taim , em i orait liklik long i stap yet wantaim mi . "

translation.en: of course , some in such dire straits terminate their marriage .
translation.zu: tru , sampela bai katim tasol marit bilong ol sapos em i bagarap olsem .

translation.en: for many , however , divorce is out of the question .
translation.zu: tasol planti ol i no inap katim marit .

translation.en: why ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem ?

translation.en: according to dr . karen kayser , factors such as children , community stigma , finances , friends , relatives , and religious beliefs might keep a couple together , even in a loveless state .
translation.zu: olsem dokta karen kayser i tok , ol samting olsem ol pikinini , pret long kisim sem , mani , lotu , na ol pren na wanblut , ol dispela samting inap mekim na tupela i no katim marit , maski narapela i no laikim moa narapela .

translation.en: " unlikely to divorce legally , " she says , " these spouses choose to remain with a partner from whom they are emotionally divorced . "
translation.zu: em i tok : " i luk olsem tupela bai i no inap kot na katim marit , olsem na ol i tingting pinis long stap wantaim poroman ol i les pinis long en . "

translation.en: is a loveless marriage the only alternative to divorce ?
translation.zu: yu ting dispela kain sindaun tasol i olsem senis bilong katim marit ?

translation.en: experience proves that many troubled marriages can be saved - not only from the agony of breakup but also from the misery of lovelessness .

translation.zu: tasol i no longtaim na tingting bilong rose long pasin bilong man bilong em i senis .

translation.en: " i ended up being terribly disappointed in him , " she says .
translation.zu: rose i tok : " bihain mi no amamas liklik long em . "

translation.en: for example , it is appropriate to expect love , attention , and support from one 's mate . yet , even these wishes may go unfulfilled .
translation.zu: maski ol inap stretim hevi long marit bilong ol , sapos marit i no gutpela tru olsem marit long sampela stori nating , ol inap ting marit bilong ol i nogut olgeta .

translation.en: " i almost feel that i am not married , " says meena , a young bride in india .
translation.zu: tasol i gat sampela pasin i stret yumi ken ting em i mas i stap insait long marit bilong yumi .

translation.en: incompatibility - " we have nothing in common "
translation.zu: tasol sampela taim poroman i no save bihainim ol dispela pasin .

translation.en: " not a day passes that i don 't bitterly regret my decision to marry him .
translation.zu: tupela i no wanbel - " mipela i no gat wankain laik "

translation.en: usually it does not take long for a married couple to discover that they are not as much alike as they seemed to be during courtship .
translation.zu: long olgeta de mi save bel hevi tru long mi bin maritim em . i no gat wanpela samting mipela i save wanbel long en . "

translation.en: " marriage often showcases characteristics that the partners had managed to hide from themselves throughout their single lives , " writes dr .
translation.zu: taim man na meri i marit pinis , i no longtaim na ol i kisim save olsem pasin bilong ol long stap wanbel i no wankain olsem long taim tupela i no marit yet .

translation.en: nina s .
translation.zu: dokta nina s .

translation.en: " despite some similarities in taste and personality , most people enter marriage with major differences in style , habits , and attitudes , " says dr .
translation.zu: dispela inap mekim na tupela marit ol inap ting i no gat wanpela samting ol i wanbel long en .

translation.en: aaron t .
translation.zu: dokta aaron t .

translation.en: " we were amazed at how much we were fighting - yelling even , or worse , steaming around in silence for days , " says cindy , reflecting on the early days of her marriage .
translation.zu: cindy i tingim taim em i marit nupela na em i tok olsem : " mipela i kirap nogut long pasin bilong mipela long kros planti ; olsem mipela i bikmaus na kros , o kros i mekim na inap sampela de mipela i no toktok wantaim . "

translation.en: " in a healthy marriage , " writes dr . daniel goleman , " husband and wife feel free to voice a complaint .
translation.zu: dokta daniel goleman i tok : " tupela marit i pas gut wantaim ol i no hatwok long kamapim ol samting ol i bel hevi long en .

translation.en: but too often in the heat of anger complaints are expressed in a destructive fashion , as an attack on the spouse 's character . "
translation.zu: tasol belhat i mekim na planti marit i kamapim bel hevi bilong ol long pasin i bagarapim bel bilong poroman , olsem ol i save sutim tok long sampela pasin bilong em . "

translation.en: when this happens , conversation is a battleground where viewpoints are defended with grim determination and words are weapons instead of tools of communication .
translation.zu: taim dispela samting i kamap , toktok bilong tupela i no bilong stretim hevi , em bilong tok pait na autim strongpela tingting bilong ol yet .

translation.en: says one team of experts : " one of the most damaging things about arguments that are escalating out of control is that partners tend to say things that threaten the very lifeblood of their marriage . "
translation.zu: sampela saveman i tok : " tasol taim kros i go bikpela , dispela inap kirapim tupela marit long kamapim sampela tok i laik bagarapim marit bilong ol . "

translation.en: apathy - " we 've given up "
translation.zu: lespasin - " mipela les pinis long stretim hevi "

translation.en: " i 've given up on trying to make our marriage work , " confessed one woman after five years of marriage .
translation.zu: wanpela meri i marit 5 - pela yia pinis na em i tok : " mi les pinis long traim stretim hevi bilong marit bilong mipela .

translation.en: " i know that it will never work now .
translation.zu: nau mi save , marit bilong mipela bai i no inap kamap gutpela .

translation.en: so all i 'm concerned about is our kids . "
translation.zu: olsem na mi save tingim ol pikinini tasol . "

translation.en: it has been said that the true opposite of love is not hate but apathy .
translation.zu: sampela i bin tok , pasin bilong les pinis long narapela i nogut moa , winim pasin bilong bel nogut long em .

translation.en: sadly , though , some spouses become so accustomed to a loveless marriage that they give up all hope of any change .
translation.zu: dispela i mekim na ol i no gat tingting liklik olsem gutpela samting bai i kamap long marit bilong ol .

translation.en: for example , one husband said that being married for 23 years resembled " being in a job you don 't like . "
translation.zu: wanpela man i marit inap long 23 yia pinis , em i tok marit bilong em i kain olsem " pasin bilong holim wanpela wok mani yu no save amamas long en . "

translation.en: he added : " you do the best you can in the situation . "
translation.zu: em i tok moa olsem : " yu lain tasol long karim hevi bilong kain marit olsem . "

translation.en: i don 't want to go through that again .
translation.zu: mi no laik larim pasin bilong em i bagarapim gen bel bilong mi .

translation.en: if i get my hopes up , i 'll only get hurt .
translation.zu: olsem na mobeta mi no ken ting wanpela gutpela samting bai i kamap .

translation.en: i 'd sooner expect nothing - i won 't enjoy things , but at least i won 't get depressed . "
translation.zu: tru , dispela kain sindaun i no givim amamas long mi , tasol bai mi no inap kisim bikpela bel hevi gen . "

translation.en: obviously , there are more - a few of which are noted in the box on page 5 .
translation.zu: tru , i gat ol narapela as bilong dispela hevi - sampela i stap long blok long pes 5 .

translation.en: regardless of the cause , is there hope for spouses who seem to be trapped in a loveless marriage ?
translation.zu: tasol yu ting i gat wanpela samting i ken helpim tupela marit taim pasin bilong laikim tru poroman i no stap moa insait long marit bilong ol ?

translation.en: [ box / picture on page 5 ]
translation.zu: [ blok / piksa long pes 5 ]

translation.en: • money : " one might imagine that budgeting would help unite a couple through the necessity of working together , pooling their resources for the basics of living , and enjoying the fruits of their labors .
translation.zu: • mani : dokta aaron t . beck i tok : " yumi inap ting wok bilong skelim gut mani bilong famili inap helpim tupela marit long wok gut wantaim , long wanem , tupela bai wok wantaim bilong kisim ol samting ol i mas i gat na bilong kisim sampela amamas long hatwok bilong ol .

translation.en: but here , too , what could bond a couple in a joint venture often serves to separate them . " - dr . aaron t . beck .
translation.zu: tasol planti taim dispela samting bilong helpim tupela marit long wok gut wantaim i save mekim na ol i no pas gut moa . "

translation.en: • parenthood : " we 've found that 67 percent of couples experience a significant drop in marital contentment after their first child is born , and there is eight times more conflict .
translation.zu: • kamapim pikinini : dokta john gottman i tok : " samting mipela skelim i makim olsem taim ol marit i kamapim namba wan pikinini , hevi i save kamap long planti marit olsem 67 pesen , olsem ol i no stap amamas wantaim olsem bipo .

translation.en: • deceit : " infidelity usually involves deceit , and deceit , pure and simple , is a betrayal of trust .
translation.zu: fields i tok : " sapos wanpela poroman marit i pamuk , em bai giaman bilong haitim dispela samting , na pasin giaman i save bagarapim pasin bilong bilip long narapela .

translation.en: with trust identified as a crucial component in all successful long - term marriages , is it any wonder that deceit can wreak havoc on a marital relationship ? " - dr .
translation.zu: yumi save i mas i gat pasin bilong bilip long narapela na bai marit i ken stap gut na stap longpela taim . olsem na yumi save , pasin giaman inap kamapim bikpela hevi namel long tupela marit . "

translation.en: nina s . fields .
translation.zu: • maritpasin : dokta judith s .

translation.en: • sex : " by the time people file for divorce , sexual deprivation of many years ' standing is shockingly common .
translation.zu: wallerstein i tok : " taim ol i laik kot bilong katim marit , mipela kirap nogut olsem planti marit i no bin slip wantaim inap planti yia pinis .

translation.en: in some cases the sexual relationship was never established , and in others , sex was mechanical , merely a vent for one partner 's physical needs . " - judith s . wallerstein , clinical psychologist .
translation.zu: na sampela ol i no bin mekim maritpasin wanpela taim , na long sampela narapela marit , maritpasin i no samting bilong amamas , em i bilong inapim laik bilong wanpela poroman tasol . "

translation.zu: [ blok / piksa long pes 6 ]

translation.en: can the quality of your marriage affect your children ?
translation.zu: yu ting marit bilong yupela inap mekim sampela samting long ol pikinini ?

translation.en: john gottman , who has researched married couples for some 20 years , the answer is yes .
translation.zu: em wanpela dokta i bin skelim planti marit inap 20 yia samting .

translation.en: over time , marital conflict leads to lower achievement in school , regardless of the children 's iq . " in contrast , dr .
translation.zu: isi isi hevi bilong marit i mekim na ol mak ol pikinini i kisim long skul bai i no antap tumas , maski ol i no gat hevi long kisim save . "

translation.en: " one problem in distressed marriages is the strong belief that things cannot get better .
translation.zu: " wanpela hevi bilong ol marit i no sindaun gut wantaim , em strongpela tingting olsem hevi bilong marit bai i stap olsem tasol .

translation.en: such a belief thwarts change because it robs you of the motivation to try anything constructive . " - dr . aaron t .
translation.zu: dispela tingting i pasim rot bilong stretim hevi , long wanem , em bai daunim pasin bilong givim bel long helpim marit i kamap gutpela . " - dokta aaron t .

translation.en: beck .
translation.zu: beck .

translation.en: imagine that you are in pain and go to the doctor for a checkup .
translation.zu: tingim : i olsem yu pilim pen na go lukim dokta .

translation.en: you are anxious - and understandably so .
translation.zu: i stret yu tingting planti .

translation.en: after all , your health - even your very life - may be at stake .
translation.zu: long wanem , gutpela skin bilong yu i laik bagarap , o nogut yu bai dai .

translation.en: but suppose that after the examination , the doctor gives you the good news that while your problem is by no means trivial , it can be treated .
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem sapos dokta i glasim sik bilong yu na tok maski sik i bikpela , i gat rot bilong stretim .

translation.en: in fact , the doctor tells you that if you carefully adhere to a reasonable program of diet and exercise , you can expect a full recovery .
translation.zu: dokta i tok sapos yu kisim ol kaikai i stret na kisim eksasais , sik inap pinis olgeta .

translation.en: are you experiencing pain in your marriage ?
translation.zu: yu karim sampela pen na hevi long marit bilong yu ?

translation.en: of course , every marriage will have its share of problems and disagreements .
translation.zu: tru , sampela taim olgeta marit bai i gat hevi o hatwok long stap wanbel .

translation.en: so just having some difficult moments in your relationship does not mean that you have a loveless marriage .
translation.zu: olsem na sampela hevi long marit i no mak olsem pasin bilong laikim tru narapela i no stap moa insait long marit bilong yu .

translation.en: if so , you are rightly concerned , for this is no trivial matter .
translation.zu: sapos i olsem , em nau , i stret yu tingting planti , long wanem , dispela i no liklik samting .

translation.en: indeed , the quality of your marriage can touch virtually every aspect of your life - and that of your children .
translation.zu: tru tumas , marit bilong yu inap helpim o nogutim olgeta narapela samting long i stap bilong yu , na bilong ol pikinini tu .

translation.en: it is believed , for instance , that marital distress can be a major factor in such problems as depression , low worker productivity , and children 's failure at school .
translation.zu: sampela i ting hevi bilong marit i olsem wanpela bikpela as na man o meri i save stap bel hevi tumas , o ol i no inap mekim gut wok bilong ol long ples wok , na ol pikinini i no inap mekim gutpela wok long skul .

translation.en: but that is not all .
translation.zu: tasol i no dispela samting tasol .

translation.en: christians recognize that the relationship they have with their mate can affect their very relationship with god . - 1 peter 3 : 7 .
translation.zu: ol kristen i save god yet i gat tok long ol pasin ol marit i mekim long poroman . - 1 pita 3 : 7 .

translation.en: the fact that there are problems between you and your spouse does not mean that the situation is hopeless .
translation.zu: sapos yu na poroman i gat sampela hevi long marit , dispela i no makim olsem i no gat rot bilong stretim .

translation.en: facing the reality of marriage - that there will be challenges - can help a couple to put their problems in perspective and work toward solutions .
translation.zu: yu mas save gut long pasin bilong stap marit - olsem olgeta marit bai i gat sampela hevi - dispela save inap helpim ol marit long kisim stretpela tingting long hevi bilong ol , na ol i ken wok long stretim .

translation.en: a husband named isaac says : " i had no idea that it was normal for couples to go up and down in their level of happiness over the course of a marriage .
translation.zu: wanpela man marit , em isaac , em i tok : " mi no bin save olsem sampela taim pasin amamas insait long marit bai i stap strong na sampela taim bai i no strong tumas .

translation.en: granted , the wounds resulting from a troubled relationship may be deep , especially if problems have persisted for years .
translation.zu: tru , ating bel i bagarap long sampela hevi i bin kamap long marit , na dispela inap kamap moa yet sapos ol hevi i bin i stap inap sampela yia .

translation.en: still , there is strong reason for hope .
translation.zu: tasol i gat as bilong ting olsem gutpela samting inap kamap .

translation.en: even two people with serious marital problems can make improvements if it means enough to both of them .
translation.zu: maski hevi bilong marit i bikpela , sapos tupela i gat laik , ol i ken helpim marit long kamap gutpela .

translation.en: so ask yourself , ' how strong is my desire to attain a satisfying relationship ? '
translation.zu: askim yu yet , ' mi gat strongpela laik bilong helpim marit long kamap gutpela ? '

translation.en: are you and your mate willing to put forth effort to improve your marriage ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ? yu na poroman i redi long wok strong bilong helpim marit ?

translation.en: dr . beck , quoted earlier , says : " i have often been surprised at how an apparently bad relationship can be helped when partners work together to correct deficits and reinforce the strong points of their marriage . "
translation.zu: dokta beck , em pastaim yumi bin stori long em , em i tok : " planti taim mi luksave olsem marit i ken kamap gutpela taim tupela i wok wantaim long stretim hevi bilong en , na strongim sampela gutpela pasin ol i bihainim pinis . "

translation.en: but what if your spouse is reluctant to join in ?
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem sapos poroman i no laik mekim sampela wok bilong helpim marit ?

translation.en: or what if he or she seems oblivious to the fact that there is a problem ?
translation.zu: o olsem wanem sapos poroman i no gat tingting liklik olsem marit i gat sampela hevi ?

translation.en: is it futile for you to work on the marriage alone ?
translation.zu: yu ting dispela bai makim olsem yu wok nating long helpim marit bilong yu ?

translation.en: by no means !
translation.zu: nogat tru !

translation.en: " if you make some changes , " says dr . beck , " this in itself may prompt changes in your partner - it very often does . "
translation.zu: dokta beck i tok : " sapos yu yet yu senisim sampela pasin bilong yu , planti taim dispela bai kirapim poroman long senisim sampela pasin bilong em . "

translation.en: do not hastily conclude that this cannot happen in your case .
translation.zu: no ken hariap na ting dispela samting i no inap kamap long marit bilong yu .

translation.en: such defeatist thinking may in itself be the greatest threat to your marriage !
translation.zu: dispela kain tingting inap i stap olsem namba wan samting i laik bagarapim marit bilong yu !

translation.en: one of you needs to take the first step .
translation.zu: wanpela i mas kirap pastaim na mekim ol samting bilong stretim hevi .

translation.en: can it be you ?
translation.zu: ating em yu yet , a ?

translation.en: once the momentum is established , your spouse may see the benefit of working along with you toward building a happier marriage .
translation.zu: taim yu kirap pinis long mekim ol samting , ating poroman bilong yu inap kisim tingting olsem i gutpela long wok wantaim yu bilong helpim marit long kamap gutpela .

translation.en: what can you do , therefore - either as an individual or as a couple - to save your marriage ?
translation.zu: olsem na yutupela wantaim o yu yet i ken mekim wanem bilong helpim marit long abrusim bagarap ?

translation.en: the bible is a powerful aid in answering this question .
translation.zu: baibel i gutpela tru bilong helpim yumi long bekim dispela askim .

translation.en: let us see how .
translation.zu: orait nau yumi ken skelim dispela samting .

translation.en: [ footnote ]
translation.zu: [ futnot ]

translation.en: admittedly , in certain extreme cases , there may be valid reasons for a husband and wife to separate .
translation.zu: tru , wan wan taim ating i gat gutpela as bilong lusim poroman na stap longwe long em .

translation.en: in addition , the bible allows for divorce on the grounds of fornication .
translation.zu: na tu , baibel i tok sapos pasin pamuk i kamap , i no gat rong long katim marit .

translation.en: whether to obtain a divorce from an unfaithful mate is a personal decision , and others should not pressure the innocent mate into deciding one way or the other . - see the book the secret of family happiness , pages 158 - 61 , published by the watchtower bible and tract society of new york , inc .
translation.zu: na sapos poroman i no gat asua i laik katim marit o nogat , em samting bilong em yet long skelim , na i no wok bilong ol narapela long subim em . - lukim buk rot bilong famili i ken stap amamas , pes 158 - 161 , em sosaiti wastaua bilong nu yok i wokim .

translation.en: your marriage can be saved !
translation.zu: marit bilong yu inap abrusim bagarap !

translation.en: the bible abounds with practical counsel that can benefit husbands and wives .
translation.zu: i gat planti ol gutpela tok bilong baibel bilong helpim ol man na meri marit .

translation.en: this is hardly surprising , for the one who inspired the bible is also the originator of the marriage arrangement .
translation.zu: yumi no kirap nogut long dispela samting , long wanem , dispela man i as bilong ol tok bilong baibel , em i as bilong marit .

translation.en: the bible paints a realistic picture of marriage .
translation.zu: baibel i kamapim stretpela tingting long pasin bilong stap marit .

translation.en: it acknowledges that a husband and wife will have " tribulation " or , as the new english bible renders it , " pain and grief . "
translation.zu: baibel i tokaut olsem tupela marit " bai i painim planti hevi long laip bilong ol . "

translation.en: has pain and disappointment overshadowed the intimacy and joy that once characterized your relationship ?
translation.zu: o yu ting pasin bilong bel hevi na tingting planti i daunim pinis pasin bilong stap amamas na wanbel ?

translation.en: even if your marriage has been in a loveless state for many years , what was lost can be found .
translation.zu: maski pasin bilong laikim tru poroman i lus long marit bilong yu inap longpela taim , yu inap kisim dispela pasin gen .

translation.en: of course , you have to be realistic .
translation.zu: tasol yu mas i gat stretpela tingting .

translation.en: no imperfect man and woman are able to achieve a perfect marriage .
translation.zu: man na meri i no gutpela olgeta , olsem na marit bilong ol i no inap kamap gutpela olgeta .

translation.en: nevertheless , there are steps that you can take to reverse negative trends .
translation.zu: tasol i gat ol samting yu inap mekim bilong stretim ol hevi insait long marit .

translation.en: while reading the following material , try to identify which points particularly apply to your marriage .
translation.zu: taim yu ritim ol tok i stap daunbilo , traim tingim wanem tok i stret tru long marit bilong yu .

translation.en: instead of focusing on the shortcomings of your mate , select a few suggestions that you can put into practice , and apply the scriptural counsel .
translation.zu: no ken tingim tasol ol samting poroman i save popaia long en ; makim sampela tok yu yet i ken mekim wok long en , na bihainim ol tok bilong baibel i toktok long marit .

translation.en: you may find that there is more hope for your marriage than you realized .
translation.zu: ating nau bai yu save i gat rot bilong helpim marit bilong yu long kamap gutpela .

translation.en: a long - term view is essential if you are going to work on your marriage .
translation.zu: sapos yu laik stretim sampela hevi bilong marit , yu mas i gat tingting olsem marit i no bilong stap sotpela taim tasol .

translation.en: after all , the marital arrangement was designed by god to link two humans inseparably .
translation.zu: tingim , marit em i samting god yet i kamapim bilong pasim tupela inap oltaim .

translation.en: hence , your relationship with your spouse is not like a job that you can quit or an apartment that you can escape from by simply breaking the lease and moving out .
translation.zu: ( stat 2 : 24 ; matyu 19 : 4 , 5 ) olsem na i stap bilong yu wantaim poroman i no olsem wanpela wok mani yu inap lusim , o wanpela haus yu ken brukim nating kontrak bilong rentim na go long narapela haus .

translation.en: rather , when getting married you made a solemn promise to stick with your mate , come what may .
translation.zu: taim yu marit , yu bin mekim wanpela tok promis bilong stap wantaim poroman maski wanem samting i kamap .

translation.en: a deep sense of commitment conforms to what jesus christ stated nearly 2,000 years ago : " what god has yoked together let no man put apart . " - matthew 19 : 6 .
translation.zu: pasin bilong pilim tru dispela tok promis , em i stret long tok jisas i mekim long 2,000 yia i go pinis , em i tok : " samting god i pasim pinis , em man i no ken katim . " - matyu 19 : 6 .

translation.en: some might say , ' well , we 're still together .
translation.zu: ating sampela bai tok : ' mipela stap yet wantaim .

translation.en: however , as noted at the outset of this series , some couples who stay together are stuck in stagnant waters , trapped in a loveless marriage .
translation.zu: tasol olsem namba wan stori i kamapim , sampela i no katim marit tasol ol i no sindaun gut wantaim - ol i karim hevi tasol bilong stap insait long wanpela marit i no gat pasin bilong laikim tru narapela long en .

translation.en: commitment should reflect loyalty not only to the institution of marriage but also to the person whom you have vowed to love and cherish . - ephesians 5 : 33 .
translation.zu: pasin bilong stap gut long poroman i kamapim klia olsem ol i tingim marit i bikpela samting , na ol i tingim gut poroman ol i bin tok promis long laikim em tru na lukautim em gut . - efesus 5 : 33 .

translation.en: the things you say to your mate can reveal just how deep your commitment is .
translation.zu: ol tok yu mekim long poroman inap kamapim klia tingting tru bilong yu long dispela pasin bilong stap gut long marit .

translation.en: for example , in the heat of an argument , some husbands and wives make rash statements such as " i 'm leaving you ! "
translation.zu: olsem : taim kros i kamap , sampela man na meri marit i hariap na kamapim kain tok olsem " mi bai lusim yu ! "

translation.en: or " i 'm going to find someone who appreciates me ! "
translation.zu: o " mi bai painim wanpela poroman i save tingim mi ! "

translation.en: even if such comments are not meant literally , they undermine commitment by implying that the door is always open and that the speaker is ever poised and ready to walk through it .
translation.zu: maski ol i toktok nating tasol , tok bilong ol i kamapim tingting olsem oltaim ol i redi i stap long lusim poroman sapos rot i op , na dispela i bagarapim pasin bilong stap gut long marit .

translation.en: to restore love in your marriage , eliminate such threats from your conversations .
translation.zu: bilong kirapim gen pasin bilong laikim tru narapela insait long marit , yupela mas rausim olgeta kain tok olsem .

translation.en: after all , would you decorate an apartment if you knew that any day you might be moving out of it ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ? bai yu wok long bilasim haus yu stap long en sapos yu save i no longtaim na yu bai lusim olgeta ?

translation.en: determine that you will try earnestly to work toward solutions .
translation.zu: pasim tok long bel olsem yu bai wok strong long stretim ol hevi bilong yupela .

translation.en: this is what one wife did after going through a turbulent period with her husband .
translation.zu: wanpela meri i bin mekim olsem taim man bilong em i bin givim planti hevi long em .

translation.en: " as much as i disliked him at times , i didn 't think about getting out of the relationship , " she says .
translation.zu: em i tok : " maski sampela taim mi no save laikim em liklik , mi no tingting long lusim em .

translation.en: " whatever was broken , we were going to fix it somehow .
translation.zu: wanem samting long marit bilong mipela i bagarap , mipela bai painim rot bilong stretim .

translation.en: and now , after two very rocky years , i can honestly say that we are quite happy together again . "
translation.zu: inap 2 - pela yia hevi bilong marit i bikpela tru , tasol nau mi ken tok mipela i stap amamas wantaim . "

translation.en: yes , commitment means teamwork - not just coexisting but working toward a common goal .
translation.zu: tupela mas wok wantaim long mekim marit bilong ol i stap gut .

translation.en: perhaps you have noted that to be true of a man who owns an expensive new car .

translation.en: for example , in the prophet malachi 's day , jehovah censured israelite husbands who dealt treacherously with their wives by frivolously divorcing them .

translation.en: yet , the mere presence of conflict does not have to be the death knell of a marriage .
translation.zu: tasol taim tupela marit i gat kros , dispela i no makim olsem marit i bilong bagarap tasol .

translation.en: in a successful marriage , the husband and wife have learned to talk about their problems without becoming , as one doctor calls it , " intimate enemies . "
translation.zu: long marit em tupela i pas gut wantaim , man na meri i lain pinis long toktok gut wantaim long ol hevi - ol i no stap olsem " tupela birua i pas wantaim , " olsem wanpela dokta i kamapim .
