translation.en: then , too , some were raised in homes where a parent 's anger was unleashed on a regular basis .
translation.zu: na tu , sampela i bin go bikpela wantaim papa o mama em ol i save belhat planti taim .

translation.en: from an early age , they were , in a sense , trained to believe that temperamental outbursts and abusive speech are normal .
translation.zu: dispela i mekim na taim ol i liklik yet ol i kisim tingting olsem i no gat rong long belhat na tok nogut taim kros i kamap long bel .

translation.en: a boy raised in such an environment may grow up to become " a man given to anger , " one who is " disposed to rage . "
translation.zu: wanpela manki i go bikpela insait long ol lain i bihainim dispela pasin em inap kamap wanpela " man bilong belhat . "

translation.en: managing conflict , then , involves learning new ways to express one 's thoughts .
translation.zu: olsem na bilong stretim kros long gutpela pasin , man na meri i mas lainim nupela pasin bilong kamapim tingting bilong ol .

translation.en: this is no trivial matter , for a bible proverb states : " death and life are in the power of the tongue . "
translation.zu: dispela i no liklik samting , olsem wanpela savetok bilong baibel i kamapim : " toktok bilong yu em inap mekim man i stap gut [ o ] em inap long bagarapim man . "

translation.en: even if your mate seems to be the prime offender in this regard , give thought to the things that you say during a disagreement .
translation.zu: maski i olsem poroman bilong yu i gat bikpela asua moa long pasin bilong kamapim ol hatpela tok , tingim gut ol tok yu yet yu laik kamapim taim yupela i no wanbel .

translation.en: of course , if something disturbs you , you have a right to express yourself .
translation.zu: sapos i gat samting yu no amamas long en , i stret yu ken kamapim long poroman .

translation.en: but you can do so without resorting to sarcasm , insults , and put - downs .
translation.zu: ( stat 21 : 9 - 12 ) tasol taim yu mekim olsem , yu inap abrusim pasin bilong sutim tok na daunim narapela .

translation.en: set firm boundaries for yourself - some things that you will resolve not to say to your mate , such as " i hate you " or " i wish we had never married . "
translation.zu: putim sampela tambu long yu yet - tambuim sampela tok yu bai i no inap mekim long poroman , olsem : " mi no laikim yu liklik , " o " i gutpela moa sapos yumi i no bin marit . "

translation.en: and although the christian apostle paul was not specifically discussing marriage , it is wise to avoid getting caught up in what he called " debates about words " and " violent disputes about trifles . "
translation.zu: tru , aposel pol i no toktok long ol marit taim em i toktok long pasin bilong " tok resis , " na " tok kros nabaut long ol liklik samting nating , " tasol i gutpela sapos ol marit i abrusim ol dispela kain pasin .

translation.en: * if your spouse uses such methods , you do not have to respond in kind .
translation.zu: * sapos poroman bilong yu i save tok resis o tok kros nabaut , i no olsem yu mas bihainim wankain pasin .

translation.en: as far as it depends upon you , pursue peace . - romans 12 : 17 , 18 ; philippians 2 : 14 .
translation.zu: oltaim yu yet yu mas painim rot bilong i stap wanbel . - rom 12 : 17 , 18 ; filipai 2 : 14 .

translation.en: admittedly , when tempers flare , it is difficult to control one 's speech .
translation.zu: tru , taim belhat i kamap , i hatwok long bosim gut toktok .

translation.en: " not one of mankind can get it tamed .
translation.zu: oltaim maus i save kirap nabaut na mekim tok nogut .

translation.en: an unruly injurious thing , it is full of death - dealing poison . "
translation.zu: i olsem marasin nogut bilong kilim man i dai i pulap long maus bilong yumi . "

translation.en: what can you do , then , when anger begins to build ?
translation.zu: olsem na yu ken mekim wanem taim kros i wok long kamap bikpela ?

translation.en: how can you speak to your mate in a manner that will quell the conflict rather than add fuel to it ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem yu ken toktok wantaim poroman long pasin i save mekim kros i dai , na i no bilong mekim kros i go bikpela ?

translation.en: defusing explosive arguments
translation.zu: rot bilong daunim belhat

translation.en: some have found that it is easier to slow down anger and address underlying issues if they put emphasis on their feelings rather than on their mate 's actions .
translation.zu: sampela i kisim save olsem ol i ken daunim pasin bilong belhat na stori stret long as bilong hevi taim ol i kamapim ol tingting i stap long bel na ol i no sutim tok long samting poroman i mekim .

translation.en: for example , " i feel hurt because of what you said " is much more effective than " you hurt me " or " you should know better than to say that . "
translation.zu: ol i kirapim toktok olsem : " bel bilong mi i bagarap long sampela tok yu bin mekim . " dispela i winim pasin bilong tok olsem " yu bagarapim bel bilong mi , " o " tok bilong yu i no stret . "

translation.en: of course , when expressing how you feel , the tone of your voice should not be laced with bitterness or contempt .
translation.zu: tasol nek bilong yu i mas gutpela taim yu kamapim ol samting i stap long bel bilong yu , na no ken mekim olsem yu bel nogut long poroman .

translation.en: your objective should be to highlight the problem rather than attack the person . - genesis 27 : 46 - 28 : 1 .
translation.zu: dispela bai helpim yu long stori stret long hevi na abrusim pasin bilong sutim tok long poroman . - stat 27 : 46 - 28 : 1 .

translation.en: in addition , always remember that there is " a time to keep quiet and a time to speak . "
translation.zu: na oltaim yumi mas tingim dispela samting : i gat " taim bilong pasim maus na taim bilong toktok . "

translation.en: so when it is your turn to listen , be " swift about hearing , slow about speaking . "
translation.zu: olsem na taim yu gat wok long putim yau , yu mas " putim yau kwik long harim tok , tasol [ yu ] no ken hariap long mekim toktok . "

translation.en: equally important , be " slow about wrath . "
translation.zu: narapela bikpela samting i olsem , yu " no ken kros kwik . "

translation.en: do not take literally every harsh word that your mate utters ; neither " hurry yourself in your spirit to become offended . "
translation.zu: ( saveman 7 : 9 ) i gutpela moa long tingim samting i stap long bel bilong poroman na olsem wanem dispela i kirapim em long mekim sampela toktok .

translation.en: instead , try to perceive the feelings behind your mate 's words .
translation.zu: baibel i tok : " man i gat gutpela tingting , em i no inap kros kwik .

translation.en: " the insight of a man certainly slows down his anger , " says the bible , " and it is beauty on his part to pass over transgression . "
translation.zu: nambawan pasin bilong en i olsem . em i no save tingim rong narapela man i mekim long em . "

translation.en: for example , a wife 's complaint that her husband does not spend time with her is likely not simply about hours and minutes .
translation.zu: yumi ken tingim wanpela meri i toktok planti olsem man bilong em i no tromoi bikpela hap taim bilong poromanim em .

translation.en: similarly , a husband 's grievance concerning an impulsive purchase that his wife made is probably not just about dollars and cents .
translation.zu: na tu wanpela man inap toktok planti long mani meri i tromoi bilong baim wanpela samting , tasol ating man i no bel hevi tumas long ol kina na toea meri i tromoi .

translation.en: it may be more about his feeling left out of the decision - making process .
translation.zu: ating em i bel hevi long wanem meri i no bin toktok gut wantaim em paslain long em i baim samting .

translation.en: is this easier said than done ?
translation.zu: yu ting i hatwok long mekim olsem ?

translation.en: absolutely !
translation.zu: tru tumas !

translation.en: sometimes , despite the best of efforts , unkind words will be spoken and tempers will flare .
translation.zu: maski ol i wok strong long daunim , sampela taim ol bai kamapim ol tok i bagarapim bel bilong poroman na nau tupela marit bai kros .

translation.en: when you see this start to happen , you may need to follow the advice of proverbs 17 : 14 : " before the quarrel has burst forth , take your leave . "
translation.zu: taim yu lukim olsem dispela samting bai kamap , ating yu gat wok long bihainim gutpela tok i stap long sindaun 17 : 14 ( nw ) , i tok : " taim kros i no kirap yet , mobeta yu lusim dispela man . "

translation.en: there is nothing wrong with postponing the discussion until feelings have cooled down .
translation.zu: i no gat rong long larim bel i kol pastaim na stretim hevi long bihain .

translation.en: if it is difficult to talk without things getting out of hand , it may be advisable to have a mature friend sit down with the two of you and help you to sort through your differences .
translation.zu: sapos i hatwok long pasim bikpela kros taim yupela i laik toktok long wanpela samting , ating i gutpela long kisim wanpela pren em i gat bikpela krismas na gutpela tingting , na em i ken sindaun wantaim yupela na helpim yupela long stretim hevi .

translation.en: maintain a realistic outlook
translation.zu: holimpas stretpela tingting

translation.en: do not be discouraged if your marriage is not what you envisioned it would be during courtship .
translation.zu: no ken bel hevi sapos marit bilong yu i no wankain olsem samting yu bin tingim taim yutupela i no marit yet .

translation.en: says one team of experts : " unending bliss is just not what marriage is like for most people .
translation.zu: wanpela lain i save skelim ol marit , ol i tok olsem : " marit bilong planti manmeri i no olsem samting bilong kisim bikpela amamas long en long olgeta taim .

translation.en: yes , marriage may not be a storybook romance , but neither does it have to be a tragedy .
translation.zu: ating marit i no olsem ol buk nating i kamapim , tasol dispela i no makim olsem marit i bilong karim hevi tasol .

translation.en: while there will be times when you and your spouse will just have to put up with each other , there will also be occasions when you can put your differences aside and just enjoy being together , having fun , and talking to each other as friends .
translation.zu: tru , sampela taim i gat wok long karim hevi long sampela pasin bilong poroman , tasol i gat ol narapela taim na bai yutupela i no tingim ol samting yupela i no wanbel long en . bai yupela i kisim amamas long mekim ol samting na toktok gut wantaim olsem tupela pren .

translation.en: these are the times when you may be able to rekindle the love that has faded .
translation.zu: long ol kain taim olsem ating yu inap kirapim gen pasin bilong laikim tru narapela insait long marit bilong yu .

translation.en: but they can find a measure of happiness .
translation.zu: tasol ol i ken kisim sampela amamas long marit bilong ol .

translation.en: one thing is certain : if both you and your mate put forth effort and are willing to be flexible and seek the advantage of the other person , there is good reason to believe that your marriage can be saved . - 1 corinthians 10 : 24 .
translation.zu: tasol yumi save olsem : sapos yu na poroman i wok strong na daunim laik bilong yupela yet na tingim laik bilong narapela , i gat as bilong ting olsem marit bilong yu inap abrusim bagarap . - 1 korin 10 : 24 .

translation.zu: long buk medicina - mitos y verdades ( marasin - ol stori nating na ol tok tru ) , carla leonel i tok , taim ol pikinini i no winim yet 6 - pela mun ol i ken kisim liklik hap wara bilong swit muli , na ol prut ol i bin memeim ( olsem banana , apel , na popo ) , poris , na sup i gat kumu sayor samting long en .

translation.en: of course , since opinions on this vary , it would be wise for you to consult your pediatrician .
translation.zu: tasol i gat ol narapela narapela tingting long dispela samting , olsem na i gutpela long askim dokta bilong ol pikinini pastaim .

translation.en: that thought kept running through my mind as i lay in a hospital bed with units of blood slowly dripping into my veins .
translation.zu: mi wok long tingting olsem taim mi slip long bet long haus sik na isi isi blut i go insait long ol rop bilong blut bilong mi .

translation.en: for more than 20 years , i had been told that this was the only way i could keep living - if indeed this could be called living .
translation.zu: winim 20 yia olgeta , ol i bin tokim mi olsem long dispela rot tasol mi inap i stap laip - tasol dispela pasin bilong i stap laip em i no gutpela liklik .

translation.en: beta - thalassemia major is a severe inherited blood disease , which occurs most frequently among people of greek , italian , middle eastern , southern asian , or african ancestry .
translation.zu: dispela em i wanpela bikpela sik bilong blut ol man i save kisim long papamama , na em i save kamap planti long ol manmeri bilong grik , itali , midel is , saut esia , o afrika .

translation.en: as the doctors explained to my parents , when one has this condition , the red cells of the body do not produce enough hemoglobin , the protein that transports oxygen to the cells .
translation.zu: ol dokta i stori long papamama bilong mi olsem taim man i gat dispela sik , ol retpela sel bilong blut i no save kamapim planti hemoglobin , em dispela protin i save karim win oksijen i go long ol sel bilong bodi .

translation.en: red cells remain in my bloodstream for only a short time because my liver and spleen destroy and remove them .
translation.zu: ol retpela sel i save stap sotpela taim tasol long bodi bilong mi , long wanem , lewa na splin bilong mi i save bagarapim na rausim ol .

translation.en: these organs are responsible for the destruction of abnormal or worn - out red cells .
translation.zu: ol dispela hap bilong bodi i gat wok long bagarapim ol retpela sel i nogut o i olpela .

translation.en: my parents were told that the only known treatment for thalassemia was regular blood transfusions and the removal of the accumulated iron .
translation.zu: ol i tokim papamama bilong mi olsem wanpela rot tasol bilong stretim dispela sik em long rot bilong kisim blut long olgeta taim na rausim marasin ain taim em i kamap planti .

translation.en: as the doctors explained , however , treatment by transfusion is accompanied by the ongoing accumulation of iron in the heart and the liver , and this can be fatal .
translation.zu: tasol olsem ol dokta i tok , pasin bilong kisim blut bai mekim na ain bai kamap planti long klok na lewa , na dispela inap long bagarapim man .

translation.en: transfusion - the treatment that prevents death in patients in their first ten years of life - usually provides the major component of the iron poisoning that is so deadly later on .
translation.zu: pasin bilong kisim blut - em wanpela rot bilong stretim sik na i save helpim ol man long i stap laip inap 10 - pela yia samting - tasol em i save mekim na planti ain i kamap na dispela inap long bagarapim man long bihain .

translation.en: life with an " expiration date "
translation.zu: mi save mi no inap i stap longpela taim

translation.en: from my early childhood , death loomed heavily over me .
translation.zu: kirap long taim mi stap liklik yet , planti taim klostu mi laik i dai .

translation.en: i was brought up with an unending list of " don 'ts " and other rules : " don 't run ! "
translation.zu: ol i tambuim mi long planti samting na kamapim planti tok olsem : " no ken ran ! "

translation.en: " don 't get excited ! "
translation.zu: " no ken amamas tumas ! "

translation.en: " be careful ! "
translation.zu: " was gut ! "

translation.en: to improve my condition , she would take me to faraway monasteries with a reputation for faith healing and would supply me with various charms and amulets .
translation.zu: bilong stretim sik bilong mi em i bin kisim mi i go long ol haus bruder i stap longwe em ol i gat nem long oraitim ol man long rot bilong bilip , na ol i bin givim ol paspas samting long mi .

translation.en: much money was spent on such agencies - but to no avail .
translation.zu: mipela i lusim bikpela mani long ol dispela lain - tasol sik bilong mi i stap yet .

translation.en: i believed in and loved god , although i did not know how to worship him .
translation.zu: mi bilip long god na mi laikim em , maski mi no save long rot bilong lotuim em .

translation.en: when in despair , i would tearfully pray : " god , if you really exist and love me , please help me . "
translation.zu: taim mi bel hevi tru , mi save krai na beten olsem : " god , sapos yu stap tru na yu laikim mi , plis helpim mi . "

translation.en: a desperate quest for comfort
translation.zu: painim rot bilong mekim gut bel bilong mi

translation.en: as i grew up , my health deteriorated rapidly , largely because of the excess iron in my blood .
translation.zu: taim mi wok long i go bikpela , skin bilong mi i wok long bagarap hariap , long wanem , planti ain i stap long blut bilong mi .

translation.en: as part of my treatment , i used a device that reduces blood iron .
translation.zu: bilong stretim dispela hevi , mi save mekim wok long wanpela samting bilong daunim ain long blut .

translation.en: every night i had to insert a needle just underneath the skin in my abdomen to let an iron chelator trickle into my body all night long .
translation.zu: long olgeta nait mi yet mi bin givim sut long bel bilong mi na larim sut i stap long skin , na long nait olgeta wanpela marasin i ken go insait isi isi long bodi bilong mi .

translation.en: often during those sleepless nights , i wanted to die .
translation.zu: planti taim long ol dispela nait mi no save slip na mi laik dai tasol .

translation.en: i felt that god had ignored my pleas for help .
translation.zu: mi pilim olsem god i no laik harim beten bilong mi na helpim mi .

translation.en: at the age of 16 , i started associating with a group of youngsters who were immersed in heavy metal music .
translation.zu: taim mi gat 16 krismas , mi kirap long bung wantaim sampela yangpela em ol i insait tru long musik hevi - metal .

translation.en: after all , since evil was everywhere around me , i agreed with the idea that an evil higher power controlled the universe .
translation.zu: pasin nogut i pulap long olgeta hap , olsem na mi wanbel long dispela tingting olsem wanpela spirit nogut i bosim ples antap na graun .

translation.en: my endless blood transfusions had left their mark on my body .
translation.zu: long olgeta taim mi kisim blut na dispela i mekim nogut long skin bilong mi .

translation.en: as i continued listening to heavy metal music with its emphasis on death , drugs , demons , spiritism , and blood , i felt that satan had me entangled .
translation.zu: taim mi wok long harim musik hevi - metal em i toktok planti long dai , na drak , na ol spirit nogut , na ol wok bilong ol spirit nogut , na blut , mi pilim olsem satan i kalabusim mi pinis .

translation.en: at night i was depressed and often wept .
translation.zu: long nait mi save bel hevi na planti taim mi save krai .

translation.en: it was at this low point in my life that a beam of hope began to shine .
translation.zu: mi stap bel hevi nogut tru , tasol long dispela taim rot i op na ol gutpela samting i kamap long i stap bilong mi .

translation.en: my life takes a turn
translation.zu: i stap bilong mi i senis

translation.en: one day , when i was 20 years old , a friend gave me a book that she had obtained from jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: wanpela de , taim mi gat 20 krismas , wanpela pren i givim mi wanpela buk em i bin kisim long ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: it was entitled the bible - god 's word or man 's ?
translation.zu: nem bilong dispela buk em the bible - god 's word or man 's ?

translation.en: * she was not really interested in the book , but when i browsed through its pages , i was impressed .
translation.zu: * em i no amamas tumas long dispela buk , tasol taim mi lukim ol tok i stap long en , mi kirap nogut tru .

translation.en: when i finished reading the book , i wanted to share these things with others .
translation.zu: taim mi kaunim pinis dispela buk , mi laik tokim ol narapela tu long ol dispela samting .

translation.en: it was then that i met manolis , a man who knew about jehovah and the message of the bible because some of his relatives were jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: long dispela rot mi bungim manolis , em wanpela man i save long jehova na long ol tok bilong baibel , long wanem , sampela wanblut bilong em ol i witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: he took me to the local meeting place of jehovah 's witnesses , and during the summer of 1990 , i started studying the bible with them .
translation.zu: em i kisim mi i go long hap ol witnes bilong jehova i save bung long en , na long julai samting long 1990 , mi kirap stadi long baibel wantaim ol .

translation.en: through my bible study , i learned that our creator truly cares for us and that he is not responsible for the sickness and pain that afflict many of us .
translation.zu: long rot bilong baibel - stadi mi kisim save olsem man bilong wokim yumi em i save tingim tru yumi na em i no asua bilong em na ol sik na pen i save painim yumi .

translation.en: i learned that it was satan who introduced sin and death into this world and that jehovah will soon undo the works of satan by removing this old system and replacing it with a perfect new world .
translation.zu: mi kisim save olsem satan i bin kamapim sin na indai long graun , na liklik taim jehova bai bagarapim ol wok bilong satan long rot bilong pinisim ol pasin nogut bilong nau na kamapim long graun wanpela nupela taim i gat stretpela pasin i stap long en .

translation.en: under paradisaic conditions , god - fearing people will be restored to human perfection .
translation.zu: ol manmeri i pret long god ol bai i stap long gutpela ples paradais na skin bilong ol bai kamap gutpela olgeta .

translation.en: then , no one will say , " i am sick . " - isaiah 33 : 24 .
translation.zu: na long dispela taim i no gat man bai tok olsem : " mi gat sik . " - aisaia 33 : 24 .

translation.en: at the same time , i learned that the bible tells us to ' abstain from blood . '
translation.zu: na tu , mi kisim save olsem baibel i tok yumi mas abrusim blut .

translation.en: as my conscience started to be molded and trained by the lofty standards and principles of the bible , i was motivated to make a personal decision regarding blood transfusions .
translation.zu: taim ol lo bilong baibel i stretim na stiaim gut maus bilong bel bilong mi , dispela i kirapim mi long tingim wanem samting mi laik mekim long pasin bilong kisim blut .

translation.en: i decided that i would not accept them anymore .
translation.zu: mi pasim tok olsem bai mi no inap moa long kisim blut .

translation.en: for more than 20 years , i had been led to believe that the only way i could keep alive was to receive regular blood transfusions .
translation.zu: winim 20 yia olgeta , ol narapela i kirapim mi long bilip olsem i gat wanpela rot tasol bilong mi long i stap laip yet , em long rot bilong kisim blut long olgeta taim .

translation.en: would i by obeying the bible 's command be signing my own death warrant ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ? sapos mi bihainim tok bilong baibel , dispela bai mekim na mi bai dai ?

translation.en: what would my parents think of my rejection of blood ?
translation.zu: papamama bilong mi ol bai ting olsem wanem long pasin bilong mi long sakim blut ?

translation.en: would my doctors and the other medical staff try to pressure me ?
translation.zu: ol dokta na ol narapela wokman long haus sik ol bai strong long mi mas kisim blut ?

translation.en: through fervent prayer i threw all my anxieties on jehovah .
translation.zu: long rot bilong beten strong mi putim olgeta hevi bilong mi long han bilong jehova .

translation.en: above all else , i was determined to conform to god 's law as it is expressed in the bible .
translation.zu: tasol bikpela samting em mi tingting strong long bihainim lo bilong god long baibel .

translation.en: eventually , though , they said that they would respect my personal decision in the matter .
translation.zu: tasol bihain ol i tok olsem ol i orait long samting mi laik mekim .

translation.en: i then explained my religious stand to the medical staff at the hospital , also informing them that i would vigorously pursue alternative methods to blood transfusion .
translation.zu: orait nau mi kamapim bilip bilong mi long ol dokta long haus sik na mi tokim ol olsem bai mi wok strong tru long painim ol narapela rot bilong stretim sik bilong mi em ol i senisim pasin bilong kisim blut .

translation.en: the doctors reluctantly agreed to abide by my wishes .
translation.zu: ol dokta i no amamas , tasol ol i orait long bihainim laik bilong mi .

translation.en: while receiving blood transfusions in the past , i had made friends with some other thalassemic youngsters .
translation.zu: long taim mi wok long kisim blut long bipo , mi bin pren wantaim sampela narapela yangpela em ol tu i gat dispela sik .

translation.en: now they were puzzled over my stand on blood .
translation.zu: nau ol i kirap nogut olsem mi sakim blut .

translation.en: one of them sarcastically told me that soon i would " be carried away by four " - a greek expression meaning that i would die .
translation.zu: wanpela bilong ol em i tok bilas long mi , olsem i no longtaim na " fopela man bai karim mi i go " - em wanpela hap tok grik bilong makim olsem mi bai dai .

translation.en: since august 1991 , i have not had a blood transfusion .
translation.zu: kirap long ogas 1991 na i kam inap long nau , mi no kisim blut moa .

translation.en: best of all , however , i have a life with purpose , a life enriched by an intimate relationship with my creator , jehovah god .
translation.zu: tasol gutpela samting tru em olsem : nau laip bilong mi i gat as bilong en na mi amamas , long wanem , mi pas gut wantaim man bilong wokim yumi , em god jehova .

translation.en: in july of 1992 , i symbolized my dedication to jehovah by water baptism .
translation.zu: long julai 1992 , mi kamapim dediket bilong mi long jehova long rot bilong baptais long wara .

translation.en: manolis , that cherished friend who brought me in contact with the vital support of the christian congregation of jehovah 's witnesses , was baptized on that same day .
translation.zu: manolis , em dispela gutpela pren i kisim mi i go bilong kisim helpim long kongrigesen kristen bilong ol witnes bilong jehova , em tu i kisim baptais long dispela de .

translation.en: about 18 months later , we were married .
translation.zu: inap olsem 18 mun bihain mitupela i marit .

translation.en: later , i had the joy of seeing my mother and my sister become baptized servants of jehovah .
translation.zu: bihain , mi amamas tru long lukim mama na susa bilong mi ol i kisim baptais na kamap wokboi bilong jehova .

translation.en: i have learned that although death is an enemy , it is not an enemy to be feared .
translation.zu: mi kisim save olsem maski indai em i wanpela birua , yumi no ken pret long en .

translation.en: our life is in his hands .
translation.zu: laip bilong yumi i stap long han bilong em .

translation.en: i will always be thankful to him for saving me from a life with only the prospect of a slow death .
translation.zu: oltaim bai mi tok tenkyu long em i bin kisim bek mi long kain laip i gat tingting tasol long i dai isi isi .

translation.en: indeed , he has led me to the hope of eternal life ! - revelation 21 : 1 - 4 .
translation.zu: tru tumas , em i helpim mi long bilip na wet long kisim laip oltaim ! - kth 21 : 1 - 4 .

translation.en: the bible 's viewpoint
translation.zu: baibel i tok wanem ?

translation.en: your choice of medical treatment - does it matter ?
translation.zu: ol marasin samting yu laik kisim - em bikpela samting o nogat ?

translation.en: the bible writer who penned those words , luke , was himself a physician .
translation.zu: man i raitim dispela tok bilong baibel , em luk , em yet i wanpela dokta .

translation.en: perhaps during their travels together , the apostle paul benefited from luke 's medical expertise .
translation.zu: aposel pol na luk i bin raun wantaim , na ating save bilong luk long ol samting bilong marasin i bin helpim pol .

translation.en: but do the scriptures provide guidelines as to what types of medical care are acceptable for christians ?
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem ? baibel i kamapim sampela tok bilong stiaim ol kristen bambai ol i ken save wanem kain marasin samting ol i mas kisim ?

translation.en: the bible can guide a person in making wise decisions with regard to medical treatment .
translation.zu: baibel inap helpim ol man long kisim stretpela tingting long ol samting bilong dokta na marasin .

translation.en: for instance , deuteronomy 18 : 10 - 12 makes clear that practices such as divination and magic are " detestable " to jehovah .
translation.zu: olsem : lo 18 : 10 - 12 i kamapim long ples klia olsem jehova i " no laikim tru " olkain pasin bilong glasman na posin marila samting .

translation.en: the bible also reveals the high value that the creator places on the sanctity of life and blood .
translation.zu: baibel i tokaut tu olsem man bilong wokim yumi em i ting laip na blut em i bikpela samting tru na i holi .

translation.en: determined to heed the injunction to ' keep abstaining from blood , ' jehovah 's witnesses object to medical procedures that violate the bible 's command to abstain from blood .
translation.zu: ( stat 9 : 3 , 4 ) ol witnes bilong jehova i tingting strong long bihainim lo bilong baibel long abrusim blut , olsem na ol i sakim olgeta marasin samting i brukim dispela lo .

translation.en: this does not mean that they reject all medical treatment .
translation.zu: tasol i no olsem ol i sakim olgeta kain marasin samting , nogat .

translation.en: rather , they seek the best care possible for themselves and their children .
translation.zu: ol i wok strong long painim nambawan gutpela marasin samting bilong helpim ol yet na ol pikinini bilong ol .

translation.en: but they appeal to health - care professionals to provide treatment that is in accord with their religious convictions .
translation.zu: tasol ol i save askim ol dokta na nes long tingim bilip bilong ol taim ol i laik mekim ol samting bilong stretim sik bilong ol .

translation.en: king solomon warned that " anyone inexperienced puts faith in every word , but the shrewd one considers his steps . "
translation.zu: king solomon i givim tok lukaut olsem : " ol man i gat liklik save tasol , ol i save bilipim olgeta kain tok .

translation.en: not all forms of medical treatment are helpful .
translation.zu: i no olgeta marasin samting i save helpim skin bilong man .

translation.en: when jesus said that ' those who are ailing need a physician , ' he was not sanctioning all the medical treatments that were available in his day .
translation.zu: taim jisas i tok ' ol sikman tasol i save go long dokta , ' em i no laik tokaut olsem olgeta kain marasin samting long taim bilong em ol i gutpela .

translation.en: he knew that some forms of medical practice were sound and that some were fallacious .
translation.zu: em i save olsem sampela marasin samting i gutpela na sampela i no inap helpim man .

translation.en: it should also be acknowledged that a treatment that is helpful to one person could be ineffective - even harmful - to another .
translation.zu: na yumi mas save tu olsem sampela marasin samting inap helpim wanpela man , tasol em i no inap helpim narapela man - em inap bagarapim em .

translation.en: when facing a medical decision , a prudent person would weigh his options carefully instead of ' putting faith in every word , ' even when receiving advice from well - meaning friends .
translation.zu: taim man i mas skelim wanem kain marasin samting em bai kisim , man i gat gutpela tingting em bai skelim gut dispela samting na em bai no " bilipim olgeta kain tok , " maski wanpela pren i laik helpim em i tokim em long wanpela marasin samting .

translation.en: he would display " soundness of mind " by seeking reliable information so as to be in a position to make an informed choice . - titus 2 : 12 .
translation.zu: em bai " tingting gut " na wok long kisim stretpela save bambai em i ken makim gut ol samting em i laik mekim . - taitus 2 : 12 .

translation.en: be realistic and reasonable
translation.zu: bihainim gutpela tingting na tingting stret

translation.en: for example , if a reasonably healthy person becomes obsessively preoccupied with health and fitness , this could cause him to lose sight of " the more important things . " - philippians 1 : 10 ; 2 : 3 , 4 .
translation.zu: olsem : sapos man i gat gutpela skin i wok long tingting tumas long helpim skin bilong em long kamap gutpela na strongpela , dispela inap mekim na em bai lusim tingting long " skelim gut olgeta pasin na kisim ol pasin i gutpela tru . " - filipai 1 : 10 ; 2 : 3 , 4 .

translation.en: a desperately sick woman in jesus ' day " spent all her resources " seeking the help of physicians for treatment of her chronic ailment .
translation.zu: wanpela meri i sik nogut tru long taim bilong jisas , em i bin " lusim olgeta mani bilong en " bilong painim wanpela dokta i ken oraitim sik bilong em .

translation.en: what was the result ?
translation.zu: wanem samting i kamap long dispela ?

translation.en: so it is important to have a realistic view of what medical science can accomplish .
translation.zu: olsem na yumi mas kisim stretpela tingting long ol samting ol dokta i ken mekim .

translation.en: therefore , we must develop a balanced view of medical treatment . - philippians 4 : 5 .
translation.zu: olsem na yumi mas kisim stretpela tingting long ol marasin samting bilong stretim sik bilong yumi . - filipai 4 : 5 .

translation.en: clearly , the choices that we make matter .
translation.zu: em nau , rot yumi bihainim bilong stretim sik em i bikpela samting .

translation.en: for that reason , when confronted with decisions about medical treatment , our choice should reflect both our desire for good health and our desire to maintain a healthy relationship with god .
translation.zu: olsem na taim yumi mas makim wanem kain marasin samting yumi laik kisim , samting yumi mekim i mas kamapim long ples klia olsem yumi laik kisim strongpela skin na yumi laik pas gut wantaim god .

translation.en: as we do so , we can continue to look with confidence to the fulfillment of jehovah 's promise that in the glorious new world to come , " no resident will say : ' i am sick . ' " - isaiah 33 : 24 .
translation.zu: taim yumi mekim olsem , yumi ken lukluk i go long truim bilong tok promis bilong jehova olsem long nupela taim bihain bai i ' no gat man i tok " mi gat sik . " ' - aisaia 33 : 24 .

translation.zu: wanem pe bilong dispela wok ?

translation.en: brazilians now cultivate friendships with less frequency than they did ten years ago , reports o globo newspaper .
translation.zu: nius le monde bilong frans i stori olsem wanpela lain i tok pe " long olgeta hap i samting olsem 300 bilion i go inap 600 bilion dola . "

translation.en: a survey of men and women between the ages of 70 and 79 shows that some widows and widowers experience high levels of depressive symptoms up to two years after the loss of their spouse .
translation.zu: nius globe and mail i tok : " em i isi moa long ol lain bilong belhat long kisim hat - atek , winim tru ol lain i no save kros kwik . "

translation.en: those taking part in the study were divided into six groups , based on the amount of time that had passed since the death of their spouse .
translation.zu: inap 6 - pela yia ol i skelim klostu 13,000 manmeri bilong painimaut wanem kain man bai kisim sik long klok .

translation.en: the study found that the rate of depression among the newly bereaved is nine times higher than among married individuals who had not suffered a similar bereavement .
translation.zu: insait long 6 - pela yia , 256 bilong dispela lain manmeri i bin kisim hat - atek .

translation.en: hooked on internet pornography researchers have found that " at least 200,000 internet users are hooked on pornography sites , x - rated chat rooms or other sexual materials online , " reports the new york times .
translation.zu: wok bilong skelim ol dispela lain i kamapim klia olsem ol manmeri i save belhat inap kisim sampela hevi long klok , winim ol narapela inap olsem 35 pesen .

translation.en: the study was conducted by psychologists at stanford and duquesne universities and is one of the first to have estimated the number of internet " cybersex compulsives . " the researchers said that these individuals visit x - rated web sites more than 11 hours a week .
translation.zu: dokta janice williams bilong yunivesiti bilong not karolaina em i go pas long kisim save long dispela samting , na em i tok : " pasin bilong belhat inap kamapim hat - atek , na em i bikpela hevi moa bilong ol lain em mak bilong blut i stret na ol i gat 40 i go inap 60 krismas . "

translation.en: the newspaper quoted the researchers as saying : " this is a hidden public health hazard exploding , in part , because very few are recognizing it as such or taking it seriously . "
translation.zu: olsem na ol lain i skelim dispela samting i tok i gutpela sapos ol manmeri bilong belhat i lain long daunim dispela samting .

translation.en: in the past year , aids has killed more people in africa than has warfare , according to kofi annan , secretary - general of the united nations .
translation.zu: long olgeta yia ol bisnis bilong amerika i save lusim planti milion dola taim man i no inap wok na i mas i gat lain i helpim em , long wanem , em i lusim tingting pinis long paswot bilong em .

translation.en: in côte d 'ivoire , aids kills one teacher every school day , and in botswana , life expectancy has dropped from 70 years to 41 .
translation.zu: tasol long nau planti man i mas mekim wok long ol paswot bilong yusim e - meil na sampela fail i stap long kompiuta long ples wok .

translation.en: " none of us has yet begun to grasp the full impact of this horror - on the quality of life in africa , its economic potential and its social and political stability , " stated mr .
translation.zu: olsem na sampela kampani i wok long lusim pasin bilong mekim wok long ol paswot na ol i kisim ol masin i skelim ol mak bilong han na ol narapela kain samting olsem bilong pasim rot bilong lukim ol samting i no bilong olgeta man long skelim .

translation.en: cities alter climate " explosive urban growth is creating ' heat islands ' so intense that they are establishing their own local weather systems , " reports the times of london .
translation.zu: wanpela ripot ( worldwatch issue alert ) i tok : " inap 100 yia samting pasin bilong smok i wok long go bikpela , tasol long nau ol man long olgeta hap i wok long lusim dispela samting . "

translation.en: the cities trap heat during the day and radiate it back into space at night .
translation.zu: kirap long 1990 i go inap long 1999 , namba bilong olgeta man i smok i go liklik inap olsem 11 pesen .

translation.en: marc imhoff , a national aeronautics and space administration scientist , said : " human survival depends on the ability of the landscape to produce food . if the capacity of the landscape to carry out photosynthesis is substantially reduced , the ability of the planet to support human life must also be diminished . "
translation.zu: nius reuters i kamapim stori olsem i no longtaim i go pinis na wanpela ripot i toksave olsem long ol lain bilong amerika i no gat insurens , ol i save givim baksait long ol samting i makim olsem ol i gat wanpela sik na ol i no tingting tumas long lukim dokta olsem ol narapela man i gat insurens .

translation.en: in most cases it is prime agricultural land that is sacrificed for urban expansion . pollution kills the demand for whales pollution may have become an unlikely ally in the fight to save the whale .
translation.zu: dispela ripot i bin kamap pastaim long narapela nius ( archives of internal medicine ) , na ol i bin kisim ol tok long wanpela lain ( national center for health statistics ) i save skelim ol samting bilong sik .

translation.en: one test showed that eating just one and a half ounces [ 50 g ] of contaminated dolphin meat could cause a significant health risk to a person .
translation.zu: ripot i tok : " long nau kantri bilong yumi i wok long kamapim ol lo bilong helpim ol sikman tasol i no gat ol lo i bilong helpim olgeta man long lukim dokta .

translation.en: such news , some expect , may kill the demand for whale meat .
translation.zu: dispela em i narapela kain pasin tru . "

translation.en: " self - cleaning " lotus
translation.zu: ol trausel i kam bek pinis !

translation.en: why does the lotus plant , long held sacred in eastern religions , always look so clean ?
translation.zu: em ol trausel ol i kolim olive ridley , na laspela taim ol i bin bung olsem , em long 1985 .

translation.en: " water - repellency of plant surfaces has long been known , " say the scientists w .
translation.zu: dispela nambis em i nambawan bikpela ples bilong ol dispela trausel long bung na putim kiau .

translation.en: " but the self - cleaning properties . . . had been completely overlooked . "
translation.zu: inap 28,000 samting i dai long ol traipela umben ol bikpela bot i yusim bilong kisim pis .

translation.en: this is not because the surface is smooth .
translation.zu: ol lain bilong lotu i stap longpela taim moa , o nogat ?

translation.en: seen under a microscope , the leaf has a rough surface of " knobs , folds and buttons " with " convex or dome - shaped water - shedding " profile .
translation.zu: wanpela nius ( science news ) i tok : " pasin bilong insait long ol wok bilong lotu i helpim skin bilong man long i stap gutpela moa na stap longpela taim moa .

translation.en: but added to this is the effect of the hydrophobic , or water - hating , wax crystalloids with which the plant is covered .
translation.zu: em save ol i kisim taim ol i skelim ol ripot bilong 42 lain , em sampela i bin kamapim ripot long 1977 . "

translation.en: the researchers say that this " lotus effect " drastically reduces the adhesion of water and dirt particles , and they add that the plant can regenerate waxes in spite of adverse environmental conditions .
translation.zu: nius i tok moa olsem : " ol saientis i tok ol man i mekim sampela wok lotu bilong helpim ol narapela , dispela i gutpela moa bilong helpim ol long stap longpela taim , winim ol lain i no insait long dispela wok . "

translation.en: a study by the world wide fund for nature ( wwf ) warns that " preventive measures must be taken " before the water quality in france reaches " a point of no return . "
translation.zu: wanpela ripot i tok : " nau yumi kisim save pinis olsem ol manmeri i go oltaim long lotu . . . dispela i mekim na ol i stap longpela taim moa , na dispela tok i stret moa long ol meri .

translation.en: making good use of a powerful video
translation.zu: mekim gutpela wok long wanpela video

translation.en: when she was just 12 years old , tillie took advantage of an opportunity to give a witness at school .
translation.zu: taim tillie i gat 12 - pela krismas tasol , em i autim tok long skul taim rot i op long em .

translation.en: the teacher agreed to let tillie bring the video purple triangles to class .
translation.zu: tisa i orait long tillie i bringim video purple tringles i kam long skul .

translation.en: jehovah 's witnesses are among such groups . "
translation.zu: ol witnes bilong jehova tu i insait long dispela lain . "

translation.en: tillie remembered that her fourth grade teacher 's brother had been killed by the nazis during the holocaust .
translation.zu: tillie i tingim tu tisa bilong em long gret 4 , olsem ol natsi i bin kilim i dai brata bilong em .

translation.en: she took the video to that teacher too , and he viewed it that very evening .
translation.zu: em i kisim video i go long dispela tisa tu , na long dispela apinun yet tisa i lukim video .

translation.en: in all , more than 60 people got to see purple triangles , and much interest was aroused .
translation.zu: winim 60 manmeri olgeta ol i lukim video purple triangles , na em i kirapim tru tingting bilong ol .

translation.en: all of this took place because a young girl had the courage to speak up about her religion . - psalm 8 : 2 .
translation.zu: dispela samting i kamap , long wanem , wanpela yangpela meri i no pret long tokaut long lotu bilong em . - song 8 : 2 .

translation.en: young people ask . . .
translation.zu: ol yangpela i laik save . . .

translation.en: what if my parents think i 'm too young to date ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem sapos papamama i ting mi yangpela tumas long prenim wanpela man ?

translation.en: " you 're old - fashioned , mom .
translation.zu: " mama , yu gat tingting bilong ol man bilong bipo .

translation.en: this isn 't the ' 50 ' s .
translation.zu: nau i no yia 1950 samting .

translation.en: i 'm not your little girl anymore . " - 16 - year - old janie .
translation.zu: mi no liklik pikinini meri bilong yu moa . " - janie , 16 krismas .

translation.en: it can be frustrating to be told that you 're not ready to date .
translation.zu: tru , yu inap bel hevi taim ol i tokim yu olsem yu no redi yet long raun wantaim boipren o gelpren .

translation.en: " i want to do as the bible says and honor my father and mother , " says one youth , " but i don 't think they 're right .
translation.zu: wanpela yangpela i tok : " mi laik bihainim tok bilong baibel na givim biknem long papa na mama bilong mi , tasol mi no ting tingting bilong ol i stret .

translation.en: i don 't even know how to discuss this with them . "
translation.zu: mi no save liklik long olsem wanem mi inap toktok wantaim tupela long dispela samting . "

translation.en: like this young man , you may feel that your parents are being unreasonable and unsympathetic .
translation.zu: olsem dispela yangpela man , ating yu pilim olsem papamama i no gat stretpela tingting na ol i no pilim hevi bilong yu .

translation.en: maybe you 've met someone that you really like and you want to get to know him or her better .
translation.zu: ating yu bin bungim wanpela man o meri yu laikim em tru , na yu laik save gut moa long em .

translation.en: or perhaps you feel that getting into the dating scene would help you to fit in better with your peers .
translation.zu: o ating yu ting olsem sapos yu gat boipren o gelpren , dispela bai helpim yu long kamap wankain olsem ol wanlain bilong yu .

translation.en: " there 's pressure , " says michelle .
translation.zu: michelle i tok : " ol narapela bai subim yu .

translation.en: " if you 're not dating , kids in school think you 're weird . "
translation.zu: sapos yu no prenim wanpela , ol yangpela long skul bai ting olsem yu narapela kain . "

translation.en: one family counselor observed about dating : " there is no area in which parents seem more unreasonable . "
translation.zu: em i tok : " dispela em i wanpela samting ol pikinini i ting papamama i no gat stretpela tingting long en , winim ol narapela samting . "

translation.en: but just because your parents may seem to be unreasonable , does that mean that they really are ?
translation.zu: i luk olsem papamama i no gat stretpela tingting , tasol yu ting dispela i makim olsem ol i no gat stretpela tingting ?

translation.en: after all , god holds your parents responsible to teach , train , protect , and guide you .
translation.zu: god i givim wok long papamama long skulim , lukautim , na soim rot long yu .

translation.en: could it be that your parents have some legitimate concerns about your well - being ?
translation.zu: ( lo 6 : 6 , 7 ) olsem wanem ? ating i gat as na papamama i tingim i stap bilong yu ?

translation.en: " i see the danger looming , " says one parent , " and it 's very frightening . "
translation.zu: wanpela mama i tok : " mi lukim olsem hevi i laik kamap na dispela i pretim mi tru . "

translation.en: " my parents make it seem like there is something wrong with liking someone , " complains 14 - year - old beth .
translation.zu: beth i gat 14 krismas , em i tok : " tok bilong papamama i mekim na i olsem i no stret long laikim wanpela man . "

translation.en: however , if your parents are christians , they well know that god designed the sexes to be attracted to each other .
translation.zu: tasol sapos papamama bilong yu ol i kristen , ol i save gut olsem god i wokim man na meri bilong narapela i laikim tru narapela .

translation.en: they know that this attraction is natural , that it works in harmony with our creator 's purpose for mankind to " fill the earth . " - genesis 1 : 28 .
translation.zu: ( stat 2 : 18 - 23 ) ol i save olsem dispela laik i stap long skin bilong yumi na i stret wantaim laik bilong god long ol man i mas " i go sindaun long olgeta hap bilong graun . " - stat 1 : 28 .

translation.en: furthermore , your parents understand how strong sexual desires can be when you are in " the bloom of youth . "
translation.zu: na tu , papamama i save olsem laik bilong skin long mekim maritpasin i save kamap strong tru taim yu stap yangpela yet .

translation.en: they also know that you have had little experience in learning how to control those desires .
translation.zu: ol i save tu olsem yu no gat bikpela save long rot bilong bosim ol dispela laik bilong skin .

translation.en: if you begin spending a lot of time with someone of the opposite sex in person , on the phone , or even through letter writing or e - mail , the attraction will likely grow .
translation.zu: sapos yu man na yu kirap lusim bikpela hap taim wantaim wanpela meri o sapos yu meri na yu kirap lusim bikpela hap taim wantaim wanpela man long rot bilong telefon , o pas , o e - meil , orait dispela laik namel long yutupela bai kamap strong moa .

translation.en: ' what 's so bad about that ? ' you may ask .
translation.zu: ating yu laik save , ' dispela samting i nogut olsem wanem ? '

translation.en: well , what legitimate outlet do you have for those desires ?
translation.zu: yu ting yu gat wanem stretpela rot bilong inapim ol dispela laik bilong skin ?

translation.en: are you really prepared to take those feelings to their logical conclusion - marriage ?
translation.zu: yu redi tru long mekim samting ol dispela laik bai kirapim yu long mekim - olsem maritim dispela man o meri ?

translation.en: not likely .
translation.zu: nogat , a ?

translation.en: the bible warns : " can a man rake together fire into his bosom and yet his very garments not be burned ? "
translation.zu: baibel i tok : " sapos yu holim paia klostu long bros bilong yu , orait ating siot bilong yu i no inap paia , a ? "

translation.en: young tammy , for example , thought her parents were being unfair when they would not allow her to date .
translation.zu: yangpela meri tammy i ting papamama i no mekim stretpela pasin taim ol i no orait long em long prenim wanpela man .

translation.en: so she secretly began to date someone in school .
translation.zu: olsem na long pasin hait em i kirap prenim wanpela manki long skul .

translation.en: soon , though , tammy was pregnant - and her life was changed .
translation.zu: tasol i no longtaim na tammy i gat bel - na i stap bilong em i senis .

translation.en: now she confesses : " dating is not all that it 's cracked up to be . "
translation.zu: nau em i tok : " pasin bilong prenim wanpela man em i no gutpela olsem ol stori bilong ol man i kamapim . "

translation.en: even then , there is still the danger of awakening or arousing feelings of love prematurely .
translation.zu: maski ol i mekim olsem , bel bilong ol inap kirap taim ol i no redi yet long dispela samting .

translation.en: do you really have the patience and determination needed to maintain a long - term relationship ?
translation.zu: yu gat pasin bilong isi na no ken les kwik na strongpela tingting bilong helpim marit bilong yu long stap longpela taim ?

translation.en: not surprisingly , most teenage romantic relationships are painfully short - lived .
translation.zu: yumi no kirap nogut long pasin pren bilong planti yangpela i save pinis hariap .

translation.en: few result in long - lasting marriages .
translation.zu: marit bilong wan wan tasol i save stap longpela taim .

translation.en: eighteen - year - old monica therefore sums it up well when she observes : " all my friends in school would tell me their stories about their boyfriends .
translation.zu: monica i gat 18 krismas , em i tok stret olsem : " olgeta pren bilong mi long skul ol i save stori long mi long ol boipren bilong ol .

translation.en: but they either got married young or ended up in a terrible breakup because they weren 't ready to go to the next level . "
translation.zu: tasol ol i marit taim ol i yangpela yet o narapela i lusim narapela , long wanem , ol i no redi yet long marit . "

translation.en: a youth named brandon also observes : " when you realize that you 're not ready to commit to someone but you feel that you already have because you 're dating , it 's very frustrating .
translation.zu: wanpela yangpela , nem bilong em brandon , em tu i tok : " taim yu luksave olsem yu no redi yet long mekim sampela tok promis long narapela tasol yu ting yu mekim olsem pinis , long wanem , yu prenim em , dispela inap mekim yu bel hevi tru .

translation.en: how do you back away without hurting the other person ? "
translation.zu: olsem wanem yu inap lusim narapela na yu no bagarapim bel bilong em ? "

translation.en: your parents are no doubt trying to spare you that pain and frustration by insisting that you do not date until you are old enough to make a marriage commitment .
translation.zu: papamama i laik helpim yu long abrusim dispela hevi , olsem na ol i strong long yu no ken prenim wanpela i go inap long yu kamap bikpela moa na yu redi long marit .

translation.en: really , they are only acting in harmony with the inspired advice at ecclesiastes 11 : 10 : " remove vexation from your heart , and ward off calamity from your flesh . "
translation.zu: samting ol i mekim i stret wantaim tok bilong baibel long saveman 11 : 10 : " yupela i no ken tingting planti long ol samting i save givim hevi long yupela . na yupela i no ken bihainim pasin i givim pen long bodi bilong yupela . "

translation.en: but why narrow your association down to one person ?
translation.zu: tasol yu no ken bung wantaim wanpela man o meri tasol .

translation.en: the bible , in another context , encourages us to " widen out " in our associations .
translation.zu: baibel i kirapim yumi long " givim bel " na prenim ol narapela man na meri tu .

translation.en: that is good advice for young people .
translation.zu: em gutpela tok bilong helpim ol yangpela .

translation.en: " i think it 's more fun that way , " observes tammy .
translation.zu: tammy i tok : " mi ting long dispela rot mi kisim bikpela amamas moa .

translation.en: " it 's better to have a lot of friends . "
translation.zu: i gutpela moa long kisim planti poroman . "

translation.en: monica says : " the group idea is a really good idea because you get to see people with different personalities and it makes you realize that there are many people out there that you haven 't met yet . "
translation.zu: monica i tok : " pasin bilong bung wantaim planti lain i gutpela , long wanem , yu gat rot bilong lukim kain kain man em ol i gat narapela narapela pasin , na dispela bai helpim yu long luksave olsem i gat planti lain em yu no bungim ol yet . "

translation.en: your parents may even be willing to help you arrange for wholesome good times with other young ones .
translation.zu: ating papamama bai amamas long helpim yu long stretim rot bilong bung na amamas wantaim ol narapela yangpela .

translation.en: anne , a mother of two , explains : " we always make sure that our home is a fun place where the kids want to be .
translation.zu: anne , em i gat 2 - pela pikinini , em i tok : " mipela i save wok strong long mekim haus bilong mipela i stap olsem ples bilong amamas na bai ol pikinini i laik i stap long en .

translation.en: we invite their friends over , give them snacks , and let them play games .
translation.zu: mipela i save singautim ol pren bilong ol i kam , na givim liklik kaikai samting long ol na larim ol i pilai .

translation.en: this way they don 't feel that they have to get out of the house to have fun . "
translation.zu: olsem na ol i no ting ol i mas lusim haus bilong painim amamas . "

translation.en: of course , even in a group you still have to be careful about showing too much attention to one person .
translation.zu: tasol maski bikpela lain i bung , yu mas was gut nogut yu pas wantaim wanpela man o meri tasol .

translation.en: some youths reason that as long as they 're with other people , they 're not really dating .
translation.zu: sampela yangpela i ting olsem sapos ol i stap wantaim ol narapela , dispela i makim olsem ol i no raun wantaim boipren o gelpren .

translation.en: if you are pairing off with the same person every time you get together with your friends , it amounts to dating .
translation.zu: ( song 36 : 2 ) sapos yu save poromanim wanpela man o meri tasol long olgeta taim yu bung wantaim ol narapela , dispela i makim olsem yutupela i raun wantaim .

translation.en: * work at using sound judgment in your friendships with the opposite sex . - 1 timothy 5 : 2 .
translation.zu: * wok long bihainim gutpela tingting long pasin bilong prenim wanpela man , o sapos yu man , long pasin bilong prenim wanpela meri . - 1 timoti 5 : 2 .

translation.en: it is not easy to be told that you are too young to begin dating .
translation.zu: tru , yu inap bel hevi taim ol i tokim yu olsem yu yangpela tumas long raun wantaim boipren o gelpren .

translation.en: but your parents are not trying to hurt you .
translation.zu: tasol papamama i no laik mekim yu bel hevi .

translation.en: on the contrary , they are doing everything they can to help and protect you .
translation.zu: nogat . ol i mekim olgeta samting ol inap mekim bilong helpim na lukautim yu .

translation.en: so instead of trusting your own heart and rejecting their advice , why not utilize their experience ?
translation.zu: olsem na yu no ken bilip long tingting bilong yu yet na sakim tok bilong ol , gutpela sapos yu bihainim tok bilong ol , a ?

translation.en: young connie says : " when a guy likes me , what helps me resist the pressure to date is talking about it with my mom .
translation.zu: yangpela meri connie i tok : " taim wanpela man i laikim mi , samting i save helpim mi long sakim tingting bilong prenim em i olsem : mi save toktok wantaim mama long dispela samting .

translation.en: she shares experiences of what happened to her friends and family in the past .
translation.zu: em i save stori long ol samting i bin kamap long ol pren na famili bilong em long bipo .

translation.en: it really helps me . "
translation.zu: dispela i save helpim mi tru . "

translation.en: because you have not yet taken on the adult responsibilities of courtship and marriage , you have the freedom to ' rejoice in your youth . '
translation.zu: yu no gat wok yet long karim hevi bilong pasin bilong poromanim man o meri na ol hevi bilong marit , olsem na yu stap fri long ' amamas long taim yu yangpela yet . '

translation.en: as one christian youth put it , " you should be committed to jehovah before you commit to anyone else . "
translation.zu: ( krai 3 : 26 , 27 ) olsem wanpela yangpela meri kristen i tok : " yu mas givim yu yet long jehova paslain long yu givim yu yet long narapela . "

translation.en: as you get older and your advancement becomes obvious to everyone , your parents will begin to view you differently .
translation.zu: taim krismas bilong yu i go antap moa na ol gutpela pasin bilong yu i kamap ples klia , orait nau papamama bai senisim tingting bilong ol long yu .

translation.en: and when you are truly ready to date , you will no doubt be able to do so with their blessing .
translation.zu: na taim yu redi tru long raun wantaim boipren o gelpren , ol bai orait long yu mekim olsem .

translation.en: the bible 's viewpoint
translation.zu: baibel i tok wanem ?

translation.en: should marriage be a lifelong union ?
translation.zu: marit i bilong i stap oltaim ?

translation.en: why even ask that question ?
translation.zu: wanem as bilong dispela askim ?

translation.en: isn 't marriage , to quote western wedding vows , " for better or for worse " and " until death do us part " ?
translation.zu: ol tok promis ol marit i mekim long hap bilong wes i tok , " bai mi stap wantaim yu long gutpela taim na long taim nogut " na " inap indai i brukim marit bilong mitupela . "

translation.en: yes , marriage vows usually state that the bride and the groom are entering a lifelong commitment .
translation.zu: tru tumas , ol tok promis bilong marit i save tokaut olsem man na meri marit bai stap wantaim inap long olgeta taim ol i stap laip .

translation.en: but many no longer consider themselves bound by those solemn promises .
translation.zu: tasol planti marit i no bihainim moa ol dispela tok promis .

translation.en: married couples in alarming numbers are breaking up - some after a few months , and others after decades .
translation.zu: planti marit moa i wok long bruk - sampela i bruk bihain long sampela mun na sampela bihain long planti yia .

translation.en: the bible gives the answer .
translation.zu: baibel i bekim dispela askim .

translation.en: please examine 2 timothy 3 : 1 - 3 , and compare it with what you observe in the world today .
translation.zu: kaunim 2 timoti 3 : 1 - 3 na skelim dispela tok wantaim ol samting i kamap long nau .

translation.en: in part , those verses state : " in the last days critical times hard to deal with will be here .
translation.zu: sampela hap bilong ol dispela ves i tok : " long taim bilong las de planti hevi nogut tru bai i kamap .

translation.en: for men will be lovers of themselves , lovers of money , . . . unthankful , disloyal , having no natural affection , not open to any agreement , . . . without self - control . "
translation.zu: ol man bai i laikim ol yet tasol , na ol bai i laikim tumas long kisim mani . . . . ol bai i no tok tenkyu long ol manmeri i mekim gutpela pasin long ol .

translation.en: that prophecy is striking in its accuracy .
translation.zu: ol bai i givim baksait long ol pasin bilong god .

translation.en: clearly , many people have lost respect for marriage .
translation.zu: ol bai i no bosim laik bilong bodi bilong ol . "

translation.en: in view of this , we might ask : should marriage be taken so seriously ?
translation.zu: taim yumi tingim dispela samting , ating yumi laik save : yumi mas tingim tru marit olsem em i bikpela samting ?

translation.en: is there such a thing as the sanctity of marriage ?
translation.zu: tru marit i mas i stap holi ?

translation.en: what help does the bible offer to married couples today ?
translation.zu: baibel i gat wanem ol tok bilong helpim ol marit long nau ?

translation.en: has god 's view changed ?
translation.zu: tingting bilong god i senis ?

translation.en: in the beginning , god did not speak of the marriage bonds as temporary .
translation.zu: long pastaim tru , god i no tok marit i bilong i stap sotpela taim tasol , nogat .

translation.en: his joining of the first man and woman is related at genesis 2 : 21 - 24 , and there no mention is made of an option to divorce or separate .
translation.zu: stori bilong em long pasim namba wan man na meri wantaim na tupela i marit em i stap long stat 2 : 21 - 24 , na i no gat wanpela tok i orait long ol i ken katim marit o lusim poroman .

translation.en: instead , verse 24 says : " a man will leave his father and his mother and he must stick to his wife and they must become one flesh . "
translation.zu: ves 24 i tok : " man i save lusim papamama na i pas wantaim meri bilong en , na tupela i kamap wanpela bodi tasol . "

translation.en: what does that scripture mean ?
translation.zu: wanem insait bilong dispela skripsa ?

translation.en: consider the human body , how its different tissues are woven together seamlessly and how bones meet in strong , frictionless joints .
translation.zu: tingim bodi bilong man . ol narapela narapela hap bilong en na ol bun i pas gut wantaim na ol i pas strong tru .

translation.en: what unity !
translation.zu: man !

translation.en: hence , at genesis 2 : 24 , the term " one flesh " emphasizes the intimacy and permanence of the marital union .
translation.zu: olsem na long stat 2 : 24 , dispela tok " wanpela bodi " i kamapim klia olsem man na meri marit i mas pas gut wantaim na stap wantaim long olgeta taim tupela i stap laip .

translation.en: it also gives implicit warning of great pain if that bond is dissolved .
translation.zu: na tu , em i givim tok lukaut olsem bikpela hevi bai kamap sapos marit i bagarap .

translation.en: although the winds of change over the past millenniums have shaped and reshaped human views , god still views marriage as a lifelong commitment .
translation.zu: tru insait long planti tausen yia i go pinis tingting bilong ol man i senis senis , tasol god i tingim yet marit olsem wanpela samting bilong i stap long olgeta taim man i stap laip .

translation.en: about 2,400 years ago , some jewish men had taken to abandoning their first wives and marrying younger women .
translation.zu: olsem 2,400 yia i go pinis , sampela man juda i lusim ol meri bilong ol na ol i maritim ol yangpela meri .

translation.en: god condemned this practice , declaring through his prophet malachi : " ' you people must guard yourselves respecting your spirit , and with the wife of your youth may no one deal treacherously .
translation.zu: god i no amamas long dispela pasin na long rot bilong profet malakai em i tok : " yupela i mas lukaut gut bai yupela i no brukim promis yupela i bin mekim wantaim ol meri bilong yupela taim yupela i marit .

translation.en: for he has hated a divorcing , ' jehovah the god of israel has said . " - malachi 2 : 15 , 16 .
translation.zu: god , bikpela bilong yumi israel , em i tok olsem , ' mi no laikim tru pasin bilong brukim marit . ' " - malakai 2 : 15 , 16 .

translation.en: over four centuries later , jesus reaffirmed god 's original view of marriage when he quoted genesis 2 : 24 and then directed : " what god has yoked together let no man put apart . "
translation.zu: winim 400 yia bihain , jisas i strongim tingting bilong god long marit taim em i kolim tok bilong stat 2 : 24 na i tok : " samting god i pasim pinis , em man i no ken katim . "

translation.en: years later the apostle paul instructed that " a wife should not depart from her husband " and that " a husband should not leave his wife . "
translation.zu: planti yia bihain , aposel pol i tok : " meri i no ken lusim man bilong en " na " man tu em i no ken rausim meri bilong en . "

translation.en: these scriptures accurately state god 's view of marriage .
translation.zu: ol dispela skripsa i kamapim klia tingting bilong god long marit .

translation.en: does the bible ever allow for the termination of a marriage ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ? baibel i orait long wanpela marit i ken pinis ?

translation.en: yes , a marriage ends when either mate dies .
translation.zu: yes , marit i pinis taim wanpela poroman marit i dai .

translation.en: adultery can also dissolve a marriage if the innocent mate so decides .
translation.zu: na tu , pasin pamuk inap pinisim marit sapos poroman i no gat asua i laik mekim olsem .

translation.en: how to make marriage long - lasting
translation.zu: rot bilong mekim marit i stap longpela taim

translation.en: he desires that a husband and wife solve their problems and deeply enjoy each other 's company .
translation.zu: em i laik bai man na meri marit i mas stretim ol hevi bilong ol na narapela i mas amamas tru long narapela .

translation.en: his word furnishes guidance for a happy , long - lasting marriage .
translation.zu: baibel i gat ol gutpela tok bilong helpim marit long i stap amamas na i stap longpela taim .

translation.en: please note the following texts .
translation.zu: orait nau yumi ken tingim sampela skripsa olsem :

translation.en: ephesians 4 : 26 : " let the sun not set with you in a provoked state . "
translation.zu: efesus 4 : 26 : " nogut yupela i belhat yet i stap na san i go daun . "

translation.en: you cannot allow the problem to continue , " he says .
translation.zu: yu no ken larim dispela hevi i stap yet . "

translation.en: sometimes he and his wife have talked through problems well into the night .
translation.zu: sampela taim em na meri bilong em ol i save toktok gut long ol hevi i go inap long biknait .

translation.en: by doing so , this man and his wife have enjoyed a happy marriage for 42 years .
translation.zu: dispela pasin i helpim dispela man na meri bilong em long stap amamas long marit bilong ol inap 42 yia .

translation.en: we put up with each other by not allowing these things to come between us . "
translation.zu: mitupela i no larim ol dispela samting i bagarapim bel bilong mipela , na dispela i save helpim mipela long i stap wanbel . "

translation.en: doubtless that sentiment has helped this couple during the 54 years that they have been married !
translation.zu: tru tumas , dispela pasin i bin helpim tupela insait long ol 54 yia ol i stap marit !

translation.en: the application of such scriptural principles reinforces the tie that binds husbands and wives .
translation.zu: pasin bilong bihainim ol kain gutpela tok olsem bilong baibel i save strongim pasin wanbel namel long man na meri marit .
