translation.zu: [ futnot ]

translation.en: according to first - century middle eastern timekeeping , the day ends at sunset .
translation.zu: long taim bilong ol aposel long hap bilong midel is , wanpela de i pinis taim san i go daun .

translation.en: paul was thus encouraging readers to be at peace with others before each day ends .
translation.zu: olsem na pol i kirapim ol kristen long stap bel isi wantaim ol narapela paslain long wanpela de i pinis .

translation.en: killer waves - myths and realities the sun had set just a few minutes earlier .
translation.zu: traipela biksi - ol stori nating na ol trupela tok bilong en

translation.en: on this tranquil friday , july 17 , 1998 , the men , women , and children of several small villages on the northern coast of papua new guinea were suddenly shaken by a magnitude - 7.1 earthquake .
translation.zu: san i go daun pinis long fraide julai 17 , 1998 . na liklik taim bihain wanpela bikpela guria i olsem 7.1 long skel rikta i seksekim ol man , meri , na ol pikinini bilong sampela ples bilong nambis long hap not bilong papua niugini .

translation.en: " the main shock , " says scientific american , " rocked 30 kilometers ( nearly 19 miles ) of coastline . . . and suddenly deformed the offshore ocean bottom .
translation.zu: nius scientific american i tok : " namba wan guria i bin seksekim bikpela hap bilong nambis inap long 30 kilomita . . . na dispela guria i mekim na wantu as bilong solwara i longwe liklik long nambis i krungut .

translation.en: the normally flat sea surface lurched upward in response , giving birth to a fearsome tsunami . "
translation.zu: orait nau mak bilong solwara i go antap na dispela i kamapim traipela biksi ol i kolim sunami . "

translation.en: a few minutes later , he spotted the first wave , which was about ten feet [ 3 m ] high .
translation.zu: sampela minit bihain em i lukim namba wan biksi i bruk i kam antap inap 3 - pela mita .

translation.en: it overtook him as he was trying to run away from it .
translation.zu: biksi i bruk long nambis na wara i kisim em taim em i traim ranawe .

translation.en: a second , larger wave flattened his village and swept him along for nearly a mile [ 1 km ] , into a nearby mangrove forest .
translation.zu: namba tu biksi i bikpela moa na i bagarapim tru ples bilong em na karim em i go longwe inap olsem wanpela kilomita insait long hap bilong mangro .

translation.en: " debris hanging from the tops of palm trees indicated that the waves reached heights of 14 meters [ 46 feet ] , " reports science news .
translation.zu: nius science news i tok : " olkain pipia i pas long ol diwai i makim olsem ol biksi i bin go antap inap olsem 14 mita . "

translation.en: that evening giant waves took the lives of at least 2,500 people .
translation.zu: long dispela apinun ol traipela biksi i bin kilim i dai inap 2,500 manmeri .

translation.en: as a twist of irony , a lumber company later donated timber for new schools , but there were virtually no children left to go to school .
translation.zu: bihain wanpela kampani bilong katim diwai i laik givim nating sampela diwai bilong wokim ol nupela skul , tasol tarangu , ol pikinini i bilong go long skul ol i no stap moa .

translation.en: almost all - more than 230 - had been killed by the tsunami .
translation.zu: klostu olgeta - winim 230 - i bin dai long dispela biksi ol i kolim sunami .

translation.en: what are tsunamis ?
translation.zu: sunami em i wanem samting ?

translation.en: tsunami is a japanese word that means " harbor wave . "
translation.zu: sunami em tok ples japan , na insait bilong en i olsem " biksi bilong nambis . "

translation.en: this is " a fitting term , " says the book tsunami ! , " as these giant waves have frequently brought death and destruction to japanese harbors and coastal villages . "
translation.zu: buk tsunami ! , i tok dispela tok i " stret tru , long wanem , planti taim ol dispela traipela biksi i bin kilim i dai ol man na bagarapim ol ples i stap long nambis bilong japan . "

translation.en: tsunamis are sometimes called tidal waves .
translation.zu: sampela i save kolim ol sunami olsem taidel wev .

translation.en: strictly speaking , however , tidal waves are simply the surging and waning swells that we call tides and are caused by the gravitational pull of the sun and the moon .
translation.zu: tasol tru tru taidel wev i makim wok bilong solwara long i go na i kam , em yumi save kolim olsem haiwara na draiwara , na strong bilong san na mun i save kamapim dispela samting .

translation.en: even the massive waves - sometimes over 90 feet [ 25 m ] high - that are whipped up by gale - force winds cannot be compared with tsunamis .
translation.zu: na sapos bikpela win tru i kirapim traipela biksi - sampela inap go antap inap 25 mita - dispela tu i no wankain olsem sunami .

translation.en: if you were to dive beneath these tidal waves , you would find that their influence weakens the deeper you go .
translation.zu: sapos yu kalap i go aninit long kain biksi olsem bai yu pilim olsem strong bilong en i wok long pinis taim yu go daun moa insait long solwara .

translation.en: at a certain depth , the water is hardly disturbed .
translation.zu: na long hap bilong solwara i daun tru , wara i no meknais liklik .

translation.en: but not so with tsunamis .
translation.zu: tasol ol sunami i no olsem .

translation.en: their influence reaches from the surface right to the ocean floor , even though the water may be miles deep !
translation.zu: strong bilong wanpela sunami i go daun olgeta long as bilong solwara , maski wara i daun tru inap planti kilomita !

translation.en: a tsunami runs deep because it is generally caused by violent geologic activity on the seafloor .
translation.zu: strong bilong wanpela sunami i go daun olgeta , long wanem , planti taim wanpela guria long as bilong solwara i as bilong dispela sunami .

translation.en: for this reason , scientists sometimes refer to tsunamis as seismic waves .
translation.zu: olsem na sampela saientis i save kolim sunami olsem biksi bilong guria .

translation.en: the seafloor may rise , lifting the column of water above it and creating a gentle swell , which may cover 10,000 square miles [ 25,000 km ] .
translation.zu: guria inap mekim as bilong solwara long wanpela hap i kam antap liklik , na dispela bai apim wara tu i go antap na kirapim wanpela biksi i no antap tumas , tasol em inap karamapim bikpela hap olsem 25,000 skwe kilomita .

translation.en: or the ocean floor may sink , briefly creating a hollow on the ocean surface .
translation.zu: o guria inap mekim na as bilong solwara i go daun , na inap liklik taim mak bilong solwara i surik i go daun .

translation.en: either way , gravity causes the affected water to oscillate up and down - a motion that spawns a series of concentric waves , like those formed when a stone hits a pond .
translation.zu: maski i gat wanem as na solwara i surik , wanpela strong ol i kolim graviti i meknaisim wara na kirapim ol biksi , kain olsem wara i meknais taim yu tromoi ston long en .

translation.en: this phenomenon shatters the popular myth that tsunamis are just single rogue waves .
translation.zu: dispela samting i daunim tingting kranki bilong planti man , olsem ol sunami i wanpela traipela biksi tasol .

translation.en: instead , they usually fan out in what is called a tsunami wave train .
translation.zu: tru tru wanpela sunami i save kirapim narapela narapela biksi .

translation.en: one of the most devastating series of tsunamis in recorded history was formed by the august 1883 explosion of krakatau , a volcano in indonesia .
translation.zu: ol sunami nogut ol man i save long en i bin kamap taim krakatau i pairap long ogas 1883 , em wanpela volkeno i stap long indonisia .

translation.en: some of the resulting waves reached the incredible height of 135 feet [ 41 m ] above sea level and swept away some 300 coastal towns and villages .
translation.zu: ol traipela biksi bilong dispela sunami i go antap tru inap olsem 41 mita antap long mak bilong solwara , na tait wara bilong en i bagarapim 300 taun na ples i stap arere long nambis .

translation.en: the tsunami 's dual personality
translation.zu: tupela pasin bilong ol sunami

translation.en: " tsunami waves , on the other hand , " says the book tsunami ! , " may travel as fast as a jetliner , an astonishing 500 miles [ 800 km ] per hour or more in the deep waters of an ocean basin . "
translation.zu: buk tsunami ! , i tok : " tasol wanpela biksi olsem sunami inap spit tru olsem wanpela bikpela balus i spit inap 800 kilomita insait long wanpela aua , na em bai i spit moa yet long hap bilong solwara i daun tru . "

translation.en: yet , despite their speed , they are not dangerous in deep water .
translation.zu: tasol maski ol i spit tru , ol sunami i no bagarapim wanpela samting long biksolwara .

translation.en: why ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem ?

translation.en: first , because on the open sea , a single wave is usually less than ten feet [ 3 m ] high ; and second , because the wave can be hundreds of miles from crest to crest , giving it a gentle slope .
translation.zu: long wanem , biksi bilong wanpela sunami i stap long biksolwara bai i go antap inap 3 - pela mita tasol , na tu , dispela biksi bai go antap na isi isi go daun gen , na paslain long em i go antap gen em bai ran inap sampela handet kilomita .

translation.en: the master of a ship lying off the coast of one of the hawaiian islands was not even aware that a tsunami had passed by until he saw huge waves pounding the distant shore .
translation.zu: kepten bilong wanpela sip i stap longwe liklik long wanpela ailan bilong hawaii em i no save wanpela sunami i raun aninit long sip bilong em , i go inap long em i lukim ol traipela biksi i bagarapim nambis .

translation.en: the general rule for safety at sea is for ships to reach water that is a depth of at least 100 fathoms , or 600 feet [ 180 m ] .
translation.zu: bilong sip ken i raun gut , ol i tok ol sip i mas raun long hap em wara i daun inap 180 mita samting .

translation.en: tsunamis change character when they approach land and come into shallower water .
translation.zu: ol sunami i senis taim ol i kam klostu moa long nambis .

translation.en: the back of the wave is always in deeper water than the front and so travels slightly faster .
translation.zu: na ol narapela narapela biksi i kam bihain bai bungim namba wan biksi .

translation.en: meantime , trailing waves in the wave train catch up , piling into the waves in front .
translation.zu: tasol planti taim ol sunami i mekim na i olsem solwara i tait na spit i kam long nambis .

translation.en: in their final stage , tsunamis may descend on a section of coast as a breaking wave or as a wall of water called a bore , but more commonly , they appear as a fast - rising tidelike flood that surges well above the normal high - water mark .
translation.zu: sampela taim solwara i bin tait na abrusim mak tru bilong en inap 50 mita , na em i karim ol pipia , pis , na hap rip i bruk bruk i kam antap long nambis inap sampela tausen mita , na bagarapim olgeta samting .

translation.en: water has been known to surge more than 170 feet [ 50 m ] above the normal sea level and carry debris , fish , and even chunks of coral thousands of feet inland , obliterating everything within its path .
translation.zu: tasol sampela taim sunami i trikim ol man , em i no sua olsem solwara i tait , tasol sampela taim namba wan samting i makim olsem sunami i laik sua i narapela kain olgeta .

translation.en: it may be quite the opposite - an abnormal outgoing tide that drains beaches , bays , and harbors dry and leaves fish flapping on the sand or mud .
translation.zu: olsem : bikpela draiwara i kamap long nambis na long ol pasis , na ol pis i kalap nating long wesan .

translation.en: what determines the initial conditions is which part of the wave train reaches shore first - the rise or the trough .
translation.zu: sapos kil bilong sunami i sua pastaim bikpela haiwara bai kamap long nambis , tasol sapos baret bilong sunami i sua pastaim bikpela draiwara bai kamap .

translation.en: when the beach runs dry
translation.zu: taim draiwara i kamap

translation.en: it was a calm evening on november 7 , 1837 , on the hawaiian island of maui .
translation.zu: long apinun bilong novemba 7 , 1837 , ol samting i stap isi tasol long wanpela ailan bilong hawaii ol i kolim maui .

translation.en: about seven o 'clock that evening , explains the book tsunami ! , the water began to recede from the beach , leaving the reef exposed and fish stranded .
translation.zu: na olsem buk tsunami ! i tok , long 7 klok long apinun solwara i wok long surik i go bek , na rip i kamap ples klia na ol pis i pas long wesan .

translation.en: many excited islanders ran out to pick up the fish , but a few individuals , who were more alert , ran for high ground , possibly knowing from past experience what was about to happen .
translation.zu: planti man i amamas na ol i ran i go kisim ol pis , tasol wan wan bilong ol i gat narapela tingting . ol i ran i go long hap graun i antap liklik , ating ol i bin lukim dispela samting bipo na ol i save wanem samting i laik kamap .

translation.en: soon , a terrifying surge of water rushed in and carried the entire village of 26 grass houses , along with the inhabitants and livestock , 800 feet [ 200 m ] inland and dumped them into a small lake .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na traipela biksi nogut tru i bruk i kam insait , na wara i kisim olgeta 26 haus kunai wantaim ol manmeri na ol animal , na karim ol i go insait moa inap 200 mita na lusim ol long wanpela raunwara .

translation.en: on that same evening , thousands of people were assembled at a beach on another island for a religious service .
translation.zu: na long dispela hap tu , wantu solwara i surik i go bek na dispela i kirapim ol dispela man long ran i go long nambis bilong lukluk .

translation.en: once again , the sudden withdrawal of water caused curious hawaiians to rush down to the beach in crowds .
translation.zu: orait nau wanpela traipela biksi i kamap wantu tasol , dispela biksi i antap long mak bilong haiwara inap 6 - pela mita .

translation.en: however , this reported increase , the magazine adds , is largely attributed to improved communications , while the high death tolls are due in part to increases in coastal populations .
translation.zu: tasol olsem nius i tok , bikpela as na ripot bilong namba bilong ol sunami i antap moa em i olsem : long nau i gat ol gutpela rot moa bilong salim ol toksave i go i kam .

translation.en: the pacific ocean is especially noted for tsunamis because its basin is seismically the most active .
translation.zu: na planti man moa i save dai long ol sunami , long wanem , lain bilong i stap arere long nambis i wok long go bikpela .

translation.en: in fact , " hardly a year goes by without at least one destructive tsunami striking somewhere in the pacific , " says one reference , which also states that " over the past fifty years , 62 percent of all earthquake - related deaths in the united states have been caused by tsunamis . "
translation.zu: wanpela buk i tok : " klostu olgeta yia wanpela sunami i bagarapim ol samting i kamap long sampela hap bilong solwara pasifik . " na tu , buk i tok " insait long laspela 50 yia , 62 pesen bilong ol man i dai long guria long amerika , em ol i kisim bagarap long rot bilong sunami tasol . "

translation.en: between 1948 and 1998 , about 75 percent of tsunami warnings given in hawaii were false alarms .
translation.zu: namel long 1948 na 1998 , inap 75 pesen bilong ol toksave long hawaii olsem sunami bai kamap i bin popaia .

translation.en: however , a much better system of detection , incorporating modern technology , is now being deployed .
translation.zu: tasol long nau ol i save yusim ol nupela masin , na wok bilong skelim taim sunami bai kamap i gutpela moa .

translation.en: at the heart of the improved detection system is a bottom pressure recorder ( bpr ) , which , as its name suggests , is placed thousands of feet down , at the bottom of the ocean .
translation.zu: bikpela samting i helpim ol em wanpela masin i skelim strong bilong wara i stap daun tru , olsem na ol i putim dispela masin i go daun tru inap planti tausen mita long as bilong solwara .

translation.en: this highly sensitive instrument is able to register the difference in water pressure as a tsunami travels overhead - even one no higher than a single centimeter .
translation.zu: dispela masin inap save taim senis i kamap insait long solwara taim wanpela sunami i spit i go - maski biksi bilong sunami i go antap inap wanpela sentimita tasol .

translation.en: using sound waves , the bpr transmits data to a special buoy , which then forwards it to a satellite .
translation.zu: taim wanpela sunami i kamap , krai bilong dispela masin i go long wanpela dis i slip antap long wara , na dispela dis i salim krai i go long wanpela satelait .

translation.en: scientists are confident that this more precise early - warning system will curb the number of false alarms .
translation.zu: ol saientis i ting dispela rot bilong kisim stretpela save hariap bai daunim namba bilong ol toksave i popaia .

translation.en: so if you live in a tsunami - prone , low - lying coastal region and local authorities announce a tsunami warning or you sense an earthquake or you see an unusual out - going tide , be sure to seek high ground immediately .
translation.zu: olsem na sapos yu stap klostu long nambis em sunami inap kam long en , na ol bikman i tokaut olsem wanpela sunami bai kam , o yu pilim graun i guria , o yu lukim narapela kain draiwara , orait wantu yu mas go long hap graun i antap .

translation.en: remember , in the open sea , tsunamis can travel at the speed of a jet plane and may barrel in at highway speed near shore .
translation.zu: tingim , wanpela sunami i stap long biksolwara inap ran spit olsem wanpela bikpela balus , na taim em i kam klostu long nambis em inap spit olsem ka i spit long bikrot .

translation.en: so once you see the wave , chances are you will not be able to outrun it .
translation.zu: olsem na taim yu lukim biksi bilong wanpela sunami , ating bai yu no gat taim bilong ran na abrusim em .

translation.en: however , if you meet up with a tsunami when you are out at sea enjoying a cruise or fishing , you can relax - your cup of coffee or glass of wine resting on the table will likely remain undisturbed .
translation.zu: tasol sapos yu stap long wanpela sip long biksolwara na sunami i kam , yu ken stap isi - ating dring bilong yu i stap long tebol bai i no inap surik liklik .

translation.en: according to discover magazine , the circular or elliptic motion of water that exists within all waves is also a factor in the receding water .
translation.zu: nius discover i tok , olgeta biksi i save raun olsem wil , na dispela samting tu i helpim draiwara i kamap .

translation.en: people swimming in the ocean tend to feel an outward pull of water just before a wave reaches them .
translation.zu: taim man i swim long solwara , strong bilong biksi i save pulim em liklik paslain long biksi i kam long em .

translation.en: this effect is greater with tsunamis and hence is a factor in the draining of beaches or harbors in advance of the first wave .
translation.zu: ol sunami i gat bikpela strong moa long mekim dispela samting , olsem na em i wanpela as na draiwara i kamap long nambis na long ol pasis paslain long namba wan biksi i bruk .

translation.en: thembeka is a 12 - year - old girl who lives in a rural village of southern africa .
translation.zu: thembeka em i wanpela pikinini meri i gat 12 - pela krismas na em i sindaun long wanpela liklik ples long hap saut bilong afrika .

translation.en: her parents died of aids , and she was left to care for her three little sisters aged ten , six , and four .
translation.zu: papamama bilong em i dai long sik aids , na em tasol i stap bilong lukautim 3 - pela liklik susa bilong em , ol i gat 10 - pela , 6 - pela na 4 - pela krismas .

translation.en: " the girls have no income and rely totally on neighbours kindness . . . a loaf of bread , a few potatoes , " stated a news reporter .
translation.zu: wanpela niusman i tok : " ol dispela pikinini meri i no gat mani na ol i save wetim ol lain i sindaun klostu long ol long givim kaikai samting long ol . . . bret na sampela poteto . "

translation.en: a picture of the four orphaned girls was displayed on the front page of a south african newspaper that reported on the 13th international aids conference , held during july 2000 in durban , south africa .
translation.zu: ol i bin putim piksa bilong dispela 4 - pela pikinini em papamama bilong ol i dai pinis long namba wan pes bilong wanpela nius bilong saut afrika . dispela nius i stori long wanpela kibung ( 13th international aids conference ) i kamap long julai 2000 long deban , saut afrika .

translation.en: millions of aids orphans face a situation similar to that of thembeka and her younger sisters .
translation.zu: planti milion pikinini em papamama bilong ol i dai long sik aids ol i gat wankain hevi olsem thembeka na ol susa bilong em .

translation.en: the conference discussed methods of dealing with the growing aids crisis , such as education on the prevention of aids through the use of condoms ; the use of less expensive aids treatment , which is now available ; and more funding for the development of aids vaccines .
translation.zu: sik aids i wok long i go bikpela moa na long dispela kibung ol i toktok long ol rot bilong daunim dispela sik , olsem long skulim ol man long mekim wok long kondom bambai ol i no ken kisim sik aids ; na mekim wok long ol nupela marasin i no gat bikpela pe bilong daunim ; na long givim sampela mani moa bilong helpim ol saientis long kamapim ol sut samting bilong oraitim .

translation.en: furthermore , many men will not marry a girl unless she has first produced a child .
translation.zu: na tu , planti man i no inap maritim wanpela meri sapos em i no kamapim yet wanpela pikinini .

translation.en: the use of condoms is therefore seen as a barrier to both marriage and motherhood .
translation.zu: olsem na ol i ting kondom bai pasim rot bilong ol long marit o long karim pikinini .

translation.en: the south african newspaper sowetan commented on a report that was released at the conference by the united nations children 's fund ( unicef ) : " unicef 's surveys found that 51 percent of girls aged 15 to 19 in south africa did not know that someone who looks healthy can be infected with hiv and transmit it to them . "
translation.zu: nius sowetan bilong saut afrika i kamapim sampela tok long wanpela ripot lain unicef ( united nations children 's fund ) i bin kamapim long kibung , ripot i tok : " lain unicef i painimaut olsem inap 51 pesen bilong ol yangpela meri i gat 15 i go inap 19 krismas long saut afrika , ol i no save olsem maski man i gat gutpela skin , em inap karim binatang jem hiv i save kamapim sik aids na em inap givim sik long ol . "

translation.en: another factor in the spread of aids is the sexual abuse of women .
translation.zu: narapela samting i mekim na sik aids i go bikpela em pasin bilong mekim pasin sem long sampela meri .

translation.en: ranjeni munusamy , who attended the conference , reported in the sunday times of johannesburg , south africa : " violence against women , the most disturbing form of male power , remains a major barrier to hiv prevention and care .
translation.zu: ranjeni munusamy i bin stap long dispela kibung na em i tokim nius sunday times bilong johanisbek , saut afrika , olsem : " pasin bilong mekim nogut na bagarapim ol meri - samting nogut tru ol man i save mekim - i stap namba wan samting i pasim rot bilong daunim hiv .

translation.en: its many forms - rape , incest , wife battering and sexual abuse - mean that sex is often coerced , which is itself a risk factor for hiv infection . "
translation.zu: ol dispela pasin - reipim meri , mekim maritpasin wantaim wanblut , paitim meri na mekim pasin sem long em - i soim olsem planti taim ol man i save subim ol meri long slip wantaim ol , na long dispela rot ol inap kisim hiv . "

translation.en: statistics released at the conference were frightening , as the accompanying chart shows .
translation.zu: long dispela kibung ol i tokaut olsem planti man tru i gat dispela sik , olsem sat i kamapim .

translation.en: every day an estimated 7,000 young people and 1,000 infants are infected with hiv .
translation.zu: long olgeta de klostu 7,000 yangpela na 1,000 bebi ol i save kisim hiv .

translation.en: according to a survey published by the medical research council of south africa , 4.2 million people in south africa are infected with hiv , representing 1 out of every 10 citizens .
translation.zu: wanpela lain ( medical research council of south africa ) i kamapim ripot olsem 4.2 milion man long saut afrika ol i gat hiv , olsem wanpela long olgeta 10 - pela 10 - pela man .

translation.en: the situation in neighboring countries is worse .
translation.zu: dispela hevi i nogut moa long ol kantri i stap klostu .

translation.en: the natal witness reported on an estimate given by the u.s .
translation.zu: nius the natal witness i stori long namba bilong ol man i kisim sik aids em lain u.s .

translation.en: census bureau : " the populations of some aids - stricken african countries will soon begin to fall as millions die of the disease , and life expectancy by the end of the decade will plunge to around 30 . "
translation.zu: census bureau i kamapim na i tok : " namba bilong ol man long sampela kantri bilong afrika bai go daun , long wanem , planti milion man i wok long dai long sik aids , na long pinis bilong yia 2010 samting , ol man bai stap inap 30 yia tasol . "

translation.en: the aids tragedy is further evidence that mankind is living in the " critical times hard to deal with " that the bible foretold would occur " in the last days . "
translation.zu: dispela bikpela hevi bilong sik aids i kamapim klia olsem yumi stap long taim bilong " planti hevi nogut tru " em baibel i bin tok profet long em bai kamap long " taim bilong las de . "

translation.en: lovers of god 's word , the bible , look forward to a complete and permanent solution to aids and all the other problems plaguing mankind .
translation.zu: ol man i laikim tok bilong god , ol i wetim taim em sik aids na ol narapela samting i save givim pen na hevi long ol man em bai pinis olgeta .

translation.en: soon , god 's kingdom will take over the administration of earth 's affairs .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na kingdom bilong god bai bosim olgeta samting long graun .

translation.en: in the new world of righteousness , poverty and oppression will be things of the past .
translation.zu: long nupela taim i gat stretpela pasin long en , bai i no gat pasin bilong i stap rabis na pasin bilong daunim ol man .

translation.en: instead , earth 's inhabitants will be restored to perfect health , and none of them will ever say : " i am sick . " - isaiah 33 : 24 .
translation.zu: ( song 72 : 12 - 14 ; 2 pita 3 : 13 ) olgeta manmeri long graun bai i gat gutpela skin , na i no gat wanpela bilong ol bai tok : " mi gat sik . " - aisaia 33 : 24 .

translation.en: the eucalyptus - how useful is it ?
translation.zu: diwai kumurere - em i helpim yumi olsem wanem ?

translation.en: some are giants - over 300 feet [ 90 m ] in height - ranked among the tallest in the world .
translation.zu: sampela i bikpela tru - winim 90 mita i go antap - longpela bilong ol i wankain olsem ol longpela diwai tru bilong graun .

translation.en: others are short and twisted , crouching low against the parched earth .
translation.zu: sampela i sotpela na i tanim tanim i go daun klostu long graun i drai olgeta .

translation.en: their leaves are a marvel of design , and their blossoms , a delight to the eye .
translation.zu: ol lip bilong en i naispela , na yumi amamas long lukim plaua bilong en .

translation.en: in one way or another , you have likely used part of this tree yourself .
translation.zu: ating long kain kain rot , yu bin mekim wok long sampela hap bilong dispela diwai .

translation.en: a few have aristocratic names such as alpine ash and tasmanian oak , but most are just known as the common gum tree .
translation.zu: wan wan i gat ol narapela kain nem olsem alpine ash na tasmanian oak , tasol planti i gat nem , diwai gam .

translation.en: technically speaking , though , true gum is a water - soluble substance made of carbohydrates , and no eucalypti produce this .
translation.zu: gam tru tru i gat kabohaidret long en na i save tanim gut wantaim wara , tasol diwai kumurere i no save kamapim dispela gam .

translation.en: so the name gum tree is actually a misnomer .
translation.zu: olsem na nem diwai gam i no stret tumas .

translation.en: the trees are more correctly identified as the genus eucalyptus , and there are over 600 members in this family of australian natives .
translation.zu: nem tru bilong ol dispela diwai em kumurere , na i gat 600 kain kain diwai kumurere bilong ostrelia .

translation.en: eucalypti thrive in the tropical heat of australia 's northern territory as well as in the arid plains of the outback .
translation.zu: diwai kumurere i save kamap gut long bikpela san bilong noten teritori bilong ostrelia , na tu , long ol stretpela ples i drai na i stap longwe long ol taun .

translation.en: since the influx of european settlers to australia in the 19th century , the eucalyptus has suffered heavy casualties .
translation.zu: bihain long yia 1800 samting taim planti waitskin i go sindaun long ostrelia , ol i bagarapim planti diwai kumurere .

translation.en: an estimated 100,000 square miles [ 300,000 sq km ] of these trees have been torn out by the roots because the trees were considered a hindrance to progress .
translation.zu: ol i ting dispela diwai i pasim rot bilong ol long mekim ol bikpela wok samting , olsem na ol i kamautim ol kumurere long bikpela hap graun inap 300,000 skwe kilomita .

translation.en: however , not everyone showed such scant regard for this valuable resource .
translation.zu: tasol i no olgeta man i tingting long bagarapim dispela gutpela diwai .

translation.en: during the 19th century , the eucalyptus family began their conquest of the world .
translation.zu: bihain long yia 1800 , diwai kumurere i kamap long planti hap .

translation.en: an emperor , and a doctor
translation.zu: wanpela king , na wanpela dokta

translation.en: in the 1880 ' s , emperor menelik ii of abyssinia , now called ethiopia , needed shade trees and a ready source of firewood for his arid new capital city , addis ababa .
translation.zu: namel long yia 1880 na 1889 , king menelik namba 2 bilong abisinia - nau ol i kolim itiopia - em i laik planim ol diwai long nupela biktaun bilong em , adis ababa , em i ples drai .

translation.en: the emperor 's experts therefore looked elsewhere to find a tree that was thriving under a scorching sun at least as harsh as their own .
translation.zu: i no gat wanpela diwai bilong afrika i stret long dispela hap em ol i bin katim pinis olgeta diwai long en .

translation.en: " addis ababa " means " new flower , " and the name may have been given in honor of the eucalyptus , a useful import that came to play a vital role in ethiopia 's economy .
translation.zu: olsem na ol saveman bilong king i skelim ol diwai long ol narapela hap bilong painim wanpela diwai i save kamap gut long strongpela san wankain olsem long hap bilong ol .

translation.en: he was responsible for planting 38 million of them .
translation.zu: em i lukautim wok bilong planim 38 milion diwai kumurere .

translation.en: today there are more than two billion eucalypti under cultivation in brazil .
translation.zu: long nau , i gat planti diwai kumurere long brasil , winim 2 bilion .

translation.en: thus , in addition to its native rain forests , brazil lays claim to the largest population of eucalypti outside australia .
translation.zu: brasil i gat planti bikbus , na tu , em i gat planti diwai kumurere - ostrelia tasol i gat planti diwai kumurere moa winim brasil .

translation.en: the benefits to brazil 's economy have been such that for introducing this valuable asset to his country , dr . navarro was awarded a special medal for distinguished service .
translation.zu: diwai kumurere i bin helpim tru wok bisnis bilong brasil , olsem na ol i givim wanpela medal long dokta navarro long wok em i mekim bilong bringim dispela gutpela diwai i kam long brasil .

translation.en: a tree of life
translation.zu: wanpela diwai bilong laip

translation.en: some eucalypti , such as the mallees , make the most of the drought - cracked earth by storing large quantities of water in their roots .
translation.zu: sampela diwai kumurere em ol i stap long ol ples drai , kain olsem diwai mali , ol i save holim bikpela hap wara long ol rop bilong ol .

translation.en: lengths of the surface roots were dug up and broken into short sections .
translation.zu: ol i save kamautim ol rop i stap ples klia na brukim i go long ol sotpela sotpela hap .

translation.en: when air is blown into one end of a section , pale - brown sap can be forced from it .
translation.zu: taim man i winim win i go insait long wanpela hap bilong dispela rop , dispela i save subim blut bilong diwai long kam ausait na kala bilong en i yelopela liklik .

translation.en: while not the most palatable of beverages , it is estimated that 1.5 quarts of this lifesaving liquid can be extracted from a 30 - foot [ 9 - meter ] root .
translation.zu: dispela dring i no swit tumas long maus , tasol ol i kisim save olsem wanpela hap rop , longpela bilong en inap olsem 9 - pela mita , inap kamapim 1.5 lita wara .

translation.en: other members of the family flourish in marshy conditions , greedily soaking up water from sodden soils .
translation.zu: sampela diwai kumurere i save kamap gut long hap i gat planti wara long en , na ol i save pulim planti wara long dispela graun .

translation.en: this area has now been transformed into valuable farmland .
translation.zu: nau dispela hap i kamap gutpela hap graun bilong wokim gaden .

translation.en: furniture makers prize their rich - red and honey - gold timbers .
translation.zu: ol kamda i save laikim tru retpela na yelopela timba bilong en .

translation.en: one authority states : " the eucalypts produce some of the heaviest , hardest and most durable woods known .
translation.zu: wanpela buk i tok : " diwai kumurere i save kamapim ol diwai i hevi tru na i strongpela tru na i stap longpela taim .

translation.en: the quality of the timber , coupled with the rapid growth - rate . . . , makes this genus the most valuable source of hardwood in the world . "
translation.zu: dispela diwai i save kamapim gutpela timba tru , na kwiktaim em i save kamap bikpela . . . , olsem na em i wanpela gutpela diwai tru bilong kamapim strongpela timba , i no gat narapela diwai i olsem . "

translation.en: water - resistant varieties of the tree are used in the construction of ships , marine piers , telephone poles , fences , and paving blocks .
translation.zu: sampela kain diwai kumurere i save sakim wara na ol i save mekim wok long ol bilong wokim sip , bris , pos bilong pulim waia bilong telefon , na banis samting .

translation.en: in addition , beautiful gum - nut blossoms on varieties known as yellow box and ironbark produce sweet nectar , which bees convert into a particularly delicious honey .
translation.zu: na tu , ol gutpela plaua i save kamap long ol diwai kumurere , em ol i kolim yelo boks na aionbak , ol i save kamapim wanpela kain wara ol binen i save mekim wok long en bilong mekim wanpela hani i swit tru .

translation.en: in recent years , 4.5 million tons of eucalyptus wood chips have been exported from australia , resulting in an income of $ 250 million annually .
translation.zu: insait long sampela yia i go pinis , ostrelia i bin salim 4.5 milion ton bilong ol diwai kumurere em ol i katim liklik liklik , na ol i kisim 473 milion kina long en long olgeta wan wan yia .

translation.en: kino , oil , and tannin
translation.zu: kino , wel , na tanin

translation.en: a blood - red , gumlike substance called kino oozes from the bark and timber of the eucalyptus .
translation.zu: wanpela kain wara olsem gam i retpela olsem blut na ol i kolim kino , i save kam ausait long skin na long timba bilong diwai kumurere .

translation.en: kino is also employed in producing a drug that helps stop bleeding .
translation.zu: na tu , ol i save mekim wok long kino bilong wokim wanpela kain marasin bilong pasim blut .

translation.en: the bark of other species yields tannin , used for the tanning of leather and the dyeing of fabrics .
translation.zu: skin bilong sampela diwai kumurere i save kamapim tanin , na ol i save mekim wok long en bilong penim skin bilong animal i drai pinis na ol laplap samting .

translation.en: the leaves are a marvel of design and a reservoir of valuable oil .
translation.zu: ol lip bilong en i naispela tru na i gat gutpela wel long en .

translation.en: precious moisture is captured on the surface of the leaves , and then it drips from their leathery tips to the waiting root system .
translation.zu: ol lip i save holim wara , na bihain wara i bihainim lip i go daun na i pundaun long as bilong diwai .

translation.en: eucalyptus oil , which has a strong , invigorating aroma , is extracted from the leaf by a steaming and distilling process .
translation.zu: wel bilong kumurere i gat gutpela strongpela smel , na ol i save kisim dispela wel long ol lip bilong diwai kumurere .

translation.en: it is used widely , for example , in perfumes , soaps , medicines , confectionery , and cleaning products .
translation.zu: bilong kisim dispela wel ol i save boilim wara na smok bilong dispela wara i hat pinis i save rausim wel long ol lip .

translation.en: in its natural setting , the oil transpires from the leaf and fills the air with tiny droplets that refract the sunlight , giving the eucalyptus forest a characteristic blue hue .
translation.zu: long bikbus , wel i save lus long ol lip na i kamap olsem das na i pulapim win na taim lait bilong san i sutim dispela das , bikbus i gat ol diwai kumurere i save kisim blupela kala .

translation.en: the blue mountains , which define the western extremity of the city of sydney , were given their unusual name because of this phenomenon .
translation.zu: long dispela as na ol maunten long hap wes bilong sidni i kisim nem olsem ol blu maunten .

translation.en: home to some fussy eaters
translation.zu: ples bilong sampela lain bilong kaikai

translation.en: the most famous inhabitant of the eucalyptus forest is the adorable ball of fur known as the koala .
translation.zu: wanpela animal i save stap long bus bilong ol diwai kumurere na planti man i save long en , em naispela animal koala .

translation.en: this fastidious herbivore prefers to dine on the tips of 12 or so varieties of eucalyptus leaves .
translation.zu: dispela animal i save kaikai lip bilong ol diwai , na em i save laikim tru lip bilong 12 - pela kain diwai kumurere .

translation.en: such an exclusive diet would prove lethal to most animals but not the koala .
translation.zu: dispela kain pasin bilong kaikai inap bagarapim planti animal tasol koala nogat .

translation.en: this is because of the koala 's specially designed digestive system , which includes an appendix that is six to eight feet [ 1 to 2 m ] in length .
translation.zu: long wanem , bel bilong koala i narapela kain long ol narapela animal , na apendiks bilong en i longpela inap wanpela i go inap 2 - pela mita .

translation.en: by comparison , a human appendix is only three to six inches [ 8 to 15 cm ] in length .
translation.zu: longpela bilong apendiks bilong man em inap 8 i go 15 sentimita tasol .

translation.en: the koala 's unique appendix allows the little animal to extract from this menu all the proteins , carbohydrates , and fats that it needs .
translation.zu: dispela narapela kain apendiks bilong koala i save helpim em long kisim ol gutpela samting long dispela kaikai bilong helpim bodi bilong em , olsem olgeta protin na kabohaidret na ol gris samting .

translation.en: this furry marsupial is about the size of a domestic cat .
translation.zu: bikpela bilong dispela kain kapul i wankain olsem pusi .

translation.en: it has a shaggy tail about a foot and a half [ 40 cm ] long and flaps of skin stretched between its front and rear paws .
translation.zu: longpela bilong tel bilong en inap 40 sentimita na i gat planti gras long en , na i gat hap skin i stap namel long tupela han na tupela lek bilong en .

translation.en: utilizing these fleshy wings , an opossum will leap from a limb , glide for up to 100 yards [ 100 m ] , make 90 - degree turns as it flies , and then safely grasp the next branch .
translation.zu: dispela hap skin i olsem wing , na kapul i save mekim wok long en bilong flai inap olsem 100 mita , na taim em i flai yet em inap baut 90 digri na holim narapela han bilong diwai .

translation.en: bushfires , as they are known in australia , are a threat to the eucalyptus forest .
translation.zu: long ostrelia , ol paia i kamap long bus ol i save bagarapim bikbus bilong diwai kumurere .

translation.en: yet , the trees are designed so that they survive them .
translation.zu: tasol maski paia i kukim ol dispela diwai , em i no save dai olgeta .

translation.en: well , buried just below a tree 's bark , along its trunk and branches , are dormant leaf buds .
translation.zu: i gat ol nupela lip i no op yet i stap aninit long skin bilong as na ol han bilong dispela diwai .

translation.en: when a tree is stripped of its bark and leaves by a fire , these buds spring to life .
translation.zu: taim paia i kukim skin na ol lip bilong diwai , ol dispela nupela kru i save kamapim ol nupela lip .

translation.en: they clothe the blackened trunk of the tree with an overcoat of fresh green leaves .
translation.zu: ol dispela nupela grinpela lip i save kamap long olgeta hap bilong diwai em paia i kukim pinis .

translation.en: as a result , the parent tree is able to survive .
translation.zu: olsem na long dispela rot mama diwai i no save dai .

translation.en: moreover , seeds of the tree lying dormant on the ground often seize the opportunity to germinate , resulting in new growth .
translation.zu: na tu , ol pikinini bilong diwai em ol i slip nating long graun , ol i save putim kru na long dispela rot ol nupela diwai i save kamap .

translation.en: a tree to be appreciated
translation.zu: wanpela diwai bilong amamas long en

translation.en: have you been transported by a boat constructed with the tree 's timbers , or have you been housed or warmed by the wood of a eucalyptus ?
translation.zu: yu bin kalap long wanpela bot o slip long wanpela haus ol i wokim long timba bilong diwai kumurere , o yu bin hatim skin bilong yu long paiawut yu kisim long dispela diwai ?

translation.en: chances are that in some way you have been benefited by this remarkable tree .
translation.zu: ating dispela narapela kain diwai i bin helpim yu long kain kain rot .

translation.en: so the next time you see a furry koala - or admire the photo of one - may it call to your mind the marvelous design of the tree that the koala calls home .
translation.zu: olsem na long narapela taim yu lukim wanpela koala - o yu amamas long lukim poto bilong wanpela koala - dispela i ken kirapim yu long tingim gen olsem dispela gutpela diwai em i ples bilong ol .

translation.en: indeed , the versatile , tenacious eucalyptus is a tree with many uses .
translation.zu: tru tumas , strongpela diwai kumurere i gat planti wok bilong en .

translation.en: the war did not stop our preaching
translation.zu: pait i no pasim mipela long autim tok

translation.en: as told by leodegario barlaan
translation.zu: em stori bilong leodegario barlaan

translation.en: in 1942 , during world war ii , japan and the united states were locked in battle for the philippines , my homeland .
translation.zu: long 1942 , long taim bilong namba tu pait , ol japan i pait wantaim ol amerika long kisim filipin , em as ples bilong mi .

translation.en: i was at the mountain village of tabonan , where local guerrillas fighting the japanese had taken me into custody .
translation.zu: mi stap long wanpela liklik ples long maunten , long tabonan , em hap ol paitman i pait long ol japan ol i kalabusim mi .

translation.en: let me explain how i got into this situation and how i survived .
translation.zu: mi laik stori long olsem wanem ol dispela samting i painim mi , na olsem wanem mi stap laip yet .

translation.en: i was born on january 24 , 1914 , in the town of san carlos , pangasinan .
translation.zu: mama i karim mi long janueri 24 , 1914 , long taun bilong san kalos , pangasinan .

translation.en: in the 1930 ' s , father sent me to school to study agriculture .
translation.zu: bihain long 1930 samting , papa i salim mi i go long skul bilong kisim save long pasin bilong wokim gaden samting .

translation.en: on sundays i attended mass , and the priest would speak about the gospels - matthew , mark , luke , and john .
translation.zu: long sande mi save go long lotu , na pris i save toktok long ol gutnius - matyu , mak , luk , na jon .

translation.en: as a result , i wanted to read them .
translation.zu: dispela i kirapim laik bilong mi long kaunim ol gutnius .

translation.en: one day i went to the convent to buy a copy of the gospels with money i had obtained from selling some vegetables .
translation.zu: wanpela taim mi go long haus sister bilong baim 4 - pela gutnius long mani mi bin kisim long salim ol kaikai bilong gaden .

translation.en: instead , i was given a booklet entitled the way to heaven , and it did not contain the gospels .
translation.zu: tasol ol i givim mi wanpela liklik buk , nem bilong en rot bilong i go long heven , na i no gat ol stori bilong ol gutnius long en .

translation.en: this disappointed me .
translation.zu: mi bel hevi long dispela .

translation.en: later , pursuing my desire to obtain the gospels , i traveled to manila .
translation.zu: mi gat strongpela laik yet long kisim 4 - pela gutnius , olsem na bihain mi go long manila .

translation.en: there my uncle , who was one of jehovah 's witnesses , provided me with a copy of the complete bible .
translation.zu: long manila , ankol bilong mi em i wanpela witnes bilong jehova , na em i givim wanpela baibel olgeta long mi .

translation.en: in manila , i met several witnesses , whose ability to quote scriptures impressed me .
translation.zu: mi bungim sampela witnes long manila na mi kirap nogut long pasin bilong ol long kolim ol tok bilong ol skripsa .

translation.en: from them i received satisfactory answers to many questions .
translation.zu: ol i bekim gut planti askim bilong mi .

translation.en: eventually , my uncle , ricardo uson , took me to a meeting at the branch office of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: bihain , ankol bilong mi , ricardo uson , i kisim mi i go long wanpela miting long brens - ofis bilong ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: when nearing the place , i lit a cigarette .
translation.zu: taim mipela i kamap klostu long brens - ofis , mi laitim wanpela smok .

translation.en: " throw that away , " my uncle said .
translation.zu: ankol i tok : " tromoi dispela samting i go .

translation.en: " jehovah 's witnesses don 't smoke . "
translation.zu: ol witnes bilong jehova i no save smok . "

translation.en: so i threw the cigarette away and never smoked again .
translation.zu: olsem na mi tromoi dispela smok i go na mi lusim smok olgeta .

translation.en: i met joseph dos santos , the branch overseer , as well as some other witnesses .
translation.zu: mi bungim joseph dos santos , em wasman bilong brens , na sampela narapela witnes tu .

translation.en: today , all these decades later , i still remember those fine christian brothers .
translation.zu: nau , planti yia i lus pinis tasol mi tingim yet ol dispela gutpela brata kristen .

translation.en: a desire to serve god
translation.zu: laik bilong mekim wok bilong god

translation.en: instead , i read the bible along with the literature that had been given to me by my uncle .
translation.zu: tasol mi save kaunim baibel na ol buk na nius samting em ankol i bin givim long mi .

translation.en: a group of jehovah 's witnesses visited the college compound , and as a result of discussions with one of them , elvira alinsod , my desire to serve jehovah god became strong .
translation.zu: sampela witnes bilong jehova i kam long skul na taim mi toktok wantaim wanpela bilong ol , elvira alinsod , dispela i strongim laik bilong mi long mekim wok bilong god jehova .

translation.en: when i told my instructors that i planned to quit school , they asked : " who will support you ? "
translation.zu: taim mi tokim ol tisa olsem mi laik lusim skul , ol i askim mi : " husat bai lukautim yu ? "

translation.en: i explained that i was confident that if i served god , he would support me .
translation.zu: mi tokim ol olsem mi bilip strong olsem sapos mi mekim wok bilong god , em bai lukautim mi .

translation.en: after quitting school , i went to the watch tower society 's office and presented myself as a volunteer , explaining : " i have read the publications loyalty , riches , and where are the dead ?
translation.zu: taim mi lusim skul pinis , mi go long ofis bilong sosaiti was taua na mi kamapim mi yet olsem mi laik mekim wok volantia , na mi tok : " mi kaunim pinis buk loyalty , riches , na where are the dead ?

translation.en: now i want to serve jehovah full - time . "
translation.zu: nau mi laik mekim wok bilong jehova long olgeta de . "

translation.en: i was directed to cebu province to join three pioneers , as full - time ministers of jehovah 's witnesses are called .
translation.zu: ol i tokim mi long go long provins sebu na wok wantaim 3 - pela painia - em ol witnes bilong jehova i save mekim wok autim tok long olgeta de .

translation.en: on july 15 , 1938 , salvador liwag met me at the pier when i arrived on the island of cebu .
translation.zu: long julai 15 , 1938 , salvador liwag i bungim mi long bris taim mi kamap long ailan sebu .

translation.en: the next day , i started in the house - to - house ministry .
translation.zu: long de bihain , mi kirap mekim wok autim tok long ol haus .

translation.en: i just presented the householder with a testimony card that explained our work .
translation.zu: mi save lusim wanpela kat long man bilong haus , na dispela kat i stori long wok bilong mipela .

translation.en: in fact , i knew only two words in cebuano , the local language .
translation.zu: mi save long tupela tok tasol bilong tok sebuano , em tok ples ol i mekim long dispela hap .

translation.en: thus began my first day in the ministry .
translation.zu: em namba wan de bilong mi long autim tok .

translation.en: when we started witnessing in a new town , it was our custom to go to the municipal building first .
translation.zu: taim mipela i kirap long autim tok long wanpela nupela taun , pastaim mipela i save go long haus kaunsil .

translation.en: there brother liwag would witness to the mayor ; pablo bautista , to the chief of police ; and conrado daclan , to the judge .
translation.zu: taim mipela i kamap long haus kaunsil , brata liwag i autim tok long bikman i bosim taun ; pablo bautista i autim tok long bikman bilong polis ; na conrado daclan i autim tok long jas .

translation.en: i would speak to the postmaster .
translation.zu: mi autim tok long bikman bilong posofis samting .

translation.en: then we would visit the bus terminal , the police barracks , the stores , and the schools .
translation.zu: bihain mipela i go autim tok long ol ples bilong kisim bas , long hap bilong ol polis , long ol stua na ol skul .

translation.en: in addition , we would call on people at their homes .
translation.zu: na tu , mipela i go autim tok long ol man long haus .

translation.en: as i imitated the way my companions gave a testimony , little by little i learned to speak cebuano , and i began to place books .
translation.zu: mi bihainim pasin bilong ol pren bilong mi long autim tok na isi isi mi lain long mekim tok sebuano , na mi kirap long lusim ol buk long ol man .

translation.en: within three months we finished the whole province of cebu - 54 towns .
translation.zu: insait long 3 - pela mun mipela i autim tok long olgeta hap bilong provins sebu - em 54 taun olgeta .

translation.en: then i asked brother liwag : " can i be baptized now ? "
translation.zu: bihain mi askim brata liwag : " mi inap kisim baptais nau ? "

translation.en: " not yet , brother , " he answered .
translation.zu: em i tok : " i no yet , brata . "

translation.en: so we transferred to another island , bohol , and preached there for a month and a half , covering 36 more towns .
translation.zu: olsem na mipela i go long narapela ailan , bohol , na autim tok long hap inap wanpela mun na hap , na mipela i autim tok long 36 taun samting .

translation.en: again i asked to be baptized .
translation.zu: orait nau mi askim gen long kisim baptais .

translation.en: " not yet , brother barlaan , " i was told .
translation.zu: ol i tokim mi : " i no yet , brata barlaan . "

translation.en: so having finished bohol and then camiguin island , we went to the big island of mindanao and preached in cagayan de oro city .
translation.zu: olsem na taim mipela i autim tok pinis long bohol na ailan kamiguin , mipela i go long bikpela ailan mindanao na autim tok long biktaun kagayan de oro .

translation.en: by this time virginio cruz joined our group .
translation.zu: long dispela taim virginio cruz i kam wok wantaim mipela .

translation.en: he had been a public - school teacher and had quit to become a pioneer .
translation.zu: em i wanpela tisa , tasol em i lusim dispela wok bilong kamap wanpela painia .

translation.en: while there i again asked if i could be baptized .
translation.zu: taim mipela i stap long dispela hap , mi askim gen long kisim baptais .

translation.en: at last , on december 28 , 1938 , after about six months of pioneering , brother cruz baptized me in the waters of lake lanao at the town of lumbatan .
translation.zu: em nau , long disemba 28 , 1938 , taim mi mekim wok painia inap 6 - pela mun pinis , brata cruz i baptaisim mi long raunwara lanao long hap bilong taun lumbatan .

translation.en: rewarded for trusting in god
translation.zu: kisim gutpela samting long bilip long god

translation.en: later i joined three pioneers in negros occidental .
translation.zu: bihain mi go wok wantaim 3 - pela painia long negros oksidental .

translation.en: they were fulgencio de jesus , esperanza de jesus , and natividad santos , whom we called naty .
translation.zu: em fulgencio de jesus , esperanza de jesus , na natividad santos - mipela i save kolim em naty .

translation.en: we preached together in many towns in that province .
translation.zu: mipela i autim tok wantaim long planti taun long dispela provins .

translation.en: we really had to put full trust in jehovah , since at times our finances were meager .
translation.zu: mipela i mas bilip strong long jehova , long wanem , sampela taim mipela i save sot tru long mani .

translation.en: once we wanted to find fish to go with our rice .
translation.zu: wanpela taim mipela i laik painim pis bilong kaikai wantaim rais .

translation.en: i met a man on the beach and asked about buying some , but all of his had been taken to the market .
translation.zu: mi bungim wanpela man long nambis na mi askim em long baim sampela pis , tasol ol i kisim olgeta pis bilong em i go pinis long maket .

translation.en: however , he offered me one that he had set aside for himself .
translation.zu: tasol em i givim mi wanpela pis em i bin putim i stap bilong em yet .

translation.en: i asked how much it was .
translation.zu: mi askim em long pe bilong pis .

translation.en: " never mind , " he said .
translation.zu: em i tok : " em i orait .

translation.en: " you can have it . "
translation.zu: yu ken kisim nating . "

translation.en: i thanked him .
translation.zu: mi tok tenkyu long em .

translation.en: but as i was leaving , i realized that one fish would not be enough for four people .
translation.zu: tasol taim mi lusim em , mi skelim olsem wanpela pis bai i no inap long 4 - pela man .

translation.en: passing by a small creek , i was surprised to see a fish lying on top of a stone , still wet from the water .
translation.zu: taim mi wokabaut klostu long wanpela liklik wara , mi kirap nogut long lukim wanpela pis i stap antap long ston na wara i stap yet long skin bilong en .

translation.en: i thought , ' maybe it 's dead . '
translation.zu: mi tingting olsem ' ating em i dai pinis . '

translation.en: i went to pick it up and was surprised to find that it was alive .
translation.zu: mi kisim dispela pis na mi kirap nogut long lukim olsem em i stap laip yet .

translation.en: grabbing it , i held on tightly , remembering immediately jesus ' promise : " keep on , then , seeking first the kingdom and his righteousness , and all these other things will be added to you . " - matthew 6 : 33 .
translation.zu: mi kisim na holim strong na wantu mi tingim tok promis bilong jisas : " yupela i mas wok pastaim long painim kingdom bilong god wantaim stretpela pasin bilong em . na bihain bai em i givim dispela olgeta arapela samting tu long yupela . " - matyu 6 : 33 , nupela testamen na ol sam , bilong 1978 .

translation.en: preaching in the midst of war
translation.zu: autim tok long taim bilong pait

translation.en: when our group of pioneers grew to nine , two groups were formed .
translation.zu: taim mipela i kamap 9 - pela painia , mipela i wokim tupela grup .

translation.en: it was now december 1941 , and world war ii was in progress in the philippines .
translation.zu: em disemba 1941 , na namba tu pait i kamap long filipin .

translation.en: while we were in the town of tuburan , a philippine lieutenant came to our room at midnight .
translation.zu: taim mipela i stap long taun tuburan , wanpela lutenant bilong filipin i kam long rum bilong mipela long biknait .

translation.en: " sons , wake up , " he said .
translation.zu: em i tok : " yupela kirap .

translation.en: " the soldiers are looking for you . "
translation.zu: ol soldia i wok long painim yupela . "

translation.en: we were suspected of being japanese spies and so were interrogated the rest of the night .
translation.zu: ol i ting mipela i man bilong lukstil na helpim ol japan , olsem na ol i sutim ol askim long mipela inap long nait olgeta .

translation.en: afterward , we were placed in the municipal jail .
translation.zu: bihain ol i putim mipela long haus kalabus .

translation.en: the u.s . armed forces in cebu city required us to provide them with copies of each of our books so that they could determine if we were japanese spies .
translation.zu: lain ami bilong amerika i stap long sebu siti ol i laik mipela i mas givim olgeta wan wan buk bilong mipela long ol na bai ol i ken skelim olsem mipela i lukstil na helpim ol japan o nogat .

translation.en: many local folks visited us in jail , curious to see what those accused of being japanese spies looked like .
translation.zu: planti lain i laik save long ol dispela man i lukstil na helpim ol japan , olsem na ol i kam lukim mipela long haus kalabus .

translation.en: some asked questions , and we gave them a witness about god 's kingdom .
translation.zu: sampela i givim ol askim long mipela , na mipela i autim tok long ol long kingdom bilong god .

translation.en: after we had spent five days in jail , the chief of police received a telegram from the u.s .
translation.zu: taim mipela i stap 5 - pela de pinis long haus kalabus , bikman bilong polis i kisim wanpela telegram i kam long bikpela ofis bilong ami bilong amerika .

translation.en: army headquarters , directing him to release the witnesses of jehovah .
translation.zu: hetkota bilong ami i tokim ol long lusim ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: however , he instructed us not to preach anymore because it was now wartime .
translation.zu: tasol em i tokim mipela long no ken autim tok moa , long wanem , nau em taim bilong pait .

translation.en: we explained that we could not stop preaching because we had a commission from god to do this work .
translation.zu: mipela i tok olsem mipela i no inap lusim wok autim tok , long wanem , god i tokim mipela long mekim dispela wok .

translation.en: the chief became angry and said : " if you continue preaching , i 'll let the people kill you . "
translation.zu: dispela bikman i kros na i tok : " sapos yupela i autim tok yet , orait bai mi tokim ol man long kilim yupela i dai . "

translation.en: in the days that followed , the chief of police sought to have us rearrested . eventually , a squad of u.s .
translation.zu: insait long sampela de bihain , bikman bilong polis i painim rot bilong ol i ken holim mipela .

translation.en: army soldiers stopped us , and a lieutenant named soriano asked sister santos : " will you stop preaching ? "
translation.zu: bihain , sampela soldia bilong amerika i pasim mipela na wanpela lutenant bilong ol , em soriano , i askim sista santos : " bai yupela i pinis long autim tok ? "

translation.en: " no , " she replied .
translation.zu: sista santos i tok : " nogat . "

translation.en: he asked . " that would not change our decision , " she explained .
translation.zu: sista santos i tok : " dispela i no inap senisim tingting bilong mipela . "

translation.en: at that , we were all put on a cargo truck and taken to cebu city , where we appeared before colonel edmund .
translation.zu: ol i putim mipela long wanpela ka bilong kisim ol kago na ol i bringim mipela i go long sebu siti bilong lukim kenel edmund .

translation.en: lieutenant soriano introduced us to him by saying : " these are jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: taim lutenant soriano i kisim mipela i go long em , soriano i tok : " em ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: " jehovah 's witnesses ? " the colonel asked .
translation.zu: kenel i tok : " ol witnes bilong jehova , a ?

translation.en: " i knew jehovah 's witnesses very well in america .
translation.zu: mi save gut long ol witnes bilong jehova long amerika .

translation.en: they are not spies !
translation.zu: ol i no lain bilong lukstil !

translation.en: later , after we had been held in a storage room for some time , colonel edmund spoke with us again and asked : " are you still neutral ? "
translation.zu: ol i putim mipela long wanpela rum bilong putim ol kago samting , na bihain kenel edmund i toktok gen wantaim mipela na em i askim mipela olsem : " yupela i stap olsem yet ? "

translation.en: " yes , sir , we are , " we replied .
translation.zu: mipela i tok : " yes , bikman , mipela i no inap insait long pait . "

translation.en: " then , you won 't be released , " he said , " because if we release you , you will continue to preach , and those you convert will become neutral .
translation.zu: em i tok : " olsem bai mipela i no inap larim yupela i go , long wanem , sapos mipela i larim yupela i go , yupela bai autim tok yet na olgeta man i bihainim yupela bai i no inap insait long pait .

translation.en: and if everybody does that , then nobody will fight . "
translation.zu: na sapos olgeta man i mekim olsem bai i no gat man bilong pait . "

translation.en: free to preach again
translation.zu: stap fri gen long autim tok

translation.en: later we were transferred to the jail in cebu city .
translation.zu: bihain ol i salim mipela i go long haus kalabus long sebu siti .

translation.en: on april 10 , 1942 , the japanese invaded the city .
translation.zu: long epril 10 , 1942 , ol japan i go insait long biktaun .

translation.en: bombs fell everywhere , and a big fire broke out !
translation.zu: ol i tromoi ol bom long olgeta hap , na bikpela paia i kirap !

translation.en: the warden saw sister santos , whose cell was near the front of the jail . " oh my !
translation.zu: wasman bilong haus kalabus i lukim sista santos , em sel bilong em i stap klostu long dua , na em i singaut : " olaman !

translation.en: jehovah 's witnesses are still inside ! "
translation.zu: ol witnes bilong jehova i stap yet insait !

translation.en: " open the door , and let them out ! "
translation.zu: opim dua na larim ol i kam ausait ! "

translation.en: we thanked jehovah for his protection .
translation.zu: mipela i tenkyu long jehova long em i lukautim mipela .

translation.en: immediately we headed for the mountains to find fellow witnesses .
translation.zu: wantu mipela i go long ples maunten bilong painim ol wanlain witnes .

translation.en: we located one in the town of compostela .
translation.zu: mipela i painim wanpela witnes long taun bilong kompostela .

translation.en: earlier he had taken a lead in the preaching work , but now he decided to stop preaching and go off to cebu city and develop a business selling various goods .
translation.zu: pastaim em i bin i go pas long wok autim tok , tasol nau em i tingting long lusim na go long sebu siti na kirapim wanpela bisnis bilong salim ol kain kain samting .

translation.en: our decision , however , was to continue preaching about god 's kingdom , come what may .
translation.zu: tasol mipela i tingting pinis long wok yet long autim tok long kingdom bilong god , maski wanem wanem samting i kamap .

translation.en: we had many copies of the booklet comfort all that mourn , and we worked hard to place them in the hands of the people .
translation.zu: mipela i gat planti liklik buk comfort all that mourn , na mipela i wok strong long tilim long ol man .

translation.en: however , many tried to frighten us by saying that if the japanese saw us , they would cut off our heads .
translation.zu: tasol planti man i laik pretim mipela na ol i tok , sapos ol japan i lukim mipela , ol bai katim na rausim het bilong mipela .

translation.en: soon afterward , an anti - japanese guerrilla movement was organized , and the one who had ceased preaching and had gone off to do business in cebu city was arrested .
translation.zu: i no longtaim na wanpela lain paitman i kirap long birua long ol japan na ol i holim dispela brata i bin lusim wok autim tok na i go long sebu siti long mekim wok bisnis .

translation.en: in the meantime we continued preaching in the mountains .
translation.zu: mipela i wok yet long autim tok long ol ples maunten .

translation.en: we came to the village of mangabon , where the woman resided , but a squad of soldiers there found us and shouted : " what is your purpose in coming here ? "
translation.zu: mipela i kamap long liklik ples mangabon , em hap dispela meri i stap long en , tasol sampela soldia i lukim mipela na ol i singaut : " wanem as na yupela i kam long hia ? "

translation.en: " we are jehovah 's witnesses , " i replied .
translation.zu: mi tok : " mipela i witnes bilong jehova . olsem wanem ?

translation.en: " do you want to hear the message we are bringing by means of the phonograph ? "
translation.zu: yupela i laik harim tok mipela i bringim i kam long rot bilong masin bilong pilaim musik ? "

translation.en: when they responded favorably , i played the record the value of knowledge .
translation.zu: taim ol i orait long harim , mi pilaim wanpela tok long ol ( the value of knowledge ) .

translation.en: afterward , we were searched and questioned and then taken to the guerrilla headquarters at the village of tabonan .
translation.zu: bihain ol i sekim mipela na givim sampela askim long mipela na nau ol i kisim mipela i go long bikpela ofis bilong ol paitman long liklik ples tabonan .

translation.en: this brings us to the situation that i described at the beginning , when i was beaten and the lieutenant pointed at me and said : " you are a spy ! "
translation.zu: samting mi stori long en long kirap bilong dispela stori i bin kamap long dispela taim . ol i paitim mi na ofisa bilong ol i makim pinga long mi na tok : " yu wanpela man bilong lukstil ! "

translation.en: our mistreatment continued for a while , but instead of being executed , we were sentenced to hard labor .
translation.zu: ol i mekim nogut long mipela inap sampela taim , na bihain ol i makim mipela bilong mekim ol strongpela wok kalabus na ol i no kilim mipela i dai .

translation.en: my brother bernabe was one of the pioneers imprisoned at tabonan .
translation.zu: brata bilong mi , bernabe , em tu i kalabus long tabonan .

translation.en: each morning we prisoners were required to sing " god bless america " and " god bless the philippines . "
translation.zu: long olgeta moningtaim ol i laik mipela i mas mekim ol singsing " god i mekim gut long amerika " na " god i mekim gut long filipin . "

translation.en: instead , the witnesses sang " who is on the lord 's side ? "
translation.zu: tasol ol witnes i save mekim singsing " husat i stap long lain bilong bikpela ? "

translation.en: once , the officer in charge shouted : " anyone who is not singing ' god bless america ' will be hanged on that acacia tree ! "
translation.zu: wanpela taim ofisa i bosim mipela em i singaut : " husat man i no mekim singsing ' god i mekim gut long amerika , ' mipela bai hangamapim em long dispela diwai akas ! "

translation.en: eventually , we were transferred to other camps .
translation.zu: bihain ol i salim mipela i go long ol narapela kem .

translation.en: finally , my release papers , dated july 1943 , came .
translation.zu: long julai 1943 mi kisim pepa bilong larim mi i lusim kem .

translation.en: by then , i had been a prisoner for eight months and ten days .
translation.zu: mi bin stap kalabus inap 8 - pela mun na 10 - pela de pinis .

translation.en: a lifetime of preaching
translation.zu: autim tok inap mi lapun

translation.en: our desire to see interested individuals to whom we had preached earlier moved us to hike 40 miles [ 60 km ] to the city of toledo .
translation.zu: mipela i laik lukim ol lain mipela i bin autim tok long ol long bipo , olsem na mipela i go longwe inap 60 kilomita long biktaun toledo .

translation.en: regular meetings were established there , and many people were eventually baptized .
translation.zu: mipela i kirapim ol miting kristen long hap na isi isi planti man i bin kisim baptais .

translation.en: finally , the war ended in 1945 .
translation.zu: long 1945 pait i pinis .

translation.en: two years later , almost nine years after my baptism , i was able to attend my first convention , which was held at the santa ana racetrack in manila .
translation.zu: tupela yia bihain , klostu 9 - pela yia bihain long mi bin kisim baptais , rot i op na mi inap go long namba wan kibung bilong mi i kamap long wanpela stediam bilong pilai spot long santa ana , manila .

translation.en: about 4,200 assembled for the public talk " the joy of all the people . "
translation.zu: inap olsem 4,200 ol i bung bilong harim pablik - tok " amamas bilong olgeta man . "

translation.en: before the war started , we had about 380 witnesses in the philippines , but by 1947 , there were some 2,700 !
translation.zu: paslain long pait i bin kirap , i gat olsem 380 witnes long filipin , tasol long 1947 , i gat olsem 2,700 !

translation.en: since then i have continued to enjoy many privileges in jehovah 's service .
translation.zu: kirap long dispela taim na i kam inap long nau , mi bin amamas long kisim planti gutpela wok bilong jehova .

translation.en: from 1948 to 1950 , i served as a traveling overseer in the surigao region .
translation.zu: long 1948 i go inap long 1950 , mi mekim wok olsem wasman bilong raun long hap bilong surigao .

translation.en: in 1951 , i married natividad santos , who had courageously preached with our group during the war .
translation.zu: long 1951 , mi maritim natividad santos , em i bin strongim bel na autim tok wantaim grup bilong mipela long taim bilong pait .

translation.en: so that we could be near our aged parents and offer them assistance , we became special pioneers in 1972 .
translation.zu: mipela i laik stap klostu long ol papamama bilong mipela em ol i lapun pinis , olsem na mipela i kamap painia salim long 1972 .

translation.en: even though we are both in our 80 ' s , we continue to pioneer , having spent , between us , more than 120 years in the full - time ministry .
translation.zu: mitupela i winim pinis 80 krismas , tasol mipela i save mekim yet wok painia , na taim mipela i bungim ol yia bilong mipela wantaim , mipela i bin lusim planti yia tru long mekim wok painia samting , winim 120 yia .

translation.en: what a joy it has been to us to see the number of those proclaiming the good news of god 's kingdom in the philippines grow to more than 130,000 !
translation.zu: mipela i amamas tru long lukim namba bilong ol man i autim gutnius bilong kingdom bilong god long filipin i go antap winim 130,000 !

translation.en: it is our desire to help many more to appreciate that god 's kingdom is the only hope for enjoying true peace and happiness on earth .
translation.zu: em laik bilong mipela long helpim planti man moa long pilim tru olsem kingdom bilong god tasol em i rot bilong yumi ken i stap bel isi tru na amamas long graun .
