translation.en: the bible 's viewpoint
translation.zu: baibel i tok wanem ?

translation.en: should we go to christian meetings ?
translation.zu: yu ting yumi mas go long ol miting kristen ?

translation.en: " i used to go to church , but not anymore . "
translation.zu: " bipo mi save go long lotu , tasol nau nogat . "

translation.en: " i think you can worship god anywhere , not just in a church . "
translation.zu: " mi ting yumi ken lotuim god long wanem wanem hap yumi stap long en , na i no long haus lotu tasol . "

translation.en: " i believe in god and the bible , but i don 't believe in going to church . "
translation.zu: " mi bilip long god na long baibel , tasol mi no ting yumi mas i go long lotu . "

translation.en: what does the bible say about going to church ?
translation.zu: baibel i tok wanem long pasin bilong i go long lotu ?

translation.en: the words " church " and " churches " occur over 110 times in the king james version .
translation.zu: long baibel king james version dispela tok " sios " na " ol sios " i stap winim 110 taim .

translation.en: other translations also use these terms .
translation.zu: ol narapela baibel tu i yusim ol dispela tok .

translation.en: the greek word translated " church " literally means " a calling forth , " or , in other words , a gathering of people .
translation.zu: insait bilong dispela tok grik ol i tanim olsem " sios " i olsem " singautim ol man " olsem bungim ol man .

translation.en: for example , acts 7 : 38 , in the king james version , tells of moses being " in the church in the wilderness , " that is , among the congregated nation of israel .
translation.zu: olsem , long king james version , aposel 7 : 38 i tok moses i stap " insait long sios long ples drai nating , " olsem em i stap wantaim ol manmeri bilong lain israel .

translation.en: in another instance the scriptures state that " a bitter persecution started against the church , " referring to the community of christians in jerusalem .
translation.zu: narapela baibel i tok olsem " ol i kirap long birua nogut tru long sios " na long hia sios i makim ol kristen i stap long jerusalem .

translation.en: in one of his letters , paul greets " the church in [ philemon 's ] house , " the local congregation that met there . - philemon 2 , revised standard version .
translation.zu: long wanpela pas pol i raitim , em i givim gude long " sios i stap long haus [ bilong filemon ] , " sios i makim kongrigesen i save bung long haus bilong filemon . - filemon 2 , revised standard version .

translation.en: clearly , the term " church " as used in the bible designates , not a place of worship , but rather a group of worshipers .
translation.zu: dispela i kamapim klia olsem dispela tok " sios " olsem i stap long baibel i no makim ples bilong mekim lotu , tasol em i makim ol manmeri i save lotu .

translation.en: acknowledging this , clement of alexandria , a second - century religious teacher , wrote : " not the place , but the congregation of the elect , i call the church . "
translation.zu: wanpela tisa bilong lotu long yia 150 c.e . samting , em clement bilong alexandria , em i tok : " mi tok sios i makim ol manmeri bilong lotu , na i no wanpela ples ol i bung long en bilong mekim lotu . "

translation.en: still , must christians be present at a specific location or building in order for their worship to be acceptable to god ?
translation.zu: tasol yu ting ol kristen i mas bung long wanpela hap stret o wanpela haus bambai god i ken orait long lotu bilong ol ?

translation.en: worship in the nation of israel
translation.zu: pasin bilong lain israel long mekim lotu

translation.en: they ' expounded it , put meaning into it , and gave understanding in the reading . '
translation.zu: ol i save ritim na kamapim as bilong ol tok bambai ol " manmeri i ken save gut " long ol tok .

translation.en: for sabbath years , god 's direction stated : " congregate the people , the men and the women and the little ones and your alien resident who is within your gates , in order that they may listen and in order that they may learn , as they must fear jehovah your god and take care to carry out all the words of this law . " - deuteronomy 31 : 12 .
translation.zu: ( nehemia 8 : 8 ) god i tokim ol long ol samting ol i mas mekim long ol yia bilong sabat : " singautim olgeta man wantaim meri na pikinini na ol man bilong arapela kantri i stap long ol taun bilong yupela , bai olgeta i ken kam na harim dispela tok . ol i ken harim na i stap aninit long god , bikpela bilong yumi , na bihainim gut olgeta tok bilong em . " - lo 31 : 12 .

translation.en: only at the temple in jerusalem could a person offer sacrifices to god and receive instruction from the priests .
translation.zu: ol man i mas i go long tempel bilong givim ofa long god na bilong ol pris i ken skulim ol .

translation.en: these were locations for the reading of the scriptures and for praying .
translation.zu: ol i ritim ol skripsa na mekim ol beten insait long ol dispela haus lotu .

translation.en: still , the temple in jerusalem was the principal place of worship .
translation.zu: tasol tempel long jerusalem em i nambawan ples bilong mekim lotu .

translation.en: he mentions an elderly woman named anna , who was " never missing from the temple , rendering sacred service night and day with fastings and supplications . "
translation.zu: em i save tambu long kaikai na i beten i stap , na em i holim wok bilong god long san na long nait . "

translation.en: true worship with other devoted ones was the focal point of anna 's life .
translation.zu: nambawan bikpela samting long i stap bilong ana em long mekim lotu wantaim ol narapela i save givim bel long god .

translation.en: other god - fearing jews followed a similar course .
translation.zu: ol narapela juda em ol i pret long god ol tu i bihainim wankain pasin .

translation.en: true worship after christ 's death
translation.zu: lotu i tru bihain long indai bilong krais

translation.en: after jesus ' death his followers were no longer under the mosaic law , nor were they required to worship at the temple .
translation.zu: bihain long indai bilong jisas , ol disaipel bilong em i no stap aninit moa long lo bilong moses , na tu , i no olsem ol i mas mekim lotu long tempel .

translation.en: still , they continued to meet together for prayer and study of god 's word .
translation.zu: tasol ol i save bung wantaim bilong beten na stadi long tok bilong god .

translation.en: free of ritualism and pomp , those first - century christian meetings had a beautiful simplicity .
translation.zu: long taim bilong ol aposel , ol miting kristen i no gat ol kain kain pasin bilong lotu na ol bilaspasin .

translation.en: amid the moral gloom of the roman empire , the bible principles taught at those meetings sparkled like diamonds .
translation.zu: ol tok bilong baibel ol i lainim long ol dispela miting i narapela kain tru long ol pasin nogut bilong gavman rom .

translation.en: yes , god was really among them .
translation.zu: em nau , god i stap namel long ol .

translation.en: " therefore , indeed , the congregations [ " churches , " rs , jb ] continued to be made firm in the faith and to increase in number from day to day . " - acts 16 : 5 .
translation.zu: " olsem na bilip bilong ol manmeri bilong ol sios i kamap strong moa , na namba bilong ol i go bikpela moa long olgeta de . " - aposel 16 : 5 .

translation.en: could a christian at that time have god 's approval by worshiping in pagan temples or on his own ?
translation.zu: yu ting god bai orait long wanpela kristen long taim bilong ol aposel , sapos em i mekim lotu long ol tempel bilong ol haiden o em yet i mekim lotu ?

translation.en: the bible gives clear direction on this matter : approved worshipers had to become part of the only true church , or congregation , the " one body " of genuine worshipers .
translation.zu: baibel i tokaut klia long dispela samting : ol man god i orait long ol , ol i mas insait long lotu i tru , o kongrigesen , em dispela " wanpela bodi " i makim ol man i lotu tru long god .

translation.en: these were the disciples of jesus , known as christians . - ephesians 4 : 4 , 5 ; acts 11 : 26 .
translation.zu: em ol disaipel bilong jisas , ol i kolim ol kristen . - efesus 4 : 4 , 5 ; aposel 11 : 26 .

translation.en: instead of encouraging us to worship in a church , the bible encourages us to worship with the church , " the congregation of the living god , " the people who " worship with spirit and truth . "
translation.zu: baibel i no tok yumi mas mekim lotu insait long wanpela haus lotu , tasol em i tokim yumi long lotu wantaim sios , em kongrigesen " bilong god bilong i stap oltaim , " em ol man i " lotu long strong bilong holi spirit na long pasin i tru . "

translation.en: religious meetings approved by god should instruct people " in holy acts of conduct and deeds of godly devotion . "
translation.zu: ol miting bilong lotu em god i orait long en i mas skulim ol man long " wokabaut long pasin holi na bihainim olgeta pasin bilong god . "

translation.en: jehovah 's witnesses strive to follow the model of the first - century christians .
translation.zu: ol witnes bilong jehova i save wok strong long bihainim pasin bilong ol kristen bilong taim bilong ol aposel .

translation.en: this is in harmony with the apostle paul 's words : " let us consider one another to incite to love and fine works , not forsaking the gathering of ourselves together . " - hebrews 10 : 24 , 25 .
translation.zu: dispela i stret wantaim tok bilong aposel pol : " yumi wan wan i mas tingting tu long ol arapela manmeri bilong god , na painim rot bilong kirapim ol long laikim ol arapela na mekim ol gutpela pasin long ol . na yumi ol manmeri bilong god i no ken lusim pasin bilong bung wantaim . " - hibru 10 : 24 , 25 .

translation.en: young people ask . . .
translation.zu: ol yangpela i laik save . . .

translation.en: how can i turn him down ?
translation.zu: hau bai mi tok nogat long em ?

translation.en: " this summer a brother in my congregation fell in love with me .
translation.zu: " wanpela brata long kongrigesen bilong mi i gat laik long mi .

translation.en: i never really liked him .
translation.zu: mi no save laikim em tumas .

translation.en: the problem is , i didn 't know how to say no without hurting his feelings . " - elizabeth .
translation.zu: tasol mi no save hau bai mi tok nogat long em , nogut mi bagarapim bel bilong em . " - elizabeth .

translation.en: " can i get to know you better ? "
translation.zu: " mi gat laik long yu . " olsem wanem ?

translation.en: have you ever had a young man ask you that question ?
translation.zu: yu bin harim wanpela yangpela man i mekim dispela tok long yu ?

translation.en: as a young woman , * you may have felt happy and flattered - even thrilled !
translation.zu: yu wanpela yangpela meri , * na ating dispela kain tok i amamasim tru bel bilong yu !

translation.en: on the other hand , you may have also felt so confused that you didn 't know what to say in reply .
translation.zu: o ating yu bin tingting planti na yu no save bai yu bekim wanem tok long dispela man .

translation.en: when someone expresses romantic interest in you , it can unleash a wide range of emotions .
translation.zu: taim wanpela man i tokim yu olsem em i laikim yu , dispela inap kirapim yu long kisim kain kain tingting .

translation.en: this is especially true if you are old enough to get married and are thus in a position to respond to such attention !
translation.zu: ol dispela kain tingting bai kamap moa yet sapos yu bikpela pinis inap long yu ken marit na raun wantaim boipren !

translation.en: * even so , much of how you react will be influenced by who is asking the question .
translation.zu: * tasol wanem kain man i mekim dispela askim long yu , dispela bai stiaim tok yu bai bekim long em .

translation.en: if he is an emotionally mature person and you find yourself attracted to him , your answer may be easy .
translation.zu: sapos em i save bosim gut bel na yu pilim olsem yu laikim em , ating bai yu no hatwok long bekim tok bilong em .

translation.en: what , though , if he clearly does not have the qualifications to make a suitable mate ?
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem sapos em i no gat ol gutpela pasin bilong kamap wanpela gutpela poroman ?

translation.en: or what if , in spite of his possessing fine qualities , you are simply not interested in him ?
translation.zu: o olsem wanem sapos em i gat ol gutpela pasin , tasol bel bilong yu i no kirap long laikim em ?

translation.en: consider , too , the situation of a young woman who has dated someone for a while but has come to the realization that she does not want to spend the rest of her life with him .
translation.zu: tingim tu hevi bilong wanpela yangpela meri i raun wantaim boipren inap sampela taim pinis , tasol nau em i pilim olsem em i no laik stap wantaim dispela man long laip olgeta bilong em .

translation.en: instead of breaking things off , she continues going out with him .
translation.zu: tasol em i raun yet wantaim dispela man , na em i no lusim em .

translation.en: " how can i turn him down ? " she asks .
translation.zu: em i askim olsem : " hau bai mi tok nogat long em ? "

translation.en: when you are not interested romantically
translation.zu: taim bel i no kirap long laikim wanpela man

translation.en: back in patriarchal times , people apparently married individuals whom their parents chose .
translation.zu: long bipo tru , ol man i save maritim poroman em papamama i makim long ol .

translation.en: the bible has one stipulation - that a christian marry " only in the lord . " - 1 corinthians 7 : 39 .
translation.zu: baibel i gat wanpela lo - kristen " i mas maritim man i bilip long bikpela . " - 1 korin 7 : 39 .

translation.en: does this mean that you should marry any fellow believer who expresses interest in you or whom you have dated for a short while ?
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem ? dispela i makim olsem yu mas maritim tasol wanpela wanbilip i laikim yu o yu bin raun wantaim em inap sampela taim pinis ?

translation.en: well , consider the bible example of a young country girl from the middle eastern village of shunem .
translation.zu: tingim stori bilong baibel long wanpela yangpela meri bilong sunem long hap bilong midel - is .

translation.en: solomon , her king , saw her and fell deeply in love with her .
translation.zu: king bilong em , solomon , i lukim em na em i gat bikpela laik tru long em .

translation.en: when he tried to pursue her , however , the young girl not only rejected him but also pleaded with the court women who waited on the king : " try not to awaken or arouse love in me until it feels inclined . "
translation.zu: taim king solomon i strong long kisim em , dispela yangpela meri i sakim em na em i tokim ol meri i mekim wok long haus bilong king solomon olsem : " yupela i no ken kirapim bel bilong mitupela . dispela i samting bilong mitupela yet . "

translation.en: she was simply not interested in solomon romantically , for she was in love with a humble shepherd .
translation.zu: em i no gat laik long solomon , long wanem , em i laikim tumas wanpela wasman bilong sipsip i no gat nem .

translation.en: this teaches an important lesson for those considering marriage today : you cannot have romantic love for just anyone .
translation.zu: dispela stori i skulim ol lain i tingting long marit long wanpela bikpela samting : bel bilong yu i no inap kirap nating long laikim wanpela man .

translation.en: so even after dating someone for a while , a young woman might find that she is not interested in him romantically .
translation.zu: olsem na maski wanpela yangpela meri i raun wantaim boipren inap sampela taim pinis , em inap long pilim olsem em i no laikim moa dispela man .

translation.en: perhaps her feelings are based on some observable weakness in the other person 's character .
translation.zu: ating meri i no laikim em moa , long wanem , em i lukim sampela pasin kranki bilong dispela man .

translation.en: or maybe she does not find herself attracted to him .
translation.zu: o ating em i pilim olsem em i no gat laik moa long dispela man .

translation.en: * " there were so many doubts in my mind about him , " said tamara regarding the young man she was dating .
translation.zu: * tamara i tok long boipren bilong em olsem : " mi save tingting planti long planti pasin bilong em .

translation.en: " not just little doubts but ones that really bothered me to the point of giving me a tense and nervous feeling when i was with him . "
translation.zu: i no ol liklik samting tasol , nogat ; em ol bikpela samting na dispela i mekim na taim mi stap wantaim em , bel bilong mi i no save stap isi na mi save pret . "

translation.en: she later realized that because of these doubts , it was best to end the relationship .
translation.zu: em i tingting planti , olsem na bihain em i luksave olsem mobeta em i lusim dispela man .

translation.en: why it 's hard to say no
translation.zu: sampela as na i hatwok long tok nogat

translation.en: like elizabeth , mentioned at the outset , you may be afraid of hurting him .
translation.zu: olsem elizabeth , em yumi stori long em long kirap bilong dispela stori , ating yu pret long bagarapim bel bilong em .

translation.en: granted , we should be sensitive to the feelings of others .
translation.zu: yumi save olsem yumi mas tingim filings bilong narapela .

translation.en: the bible encourages christians to ' clothe themselves with the tender affections of compassion ' and to treat others as they would like to be treated .
translation.zu: baibel i kirapim ol kristen long " sori tru long ol arapela " na mekim pasin ol i laik bai ol narapela tu i mas mekim long ol . tasol olsem wanem ?

translation.en: does this mean , though , that you should carry on a pretense simply so that you do not disappoint or hurt this young man ?
translation.zu: dispela i makim olsem yu mas giaman na mekim olsem yu laikim dispela yangpela man , nogut yu bagarapim bel bilong em ?

translation.en: sooner or later he will no doubt find out how you really feel , and your failing to be honest and postponing the moment of reckoning will only add to the pain .
translation.zu: bihain em bai save long ol tingting tru bilong yu , na em bai bel hevi moa yet taim em i save olsem yu bin giamanim em na yu no bin tokim em kwik long dispela samting .

translation.en: even worse would be your marrying the young man simply because you feel sorry for him .
translation.zu: tasol em bai nogut moa sapos yu maritim dispela yangpela man , long wanem , yu no laik em i bel hevi .

translation.en: pity is a poor foundation on which to build a marriage .
translation.zu: marit i no inap stap strong sapos yu sori nating long em na yu marit .

translation.en: perhaps , though , you are wrestling with the thought , ' if i don 't marry him , i may not have a second chance . '
translation.zu: tasol nogut yu wok long tingting planti olsem , ' ating bai mi no gat narapela sans long marit sapos mi no maritim dispela man . '

translation.en: as an article in teen magazine put it , a girl might reason : " he 's not ' the one , ' but at least he 's someone - and you really don 't want to be alone . "
translation.zu: olsem wanpela stori long magasin teen i kamapim , yangpela meri inap tingting olsem : " em i no ' dispela man mi laik maritim ' tasol em i wanpela man - na mi no laik i stap wanpis . "

translation.en: admittedly , the longing for companionship is strong .
translation.zu: tru , yumi gat strongpela laik long wanpela i poromanim yumi .

translation.en: properly satisfying this desire , however , means more than having just anyone by your side .
translation.zu: tasol bilong inapim tru dispela laik i no olsem yu gat wanpela poroman na em tasol , nogat .

translation.en: it involves finding someone whom you can truly love and who is capable of fulfilling the scriptural responsibilities of marriage .
translation.zu: yu mas painim wanpela man em yu inap long laikim em tru , na em inap long mekim ol samting baibel i tok poroman marit i mas mekim .

translation.en: so do not be quick to settle for a mate !
translation.zu: olsem na yu no ken hariap long makim poroman bilong maritim !

translation.en: finally , some may continue dating even when it is clear that a young man has serious flaws .
translation.zu: tasol sampela meri i save pren yet wantaim yangpela man , maski ol i save pinis long ol bikpela pasin kranki bilong em .

translation.en: ' if i give him a little more time , ' they reason , ' he may change . '
translation.zu: ol i tingting olsem , ' ating em bai senisim pasin bilong em sapos mi givim sampela hap taim moa long em . '

translation.en: is this really sensible ?
translation.zu: yu ting dispela i gutpela tingting ?

translation.en: after all , poor habits and patterns of behavior are often strongly entrenched and extremely difficult to change .
translation.zu: planti taim ol pasin kranki bilong man i save pas strong long bel bilong em na i hatwok tru long senisim .

translation.en: and even if he makes some sudden and dramatic changes , can you really be sure that these changes are permanent ?
translation.zu: na sapos em i hariap long mekim sampela bikpela senis , yu ting em i senisim tru ol pasin bilong em ?

translation.en: in one such situation , a young woman named karen wisely decided to break things off with a young man when she realized that they did not share the same goals .
translation.zu: wanpela yangpela meri , karen , em i bihainim gutpela tingting na em i lusim boipren bilong em taim em i luksave olsem ol i no gat laik long mekim ol wankain samting .

translation.en: " it was hard , " she admits , " because i was physically attracted to him .
translation.zu: em i tok : " i hatwok , long wanem , mi laikim gutpela skin bilong em .

translation.en: but i knew it was the right thing to do . "
translation.zu: tasol mi save olsem samting mi mekim em i stret . "

translation.en: admittedly , turning someone down is no easy task .
translation.zu: tru , em i no liklik samting long tok nogat long wanpela man .

translation.en: like a package with a delicate item inside , the situation must be handled with care .
translation.zu: yu mas was gut tru , wankain olsem yu mas was gut taim yu holim wanpela bokis i gat glas samting i stap insait long en .

translation.en: here are a few suggestions that might prove helpful .
translation.zu: ol tok i stap daunbilo inap helpim yu .

translation.en: discuss the matter with your parents or with another mature one in the congregation .
translation.zu: toktok long dispela samting wantaim papamama bilong yu o wanpela strongpela brata o sista long kongrigesen .

translation.en: they might be able to help you determine if your expectations are perhaps a bit unrealistic .
translation.zu: ol inap helpim yu long skelim olsem ol samting yu wet long en inap kamap tru o nogat .

translation.en: be clear and direct .
translation.zu: tokaut stret na tok i mas klia .

translation.en: leave no room for doubt in his mind as to how you feel .
translation.zu: no ken mekim tok o pasin em inap givim tupela tingting long man .

translation.en: if necessary , state your refusal in stronger terms , such as , " i 'm sorry , but i 'm really not interested . "
translation.zu: sapos yu mas mekim , orait kamapim klia tingting bilong yu na mekim strongpela tok olsem , " harim , mi no gat laik liklik long yu . "

translation.en: be careful not to give the impression that you might change your mind with a little more persistence on his part .
translation.zu: was gut nogut tok o pasin bilong yu i mekim na em i ting olsem yu bai senisim tingting sapos em i toktok i go .

translation.en: making it clear that you have no romantic feelings for him should prevent any confusion and make it easier for him to get over his disappointment .
translation.zu: sapos yu kamapim klia olsem yu no laikim em , dispela bai mekim na em i no gat tupela tingting , na em bai no hatwok tumas long daunim bel hevi bilong em .

translation.en: balance honesty with tactfulness .
translation.zu: mekim tok tru long gutpela pasin isi .

translation.en: proverbs 12 : 18 states : " there exists the one speaking thoughtlessly as with the stabs of a sword . "
translation.zu: sindaun 12 : 18 i tok : " sapos man i no tingting gut na i tok , orait tok bilong en inap bagarapim bel bilong narapela man olsem bainat i sutim em . "

translation.en: while being forthright is important , the bible says that our utterances must be " with graciousness , seasoned with salt . " - colossians 4 : 6 .
translation.zu: tru , em i bikpela samting long yumi mas tokaut stret long ol samting , tasol baibel i tok yumi mas mekim ol ' gutpela tok em ol man i save laik long harim . ' - kolosi 4 : 6 .

translation.en: stick to your decision .
translation.zu: bihainim tok bilong yu .

translation.en: well - intentioned friends , who likely know little of the reasons behind your decision , may pressure you to give the relationship another chance .
translation.zu: ating ol gutpela pren em ol i laik helpim yu tasol ol i no save long as na yu tok nogat long wanpela yangpela man , ol inap subim yu long senisim tingting bilong yu .

translation.en: but ultimately you have to live with your decision - not your well - meaning friends .
translation.zu: tasol wanem samting bai kamap long dispela , yu yet bai karim hevi bilong en - i no ol gutpela pren bilong yu .

translation.en: act in harmony with your words .
translation.zu: mekim ol samting i stret wantaim tok bilong yu .

translation.en: formerly the two of you may have been good friends , and it is only natural to wish that things could go back to the way they were .
translation.zu: ating pastaim yutupela i bin pren gut wantaim , olsem na nau yu laik bai yutupela i ken stap yet olsem ol gutpela pren .

translation.en: but usually that is neither practical nor possible .
translation.zu: tasol planti taim dispela samting i no inap kamap .

translation.en: his feelings for you have become romantic .
translation.zu: em i laikim yu olsem man i save laikim meri .

translation.en: is it realistic to think that he can simply ignore those feelings and pretend that nothing has happened ?
translation.zu: yu ting em inap lusim tingting long dispela laik bilong em na mekim olsem i no gat wanpela samting i bin kamap namel long yutupela ?

translation.en: so while it is obviously better for you to treat each other cordially , regularly talking on the phone or spending a lot of time together in social situations will likely only fuel his misery .
translation.zu: tru , yutupela i mas mekim gutpela pasin long narapela narapela , tasol sapos yutupela i toktok olgeta taim long telefon o lusim bikpela hap taim long stap wantaim long ol bung samting , dispela bai mekim em i bel hevi moa yet .

translation.en: it could amount to toying with his emotions , and that would not be kind on your part .
translation.zu: dispela i olsem yu wok long pilai long filings bilong em na yu no mekim gutpela pasin long em .

translation.en: the apostle paul urged christians to " speak truth " with one another .
translation.zu: aposel pol i kirapim ol kristen long " mekim tok tru tasol " long ol narapela .

translation.en: doing so may be hard , but it may help you both to move on with your lives .
translation.zu: ating i hatwok long mekim olsem , tasol dispela inap helpim yutupela wantaim long i stap amamas .

translation.en: a glimpse of paradise
translation.zu: liklik hap bilong paradais

translation.en: elephants , tigers , and gazelles do not usually roam around abandoned mines .
translation.zu: ol elefan , taiga , na gasel ol i no save stap na raun long ol olpela main .

translation.en: surface mining has a reputation for leaving a landscape scarred and desolate , not suitable as a refuge for exotic animals .
translation.zu: wok bilong main i save bagarapim graun na i no gutpela bilong ol wel animal i ken i stap long en .

translation.en: but in the cabárceno nature park in the spanish province of cantabria , a unique experiment has shown that even the most unpromising sites can be beautified and converted into a virtual paradise .
translation.zu: tasol long wanpela bikpela pak bilong ol animal ( cabárceno nature park ) long cantabria , spen , wanpela narapela kain wok ol i bin mekim i soim olsem ol hap i bagarap olgeta ol inap kamap naispela ples tru olsem wanpela ples paradais .

translation.en: for some 3,000 years , cabárceno was renowned for its high - quality iron ore .
translation.zu: inap 3,000 yia samting , cabárceno i gat nem long kamapim ol gutpela na strongpela ain .

translation.en: since the ore was found near the surface , the ancient miners laboriously removed the rich granular deposits with picks and shovels , leaving behind hundreds of rocky turrets that did not contain any ore .
translation.zu: ol ston i gat ain long en i no stap daun tumas , olsem na ol dispela lain bilong wok long main long bipo , ol i wok strong tru long brukim ol ston long ol tul olsem pik na savol bilong ol .

translation.en: with the arrival of the industrial revolution , however , modern machinery was used to demolish what was left of the mountain in order to recover the precious ore that still remained .
translation.zu: olsem na dispela hap i gat ol hul na baret i stap nabaut nabaut na sampela bikpela ston i olsem ol liklik maunten i gat sap bilong en na i luk olsem ol man i bin katim , tasol nogat ; wara yet i bin mekim na ol i kamap olsem .

translation.en: finally , when the bulldozers had extracted all the mineral wealth that the mountain had to offer , the mine closed its gates in 1989 .
translation.zu: bihain , taim ol buldosa i kamautim pinis olgeta ain i stap long dispela maunten , ol i pasim dispela main long 1989 .

translation.en: undoubtedly , it is easier to ruin a landscape than to restore it .
translation.zu: tru , i no hatwok long bagarapim graun , tasol bilong stretim bek i gat bikpela hatwok tru .

translation.en: undeterred , the local authorities of cantabria took up the challenge of creating a zoological park out of a landscape that looked more like a moonscape .
translation.zu: tasol maski i gat bikpela hatwok long stretim bek graun , ol bikman bilong cantabria i kirapim dispela bikpela wok bilong mekim dispela ples nogut i kamap wanpela gutpela ples ol animal i ken i stap long en .

translation.en: finally , specially selected animals were placed in large enclosures to complete the transformation .
translation.zu: bilong pinisim dispela wok , ol i makim sampela animal na putim ol long ol bikpela banis insait long dispela pak .

translation.en: not a few have exclaimed excitedly : " this is a paradise ! "
translation.zu: planti ol i save amamas na tok : " dispela em i wanpela paradais ! "

translation.en: the word " paradise " is well chosen , since it was used by ancient persians and greeks to refer to a large , well - watered park of unspoiled beauty where animals could graze in relative freedom .
translation.zu: dispela tok " paradais " i stret long dispela hap , long wanem , ol persia na grik bilong bipo ol i save kolim dispela tok bilong makim wanpela hap i gat wara na ol diwai samting i kamap gut na ol animal inap raun gut long en .

translation.en: at a time when so many natural landscapes have been ruined , it is refreshing to visit a place where beauty has been restored and embellished .
translation.zu: ol man i bin bagarapim planti hap bilong graun , olsem na taim yumi go lukim wanpela hap em ol i bin stretim na bilasim gut , dispela i save givim bikpela amamas long yumi .

translation.en: moreover , what has been achieved on a small scale at cabárceno well illustrates what this marvelous earth is capable of .
translation.zu: na tu , wok ol i bin kamapim long cabárceno i makim olsem dispela graun olgeta inap kamap wanpela gutpela ples paradais .

translation.en: elephants and gazelles graze on lush pastures that carpet an area formerly stripped bare by excavators .
translation.zu: ol elefan na ol gasel i kaikai naispela grinpela gras long hap em pastaim ol man bilong digim graun i bagarapim olgeta .

translation.en: and this transformation was achieved within a few short years !
translation.zu: ol i kamapim dispela bikpela senis insait long sampela yia tasol !

translation.en: the bible promises that one day , in harmony with god 's original purpose for mankind , the whole earth will be a paradise .
translation.zu: baibel i tok promis olsem i gat wanpela taim bai kamap na olgeta hap bilong graun bai kamap wanpela ples paradais na dispela i stret wantaim laik bilong god long pastaim yet .

translation.en: the bible 's viewpoint
translation.zu: baibel i tok wanem ?

translation.en: are dreams messages from god ?
translation.zu: yu ting ol driman i kam long god ?

translation.en: reportedly , inventor elias howe 's idea for the design of the sewing machine was based on a dream .
translation.zu: ol man i tok olsem saveman elias howe i kisim save long wokim masin bilong samap long rot bilong wanpela driman .

translation.en: the composer mozart said that many of the themes for his music came to him in dreams .
translation.zu: man bilong raitim musik , em mozart , i tok em i kisim ol bikpela tok bilong ol musik em i raitim long rot bilong ol driman .

translation.en: the chemist friedrich august kekule von stradonitz likewise claimed to have discovered the shape of the benzene molecule in a dream .
translation.zu: saveman friedrich august kekule von stradonitz i tok , em i kisim save long samting bilong molekul i stap long bensin long rot bilong wanpela driman .

translation.en: such occurrences are hardly unique .
translation.zu: i gat planti kain stori olsem .

translation.en: the bible contains several accounts in which dreams are described as an important source of information - a form of divine communication .
translation.zu: baibel i gat planti stori i kamapim olsem ol driman em i wanpela bikpela rot bilong kisim ol tok - wanpela rot bilong god long toktok wantaim ol man .

translation.en: in the bible , god - inspired dreams were always induced for a specific reason .
translation.zu: long baibel , i gat as na god i kamapim ol driman .

translation.en: true , at times the dreamer could not immediately understand the meaning of the dream .
translation.zu: tru , sampela taim man i kisim driman i no inap save kwik long mining bilong en .

translation.en: in many cases , however , the " revealer of secrets " himself provided the explanation so that there would be no doubt as to the meaning of the dream .
translation.zu: planti taim man bilong " kamapim as bilong ol samting i hait " em yet i save kamapim as bilong ol driman bambai ol man i ken save long mining bilong en .

translation.en: at times , dreams were used by god to protect key individuals in the outworking of his purpose .
translation.zu: sampela taim god i save yusim ol driman bilong lukautim ol man em ol i gat bikpela wok bilong kamapim laik bilong em .

translation.en: the recipients of such dreams were not necessarily servants of god .
translation.zu: i no olgeta man i kisim ol kain driman olsem ol i wokman bilong god .

translation.en: this gave jesus ' adoptive father , joseph , enough time to flee to egypt with his family , in response to the direction that he too had received in a dream .
translation.zu: olsem na josep em waspapa bilong jisas , em i gat taim long bihainim ol tok em i kisim long rot bilong driman , na ranawe i go long isip wantaim famili bilong em .

translation.en: this saved the life of young jesus . - matthew 2 : 13 - 15 .
translation.zu: long dispela rot pikinini jisas i abrusim bagarap . - matyu 2 : 13 - 15 .

translation.en: centuries earlier , an egyptian pharaoh had dreams of seven healthy ears of grain and seven fat - fleshed cows contrasted with seven sickly ears of grain and seven emaciated cows .
translation.zu: sampela handet yia paslain , wanpela king bilong isip i driman long 7 - pela bikpela het bilong rais na 7 - pela patpela bulmakau , na bihain em i driman long 7 - pela het bilong rais i liklik tru na 7 - pela bulmakau i bun nating .

translation.en: joseph , with divine help , interpreted the dreams correctly : egypt would enjoy seven years of abundance followed by seven years of famine .
translation.zu: god i helpim josep long kamapim stret mining bilong ol dispela driman : inap 7 - pela yia isip bai gat planti kaikai tru , na bihain bai gat 7 - pela yia bilong bikpela hangre .

translation.en: this proved instrumental in preserving the descendants of abraham and in bringing them to egypt . - genesis , chapter 41 ; ge 45 : 5 - 8 .
translation.zu: long dispela rot , ol lain tumbuna bilong abraham i abrusim bagarap na ol i go sindaun long isip . - stat , sapta 41 ; 45 : 5 - 8 .

translation.en: king nebuchadnezzar of babylon likewise had a dream .
translation.zu: king bilong babilon , nebukatnesar , em tu i bin kisim wanpela driman .

translation.en: it foretold the rise and fall of the future world powers that would have a direct impact on god 's people .
translation.zu: dispela driman i tok profet long ol bikpela gavman bilong graun bai kamap na pundaun , na dispela bai mekim sampela samting long ol manmeri bilong god .

translation.en: this prophetic dream had a larger fulfillment , pinpointing the establishment of the messianic kingdom , through which god would accomplish his will . - daniel 4 : 10 - 37 .
translation.zu: dispela driman i olsem tok profet i gat bikpela truim bilong en , na i makim kingdom bilong god long han bilong krais bai kamap , na long rot bilong dispela kingdom god bai kamapim laik bilong em . - daniel 4 : 10 - 37 .

translation.en: yes , god did communicate with some people through dreams .
translation.zu: yes , god i bin toktok wantaim sampela man long rot bilong ol driman .

translation.en: but the bible indicates that this was quite rare .
translation.zu: tasol baibel i kamapim olsem dispela samting i bin kamap wan wan taim tasol .

translation.en: dreams were never the principal form of divine communication .
translation.zu: ol driman i no nambawan rot bilong god long toktok wantaim ol man .

translation.en: there were many faithful servants of god who never received messages from god in dreams .
translation.zu: planti gutpela wokman bilong god ol i no bin kisim sampela tok i kam long god long rot bilong ol driman .

translation.en: god 's use of dreams to communicate with man can be compared to his parting of the red sea .
translation.zu: yumi ken tok olsem pasin bilong god long yusim ol driman bilong toktok wantaim ol man i wankain olsem samting em i mekim bilong brukim solwara retsi long tupela hap .

translation.en: we know that he did it once , but that is certainly not his usual way of dealing with his people . - exodus 14 : 21 .
translation.zu: yumi save olsem em i bin mekim olsem inap wanpela taim tasol , tasol em i no save mekim olsem long olgeta taim long ol lain bilong em . - kisim bek 14 : 21 .

translation.en: the apostle paul acknowledged that in his day god 's spirit was operating on his servants in many extraordinary ways .
translation.zu: aposel pol i tokaut olsem long taim bilong em spirit bilong god i stap long ol wokman bilong em na ol i mekim planti narakain samting .

translation.en: paul said : " to one there is given through the spirit speech of wisdom , to another speech of knowledge according to the same spirit , to another faith by the same spirit , to another gifts of healings by that one spirit , to yet another operations of powerful works , to another prophesying , to another discernment of inspired utterances , to another different tongues , and to another interpretation of tongues . "
translation.zu: na long narapela man dispela wanpela spirit tasol i givim strong bilong autim sampela kain save bilong god long ol manmeri . na narapela man i kisim strongpela bilip long dispela wanpela spirit tasol . na long dispela wanpela spirit tasol narapela i kisim strong bilong mekim orait ol sikman . na narapela i kisim strong bilong wokim mirakel . na narapela i kisim strong bilong autim tok profet . na narapela i kisim save bilong skelim ol kain kain spirit . na narapela i kisim save bilong mekim tok long kain kain tok ples . na narapela i kisim save bilong tanim ol dispela tok ples . '

translation.en: although divinely inspired dreams are not specifically mentioned , a number of christians evidently received divinely inspired dreams as one of the gifts of the spirit in fulfillment of joel 2 : 28 . - acts 16 : 9 , 10 .
translation.zu: tru , ol i no mekim sampela tok long ol driman god i givim long ol kristen , tasol yumi ken ting olsem sampela kristen i bin kisim ol driman i kam long god , olsem wanpela presen i truim tok bilong joel 2 : 28 . - aposel 16 : 9 , 10 .

translation.en: however , the apostle said regarding these special gifts : " whether there are gifts of prophesying , they will be done away with ; whether there are tongues , they will cease ; whether there is knowledge , it will be done away with . "
translation.zu: tasol aposel pol i tok long ol dispela gutpela presen olsem : " wok bilong autim tok bilong god olsem profet , em bai i pinis . na ol kain kain tok ples bai i pinis . na olgeta kain save bilong ol man , em tu bai i pinis . "

translation.en: evidently included among the gifts that would be " done away with " were the various forms of divine communication .
translation.zu: olsem na yumi ken save olsem sampela rot god i save yusim bilong toktok wantaim ol man ol tu " bai i pinis . "

translation.en: after the death of the apostles , god ceased to impart these special gifts to his servants .
translation.zu: taim ol aposel i dai pinis , god i no givim moa ol dispela narapela kain gutpela presen long ol wokman bilong em .

translation.en: the bible sheds no light on such issues .
translation.zu: baibel i no stori long dispela samting .

translation.en: however , to those who insist on seeking divine communications in their dreams , the bible does provide a warning .
translation.zu: tasol baibel i givim wanpela tok lukaut long ol man i laik kisim ol tok i kam long god long rot bilong ol driman .

translation.en: at zechariah 10 : 2 , it states : " the practicers of divination , . . . valueless dreams are what they keep speaking . "
translation.zu: long sekaraia 10 : 2 , baibel i tok : " sampela man i save autim as bilong driman , na ol tu i giamanim yupela . "

translation.en: god also warns against looking for omens .
translation.zu: god i givim tok lukaut tu long pasin bilong glasman .

translation.en: rather , they view dreams simply as something experienced during sleep .
translation.zu: tasol ol i save olsem ol driman i wanpela samting i save kamap taim man i slip .

translation.en: though deaf and blind , i found security
translation.zu: maski mi yaupas na aipas , mi stap gut

translation.en: as told by janice adams
translation.zu: stori bilong janice adams

translation.en: then , while in college , i was shocked when i was told that i would become blind .
translation.zu: bihain , taim mi stap long skul koles , mi kirap nogut taim mi kisim toksave olsem mi bai kamap aipas .

translation.en: immediately , my eyes caught the phrase that those both deaf and blind are the loneliest people in the world .
translation.zu: kwiktaim mi lukim dispela hap tok olsem ol man i yaupas na aipas ol i tarangu lain i stap wanpis .

translation.en: i burst into tears .
translation.zu: aiwara bilong mi i pundaun .

translation.en: i was born in des moines , iowa , u.s.a . , on july 11 , 1954 , the only child of dale and phyllis den hartog .
translation.zu: mama i karim mi long des moines , iowa , amerika , long julai 11 , 1954 , na mi wanpela pikinini tasol bilong dale na phyllis den hartog .

translation.en: little did my parents realize that both of them were carriers of a genetic condition known as usher 's syndrome , which is characterized by congenital deafness with progressive visual loss .
translation.zu: papamama i no save olsem ol i gat wanpela sik i stap long blut bilong ol , ol i kolim usher 's syndrome , em i save mekim na mama bai karim pikinini i yaupas na isi isi em bai kamap aipas .

translation.en: my parents did not at first suspect any problem with me .
translation.zu: pastaim papamama i ting olsem mi orait tasol .

translation.en: perhaps this was because i had a little residual hearing of low frequencies and would sometimes respond to sounds .
translation.zu: ating ol i ting olsem , long wanem , mi inap harim ol liklik pairap samting .

translation.en: however , when i did not develop speech , they knew something was seriously wrong .
translation.zu: tasol taim mi no lain long toktok , nau ol i save olsem mi gat bikpela hevi .

translation.en: the doctor finally diagnosed my deafness when i was about the age of three .
translation.zu: taim mi gat 3 - pela krismas samting dokta i painimaut olsem mi yaupas .

translation.en: the news devastated my parents .
translation.zu: dispela toksave i bagarapim tru bel bilong papamama .

translation.en: yet , they were determined that i receive the best possible education .
translation.zu: tasol ol i tingting strong long mi mas kisim gutpela skul .

translation.en: i was put in an excellent preschool for the hard - of - hearing .
translation.zu: ol i putim mi long wanpela gutpela pri - skul bilong ol pikinini i gat hevi long harim gut tok .

translation.en: sent away to a special school
translation.zu: ol i salim mi go long wanpela kain skul

translation.en: my parents chose to enter me in the central institute for the deaf ( cid ) , in st .
translation.zu: papamama i laik putim mi long wanpela kain skul koles bilong ol yaupas em central institute for the deaf ( cid ) , long st .

translation.en: louis , missouri .
translation.zu: louis , missouri .

translation.en: despite the great financial cost and the heartbreak of sending me away at the age of five , they figured that this was my best hope for a successful , happy life .
translation.zu: papamama i mas lusim bikpela mani long baim skul na ol i bel hevi tru long salim mi go taim mi gat 5 - pela krismas , tasol ol i ting olsem em i gutpela rot bilong helpim mi long stap amamas long bihain .

translation.en: my parents and i really could not communicate at that time .
translation.zu: long dispela taim mi na papamama i no inap toktok gut wantaim .

translation.en: i watched mother pack my clothes in a trunk .
translation.zu: mi lukluk i stap taim mama i pulapim ol klos bilong mi long wanpela bokis .

translation.en: at cid , i remember seeing the other little girls with no mothers and thinking , ' oh , i won 't have to stay here because i have a mommy and a daddy . '
translation.zu: taim mipela i kamap long skul cid , mi lukim ol narapela liklik meri ol i no gat mama na mi tingting , ' mi no gat wok long stap long hia , long wanem , mi gat mama na papa . '

translation.en: when it came time for my parents to leave , they tried to explain that they would come back in a few months .
translation.zu: taim papamama i laik lusim mi , ol i traim long toksave long mi olsem ol bai kam bek bihain long 3 - pela mun samting .

translation.en: i cried and cried and held onto them tightly , but the housemother pried me away so that they could leave .
translation.zu: mi krai nogut tru na holimpas tupela , tasol tisa bilong dispela skul i pulim mi go bek bambai papamama i ken i go .

translation.en: alone with the other girls on our first night at the school , i tried to comfort a crying girl by pretending to talk to her , although i couldn 't actually speak at the time .
translation.zu: long namba wan nait mipela ol pikinini i stap long skul , wanpela liklik meri i krai na mi laik mekim gut bel bilong em , olsem na mi mekim olsem mi toktok long em tasol long dispela taim mi no save long toktok .

translation.en: the housemother scolded me and set up a divider between us so that we could not try to communicate .
translation.zu: meri bilong lukautim mipela i krosim mi na em i putim wanpela banis namel long mipela bambai mipela i no ken traim long toktok wantaim .

translation.en: the wall remained there from then on .
translation.zu: kirap long dispela taim banis i stap olsem tasol .

translation.en: perhaps my parents loved me after all , but i reasoned that it was my fault that i had failed preschool .
translation.zu: ating papamama i laikim mi , tasol mi skelim olsem em asua bilong mi yet na mi no bin winim pri - skul .

translation.en: i was determined to succeed this time and one day return to my family .
translation.zu: nau mi tingting strong long winim skul na go bek long famili bilong mi .

translation.en: the education at cid was excellent .
translation.zu: mipela i kisim gutpela skul tru long cid .

translation.en: all the subjects taught in regular schools were emphasized as well .
translation.zu: mipela i kisim wankain skul olsem ol narapela pikinini i kisim .

translation.en: while i believe that the oral - only approach , as it is called , does not work well for many deaf children , it worked for me , and i felt successful .
translation.zu: mi ting olsem pasin bilong lukim maus tasol bilong save long tok ol narapela i mekim , dispela i no inap helpim planti yaupas pikinini tasol i helpim mi , na mi pilim olsem mi bin mekim gut skul .

translation.en: my parents and the school were extremely satisfied with my success .
translation.zu: papamama na ol tisa bilong mi ol i amamas tru long mi mekim gut skul bilong mi .

translation.en: still , i longed to be back home .
translation.zu: tasol mi gat bikpela laik yet long i go bek long haus .

translation.en: each summer vacation i would beg my parents to let me stay home and go to school in iowa , but there were still no local programs .
translation.zu: long taim mi go long malolo , mi save strong long papamama i mas larim mi stap long haus na go skul long iowa , tasol i no gat ol gutpela program bilong ol yaupas long iowa .

translation.en: after i returned to school , mother would send me a letter each day and include a stick of chewing gum .
translation.zu: taim mi go bek long skul , mama i save salim pas long mi long olgeta de na em i save putim wanpela stik pike insait long en .

translation.en: rather than chew it , i would save each piece , and i especially cherished them when feeling depressed .
translation.zu: mi no save kaikai dispela pike , mi save larim i stap na em i save mekim gut bel bilong mi taim mi bel hevi .

translation.en: finally , when i was ten , my parents brought me home .
translation.zu: papamama i kisim mi go bek long haus taim mi gat 10 - pela krismas .

translation.en: i was so happy and felt so secure to be with my family !
translation.zu: mi amamas tru taim mi stap wantaim famili bilong mi na bel bilong mi i stap isi na mi no pret !

translation.en: i enrolled in a local special school in des moines for children with hearing loss .
translation.zu: mi go long wanpela skul bilong ol yaupas pikinini long des moines .

translation.en: eventually i was mainstreamed into regular classes because i was a fairly good speech - reader and had developed intelligible speech .
translation.zu: bihain ol i putim mi long skul bilong olgeta pikinini , long wanem , mi save gut long pasin bilong lukim maus bilong ol narapela na kisim tok bilong ol .

translation.en: yet , there were many challenges with my new situation .
translation.zu: na tu , toktok bilong mi yet i kamap gutpela liklik .

translation.en: in the dormitory at cid , i had felt accepted by my deaf peers .
translation.zu: taim mi stap long skul cid , ol wanlain bilong mi em ol i yaupas , ol i orait long mi .

translation.en: but now , when i had to interact with more than one person at a time , my speechreading skills could not keep up with the fast communication .
translation.zu: tasol nau , save bilong mi long lukim maus bilong man i toktok , dispela i no helpim mi taim ol narapela i bung na mekim toktok i go i kam .

translation.en: so i would be left out .
translation.zu: olsem na ol narapela i no save toktok wantaim mi .

translation.en: this led to my seeking the approval of teenage boys , which resulted in becoming involved in compromising situations .
translation.zu: olsem na mi traim long mekim ol samting na bai ol yangpela man i ken orait long mi , na dispela i putim planti hevi long mi .

translation.en: and i didn 't know how to say no .
translation.zu: tasol mi no save long olsem wanem mi inap sakim ol dispela samting .

translation.en: when i was 14 , i was raped ; but i told no one .
translation.zu: wanpela man i reipim mi taim mi gat 14 krismas ; tasol mi no tokaut long dispela samting .

translation.en: with my hearing aids , i could enjoy music somewhat , but my choice of music was questionable .
translation.zu: ol liklik masin ol i putim insait long yau bilong mi i helpim mi long amamas long ol musik , tasol mi no harim ol gutpela musik .

translation.en: i listened to loud acid rock .
translation.zu: mi harim ol strongpela rok - musik nogut .

translation.en: i still feel deep regret when i look back on what i did during those turbulent years and on the pain it caused my family and me .
translation.zu: bel bilong mi i save bagarap tru taim mi tingim bek ol samting mi bin mekim na bikpela bel hevi dispela pasin i kamapim long mi yet na famili bilong mi .

translation.en: efforts to improve my life
translation.zu: wok strong long i stap gut

translation.en: throughout this period , i had a continuing thirst for learning and a desire to be creative .
translation.zu: long taim bilong ol dispela hevi , mi gat laik yet long kisim save long ol nupela samting , na mi laik wokim ol naispela samting .

translation.en: i wanted more out of my life than what the future held for my friends who were only into drugs .
translation.zu: ol pren bilong mi ol i save tingting tasol long kisim drak , tasol mi laik mekim sampela samting moa long i stap bilong mi .

translation.en: so i registered in a regular college near home to pursue my interest in art .
translation.zu: olsem na mi go long wanpela koles i stap klostu bilong kisim sampela save moa long wokim ol piksa samting .

translation.en: eventually i transferred to the national technical institute for the deaf in rochester , new york , to major in ceramic art .
translation.zu: bihain mi go long narapela koles em national technical institute for the deaf long rochester , new york , bilong kisim sampela save moa long wokim ol glas samting .

translation.en: although my eyesight was progressively getting worse - a fact that i somehow refused to recognize - i felt as though my life was heading in the right direction .
translation.zu: maski ai bilong mi i wok long bagarap hariap - em samting mi no laik tru long tingim - mi pilim olsem i stap bilong mi i wok long kamap gutpela .

translation.en: the institution was ill prepared to handle my needs , and i had to leave .
translation.zu: dispela koles i no gat ol gutpela program samting bilong helpim mi , olsem na mi lusim skul .

translation.en: what would i do now ?
translation.zu: nau bai mi mekim wanem ?

translation.en: although saddened by the prospect of soon becoming blind , i was determined to find a way to live independently and not end up as , in the words of the article the counselor gave me , ' one of the loneliest people in the world . '
translation.zu: mi save olsem klostu bai mi kamap aipas na mi bel hevi long dispela , tasol mi tingting strong long painim rot bilong lukautim mi yet . mi no laik bai ol tok i stap long nius em tisa i bin givim mi long koles i kamap tru long mi olsem ' wanpela tarangu meri i stap wanpis . '

translation.en: i returned home to iowa to learn how to read braille and how to use a cane for mobility .
translation.zu: mi go bek long ples long iowa bilong lainim pasin bilong ritim tok long rait brel na long yusim stik bilong wokabaut .

translation.en: move to washington , d.c .
translation.zu: mi go long washington , d.c .

translation.en: gallaudet university in washington , d.c . , the world 's only liberal arts college for the deaf , had specialized services for deaf - blind students .
translation.zu: wanpela koles bilong ol yaupas em yunivesiti bilong gallaudet long washington , d.c . , na em i gat ol gutpela samting bilong helpim ol sumatin i yaupas na aipas wantaim .

translation.en: once again , i felt good to be able to succeed academically .
translation.zu: mi amamas olsem mi inap long winim skul .

translation.en: yet , i still felt socially isolated from my peers .
translation.zu: tasol mi pilim yet olsem mi no insait long ol amamas wantaim ol wanlain bilong mi .

translation.en: robbed by my visual loss , i had learned sign language just in time to start to feel as though i belonged to a group , the deaf community .
translation.zu: isi isi ai bilong mi i wok long bagarap , tasol mi bin lain kwik long pasin bilong yusim han bilong mekim ol tok bilong ol yaupas , olsem na mi pilim olsem mi insait long wanpela lain , em ol lain bilong ol yaupas .

translation.en: the sign language i use is the same as the one other deaf people use .
translation.zu: mi save bihainim wankain pasin bilong yusim han olsem ol narapela yaupas i save mekim .

translation.en: i began to wonder if i would ever be truly accepted by any group of people .
translation.zu: mi kirap long tingting planti , olsem wanpela lain bai orait long mi o nogat .

translation.en: search for true religion
translation.zu: wok long painim lotu i tru

translation.en: religion had not provided me with comfort while i was growing up .
translation.zu: lotu i no bin mekim gut bel bilong mi long taim mi wok long kamap bikpela .

translation.en: and in college , even though i took a course in religion , i never received answers to my many questions .
translation.zu: na long taim mi stap long koles , mi mekim wanpela kos long lotu , tasol mi no kisim wanpela bekim long ol planti askim bilong mi .

translation.en: during this time i was unhappy with my relationships , so i began to pray to god for his guidance .
translation.zu: long dispela taim , mi no amamas long pasin bilong mi long poromanim ol narapela , olsem na mi beten askim god long stiaim mi .

translation.en: in 1981 , i moved back to gallaudet university to get my master 's degree in rehabilitation counseling .
translation.zu: long 1981 , mi go bek long yunivesiti bilong gallaudet long kisim bikpela mak moa long wok bilong helpim ol man long stretim pasin bilong ol .

translation.en: i continued to pray for help to find the right church .
translation.zu: mi beten yet long god i mas helpim mi long painim lotu i tru .

translation.en: several people offered to take me to their churches , but for one reason or another , they did not follow through .
translation.zu: sampela i tok long kisim mi go long lotu bilong ol , tasol long taim ol i laik kisim mi go , sampela samting i kamap i pasim ol long mekim olsem .

translation.en: then i met bill , who could hear normally and was also in graduate school .
translation.zu: bihain mi bungim bill , em i no yaupas , na em tu i skul long yunivesiti .

translation.en: he discovered , quite by chance , that i shared his interest in the bible , and he told me that he was learning all kinds of amazing things from jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: em i painimaut olsem mi gat wankain laik olsem em long save long baibel na em i tokim mi olsem em i wok long kisim save long ol gutpela samting long ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: my first impression was that jehovah 's witnesses were some jewish cult , an opinion that i found to be common to many deaf people .
translation.zu: namba wan tingting bilong mi em olsem ol witnes bilong jehova i wanpela liklik lain lotu bilong juda , na planti yaupas i gat dispela tingting .

translation.en: bill assured me that they were not , and he said that the best way to find out about them would be to attend one of their meetings .
translation.zu: tasol bill i helpim mi long save dispela tingting i no stret , na em i tok olsem gutpela rot bilong save long ol em long go long wanpela miting bilong ol .

translation.en: i really did not want to go , but i remembered my prayer .
translation.zu: mi no laik tru long i go , tasol mi tingim beten bilong mi .

translation.en: i felt right at home
translation.zu: bel bilong mi i stap isi tru

translation.en: i was very nervous as we drove to the meeting .
translation.zu: mi pret nogut tru taim mipela i ran yet long ka bilong i go long miting .

translation.en: we both wore blue jeans and flannel shirts .
translation.zu: mitupela wantaim i putim jin trausis na ol siot bilong raun .

translation.en: i was glad we arrived a little late because then we did not have to interact with anyone before the meeting .
translation.zu: mipela i kamap leit liklik na mi amamas long dispela , long wanem , mipela i no gat wok long toktok wantaim ol narapela paslain long miting i kirap .

translation.en: although i did not fully understand what was going on , i was impressed by two things : the speaker frequently used the bible , and the children , who sat with their parents , actively participated in the meetings .
translation.zu: maski mi no save gut long ol samting i kamap , mi kirap nogut long tupela samting : planti taim man bilong mekim tok i kamapim ol tok bilong baibel , na ol pikinini i sindaun wantaim papamama bilong ol na ol tu i insait long ol miting .

translation.en: we were the only two white people in the kingdom hall .
translation.zu: long dispela haus kingdom , mitupela tasol i waitskin .

translation.en: although i was not aware that i had any prejudice against blacks , i was initially uncomfortable being there .
translation.zu: mi no save olsem mi gat tingting nogut long ol blakskin , tasol taim mipela i kamap long haus kingdom mi bin pilim olsem mi no amamas tumas .

translation.en: however , the message of bible truth was too compelling to let my discomfort stop me .
translation.zu: tasol strongpela laik bilong kisim ol tok i tru bilong baibel i helpim mi long daunim dispela tingting .

translation.en: we started to attend the meetings regularly .
translation.zu: mipela i kirap long go oltaim long ol miting .

translation.en: even more of a challenge for me was that there were no deaf people in that congregation .
translation.zu: tasol hevi bilong mi em olsem i no gat wanpela yaupas long dispela kongrigesen .

translation.en: so when we heard about another congregation that had some deaf attending , we started to go there .
translation.zu: olsem na taim mipela i kisim save long narapela kongrigesen i gat sampela yaupas long en , mipela i kirap na go long en .

translation.en: again , at this new congregation , we were the only whites in attendance .
translation.zu: long dispela kongrigesen tu , mitupela tasol i waitskin .

translation.en: yet , we were made to feel right at home .
translation.zu: tasol ol i mekim gut long mipela na mipela stap amamas .

translation.en: we accepted an offer of a bible study .
translation.zu: mitupela i orait long mekim baibel - stadi .

translation.en: for the first time in my life , i came to feel close to jehovah as the true god .
translation.zu: long namba wan taim long laip bilong mi , mi pilim olsem mi pas gut wantaim jehova , olsem trupela god .

translation.en: at the same time , bill and i became close friends .
translation.zu: na tu , mitupela bill i kamap gutpela pren .

translation.en: i knew that he liked me , but i was surprised when he asked me to marry him .
translation.zu: mi save olsem em i laikim mi , tasol mi kirap nogut taim em i askim mi long maritim em .

translation.en: happily , i said yes .
translation.zu: mi amamas na mi orait .

translation.en: bill was baptized shortly after our wedding , and i followed him a few months later , on february 26 , 1983 .
translation.zu: bill i kisim baptais bihain liklik long mipela i marit , na sampela mun bihain mi kisim baptais long februeri 26 , 1983 .

translation.en: finding the security i sought
translation.zu: mi painim pinis bel isi

translation.en: initially i feared that i would be isolated because our congregation had only two other deaf people and they were not adept at communicating with someone both deaf and blind .
translation.zu: pastaim mi tingting planti olsem mi bai stap wanpis , long wanem , kongrigesen bilong mipela i gat tupela yaupas tasol , na ol i no save gut long toktok wantaim man i yaupas na aipas wantaim .

translation.en: i could tell that our congregation was loving and warm , yet i could not at first communicate directly with them .
translation.zu: mi save olsem ol brata sista long kongrigesen bilong mipela ol i gat pasin sori na ol i save mekim gut long ol narapela , tasol pastaim mi hatwok long toktok wantaim ol .

translation.en: however , a kind act of a spiritual brother or sister would touch my heart and lift my spirits .
translation.zu: tasol sampela gutpela pasin wanpela brata o sista bilong spirit i mekim long mi i save strongim tru bel bilong mi na mi pilim tru .

translation.en: bill also encouraged me to persist in my ministry and to pray to jehovah to bring more deaf people into association with the congregation .
translation.zu: na tu , bill i save kirapim mi long wok strong long autim tok na beten long jehova long bringim sampela yaupas moa i kam insait long kongrigesen .

translation.en: i decided to get a guide dog so that i could be more independent .
translation.zu: mi kisim wanpela dok bilong was long ol aipas bambai mi yet inap mekim ol samting .

translation.en: the dog also helped to dispel my feelings of isolation .
translation.zu: dispela dok i helpim mi long lusim tingting olsem mi stap wanpis .

translation.en: when bill was at work , i could walk to the kingdom hall to meet the group that met to share in the christian ministry .
translation.zu: taim bill i stap long wok , mi inap wokabaut i go long haus kingdom na bungim grup bilong autim tok .

translation.en: over the years i have had four guide dogs , and each has been like a member of the family .
translation.zu: insait long ol yia i go pinis , mi bin kisim 4 - pela dok bilong was long mi , na olgeta wan wan i olsem hap bilong famili .

translation.en: in time , jehovah blessed our efforts to develop interest in bible study among the deaf .
translation.zu: bihain , jehova i blesim ol hatwok bilong mipela long kirapim baibel - stadi wantaim ol yaupas .

translation.en: the interest grew to the point where a sign language congregation was formed in washington , d.c .
translation.zu: planti yaupas i amamas long mekim baibel - stadi , olsem na wanpela kongrigesen bilong mekim ol tok long han i kamap long washington , d.c .

translation.en: finally , i could communicate with each member of the congregation !
translation.zu: nau mi inap long toktok wantaim wan wan brata sista long kongrigesen !

translation.en: bill qualified to serve as an elder and was appointed the presiding overseer of the sign language congregation .
translation.zu: bill i winim ol mak bilong mekim wok elda na ol i makim em olsem wasman siaman bilong dispela kongrigesen bilong mekim tok long han .

translation.en: i found great pleasure in conducting bible studies with other deaf and deaf - blind people , a number of whom are now serving jehovah faithfully .
translation.zu: mi kisim bikpela amamas tru long mekim baibel - stadi wantaim ol yaupas na ol lain i yaupas na aipas wantaim , na planti bilong ol i givim bel long lotuim jehova .

translation.en: i also tutored hearing sisters in sign language so that they could be more effective in the deaf ministry .
translation.zu: na tu , mi skulim ol sista i no yaupas long mekim tok long han bambai ol i ken mekim gutpela wok moa long autim tok long ol yaupas .

translation.en: a time of testing
translation.zu: taim bilong traim

translation.en: in 1992 major depression that was associated with the abuse i suffered as a youth overwhelmed me .
translation.zu: long 1992 mi kisim bikpela bel hevi tru , ol hevi i bin painim mi long taim mi stap yangpela yet i as bilong dispela samting .

translation.en: for a couple of years , i could barely function .
translation.zu: inap sampela yia , mi hatwok tru long mekim ol samting mi mas mekim .

translation.en: i felt handicapped - not by my deafness or blindness - but by my intense emotional turmoil .
translation.zu: mi pilim olsem hap skin bilong mi i bagarap - i no long wanem mi yaupas na aipas - tasol em bel bilong mi i bagarap tru .

translation.en: many times i did not think that i could bear to go to the meeting or out in the ministry , and i would beg jehovah to give me the strength to keep integrity .
translation.zu: planti taim mi no ting olsem mi bai inap long i go long ol miting o go autim tok , na mi save krai long jehova long strongim mi long holimpas bilip .

translation.en: as a result , i rarely missed a meeting , and i remained regular in my ministry during those dark years . - matthew 6 : 33 .
translation.zu: olsem na long dispela rot , mi no bin lusim ol miting na wok bilong go oltaim long autim tok long ol dispela taim mi stap bel hevi . - matyu 6 : 33 .

translation.en: in 1994 we moved to vancouver , british columbia , canada , to help with the formation of another sign language congregation .
translation.zu: long 1994 , mipela i go long vancouver , british columbia , kanada , bilong helpim wok bilong kirapim narapela kongrigesen bilong mekim tok long han .

translation.en: the move was not an easy one .
translation.zu: mi lusim taun mi save long en na planti gutpela poroman .

translation.en: i left behind a familiar city with many dear friends .
translation.zu: na mi gat hevi yet long pasin bilong bel hevi na tingting planti .

translation.en: even though i was still not over the depression and anxiety , the joy of seeing a new congregation formed in vancouver made all the sacrifices worthwhile .
translation.zu: tasol mi amamas long lukim wanpela nupela kongrigesen i kamap long vancouver na mi no tingim moa hatwok bilong ol dispela samting .

translation.en: i made dear friends in the new congregation , so that it came to feel like home .
translation.zu: mi kisim ol gutpela poroman long dispela nupela kongrigesen na mi pilim amamas long i stap .

translation.en: blessed by our loving father
translation.zu: jehova i mekim gut long mipela

translation.en: in 1999 my husband and i and two other witnesses visited haiti for six weeks to help in the deaf ministry .
translation.zu: long 1999 , mi na man bilong mi na tupela narapela witnes , mipela i go long haiti na stap inap 6 - pela wik bilong helpim wok bilong autim tok long ol yaupas .

translation.en: i returned home with renewed spiritual vigor and began the full - time ministry as a pioneer in september 1999 .
translation.zu: mi kisim nupela strong long ol samting bilong spirit na taim mipela i lusim haiti na go bek , mi kirap long mekim wok painia oltaim long septemba 1999 .

translation.en: with the help of jehovah , my dear husband , and a supportive congregation , bouts of depression have not robbed me of joy .
translation.zu: mi save bel hevi yet long sampela taim , tasol jehova i save helpim mi , na gutpela man bilong mi na kongrigesen tu i save strongim mi na dispela bel hevi i no save pinisim amamas bilong mi .

translation.en: over the years , i have experienced how tender jehovah is in affection .
translation.zu: insait long ol yia i go pinis , mi bin pilim tru bikpela pasin sori na pasin marimari bilong jehova .

translation.en: by means of his organization , i have been able to receive the new world translation of the holy scriptures along with many other bible study aids in braille .
translation.zu: long rot bilong oganaisesen bilong em , mi bin kisim baibel new world translation of the holy scriptures na planti narapela buk bilong stadi long baibel , em ol i wokim long rait brel .

translation.en: the congregation lovingly supports me by tactile interpreting , signing into my hands , so that i am fully included in all the meetings .
translation.zu: kongrigesen i save helpim mi long insait long olgeta miting , na bilong mekim olsem , ol i holim han bilong mi na mekim ol toktok long han .

translation.en: in spite of a double disability , i have found security among jehovah 's people .
translation.zu: maski mi yaupas na aipas wantaim , mi painim bel isi insait long lain bilong jehova .

translation.en: not only do i receive but i can also give , and this gives me great joy . - acts 20 : 35 .
translation.zu: mi kisim planti samting , tasol mi gat rot long givim ol samting long ol narapela tu , na dispela i save givim bikpela amamas long mi . - aposel 20 : 35 .

translation.en: i look forward to regaining both my hearing and my sight in jehovah 's new world .
translation.zu: mi wetim nupela taim jehova bai kamapim na mi bai inap long harim na lukluk gen .

translation.en: in the meantime i am not one of the loneliest people in the world , but i have a worldwide family of millions of spiritual brothers and sisters .
translation.zu: tasol long nau , mi no wanpela tarangu meri i stap wanpis , mi gat planti milion brata sista bilong spirit na mipela olgeta i insait long wanpela bikpela famili i stap long olgeta hap bilong graun .

translation.en: yes , in spite of all the challenges , i can say : " jehovah is my helper ; i will not be afraid . " - hebrews 13 : 5 , 6 .
translation.zu: tru , mi bin karim planti hevi , tasol mi inap long tok olsem : " bikpela i save helpim mi na mi no inap pret . " - hibru 13 : 5 , 6 .
