translation.en: with my husband , bill , today
translation.zu: mi wantaim man bilong mi , bill , long nau

translation.en: one woman gave birth while in a tree and was seen being lifted to safety along with her baby .
translation.zu: wanpela meri i karim pikinini taim em i stap antap long diwai na ol man i lukim piksa bilong em long televisen taim wanpela helikopta i kam kisim em i go .

translation.en: thousands , though , were stranded for days - some with snakes as companions - until the water subsided or they were rescued by helicopters .
translation.zu: inap planti de , planti tausen manmeri ol i stap nabaut nabaut - sampela i stap wantaim ol snek - inap long tait wara i pinis o helikopta i kam kisim ol .

translation.en: the tragedy began with torrential rainfall in mozambique 's capital city , maputo .
translation.zu: dispela bagarap i kirap taim bikpela ren i pundaun long maputo , em biktaun bilong mosambik .

translation.en: in some places water rose to the roofs of houses .
translation.zu: long sampela hap , wara i go antap inap long rup bilong ol haus .

translation.en: large gullies formed , and houses and cars , as well as just about everything else , were washed away .
translation.zu: ol bikpela baret i kamap long graun , na ol haus na ka na planti narapela samting i lus long tait wara .

translation.en: but the worst was yet to come .
translation.zu: tasol bikpela hevi moa yet i kamap .

translation.en: the rains continued , inundating the entire southern part of the country .
translation.zu: ren i pundaun yet na dispela i kamapim bikpela tait long hap saut bilong dispela kantri .

translation.en: how christians cared for one another during this catastrophe is a faith - strengthening story .
translation.zu: pasin ol kristen i bin mekim bilong lukautim narapela narapela long dispela taim nogut em inap tru long strongim bilip bilong yumi .

translation.en: assessing the early damage
translation.zu: skelim ol bagarap

translation.en: on february 9 last year , two representatives of the branch office of jehovah 's witnesses in maputo left to visit the north .
translation.zu: las yia long februeri 9 , tupela mausman bilong brens - ofis bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long maputo ol i go bilong skelim ol bagarap i kamap long hap not bilong dispela kantri .

translation.en: about nine in the morning , they passed the city of xinavane , where the level of the incoluane river was very high .
translation.zu: long 9 klok samting long moningtaim , ol i abrusim biktaun bilong xinavane , na long dispela hap , mak bilong wara incoluane i antap tru .

translation.en: they decided to continue on to xai - xai , the capital of the province of gaza .
translation.zu: ol i laik i go moa long xai - xai , em biktaun bilong provins gaza .

translation.en: however , they observed that near the city of chókwè , where the worst flooding often occurs during storms , there were no signs of problems .
translation.zu: tasol ol i lukim olsem klostu long biktaun chókwè , em hap ol bikpela tait i save kamap long en long taim bilong ren , i no gat mak olsem bagarap bai kamap .

translation.en: so they decided to return to maputo .
translation.zu: olsem na ol i laik i go bek long maputo .

translation.en: however , as they approached xinavane on their return , they were stopped by a police barrier . " the floodwaters from south africa have arrived and cut off the national road , " the police warned .
translation.zu: tasol taim ol i kamap long xinavane , ol polis i banisim rot na ol i toksave olsem : " bikpela tait long saut afrika i kam na i pasim rot .

translation.en: " neither buses nor trucks are able to pass . "
translation.zu: i no gat wanpela bas o trak inap long brukim dispela tait . "

translation.en: the same section of road that they had crossed in the morning was now completely under water !
translation.zu: hap bilong rot em ol i bin i go long en long moningtaim , nau wara i karamapim olgeta !

translation.en: since rivers farther north were also rising , the area was isolated from the rest of the country .
translation.zu: ol wara long hap not bilong mosambik i solap i kam antap na i pasim rot bilong ol ka long i go long ol narapela hap bilong kantri .

translation.en: the two decided to spend the night in nearby macia .
translation.zu: dispela tupela man i tingting long slip long macia long dispela nait .

translation.en: during that night the situation worsened .
translation.zu: long nait , tait wara i kamap bikpela moa .

translation.en: the entire city of xinavane was flooded , and people there lost everything .
translation.zu: wara i karamapim olgeta hap bilong biktaun xinavane na olgeta samting bilong ol manmeri i lus long wara .

translation.en: arrangements were made to help the witnesses in the area get to a kingdom hall in macia , where a makeshift refugee camp was set up .
translation.zu: ol i stretim rot bilong helpim ol witnes long xinavane long i go i stap long wanpela haus kingdom long macia em ol i mekim i kamap olsem refiuji kem .

translation.en: witnesses immediately went to warehouses and bought such basic items as rice , beans , flour , and oil .
translation.zu: kwiktaim ol witnes i go long ol bakstua na baim ol samting olsem rais , bin , plaua , na wel .

translation.en: concern now focused on fellow christians in chókwè and the nearby cities .
translation.zu: nau ol i tingting long helpim ol wanbilip kristen long chókwè na long ol narapela taun i stap klostu .

translation.en: the overseers in congregations in chókwè met together and organized a mass evacuation .
translation.zu: ol wasman bilong ol kongrigesen long chókwè ol i bung na stretim rot bilong helpim olgeta witnes long lusim dispela ples .

translation.en: the message was spread : " leave immediately , and go to macia ! "
translation.zu: ol i salim toksave i go long olgeta witnes long dispela hap : " lusim dispela hap kwiktaim na go long macia ! "

translation.en: it was soon learned , however , that many from xinavane had not arrived .
translation.zu: tasol i no longtaim na ol i kisim save olsem planti brata long xinavane ol i no kamap yet long macia .

translation.en: it was also learned that a christian elder had drowned inside his house .
translation.zu: ol i kisim save tu olsem wanpela elda kristen i dring wara na em i dai insait long haus bilong em .

translation.en: his burial was arranged , and the rest of the witnesses , some on rooftops , were located and helped to get to macia .
translation.zu: ol i stretim rot bilong planim em na ol i painim ol narapela witnes - sampela ol i stap antap long rup bilong ol haus - na helpim ol long i go long macia .

translation.en: after these arrangements were made , the representatives from the branch went to bilene , a small city on the coast , where they chartered a plane for maputo .
translation.zu: taim ol i stretim pinis ol dispela samting , dispela tupela mausman bilong brens - ofis i go long bilene , em wanpela liklik taun i stap long nambis , na long dispela hap ol i satarim wanpela balus bilong i go long maputo .

translation.en: it was reported that in the province of gaza alone , 600,000 people had been affected .
translation.zu: ol i tok olsem long gaza yet , inap 600,000 manmeri ol i kisim hevi long tait wara .

translation.en: during the next few days , the rains intensified , and the central provinces of mozambique were also devastated .
translation.zu: insait long ol de bihain , ren i pundaun bikpela moa yet na i bagarapim tru sampela provins i stap insait long kantri mosambik .

translation.en: then an enormous tropical cyclone named eline formed .
translation.zu: orait nau wanpela bikpela win ol i kolim eline i kirap .

translation.en: on february 20 it dumped devastating rain on the provinces of inhambane , sofala , and manica .
translation.zu: long februeri 20 , dispela bikpela win i mekim na bikpela ren tru i pundaun long ol provins bilong inhambane , sofala , na manica .

translation.en: then , toward the end of february , the city of chókwè and the entire surrounding region were flooded in a way that had never been seen before .
translation.zu: klostu long pinis bilong mun februeri , bikpela tait i karamapim biktaun bilong chókwè na olgeta hap i stap klostu . kain bikpela tait olsem i no bin kamap bipo .

translation.en: close to midnight on saturday , february 26 , floodwaters arrived like a great avalanche , washing away everything in their path .
translation.zu: klostu long biknait long sarere , februeri 26 , bikpela tait wara i kamap wantu tasol olsem traipela si i bruk , na em i bagarapim planti samting .

translation.en: chitlango explained : " as we jumped out of bed , we could hear the loud roar of the water .
translation.zu: chitlango i tok : " taim mipela i kirap na lusim bet , mi inap harim bikpela pairap bilong wara .

translation.en: as we fled , we encountered many snakes .
translation.zu: na mipela i bungim planti snek taim mipela i wok long ranawe .

translation.en: at six o 'clock , we arrived at higher ground , but later in the morning when floodwaters had risen on all sides , we had to climb into the trees .
translation.zu: long 6 klok , mipela i kamap long hap graun i antap liklik , tasol bihain liklik , long moningtaim yet , tait wara i solap i kam antap , olsem na mipela i go antap long ol diwai .

translation.en: " the men climbed into the trees first .
translation.zu: " pastaim ol man yet i go antap long ol diwai .

translation.en: then the women handed the children to them , and these were tied to tree branches .
translation.zu: orait taim ol i stap antap pinis , ol meri i givim ol pikinini long ol na ol i pasim ol long ol han bilong diwai .

translation.en: every now and then , we climbed down from the trees and probed the ground beneath the water for peanuts , which we knew were grown in the area .
translation.zu: mipela i save olsem ol man i bin planim ol pinat long dispela hap , olsem na sampela taim mipela i lusim diwai na go daun long graun na pulim ol pinat i stap aninit long wara .

translation.en: " after three days it was decided that we all should walk to chókwè .
translation.zu: " bihain long tripela de , mipela i pasim tok olsem mipela olgeta i mas wokabaut i go long chókwè .

translation.en: the next day the floodwaters had subsided enough for trucks to reach the city and take people to macia . "
translation.zu: long de antap , tait wara i slek liklik na ol trak inap long go long biktaun na kisim ol manmeri i go long macia . "

translation.en: the witness refugee camp
translation.zu: refiuji kem bilong ol witnes

translation.en: a large part of the population had fled to macia , which had been transformed into an enormous camp for refugees .
translation.zu: planti manmeri ol i ranawe i go pinis long macia na dispela hap i kamap olsem wanpela bikpela kem bilong ol refiuji .

translation.en: the scene was like a war zone .
translation.zu: dispela hap i luk olsem wanpela hap bilong pait .

translation.en: when the witness relief team arrived in macia , they not only made arrangements for feeding victims but also set up an infirmary .
translation.zu: taim wanpela lain helpim bilong ol witnes i kamap long macia , ol i stretim rot bilong givim kaikai samting long ol refiuji , na tu , ol i wokim wanpela liklik haus sik .

translation.en: every morning at the witness camp , which accommodated nearly 700 witnesses as well as others , a bible text was considered at 6 : 30 a.m .
translation.zu: long olgeta moningtaim long kem bilong ol witnes - i gat klostu 700 witnes na ol narapela lain tu i stap long en - ol i save skelim wanpela tok bilong baibel long 6 : 30 long moningtaim .

translation.en: when the food prepared by christian sisters was ready , the names of family heads were called .
translation.zu: taim ol sista kristen i redim pinis kaikai , ol i save kolim nem bilong ol het bilong famili .

translation.en: each would indicate with his fingers how many plates he needed , and the food would be delivered .
translation.zu: olgeta wan wan het bilong famili i save soim pinga bilong makim hamas plet kaikai ol i mas kisim na ol i save bringim kaikai i go long ol .

translation.en: every aspect of life in the camp was well organized .
translation.zu: ol i stretim gut olgeta wok samting long dispela kem .

translation.en: some people were assigned to purchase food ; and others , to safeguard sanitation of drinking water , to clean latrines , and so forth .
translation.zu: ol i makim sampela lain bilong baim kaikai ; na sampela bilong stretim gut wara bilong dring , na klinim ol toilet , na long mekim ol narapela wok samting .

translation.en: the good organization did not go unnoticed by government officials , who commented : ' it is worth it to be here .
translation.zu: ol bikman bilong gavman i lukim dispela pasin bilong ol witnes long stretim gut ol wok samting na ol i tok : ' dispela hap i wanpela gutpela hap tru bilong i stap long en .

translation.en: nobody goes without food , and there is no quarreling . '
translation.zu: i no gat wanpela man i sot long kaikai , na i no gat man i kros . '

translation.en: a local authority said : ' everyone should visit the camp of the witnesses to see how things should work . '
translation.zu: wanpela bikman bilong gavman i tok : ' olgeta lain i mas i go lukim kem bilong ol witnes na bai ol i ken save long pasin bilong stretim gut ol wok samting . '

translation.en: the following morning during the consideration of the day 's bible text , announcement was made regarding these plans .
translation.zu: long de antap long moningtaim , taim ol i skelim teks bilong de , ol elda i toksave long ol brata sista long dispela samting .

translation.en: even though the authorities had donated two large tents , many in the camp were still sleeping in the open air .
translation.zu: lain bilong gavman i givim tupela bikpela haus sel long ol , tasol planti long dispela kem ol i slip nating long ausait .

translation.en: so a team from among the flood victims was organized to construct a large kingdom hall on the plot of land belonging to the local congregation .
translation.zu: olsem na ol i bungim sampela brata refiuji bilong wokim wanpela bikpela haus kingdom long hap graun bilong kongrigesen long macia .

translation.en: in the meantime , on march 5 , after the floodwaters had subsided somewhat , a relief team was formed to travel to the town of aldeia da barragem , located in one of the first regions to be flooded .
translation.zu: long mas 5 , taim tait wara i slek liklik , ol i makim wanpela lain helpim bilong i go long aldeia da barragem , em wanpela taun i stap long hap em tait wara i bin kamap pastaim long en .

translation.en: it had a congregation of some 90 witnesses , and nothing had been heard from them .
translation.zu: i gat olsem 90 witnes i insait long kongrigesen long dispela hap na ol brata i no bin kisim sampela tok long ol .

translation.en: en route , the team passed chihaquelane , a large refugee camp of about 100,000 people .
translation.zu: taim ol i go , ol i abrusim chihaquelane , em wanpela bikpela refiuji kem i gat 100,000 manmeri i stap long en .

translation.en: on both sides of the road , which in places was washed away , the region was flooded as far as the eye could see .
translation.zu: tait wara i bin bagarapim sampela hap bilong rot na ol i lukim olsem tait wara i karamapim dispela hap olgeta .

translation.en: one member of the team commented : " when we arrived in chókwè , a desolate scene met our eyes .
translation.zu: wanpela brata i tok : " taim mipela i kamap long chókwè , mipela i lukim samting nogut tru .

translation.en: many houses at the entrance of the city still had water up to the rooftops .
translation.zu: tait wara i solap i go antap inap long rup bilong ol haus .

translation.en: the majority of the houses were submerged in the floodwaters .
translation.zu: planti haus i stap insait long wara .

translation.en: it was getting dark , and we still had 15 miles [ 25 km ] to go before we reached aldeia da barragem . "
translation.zu: tudak i wok long kamap na mipela i gat 25 kilomita moa bilong i go kamap long aldeia da barragem . "

translation.en: during the night , the team finally reached their destination .
translation.zu: dispela lain helpim i kamap long aldeia da barragem long nait .

translation.en: a member of the team recalls : " we stopped and wondered what to do next . "
translation.zu: wanpela brata i insait long dispela lain i tok : " mipela i pasim ka na mipela i tingting long wanem samting mipela bai mekim . "

translation.en: then people appeared , shouting : " brothers ! "
translation.zu: nau ol manmeri i kam na ol i singaut : " ol brata ! "

translation.en: and there was loud , happy laughter .
translation.zu: na ol i amamas na lap strong .

translation.en: when they had seen the lights of the two vehicles , the local witnesses had immediately thought that it might be their brothers , and they told others this .
translation.zu: taim ol i lukim lait bilong dispela tupela ka em ol lain helpim i go long en , wantu ol witnes long dispela hap i tingting olsem ol brata bilong ol i kam , na ol i tokim ol narapela long dispela samting .

translation.en: the brothers from aldeia da barragem were helped to reach the camp in macia , where they were given food , accommodations , and medical treatment .
translation.zu: ol i helpim ol brata long aldeia da barragem long i go long kem long macia , na long dispela hap ol i kisim kaikai na ples slip na ol marasin samting .

translation.en: meanwhile , the situation in macia was becoming critical .
translation.zu: tasol nau bikpela hevi i laik kamap long macia .

translation.en: there was an urgent need to restore a land link with maputo .
translation.zu: olsem na nau ol i mas hariap long stretim rot bilong ka long i go long maputo .

translation.en: when the floodwaters subsided sufficiently and an accounting had been made of those who had lost their homes , the work of rebuilding houses and kingdom halls began .
translation.zu: taim tait wara i pinis liklik na ol i kisim save long hamas lain em haus bilong ol i lus na nau ol i kirapim wok bilong wokim gen ol haus na ol haus kingdom .

translation.en: a reconstruction committee was established and was supported by dozens of volunteers , who immediately set to work .
translation.zu: ol i kamapim wanpela komiti bilong wokim ol haus samting na wantu tasol planti volantia i kirap long helpim dispela wok .

translation.en: since then , more than 270 houses as well as at least five kingdom halls have been rebuilt .
translation.zu: kirap long dispela taim , ol i bin wokim planti haus , winim 270 , na 5 - pela haus kingdom .

translation.en: when the first houses constructed by witness volunteers began to appear , people took notice .
translation.zu: taim ol witnes volantia i wokim pinis sampela haus , ol man i kirap nogut na ol i mekim sampela tok .

translation.en: one neighbor commented : ' you worship a god who is alive .
translation.zu: wanpela meri i tok : ' yupela i lotuim wanpela god i stap laip .

translation.en: our pastors fail to remember their sheep who are suffering .
translation.zu: ol pasto bilong mipela i no tingim ol sipsip bilong ol em ol i karim hevi .

translation.en: however , you are receiving these beautiful houses . '
translation.zu: tasol yupela i wok long kisim ol dispela naispela haus . '

translation.en: in such areas many have been receptive to the kingdom message preached by jehovah 's witnesses , and a number of bible studies have been started . - matthew 24 : 14 ; revelation 21 : 3 , 4 .
translation.zu: long ol kain hap olsem , planti man i amamas long putim yau long harim tok bilong kingdom em ol witnes bilong jehova i autim , na ol i bin kirapim planti baibel - stadi . - matyu 24 : 14 ; kth 21 : 3 , 4 .

translation.en: although many witnesses lost all their material possessions , none lost their faith .
translation.zu: maski planti witnes i lusim olgeta samting bilong skin , i no gat wanpela bilong ol i lusim bilip bilong em .

translation.en: instead , their faith in jehovah god and in their worldwide association of fellow believers was strengthened .
translation.zu: bilip bilong ol long god jehova na long ol wanbilip bilong ol i stap long olgeta hap bilong graun i kamap strong moa .

translation.en: they are grateful to their loving international brotherhood , which was so prompt in its response to this terrible disaster .
translation.zu: ol i tenkyu tru long lain brata bilong ol long olgeta hap i bin hariap long helpim ol long dispela taim bilong hevi .

translation.en: they have experienced in a personal way jehovah 's tender care and protection , and they will always remember the bible expression : " jehovah is great . " - psalm 48 : 1 .
translation.zu: olgeta wan wan i pilim tru pasin bilong jehova long tingim tru ol na lukautim ol , na oltaim bai ol i tingim dispela tok bilong baibel : " bikpela i gat biknem . " - song 48 : 1 .

translation.en: can prisoners be reformed ?
translation.zu: ol kalabusman inap senis ?

translation.en: all too often , prison is simply a training ground for more serious crimes .
translation.zu: 3 - 10 haus kalabus i olsem wanpela hap bilong lainim ol man long mekim ol bikpela rong .

translation.en: but read how some inmates have been helped to make genuine changes . 3 prisons in crisis 4 is the solution part of the problem ?
translation.zu: tasol ritim stori long olsem wanem sampela kalabus i bin kisim helpim na ol i bin senisim tru i stap bilong ol .

translation.en: 8 is real reform possible ?
translation.zu: yu ting ol driman i kam long god ?

translation.en: 24 living mosaics in montreal 26 the genuine panama hat - made in ecuador ?
translation.zu: planti man i ting olsem , tasol yu ting baibel i helpim dispela tingting ?

translation.en: 31 " watching the world " goes to school 32 ' educational and informative ' on safari in ghana 14
translation.zu: ritim stori long olsem wanem trupela bilip i bin helpim ol kristen long taim bilong hevi .

translation.en: in a world where political correctness often whitewashes the darker side of reality , we have soft alternatives for the bleak word " prison . "
translation.zu: olsem long planti kantri ol man i yusim ol tok i helpim bel bilong man i stap isi na i olsem senis bilong dispela tok " kalabus . "

translation.en: we prefer " penitentiary " or " correctional facility , " where " vocational training " and " social services " are provided .
translation.zu: ol i save tok " ples bilong stretim man , " we man inap " lainim sampela wok " na kisim " helpim bilong sindaun gut . "

translation.en: we even favor the term " inmate " over the dehumanizing word " prisoner . "
translation.zu: na tu , ol i no laik yusim dispela tok " kalabusman . "

translation.en: yet , look under the veneer , and you will find that prisons are facing serious problems today , such as the skyrocketing cost of keeping offenders behind bars and the ever - widening gulf between the aims of incarceration and the actual results .
translation.zu: tasol taim yu skelim gut wok bilong ol haus kalabus , yu bai luksave olsem ol haus kalabus i gat planti hevi long nau , olsem pe bilong holim man long kalabus i go antap tru . na samting i kamap tru tru long wok bilong kalabusim man i narapela olgeta long ol gutpela wok ol i laik bai kalabus i kamapim .

translation.en: they note that while the number of prisoners worldwide has soared to over eight million , the crime rate in many lands has not significantly diminished .
translation.zu: ol i luksave olsem maski namba bilong olgeta man long graun i stap kalabus i go bikpela tru winim 8 milion , dispela i no mekim bikpela samting bilong daunim pasin raskol .

translation.en: moreover , while a large number of those in prison are there for crimes involving drugs , the availability of drugs on the street is still a grave concern .
translation.zu: na maski bikpela lain i kalabus , long wanem , ol i brukim lo na kisim o salim ol drak , dispela wok bilong maketim ol drak i stap yet olsem bikpela hevi .

translation.en: nevertheless , many consider imprisonment to be the punishment of choice .
translation.zu: tasol planti pipel i ting wok bilong kalabusim ol man em i namba wan rot bilong strafim ol .

translation.en: they feel that when the offender is jailed , justice is served .
translation.zu: ol i ting taim man i mekim rong i go kalabus , em i kisim stretpela strafe .

translation.en: one journalist describes the zeal to put criminals behind bars as " lock - ' em - up fever . "
translation.zu: wanpela niusman i stori long dispela bikpela laik bilong kalabusim man na tok ol man i tingting long " lokim ol tasol . "

translation.en: there are four principal reasons why lawbreakers are put in prison : ( 1 ) to punish the offenders , ( 2 ) to protect society , ( 3 ) to prevent future crimes , and ( 4 ) to rehabilitate criminals , teaching them to be law - abiding and productive after their release .
translation.zu: i gat 4 - pela as bilong kalabusim man : ( 1 ) strafim man i brukim lo , ( 2 ) lukautim ol manmeri , ( 3 ) pasim man long mekim gen sampela rong , na ( 4 ) senisim pasin bilong man nogut , na lainim em long bihainim ol lo na mekim gutpela wok taim en i lusim kalabus .

translation.en: is the solution part of the problem ?
translation.zu: rot bilong stretim hevi em i kamapim hevi ?

translation.en: " demeaning and demoralizing prisoners is the worst way to prepare them for the world outside . " - an editorial in the atlanta constitution .
translation.zu: " pasin bilong daunim na bagarapim bel bilong man i kalabus , dispela i no helpim em long redi liklik long stap wantaim ol manmeri ausait . " - wanpela stori long nius the atlanta constitution .

translation.en: in many cases prisons simply act as a restraint - and a temporary one at that .
translation.zu: planti kalabus i mekim wok long pasim man inap sotpela taim tasol .

translation.en: " i am the mother of a murdered child , " pleaded rita when the convicted killer of her 16 - year - old son was released after serving only a three - year sentence .
translation.zu: rita i krai na tok : " mi mama bilong pikinini , em man i bin kilim em i dai . " meri i tok olsem taim dispela man i gat asua long kilim i dai pikinini bilong em i gat 16 krismas , em i lusim kalabus bihain long 3 - pela yia tasol .

translation.en: " please stop for a moment . think .
translation.zu: em i tok moa olsem : " plis , tingim gut dispela samting .

translation.en: can you begin to imagine what this means ? "
translation.zu: yu ting yu inap pilim tru tingting bilong mi ? "

translation.en: as rita 's case illustrates , tragedy often lingers long after the courts have finished their business and the headlines have faded .
translation.zu: samting i painim rita i soim olsem , bel hevi i stap yet , maski kot i pinis longtaim , na i no gat stori moa bilong dispela samting long nius .

translation.en: this issue is of concern not only to those whose lives have been touched by crime but also to everyone else .
translation.zu: dispela hevi em i bilong olgeta manmeri long tingim , i no bilong ol manmeri tasol i bin karim hevi long sampela pasin raskol .

translation.en: after all , whether released prisoners have been rehabilitated or simply hardened by their experience behind bars has a direct bearing on your peace of mind if not on your very safety .
translation.zu: tingim man i laik lusim kalabus , sapos i stap bilong em long kalabus i helpim em long senisim pasin , o i mekim em i kamap man i nogut moa , dispela i bikpela samting long yumi bai stap gut o nogat .

translation.en: schools for criminals
translation.zu: skul bilong ol raskol

translation.en: " when money is poured into building another prison cell at the expense of rebuilding a prisoner 's self - image , it is often just a prelude to more - and worse - crime , " writes jill smolowe in time magazine .
translation.zu: jill smolowe i raitim wanpela stori long nius time na tok : " taim ol i tromoi mani bilong wokim narapela rum kalabus , na ol i no yusim dispela mani long helpim kalabusman long kisim gutpela tingting olsem em inap mekim gutpela wok , dispela i save mekim na bihain pasin raskol bilong em bai i go bikpela moa . "

translation.en: peter , * who has spent 14 years behind bars , would agree with that statement .
translation.zu: peter , * em i stap 14 yia pinis long kalabus , na em i wanbel long dispela tok .

translation.en: while prisons may take criminals off the streets for a while , it seems that they do little - if anything - to deter crime in the long term .
translation.zu: kalabus inap pasim raskol inap sotpela taim , tasol i luk olsem wok bilong kalabus i no mekim bikpela wok tumas bilong pinisim hevi bilong pasin raskol .

translation.en: inner - city boys and young men often view imprisonment as an initiation rite .
translation.zu: sampela manki bilong ol biktaun na sampela yangpela man , ol i ting kalabus i olsem mak bilong man tru .

translation.en: very often they end up becoming hardened offenders .
translation.zu: planti taim ol kamap olsem raskol i nogut tru .

translation.en: " prison doesn 't rehabilitate you at all , " says larry , who has spent much of his life in and out of jail .
translation.zu: larry i bin kalabus planti taim , em i tok : " kalabus i no senisim liklik pasin bilong man .

translation.en: " these guys come out and do the same thing all over again . "
translation.zu: taim man i lusim kalabus , ol i mekim ol wankain samting gen . "

translation.en: this ' revolving door ' may explain why , according to one study in the united states , 50 percent of all serious crimes are committed by about 5 percent of the criminals .
translation.zu: ating pasin bilong go i kam long kalabus i as na wanpela ripot bilong amerika i tok , 5 pesen bilong ol man i bin kalabus bipo i gat asua long 50 pesen bilong ol pasin raskol nogut tru .

translation.en: " when prisoners have no constructive way to spend their time , " remarks time magazine , " they often fill the hours building a reservoir of resentment , not to mention a grab bag of criminal tricks , that . . . they will take back to the streets . "
translation.zu: nius time i tok : " taim ol man i stap long kalabus i no gat gutpela samting long mekim , ol i save tromoi planti aua long tingim ol samting i kirapim ol long bel nogut moa yet long ol man . na tu , ol i lainim planti samting nogut , . . . ol bai mekim taim ol i lusim kalabus . "

translation.en: the situation is not unique to the united states .
translation.zu: dispela i no samting i kamap long amerika tasol .

translation.en: john vatis , a physician at a military prison in greece , states : " our prisons have become very good at producing people who are menacing , violent , and mean .
translation.zu: john vatis , em wanpela dokta bilong wanpela kalabus bilong ami long grik , em i tok : " ol haus kalabus bilong mipela i save lainim ol man long bihainim pasin bilong bagarapim ol narapela , pait , na mekim hatpela pasin .

translation.en: when released , most inmates want to ' square up ' with society . "
translation.zu: taim ol i lusim kalabus , planti ol i gat tingting long ' bekim nogut ' long olgeta manmeri . "

translation.en: inmates over the age of 60 can cost three times that amount .
translation.zu: pe bilong lukautim ol kalabus i winim 60 krismas inap bikpela moa .

translation.en: in many countries public confidence in the penal system is waning for additional reasons .
translation.zu: long planti kantri , i gat ol narapela as na ol manmeri i no save bilip tumas long wok bilong kalabus .

translation.en: there are concerns about prematurely released criminals as well as offenders who manage to avoid prison sentences altogether because of some legal technicality discovered by an astute lawyer .
translation.zu: ol i tingting planti long ol man nogut i lusim kalabus hariap tumas , na long ol man nogut i abrusim kalabus , long wanem , loya bilong ol i painim rot bilong abrusim sampela lo em ol i gat wok long pasim ol raskol .

translation.en: public confidence in the prison system is not helped by the inhumane conditions to which prisoners are exposed , as described in the accompanying box .
translation.zu: sindaun bilong ol man i kalabus i nogut tru olsem stori bilong blok i kamapim , na dispela i mekim na ol manmeri i no bilip tumas olsem kalabus bai kamapim gutpela wok .

translation.en: then , too , a number of human rights groups are concerned about the disproportionate numbers of members of minority groups who are found in prisons .
translation.zu: na tu , sampela lain ol i tingting planti , long wanem , i gat planti man moa i kalabus , em ol man bilong ol narapela kain skin .

translation.en: a 1998 associated press report drew attention to the plight of ex - prisoners of the holmesburg prison , in pennsylvania , u.s.a . , who sought compensation for having allegedly been used as human guinea pigs in chemical experiments while imprisoned .
translation.zu: ripot bilong 1998 bilong lain associated press i stori long hevi bilong ol man i bin stap long kalabus long holmesburg , pennsylvania , long amerika .

translation.en: amnesty international reports : " work on the gang lasts for 10 - 12 hours often in hot sun , with very brief breaks for water , and an hour for lunch . . . .
translation.zu: ripot bilong wanpela lain ( amnesty international ) i tok : " ol man em sen i pasim ol , ol i wok inap 10 - pela o 12 - pela aua long hatpela san .

translation.en: the only toilet facility available to chain gang inmates is a portable chamber pot behind a make - shift screen .
translation.zu: toilet bilong ol em wanpela baket i stap baksait long wanpela banis ol i wokim nating .

translation.en: when the chamber pot is inaccessible , inmates are forced to squat down on the ground in public . "
translation.zu: taim rot i no op bilong go long toilet , ol i mas pekpek long ples klia . "

translation.en: of course , not all prisons operate that way .
translation.zu: olgeta haus kalabus i no save mekim olsem .

translation.en: are community interests served ?
translation.zu: wok bilong kalabus i helpim komiuniti ?

translation.en: naturally , most communities feel safer when dangerous criminals are behind bars .
translation.zu: tru , bel bilong planti man i stap isi taim ol man nogut i kalabus .

translation.en: when a prison in the small australian town of cooma was to be closed , people protested .
translation.zu: taim ol i laik pasim wanpela haus kalabus long wanpela liklik taun bilong australia , em cooma , ol manmeri bilong dispela hap i no amamas .

translation.en: why ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem ?

translation.en: in recent times some governments have sold their prisons to private enterprise as a cost - saving measure .
translation.zu: long nau sampela gavman i larim ol bisnisman i baim ol haus kalabus na bai gavman i no ken tromoi planti mani long lukautim .

translation.en: thus , justice can become mixed up with commercialism .
translation.zu: olsem na stretpela kot inap paul long ol samting long sait bilong wok bisnis .

translation.en: while the answer is often negative , you may be surprised to learn that some inmates have been helped to change .
translation.zu: planti man i tok nogat , tasol ating yu bai kirap nogut long kisim save olsem sampela ol kalabus i bin kisim helpim long senisim pasin bilong ol .

translation.en: is real reform possible ?
translation.zu: yu ting ol kalabus inap senis tru ?

translation.en: " no one can force another human being to be rehabilitated .
translation.zu: " i no gat wanpela man inap subim narapela long senisim pasin bilong em .

translation.en: change has to come from within the individual and to be willed . " - vivien stern , a sin against the future - imprisonment in the world .
translation.zu: senis tru mas i kamap long bel bilong man , na strongpela laik bilong em yet i mas kamapim . " - vivien stern , a sin against the future - imprisonment in the world .

translation.en: a vital key to real reform among prisoners centers on education and a change in values and outlook .
translation.zu: bikpela samting bilong helpim ol kalabus long senisim tru pasin bilong ol , em skul ol i kisim na senis bilong tingting .

translation.en: without a doubt , there are sincere individuals who are making efforts to educate and help prisoners .
translation.zu: i gat sampela manmeri i givim bel tru long wok bilong skulim na helpim ol kalabusman .

translation.en: the fine and altruistic work of such people is indeed appreciated by many prisoners .
translation.zu: planti kalabus i amamas long gutpela wok bilong ol dispela manmeri i bihainim pasin bilong tingim ol narapela .

translation.en: some people will argue that the prison system as a whole is beyond reform and that it is barely possible for prisoners to change in such an environment .
translation.zu: ating sampela man i tok i no gat rot bilong stretim wok bilong haus kalabus , na i hatwok tru long ol man i stap long kain ples olsem long senisim pasin bilong ol .

translation.en: while it may be true that incarceration alone does not instill new values , bible instruction has helped some to change their lives .
translation.zu: i tru , wok bilong stap tasol long kalabus i no inap kirapim man long bihainim nupela tingting , tasol skul bilong baibel i bin kamapim bikpela senis long i stap bilong sampela .

translation.en: this illustrates that reform is possible on an individual basis .
translation.zu: dispela i makim olsem senis inap kamap long sampela kalabusman .

translation.en: today , with help from the bible , some inmates are making the changes that produce right thinking and conduct .
translation.zu: long nau , helpim ol i kisim long baibel i strongim sampela kalabusman long mekim ol senis i kirapim ol long bihainim stretpela tingting na wokabaut .

translation.en: by heeding the bible counsel : " quit being fashioned after this system of things , but be transformed by making your mind over , that you may prove to yourselves the good and acceptable and perfect will of god . "
translation.zu: ol i bihainim dispela tok bilong baibel : " yupela i no ken wokabaut wankain olsem ol man bilong dispela graun . nogat . yupela i mas larim god i mekim tingting bilong yupela i kamap nupela na bai pasin bilong yupela i kamap nupela tu .

translation.en: how is this accomplished ?
translation.zu: dispela i kamap olsem wanem ?

translation.en: many people feel that religion can play a large role in helping prisoners to repent of their previous actions .
translation.zu: planti man i ting lotu i bikpela samting bilong helpim ol kalabus long tanim bel na hevi long ol rong ol i bin mekim bipo .

translation.en: of course , a basic problem with this is that any change of character brought about behind bars may vanish once the prisoner has been released .
translation.zu: tasol wanpela hevi bilong dispela i olsem , senis man i mekim taim em kalabus , dispela inap lus nating taim ol i larim em long go fri .

translation.en: one inmate put it this way : " a lot of people find christ in this place - but when they leave here , they leave christ behind ! "
translation.zu: wanpela kalabusman i stori long dispela samting na tok : " planti man i painim krais long hia - tasol taim ol i lusim kalabus , ol i lusim krais long hap ol i bin painim em ! "

translation.en: experience has demonstrated that genuine change must occur within - in the criminal 's mind and heart - and that the basis must be sincere repentance for past wrongdoing .
translation.zu: save ol man i kisim pinis i kamapim klia olsem senis tru i mas kamap insait - long bel na tingting bilong dispela man nogut - na pasin bilong pilim tru rong bilong ol na tanim bel i mas stap olsem as bilong dispela senis .

translation.en: a program of bible education can help an individual to learn how god feels about wickedness and why it is wrong .
translation.zu: skul bilong baibel inap helpim man long save god yet i gat wanem tingting long pasin nogut na bilong wanem dispela pasin i no stret .

translation.en: this can give him strong reasons for not wanting to continue in such a course .
translation.zu: dispela inap stap olsem strongpela as bilong helpim man na em bai i no laik mekim moa dispela pasin .

translation.en: jehovah 's witnesses are conducting such a bible education program in numerous prisons around the world , with wonderful results .
translation.zu: ol witnes bilong jehova i wokim kain skul bilong baibel olsem long planti haus kalabus long olgeta hap bilong graun , na wok i karim gutpela kaikai .

translation.en: " we have been helped to discover what the bible says about the purpose of life and the blessings the future holds for mankind , " commented one prisoner , adding : " it 's an incredible education ! "
translation.zu: wanpela kalabusman i tok : " ol i helpim mipela long save baibel i tok wanem long as na yumi stap , na ol gutpela blesing ol man inap kisim long bihain . " em i tok moa olsem : " em i narapela kain skul tru ! "

translation.en: another inmate remarked : " we 're making decisions based on god 's counsel . . . .
translation.zu: narapela man i stap kalabus i tok : " nau mipela wok long larim baibel i stiaim mipela long ol samting mipela laik mekim . . . .

translation.en: of course , the need for reform extends beyond prison walls .
translation.zu: tru , ol samting i gat wok long senis i no stap insait long ol haus kalabus tasol .

translation.en: the true solution to the prison crisis lies in eliminating the need for prisons .
translation.zu: taim i no gat wok moa long ol haus kalabus , dispela em i samting tru tru bilong stretim hevi .

translation.en: one of the glorious bible truths that has touched the hearts of so many inmates is expressed in god 's promise : " evildoers themselves will be cut off . . .
translation.zu: wanpela gutpela tok bilong baibel i bin kirapim tru bel bilong planti kalabus em dispela tok promis bilong god : " ol man nogut bai i bagarap olgeta . . . .

translation.en: the righteous themselves will possess the earth , and they will reside forever upon it . " - psalm 37 : 9 , 29 .
translation.zu: ol stretpela man bai i kisim graun god i givim ol , na bai ol i stap oltaim long en . " - song 37 : 9 , 29 .

translation.en: when that happens , god 's superior standards will be enforced by an incorruptible government that is both loving and firm , god 's heavenly kingdom under christ - the government for which christians have been taught to pray .
translation.zu: taim truim bilong dispela samting i kamap , wanpela gavman i no inap bagarap bai i sori long ol man , na strong long ol man i mas bihainim ol stretpela lo bilong god .

translation.en: in that new world , every inhabitant will be reformed by learning god 's superior laws .
translation.zu: em wok bilong kingdom bilong god long heven krais i bosim - em gavman ol kristen i bin lain long beten long en .

translation.en: then it will be true as never before that " the earth will certainly be filled with the knowledge of jehovah as the waters are covering the very sea . "
translation.zu: bai i gat bikpela truim bilong dispela tok : " olgeta samting long graun bai i save tru long bikpela . dispela save bai inapim olgeta hap graun olsem solwara i inapim mak bilong en olgeta . "

translation.en: the law - abiding inhabitants of the new world " will indeed find their exquisite delight in the abundance of peace . " - psalm 37 : 11 .
translation.zu: ol manmeri bilong bihainim lo bilong dispela nupela taim bai " ol i sindaun gutpela tumas na amamas i stap . " - song 37 : 11 .

translation.en: opening a window of hope
translation.zu: i opim rot bilong kisim bilip

translation.en: for more than 20 years , volunteer ministers of jehovah 's witnesses have carried out a successful bible - based educational program in the federal penitentiary in atlanta , georgia , u.s.a .
translation.zu: winim 20 yia pinis , ol witnes bilong jehova i mekim wok volantia na ol i wokim wanpela skul bilong baibel long bikpela haus kalabus long atlanta , georgia , long amerika .

translation.en: during that time , more than 40 inmates have been helped to become baptized ministers of jehovah 's witnesses , and more than 90 other inmates have also benefited from regular bible studies .
translation.zu: insait long dispela hap taim , inap olsem 40 kalabus i bin kisim baptais na kamap witnes bilong jehova . na 90 narapela ol kalabus , ol tu i kisim helpim long rot bilong stadi oltaim long baibel .

translation.en: recently spoke with several bible teachers who have unselfishly worked in that prison .
translation.zu: i bin toktok wantaim sampela tisa bilong baibel em ol i givim bel long wok long dispela haus kalabus .

translation.en: ▪ why is bible education so effective in motivating certain inmates to change their lives ?
translation.zu: ▪ bilong wanem skul bilong baibel i gutpela long kirapim sampela ol kalabus long senisim pasin bilong ol ?

translation.en: so when they come to know that god loves them and when they pour their hearts out to him in prayer and then he answers their prayers , he becomes real to them .
translation.zu: olsem na taim ol i kisim save olsem god i laikim ol tru , na ol i prea long em na kamapim gut bel bilong ol , na god i harim prea bilong ol - ol i tingim god i olsem man tru tru .

translation.en: their hearts are motivated to love him in return .
translation.zu: na bel i kirapim ol long laikim em tru .

translation.en: ray : one of the inmates i studied with was abused as a child .
translation.zu: ray : mi bin stadi wantaim wanpela kalabus em sampela i mekim nogut long em taim em i liklik .

translation.en: when i asked him what attracted him to jehovah , he answered that when you learn bible truth , you find out that jehovah really understands you .
translation.zu: taim mi askim em long wanem samting i kirapim em long laikim jehova , em i tok olsem taim yu lainim ol tok tru bilong baibel , yu bai kisim save olsem jehova i save pilim tru tingting bilong yu .

translation.en: this made him want to learn more about the personality of such a loving god .
translation.zu: dispela i bin kirapim em long kisim save moa long pasin bilong dispela god bilong sori .

translation.en: what has your experience shown you ?
translation.zu: yu gat wanem tingting long dispela ?

translation.en: fred : when the inmates come to our studies , we don 't appeal to their sentimentality .
translation.zu: fred : taim ol kalabus i kam long skul bilong mipela , mipela i no kirapim nating bel bilong ol .

translation.en: we simply study the bible with them .
translation.zu: mipela stadi long baibel tasol .

translation.en: in short order , they learn that they 're going to be taught about the bible and that this is all we do .
translation.zu: kwiktaim ol i kisim save olsem ol bai lainim ol samting bilong baibel , na em tasol .

translation.en: i 've had them come to me and ask for help in dealing with their court cases .
translation.zu: sampela i bin kam askim mi long helpim ol long kot bilong ol .

translation.en: i 'll not discuss this with them .
translation.zu: tasol mi no toktok wantaim ol long dispela samting .

translation.en: as a result , the ones who come into the study group and stay there over a period of time really want to learn what the bible says .
translation.zu: dispela i mekim na ol man i wok long kam oltaim long stadi , em ol man i gat laik tru long lainim ol tok bilong baibel .

translation.en: nick : one thing i notice is the changes that some inmates make while they are in the penitentiary .
translation.zu: nick : wanpela samting mi luksave long en , em ol senis sampela man i mekim taim ol i stap long kalabus .

translation.en: that is very hard for them .
translation.zu: dispela i givim hatwok tru long ol .

translation.en: if the bible had not touched their hearts , they would not have been able to remain faithful under those circumstances .
translation.zu: sapos baibel i no bin kirapim tru bel bilong ol , ol bai i no inap stap gut long god taim ol dispela hevi i painim ol .

translation.en: israel : generally , they are people with a deep desire to learn about jehovah , and they express it in a beautiful way .
translation.zu: israel : planti em ol man i gat laik tru long kisim save long jehova , na toktok bilong ol i kamapim klia ol i pilim tru samting ol i laik kisim .

translation.en: you can see that it comes from their heart .
translation.zu: yu inap save long laik tru i stap long bel bilong ol .

translation.en: joe : the ones who become true christians have come to understand why things went wrong in their lives .
translation.zu: joe : ol kalabus i kamap kristen tru , ol i bin tingim gut ol samting na ol i save bilong wanem wokabaut bilong ol i bin go nogut .

translation.en: they also understand that there is hope for change - a window of hope opens up for them .
translation.zu: na tu , ol i save i gat as bilong bilip olsem senis inap kamap - i olsem wanpela i opim rot bilong ol long kisim bilip .

translation.en: now they can sincerely anticipate the fulfillment of jehovah 's promises for the future .
translation.zu: na nau ol inap wetim truim bilong ol tok promis bilong jehova long ol samting em bai kamapim bihain .

translation.en: joe : the purpose of the penal system is , not to rehabilitate , but to keep criminals away from the rest of society .
translation.zu: joe : wok bilong kalabus i no bilong senisim pasin bilong man , nogat . em bilong pasim ol raskol na bai ol i stap longwe long ol narapela manmeri .

translation.en: that 's the core of the problem - the mind - set of the prison system toward these men .
translation.zu: dispela samting i mekim , olsem na ol i no senisim pasin bilong ol .

translation.en: henry : the prison system is unable to change the offenders ' hearts .
translation.zu: henry : wok bilong kalabusim man i no inap senisim tingting i stap long bel bilong em .

translation.en: most of these people are going to repeat their crimes when they get out .
translation.zu: planti bilong ol dispela lain i stap long kalabus , ol bai mekim gen wankain pasin nogut taim ol i lusim kalabus .

translation.en: the bible 's viewpoint
translation.zu: baibel i tok wanem ?

translation.en: was jehovah the tribal god of the jews ?
translation.zu: yu ting jehova em i god bilong ol juda tasol ?

translation.en: in many lands today , the name jehovah is closely associated with the modern - day organization of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: long planti kantri long nau , ol man i tok nem jehova em bilong oganaisesen bilong ol witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: yet , this name appears in some bible translations that are used by religions besides jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: tasol dispela nem i stap long sampela baibel em ol witnes bilong jehova i save yusim , na ol narapela lotu tu i save yusim ol dispela wankain baibel .

translation.en: indeed , the name jehovah as represented by the tetragrammaton has been in use for thousands of years .
translation.zu: tru tumas , inap planti tausen yia pinis ol man i bin yusim dispela nem jehova olsem tetragramaton i makim .

translation.en: jehovah is sometimes called " the god of israel . "
translation.zu: sampela taim baibel i kolim jehova olsem " god bilong israel . "

translation.en: " [ jehovah ] began life as a very aggressive tribal deity of the israelites , " claims karen armstrong , writer of the book a history of god .
translation.zu: karen armstrong , em i raitim buk a history of god , em i tok : ' pastaim ol man i ting [ jehova ] em i god bilong lain israel i save belhat na kros .

translation.en: " later , the prophets of israel . . . , in about the seventh and sixth centuries b.c . , made this tribal god a symbol for the absolutely indescribable reality . "
translation.zu: bihain , long yia 650 b.c . na 550 b.c . samting , ol profet bilong israel i yusim dispela nem bilong makim olsem dispela god i winim tru olgeta samting ol man inap tingim bilong stori long em . '

translation.en: a number of religious historians have attempted to trace the origin of the name jehovah to canaanite or egyptian sources .
translation.zu: sampela saveman bilong lotu i traim long painim ol samting bilong soim olsem dispela nem jehova i kirap long kenan o isip .

translation.en: others assert that it " is an old tribal name " and does not identify the god portrayed in the " new testament . "
translation.zu: ol narapela i tok dispela nem i ' wanpela olpela nem bilong lain juda ' na i no makim dispela god em " nupela testamen " i stori long em .

translation.en: what does a careful reading of the bible reveal ?
translation.zu: yumi inap kisim wanem save taim yumi skelim gut ol tok bilong baibel ?

translation.en: jehovah - the god of all people
translation.zu: jehova - god bilong olgeta lain man

translation.en: the bible acknowledges the intimate association of jehovah with the israelite nation .
translation.zu: baibel i tokaut long pasin bilong jehova long pas gut wantaim lain israel .

translation.en: but this is no reason to consider him a mere tribal god .
translation.zu: tasol dispela i no gutpela as bilong yumi ken ting olsem em i wanpela god tasol bilong lain israel .

translation.en: is he not also of people of the nations ? "
translation.zu: ating god em i god bilong ol juda tasol ?

translation.en: " yes , of people of the nations also . "
translation.zu: em i god bilong ol arapela lain tu . "

translation.en: who was the god that paul referred to ?
translation.zu: pol i toktok long wanem god ?

translation.en: well , in this same letter to the romans , the name jehovah appears 19 times .
translation.zu: long dispela wankain pas em i salim long ol rom , dispela nem jehova i stap 19 taim long en .

translation.en: the apostle , quoting the ancient hebrew prophet joel , noted that not just the jews but " everyone who calls on the name of jehovah will be saved . " - romans 10 : 13 ; joel 2 : 32 .
translation.zu: aposel pol i kamapim tok bilong wanpela profet hibru bilong bipo , em joel , na em i tok " olgeta manmeri i singaut long nem bilong jehova , bai em i kisim bek ol , " na i no ol juda tasol . - rom 10 : 13 , nw ; joel 2 : 32 .

translation.en: the israelites did not choose jehovah as their god ; rather , jehovah chose them to accomplish his purpose - that is , to prepare the way for the messiah .
translation.zu: lain israel i no bin makim jehova bilong kamap god bilong ol , nogat ; jehova i makim ol bilong inapim laik bilong em - bilong redim rot bilong mesaia .

translation.en: furthermore , a tribal god 's destiny is bound up with that of its people .
translation.zu: na tu , wanem samting i painim wanpela lain , dispela wankain samting bai painim god bilong ol tu .

translation.en: when the tribe is vanquished , the god too suffers defeat .
translation.zu: taim birua i daunim dispela lain , ol i save daunim god bilong ol tu .

translation.en: this has not been the case with jehovah .
translation.zu: tasol dispela samting i no bin painim jehova .

translation.en: jehovah 's covenant with abraham - put into effect centuries before the christian era - promised blessings for people of all nations , showing god 's interest in all mankind .
translation.zu: kontrak jehova i mekim wantaim abraham - em ol i mekim inap planti handet yia paslain long taim bilong ol kristen - i tok promis olsem ol gutpela samting bai painim olgeta lain man , na dispela i soim olsem god i laikim olgeta man .

translation.en: israelite king david showed that jehovah was proprietor of more than just the land of israel : " to jehovah belong the earth and that which fills it , the productive land and those dwelling in it . " - psalm 24 : 1 .
translation.zu: em i tok : " dispela graun wantaim olgeta samting i stap long en , em olgeta i bilong bikpela tasol . olgeta ples na olgeta manmeri bilong ples , ol tu i bilong em . " - song 24 : 1 .

translation.en: later when david 's son solomon dedicated a temple of worship to jehovah , he showed that there was a way by which jehovah could be approached by humble people of any nation .
translation.zu: bihain taim pikinini bilong devit , em solomon , i dediketim tempel bilong lotuim jehova , em i soim olsem i gat rot bilong ol man bilong olgeta lain em ol i gat pasin daun ol i ken i go klostu long god .

translation.en: in his dedication prayer , solomon said : " also to the foreigner , who is no part of your people israel and who actually comes from a distant land . . . and prays toward this house , may you yourself listen from the heavens , your established place of dwelling , and you must do according to all that for which the foreigner calls to you ; in order that all the peoples of the earth may get to know your name so as to fear you the same as your people israel do . " - 1 kings 8 : 41 - 43 .
translation.zu: long beten solomon i mekim bilong dediketim tempel , em i tok : " ol man bilong ol arapela kantri . . . sapos wanpela bilong ol i laik lotu long yu na i lusim as ples bilong en na i kam klostu long dispela haus na i beten long yu , orait , bikpela , yu stap long ples bilong yu long heven na yu ken harim beten bilong en na mekim ol samting em i askim yu long mekim . olsem na bai olgeta lain man long olgeta kantri i ken save long yu na i stap aninit long yu , olsem mipela israel , ol manmeri bilong yu , i save mekim . " - 1 king 8 : 41 - 43 .

translation.en: labuschagne wrote : " throughout her history israel experienced again and again that the ' national ' god could act in a most unnational and even antinational way . "
translation.zu: labuschagne i stori long pasin i stap namel long lain israel na jehova na em i tok : " planti taim dispela god ' bilong israel ' i no helpim lain bilong em na sampela taim i olsem em i birua long lain bilong em . "

translation.en: in the first century when israel rejected the messiah , jehovah rejected that nation .
translation.zu: long taim bilong ol aposel lain israel i sakim mesaia , olsem na jehova i sakim ol .

translation.en: however , jehovah 's name was to continue to be used among christians .
translation.zu: tasol ol kristen i mas wok yet long yusim nem bilong jehova .

translation.en: as the christian congregation grew , its membership came to include people of all nations .
translation.zu: taim kongrigesen kristen i wok long kamap bikpela , ol man bilong olgeta lain i go insait long en .

translation.en: presiding at a christian assembly in jerusalem , the jewish disciple james spoke of god as having " turned his attention to the [ non - jewish ] nations to take out of them a people for his name . "
translation.zu: long wanpela kibung kristen long jerusalem , disaipel jems bilong lain juda , em i tok olsem god " i kam long ol man bilong ol arapela lain , bilong kisim ol lain manmeri bilong ol na mekim ol i kamap lain bilong em yet . "

translation.en: as proof that this had been foretold , james then quoted a prophecy in the book of amos in which jehovah 's name appears . - acts 15 : 2 , 12 - 18 ; amos 9 : 11 , 12 .
translation.zu: bilong kamapim klia olsem wanpela tok profet i bin tokaut pinis long dispela samting , jems i kolim wanpela tok profet bilong buk amos i gat nem jehova i stap long en . - aposel 15 : 2 , 12 - 18 ; amos 9 : 11 , 12 . em i tingim tru olgeta man na mekim gut long ol

translation.en: further confirming the universalness of jehovah 's godship , paul wrote : " there is no distinction between jew and greek , for there is the same lord over all , who is rich to all those calling upon him . "
translation.zu: bikpela wanpela tasol em i bikpela bilong yumi olgeta . na em i save mekim gut tru long olgeta manmeri i singaut long em na askim em long helpim ol . "

translation.en: yes , all obedient humankind can receive jehovah 's blessing .
translation.zu: em nau , jehova bai mekim gut long olgeta man i bihainim tok bilong em .

translation.en: his word describes such people as " the desirable things of all the nations . "
translation.zu: baibel i tok ol dispela kain manmeri i olsem " ol gutpela samting bilong olgeta lain . "

translation.en: the last book of the bible says about them : " all the nations will come and worship before you [ jehovah ] , because your righteous decrees have been made manifest . " - revelation 15 : 4 .
translation.zu: laspela buk bilong baibel i tok long ol olsem : " olgeta lain man bai i kam na lotu long yu [ jehova ] . long wanem , stretpela pasin bilong yu i kamap ples klia pinis . " - kth 15 : 4 .

translation.en: the bible 's viewpoint
translation.zu: baibel i tok wanem ?

translation.en: are all religions different roads leading to god ?
translation.zu: yu ting olgeta lotu i narapela narapela rot i go long god ?

translation.en: " i find it literally incredible that the god of the whole universe has chosen to be known by one religious tradition , " stated author marcus borg .
translation.zu: man bilong raitim buk marcus borg i tok : " mi no inap bilip tru olsem god bilong heven na graun i makim wanpela lotu olsem rot bilong ol man i ken kisim save long em . "

translation.en: a popular hindu view is " jotto moth , totto poth , " which means when loosely translated that all religions are but different roads leading to the same goal .
translation.zu: wanpela tok ol hindu i save mekim em " jotto moth , totto poth , " insait bilong en i olsem , olgeta lotu i narapela narapela rot bilong i go long wanpela ples tasol .

translation.en: buddhists also share this viewpoint .
translation.zu: ol buda tu i gat wankain bilip olsem .

translation.en: indeed , millions of people believe that all religions are different roads leading to god .
translation.zu: tru tumas , planti milion manmeri i bilip olsem olgeta lotu i narapela narapela rot bilong i go long god .

translation.en: historian geoffrey parrinder stated : " it is sometimes said that all religions have the same goal , or are equal ways to the truth , or even that all teach the same doctrines . "
translation.zu: saveman geoffrey parrinder i tok : " sampela man i tok olsem olgeta lotu i gat wankain mak , o ol i wankain rot bilong bringim man long tok i tru , o olgeta i skulim ol man long ol wankain bilip . "

translation.en: in most religious groups , some put forth sincere efforts to help others .
translation.zu: long planti lotu , sampela man i wok strong long helpim ol narapela .

translation.en: so , then , if one is sincere in his beliefs and tries to live a good life , does it matter what religion he belongs to ?
translation.zu: olsem na sapos wanpela man i givim bel tru long ol bilip bilong em na em i laik bihainim stretpela pasin , orait yu ting em i no bikpela samting long wanem lotu em i insait long en ?

translation.en: or are all religions just different roads leading to god ?
translation.zu: o olgeta lotu i narapela narapela rot bilong i go long god ?

translation.en: consider the case of the first - century jewish man named saul , who became the christian apostle known as paul .
translation.zu: tingim wanpela man juda long taim bilong ol aposel , nem bilong em sol , na bihain em i kamap wanpela aposel kristen ol i kolim em pol .

translation.en: he was a very zealous adherent of judaism , and this led him to try to stamp out the worship of the followers of christ , which worship he felt was improper .
translation.zu: em i save givim bel long bihainim lotu juda , na dispela i mekim na em i wok long bagarapim lotu bilong lain bilong krais , em lotu em i ting i no stret .

translation.en: but through god 's mercy saul came to realize that very religious people like himself might have a zeal for god , and yet , because of not having all the facts , they might be wrong .
translation.zu: tasol long rot bilong marimari bilong god sol i kisim save olsem , ol man i givim bel tru long lotu na god olsem em i bin mekim , ating bilip bilong ol i no stret , long wanem , ol i no save gut long olgeta tok bilong god .

translation.en: when saul learned more about god 's will and dealings , he changed and began to worship with the very ones he had been persecuting - the followers of jesus christ . - 1 timothy 1 : 12 - 16 .
translation.zu: taim sol i kisim sampela save moa long laik na pasin bilong god , em i senis na i kirap lotu wantaim dispela lain em i bin birua long ol - em ol disaipel bilong jisas krais . - 1 timoti 1 : 12 - 16 .

translation.en: does the bible say that there are hundreds of faiths to choose from and that whichever one we select will be all right with god ?
translation.zu: yu ting baibel i tok olsem i gat planti handet lotu i stap bilong yumi ken makim na bihainim , na wanem lotu yumi makim em i gutpela long ai bilong god ?

translation.en: many of the people to whom paul was sent already had a religion .
translation.zu: ol man jisas i salim pol i go long ol , planti ol i gat lotu pinis .

translation.en: but they were in " darkness . "
translation.zu: tasol ol i stap long " tudak . "

translation.en: indeed , if all religions were simply different roads leading to life everlasting and god 's favor , there would have been no need for jesus to train his followers for the disciple - making work that he commissioned them to do . - matthew 28 : 19 , 20 .
translation.zu: tru tumas , sapos olgeta lotu i narapela narapela rot i bringim ol man long laip oltaim na bilong god i orait long ol , bai i no gat wok long jisas long skulim ol disaipel bilong em long mekim wok bilong kamapim disaipel , olsem em i bin tokim ol long mekim . - matyu 28 : 19 , 20 .

translation.en: the bible explicitly states that there is " one faith . "
translation.zu: baibel i tok klia stret olsem i gat " wanpela pasin bilong bilip . "

translation.en: clearly , many who are on the " broad " road have a religion .
translation.zu: planti man i stap long " bikpela " rot ol i gat lotu .

translation.en: but they do not have the " one faith . "
translation.zu: tasol ol i no gat " wanpela pasin bilong bilip . "

translation.en: since there is only one true form of worship , those who desire to find that true faith will have to seek it out .
translation.zu: i gat wanpela pasin bilong mekim lotu i tru , olsem na husat man i laikim lotu i tru ol i mas wok long painim dispela .

translation.en: search for the true god
translation.zu: wok long painim god tru

translation.en: from the very beginning of man 's history , god has told humans what he wants them to do .
translation.zu: kirap long taim ol man i kamap nupela long graun , god i tokim ol long ol samting em i laik ol i mas mekim .

translation.en: this makes it possible for us to distinguish between acceptable worship and unacceptable worship .
translation.zu: dispela i helpim yumi long skelim wanem lotu god i laikim na wanem lotu god i no laikim .

translation.en: some people have inherited their religion , while others just go along with the majority in the community .
translation.zu: sampela man i kisim lotu bilong papamama bilong ol , na sampela ol i bihainim tasol lotu bilong ol man i stap long hap bilong ol .

translation.en: for many , religion is simply a matter of when and where they were born .
translation.zu: planti manmeri i save bihainim nating lotu i strong long ples bilong ol o i strong long taim mama i karim ol .

translation.en: however , should you leave your choice of religion to chance or let others make this decision for you ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem ? bai yu kirap bihainim nating tasol wanpela lotu o larim ol narapela i makim lotu bilong yu ?

translation.en: your choice of religion should be an informed one based on a careful examination of the scriptures .
translation.zu: taim yu laik makim lotu bilong bihainim , yu mas skelim baibel na ol tok bilong en i mas stiaim tingting bilong yu .

translation.en: in the first century , certain educated people did more than simply accept the apostle paul 's words at face value .
translation.zu: long taim bilong ol aposel , sampela man i kisim gutpela skul ol i no bihainim nating tasol ol tok aposel pol i autim .

translation.en: why not do the same yourself ?
translation.zu: gutpela sapos yu mekim wankain , a ?

translation.en: the bible describes the god of the universe as looking for people to worship him with truth .
translation.zu: baibel i tok god bilong heven na graun i wok long painim ol manmeri i laik lotuim em long pasin i tru .

translation.en: as recorded at john 4 : 23 , 24 , jesus explained : " nevertheless , the hour is coming , and it is now , when the true worshipers will worship the father with spirit and truth , for , indeed , the father is looking for suchlike ones to worship him .
translation.zu: long jon 4 : 23 , 24 , jisas i tok : " tasol taim i laik kamap , na nau i kamap pinis , na olgeta man i laik lotu tru bai ol i lotu long papa long strong bilong holi spirit na long pasin i tru . na papa i laikim tumas bai ol kain man olsem i mas lotu long em . god em i spirit .

translation.en: god is a spirit , and those worshiping him must worship with spirit and truth . "
translation.zu: na ol man i lotu long em , ol i mas lotu long strong bilong holi spirit na long pasin i tru . "

translation.en: only " worship that is clean and undefiled from the standpoint of our god and father " is acceptable to him .
translation.zu: lotu " i stap stret olgeta na i no gat asua long ai bilong god papa bilong yumi , " em i save laikim kain lotu olsem .

translation.en: god has blessed the search of millions to find the narrow road that leads to life .
translation.zu: god i blesim hatwok bilong planti milion manmeri i wok long painim liklik rot i go long laip .

translation.en: he will not give eternal life to the indifferent but rather to those who put forth a real effort to find the narrow way he has set out and then follow it . - malachi 3 : 18 .
translation.zu: em i no inap givim laip oltaim long ol man i ting olgeta lotu i gutpela , nogat ; em bai givim laip long ol man i wok strong long painim liklik rot em i makim na ol i bihainim dispela rot . - malakai 3 : 18 .

"

translation.zu: dispela tok bai kamapim olsem em i bikpela samting long skulim yumi yet taim yumi skulim ol narapela , na bihainim stretpela pasin , mekim stadi bilong yumi yet , na sakim ol samting satan i mekim bilong paulim yumi .

translation.zu: na bilong pinisim program bilong dispela de ol bai mekim wanpela tok i stori long aisaia sapta 60 , nem bilong en " jehova i givim lait long lain bilong em na ol i kamap nambawan tru . "

translation.en: saturday 's talks " finding refreshment under christ 's yoke , " " imitate the great teacher , " and " are you willing to serve others ? "
translation.zu: ol tok bilong sarere , olsem " kisim nupela strong aninit long plang bilong krais , " " bihainim pasin bilong bikpela tisa , " na " yu gat laik long helpim ol narapela ? "

translation.en: the morning symposium will provide suggestions on making disciples , and the afternoon presentation will highlight ways we can benefit more fully from bible study and attendance at christian meetings .
translation.zu: tok i gat tripela hap i kamap long moningtaim em bai kamapim sampela tok bilong helpim yumi long kamapim disaipel .

translation.en: the morning program will conclude with a discussion of baptism , after which there will be opportunity for qualified individuals to be baptized .

translation.en: many will be anxious to hear saturday afternoon 's concluding talk , " new provisions for our spiritual advancement . "
translation.zu: planti bai laik tru long harim laspela tok long apinun , nem bilong en " ol nupela samting bilong helpim yumi kamap strong long samting bilong spirit . "

translation.en: the sunday morning program includes a three - part symposium that discusses the book of malachi and provides fine application to situations in our day .
translation.zu: long sande , long program bilong moningtaim bai i gat tok i gat tripela hap na em bai stori long buk malakai na i kamapim ol tok bilong dispela buk i stret long taim bilong yumi .

translation.zu: bihain long dispela , bai i gat wanpela pilai i stori long kora , datan , na abiram i bikhet long moses , em man god i makim bilong bosim ol .

translation.en: afterward , a talk will highlight the message conveyed in the drama .
translation.zu: bihain wanpela tok bai i kamap i stori long bikpela samting bilong dispela pilai .

translation.en: the afternoon program will feature the public address entitled " who are teaching all nations the truth ? "
translation.zu: long apinun bai i gat pablik - tok nem bilong en " husat ol i wok long skulim olgeta lain long tok i tru ? "

translation.en: the love song of the cricket
translation.zu: grasopa i singsing bilong painim meri

translation.en: at two inches [ 50 mm ] or less in length , a cricket might not seem to be a likely showstopper .
translation.zu: wanpela kain grasopa ol i kolim kriket , em i longpela inap 50 milimita na ating yumi no save tingting tumas long en .

translation.en: yet , the song of this cricket captures the attention of millions of people worldwide .
translation.zu: tasol long olgeta hap bilong graun , singsing bilong dispela kriket i save pulim tingting bilong planti milion man .

translation.en: how does this small creature sing , and for what purpose ?
translation.zu: dispela liklik binatang i save singsing olsem wanem , na bilong wanem em i save singsing ?

translation.en: interestingly , among the approximately 2,400 species of crickets , only the males sing , or chirp .
translation.zu: i gat olsem 2,400 kain kain kriket na ol man kriket tasol i save singsing .

translation.en: rather than doing so from their throats , male crickets make music with their wings .
translation.zu: ol dispela man kriket i no save singsing long nek bilong ol , nogat ; ol i save singsing long ol wing bilong ol .

translation.en: one encyclopedia explains that male crickets chirp by rubbing part of one forewing along a row of about 50 to 250 teeth on the opposite forewing .
translation.zu: wanpela buk i tok ol man kriket i save rapim wanpela hap bilong wing bilong ol long ol liklik samting olsem nil i stap long arere bilong narapela wing na dispela i kamapim singsing .

translation.en: the frequency of the chirps depends on the number of teeth struck per second .
translation.zu: pasin bilong em long rapim wing bilong em hariap hariap bai makim wanem kain singsing em i mekim .

translation.en: the vibrations fill the air with the distinctive song of the cricket .
translation.zu: em nau , singsing bilong kriket i kamap .

translation.en: but surely the male cricket does not sing simply to entertain his human listeners !
translation.zu: tasol man kriket i no singsing bilong amamasim ol man !

translation.en: no , indeed !
translation.zu: nogat tru !

translation.en: the intended audience of this musician is a potential mate .
translation.zu: em i singsing bilong kisim wanpela poroman .

translation.en: some crickets continue to sing to advertise their presence until a female cricket shows interest .
translation.zu: sampela man kriket i save singsing yet i go inap long wanpela meri kriket i laikim ol .

translation.en: hearing the song through the " ears " on her forelegs , the female is not content to carry on a long - distance courtship .
translation.zu: taim meri kriket i harim singsing long rot bilong " ol yau " i stap long ol han bilong em , em bai kirap long painim dispela man kriket .

translation.en: this serenade entices the female to her suitor , and the two crickets mate .
translation.zu: dispela singsing i save pulim meri kriket long kam klostu long em .

translation.en: in east asia some people keep male crickets as pets because they are amused by their song .
translation.zu: long hap bilong is esia , sampela man i save lukautim ol kriket long haus , long wanem , ol i amamas long harim singsing bilong en .

translation.en: others prefer to enjoy such music in a cricket 's natural habitat .
translation.zu: tasol sampela man i laik harim singsing bilong kriket long ples tru bilong en .

translation.en: in whatever setting , the song of the tiny cricket enchants human listeners around the globe and brings praise to its designer .
translation.zu: tasol maski kriket i stap long wanem hap , singsing bilong en i save amamasim ol man na i litimapim nem bilong man bilong wokim em .

translation.zu: kisim drak - i gat rot bilong stretim !

translation.en: which really are the harmful drugs ?
translation.zu: 3 - 11 wanem ol drak inap nogutim ol man ?

translation.en: is there a lasting solution to the problem ?

translation.en: 6 drugs - why do people abuse them ?
translation.zu: tingting i senis long ol lapun 19

translation.en: 9 drug abuse - there is an answer !
translation.zu: tingting bilong ol man long ol lapun i wok long senis .

translation.en: 12 the bible 's viewpoint is it wrong to mourn ?
translation.zu: ol lapun i ken mekim wanem bilong i stap gut na i stap amamas ?

translation.en: she hated the bible , viewing it as the white man 's book .
translation.zu: planti milion man bai tok yes long dispela askim .

translation.en: what made her change ?
