translation.en: drugs - who takes them ?
translation.zu: ol drak - husat i save kisim ?

translation.en: " everyone takes drugs . "
translation.zu: " olgeta man i save kisim drak . "

translation.en: that sweeping statement may be used to induce the naive to experiment with illicit drugs .
translation.zu: ol man inap mekim kain tok olsem bilong grisim ol man i no gat save long drak na bai ol i ken kisim .

translation.en: but depending on how we define " drugs , " those words contain an element of truth .
translation.zu: sapos yumi skelim ol samting yumi kolim olsem " drak , " bai yumi lukim olsem dispela tok antap i stret .

translation.en: the term " drug " is defined as : " any chemical substance , whether of natural or synthetic origin , which can be used to alter perception , mood or other psychological states . "
translation.zu: mining bilong dispela tok " drak " i olsem : " wanpela kain marasin bilong bus o bilong dokta em inap long kamapim sampela senis long tingting na pasin bilong man . "

translation.en: that is a useful , broad description of what are called psychoactive drugs , although it does not cover many medicinal drugs used for physical ailments .
translation.zu: dispela tok i makim ol drak em ol inap long mekim sampela samting long tingting na pasin bilong man , tasol em i no makim ol marasin em man i save kisim bilong stretim ol sik samting .

translation.en: the danger lies in its immoderate use , which is evidently increasing .
translation.zu: dring inap nogutim man sapos em i kisim planti tumas , na dispela hevi i wok long kamap bikpela .

translation.en: like alcohol , tobacco is legally available , although it contains a powerful poison , nicotine .
translation.zu: olsem bia samting , gavman i orait long tabak maski i gat strongpela marasin nikotin long en .

translation.en: yet , tobacco barons are wealthy , honored members of society .
translation.zu: tasol ol bikpela bisnisman bilong tabak ol i maniman na ol i gat biknem namel long ol man .

translation.en: cigarette smoking is also highly addictive , perhaps more so than the use of many of the illegal drugs .
translation.zu: na tu , pasin bilong smok inap kalabusim man moa yet , winim planti narapela drak .

translation.en: nevertheless , many people still see smoking as an acceptable social activity .
translation.zu: planti man i ting pasin bilong smok i wanpela gutpela samting ol man i ken mekim .

translation.en: smoking continues to be glamorized by the film industry .
translation.zu: ol piksa wokabaut i save litimapim tru pasin bilong smok .

translation.en: what about " safe " drugs ?
translation.zu: olsem wanem long ol marasin ?

translation.en: doctors may at times prescribe drugs too easily , or they are pressured by patients to prescribe drugs that are not necessary .
translation.zu: sampela taim ol dokta i no save skelim gut ol marasin ol i givim , na sampela sikman i save strong long kisim nating marasin .

translation.en: one physician commented : " doctors don 't always take time to sit with the patient to work out the cause of his symptoms .
translation.zu: wanpela dokta i tok : " sampela taim ol dokta i no save lusim hap taim wantaim sikman na traim long kisim save gut long as bilong sik bilong em .

translation.en: it 's easier to say , ' take this pill . '
translation.zu: ol i save tok tasol : ' kisim dispela marasin . '

translation.en: even nonprescription drugs , such as aspirin and paracetamol ( tylenol , panadol ) , if abused can lead to serious health problems .
translation.zu: ol marasin em ol man inap baim nating long haus marasin , olsem asprin na panadol samting ( olsem parasitamol ) , ol inap nogutim tru skin bilong man sapos man i kisim planti tumas .

translation.en: according to our earlier definition , the caffeine in tea and coffee is also a drug , although we hardly regard it as such when drinking our favorite breakfast brew .
translation.zu: mining bilong dispela tok drak em yumi bin stori long en i kamapim olsem marasin kafin long ti na kofi em i wanpela drak , maski yumi yet i no ting olsem taim yumi dring ti o kofi long moningtaim .

translation.en: and it would be absurd to view socially acceptable drinks like tea or coffee in the same light as hard drugs like heroin .
translation.zu: na i no stret long yumi ting olsem ol dring olsem ti na kofi i wankain long ol drak nogut olsem heroin .

translation.en: that would be like comparing a domestic kitten to a fierce lion .
translation.zu: dispela i olsem yumi laik tok pusi i wankain tasol olsem wanpela strongpela laion .

translation.en: nevertheless , according to some health experts , if you habitually drink more than five cups of coffee or nine cups of tea a day , it could do you harm .
translation.zu: ol saveman bilong helt i tok , sapos yu save dring 5 - pela kap kofi o sampela moa o yu dring 9 - pela kap ti o sampela moa long olgeta de , dispela inap nogutim yu .

translation.en: furthermore , if you were to cut a very high intake drastically , you could undergo withdrawal symptoms similar to those of one tea drinker who experienced vomiting , severe headaches , and sensitivity to light .
translation.zu: na sapos wantu tasol yu laik lusim dispela kain pasin bilong dring ti o kofi samting , yu inap kisim pen na hevi long skin , wankain olsem samting i bin painim wanpela meri bilong dring ti .

translation.en: a more controversial issue is the use of drugs in sports .
translation.zu: long nau bikpela tok i kamap long pasin bilong kisim drak long ol pilai spot .

translation.en: time magazine reports that some have even gone so far as to have " ' urine transplants , ' meaning [ that ] someone else 's ' clean ' urine is inserted into their bladder via a catheter , an often painful procedure . "
translation.zu: nius time i tok sampela man i save " kisim pispis bilong man i no bin kisim drak , na long rot bilong wanpela gumi , ol i putim i go insait long rop bilong pispis bilong ol , na dispela pasin i save givim bikpela pen long skin bilong ol . "

translation.en: we have yet to deal with the bewildering array of illicit drugs used for " recreational " purposes .
translation.zu: bai yumi stori tu long ol drak ol man i save kisim bilong painim " amamas . "

translation.en: these include marijuana , ecstasy ( methylenedioxy - methamphetamine , or mdma ) , lsd ( lysergic acid diethylamide ) , uppers ( stimulants like cocaine and amphetamines ) , downers ( depressants like tranquilizers ) , and heroin .
translation.zu: sampela drak ol man i save kisim em mariwana , olsem spakbrus , ekstasi , drak lsd , ol drak bilong kirapim tingting ( olsem koken na amfetamin ) , na ol drak bilong daunim wok bilong kru long tingim ol hevi samting na mekim man i stap bel isi , na heroin .

translation.en: not to be forgotten are the various inhalants , such as glue and gasoline , that are popular among the young .
translation.zu: planti yangpela i save kisim glu na bensin na ol i smelim , na dispela i save mekim wok olsem drak .

translation.en: of course , these inhalants are not banned substances and are readily available .
translation.zu: ol dispela samting i no gat tambu long baim , olsem na em isi tasol long kisim .

translation.en: many on drugs are still able to function relatively normally in everyday life , although their addiction must affect the quality of their life to a greater or lesser degree .
translation.zu: tru , ol i kalabus long drak na dispela i save nogutim i stap bilong ol , tasol planti ol inap mekim ol wok bilong ol long olgeta de .

translation.en: nevertheless , we cannot minimize the dark side of the drug scene .
translation.zu: tasol pasin bilong kisim drak i save kamapim planti hevi long i stap bilong ol .

translation.en: after an apparent decline in the late 1980 ' s , illegal drug use is on the rise again worldwide .
translation.zu: long yia 1989 samting , namba bilong ol man i kisim drak i go daun liklik , tasol nau long olgeta hap planti man moa i wok long kisim ol dispela drak .

translation.en: the star newspaper of johannesburg , south africa , stated that according to government statistics , " one in four people living in south africa are addicted to alcohol or drugs . "
translation.zu: nius the star bilong johannesburg , saut afrika , i tok ol ripot bilong gavman i kamapim olsem , " long olgeta fopela fopela man long saut afrika , wanpela bilong ol i kalabus long ol dring o drak . "

translation.en: an article in discover magazine explained that most american bank notes bear traces of the drug .
translation.zu: wanpela stori long nius discover i tok , planti pepa mani bilong ol beng bilong amerika i gat drak koken long en .

translation.en: considering the widely publicized damage caused by illicit drugs as well as tobacco and alcohol , the obvious question is , why do people abuse them ?
translation.zu: tasol taim yumi skelim ol samting nogut i kamap long pasin bilong kisim ol drak nogut na tabak na dring , yumi laik save , bilong wanem ol man i kisim ?

translation.en: as we ponder this question , it is a good time to reflect on our own views about drugs .
translation.zu: taim yumi wok long tingim dispela askim , yumi ken skelim tingting bilong yumi yet long ol drak .

translation.en: drugs - why do people abuse them ?
translation.zu: ol drak - bilong wanem ol man i kisim ?

translation.en: " i was 13 years old , and my best friend 's sister invited us to their apartment one evening .
translation.zu: " mi bin i gat 13 krismas , na wanpela taim bikpela susa bilong poroman bilong mi i singautim mipela i go long haus bilong ol .

translation.en: at first , i refused it , but after it came around a number of times , i eventually tried it . "
translation.zu: pastaim mi no laik kisim , tasol ol i subim mi planti taim , olsem na mi kisim na traim . "

translation.en: that was how michael , from south africa , explained his introduction to drugs .
translation.zu: michael , bilong saut afrika , i tok em i bin kirap kisim drak long dispela rot .

translation.en: " i come from a conservative family professionally involved in classical music .
translation.zu: " mi kamap long wanpela famili i save gut long wokim ol musik .

translation.en: i played in an orchestra , and one of the musicians used to smoke marijuana regularly during the intermissions .
translation.zu: mi insait long wanpela ben na wanpela man insait long ben em i save smok mariwana long taim bilong malolo .

translation.en: he persistently offered it to me over a period of months .
translation.zu: inap sampela mun em i wok long subim mi long smok mariwana .

translation.en: i eventually tried it and began using it regularly . "
translation.zu: bihain mi traim na mi kirap long smok mariwana long olgeta taim . "

translation.en: that was how darren , a canadian , started using drugs .
translation.zu: darren , bilong kanada , em i kirap kisim drak long dispela rot .

translation.en: both of these individuals went on to use other drugs , such as lsd , opium , and stimulants .
translation.zu: dispela tupela man i kirap kisim ol narapela drak tu , olsem lsd , opiam , na ol drak bilong kirapim tingting .

translation.en: looking back , now as former drug abusers , they agree that the influence of peers was the prime reason they started abusing drugs .
translation.zu: nau ol i no kisim drak moa , tasol ol i wanbel long tok olsem ol wanlain yet i bin kirapim ol long kisim drak .

translation.en: " i never thought that i would ever take drugs , " says michael , " but those kids were the only friends i had , and naturally you go along with them . "
translation.zu: michael i tok : " mi no tingting liklik olsem mi bai kisim drak , tasol ol dispela manki ol i pren bilong mi na mi no gat ol narapela pren , olsem na mi bihainim laik bilong ol . "

translation.en: the entertainment scene
translation.zu: ol amamas samting

translation.en: peer pressure certainly plays a major role in starting many on drugs , and the young are especially susceptible .
translation.zu: wanpela bikpela samting i save kirapim ol man long kisim drak , em ol wanlain i strong long pulim ol , na ol yangpela i save hatwok moa long sakim drak .

translation.en: additionally , they are confronted with the examples of their idols in the entertainment world , who wield a powerful influence over their young fans .
translation.zu: na tu , ol lain i gat nem insait long ol piksa wokabaut na spot samting , ol i gat strong long senisim tingting na pasin bilong ol man .

translation.en: top performers on the music scene often become involved with heavy drugs at some stage in their career .
translation.zu: planti man em ol i gat nem long ol piksa wokabaut ol tu i save kisim drak long olgeta taim .

translation.en: many film stars are also habitual drug users . entertainers can give drugs a glamour and appeal that youths seem to find irresistible .
translation.zu: ol man bilong pilaim musik na mekim ol piksa wokabaut samting ol inap mekim na pasin bilong kisim drak i olsem i gutpela samting , na dispela i save kirapim tru ol yangpela long kisim drak .

translation.en: newsweek reported in 1996 : " the streets of seattle are cluttered with kids who 've moved there to do heroin , just because [ rock musician ] cobain did . "
translation.zu: nius newsweek i kamapim dispela ripot long 1996 : " ol rot bilong seattle i pulap long planti yangpela em ol i bin i go long dispela hap bilong kisim heroin , long wanem , cobain [ man bilong pilaim rok - musik ] i bin kisim heroin . "

translation.en: the drug scene is glamorized in magazines , films , and television .
translation.zu: ol magasin na ol piksa wokabaut na televisen i save litimapim tru pasin bilong kisim drak .

translation.en: why do some get hooked ?
translation.zu: bilong wanem sampela i kalabus long drak ?

translation.en: no surprise , they are lonely and don 't want to be alone .
translation.zu: ol i save stap wanpis na ol i no laik long i stap olsem .

translation.en: they watch endless television and music videos or cruise the internet looking for excitement .
translation.zu: ol i save lukim ol piksa long televisen na harim musik o ol i save painim ol amamas samting long intenet .

translation.en: smoking , drug use , and drinking can easily become a part of this picture . "
translation.zu: olsem na i no hatwok long ol i kirap long kisim smok , drak , na dring . "

translation.en: michael , mentioned earlier , said about his lack of parental supervision at home : " my family life was happy .
translation.zu: michael , em yumi stori pinis long em , em i stori long papamama i no save bosim gut ol : " famili bilong mipela i stap amamas .

translation.en: we were an exceptionally close family .
translation.zu: mipela i save pas gut wantaim .

translation.en: both my parents worked , though , and there was no supervision during the day .
translation.zu: tasol papa na mama wantaim i mekim wok mani , olsem na long san i no gat man i save stap bilong bosim mipela .

translation.en: also , our parents gave us all the latitude in the world .
translation.zu: na tu , papamama i larim mipela i mekim wanem wanem samting mipela i laik mekim .

translation.en: there was no discipline .
translation.zu: ol i no save stretim mipela .

translation.en: my parents had no idea i was using drugs . "
translation.zu: papamama i no save liklik olsem mi wok long kisim ol drak . "

translation.en: once hooked , many continue to use drugs for a simple reason : they enjoy it .
translation.zu: planti man , taim ol i kalabus pinis long drak , ol i save kisim yet , long wanem , ol i amamas long kisim .

translation.en: michael , who used drugs daily , said of their effects : " i was in a dream world .
translation.zu: michael i bin kisim drak long olgeta de na em i stori long ol samting i painim em : " mi pilim olsem mi stap long narapela ples .

translation.en: i could escape from any pressures i had .
translation.zu: mi inap lusim tingting long olgeta hevi bilong mi .

translation.en: i never felt threatened .
translation.zu: mi no pret liklik long wanpela samting .

translation.en: everything was beautiful . "
translation.zu: olgeta samting i gutpela tasol . "

translation.en: another former drug abuser , named dick , from south africa , described the effects marijuana had on him when he started using it at the age of 13 : " i laughed at any joke .
translation.zu: narapela man em bipo i save kisim drak , nem bilong em dick , bilong saut afrika , em i bin kirap long kisim drak taim em i gat 13 krismas na em i stori long ol samting mariwana i mekim long em : " mi save lap long olgeta tok pilai .

translation.en: everything was hilarious . "
translation.zu: olgeta samting i pani tasol . "

translation.en: warnings about the harm drugs can do just don 't seem to scare youths .
translation.zu: maski i gat ol tok lukaut long ol samting nogut drak inap kamapim , dispela i no save pretim ol yangpela .

translation.en: they tend to have an " it won 't happen to me " attitude .
translation.zu: ol i save ting " ol dispela samting i no inap kamap long mi . "

translation.en: teenagers see lung cancer , alcoholism , heavy drug addiction , as things that happen to people who are older , not to them . "
translation.zu: ol yangpela i ting olsem sik kensa bilong waitlewa , na pasin bilong dring oltaim , na kalabus long drak , ol i save painim ol bikpela man tasol . '

translation.en: what is it ? ecstasy and the rave scene
translation.zu: drak ekstasi em i wanem samting ?

translation.en: the sellers promote the impression that taking ecstasy is a safe way to experience a euphoric feeling plus a bonus of boundless energy to dance the night away .
translation.zu: long ol pati ol i kolim reiv , planti man i save kisim drak ekstasi - dispela drak i gat marasin mdma , bilong mekim man i spak .

translation.en: one youth explained the allure of ecstasy : " the buzz begins at your toes , enveloping you in incredible warmth and love as it slowly tingles up to your head . "
translation.zu: wanpela yangpela meri i stori long amamas em i kisim long ekstasi na em i tok : ' isi isi amamas i save kamap bikpela na i go inapim bodi olgeta . '

translation.en: brain scans of regular ecstasy users have provided physical evidence that it is not the harmless drug that sellers claim it to be .
translation.zu: taim ol dokta i glasim kru bilong ol man i save kisim ekstasi ol i lukim olsem , ol man i salim dispela drak ol i giaman taim ol i tok em i no inap bagarapim man .

translation.en: ecstasy evidently damages nerve fibers in the brain and reduces serotonin levels .
translation.zu: ekstasi i save bagarapim ol rop bilong kru na em i save mekim marasin serotonin i go liklik .

translation.en: in time , this may lead to disorders like depression and memory loss .
translation.zu: bihain , isi isi dispela inap mekim na man i stap bel hevi na em bai lusim tingting long planti samting .

translation.en: some deaths have been reported among ecstasy users .
translation.zu: sampela man i bin i dai taim ol i kisim ekstasi .

translation.en: then , too , a number of drug dealers mix ecstasy with heroin in order to hook their clients .
translation.zu: na tu , ol lain bilong salim drak ol i save bungim ekstasi wantaim heroin bilong kalabusim ol man i save kisim dispela drak .

translation.en: how easy to obtain ?
translation.zu: ol man inap kisim olsem wanem ?

translation.en: this is partially due to political and economic changes .
translation.zu: kain samting olsem i bin kamap long saut afrika .

translation.en: south africa is a typical example , where political change has resulted in increasing trade and interchange with other countries .
translation.zu: ol senis long wok politik bilong dispela kantri i kirapim planti man long baim na salim ol samting long ol narapela kantri na ol lain inap i go i kam long kantri .

translation.en: where drugs abound , violent crime is seldom far away .
translation.zu: pait na bagarapim man i pulap tru long ol hap i gat planti drak long en .

translation.en: according to a newspaper report , children in schools in gauteng , south africa - some only 13 years old - are under surveillance by police for drug dealing .
translation.zu: wanpela nius i tok , ol polis i wok long was gut tru long ol pikinini long ol skul bilong provins gauteng long saut afrika - sampela i gat 13 krismas tasol - long wanem , ol i wok long salim drak .

translation.en: a number of schools in the area have begun subjecting pupils to drug tests .
translation.zu: sampela skul long dispela hap i kirap pinis long glasim ol sumatin bilong painimaut olsem husat i save kisim drak .

translation.en: what is the root cause ?
translation.zu: wanem as tru bilong en ?

translation.en: there are clearly many reasons why people abuse drugs .
translation.zu: i gat planti samting i olsem as na ol man i save kisim drak .

translation.en: but these are all symptoms of a deeper problem , a root cause .
translation.zu: tasol dispela i olsem mak bilong wanpela bikpela as tru bilong dispela hevi .

translation.en: writer ben whitaker hinted at this : " the contemporary expansion of drug use is a warning signal of weaknesses and faults in our society , besides loneliness and despair : why otherwise should a significant number of talented and privileged people prefer drugs to the reality of the present day ? "
translation.zu: man bilong raitim buk , ben whitaker , i tok : " dispela hevi bilong planti man i kisim drak em wanpela tok lukaut olsem ol pasin i bosim i stap bilong ol man , i gat sampela samting long en i no stret : sapos i no olsem , orait i gat wanem as na planti man em ol i gat save na ol i holim ol bikpela wok samting ol i kirap long kisim drak ? "

translation.en: we must unearth and face up to that root cause before we can find the only permanent solution to the drug problem .
translation.zu: pastaim yumi mas kisim save gut long as tru bilong ol dispela hevi na bai yumi ken save long rot bilong pinisim hevi bilong drak .

translation.en: this will be dealt with in the following article .
translation.zu: bai yumi stori long dispela samting long stori i kamap bihain long dispela .

translation.en: drug abuse - there is an answer !
translation.zu: kisim ol drak - i gat rot bilong stretim !

translation.en: " huge cocaine haul found in wine bottles . "
translation.zu: " ol i painim koken long ol botol wain . "

translation.en: mixed in the wine were between 150 and 180 kilograms of cocaine .
translation.zu: insait long ol dispela botol wain i gat olsem 150 i go inap 180 kilogram bilong koken .

translation.en: this was believed to be the largest haul of cocaine to have entered the country to date .
translation.zu: bipo i no gat planti koken olsem i kam insait long dispela kantri .

translation.en: unfortunately , this is similar to a gardener snipping a few leaves off a virulent weed but leaving the roots in the ground .
translation.zu: dispela i kain olsem man bilong wokim gaden i katim wan wan lip tasol bilong wanpela gras nogut na em i larim as bilong en i stap long graun .

translation.en: in the united states alone , the estimated annual illegal drug market is many billions of dollars .
translation.zu: ol i tok , long amerika long olgeta yia ol i save kisim planti bilion dola long ol drak ol i salim .

translation.en: with such big money at stake , it is not surprising that police and government officials , even some in high positions , are susceptible to corruption .
translation.zu: em bikpela mani tru ol i kisim , olsem na yumi no kirap nogut olsem dispela inap pulim ol polis na ol bikman bilong gavman na ol man i gat bikpela namba long helpim wok bilong baim na salim ol drak .

translation.en: about these findings a professor of politics at brasília university said : " it 's a massive indictment of all sections of brazilian society . "
translation.zu: wanpela profesa bilong politik long yunivesiti brasília i tok : " dispela i kamapim klia tru olsem olgeta kain man long brasil i insait long wok bilong baim na salim ol drak . "

translation.en: the same might be said of many societies where drugs have a pervasive hold .
translation.zu: yumi ken tok , wankain samting i save kamap long ol narapela hap tu em ol man i stap kalabus long drak .

translation.en: the general concept is that individuals should be allowed to possess small amounts for personal use .
translation.zu: ol i tok olsem gavman i mas orait long ol man i ken holim sampela drak bilong ol yet i mekim wok long en .

translation.en: it is felt that this would make government control easier and would cut the huge profits made by drug lords .
translation.zu: ol i ting dispela bai helpim wok bilong gavman na ol man i mekim wok bisnis long drak bai i no ken kisim bikpela mani tumas .

translation.en: unfortunately , the chances are that once an addict returns to his usual environment , he will be tempted to return to drugs .
translation.zu: tasol planti taim , sapos man i lusim drak na em i go sindaun long wankain hap bipo em i sindaun long en , dispela bai kirapim em gen long kisim drak .

translation.en: writer luigi zoja gives the reason for this : " it is impossible to simply eliminate a behavior without redirecting the patient towards a completely new dimension . "
translation.zu: man bilong raitim buk , em luigi zoja , i kamapim as bilong dispela : " bilong man i ken lusim tru wanpela pasin bilong em , yumi mas helpim em long senisim pasin bilong em na kisim nupela pasin . "

translation.en: darren , mentioned in the preceding article , found a " new dimension " that changed his life .
translation.zu: darren , em yumi stori pinis long em , em i bin kisim " nupela pasin " na dispela i senisim i stap bilong em .

translation.en: he explains : " i was a professed atheist , but in time , even though i was on drugs from morning till night , i came to the realization that there must be a god .
translation.zu: em i tok : " mi bin bilip olsem i no gat god i stap na mi save kisim drak long olgeta taim , tasol bihain mi kirap long luksave olsem i mas i gat wanpela god i stap .

translation.en: during a period of two or three months , i tried to break free from drugs , but my friends would not let me refuse them .
translation.zu: inap tupela o tripela mun samting mi bin traim long lusim kalabus bilong drak , tasol ol pren bilong mi i pasim mi .

translation.en: although i still took drugs , i started to read the bible regularly before i went to bed .
translation.zu: maski mi wok yet long kisim ol drak , mi kirap long ritim baibel long olgeta nait .

translation.en: i associated with my friends less often .
translation.zu: mi no save bung tumas wantaim ol pren bilong mi .

translation.en: one evening my roommate and i were very high on drugs .
translation.zu: long wanpela nait , mi na poroman bilong mi long rum , mitupela i kisim planti drak .

translation.en: i mentioned the bible to him .
translation.zu: mi kirap tokim em long baibel .

translation.en: the next morning he phoned his brother , who was one of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: long de antap long moningtaim em i ringim brata bilong em , em wanpela witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: he referred us to a witness who was living in the same city as we were , and i went to see him .
translation.zu: em i toksave long mipela long wanpela witnes long dispela taun mipela i stap long en na mi go lukim em .

translation.en: " we talked until 11 : 00 p.m . , and i left with about a dozen bible study aids .
translation.zu: " mipela i toktok i go inap 11 : 00 klok long nait na taim mi lusim em , mi kisim 12 - pela buk samting bilong mekim baibel - stadi .

translation.en: i started to study the bible with him and stopped abusing drugs and smoking .
translation.zu: mi kirap stadi long baibel wantaim em na mi lusim pasin bilong kisim drak na smok .

translation.en: about nine months later , i was baptized as one of jehovah 's witnesses . "
translation.zu: olsem 9 - pela mun samting bihain , mi kisim baptais na kamap wanpela witnes bilong jehova . "

translation.en: breaking the drug habit is not easy .
translation.zu: i hatwok long lusim pasin bilong kisim drak .

translation.en: michael , mentioned in the preceding article , reveals the difficulties he had when he stopped taking drugs after 11 years of abuse : " i found it very difficult to eat and thus lost weight .
translation.zu: michael , em yumi stori pinis long em , em i bin kisim drak inap 11 - pela yia na em i stori long ol hevi em i mas winim taim em i laik lusim drak . em i tok : " mi hatwok long kisim kaikai , olsem na mi lusim skin .

translation.en: i also experienced sensations of pins and needles , had sweats , and saw auras around people .
translation.zu: na tu , mi pilim skin bilong mi i dai na mi save tuhat na mi lukim samting olsem lait i stap raunim ol man .

translation.en: i felt a tremendous craving to return to drugs , but drawing close to jehovah in prayer and studying the bible helped me to stay clean . "
translation.zu: skin bilong mi i hangre tru long kisim drak , tasol pasin bilong i go klostu long jehova long rot bilong beten na stadi long baibel i helpim mi long sakim dispela pasin . "

translation.en: illicit drug abuse is just one facet of a larger global problem .
translation.zu: pasin bilong kisim ol drak em i wanpela hap tasol bilong ol bikpela hevi tru i stap long graun .

translation.en: an overwhelming influence for evil , violence , and cruelty grips the whole world .
translation.zu: long olgeta hap bilong graun , pasin bilong mekim nogut long man na pait na bagarapim man i pulap tru .

translation.en: the bible says : " the whole world is lying in the power of the wicked one . "
translation.zu: baibel i tok : " dispela graun olgeta em i stap aninit long strong bilong satan . "

translation.en: that " wicked one " is identified by the apostle john at revelation 12 : 9 : " so down the great dragon was hurled , the original serpent , the one called devil and satan , who is misleading the entire inhabited earth ; he was hurled down to the earth , and his angels were hurled down with him . "
translation.zu: long kamapim tok hait 12 : 9 , aposel jon i stori long satan na em i tok : " ol ensel bilong god i tromoi dispela snek i go daun . em dispela snek bilong bipo yet , na ol i kolim em satan . . . em i man bilong giamanim olgeta manmeri bilong graun . ol i tromoi em i go daun long graun , na ol i tromoi ol ensel bilong en i go daun wantaim em . "

translation.en: in addition to his own weaknesses , man has had to contend with this powerful enemy .
translation.zu: ol man i gat sin na ol i save mekim ol popaia , na ol i mas wok strong tu long sakim dispela strongpela birua .

translation.en: satan is the one who caused man 's downfall at the start .
translation.zu: long pastaim tru , satan yet i as na man i bin pundaun na mekim sin .

translation.en: he is determined to bring further degradation on mankind and to turn them away from god .
translation.zu: em i strong long mekim ol man i go nogut moa yet na pulim ol long givim baksait long god .

translation.en: mankind 's abuse of drugs appears to be a part of his strategy .
translation.zu: i luk olsem wanpela rot bilong em long pulim ol man , em pasin bilong kisim drak .

translation.en: he is acting with great anger because he knows that " he has a short period of time . " - revelation 12 : 12 .
translation.zu: em i belhat tru , long wanem , em i save olsem " em i gat sotpela taim tasol bilong i stap . " - kth 12 : 12 .

translation.en: what is god 's solution ?
translation.zu: god bai stretim long wanem rot ?

translation.en: the bible reveals the creator 's loving provision to redeem mankind from their sinful condition .
translation.zu: baibel i kamapim laik bilong god long kisim bek ol manmeri long sin .

translation.en: at 1 corinthians 15 : 22 , we are told : " just as in adam all are dying , so also in the christ all will be made alive . "
translation.zu: long 1 korin 15 : 22 , baibel i tok : " olgeta man bilong lain bilong adam ol i save dai . na olsem tasol olgeta man bilong lain bilong krais ol i kisim laip . "

translation.en: jesus willingly came to earth as a perfect human and sacrificed his earthly life to redeem mankind from the effects of sin and death .
translation.zu: jisas i bin orait long kam long graun olsem man i gutpela olgeta na em i givim laip bilong em olsem ofa bilong kisim bek ol man long hevi bilong sin na dai .

translation.en: knowing the reason for death as well as the solution to man 's problems has given many the motivation and courage to break free from drug addiction .
translation.zu: planti man em ol i bin kalabus long drak , ol i lusim dispela pasin taim ol i kisim save long as na ol man i dai na rot bilong pinisim ol hevi .

translation.en: but the bible does more than help us deal individually with the drug problem now .
translation.zu: baibel i helpim yumi long abrusim pasin bilong kisim drak na em i mekim sampela samting moa .

translation.en: it tells of the time , after the termination of satan 's influence , when all the world 's ills , including drug abuse , will end permanently .
translation.zu: em i stori long wanpela taim bai kamap na satan i no inap paulim moa ol man , na olgeta hevi bilong ol man na hevi bilong drak bai pinis olgeta .

translation.en: the book of revelation describes " a river of water of life , clear as crystal , flowing out from the throne of god and of the lamb . "
translation.zu: buk kamapim tok hait i stori long " wanpela bikpela wara , em wara bilong givim laip , . . . i kamap long sia king bilong god wantaim pikinini sipsip , na i ran i go . "

translation.en: this symbolic river pictures god 's provision through jesus christ to restore man to perfect life on a paradise earth .
translation.zu: dispela wara i olsem piksa na i makim ol samting god i mekim long rot bilong jisas krais bilong helpim ol man long kisim laip i gutpela olgeta long paradais long graun .

translation.en: revelation describes trees of life flourishing along the river and states : " the leaves of the trees were for the curing of the nations . "
translation.zu: kamapim tok hait i stori long ol diwai bilong laip i kamap arere long dispela wara na i tok : " ol lip bilong diwai ol i bilong mekim orait ol manmeri bilong olgeta lain man . "

translation.en: at last , man will be free , not only from drug abuse but also from all the other ills and problems that plague him in this degraded system !
translation.zu: long dispela taim , ol man bai stap fri olgeta long hevi bilong drak na ol narapela hevi i painim ol man nau long dispela taim nogut yumi stap long en !

translation.en: how safe is marijuana ?
translation.zu: mariwana inap bagarapim yumi o olsem wanem ?

translation.en: the drug has been found to alleviate the nausea caused by chemotherapy , and it evidently helps aids sufferers to overcome loss of appetite .
translation.zu: ol i painimaut olsem mariwana inap pasim man long traut taim em i kisim kimoterapi , na dispela drak inap tu long helpim ol man i gat sik aids long kisim gut kaikai .

translation.en: it has also been used as a pain reliever .
translation.zu: na tu , ol i bin yusim dispela drak olsem marasin bilong daunim pen .

translation.en: while there is disagreement about the results of research findings , tests that were reported on in new scientist magazine have established some of the harmful effects of marijuana .
translation.zu: tru , sampela lain i no wanbel olsem mariwana inap helpim ol man , tasol nius new scientist i stori long sampela samting nogut mariwana i save kamapim .

translation.en: a harvard university test compared a group who smoked marijuana daily with a group who used it less often .
translation.zu: yunivesiti harvard i skelim ol lain i save smok mariwana long olgeta de na ol lain i save mekim long wan wan taim .

translation.en: they found little difference on standard mental tests .
translation.zu: ol i kisim save olsem wankain bagarap i painim tupela lain wantaim .

translation.en: another university tested a group of regular marijuana smokers and a group of cigarette smokers , over a period of 15 years .
translation.zu: narapela yunivesiti i skelim ol lain i save smok mariwana long olgeta de wantaim ol lain i bin smok sigaret , na ol i skelim tupela lain inap 15 yia .

translation.en: the marijuana smokers usually had three or four joints a day , while the cigarette smokers had 20 or more cigarettes a day .
translation.zu: ol lain i smok mariwana ol i save smok 3 - pela o 4 - pela mariwana long olgeta de na ol lain i smok sigaret ol i save smok inap olsem 20 sigaret long wanpela de .

translation.en: although the marijuana smokers indulged much less often , it was found that a single joint releases three times as much tar as a cigarette .
translation.zu: maski ol man i smok mariwana ol i save kisim long wan wan taim tasol , ol i painimaut olsem mariwana i gat planti kolta moa winim kolta i stap long wanpela sigaret .

translation.en: in addition , immune cells from the lungs of the marijuana smokers were found to be 35 percent less capable of fighting bacteria than were cells from the cigarette smokers .
translation.zu: na tu , ol i kisim save olsem , long ol man i smok mariwana , ol sel bilong sakim sik long waitlewa i lusim strong bilong mekim dispela wok winim ol man bilong smok sigaret inap 35 pesen .

translation.en: " a painful indictment " of parents
translation.zu: " bikpela asua " bilong papamama

translation.en: an editorial in the south african newspaper saturday star expressed concern over the alarming increase in drug abuse among youth in south africa and commented :
translation.zu: nius saturday star bilong saut afrika i tok , planti yangpela moa long saut afrika i wok long kisim drak . nius i tok :

translation.en: " that our children do this [ take drugs ] is often a painful indictment of us as parents and of society in general .
translation.zu: " planti taim pasin bilong ol pikinini long kisim drak i kamapim bikpela asua bilong yumi papamama na olgeta lain .

translation.en: week in and week out we grub for money , worshipping at the temple of material success .
translation.zu: long olgeta wik yumi save lusim taim na strong bilong kisim ol samting bilong skin .

translation.en: our kids tax our minds , our strength .
translation.zu: yumi save wok strong long helpim ol pikinini .

translation.en: quality time ?
translation.zu: tasol olsem wanem ?

translation.en: it 's easy to throw money at them to get them out of our hair .
translation.zu: taim yumi les long ol , ating yumi givim mani long ol bilong pasim maus bilong ol .

translation.en: tonight , as we sit at a restaurant table or relax in front of the tv , will we even know what they 're doing ? "
translation.zu: long nau nait taim yumi sindaun long haus kaikai o yumi lukim televisen , yu ting yumi inap save long ol samting ol i wok long mekim ? "

translation.en: god 's name changed my life !
translation.zu: nem bilong god i senisim laip bilong mi !

translation.en: as told by sandy yazzie tsosie
translation.zu: stori bilong sandy yazzie tsosie

translation.en: trying to hide , my sisters and i were under the bed giggling and hitting each other when the mormons knocked at our door .
translation.zu: mi na ol susa bilong mi i hait aninit long bet na lap , na narapela i paitim narapela taim ol momon i paitim dua bilong mipela .

translation.en: * when i finally answered the door , i rudely told them that we were traditional navajo and did not want them talking to us about any white man 's religion .
translation.zu: * taim mi opim dua , mi tokim ol strong olsem mipela i bilong lain navajo na mipela i no laik bai ol i toktok long mipela long lotu bilong ol waitskin .

translation.en: our parents had gone to the trading post for necessities .
translation.zu: papamama bilong mipela i bin go long stesin bilong baim ol samting .

translation.en: on their return they learned that i had been rude to the mormons .
translation.zu: taim ol i kam bek , ol i kisim save olsem mi bin tok strong long ol momon .

translation.en: they gave me good counsel never to treat anyone with disrespect again .
translation.zu: ol i givim strongpela tok long mi olsem no ken mekim moa kain pasin olsem .

translation.en: we were taught to treat people with respect and kindness .
translation.zu: ol i lainim mipela long rispektim na mekim gutpela pasin long ol narapela .

translation.en: i remember when an unexpected visitor arrived one day .
translation.zu: mi inap tingim taim wanpela man i kam long haus .

translation.en: my parents had cooked a meal outdoors .
translation.zu: papamama i kukim kaikai ausait long haus .

translation.en: they hospitably invited the visitor to eat first , and then we ate afterward .
translation.zu: ol i singautim dispela man long kaikai pastaim na bihain mipela yet i kaikai .

translation.en: this is in the southwestern united states , where there is spectacular desert scenery , punctuated by unusual red sandstone formations .
translation.zu: dispela ples i stap long hap saut - wes bilong yunaitet stets , em gutpela ples wesan na i gat ol narakain bikpela retpela ston long en .

translation.en: there are many mesas - high , steep - walled plateaus .
translation.zu: long dispela hap i gat planti bikpela hap graun i stap antap tru .

translation.en: during high school i became very close to my cousins who supported the american indian movement ( aim ) .
translation.zu: taim mi go long haiskul , mi pren gut wantaim ol kasen bilong mi em ol i sapotim lain american indian movement ( aim ) .

translation.en: * i was very proud of being a native american and voiced my opinions to white people about the decades of oppression , which i believed were caused by the bureau of indian affairs ( bia ) .
translation.zu: * mi amamas tru long mi wanpela indian bilong amerika , na mi kamapim tingting bilong mi long ol waitskin long pasin bilong ol long daunim mipela , na mi ting lain bureau of indian affairs ( bia ) i as bilong en .

translation.en: i kept it secret in my heart .
translation.zu: mi holim dispela tingting long bel bilong mi .

translation.en: that led me to hate anyone who possessed a bible .
translation.zu: dispela i mekim na mi nolaik tru long olgeta man i gat baibel .

translation.en: i reasoned that it was because of the bible that the white people had the power to take away our land and rights and our freedom to practice our own sacred rites !
translation.zu: mi ting baibel i as na ol waitskin i gat strong long kisim graun bilong mipela , na ol i pasim mipela long mekim ol pasin bilong lotu bilong mipela !

translation.en: i even forged my father 's signature to get out of the protestant and catholic religious ceremonies when we were forced to attend church during my boarding school days .
translation.zu: taim mi go long skul i gat ples slip , ol i subim mipela long go long lotu . mi giaman na sainim nem bilong papa long wanpela pepa na bai mi no ken insait long ol pasin bilong lotu talatala na katolik .

translation.en: we were not even allowed to speak our own language !
translation.zu: ol i no larim mipela long toktok long tok ples bilong mipela yet !

translation.en: we had a deep respect for nature and our surroundings .
translation.zu: mipela i tingim tru ol maunten , diwai , na plaua samting .

translation.en: each morning we faced the east , uttered our prayers , and gave thanks by sprinkling the sacred corn pollen .
translation.zu: long olgeta moningtaim mipela i save lukluk i go long hap is , beten na tok tenkyu na tromoi paura bilong plaua bilong kon bilong mipela ol indian .

translation.en: * this was my formal training in worship the navajo way , and i wholeheartedly accepted it with pride .
translation.zu: * ol i lainim mi long bihainim dispela pasin bilong ol navajo long mekim lotu , na mi amamas tru long mekim olsem .

translation.en: christendom 's idea of going to heaven did not appeal to me , nor did i believe in a fiery torment in hell .
translation.zu: mi no laikim bilip bilong lain kristendom long ol man bai go long heven , na mi no bilip long ol man bai kisim bikpela pen long helpaia .

translation.en: my heart was set on living on the earth .
translation.zu: mi gat laik long stap long graun .

translation.en: during school vacations i enjoyed my close - knit family .
translation.zu: taim mi malolo long skul , mi amamas long stap wantaim famili bilong mi .

translation.en: cleaning the hogan - our navajo dwelling - weaving , and caring for the sheep were my daily routine .
translation.zu: long olgeta de mi save klinim haus bilong mipela navajo - ol i kolim hogan - na mi wokim ol laplap na lukautim ol sipsip .

translation.en: each time i cleaned our hogan ( see photo below ) , i noticed a little red book that contained the bible book of psalms and several books of the " new testament . "
translation.zu: long olgeta taim mi klinim hogan bilong mipela ( lukim piksa daunbilo ) , mi lukim wanpela liklik retpela buk i gat buk song na sampela narapela buk bilong " nupela testamen " long en .

translation.en: i kicked it here and there , never giving any thought to its contents and meaning .
translation.zu: mi save kikim nabaut dispela buk na mi no tingim ol tok bilong en o em i wanem kain buk .

translation.en: but i never got rid of it .
translation.zu: tasol mi no rausim dispela buk .

translation.en: after graduation from high school , i planned to attend trade school in albuquerque , new mexico .
translation.zu: taim mi pinis long haiskul , mi tingting long go long vokesenel skul long albuquerque , new mexico .

translation.en: however , i met my husband - to - be before i left .
translation.zu: tasol paslain long mi go , mi bungim man bihain bai mi maritim .

translation.en: i returned to the navajo reservation , which we call the rez , to marry .
translation.zu: olsem na mi go bek long hap ol navajo i stap long en - mipela kolim olsem res - bilong mipela i ken marit .

translation.en: my parents had been married for many years .
translation.zu: papamama bilong mi i bin marit inap planti yia .

translation.en: i wanted to follow in their footsteps , so i married .
translation.zu: mi laik bihainim lek mak bilong ol , olsem na mi marit .

translation.en: i loved being a homemaker and enjoyed our domestic life , especially with the birth of our son , lionel .
translation.zu: mi laikim tru ol wok bilong haus na mi amamas moa yet long sindaun bilong famili bilong mipela taim mi karim pikinini man bilong mipela , lionel .

translation.en: my husband and i were very happy - until one day when i heard heartbreaking news !
translation.zu: mi na man bilong mi i stap amamas tru - i go inap long de mi harim tok i bagarapim tru bel bilong mi !

translation.en: my husband had another woman !
translation.zu: man bilong mi i gat narapela meri !

translation.en: our marriage was shattered by his infidelity .
translation.zu: pasin pamuk bilong em i bagarapim marit bilong mipela .

translation.en: i fell apart and became very hateful toward him .
translation.zu: bel bilong mi i bagarap olgeta na mi kirap nolaik tru long em .

translation.en: but during the course of our divorce battles over our son and financial support , i simply became sad , feeling worthless and without hope .
translation.zu: tasol taim mipela i katim marit na kot long wok bilong lukautim lionel na mani bilong lukautim em , mi bel hevi tasol na mi pilim olsem mi no gutpela meri na mi no gat gutpela samting bilong wetim .

translation.en: i used to run for miles to ease my grief .
translation.zu: planti taim mi ran inap planti kilomita bilong daunim bel hevi bilong mi .

translation.en: i broke down in tears readily and lost my appetite .
translation.zu: mi krai planti taim na mi les long kaikai .

translation.en: i felt totally alone .
translation.zu: mi pilim olsem mi stap wanpis olgeta .

translation.en: some time later , i started a relationship with a man who had similar marital problems .
translation.zu: bihain , mi kirap prenim wanpela man i gat wankain hevi bilong marit olsem mi .

translation.en: we were both hurting .
translation.zu: mitupela wantaim i bel hevi .

translation.en: he showed me fellow feeling and provided the emotional support i needed .
translation.zu: em i mekim gutpela pasin sori long mi na strongim bel bilong mi .

translation.en: i told him of my innermost thoughts and feelings about life .
translation.zu: mi tokim em long ol tingting bilong mi long laip na ol samting mi pilim long bel .

translation.en: we made plans to get married .
translation.zu: mipela i kirap stretim ol samting bilong marit .

translation.en: then i found out that he too was unfaithful !
translation.zu: bihain mi kisim save olsem em tu i gat narapela meri !

translation.en: as difficult and painful as it was , i forced him out of my life .
translation.zu: mi lusim dispela man , maski i hatwok tru long mekim olsem .

translation.en: i made two attempts to end my life .
translation.zu: inap tupela taim mi traim long pinisim laip bilong mi .

translation.en: i just wanted to die .
translation.zu: mi laik dai tasol .

translation.en: my first inkling of a true god
translation.zu: namba wan taim mi kisim liklik save long trupela god

translation.en: i shed many tears while praying to a god whom i did not know .
translation.zu: planti taim mi krai taim mi beten long wanpela god mi no save long em .

translation.en: yet , i tended to believe that there was a supreme being who had created the awesome universe .
translation.zu: tasol mi bilip olsem i gat wanpela nambawan bikpela i bin wokim olgeta samting long heven na graun .

translation.en: i was intrigued with the beautiful sunsets and meditated on how wonderful that someone was to allow us to enjoy these marvels .
translation.zu: taim san i go daun na skai i luk nais tru , mi tingim gutpela pasin bilong man i mekim ol dispela gutpela samting bilong yumi ken amamas long en .

translation.en: i grew to love that person whom i did not know .
translation.zu: mi kirap long laikim dispela man em mi no save long em .

translation.en: i started saying to him : " god , if you really exist , help me , give me direction , and make me happy again . "
translation.zu: mi tokim em olsem : " god , sapos yu stap tru , helpim mi , soim rot long mi , na helpim mi long stap amamas gen . "

translation.en: meanwhile , my family was worried , especially my father .
translation.zu: famili bilong mi i wari long mi , na papa i wari moa yet .

translation.en: my parents hired medicine men to heal me .
translation.zu: papamama i baim ol glasman bilong ol indian long oraitim mi .

translation.en: my father said that a good medicine man would never quote you a price , and he would practice what he preached .
translation.zu: papa i tok , gutpela glasman bai i no inap singaut long mani , na em yet bai bihainim pasin em i tok ol narapela i mas mekim .

translation.en: to please my parents , i went through the navajo blessing way religious ceremonies on several occasions .
translation.zu: bilong amamasim papamama , mi mekim ol pasin bilong lotu navajo ( navajo blessing way ) inap planti taim liklik .

translation.en: i spent days secluded in the hogan with only a radio by my bedside .
translation.zu: mi stap planti de insait long hogan na redio tasol i stap klostu long bet bilong mi .

translation.en: i listened with abhorrence to a clergyman 's condemnation because i didn 't accept jesus in my heart .
translation.zu: mi bel nogut tru taim mi harim wanpela pris i tok ol man i no bilip long jisas , ol bai bagarap .

translation.en: i had had it with the white man 's religion and even with my own religion !
translation.zu: mi les pinis long lotu bilong ol waitskin na lotu bilong mi yet tu !

translation.en: i made up my mind to find god in my own way .
translation.zu: mi wokim tingting long mi yet bai painim god .

translation.en: during my seclusion i noticed that little red book again .
translation.zu: taim mi stap wanpis insait long hogan , mi lukim gen dispela liklik retpela buk .

translation.en: i discovered that it was part of the bible .
translation.zu: mi kisim save olsem em i hap bilong baibel .

translation.en: by reading the psalms , i learned about king david 's sufferings and depression , and i felt comforted .
translation.zu: taim mi ritim buk song , mi kisim save long ol hevi bilong king devit na bel hevi bilong em , na dispela i mekim gut bel bilong mi .

translation.en: i would not accept the white man 's religion .
translation.zu: mi no laik bilip long lotu bilong ol waitskin .

translation.en: despite my depression , i managed to take good care of my son .
translation.zu: maski mi bel hevi , mi lukautim gut pikinini man bilong mi .

translation.en: he became my source of encouragement .
translation.zu: em i strongim bel bilong mi .

translation.en: i slammed the phone down when i was told to make a pledge of $ 50 or $ 100 !
translation.zu: taim ol i tokim mi long givim 150 o 300 kina bilong ol i ken beten , mi putim telefon i go daun strong !

translation.en: the divorce court trials depressed me , especially seeing my husband not being truthful to the tribal judge .
translation.zu: ol kot bilong katim marit i bagarapim bel bilong mi , na mi bel hevi moa yet taim man bilong mi i giaman long majistret bilong ol indian .

translation.en: it took a long time to finalize our divorce because of battles to get custody of our son .
translation.zu: bikpela hap taim i lus bilong stretim ol samting bilong katim marit , long wanem , mitupela i pait long husat bai kisim pikinini man bilong mipela .

translation.en: but i won .
translation.zu: tasol mi win .

translation.en: my father , without a word , lovingly supported me during the trials .
translation.zu: taim mipela i kot , papa bilong mi i helpim mi gut .

translation.en: he saw that i was deeply hurt .
translation.zu: em i luksave olsem bel bilong mi i bagarap tru .

translation.en: my first contact with the witnesses
translation.zu: namba wan taim mi bungim ol witnes

translation.en: i decided to take life one day at a time .
translation.zu: mi tingting long mi mas karim hevi bilong wan wan de .

translation.en: on one occasion i noticed a navajo family talking to my neighbors .
translation.zu: wanpela taim mi lukim wanpela famili navajo i toktok wantaim lain i stap klostu long mipela .

translation.en: i could not resist spying on them .
translation.zu: mi lukstil long ol .

translation.en: the visitors were involved with some type of door - to - door work .
translation.zu: dispela famili i go long ol haus na mekim sampela kain wok .

translation.en: they came to my home also .
translation.zu: ol i kam long haus bilong mi tu .

translation.en: sandra , a navajo , identified herself as one of jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: sandra , em i wanpela navajo , em i tok em i wanpela witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: the name jehovah caught my attention more than anything else .
translation.zu: dispela nem jehova i kirapim tru tingting bilong mi .

translation.en: i said : " who is jehovah ?
translation.zu: mi tok : " jehova em i husat ?

translation.en: you must be a new religion .
translation.zu: ating yupela wanpela nupela lotu .

translation.en: why was i not taught god 's name in church ? "
translation.zu: bilong wanem ol i no bin lainim mi long nem bilong god long haus lotu ? "

translation.en: she kindly opened her bible to psalm 83 : 18 , which says : " that people may know that you , whose name is jehovah , you alone are the most high over all the earth . "
translation.zu: em i opim baibel long song 83 : 18 , em i tok : " bai ol i ken save tru , yu wanpela tasol , yu bikpela [ jehova ] , na yu god antap tru , na yu save bosim olgeta hap bilong graun . "

translation.en: she explained that god has a personal name and that his son , jesus christ , was a witness for jehovah .
translation.zu: em i tok god i gat nem tru bilong em na pikinini bilong em , jisas krais , em i wanpela witnes bilong jehova .

translation.en: she offered to teach me about jehovah and jesus and left me the book the truth that leads to eternal life .
translation.zu: em i tok em i laik helpim mi long save long jehova na jisas , na em i givim mi buk tok i tru i bringim man long laip oltaim .

translation.en: * excited , i said : " yes .
translation.zu: * mi amamas na tok : " yes .

translation.en: i would like to try this new religion ! "
translation.zu: mi laik kisim save long dispela nupela lotu ! "

translation.en: it explained that life has a purpose , and it was what i needed to rekindle my interest in life .
translation.zu: buk i tok laip i gat as bilong en , na em samting mi mas kisim save long en bilong kirapim gen laik bilong mi long stap laip .

translation.en: i started studying the bible , and to my delight , many of my questions were answered from the bible .
translation.zu: mi kirap stadi long baibel , na mi amamas tru long baibel i bekim planti askim bilong mi .

translation.en: i believed everything that i learned .
translation.zu: mi bilip long olgeta samting mi kisim save long en .

translation.en: it made sense , and it had to be the truth !
translation.zu: ol dispela tok i stret , olsem na em i tok i tru !

translation.en: i started teaching bible truth to lionel when he was six years old .
translation.zu: mi kirap lainim tok i tru bilong baibel long lionel taim em i gat 6 - pela krismas .

translation.en: we prayed together .
translation.zu: mipela i beten wantaim .

translation.en: we encouraged each other with the thought that jehovah cared and that we needed to trust him .
translation.zu: narapela i strongim narapela na tok jehova i tingim mipela na mipela i mas bilip long em .

translation.en: sometimes i had no strength to cope .
translation.zu: sampela taim mi no gat strong long karim ol hevi .

translation.en: yet , his little arms around me , together with the confident and reassuring comment , " don 't cry , mummy , jehovah will take care of us , " made a world of difference .
translation.zu: tasol taim lionel i holim mi na mekim dispela gutpela tok , " mama , yu no ken krai , jehova bai lukautim yumi , " dispela i save strongim mi tru .

translation.en: how that comforted me and gave me determination to continue studying the bible !
translation.zu: em i mekim gut bel bilong mi na strongim mi long stadi yet long baibel !

translation.en: i prayed incessantly for guidance .
translation.zu: oltaim mi beten askim jehova long stiaim mi .

translation.en: the effect of christian meetings
translation.zu: samting ol miting kristen i mekim

translation.en: our appreciation for jehovah inspired us to travel 150 miles [ 240 km ] round trip to attend the meetings of jehovah 's witnesses in tuba city .
translation.zu: mipela i pilim tru ol samting jehova i mekim na dispela i kirapim mipela long raun inap 240 kilomita bilong i go i kam long ol miting bilong ol witnes bilong jehova long tuba city .

translation.en: we attended twice a week during the summer and all day on sunday during the winter months because of the inclement weather .
translation.zu: mipela i save go tupela taim long olgeta wik long taim bilong san , na long taim bilong kol mipela i mekim ol miting long de olgeta long sande .

translation.en: the long drives were tiring , but a comment lionel made that we should never miss a meeting unless we were dying impressed upon me the importance of not taking for granted spiritual instruction from jehovah .
translation.zu: ol dispela longpela raun i mekim na skin bilong mi i les , tasol tok lionel i mekim long mipela i no ken lusim wanpela miting - indai tasol inap pasim mipela - i helpim mi long save olsem em i bikpela samting long tingim ol tok bilong spirit i kam long jehova .

translation.en: at the meetings my tears flowed easily when we sang kingdom songs that emphasized living forever without life 's miseries .
translation.zu: planti taim mi krai long ol miting taim mipela i mekim ol singsing bilong kingdom i stori long laip oltaim i no gat ol hevi long en .

translation.en: i drew comfort and encouragement from jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: ol witnes bilong jehova i strongim na mekim gut bel bilong mi .

translation.en: they followed the course of hospitality by inviting us to their homes for lunch and refreshments , and we participated in their family bible studies .
translation.zu: ol i mekim gut long mipela na singautim mipela i go long haus bilong ol bilong kaikai wantaim , na mipela i insait long ol famili - stadi bilong ol .

translation.en: the elders in particular played a key role in empathizing with us and reinforcing our conviction that jehovah god cared .
translation.zu: ol elda i pilim tru hevi bilong mipela , ol i strongim mipela long bilip olsem god jehova i tingim tru mipela .

translation.en: i was happy to gain real friends .
translation.zu: mi amamas long kisim ol pren tru .

translation.en: they were refreshing and even wept with me when i felt i could continue no longer . - matthew 11 : 28 - 30 .
translation.zu: ol i givim nupela strong long mi , na ol i krai wantaim mi taim mi pilim olsem mi no inap karim moa ol hevi . - matyu 11 : 28 - 30 .

translation.en: just when i felt content with jehovah 's provisions , my boyfriend returned to make amends .
translation.zu: taim mi amamas long ol samting jehova i givim long mi , boipren bilong mi i kam bek bilong stretim hevi bilong mitupela .

translation.en: i still loved him and could not refuse his pleas .
translation.zu: mi laikim em yet na mi no inap sakim em .

translation.en: we made plans to get married .
translation.zu: mipela i kirap stretim ol samting bilong marit .

translation.en: i thought that the truth would change him .
translation.zu: mi ting tok i tru bai senisim em .

translation.en: i was not happy .
translation.zu: mi no amamas .

translation.en: my conscience bothered me terribly .
translation.zu: maus bilong bel i kotim mi strong .

translation.en: to my dismay , he did not want the truth .
translation.zu: em i no laikim tok i tru , na mi bel hevi stret long dispela .

translation.en: i confided in one of the elders .
translation.zu: mi kamapim ol dispela samting long wanpela elda .

translation.en: i concluded that jehovah would never hurt me or cause me pain but that imperfect people would , no matter how much we adore them .
translation.zu: mi kisim tingting olsem jehova bai i no inap bagarapim bel o givim hevi long mi , tasol ol man i gat sin ol bai mekim olsem , maski yumi laikim ol tru .

translation.en: in fact , i learned that there is no security in so - called common - law marriages .
translation.zu: mi kisim save olsem pasin bilong man na meri long stap nating wantaim na i no stretim marit , dispela i no helpim ol long stap gut .

translation.en: i made a decision .
translation.zu: mi skelim pinis samting mi mas mekim .

translation.en: it was very difficult and painful to end this relationship .
translation.zu: em i hatwok tru na mi bel hevi stret long lusim dispela man .

translation.en: even though i would be suffering financially , i needed to trust in jehovah with all my heart .
translation.zu: maski mi bai kisim sampela hevi bilong mani , mi mas bilip long jehova long bel olgeta .

translation.en: i loved jehovah and resolved to serve him .
translation.zu: mi laikim tru jehova na mi laik mekim wok bilong em .

translation.en: on may 19 , 1984 , i symbolized the dedication of my life to jehovah god by water baptism .
translation.zu: long me 19 , 1984 , mi kisim baptais bilong makim olsem mi dediketim laip bilong mi long god jehova .

translation.en: my son , lionel , is also a baptized witness of jehovah .
translation.zu: pikinini bilong mi , lionel , em tu i wanpela witnes bilong jehova i baptais pinis .

translation.en: we received much persecution from my family and ex - husband , but we continued to put matters in jehovah 's hands .
translation.zu: famili na man bilong mi bilong bipo ol i birua tru long mipela , tasol mipela i putim ol hevi bilong mipela long han bilong jehova .

translation.en: we were not disappointed .
translation.zu: na em i strongim mipela .

translation.en: i love them very much , and all i want is for them to give jehovah a chance so that they can be happy too .
translation.zu: mi laikim ol tru , na mi laik bai ol i kisim save long jehova bambai ol tu i ken stap amamas .

translation.en: he was content to see me happy again .
translation.zu: em i stap belgut taim em i lukim mi amamas gen .

translation.en: i found that praying to jehovah , attending the meetings of jehovah 's witnesses , and applying god 's word are vital to the healing process .
translation.zu: mi kisim save olsem pasin bilong beten long jehova , go long ol miting bilong ol witnes bilong jehova , na bihainim tok bilong god i bikpela samting bilong helpim bel bilong man long kamap orait gen .

translation.en: i look forward to a time when all traces of suffering , imperfection , falsehood , and hatred will be completely gone .
translation.zu: mi wet long taim olgeta kain hevi , sin , pasin giaman , na pasin bilong nolaik tru long narapela i pinis olgeta .

translation.en: i imagine our navajo land blossoming with endless vegetation , with the peach and apricot trees that used to be here .
translation.zu: mi tingting long kain kain diwai na plaua bai pulap long graun bilong mipela ol navajo , na ol diwai pits na aprikot bai stap olsem bipo ol i bin stap .

translation.en: i see the joy of different tribes taking part in transforming their arid homelands into a beautiful paradise with the help of rivers and rain .
translation.zu: mi tingting long amamas bilong narapela narapela lain , taim wara na ren i helpim ol long mekim hap graun bilong ol i drai tru i kamap gutpela ples paradais .

translation.en: i see us sharing land with our hopi neighbors and other tribes instead of being rivals as we have been in recent history .
translation.zu: mi tingting long mipela bai stap gut wantaim lain hopi na ol narapela lain indian , na bai mipela i no pait olsem nau mipela i save mekim .

translation.en: i now see how god 's word unites all races , tribes , and clans .
translation.zu: nau mi inap luksave olsem wanem tok bilong god i mekim na olgeta kain skin na lain ol i stap wanbel wantaim .

translation.en: in the future i will see families and friends united with their dead loved ones by means of the resurrection .
translation.zu: bihain bai mi lukim ol famili na pren i bung gen wantaim ol famili bilong ol i dai pinis taim ol i kirap bek long matmat .

translation.en: it will be a time of great rejoicing with everlasting life in view .
translation.zu: em i taim bilong bikpela amamas , na ol man bai kisim laip oltaim .

translation.en: i cannot imagine anyone not wanting to learn about this wonderful prospect .
translation.zu: mi no inap ting olsem i gat man i no laik kisim save long ol dispela gutpela samting .

translation.zu: wok bilong god i go bikpela long graun bilong ol navajo

translation.zu: mi amamas tru long lukim haus kingdom i kamap long tuba city na lukim 4 - pela kongrigesen i go bikpela long hap ol navajo na hopi i stap long en * - em chinle , kayenta , tuba city , na keams canyon .

translation.en: it is no longer a product of my imagination .
translation.zu: nau em i no moa wanpela tingting tasol .

translation.en: since 1998 , the school has been conducted in the navajo language .
translation.zu: kirap long 1998 , mipela i mekim dispela skul long tok ples navajo .
