translation.en: the bible 's viewpoint
translation.zu: baibel i tok wanem ?

translation.en: " moreover , brothers , we do not want you to be ignorant concerning those who are sleeping in death ; that you may not sorrow just as the rest also do who have no hope . " - 1 thessalonians 4 : 13 .
translation.zu: " ol brata , mipela i laik bai yupela i ken save gut long wanem ol samting bai i kamap long ol manmeri i dai pinis . nogut yupela i sori tumas , olsem ol arapela manmeri i no bilip long god na i no wetim taim bilong kirap bek long matmat . " - 1 tesalonaika 4 : 13 .

translation.en: the bible holds out a hope for those who have died .
translation.zu: baibel i tok ol man i dai pinis ol bai i kirap bek .

translation.en: the resurrections performed by jesus , as well as his teachings , point to a time when the dead will be brought back to life .
translation.zu: wok jisas i mekim bilong kirapim bek ol man i dai pinis , na ol tok em i skulim ol man long en , i makim taim bai kamap bihain na ol man i dai pinis ol bai kirap bek .

translation.en: how should this hope affect us ?
translation.zu: dispela bilip i mas mekim wanem long yumi ?

translation.en: the apostle paul 's words quoted above indicate that this hope can prove comforting when a loved one dies .
translation.zu: tok aposel pol i mekim na i stap antap i makim olsem dispela bilip inap strongim bel bilong yumi taim wanpela yumi laikim tumas em i dai .

translation.en: if you have lost a loved one in death , you have no doubt felt the emotional pain that accompanies such a tragedy .
translation.zu: sapos wanpela yu laikim tumas em i dai , ating yu bin sori tumas na bel i bagarap stret long dispela samting i bin kamap .

translation.en: theresa , whose husband of 42 years died shortly after heart surgery , states : " it was such a shock !
translation.zu: theresa i bin marit inap 42 krismas na man bilong em i dai taim em i kisim operesen long klok bilong em .

translation.en: then came the tremendous pain that grew worse as time went on .
translation.zu: bihain , taim ol de i wok long kamap na i go mi bel hevi nogut tru .

translation.en: i cried a lot . "
translation.zu: mi krai planti . "

translation.en: do paul 's words mean that it is wrong to mourn ?
translation.zu: tok bilong pol i makim olsem i gat rong long krai sori long wanpela i dai ?

translation.en: examples of mourning in the bible
translation.zu: stori bilong baibel long ol man i krai sori

translation.en: in many accounts the death of an immediate family member was accompanied by a period of mourning .
translation.zu: long planti stori bilong baibel ol i stori olsem taim wanpela long famili i dai ol i save krai sori inap sampela de .

translation.en: consider how some men of faith mourned over the death of a loved one .
translation.zu: yumi ken skelim stori bilong sampela bilipman i bin krai sori long taim wanpela ol i laikim tru em i dai .

translation.en: abraham , for example , had strong faith that god could resurrect the dead .
translation.zu: abraham i gat strongpela bilip olsem god bai kirapim bek ol man i dai pinis .

translation.en: even with this conviction , when his wife died , he " came in to bewail sarah and to weep over her . "
translation.zu: maski em i bilip tru long dispela samting , taim meri bilong em i dai , em i " sori tru na i krai long em . "

translation.en: although both of them had caused distress to david and his family , they were still his sons , and their deaths brought him much sorrow . - 2 samuel 13 : 28 - 39 ; 18 : 33 .
translation.zu: tru , tupela i givim hevi long devit na famili bilong em , tasol ol i pikinini bilong em na i dai bilong ol i mekim em i bel hevi tru . - 2 samuel 13 : 28 - 39 ; 18 : 33 .

translation.en: at times , the whole israelite nation mourned , as they did over the death of moses .
translation.zu: sampela taim , lain israel olgeta i bin krai sori , kain olsem ol i bin mekim long taim moses i dai .

translation.en: deuteronomy 34 : 8 tells us that the israelites wept for him for 30 days .
translation.zu: lo 34 : 8 i tok olsem ol israel i bin krai inap 30 de .

translation.en: finally , there is the example of jesus christ .
translation.zu: narapela em stori bilong jisas krais .

translation.en: his close friend lazarus died .
translation.zu: gutpela pren bilong em lasarus i dai .

translation.en: and when jesus saw how lazarus ' sisters , martha and mary , and their friends were weeping , he " groaned in the spirit and became troubled . "
translation.zu: na taim em i lukim ol susa bilong lasarus , em marta na maria , na ol pren bilong ol i krai , " bel bilong en i sori tru na em tu i laik krai . "

translation.en: though he knew that in a few moments he would bring his friend back to life , he still " gave way to tears . "
translation.zu: maski em i save olsem liklik taim em bai kirapim bek pren bilong em , tasol " jisas i krai . "

translation.en: jesus loved his dear friends martha and mary .
translation.zu: jisas i laikim tumas tupela pren bilong em marta na maria .

translation.en: so he was deeply moved when he saw their distress over their brother 's death . - john 11 : 33 - 36 .
translation.zu: olsem na bel bilong em i pilim tru taim em i lukim tupela i krai sori long brata bilong ol i dai . - jon 11 : 33 - 36 .

translation.en: abraham , jacob , david , and jesus all exercised great faith in jehovah and his promises , yet they grieved .
translation.zu: abraham , jekop , devit , na jisas , olgeta i bin bilip tru long jehova na ol tok promis bilong em , tasol ol i bin krai . olsem wanem ?

translation.en: absolutely not !
translation.zu: nogat tru !

translation.en: it was never god 's purpose for mankind to die .
translation.zu: em i no laik bilong god long ol manmeri i mas i dai .

translation.en: jehovah 's original purpose , as expressed to adam and eve , was for the earth to be transformed into a beautiful paradise filled with a loving , happy family .
translation.zu: jehova i kamapim laik bilong em long bipo taim em i tokim adam na iv olsem ol i mas mekim dispela graun i kamap gutpela ples paradais na ol gutpela manmeri i ken i stap long en .

translation.en: death would come only if that first couple chose to disobey jehovah .
translation.zu: sapos tupela i sakim tok bilong jehova , indai bai painim tupela .

translation.en: death is thus a cruel enemy that was never meant to be . - 1 corinthians 15 : 26 .
translation.zu: indai em i wanpela birua nogut tru na i no laik bilong god na dispela samting i kamap . - 1 korin 15 : 26 .

translation.en: it is only reasonable , then , that the unnatural event of the death of someone close sparks deep emotional pain for those it touches .
translation.zu: olsem na yumi save , taim wanpela yumi laikim tumas em i dai , dispela i save bagarapim tru bel bilong yumi .

translation.en: it creates an enormous vacuum in their life .
translation.zu: em i no stap moa wantaim yumi na yumi pilim tru dispela samting .

translation.en: theresa , the widow mentioned above , stated with regard to her husband : " i am sure that i will see him again in the resurrection , but i miss him so much now .
translation.zu: theresa , dispela meri yumi bin stori long en pastaim , em i stori long man bilong em olsem : " mi save mi bai lukim em long taim em i kirap bek , tasol mi save wari tru long em i no stap moa .

translation.en: the death of a parent may remind us of our own mortality .
translation.zu: i dai bilong papa o mama i mekim na yumi save tingting long i dai bilong yumi yet .

translation.en: the death of a young person particularly pains us because of the tragedy of a life not fully lived . - isaiah 38 : 10 .
translation.zu: taim wanpela yangpela i dai , dispela i save bagarapim tru bel bilong yumi , long wanem , em i yangpela yet na em i no bin stap longpela taim . - aisaia 38 : 10 .

translation.en: yes , death is unnatural .
translation.zu: yes , indai i narapela kain samting tru .

translation.en: the pain that it spawns is to be expected , and jehovah does not view mourning as a lack of faith in the resurrection .
translation.zu: olsem na yumi mas save dispela inap kamapim bikpela bel hevi , na jehova i no save ting olsem taim man i krai sori em i no bilip tumas long kirap bek , nogat .

translation.en: as seen by the examples of abraham , jacob , david , the israelite nation , and jesus , outwardly expressing our pain of heart is no indication that we are lacking spiritually .
translation.zu: olsem yumi bin skelim long stori bilong abraham , jekop , devit , ol lain israel , na jisas , taim man i krai sori long wanpela i dai , dispela i no makim olsem em i no strong long ol samting bilong spirit .

translation.en: nevertheless , while we as christians certainly do grieve because of death , we do not sorrow " as the rest also do who have no hope . "
translation.zu: tru , yumi ol kristen i save bel hevi long taim wanpela i dai , tasol yumi no save " sori tumas , olsem ol arapela manmeri i no bilip long god na i no wetim taim bilong kirap bek long matmat . "

translation.en: we do not indulge in unreasonable extremes of grieving because we are not confused as to the condition of the dead .
translation.zu: yumi save olsem ol i no kisim pen o bel hevi , nogat . ol man i dai pinis i olsem ol i slip i dai , ol i no tingim wanpela samting .

translation.en: we also have full confidence that jesus , " the resurrection and the life , " will act on his promise to bring back " all those in the memorial tombs . " - john 5 : 28 , 29 ; 11 : 24 , 25 .
translation.zu: na laip , em mi yet , " em bai truim tok promis bilong em long kirapim bek " olgeta manmeri i stap long matmat . " - jon 5 : 28 , 29 ; 11 : 24 , 25 .

translation.en: [ footnote ]
translation.zu: [ futnot ]

translation.en: for help in coping with grief , see pages 14 - 19 of the brochure when someone you love dies , published by jehovah 's witnesses .
translation.zu: bilong helpim ol man i krai sori , lukim pes 14 - 19 bilong buklet taim wanpela long famili i dai , em ol witnes bilong jehova i bin wokim .

translation.en: even so , " the death toll from infectious diseases ( such as aids , malaria , respiratory diseases and diarrhoea ) is 160 times greater than the number killed in last year 's natural disasters , " states a red cross / red crescent press release of june 2000 .
translation.zu: wanpela ripot bilong lain red cross / red crescent bilong jun 2000 i kamapim olsem , " namba bilong ol man i dai long ol bikpela sik ( olsem sik aids , malaria , sik sotwin , na pekpek wara ) i winim tru namba bilong ol man i dai long rot bilong ol guria samting long yia i go pinis inap 160 taim .

translation.en: " and the situation is getting worse . "
translation.zu: na dispela hevi i wok long i go nogut moa . "

translation.en: two main factors are said to be responsible for this shocking figure .
translation.zu: ol i tok tupela samting i as na planti man moa i dai long ol bikpela sik .

translation.en: one is the unrelenting spread of aids , which kills 300 people every hour .
translation.zu: wanpela as em sik aids i wok long kamap bikpela moa na i save kilim i dai 300 man long olgeta aua .

translation.en: aids " is no longer a disease , it is a disaster , " says peter walker , director of disaster policy for the international federation of red cross and red crescent societies .
translation.zu: peter walker , em dairekta bilong lain international federation of red cross na red crescent societies , em i tok , sik aids " i no wanpela sik tasol , nogat ; nau em i wanpela bikpela bagarap .

translation.en: the other factor is the deterioration of public health systems , resulting in a dramatic comeback of older diseases such as tuberculosis , syphilis , and malaria .
translation.zu: na narapela as em olsem : i no gat ol gutpela samting bilong helt , olsem na ol sik olsem tb , sifilis , na malaria i kamap bikpela gen .

translation.en: for instance , one asian country is presently reporting 40,000 new tuberculosis cases every year .
translation.zu: olsem : long wanpela kantri long esia inap 40,000 man i save kisim sik tb long olgeta yia .

translation.en: the irony is , however , that although infectious diseases have turned into disasters , they are actually among the most preventable disasters .
translation.zu: ol bikpela sik i wok long bagarapim ol man , tasol i gat rot bilong pasim ol dispela sik .

translation.en: in fact , the report says that the majority of the 13 million deaths from infectious diseases that occurred in 1999 " could have been prevented at a cost of us $ 5 per person . "
translation.zu: ripot i tok , planti bilong ol dispela 13 milion man i dai long bikpela sik long 1999 , ol bai i no bin dai ' sapos gavman i bin tromoi 15 kina bilong helpim wan wan sikman . '

translation.en: if the world 's governments were willing to spend $ 5 per person on health care - a total of $ 30 billion - imagine how many needless deaths could be prevented !
translation.zu: sapos ol gavman bilong graun i redi long tromoi 15 kina bilong helpim wan wan man long kisim ol marasin samting - inap 90 bilion kina long olgeta dispela man - dispela inap pasim planti man long indai !

translation.en: although this is a considerable amount , it shrinks when compared with what the world spends on other services .
translation.zu: dispela em i bikpela mani tru , tasol em i olsem liklik mani tasol taim yumi skelim wantaim mani ol i tromoi long ol narapela wok .

translation.en: just think of how much more is spent on preparing for war than on preventing the spread of diseases !
translation.zu: tingim bikpela mani ol i tromoi long ol samting bilong pait na ol i no tingting long pasim ol sik i save kalap long planti man !

translation.en: after all , human governments cannot even set the right priorities .
translation.zu: ol gavman bilong ol man i no inap tingim wanem ol samting i bikpela samting tru .

translation.en: myths and facts about older ones
translation.zu: ol stori nating na stori tru long ol lapun

translation.en: myths about old age abound .
translation.zu: i gat planti stori nating long lapun .

translation.en: " ageing - exploding the myths , " a publication of the world health organization 's ageing and health programme , exposes the fallacy of some of these myths .
translation.zu: wanpela nius bilong dipatmen bilong helt na lapun bilong wol helt oganaisesen ( ageing - exploding the myths ) i kamapim klia kranki tingting bilong sampela stori nating .

translation.en: fact : actually , over 60 percent of the world 's 580 million older people live in developing countries .
translation.zu: stori tru : i gat 580 milion lapun i stap long graun , na 60 pesen bilong ol i stap long ol kantri i no gat planti bisnis .

translation.en: an increasing number of people in these lands are reaching old age as a result of better health care and improvements in sanitation , housing , and nutrition .
translation.zu: planti man moa bilong ol kantri olsem ol i wok long winim bikpela krismas , long wanem , wok bilong lukautim sikman na mekim ples i klin i kamap gutpela moa , na ol i gat gutpela haus na kaikai .

translation.en: myth : older people have nothing to contribute .
translation.zu: stori nating : lapun i no inap helpim ol narapela .

translation.en: fact : older people make substantial contributions by doing work for which they are not paid .
translation.zu: stori tru : ol lapun i mekim bikpela wok i no gat pe bilong helpim ol narapela .

translation.en: for instance , an estimated 2 million children in the united states are being cared for by their grandparents , with 1.2 million of them living in their grandparents ' home .
translation.zu: olsem : i gat 2 milion pikinini long amerika em ol bubu i lukautim , na 1.2 milion bilong ol pikinini ya em bubu tasol i mekim bikpela long ol .

translation.en: thus older people provide shelter , food , and education and convey cultural values to their grandchildren while enabling mothers and fathers to continue as members of the work force .
translation.zu: olsem na ol lapun i lukautim ol tumbuna pikinini long ples slip , kaikai , na skul , na ol i save stori long ol long pasin bilong ples . long dispela rot papamama bilong ol dispela pikinini inap holim yet wok mani .

translation.en: in some developing countries , where up to 30 percent of the adult population have contracted aids , older people care for their infected adult children , after whose death they will have to raise their orphaned grandchildren .
translation.zu: long sampela kantri i no gat planti bisnis , klostu 30 pesen bilong ol bikpela manmeri i gat sik aids , na ol lapun papamama bilong ol i save lukautim ol , na taim ol i dai long dispela sik , ol lapun ya bai mekim bikpela long ol liklik bubu bilong ol .

translation.en: myth : older people leave the work force because they can no longer perform their jobs .
translation.zu: stori nating : ol lapun i save lusim wok mani , long wanem , ol i no inap mekim wok bilong ol moa .

translation.en: myth : older people do not want to work .
translation.zu: stori nating : ol lapun i no laik wok .

translation.en: fact : older people are often excluded from paying jobs despite their willingness and ability to continue working .
translation.zu: stori tru : maski ol i gat laik na save bilong mekim yet wok mani , planti taim ol bosman bai tok nogat .

translation.en: however , the early withdrawal of older workers from the labor force does not necessarily translate into jobs for the young .
translation.zu: tasol pasin bilong ol lapun long hariap na lusim wok i no makim olsem ol yangpela i redi long kisim wok bilong ol , nogat .

translation.en: a younger unemployed job seeker may not have the skills needed to take the place of an older worker .
translation.zu: ating yangpela bai i no gat save long mekim dispela wok olsem lapun i bin mekim .

translation.en: with these facts in mind , notes the world health organization ( who ) , the world community should view its aging population as a source of expertise that can be put to good use .
translation.zu: wol helt oganaisesen ( who ) i tok i gutpela sapos ol dispela stori tru i helpim olgeta manmeri long tingim ol lapun olsem lain i gat bikpela save , na dispela save i gat ol gutpela wok bilong en .

translation.en: alexandre kalache , group leader of who 's ageing and health programme , therefore notes that " countries . . . should see their ageing populations not as a problem but as a potential solution to problems . "
translation.zu: alexandre kalache , em lida bilong dipatmen bilong helt na lapun , bilong wol helt oganaisesen , i tok : " ol man long olgeta kantri . . . i no ken tingim ol lain bilong ol i wok long go lapun i olsem wanpela hevi , nogat .

translation.en: and that is a fact .
translation.zu: na dispela em i tok tru .

translation.en: changing attitudes toward old age
translation.zu: tingting i senis long ol lapun

translation.en: at what age are you old ?
translation.zu: bai yu kamap lapun taim yu gat hamas krismas ?

translation.en: the answer seems to depend on whom you ask .
translation.zu: bai yu kisim kain kain bekim long dispela askim .

translation.en: teenagers will happily banish anyone over 25 to this category .
translation.zu: ol yangpela bai tok man i winim pinis 25 krismas em i lapun .

translation.en: on the other hand , opera singers do not reach their prime until much later in life .
translation.zu: ol man na meri bilong singsing long ol musik ol i kolim opra , ol i save singsing gut moa yet taim ol i kamap lapun liklik .

translation.en: and a report in australia 's newspaper the sun - herald claims regarding those intent on climbing the corporate ladder : " today 's truth is that if you haven 't made it by 40 , you never will . "
translation.zu: nius the sun - herald bilong australia i stori long ol man i wok strong long kisim bikpela namba na i tok : " long nau , sapos yu no kisim bikpela namba yet na krismas bilong yu i kamap 40 , bai i no gat rot long yu ken kisim dispela namba long bihain . "

translation.en: is it fair to make such assumptions ?
translation.zu: tasol yu ting i stret long kisim ol kain tingting olsem ?

translation.en: well , according to statistics of the world health organization , in the whole european region , " one in every three road traffic deaths involves people younger than 25 years of age . "
translation.zu: wanpela ripot bilong wol helt oganaisesen i kamapim olsem long olgeta hap bilong yurop , " long olgeta tripela tripela man i dai long rot , wanpela i no winim yet 25 krismas . "

translation.en: furthermore , the most rapid rate of physical decline happens between ages 30 and 40 , and there is no evidence that a healthy person 's intellectual ability decreases with age .
translation.zu: skin bilong ol man i save bagarap kwik namel long 30 na 40 krismas , na i no gat wanpela samting bilong kamapim klia olsem tingting bilong man i no inap wok gut taim em i wok long i go lapun .

translation.en: " a common myth is that ageing and disease are synonymous , " says the medical journal of australia .
translation.zu: wanpela nius ( the medical journal of australia ) i tok , " wanpela stori nating bilong ol man i kamapim olsem lapun na sik i save poroman wantaim . "

translation.en: the fact is , many older ones are enjoying a reasonable measure of health and don 't consider themselves old .
translation.zu: tasol planti lapun ol i gat gutpela skin na ol yet i no ting olsem ol i lapun .

translation.en: why , then , do older people often suffer discrimination and , at times , even outright prejudice ?
translation.zu: tasol i gat wanem as na planti man i save daunim ol lapun na tingting nogut long ol ?

translation.en: the answer revolves to a large extent around attitudes toward aging .
translation.zu: tingting bilong ol man long ol lapun i as na ol i mekim olsem .
